column2: Umhlaba wawulihlane lelingenalutfo, bumnyama babumbonye emanti nekujula kwawo; Moya waNkulunkulu
Nkulunkulu watsi: “Akube khona kukhanya,” kwaba khona kukhanya.
Nkulunkulu wabona kutsi kukhanya kuhle. Nkulunkulu wehlukanisa kukhanya nebumnyama.
Nkulunkulu wakwetsa kukhanya watsi: “Yimini,” bumnyama wabetsa watsi: “Busuku.” Kwahlwa, kwasa: Kwaba lilanga lekucala.
Nkulunkulu wenta umkhatsi, wehlukanisa emanti labengephansi kwemkhatsi nemanti labengetulu kwemkhatsi. Kwase kuba njalo.
Nkulunkulu wawetsa lomkhatsi watsi: “Lizulu.” Kwahlwa, kwasa: Kwaba lilanga lesibili.
Lokomile Nkulunkulu wakwetsa libito watsi: “Ngumhlaba;” nemanti labutsene ndzawonye wawetsa libito watsi: “Lwandle.” Nkulunkulu wabona kutsi loko kuhle.
Nkulunkulu watsi: “Umhlaba awuvete konkhe lokumilako: lokutsela tinhlavu, netihlahla tetitselo letitsela tinhlavu letiyinhlanyelo ngetinhlobo tato.” Kwase kuba njalo.
Umhlaba waveta konkhe lokumilako lokutsela tinhlavu, netihlahla tetitselo letitsela tinhlavu letiyinhlanyelo ngetinhlobo tato. Nkulunkulu wabona kutsi loko kuhle.
Atibe tibane temkhatsi wesibhakabhaka tikhanyisele umhlaba.” Kwase kuba njalo.
Nkulunkulu wenta tibane letikhulu taba tibili: lesikhulu kutsi sibuse imini, lesincane kutsi sibuse busuku. Wenta netinkhanyeti futsi.
Nkulunkulu watibeka emkhatsini wesibhakabhaka kutsi tikhanyisele umhlaba,
tibuse imini nebusuku, tehlukanise kukhanya nebumnyama. Nkulunkulu wabona kutsi loko kuhle.
Nkulunkulu watsi: “Emanti akagcwale yonkhe inhlobo yetilwane letiphilako, kundize tinyoni etikwemhlaba emkhatsini wesibhakabhaka.”

Ngako-ke Nkulunkulu wadala tilwane letikhulu taselwandle nato tonkhe tinhlobo tetilwane letiphilako letigcwele emantini ngetinhlobo tato, nato tonkhe tinhlobo tetinyoni letinetimphiko. Nkulunkulu wabona kutsi loko kuhle.
Nkulunkulu watibusisa watsi: “Talanani, nandze nigcwalise tilwandle, netinyoni tandze nemhlaba wonkhe.”
Nkulunkulu watsi: “Umhlaba awuvete tonkhe tinhlobo tetilwane letiphilako: tonkhe tinhlobo tetifuyo, netetilwane letihamba ngesisu, netilo tesiganga.” Kwase kuba njalo.
Nkulunkulu wenta tonkhe tinhlobo: tetilo tesiganga, netetifuyo, netetilwane letihamba ngesisu. Nkulunkulu wabona kutsi loko kuhle.
Nkulunkulu wababusisa watsi: “Talanani, nandze, nigcwalise umhlaba, niwuncobe. Nibuse etikwetinhlanti taselwandle, nasetikwetinyoni tasemoyeni, nasetikwato tonkhe tilwane letihamba emhlabeni.”
Nkulunkulu watsi: “Ase nibuke la, ngininike tonkhe tibhidvo letisemhlabeni wonkhe letimilisa inhlanyelo, nato tonkhe tihlahla letinenhlanyelo etitselweni tato, kutsi kube kudla kwenu.
Kepha konkhe lokuphilako: tilwane temhlaba, nato tonkhe tinyoni tasemoyeni, netilwane letihamba ngesisu, ngikunika konkhe lokuluhlata kutsi kube kudla kwako.” Kwase kuba njalo.
Nkulunkulu wakubona konkhe labesakwentile, kutsi kuhle kakhulu. Kwahlwa, kwasa: Kwaba lilanga lesitfupha.
Ngako-ke kwase kupheleliswe lizulu nemhlaba, nendalo yako konkhe.
Ngelilanga lesikhombisa Nkulunkulu abesawucedzile wonkhe umsebenti wakhe labewenta; wase uyaphumula.
Ngako-ke Nkulunkulu walibusisa lilanga lesikhombisa, walingcwelisa; ngobe ngalo waphumula emsebentini wakhe wonkhe wekudala.
Ngesikhatsi Nkulunkulu Simakadze enta umhlaba nelizulu,
kusete nakunye lokumilako emhlabeni, netibhidvo tisengakabikho, ngobe Nkulunkulu Simakadze abesengakayinisi imvula emhlabeni, kwakute umuntfu wekuwulima lomhlaba.
Noko kwenyuka inkhungu, iphuma emhlabatsini, yanisela wonkhe umhlaba.
Nkulunkulu Simakadze wahlanyela insimi yase-Edeni ngasemphumalanga; wambeka khona-ke lomuntfu labesamentile.
Nkulunkulu Simakadze wamilisa emhlabatsini tonkhe tihlahla letibukekako letimnandzi; ekhatsi nensimi wamilisa sihlahla sekuphila kanye nesihlahla sekwati lokuhle nalokubi.
Kwavela umfula lowageleta wanisela insimi yase-Edeni, udzabula ekhatsi nayo, bese wehlukana uba ngimifula lemine.
Libito lemfula wekucala yiPhishoni; ngulona logeleta utungelete lonkhe live laseHavila, lapho kunegolide khona.
Igolide yalelo live yinhle kakhulu; kunenhlaka yebhedola kanye nelitje isholamu kulelo live.
Umfula wesibili yiGihoni; ngiwo logeleta utungelete lonkhe live laseKushe.
Libito lemfula wesitsatfu yiThigrisi, logeletela ngasemphumalanga ye-Asiriya. Umfula wesine yiYufrathe.
Nkulunkulu Simakadze wamtsatsa umuntfu wambeka ensimini yase-Edeni kutsi ayilime, ayilindze.
Nkulunkulu Simakadze wamyala umuntfu watsi kuye: “Ungadla ngekutsandza kwakho tonkhe titselo letilapha ensimini;
kodvwa ungasidli sitselo sesihlahla sekwati lokulungile nalokungakalungi, ngobe mhlazana usidla uyakufa nekufa.”
Ngako-ke Nkulunkulu Simakadze wabumba ngemhlabatsi tonkhe tilwane tesiganga, netinyoni letindiza emoyeni, watiletsa kumuntfu kutsi abone kutsi utetsa njani. Lawo mabito latetsa wona tabitwa ngawo.
Ngako-ke umuntfu watetsa emabito tonkhe tifuyo, netinyoni letindiza emoyeni, nato tonkhe tilwane tesiganga. Kepha Adamu
Ngako-ke Nkulunkulu Simakadze wamehlisela umuntfu butfongo lobukhulu; walala. Nkulunkulu wase ukhipha lolunye lwetimbambo takhe wagcwalisa sikhala ngenyama.
Nkulunkulu Simakadze wambumba lomsikati ngelubhambo labelukhiphe kulomdvuna, wase umyisa endvodzeni.
Babehamba ngcunu, bobabili, lendvodza nemkayo, bate emahloni.
Umfati waphendvula inyoka watsi: “Singatidla titselo tetihlahla letisensimini,
ngaphandle kwesitselo sesihlahla lesisekhatsi nensimi; Nkulunkulu utsite: ‘Ningasidli sitselo sesihlahla lesisekhatsi nensimi, ningasitsintsi nekusitsintsa, kuze ningafi.’ ”
Kepha Nkulunkulu uyati kutsi mhlazana nisidla, emehlo enu ayawuvuleka, bese nifanana naNkulunkulu nikwati lokuhle nalokubi.”
Emehlo abo bobabili ase ayavuleka, batibona kutsi bangcunu; base batfunga emacembe emkhiwa, batentela kwekuvunula.
Ekupholeni kwelilanga beva Nkulunkulu Simakadze ahambahamba ensimini; bo-Adamu nemkakhe bambhacela Nkulunkulu Simakadze emkhatsini wetihlahla tensimi.
Kodvwa Nkulunkulu Simakadze wabita Adamu watsi: “Ukuphi?”
Waphendvula watsi: “Ngive livi lakho ensimini, ngase ngiyesaba, ngobe ngihamba ngcunu; ngabhaca.”
Nkulunkulu wambuta watsi: “Ngubani losakutjele kutsi uhamba ngcunu? Sewusidlile yini lesitselo salesihlahla lengakuyala ngaso kutsi ungabosidla?”
Adamu waphendvula watsi: “Ngulomfati lowanginika yena kutsi ahlale nami, nguye lona longinike lesitselo, ngase ngiyasidla.”
Nkulunkulu Simakadze watsi kumfati: “Yini-ke lena lose uyentile?”
Nkulunkulu Simakadze wentela bo-Adamu nemkakhe kwekwembatsa kwetikhumba, wabembatsisa.
Nkulunkulu Simakadze watsi: “Ase nibuke, Adamu sewunjengatsi, sewuyakwati lokuhle nalokubi. Angahle akhe kulesihlahla sekuphila adle, bese uphila kuze kube phakadze naphakadze.”
Ngako-ke Nkulunkulu Simakadze wamcosha ensimini yase-Edeni, kutsi alime umhlabatsi labetsatfwe kuwo.
Wamkhipha lo-Adamu; kwase kutsi ngasemphumalanga nensimi yase-Edeni wabeka emakherubhi kanye nenkemba lenelilangabi lephendvuphendvukako ilindze indlela leya esihlahleni sekuphila.
Adamu wamati Eva, umkakhe; Eva wakhulelwa watala Khayini, watsi: “Ngitfole indvodzana ngekusitwa nguSimakadze.”
Emvakwaloko watala Abela, umnakabo. Yena-ke Abela waba ngumelusi wetimvu, Khayini waba ngumlimi wemhlabatsi.
Ngekuhamba kwesikhatsi Khayini waletsa umnikelo wetitselo temhlabatsi kuSimakadze.
Na-Abela waletsa ematubulo etimvu takhe letikhuluphele. Simakadze wanaka Abela nemnikelo wakhe;
kepha Khayini nemnikelo wakhe akazange amnake. Ngako-ke Khayini watfukutsela kakhulu; buso bakhe banyukumala, bahlwa.
Simakadze watsi kuKhayini: “Utfukutseleleni? Buso bakho bunyukumaleleni?
Angitsi nawenta lokulungile, uyemukeleka? Nawungenti lokulungile, sono siyakucatsamela ngasemnyango. Sifuna wena, kodvwa wena kufanele usincobe.”
Simakadze wabuta kuKhayini watsi: “Uphi umnakenu Abela?”
Sewucalekisiwe emhlabatsini lekunguwona ukhamise umlomo wawo wemukela ingati yemnakenu esandleni sakho.
Nawulima umhlabatsi, ngeke usakunika sivuno sawo lesihle; wena sewuyawuba ngumhambuma neluzulane emhlabeni.”
Khayini watsi kuSimakadze: “Sijeziso sami singetulu kwemandla ami.
Asubuke, sewuyangicosha lamuhla la emhlabatsini, ngisuke nasebukhoneni bakho, ngibe ngumhambuma neluzulane emhlabeni; kantsi futsi wonkhe lohlangana nami uyawungibulala.”

Kodvwa Simakadze watsi: “Cha, akunjalo! Lowo lobulala Khayini kuyawuphindziselwa kuye kuze kube kasikhombisa.” Simakadze wabeka Khayini luphawu, khona kutewuba secwayiso sekutsi lowo lohlangana naye angambulali.
Khayini wase uyesuka ebukhoneni baSimakadze wayawuhlala eveni laseNodi, ngasemphumalanga yase-Edeni.
Khayini wamati umkakhe, lowakhulelwa, watala Enoki. Khayini wase wakha lidolobha laletsa ngemsa wakhe, watsi yi-Enoki.
Enoki watala Iradi; Iradi waba nguyise waMehujayeli; Mehujayeli waba nguyise waMethushayeli; Methushayeli waba nguyise waLameki.
Lameki watsatsa bafati lababili; libito lalomunye kwakungu-Ada, lomunye-ke anguSila.
Ada watala Jabale; yena waba nguyise walabo bebahlala emathendeni, bafuye tinkhomo.
Libito lemnakabo kwakunguJubale; yena-ke waba nguyise wabo bonkhe lababedlala lugitali nemntjingozi.
Sila watala Thubali Khayini; yena-ke waba nguyise wabo bonkhe labakha emathulusi ngelitfusi nensimbi. DzadzewaboThubali Khayini kwakunguNama.
Adamu waphindze wamati umkakhe, watala indvodzana, wayetsa libito watsi nguSethi, ngobe abetsi: “Nkulunkulu sewungiphe lomunye umntfwana esikhundleni sa-Abela lowabulawa nguKhayini.”
NaSethi watala indvodzana layetsa libito watsi ngu-Enoshi; ngaleso sikhatsi bantfu bacala kukhuleka kuSimakadze.
Wabadala lomdvuna nalomsikati, wababusisa, wabanika libito mhlazana abadala watsi bantfu.
Kwatsi Adamu asaneminyaka leli-130, watala indvodzana leyamfuta, yafanana naye; wayetsa libito watsi nguSethi.
Emalanga a-Adamu emvakwekutalwa kwaSethi aba ngiminyaka lengema-800, asatele emadvodzana nemadvodzakati.
Kwatsi Sethi nasaneminyaka leli-105, watala Enoshi.
Emvakwekutalwa kwa-Enoshi Sethi waphila iminyaka lengema-807, asatele emadvodzana nemadvodzakati.
Kwatsi Enoshi nasaneminyaka lengema-90, watala Khenani.
Emvakwekutalwa kwaKhenani Enoshi waphila iminyaka lengema-815, asatele emadvodzana nemadvodzakati.
Kwatsi Khenani nasaneminyaka lengema-70, watala indvodzana lekwakunguMahalaleli.
Emvakwekutalwa kwaMahalaleli, Khenani waphila iminyaka lengema-840, asatele emadvodzana nemadvodzakati.
Kwatsi Mahalaleli nasaneminyaka lengema-65, watala Jaredi.
Emvakwekutalwa kwaJaredi, Mahalaleli waphila iminyaka lengema-830, asatele emadvodzana nemadvodzakati.
Kwatsi Jaredi nasaneminyaka leli-162, watala Enoki.
Emvakwekutalwa kwa-Enoki, Jaredi waphila iminyaka lengema-800, asatele emadvodzana nemadvodzakati.
Kwatsi Enoki nasaneminyaka lengema-65, watala Methusela.
Emvakwaloko Enoki wahamba anebudlelwane naNkulunkulu iminyaka lengema-300, watala emadvodzana nemadvodzakati.
Enoki abehamba naNkulunkulu, wase uyanyamalala ngobe Nkulunkulu abesamtsatsile.
Kwatsi Methusela nasaneminyaka leli-187, watala Lameki.
Emvakwekutalwa kwaLameki, Methusela waphila iminyaka lengema-782, asatele emadvodzana nemadvodzakati.
Lendvodzana wayetsa libito, watsi nguNowa, atsi: “Lona-ke nguye lotasidvudvuta emsebentini wetfu nasekukhatsatekeni kwetfu kuwo lomhlabatsi lowacalekiswa nguSimakadze.”
Emvakwekutalwa kwaNowa, Lameki waphila iminyaka lengema-595, asatele emadvodzana nemadvodzakati.
Nowa wakhula waba neminyaka lengema-500 budzala, watala emadvodzana lamatsatfu: BoShemi, naHhamu, naJafethi.
Kwatsi kube bantfu bacale kwandza nemhlaba wonkhe, batala tintfombi,
Simakadze wase utsi: “Moya wami angeke asabenta bantfu baphile kuze kube phakadze,

Kulawo malanga, nangasemva kwawo, kwakunetichwaga letatitalwa bantfu emhlabeni. Emadvodzana aNkulunkulu nasangene kuletintfombi tebantfu, tawatalela bantfwana. Labantfwabato bekungemachawe asendvulo labenemandla neludvumo.
Simakadze watisola ngekudala kwakhe umuntfu kutsi abe khona emhlabeni, wadzabuka enhlitiyweni yakhe.
Ngako Simakadze watsi: “Ngitabacitsa labantfu lengibadalile emhlabeni; yebo, bantfu, netifuyo, netilwane letihamba ngesisu, netinyoni letindiza emoyeni, ngobe sengiyatisola ngekutsi ngakwenta.”
Nowa abenemadvodzana lamatsatfu: BekuboShemi, naHhamu, naJafethi.
Umhlaba wawonakele emehlweni aNkulunkulu; umhlaba wawugcwele budlova.
Nkulunkulu wabuka umhlaba wabona kutsi wonakele, ngobe bonkhe bantfu babetiphetse ngemonakalo emhlabeni.
Nkulunkulu watsi kuNowa: “Sengincume kutsi ngibacedze bonkhe bantfu; ngobe umhlaba ugcwele budlova ngenca yabo. Ngitawubabhubhisa, ngibesuse bonkhe emhlabeni.
Utakuwakha kanje: Budze bemkhumbi butawuba ngemamitha langaba li-133, bubanti bube ngemamitha langaba ngema-22, kuphakama kube ngemamitha langaba li-13.
Ngitawuletsa zamcolo emhlabeni, utawufika abulale yonkhe inyama lenemoya wekuphila, lengaphansi kwelizulu. Konkhe lokusemhlabeni kutawubhubha.
Kodvwa ngitakwenta sivumelwane sami nawe: Utawungena emkhunjini wena, nemadvodzana akho, nemkakho, nabomalukatana bakho.
Kuto tonkhe tilwane utawungenisa lesidvuna nalesisikati kulolo nakulolo luhlobo, khona titawuphila kanye nawe.

Kuto tinyoni tinhlobo ngetinhlobo tato, nakuto tifuyo tinhlobo ngetinhlobo tato, nasetilwaneni letihamba ngesisu emhlabatsini tinhlobo ngetinhlobo tato, kutawufika kuwe tibe timbili talolo nalolo luhlobo, kuze kutsi tihlale tiphilile.
Utsatse tonkhe tinhlobo tekudla, utigcine; kutawuba kudla kwakho nekwato.”
Nowa wakwenta konkhe layalwa nguNkulunkulu kutsi akwente.
Simakadze watsi kuNowa: “Ngena emkhunjini wena nendlu yakho, ngobe sengibonile kutsi nguwe wedvwa lolungile kulesitukulwane.

Kuto tonkhe tinhlobo tetilwane letihlambulukile tsatsa tibe sikhombisa letindvuna naletinsikati tibe sikhombisa, nakuto tinhlobo tetilwane letingakahlambuluki utsatse tibe timbili lesidvuna nalesisikati.
Nakuto tonkhe tinhlobo tetinyoni tsatsa tibe sikhombisa letindvuna naletinsikati; khona lungetiwuphela lolo nalolo luhlobo emhlabeni.
Emvakwemalanga lasikhombisa kusukela lamuhla ngitawutfumela imvula emhlabeni, emalanga langema-40 nebusuku bawo; konkhe lokuphilako lengikwentile emhlabeni ngitakubhubhisa.”
Nowa abesaneminyaka lengema-600 budzala, mhlazana kufika zamcolo emhlabeni.
Nowa wangena emkhunjini yena nemadvodzana akhe, nemkakhe, nebafati bemadvodzana akhe, babalekela emanti azamcolo.
Kuto tonkhe tilwane letihlambulukile naletingakahlambuluki, nasetinyonini, nakuto tonkhe tilwane letihamba ngesisu,
tangena ngatimbili, lesidvuna nalesisikati, tangena naNowa emkhunjini, njengobe Nkulunkulu abemtjelile.
Emvakwemalanga lasikhombisa layitsela imvula yazamcolo emhlabeni.
Lana emhlabeni emalanga langema-40 nebusuku bawo.
Ngalelo langa Nowa nemkakhe wangena emkhunjini, naboShemi, naHhamu, naJafethi, emadvodzana akhe, nebafati bawo.
Bangena nato tonkhe tilwane: tonkhe tifuyo ngetinhlobo tato, nato tonkhe tilwane letihamba ngesisu ngetinhlobo tato, nato tonkhe tinyoni ngetinhlobo tato.
Tangena kuNowa emkhunjini ngatimbili tako konkhe lokunemoya wekuphila.
Letangena tangena kwaba ngulesidvuna nalesisikati senyama yonkhe, tangena, njengobe Nkulunkulu abetjele Nowa. Simakadze wavala umnyango.
Layitsela imvula emhlabeni emalanga langema-40 nebusuku bawo; emanti akhula adzimate awuphakamisa umkhumbi, wasukuma emhlabatsini.
Emanti akhula andza kakhulu emhlabeni, nemkhumbi wantanta etikwemanti.
Emanti achubeka akhukhumuka, adzimate ambonya tonkhe tintsaba temhlaba naletindze kakhulu.
Emanti akhukhumuka, adzimate aba ngemamitha lasikhombisa ngetulu kwetintsaba.
Konkhe lokuphilako lokwakusemhlabeni kwafa: tinyoni netifuyo, netilwane tesiganga, nako konkhe lokwakugcwalise umhlaba, nebantfu bonkhe.
Konkhe lokwakusemhlabeni lokwakuphefumula umoya wekuphila emakhaleni, kwafa.
Simakadze wakucitsa kanjalo-ke konkhe lokwakuphila emhlabeni; wacitsa bantfu, netifuyo netilwane letihamba ngesisu, netinyoni letindiza emoyeni. Kwasala Nowa kanye nalabo abenabo emkhunjini.
Nkulunkulu wamkhumbula Nowa, netilwane tonkhe, kanye nato tonkhe tifuyo labenato emkhunjini. Nkulunkulu waletsa umoya waphuphutsa etikwemhlaba, emanti etja.
Tiyalu temhlaba tavaleka, emafasitelo elizulu avaleka, imvula yahhamuka.
Emanti aya ngekuya etja emhlabeni. Emvakwemalanga lali-150 emanti ancipha.
Ngelilanga leli-17, enyangeni yesikhombisa umkhumbi watinta etikwetintsaba tase-Ararathi.
Emanti achubeka nekwetja, kwadzimate kwatsi ngelilanga lekucala enyangeni yelishumi, tihloko tetintsaba tavela tabonakala.
Ekupheleni kwemalanga langema-40 Nowa walivula lelifasitelo labelakhile.
Watfumela lihubhulu, kodvwa alizange libuye, lazulazula kwaze kwasha emanti emhlabeni.
Wase utfumela lituba kutsi liyewuhlola kutsi emanti asanciphile yini emhlabatsini.

Kepha lituba lehluleka kutfola indzawo, ngisho neyekubeka lunyawo lwalo, lancandzeka labuyela kuye emkhunjini, ngobe emanti abesemanyenti emhlabeni wonkhe. Ngako welula sandla sakhe walitsatsa, walingenisa emkhunjini kuye.
Walindza emalanga lasikhombisa, waphindze watfumela lituba walikhipha emkhunjini.
Lituba lancandzeka lefika kuye kusihlwa liphetse licembe lesihlahla semncumo lelalisandza kukhiwa. Ngako Nowa wati kutsi emanti asetjile emhlabeni.
Waphindze walindza emalanga lasikhombisa, wase utfuma lituba futsi; alizange liphindze libuye.
Ngemnyaka wakhe wema-601, mhlazana lulunye enyangeni yekucala emanti abesashile emhlabeni. Nowa walususa luphahla lwemkhumbi, wahlola, wabona umhlabatsi sewomile.
Mhlazana tingema-27 enyangeni yesibili umhlaba wase womile.
“Phuma emkhunjini wena, nemkakho, nemadvodzana akho, nebafati bemadvodzana akho.
Phuma kanye nato tonkhe tilwane letiphilako letinawe tayo yonkhe inhlobo: tinyoni, netifuyo, nato tonkhe tilwane letihamba ngesisu, khona titekwandza emhlabeni titalane tigcwalise umhlaba.”
Ngako-ke Nowa waphuma nemkakhe, nemadvodzana akhe, nebafati bemadvodzana akhe.
Tonkhe tilwane, ngisho naletihamba ngesisu, nato tonkhe tinyoni, konkhe lokuhamba emhlabatsini kwaphuma ngetinhlobo tako emkhunjini.
Nowa wakhela Nkulunkulu lilati, watsatsa kuto tonkhe tifuyo letihlambulukile nakuto tonkhe tinyoni letihlambulukile, wanikela kuNkulunkulu umnikelo wekushiswa elatini.

Nkulunkulu waliva leliphunga lelinuka lusi lolumnandzi, watsi enhlitiyweni yakhe: “Ngingeke ngiphindze ngiwucalekise umhlabatsi ngenca yemuntfu, ngobe imizindlo yenhlitiyo yemuntfu mibi kwasebusheni bakhe. Ngingeke ngiphindze ngikubhubhise konkhe lokuphilako, njengobe ngentile.

Luvalo nekwesatjwa kwenu akubesetilwaneni tonkhe temhlaba, nakuto tonkhe tinyoni letindiza emoyeni, nakuko konkhe lokuhamba ngesisu emhlabatsini, nakuto tonkhe tinhlanti telwandle. Konkhe loko kuniketelwe etandleni tenu.
Intfo nje, ningayidli inyama lesenengati; loko ngikusho ngobe kuphila kusengatini.
Umuntfu lobulala lomunye umuntfu uyawujeziswa, nesilwane lesibulala umuntfu ngiyawusijezisa. Ngulowo nalowo uyawutilandza ngengati yalomunye.
Nkulunkulu wakhuluma kuNowa nemadvodzana akhe, watsi:
“Ase nibuke la, mine ngimisa sivumelwane sami nani netitukulwane tenu letiyawunilandzela,
kanye nato tonkhe tilwane letiphilako letinani: tinyoni, netifuyo, nato tonkhe tilwane tesiganga leniphume nato emkhunjini, ngisho nato tonkhe tilwane temhlaba.
Ngimisa sivumelwane sami nani, kutsi ngeke kuphindze kubhujiswe lutfo ngemanti azamcolo, angeke aseta zamcolo kutewubhubhisa umhlaba.”
Nkulunkulu wachubeka watsi: “Nalu luphawu lwesivumelwane lengisenta emkhatsini wami nani, nato tonkhe tidalwa letiphilako letinani, nato tonkhe titukulwane letitako:
Ngibeka umushi wenkosazana emafini, uyawuba luphawu lwesivumelwane emkhatsini wami nemhlaba.
Nangiletsa emafu etikwemhlaba bese kubonakala lomushi emafini,
ngiyawukhumbula sivumelwane sami emkhatsini wami nani, nato tonkhe tilwane letiphilako, ngisho tonkhe tinhlobo tato. Emanti angeke aphindze abe nguzamcolo wekubhubhisa konkhe lokuphilako.
Nakunalomushi emafini, ngiyakuwubuka bese ngikhumbula sivumelwane saphakadze emkhatsini waNkulunkulu nato tonkhe tinhlobo tetilwane letiphila emhlabeni.”
Nkulunkulu wachubeka watsi kuNowa: “Lolu luphawu lwesivumelwane lesengisimise emkhatsini wami nako konkhe lokuphilako emhlabeni.”
Emadvodzana aNowa laphuma emkhunjini bekuboShemi, naHhamu, naJafethi. Hhamu bekunguyise waKhenani.
Bobatsatfu bekungemadvodzana aNowa; umhlaba wonkhe wagcwaliswa yintalo yabo.
Nowa abengumlimi, waba wekucala kuhlanyela sivini.
Wanatsa liwayini, wadzakwa, wadzimate walala ngcunu, ethendeni lakhe.
Hhamu, uyise waKhenani, wabubona bungcunu beyise, wahamba wayawutjela bomnakabo lababili lababengephandle.
BoShemi naJafethi batsatsa ingubo, batigubhetela emahlombe abo bobabili, bahamba nyova, bafike babumbonya bungcunu beyise. Buso babo babubheke eceleni, ngako abazange babubone bungcunu beyise.
Nowa wavuka asacabukile ekudzakweni kwakhe, weva loko lokwakwentiwe yindvodzana yakhe lencane.
Emadvodzana aJafethi bekuboGomeri, naMagogi, naMadayi, naJavani, naThubali, naMesheki, naThirasi.
Emadvodzana aJavani bekubo-Elisha, naThashishi, nemaKhithi, nemaRodani.
Bavela kulabo-ke labantfu labahamba bayawuhlala emaveni langaselwandle. Babehlala ngemindeni yabo etiveni tabo, bakhuluma tilimi tabo emaveni abo.
Emadvodzana aHhamu bekuboKushe, naGibhithe, naPhuthi, naKhenani.
Emadvodzana aKushe bekuboSeba, naHavila, naSabta, naRama, naSabtekha. Emadvodzana aRama bekuboSheba naDedani.
Kushe waba nguyise waNimrodi. LoNimrodi waba wekucala emhlabeni kutsi abe sichwaga lesinemandla lamakhulu.
Abengumtingeli lonemandla kakhulu embikwaSimakadze, ngako-ke kutsiwa: “NjengaNimrodi umtingeli labenemandla embikwaSimakadze.”
Umbuso wakhe wacala ngeBhabheli, nase-Ereki, nase-Akhadi, konkhe kwakuseveni laseShinari.
Kusuka lapho umbuso wakhe waze wefika e-Asiriya. Nimrodi wakha iNineve, neRehobothi Iri, neKhala,
neReseni, emkhatsini weNineve neKhala; lelo bekulidolobha lelikhulu.
Gibhithe watala emaLudi, nema-Anami, nemaLehabi, nemaNafethuhi,
nemaPhathrusi, nemaKhasuluhi, lapho kwadzabuka khona emaFilisti nemaKhaftori.
nema-Avadi, nemaSemari, nemaHamathi. Emvakwaloko imindeni yemaKhenani yahlakateka yandza,
kangangekutsi umnyele welive lemaKhenani wawusuka eSidoni ushaye eGerari, naseGaza, naseSodoma, naseGomora, nase-Adma, naseSeboyimu uze ufike eLasha.
Ngito leto-ke titukulwane taHhamu, ngemindeni yato, netilimi tato, emaveni ato, nasetiveni tato.
NaShemi futsi, uyise wabo bonkhe bantfwana ba-Ebheri, umnakaboJafethi lomkhulu, watala bantfwana.
Emadvodzana aShemi bekubo-Elamu, na-Ashuri, na-Aphakshadi, naLudi, na-Aramu.
Emadvodzana a-Aramu bekubo-Use, naHuli, naGetheri, naMashe.
Aphakshadi watala Shela; Shela watala Ebheri.
Ebheri watala emadvodzana lamabili. Lomunye kwakunguPhelegi, ngobe ngesikhatsi sakhe live ladzatjulwa. Umnakabo kwakunguJokthane.
Jokthane kwakunguyise wabo-Almodadi, naShelefi, naHasamavete, naJera,
na-Ofiri, naHavila, naJobabi. Bonkhe laba kwakungemadvodzana aJokthane.
Live babehlala kulo lalisuka eMesha ngaseSefari, lize lifike eveni letintsaba ngasemphumalanga.
Ngiwo lawo-ke emadvodzana aShemi, ngemindeni yawo, nangetilimi tawo, emaveni awo, nasetiveni tawo.
Ngiyo-ke le imindeni yemadvodzana aNowa ngetitukulwane tawo nangetive tawo. Tive tesukela kuwo, emvakwazamcolo, tandza nemhlaba wonkhe.
Umhlaba wonkhe wawukhuluma lulwimi lunye lunemagama manye etintfo.
Batsi basahambahamba ngasemphumalanga, bakhandza litsafa eveni laseShinari,
Base bakhulumisana bodvwana, batsi: “Wotani, asente titini, sitishise.” Basebentisa titini esikhundleni sematje, nelitiyela esikhundleni seludzaka.
Batsi: “Wotani, sitakhele lidolobha, nembhoshongo lotawufikela ezulwini, sitentele ligama, sitekwatiwa, khona singetiwulahlekelana sisakateke nemhlaba wonkhe.”
Simakadze wehla atewubona lelidolobha nalombhoshongo lowawakhiwa bantfu.
Simakadze watsi: “Ase nibheke labantfu basive sinye, nelulwimi lunye; loku kusicalo saloko labatakwenta, kute labatawutsi nabatimisele kukwenta behluleke kukwenta.
Wotani, sehle, siyewusanganisa lulwimi lwabo, khona bangetiwuvana.”
Ngako Simakadze wabahlakata nemhlaba wonkhe, bayekela kulakha lelo dolobha.
Ngako-ke wetsiwa libito kwatsiwa yiBhabheli, ngobe Simakadze wasanganisa lulwimi lwemhlaba wonkhe. Kusuka lapho Simakadze bantfu wabasakata nemhlaba wonkhe.
Emvakwekutalwa kwa-Aphakshadi, Shemi waphila iminyaka lengema-500, watala emadvodzana nemadvodzakati.
Emvakwekutalwa kwaShela, Aphakshadi waphila iminyaka lengema-403, watala emadvodzana nemadvodzakati.
Emvakwekutalwa kwa-Ebheri, Shela waphila iminyaka lengema-403, watala emadvodzana nemadvodzakati.
Emvakwekutalwa kwaPhelegi, Ebheri waphila iminyaka lengema-430, watala emadvodzana nemadvodzakati.
Emvakwekutalwa kwaRehu, Phelegi waphila iminyaka lengema-209, watala emadvodzana nemadvodzakati.
Emvakwekutalwa kwaSerugi, Rehu waphila iminyaka lengema-207, watala emadvodzana nemadvodzakati.
Emvakwekutalwa kwaNahori, Serugi waphila iminyaka lengema-200, watala emadvodzana nemadvodzakati.
Emvakwekutalwa kwaThera, Nahori waphila iminyaka leli-119, watala emadvodzana nemadvodzakati.
Thera waphila iminyaka lengema-70, watala telamani bo-Abrama, naNahori, naHarani.
Nati-ke titukulwane taThera: Thera abenguyise wa-Abrama, naNahori, naHarani. Harani abenguyise waLoti.
Harani wafa kucala kuneyise, Thera; wafela eveni latalelwa kulo, i-Uri yemaKhaledi.
Bo-Abrama naNahori batsatsa bafati. Libito lemka-Abrama kwakunguSarayi; libito lemkaNahori kwakunguMilkha, indvodzakati yaHarani, uyise waMilkha naJiskha.
Thera wafela lapho eHarani asaneminyaka lengema-205.
Ngako-ke Abrama wahamba, njengobe Simakadze abesamtjelile, Loti wahamba naye. Abrama abesaneminyaka lengema-75 budzala, nakasuka eHarani.
Abrama watsatsa Sarayi, umkakhe, naLoti, indvodzana yemnakabo, netimphahla tabo labesebatigcogcile, netisebenti labesebatitfole eHarani; bahamba nato baya eveni laseKhenani.
Abrama wahamba wadzabula live, waze wefika eShekhemu, ngasema-okhini aseMore. EmaKhenani abehlala kulelo live ngaleso sikhatsi.
Simakadze wabonakala ku-Abrama, watsi: “Lelive ngiyawulinika titukulwane takho.” Abrama wakhela Simakadze lilati, ngobe abebonakele lapho kuye.

Wesuka waya etintsabeni tangasemphumalanga neBetheli, wafike wemisa lithende lakhe khona; iBetheli beyingasenshonalanga, i-Ayi beyingasemphumalanga. Nakhona lapho wafike wakhela Simakadze lilati; wakhuleka kuSimakadze.
Emvakwaloko Abrama wahamba wacondza ngaseningizimu neKhenani.
Kwase kuba nendlala lenkhulu eKhenani. Ngako-ke Abrama wehlela eGibhithe; wahlala khona sikhashana, ngobe indlala yayiyinkhulu kakhulu eKhenani.
Watsi nasatawufika eGibhithe, wakhuluma kumkakhe Sarayi watsi: “Ase ulalele la: Ngiyakwati kutsi ungumfati lomuhle, nalobukekako.
EmaGibhithe atawutsi angakubona atsi: ‘Ngumkakhe lo,’ bese ayangibulala, wena angakubulali.
Ngako-ke ubotsi ungudzadzewetfu, khona kutangihambela kahle ngisindze ngenca yakho.”
Watsi Abrama nakewela umnyele angena eGibhithe, emaGibhithe akhangwa buhle balomfati.
Tindvuna taFaro tatsi kube timbone, tambabata kuFaro; wase uyatsatfwa-ke uyiswa esigodlweni saFaro.
Ngenca yalomfati, Abrama waphatseka kahle: Wanikwa timvu netimbuti, netinkhomo, netimbongolo letindvuna naletinsikati, nemakamela, netisebenti letidvuna naletisikati.
Ngako-ke Faro wabita Abrama, watsi kuye: “Yini lena loyente kimi? Awukangitjeli ngani kutsi lona ngumkakho?
Ushitoleni kutsi ngudzadzewenu, ngaze ngamtsatsa waba ngumkami? Nangu-ke umkakho, mtsatse, uhambe naye.”
Faro watfumela emancusa ku-Abrama, amhambisa kanye nemkakhe, nako konkhe labesanako.
Ngako-ke Abrama wakhuphuka eGibhithe, yena nemkakhe, nako konkhe labesanako, wahamba naLoti, baya ngaseningizimu neKhenani.
Abrama abesacebe kakhulu: asanemfuyo, nesiliva, negolide.
Wesuka eningizimu neKhenani wacocoma ngekutfutsa, waze wefika ngaseBetheli. Waphindze wesuka lapho waya endzaweni lesemkhatsini weBetheli ne-Ayi, lapho abeke wemisa khona lithende kucala,
wakha nelilati. Abrama wafike lapho wakhuleka kuSimakadze.
Naye Loti, labehamba na-Abrama, abesanetimvu, netimbuti, netinkhomo kanye nemndeni wakhe netisebenti takhe.
Ngako-ke lelo live lalingeke lisabenela kahle-hle, ngobe timphahla tabo tase titinyenti kangangekutsi babengabe basahlala ndzawonye.
Kwavela kucabana emkhatsini webelusi baka-Abrama nebelusi bakaLoti. Ngaleso sikhatsi emaKhenani nemaPheresi abesahlala kulelo live.
Ngako Abrama watsi kuLoti: “Tsine nawe sitihlobo. Ngako-ke akukafaneli kutsi sicabane ngenca yekucabana kwebelusi betfu.
Angitsi uyalibona lonkhe lelive? Asehlukane. Nawukhetsa kuya ngesancele, mine ngitakuya ngesekudla; nawukhetsa kuya ngesekudla, mine ngitakuya ngesancele.”

Loti watsi naphakamisa emehlo akhe, wabona litsafa lelinesihlambo semfula iJordane, linemanti lenele yonkhe indzawo, kuze kuyewufika eSowari; lalinjengensimi yaSimakadze nanjengelive laseGibhithe. Ngalesikhatsi Simakadze abesengakayibhubhisi iSodoma neGomora.
Ngako-ke Loti wakhetsa lonkhe litsafa lelalinesihlambo semfula iJordane, wacondza ngasemphumalanga. Kwaba kwehlukana kwabo-ke njalo.
Abrama wahlala eveni laseKhenani, Loti yena wayawuhlala emkhatsini wemiti lesetsafeni lemfula, wemisa lithende lakhe edvute neSodoma.
Kepha bantfu baseSodoma babekhohlakele, bona kakhulu kuSimakadze.
Kwatsi Loti nasehlukene na-Abrama, Simakadze watsi ku-Abrama: “Phakamisa emehlo akho, ubuke ngasenyakatfo, nangaseningizimu, nangasemphumalanga, nangasenshonalanga.
Lonkhe lelive lolibonako ngitawulinika wena netitukulwane takho kuze kube phakadze.
Titukulwane takho ngiyawutenta tibe ngangelutfuli lwemhlaba, kangangekutsi nakukhona longabala lutfuli lwemhlaba, netitukulwane takho angatibala.
Sukuma, uhambe ulidzabule ekhatsi ngebudze nangebubanti balo lelive, ngobe ngitakunika lona.”
Ngako-ke, Abrama walitfutsa lithende lakhe walimisa ngasetihlahleni tema-okhi eMamre, leseHebroni; wafike lapho wakhela Simakadze lilati.

ahloma ayawuhlasela lamanye emakhosi lasihlanu, lekwakuboBhera, inkhosi yaseSodoma, naBhisha, inkhosi yaseGomora, naShinabe, inkhosi yase-Adema, naShemebere, inkhosi yaseSeboyimu, nenkhosi yaseBhela, leyiSowari.
Onkhe lamakhosi ahlangana ndzawonye eTsafeni laseSidimu, lesekwaba Lwandle Lweluswayi.
Kwase kuphele iminyaka leli-12 baphansi kwenkhosi Khedolawomere; kepha emnyakeni weli-13 bamhlubuka.
Ngemnyaka weli-14 weta Khedolawomere nalamanye emakhosi labenawo, balwa behlula emaRefa e-Ashtherothe Khanayimu, nemaZuzi eHhamu, nema-Emi eShave Khiriyathayimu,
nemaHori entsabeni yawo iSeyiri, kwadzimate kwaba ngu-Eli Pharani ngasehlane.
Base bayancandzeka, beta e-Eni Mishpati leliyiKhadeshi, balicitsa lonkhe live lema-Amaleki, nelema-Amori labehlala eHasesoni Thamari.
Inkhosi yaseSodoma, neyaseGomora, neyase-Adema, neyaseSeboyimu, neyaseBhela leliyiSowari, ahloma aya kulelitsafa laseSidimu,
kuyakulwa nemakhosi boKhedolawomere wase-Elamu, naThidali inkhosi yetive,
Litsafa laseSidimu laligcwele imigodzi yelitiyela. Ngesikhatsi emakhosi aseSodoma abaleka, agcumukela kulemigodzi, lamanye abalekela etintsabeni.
Ngako-ke lamakhosi lamane atitsatsa tonkhe timphahla taseSodoma netaseGomora nemiphako yawo yonkhe, ahamba.
Atsatsa naLoti labeyindvodzana yemnakabo-Abrama, njengobe abehlala eSodoma, naye bamtfumba kanye netimphahla takhe.
Lomunye waphunyuka wabaleka wayawubikela Abrama, umHebheru, labehlala ngasetihlahleni tema-okhi aMamre, um-Amori, umnakabo-Eshkoli na-Aneri. Bonkhe-ke laba bebabambisene na-Abrama.

Abrama watsi kube eve kutsi umntfwanemnakabo bamtfumbile, wabutsa emadvodza labetalelwe ekhaya lakhe labececeshelwe timphi. Asawonkhe abesangema-318. Abrama nalamadvodza wacosha lamakhosi lamane wadzimate wawefikisa ngakaDani.
Kwatsi ebusuku wahlelembisa libutfo lakhe ngeticheme talo. Wawahlasela wawehlula, wawacosha waze wawabeka eHoba, enyakatfo neDamaseko.
Watitsatsa tonkhe timphahla wabuya nato kanye naLoti netimphahla takhe nalabasikati kanye nalabanye labanyenti.
Abrama asabuya ekwehluleni Khedolawomere nalamanye emakhosi labenawo, inkhosi yaseSodoma yaphuma yaya kumhlangabeta eSigodzini saseShave, lekuSigodzi Senkhosi.
NaMelkhisedeki, inkhosi yaseSalema, leyayingumphristi waNkulunkulu Losetikwako Konkhe, yaletsa kuye sinkhwa neliwayini.
Abrama wanika Melkhisedeki kwelishumi kwako konkhe.
Inkhosi yaseSodoma yatsi ku-Abrama: “Buyisa bonkhe labantfu bami, wena utitsatsele letimphahla.”
Kodvwa Abrama watsi enkhosini yaseSodoma: “Ngiphakamisela sandla sami, ngifunga kuSimakadze Nkulunkulu Losetikwako Konkhe, uMdali welizulu nemhlaba,
kutsi ngingeke ngitsatse ngisho nelucotfo nome umchilo weticatfulo nome yini lekuyakho. Angifuni kutsi bese utsi: ‘Abrama ngimcebisile.’
Kute lengitakutsatsa ngaphandle kwaloko lokudliwe ngulamadvodza akami, nesabelo salamadvodza bengihamba nawo: bo-Aneri, na-Eshkoli, naMamre. Abatsatse sabelo sabo.”
Emvakwaloko livi laSimakadze lefika ku-Abrama ngembono, latsi: “Abrama, ungesabi. Ngisihlangu sakho, umvuzo wakho utawuba mkhulu.”
Kodvwa Abrama watsi: “Awu, Simakadze Nkulunkulu, utangiphani, ngobe seloku anginamntfwana? Indlalifa yami kutawuba ngu-Eliyezeri waseDamaseko.”
Abrama wachubeka watsi: “Ase ubuke nje, awungiphanga ntalo, lesisebenti lesesitalelwe la endlini yami ngiso lesitawuba yindlalifa yami.”
Simakadze wamkhiphela ngaphandle watsi: “Buka etulu esibhakabhakeni ubale tinkhanyeti, nawungatibala.” Wachubeka watsi kuye: “Nentalo yakho-ke iyawuba ngako.”
Watsi kuye: “NginguSimakadze lowakukhipa e-Uri yemaKhaledi, kutsi ngitekupha lelive libe lakho.”
Kepha Abrama watsi: “Nkhosi, Simakadze, ngitakwati ngani kutsi lelive litawuba ngelami?”

Wamphendvula watsi: “Ngiletsele sitfokati lesineminyaka lemitsatfu budzala, nembutikati leneminyaka lemitsatfu budzala, nesihhanca lesineminyaka lemitsatfu budzala, nelituba kanye nelizini lelivukutfu.”
Konkhe loku wakuletsa, wakujuba ekhatsi. Lolo nalolo lucetu walubeka macondzana nalolunye, kodvwa tinyoni akatijubanga.
Emangce ehlela etidvunjini, kepha Abrama wawacosha.
Latsi nalishonako lilanga, Abrama wehlelwa butfongo lobukhulu, walala; asalele wefikelwa luvalo nekwesaba lokukhulu.
Simakadze watsi ku-Abrama: “Yati ngempela kutsi situkulwane sakho siyawuba sihambi eveni lekungesilo laso; siyawuba sigcili sakulelo live, sigcilateke iminyaka lengema-400.
Kodvwa ngiyawusehlulela leso sive lesiyawube sigcilata lesitukulwane sakho; emvakwaloko lesitukulwane sakho siyawuphuma sesinetimphahla letinyenti.
Wena-ke utawukhula, ufe ngekuthula sewumdzala kakhulu, ungcwatjwe.
Lesitukulwane siyawuphindze sibuye lapha sesingesesine, ngobe bubi ba-Amori abukapheli.”
Ngalo lelo langa Simakadze wenta sivumelwane na-Abrama, watsi: “Lelive ngilinika situkulwane sakho, kusukela emfuleni waseGibhithe kuze kufike emfuleni lomkhulu iYufrathe,
Sarayi, umka-Abrama, abengenamntfwana. Abenesisebenti lesasingumGibhithe lesasibitwa ngekutsi nguHagari.
Sarayi watsi ku-Abrama: “Ase ubuke, Simakadze ungimile intalo. Ngena kulesisebenti sami, mhlawumbe ngitawutfola ngaso bantfwana.” Abrama walilalela livi laSarayi.
Abrama asahlale iminyaka lelishumi eveni laseKhenani, Sarayi, umka-Abrama, watsatsa Hagari, sisebenti sakhe lesasingumGibhithe, wasinika Abrama kutsi sibe ngumkakhe.
Abrama wangena kuHagari; Hagari wase uyakhulelwa. Watsi kube Hagari abone kutsi sewukhulelwe, wase wedzelela loSarayi.

Sarayi wakhuluma ku-Abrama watsi: “Nguwe lofanele kulungisa letintfo lesetonakala. Ngimi lengakunika loHagari, kodvwa utsite kube abone kutsi sewukhulelwe, wase uyangedzelela. Simakadze akasehlulele abone kutsi ngubani lowonile emkhatsini wakho nami.”
Abrama watsi kuSarayi: “Lalela la, Hagari sisebenti sakho, uphetfwe nguwe. Mphatse njengekubona kwakho.” Sarayi wase umphatsa ngelulaka loHagari, wadzimate Hagari wabaleka.
Ingilosi yaSimakadze yakhandza Hagari ngasesicojeni semanti, ehlane, endleleni leya eShuri,
Ingilosi yaSimakadze yatsi kuye: “Ncandzeka, buyela kuSarayi, umphatsi wakho, ufike utitfobe ngaphansi kwakhe.”
Ingilosi yaSimakadze yachubeka yatsi: “Intalo yakho ngitayandzisa kakhulu kangangekutsi kute loyawuba nemandla ekuyibala.”
Ingilosi yachubeka yatsi kuye: “Ase ubuke nje, sewukhulelwe, utawutala indvodzana uyetse libito utsi ngu-Ishmayeli,
Uyawuba ngumuntfu lonjengembongolo yesiganga, aphambane naye wonkhe umuntfu, bonkhe bantfu baphambane naye. Uyawuhlala ngekuchukulutana netihlobo takhe.”
Ngako-ke wase wetsa loSimakadze lowakhuluma kuye watsi: “UnguNkulunkulu longibonako,” ngobe watsi: “Kambe ngabe ngibone Nkulunkulu ngabuye ngaphilela kutsi ngikhulume ngaloko?”
Ngiko nje lomtfombo losemkhatsini weKhadeshi neBheredi ubitwa ngekutsi yiBheri Lahayi Rohi lokusho kutsi: “Umtfombo waLophilako Longibonako.”
Abrama abesaneminyaka lengema-86, mhlazana Hagari amtalela Ishmayeli.
Kwatsi Abrama nasaneminyaka lengema-99 budzala, Simakadze wabonakala kuye watsi: “NginguNkulunkulu Somandla; hamba entsandvweni yami, ube msulwa.
Ngitakwenta sivumelwane sami nawe ngikwandzise kakhulukati.”
Abrama wakhotsamisa buso bakhe, batsintsa phansi, Nkulunkulu watsi kuye:
“Nasi-ke sivumelwane sami nawe: Uyawuba nguyise wetive letinyenti.
Libito lakho lingeke lisaba ngu-Abrama, kodvwa selitawuba ngu-Abrahama, ngobe sengikwente uyise wetive letinyenti.
Ngitakupha intalo lenyenti, ngikwente tive letinyenti, labanye kuto bayawuba ngemakhosi.
“Ngiyawumisa sivumelwane sami nawe nentalo yakho, emvakwakho, etitukulwaneni ngetitukulwane, kube sivumelwane saphakadze. Ngiyawuba nguNkulunkulu wakho naNkulunkulu wetitukulwane takho emvakwakho.

Lelive lewusihambi kulo ngiyawulinika wena netitukulwane takho emvakwakho. Lonkhe lelive laseKhenani liyawuba letitukulwane takho, libe lifa lato phakadze naphakadze, mine ngiyawuba nguNkulunkulu wato.”
Nkulunkulu wase utsi ku-Abrahama: “Wena-ke, sewuyawugcina lesivumelwane sami, wena nentalo yakho emvakwakho, tonkhe titukulwane tayo.
Naku-ke kwekugcina sivumelwane sami lekufanele ukwente wena kanye nentalo yakho emvakwakho: Bonkhe labadvuna niyawubasoka.
Niyawusoka; loko kuyawuba luphawu lwesivumelwane sami nani.
Losanemalanga lasiphohlongo atelwe, niyawumsoka: Bonkhe labadvuna kuto tonkhe titukulwane tenu, ngisho nabo bonkhe labatalelwe kakho nalabatsengwe ngemali yakho etihambini tetive letingesito takini.
Lowo lotalelwe endlini yakho nalotsengiwe, bonkhe kufanele basokwe. Ngako-ke lesivumelwane siyawubasemtimbeni wenu, kube sivumelwane saphakadze.
Wonkhe lomdvuna longakasoki uyawuncunywa esiveni sakubo, ngobe wephule sivumelwane sami.”
Nkulunkulu watsi ku-Abrahama: “Ungabe usambita umkakho ngekutsi nguSarayi, kodvwa ubosale utsi nguSara.
Ngiyawumbusisa, ngikunike indvodzana ngaye. Ngiyawumbusisa, abe ngunina wetive. Kuyawuvela kuye emakhosi etive.”
Abrahama waphumisela watsi kuNkulunkulu: “Kube mane Ishmayeli abengemukeleka kuwe.”
Ngisivile sicelo sakho nga-Ishmayeli. Naye ngitambusisa ngimente achume andze kakhulu. Utawuba nguyise wetikhulu letili-12, ngimente abe sive lesikhulu.
Kepha ngiyawumisa sivumelwane sami na-Isaka, latakutalela yena Sara ngaso lesikhatsi ngemnyaka lotako.”
Watsi kube Nkulunkulu acedze kukhuluma na-Abrahama, wamshiya, wenyuka.

Ngalo lelo langa Abrahama watsatsa Ishmayeli, indvodzana yakhe, nabo bonkhe lababetalelwe kakhe, nabo bonkhe lababetsengwe ngemali yakhe; bonkhe labadvuna lababekakhe wabasoka, njengobe Nkulunkulu abemtjelile.
Abrahama abesaneminyaka lengema-99 budzala, mhlazana asokwa.
Ishmayeli indvodzana yakhe abesaneminyaka leli-13 budzala, mhlazana asokwa.
Bo-Abrahama nendvodzana yakhe, Ishmayeli, basokwa langa linye bobabili.
Bonkhe labadvuna lababesemndenini wakhe lababetalelwe kakhe nalabo lababetsengwe ngemali yakhe kubetive basokwa kanye naye.
Simakadze wabonakala ku-Abrahama ngasema-okhini aMamre, ahleti ngasemnyango welithende lakhe ngesikhatsi sekushisa kwelilanga.
Abrahama watsi nakaphakamisa emehlo, wabona emadvodza lamatsatfu eme embikwakhe. Watsi kube awabone, wesuka emnyango welithende lakhe wagijima wawahlangabeta, wafike wakhotsama,
Ase nginiletsele liyakana lemanti nitewugeza tinyawo tenu, bese niphumula la emtfuntini walesihlahla.
Ngitawulandza lucetwana lwesinkhwa, khona nitewudla kucala ningakahambi, njengobe naku senifike ekhaya lenceku yenu.”
Ngako-ke batsi kuye: “Kulungile, yenta njengobe sewushito.”
Abrahama waphutfuma ethendeni kuSara, watsi: “Sheshisa utsatse emabinta lamatsatfu afulaha uyibhuce, wente emacebelengwane.”
Abrahama wagijima waya etinkhomeni, wafike wakhetsa litfole lelihle lelikhuluphele, walinika sisebenti, naso saphutfuma salilungisa.
Watsatsa emasi, nelubisi, nalenyama yelitfole leyase ilungisiwe, wakubeka embikwawo; yena wema eceleni kwawo phansi kwesihlahla ngesikhatsi asadla.
Sara wakuva loko, ngobe abesemnyango welithende emvakwa-Abrahama, alalele.
Kepha bo-Abrahama naSara bese babadzala kakhulu, naSara abengasayi esikhatsini.
Sara watihlekela nje, wadzimate watsi: “Manje sengimdzala kangaka, nenkhosi yami seyigugile, utsi ngingabe ngisaba nayo lenjabulo?”
Simakadze watsi ku-Abrahama: “Uhlekeleni Sara, atsi: ‘Ngitawutala umntfwana sengimdzala kangaka?’
Kukhona yini lokungamehlula Simakadze? Njengobe sengishito, ngitawubuya la kuwe ngemnyaka lotako. Sara utawuba nendvodzana.”
Kodvwa Sara waphika ngenca yekwesaba watsi: “Angikahleki.”
Lamadvodza esuka lapho ahamba asalibhekise eSodoma, Abrahama wawaphekeletela, entela kuwakhombisa indlela.
Simakadze wase utsi: “Kodvwa ngingamfihlela yini Abrahama loku lengitakwenta?
Phela, Abrahama utawuba sive lesikhulu lesinemandla, tonkhe tive temhlaba tiyawubusiswa ngaye.

Cha, ngeke, ngobe Abrahama ngimkhetsile kutsi ayale emadvodzana akhe netitukulwane takhe emvakwakhe, kutsi bagcine intsandvo yaSimakadze ngekwenta lokuhle nalokulungile. Khona-ke Simakadze uyawunika Abrahama loko lametsembisa kona.”
ngitakwehla ngiyewubona kutsi ngabe bente njengekusho kwesikhalo lesifike kimi yini. Nangabe akunjalo, ngitakwati.”
Ngako-ke lamadvodza esuka lapho acondza ngaseSodoma; kepha Abrahama wasala embikwaSimakadze.
Abrahama wasondzela kuSimakadze watsi: “Uyawubabhubhisa ngempela yini labalungile kanye nalababi?
Nangabe-ke kulelidolobha kukhona labalungile labangema-50, utawulibhubhisa yini? Ungete walisindzisa yini ngenca yalaba labalungile labangema-50?

Akube khashane nawe kwenta intfo lenje! Ungababhubhisi labalungile kanye nalababi, bese labalungile baba njengalabangakalungi! Akube khashane nawe loko. Angeke yini umehluleli wemhlaba wonkhe ente kulunga?”
Simakadze wamphendvula watsi: “Nangikhandze bantfu labalungile labangema-50 eSodoma, yonkhe leyo ndzawo ngiyawuyisindzisa ngenca yabo.”
Abrahama waphindze wakhuluma futsi, watsi: “Ngiyacolisa kuba nesibindzi sekukhuluma neNkhosi yami, mine lengilutfuli nemlotsa.
Nakwenteka babe ngema-45, utalibhubhisa yini ngenca yalaba labasilele?”
Simakadze waphendvula watsi: “Ngingeke ngilibhubhise, nangikhandze kutsi labalungile bangema-45.”
Abrahama waphindze wakhuluma kuye futsi, watsi: “Ase ngitsi-ke kutfolakala kutsi labalungile bangema-40.”
Wamphendvula watsi: “Nakukhona labangema-40 labalungile, ngingeke ngilibhubhise.”
Abrahama watsi: “Ngicela kutsi iNkhosi ingatfukutseli ngekutsi ngisakhuluma. Nakwenteka-ke kutfolakala labalungile bangema-30?”
Wamphendvula watsi: “Ngingeke ngilibhubhise, nangikhandza kutsi labalungile bangema-30.”
Abrahama watsi: “Ngiyacolisa kuba nesibindzi sekuchubeka ngikhulume neNkhosi. Ase ngitsi-ke ukhandza labalungile bangema-20?”
Wamphendvula watsi: “Ngingeke ngilibhubhise, nangikhandza labalungile bangema-20.”
Abrahama watsi: “Ngicela kutsi iNkhosi ingatfukutseli ngobe sengitawukhuluma kwekugcina-ke manje. Ase ngitsi-ke ukhandza labalungile balishumi?”
Wamphendvula watsi: “Ngenca yalabalungile labalishumi ngingeke ngilibhubhise.”
Watsi kube acedze kukhuluma na-Abrahama, Simakadze wase uyahamba; Abrahama wabuyela ethendeni lakhe.
Natifika eSodoma letingilosi letimbili, Loti abehleti esangweni lalowo muti. Watsi kube atibone, Loti wasukuma watihlangabeta; watikhotsamela,
watsi kuto: “Makhosi, ngiyanicela kutsi niphambuke nitewungenisa endlini yenceku yenu kulobusuku balamuhla, khona nitewugeza tinyawo tenu. Kusasa ngeluvivi seningahamba niye lapho niya khona.”
Kodvwa taphendvula tatsi: “Cha, sitawuhlala lapha ngaphandle.”
Kepha Loti watincenga kakhulu letingilosi, tadzimate taphambuka taya tangenisa endlini kakhe. Watentela lidzili, watibhakela sinkhwa lesite imbiliso, tadla.
Kepha tatsi tisengakalali, onkhe emadvodza alomuti waseSodoma, lamadzala nalamancane, ayitungeleta lendlu.
Amemeta Loti atsi: “Aphi lamadvodza langenise lapha kakho kuyo lentsambama? Wakhiphe uwaletse la, khona sitewulala nawo!”
Loti waphuma waya kuwo, wavala umnyango emvakwakhe,
watsi: “Ngiyanincenga, bomnaketfu, kutsi ningayenti lentfo lembi kangaka.

Ase nilalele la, nginemadvodzakati lamabili langazange asalale nemuntfu lomdvuna. Angimane nginiletsele wona, nente lenikutsandzako kuwo. Kepha ningenti lutfo kulamadvodza, ngobe angenise endlini kami.”
Kepha atsi kuye: “Khwesha wena mchamuki-ndzini, sewufuna kuba ngumehluleli wetfu! Wena-ke sesitakuphatsa matima kakhulu kunawo.” Bafuca Loti bamcindzetela betama kwephula sivalo.
Kepha lamadvodza lamabili aveta tandla tawo, advonsa Loti amngenisa endlini kuwo, avala umnyango.
Ashaya lamadvodza labesemnyango ngebumphumphutse onkhe lawo labengaphandle kwendlu, lamancane nalamadzala, kangangekutsi abatse ayawufuna umnyango angete awutfola.
Lamadvodza lamabili atsi kuLoti: “Nangabe bakhona labanye bantfu lonabo, labanjengebakhwenyana, nemadvodzana, nemadvodzakati nome ngangubani lokulelidolobha, bakhiphe lapha,
ngobe lendzawo sesitayibhubhisa, ngesizatfu sekutsi sikhalo ngalabantfu balapha sesikhulu kakhulu kuSimakadze; ngako Simakadze usitfume kutsi siteyibhubhisa.”

Ngako-ke Loti waphuma waya kubakhwenyana bakhe lababetawutsatsa emadvodzakati akhe, wefike watsi: “Sheshisani siphume, ngobe Simakadze sewutayibhubhisa lendzawo.” Kepha bamtsatsa njengemuntfu lonamako nje.
Ekuseni kuseluvivi tingilosi tamgcugcuta Loti tatsi: “Vuka, utsatse umkakho nemadvodzakati akho lamabili lakhona la, ningahle nehlelwe ngulesijeziso salelidolobha.”
Kepha Loti wabina; ngako-ke ngobe Simakadze waba nesihawu kuye, lamadvodza lamabili ababamba ngetandla, yena nemkakhe kanye nemadvodzakati akhe abakhiphela ngaphandle kwalelidolobha.
Atsi kube abakhiphele ngaphandle, lomunye wawo watsi: “Balekani nitewusindza! Ningasabuki nasemuva, ningemi ndzawo kulelitsafa. Balekani nicondze ngasetintsabeni, ningahle nehlelwe ngulesijeziso.”
Loti waphendvula watsi: “Cha, Nkhosi, akungabi njalo.

Inceku yakho itfole umusa emehlweni akho, wayentela sihawu lesikhulu ngekusindzisa imphilo yayo; kodvwa ngingeke ngikwati kubalekela etintsabeni, ngobe lesijeziso singahle singijubele ngembili, bese ngiyafa.
Ase ubuke naliya lidolobha ngesheya, kumalula kubalekela kulo ngobe lisedvutane, futsi lincane. Ngicela kubalekela kulelidolobha lelincane, khona ngitewusindza.”
Yatsi kuye: “Yebo-ke naloko ngiyakwemukela. Ngingeke ngilibhubhise lelidolobha lokhuluma ngalo.
Phangisa-ke ubalekele khona; ngobe ngingeke ngente lutfo ungakefiki khona.”
Ngako-ke, njengobe Loti watsi lelidolobha lincane, lase letsiwa ngekutsi yiSowari.
Watsi Loti nakefika eSowari, lilanga lase liphuma.
Simakadze wanisa imvula yesibabule nemlilo, iphuma ezulwini, kwana etikweSodoma neGomora.
Wawabhubhisa lawo madolobha kanye nalo lonkhe lelo tsafa, nebantfu bawo bonkhe, nako konkhe lokwakumile emhlabatsini.
Kepha umkaLoti wabuka emuva, wagucuka masinyane waba yinsika yeluswayi.
Abrahama wavuka ekuseni kuseluvivi waya kulendzawo lapho abehlangene naSimakadze khona.
Wabuka entansi ngaseSodoma neGomora, ematsafeni angakhona. Wabona intfutfu yalelo live yenyuka njengemusi wenkhehlewane yemlilo.
Ngako-ke Nkulunkulu nakabhubhisa lamadolobha alawo matsafa, wakhumbula Abrahama ngekutsi akhiphe Loti ekubhujisweni kwalamadolobha, Loti labehlala kuwo.
Njengobe Loti bekesaba kuhlala eSowari, waphuma wayawuhlala etintsabeni yena nemadvodzakati akhe lamabili; likhaya labo kwaba ngumgedze.
Lendvodzakati yaLoti yematubulo yakhuluma kulena lencane, yatsi: “Babe wetfu semdzala, kantsi futsi kulelive kute indvodza lengalala natsi njengobe bonkhe bantfu benta.
Kota, sitewunatsisa babe liwayini, bese silala naye, sentele kutatitfolela bantfwana kubabe.”
Kulobo busuku uyise bamnatsisa liwayini, wadzakwa. Litubulo lakhe langena kuye, lalala neyise. Loti akazange asamuve nekutsi wangena nini waphuma nini engutjeni, ngobe bekadzakwe kakhulu.

Ngakusasa lelitubulo latsi kulona lomncane: “Awuboni-ke, mine ngilele naye babe ebusuku bayitolo, asiphindze simnatsise futsi nalamuhla bese uyangena nawe ulale naye, sentele kutitfolela bantfwana kubabe.”
Ngako-ke baphindza bamnatsisa uyise nakubo lobo busuku wadzakwa. Lona lomncane wahamba wafike walala neyise. Loti akamvanga nakangena nome asaphuma, ngobe bekadzakwe kakhulu.
Ngako-ke omabili emadvodzakati aLoti akhuleliswa nguyise.
Litubulo lakhe latala indvodzana, layetsa libito latsi nguMowabi.
Lencane nayo yatala indvodzana, yayetsa libito yatsi nguBhenani.
Abrahama wesuka kulelo live waya eveni laseNegevu, eningizimu naseKhenani. Wafike wahlala emkhatsini weKhadeshi neShuri; wahlalahlala eGerari.
Wafike lapho watsi: “Sara ngudzadzewetfu.” Ngako-ke Abimeleki, inkhosi yaseGerari, yatfumela kutsi kulandvwe Sara.
Kodvwa Nkulunkulu weta ku-Abimeleki ngeliphupho ebusuku watsi kuye: “Wena utakufa ngenca yalomfati lomtsetse, ngobe ungumfati walendvodza.”
Abimeleki abesengakaze wangena kuye, ngako-ke wase utsi: “Nkhosi, utasibhubhisa yini nalesive lesite licala?
Kantsi akasho yini Abrahama kutsi ngudzadzewabo? Naye lomfati utsite ngumnakabo. Loku ngikwente ngenhlitiyo lemhlophe, tandla tami atinacala.”
Nkulunkulu wamphendvula ephusheni watsi: “Yebo, ngiyati kutsi loku ukwente ngenhlitiyo lemhlophe, futsi ngimi lokuvimbile kutsi ungoni kimi, ngako angikakuvumeli kutsi umtsintse.
Manje-ke, mncandzekise lomfati walendvodza, ngobe ingumphrofethi; itakuthandazela bese uyaphila. Kodvwa nawungamncandzekisi, ubovele wati kutsi utakufa, wena nebantfu bakho.”
Ngako-ke ekuseni ngeluvivi Abimeleki wavuka, wabita tonkhe tindvuna takhe, waticocela ngako konkhe loko; nato tesaba kakhulu.

Abimeleki wabita Abrahama wambuta watsi: “Yini lena lose uyente la kitsi? Ngikone ngani, kutsi ungaze uletsele mine kanye nembuso wami lesono lesikhulu kangaka? Utenteleni letintfo bewungakafaneli kutenta?”
Abrahama wamphendvula watsi: “Ngikwente ngobe ngicabange ngatsi: ‘Akukho kwesaba Nkulunkulu kulendzawo, ngako batangibulala ngenca yalomfati wami.’
Ngaphandle kwaloko nje, vele ungudzadzewetfu, ngobe uyindvodzakati yababe, kodvwa hhayi yamake; kodvwa noko ungumkami.
Nkulunkulu nangikhipha endlini yababe kutsi ngizulazule, ngatsi kuSara: ‘Naku-ke lengicela ungentele kona: Yonkhe indzawo lapho sifika khona, ubobatjela ngami utsi: “Ungumnaketfu.” ’ ”
Abimeleki watsatsa timvu, netinkhabi, netisebenti letidvuna naletisikati, watipha Abrahama, wabuyisela Sara endvodzeni yakhe.
Abimeleki watsi: “Buka la, nali live lami, yakha lapho utsandza khona.”
Wagucukela kuSara watsi: “Umnakenu sengimnike emasiliva layinkhulungwane; loku kufakaza kubo bonkhe laba kutsi awunacala, kute lokubi lokwentile.”
Abrahama wathandaza kuNkulunkulu. Nkulunkulu waphilisa Abimeleki, nemkakhe, netisebenti letisikati kuze bonkhe batale bantfwana.
Phela Simakadze abesavale tonkhe titalo tebemndeni waka-Abimeleki ngenca yaSara, umka-Abrahama.
Sara wakhulelwa, watalela Abrahama indvodzana ngesikhatsi lesasikhonjwe nguNkulunkulu. Abrahama abesamdzala kakhulu.
Abrahama wayetsa libito watsi ngu-Isaka lendvodzana yakhe labeyitalelwe nguSara.
Abrahama wayisoka indvodzana yakhe lengu-Isaka seyinemalanga lasiphohlongo budzala, njengobe Nkulunkulu abemyalile.
Abrahama abesaneminyaka lelikhulu budzala, ngesikhatsi kutalwa indvodzana yakhe Isaka.
Wachubeka watsi: “Ngubani nje labengahle asho ku-Abrahama kutsi Sara uyawuse amunyise bantfwana? Noko sengimtalele indvodzana ebudzaleni bakhe.”
Umntfwana wakhula, kwatsi mhlazana alunyulwa Abrahama wenta lelikhulu lidzili.
Ngalelinye lilanga Sara wabona indvodzana yaHagari, umGibhithe, labeyitalele Abrahama, yeyisa
Ngako-ke wase utsi ku-Abrahama: “Sicoshe lesigcilikati nalendvodzana yaso, ngobe indvodzana yalesigcilikati akufanele ibe yindlalifa kanye nendvodzana yami Isaka.”
Loku kwamkhatsata kakhulu Abrahama, ngobe bekuphatselene nalendvodzana yakhe.

Kodvwa Nkulunkulu watsi ku-Abrahama: “Ungakhatsateki ngenca yalomfana nangenca yalesigcilikati sakho. Loko lokushiwo nguSara kuwe kwente njengobe akutjelile, ngobe titukulwane takho tiyawubitwa nga-Isaka.
Ngiyakwenta sive nangendvodzana yesigcilikati sakho, ngobe nayo iyintalo yakho.”
Ngakusasa ekuseni Abrahama wavuka kuseluvivi, watsatsa sinkhwa nesigubhu semanti wakwetjatsisa Hagari, wamnika nemntfwana wabahambisa. Wahamba-ke Hagari azulazula ehlane laseBherisheba.
Atsi kube aphele lamanti esigujini, wabeka umntfwana ngaphansi kwalesinye sihlahla.
Wase uhamba libanga lemjikijelo, wayawuhlala khona acabanga atsi: “Ngingeke ngikumele kubuka umntfwanami afa.” Asahleti phansi afulatsele lomfana, tehla tinyembeti, wakhala kabuhlungu.
Nkulunkulu wakuva kukhala kwalomfana; ingilosi yaNkulunkulu yakhuluma isezulwini, yatsi kuHagari: “Hagari, uhlushwa yini? Ungesabi, ngobe Nkulunkulu sewulivile livi lalomfana lapho akhona.
Sukuma, utsatse lomntfwana, umgone, ngobe ngitakumenta abe sive lesikhulu.”
Nkulunkulu wawavula emehlo aHagari, wabona sicobho semanti, waya kuwo wafike wagcwalisa sigubhu ngemanti, wanatsisa lomntfwana.
Nkulunkulu waba naye lomntfwana. Wakhula, akhulela ehlane, waba yingcweti kutebutjoki.
Ngesikhatsi ahlala ehlane lasePharani, unina wamtsatsela umfati labengumGibhithe.
Ngako ase ufunge la kimi embikwaNkulunkulu kutsi ungeke ungiyenge mine, nebantfwabami, netitukulwane tami, kepha ngekwemusa wami lengiwente kuwe, wente nakimi nakulo lelive lokhosele kulo.”
Abrahama wase ubeka sikhalo sakhe ku-Abimeleki macondzana nemtfombo wemanti lowawuchwagwe tisebenti ta-Abimeleki.
Abimeleki watsi: “Hhawu, nami ngiyayicabuka nje lendzaba. Angati kutsi kwentiwe ngubani loko, nawe awuzange sewungitjele, kantsi futsi angizange sengive ngako.”
Abrahama wase upha Abimeleki timvu netinkhabi, benta sivumelwane bobabili.
Abrahama wakhetsa emazinyane etimvu lamasikati lasikhombisa emhlambini wakhe.
Abimeleki wabuta Abrahama watsi: “Usho kutsini ngalokukhetsa lamazinyane etimvu lamasikati lasikhombisa?”
Abrahama waphendvula watsi: “Yemukela lamazinyane lasikhombisa etimvu la esandleni sami, kube bufakazi bami kutsi lomtfombo wembiwa ngimi.”
Ngako-ke leyo ndzawo yabitwa ngekutsi yiBherisheba;
Batsi kube basente lesivumelwane eBherisheba, bo-Abimeleki nendvuna yakhe, Phikoli, besuka kuleyo ndzawo babuyela eveni lemaFilisti.
Abrahama wahlanyela sihlahla selitamariske eBherisheba. Wadvumisa Simakadze, Nkulunkulu waphakadze.
Abrahama wahlala eveni lemaFilisti sikhatsi lesidze.

Ngakusasa ekuseni ngeluvivi, Abrahama wavuka, wabophela imbongolo yakhe, watsatsa tisebenti takhe taba timbili kanye nendvodzana yakhe Isaka. Wakabha tinkhuni temhlatjelo labetawufike awushise, besuka bahamba baya kuleyo ndzawo Nkulunkulu labemlayele yona.
Ngelilanga lesitsatfu Abrahama watsi uphakamisa emehlo, wayibona indzawo isesekhashane.
Abrahama wase ukhuluma kuletisebenti takhe watsi: “Hlalani la nalembongolo, mine nalomfana sisaya lapha kuyawukhonta, sitawubuya sibuye la kini.”
Abrahama watsatsa tinkhuni temhlatjelo wekushiswa, watetfwesa Isaka, umsa wakhe, yena waphatsa umlilo nemukhwa esandleni sakhe. Bahamba bobabili ndzawonye.
Isaka wabuta watsi: “Ngiyatibona tinkhuni nemlilo, kepha liphi lizinyane lemvu yemhlatjelo?”
Abrahama waphendvula watsi: “Ndvodzana yami, Nkulunkulu utatibonela yena lizinyane lemhlatjelo wekushiswa.” Ngako-ke bachubeka solomane bahamba bobabili.
Batsi kube befike kulendzawo Nkulunkulu labemlayele yona, Abrahama wakha lilati walungisa tinkhuni, wabopha Isaka, umsa wakhe, wambeka etinkhunini etikwelilati.
Abrahama welula sandla sakhe, watsatsa umukhwa asatawuhlaba umsa wakhe.
Kepha ingilosi yaSimakadze yambita isezulwini yatsi: “Abrahama! Ye, Abrahama!”

Abrahama watsi uphakamisa emehlo uyacalata, wabona emvakwakhe kunesihhanca, sibanjwe ngetimphondvo esihlahleni. Abrahama wahamba wayawutsatsa lesihhanca, wase unikela ngaso, saba ngumhlatjelo esikhundleni sendvodzana yakhe.
Ngako-ke Abrahama wetsa leyo ndzawo libito, watsi: “Simakadze uyatibonela.” Nalamuhla lendzawo bantfu basayibita ngekutsi: “Simakadze uyatibonela entsabeni.”
Ingilosi yaSimakadze yaphindze yamemeta Abrahama kwesibili isezulwini,
yatsi, “Nali livi laSimakadze litsi: ‘Ngitifunga mine kutsi njengobe wente loku, wangete wayigodla indvodzana yakho yekuphela,
ngiyakukubusisa impela, ngandzise titukulwane takho tibe ngangetinkhanyeti tesibhakabhaka nangangesihlabatsi selugu lwelwandle. Titukulwane takho tiyakwehlula emadolobha etitsa tato.
Tive tonkhe temhlaba tiyawubusiswa ngetitukulwane takho, ngobe ulalele livi lami.’ ”
Abrahama wancandzeka wabuyela etincekwini takhe, bahambisana sebabuyela eBherisheba, lapho Abrahama afike wakha khona.
Litubulo lakhe ngu-Uzi, elanywe nguBuzi, umnakabo, bese kuta Khemuweli, uyise wa-Aramu,
elanywe nguKhesede, naHazo, naPhildashi, naJidilafe, naBethuweli.”
Bethuweli watala Rebheka. Laba-ke labasiphohlongo Milkha wabatala kuNahori, umnakabo-Abrahama.
Ngetulu kwaloko umfati lomunye waNahori lekwakutsiwa nguRewuma watala boTheba, naGahamu, naThahashi, naMakha.
Sara wafela eKhiriyathi Abha, lekuyiHebroni, eveni laseKhenani. Abrahama wakhalela umkakhe, Sara.
Abrahama wasishiya sidvumbu semkakhe, wesuka waya kumaHethi, wefika watsi:
“Ngisihambi nemchamuki la emkhatsini wenu. Ngicela ningitsengisele indzawo yekungcwaba, khona ngitewungcwaba lesidvumbu semkami.”

“Ase usilalele, mnumzane, wena usikhulu lesinemandla la emkhatsini wetfu. Lomkakho ungamngcwaba nome ngangukuliphi kulamathuna etfu. Kute la emkhatsini wetfu longete akunika lithuna nome akuphatamise ekungcwabeni lomkakho.”
Abrahama wasukuma wewakhotsamela lamaHethi, lekwakubantfu bakuleyo ndzawo.
Watsi kubo: “Nanitsandza kutsi ngimngcwabe, esuke embikwami, ngisiteni ningicelele ku-Efroni, umsa waSowari,
kutsi angitsengisele umhume wakhe waseMakhaphela, lesekugcineni kwensimi yakhe. Ngicela angitsengisele ngentsengo lefanele, utewuba wami ube yindzawo yekungcwaba.”
Efroni labehleti emkhatsini wemaHethi waphendvula Abrahama eva onkhe emaHethi labengena esangweni lelidolobha,
watsi: “Cha, nkhosi yami, asungilalele: Ngiyakunika lensimi kanye nalomhume lokuyo, ngikunika embikwebantfu bakitsi, ngitsi: Lomkakho mngcwabe khona.”
Wakhuluma ku-Efroni embikwalabo bantfu, watsi: “Ase ungilalele, ngitakunika intsengo yalensimi, ngicela uyemukele kimi, khona ngitawungcwaba khona umkami.”
“Nkhosi yami, asungilalele: Lesicakwana singabita lemashekheli esiliva langema-400.
Bo-Abrahama na-Efroni bavumelana. Abrahama wase ukalela Efroni isiliva labesavele akhulume ngayo embikwemaHethi. Kwaba ngemashekheli esiliva langema-400,
Ngako-ke insimi ya-Efroni leyayiseMakhaphela ngasemphumalanga neMamre, leyayinemhume nato tonkhe tihlahla letatikuyo, yonkhe leyo ndzawo,
yetfulwa ku-Abrahama embikwemaHethi, nabo bonkhe lababesesangweni lalelo dolobha.
Emvakwaloko Abrahama wangcwaba umkakhe Sara emhumeni wensimi yaseMakhaphela, ngasemphumalanga neMamre, eHebroni, eveni laseKhenani.
Lensimi kanye nemhume emaHethi akunika Abrahama kutsi kube yindzawo yakhe yekungcwaba.
Abrahama abesamdzala kakhulu ngeminyaka. Simakadze abembusisile etintfweni tonkhe.
Abrahama wakhuluma nenceku yakhe lenkhulu ekhaya lakhe, leyayiphetse konkhe labenako, watsi: “Beka sandla sakho ngaphansi kwelitsanga lami.
Ngitekufungisa Simakadze longuNkulunkulu welizulu nemhlaba, kutsi ungacali utsatsele indvodzana yami umfati emkhatsini wemadvodzakati emaKhenani, lengihleti emkhatsini wawo.
Kodvwa ubohamba ubuyele eveni lakitsi lemdzabu, nasetihlotjeni takitsi, ufike umtsatsele khona Isaka, umsa wami, umfati.”
Lenceku yatsi kuye: “Nangabe lentfombi ingavumi kungilandzela ite nami kulelive, ngibobe sengenta njani? Ngiboyitsatsa yini lendvodzana yakho ngincandzeke nayo ngiyibuyisele kulelo live lakini?”
Abrahama watsi kuyo: “Caphela ungacali uyibuyisele emuva lendvodzana yami.

Simakadze, Nkulunkulu welizulu, lowangitsatsa endlini yababe, naseveni lakitsi lemdzabu, wakhuluma kimi waphindze wangetsembisa ngesifungo watsi: ‘Lelive ngiyawulinika titukulwane takho,’ utawutfuma ingilosi kutsi ikuhambele embili. Wena-ke, lomsa wami uyawumtsatsela intfombi kuleyo ndzawo ute nayo la.
Kodvwa nangabe lentfombi ayifuni kukulandzela, utawube sewukhululekile kulesifungo. Intfo nje, ungayibuyiseli indvodzana yami kulelo live.”
Ngako-ke lenceku yabeka sandla sayo ngaphansi kwelitsanga la-Abrahama, inkhosi yayo, yafunga kuye ngalendzaba.
Yefika entsambama yakanekisa ngaphandle kwelidolobha, yagucisa emakamela eceleni kwesicobho, ngesikhatsi labakha ngaso emanti labasikati.
Lenceku yathandaza yatsi: “Simakadze, Nkulunkulu wenkhosi yami, ngicela ungiphe imphumelelo lamuhla, ukhombise umusa wakho enkhosini yami Abrahama.
Naku manje sengime la eceleni kwalesicobho, lapho kukha khona emadvodzakati ebantfu bakulelidolobha.

Akutsi kuleyo ntfombi lengitawutsi kuyo: ‘Ngicela ubeke phansi imbita ngitewunatsa,’ yona-ke itsi: ‘Natsa, ngitawunatsisa wena kanye nemakamela akho,’ ngicela kutsi leyo kube ngiyo-ke loyimisele Isaka, inceku yakho. Ngiyawukwati ngaloko-ke kutsi ukhombise umusa enkhosini yami.”
Lentfombi yayiyinhle, ibukeka, iyintfombi, ingazange seyilale nemuntfu lomdvuna. Yewukela esicojeni, yakhelela, yagcwalisa imbita yayo ngemanti, yakhuphuka.
Lenceku yagijima yaya kuyo iyihlangabeta, yafike yatsi: “Ngicela sewumane unginatsise emantana nje la embiteni yakho.”
Yaphendvula yatsi: “Natsa, nkhosi yami.” Yaphangisa yetfula imbita, yanatsisa lenceku.
Yatsi kube icedze kuyinatsisa, yatsi: “Ngitawunatsisa nalamakamela akho, aze enele onkhe.”
Ngako-ke, yashesha yatfululela lamanti enkelebheni, yagijima yaya kukha lamanye esicojeni, yawanatsisa onkhe lamakamela enceku.
Lendvodza yayibukisisa lentfombi, ibindzile, ifundzisisa kahle nome Simakadze abeyiphumelelisa indlela yayo, nome cha.
Yatsi kube icedze lentfombi kunatsisa emakamela, lendvodza yatsatsa indandatho yegolide leyayinesisindvo sencenye yelishekheli
yatsi: “Ase ungitjele kutsi wena utalwa ngubani? Singayitfola yini indzawo lena ekhaya kini, simane siyewufihla inhloko lenemehlo?”
Lentfombi yaphendvula yatsi: “Mine ngiyindvodzakati yaBethuweli, umsa waMilkha naNahori.”
Yachubeka yatsi: “Sinetjani lobunyenti bemakamela kanye nendlu leyenele kutsi ningangenisa khona.”

yatsi: “Akabongwe Simakadze, Nkulunkulu wenkhosi yami Abrahama, longakayekeli kukhombisa umusa wakhe nekwetsembeka kwakhe enkhosini yami Abrahama. Mine-ke Simakadze ungihole endleleni, waze wangingenisa endlini yetihlobo tenkhosi yami.”
Lentfombi yagijima, yaya kubendlu yenina, yafike yabatjela ngako konkhe loko.
Rebheka abenemnakabo, anguLabani. Labani waphuma wagijima waya kuyo lendvodza, ngasesicojeni.

Watsi nakabona indandatho ekhaleni kanye nemabhengela emikhonweni yadzadzewabo, watsi nakeva emavi aRebheka, dzadzewabo, atsi: “Lendvodza ikhulume kimi,” waya kuyo. Wayikhandza ime eceleni kwemakamela madvutane nesicobho.
Wafike watsi: “Ngena, wena lobusiswe nguSimakadze, umeleni ngaphandle? Ngobe indzawo sengiyilungisile endlini, ngisho nendzawo yemakamela imbala.”

Ngako-ke lendvodza yeta, yangena endlini. Labani wakhumula lamakamela, wawafaka esibayeni wawanika kudla, adla. Wanika lendvodza emanti ekugeza tinyawo tayo, nalamadvodza abehamba nawo ageza tinyawo tawo.
Kwase kuletfwa kudla, kwabekwa embikwayo kutsi itekudla. Kodvwa yona yatsi: “Ngingeke ngidle, ngingakayikhulumi indzaba lengite ngayo.” Labani watsi: “Khuluma phela.”
Simakadze uyibusise kakhulu inkhosi yami, injinge kakhulu. Simakadze uyibusise ngemihlambi yetimvu netinkhomo, isiliva negolide, tisebenti letidvuna naletisikati, emakamela kanye netimbongolo.
Sara, inkhosikati yenkhosi yami, watalela inkhosi yami indvodzana, asamdzala kakhulu. Inkhosi yami seyinike lendvodzana yayo konkhe lenako.
Inkhosi yami yangifungisa yatsi: ‘Ungayitsatseli indvodzana yami umfati kuletintfombi taseKhenani, kulelive lengihleti kulo.
Kodvwa ubohamba uye elusendvweni lwaketfu esiveni sakitsi, uyitsatsele khona indvodzana yami umfati.’
Ngabuta enkhosini yami ngatsi: ‘Nangabe ayivumi kuta nami lentfombi, ngibobe sengenta njani?’

“Yangiphendvula yatsi: ‘Simakadze lengihamba embikwakhe utawutfumela ingilosi yakhe ihambe nawe, akuphumelelise endleleni yakho. Indvodzana yami uyawuyitsatsela umfati esiveni sakitsi, elusendvweni lwaketfu.
Nawuye esiveni sakitsi, uyawube sewuyakhululeka-ke kulesifungo sakho; nome befike bala kukunika lentfombi, uyawukhululeka-ke kulesifungo sakho.’
“Nangifika esicojeni lamuhla, ngitsite: ‘Simakadze, Nkulunkulu wenkhosi yami, Abrahama, nakuyintsandvo yakho, ngiphumelelise kuloluhambo lwami.
Njengobe ngime la, eceleni kwalesicobho semanti, akutsi intfombi letewukha emanti nangitsi kuyo: “Ngicela unginatsise emantana ngalembita yakho,”
yona itsi kimi: “Natsa wena, ngitawube senginatsisa nalamakamela akho,” kube ngiyo-ke intfombi Simakadze layimisele indvodzana yenkhosi yami.’
Ngitsite ngisengakacedzi nje kuthandaza ngenhlitiyo, kwachamuka Rebheka etjetse imbita yemanti. Wewukela esicojeni wefike wakha emanti. Ngase ngitsi kuye: ‘Ngicela unginatsise.’
Waphangisa wetfula imbita yakhe, watsi: ‘Natsa wena kucala, ngitawube senginatsisa nalamakamela akho futsi.’ Nganatsa-ke, wase unatsisa nemakamela ami futsi.

Ngase ngiyambuta ngitsi: ‘Wena uyindvodzakati yabani?’ Wangiphendvula watsi: ‘Ngiyindvodzakati yaBethuweli, umsa waMilkha naNahori.’ Ngako-ke ngase ngimfaka lendandatho ekhaleni lakhe ngamegabisa nalamajiva emikhonweni yakhe.

Ngase ngikhotsamisa inhloko yami, ngakhuleka kuSimakadze, ngimbonga yena longuNkulunkulu wenkhosi yami Abrahama, ngobe angihole ngendlela lekungiyo sibili kutsi ngitewutsatsa lendvodzakati yesihlobo senkhosi yami itewuba ngumfati wendvodzana yayo.
Manje-ke, njengobe nine nitinini tenkhosi yami, ngitjeleni, nanitsandza kuvelana nayo ngekwetsembeka. Naningatsandzi, ngitjeleni, khona phela ngitekwenta loko lokufanele ngikwente.”
BoLabani naBethuweli baphendvula batsi: “Lendzaba le iphuma kuSimakadze. Tsine kute lesingakusho.
Nangu Rebheka embikwakho; mtsatse, uhambe naye ayekuba ngumfati wendvodzana yenkhosi yakho, njengobe Simakadze asakhulumile.”
Yatsi kube ikuve loko inceku ya-Abrahama, yakhotsama yakhuleka kuSimakadze.
Lenceku yakhipha tintfo tesiliva netegolide, netingubo, yatipha Rebheka. Yaphindze yapha umnakabo nenina tintfo letingemagugu.
Lenceku kanye nemadvodza beyihamba nawo badla, banatsa, bahlala khona busuku bonkhe. Nabavuka ngakusasa ekuseni lenceku yatsi: “Ngikhululeni, ngibuyele enkhosini yami.”
UmnakaboRebheka nenina batsi: “Ase ihlalahlale natsi lentfombatane emalangana langacishe abe lishumi. Emvakwaloko nitawube seniyahamba-ke.”
Kepha inceku yatsi kubo: “Ningangibambeleli, ngobe Simakadze uyiphumelelisile indzaba yami. Ngikhululeni ngiye enkhosini yami.”
Base batsi: “Ake sibite lentfombatana sitewuva kuyo.”
Babita Rebheka, bambuta batsi: “Utawuhamba nayo yini lendvodza?”
Rebheka netimphekeleteli takhe batilungisela bagibela emakamela, bahamba nalendvodza. Yamtfola kanjalo-ke Rebheka lendvodza.
Waphuma entsambama waya esigangeni ayewudla ematsambo engcondvo khona; watsi uphakamisa emehlo wabona kuchamuka emakamela eta ngakuye.
Rebheka watsi uphakamisa emehlo akhe, wabona Isaka, wase uyehlika ekameleni.
Wabuta kulenceku watsi: “Ngubani leya ndvodza lesihlangabetako?”
Inceku yaphendvula yatsi: “Yinkhosi yami.” Ngako-ke watsatsa iveyili yakhe watimbonya.
Lenceku yafike yalandzisa Isaka ngako konkhe leyase ikwentile.
Yena-ke wamtalela boZimrani, naJokshane, naMedani, naMidiyani, na-Ishbaki, naShuwa.
Jokshane watala boSheba naDedani. KuDedani ngulapho kwavela khona ema-Ashuri, nemaLethushi, nemaLewumi.
Emadvodzana aMidiyani bekubo-Efa, na-Eferi, naHanoki, na-Abida, naElda. Bonkhe laba kwakubantfwana baKhetura.
Kodvwa emadvodzana alabanye bafati bakhe wabapha tipho, watsi asaphila nje wawasusa kulendvodzana yakhe Isaka, wawabhekisa ngasemphumalanga nelive.
Abrahama wafa asamdzala kakhulu asenelisekile emphilweni; walandzela bokhokho bakhe.
Bo-Isaka na-Ishmayeli, emadvodzana akhe, amngcwaba emhumeni waseMakhaphela, ensimini ya-Efroni, umsa waSowari, umHethi, emphumalanga naseMamre.
Lensimi ngulena leyatsengwa ngu-Abrahama kumaHethi. Wangcwatjwa khona lapho-ke Abrahama, kanye nemkakhe Sara.
Emvakwekufa kwa-Abrahama, Nkulunkulu wayibusisa lendvodzana yakhe lengu-Isaka. Isaka wacaba eBheri Lahayi Royi.
Emadvodzana a-Ishmayeli ngekwelamana kwawo bekunguNebayothi, litibulo lakhe, naKhedari, na-Adbeli, naMibsamu,
Ngiwo lawo-ke emadvodzana a-Ishmayeli nemabito awo labetsa ngawo imiti netikanekiso tawo; babetikhulu tetive letili-12.
Ishmayeli waphila iminyaka leli-137, wafa; walandzela bokhokho bakhe.
Titukulwane ta-Ishmayeli takha kusukela eHavila kuya eShuri, lemalunga naseGibhithe, kuya ngase-Asiriya. Takha, tatsi cekelele takhweshelana netihlobo tato; tatihlaselana naletihlobo tato.
Isaka watsi nasaneminyaka lengema-40 watsatsa Rebheka, indvodzakati yaBethuweli, um-Aramu wasePhadani Aramu, dzadzewabo Labani, um-Aramu.
Isaka wathandazela umkakhe kuSimakadze, ngobe abeyinyumba. Simakadze wawuphendvula umthandazo wakhe; Rebheka, umka-Isaka, wakhulelwa.
Wakhulelwa emaphahla. Atsi asengakatalwa agudlulana kamatima esiswini sakhe, wadzimate watsi: “Loku kwentekelani kimi?” Ngako-ke wayawubuta kuSimakadze.
Kwatsi nakufika emalanga akhe ekubeleka, wabeleka emaphahla.
Lekucala laphuma libovana, lilihwanca wonkhe umtimba, njengengubo yeboya. Baletsa batsi ngu-Esawu.
Emvakwekuphuma kwalomnakabo, sandla salona lomunye lolandzelako saphuma sibambe sitsendze sa-Esawu, ngako-ke bametsa ngekutsi nguJakobe.
Labafana bakhula. Esawu waba ngumtingeli lonelikhono, angumuntfu wasematsafeni, kantsi Jakobe yena abesithuli ahlala ekhaya.
Isaka abetsandza Esawu, ngobe abedla inyama yenyamatane labeyitingela; kepha Rebheka abetsandza Jakobe.
Esawu watsi kuJakobe: “Maye, ngilambile! Ngicela sewumane ungiphe lesiphuphe.” Ngako-ke libito lakhe kwatsiwa ngu-Edomu.
Esawu watsi: “Sengitakufa, linalusito luni kimi lelifa?”
Jakobe wase unika Esawu lesiphuphe. Esawu wadla, wanatsa, wasukuma wahamba. Esawu waledzelela kanjalo lifa lebutubulo bakhe.
Simakadze wabonakala ku-Isaka watsi: “Ungehleli eGibhithe. Ubohlala eveni lengitakukhombisa lona.
Hlalahlala kulelive, ngitawuba nawe ngikubusise, ngobe onkhe lamave ngitawuwanika wena netitukulwane takho. Ngitasifeza setsembiso sami lengasenta kuyihlo Abrahama.
Titukulwane takho ngiyawutandzisa tibe ngangetinkhanyeti tesibhakabhaka. Onkhe lamave ngiyakuwanika titukulwane takho. Tive tonkhe temhlaba tiyawubusiswa ngetitukulwane takho,
njengobe Abrahama wangihlonipha, wagcina imiyalo yami, nemitsetfo yami, netimiso tami.”

Kwatsi nakabutwa ngemadvodza aleyo ndzawo ngemfati wakhe, yena watsi ngudzadzewabo. Abengeke avume kutsi ngumkakhe, ngobe abesaba emadvodza aleyo ndzawo kutsi angahle ambulale ngenca yaRebheka. Phela Rebheka abemuhle, abukeka.
Isaka wahlala sikhatsi lesidze kuleyo ndzawo. Ngalelinye lilanga Abimeleki, inkhosi yemaFilisti, yatsi ihlola ngelifasitelo, yabona Isaka anga Rebheka, umkakhe.
Ngako-ke Abimeleki wabita Isaka wambuta watsi: “Kantsi vele ngumkakho yini lo! Kepha ukwentelani lokuhambe utsi ngudzadzewenu?”
Isaka wamphendvula watsi: “Kungobe bengicabanga ngitsi: ‘Ngingahle ngife ngenca yaRebheka!’ ”
Abimeleki watsi kuye: “Yini-ke lena lose uyente la kitsi? Buka-ke, ngobe lenye indvodza beyingahle ilale naye kalula nje lomkakho; ngaleyo ndlela bewutawube sewusiletsele licala.”
Ngako-ke Abimeleki wabayala bonkhe bantfu bakhe watsi: “Lowo lotsintsa lendvodza nome lomkayo utawubulawa.”
Isaka walima kulelo live, kulowo mnyaka wavuna ngalokuphindvwe kalikhulu, ngobe Simakadze wambusisa,
waceba, wachubeka wanotsa, waze waba yinjinga lenkhulu.
Abenetimphahla letinyenti, imihlambi yetimvu, netinkhomo, anemuti lomkhulu, netisebenti letinyenti, kangangekutsi emaFilisti adzimate aba nemona ngaye.
Ngako emaFilisti ase atigcibedzela ngemhlaba tonkhe ticobho letatimbiwe tisebenti ta-Abrahama asekhona; phela, Abrahama bekunguyise wa-Isaka.
Abimeleki wakhuluma ku-Isaka, watsi: “Suka, uhambe la eveni letfu; ngobe sewunemandla kakhulu kunatsi.”
Isaka wesuka lapho, wahamba waya eSigodzini saseGerari, lapho afike wahlala khona.

Isaka waphindze watimba ticobho temanti letatimbiwe ngu-Abrahama, uyise asekhona; ngobe phela emaFilisti abetigcibedzela emvakwekufa kwa-Abrahama. Leticobho Isaka watetsa emabito letatetsiwe ngawo nguyise.
Kepha tatsi tisebenti ta-Isaka natimba esigodzini, takhandza sicobho lesasinemanti lamnandzi.
Belusi baseGerari bacabana nebelusi ba-Isaka, batsi: “Lamanti ngewetfu!” Ngako lesicobho wasetsa libito watsi yi-Eseki,
Bemba lesinye futsi sicobho. Naso baphikisana ngaso futsi, ngako wasetsa watsi yiSitna.
Wesuka lapho wayakumba lesinye sicobho, sona-ke abazange baphikisane ngaso, ngako wasetsa watsi yiRehobothi,
Simakadze wabonakala kuye ngabona lobo busuku, watsi: “NginguNkulunkulu weyihlo Abrahama; ungesabi, ngobe nginawe, ngiyakukubusisa ngandzise titukulwane takho ngenca yenceku yami Abrahama.”
Ngako Isaka wakha lilati lapho, wakhuleka kuSimakadze, wemisa lithende lakhe khona lapho. Tisebenti ta-Isaka tase timba sicobho khona lapho.
Isaka watsi kubo: “Niteleni la kimi, kantsi niyangitondza, futsi nine nangicosha nasemkhatsini wenu?”
Bamphendvula batsi: “Manje sekusikhanyele kutsi Simakadze unawe. Ngako-ke sitsi: Akube nesifungo emkhatsini wakho natsi. Asente sivumelwane nawe,
sekutsi ungeke usentele lokubi, njengobe natsi singakakuphatsi kabi nje; sikuphetse kahle, sakuhambisa ngekuthula. Sekuyakhanya kutsi Simakadze ukubusisile.”
Isaka wase ubentela lidzili; badla banatsa.
Ekuseni kuseluvivi ngakusasa bavuka benta sivumelwane lomunye kulomunye, basibeka luphawu ngesifungo. Isaka wabavalelisa, bahamba ngekuthula.
Ngalo lelo langa tisebenti ta-Isaka teta kuye tamtjela ngesicobho letase tisimbile tatsi: “Sesiwatfolile emanti.”
Labalukatana bayenta yaba lusizi imphilo yabo-Isaka naRebheka.
Kwatsi Isaka asamdzala kakhulu, emehlo akhe asafiphele angasaboni kahle. Watfumela wabita Esawu, indvodzana yakhe lendzala, wafike watsi kuye: “Msawami!”
Isaka watsi: “Manje sengimdzala, angilati lilanga lami lekuhamba emhlabeni.
Manje-ke, tsatsa tinsungulo nebutjoki bakho, uhambe uye etsafeni, uyekungitingelela inyamatane,
ungilungisele kudla lokumnandzi, ungiletsele kona ngitewudla, bese ngiyakubusisa, ngingakafi.”
Rebheka bekalalele ngesikhatsi Isaka akhuluma nemsa wakhe, Esawu. Ngako watsi kube Esawu ahambe aye etsafeni kuyewutingela inyamatane atewuyiletsa kuyise,
Rebheka watsi kuJakobe, indvodzana yakhe: “Ngive uyihlo akhuluma nemnakenu Esawu atsi:
‘Ngiletsele inyama yenyamatane ungilungiselele kudla lokumnandzi, kuze ngitekudla, ngikubusise embikwaSimakadze, ngisengakafi.’
Manje-ke, ndvodzana yami, lalela emavi ami, wente lengikushoko.
Hamba uye etimbutini ungilandzele emazinyane lamabili lakhuluphele, kuze ngitewulungiselela uyihlo kudla lokumnandzi.
Utawube sewukumikisa kuyihlo kutsi adle, khona atekubusisa asengakafi.”
Babe angahle angiphatse ngesandla, bese ngitfolakala ngingulonebucili, esikhundleni sekutsi angibusise angicalekise.”
Unina watsi kuye: “Ndvodzana yami, leso sicalekiso asehlele kimi; wena yenta loko lengikutjela kona, hamba ungilandzele lamazinyane.”
Wahamba, wafike wawatsatsa wawaletsa kunina. Unina walungiselela Isaka kudla lokumnandzi.
Rebheka watsatsa timphahla letincono kakhulu ta-Esawu letatisendlini kabo, watembatsisa Jakobe.
Wamembatsisa letikhumba temazinyane etimbuti etandleni takhe nasentsanyeni yakhe, lapho abeshelela khona.
Watsatsa lokudla lokumnandzi nesinkhwa labesasentile wakunika indvodzana yakhe Jakobe.
Jakobe wamphendvula watsi: “Ngingu-Esawu, litubulo lakho; sengikwentile konkhe longitfume kona, babe. Vuka, utekudla inyama yenyamatane, bese uyangibusisa.”
Kepha Isaka watsi kulomsa wakhe: “Hhawu, ndvodzana yami, washesha kangaka kuyitfola, wente njani?”
Jakobe waphendvula watsi: “Kungobe Simakadze, Nkulunkulu wakho, ungiphumelelisile.”
Isaka watsi kuJakobe: “Sondzela ngitekuphatsa, msawami, ngiteba neliciniso kutsi unguye sibili yini Esawu, indvodzana yami, nome cha.”
Nembala Jakobe wasondzela ku-Isaka. Isaka welula sandla wamphatsa watsi: “Livi lona laJakobe, kodvwa tandla ta-Esawu.”
Akazange ati kutsi nguJakobe, ngobe tandla takhe tatineboya njengetandla ta-Esawu. Ngako-ke wase uyambusisa.
Waphindze wambutisisa watsi: “Unguye ngempela yini Esawu?”
Isaka watsi: “Ngisondzetele inyama yenyamatane yakho, msawami, ngitekudla ngikubusise.”
Emvakwaloko uyise Isaka watsi kuye: “Sondzela, ndvodzana yami, ungange.”
Wasondzela, wamanga. Watsi nakaliva liphunga letimphahla takhe, wambusisa watsi:
Kwatsi acedza nje Isaka kubusisa Jakobe, naJakobe asandza kusuka nje ku-Isaka, uyise, watseleka Esawu, umnakabo, aphuma ekutingeleni.
Naye walungisa kudla lokumnandzi wakumikisa kuyise. Wafike watsi kuye: “Ngicela asale avuka babe, adle inyama yenyamatane layilungiselwe yindvodzana yakhe, khona atekuyibusisa.”
Wamphendvula watsi: “Ngingumsa wakho, Esawu, litubulo lakho.”
Isaka wetfuka wachachatela kamatima wonkhe umtimba watsi: “Kantsi ngubani lona loletse inyama yenyamatane lapha kimi, ngayidla yonkhe ungakefiki wena, ngase ngiyambusisa? Ngempela utawubusiswa yena.”
Watsi Esawu nakeva lamavi eyise, wakhala kakhulu, wadzimate watsi kuyise: “Babe, nami ngibusise.”
Isaka wamphendvula watsi: “Umnakenu ufike wangiyenga, watsatsa sibusiso sakho.”
Wachubeka Esawu wabuta uyise watsi: “Awukangibekeli yini sakami sibusiso?”

Isaka wamphendvula watsi: “Asubuke nje, sengimente waba yinkhosi yakho, ngimnike bonkhe bomnakabo kutsi babe tisebenti takhe. Ngimuphe inala yemabele neyeliwayini. Pho, wena ngingabe ngisakwentelani, ndvodzana yami?”
Esawu wamtondza Jakobe ngenca yesibusiso labesitsatse kuyise, wadzimate watsi enhlitiyweni yakhe: “Emalanga ekulilela babe asayasondzela, emvakwawo Jakobe, umnaketfu, ngitambulala.”

Kodvwa Rebheka watsi kube atjelwe ngaloku Esawu, indvodzana yakhe lendzala, labesatimisele kukwenta, Rebheka wabita Jakobe, indvodzana yakhe lencane, wayitjela watsi: “Lalela la, umnakenu Esawu utidvudvuta ngekutsi utakubulala.
Ngako-ke, ndvodzana yami, lalela livi lami: Baleka masinyane uye kamnaketfu Labani eHarani;
ufike uhlalahlale khona, kuze kuphole kutfukutsela kwemnakenu.
Nangabe kutfukutsela kwakhe sekutse gogololo, asakukhohliwe naloku lokwente kuye, ngiyakutfumela ngikulandze. Ngesaba kulahlekelwa ngini nobabili ngalanga linye.”
Isaka wabita Jakobe, wambusisa wamyala watsi: “Ungamtsatsi umfati kulamaKhenani.
Hamba uye eMesophothamiya ekhabonyoko, kaBethuweli, utitsatsele khona umfati emadvodzakatini aLabani, malume wakho.
Shangatsi Nkulunkulu Somandla angakubusisa akuchumise, akwandzise, udzimate ube tive letinyenti.
Shangatsi angakunika sibusiso sa-Abrahama, wena kanye netitukulwane takho, uze ulitsatse libe lakho lelive losihambi kulo kwamanje, Nkulunkulu lalinika Abrahama!”
Ngako-ke Isaka wahambisa Jakobe wamyisa eMesophothamiya kaLabani umsa waBethuweli, um-Aramu, umnakaboRebheka, unaboJakobe na-Esawu.

Esawu weva kutsi Isaka abesabusise Jakobe, wabuye wamhambisa watsi akaye eMesophothamiya, kutsi ayewutsatsa khona umfati. Esawu weva nekutsi Isaka abesayale Jakobe watsi: “Ungamtsatsi umfati kulamaKhenani.”
Weva nekutsi Jakobe abebahloniphile boyise nenina ngekutsi ahambe aye eMesophothamiya.
Esawu watsi kube abone kutsi emadvodzakati emaKhenani abengamjabulisi uyise,
wesuka wayawutsatsa Mahalathi wamenta umkakhe etikwalabafati labenabo. Mahalathi abengudzadzewaboNebayothi, indvodzakati ya-Ishmayeli, umsa wa-Abrahama.
Wabhudza abona liladi limiswe emhlabatsini, laze lefika ezulwini, wabona tingilosi taNkulunkulu tehla tenyuka ngalo.
Simakadze abeme etikwalo; wakhuluma naye watsi: “NginguSimakadze, Nkulunkulu weyihlo Abrahama, naNkulunkulu wa-Isaka. Lelive lolele kulo ngiyawulinika wena kanye netitukulwane takho.

Titukulwane takho tiyawuba ngangelutfuli lwemhlaba. Uyakwandza nemhlaba wonkhe wenabele enshonalanga, nasemphumalanga, nasenyakatfo, naseningizimu. Tonkhe tive temhlaba tiyawubusiswa ngawe nangetitukulwane takho.
Ukhumbule kutsi ngitawuba nawe ngikulondvolote nome uyaphi, ngikubuyise kulo lelive. Ngobe ngingeke ngikushiye ngingakakwenti loku lesengikwetsembise kona.”
Jakobe waphaphama ebutfongweni, watsi: “Kantsi Simakadze ukulendzawo, bengingakwati-ke loku.”
Wefikelwa kwesaba, watsi: “Maye, lendzawo iyesabeka! Ngempela lendzawo iyindlu yaNkulunkulu. Leli lisango lasezulwini.”
Jakobe wase wenta sifungo, watsi: “Nangabe Nkulunkulu atawuba nami angilondvolote kuloluhambo lwami, anginike kudla, netimphahla tekwembatsa, ngembatse,
ngidzimate ngibuyele ngekuthula ekhaya ketfu, khona-ke Simakadze uyawuba nguNkulunkulu wami.
