Lelitje lengilimise la, kutsi libe sikhumbuto, litawuba yindlu yaNkulunkulu. Kuko konkhe langipha kona ngiyakumnika kwelishumi.”
Jakobe wachubeka neluhambo lwakhe waya eveni lebantfu bangasemphumalanga.

Watsi asahamba, adzabula imimango, wakhandza sicobho semanti situngeletwe ngimihlambi lemitsatfu yetimvu ilele eceleni kwaso. Lemihlambi yayitewunatsiswa kuso leso sicobho. Kwakunelitje lelikhulu lekwakumbonywe ngalo.
Yayitsi lemihlambi ingaphelela, belusi bese bayaligicita balisuse lelitje, banatsise lemihlambi, babuye balibuyisele.
Jakobe wabuta labelusi watsi: “Ye bomnaketfu, niphumaphi?”
Batsi: “Yebo, usaphila. Nanguya nje naRakheli, indvodzakati yakhe, eta netimvu takhe.”
Jakobe watsi: “Njengobe kusesemini lenkhulu kangaka nyalo, kusengakabi sikhatsi sekutsi letimvu tibutsiswe ndzawonye, anitinatsisi ngani, bese niyakutidlisa eluhlateni?”
Bamphendvula batsi: “Singeke phela sicale ingakapheleli yonkhe lemihlambi bese kugicitwa lelitje, kungukhona-ke sitinatsisa letimvu.”
Watsi asakhuluma nje Jakobe, kwase kufika Rakheli netimvu teyise, ngobe bekunguye labetelusa.
Jakobe watsi kube ambone loRakheli, indvodzakati yaLabani, malume wakhe, abone netimvu takaLabani, wesuka waya kulelitje, wafike waligicita, wase uyatinatsisa timvu takamalume wakhe, Labani.
Jakobe wanga Rakheli, wakhala ngenca yenjabulo.
Jakobe watjela Rakheli watsi: “Mine ngisihlobo seyihlo, ngitalwa nguRebheka.”
Watsi kube Labani ayive lendzaba yemshana wakhe, wagijima wamhlangabeta, wafike wamgona wamanga, wamngenisa endlini. Jakobe watekela Labani yonkhe indzaba yakhe.
Labani watsi kuye: “Ngempela ulitsambo lami nengati yami.” Jakobe wahlala lapho inyanga yonkhe.
Labani wakhuluma kuJakobe, watsi: “Njengobe usinini sami, pho, kufanele yini kutsi ungisebentele mahhala? Ngitjele kutsi ufuna ngikuholele ngani.”
Labani abenemadvodzakati lamabili, lendzala bekunguLeya, lencane kunguRakheli.
Labani watsi: “Kuncono mane ngimnike wena kunekutsi ngimnike nome ngubani nje, sale uhlala nami la ekhaya.”
Ngako-ke Jakobe wamsebentela iminyaka lesikhombisa loRakheli, noko kuJakobe leminyaka lengaka kwaba shangatsi ngemalangana nje, ngobe phela abemtsandza kakhulu.
Jakobe wakhuluma kuLabani, watsi: “Sengisicedzile sikhatsi sami, sale unginika umkami ngingene kuye.”
Ngako-ke, Labani wamema bonkhe bantfu bakuleyo ndzawo, wenta lidzili.
Kodvwa kwatsi ngalobo busuku Labani watsatsa indvodzakati yakhe, Leya, wayingenisa kuJakobe. Jakobe wamati Leya.
Labani wakhipha Zilpha, labesisebenti sakhe, kutsi atewuba sisebenti saLeya.
Ekuseni ngakusasa Jakobe kwangukhona abona kutsi nguLeya. Jakobe waya kuLabani wafike watsi: “Yini lena longenta yona? Kantsi bengingasebenteli Rakheli yini? Manje ungilutseleni?”
Labani wamphendvula watsi: “Kulelive akwentiwa kutsi kwendziswe lomncane kucala lomdzala angakendzi.
Ase ume kuphele leliviki lemshado, sitawube sesiyakunika futsi nalona lomunye, nawungasebenta leminye iminyaka lesikhombisa.”
Jakobe wenta njalo, walicedza leliviki lemshado. Labani wase umnika Rakheli, indvodzakati yakhe, kutsi abe ngumkakhe.
Labani wakhipha Bilha labesisebenti sakhe kutsi atewuba sisebenti saRakheli.
Ngako Jakobe wangena kuRakheli. Wamtsandza kakhulu kunaLeya. Jakobe wasebentela Labani leminye futsi iminyaka lesikhombisa.
Watsi kube abone Simakadze kutsi Leya uyaliwa, wavula sitalo sakhe; kepha Rakheli waba yinyumba.
Leya wakhulelwa, watala indvodzana, wayetsa libito watsi nguRubeni,
Waphindza wakhulelwa, watala indvodzana, watsi: “Njengobe Simakadze evile kutsi ngiyaliwa, uphindze wangipha lenye indvodzana.” Wayetsa libito watsi nguSimeyoni.
Waphindze futsi wakhulelwa, watala lenye indvodzana, watsi: “Manje-ke indvodza yami seyitawunamatsela kimi, ngobe sengiyitalele emadvodzana lamatsatfu.” Ngako-ke libito layo kwaba nguLevi.
Waphindze wakhulelwa futsi, watala indvodzana, watsi: “Manje-ke ngitamdvumisa Simakadze.” Ngako-ke wayetsa libito watsi nguJuda,
Watsi kube Rakheli abone kutsi akamtaleli Jakobe bantfwana, waba nesikhwele ngadzadzewabo. Watsi kuJakobe: “Ngiphe bantfwana, ngaphandle kwaloko ngitakufa!”
Jakobe watfukutselela Rakheli, wadzimate watsi: “Kantsi mine nginguNkulunkulu yini, longuyena avale sitalo sakho?”
Ngako wamnika Bilha, sisebenti sakhe, kutsi abe ngumkakhe. Jakobe wangena kuBilha, walala naye.
Rakheli watsi: “Nkulunkulu ungehlulele, waliva nelivi lami, wangipha indvodzana.” Ngako-ke wayetsa libito layo watsi nguDani.
Waphindze Bilha, sisebenti saRakheli, wakhulelwa, watalela Jakobe indvodzana yesibili.
Rakheli watsi: “Ngekubambana lokunemandla ngibambene nadzadzewetfu ngamehlula.” Wayetsa libito watsi nguNaftali.
Watsi kube abone Leya kutsi sewumile kutala, watsatsa Zilpha, sisebenti sakhe, wasinika Jakobe kutsi sibe ngumkakhe.
Zilpha sisebenti saLeya, watalela Jakobe indvodzana.
Leya watsi: “Yinhlanhla lenhle,” ngako wayetsa libito watsi nguGadi.
Zilpha, sisebenti saLeya, saphindze selamisa ngendvodzana yesibili.
Leya watsi: “Maye, ngiyajabula! Nyalo labasikati sebayawutsi ngibusisekile.” Ngako wayetsa libito watsi ngu-Asheri.

Ngesikhatsi kuvunwa kolo, Rubeni watsi uyahamba, watfola umutsi wentalo ensimini, wawumikisa kuLeya, unina. Ngako Rakheli watsi kuLeya: “Ngicela sewumane ungiphe lomunye walomutsi wentalo lotfolwe yindvodzana yakho.”
Leya watsi kuRakheli: “Wena nanyalo awukeneliswa kutsi wena sewugovuke nendvodza yami? Nyalo sewufuna kutsatsa nalomutsi lengiwutfolelwe yindvodzana yami?”
Rakheli waphendvula Leya watsi: “Ungamane ulale nayo kulobusuku balamuhla, nawungamane nje ungiphe lomutsi wendvodzana yakho.”

Entsambama nakabuya etsafeni Jakobe, wahlangabetwa nguLeya. Wafike watsi kuJakobe: “Ubota utewulala nami lamuhla, ngobe ngikucashe ngemutsi wentalo lotfolwe yindvodzana yami.” Ngako-ke wavele wayawulala naye kulobo busuku.
Nkulunkulu wawuva umthandazo waLeya. Leya wakhulelwa, watalela Jakobe indvodzana yesihlanu.
Leya watsi: “Nkulunkulu unginike umvuzo wami, ngobe indvodza yami ngayinika sisebenti sami.” Lendvodzana wayetsa libito watsi ngu-Isakhari.
Leya waphindze wakhulelwa futsi. Watalela Jakobe indvodzana yesitfupha.
Leya watsi: “Nkulunkulu unginike sipho lesihle. Manje indvodza yami seyitawubambelela kimi, ngobe sengiyitalele emadvodzana lasitfupha.” Ngako wayetsa libito watsi nguZebuloni.
Emvakwaloko Leya watalela Jakobe indvodzakati, wayetsa libito watsi nguDina.
Nkulunkulu wakhumbula Rakheli, wawuva umthandazo wakhe, wasivula sitalo sakhe.
Rakheli wakhulelwa, watala indvodzana, watsi: “Nkulunkulu sewulisusile lihlazo lami.”
Watsi Rakheli asatele Josefa, Jakobe watsi kuLabani: “Ase ungikhulule, ngihambe ngibuyele ekhaya kitsi naseveni lakitsi.
Sale unginika bafati bami, nebantfwabami lengikusebentele ngabo ngitewuhamba, ngobe nawe uyawati umsebenti lengikwentele wona.”
Labani watsi kuye: “Ase ngisho naku: Sengifundzile, futsi sengiyile ngeva kubemanga kutsi Simakadze ungibusise ngenca yakho.
Jakobe watsi kuye: “Nawe matfupha uyati kutsi ngikusebentele kanjani, nekutsi timphahla takho tandze kanganani tiseluswa ngimi.
Leto letimbalwa lewawunato ngisengakefiki setandze kakhulu. Simakadze ukubusise kuyo yonkhe indzawo lapho bengifika khona. Kodvwa-ke manje mine ngitayisebentela nini indlu yami?”
Labani wambuta watsi: “Ufuna ngikuholele ngani?” Jakobe wamphendvula watsi: “Angiwufuni umholo. Ngitawuchubeka ngikwelusele lomhlambi wakho, nawungasemukela nasi sicelo sami:

Ase ngiyibhidle ekhatsi lemihlambi yakho. Ngitawukhetsa kuyo tonkhe timvu letinemibala naletingemacabhacabha kanye nemazinyane lamnyama, ngikhetse tonkhe timbuti letinemibala naletinemacabhacabha; ngito-ke letitawuba ngumholo wami.

Ngako kwetsembeka nekulunga kwami ngiko lokuyawungifakazela, nase uta ngemuso utewuhlola umholo wami. Nawukhandza imbuti lengenamabala nalengesiwo emacabhacabha nemvu lengemnyama kuleti takami kuyawukhanya kutsi ngitebile.”
Labani waphendvula watsi: “Kulungile! Akube njengekusho kwakho.”
Kodvwa ngalo lelo langa Labani watikhetsa tonkhe timphongo letinemibala naletimacabhacabha, tonkhe letinalokumhlophe nemazinyane lamnyama, watinika emadvodzana akhe kutsi ateluse,
watsatsa luhambo lwemalanga lamatsatfu kusuka kuJakobe. Jakobe wachubeka wayelusa imihlambi yaLabani leyayisasele.
Jakobe watsatsa imizaca leyayisemanti yetihlahla telibhabhabhulomu, ne-alimondi, nepleni, wayebula wayenta imishi, yasala yaba mhlophe.
Lemizaca wayibeka embikwaletimvu etinkelebheni, lapho tatinatsa khona, ngobe tatekhwelwa natiye kuyewunatsa.
Tekhwelelwa etikwayo lemizaca, temitsa, tatala emazinyane lanemibala, nalangemacabhacabha, nalanemishi.
Jakobe wakhetsa onkhe lamazinyane labetelwe; lemihlambi yeluphawu lwaLabani wayibhekisa ngakulamazinyane. Umhlambi wakhe wawakha ngalendlela wawehlukanisa nemihlambi yaLabani.
Kwakutsi njalo nje letifuyo naseticinile setekhwelwa, Jakobe abeke lemizaca kuletinkelebha tekunatsa embikwalomhlambi entele kutsi titekwemitsela eceleni kwalemizaca.
Kodvwa abengayibeki lemizaca embikwaletifuyo letatiwombile. Ngako-ke Labani wagcina asasalelwe nguletiwombile todvwa, kwatsi leticinile taba taJakobe.
Jakobe wagcina asanjinge kakhulu, waba nemihlambi lemikhulu, netincekukati, netinceku, nemakamela, netimbongolo.
Jakobe weva emadvodzana aLabani akhuluma atsi: “Jakobe sewutsetse konkhe lobekukwababe. Sewunjinge ngaletimphahla tababe.”
Jakobe wabona kutsi buso baLabani babungasamjabuleli njengakucala.
Simakadze wakhuluma kuJakobe watsi: “Hamba ubuyele eveni lakini, lapho watalelwa khona, ngitawuba nawe.”
Ngako-ke Jakobe wabita boRakheli naLeya kutsi bete kuye emadlelweni, lapho abelusele khona imfuyo yakhe.
Wafike wakhuluma kubo watsi: “Sengibonile kutsi buso beyihlo abusangijabuleli njengakucala, kodvwa Nkulunkulu wababe abenami.
Nani niyati kutsi uyihlo ngimsebentele ngawo onkhe emandla ami.
Kodvwa uyihlo sewungiphambile ngekutsi agucule liholo lami ngalokuphindvwe kalishumi, noko Nkulunkulu akamvumeli kutsi ente lokubi kimi.

Utsite nakatsi: ‘Liholo lakho kutawuba nguletimacabhacabha todvwa,’ umhlambi wonkhe wesuka watala letimacabhacabha. Nome asatsite: ‘Liholo lakho kutawuba nguletinemishi,’ umhlambi wonkhe wesuka watala letinemishi todvwa.
Nkulunkulu uyitsatse kanjalo-ke imfuyo yeyihlo wayinika mine.
“Kwatsi ngesikhatsi tekhwelwa letimbuti ngabhudza, ngatsi ngiyabuka ngabona letiphongo letekhwela letimbutikati kutsi tatinemishi, timacabhacabha, naletimabalabala.
Ingilosi yaNkulunkulu yangibita ephusheni yatsi: ‘Jakobe!’ Ngasabela ngatsi: ‘Ngilapha.’
Yakhuluma kimi yatsi: ‘Buka la, tonkhe letiphongo letekhwela letimbutikati tinemishi, timacabhacabha, timabalabala; ngobe sengikubone konkhe lokwentiwa nguLabani kuwe.
NginguNkulunkulu waseBetheli, lapho wagcoba khona litje ngemafutsa, walenta sikhumbuto, wafunga kimi. Sukuma-ke manje, utfutse kulelive, ubuyele eveni lakini, lapho kunenkhaba yakho khona.’ ”
BoRakheli naLeya baphendvula batsi: “Pho, sisenaso yini sabelo nome lifa lekungeletfu endlini yababe?
Kambe asisesibo bafokati yini? Ngobe sewatsengisa ngatsi, nemali layitfola ngatsi sewayidla wayicedza.
Yonkhe ingcebo letsetfwe nguNkulunkulu kubabe ngeyetfu nebantfwabetfu. Ngako-ke, yenta loko Nkulunkulu lakukhulume kuwe.”
Jakobe wesuka lapho wagibelisa bantfwabakhe nebafati bakhe emakameleni,
wayichuba yonkhe imfuyo yakhe kanye nako konkhe kwakhe labekuholile eMesophothamiya, wancandzeka wabuyela kuyise, Isaka, eveni laseKhenani.
Labani abengekho ayewuhhula timvu takhe, Rakheli weba tithico takabo.
Jakobe wamnyenyela Labani, umSiriya, ngobe akazange amtjele kutsi utawuhamba.
Wabaleka nako konkhe labenako, wewela umfula iYufrathe, emabombo awabhekise ngasetintsabeni takaGileyadi.
Watsi kube Labani atjelwe ngelilanga lesitsatfu kutsi Jakobe akasekho ubalekile,
watsatsa bomnakabo wamlandzela amcosha ngemuva, kwadzimate kwaphela emalanga lasikhombisa, waze wamkhandza etintsabeni takaGileyadi.
Kodvwa Nkulunkulu weta wakhuluma ngeliphupho kuLabani, umSiriya, watsi: “Ucaphele ungakhulumi lokuhle nome lokubi kuJakobe.”
Labani wamkhandza Jakobe. Jakobe abemise lithende lakhe kuleto tintsaba takaGileyadi, naLabani kanye nabomnakabo naye wakanekisa kuto leto tintsaba.
Labani wafike wakhuluma kuJakobe, watsi: “Seyini-ke lena lose uyentile, unginyenyeleleni ngekuhamba nemadvodzakati ami kungatsi bafati lobatfumbe emphini?
Uhambeleni ngekunyenya? Awukangitjeli ngani, khona phela ngitekukhipa ngekujabula, nangekuhlabela, nangelugubhu, nangelihabhu?
Awukangivumeli ngani kutsi ngivalelise emadvodzana nemadvodzakati ami ngekuwanga? Ibulima-ke lentfo loyentile.
Nginawo emandla ekukulimata; kodvwa Nkulunkulu weyihlo ukhulume kimi itolo ebusuku ephusheni watsi: ‘Ucaphele, ungakhulumi lokuhle nome lokubi kuJakobe.’
Nyalo-ke njengobe sewuhamba ukhumbule bakini, utebeleni letithico tami?”
Jakobe waphendvula Labani, watsi: “Kungobe ngesabile kutsi ungahle ungemuke lamadvodzakati akho.

Kodvwa lowo loyawukhandza tithico takho kuye akafe nekufa. Phenya la emkhatsini wetfu ukhombe lokukwakho lokukimi ukutsatse bonkhe bantfu babuka.” Phela Jakobe abengati kutsi letithico tatebiwe nguRakheli.
Ngako-ke Labani waya ethendeni laJakobe, nelaLeya, nasethendeni letisebenti letisikati letimbili; kodvwa akatitfolanga tithico. Waphuma ethendeni laLeya waya ethendeni laRakheli.
Rakheli bekatsetse letithico watifihla ngaphansi kwesihlalo selikamela, wahlala etikwato. Labani, watiphumphutsa lonkhe lithende laRakheli, wangete watitfola.

Rakheli watsi kuyise: “Shangatsi inkhosi yami ingete yangitfukutselela ngekutsi ngingeke ngiphakame embikwayo, ngobe ngisesikhatsini.” Labani waphenya, wanyakulula, kodvwa akazange atitfole letithico.
Jakobe watfukutsela wagcwala kokana, watsetsisa Labani watsi: “Siphi-ke siphambuko sami? Sono sami siphi, kutsi bewungaze ungitfungatse kangaka?
Njengobe sewuphenye watinyakulula kangaka letimphahla tami, tiphi-ke temndeni wakho? Tibeke la embikwabo bonkhe labantfu babuka kutsi kube ngibo lababehluleli emkhatsini wakho nami.
Ngicedze iminyaka lengema-20 ngihleti nawe. Timvu takho netimbuti takho atizange setiphunte, angizange sengidle kwasasihhanca sakho.
Ngisho naleti letatidliwe tilwane tesiganga ngangingatiletsi kuwe, kodvwa ngangivele ngitenane ngetami. Nawe wawuvele utifune kimi letebiwe emini nome ebusuku.
Emini bengibhadliswa lilanga, ebusuku ngishushwe lichwa, ngiphelelwe nabutfongo.

Bengihleti nawe iminyaka lengemashumi lamabili, emadvodzakati akho ngiwasebentele iminyaka lelishumi namine, timphahla takho ngatelusa iminyaka lesitfupha, nakhona lapho wangidlelela umholo wami ngekuwugucula emahlandla lalishumi.

Kube Nkulunkulu wababe, naNkulunkulu wa-Abrahama, lokwesaba kwa-Isaka, abengekho ngakimi, ngineliciniso kutsi ngabe ungicoshile ngahamba mahhala ngite lutfo. Kodvwa Nkulunkulu ukubonile kuhlupheka kwami nemsebenti wetandla tami, wase uyakwekhuta kulobusuku bayitolo.”

Labani waphendvula Jakobe watsi: “Lamadvodzakati lawa ngami, nalabantfwana bami, nalemihlambi yami, nako konkhe loku lokubonako kwami. Kodvwa kute lengingabuye ngikwente ngalamadvodzakati nalabantfwabawo lababatele.
Lokuncono kota sente sivumelwane, wena nami, kube bufakazi emkhatsini wetfu sobabili.”
Ngako-ke Jakobe watsatsa litje walimisa kutsi libe sikhumbuto.
Jakobe wakhuluma kulamadvodza labehamba nawo watsi ababutse ematje. Nembala awabutsa enta ngawo sivivane, badla ndzawonye badlela eceleni kwaso.
Labani wakhuluma kuJakobe watsi: “Lamuhla lesivivane sibufakazi emkhatsini wakho nami.” Ngako-ke wasetsa watsi yiGaledi.
Nawuwaphatsa kabi lamadvodzakati ami nome sewutsatsa labanye bafati ngaphandle kwawo nome ungabonwa ngumuntfu, kodvwa ubokhumbula kutsi Nkulunkulu ungufakazi emkhatsini wetfu sobabili.”
Labani wachubeka wakhuluma kuJakobe, watsi: “Buka nasi sivivane nalelitje lelisikhumbuto lengikubeke embikwetfu sobabili.

Lesivivane asibe bufakazi, nalelitje kube ngulona bufakazi, bekutsi ngingeke ngendlule lesivivane nalelitje ngewelele ngakuwe, nawe futsi ungeke wendlule lesivivane nalelitje wewelele ngakimi kutakwenta bubi.
Nkulunkulu wa-Abrahama naNkulunkulu waNahori, utakwehlulela emkhatsini wetfu.” Ngako-ke Jakobe wafunga ngaNkulunkulu weyise Isaka, wagomela kutsi utasigcina lesetsembiso.
Jakobe wanikela ngemhlatjelo etikwentsaba, wase umema lamadvodza kutsi atewudla sinkhwa. Adla ahlala busuku bonkhe kuleyo ntsaba.
Labani wavuka ngakusasa ekuseni ngetingweti, wanga batukulu bakhe nemadvodzakati akhe, wababusisa, wancandzeka wabuyela ekhaya kakhe.
Jakobe wachubeka nendlela yakhe, tingilosi taNkulunkulu tamhlangabeta.
Jakobe watsi kube atibone letingilosi watsi: “Lesi sikanekiso saNkulunkulu!” Wetsa leyo ndzawo libito watsi yiMahanayimu.
Jakobe watfumela tigijimi ku-Esawu umnakabo, eveni laseSeyiri, kulaka-Edomu.
Watibamba ngendlebe watsi: “Nitawufika enkhosini yami, Esawu, niyitjele nitsi: ‘Inceku yakho, Jakobe, itsi: Seloku ngahamba bengisolo ngihleti kaLabani, kuze kube ngulamuhla.
Nginetinkhabi, netimbongolo, netimvu, netimbuti netisebenti letidvuna naletisikati. Sengitfumele ligama enkhosini yami kutsi kumbe ngingatfola umusa ngemukeleke.’ ”
Titfunywa tabuya kuJakobe, tafike tatsi: “Simkhandzile umnakenu Esawu; naye sewuyeta utekuhlangabeta, uta nemadvodza langemakhulu lamane.”
Jakobe wesaba kakhulu waba neluvalo. Wehlukanisa labantfu abehamba nabo, wabenta emacembu lamabili, kanjalo nemihlambi yetimvu, neyetimbuti, neyetinkhomo kanye neyemakamela nako wakwenta njalo.
Loku abekwenta acabanga atsi: “Nangabe Esawu efika ahlasela lelinye licembu, leli lelinye-ke lelisasele lisengabaleka.”

Umusa wakho awukangifaneli nako konkhe kwetsembeka kwakho lokubonakalise kimi, inceku yakho, akukangifaneli. Ngobe lomfula iJordane ngawewela ngiphetse ludvondvolo lwami lodvwa, manje senginemacembu lamabili.
Ngicela kutsi umane ungephule esandleni semnaketfu Esawu, ngobe ngiyamesaba, kutsi angahle angihlasele abulale bantfwana kanye nabonina.
Kodvwa wena wakhuluma kimi watsi: ‘Ngiyawukwentela lokuhle, ngandzise nentalo yakho ibe ngangesihlabatsi sangaselwandle, ingete yabaleka ngenca yebunyenti.’ ”
Jakobe wacitsa busuku bonkhe kuleyo ndzawo, wakhetsela Esawu, umnakabo, sipho etifuyweni takhe, wakhetsa
timbutikati letingemakhulu lamabili, netiphongo letingemashumi lamabili, netimvukati letingemakhulu lamabili, netihhanca letingemashumi lamabili,

nemakamela lasengwako langemashumi lamatsatfu kanye nemankhonyane awo, netinkhomati letingemashumi lamane, netinkunzi letilishumi, netimbongolo letinsikati letingemashumi lamabili, naletindvuna letilishumi.

Tonkhe letifuyo watehlukanisa emkhatsini, taba ngimihlambi leyehlukene, ngulowo nalowo umhlambi wabasesandleni senceku yakhe letsite. Watiyala letinceku takhe watsi: “Hambani ngembili kwami, nishiyelane imikhawu yemabanga latsite, emikhatsini yemihlambi yenu.”
Inceku yekucala wayiyala watsi: “Nawuhlangana na-Esawu, umnaketfu, akubuta atsi: ‘Wena uwakabani? Uyaphi? Ngetabani letifuyo lotichubako?’
ubotsi: ‘Tenceku yakho Jakobe. Utitfumele njengesipho enkhosini yakhe Esawu. Naye, Jakobe, usilandzela ngemuva.’ ”
Wachubeka wayiyala kanjalo futsi neyesibili, neyesitsatfu, nato tonkhe letinceku lebetichuba lemihlambi atsi: “Ngiko loko-ke leniyakukhuluma ku-Esawu, nanihlangana naye.
Nibotsi: ‘Yebo, Jakobe inceku yakho, ita ngemuva, iyangilandzela.’ ” Jakobe abecabanga atsi uyatincengela ngaletipho ngekutitfumela kucala, khona kutawutsi nakahlangana naye, abe asamcolele.
Ngako-ke letipho takhe tahamba embili, yena Jakobe wasala ngemuva esikanekisweni, wabucitsa khona busuku.
Ngabona lobo busuku Jakobe wavuka watsatsa bafati bakhe bobabili, netincekukati takhe letimbili, nebantfwabakhe labalishumi namunye, wabeweta etubukweni lemfula iJabhoki.
Bonkhe wabewetela ngesheya kwemfula nako konkhe labenako,
Kwase kufika indvodza labambana nayo, kwadzimate kwadzabuka kusa.
Yatsi kube ibone lendvodza kutsi iyehluleka kuphunyula kuJakobe, yase imtsintsa enyongeni. Inyonga yaJakobe yenyela solomane tibambene etulu nalendvodza.
Yaphendvula yatsi: “Ufunelani kwati libito lami?” Yase iyambusisa.
Jakobe wesuka ePheniyeli nakuphuma lilanga, asahamba achuta ngenca yenyonga yakhe.
Ngako-ke kuze kube ngulamuhla titukulwane taka-Israyeli atiwudli umsipha wenyonga, ngobe ngiwo lowo msipha lowatsintfwa kuJakobe.
Jakobe watsi uphakamisa emehlo, wabona Esawu eta nemadvodza akakhe langemakhulu lamane. Wehlukanisa bantfwabakhe emkhatsini waLeya, naRakheli netincekukati tabo letimbili.
Tincekukati nebantfwabato, bahamba embili, kwalandzela Leya nebantfwabakhe, kwagcina Rakheli naJosefa.
Jakobe wahamba embikwabo bonkhe, wakhotsamela emhlabatsini kasikhombisa, wadzimate wefika kumnakabo.
Kodvwa Esawu wagijima wamhlangabeta, wafike wamgona ngemikhono, wamanga. Bakhala bobabili.
Esawu watsi uyabuka wabona bafati nebantfwana, wabuta watsi: “Bobani laba lohamba nabo?”
Jakobe wamphendvula watsi: “Laba-ke bantfwana Nkulunkulu layiphe bona inceku yakho.”
Letincekukati-ke tase tita nebantfwabato tafike takhotsama nato.
NaLeya wasondzela kanye nebantfwabakhe bafike bakhotsama, ekugcineni-ke kwasondzela Josefa naRakheli, nabo bafike bakhotsama.
Esawu wabuta watsi: “Usho kutsini ngato tonkhe leticumbi lebengihambe ngihlangana nato?”
Jakobe waphendvula watsi: “Ngicondze kutsi ngizuze umusa enkhosini yami, ngemukeleke.”
Kodvwa Esawu waphendvula watsi: “Cha, mnaketfu, nami senginalokunyenti; tigcinele wena loko lonako kube kwakakho.”

Jakobe watsi: “Cha, mnaketfu, ngiyacela nangabe ngemukele umusa emehlweni akho semukele lesipho sami; ngobe kimi kubona buso bakho kunjengekubona buso baNkulunkulu, kakhulu nje ngobe nawe sewungemukele ngemoya lomuhle.
Ngicela usitsatse lesipho lonikwa sona, ngobe Nkulunkulu ube nemusa kimi, wadzimate wangipha konkhe lengikudzingako.” Ngenca yekuncenga kwaJakobe wagcina asasemukele.
Esawu watsi: “Asitilungisele kuhamba, mine ngitawuhamba embikwakho.”
Jakobe waphendvula watsi: “Inkhosi yami seyibabonile bantfwana kutsi bancane, timvu netinkhomo ngiyatincenekela ngobe tiyamunyisa. Natishuciswa ngemjako lilanga lonkhe, titakufa.
Ngicela umane wena uhambe embili, mine ngitawusale ngishuca ngincengancenga nalabantfwana. Inkhosi yami ngitayikhandza e-Edomu.”
Esawu watsi: “Kuncono ngishiye lamanye kulamadvodza lengite nawo ete kanye nani.”
Kodvwa Jakobe waphendvula watsi: “Ngiyabonga. Kodvwa loko bekungakadzingeki, kuphela kutsi ngitfole umusa emehlweni enkhosi yami.”
Ngalona lelo langa Esawu wahamba wabuyela e-Edomu.
Kodvwa Jakobe wahamba waya eSukhothi. Wefika lapho watakhela indlu, wakha nesibaya setinkhomo takhe. Ngako-ke lendzawo wayetsa libito watsi yiSukhothi.
Jakobe wahamba kahle waze wefika ngekuphepha edolobheni laseShekhemu yaseKhenani, nakaphuma eMesophothamiya. Wemisa lithende lakhe madvutane nelidolobha.
Lendzawo lafike wamisa kuyo lithende lakhe wayitsenga emadvodzeni aHamori, uyise waShekhemu, wayikhiphela tinhlavu tesiliva letatilikhulu.
Wakha lilati lapho waletsa libito watsi: yi-Eli Elohe Israyeli.
Ngalelinye lilanga, Dina, indvodzakati yaJakobe layitala kuLeya, wavakashela lamanye emantfombatana akuleyo ndzawo labengemaKhenani.
Shekhemu, umsa waHamori umHivi, labesikhulu saleyo ndzawo, watsi nakambona, wamtsatsa wayakumdlwengula, wamhlazisa.
Inhlitiyo yakhe yanamatsela kuDina, wayitsandza lentfombatana, ngako wayisoma.
Shekhemu wakhuluma kuyise, Hamori, watsi: “Ngicela ungitsatsele lentfombi, ngifuna kuyiteka ibe ngumkami.”
Jakobe weva kutsi Shekhemu ungcolise indvodzakati yakhe; kodvwa akazange akhulume lutfo, kwaze kwabuya emadvodzana akhe labengekho asekweluseni.
Hamori, uyise waShekhemu, wahamba wayawukhuluma naJakobe.

Atsi emadvodzana aJakobe nakefika eva ngaloku, eva buhlungu atfukutsela agcwala kokana, ngobe Shekhemu abente sento lesibi lesiphambene nesive saka-Israyeli ngekudlwengula lendvodzakati yaJakobe. Leyo kwakuyintfo lengentiwa nje vele ka-Israyeli.
Hamori wefika kuJakobe watsi: “Shekhemu, indvodzana yami, utsandze intfombi yakakho. Ngiyakucela kutsi umane umnike yona ayiteke ibe ngumkakhe.
Yendziselanani natsi: nisendzisele tintfombi tenu nani nititsatsele bafati etintfombini tetfu.
Ningakha kulelive letfu nihlale kanye natsi, ningahlala nome ngukuphi lapho nitsandza khona, ningasebenta ngekukhululeka nome kukuphi, nome nitisikele yenu indzawo.”
Shekhemu wakhuluma kuyise waDina kanye nebanakabo watsi: “Ngicela nimane ningihawukele, ngitaninika nome ngabe yini leniyifunako.
Ningabita lapho nitsandza khona ngelilobolo kanye nesipho, ngitakukhipha, kuphela nje naningivumele kutsi ngiteke lentfombi.”
Njengobe Shekhemu abesangcolise Dina, dzadzewabo lamadvodzana aJakobe, wona aphendvula boShekhemu neyise Hamori ngebucili,
atsi: “Ngeke sesikwente-ke loko! Dzadzewetfu singeke simnike indvodza lengakasoki, ngobe phela loko kulihlazo lapha kitsi.
Singavuma kuphela, nangabe nani ningalingisa tsine, nisoke bonkhe labadvuna benu.
Nase nente njalo-ke, singendziselana nani, sihlale emkhatsini wenu, sibe sive sinye nani.
Kodvwa nangabe asivumelani kuloko, sitamtsatsa lodzadzewetfu sihambe naye, sisuke kulendzawo.”
Lesiphakamiso semukeleka kuboHamori nemsa wakhe Shekhemu.
Lelijaha lelibaluleke kakhulu ekhaya kubo alicitsanga sikhatsi, lavele lasokwa ngekushesha, ngobe beliyitsandza kakhulu lendvodzakati yaJakobe.
Ngako-ke Hamoni nemsa wakhe Shekhemu bancandzeka baya enkhundleni yakubo esangweni lelidolobha, bafike bamemetela kutakhamiti tabo batsi:
“Labantfu balungile, asibavumele kutsi bakhe bahlale ngekukhululeka kulelive letfu. Lelive lingasenela tsine nabo. Singawateka emadvodzakati abo, nabo bateke emadvodzakati etfu.
Kodvwa lamadvodza ayavuma kutsi angahlala natsi sibe sive sinye nabo kuphela nasingenta naku: kutsi sisoke bonkhe labadvuna betfu sibe njengawo.
Kepha nitsi tifuyo tawo kanye nako konkhe kwawo kungeke yini kube kwetfu? Ngako-ke asivume, kuze atekwakha emkhatsini wetfu.”
Tonkhe takhamiti telidolobha tasemukela siphakamiso saHamori naShekhemu. Ngako-ke bonkhe labadvuna basokwa.
Bahlahlela Hamori naShekhemu, indvodzana yakhe, ngenkemba. Batsatsa Dina, dzadzewabo, endlini kaShekhemu bahamba naye.
Emvakwekubulawa kwalabantfu, lamanye emadvodzana aJakobe eta kulelidolobha afike akhipha sibhongo sekungcoliswa kwadzadzewabo baze baphanga lelidolobha.
Batsatsa imihlambi yetimvu, netimbuti, netinkhomo, netimbongolo, nako konkhe lokwakungekhatsi nangaphandle kwelidolobha, nasemaphandleni.
Bahamba nato tonkhe timphahla, batfumba bonkhe labasikati nebantfwana, batsatsa konkhe lokwakusetindlini.

Jakobe wakhuluma kuboSimeyoni naLevi watsi: “Manje seningiletsele luhlupho, seningibangele kutsi ngitondzeke lapha kulabantfu bakulendzawo, kumaKhenani nakumaPheresi. Mine nginemadvodza lambalwa, ngako nabangahlangana bangihlasele bonkhe kanyekanye, bangangibhubhisa kanye nemndeni wami.”
Kodvwa bamphendvula batsi: “Besingeke sivume kutsi dzadzewetfu entiwe ingwadla.”
Sitawusuka la siye eBetheli, lapho ngitawufika ngakhe khona lilati laNkulunkulu, lowangiva wangiphendvula ngesikhatsi sekuhlupheka kwami, nalowaba nami yonkhe indzawo lapho ngangihamba khona.”
Ngako-ke base batinika Jakobe tithico tebetive lababenato kanye nemacici lababewafake etindlebeni tabo. Jakobe wakumbela ngaphansi kwesihlahla se-okhi edvute neShekemu.
Ngako-ke base bayesuka boJakobe nemadvodzana akhe. Bantfu balamadolobha abesedvutane behlelwa kwesaba lokukhulu lobekuvela kuNkulunkulu, abazange babacoshe ngemuva.
Jakobe nabo bonkhe bantfu labehamba nabo wefika eLuzi, leseyatiwa ngekutsi yiBetheli eveni laseKhenani.
Wafike wakha lilati lapho. Lendzawo wayetsa libito watsi yi-Eli Betheli
Debhora, sisebenti saRebheka, wafa wangcwatjwa ngaphansi kwesihlahla se-okhi eningizimu neBetheli, ngako-ke Jakobe lendzawo wayetsa libito watsi yi-Aloni Bhakhuthi.
Waphindze futsi Nkulunkulu watibonakalisa kuJakobe ngesikhatsi asabuyile eMesophothamiya, wambusisa.
Nkulunkulu watsi kuJakobe: “Libito lakho nguJakobe, kodvwa kusukela nyalo sewutawubitwa ngekutsi ungu-Israyeli.” Ngako-ke Nkulunkulu wametsa ngekutsi ngu-Israyeli.
Ngikunika lelive, lona leli lengalinika bo-Abrahama na-Isaka ngiyawuphindze ngilinike titukulwane takho nasufile wena.”
Nkulunkulu wase uyesuka kuleyo ndzawo bekakhulumela kuyo, wamshiya wenyuka.
Kwase kutsi lapho akhuluma khona naNkulunkulu Jakobe wemisa litje lesikhumbuto, walitsela ngeliwayini nangemafutsa.
Jakobe wayetsa lendzawo Nkulunkulu abebonakale kuye khona watsi yiBetheli.
Jakobe nemuti wakhe batfutsa eBetheli, batsi basesekhashane ne-Efratha, Rakheli wafikelwa sikhatsi sekubeleka; wahelwa kamatima.
Kodvwa asahelwa kamatima umbelekisi wamdvudvuta watsi: “Ungesabi, Rakheli, sewutfole lenye indvodzana.”
Kwatsi nasafa wetsa loluswane lwakhe watsi nguBhenoni,
Rakheli wafa wangcwatjwa eceleni kwemgwaco loya e-Efratha, lendzawo leseyatiwa ngekutsi yiBhetlehema.
Jakobe wemisa litje lesikhumbuto kuleyo ndzawo, kuze kube ngulamuhla seloku lisakhombisa lelitje lapho kunelithuna laRakheli khona.
Israyeli wesuka lapho wemisa lithende lakhe ngesheya kweMigdala Ederi.
Emadvodzana aLeya bekuboRubeni, litubulo laJakobe, bese kuba nguSimeyoni, naLevi, naJuda, na-Isakhari, naZebuloni.
Emadvodzana aBhilha, sisebenti saRakheli, bekuboDani naNaftali.
Emadvodzana aZilpha, sisebenti saLeya, bekuboGadi na-Asheri. Ngiwo lawa-ke emadvodzana aJakobe lawatalelwa eMesophothamiya.
Wafa asamdzala kakhulu, walandzela bokhokho bakhe. Wangcwatjwa bo-Esawu naJakobe, emadvodzana akhe.
Esawu watsatsa bafati etintfombini temaKhenani: Ada, indvodzakati ya-Eloni, umHethi, na-Oholibama, indvodzakati ya-Ana, umsa waSibeyoni, umHivi,
Ada watalela Esawu Elifazi, Bhasemathi watala Rehuweli.
Oholibama watala Jewushe, naJalamu, naKhora. Ngiwo lawa-ke emadvodzana a-Esawu lawatalelwa aseseveni laseKhenani.

Esawu wesuka lapho watsatsa bafati bakhe, nemadvodzana, nemadvodzakati akhe, nabo bonkhe bendlu yakhe, netinkhomo takhe tonkhe, nayo yonkhe imfuyo yakhe, nayo yonkhe imphahla yakhe labeyitfole aseseKhenani; wesuka kumnakaboJakobe, waya kulelinye live.
Sizatfu lesamenta ehlukane nemnakabo kutsi bobabili bese banetimphahla letinyenti kakhulu. Live labebahlala kulo lalingabe lisabenela bobabili.
Ngako-ke Esawu, labekatiwa ngekutsi ngu-Edomu, wahlala eveni letintsaba eSeyiri.
Nati-ke titukulwane taka-Esawu, uyise wema-Edomu, esifundzeni saseSeyiri.
Emadvodzana a-Esawu bekubo-Elifazi lamtala ku-Ada, umkakhe, naRehuweli, umsa waBhasemathi, umka-Esawu.
Emadvodzana a-Elifazi bekubo-Themani, na-Omari, naSefo, naGatamu, naKhenazi.
Umsa wa-Esawu, Elifazi, abenemfati lomunye lomncane, lekwakutsiwa nguThimna. Yena-ke wamtalela indvodzana lekwakutsiwa ngu-Amaleki. Ngulawo-ke emadvodzana a-Ada, umka-Esawu.
Emadvodzana a-Rehuweli bekuboNahathi, naZera, naShama, naMiza. Ngulabo-ke batukulu baBhasemathi, umka-Esawu.
Oholibama, umka-Esawu, labeyindvodzakati ya-Ana, aphindze abe ngumtukulu waSibeyoni, watalela Esawu nankha emadvodzana: boJewushe, naJalamu, naKhora.
naKhora, naGatamu, na-Amaleki. Ngito-ke tikhulu letadzabuka ku-Elifazi, eveni lase-Edomu. Ngulawo-ke emadvodzana a-Ada.

Emadvodzana aRehuweli, umsa wa-Esawu, labetikhulu bekubo-Nahathi, naSera, naShama, naMiza. Ngito leto-ke tikhulu letadzabuka kuRehuweli eveni lase-Edomu. Ngulawo lamanye emadvodzana aBhasemathi, umka-Esawu.
Emadvodzana a-Oholibama, umka-Esawu, bekutikhulu boJewushe, naJalamu, naKhora. Ngito leto-ke tikhulu letatalwa ngu-Oholibama, indvodzakati ya-Ana, umka-Esawu.
Ngulawo-ke emadvodzana netikhulu ta-Esawu; Esawu bekungu-Edomu.
na-Dishoni, na-Eseri, naDishani. Ngito leto-ke tikhulu temaHori letatingemadvodzana aSeyiri, kulaka-Edomu.
Emadvodzana aLotani bekuboHori naHemami. Thimna bekungudzadzewaboLotani.
Emadvodzana aShobali bekubo-Alvani, naManahati, na-Ebali, naShefo, na-Onamu.
Sibeyoni abenemadvodzana lamabili bo-Aya, na-Ana. Ngulo-Ana lowatsi eluse timbongolo teyise, Sibeyoni, watfola manzana ehlane.
Emadvodzana aDishoni bekubo-Hemdani, na-Eshbani, naJithrani, naKherani.
Tikhulu temaHori bekuboLotani, naShobali, naSibeyoni, na-Ana,
naDishoni, na-Eseri, naDishani. Leti-ke kwakutikhulu temaHori eveni laka-Edomu.
Bela, umsa waBheyori, waba yinkhosi ka-Edomu; inhlokodolobha yakhe bekuyiDinihabha.
Kwatsi kube kufe Bela, kwase kubekwa Jobabi, umsa waZera. Inhlokodolobha yakhe bekuyiBhosra.
Kwatsi kube kufe Jobabi, kwase kubekwa Hushamu welive lemaThemani.
Kwatsi kube kufe Hushamu, kwase kubekwa Hadadi, umsa waBedadi. Bedadi ngulona lowancoba emaMidiyani eveni lakaMowabi. Inhlokodolobha yakhe bekuyi-Avithi.
Kwatsi kube kufe Hadadi, kwase kubekwa Samla waseMasreka.
Kwatsi kube kufe Samla, kwase kubekwa Shawula waseRehobothi ngasemfuleni.
Kwatsi kube kufe Shawula, kwase kubekwa Bhali Hanani, umsa wa-Akbori.
Kwatsi kube kufe Bhali Hanani, kwase kubekwa Hadadi. Inhlokodolobha yakhe bekutsiwa yiPhawu, kantsi umkakhe bekunguMehethabeli, indvodzakati yaMatredi, indvodzakati yaMe Zahabe.
naMagdiyeli, na-Iramu. Ngito leti-ke tikhulu taka-Edomu netindzawo lapho tatihlala khona, eveni lelalilifa lato. Esawu abenguyise wema-Edomu.
Josefa, labesaneminyaka leli-17, abelusa timvu netimbuti kanye nabomnakabo bekutalwa nguBilha, naZilpha, bafati beyise. Josefa abeletsa umbiko kuyise ngaloko lokubi lababekwenta.
Israyeli abetsandza kakhulu Josefa kunawo onkhe emadvodzana akhe, sizatfu kwakukutsi wamtala asamdzala kakhulu. Ngako-ke wamtfungela ingubo lendze leyayinemikhono lemidze kantsi futsi ihlotjisiwe.
Batsi kube bomnakabo babone kutsi uyise umtsandza kakhulu kunabo bonkhe, base bayamtondza loJosefa, kangangekutsi babengasamkhulumisi kahle.
Ngalelinye lilanga Josefa wabhudza; watsi nakabatjela labomnakabo, bamtondza kakhulu futsi.
Ngibhudze sibopha titfungo ekhatsi nensimi, sitfungo sami sasukuma sema satsi mpo, leti tenu tase titungeleta lesi sami tasikhotsamela.”
Labomnakabo bambuta batsi: “Usho kutsi wena utawuba yinkhosi ubuse etikwetfu?” Bachubeka bamtondza kakhulu ngenca yemaphupho akhe nenkhulumo yakhe.
Josefa waphindze wabhudza, wabatjela watsi: “Ase nginitjele nali lelinye liphupho. Ngibhudze lilanga, nenyana, netinkhanyeti leti-11 tingikhotsamela.”
Kwatsi nakalitjela boyise nabomnakabo leliphupho, uyise wamtsetsisa watsi kuye: “Yini lena loyibhudzako wena? Ucabanga kutsi mine, nenyoko, nabomnakenu, sitakuta sitekukhotsama la kuwe?”
Bomnakabo baba nemona, kodvwa uyise wawagcina engcondvweni yakhe lamaphupho.
BomnakaboJosefa bahamba baya eShekhemu bayakwelusa timvu netimbuti teyise.
Israyeli wakhuluma kuJosefa, watsi: “Angitsi bomnakenu belusele eShekhemu? Kota-ke ngitekutfuma kubo.”
Uyise watsi: “Hamba-ke uyewuhlola kutsi bomnakenu basekahle yini, nekutsi timvu tisaphephile yini, bese uyabuya-ke utengitjela.” Wamtfuma esuka esigodzini saseHebroni.
Josefa wahamba waze wefika eShekhemu. Abesazulazula kuleyo ndzawo ngesikhatsi abona indvodza letsite leyambuta yatsi: “Ufunani lapha?”
Josefa wayiphendvula watsi: “Ngifuna bomnaketfu. Ngicela mane ungilayele lapho belusele ngakhona.”
Lendvodza yatsi: “Sebatfutsile lapha. Ngabeva bakhuluma batsi baya eDothani.” Josefa wabalandzela, wabakhandza khona eDothani.
Kodvwa bona bambona asesekhashane eta kubo, watsi asengakefiki, bavumelana ngekutsi bambulale.
Bakhuluma bodvwana batsi: “Nanso phela inkunzi yemaphupho ita.
Wotani simbulale, sidvumbu sakhe sisilahle kuleminye yalemigodzi. Sitabe sesitsi ubulewe tilwane tesiganga. Sitase sibone kutsi lamaphupho akhe atawugcinwa yini.”
Asimhholokoshisele kulomgodzi lolapha ehlane, singayicitsi ingati yakhe.” Phela Rubeni abecondze kumkhipha kulomgodzi bese umbuyisela kuyise.
Josefa watsi nakefika kubomnakabo, bamkhumula lengubo yakhe leyayihlotjisiwe inemikhono lemidze.
Bahlala phansi badla. Batsi basadla babona ludvwendvwe lwema-Ishmayeli luchamuka kaGileyadi lwehlela eGibhithe. Emakamela abo abetfwele tinandzisi tekudla nemakha.
Juda wakhuluma kubomnakabo watsi: “Kusitani kutsi simbulale lomnaketfu bese sifihla lengati yakhe?
Wotani, sitemtsengisa kunankha ema-Ishmayeli, singambulali; empeleni, ungumnaketfu, uyinyama yenyama yetfu, nengati yengati yetfu.” Bomnakabo bamvumela.
Kwatsi nase kwendlula bahwebi bemaMidiyani, Josefa bamkhipha kulomgodzi, bamtsengisa kulama-Ishmayeli ngetinhlavu tesiliva letatingemashumi lamabili. Ema-Ishmayeli ahamba naye aya eGibhithe.
Rubeni watsi ubuyela kulomgodzi wakhandza Josefa angasekho, wadzabula timphahla takhe.
Waya kubomnakabo wafike watsi: “Umfana akasekho! Pho, mine ngitawutsini?”
Batsatsa ingubo yaJosefa, babulala siphongo, benya lengubo engatini yaso.
Base bayitfumela kuyise nemlayeto lowawutsi: “Naku lesikutfolile. Ase ubukisise kutsi akusiyo ingubo yendvodzana yakho yini.”
Jakobe wadzabuka wadzimate wadzabula timphahla takhe, wavunula emasaka, walilela lendvodzana yakhe emalanga lamanyenti.

Onkhe emadvodzana akhe ase eta kuye atekumdvudvuta. Kodvwa wala kudvudvutwa watsi: “Ngiyawuze ngehle ngiye endzaweni yalabafile, lapho kunendvodzana yami khona, seloku ngililela indvodzana yami.” Ngako-ke uyise wachubeka walila.
Ngaso leso sikhatsi Juda wesuka kubomnakabo wayawuhlala naHira, indvodza yase-Adulamu.
Asekhona lapho wabonana nentfombi yemKhenani leyayibitwa ngekutsi nguShuwa, wayiteka,
yakhulelwa, yatalela Juda indvodzana, wayetsa libito watsi ngu-Era.
LomkaJuda waphindze wakhulelwa, wamtalela lenye futsi indvodzana, wayetsa libito watsi ngu-Onani.
Waphindza lenye futsi indvodzana, wayetsa libito watsi nguShela. BoJuda babeseKhesibi ngesikhatsi italwa lendvodzana.
Juda watsatsela Era, litubulo lakhe, umfati labebitwa ngekutsi nguThamari.
Kodvwa Era, litubulo laJuda, watiphatsa kabi embikwaSimakadze. Ngako-ke Simakadze wambulala.
Juda wase utsi ku-Onani, umnakabo-Era: “Ngena lomfelokati wemnakenu, wente lokufanele njengemkhula wakho, utalele umufi bantfwana.”
Kodvwa Onani, njengobe abati kutsi utabe utalele umnakabo, inhlanyelo yakhe abeyicitsela phansi njalo nje nakalala nalomkhula wakhe.
Simakadze watfukutsela ngaleso sento sa-Onani, ngako naye wambulala.

Juda wakhuluma kumalukatana wakhe, Thamari, watsi: “Ncandzeka ubuyele kini, ekhaya leyihlo, uhlale khona ungumfelokati kuze kukhule Shela, indvodzana yami.” Loko abekusho ngobe abesaba kutsi naye angahle afe njengabomnakabo. Ngako-ke Thamari wahamba wabuyela ekhaya kubo, wayawuhlala khona.
Emvakwesikhatsi lesidze umkaJuda, indvodzakati yaShuwa, wafa. Kwatsi kube kuphele sikhatsi sekulila, Juda naHira wase-Adulamu benyuka baya kubagundzi betimvu eThimna.
Lomunye watjela Thamari watsi: “Uyihlotala uyakhuphuka uya eThimna kuyewugundza timvu takhe.”

Ngako-ke Thamari wakhumula inzilo yakhe, watimbonya ngendvwangu wase uhlala esangweni lase-Enayimu, emgwacweni lophambukela eThimna. Abesati kutsi Shela abesakhulile, kodvwa abesengakanikwa kutsi amteke.
Watsi nakambona Juda, wacabanga kutsi yingwadla, ngobe abetimbonye buso.
Waphambuka waya kuye wafike watsi: “Kota ngitewulala nawe.” Abengati kutsi lowo kwakungumalukatana wakhe.
Waphendvula watsi: “Ngitakunika lizinyane lembuti lelisemhlambini wami.”
Thamari watsi: “Kulungile-ke, unganginika sibambiso, uze ungitfumelele lelo zinyane.”
Juda wabuta watsi: “Sibambiso sini lengingakunika sona?”
Wamphendvula watsi: “Indandatho leneluphawu lwakho, nentsambo yakho, neludvondvolo lwakho lolusesandleni sakho.” Wamnika. Wangena, walala naye; Thamari wakhulelwa.
Wesuka lapho Thamari wahamba, wayisusa leveyili, wembatsa inzilo yakhe yebufelokati.
Juda wase utfumela lomngani wakhe Hira wase-Adulamu, kutsi amikise lelizinyane abuye nalesibambiso kulomfati, kodvwa akazange amtfole.
Wabuta kulamadvodza aleyo ndzawo, watsi: “Iphi lengwadla beyilapha endleleni ngase-Enayimu?”
Baphendvula batsi: “Kute ingwadla leke yaba khona lapha.”
Wancandzeka wabuyela kuJuda wafike watsi: “Ngehlulekile kuyitfola lengwadla, nemadvodza aleyo ndzawo atsi kute ingwadla leke yaba khona lapho.”
Juda wamphendvula watsi: “Yiyekele itigcine leto tintfo, singaze sibe yinhlekisa kubantfu. Ngetamile kuyitfumelela lelizinyane, kodvwa wena wehlulekile kuyitfola.”
Emvakwetinyanga letintsatfu wabikelwa Juda kwatsiwa: “Thamari, malukatana wakakho ugwadlile, manje nje sewutetfwele.”
Juda waphendvula watsi: “Mkhipheni, nimshise aze afe.”

Kwatsi kube akhishelwe ngaphandle, watfumela livi kuyisetala lelitsi: “Umnikati waletimphahla nguye longitfolise lesisu. Ngiyakucela kutsi utibukisise ubone kutsi tabani letimphahla: indandatho leneluphawu lwakhe, nalentsambo, naloludvondvolo.”
Juda watibona letimphahla kutsi takhe wase utsi: “Akanacala lomakoti. Ngimi lengingawufezanga umsebenti wami ngekutsi ngimnike indvodzana yami Shela.” Juda akazange aphindze alale naye futsi.
Watsi nasabeleka, kwatfolakala kutsi esiswini sakhe kunemaphahla.
Watsi nasabeleka, lelinye lakhipha umkhono, umbelekisi walibamba walibekisa, walegabisa lucotfo lolubovu, wase utsi: “Nali lelitelwe kucala.”
Kodvwa lawufinyeta lomkhono walo, kwase kuphuma umnakabo kucala. Lombelekisi wase utsi: “Sewuphuma ngekufohla!” Ngako-ke wametsa libito watsi nguPheresi.
Emvakwakhe lomnakabo waphuma seloku agabe lolo lucotfo lolubovu esandleni, wametsa libito watsi nguZera.
Simakadze waba naJosefa wamphumelelisa kuko konkhe. Josefa abehlala kalomnumzane waseGibhithe.
Nalomnumzane wabona kutsi Simakadze abenaJosefa nekutsi Simakadze abekwenta kuchume konkhe lokuke kwaphatfwa tandla taJosefa.
Ngako-ke Josefa wazuza umusa kuPhotifari; wambeka kutsi abe yindvuna yakhe leyengamele likhaya lakhe nayo yonkhe imphahla yakhe.

Kusukela ngalelo langa labekwa ngalo kwengamela likhaya laPhotifari netimphahla takhe, Simakadze walibusisa lelikhaya lalomGibhithe ngenca yaJosefa. Sibusiso saSimakadze sasisetikwako konkhe Photifari labenako ekhaya nasemasimini.
Ngako-ke Photifari wakuyekelela etandleni taJosefa. Abengasahlupheki ngalutfo ngaphandle kwekudla labekudla.
Ngekuhamba kwesikhatsi umkaPhotifari wafisa Josefa, waze waphahluka watsi kuye: “Lala nami.”
Kodvwa Josefa wala, watsi: “Lalela la, inkhosi yami kute lesahlupheka ngako lapha ekhaya, ngobe konkhe ikubeke esandleni sami.
Inkhosi ingilinganise nayo kulelikhaya, futsi kute lengigodlele kona ngaphandle kwakho, ngobe ungumkayo. Pho, ngingabenta kanjani lobubi lobungaka, ngone kuNkulunkulu?”
Kwala nome lomfati ambekele siye amcela onkhe emalanga, kodvwa akazange avume Josefa kulala naye, ngisho nekutsi ahlale naye imbala.
Kodvwa kwatsi ngalelinye lilanga Josefa asesendlini enta umsebenti wakhe, netisebenti tasendlini tingekho,
lomfati wadvumela Josefa wambamba ngengubo yakhe, watsi: “Lala nami!” Kodvwa Josefa wanyomula lengubo wabaleka wamshiya nayo, waphuma kulendlu.
Watsi kube abone lomfati kutsi Josefa sewuphunyulile, wamshiya nalengubo wabaleka waphuma,
wamemeta lamadvodza lasebenta kulendlu watsi kuwo: “Ase nibheke! LomHebheru uletselwe kudlala ngatsi la. Ungingenele ekamelweni wangibamba afuna kulala nami. Ngesuka mine ngahlaba inyandzaleyo.
Utsite kube eve kutsi ngihlaba umkhosi, wabaleka washiya nayi ingubo yakhe, waphuma la endlini.”
Lengubo wayigcina lomfati, kwaze kwefika indvodza yakhe.
Yatsi kube ifike indvodza yakhe, wayitjela leyo ndzaba ngalokufananako, watsi: “Lesigcili semHebheru, losiletse la, emkhatsini wetfu, singene seta kimi satawudlala ngami.
Kodvwa ngitsite kube ngihlabe inyandzaleyo, sabaleka sashiya nayi ingubo yaso, saphuma la endlini.”
Lomfati wagcina ngekutsi: “Singiphatse kanjena-ke lesigcili sakho.” Lendvuna yatfukutselela Josefa kamatima.
Yamtsatsa yamfaka ejele, lapho efike wahlala khona kanye netiboshwa tenkhosi, Faro. Ngesikhatsi Josefa asesejele,
Simakadze wajinge waba naye, wamentela umusa, wamupha kutsandzeka emehlweni emgcinijele.
Umgcinijele wabeka tonkhe tiboshwa ngaphansi kwesandla saJosefa; yonkhe imisebenti leyayentiwa ejele yabekwa ngaphansi kwesandla saJosefa.
Umgcinijele akazange aphindze ahlupheke ngaloko lokwakungaphansi kwesandla saJosefa, ngobe Simakadze abenaye, futsi konkhe labekwenta Josefa Simakadze abekuphumelelisa.
Emvakwesikhashana umphatsi lomkhulu wetitja tenkhosi yaseGibhithe nempheki lomkhulu wetinkhwa tayo bona kuFaro, inkhosi yaseGibhithe.
Faro watitfukutselela totibili letiphatsimandla takhe: indvuna yebatseli beliwayini nendvuna yebapheki,
wase ubavalela esitokisini, endlini yendvuna yetingadzi kulelo jele lapho kwakunaJosefa khona.
Indvuna yelijele yetfula Josefa kubo kutsi abanakekele, wabanakekela. Bahlalisana sikhatsi lesidze basejele.
Ngalobunye busuku bobabili basejele babhudza, umphatsi wetitja lomkhulu wabhudza lakakhe liphupho, nembhaki lomkhulu wabhudza lakakhe; tinchazelo tawo tatehlukene.
Josefa nakefika kubo ekuseni, wakhandza kutsi bobabili bakhatsateke kakhulu.
Ngako-ke Josefa watibuta letiphatsimandla taFaro letatinaye ejele, watsi: “Buso benu bubukeka bukhatsatekile lamuhla kwenteke njani?”
Bamphendvula batsi: “Sobabili sibhudzile, futsi kute nalongachaza kutsi asho kutsini lamaphupho etfu.”
Josefa wabaphendvula watsi: “Kantsi tinchazelo temaphupho atiphumi kuNkulunkulu yini? Ase ningitjele kutsi nibhudzeni.”
Ngako-ke lomphatsi wetitja lomkhulu walandzisa Josefa watsi: “Mine ngibhudze ngibona umvini
unemagala lamatsatfu. Kutsite nakuhluma emacembe, kwase kuchakaza timbali, emagelebisi ase ayavutfwa.
Bengiphetse indzebe yaFaro esandleni sami, ngase ngitsatsa lamagelebisi ngiwahlutela endzebeni yaFaro, ngayitsatsa ngayibeka esandleni saFaro.”
Josefa watsi kuye: “Nayi-ke inchazelo yalo: Emagala lamatsatfu amele emalanga lamatsatfu.
Emvakwemalanga lamatsatfu Faro utakukhulula ejele, akubuyisele emsebentini wakho. Utawuphindze ube ngumphatsi weliwayini laFaro njengobe wawuvele unguye.
Kodvwa ngicela umane ungikhumbule nasekukumele kahle konkhe, ungihawukele ngekungiveta kuFaro, kuze angikhiphe nami ejele.
Empeleni ngebiwa eveni lemaHebheru; kunjalo nje nakhona lapha eGibhithe kute lengikwentile lokubangele kutsi ngifakwe lapha ejele.”
Kwatsi kube indvuna yebabhaki betinkhwa ibone kutsi inchazelo yaleliphupho ibe yinhle, yase itsi kuJosefa: “Nami ngibhudzile: Ngibhudze ngetfwele titja letitsatfu tekuphatsa tinkhwa.
Kulesitja lesingetulu bekukhona tonkhe tinhlobo tekudla lokuphekiwe kwaFaro, kodvwa kwefika tinyoni takudla konkhe loko kudla bekusesitjeni, takudla takucedza ngikwetfwele.”
Josefa wamphendvula watsi: “Nayi-ke inchazelo: Letitja letitsatfu timele emalanga lamatsatfu.
Emvakwemalanga lamatsatfu, Faro utakukhipha lapha ejele akugwebe intsambo! Utakulengisa elugodvweni, tinyoni tidle sidvumbu sakho.”

Emvakwemalanga lamatsatfu, Faro wagubha lusuku lwakhe lwekutalwa. Wenta lidzili, wentela tonkhe tisebenti takhe. Umphatsi wetitja kanye nempheki lomkhulu wetinkhwa wabakhipha ejele; babasemkhatsini wetisebenti nabo.
Wabuyisela umphatsi wetitja lomkhulu emsebentini wakhe, kuze aphindze abe ngumphatsi weliwayini laFaro,
kodvwa umpheki lomkhulu wetinkhwa wamlengisa entsanjeni. Konkhe kwaya njengobe Josefa abechazile.
Noko lomphatsi wetitja akazange amkhumbule Josefa; wamkhohlwa.
Kwatsi sekuphele iminyaka lemibili legcwele, Faro wabhudza eme eceleni kwemfula iNayili.
Wabona tinkhomati letisikhombisa letatibukeka kahle tikhuluphele tichamuka, tikhuphuka emfuleni, tefike tadla emhlangeni.
Kwatsi kusenjalo kwakhuphuka letinye futsi emfuleni, nato tisikhombisa; tona-ke tatibukeka kabi tondze tingimikhehlekhehle, tema elusentseni lwemfula eceleni kwaleti letinye.
Leti letondzile tesuka tadla leti letisikhombisa letikhuluphele. Faro wase uyaphaphama.
Waphindze wabuyela walala. Wabhudza lelinye futsi liphupho. Wabhudza abona tibhuluja letisikhombisa letatitikhulu tibhaceka eluhlangeni lunye.
Emvakwato, kwase kubhaceka tikhutu letisikhombisa kungatsi tihangulwe ngumoya wasemphumalanga.
Letikhutu tamita letibhuluja; Faro wase uyaphaphama, nalapho wakhandza kutsi abebhudza.

Ngakusasa ekuseni umphefumulo wakhe wakhatsateka kakhulu kangangekutsi wadzimate wabita tonkhe tangoma taseGibhithe kanye nabo bonkhe bosiyazi bakhona. Batsi kube befike, Faro wabalandzisa lamaphupho akhe, kodvwa kwabate ngisho namunye lowaba nemandla ekumchazela ngawo.
Ngesikhatsi inkhosi itfukutselele tisebenti tayo, yafaka mine nendvuna yebapheki betinkhwa ejele lelisendlini yendvuna yetingadzi.
Ngabusuku bunye sobabili sabhudza, lelo nalelo phupho lalinenchazelo yalo.
Sasinalomunye umHebheru labesemncane asisebenti sendvuna yabogadzi. Satsi nasimtjela lamaphupho etfu, wasinika inchazelo yalelo nalelo phupho.
Nangempela konkhe kwenteka njengobe abesitjelile: Mine ngabuyiselwa emsebentini wami, yena wajutjelwa intsambo.”
Faro wakhuluma kuJosefa watsi: “Ngibhudzile, kodvwa kute nome munye lonemandla ekungichazela ngaleliphupho. Kodvwa sengivile kutsi wena utsi ungalandziswa ngeliphupho, ulichaze njengobe linjalo.”
Josefa waphendvula watsi: “Akusimi, nkhosi, kodvwa nguNkulunkulu lotawunika Faro inchazelo lengiyo.”
Faro wase ulandzisa Josefa utsi: “Ngibhudze ngime elusentseni lwemfula iNayili,
kwase kuchamuka tinkhomati letisikhombisa, tibukeka kahle, tikhuluphele, tikhuphuka emfuleni, tadla emhlangeni.
Kutsite kusenjalo kwachamuka letinye letisikhombisa emvakwato, tona tatitimbi, tondze lengingazange sengikubone lapha kuleli laseGibhithe.
Leti letondzile tesuka tadla leti tekucala betitinhle tikhuluphele.
Kodvwa kutsite nome setitidlile kwangete kwabonakala, ngobe betisolo tinjalo nje, tondze tingimikhehlekhehle. Ngase ngiyaphaphama.
Ngaphindze ngabhudza futsi: Ngabhudza ngibona tibhuluja letisikhombisa tibhaceka eluhlangeni lunye.
Kutsite kusenjalo kwase kubhaceka tikhutu letimbi letibunile, kungatsi tihangulwe ngumoya wasemphumalanga.
Letikhutu tesuka tamita letibhuluja letisikhombisa. Sengititjele tonkhe tangoma, kodvwa kute nasinye lesibe nemandla ekunginika inchazelo.”
Josefa wakhuluma kuFaro watsi: “Omabili lamaphupho aFaro, asho intfo yinye. Nkulunkulu wembulele Faro ngaloko latakwenta.
Tinkhomati letinhle letisikhombisa timele iminyaka lesikhombisa, kanjalo futsi naletibhuluja letisikhombisa timele iminyaka lesikhombisa; kokubili kuchaza intfo yinye.

Tinkhomati letisikhombisa letimbi kantsi tondzile letalandzela, tona-ke timele iminyaka lesikhombisa, kanjalo futsi netikhutu letihangulwe ngumoya wasemphumalanga: Timele iminyaka lesikhombisa yendlala.
Kunjengobe ngishito kuFaro, Nkulunkulu wembulele Faro ngaloko latakwenta.
Kutawufika iminyaka lesikhombisa yenala lenkhulu eveni lonkhe laseGibhithe.
Kodvwa emvakwayo kutawulandzela leminye iminyaka lesikhombisa yendlala lenkhulu, yonkhe inala iyawukhohlakala eGibhithe; indlala italigubudzela lonkhe live.
Inala ingeke iphindze ikhunjulwe eveni, ngenca yendlala letawulandzela, ngobe itawuba matima kakhulu.
Lokuphindzaphindzeka kwaleliphupho laFaro kuchaza kutsi loku kumiswe nguNkulunkulu, futsi Nkulunkulu utakwenta masinyane.
“Ngako-ke Faro akakhetse indvodza lecaphelako, nalecotfo, ayibeke yengamele lonkhe live laseGibhithe.
Akachubeke Faro abeke tindvuna kuyo yonkhe imimango yalelive. Letindvuna tibotsatsa incenye yesihlanu yesivuno kulo lonkhe laseGibhithe, ngaleminyaka yenala lenkhulu.
Tibutse konkhe lokudla ngaleminyaka yenala lesikhombisa letako, konkhe tikwente ngeligama nangemandla aFaro, tikubutsele emadolobheni lokudla, bese tiyakulondvolota.
Lokudla-ke kutawugcinelwa lelive kutsi kudliwe ngesikhatsi sendlala letakwembesa iGibhithe yonkhe, kuze live lingabhubhi ngenca yendlala.”
Lesiphakamiso semukeleka kuFaro nakuto tonkhe tindvuna takhe.
Faro wakhuluma kuletindvuna takhe watsi: “Kodvwa singamtfolaphi umuntfu lofana nalona, lonaMoya waNkulunkulu?”
Faro wase utsi kuJosefa: “Njengobe Nkulunkulu akukhombise konkhe loku, angiboni kutsi ukhona umuntfu locaphelako nalocotfo kwendlula wena.
Ngako ngitakubeka wengamele live lami; bantfu bami batakwenta konkhe lokushoko. Mine ngitaba mkhulu kunawe ngesihlalo sebukhosi kuphela.”
Wachubeka Faro watsi: “Sengikubekile kutsi wengamele lonkhe live laseGibhithe.”
Faro wakhipha indandatho yakhe esandleni sakhe, wayifaka esandleni saJosefa; wamembatsisa ingubo yelineni lecolisakele, wamegabisa buhlalu begolide entsanyeni.
Wamekhweta encoleni yakhe yesibili. Bogadzi bakhe bahamba embikwakhe, bamemeta batsi: “Khweshani! Khweshani!” Wambeka kanjalo-ke kutsi engamele lonkhe laseGibhithe.
Ngetulu kwaloko Faro wakhuluma kuJosefa watsi: “NginguFaro; ngaphandle kwakho kute umuntfu lotawuphakamisa sandla sakhe nome lunyawo lwakhe lapha kuleli laseGibhithe.”
Faro wetsa Josefa libito watsi nguSafenathi Phaneya; wamendzisela Asenathi, indvodzakati yaPhotifera, umphristi wase-Oni.
Ngako-ke Josefa waphuma wahamba kulo lonkhe laseGibhithe.
Josefa abesaneminyaka lengemashumi lamatsatfu nakacala kusebenta ngaphansi kwaFaro. Wesuka kuFaro walihamba lonkhe laseGibhithe.
Kwatsi ngeminyaka lesikhombisa yenala, live laba nesivuno lesikhulu.
Konkhe lokudla kweminyaka lesikhombisa yenala Josefa wakubutsela emadolobheni. Lelo nalelo dolobha eGibhithe kwaba yindzawo yekugcina kudla, nasekuvuniwe emasimini lasedvutane nalo.
Josefa wasigcina sonkhe ngebunyenti baso lesivuno lesasingangetihlabatsi taselwandle, wadzimate wakuyekela nekusibala, ngobe sasingeke sisabaleka.
Lona wekucala Josefa wametsa libito watsi nguManase,
Lona wesibili Josefa wametsa libito watsi ngu-Efrayimu,
Yaphela-ke iminyaka lesikhombisa yenala eveni laseGibhithe,
kwacala iminyaka yendlala, njengobe abeshito Josefa. Kwaba nendlala emaveni onkhe, kodvwa kulo lonkhe laseGibhithe kwakusekhona kudla.
Yatsi kube indlala yembese lonkhe live, baseGibhithe bahamba bayawukhala kuFaro bamtjela kutsi sebabulawa yindlala. Faro wabaphendvula watsi: “Hambani niye kuJosefa, nente konkhe latanitjela kona.”
Ngako-ke yatsi kube indlala yandze nalo lonkhe live, Josefa wativula tonkhe tingungu takhe watsengisela baseGibhithe kudla, ngobe indlala yase ilikhungetse lonkhe laseGibhithe.
Ngetulu kwaloko, wonkhe umhlaba weta eGibhithe kutawutsenga kudla kuJosefa, ngobe lendlala yase ikhungetse wonkhe umhlaba.
Watsi kube eve Jakobe kutsi kunekudla lokutsengisako eGibhithe, wakhuluma kumadvodzana akhe watsi: “Yini nilibale kubukana emehlweni nje?
Ngivile kutsi kunekudla le eGibhithe. Hambani niyesitsengela khona, singaze sife sibulawe yindlala.”
Ngako-ke bomnakaboJosefa labalishumi behlela eGibhithe kuyawutsenga kudla.
Kodvwa Jakobe akazange amvumele Bhenjamini, labelama Josefa, kutsi ahambe nabo, ngobe phela abesaba kutsi angahle naye avelelwe yingoti.
Ngako emadvodzana a-Israyeli ahamba kanye nalabanye batsengi kuyawutsenga kudla, ngobe lendlala yase ilikhungetse lonkhe laseKhenani.
Ngaleso sikhatsi Josefa abesangundvunankhulu walo lonkhe live. Kwakunguye labetsengisela bonkhe bantfu kudla. Batsi bomnakaboJosefa nabefika, bamkhotsamela, babhekise buso babo phansi.
Kodvwa Josefa wababona kanye nje kutsi bomnakabo, noko watsalalisa nje wenta shangatsi akabati, wabaphatsa njengetihambi wakhuluma kubo ngelulaka, wababuta watsi: “Niphumaphi?”
Bamphendvula batsi: “Siphuma kulela laseKhenani, sitewutsenga kudla.”
Nome Josefa abebabona labomnakabo, kodvwa bona babengamboni.
Josefa wawakhumbula emaphupho akhe ngabo, wase utsi kubo: “Nine nitinhloli, nitewuhlola tikhala leningalingenela ngato lelive letfu.”
Bamphendvula batsi: “Cha, nkhosi, tinceku takho titewutsenga kudla.
Singemadvodzana andvodza yinye; sitinceku takho letetsembekile, asisito tinhloli.”
Wabaphendvula watsi: “Cha, nitele kutawuhlola tikhala leningalingenela ngato lelive letfu.”
Batsi: “Nkhosi, tinceku takho tingemadvodzana lalishumi namabili andvodza yinye, eveni laseKhenani. Lomncane kunatsi sonkhe usele nababe ekhaya, lona lomunye-ke akasekho.”
Josefa wabaphendvula watsi: “Kunjengobe ngishito kutsi nitinhloli.
Nitawuvivinywa kanjena-ke: Ngifunga Faro, ngitsi ningeke nikhululeke kutsi nihambe, ningakamletsi la umnakenu lomncane.

Lomunye emkhatsini wenu kufanele amlandze, nine labanye nitawuvalelwa esitokisini kuze kubonakale kahle kutsi kuliciniso yini loko lenikushoko. Nakungenjalo, ngiyanisola, ngifunga Faro, kutsi nine nitinhloli.”
Ngelilanga lesitsatfu Josefa wakhuluma nabo watsi: “Mine ngingumuntfu lowesaba Nkulunkulu, yentani naku kuze nitewuphila.
Naningemadvodza letsembekile, shiyani munye la esitokisini, laba labanye bahambe bayewutsatsa lokudla bakumikise emakhaya enu, ngobe naku indlala ibhokile.
Kufanele nite naye la kimi lomnakenu lomncane. Ngako-ke nitabe senikhombise ngempela kutsi benikhuluma liciniso, futsi ningeke nisabulawa.”

Bakhuluma bodvwana batsi: “Ase nibheke-ke manje sesiyavuna ngalobubi lesabenta kumnaketfu Josefa. Satsi sesikubona kukhatsateka kwemphefumulo wakhe, nasincenga, satsalalisa sangete samlalela. Ngiko nje sesikulenhlupheko manje.”
Babengati kutsi Josefa abeluva lolulwimi lwabo, ngobe kwakukhona labemhumushela.
Josefa wesuka kubo wayawukhala. Watsi kube acedze kukhala, asakwati kukhuluma kahle, wabuya weta kubo, wafike watsatsa Simeyoni wambopha embikwabo.
Josefa wayala kutsi bagcwaliselwe kudla emasakeni abo, nemali yalowo nalowo wabo ibuyiselwe esakeni lakhe, banikwe nemiphako yeluhambo lwabo. Konkhe loko kwentiwa.
BomnakaboJosefa bayikhweta-ke imitfwalo yabo etimbongolweni tabo, besuka bahamba.
Kwatsi lapho befike baphumula khona, lomunye wabo watsi uvula esakeni lakhe atewupha imbongolo yakhe, wakhandza imali yakhe emlonyeni welisaka lakhe.
Wakhuluma kubomnakabo watsi: “Imali yami ibuyiselwe nayi emlonyeni welisaka lami.” Tinhlitiyo tabo takhatsateka kakhulu ngaloko, badzimate bakhulumisana batsi: “Yini lena lasentele yona Nkulunkulu?”
Batsi nabefika kuyise Jakobe eveni laseKhenani bamlandzisa ngako konkhe lokwabehlela, batsi:
“Lendvodza lengundvunankhulu kulela laseGibhithe yakhuluma natsi ngelulaka, yasitsatsa njengetinhloli telive labo.
Kodvwa samphendvula satsi: ‘Asisito tinhloli, singemadvodza letsembekile.
Singemadvodzana andvodza yinye lali-12. Lenye ayisekho, lencane kakhulu isekhaya kubabe, eveni laseKhenani.’

Lendvodza lengundvunankhulu isiphendvule yatsi: ‘Naku lengitanihlola ngako kutsi netsembekile: Lomunye wenu utawusala nami, laba labanye benu bahambe bamikise kudla emakhaya, ngobe naku indlala ibhokile.

Niboletsa lomnakenu lomncane lapha kimi. Ngitawubona ngaloko-ke kutsi nine ningemadvodza letsembekile, anisito tinhloli. Ngitabe sengiyaninika-ke futsi lomnakenu nani nihambe nikhululekile kulelive; kutsi ningakha, nitsenge, nitsengise ngekutsandza.’ ”
Base bakhumula emasaka abo, kwaba ngulowo nalowo watfola imali yakhe emlonyeni welisaka lakhe. Bona neyise befikelwa kwesaba nekudvumala lokukhulu.
Uyise wakhuluma kubo watsi: “Maye mine bo! Bonkhe bantfwabami bayangiphelela; Josefa akasekho, naSimeyoni akasekho, kodvwa manje senifuna kutsatsa naBhenjamini. Mine konkhe nje kuyangihlanekela.”
Rubeni waphendvula uyise watsi: “Nangabe Bhenjamini angikambuyisi, ubobulala lamadvodzana ami lamabili. Myekelele etandleni tami, ngitambuyisa kuwe.”

Kodvwa Jakobe watsi kuye: “Indvodzana yami angiyivumeli kutsi uhambe nayo, yewukele eGibhithe. Umnakabo ufile, nguye yedvwa losasele. Nakungahle kwenteke avelelwe yingoti nisesendleleni, ngitakufa ngibulawe buhlungu ebudzaleni bami.”
Kwatsi sebakudle konkhe kudla lababekutsenge eGibhithe, uyise wakhuluma kubo watsi: “Hambani njalo niyesitsengela lokunye kudla.”
Kodvwa Juda wamphendvula watsi: “Leya ndvodza yasiyalisisa yatsi: ‘Ningeke ningibone ngisho nekungibona, naningeti naye lomnakenu.’
Nawungasivumela kutsi sihambe nemnaketfu, kulungile, sitawuhamba siyekutsengela lokudla.
Kodvwa nawungasivumeli kutsi sihambe naye, singeke sewuke, ngobe lendvodza yakhuluma yatsi: ‘Ningeke ningibone ngisho nekungibona, naningeti naye lomnakenu.’ ”
Israyeli watsi: “Ningiphatseleni kabuhlungu kangaka ngekutjela lendvodza kutsi ukhona lomunye umnakenu?”

Baphendvula batsi: “Lendvodza yasibutisisa, yabuta konkhe ngatsi nangemndeni wakitsi yatsi: ‘Uyihlo usaphila yini? Ninaye yini lomunye umnakenu?’ Natsi-ke sasiphendvula imibuto yakhe. Besingati ngani tsine kutsi utawube sewutsi: ‘Yehlani naye lomnakenu’?”
Juda wakhuluma kuyise, Israyeli, watsi: “Mkhulule lomfana, ngihambe naye, sitewushesha sihambe, kutewubate lotawubulawa yindlala.
Mine ngitawuba sibambiso sakhe ngemphilo yami; nangabe ngingakabuyi naye la kuwe, licala laloko ngitawuletfwala ngize ngife.
Kube asikabambeleleki nje, ngabe sesihambe saze sabuyela nakabili.”

Israyeli, uyise, wakhuluma kubo watsi: “Nangabe kufanele kube njalo-ke, hambani netipho letititselo telikhetselo talelive, nitifake emasakeni enu, nifike nitiphe lendvodza leniyishoko: nitsatse litsantana lebhalisamu, neleluju lwetinyosi, nelemakha, nelemure, nelemaphisitakhiwo, nelema-alimondi.
Nibophatsa imali yekutsenga, niyiphatse ngalokuphindvwe kabili, nincandzekise nalemali leyabuyiswa ifakwe emilonyeni yemasaka enu; mhlawumbe yafakeka ngesiphosiso.
Shangatsi Nkulunkulu Somandla anganipha umusa ebusweni balowo muntfu, anikhululele umnakenu nibuye kanye naye naBhenjamini. Kepha-ke mine nangemukwa bantfwabami, ngiyemukwa.”
Ngako-ke lamadvodza esuka lapho atsatsa sipho, nemali seyiphindvwe kabili, batsatsa naBhenjamini bahamba naye baya eGibhithe bafike bakhulekela kuJosefa.

Watsi kube Josefa ababone bahamba naBhenjamini, watjela indvuna yetisebenti tasendlini kakhe watsi: “Tsatsa lamadvodza uwangenise endlini kami, bese uyahlaba ulungise kudla, ngobe atakudla kanye nami emini.”
Sisebenti senta njengobe Josefa abeshito; satsatsa lamadvodza sawangenisa endlini kaJosefa.

BomnakaboJosefa besaba kakhulu, ngobe babengeniswe endlini kaJosefa, badzimate batsi: “Singeniswe lapha ngenca yalemali leyabuyiselwa emasakeni etfu nasite lapha kwekucala. Wentele kutsi atesituma, asitfumbe asente tigcili takhe, asemuke naletimbongolo tetfu.”
Ngako bahamba baya kulendvuna yetisebenti tendlu yaJosefa, bakhuluma nayo beme emnyango,
batsi: “Manje nkhosi, ngesikhatsi site lapha kwekucala sitewutsenga kudla,
satsi lapho sefika saphumula khona, savula emasaka etfu sonkhe sakhandza kutsi emilonyeni yawo kunalemali besitewutsenga ngayo, iphelele. Ngako sesibuye nayo.
Sehle nalenye futsi imali kutewutsenga ngayo kudla. Asati kutsi ngubani lona labeyibuyisele lemali lapha emasakeni etfu.”

Lendvuna yabaphendvula yatsi: “Cha, kulungile, ningesabi. Nkulunkulu wenu, longuNkulunkulu weyihlo, uniphile lomcebo emasakeni enu. Mine ngayitfola inkhokhelo yenu.” Yase ibakhiphela Simeyoni, yabaletsela yena.
Lendvuna yawatsatsa lamadvodza yawangenisa endlini kaJosefa, yawanika emanti, ageza tinyawo tawo, yabe seyipha netimbongolo tawo kudla.
Lamadvodza abe asalungisa tipho tawo alungela kutetfula kuJosefa nakefika emini, njengobe abesavile kutsi abetakudla kanye nawo.
Watsi kube efike ekhaya Josefa, bomnakabo base bangenisa tipho lababemphatsele tona batetfula kuye, bamkhotsama.
Wababuta imphilo watsi: “Linjani likhehla lelinguyihlo, lenakhuluma ngalo, lisaphila yini?”
Baphendvula batsi: “Inceku yakho lengubabe, isaphila.” Bamkhotsamela, bamshayela sihlutfu.

Watsi Josefa nakaphakamisa emehlo, wabona Bhenjamini, umntfwanakabo, labelamana naye emhlane, watsi: “Nguye lona yini lomnakenu lomncane lenangitjela ngaye? Shangatsi Nkulunkulu angaba nemusa kuwe, ndvodzana yami!”
Josefa washesha waphuma, ngobe inhlitiyo yakhe yefikelwa buhlungu, wafuna indzawo lesitsele, wangena khona wakhala.
Asagezile buso bakhe, waphindze waphuma; waticinisa watsi: “Phakelani kudla.”
Josefa bamphakela yedvwa, nabomnakabo babaphakela bodvwana, nalamaGibhithe labedla nawo aphakelwa odvwana, ngobe phela emaGibhithe abekutsatsa ngekutsi kutehlisa kudla nemaHebheru.

BomnakaboJosefa bahlaliswa etafuleni, ngekwelamana kwabo: litubulo ngebudzala balo nelitfunjana ngebuncane balo, bonkhe babebheke ngakuJosefa. Batsi nabakubona loko bomnakaboJosefa babukana bodvwana, bamangele.
Batsi nabanikwa kudla kwasetafuleni laJosefa, kwakaBhenjamini kwaphindvwa kahlanu kunekwabo bonkhe. Ngako-ke badla, banatsa, bajabula kanye naye.

Josefa wase utjela lendvuna yetisebenti watsi: “Gcwalisani emasaka alamadvodza ngekudla lokulingene nekutsi bangakwetfwala, emlonyeni walelo nalelo saka laleyo ndvodza ufake leyo mali yayo letsenge ngayo.
Emlonyeni welisaka lelitfunjana ufake indzebe yami yesiliva kanye naleyo mali lekutsengwe ngayo kudla.” Indvuna yenta njengobe yayitjelwe nguJosefa.
Ekuseni ngakusasa, lamadvodza akhululeka ahanjiswa wona kanye netimbongolo tawo.

Atsi kube aphume edolobheni asengakahambi nelibanga nje, Josefa watfumela indvuna yetisebenti takhe watsi: “Phutfuma uwalandzele lamadvodza, utsi ungawakhandza ufike uwabute utsi: ‘Nentiwa yini kubonga lokuhle ngalokubi? Seniyibeleni indzebe yesiliva yenkhosi yami?
Angitsi ngiyo lena lenatsa ngayo, ibuye yembule ngayo konkhe lokufihlakele? Nine nigange kakhulu.’ ”
Yatsi kube iwakhandze endleleni lendvuna, yafike yakhuluma lawo mavi.
Lamadvodza aphendvula atsi: “Usho kutsini-ke, mnumzane, nawukhuluma kanje? Siyafunga kutsi besingeke siyente tsine intfo lenjalo.
Nalemali lesayikhandza emasakeni etfu, siphindze sabuya nayo nasiphuma eKhenani. Pho, besingayeba kanjani isiliva negolide endlini yenkhosi yakho?
Nakwenteka uyikhandza kulomunye wetfu, lowo utakufa, tsine-ke sibe tigcili tenkhosi yami.”
Yatsi: “Akube njengobe nishito kutsi lowo letfolakala kuye utawuba sigcili sami, nine labanye ningeke nibe nacala.”
Kwaba nguleyo naleyo ndvodza yehlisa umtfwalo wayo masinyane, yavula lisaka layo.
Wafuna acala ngalomdzala waze wagcina ngalomncane. Indzebe yesiliva yaze yatfolakala esakeni laBhenjamini.
Besuka badzabula tingubo tabo ngenca yekudzabuka, kwaba ngulowo nalowo wekhweta umtfwalo wakhe embongolweni yakhe, bancandzeka sebabuyela edolobheni.
Watsi kube Juda nabomnakabo befike endlini kaJosefa, bamkhandza naye asekhona. Bakhotsama phansi embikwakhe.
Josefa watsi kubo: “Yini-ke lena leseniyentile? Utsi benati nje kutsi umuntfu lokulesikhundla sami angabona timfihlakalo ngemlingo?”

Juda waphendvula watsi: “Kute lesingahle sikusho kuwe, nkhosi yami. Singakhulumani nje? Singaphikani nje? Nkulunkulu sewulembulile licala letfu. Sonkhe sesitigcili tenkhosi yami, tsine sonkhe kanye nalona lekutfolakale kuye indzebe.”
Josefa watsi: “Cha, ngingeke ngikwente loko! Sigcili sami kutawuba ngulona lekutfolakale kuye indzebe. Kodvwa nine labanye hambani ngekuthula niye kuyihlo.”
Juda wasondzela kuJosefa watsi: “Ngiyakuncenga, nkhosi yami, kutsi sengimane ngikhulume nawe inhlitiyo yami yonkhe. Ngicela ungangicansukeli, nome ulingana naFaro matfupha.
Kucala inkhosi yami yabuta tinceku tayo yatsi: ‘Ninaye yini uyihlo nome umnakenu?’
Sayiphendvula satsi: ‘Sinaye babe, semdzala kakhulu, ukhona nemnaketfu losemncane, lamtala ebudzaleni bakhe, umnakabo akasekho. Senguye kuphela losasele esiswini senina. Uyise umtsandza kakhulu.’
Inkhosi yatsi etincekwini tayo: ‘Mletseni la kimi ngitembona ngemehlo.’
Sakhuluma enkhosini yami satsi: ‘Lomfana angeke ehlukane neyise, ngobe nangenta njalo, uyise angafa.’
Kodvwa watjela tinceku takho watsi: ‘Ngaphandle kwekutsi nite nemnakenu lomncane, ningeke niyitfole imvume yekubonana nami.’
“Satsi nasincandzeka sibuyela emuva kubabe, sefike samtjela onkhe emavi akho.
Ngesikhatsi babe asatsi: ‘Hambani futsi niyewusitsengela kudlanyana,’
satsi kuye: ‘Singeke siye lapho, nasingahambi naye lomnaketfu lomncane. Nasimshiya, singeke siyitfole imvume yekubonana nalenkhosi.’
Inceku yakho, lengubabe, yatsi: ‘Nani niyati kutsi Rakheli umkami, wangitalela emadvodzana lamabili kuphela.
Lomunye sewangishiya, kungahle kube nje waklejuklejulwa tilwane tesiganga waba ticucwana. Kusukela ngalelo langa angizange ngiphindze ngimbone.
Nangabe nalona senimtsatsa lapha kimi, bese wehlelwa yingoti endleleni, ngitawufa ngibulawe buhlungu, ngobe vele sengimdzala.’
“Ngako-ke, nkhosi yami, nangifika kubabe, inceku yakho, ngingeti naye lomfana, kantsi imphilo yakhe ibophene kangaka neyakhe,
nakabona kutsi lomfana akekho, anganhlakayeka afe. Ngaloko tsine, tinceku takho, sitawube sibangele inceku yakho, lengubabe, kutsi ife kabuhlungu ebudzaleni bayo.
Ngetulu kwaloko mine ngatidzela ematsambo ngaba sibambiso kubabe, ngatsi kuye: ‘Nangingabuyi nalomfana kuwe, licala laloko litawubasemahlombe ami ngize ngiyekufa.’
Ngako-ke ngiyakuncenga kutsi kumane kusale mine ngibe sigcili sakho, ukhulule lomfana ahambe nabomnakabo abuyele ekhaya.
Ngingancandzeka kanjani ngiye kubabe, nangabe ngingeti naye lomfana? Ngingeke ngikumele kubona buhlungu lobungaka behlela babe ngibukile.”
Wakhala kakhulu, kwadzimate kweva nemaGibhithe, kanye nebendlu yakaFaro.
Josefa watjela bomnakabo watsi: “Phela mine nginguJosefa; babe usaphila yini?” Kodvwa bomnakabo abazange bakhone kumphendvula, ngobe babesetfuke kakhulu.

Kodvwa ningakhatsateki futsi ningahlupheki ngekutsi nangitsengisa la. Empeleni nguNkulunkulu lowangitfumela kutsi ngite kulendzawo. Abentela kutsi nginendvulele ngekuta lapha ngitewusindzisa timphilo tebantfu.
Kusengumnyaka wesibili lona indlala ikhungetse umhlaba; kusasele leminye iminyaka lesihlanu kungalinywa kungavunwa.
Ngako nguNkulunkulu lowatsi anginendvulele ngekuta lapha, kuze anilondvolote nibe yinsali emhlabeni, nisindziswe kube kukhululwa lokukhulu.
“Ngako-ke, akusini lenangitfumela la, kodvwa nguNkulunkulu. Sewungente ngaba nguyise waFaro, nenkhosi yendlu yakhe, nembusi etikwelive lonkhe laseGibhithe.
Utawuhlala eveni laseGosheni, ubesedvute nami, wena nebantfwabakho, nebatukulu bakho, nemihlambi yakho yetimvu, neyetinkhomo, nako konkhe lonako.
Ngitaninakekela kahle nanilapho, ngobe kusasele iminyaka lesihlanu yendlala. Angifuni kutsi wena nendlu yakho nako konkhe nife nibulawe yindlala.’ ”
Josefa wachubeka watsi: “Manje, seniyabona-ke ngisho nawe, Bhenjamini, niyabona kutsi nginguJosefa.
Nibotjela babe kutsi sengaba mkhulu kanganani lapha eGibhithe, nimtekele nangako konkhe lenikubonile. Sheshani nilandze babe, ehle ete la.”
Wase ugaca imikhono entsanyeni yaBhenjamini wakhala; naBhenjamini wakhalela entsanyeni yaJosefa.
Bonkhe labomnakabo wabanga, akhala; emvakwaloko bonkhe labomnakabo base bakhuluma naye.
Kwatsi lendzaba nayibikwa kuFaro kutsi bomnakaboJosefa laba labefikile, Faro netiphatsimandla takhe bajabula kakhulu.
Faro wakhuluma kuJosefa watsi: “Tjela labomnakenu kutsi ababophele imitfwalo yabo etimbongolweni tabo bahambe baye eveni laseKhenani,
balandze uyihlo nemindeni yabo bete la kimi. Ngitabanika lokuhle kakhulu la eGibhithe bahlale benabe ngekutsandza kwabo.
Ubatjele batsatse tincola talapha eGibhithe, batekwetfwala ngato bantfwababo, nebafati babo, neyihlo, bete nabo.
Bangahlupheki ngekushiya emagugu abo emuva, ngobe konkhe lokuhle kakhulu kwalapha eGibhithe kutawuba kwabo.”
Emadvodzana a-Israyeli enta njengobe abetjeliwe. Josefa wabanika tincola njengekuyala kwaFaro, wabanika nemiphako yendlela.
Kwaba ngulowo nalowo wamnika ingubo yekushintja; kodvwa Bhenjamini wamnika tinhlavu tesiliva letingemakhulu lamatsatfu netingubo letisihlanu tekushintja.
Uyise wamtfumelela timbongolo letatilishumi letatitfwele tintfo letinhle taseGibhithe, netimbongolo letinsikati letatetfwele kudla, netinkhwa, nemiphako yeyise labetayidla nasehla eta eGibhithe.
Wase uyabahambisa labomnakabo, batsi nase besuka wabayala watsi: “Ningabohambe nilwa endleleni.”
Besuka-ke bahamba babuyela kuyise Jakobe eKhenani.
Bafike bamtjela batsi: “Josefa usaphila! Ungumbusi etikwalo lonkhe live laseGibhithe.” Jakobe wamane waphela emandla nje, wacale wangete wabakholwa.
Kodvwa kwatsi sebamtjele yonkhe inkhulumo yaJosefa layikhulume kubo, asabone netincola letatitfunyelwe nguJosefa kutsi titemetfwala, umoya waJakobe, uyise, wavuseleleka.
Israyeli wakhuluma watsi: “Sengenelisekile kutsi Josefa, indvodzana yami, uyaphila. Angehle ngiyekumbona, ngingakafi.”
Ngako Israyeli watsatsa konkhe labenako wahamba, waze wefika eBherisheba, lapho efike wanikela iminikelo kuNkulunkulu wa-Isaka, uyise.
Nkulunkulu wakhuluma ku-Israyeli embonweni ebusuku, watsi: “Jakobe! Ye Jakobe!”
Watsi: “NginguNkulunkulu, Nkulunkulu weyihlo. Ungesabi kwehlela eGibhithe, ngiyawukwenta ube sive lesikhulu khona.
Ngitawuba nawe ngehle ngiye eGibhithe, ngiyawuphindze ngenyuke nawe ngikubuyise futsi; Josefa cobo lwakhe nguye loyawuvala emehlo akho ekufeni kwakho ngetandla takhe.”
Jakobe wesuka eBherisheba; emadvodzana akhe agibelisa uyise, nebantfwabawo, nebafati bawo etincoleni lababetitfunyelelwe nguFaro kutsi titewubetfwala.
Bahamba netinkhomo tabo netimphahla tabo lababetitfole baseseveni laseKhenani. Labaya eGibhithe kwakunguJakobe nentalo yakhe yonkhe:
emadvodzana akhe, nemadvodzana awo, nemadvodzakati akhe, nemadvodzakati emadvodzana akhe; tonkhe titukulwane takhe wefika nato eGibhithe.
Emadvodzana aRubeni bekuboHanoki, naPhalu, naHesroni, naKhami.
Emadvodzana aSimeyoni bekuboJemuweli, naJamini, na-Ohade, naJakhini, naSohari, naShawule, indvodzana leyatalwa ngumfati labengumKhenani.
Emadvodzana aJuda bekubo-Era, na-Onani, naShela, naPheresi, naZera; kodvwa Era na-Onani bafela eveni laseKhenani. Emadvodzana aPheresi bekubo-Hesroni naHamule.
Emadvodzana a-Isakhari bekuboThola, naPhuwa, naJashubi, naShimroni.
Lawa-ke ngemadvodzana aLeya, lawatalela Jakobe eMesophothamiya ngaphandle kwaDina. Asawonkhe emadvodzana nemadvodzakati aLeya abengema-33.
Emadvodzana aGadi bekuboSefoni, naHagi, naShuni, na-Esboni, na-Eri, na-Arodi, na-Areli.
Emadvodzana a-Asheri bekuboJimna, naJishuwa, naJishvi, naBheriya, naSera labengudzadzewabo. Emadvodzana aBheriya bekuboHebere naMalkhiyeli.
Lawa-ke kwakungemadvodzana aZilpha, Labani lamnika Leya, indvodzakati yakhe. Watalela Jakobe bantfu lababeli-16.
Eveni laseGibhithe Josefa watalelwa boManase na-Efrayimu; lamtalela bona Asenathi, indvodzakati ya-Photifera, umphristi wase-Oni.
Emadvodzana aBhenjamini bekuboBela, naBekheri, na-Ashbeli, naGera, naNamani, na-Ehi, naRoshe, naMuphimi, naHuphimi, na-Adi.
Lawo-ke kwakungemadvodzana aRakheli lawatalela Jakobe; wamtalela bantfu lababeli-14.
Emadvodzana aNaftali bekuboJasiyeli, naGuni, naJeseri, naShilemi.
Lawo-ke kwakungemadvodzana aBilha, Labani lamnika Rakheli, indvodzakati yakhe. Sebabonkhe kwakubantfu labasikhombisa.
Sebabonkhe bantfu bekutalwa nguJakobe labaya eGibhithe babengema-66, ngaphandle kwabomalukatana bakakhe.
Emadvodzana aJosefa latalelwa eGibhithe aba mabili; ngako-ke bantfu bemndeni wakaJakobe labehlela eGibhithe babengema-70 sebabonkhe.
Jakobe watfumela Juda embili kuJosefa kutsi atewubahlangabeta eGosheni. Bahamba baze befika eGosheni.
Josefa wagibela incola yakhe waphikelela khona eGosheni, wayawuhlangabeta uyise Israyeli. Watsi achamuka nje, Josefa wambona uyise watigaca entsanyeni yakhe, wakhalela kuye sikhatsi lesidze.
Israyeli watsi kuJosefa: “Cha, sengingafa-ke manje, ngobe sengibubonile buso bakho, futsi sengiyati kutsi usaphila.”
Josefa wakhuluma kubomnakabo kanye nemndeni wonkhe weyise, watsi: “Kufanele ngenyuke ngiye kuFaro ngimatise kutsi bomnaketfu nemndeni wababe labebaseKhenani, sebefikile, bete kimi.
Ngitawufike ngimtjele kutsi nine nibelusi betinkhomo, nifuyile, ngimtjele nekutsi nite nayo yonkhe imihlambi yenu, netimvu, netinkhomo, nako konkhe leninako.
Nasanibita-ke Faro abuta atsi: ‘Yini umsebenti wenu?’
nibomphendvula nitsi: ‘Tinceku takho tibelusi betinkhomo kusukela ebusheni bato kuze kube ngunyalo, tsine nabobabe betfu.’ Nanimlandzise kanjalo, utanivumela kutsi nakhe lapha eGosheni.”
Phela Josefa abesho loku, ngobe emaGibhithe abewubukela phansi umsebenti wekwelusa.
Ngako-ke Josefa wahamba wayawubikela Faro, watsi: “Babe, nabomnaketfu, netimvu tabo, netinkhomo tabo, nako konkhe labanako sebefikile baphuma eKhenani, sebaseGosheni.”
Emkhatsini wabomnakabo wakhetsa baba sihlanu wayawubetfula kuFaro.
Inkhosi Faro yababuta yatsi: “Yini umsebenti wenu?”
Sitfutsele kulelive, ngobe eKhenani indlala seyibhoke kangangobe sekuze kuphele nemadlelo alemfuyo yetfu. Siyakucela kutsi mane usivumele sikhosele eGosheni.”
Faro wakhuluma kuJosefa watsi: “Uyihlo nabomnakenu bete kuwe.
Lonkhe lelive laseGibhithe lisetandleni takho. Babeke bakhe endzaweni lencono kakhulu, abakhe eGosheni. Nakukhona labanelikhono lekwelusa emkhatsini wabo, babeke babe tindvuna tebelusi bemfuyo yami.”
Josefa wabe sewungenisa Jakobe, uyise, wametfula kuFaro. Jakobe wakhulekela kuFaro amfisela tibusiso.
Faro wabuta Jakobe watsi: “Sewuneminyaka lemingakhi budzala?”
Jakobe wase ubusisa Faro, wavalelisa, waphuma.
Josefa wabeka uyise nabomnakabo wabakhela eveni lelincono laseGibhithe, endzaweni levundze kakhulu, eceleni kwelidolobha laka-Ramsesi, njengobe abeyalwe nguFaro.
Josefa wapha uyise kudla, wapha nabomnakabo, nemndeni weyise; kwaya ngebunyenti babo.
Kudla kwaphela yonkhe indzawo; ngobe indlala yase ibhoke kakhulu eveni laseGibhithe nelaseKhenani, ngako-ke bantfu balamba.
Josefa wase ubutsela ndzawonye yonkhe lemali leyayingene ngekutsengiswa kwekudla eveni laseGibhithe nelaseKhenani. Yonkhe lemali wayiletsa endlini yaFaro.

Yatsi kube iphele yonkhe imali eveni laseGibhithe nelaseKhenani, onkhe emaGibhithe eta kuJosefa afike atsi: “Siphe kudla! Ungasiyekela nje kodvwa sibulawe yindlala embikwakho? Yonkhe imali yetfu seyiphelile.”
Josefa wabaphendvula watsi: “Letsani tinkhomo tenu, nitsenge ngato, ngitaninika-ke kudla, nangabe imali yenu seyiphelile.”

Ngako-ke baletsa tinkhomo tabo batinika Josefa, batsenga ngato. Josefa wabanika kudla bonkhe labeta kutawushintjisa ngemahhashi, nangetimvu, nangetimbuti, nangetinkhomo, nangetimbongolo. Wonkhe lowo mnyaka waphela seloku abanika kudla ngekutsi bakuntjintjise ngetifuyo.

Watsi kube uphele lowo mnyaka, beta kuye ekucaleni kwemnyaka lolandzelako, bafike batsi: “Singeke sikufihle loku, nkhosi, kutsi imali yetfu yonkhe seyiphelile, nekutsi imfuyo yetfu ngeyakho. Kute lesingabe sisakunika kona manje, ngaphandle kwemitimba yetfu nemasimi etfu.

Utasiyekela nje sibulawe yindlala embikwakho tsine nelive letfu? Sitsengisele kudla ngatsi nangemasimi etfu. Tsine nelive letfu sitawuba tigcili taFaro. Siphe kudla kuze siphunge indlala, singafi; usiphe nenhlanyelo sitewuhlanyela emasimini etfu.”
Ngako-ke Josefa walitsenga lonkhe live laseGibhithe, ngobe onkhe emaGibhithe atsengisa ngawo onkhe emasimi awo, ngenca yekubhokelwa yindlala. Live lonkhe laba laFaro.
Bonkhe bantfu baba tigcili taFaro kusukela ngale kwelive kuze kubesekugcineni ngale kwelive laseGibhithe.
Live langalitsenganga kwaba lebaphristi kuphela; ngobe baphristi babephila ngesabelo sekudla lababesinikwa nguFaro. Ngako-ke abalitsengisanga live labo.
Josefa wase ukhuluma kubantfu watsi: “Lalelani-ke, kusukela lamuhla nine nelive lenu senginitsengele Faro. Nansi-ke inhlanyelo yenu, hlanyelani emasimini.
Nanivunako, incenye yesihlanu yesivuno nitawuyetfula kuFaro, bese kutsi tincenye letine esihlanwini tibe tenu netemindeni yenu.”
Bamphendvula batsi: “Utisindzisile timphilo tetfu. Usiphetse ngesandla lesihle, nkhosi. Sitaba tigcili taFaro.”
Ngako-ke Josefa wakwenta kwaba ngumtsetfo lomile welive laseGibhithe, kuze kube ngulamuhla, kutsi Faro anikwe incenye yesihlanu yesivuno. Live lebaphristi lodvwa lelasala langete ladliwa nguFaro.
Jakobe wahlala eveni laseGibhithe iminyaka leli-17. Iminyaka yekuphila kwaJakobe yaba li-147.
Ngifuna kungcwatjwa lapho kwangcwatjwa khona bobabe. Ubongetfwala, ungikhiphe eGibhithe ngiyekungcwatjwa lapho kwangcwatjwa khona bobabe.”
Josefa wamphendvula watsi: “Ngiyawukwenta loko njengobe ushito.”
Emvakwaloko Josefa wabikelwa kutsi uyise uyagula. Ngako-ke Josefa wesuka watsatsa emadvodzana akhe omabili boManase na-Efrayimu, waya nawo kuyise.
Wase uyabikelwa Jakobe kwatsiwa: “Indvodzana yakho, Josefa, seyifikile itekuvusela.” Israyeli waticinisa abuyisa emandla akhe, wavuka wahlala ngetibunu embhedzeni.
Jakobe wakhuluma kuJosefa watsi: “Nkulunkulu Somandla wabonakala kimi eLuzi, eveni laseKhenani wangibusisa,
watsi kimi: ‘Lalela la, ngitakwandzisa ngikwente ube tive letinyenti, lelive ngiliphe titukulwane takho emvakwakho. Liyawuba lato phakadze naphakadze.’ ”
Bantfwana lotawubatala emvakwabo batawuba bakho, hhayi bami; lifa labo liyawubitwa ngemagama alaba bomnakabo.

Loku ngikwenta ngenca yekudzabuka lengaba nako nangifelwa ngunyoko Rakheli, ngisesendleleni ngisuka eMesophothamiya sengitawufika e-Efratha, eveni laseKhenani. Ngamngcwaba e-Efratha.” Manje leyo ndzawo seyibitwa ngekutsi yiBhetlehema.
Israyeli nakabona emadvodzana aJosefa, wabuta watsi: “Bakabani labafana?”
Josefa waphendvula uyise watsi: “Ngemadvodzana ami, Nkulunkulu langiphe wona ngisekuleli laseGibhithe.” Israyeli watsi: “Ase uwaletse, khona ngitewabusisa.”
Emehlo a-Israyeli abengasaboni kahle, ngenca yebudzala, abesafifiyela. Ngako Josefa wawasondzeta kuye. Jakobe wawanga, wawagaca ngemikhono.
Israyeli wakhuluma kuJosefa watsi: “Ngangingasacabangi kutsi ngiyawuphindze ngibubone buso bakho, kodvwa Nkulunkulu sewungivumele kutsi ngikubone, ngaze ngabona ngisho nebantfwabakho futsi.”
Josefa wase uyawesusa emadvodzana akhe emadvolweni aJakobe, wakhotsama abhekise buso bakhe phansi.
Josefa wawatsatsa omabili wawabeka emaceleni a-Israyeli: Efrayimu angesancele, Manase ngesekudla.
Kodvwa Israyeli welula sandla sakhe sangesekudla wasibeka etikwa-Efrayimu, nome abengulomncane; sandla sakhe sangesancele waselula wasibeka etikwaManase, labelitubulo.
