Ningabakhotsameli bonkulunkulu babo, ningabakhonti, ningayenti nemikhuba yabo yekukhonta. Bonkulunkulu babo nibobabhidlita kanye netinsika tabo tematje.
Nanikhonta mine Simakadze longuNkulunkulu wenu, ngitawunibusisa ngekudla nangemanti, ngikususe konkhe kugula kwenu.
Kute umfati lotawuphunyelwa sisu nalotawuba yinyumba eveni lenu, ngitanipha imphilo lendze.
Ngiyawutfumela bomanyovu embikwenu; ngibo labayawunicoshela letitsa tenu letingemaHivi, nemaKhenani, nemaHethi.
Ngingeke ngitikhiphe tonkhe ngamnyaka munye; ngobe nangingenta njalo, lelive litawube seliba sikhotsa, netilwane tesiganga tandze bese tiba yingoti kini.
Esikhundleni saloko letitsa tenu ngitatikhipha kancane kancane, nize nitsi ningandza, bese niyalitsatsa-ke lonkhe live.
Iminyele yenu ngitayibeka isuke eLwandle Lolubovu kuye eLwandle lwemaFilisti, kuye ehlane, kuze kufike emfuleni.
Ningasenti sivumelwane nabo, ngisho nabonkulunkulu babo imbala.
Ningabavumeli kutsi bakhelane nani eveni lenu, ngobe phela bangahle banente none kimi ngekukhonta labonkulunkulu babo; loko kuyakwenta lugibe kini.”
Simakadze wakhuluma kuMosi, watsi: “Yenyuka, ukhuphukele kuSimakadze, wena, na-Aroni, naNadabi, na-Abihu kanye nebaholi bema-Israyeli labangema-70 nikhotsame nikhonte nisesekhashane.
Wena-ke Mosi, ubosondzela kuSimakadze, kodvwa laba labanye bangacali basondzele kimi. Bantfu kufanele bangenyuki nawe.”
Mosi wawabhala phansi onkhe emavi aSimakadze. Wavuka ekuseni ngeluvivi wakha lilati phansi kwentsaba, ngematje lali-12, labemele tive tema-Israyeli.
Watfuma emajaha etive tema-Israyeli, anikela iminikelo yekushiswa, ngemihlatjelo ngetinkunzana taba ngiminikelo yekuthula kuSimakadze.
Mosi watsatsa incenye yalengati wayifaka emigezelweni, lenye yayo wayinyenyeta etikwelilati.
Wase utsatsa incwadzi yesivumelwane, wayifundza, bonkhe bantfu balalela, bakhuluma batsi: “Konkhe lokushiwo nguSimakadze siyawukwenta sikulalele.”
Mosi na-Aroni, naNadabi, na-Abihu kanye nebaholi bema-Israyeli lababengema-70 benyuka baya entsabeni,
bafike babona Nkulunkulu wema-Israyeli. Ngaphansi kwetinyawo takhe kwabonakala lokwakufanana nendlela yelitje lesafire lelalingumbala loluhlata njengesibhakabhaka.
Nkulunkulu akazange abatsintse, baholi besive sema-Israyeli; babona Nkulunkulu. Banatsa, badla ndzawonye.
Simakadze wakhuluma kuMosi, watsi: “Yenyuka ukhuphukele kimi entsabeni uhlale khona; ngitakunika tibhelekeca tematje letinemiyalo lengiyibhalele kutsi ibe ngimiyalo yebantfu.”
Mosi kanye nemsiti wakhe labenguJoshuwa batilungiselela; benyuka baya eNtsabeni yaNkulunkulu.
Mosi wakhuluma kulabaholi, watsi: “Ase nisimele la, size sibuye futsi. Aroni naHure batawusala nani. Nakukhona lonesikhalo, akaye kubo.”
Mosi wenyuka intsaba iSinayi, lifu layisibekela yonkhe intsaba.
Inkhatimulo yaSimakadze yahlala etikweNtsaba iSinayi, lifu layembesa kwaze kwaphela emalanga lasitfupha; kwatsi ngelilanga lesikhombisa Simakadze wamemeta Mosi asekhatsi efini.
Ema-Israyeli lenkhatimulo yaSimakadze leyayembese leNtsaba ayibona ayifanisa nemlilo locotfulako.
Mosi wangena kulelifu, wenyuka waya entsabeni. Wahlala lapho emalanga langema-40 kanye nebusuku bawo.
“Khuluma esiveni saka-Israyeli kutsi asingiletsele umnikelo, ukhishwe ngibo bonkhe bantfu labanenhlitiyo levumako, wena uwemukele egameni lami.
Leminikelo lotawuyemukela kufanele kube ngulena: yigolide, nesiliva, nelitfusi,
nensontfo leluhlata njengesibhakabhaka, nalebukhwebeletane, nalebovu ngalokutopele, nendvwangu yelineni lecolisakele, neboya bembuti,
netikhumba tetihhanca letishukiwe taguculwa taba bovu, netikhumba temahhashi aselwandle,
nemafutsa ekukhanyisa tibane, netinongo temafutsa ekugcobisa, netemphepho lenuka kamnandzi,
nematje e-oniksi, nalamanye ematje laligugu ekufakwa esidziyeni nasesembatfweni sesifuba semPhristi Lomkhulu.
Labantfu kufanele bangentele indlu lengcwele, khona ngitawuhlala emkhatsini wabo.
Nawakha lendlu lengcwele nato tonkhe timphahla tayo, ubokwenta konkhe ngendlela lengitakukhombisa yona.”
Ulembese ngegolide lecengekile ngekhatsi nangephandle; ulephetse ngegolide.
Utakwakha emajiva egolide ekuletfwala lekufanele ashayelwe kulo etinyaweni talo, abe mane, abe mabili nganhlanye, nanganhlanye abe mabili.
Ubenta timboko tekuletfwala tibe temgamba, bese utembesa ngegolide.
Letimboko utifake ekhatsi kulamajiva lasetinhlangotsini talelibhokisi; tisetjentiswe ekwetfwaleni lelibhokisi.
Tiyawuhlala ekhatsi emajiveni alelibhokisi, tingakhishwa kulo.
Ekhatsi kwalelibhokisi ubofaka letibhelekeca tematje letimbili lengitakunika tona.
“Simbonyo salo lesisihlalo semusa, usente ngegolide lecengekile: budze baso bube ngemasentimitha langaba li-110, bubanti bube ngemasentimitha langaba ngema-66.
Uyawukwenta emakherubhi lamabili ngegolide legcotjiwe uwabetsele lelinye likherubhi libe ngala, lelinye libe ngale.
Yenta lelinye likherubhi libe ngale ngekugcineni kwesihlalo semusa, lelinye libe ngala ekugcineni, bese kuba yintfo yinye nesimbonyo.
Lamakherubhi kufanele avule emaphiko awo engamele lesihlalo semusa abukane, abheke lesihlalo semusa.
Letibhelekeca tematje letimbili ubotifaka ekhatsi kulelibhokisi, bese ulimbonya ngalesihlalo semusa.
Ngitawuhlangana nawe lapho, ngikhulume nawe ngisetikwalesihlalo semusa emkhatsini walamakherubhi lamabili lasetikwelibhokisi. Ngulapho ngitakunika khona yonkhe imitsetfo yami yesive sema-Israyeli.”
Lapha emaceleni wakhe emaphetselo lanebubanti besandla, alitungelete ndzawo tonkhe, bese uwahlobisa ngelugebhezi lwegolide.
Lelitafula ubolentela emajiva egolide lamane, lamajiva uwabophele emakoneni omane alemilente yalo.
Lamajiva ekufaka letimboko tekwetfwala kufanele abesedvute nemaphetselo alelitafula.
Uyakwenta timboko ngemgamba, utembese ngegolide, lelitafula liyakwetfwalwa ngato.
Ubenta emapulede, netindzebe, nemajeke, netindishi temnikelo wewayini; tonkhe letintfo kufanele tentiwe ngegolide lecengekile.
Etikwalelitafula kufanele ubeke sinkhwa lesinikelwe kimi, lekufanele sibesembikwami ngaso sonkhe sikhatsi.”
Kuboba nemagala lasitfupha esicwini salo, lamatsatfu abe nganhlanye, nalamatsatfu abe nganhlanye.
Lelo nalelo gala kufanele libe nemihlobiso lemitsatfu lenesimo setimbali te-alimondi, letinye tibe nguletisengimidvumba, letinye tibe ngulesetichakazile.
Lolutsi lwetibane kufanele lube nemihlobiso lemine leyentiwe yaba njengetimbali te-alimondi, letisengimidvumba nalesetichakazile.

Ngako kusho kutsi kutawuba nalesengumdvumba ngaphansi kwemagala lamabili ekucala lesuka esicwini, kulandzele lenye lesengumdvumba ngaphansi kwemagala lamabili lalandzelako, kanjalo nakulawo lamabili ekugcina. Leto totintsatfu titawucondzana nalamagala lasitfupha.
Letimbali letisengimidvumba, nalamagala, nelutsi lwesibane kufanele kube sikhatsa sinye segolide lecengekile legcotjiwe.
Yenta tibane letisikhombisa kulesicu utimise titewukhanyisa ngembili kwalesicu.
Tijubantsambo netitsebe talo utente ngegolide lecengekile.
Ubosebentisa igolide lecengekile lengemakhilogremu langaba ngema-35, nawakha lolutsi lwetibane nako konkhe lokuhambisana nalo.
Ucaphele kutsi letintfo utakha ngaleyo ndlela lengakukhombisa yona entsabeni.”
Leyo naleyo ndvwangu ibe ngemamitha langaba li-14 budze, nemamitha langaba mabili bubanti; tonkhe letindvwangu tilingane.
Ubotihlanganisa ngekutitfungela ndzawonye letisihlanu, naleti letinye letisihlanu utente njalo.
Wente tinkintjo ngendvwangu leluhlata njengesibhakabhaka tibesemaphetselweni aleyo naleyo ndvwangu leseyihlanganisiwe.
Yenta tinkintjo letingema-50 endvwangwini yekucala, wente njalo futsi nakulena yesibili, tinkintjo ticondzane njengekulandzelana kwato.
Yenta emahhuka egolide langema-50, wentele kuhlanganisa letindvwangu, lithende lekukhontela libe yintfo yinye.
Tonkhe letindvwangu ubotenta tilingane, iyinye ibe ngemamitha langaba li-15 budze, ibe ngemamitha langaba mabili bubanti.
Letisihlanu utihlanganise ngekutitfungela ndzawonye, naleti letisitfupha nato tibe yintfo yinye. Lena yesitfupha uyigoce ngekuyiphindza kabili ngembili kwalelithende.
Ubofaka tinkintjo letingema-50 emaphetselweni aleyo naleyo ndvwangu.
Wakhe emahhuka ngelitfusi abe ngema-50, bese letindvwangu utihlanganisa ngalamahhuka, khona lithende litawuba yintfo yinye.
Lengisa sigamu salendvwangu lenye ngemuva kwalelithende lekukhontela.
Budze bekugabanca kwayo kulelithende bube ngemasentimitha langaba ngema-50 ngala nangale, loko lokusele kuyawugabanca ngetulu kulenge emihlubulweni yelithende kwentele kulembesa.
“Ubenta simbonyo salelithende ngetikhumba tetihhanca letishukiwe taguculwa taba bovu, nesetikhumba temahhashi aselwandle
Nguleyo naleyo nsikabhaluko ibe nebudze lobungemamitha langaba mahlanu, nebubanti lobungemasentimitha langaba ngema-66,
tibe netiphongwana letifananako khona titewuhlanganiseka ngato. Tonkhe letinsikabhaluko talelithende lekukhontela kufanele tentiwe njalo.
Ubenta tinsikabhaluko letingema-20 ngaseningizimu yelithende lekukhontela,
nemaseko esiliva langema-40 abe ngaphansi kwetinsikabhaluko, abe mabili ngaphansi kwaleyo naleyo nsikabhaluko, entelwe kubamba tisimiso tayo letimbili.
Nangasemhlubulweni wesibili longasenyakatfo nakhona wente tinsikabhaluko letingema-20,
kanye nemaseko esiliva langema-40, abe mabili ngaphansi kwaleyo naleyo nsikabhaluko.
Lingemuva lelithende lekukhontela lelingasenshonalanga lona ubolentela tinsikabhaluko letisitfupha.
Emakona langemuva kwelithende lekukhontela ubowentela tinsikabhaluko letimbili.
Tinsikabhaluko kufanele tibhancwe kusukela phansi, kuze kuyewufika etulu kuhlanganiswe kulelijiva lekucala. Totimbili letinsikabhaluko letenta lamakona lamabili kufanele tentiwe njalo.
Ngako-ke kusho kutsi kufanele kube tinsikabhaluko letisiphohlongo nemaseko ato esiliva lali-16, lamabili ngaphansi kwaleyo naleyo nsikabhaluko.
“Ubenta emakabha abe li-15 ngemgamba, lasihlanu abe ngewetinsikabhaluko letisemhlubulweni welithende,
lasihlanu abe ngewetinsikabhaluko kulomunye umhlubulo, lasihlanu abe ngewetinsikakhaluko ngemuva ngasenshonalanga.
Lelikabha lelisemkhatsini lelibhukula lensikabhaluko kufanele lisuke ngale ekugcineni lize lifike ngale ekugcineni.
Tinsikabhaluko ubotembesa ngegolide, ushayele kuto emajiva egolide ekufaka lamakabha; nawo kufanele embeswe ngegolide.
Lelithende lekukhontela kufanele ulakhe ngaleyo ndlela lengakukhombisa yona entsabeni.
Uboyilengisa etinsikeni temgamba letine letembeswe ngegolide tafakwa emahhuka lamane egolide, tasinyiswa etikwemaseko esiliva lamane.

Lendvwangu uboyikhaceka kulamahhuka lavalekako laseluphahleni, bese uletsa lelibhokisi lesivumelwane lelinetibhelekeca letimbili tematje, ulifake ngemuva kwalendvwangu. Lendvwangu itakwehlukanisa indzawo lengcwele endzaweni lengcwelengcwele.
Lesihlalo semusa utakwembonya ngaso libhokisi lesivumelwane kulendzawo lengcwelengcwele.
Ngaphandle kwendvwangu beka litafula ngasenyakatfo kwelithende, ubeke lutsi lwesibane ngaseningizimu libhekane nalelitafula.

“Emnyango walelithende ubenta sivalo sendvwangu ngalokuluhlata njengesibhakabhaka, nangalokubukhwebeletane, nangalokubovu ngalokutopele, usente nangemitiya yelineni leyephotselwe yacolisakala; konkhe loko kube ngumsebenti wengcweti yetekuhlobisa.
Yenta emahhuka egolide alendvwangu. Lendvwangu uyentele tinsika temgamba letisihlanu letembeswe ngegolide; leti-ke ubotibumbela emaseko elitfusi lasihlanu.”
Lamakona lamane ubowenta abe netimphondvo lapha ngetulu, tihlangane tibe yintfo yinye nelilati, konkhe loku ubokwembesa ngelitfusi.
Ubolentela emabhodo ekucitsa umlotsa, ulentele nemafosholo, nemigezelo, netindishi, netintsi tekuhloma inyama, nemakesi; tonkhe letitja ubotenta ngelitfusi.
Ubolentela umhlobiso welitfusi losasisefo, etikwawo ubokwenta emajiva lamane elitfusi emakoneni awo omane.
Ubowuvunulisa ngaphansi kwalomtsandvo welilati loselukhalweni lwelilati.
Lelilati ubolentela timboko ngemgamba, uyembese ngelitfusi.
Uyawutifaka emajiveni ngala nangala kwelilati njalo nje naletfwalwako.
Lelilati ubolenta ngemapulango libe nemhubhe, ulakhe ngaleyo ndlela lengakukhombisa yona entsabeni.”
sibe netinsika letingema-20 letimiswe emasekweni elitfusi langema-20, letinsika tibe nemahhuka nemigcala yesiliva.

Kufanele kwentiwe njalo futsi nangasemhlubulweni longasenyakatfo; lesibuya sibe nebudze lobungemamitha langaba ngema-46, letindvwangu tesibuya kufanele tilengiswe etinsikeni letingema-20 letimiswe emasekweni elitfusi langema-20. Letinsika tibe nemahhuka nemigcala yesiliva.
Ngasenshonalanga kufanele kube nesibuya setindvwangu lesingemamitha langaba ngema-23 budze, letinsika tisinyiswe emasekweni lalishumi.
Bubanti balesibuya ngembili kwaso, ngasemphumalanga, kufanele bube ngemamitha langaba ngema-23.
Kulenga kwato letindvwangu ngala kwemnyango kufanele kube ngemamitha langaba sitfupha nemasentimitha langema-60 bubanti, tihhukwe etinsikeni letintsatfu letisinyiswe emasekweni lamatsatfu.
Nangale kwemnyango kufanele kulenge tindvwangu letingemamitha langaba sitfupha nemasentimitha langema-60 bubanti, tihhukwe etinsikeni letintsatfu letisinyiswe emasekweni lamatsatfu.

Lomnyango wesibuya kufanele ube nesivalo lesentiwe ngendvwangu yelineni lecolisakele lehlotjiswe nangensontfo leluhlata njengesibhakabhaka, nalebukhwebeletane, nalebovu ngalokutopele; kube ngumsebenti wengcweti yetekuhlobisa, bubanti balendvwangu bube ngemamitha langaba yimfica. Kufanele ihhukwe etinsikeni letine letisinyiswe emasekweni lamane.
Tonkhe tinsika letitungelete lesibuya kufanele tibe nemigcala yesiliva nemahhuka esiliva, emaseko ato entiwe ngelitfusi.

Lesibuya kufanele sibe nebudze lobungemamitha langaba ngema-46, nebubanti lobungemamitha langaba ngema-23, nekuphakama kwetindvwangu lokungemamitha langaba mabili nemasentimitha langema-20. Letindvwangu kufanele tentiwe ngemitiya yelineni leyephotselwe yacolisakala, emaseko ato letinsika entiwe ngelitfusi.
Tonkhe timphahla letitawusetjentiswa kulelithende ekukhonteni ngisho netiphunti talelithende kanye netesibuya kufanele kwentiwe ngelitfusi.”

Aroni nemadvodzana akhe kufanele balinakekele lelithende lekuhlangana ngekulikhanyisa kusukela kusihlwa kuze kube ngusekuseni; lolutsi lwetibane kufanele lubekwe ngaphandle kwendvwangu lesembikwelibhokisi lesivumelwane, lapho ngikhona khona. Lomtsetfo kufanele wentiwe ngema-Israyeli titukulwane ngetitukulwane.”
“Ubobe sewubita umnakenu, Aroni, kanye nemadvodzana akhe boNadabi, na-Abihu, naEleyazare, na-Ithamari, ubehlukanise nema-Israyeli, ngobe ngifuna babe baphristi bekungikhonta.
Ubotfungela umnakenu, Aroni, tembatfo letingcwele tebuphristi; ngito letitamnika sitfunti nekuhlonipheka.
Tjela bonkhe bantfu labanelikhono lekutfunga, lengibaphe kuhlakanipha, kutsi bafanele bentele Aroni tembatfo tebuphristi kuze angikhonte njengemphristi.

Tembatfo lekumele batente ngunati: sembatfo sesifuba, sidziya, nemjiva, nengubo lete umkhono lehlotjisiwe, nemshuculo wenhloko, nelucotfo. Letembatfo letingcwele batawutentela umnakenu Aroni kanye nemadvodzana akhe, kuze bangikhonte njengebaphristi.
Letingcweti tibosebentisa imitiya yelineni leyephotselwe ngalokucolisakele, nensontfo leluhlata njengesibhakabhaka, nalebukhwebeletane, nalebovu ngalokutopele, nemicwana yegolide.
Lesidziya sitawuba nemichilo lemibili ngala nangale yekusibophela nekusihlanganisa emahlombe.

Nalelibhande lelelukiwe leliselukhalweni kufanele libe yintfo yinye nalesidziya, lentiwe ngemicwana yegolide, nangensontfo lebukhwebeletane, naleluhlata njengesibhakabhaka, nalebovu ngalokutopele kanye nangemitiya yelineni leyephotselwe ngalokucolisakele.
Ubotsatsa ematje lamabili e-oniksi, uwabhale ngekucopha emabito emadvodzana a-Israyeli lali-12,
ngekwelamana kwawo, lasitfupha kulelitje lelinganhlanye, nalasitfupha kulelitje lelinganhlanye.
Funa umuntfu lonelikhono lekubhala ngekucopha lamatje lamabili, acophe emabito emadvodzana aka-Israyeli; lamatje abowahlobisa ngegolide lapha emaphetselweni.
Lamatje ubowafaka kulemichilo lebophela lesidziya emahlombe. Aroni utabowagaca emahlombe lamabito emadvodzana aka-Israyeli njalo nje naketa kimi, kuze kube sikhumbuto.
nemigaco yegolide lecengekile lephotsene njengentsambo leyelukiwe, bese uyibophela emiphetfweni.”
Kufanele siphindvwe kabili, khona sitewuba sikhwama lesilingene ndzawo tonkhe, budze baso bube ngemasentimitha langaba ngema-22, nebubanti lobungemasentimitha langaba ngema-22.
Unamatsisele kuso imigca lemine yematje laligugu; emgceni wekucala unamatsisele isadiyusi, nethophazi, nerubhi;
emgceni wesibili unamatsisele simaragidu, nesafire, nedayimani;
emgceni wesitsatfu unamatsisele ihiyakinte, ne-agathe, ne-amethiste;
emgceni wesine unamatsisele ikhrisolithe, ne-oniksi, nejasiphi. Lamatje kufanele ephetfwe ngegolide.
Kufanele kube nematje lali-12, ngulelo nalelo litje libe nelibito lendvodzana ya-Israyeli; ngulelo nalelo litje libekwe luphawu ngekusikwa kwelibito lesive setive letili-12 taka-Israyeli.
Lesembatfo sesifuba kufanele usentele imigaco yegolide lecengekile lephotsene njengentsambo leyelukiwe.
Lesembatfo sesifuba kufanele usentele emajiva lamabili egolide, uwacoboshele kulamakona lamabili langetulu.
Uyawubophela lemigaco lemibili yegolide kulamajiva lamabili lasemakoneni alesembatfo sesifuba.
Letinye tihloko talemigaco kufanele utibophele kulemiphetfo lemibili, ngalendlela titawuba ngembili emichilweni yemahlombe yalesidziya.
Ubenta emajiva lamabili egolide uwatfungele kulamakona lamabili langentansi ngaphansi kulesembatfo sesifuba, ngekhatsi macondzana nesidziya.
Wente lamanye emajiva lamabili egolide uwatfungele ngaphansi kulemichilo lemibili yesidziya ngembili kwaso, eceleni kwemtfungo, ngetulu kwalelibhande lelelukwe kahle.
Bopha lamajiva lasesembatfweni sesifuba uwahlanganise nalamajiva esidziya ngentsambo leluhlata njengesibhakabhaka. Loko kutakwenta sembatfo sesifuba sibe ngetulu kwelibhande singaceki.
“Ngesikhatsi Aroni angena endzaweni lengcwele utabokwembatsa lesembatfo sesifuba lesinemabito emadvodzana aka-Israyeli, khona atawubokhumbuleka njalo nje kuSimakadze.
Kulesembatfo sesifuba sekwehlulela ubofaka i-Urimu neThumimu,
Lomjiva kufanele ube nembobo yekufaka inhloko; lembobo kufanele yephetfwe ngekugocotwa, bese iyatfungwa khona ingetiwudzabuka.
Emphetfweni wawo ngaphansi kufanele uwuhlobise ngemahananandza
Kufanele kube nelihananandza lilandzelwe yinsimbi yegolide wonkhe umphetfo wemjiva.
“Aroni kufanele embatse lomjiva njalo nje nakakhonta njengemphristi, nangena endzaweni lengcwele eme embikwaSimakadze nome aphuma, letinsimbi titabovakala tikhala, khona angetikufa.
Longcwengcwe ubombophela ngembili kulomshuculo wenhloko ngentsambo leluhlata njengesibhakabhaka.
Aroni kufanele akufake ebuntini lakhe, khona atekutsatsa onkhe emaphutsa esive sema-Israyeli lababe nawo, khona iminikelo yabo itekwamukeleka, nome ngabe bebonile ekunikeleni ngayo.
“Ingubo ya-Aroni lengenamkhono uboyitfunga ngendvwangu yelineni lecolisakele, nalomshuculo wenhloko uwente ngendvwangu yelineni lecolisakele kanye nelibhande lekufanele lihlotjiswe.
“Ubenta tingubo letingenamkhono nemabhande, nemishuculo yenhloko, wentele emadvodzana a-Aroni, khona atewuba nesitfunti ahlonipheke.
Letimphahla ubotembatsisa umnakenu Aroni nemadvodzana akhe. Ubobagcoba ngemafutsa emncumo, ungehlukanisele bona babe ngcwele bangene esigabeni sekungikhonta njengebaphristi.
“Kufanele ubentele imibekelo yelineni kusukela elukhalweni kuze kufike ematsangeni, khona batewufihla bungcunu babo.
Aroni nemadvodzana akhe kufanele batifake njalo nje nabaya ethendeni lekuhlangana nome beta kutekungikhonta elatini endzaweni lengcwele, khona bangetiwubulawa ngenca yekona ngebungcunu babo.
“Lona-ke ngumyalo wa-Aroni netitukulwane takhe kuze kube phakadze naphakadze.”
Sebentisa sinkhwa lesite imbiliso, nemipotongwane lete imbiliso lahlanganiswe nemafutsa, kanye nemacebelengwane lagcotjiswe ngemafutsa; konkhe loko kwentiwe ngemphuphu yakolo lecolisakele.
Konkhe loko ukufake esitjeni ukunikele kimi kanye nalenkunzana naletihhanca letimbili.
Ubobe sewembatsisa Aroni ngaletembatfo takhe tebuphristi: ingubo lete imikhono, nesidziya, nemjiva longetulu kwesidziya, nesembatfo sesifuba kanye nelibhande.
Ubomfaka lomshuculo wenhloko, ucoboshele kuwo loluphawu lwebungcwele lolungungcwengcwe lobhalwe kutsi: ‘Kwehlukaniselwe Nkulunkulu’.
Ubotsatsa lamafutsa emgcobo, uwatsele enhloko yakhe, umgcobe ngawo.
“Ubobe sewuletsa emadvodzana akhe, uwagcokise letingubo letingenamkhono,
uwabophe ngemabhande etinkhalweni tawo, uwafake nemishuculo etinhloko. Utamgcoba kanjalo-ke Aroni kanye nemadvodzana akhe. Bona netitukulwane tabo bayawuba baphristi bami phakadze naphakadze.
Lenkunzana uboyihlabela embikwaSimakadze, ekungeneni kwelithende lekuhlangana.
Ubotsatsa litsantana lalengati ngemuno ulibhoce etimphondvweni telilati; lengati lesele uyitsele esisekelweni selilati.
Emvakwaloko tsatsa onkhe lamanoni lembese kwangekhatsi, nemanoni lambonye sibindzi, nemanoni lembese tinso totimbili kanye nato, bese ukushisela etikwelilati.
Kodvwa inyama yalenkunzana, nesikhumba sayo, nemswane wayo ukushisele ngephandle kwenkambu, ngobe kungumnikelo wesono.
Sihlabe, utsatse ingati yaso uyifafate ndzawo tonkhe kutungeleta lilati.
Usisike ngekusihlahlela sibe ticucu; ugeze kwangekhatsi kwaso kanye nemilente yaso, ukubeke ndzawonye neticucu, nenhloko yaso.
Sonkhe lesihhanca usishisele etikwelilati sibe ngumnikelo wekushiswa kuSimakadze. Lelo liphunga lelinuka lusi lolumnandzi kuSimakadze, umnikelo lowentiwa ngemlilo kuSimakadze.

Sihlabe, utsatse litsantana lengati yaso ubhoce lihwandza lendlebe ya-Aroni yangesekudla, uphindze ubhoce emahwandza etindlebe tangesekudla temadvodzana a-Aroni, uphindze ubhoce netitfupha tangesekudla, uphindze ubhoce naboqukulu bangesekudla, lengati letawusala uboyifafata ndzawo tonkhe kutungeleta lilati.
Ubotsatsa lengati leselatini kanye nemafutsa emgcobo ufafate bo-Aroni nemadvodzana akhe kanye netingubo tabo; ngaloko bo-Aroni nemadvodzana akhe batawube sebanikelwe kimi kanye netingubo tabo.

“Kulesihhanca ubosika konkhe lokungemanoni: umsila, nemanoni lasetibilinini, nemanoni lambonye sibindzi, nemanoni lambonye tinso totimbili kanye nato letinso, nemlente wangesekudla; ngobe lesihhanca semgcobo.
Kulesitja lesinetinkhwa letite imbiliso letisembikwaSimakadze, ubotsatsa sinkhwa sibe sinye, nempotongwane munye wesinkhwa lesinemafutsa, nelicebelengwane libe linye.
Konkhe lokudla kwetfule etandleni ta-Aroni nasetandleni temadvodzana akhe, bakujikitisele kimi njengemnikelo lojikitiselwe kuSimakadze.
Ubobe sewuyakutsatsa kubo ukushisele etikwemnikelo wekushiswa loselatini. Lelo liphunga lelinuka lusi lolumnandzi kuSimakadze, umnikelo lowentiwa ngemlilo kuSimakadze.
“Ubotsatsa umganga walesihhanca sekugcotjwa kwa-Aroni uwujikitisele kuSimakadze; kube ngumnikelo wekujikitiswa. Lomganga-ke usabelo sakho.

“Kufanele ungehlukanisele umganga lonikelwe ngekujikitiswa, nemlente lonikelwe ngekujikitiswa; yebo, wona lowo mganga nemlente lonikelwe ngekujikitiswa ngesikhatsi kugcotjwa bo-Aroni kanye nemadvodzana akhe.

Loko kutawuhlala kusabelo sa-Aroni nemadvodzana akhe ngesimiso saphakadze kuma-Israyeli. Njalo nje nakwentiwa umnikelo wekuthula, umganga nemlente kuyawuba kwebaphristi. Leso-ke sipho sebantfu labasinika mine, Simakadze.
“Tembatfo ta-Aroni letingcwele tiyawuba temadvodzana akhe, nasafile; ayawutembatsa nasagcotjiwe.
Indvodzana ya-Aroni leyawumlandzela itsatse inkonzo yebuphristi iyawutembatsa emalanga lasikhombisa, nayita kutewukhonta endzaweni lengcwele lesethendeni lekuhlangana.
“Ubotsatsa lenyama yesihhanca semgcobo wa-Aroni nemadvodzana akhe uyiphekele endzaweni lengcwele.
Bo-Aroni nemadvodzana akhe baboyidla kanye nesinkhwa lesisesitjeni, ekungeneni kwelithende lekuhlangana.
Loko bekukwemsimeto wenhlawulo nabagcotjwa, banikelwa, kubodliwa ngibo bodvwana; longesiye umphristi angakudli, ngobe kungcwele.
Nakwenteka lenyama yemgcobo, nome sinkhwa kusala kuze kube ngakusasa ekuseni, ubobe sewukushisa ngemlilo loku lokulibhadlela. Akukafaneli kudliwe, ngobe kungcwele.
“Lemisimeto yemgcobo uboyenta ku-Aroni nakumadvodzana akhe njengobe ngikuyalile, iyawutsatsa emalanga lasikhombisa.
Onkhe emalanga ubonikela ngenkunzi ibe ngumnikelo wetono, khona titawutsetselelwa; ngekwenta njalo utawuhlambulula lilati, uligcobe ngemafutsa ulingcwelise bese uyalinikela.
Loku ubokwenta onkhe lamalanga lasikhombisa. Lelilati litawuba ngcwele ngalokuphelele; lowo nome loko lokulitsintsako kutawulinyatwa ngemandla ebungcwele balo.”
Lizinyane lelinye utabolinikela ekuseni, lelinye ulinikele entsambama nakushona lilanga.

Lelizinyane lelitabonikelwa ekuseni libohambisana nemphuphu yakolo locolisakele leyikhilogremu yinye, lebhicwe nelitha yinye yemafutsa emncumo. Utsele ilitha yinye yeliwayini ibe ngumnikelo wesinatfo.

Niyawunikela leli lelinye lizinyane entsambana kanye nalowo mnikelo walokutinhlavu nemnikelo wawo wesinatfo njengasekuseni. Lelo liphunga lelinuka lusi lolumnandzi kuSimakadze, umnikelo lowentiwa ngemlilo kuSimakadze.
Ngitabohlangana lapho nema-Israyeli; lendzawo bese ingcweliswa yinkhatimulo yami.
“Lelithende lekuhlangana nelilati ngitawukungcwelisa; bo-Aroni nemadvodzana akhe ngitabehlukanisela inkonzo yekuba baphristi.
Ngitawuhlala emkhatsini wema-Israyeli, ngibe nguNkulunkulu wabo.
Bayawukwati kutsi nginguSimakadze longuNkulunkulu wabo, lowabakhipha eveni laseGibhithe, ngentela kuhlala emkhatsini wabo. NginguSimakadze longuNkulunkulu wabo.”
Kufanele libe nemihlubulo lelinganako: libe ngemasentimitha langaba ngema-45 imihlubulo, nemasentimitha langaba ngema-90 kuphakama. Timphondvo temakona alo omane kufanele tibe yintfo yinye nalo.
Kufanele uyembese ngegolide lecengekile yomine imihlubulo, ngetulu nangaphansi kanye netimphondvo talo; ulephetse ngegolide ndzawo tonkhe.
Yenta emajiva egolide ekuletfwala abe mabili, uwashayele ngaphansi kwemphetfo emihlubulweni ngala nangale, lapho nitawufaka khona timboko tekuletfwala.
Lelilati ubolibeka embikwendvwangu levimbele libhokisi lesivumelwane lelinesihlalo semusa etikwalo, lapho ngitabohlangana nawe khona.
“Aroni utaboshisa imphepho lenuka kamnandzi, njalo nje ekuseni nakalungisa letibane.
Aroni kufanele aphindze akwente loko njalo nje embikwaSimakadze entsambana, nakakhanyisa tibane; lomnikelo wemphepho uyakwentiwa kuSimakadze njalo nje titukulwane ngetitukulwane.
Ungacali unikele etikwalo ngemphepho lengemukeleki, nome umnikelo wekushiswa nome umnikelo walokutinhlavu, ungacali utsele umnikelo weliwayini etikwalo.

Kanye ngemnyaka Aroni abenta inkonzo yekubuyisana kuSimakadze, ayentele etimphondvweni totine telilati; leyo nkonzo yekuhlawulela tono ngemnikelo wengati, iyakwentiwa njalo nje kanye ngemnyaka. Loko niyawukwenta titukulwane ngetitukulwane. Lelilati kufanele libe ngcwele lehlukaniselwe mine, Simakadze.”
“Nawenta lubalo lwema-Israyeli, ngulowo nalowo kufanele akhiphe inhlawulo yemphilo yakhe ngesikhatsi ubabala, khona angetikwehlelwa sishayo, nasangene elubalweni.
Ngulowo nalowo muntfu lowewelela kulabo lesebabaliwe kufanele akhiphe imali lekalwe nalejutjwe ngalokusemtsetfweni,
Wonkhe longenile kulolubalo losukela eminyakeni lengema-20 budzala kuye etulu kufanele awukhiphe lomnikelo waSimakadze.
Lonjingile akufanele akhokhiswe ngetulu, nalophuyile akukafaneli akhokhiswe ngaphansi kwalemali, lekuyinhlawulo yetimphilo tenu kuSimakadze.

Lemali leyinhlawulo uboyibutsa kuma-Israyeli, uyisebentise ekuchubeni nasekusekeleni inkonzo yelithende lekuhlangana. Lemali ngeyekuhlenga timphilo tabo, khona mine, Simakadze, ngitabokhumbula kuphephisa sive saka-Israyeli.”
“Yenta umgezelo welitfusi, kanye netibunu tawo letilitfusi, ube wekugezela. Ubowubeka emkhatsini welithende lekuhlangana nelilati, utsele emanti kuwo.
Aroni nemadvodzana akhe kufanele bageze kuwo tandla netinyawo tabo.
Ngaphambi kwekuba bangene ethendeni lekuhlangana nome nabasondzela elatini kutewufeza inkonzo yabo yekushisa umnikelo ngemlilo kuSimakadze, kufanele bageze kulamanti. Nabangakagezi batakufa.
Kufanele bageze tandla tabo netinyawo tabo, khona bangetikufa. Lona ngumyalo nemtsetfo labatawugcina bona netitukulwane tabo kuze kube phakadze naphakadze.”
“Tsatsa tinongo leticolisakele, emakhilogremu langaba sitfupha emure lemanti, nemakhilogremu langaba matsatfu esinamoni lenuka kamnandzi, nemakhilogremu langaba matsatfu ekalamu,
nemakhilogremu langaba sitfupha ekhasiya; konkhe kukalwe ngesikalo lesisemtsetfweni. Ubengeta emalitha langaba mane emafutsa emncumo,
bese wakha ngato emafutsa langcwele emgcobo, lahlanganiswe aba ngemakha, uwente njengengcweti yalomsebenti.
Ubowasebentisa ekugcobiseni ngawo lelithende lekuhlangana, nelibhokisi lesivumelwane,
nelitafula, netimphahla letihambisana nalelitafula, nelutsi lwetibane, netimphahla letihambisana nalolutsi lwetibane, nelilati lekushisa imphepho,
nelilati lekushisa iminikelo, netimphahla letihambisana nalelilati, nemgezelo kanye nesibunu sawo.
Tonkhe letimphahla ubotinikela, khona titewuba ngcwele ngalokuphelele; loko lokutitsintsako kutawulinyatwa bungcwele bato.
Ubogcoba bo-Aroni nemadvodzana akhe babe ngcwele, khona batewungikhonta njengebaphristi bami.
Ubokhuluma kuma-Israyeli utsi: ‘Lamafutsa ami langcwele emgcobo niyakuwasebentisa kuto tonkhe titukulwane tenu.
Akukafaneli atselwe emitimbeni yebantfu nje, futsi kufanele ningawakhi lamanye ngaletilinganiso talawa; angcwele, futsi nibowatsatsa ngekutsi vele angcwele.
Nangabe kungaba khona lowakha lafana nawo nome awasebentise kulomunye longesiye umphristi, uyawuncunywa esiveni sakubo.’ ”
Tihlanganise ndzawonye njengengcweti yalomsebenti, utente tibe yimphepho yemakha lanongwe ngeluswayi, khona itawuba ngulehlantekile nalengcwele.
Lenye yayo uboyisila icolisakale, bese uyifaka ethendeni lekuhlangana uyifafate embikwelibhokisi lesivumelwane, lapho ngihlangana khona nawe. Lemphepho uboyiphatsa uyente ibe ngcwele.
Ningacali nente imphepho ngayo lendlela nangaletilinganiso; kini itawuba ngcwele, inikelwe kuSimakadze.
Lowo lowenta emakha lafanana nawo uyawuncunywa esiveni sakubo.”
“Bheka, ngitikhetsele Besaleli, umsa wa-Uri, lotalwa nguHure, wesive sakaJuda;
ngamgcwalisa ngaMoya waNkulunkulu. Ngimuphe likhono nekuhlakanipha, nelwati emisebentini yonkhe yebungcweti:
kutsi akwati kwenta tinhlobonhlobo temihlobiso ngegolide, nesiliva, nelitfusi,
nekucopha nekufaka ematje laligugu, nekubata lugodvo, nekwenta nome ngabe ngumuphi umsebenti webungcweti.
Ngetulu kwaloko ngikhetse na-Oholiyabi, umsa wa-Ahisamaki, wesive sakaDani, kutsi asebente naye. Bonkhe laba labanelikhono nabo ngibengetele, khona batewukwati kwenta loku lengikuyale ngako:
lithende lekuhlangana, nelibhokisi lesivumelwane, nesihlalo semusa, netimphahla tonkhe telithende,
nelitafula, netimphahla letihambisana nalo, nelutsi lwetibane lolwentiwe ngegolide lecengekile, netimphahla letihambisana nalo, nelilati lemphepho,
nelilati lemnikelo wekushiswa kanye netimphahla letihambisana nalo, nemgezelo, nesibunu sawo,
netembatfo letihlotjiswe kahle ta-Aroni, umphristi, kanye netemadvodzana akhe tekutsi batembatse nabenta inkonzo yabo yebuphristi,
nemafutsa emgcobo, nemphepho lenuka kamnandzi yendzawo lengcwele. Konkhe loku bafanele bakwente njengobe ngikuyalile.”
“Khuluma kuma-Israyeli utsi ngitsi: ‘Gcinani emaSabatha ami, loku kuyawuba luphawu emkhatsini wenu nami titukulwane ngetitukulwane, kuze nati kutsi nginguNkulunkulu wenu loningcwelisako.
Niyawusebenta emalanga lasitfupha, kodvwa lilanga lesikhombisa liSabatha lekuphumula, lingcwele kuSimakadze; wonkhe umuntfu losebentako ngalo kufanele abulawe.
Ngako-ke ema-Israyeli leliSabatha kufanele aligcine titukulwane ngetitukulwane kube sivumelwane saphakadze naphakadze.
Liluphawu lwaphakadze naphakadze emkhatsini wema-Israyeli nami, kutsi ngemalanga lasitfupha Simakadze wadala lizulu nemhlaba, kwatsi ngelilanga lesikhombisa waphumula emsebentini wakhe.’ ”
Batsi kube bantfu babone kutsi Mosi sewutsetse sikhatsi lesidze angasehli entsabeni, babutsana ndzawonye beta ku-Aroni bakhuluma kuye batsi: “Kota, usentele nkulunkulu
Aroni wakhuluma kubo watsi: “Khumulani lamacici egolide lasetindlebeni tebafati benu, netemadvodzana enu, netemadvodzakati enu, niwaletse lapha kimi.”
Ngako bonkhe bantfu bakhipha emacici abo etindlebeni tabo, bawaletsa ku-Aroni.
Wawatsatsa wawancibilikisa, wase ubumba litfole lelidvuna legolide.
Bantfu bamemeta batsi: “Israyeli! Nangu-ke nkulunkulu wakho
Watsi kube Aroni akubone loku, wase wakha lilati embikwalelitfole, wamemetela watsi: “Kusasa kutawuba nesibhimbi sekudvumisa Simakadze.”
Ngakusasa bavuka ekuseni ngeluvivi baletsa iminikelo yekushiswa kanye neminikelo yekuthula. Bantfu bahlala phansi, badla, banatsa, basukuma badlala.
Sebaphambuke ngekushesha kuloko lengabayala ngako; sebancibilikise igolide benta litfole lelidvuna. Balikhotsamela balikhonta, badzimate batsi: ‘Israyeli! Nangu-ke nkulunkulu wakho
Simakadze wachubeka wakhuluma kuMosi watsi: “Sengibabonile labantfu kutsi basive lesinentsamo lelukhuni.
Ngako-ke ase ungiyekele kutsi lulaka lwami lutewubahashula lubabhubhise. Wena-ke ngitakwenta ube sive lesikhulu.”

Pho, kudzingeke ngani kutsi emaGibhithe abe asatsi: ‘Wabakhipha ngebucili eGibhithe wabe sewubabulala ngekubacitsa ebusweni bemhlaba baphelela etintsabeni bonkhe’? Mane uluyekele lulaka lwakho loluvutsako, ucole, ungasehliseli imbhubhiso lesive sakho.

Khumbula Abrahama, na-Isaka, na-Israyeli, tinceku takho, lowafunga kuto ngelibito lakho watetsembisa, watsi: ‘Ngiyawunandzisa, titukulwane tenu tibe ngangetinkhanyeti tesibhakabhaka. Lelive lenginitsembisa lona ngiyawulipha titukulwane tenu, liyawuba ngelabo phakadze naphakadze.’ ”
Ngako Simakadze wagucula umcondvo wakhe, wangabe asababhubhisa bantfu bakhe.
Letibhelekeca tematje tatibatwe nguNkulunkulu, tabhalwa nguye ngekuticopha ngesandla sakhe.
Joshuwa watsi kube eve bantfu bamemeta, wakhuluma kuMosi watsi: “Kunemsindvo wemphi enkambu.”
Mosi waphendvula watsi: “Loko akufanani nemsindvo wekuncoba nome kukhala kwekwehlulwa, kodvwa ngiva kungumsindvo wekuhlabela.”
Watsatsa lelitfole lelase lakhiwe, walishisa ngemlilo, waligaya, lacolisakala laba yimphuphu, walibhuca ngemanti, watsi onkhe ema-Israyeli akalinatse.
Wakhuluma ku-Aroni watsi: “Labantfu benteni kuwe, uze ubaholele kulesono lesikhulu kangaka?”
Aroni waphendvula watsi: “Ungangitfukutseleli, nkhosi yami, nawe uyati kutsi labantfu babutsambele kanjani bubi.
Mine ngatsi kubo: ‘Wonkhe lonegolide akayiletse lapha kimi.’ Ngako banginika igolide, ngayifaka emlilweni, kwase kuphuma nali litfole lelidvuna.”
Mosi wabona kutsi bantfu sebangumhlambi kazelusile, ngobe Aroni abesabayekelele batentela matsandza, batihlazisa ngisho nasembikwetitsa tabo.
Mosi wema esangweni lenkambu wamemeta watsi: “Lowo longakuSimakadze akete lapha kimi.” Onkhe emadvodzana aLevi abutsana ndzawonye eta kuye.

Wakhuluma kuwo watsi: “Simakadze longuNkulunkulu wa-Israyeli utsi: ‘Ngulowo nalowo emkhatsini wenu akatsatse inkemba yakhe, angene ngalelisango adzimate ayewuphuma ngale, ahambe abulala bomnakabo, nebangani bakhe, nabomakhelwane bakhe.’ ”
EmaLevi enta njengekusho kwaMosi, abulala emadvodza labengaba ti-3 000 ngalelo langa.
Mosi wakhuluma kumaLevi watsi: “Lamuhla senitehlukanisele Simakadze ngentsengo yekubulala lowo nalowo indvodzana yakhe nemnakabo. Ngako-ke lamuhla sewunibusisile.”

Ngakusasa Mosi wakhuluma kubantfu, watsi: “Nente sono lesikhulu lesesabekako. Kodvwa sengitakwenyuka ngiye kuSimakadze entsabeni; mhlawumbe nginganentela inhlawulo yekubuyisana kuSimakadze ngalokona kwenu.”
Ngako Mosi wancandzeka wabuyela kuSimakadze, wafike watsi: “Labantfu sebatentele sono lesikhulu lesesabekako. Sebente nkulunkulu
Kodvwa ngiyakucela umane ubatsetselele; nangabe awubatsetseleli, kuncono nami wesule libito lami encwadzini yakho loyibhalile.”
Simakadze wamphendvula watsi: “Ngulowo lowonile kimi lengiyakwesula libito lakhe encwadzini yami.
Hamba-ke uyewuhola labantfu ubayise kulendzawo lengikhulume ngayo kuwe, ingilosi yami itawuhamba embikwakho. Kodvwa siyeta sikhatsi lapho ngitawubajezisa ngenca yekona kwabo.”
Ngako Simakadze watfumela sifo kubantfu, ngobe babecindzetele Aroni kutsi ababumbele litfole legolide.
Ngitawutfumela ingilosi yami ihambe embikwenu ngikhiphe emaKhenani, nema-Amori, nemaHethi, nemaPheresi, nemaHivi, nemaJebhusi.
Hambani niye kulelive leligcwele lubisi neluju lwetinyosi; kodvwa mine ngingeke ngihambe nani ngenca yebulukhuni benhloko yenu; ngingahle nginibhubhise nonkhana endleleni.”
Batsi kube bantfu beve onkhe lamavi labuhlungu, bakhala bonkhe, bayikhumula imihlobiso yabo.

Simakadze wakhuluma kuMosi, watsi: “Khuluma kulama-Israyeli utsi ngitsi: ‘Nine nibantfu labanenhlitiyo lelukhuni; nangingake ngihambe nani umzuzu ube munye nje, nginganibhubhisa niphele nya. Khumulani lemihlobiso yenu, khona ngitanitjela kutsi ngitakwentani ngani!’ ”
Ngako batsi kube batfutse eNtsabeni iSinayi abaphindzanga bayegabe imihlobiso futsi.

Mosi abevame kumisa lithende ngephandle kwenkambu, abelibita ngekutsi lithende lekuhlangana. Ngulowo nalowo labefuna kubuta intsandvo yaSimakadze abevele aphumele ngaphandle kwenkambu ethendeni lekuhlangana.
Abetsi Mosi nakaya kulo, bonkhe bantfu bavuke, beme eminyango yemathende abo bambuke aze ayewungena kulo.
Abetsi Mosi angangena kulo, bese kwehla insika yelifu, ifike ime ekungeneni kwalelithende lekuhlangana, bese-ke Simakadze ukhuluma naMosi.
Bonkhe bantfu babetsi bangayibona lensika yelifu ime ekungeneni kwelithende lekuhlangana bakhotsame, bakhonte, ngulowo nalowo emnyango welithende lakhe.
Simakadze abekhuluma naMosi buso nebuso, njengemuntfu akhuluma nemngani wakhe.
Mosi nasabuyele enkambu, lelibhungu lelalingumsiti wakhe, lelalinguJoshuwa, umsa waNuni, lalisala lingesuki kulelithende lekuhlangana.

Mosi wakhuluma kuSimakadze, watsi: “Wena watsi kimi: ‘Khipha labantfu,’ kodvwa awuzange ungilayele kutsi utangitfuma nabani. Yebo, washo kona kimi watsi: ‘Ngiyalati libito lakho, futsi uzuze umusa emehlweni ami.’

Ngako-ke, nangabe ngizuze umusa emehlweni akho, ngiyakucela kutsi ungikhombise tindlela takho, kuze wena ngikwati kahle, ngichubeke kuzuza umusa emehlweni akho. Ukhumbule futsi kutsi labantfu basive sakho.”
Simakadze wamphendvula watsi: “Ngiyawuhamba nawe, ngikuphe kuphumula.”
Mosi waphendvula watsi: “Nangabe ungeke uhambe natsi, ungacali usitfutse lapha.

Nawungahambi natsi, kutawubonakala kanjani kutsi ngizuze umusa emehlweni akho, mine nalesive sakho? Kuhamba kwakho nami nalesive sakho ngiko lokufanele kusente sehluke emkhatsini wetive tonkhe temhlaba.”
Simakadze wakhuluma kuMosi, watsi: “Ngitakwenta loku lokushito, ngobe uzuze umusa emehlweni ami, futsi ngikwati kahle.”
Mosi wakhuluma watsi: “Ngicela ungikhombise inkhatimulo yebukhosi bakho.”
Kodvwa ungeke ububone buso bami, ngobe kute umuntfu longabona buso bami abuye aphile.
Buka la: kunendzawo lapha ngakimi, lapho utakuma khona, etikwalelidvwala.
Nakwendlula inkhatimulo yami, ngitakufaka lapha emkhocweni walelidvwala, ngikumbonye ngesandla sami ngesikhatsi ngendlula.
Ngitabe sengiyasisusa lesandla sami, ungibone lingemuva, kodvwa buso bami ungeke ububone.”
Tilungiselele likusasa ekuseni, wenyuke ute lapha eNtsabeni iSinayi, utewutetfula lapha kimi esicongweni sentsaba.
Ungeti namuntfu, futsi kubete umuntfu lobonakala kulentsaba yonkhe. Timvu, netimbuti, netinkhomo tingeluselwa phansi kwayo lentsaba.”

Ngako-ke Mosi watibata letibhelekeca letimbili tematje, tafanana netekucala; wavuka lokwa ngeluvivi ngakusasa wenyuka iNtsaba iSinayi aphetse leto tibhelekeca letimbili ngetandla takhe, njengobe Simakadze abemyalile.
Simakadze wehla ngelifu wema naye khona lapho, wamemeta libito laSimakadze.
Simakadze wendlula embikwakhe wamemeta watsi: “Simakadze, Simakadze, Nkulunkulu lonesihawu nemusa; uyephuta kutfukutsela andze ngemusa nangekwetsembeka,

ubentela umusa labatinkhulungwane, atsetselele emaphutsa, nalokubi, netono. Kodvwa ngingeke ngihlale ngingamjezisi lonelicala; ngijezisa bantfwana nebatukulu ngetono tebatali babo, kuze kufikele esitukulwaneni sesitsatfu nesesine.”
Mosi washeshisa wakhotsamisa inhloko yakhe akhonta.
Wakhuluma watsi: “Simakadze, nangabe ngizuze umusa emehlweni akho, ngicela kutsi uhambe natsi, nome sisive lesinenhloko lelukhuni. Tsetselela kona netono tetfu, usente sibe lifa lakho.”
Lalelani lemiyalo lengininika yona lamuhla. Ngitatidvungulula ngitikhiphe kulelive tonkhe letive: ema-Amori, nemaKhenani, nemaHethi, nemaPheresi, nemaHivi, nemaJebhusi.
Nicaphele ningenti sivumelwane nebantfu labakulelive leniya kulo, ngobe loko kungahle kube lugibe kini.
Emalati abo nibowabhidlita, nephule tinsika tawo tematje, nibhidlite konkhe kwalo-Ashera longunkulunkulukati
Ningenti ngisho nesivumelwane nalabantfu balelo live, ngobe nabagwadla ngekukhonta letithico tabo, banikele umhlatjelo kuto, batanimema bese nidla leminikelo yemihlatjelo yabo.
Emadvodzana enu ningawatsatseli bafati emadvodzakatini abo, ngobe uma labantfu sebaphinga nome bagwadla ngekukhonta letithico tabo, nalamadvodzana enu atawudvonseleka kuloko.
Litubulo lelidvuna lembongolo uyawulihlenga ngekunikela lizinyane lemvu esikhundleni salo; nangabe awulihlengi, ubolephula intsamo. Onkhe emadvodzana langematubulo uyakuwahlenga.
“Kufanele kubete lovela embikwami angakaphatsi lutfo etandleni.
Ngobe ngiyawucitsa tive embikwakho ngandzise neminyele yakho; kute loyawuhawukela live lakho, ngetikhatsi tekwenyuka kwakho katsatfu ngemnyaka nawuyekutibonakalisa kuSimakadze, longuNkulunkulu wakho.
“Ungalipheki lizinyane lembuti nome lemvu elubisini lwenina.”
Mosi wahlala naSimakadze emalanga langema-40 nebusuku bawo; abengadli anganatsi. Wawabhala kuletibhelekeca tematje emavi alesivumelwane, laba ngimiyalo lelishumi.
Watsi kube Aroni nawo onkhe ema-Israyeli babone Mosi kutsi sikhumba sebuso bakhe siyakhatimula, besaba kusondzela kuye.
Kodvwa Mosi wababita, abita Aroni nebaholi bonkhe; bancandzeka babuyela kuye, Mosi wakhuluma nabo.
Emvakwaloko onkhe ema-Israyeli asondzela kuye, wase uwanika lemiyalo labeyinikwe nguSimakadze eNtsabeni iSinayi.
Watsi kube Mosi acedze kukhuluma kubo, wabe sewumbonya buso bakhe ngendvwangu.
Njalo nje Mosi abetsi nakangena ebukhoneni baSimakadze, lendvwangu ayisuse, aze aphume. Abetsi angaphuma, awatjele ema-Israyeli konkhe labetfunywe kutsi akwente.
Ema-Israyeli abebona kutsi buso baMosi buyakhatimula, ngako Mosi abebumbonya ngendvwangu lobuso bakhe, aze aphindze angene kuyawukhuluma naSimakadze.
Mosi wasihlanganisa sonkhe sive sema-Israyeli, wakhuluma kuso watsi: “Naku-ke Simakadze laniyale ngako kutsi nikwente:

Kufanele nente imisebenti yenu emalanga lasitfupha, kodvwa lilanga lesikhombisa nilingcwelise kube liSabatha, lilanga lekuphumula, lilanga lelinikelwe kuSimakadze. Losebenta ngalelo langa kufanele abulawe.
Ningawubasi ngisho nemlilo emitini yenu ngelilanga leSabatha.”
Mosi wakhuluma kuso sonkhe sive sema-Israyeli, watsi: “Naku-ke Simakadze laniyale ngako kutsi nikwente:
Tsatselani Simakadze umnikelo kuloko leninako. Wonkhe lonenhlitiyo levumako akaletse umnikelo kuSimakadze: umnikelo wegolide, newesiliva, newelitfusi,
newensontfo leluhlata njengesibhakabhaka, nalebukhwebeletane, nalebovu ngalokutopele, newendvwangu yelineni lecolisakele, neweboya bembuti,
newetikhumba tetihhanca letishukiwe taguculwa taba bovu, newetikhumba temahhashi aselwandle, newetingodvo temgamba,
newemafutsa ekukhanyisa tibane; newetinongo temafutsa ekugcobisa, newemphepho lenuka kamnandzi,
newematje e-oniksi, nawelamanye ematje laligugu ekuhleliswa esidziyeni nasesembatfweni sesifuba semPhristi Lomkhulu.”
“Onkhe emadvodza lanelikhono lasemkhatsini wenu kufanele ente naku Simakadze latsite akwentiwe:
lithende lekukhontela, nelithende lalo, nesimbonyo salo, nemahhuka alo, netinsikabhaluko talo, nemakabha alo, netinsika talo, nemaseko alo;
libhokisi lesivumelwane, netimboko talo, nesimbonyo salo lesisihlalo semusa, nendvwangu levimbe libhokisi lesivumelwane;
litafula netimboko talo, nako konkhe lokuhambisana nalo, nesinkhwa sebukhona;
lutsi lwetibane kanye netimphahla letihambisana nalo, netibane kanye nemafutsa ekukhanyisa tibane;
nelilati lemphepho, netimboko talo, nemafutsa ekugcoba, nemphepho lenuka kamnandzi, nendvwangu lelengiswa ekungeneni kwelithende lekukhontela;
nelilati lemnikelo wekushiswa, nemhlobiso walo welitfusi losasisefo, netimboko talo, netimphahla letihambisana nalo, nemgezelo nesibunu sawo,
netindvwangu tesibuya, netinsika taso, kanye nemaseko ato, nendvwangu lelengiswa emnyango wesibuya,

netembatfo letihlotjiswe kahle letisetjentiswa ekukhonteni endzaweni lengcwele, lekutembatfo letingcwele ta-Aroni, umphristi, kanye netembatfo temadvodzana akhe labatisebentisa nabenta inkonzo yabo yebuphristi.”

Ngulowo nalowo lonelikhono kanye nabo bonkhe labatsintseka etinhlitiyweni nasemoyeni wabo baletsa umnikelo kuSimakadze wekutsi usetjentiswe ethendeni lekuhlangana nasekukhonteni kanye nasekwelukeni tembatfo letingcwele.

Beta bonkhe lababenetinhlitiyo letivumako, labadvuna nalabasikati: baletsa tonkhe tinhlobo temhlobiso, letatentiwe ngegolide, baletsa ticobosho temhlobiso, nemacici, netindandatho, nebuhlalu bekwegaba. Bonkhe baletsa igolide yabo, kwaba ngumnikelo wekujikitiswa kuSimakadze.

Bonkhe labo lababenensontfo leluhlata njengesibhakabhaka, nalebukhwebeletane, nalebovu ngalokutopele, nendvwangu yelineni lecolisakele, neboya bembuti, netikhumba tetihhanca letishukiwe taguculwa taba bovu, netikhumba temahhashi aselwandle, bakuletsa.
Bonkhe labo lababenemandla ekunikela ngesiliva nangelitfusi bakuletsa, kwaba ngumnikelo kuSimakadze, bonkhe lababenemgamba lewawungaba lusito bakuletsa.
Bonkhe labasikati lababenelikhono lekwephotsa baletsa insontfo leluhlata njengesibhakabhaka, nalebukhwebeletane, nalebovu ngalokutopele, netindvwangu telineni lecolisakele.
Bonkhe labasikati lababenetinhlitiyo letitsintsekile lababenelikhono bephotsa boya betimbuti.
Baholi baletsa ematje layi-oniksi nalamanye ematje laligugu kutsi atewufakwa esidziyeni nasesembatfweni sesifuba,
netinongo, nemafutsa ekukhanyisa, newekugcoba, newemphepho lenuka kamnandzi.
Onkhe ema-Israyeli, labadvuna nalabasikati, lababenetinhlitiyo letivumako tekunikelela wonkhe lomsebenti, Simakadze labeyale Mosi kutsi awente, bakuletsa kuSimakadze, kwaba ngumnikelo wesihle.
Nkulunkulu umgcwalise ngaMoya wakhe; wamupha likhono, nekuhlakanipha, nelwati emisebentini yonkhe yebungcweti,
kutsi akwati kwenta tinhlobonhlobo temihlobiso ngegolide, nangesiliva, nangelitfusi,
nekusika ematje, nekubata lukhuni, nekwenta nome ngabe ngumuphi umsebenti webungcweti.
Simakadze uphe yena na-Oholiyabi, umsa wa-Ahisamaki, wesive sakaDani, kutsi bakwati kufundzisa labanye bantfu.

Ubaphe likhono lekutsi bakwati kwenta yonkhe inhlobo yemisebenti leyentiwa ngetandla, tingcweti, nebahlobisi, nebeluki betindvwangu letelukwe ngensontfo leluhlata njengesibhakabhaka, nalebukhwebeletane, nalebovu ngalokutopele, kanye nangemitiya yelineni lecolisakele. Bayakwati kwenta yonkhe inhlobo yemsebenti, kantsi futsi bonkhe sebanebungcweti.”
“BoBesaleli, na-Oholiyabi, nawo onkhe emadvodza lanelikhono laphiwe nguNkulunkulu bungcweti nekuhlakanipha ekwakheni lendzawo lengcwele, kufanele bawente wonkhe lomsebenti njengobe Simakadze ashito.”
Mosi wabita Besaleli, na-Oholiyabi, nawo onkhe emadvodza labenelikhono nalabephiwe nguSimakadze bungcweti nekuhlakanipha nalabetimisele kuwenta lomsebenti.
Batsatsa kuMosi tonkhe timphahla tekwakha indzawo lengcwele. Letimphahla nguleto letatinikelwe ngema-Israyeli, wona abechubeka aletsa iminikelo kuMosi onkhe emalanga ekuseni.
Ngako-ke nguleyo naleyo ndvodza leyayinelikhono lekusebenta leyayakha indzawo lengcwele, yasukuma phansi yashiya umsebenti wayo,
yaya kuMosi yafike yatsi: “Labantfu sebaletse umnikelo lomnyenti kakhulu kunalowo lodzingekile emsebentini lobekatsite Simakadze awentiwe.”

Ngako-ke Mosi wakhipha lomyalo kutsi akumenyetelwe esiveni sonkhe lesasisenkambu simemetelo lesitsi: “Sale kubate muntfu loletsa umnikelo, indvodza nemfati, ningabe nisatsintsa lutfo lwendzawo lengcwele,”
ngobe loko bebakuletsile kwase kwenele kwaze kwendlula kutsi kungawucedza wonkhe lomsebenti.
Tonkhe letindvwangu tatilingana: iyinye budze yayingemamitha labengaba li-12, bubanti bungemamitha labengaba mabili.
Batitfunga ngekuhlanganisa letisihlanu taba yindvwangu yinye, naleti letinye letisihlanu batenta njalo.
Benta tinkintjo ngendvwangu leluhlata njengesibhakabhaka lapha emaphetselweni aleyo naleyo ndvwangu leseyihlanganisiwe.
Batfungela tinkintjo letingema-50 kulenye; baphindze batfungela letinye futsi taba ngangato, tacondzana nato njengekulandzelana kwato.
Base benta emahhuka egolide langema-50 ekuhlanganisa letindvwangu; ngako-ke lithende lekukhontela laba yintfo yinye.
Letindvwangu letili-11 tatilingana: iyinye indvwangu budze bayo babungemamitha labengaba li-13, bubanti bungemamitha labengaba mabili.
Batitfunga bahlanganisa letisihlanu taba yindvwangu yinye, kwase kutsi leti letisitfupha nato tahlanganiswa taba yindvwangu yinye.
Batfungela tinkintjo letingema-50 emaphetselweni alendvwangu lesekugcineni ngala. Baphindze batfungela tinkintjo letingema-50 emaphetselweni alendvwangu lesekugcineni ngale.
Benta emahhuka elitfusi langema-50 ekuhlanganisa letindvwangu, khona atekwenta lithende yintfo yinye.

Benta naletinye timbonyo letimbili, lesinye sasentiwe ngetikhumba tetihhanca letatishukwe taguculwa taze taba bovu, nalesinye saba ngetemahhashi aselwandle. Totimbili tatentelwe kuba simbonyo selithende lekuhlangana.
Leyo naleyo yayinebudze lobabungemamitha labengaba sihlanu, bubanti bungemasentimitha labengaba ngema-66,
aba netiphongwana letimbili tekuhlanganiswa. Tonkhe tinsikabhaluko talelithende lekukhontela tentiwa njalo.
Babata tinsikabhaluko letingema-20 ngaseningizimu yelithende lekukhontela,
kanye nemaseko esiliva langema-40 ngaphansi kwaleto tinsikabhaluko, emaseko lamabili ngaphansi kwaleyo nsikabhaluko ekusimisa letiphongwana.
Babata tinsikabhaluko letingema-20 ngasenyakatfo yelithende lekukhontela
kanye nemaseko elisiliva langema-40, emaseko lamabili ngaphansi kwaleyo naleyo nsikabhaluko.
Lingemuva lelithende lekukhontela lelingasenshonalanga balentela tinsikabhaluko letisitfupha.
Letinsikabhaluko letimbili betibhanciwe kusukela phansi kuze kuyewufika etulu kuhlanganiswe kulelijiva. Tinsikabhaluko letimbili letatibhanciwe kwakwakhiwe ngato emakona omabili ngalokufananako.
Ngako-ke bekunetinsikabhaluko letisiphohlongo nemaseko esiliva lali-16; emaseko lamabili abengaphansi kwaleyo naleyo nsikabhaluko.
Babata emakabha emgamba lali-15, lasihlanu aba ngewetinsikabhaluko letisemhlubulweni welithende lekukhontela,
lasihlanu aba ngewetinsikabhaluko temhlubulo lobhekene nawo, nalawa lasihlanu aba ngewetinsikabhaluko letisemhlubulweni longasenshonalanga ngemuva.
Lelikabha lelisemkhatsini lavundliswa lase lishayelwa kuletinsikabhaluko, lesuka ngala laze layawufika ngale.
Letinsikabhaluko batembesa ngegolide, bashayela kuto emajiva egolide ekufaka lamakabha awo. Nemakabha abembeswe ngegolide.
Bakha tinsika temgamba letine letatembeswe ngegolide, taba tekulengisa lendvwangu, batifaka emahhuka egolide. Base bakha emaseko lamane esiliva ekusimisa letinsika.

Umnyango walelithende lekuhlangana bawentela sivalo sendvwangu ngalokuluhlata njengesibhakabhaka, nangalokubukhwebeletane, nangalokubovu ngalokutopele, basenta nangemitiya yelineni leyayephotselwe yacolisakala; konkhe loko kwaba ngumsebenti wengcweti yetekuhlobisa.
Benta tinsika temgamba letatisihlanu nemahhuka ato; tihloko tetinsika nemakabha bakwembesa ngegolide. Benta nemaseko ato lasihlanu ngelitfusi.
Ngekhatsi nangaphandle walembesa ngegolide lecengekile; walephetsa ngegolide emaceleni.
Wenta emajiva lamane wawakhela emilenteni yalo; lamabili aba nganhlanye, nalamabili aba nganhlanye.
Wenta timboko tekuletfwala ngemgamba, nato watembesa ngegolide,
watifaka ekhatsi kwalamajiva ngala nangale kwalelibhokisi kutsi letfwalwe ngato.
Simbonyo salo lesisihlalo semusa wasenta ngegolide lecengekile; budze babungemasentimitha labengaba li-110, bubanti babungemasentimitha labengaba ngema-66.
lelinye laba ngala, lelinye laba ngale ngekugcineni kwesihlalo semusa. Wawenta aba yintfo yinye nesimbonyo.
Lamakherubhi abebhekene, abuka leso simbonyo, avule timphiko tawo engamele sihlalo semusa.
Walembesa ngegolide lecengekile, walifaka igolide emaphetselweni alo.
Wenta emaphetselo labetungeleta lelitafula anebubanti lobungangesandla.
Wenta emajiva egolide lamane ekuletfwala, wawabophela emakoneni alo omane, emilenteni yalo.
Lamajiva ekufaka timboko tekuletfwala abefakwe eceleni kwelugebhezi emaphetselweni alelitafula.
Wakha timboko tekuletfwala ngemgamba, watembesa ngegolide.
Wakha ngegolide lecengekile titja talelitafula: emapulede alo, netindzebe talo, nemajeke alo, netindishi tekuphatsa liwayini lemnikelo.
Lwalunemagala lasitfupha esicwini salo, abematsatfu ngala nangale.
Ngulelo nalelo gala lalinemihlobiso lemitsatfu lenesimo setimbali te-alimondi, letinye taba nguletisengimidvumba letinye taba ngulesetichakazile.
Lolutsi lwetibane walwenta lwaba nemihlobiso lemine letentiwa taba njengetimbali te-alimondi, letisengimidvumba nalesetichakazile.

Wenta kwaba nalesengumdvumba ngaphansi kwemagala lamabili ekucala lesuka esicwini, kwalandzela lenye lesengumdvumba ngaphansi kwemagala lamabili lalandzelako, kanjalo nakulawo lamabili ekugcina. Leto totintsatfu tacondzana nalamagala lasitfupha.
Letimbali letisengimidvumba, nalamagala, nalolutsi lwetibane kwaba sikhatsa sinye segolide lecengekile legcotjiwe.
Wenta tibane talolutsi taba sikhombisa, wenta tijubantsambo tato netitsebe tato ngegolide lecengekile.
Lutsi lwetibane nako konkhe lokuhambisana nalo wakwenta ngegolide leyayinesisindvo lesasingemakhilogremu labengaba ngema-35.
Yonkhe imihlubulo yalo netimphondvo talo wakwembesa ngetulu nangaphansi ngegolide lecengekile. Walephetsa ngegolide ndzawo tonkhe.
Wenta emajiva egolide ekuletfwala aba mabili, wawashayela ngaphansi kwemphetfo emihlubulweni ngala nangale, lapho babetawufaka khona timboko tekuletfwala.
Wenta emakona lamane aba netimphondvo lapha ngetulu, watihlanganisa taba yintfo yinye nelilati; konkhe loko kwembeswa ngelitfusi.
Tonkhe timphahla letihambisana nalelilati watakha ngelitfusi, taba nguleti: emabhodo ekucitsa umlotsa, nemafosholo, nemigezelo, netintsi tekuhloma inyama, nemakesi.
Wakha umhlobiso welitfusi losasisefo, wawakha ngekuwuvunulisa ngaphansi kwalomtsandvo welilati loselukhalweni lwalo.
Wakha emajiva lamane ekwetfwala lelilati, wawakhela emakoneni omane.
wafaka letimboko kulamajiva ngala nangale kwelilati. Lelilati lalakhiwe ngemapulango, lingekhatsi lalo lingumhubhe.
Lesibuya sasinetinsika letatingema-20, timiswe emasekweni elitfusi langema-20, emahhuka nemigcala yetinsika leyayentiwe ngesiliva.

Nangasenyakatfo lesibuya sasinjalo: sasingemamitha labengaba ngema-46 budze, letindvwangu tatilengiswe etinsikeni letingema-20 letimiswe emasekweni elitfusi labengema-20; emahhuka nemigcala yetinsika yayentiwe ngesiliva.

Ngasenshonalanga wenta sibuya setindvwangu lesasingemamitha labengaba ngema-23 budze, tindvwangu taso talengiswa etinsikeni letilishumi etikwemaseko lalishumi; emahhuka nemigcala yato yayentiwe ngesiliva.
Ngasemphumalanga lapho kwakunelisango ngakhona bubanti besibuya baba ngemamitha labengaba ngema-23.
Kulenga kwaletindvwangu ngala kwemnyango wakwenta kwaba ngemamitha labengaba sitfupha nemasentimitha labengaba ngema-60 bubanti, tihhukwe etinsikeni letintsatfu letisinyiswe emasekweni lamatsatfu.
Nangale kwemnyango bekulenga tindvwangu letatingemasentimitha labengaba ngema-60 bubanti; tatilengiswe etinsikeni letintsatfu letatisinyiswe emasekweni lamatsatfu.
Tonkhe letindvwangu letatitungelete lesibuya tatakhiwe ngemitiya yelineni lecolisakele.
Emaseko aletinsika abengewelitfusi, kodvwa emahhuka aletinsika nemigcala yato bekukwesiliva, netihloko taletinsika betembeswe ngesiliva. Tonkhe letinsika talesibuya tatinemigcala yesiliva.

Indvwangu yesivalo emnyangeni wesibuya yayakhiwe ngemitiya yelineni lecolisakele, ihlotjiswe ngensontfo lenembala loluhlata njengesibhakabhaka, nalobukhwebeletane, nalobovu ngalokutopele, loko kwaba ngumsebenti wengcweti yetekuhlobisa. Lendvwangu yayingemamitha labengaba yimfica bubanti, nemamitha labengaba mabili kuphakama, ilingana naletindvwangu talesibuya.
Yayilengiswe etinsikeni letine letatisinyiswe emasekweni lamane; konkhe kwakwentiwe ngelitfusi. Kodvwa emahhuka aletinsika, nalemigcala yato bekukwesiliva, netihloko taletinsika tatembeswe ngesiliva.
Tonkhe tiphunti telithende lekukhontela kanye netesibuya salo tatentiwe ngelitfusi.

Nalu luhla lwebungako betintfo letatisetjentiswa ekwakheni lithende lekukhontela laSimakadze, lapho kwakuhlala khona tibhelekeca tematje letimbili letatibhalwe imiyalo lelishumi. Mosi wayala kutsi loluhla lwetimphahla lubhalwe ngemaLevi labephetfwe ngu-Ithamari, umsa wa-Aroni, umphristi.
Besaleli, umsa wa-Uri, lotalwa nguHure, wesive sakaJuda, wakwenta konkhe loko Simakadze labekushito kuMosi.

Umsiti wakhe kwakungu-Oholiyabi, umsa wa-Ahisamaki, wesive sakaDani. Yena-ke abengumbati, nemsunguli wemihlobiso, nemhlobisi ngensontfo leluhlata njengesibhakabhaka, nalebukhwebeletane, nalebovu ngalokutopele, nangemitiya yelineni lecolisakele.
Igolide yonkhe leyayisetjentiswe ekwakheni lithende lelingcwele leyayinikelwe, yayinesisindvo lesasingemakhilogremu labengaba yinkhulungwane, ngesikalo lesisemtsetfweni.
Sisindvo sesiliva leyayikhishwa ngulabo lababebalwa sasingemakhilogremu labengaba ti-3 430 ngekwesikalo lesisemtsetfweni.
Ngulowo nalowo labengene elubalweni abekhipha sikalo lesisemtsetfweni, kusukela eminyakeni lengema-20 budzala kuye etulu: kwakungemadvodza lati-603 550 lebengenele lolubalo.

Isiliva lenesisindvo lesasingemakhilogremu labengaba ti-3 400 yasetjentiswa ekwakheni emaseko lalikhulu elithende lelingcwele kanye newendvwangu yalo. Isiliva yalelo nalelo seko yayinesisindvo lesasingemakhilogremu labengaba ngema-34.
Isiliva leyasala yayingemakhilogremu labengaba ngema-30, Besaleli wayisebentisa ekwakheni emahhuka etinsika, nasekwembeseni tihloko taletinsika kanye nemigcala yato.
Litfusi lelalinikelwe kuSimakadze lalinesisindvo lesasingemakhilogremu labengaba ti-2 425.
Litfusi walisebentisa ekwakheni emaseko elisango alelithende lekuhlangana, nelilati lelitfusi kanye nemhlobiso walo losasisefo, kanye nako konkhe lokwakuhambisana nalo,
nemaseko elisango lesibuya netiphunti tonkhe telithende lekukhontela kanye netiphunti letatitungeleta sibuya.

Bakha ngcwengcwe ngegolide, base bamsika imicwana yekwelukwa kanye nemitiya yelineni lecolisakele nensontfo leluhlata njengesibhakabhaka, nalebukhwebeletane, nalebovu ngalokutopele, umsebenti wengcweti lenebuciko.
Sidziya basenta saba nemichilo lemibili ngala nangale yekusibophela nekusihlanganisa emahlombe.

Lelibhande lelalelukiwe ngebungcweti leliselukhalweni balenta laba yintfo yinye nalesidziya, lentiwa ngemicwana yegolide, nensontfo lebukhwebeletane, naleluhlata njengesibhakabhaka, nalebovu ngalokutopele, nemitiya yelineni lecolisakele, njengobe Simakadze abeyale Mosi.
Benta ematje e-oniksi bawahlelisa bawephetsa ngegolide emaceleni, bawabhala ngekucopha emabito emadvodzana aJakobe.
Lamatje bawanamatsisela emichilweni yemahlombe yalesidziya, njengobe Simakadze abeshito kuMosi. Lamatje aba sikhumbuto ngemadvodzana aJakobe.
Imihlubulo yaso yayilingana ndzawo tonkhe, umunye wawungemasentimitha labengaba ngema-22 budze, nemasentimitha labengaba ngema-22 bubanti.
Banamatsisela kuso imigca lemine yematje laligugu; emgceni wekucala banamatsisela isadiyusi, nethophazi, nerubhi;
emgceni wesibili banamatsisela simaragidu, nesafire, nedayimani;
emgceni wesitsatfu banamatsisela ihiyakinte, ne-agathe, ne-amethiste;
emgceni wesine banamatsisela ikhrisolithe, ne-oniksi, nejasiphi. Onkhe bawanamatsisela, base bawephetsa ngegolide.
Kulelo nakulelo litje kulawa lali-12 bekubhalwe ngekucopha libito lendvodzana yaJakobe. Ngulelo nalelo litje labekwa luphawu ngekucoshwa kwelibito lesive setive letili-12 taka-Israyeli.
Sembatfo sesifuba basentela imigaco leyayephotselwe njengentsambo leyelukiwe yegolide lecengekile.
Bephetsa ngemicu lemibili yegolide, base batfungela emajiva lamabili egolide emakoneni lamabili langetulu esembatfweni sesifuba.
Lemigaco lemibili yegolide bayibophela kulamajiva lamabili lasemakoneni esembatfo sesifuba.
Letinye tihloko talemigaco batibophela kulemiphetfo lemibili, ngalendlela taba ngembili emichilweni yemahlombe.
Benta emajiva lamabili egolide bawatfungela emakoneni lamabili langaphansi kulesembatfo sesifuba, ngekhatsi macondzana nesidziya.
Benta lamanye emajiva lamabili egolide, bawatfungela ngaphansi kulemichilo lemibili yesidziya, ngembili kwaso, eceleni kwemtfungo, ngetulu kwalelibhande lelelukwe kahle.

Babopha emajiva esembatfo sesifuba bawahlanganisa nemajiva esidziya ngentsambo leluhlata njengesibhakabhaka, loko kwenta kutsi sembatfo sesifuba sibe ngetulu kwelibhande, singaceki. Konkhe loko kwentiwa njengobe Simakadze abeyale Mosi.
Imbobo yekufaka inhloko yephetfwa ngekugocotwa yatfungwa, khona ingetiwudzabuka.
Emphetfweni wawo ngaphansi bahlobisa ngekutsi batungeletise emahananandza
Bakha tinsimbi tegolide lecengekile, batitfungela emphetfweni wangaphansi kulomjiva tatungeleta, tabasemkhatsini walamahananandza.
Insimbi yalandzelwa lihananandza wonkhe umphetfo wemjiva, kuze kukhontwe ngawo, njengobe Simakadze abeyale Mosi.
nemishuculo yenhloko, netincotfo tayo, nemibekelo yendvwangu yelineni lecolisakele,
nelibhande lelelukwe ngemtiya welineni lecolisakele, nangensontfo leluhlata njengesibhakabhaka, nalebukhwebeletane, nalebovu ngalokutopele; bakuhlobisa, njengobe Simakadze abeyale Mosi.
Benta ngcwengcwe ngegolide lecengekile, umhlobiso longcwele, base babhala kuye ngekucopha emagama latsi: “Kwehlukaniselwe Nkulunkulu.”
Longcwengcwe bambophela emshuculweni ngentsambo leluhlata njengesibhakabhaka; konkhe loko bakwenta njengobe Simakadze abeyale Mosi.
Bawenta bawucedza wonkhe umsebenti wekwakha lithende lekukhontela, lekulithende lekuhlangana. Ema-Israyeli akwenta konkhe Simakadze labeyale Mosi kutsi kwentiwe.
Baletsa kuMosi lithende lekukhontela nako konkhe lokuhambisana nalo: lithende, nemahhuka, netinsikabhaluko, nemakabha, netinsika, nemaseko;
nesimbonyo setikhumba tetihhanca letishukiwe taguculwa taba bovu; nesimbonyo setikhumba temahhashi aselwandle letishukwe kahle; nendvwangu levimbe libhokisi lesivumelwane;
libhokisi lesivumelwane lelalinetibhelekeca tematje, netimboko talo, nesihlalo semusa;
litafula nako konkhe lokuhambisana nalo nesinkhwa sebukhona;
lutsi lwetibane lwegolide lecengekile netibane talo, nalokuhambisana nalo, kanye nemafutsa ekukhanyisa;
lilati legolide, nemafutsa emgcobo, nemphepho lenuka kamnandzi, nendvwangu yelisango lelithende;
lilati lelitfusi, nemhlobiso walo welitfusi losasisefo, netimboko talo, nato tonkhe timphahla letihambisana nalelilati; nemgezelo nesibunu sawo;
netindvwangu tesibuya, netinsika, nemaseko ato, nendvwangu yemnyango wesibuya, netintsambo taso, netiphunti taso; netimphahla tonkhe telithende lekukhontela, lithende lekuhlangana,

netembatfo letihlotjiswe kahle letisetjentiswa ekukhonteni endzaweni lengcwele, lekutembatfo letingcwele ta-Aroni, umphristi, kanye netembatfo temadvodzana akhe, labatisebentisa nabenta inkonzo yabo yebuphristi.
Ema-Israyeli enta konkhe njengobe Mosi abeyalwe nguSimakadze.
Mosi wakuhlola konkhe wakubukisisa, wabona kutsi kwentiwe njengobe abelayelwe nguSimakadze. Ngako-ke Mosi wase uyababusisa.
“Ngelilanga lekucala enyangeni yekucala ubomisa lithende lekukhontela, lekulithende lekuhlangana.
Ekhatsi kwalo ubobeka libhokisi lesivumelwane lelinemiyalo lelishumi, bese ulivimba ngendvwangu embikwalo.
Ubongenisa lelitafula, uhlelise kahle konkhe loko lokufanele kubekwe etikwalo. Ubongenisa nalolutsi lwetibane, bese ufaka letibane lapha kulo.
Lilati legolide lekushisela imphepho ubolibeka embikwalelibhokisi lesivumelwane, ulengise lendvwangu ekungeneni kwalelithende lekukhontela.
Embikwelithende lekukhontela ubobeka lilati lekushisela umnikelo.
Emkhatsini welithende lekuhlangana nelilati ubobeka umgezelo, uwugcwalise ngemanti.
Sibuya ubosakha, ufake nendvwangu ilenge emnyango waso.
Emvakwaloko lelilati lemnikelo wekushiswa nako konkhe lokuhambisana nako ubokugcoba ngemafutsa ukunikele kutawube sekuba ngcwele ngalokuphelele.
Umgezelo kanye nesibunu sawo nako ubokugcoba ngemafutsa ukunikele kube ngcwele.
Ubogcokisa Aroni ngetembatfo tebuphristi, bese uyamgcoba abe ngcwele, khona atewungikhonta njengemphristi.
Uboletsa nalamadvodzana akhe nawo uwagcokise tingubo tawo letingenamkhono.
Nawo lamadvodzana ubowagcoba, njengobe ugcobe uyise, khona nawo atewungikhonta njengebaphristi. Lomgcobo utawubenta babe baphristi titukulwane ngetitukulwane.”
Mosi wakwenta konkhe loko njengobe Simakadze abemyalile.
Ngako-ke ngelilanga lekucala enyangeni yekucala emnyakeni wesibili baphumile eGibhithe lithende lekukhontela lemiswa laphela.
Mosi walakha lithende lekukhontela: wabeka emaseko alo, wemisa tinsikabhaluko talo netinsika talo, wafaka nemakabha alo.
Wase uyakumbonya konkhe loko ngetimbonyo leto letehlukene, njengobe Simakadze abemyalile.
Watsatsa tibhelekeca tematje letimbili watifaka ebhokisini lesivumelwane. Wafaka letimboko kulamajiva alo, wase ulimbonya ngesihlalo semusa.
Libhokisi lesivumelwane walifaka ekhatsi ethendeni lekukhontela, walengisa indvwangu yekulifihla livalekile, njengobe Simakadze abemyalile.
Litafula walifaka ekhatsi ethendeni lekuhlangana ngasenyakatfo, ngaphandle kwendvwangu,
wabeka etikwalo sinkhwa sebukhona, njengobe Simakadze abemyalile.
Wabeka lutsi lwetibane ethendeni lekuhlangana ngaseningizimu macondzana nelitafula,
wase ukhanyisa letibane embikwaSimakadze, njengobe Simakadze abemyalile.
Lelilati legolide walibeka ethendeni lekuhlangana embikwayo lendvwangu,
wase ushisa lemphepho lenuka kamnandzi, njengobe Simakadze abemyalile.
kwase kutsi embikwalendvwangu wabeka lilati lekushisela umnikelo. Etikwalo wanikela ngemnikelo wekushiswa, nangemnikelo walokutinhlavu, njengobe Simakadze abemyalile.
Mosi, na-Aroni, nemadvodzana akhe babegezela kuwo tandla tabo netinyawo
njalo nje nabangena ethendeni lekuhlangana nome nabasondzela elatini, njengobe Simakadze abeyale Mosi.
Mosi wakha sibuya, satungeleta lithende lekukhontela nelilati ndzawo tonkhe, walengisa indvwangu emnyango wesibuya. Ngako-ke Mosi wawucedza wonkhe umsebenti.
Lifu lasibekela lithende lekuhlangana, inkhatimulo yaSimakadze yagcwalisa lithende lekukhontela.
Loko kwenta kutsi Mosi ehluleke kungena ethendeni lekuhlangana, ngobe lifu lase lilisibekele. Lithende lekukhontela lase ligcwele inkhatimulo yaSimakadze.
Lalitsi lelifu lingaphakama, ema-Israyeli atfutse ayekucaba embili.
Abengatfutsi nangabe lelifu lingakesuki etikwalelithende lekukhontela.
Kulo lonkhe luhambo lwabo lifu laSimakadze emini lalibonakala etikwalelithende lekukhontela, kutsi ebusuku libe ngumlilo lovutsako etikwalo, onkhe ema-Israyeli abuka.
Simakadze asethendeni lekuhlangana, wabita Mosi wakhuluma kuye watsi:
“Tjela sive sema-Israyeli imitsetfo lekufanele siyigcine nasiletsa imihlatjelo yekushiswa kuSimakadze.
“Nangabe umuntfu anikela ngesilwane kutsi sibe ngumhlatjelo, kufanele kube yinkunzana nome yimvu nome yimbuti.
Nangabe anikela ngesilwane kutsi sibe ngumnikelo wekushiswa, kufanele aletse inkunzana lengenasiyela. Kufanele ayinikelele ekungeneni kwelithende lekuhlangana, khona Simakadze atewumemukela.
Lowo muntfu uyawubeka sandla sakhe etikwenhloko yalomnikelo wekushiswa, khona-ke utawube sewuyemukelwa egameni lakhe kutsi umentele inhlawulo yekubuyisana.

Lenkunzana utawube sewuyayihlaba embikwaSimakadze, bese-ke baphristi labangemadvodzana a-Aroni, batsatsa lengati bayinikela kuSimakadze bayifafate yonkhe emngcengcemeni welilati ndzawo tonkhe lapha ekungeneni kwelithende lekuhlangana.
Utawube sewuyayihlinza lenkunzana, bese uyayihlahlela ibe ngemacatsa.
Emadvodzana a-Aroni, umphristi, alungise tinkhuni letisetikwelilati bese ayatokhela.
Emadvodzana a-Aroni, baphristi, babowahlela lamacatsa kanye nenhloko nemanoni alomhlatjelo etikwetinkhuni letisetikwelilati.

Lomuntfu kufanele ageze loku kwangekhatsi nemilente; umphristi bese ushisa wonkhe lomhlatjelo etikwelilati. Loku kungumnikelo wekushiswa, umnikelo lowentiwa ngemlilo, liphunga lelinuka lusi lolumnandzi kuSimakadze.
“Nangabe anikela ngemvu nome ngembuti kutsi ibe ngumnikelo wekushiswa, kufanele kube sihhanca nome siwewe lesingenasiyela.
Utawube sewusibulalela ngasenyakatfo yelilati embikwaSimakadze; emadvodzana a-Aroni, baphristi, lengati atawube asayifafata emngcengcemeni welilati ndzawo tonkhe.
Lomuntfu utawutsi angayibulala ayihlahlele, umphristi bese uhlela onkhe lamacatsa, nenhloko kanye nemanoni ayo etikwetinkhuni letivutsako letiselatini.

Lomuntfu kufanele ageze loku kwangekhatsi kwayo nemilente yayo; umphristi bese ushisa wonkhe lomhlatjelo etikwelilati. Loku kungumnikelo wekushiswa, umnikelo lowentiwa ngemlilo, liphunga lelinuka lusi lolumnandzi kuSimakadze.
“Nangabe umuntfu anikela ngetinyoni kutsi tibe ngumhlatjelo wekushiswa, kufanele kube lituba nome lizini lelivukutfu.
Umphristi utalinikela elatini ngekutsi ashwile lenhloko yalo bese uyishisela etikwelilati. Lengati yalo ayiphomphisele eceleni kwelilati.

Utalibamba ngetimphiko totimbili alidzabule ekhatsi ngaphandle kwekuhluphula timphiko talo, bese ulishisa lonkhe etikwetinkhuni letivutsako letiselatini. Loku kungumnikelo wekushiswa, umnikelo lowentiwa ngemlilo, liphunga lelinuka lusi lolumnandzi kuSimakadze.”

bese ukuletsa kumadvodzana a-Aroni labaphristi. Umphristi utawukha libinta lemphuphu kanye nemafutsa emncumo, nemphepho yawo yonkhe akushisele etikwelilati kube sikhumbuto, umnikelo lowentiwa ngemlilo, kube liphunga lelinuka lusi lolumnandzi kuSimakadaze.
Yonkhe lemphuphu lesele itawuba ya-Aroni nemadvodzana akhe; ingcwele, ngobe itsetfwe ekudleni bekunikelwe ngemlilo kuSimakadze.

“Nangabe uletsa umnikelo walokutinhlavu longumpotongwane lophekiwe, kufanele kube ngulote imbiliso, lowentiwe ngafulaha wabhicwa nemafutsa emncumo nome-ke kube ngimicatsane legcotjiswe ngalawo mafutsa.
“Nangabe lomnikelo walokutinhlavu utfoswa ngelikesi, kufanele wentiwe ngafulaha lobhicwe nemafutsa emncumo kodvwa kubete imbiliso lefakwako.
Kufanele uhleshulwe ube ticucu bese utselwa ngemafutsa. Lowo-ke ngumnikelo walokutinhlavu.
“Nangabe lomnikelo walokutinhlavu uphekwe ngelibhodo, kufanele wentiwe ngafulaha nemafutsa emncumo.
Uboletsa kuSimakadze lomnikelo walokutinhlavu lowentiwe ngaleto tintfo, uwetfule kumphristi kucala, yena-ke utawumikisa elatini.
Umphristi utawutsatsa licashana lawo libe sikhumbuto bese ulishisela elatini, kube ngumnikelo lowentiwa ngemlilo, liphunga lelinuka lusi lolumnandzi kuSimakadze.
Incenye yawo lesele iyawuba sabelo sa-Aroni nemadvodzana akhe; ingcwele kakhulu ngobe itsetfwe emnikelweni lowentiwa ngemlilo kuSimakadze.
“Konkhe lokutinhlavu lokunikelwa kuSimakadze akuyiwufakwa imbiliso; ningacali nikufake imbiliso nome luju lwetinyosi kuloko lokunikelwa kuSimakadze ngemlilo.
Niyawukuletsa kuSimakadze njengemnikelo losivuno sekwendvulelisa, kodvwa ngeke sishiselwe elatini kutsi sibe liphunga lelinuka lusi lolumnandzi kuye.
Wonkhe umnikelo wenu walokutinhlavu nibowuvanga ngeluswayi. Ningacali nilushiye luswayi lwesivumelwane saNkulunkulu eminikelweni yenu yalokutinhlavu. Kufanele niyifake luswayi yonkhe iminikelo yenu.
Nawuletsa umnikelo walokutinhlavu wesivuno sekwendvulelisa kuSimakadze, ubonikela ngako kulukhotse.
Ubengeta emafutsa emncumo kanye nemphepho; lowo ngumnikelo walokutinhlavu.
Umphristi uyawushisa incenye yalokutinhlavu ibe sikhumbuto, ayishise kanye nemafutsa, nemphepho; loko-ke ngumnikelo lowentiwa ngemlilo kuSimakadze.”

Lowo muntfu uyawubeka sandla sakhe etikwenhloko yalomnikelo wakhe, bese uwubulalela ekungeneni kwelithende lekuhlangana. Emadvodzana a-Aroni labaphristi ayawufafata ngalengati emngcengcemeni walelilati alitungelete ndzawo tonkhe.
Emnikelweni wekuthula utawuletsa umhlatjelo lowentiwa ngemlilo kuSimakadze: emanoni lembese kwangekhatsi kanye nemanoni lahlanganisa loku kwangekhatsi,
netinso totimbili, nemanoni lakuto, nemanoni lembese sibindzi, nalawo latawusuka kanye nato.
Emadvodzana a-Aroni atawushisa konkhe loko elatini kanye neminikelo yekushiswa etikwetinkhuni temlilo. Kungumnikelo lowentiwa ngemlilo, liphunga lelinuka lusi lolumnandzi kuSimakadze.
“Nangabe yimvu nome yimbuti lena lesetjentiswa emnikelweni wekuthula, ingaba yindvuna nome ibe yinsikati, kodvwa kufanele kube ngulengenasiyela.
Nangabe umuntfu anikela ngemvu, kufanele ayetfule kuSimakadze,
bese ubeka sandla sakhe etikwenhloko yalomnikelo, ayibulalele embikwelithende lekuhlangana. Emadvodzana a-Aroni ayawufafata lengati emngcengcemeni walelilati alitungelete ndzawo tonkhe.
Kulomnikelo wekuthula kufanele aletse umhlatjelo lowentiwa ngemlilo kuSimakadze: emanoni nemsila wonkhe ngekunona kwawo usikwe ekugcineni kwemgogodla, nemanoni alokungekhatsi,
netinso totimbili, nemanoni lakuto nasematsebeni, nemanoni lembese sibindzi latawusuka kanye netinso.
Umphristi utakushisela etikwelilati njengekudla, kube ngumnikelo lowentiwa ngemlilo kuSimakadze.
“Nangabe umuntfu anikela ngembuti, kufanele ayetfule kuSimakadze,
uyawubeka sandla sakhe etikwenhloko yayo ayibulalele embikwelithende lekuhlangana. Emadvodzana a-Aroni atawube asafafata lengati emngcengcemeni walelilati alitungelete ndzawo tonkhe.
Kulomnikelo naku-ke latakunikela kube ngumnikelo lowentiwa ngemlilo kuSimakadze: emanoni lembese kwangekhatsi nawo onkhe lanamatsele kuko,
netinso totimbili, nemanoni lakuto nasematsebeni, nemanoni lembese sibindzi, nalawo latawusuka kanye netinso.
Umphristi utawube sewushisa konkhe loku elatini kube ngumnikelo wemlilo, liphunga lelinuka lusi lolumnandzi. Onkhe emanoni ngewaSimakadze.
Lona kutawuba ngumtsetfo wetitukulwane ngetitukulwane tenu, nome ngukuphi lapho niyawuhlala khona: kubete lodla emanoni nengati.”
“Tjela sive sema-Israyeli utsi: ‘Nangabe umuntfu onile wephula nome ngangumuphi wemiyalo yaSimakadze, angakacondzi, kufanele ahambe ngalemitsetfo.
“ ‘Nangabe kona umphristi logcotjiwe waze wehlisela lelo cala lakhe esiveni, uyawuletsa inkunzana lengenasiyela ayinikele ibe ngumhlatjelo wesono sakhe kuSimakadze.
Lenkunzana uyayiletsa ekungeneni kwelithende lekuhlangana, abeke sandla etikwenhloko yayo, bese uyibulalela khona lapho embikwaSimakadze.
Umphristi logcotjiwe uyawube sewutsatsa lengati yalenkunzana, angene nayo ethendeni lekuhlangana.
Uyakwenya umuno wakhe kulengati, bese uyifafata embikwaSimakadze embikwendvwangu lengcwele, kuze kube kasikhombisa.

Lenye ingati umphristi uyayibhoca etimphondvweni telilati lemphepho lenuka kamnandzi embikwaSimakadze ngekhatsi kwelithende lekuhlangana. Incenye yalengati uyayitsela emasekweni elilati lemnikelo wekushiswa lelisekungeneni kwelithende lekuhlangana.
Kulenkunzana yemhlatjelo wesono uyawasusa onkhe emanoni lembese kwangekhatsi kanye nalawo lahlangene nako,
netinso totimbili, nemanoni lakuto nalasematsebeni, nemanoni lembese sibindzi kanye nalawo layawusuka kanye netinso.
Umphristi uyawutsatsa lamanoni alenkhomo awashisele elatini leminikelo yekushiswa, njengobe enta nakashisa umnikelo wekuthula.
Kodvwa uyawutsatsa sikhumba sayo, nenyama yayo yonkhe, nenhloko yayo, nemilente yayo, nekwangekhatsi kwayo, nemswane wayo.

Yonkhe lenkunzana uyawuyitsatsa aphumele nayo ngaphandle kwenkambu endzaweni lehlantekile ngekwemtsetfo, lapho kucitfwa khona umlotsa, afike akushisele khona ngemlilo wetinkhuni, etikwendvundvuma yemlotsa.
Siyawutsi singabona kutsi sonile, bese siletsa inkunzana lengenasiyela itewuba ngumhlatjelo wesono; iyakwetfulwa embikwelithende lekuhlangana.
Baholi besive bayawubeka tandla tabo etikwenhloko yayo embikwaSimakadze, bese ibulawelwa khona lapho embikwaSimakadze.
Umphristi logcotjiwe uyawutsatsa lenye yalengati angene nayo ethendeni lekuhlangana,
bese wenya umuno wakhe kulengati, ayifafate embikwaSimakadze embikwendvwangu kuze kube kasikhombisa.

Lenye ingati uyayibhoca etimphondvweni telilati lelisembikwaSimakadze ethendeni lekuhlangana. Incenye yalengati lesele uyayitsela esisekelweni selilati lemnikelo wekushiswa ekungeneni kwelithende lekuhlangana.
Onkhe lawo manoni ayo uyawatsatsa awashisele elatini.
Uyakwenta njalo nakulenkunzana njengobe entile ngaleyo nakenta ngayo umhlatjelo wesono; umphristi uyawubentela kanjalo-ke inhlawulo yekubuyisana naSimakadze, bese bayatsetselelwa.
Lenkunzana uyawube sewuyayitsatsa, aphumele nayo ngaphandle kwenkambu afike ayishisele khona, njengobe entile nakashisa umnikelo wekucala. Lona-ke ngiwo umhlatjelo wekususa sono sesive sonkhe.
“ ‘Nangabe kone umholi, waba nelicala lekwephula umyalo waSimakadze longuNkulunkulu wakhe, angakacondzi,
bese uyatiswa kutsi wonile, uyawuletsa siphongo lesingenasiyela sibe ngumnikelo wakhe wesono.
Uyawubeka sandla sakhe etikwenhloko yalembuti, bese uyibulalela lapho kubulawelwa khona tonkhe tilwane temhlatjelo wekushiswa embikwaSimakadze. Lowo ngumnikelo wesono.
Umphristi uyakwenya umuno wakhe kulengati yalesilwane, bese uyibhoca etimphondvweni telilati leminikelo yekushiswa, lena lenye ingati ayitsele esisekelweni selilati.

Uyawushisa onkhe lamanoni awashisele elatini, njengobe enta nakashisa emanoni emnikelo wekuthula; umphristi uyawumentela kanjalo-ke umholi inhlawulo yekubuyisana naSimakadze, bese lomholi uyatsetselelwa sono sakhe.
uyawutsi angatiswa kutsi wonile, bese uletsa imbutikati lengenasiyela ibe ngumnikelo waleso sono lasentile.
Uyawubeka sandla sakhe etikwenhloko yalomnikelo wesono, bese uyibulalela lapho kubulawelwa khona tonkhe tilwane temhlatjelo wekushiswa.
Umphristi uyakwenya umuno wakhe kulengati yalesilwane, bese uyibhoca etimphondvweni telilati lemihlatjelo yekushiswa, lena lenye ingati lesele ayitsele esisekelweni selilati.

Uyawube sewukhipha onkhe emanoni ayo, njengobe enta nakukhishwa emanoni kuletilwane temnikelo wekuthula. Umphristi uyawube sewuwashisela elatini, khona kutawuba liphunga lelinuka lusi lolumnandzi kuSimakadze, uyawumentela kanjalo-ke inhlawulo yekubuyisana naSimakadze, bese-ke lomuntfu uyatsetselelwa sono sakhe.
“ ‘Nangabe lomuntfu aletsa imvu, kufanele kube ngulensikati lengenasiyela.
Kufanele abeke sandla sakhe etikwenhloko yayo, bese uyayibulala njengemnikelo wesono, ayibulalele lapho kubulawelwa khona tonkhe tilwane temnikelo wekushiswa.
Umphristi uyakwenya umuno wakhe kulengati yalesilwane, bese uyibhoca etimphondvweni telilati lemnikelo wekushiswa, lena lenye ingati ayitsele esisekelweni selilati.

Uyawube sewukhipha onkhe emanoni, njengobe kwentiwa nakukhishwa onkhe emanoni kulemvu yemnikelo wekuthula; umphristi uyawushisela etikwelilati kulomnikelo lowentiwa ngemlilo kuSimakadze. Umphristi uyawumentela kanjalo-ke inhlawulo yekubuyisana naSimakadze, bese-ke lomuntfu uyatsetselelwa sono sakhe.’ ”
“ ‘Nangabe umuntfu onile ngekutsi atsi afunwa ngumtsetfo kutsi atewufakaza ecaleni, kepha angabe asafakaza ngaloko lakubonile nome lakuvile, kufanele ajeziselwe lelo cala lakhe.
“ ‘Nangabe umuntfu kwenteka angakacondzi atsintsa nome yini yemuntfu lengcolile, levamisile kumngcolisa umuntfu, unelicala laloko, nasakubonile loko lakwentile.
“ ‘Nangabe kwenteka umuntfu wafunga ngekunganaki, kwenta lokuhle nome lokubi, njengobe umuntfu afunge nome ngayini angakacabangisisi nome abengakanaki, noko unelicala, nasakubonile loko lakwentile.
“ ‘Nangabe umuntfu anelicala ngalokunye kwaloku lokubaliwe, kufanele avume lesono asho nekutsi usente kanjani.
Inhlawulo yaso kufanele kube lizinyane lelisikati, lemvu nome lembuti, kube ngumhlatjelo wesono kuSimakadze. Umphristi utamentela inhlawulo yekubuyisana kuSimakadze ngesono sakhe.

“ ‘Nangabe lomuntfu angeke akhone kukhipha lizinyane lemvu, uyawuletsa ematuba lamabili nome emazini lamabili elivukutfu kuSimakadze, kube yinhlawulo yesono: linye libe ngumnikelo wesono, lelinye libe ngumnikelo wekushiswa.
Utawaletsa kumphristi, loyawucale anikele ngaloko lokungumnikelo wesono. Uyalishwila intsamo kodvwa angayihluphuli inhloko,
bese ufafata lengati yalo emhlubulweni welilati. Incenye yalengati kufanele iphomphiselwe esisekelweni selilati. Lona-ke ngumnikelo wesono.
Leli lelinye lesibili liyawuba lemnikelo wekushiswa, njengobe kusho umtsetfo. Umphristi uyawumentela kanjalo-ke inhlawulo yekubuyisana naSimakadze, bese-ke lomuntfu uyatsetselelwa sono sakhe.

“ ‘Nangabe lomuntfu angeke akhone kukhokha ematuba lamabili nome emazini lamabili elivukutfu, kufanele aletse imphuphu lengaba yikhilogremu kutsi itewuba ngumnikelo wesono. Kufanele angayifaki emafutsa emncumo nome imphepho, ngobe ingumnikelo wesono.
Uyayiletsa kumphristi, loyawufike acaphune libinta lesandla kube sikhumbuto, bese uwushisela elatini etikweminikelo yemlilo leyetfulwe kuSimakadze; lowo-ke ngumnikelo wesono.
