uyawubala intsengo yayo, kuye ngekutsi kusele mingaki iminyaka kufike lowo Mnyaka Wema-50, uMnyaka Wekubuyiselwa, akhiphe kulomuntfu labeyitsengise kuye imali lelingene leminyaka lebeyisasele; lapho-ke angaphindze abuyele kuleyo, iphindze ibe yakhe.
Kodvwa nangabe ehluleka kutfola lokwenele kuyihlenga lendzawo layitsengisile, iyawuba ngeyemtsengi kuze kufike uMnyaka Wekubuyiselwa. Ngalowo mnyaka lendzawo iyawubuyiselwa kumnikati wayo.
“ ‘Nangabe umuntfu atsengise ngendlu leyakhiwe edolobheni lelitungeletwe lubondza, uyawuba nelilungelo lokuphindze ayihlenge ngekuyitsenga umnyaka ungakapheli ayitsengisile.

Nangabe lomniyo kwaze kwaphela umnyaka angakayihlengi lendlu lekulelidolobha lelitungeletwe lubondza, itawube seyiba ngeyalomtsengi wayo netitukulwane takhe; ingeke iphindze ibuyele kulomniyo nome sekufike uMnyaka Wekubuyiselwa.
Kodvwa tindlu letisemadolobheni late lubondza tiyawuhlengwa ngendlela lenjengeyekuhlengwa kwendzawo; nato tiyawuhlengwa ngeMnyaka Wekubuyiselwa.
EmaLevi wona ayawuba nelilungelo lekuhlenga tindlu tawo nome ngunini kulawo madolobha lasesandleni sawo.

Ngako-ke indlu lengeyemaLevi iyawuhlengwa, nayitsengiswe kulawo madolobha lasesandleni sawo, kufanele ibuyiselwe kuwo ngeMnyaka Wekubuyiselwa, ngobe letindlu letisemadolobheni emaLevi tawo kuso sive sema-Israyeli.
Kodvwa emadlelo langewemadolobha awo akayiwuze atsengiswe, ngobe lifa lawo laphakadze.’ ”
Ungameboleki imali wentele kumbita intalo, kantsi futsi ungamtsengiseli kudla ngentalo wentele kutfola inzuzo.
NginguSimakadze, Nkulunkulu wenu, lowanikhipha eveni laseGibhithe kutaninika lelive laseKhenani, nekutsi ngibe nguNkulunkulu wenu.’ ”
“ ‘Nangabe lomunye wenu aba mphofu bese utitsengisa yena kuwe, awuyiwumenta akusebentele njengesigcili.
Kufanele atsatfwe njengesisebenti lesicashiwe nome sisebenti sesikhashana lesisemkhatsini wenu akusebentele kuze kube nguMnyaka Wekubuyiselwa.
Kulowo mnyaka yena nebantfwabakhe kufanele bakhululwe, bese ubuyela emndenini wakubo emhlabeni waboyisemkhulu.
Njengobe ema-Israyeli atinceku tami lengatikhipha eGibhithe, kufanele angatsengiswa njengetigcili.
Kufanele ningawabusi ngelulaka, kodvwa yesabani Nkulunkulu wenu.
Tigcili netigcilikati tenu tiyawutfolakala kuletive lenakhelene nato; tigcili ningatitsenga kuleto tive.
Ningatitsenga tigcili nakulabo betive labahambisana nani nakuleyo mindeni lesemkhatsini wenu letalelene eveni lenu, babe timphahla tenu.
Letigcili ningatishiyela bantfwabenu tibe lifa labo; nabatsandza bangatenta tibe tigcili tabo siphelane. Kodvwa umnakenu longum-Israyeli awuyikumbusa ngelulaka. Ningabusani lomunye etikwalomunye.
“ ‘Nangabe wetive nome sisebenti sesikhashana lesisemkhatsini wenu kwenteka sinjinga, bese kutsi lomnakenu loseceleni aba mphofu aze atitsengise kulona wetive losemkhatsini wenu,
nome asatitsengisile, unalo lilungelo lekuhlengwa. Lomunye wabomnakabo angamhlenga,
nome malume wakhe, nome umzala wakhe, nome ngusiphi-ke sihlobo sakhe sengati, nome naye nasanjingile angatihlenga.

Bayawubonisana nalowo labemtsengile kusukela ngalowo mnyaka latitsengisa ngawo kuze kube nguMnyaka Wekubuyiselwa. Intsengo yekukhululwa kwakhe iyakuya ngaleminyaka asehleti nemtsengi wakhe kube shangatsi abe sisebenti lesicashiwe kuleyo minyaka.
Nangabe kusalele iminyaka leminyenti, kufanele akhokhe inhlawulo yakhe lelingene leminyaka lesele.
Nangabe sekusele iminyaka lembalwa kufike uMnyaka Wekubuyiselwa, kufanele babonisane nemtsengi wakhe ngentsengo yakhe lekufanele ayikhiphe.
Kufanele atsatfwe njengemuntfu lobekacashiwe yonkhe leminyaka, kubukisiswe nekutsi lomnikati wakhe akamphatsi kabi ngesihluku yini.
Nome ngabe akahlengwa nangayinye yaletindlela, kodvwa kufanele yena nemndeni wakhe akhululwe ngeMnyaka Wekubuyiselwa,
ngobe kimi phela sive sema-Israyeli tinceku, yebo, tinceku tami lengatikhipha eveni laseGibhithe. NginguSimakadze, Nkulunkulu wenu.’ ”
Gcinani emaSabatha ami niyihloniphe nendzawo yami lengcwele. NginguSimakadze.
ngiyawunitfumelela imvula ngesikhatsi sayo, nemhlaba uninike sivuno lesihle, netihlahla tesiganga titsele titselo tato.

Sivuno siyawuba sikhulu kangangekutsi niyawuchubeka nivune, kuze kushaye sikhatsi sekukha emagelebisi. Nekukha emagelebisi kuyawuchubeka kuze kushaye sikhatsi sekuhlanyela. Yebo, niyawudla konkhe kudla lenikufunako, niphindze nihlale ngekuthula eveni lenu.
“ ‘Lelive ngiyawulipha kuthula, nicambalale ngekukhululeka ningesatjiswa lutfo. Tonkhe tilwane letiyingoti kini ngiyawutisusa kulelo live, kungabikho timphi eveni lenu.
Labasihlanu benu bayawuba nemandla ekwehlula likhulu lato, nelikhulu lenu liyawuba nemandla ekwehlula titsa leti-10 000; yebo, titsa tenu niyawutehlula niticotfule ngenkemba.
Ngiyawunibusisa, nginiphe bantfwana labanyenti, nandze; sivumelwane lengisenta nani ngiyawusigcina ngisifeze.
Sivuno senu siyawuba sinyenti kangangekutsi niyawuze nisilahle lesi sanyakenye, nentele kwekhweta lesi salonyaka.
Ngiyawuhlala emkhatsini wenu ngisethendeni lekukhontela, ngingesuki kini.
Ngiyawuhamba emkhatsini wenu ngibe nguNkulunkulu wenu, nine nibe sive sami.
Mine nginguSimakadze, Nkulunkulu wenu, lowanikhipha eGibhithe, kuze ningabe nisaba tigcili temaGibhithe. Ngephula tikeyi telijoko lenu, nganenta nahambela etulu nikhululekile.’ ”
ningatilandzeli netimiso tami, ningayenti nemitsetfo yami, nehluleke nekuyifeza lemiyalo yami ngekuphambana nesivumelwane sami,

ngiyawunijezisa nganaku: Ngiyawunehlisela kutfutfumela lokwesabekako, netifo letingelapheki, nemikhuhlane lephumphutsekisa emehlo, nginente nihusheke. Niyawulima nihlanyelele lite, ngobe titsa tenu tiyawunehlula tidle konkhe loko kudla.
Buso bami buyawumelana nani, bese nehlulwa titsa tenu, tona leto letinitondzako tiyawunibusa, nani nibaleke, ngisho nome seningasacoshwa ngumuntfu.
“ ‘Nanichubeka ngekungangilaleli nome sekunehlele konkhe loku, sijeziso senu ngiyawusikhulisa siphindvwe kasikhombisa.
Ligcabho lenu lelinenkhani ngiyawulifohlota; sibhakabhaka senu ngiyawusenta sibe njengensimbi, sibete imvula; umhlaba ngiyakuwomisa ube lukhuni njengelitfusi.
Konkhe kusebenta kwenu kamatima kungeke kunibuyisele lutfo, ngobe emasimi enu angeke abe nesivuno, netihlahla tingeke titsele titselo.
“ ‘Nanichubeka kumelana nami nale nekungilalela, lokuhlupheka kwenu ngiyawukuphindza kasikhombisa kuye ngaleto tono lenitentile.
Ngiyawunitfumelela tilwane tesiganga, tidle bantfwabenu netinkhomo tenu, nize nibe mbalwa, kangangekutsi ngisho nemigwaco yenu iyawubate bantfu.
“ ‘Emvakwalesijeziso nanichubeka nekungangilaleli ngekungakwemukeli kucondziswa ngimi ngekutsi nijinge nimelane nami,
nami-ke sengiyawumelana nani ngekunivisa buhlungu ngalokuphindvwe kasikhombisa ngenca yetono tenu.

Ngiyawuniletsela imphi itenijezisa ngekwephula kwenu sivumelwane. Niyawutsi nanihlangana emadolobheni enu etindzaweni tekuphepha, bese nginihlasela ngetifo letingelapheki, nivele niphoceleke kutinikela etitseni tenu.

Umtfombo wesinkhwa ngiyakuwujuba kangangekutsi bafati labalishumi bayawuhlanganyela hhavini munye kupheka sonkhe sinkhwa labanaso. Bayawukwenetisana ngalelo lite labayawube banalo. Niyawudla, kodvwa ningeke nesutse.
“ ‘Nangabe etikwako konkhe loku seloku aningilaleli, nichubeka nekumelana nami,
ngiyawunigucukela ngentfukutselo yami ngimelane nani, sijeziso ngisente sibe buhlungu ngekusiphindza kasikhombisa.
Niyawudla inyama yemitimba yemadvodzana nemadvodzakati enu.
Ngiyawubhidlita tindzawo tenu tekukhontela, ngidzilite nemalati enu etimphepho, tidvumbu tenu ngitibutsisele ndzawonye etikwetithico tenu letite imphilo naletiwile; umphefumulo wami uyawunicansukela.
Emadolobha enu ngiyakuwenta abe tindzala, netindzawo tenu tekukhontela ngitente tibe lihlane, kantsi neliphunga lelinuka lusi lelimnandzi leminikelo yenu yekushiswa ngingeke ngilemukele.
Live lenu ngiyawuliphundla, kuze kutsi netitsa tenu letingena kulo timangale ngalo.
Ngiyawunisakatela kuletinye tive, nginicoshe ngenkemba yami. Live lenu liyawuphundleka nemadolobha enu abe tindzala.
Live liyawuba nesikhatsi senjabulo ngeminyaka yemaSabatha ngalesikhatsi lisaphundlekile nani nisahleti eveni letitsa tenu; live liyawuphumula libe nesikhatsi lesimnandzi ngeminyaka yemaSabatha.
Ngaso sonkhe lesikhatsi live lenu lisaphundlekile liyawuba nekuphumula lelalingazange selibe nako ngesikhatsi semaSabatha enu nisahlala kulo.
Bayawugilana bawe, lomunye etikwalomunye, kube shangatsi babalekela imphi, nome kungekho lobacoshako. Ngako-ke aniyikuba nawo emandla ekuma embikwetitsa tenu.
Niyawufela emkhatsini webantfu betive, live letitsa tenu liyawunidla linicedze.
Labo benu labayawube basasele bangakafi eveni letitsa tabo, bayawukondza babe tincotfo ngenca yetono tabo, nangenca yetono taboyise bayawukondza besabeke.
lokungukona kwangenta ngaze ngabayisa eveni letitsa tabo, nangabe netinhlitiyo tabo letingakasoki titfobeka bayikhipha nenkhokhelo yesono sekuhlubuka kwabo,
ngiyawusikhumbula sivumelwane sami naJakobe, sivumelwane sami na-Isaka, sivumelwane sami na-Abrahama, ngilikhumbule live.
Lelo live bayawulifulatsela lisale litijabulisa ngemaSabatha alo ngesikhatsi liselihlane bangekho kulo. Bayawukhipha inkhokhelo yetono tabo, ngobe bayilahlile imitsetfo baticansukela netimiso tami.

Kodvwa nome kunjalo, nasebaseveni letitsa tabo, ngingeke ngibadvube, futsi ngingeke ngibacansukele kangangekutsi ngize ngibabhubhise baphele nya, ngephule sivumelwane sami nabo. NginguSimakadze, Nkulunkulu wabo.
Kodvwa ngenca yabo ngiyawusikhumbula sivumelwane sami nabokhokho babo, lengabakhipha eveni laseGibhithe embikwato tonkhe tive kutsi ngitewuba nguNkulunkulu wabo. NginguSimakadze.’ ”
Leti-ke timiso, nemiyalo, nemitsetfo Simakadze layenta entsabeni yaseSinayi emkhatsini wakhe nesive sema-Israyeli ngesandla saMosi.
“Tjela sive sema-Israyeli utsi: ‘Nangabe umuntfu ente setsembiso ngebantfu kuSimakadze ngekunika intsengo lelingene bona,
lomdvuna loneminyaka lesemkhatsini kwalengema-20 kuya kulengema-60 budzala, kuyawuba tinhlavu tesiliva letingaba ngema-50 ngekwesilinganiso lesisemtsetfweni.
Nangabe lomuntfu amsikati, inhlawulo yakhe kuyawuba tinhlavu tesiliva letingaba ngema-30.

Nangabe lomuntfu uneminyaka lesihlanu kuya kulengema-20 budzala, nakangulomdvuna, inhlawulo yakhe kuyawuba tinhlavu tesiliva letingaba ngema-20, kantsi nakamsikati, inhlawulo yakhe kuyawuba tinhlavu tesiliva letingaba lishumi.

Nangabe lomuntfu unenyanga atelwe kuya eminyakeni lesihlanu budzala, inhlawulo yakhe nakangulomdvuna, kuyawuba tinhlavu tesiliva letingaba sihlanu, kantsi nakamsikati, kuyawuba tinhlavu tesiliva letingaba tintsatfu.

Nangabe lomuntfu aneminyaka lengema-60 kuya etulu budzala, nakangulomdvuna, inhlawulo yakhe kuyawuba tinhlavu tesiliva letingaba li-15, kantsi nakangulomsikati, kuyawuba tinhlavu tesiliva letingaba lishumi.
“ ‘Nangabe lomuntfu amphofu kakhulu angakhoni kukhokha lenhlawulo loyibitako, lomuntfu kufanele aletse umuntfu kumphristi lotawubala inhlawulo yakhe lengakhonwa ngulowo muntfu.
“ ‘Nangabe wetsembise ngesilwane lesingemukeleka kutsi sibe ngumnikelo kuSimakadze, leso silwane lesesinikwe Simakadze sesiyawuba ngcwele.
Akukafaneli enane silwane lesihle ngalesibi, nome lesibi ngalesihle; nangabe asenana ngalesinye silwane, leso lenana ngaso naleso lesenanwako totimbili tiyawuba ngcwele.
Nangabe kwetsenjiswe ngesilwane lesingcolile, lesingemukeleki kuSimakadze kutsi sibe ngumnikelo, lomuntfu kufanele amikise lesilwane kumphristi,
lokunguyena atawuhlolisisa simo saso kutsi sihle nome sibi. Inhlawulo yaso iyawuba nguleyo lejutjwe ngumphristi ngekwesimo saleso silwane.
Nangabe umniyo afuna kusihlenga, uyakwengeta incenye yesihlanu yenhlawulo yaso.
“ ‘Nangabe umuntfu anikela ngendlu yakhe kutsi ibe ngcwele kuSimakadze, umphristi uyawuyihlolisisa kutsi ilungile yini nome cha. Leyo nhlawulo lebalwa ngumphristi ngalelo langa kuyawuma yona.
Nangabe lomuntfu lonikela lendlu asafuna kuyihlenga, kufanele engete incenye yesihlanu yenhlawulo yayo, bese lendlu iphindze iba ngeyakhe.

“ ‘Nangabe umuntfu anikela ngencenye yemhlaba wemndeni wakhe kuSimakadze, inhlawulo yawo iyawubalwa isuselwa entsengweni yenhlanyelo lehlanyelwa kulowo mhlaba lekutinhlavu tesiliva letingaba lishumi kuleso nakuleso sisindvo sebhali lesingemakhilogremu langaba ngema-20.
Nangabe anikela ngensimi yakhe kusukela ngalowo Mnyaka Wekubuyiselwa, inhlawulo yayo iyawuba ngulephelele.
Kodvwa nangabe anikela ngensimi yakhe emvakwaloMnyaka Wekubuyiselwa, umphristi uyawubala inhlawulo ayinciphise kuye ngeminyaka lesasele kutsi kufike uMnyaka Wekubuyiselwa.
Nangabe lomuntfu lonikele lensimi asafuna kuyihlenga futsi, kufanele engete incenye yesihlanu yenhlawulo, bese-ke lensimi iphindze iba ngeyakhe.
Kodvwa nakangafisi kuyihlenga lensimi nome asayitsengisele lomunye umuntfu, ingeke iphindze ihlengeke.
Kutawutsi lensimi nase ikhululekile ngeMnyaka Wekubuyiselwa, iyawuba ngcwele kuSimakadze njengensimi leseyinikelwe kuye, ibe ngeyebaphristi.
“ ‘Nangabe umuntfu anikela kuSimakadze ngensimi layitsengile, lengesilo lifa lemndeni wakubo,
umphristi uyawubala inhlawulo yayo kuye ngeminyaka lesele kuze kufike uMnyaka Wekubuyiselwa, lomuntfu uyawukhipha inhlawulo yayo ngalona lelo langa, bese yehlukaniselwa Simakadze.
NgeMnyaka Wekubuyiselwa leyo nsimi iyawuphindze ibuyiselwe kulomnikati lebeyitsengwe kuye, kulifa lakhe.
“ ‘Yonkhe inhlawulo iyawubasemtsetfweni, kusetjentiswe silinganiso sasendzaweni lengcwele.
“ ‘Kufanele kubete lonikela ngelitubulo lesilwane, ngobe phela lona vele laSimakadze: nome lenkhomo, nome lemvu, laSimakadze.

Nangabe litubulo kusilwane lesingcolile ngekwemtsetfo, umuntfu angalihlenga ngaleyo nhlawulo lesemtsetfweni, engete kulo incenye yesihlanu yenhlawulo yalo. Nangabe angalihlengi, kufanele litsengiswe ngalelo nani lalo lese libaliwe.
Umuntfu lonikelwe ekufeni kuSimakadze akayiwuhlengwa; kufanele abulawe.
Nangabe umuntfu afisa kuhlenga kwelishumi kwakhe, kufanele engete incenye yesihlanu yako enhlawulweni yako.
Konkhe kwelishumi emhlambini wetinkhomo netimvu, ngisho sonkhe silwane selishumi lesendlula ngaphansi kwendvuku yemelusi, siyawuba ngcwele kuSimakadze.

Lomnikati akayiwutiphambanisa leto tilwane, khona kutewukhetseka leto letinesici. Nakwenteka enana lesilwane ngalesinye, totimbili letilwane, lesenaniwe nalekwenanwa ngaso tiyawuba taSimakadze, futsi atiyiwuhlengwa.’ ”
Ngiyo lena-ke imiyalo yesive sema-Israyeli Simakadze layinika Mosi entsabeni yaseSinayi.
“Yentani lubalo lwaso sonkhe sive saka-Israyeli, lusendvo ngelusendvo, nemindeni ngemindeni, nibabhalise ngetindlu taboyise onkhe emadvodza ngemabito awo, ngayinye ngayinye,
kusukela kulasebaneminyaka lengema-20 kuya etulu, onkhe emadvodza aka-Israyeli lase angalungela kuya emphini, wena na-Aroni niyakuwabala ngeticheme tawo.
Kulowo nalowo mndeni niyawucela munye loyinhloko lemelele lowo mndeni kutsi anisite.
Lawa-ke ngemabito emadvodza lenitawusitana nawo kulomsebenti:
Emndenini wakaSimeyoni kuyawuba nguShelumiyeli, umsa waSurishadayi.
Emndenini waka-Isakhari kuyawuba nguNethaneli, umsa waSuwari.
Emndenini wakaZebuloni kuyawuba ngu-Eliyabe, umsa waHeloni.
Emndenini waka-Efrayimu kuyawuba ngu-Elishama, umsa wa-Amihudi;
emndenini wakaManase kuyawuba nguGamaliyeli, umsa waPhedasuri.
Emndenini wakaBhenjamini kuyawuba ngu-Abidani, umsa waGideyoni.
Emndenini wakaDani kuyawuba ngu-Ahiyezeri, umsa wa-Amishadayi.
Emndenini waka-Asheri kuyawuba nguPhagiyeli, umsa wa-Okrani.
Emndenini wakaGadi kuyawuba ngu-Eliyasafa, umsa waDehuweli.
Emndenini wakaNaftali kuyawuba ngu-Ahira, umsa wa-Enani.”
Laba-ke ngibo lababekhetsiwe kutsi babe baholi emindenini yabo. Babebaholi bemindeni yaka-Israyeli.

Sive sema-Levi sona asizange sibhaliswe kanye naleti letinye tive.
“Sive semaLevi ungasifaki elubalweni kanye nesive sonkhe sema-Israyeli.

Esikhundleni saloko, beka emaLevi kutsi aphatse lelithende lesivumelwane nako konkhe lokukulo lokuhambisana nalo. Kufanele etfwale lelithende nato tonkhe timphahla letihambisana nalo; yebo, kufanele alinakekele, ente inkonzo kulo, akambe emathende awo alitungelete.

Njalo nje nangabe lithende lekukhontela selitfutsa, ngemaLevi lekufanele alehlise; kanjalo, nome selimiswa, ngemaLevi lekufanele alimise. Lowo longesiye umLevi loyawusondzela eceleni kwalelithende uyawubulawa, afe.
Ema-Israyeli ayawumisa emathende awo ngeticheme, ngulowo nalowo esichemeni sakhe lesinesiboniso sebuve baso.

EmaLevi wona emathende awo ayakuwamisa awatungeletise lithende lesivumelwane, khona lulaka lwami lungetikwehlela etikwesive sema-Israyeli. Kuyawuba ngumsebenti wemaLevi kunakekela nekuphatsa lithende lesivumelwane.”
Ngako sive sema-Israyeli senta konkhe Simakadze layala ngako Mosi kutsi kwentiwe.
“Ema-Israyeli kufanele akambe bucamama atungelete lithende lekuhlangana, ngulowo nalowo esichemeni semndeni wakhe ngaphansi kwesiboniso sebuve baso.
“Ngasemphumalanga kufanele kukambe ticheme tenkambu lenesiboniso sebuve bakaJuda. Umholi wesive sakaJuda nguNasoni,
“Sive saka-Isakhari siyawukamba eceleni kwaso. Umholi wesive saka-Isakhari nguNethaneli, umsa waSuwari.
“Sive sakaZebuloni siyawukamba eceleni kwaso. Umholi wesive sakaZebuloni ngu-Eliyabe, umsa waHeloni.
“Asawonkhe emadvodza eticheme tenkambu yakaJuda aba ti-186 400. Ngiwo latawuphuma ahambe kucala.
“Ngaseningizimu kutawuba neticheme tenkambu lenesiboniso sebuve bakaRubeni. Umholi wesive sakaRubeni ngu-Elisuri, umsa waShedewuri.
“Sive sakaSimeyoni siyawukamba eceleni kwaso. Umholi wesive sakaSimeyoni nguShelumiyeli, umsa waSurishadayi.
“Sive sakaGadi siyawukamba eceleni kwaso. Umholi wesive sakaGadi ngu-Eliyasafa, umsa waDehuweli.
“Asawonkhe emadvodza eticheme tenkambu yakaRubeni aba ti-151 450. Nase kuhanjwa ngiwo latawulandzela.
“Lithende lekuhlangana kanye nenkambu yemaLevi kuyawumiswa emkhatsini wetinkambu. Bayawutfutsa emathende ngulowo nalowo endzaweni yakhe ngaphansi kwesiboniso sebuve bakhe.
“Ngasenshonalanga kutawuba yinkambu yeticheme tesiboniso sebuve baka-Efrayimu. Umholi wesive saka-Efrayimu ngu-Elishama, umsa wa-Amihudi.
“Sive sakaManase siyawukamba eceleni kwaso. Umholi wesive sakaManase nguGamaliyeli, umsa waPhedasuri.
“Sive sakaBhenjamini siyawukamba eceleni kwaso. Umholi wesive sakaBhenjamini ngu-Abidani, umsa waGideyoni.
“Asawonkhe emadvodza eticheme tenkambu yaka-Efrayimu aba ti-108 000. Nase kuhanjwa ayakulandzela abe ngesitsatfu.
“Ngasenyakatfo kutawuba yinkambu yeticheme takaDani. Umholi wesive sakaDani ngu-Ahiyezeri, umsa wa-Amishadayi.
“Sive saka-Asheri siyawukamba eceleni kwaso. Umholi wesive saka-Asheri nguPhagiyeli, umsa wa-Okrani.
“Sive sakaNaftali siyawukamba eceleni kwaso. Umholi wesive sakaNaftali ngu-Ahira, umsa wa-Enani.
“Asawonkhe emadvodza eticheme tenkambu yakaDani aba ti-157 600. Nase kuhanjwa bayawulandzela babe bekugcina, ngaphansi kwesiboniso sebuve babo.”
EmaLevi akabalwanga kanye nema-Israyeli, kwaya njengobe Simakadze abeyale Mosi.

Ngako-ke ema-Israyeli akwenta konkhe Simakadze labeyale Mosi kutsi akwente. Akamba onkhe ngulowo nalowo ngaphansi kwesiboniso sebuve bakhe; baphuma bahamba. Wonkhe umuntfu wangena emndenini wakhe naselusendvweni lwakubo.
Leti titukulwane taka-Aroni naMosi ngesikhatsi Simakadze akhuluma naMosi eNtsabeni iSinayi.
Emabito emadvodzana a-Aroni ngulawa: NguNadabi litubulo, na-Abihu, na-Eleyazare, na-Ithamari.
Ngiwo lawo-ke emabito emadvodzana a-Aroni labebaphristi lababegcotjiwe, babegcotjelwe kutsi bakhonte enkonzweni yebuphristi,

kodvwa boNadabi na-Abihu bawa phansi bafa embikwaSimakadze ngesikhatsi banikela ngemlilo lowawungengcwele eHlane laseSinayi. Babete emadvodzana; ngako-ke Eleyazare na-Ithamari baba baphristi ngesikhatsi sonkhe sekuphila kweyise, Aroni.
“Letsa sive semaLevi usetfule ku-Aroni, umphristi, kutsi sitemsita.
Kufanele emaLevi ente imisebenti letsite entele yena kanye nesive sonkhe sema-Israyeli ethendeni lekuhlangana nakakhonta ethendeni.
Kufanele aphatse tonkhe timphahla tasethendeni lekuhlangana, afezele ema-Israyeli timfanelo tawo ngekukhonta endzaweni lengcwele.
Uyawunikela emaLevi ku-Aroni nakumadvodzana akhe njengemnikelo wakhe
Uyawubeka Aroni nemadvodzana akhe kutsi bente imisebenti yebuphristi. Wonkhe umuntfu, ngaphandle kwabo, loyawusondzela eceleni kwalendzawo lengcwele uyawubulawa.”
“Sive semaLevi ngisikhetse emkhatsini wato tonkhe tive tema-Israyeli esikhundleni sematubulo awo onkhe lavula sitalo semadvodzakati ema-Israyeli. EmaLevi ngewami,
ngobe onkhe ematubulo ngewami. Mhlazana ngishaya onkhe ematubulo aseGibhithe, ngatehlukanisela onkhe ematubulo aka-Israyeli, ebantfu newetifuyo. Ayawuba ngewami. NginguSimakadze.”
Simakadze wakhuluma kuMosi aseHlane laseSinayi, watsi:
“Bala emaLevi, lusendvo ngelusendvo nangemindeni yawo. Bala bonkhe labadvuna kusukela kulabanenyanga budzala kuya etulu.”
Ngako Mosi wawabala njengekusho kwelivi laSimakadze.
Lawa-ke ngemabito emadvodzana akaGeshoni: boLibni, naShimeyi, lusendvo ngelusendvo.
Emadvodzana aKhohati lusendvo ngelusendvo emabito ngemabito: bekubo-Amramu, naJisihari, naHebroni, na-Uziyeli.
Lawa-ke ngemadvodzana aMerari, lusendvo ngelusendvo: boMahali, naMushi. Bonkhe babe ngimindeni yemaLevi, lusendvo ngelusendvo.
Lusendvo lwakaGeshoni bekungemaLibni nemaShimeyi: leyo-ke bekungimindeni yemaGeshoni.
Sibalo sabo bonkhe labadvuna kusukela kulababenenyanga budzala kuya etulu saba ti-7 500.
Lusendvo lwemaGeshoni lwemisa ngasenshonalanga emvakwelithende lekukhontela.
Umholi wetinsendvo temaGeshoni kwaba ngu-Eliyasafa, umsa waLayeli.
Umsebenti wemaGeshoni ethendeni lekuhlangana kuyawuba kunakekela lithende lekukhontela, nelithende, netimbonyo talo, nendvwangu lesemnyango welithende lekuhlangana,
netindvwangu tasesibuyeni, nendvwangu lesekungeneni kwesibuya lesitungelete indzawo lengcwele, nelilati, netindophi, nako konkhe lokuhambisana nako.
Khohati watala nati tinsendvo: ema-Amramu, nemaJisihari, nemaHebroni, nema-Uziyeli; leto-ke bekutinsendvo temaKhohati.
Sibalo semaKhohati onkhe lamadvuna kusukela kulababenenyanga budzala kuya etulu saba ti-8 600.
Tinsendvo temaKhohati takamba ngaseningizimu nendzawo lengcwele.
Umholi wemindeni yemaKhohati, lusendvo ngelusendvo, bekungu-Elisafani, umsa wa-Uziyeli.

Umsebenti wawo bekukunakekela libhokisi lesivumelwane, nelitafula, nelutsi lwetibane, nemalati, naletinye tintfo letisetjentiswa enkonzweni yebuphristi endzaweni lengcwele, nendvwangu, nako konkhe lokuhambisana nako.
Umholi lomkhulu wemaLevi bekungu-Eleyazare, umsa wa-Aroni, umphristi. Wakhetselwa kutsi engamele bonkhe labo babenakekela indzawo lengcwele.
Merari watala nati tinsendvo: emaMahali nemaMushi; leto-ke bekutinsendvo temaMerari.
Sibalo sabo bonkhe labadvuna kusukela kulababenenyanga budzala kuya etulu saba ti-6 200.
Umholi wemindeni yemaMerari bekunguSuriyeli, umsa wa-Abihayili; bebatawukamba ngasenyakatfo kwelithende lekukhontela.
EmaMerari akhetselwa inkonzo yekunakekela tinsikabhaluko telithende lekukhontela, nemakabha, netinsika, nemaseko, nako konkhe lokuhambisana nako, nako konkhe lokusetjentiswa kanye nako,
kanye netinsika taso sonkhe sibuya, nemaseko ato, netikhonkhwane telithende, netindophi.

Mosi, na-Aroni nemadvodzana akhe bebafanele bakambe ngasemphumalanga nendzawo lengcwele, lapho kuphuma lilanga ngakhona, embikwelithende lekuhlangana. Bona babekelwa inkonzo yekunakekela indzawo lengcwele egameni lema-Israyeli. Wonkhe umuntfu, ngaphandle kwawo, lobekasondzela eceleni kwayo abefanele abulawe, afe.
Onkhe emaLevi labalwa nguMosi na-Aroni njengekusho kwaSimakadze ngetinsendvo tawo, bonkhe labebabadvuna kusukela kulababenenyanga budzala kuya etulu, nababalwa sebabonkhe baba ti-22 000.
Simakadze wakhuluma kuMosi watsi: “Bala onkhe ematubulo lamadvuna ema-Israyeli kusukela kulabanenyanga budzala kuya etulu, wente luhla lwemabito awo.
Ngitsatsele emaLevi esikhundleni sawo onkhe ematubulo esive sema-Israyeli, netinkhomo temaLevi esikhundleni sematubulo onkhe etifuyo tema-Israyeli. NginguSimakadze.”
Ngako Mosi wawabala onkhe ematubulo esive saka-Israyeli njengobe Simakadze abeshito.
Sibalo sawo asawonkhe ematubulo lamadvuna kusukela kulababenenyanga budzala kuya etulu, lababhaliswa ngemabito abo, baba ti-22 273.

“Ngitsatsele emaLevi esikhundleni sawo onkhe ematubulo esive sema-Israyeli kanye nematubulo etifuyo tawo, ninikele ngetifuyo temaLevi esikhundleni sematubulo etifuyo taka-Israyeli. EmaLevi ayawuba ngewami. NginguSimakadze.
Njengobe ematubulo ema-Israyeli endlula emaLevi ngema-273, kufanele uwahlenge lamatubulo langetulu.
Uyawukhipha emagremu esiliva langaba ngema-55 litubulo lilinye njengekwesimiso lesisemtsetfweni, endzaweni lengcwele, lesingemagremu langaba li-12.
Lemali yenhlawulo uboyinika Aroni nemadvodzana akhe.”
Ngako-ke Mosi wabutsa yonkhe leyo mali yenhlawulo kulabo bebengca sibalo lesasihlengwe ngemaLevi.
Kuwo onkhe ematubulo ema-Israyeli wabutsa isiliva leyayingaba ngemakhilogremu lali-15 nemagremu langema-500 njengesimiso lesisemtsetfweni endzaweni lengcwele.
Lemali yenhlawulo Mosi wayinika Aroni nemadvodzana akhe, njengobe abeyalwe livi laSimakadze.
“Bala emaKhohati langemaLevi lusendvo ngelusendvo nangemindeni yawo.
Bala onkhe emadvodza kusukela kulasaneminyaka lengema-30 kuya kulengema-50 budzala, labo lase bangena enkonzweni yekukhonta ethendeni lekuhlangana.
Umsebenti walamaKhohati ethendeni lekuhlangana bekukunakekela tintfo letingcwelengcwele.
“Nase kufanele kutfutfwe inkambu, bo-Aroni nemadvodzana akhe kufanele bangene ekhatsi ethendeni lekukhontela, betfule lendvwangu lesembikwelibhokisi lesivumelwane, bese baliphutsa ngayo.
Batawube sebaphindze balembonya ngesikhumba lesishukiwe selihhashi laselwandle, ngetulu bendlale indvwangu leluhlata njengesibhakabhaka, bafake timboko talo endzaweni yato.
Etikwako konkhe loku kufanele bendlale indvwangu lebovu ngalokutopele, bese kumbonywa ngesikhumba lesishukiwe selihhashi laselwandle, bafake timboko talo endzaweni yato.
“Bayawutsatsa indvwangu leluhlata njengesibhakabhaka baphutse lolutsi lwetibane tekukhanyisa, kanye netibane talo, nentsambo yalo, netijubantsambo, netitsebe, netindzebe temafutsa.
Batakugocotela kanye naletintfo letihambisana nalo ngesikhumba lesishukiwe semahhashi aselwandle, bakufake eluhlakeni lwekwetfwala.
“Etikwelilati legolide kufanele bendlale indvwangu leluhlata njengesibhakabhaka, bese bambonya loko ngesikhumba lesishukiwe semahhashi aselwandle, bafake timboko talo endzaweni yato.

Kufanele batsatse tonkhe letintfo letisetjentiswa ekukhonteni endzaweni lengcwele, batigocote ngalendvwangu leluhlata njengesibhakabhaka, bakumbonye ngesikhumba semahhashi aselwandle, bese bakubeka eluhlakeni lwekwetfwala.
Kufanele besuse umlotsa elatini lelitfusi, bese bendlala indvwangu lebukhwebeletane etikwalo.

Bayawubeka etikwayo tonkhe titja letisetjentiswa enkonzweni yelilati: emakesi, netintsi tenyama, nemafosholo, nemigezelo yekunyenyeta, nato tonkhe titja taselatini. Etikwalo bese bendlala sikhumba lesishukiwe semahhashi aselwandle, bafake timboko talo endzaweni yato.

Nase bacedzile bo-Aroni nemadvodzana akhe kumbonya indzawo lengcwele nato tonkhe timphahla tayo, nenkambu yonkhe seyilungele kusuka ihambe, emaKhohati kufanele kube ngiwo letfwalako, kodvwa angatitsintsi letintfo letingcwele, funa afe.
“Ngito leto tintfo tasethendeni lekuhlangana letifanele kwetfwalwa ngemaKhohati.

“Eleyazare, indvodzana ya-Aroni, umphristi, nguye lotawuphatsa emafutsa etibane, nemphepho lenuka kamnandzi, neminikelo yafutsi yalokutinhlavu, nemafutsa emgcobo, abe liso etikwalo lonkhe lithende lekukhontela nako konkhe lokukulo, ngisho etikwayo yonkhe indzawo lengcwele nako konkhe lokukuyo.”
“Caphelani kutsi tinsendvo tesive semaKhohati tingapheli emkhatsini wemaLevi,

kodvwa niwaphatse ngendlela yekutsi aphile angafi, nakasondzela eceleni kwetintfo letingcwelengcwele. Bo-Aroni nemadvodzana akhe kufanele bangene endzaweni lengcwele bawabele ngulowo nalowo inkonzo nemsebenti locondzene naye.
Kodvwa emaKhohati akukafaneli kutsi angene abuke tintfo letingcwele ngisho nangesikhashana nje, funa afe.”
“Bala futsi emaGeshoni, lusendvo ngelusendvo nangemindeni yawo.
Bala onkhe emadvodza kusukela kulasaneminyaka lengema-30 kuya kulengema-50 budzala lase bangena enkonzweni yekukhonta ethendeni lekuhlangana.
Lena-ke yinkonzo yelusendvo lwemaGeshoni nabenta imisebenti yabo betfwala lemitfwalo:

Batakwetfwala tindvwangu telithende lekukhontela, nelithende lekuhlangana, kanye netimbonyo talo letingetulu tesikhumba lesishukiwe semahhashi aselwandle, netindvwangu letisekungeneni kwelithende lekuhlangana,

netindvwangu tesibuya, nendvwangu lesekungeneni kwesibuya lesitungeleta lithende lekukhontela nelilati, netintsambo tato, nato tonkhe timphahla letisetjentiswa ekukhonteni, babuye bente konkhe lokudzinga kwentiwa macondzana nato.
Yonkhe inkonzo yemaGeshoni itakwentiwa ngekuyala kwa-Aroni nemadvodzana akhe, nako konkhe lokufanele bakwetfwale nalokufanele bakwente. Nine-ke nibone kutsi bakwenta konkhe yini labatjelwe kona.
Lena-ke yinkonzo yelusendvo lwakaGeshoni ethendeni lekuhlangana, umsebenti batakuwenta ngaphansi kwesandla sa-Ithamari, indvodzana ya-Aroni, umphristi.”
Bala bonkhe labadvuna kusukela kulabaneminyaka lengema-30 budzala kuya kulengema-50, laba lase bangena enkonzweni yekukhonta ethendeni lekuhlangana.
Lena-ke ngimisebenti lekufanele bayente: kufanele betfwale tinsikabhaluko tendzawo lengcwele, nemakabha, netinsika kanye nemaseko ato,

netinsika letitungeleta sibuya, nemaseko ato, netikhonkhwane telithende, netintsambo, nato tonkhe timphahla nalokunye lokuhambisana nako. Nguleyo naleyo ndvodza uyibhalise eceleni kwelibito laleyo mphahla lekufanele iyetfwale.
Lena-ke yinkonzo yemindeni yemaMerari ethendeni lekuhlangana ngaphansi kwesandla sa-Ithamari, indvodzana ya-Aroni, umphristi.”
BoMosi, na-Aroni, nebaholi besive babala emaKhohati, lusendvo ngelusendvo nangemindeni yawo.
Onkhe emadvodza kusukela kulabeneminyaka lengema-30 budzala kuya kulengema-50, laba lase bangena enkonzweni yekukhonta ethendeni lekuhlangana,
Ngibo bonkhe-ke laba netinsendvo temaKhohati labebatawukhonta ethendeni lekuhlangana. Bo-Mosi na-Aroni bawabala njengekuyalwa kwaMosi nguSimakadze.
EmaGeshoni abalwa, lusendvo ngelusendvo nangemindeni yawo.
Onkhe emadvodza kusukela kulabeneminyaka lengema-30 budzala kuya kulengema-50, laba lase bangena enkonzweni yekukhonta ethendeni lekuhlangana,
abalwa, lusendvo ngelusendvo nangemindeni yawo, aba ti-2 630. Ngibo bonkhe lababetinsendvo temaGeshoni lababekhonta ethendeni lekuhlangana.
BoMosi na-Aroni bababala njengekuyalwa kwaMosi nguSimakadze.
EmaMerari abalwa, lusendvo ngelusendvo nangemindeni yawo.
Onkhe emadvodza kusukela kulabeneminyaka lengema-30 budzala kuya kulengema-50, laba lase bangena enkonzweni yekukhonta ethendeni lekuhlangana,
Ngibo bonkhe-ke lababetinsendvo temaMerari. BoMosi na-Aroni bawabala njengekuyalwa kwaMosi nguSimakadze.
Ngako boMosi, na-Aroni, nebaholi bema-Israyeli bawabala onkhe emaLevi, lusendvo ngelusendvo nangemindeni yawo.
Asawonkhe emadvodza labeneminyaka lengema-30 budzala kuya kulengema-50, laba lase bangena enkonzweni yekukhonta ethendeni lekuhlangana,
Kwaya njengekuyalwa kwaMosi nguSimakadze kutsi ngulowo nalowo ente umsebenti wakhe lowawucondzene naye kutsi awente.
Ngako-ke bonkhe babalwa njengobe Simakadze abeyale Mosi.

“Yala ema-Israyeli uwatjele kutsi wonkhe umuntfu lonesifo salokusabulephelo nome lonekuvuta nome kwaluphi luhlobo, nome longcole ngenca yesidvumbu latsintsene naso, akacoshwe akhishelwe ngephandle kwenkambu.
Bonkhe bantfu labanjalo, lomdvuna nome lomsikati, kufanele bakhishelwe ngephandle kwenkambu, khona bangetikuyingcolisa lenkambu yabo lapho ngihleti khona emkhatsini wabo.”
Ema-Israyeli awulalela lomyalo; abakhiphela ngephandle kwenkambu, njengobe Mosi abeyalwe nguSimakadze.
“Tjela ema-Israyeli utsi: ‘Nangabe indvodza nome umfati ona nome ngaluphi luhlobo lwekungetsembeki kuSimakadze, lowo muntfu uyawuba nelicala,
ngako kufanele avume sono sakhe lasentile, bese ukhipha inhlawulo lephelele ngaloko kona kwakhe, engete incenye yako yesihlanu, ayinike lowo lamonile.

Kodvwa nangabe lomuntfu asafile ate nesihlobo sakhe sengati lapho lenhlawulo ingakhishwa khona, uyawuyiletsa kuSimakadze ibe yemphristi, kuletfwe nesihhanca kutsi sibe yinhlawulo yekubuyisana leyentelwe yena lamonile.
Yonkhe iminikelo lengcwele letsite leyawunikelwa ngema-Israyeli kuSimakadze iyawuba yalowo mphristi leyetfulwe kuye.
Tonkhe tintfo latingcwelisile umuntfu tiyawuba takhe; konkhe umuntfu lakunike umphristi kuyawuba kwalowo mphristi.’ ”
“Tjela ema-Israyeli utsi: ‘Nangabe umfati wendvodza eduka ngekungetsembeki endvodzeni yakhe

ngekulala nalenye indvodza, kodvwa loko kube kufihlakale emehlweni endvodza yakhe, nalesento singete satfolakala, kantsi vele sewutingcolisile, kubete nafakazi lomlahlako ngobe angakabanjwa elucotjeni,
nangabe umoya wesikhwele ungena enhlitiyweni yendvodza yakhe imsole lomkayo kantsi vele ungcolile, nome-ke imsole kantsi akangcoli,

lendvodza kufanele itsatse umkayo iye naye kumphristi. Kufanele iphatsele lomfati wayo umnikelo loyimphuphu yebhali lengemalitha langaba mabili. Kufanele ingawatseli emafutsa etikwayo nome ingayifaki nemphepho etikwayo, ngobe phela loko kungumnikelo walokutinhlavu lonikelelwa sikhwele. Lomnikelo wentelwe kutsi liciniso liphumele ebaleni.
Utawuchubeka atsele litsantana lemanti langcwele embiteni, bese ufaka kuwo litsantana lemhlabatsi wesiyilo salelithende lekukhontela.

Utawutsi umphristi angemisa lomfati embikwaSimakadze, bese umtfukulula tinwele takhe afake etandleni talomfati umnikelo walokutinhlavu lekungewesikhumbuto sesikhwele, lomphristi utawube aphetse lamanti lababako laletsa sicalekiso.

Lomphristi utawube sewufungisa lomfati ngekukhuluma lamavi atsi: “Nangabe kute indvodza lolele nayo, waphambuka, watingcolisa ngekuphinga kantsi usesesandleni salendvodza yakho, shangatsi lamanti esicalekiso angete akulimata.
Kodvwa nangabe uphambukile usesesandleni salendvodza yakho watingcolisa ngekushenda nalenye indvodza,”
bese umphristi ufungisa lomfati ngesicalekiso atsi kuye: “Shangatsi Simakadze angenta bantfu bakini bakucalekise, baphindze bakusole. Shangatsi angashwaphanisa ematsanga
Shangatsi lamanti laletsa lesicalekiso angangena emtimbeni wakho khona atewukhukhumukisa lesisu sakho ashwaphanise nematsanga
“ ‘Umphristi uyawube sewubhala leticalekiso encwadzini legocotwako, aphindze lombhalo awugezele kulamanti lababako lasembiteni.
Utawube sewunatsisa lomfati lamanti lababako laletsa sicalekiso; lamanti esicalekiso atawutsi angangena kuye avete buhlungu lobesabekako.
Umphristi utawutsatsa lomnikelo walokutinhlavu wesikhwele etandleni talomfati awujikitise embikwaSimakadze, bese uwubeka etikwelilati.
Umphristi utawube sewutsatsa lelibinta lemnikelo walokutinhlavu wemphuphu kube ngumnikelo wesikhumbuto, awushise elatini; emvakwaloko-ke, sanganatsisa lomfati lamanti.

Nangabe lomfati utingcolisile wangete wetsembeka endvodzeni yakhe, waphinga nalenye indvodza, lamanti esicalekiso lanatsiswe wona ngumphristi atawutsi angangena kuye amvetele buhlungu lobukhulu: abe nebunyumba,
Kodvwa nangabe lomfati angakatingcolisi angenacala, angeke alimale, kantsi futsi utawuchubeka atale bantfwana.
“ ‘Lona-ke ngumtsetfo locondzene nesikhwele, nangabe umfati aphambukile watingcolisa ngekulala nalenye indvodza, asesesandleni sendvodza yakhe,
nome-ke nangabe lendvodza ifikelwa ngumoya wesikhwele, ngobe imsola lomkayo. Iyawummikisa embikwaSimakadze, bese umphristi ufeza wonkhe lomtsetfo kuye lomfati.
Indvodza ingeke ibe nelicala ngaloko, kodvwa umfati uyawutetfwalela licala lakhe.’ ”
“Tjela sive sema-Israyeli utsi: ‘Nome ngubani lomdvuna nome lomsikati, loyakwenta setsembiso sekuba ngumNaziri ngekutehlukanisela Simakadze,

uyakwehlukana neliwayini netjwala. Akasayikuyinatsa iviniga leyentiwe ngeliwayini nome-ke nganguluphi luhlobo lwetjwala. Akukafaneli anatse nesinatfo semagelebisi, angasawadli ngisho nemagelebisi nome ngulomisiwe nome ngulamanti.
Ngaso sonkhe sikhatsi sakhe sekutehlukanisela Simakadze akayikudla lutfo loluvela esihlahleni semvini, ngisho nenhlanyelo nome sikhumba semagelebisi.
Ngawo onkhe lawo malanga layawube atehlukanisela ngawo Simakadze akayiwusondzela edvute nesidvumbu,
nome kunguyise, nome kungunina, nome kungumnakabo, nome kungudzadzewabo, nakwenteka bafa, akafaneli kutingcolisa ngaloko, ngobe umgcobo wekutehlukanisela Nkulunkulu uyawube usesetikwenhloko yakhe.
Ngaso sonkhe sikhatsi sekutehlukanisela uyawuba ngcwele kuSimakadze.
Kuyawutsi ngelilanga lesiphohlongo uyawuletsa ematuba lamabili nome emavukutfu lamancane lamabili kumphristi amnyango welithende lekuhlangana.

Umphristi-ke uyawunikela linye libe ngumnikelo wesono, lelinye libe lemnikelo wekushiswa, amentele inhlawulo yekubuyisana, ngobe wonile ngenca yaleso sidvumbu. UmNaziri uyawutehlukanisela inhloko yakhe ngalona lelo langa lekuhlanjululwa,

atehlukanisele Simakadze ngawo onkhe lawo malanga ekutehlukanisela kwakhe, aletse lizinyane lemvu lelidvuna lelinemnyaka munye budzala libe lemnikelo welicala; noko sikhatsi sekucala asiyikubalwa, ngobe kutehlukanisela kwakhe kwangcoliseka.

bese unikela ngesipho sakhe kuSimakadze: lizinyane lemvu lelidvuna lelinemnyaka munye budzala, lingabi nasici, libe lemnikelo wekushiswa, nelizinyane lemvu lelisikati lelinemnyaka munye budzala, lelingenasici, libe lemnikelo wesono, nesihhanca sinye lesingenasici, sibe ngumnikelo wekuthula.

Uyawunikela nangelibhasikidi linye letinkhwa letingenambiliso, nangemacebelengwane lentiwe ngafulaha lobhicwe nemafutsa emncumo, nangemicatsane legcotjiswe ngemafutsa emncumo, bese wengeta nangemnikelo wakhe walokutinhlavu neweliwayini.
“ ‘Umphristi-ke uyakukuletsa embikwaSimakadze, anikele ngemnikelo wesono nangemnikelo wekushiswa,
anikele nangalesihhanca sibe ngumhlatjelo wemnikelo wekuthula kuSimakadze, kanye nalelibhasikidi letinkhwa letingenambiliso; umphristi uyawunikela nemnikelo walokutinhlavu newekunatfwa.

LomNaziri-ke uyawube sewuyatihhula tinwele takhe enhloko yakhe ahhulele emnyango welithende lekuhlangana, atsatse letinwele tenhloko yakhe lengcwele atifake emlilweni longaphansi kwemnikelo wekuthula.

“ ‘Umphristi uyawutsatsa siphanga lesibilisiwe sesihhanca, asibhice nelicebelengwane linye lelingenambiliso lelisebhasikidini nemcatsane munye, awubeke etandleni temNaziri, nase acedze kuhhula tinwele tekutehlukanisela.

Umphristi uyakukujikitisa, ente umnikelo wekujikitiswa embikwaSimakadze; kusabelo lesingcwele semphristi kanye nemnikelo wemganga lojikitiswako, nemlente lonikelwe. Emvakwaloko-ke lomNaziri sekangalinatsa liwayini.

Lona-ke ngumtsetfo wemNaziri lowenta sifungo. Umnikelo wakhe kuSimakadze uyakuya njengekwetsembisa kwakhe njengemNaziri ngetulu kwaloko langakhona kunikela ngako. Kufanele agcwalise sifungo sakhe lasentile njengekwemtsetfo wemNaziri.’ ”
“Shano ku-Aroni nakumadvodzana akhe utsi sive saka-Israyeli niyawusibusisa kanjena:
Shangatsi Simakadze angakhanyisa buso bakhe kuwe, abe nemusa kuwe.
Shangatsi Simakadze angaphakamisela buso bakhe ngakuwe, akuphe nekuthula.’
“Bayawulibita kanjalo-ke libito lami kuso sive saka-Israyeli, mine-ke ngiyawusibusisa.”
Baholi lababetinhloko tetive tema-Israyeli labo lababephetse nakwentiwa lubalo, baletsa iminikelo.

Baletsa iminikelo yabo kuSimakadze: tincola letisitfupha letimbonyiwe, netinkhabi letili-12, incola iyinye yayiphuma kubaholi lababili, inkhabi iyinye yayiphuma kumholi munye; konkhe loku bakunikela embikwelithende lekukhontela.
“Yemukele leminikelo, khona itawusetjentiswa ethendeni lekuhlangana. Yinike emaLevi njengekwesidzingo salowo nalowo muntfu emsebentini wakhe.”
Ngako Mosi watsatsa letincola naletinkhabi wakunika emaLevi.
EmaGeshoni wawanika tincola letimbili netinkhabi letine njengekwesidzingo semsebenti wawo;
kwatsi emaMerari wawanika tincola letine netinkhabi letisiphohlongo njengekwesidzingo semsebenti wawo. Onkhe abeholwa ngu-Ithamari, indvodzana ya-Aroni, umphristi.
Kodvwa Mosi akawanikanga lutfo emaKhohati, ngobe phela wona bekufanele letintfo letingcwele atetfwale emahlombe awo.
Latsi kube lelilati ligcotjwe ngemafutsa, baholi baletsa iminikelo yabo yekulinikela, bayibeka embikwalo.
Simakadze wakhuluma kuMosi, watsi: “Akunikele umholi munye ngelilanga linye, aletse lowo mnikelo wakhe wekunikelwa kwelilati.”
Lowaletsa umnikelo wakakhe ngelilanga lekucala kwaba nguNasoni, umsa wa-Aminadabi, wesive sakaJuda.

Umnikelo wakhe kwakulipulede lesiliva lelalinesisindvo lesasingaba yikhilogremu nencenye, nendishi yesiliva yekunyenyeta lenesisindvo lesasingemagremu labengaba ngema-800, kokubili kwaya ngekwesilinganiso lesisemtsetfweni, kokubili kwakugcwele fulaha abhicwe nemafutsa, kutsi kutewuba ngumnikelo walokutinhlavu;
ingwembe yegolide lenesisindvo lesasingemagremu labengaba li-110, igcwele imphepho;
inkunzana, nesihhanca, nelizinyane lemvu lelidvuna lelinemnyaka munye budzala, kwaba kwemnikelo wekushiswa;

tinkunzana letimbili, netihhanca letisihlanu, netiphongo letisihlanu, nemazinyane lamadvuna etimvu lasihlanu lanemnyaka munye budzala, kutsi kutewuba ngumnikelo wekuthula. Kwaba ngulowo-ke umnikelo waNasoni, umsa wa-Aminadabi.
Ngelilanga lesibili Nethaneli, umsa waSuwari, umholi wesive saka-Isakhari, waletsa umnikelo wakakhe.

Lena-ke ngiminikelo yebaholi besive saka-Israyeli yekunikela lilati nase ligcotjwe ngemafutsa, seyiyonkhe yema kanje: emapulede esiliva labeli-12, netindishi tesiliva tekunyenyeta letili-12, netingwembe tegolide letili-12.

Ngulelo nalelo pulede lalinesisindvo lesasingaba yikhilogremu nencenye, nguleyo naleyo ndishi yesiliva yekunyenyeta yayinesisindvo lesasingemagremu labengaba ngema-800. Setitonkhe tindishi tesiliva tatinesisindvo lesasingemakhilogremu labengaba ngema-28 ngekwesilinganiso lesisemtsetfweni.

Letingwembe tegolide letili-12 iyinye igcwele imphepho yayinesisindvo lesasingemagremu labengaba li-110, ngekwesilinganiso lesisemtsetfweni. Setitonkhe letingwembe tegolide tatinesisindvo lesasingaba yikhilogremu nemagremu langema-320.

Setitonkhe tifuyo letatitawushiswa kulomnikelo kwaba tinkunzana letili-12, netihhanca letili-12, nemazinyane etimvu lamadvuna lali-12 lanemnyaka munye budzala, kanye neminikelo yalokutinhlavu. Kwasetjentiswa tiphongo letili-12 emnikelweni wesono.

Setitonkhe tifuyo temhlatjelo wemnikelo wekuthula kwaba tinkunzana letingema-24, netihhanca letingema-60, netiphongo letingema-60, nemazinyane etimvu lamadvuna langema-60 lanemnyaka munye budzala. Konkhe loko kwakukwemnikelo wekunikelwa kwelilati nase ligcotjwe ngemafutsa.

Ngesikhatsi Mosi angena ethendeni lekuhlangana kuyawukhuluma naSimakadze, weva livi likhuluma naye liphuma esihlalweni semusa lesasisetikwelibhokisi lesivumelwane emkhatsini wemakherubhi lamabili. Bakhulumisana.
“Tjela Aroni utsi: ‘Ngesikhatsi ulumeka letibane letisikhombisa, kufanele tikhanyise lendzawo lesembikwelutsi lwetibane.’ ”
Aroni wavele wakwenta loko; wemisa letibane, takhanyisa lendzawo lesembikwelutsi lwetibane, njengobe Simakadze abeshito kuMosi.
Lolutsi lwalwakhiwe ngegolide legcotjiwe, kusukela esibunu salo kuze kube ngusetimbalini talo. Lolutsi lwalwakhiwe ncamashi ngendlela Mosi labeyilayelwe nguNkulunkulu.
“Yehlukanisa emaLevi emkhatsini wesive sema-Israyeli, bese uyawahlambulula.
Kufanele uwahlambulule kanje: Wafafate ngemanti ekuhlambulula, bese ahhula wonkhe umtimba, ageze timphahla tawo, atawube asayahlanteka.
Akatsatse inkunzana nemnikelo wayo walokutinhlavu kwafulaha lobhicwe nemafutsa, bese utsatsa inkunzana yesibili letawuba yemnikelo wesono.
Uyakwetfula emaLevi embikwelithende lekuhlangana, bese uhlanganisa sonkhe sive sema-Israyeli.
Uyakwetfula lamaLevi kuSimakadze, bese sive sema-Israyeli sibeka tandla taso etikwawo.
Aroni uyawube sewetfula lamaLevi kuSimakadze abe ngumnikelo wekujikitiswa wesive sema-Israyeli, kuze alungele kwenta umsebenti waSimakadze.

EmaLevi atawutsi angabeka tandla tawo etinhloko taletinkunzana, wena-ke bese unikela lenye ibe ngumnikelo wesono, lena lenye ibe ngumnikelo wekushiswa kuSimakadze kutekwenta inhlawulo yekubuyisana kwemaLevi naSimakadze.
“LamaLevi uyakuwemisa embikwabo-Aroni nemadvodzana akhe, bese uyawetfula njengemnikelo wekujikisiswa kuSimakadze.
Uyakuwehlukanisa kanjalo-ke emaLevi emkhatsini wesive sema-Israyeli; lamaLevi atawuba ngewami.
Emvakwaloko-ke emaLevi ayawungena ayekwenta inkonzo yawo ethendeni lekuhlangana, nase uwahlambululile wawetfula njengemnikelo wekujikitiswa.
Bona bangema-Israyeli lekufanele nginikwe wona ngalokuphelele. Ngititsatsele wona kutsi abe ngewami esikhundleni sematubulo onkhe latalwa ngiso sonkhe sive sema-Israyeli.
Onkhe ematubulo lamadvuna esive sema-Israyeli, ebantfu nome etilwane ngewami. Ngesikhatsi ngibulala onkhe ematubulo eGibhithe ngatehlukanisela wona.
Ngititsatsele emaLevi esikhundleni sawo onkhe ematubulo esive saka-Israyeli.

Emkhatsini waso sonkhe sive sema-Israyeli emaLevi ngiwaphe bo-Aroni nemadvodzana akhe kutsi abe tipho tabo, ente inkonzo ethendeni lekuhlangana egameni lesive sonkhe sema-Israyeli nekutsi asentele inhlawulo yekubuyisana sitewuvikeleka esijezisweni lesingahle sisehlele, nakwenteka sisondzela endzaweni lengcwele.”
Ngako-ke boMosi, na-Aroni, nesive sonkhe sema-Israyeli bavele bakwenta konkhe loko kumaLevi; bakwenta kuwo njengobe Simakadze abeyale Mosi.
EmaLevi atihlambulula, ageza netimphahla tawo. Aroni wawetfula aba ngumnikelo wekujikitiswa kuSimakadze, wawentela nenhlawulo yekubuyisana, wawahlambulula.
Emvakwaloko emaLevi eta kutakwenta umsebenti wawo ethendeni lekuhlangana ngephansi kwa-Aroni nemadvodzana akhe. Bakwenta kumaLevi konkhe loko Simakadze abeyale Mosi macondzana nawo.
“Nangu umtsetfo locondzene nemaLevi: Onkhe emaLevi kusukela eminyakeni lengema-25 budzala kuye etulu ayakuyingenela lenkonzo yawo ethendeni lekuhlangana,
kodvwa kusukela eminyakeni lengema-50 budzala ayawutsatsa umhlalaphansi, angabe asasebenta,
kodvwa noko angasita labanakabo ekwenteni inkonzo yelithende lekuhlangana. Wona ngekwawo akufanele ayente leyo nkonzo. Uyakwenta njalo-ke, nawunika emaLevi inkonzo yawo.”
“Ema-Israyeli akagubhe uMkhosi weliPhasika ngaleso sikhatsi lesimisiwe.
Akaligubhe ngaleso sikhatsi lesimisiwe, kusihlwa ngelilanga leli-14 kuyo lenyanga; kulandzelwe yonkhe leyo mitsetfo nemiyalo lemacondzana nalo.”
Ngako Mosi watjela sive sema-Israyeli kutsi akagubhe umkhosi weliPhasika;
avele akwenta loko eHlane laseSinayi kusihlwa ngelilanga leli-14 enyangeni yekucala. Ema-Israyeli akwenta konkhe loko njengobe Simakadze abeyale Mosi.
batsi: “Sesingcolile ngenca yekutsintsa sidvumbu, kodvwa kuya ngani kutsi tsine sikhishwe sivinjelwe kutsi siletse umnikelo waSimakadze kanye nalamanye ema-Israyeli ngaleso sikhatsi lesesimisiwe?”
“Tjela ema-Israyeli utsi: ‘Nangabe lomunye wenu nome wetitukulwane tenu angcole ngenca yekutsintsa sidvumbu nome aseluhambeni khashane, kodvwa noko angaligubha lelo Phasika laSimakadze.
Kufanele bona baligubhe ngelilanga leli-14 enyangeni yesibili kusihlwa. Kufanele baligubhe ngekudla lizinyane lemvu, nesinkhwa lesite imbiliso kanye netibhidvo letibabako.
Kufanele kubete labakushiyela likusasa, kantsi nematsambo alo bangawephuli. Nabagubha loMkhosi weliPhasika, kufanele bayente yonkhe imitsetfo yalo.

Kodvwa nakwenteka lomunye ayekela kuwugubha loMkhosi weliPhasika, kantsi akasiye longcolile ngekwemtsetfo futsi akekho ekuhambeni, lowo muntfu uyawuncunywa esiveni sakubo, ngobe phela akawuletsi umnikelo waSimakadze ngaleso sikhatsi lesijutjiwe. Lowo muntfu uyawulitfwala lelo cala lesono sakhe.
Lalivamise kwenta njalo nje ngekutsi lelifu lilimbonye, bese kutsi ebusuku lifanane nemlilo.
Kwakutsi nangabe lifu liphakama etikwelithende, ema-Israyeli atfutse, litsi lapho lima khona, ema-Israyeli nawo emise khona.
Ema-Israyeli abetfutsa ngekuyalwa nguSimakadze, ngalokufananako abemisa nase kusho Simakadze. Babengatfutsi kuleyo nkambu, nangabe lelifu seloku lisetikwelithende lekukhontela.
Nangabe lelifu lihleti etikwelithende lekukhontela emalanga lamanyenti, ema-Israyeli abelalela umyalo waSimakadze, angatfutsi.
Ngaletinye tikhatsi lelifu lalike libesetikwelithende lekukhontela emalanga lambalwa; abetsi Simakadze angawatjela kutsi akeme, bese ayemisa atsi angawatjela kutsi akahambe, vele atfutse.

Ngaletinye tikhatsi lelifu lalihlala etikwelithende kusukela kusihlwa kuze kube ngusekuseni, litsi lingaphakama ekuseni, batfutse futsi. Babechubeka bahambe nase kuphakeme lelifu nome ngusemini nome ngusebusuku.
Kwakutsi lelifu nalihleti etikwalelithende lekukhontela emalanga lamabili nome inyanga nome umnyaka, ema-Israyeli abechubeka kuhlala lapho, angatfutsi; kodvwa lalitsi lingaphakama, nawo vele atfutse.
Simakadze abetsi angawatjela kutsi akeme, nawo eme, atsi angawatjela kutsi akahambe vele nawo ahambe, alalela umyalo waSimakadze ngesandla saMosi.
“Yakha emacilongo lamabili esiliva legcotjiwe; lamacilongo ayawusetjentiswa ekubiteni sive nasekudzilitweni kwemathende nase kutfutfwa.
Nakushaywa lamacilongo lamabili, sive sonkhe siyawubutsana kuwe ekungeneni kwelithende lekuhlangana.
Kodvwa nakukhala linye licilongo kuphela, kuyawubutsana kuwe baholi bodvwa, lekungutona tinhloko tetive tema-Israyeli.
Licilongo nalikhala tikhawu letimfisha kwekucala, tonkhe tive letingasemphumalanga tiyawuphuma tihambe.
Licilongo nalikhala tikhawu letimfisha kwesibili, tonkhe tive letingaseningizimu tiyawuphuma tihambe. Ngako-ke emathende ayawudzilitwa, nangabe licilongo likhala tikhawu letimfisha,
kodvwa nangabe kubitwa sive sonkhe, liyawukhala tikhawu letindze.
“Lomyalo uyakwentiwa sive sema-Israyeli kuto tonkhe titukulwane.

Naniyakulwa imphi eveni lenu nihlaselwa titsa tinivimbetela, niyawukhalisa licilongo ngetikhawu tekuhlaba inyandzaleyo. Mine, Simakadze, Nkulunkulu wenu ngiyakunikhumbula nginisite, bese ngiyanephula etitseni tenu.

Nangemikhosi yenu yekujabula, ngemkhosi wekwetfwasa kwenyanga lensha nangaleminye imikhosi yekukhonta, niyawushaya emacilongo, nanetfula iminikelo yenu yekushiswa neminikelo yenu yekuthula lenguyona iyawuba sikhumbuto senu embikwaNkulunkulu wenu. Mine nginguSimakadze Nkulunkulu wenu.”
Mhlazana tingema-20, enyangeni yesibili, emnyakeni wesibili, lifu lelalisetikwelithende lesivumelwane laphakama.
Sive sema-Israyeli satfutsa eHlane laseSinayi, siphuma ngeticheme taso. Lifu lahamba laze layakuma eHlane lasePharani.
Babecala kutfutsa bayalwa nguSimakadze ngemlomo waMosi.
Ticheme tesive sakaJuda tatfutsa kucala ngetigaba taso ngaphansi kwesiboniso sebuve baso. Umholi wato bekunguNasoni, umsa wa-Aminadabi.
Umholi wesicheme sesive saka-Isakhari bekunguNethaneli, umsa waSuwari.
Umholi wesicheme sesive sakaZebuloni bekungu-Eliyabe, umsa waHeloni.
Kwase kulandzela ticheme tesive sakaRubeni ngetigaba taso ngaphansi kwesiboniso sebuve baso. Umholi waso bekungu-Elisuri, umsa waShedewuri.
Umholi wesive sakaSimeyoni bekunguShelumiyeli, umsa waSurishadayi.
Umholi wesicheme sesive sakaGadi bekungu-Eliyasafa, umsa waDehuweli.
Kwase kulandzela ticheme tesive saka-Efrayimu ngetigaba taso ngaphansi kwesiboniso sebuve baso. Umholi waso bekungu-Elishama, umsa wa-Amihudi.
Umholi wesive sakaManase bekunguGamaliyeli, umsa waPhedasuri.
Umholi wesive sakaBhenjamini bekungu-Abidani, umsa waGideyoni.
Ekugcineni kwase kulandzela tigaba teticheme tesive sakaDani ngaphansi kwesiboniso sebuve baso letaba sivikelo sema-Israyeli ngemuva. Umholi waso bekungu-Ahiyezeri, umsa wa-Amishadayi.
Umholi wesive saka-Asheri bekunguPhagiyeli, umsa wa-Okrani.
Umholi wesicheme sesive sakaNaftali bekungu-Ahira, umsa wa-Enani.
Loko-ke bekungukona kuhleleka kwekuphuma kwema-Israyeli ngekweticheme tawo, njalo nje nakatfutsa.
Hobabi waphendvula watsi: “Cha, ngingeke ngihambe nani; sengibuyela eveni lakitsi nasesiveni sakitsi.”
Mosi wamncenga atsi: “Mane ungasishiyi; wena phela uyati lapho kufanele simise khona kutsi ngusehlane; wena ungasisita ube liso letfu.
Nawungahamba natsi, siyawuhlephunelana nawe konkhe lokuhle Simakadze layakusipha kona.”

Satsi sive sema-Israyeli nasisuka eNtsabeni yaSimakadze, satsatsa emalanga lamatsatfu sihamba. Libhokisi lesivumelwane saSimakadze lalihamba embikwabo ngawo onkhe lawo malanga lamatsatfu, libabukela indzawo lapho kwakufanele baphumule khona.
Babetsi njalo nje nabatfutsako, lifu laSimakadze libesetikwabo emini.
Kwakutsi njalo nalima lelibhokisi, atsi: “Buya Simakadze, buya etigidzigidzini temindeni yaka-Israyeli.”
Batsi kube bantfu bakhale kuMosi, wase uthandaza kuSimakadze, umlilo wacima.
Sesikhumbule eGibhithe lapho sasidla khona inhlanti mahhala, sasidla emaselwa, nemajoti, nashaladi na-anyanisi, negalikhi.
Kodvwa nyalo sesilahlekelwe lutsandvo lwekudla. Kute kudla lapha, ngaphandle kwalemana!”

Bantfu babehamba bayewubutsa, bese bayakusila esigayweni setandla nome etjeni lekusila. Babekupheka ngelibhodo nome bente ngako emacebelengwane. Kwakunambitseka njengekudla lokuphekwe ngemafutsa emncumo.
Ngesikhatsi kwehla ematolo ebusuku enkambu, nemana yayehla kanye nawo.
Mosi weva bantfu emindenini yonkhe balila, ngulaba nalaba emnyango welithende labo. Simakadze watfukutsela wabilelana; naMosi waphatseka kabi emoyeni ngaloko.
Wabuta kuSimakadze watsi: “Inceku yakho uyiletseleleni lokuhlupheka? Ngenteni lembi kuwe, kutsi ungaze ungeleke ngalomtfwalo wabo bonkhe labantfu?

Bemitfwa ngimi yini bonkhe labantfu? Batalwa ngimi yini, kutsi ungaze ungitjele kutsi angibagone ngemikhono njengesidzandzane nasiphetse luswane, ngize ngiyewubangenisa eveni lowaletsembisa bokhokho babo ngesifungo?
Ngingayitsatsaphi nje inyama lengenela bonkhe labantfu? Bayangikhalela batsi: ‘Siphe inyama sitekudla.’
Anginawo emandla ekwetfwala bonkhe labantfu, ngobe bangumtfwalo lomatima kakhulu lapha kimi.
Nangabe utangiphatsa kanjena, ngiyacela kutsi usale sewungibulala khona manje nje, nangizuze umusa ebusweni bakho, khona ngingasayiwuphindze ngibone lusizi lwami.”
Ngitakwehla ngitewukhuluma nawe lapho, ngitsatse lokunye lokukwaMoya lokukuwe ngikunike bona. Batakusita ekwetfwaleni umtfwalo walesive kanye nawe, khona ungetikwetfwala wedvwa.

Tjela labantfu utsi: ‘Tihlambululeni nitilungiselele likusasa; kukhona inyama lenitayidla kusasa kona loku. Simakadze univile nanikhala nitsi: “Ngubani longasipha inyama sitekudla? Sasincono eGibhithe.” Manje-ke Simakadze utanipha inyama, futsi vele nitayidla.
Ningeke niyidle lilanga linye, nome lamabili, nome lasihlanu, nome lalishumi nome langema-20,
kodvwa niyakuyidla inyanga yonkhe, ize iphume nangemakhala, inenyanyise, ngobe senimlahlile Simakadze losemkhatsini wenu, nakhala kuye natsi: “Empeleni saphumelani khona lena eGibhithe?” ’ ”
Beyingabenela yini inyama kube bekungahlatjwa yonkhe imihlambi yetimvu, netimbuti, netinkhomo? Betingabenela yini tona tinhlanti tonkhe telwandle lebetingabanjelwa bona?”
Ngako-ke Mosi waphuma wayawutjela sive konkhe labekutjelwe nguSimakadze. Wahlanganisa bonkhe baholi lababengema-70, wabemisa batungeleta lithende lekukhontela.

Simakadze wase uyehla asekhatsi efini, wakhuluma naye. Wase utsatsa lokunye kwaMoya lokwakukuMosi, wakubeka etikwalabaholi labangema-70. Watsi kube Moya ahlale etikwalabaholi, baphrofetha, kodvwa abazange baphindze baphrofethe.
Lababili balabaholi labangema-70, bo-Eldadi neMedadi, bona babesele enkambu, bangakayi ethendeni lekuhlangana. Nabo behlelwa nguMoya baphrofetha.
Kwaphuma lelinye lijaha lagijima layawubikela Mosi, lafike latsi: “Bo-Eldadi naMedadi bayaphrofetha lena enkambu.”
Mosi wamphendvula, watsi: “Unemona yini ngami? Ngifisa shangatsi sonkhe sive saSimakadze ngabe sibaphrofethi nekutsi Simakadze abeke Moya wakhe kuso.”
Mosi nabo bonkhe baholi besive sema-Israyeli bancandzeka babuyela enkambu.

Ngalelo langa bantfu basukuma bagola letigwaca lonkhe lilanga nebusuku balo, ngisho nangakusasa kwakhona, kute noko lowagola ngaphansi kwemakhilogremu labengaba yinkhulungwane. Bateneka ngephandle kwenkambu.
Kwatsi naleyo nyama yabo isegcwele umlomo, bangakayihlafuni nekuyihlafuna, lulaka lwaSimakadze lwabavutsela wabashaya ngesifo lesimatima.
Ngako-ke libito laleyo ndzawo kwabe sekutsiwa yiKhibrothi Hathava,
Sive satfutsa eKhibrothi Hathava, sahamba saze semisa eHaserothi, lapho sefika sahlala khona.
BoMiriyamu na-Aroni bakhuluma kabi ngaMosi, bamsola kutsi abetsetse umfati labengumKushe. Phela Mosi bekashade umfati labengumKushe.
Babekhuluma batsi: “Kambe ngabe Simakadze ukhulume ngaMosi kuphela
Mosi bekangumuntfu lotfobekile kwendlula wonkhe umuntfu labekhona emhlabeni.
Masinyane Simakadze wakhuluma kuboMosi, na-Aroni, naMiriyamu, watsi: “Phutfumani nobatsatfu nite kimi ethendeni lekuhlangana.” Baphuma bobatsatfu.
Simakadze wehla ngensika yelifu, wema emnyango welithende lekuhlangana; wabita boMiriyamu na-Aroni bobabili, basondzela.
Simakadze watsi kubo: “Lalelani la kimi: Nakunemphrofethi lapha emkhatsini wenu, ngimi Simakadze lengitibonakalisa ngemibono kuye ngikhulume naye ngemaphupho.
Kodvwa angenti njalo kulenceku yami Mosi. Kuyo yonkhe indlu yami wetsembekile.
Kuye ngikhuluma umlomo nemlomo, ngikhulume ebaleni, ngingabi ngigega liguma; ubukana nesimo saSimakadze. Nine-ke nisitsatsaphi lesibindzi lesingaka sekukhuluma kabi ngenceku yami, Mosi?”

Latsi lisuka nje lelifu ethendeni lekuhlangana, Miriyamu wabe asamhlophe hhu lokusabulephelo wonkhe umtimba, asamhlophe njengesitfwatfwa. Aroni wagucukela kuMiriyamu, wamkhandza asatse hhu wonkhe umtimba.
Aroni watsi kuMosi: “Hhawu, nkhosi, mane ungasijezisi ngalesono setfu lesisente ngebulima.
Mane umente angabi njengeluswane lolutelwe lufile ngekutsi inyama yakhe ibe njengaledlovotekile kwasesiswini senina.”
Mosi wakhala kuSimakadze atsi: “Mphilise Nkulunkulu, ngiyakuncenga.”
Ngako-ke Miriyamu wavalelwa ngephandle kwenkambu emalanga lasikhombisa. Sive sonkhe asizange sichubeke nekutfutsa, waze wabuyiswa.
Emvakwaloko sive satfutsa eHaserothi sayakumisa eHlane lasePharani.
“Tfumela lamanye emadvodza kutsi ayewuhlola lelive laseKhenani lengilipha ema-Israyeli. Tfumela umholi abe munye kuleso nakuleso sive.”
esiveni sakaManase, lekwakusive sakaJosefa, kwakunguGadi, umsa waSusi;
Ngiwo lawa-ke emabito alamadvodza latfunywa nguMosi kutsi ayewuhlola lelo live. Mosi wetsa Hosheya, umsa waNuni, libito, watsi nguJoshuwa.
Mosi nabatfuma kutsi baye kuyawuhlola lelo live laseKhenani, wakhuluma kubo, watsi: “Khuphukani, ningene ngaseningizimu nelive laseKhenani nize niyewufika etintsabeni.
Hlolisisani kutsi lelo live linjani, nekutsi labantfu labahlala kulo bacinile yini nome babutsakatsaka, nekutsi bambalwa yini nome banyenti.
Bahlala eveni lelinjani? Lihle yini nome libi? Bahlala emadolobheni lanjani? Lamadolobha abo akabiyelwe yini ngetibondza nome abiyelwe atinqaba?
Umhlaba walo unjani? Uvundzile yini nome awukavundzi? Tikhona yini tihlahla nome atikho? Nibetama ngawo onkhe emandla enu kutsi niphatse titselo talo lelive!”
Benyuka, bafike balihlola lonkhe lelo live kusukela eHlane laseSini kuze kuyewufika eRehobu, edvute nemsaho, iHamathi.

Benyuka badzabula iNegevu, lekuyiningizimu yelive laseKhenani, baze befika eHebroni, lapho kwakuhlala khona bo-Ahimani, naSheshayi, naThalmayi, titukulwane ta-Anaki. IHebroni yayakhiwe iminyaka lesikhombisa ngaphambi kweSowani yaseGibhithe.
Leyo ndzawo yetsiwa ngekutsi Sihosha sase-Eshikholi,
Ekupheleni kwemalanga langema-40 babuya ekuhloleni kwabo live.
Befika kuboMosi, na-Aroni kanye nesive sonkhe sema-Israyeli eKhadeshi, eHlane lasePharani. Befika bababikela kanye nesive sonkhe, badzimate babakhombisa netitselo talelo live.
Betfula umbiko kuMosi, batsi: “Sihambile saya kulelive lositfume kutsi siyekulihlola; sakhandza kutsi, vele live leligcwele lubisi neluju lwetinyosi. Nati nje letinye titselo talo.
Kodvwa bantfu labahlala kulelive banemandla, nemadolobha akhona atinqaba kantsi futsi makhulu kakhulu. Sabona ngisho netitukulwane ta-Anaki khona lapho.
Ema-Amaleki ahlala eningizimu nelive; emaHethi, nemaJebhusi, nema-Amori wona ahlala eveni letintsaba, emaKhenani ahlala ngaselwandle, nangasemfuleni iJordane.”
Khalebi wababindzisa bonkhe bantfu embikwaMosi, wakhuluma watsi: “Asikhuphuke siyewulidla lelive, ngobe vele singakhona kulincoba.”
Kodvwa lamadvodza labenyuke naye akhuluma atsi: “Singeke sikhone kulwa nalabantfu; bacinile kunatsi.”

Ngako basakata umbiko lomubi esiveni sema-Israyeli ngalelive bebayewulihlola. Bakhuluma, batsi: “Lelive lesidzabule kulo silihlola, lilive lelidla bantfu labahlala kulo. Bonkhe labantfu lesibabonile kulo badze kakhulu.
Kubo lobo busuku bonkhe bantfu bakhihla lesikhulu sililo.
Onkhe ema-Israyeli asola boMosi na-Aroni atsi kubo: “Kube samane safela eGibhithe nome ehlane.
Simakadze usiletseleni kulelive kutsi sitewubulawa bese kutfunjwa bafati betfu nebantfwabetfu? Kungete kwaba ncono yini kutsi sincandzeke sibuyele eGibhithe?”
Bakhuluma bodvwana batsi: “Asikhetse umholi, sincandzeke sibuyele eGibhithe.”
BoMosi na-Aroni bakhotsamisa buso babo embikwesive sonkhe sema-Israyeli lesasihlangene lapho.
Joshuwa, umsa waNuni, naKhalebi, umsa waJefune, lababehambe nalamadvodza labeyewuhlola lelive, badzabula timphahla tabo,
bakhuluma kulesive sonkhe sema-Israyeli, batsi: “Lelive silihambe lonkhe, silihlola; salikhandza kutsi lihle kakhulu.
Nangabe Simakadze asitfokotela, utasihola, siyewungena kulelive leligcwele lubisi neluju lwetinyosi, asiphe lona.
Musani kuhlubuka Simakadze, futsi ningabesabi nalabantfu balelive, ngobe sitabagwinya. Sivikelo sabo sesihambile, kodvwa Simakadze unatsi. Ningabesabi.”
Sonkhe sive savele satimisela kubagcoba ngematje. Kwase kubonakala inkhatimulo yaSimakadze ethendeni lekuhlangana; onkhe ema-Israyeli ayibona.
Simakadze wakhuluma kuMosi, watsi: “Labantfu batawuchubeka nekungedzelela kuze kube ngunini? Batakwala kukholwa ngimi kuze kube ngunini, etikwaletibonakaliso temimangaliso lengitente kubo?
Ngitawubashaya ngesifo sitekubabhubhisa, kodvwa wena ngitakwenta ube nguyise wesive lesitawuba sikhulu sibe nemandla kunabo.”

Loko ayakukutjela letive letakhe kulelive. Nabo labantfu bakulesive sebevile kutsi wena, Simakadze, usemkhatsini walesive nekutsi wena, Simakadze, ubonakala kuso buso nebuso; lifu lakho lihlala etikwabo, nekutsi emini uhamba embikwabo ngensika yelifu, bese kutsi ebusuku uhambe embikwabo ngensika yemlilo.
Nawusibulala ngasikhatsi sinye lesive sonkhe, tonkhe letive letiwuvile lombiko ngawe tiyawutsi:
‘Simakadze wehlulekile kungenisa lesive sakhe eveni labefunge kutsi utasingenisa kulo; wababulalela ehlane bonkhe.’
Ngako-ke ngicela kutsi Simakadze akhombise emandla akhe, njengobe asho, watsi:
‘Simakadze uyephuta kutfukutsela andze ngemusa, atsetselele sono nekuhlubuka. Noko lonelicala akamshiyi angakamjezisi; yena ujezisa bantfwana ngesono saboyise situkulwane sesitsatfu nesesine.’
Njengobe wena, Simakadze, unelutsandvo lolukhulu, tsetselela sono salabantfu njengobe bewusolo ubatsetselela, kusukela besuka eGibhithe kuze kube ngunyalo.”
Kodvwa ngiyetsembisa ngitsi ngifunga kuphila kwami nenkhatimulo yami legcwele umhlaba wonkhe,
kute nome munye walabantfu lababona inkhatimulo yami netibonakaliso letiyimimangaliso lengatenta eGibhithe nasehlane kodvwa bangete bangilalela, bangilinga emahlandla lalishumi,
kute namunye wabo loyawulibona lelive lengafunga ngalo kuboyisemkhulu kutsi ngitabanika lona. Kute namunye lotalibona kulabo labangedzelela.
Kodvwa njengobe inceku yami Khalebi anemoya lowehlukile futsi ungilandzela ngenhlitiyo yakhe yonkhe, ngitamngenisa kulelive laya kulo, nebatukulu bakhe bayawulidla libe lifa labo.
Njengobe ema-Amaleki nemaKhenani ahlala kulesigodzi, ncandzeka kusasa ucondze ngasehlane ngemgwaco lobheke ngaseLwandle Lolubovu.”
“Kutawuze kube ngunini lesive lesikhohlakele singisola? Sengikuvile kusola kwalama-Israyeli lakhononako.
Ngako-ke batjele utsi: ‘Simakadze utsi: Ngifunga kuphila kwami kutsi ngitakwenta kini tona kanye leto tintfo benginive nitisho.
Nitakufa, tidvumbu tenu tigcwale lonkhe lelihlane, nonkhe nine lenineminyaka lengema-20 kuya etulu nangenela lubalo, nangisola nekungisola.
Kute nome munye wenu loyawungena kulelo live lengalifungela ngekuphakamisa sandla kutsi kutawuba likhaya lenu, ngaphandle kwaboKhalebi, umsa waJefune, kanye naJoshuwa, umsa waNuni.
Bantfwabenu lenakhuluma ngabo natsi batawubulawa batfunjwe, mine-ke ngitabangenisa futsi balati lelive lenilalile.
Bantfwabenu batawuba belusi khona lapha, kuze kuphele iminyaka lengema-40, bahlupheka ngenca yekungetsembeki kwenu, kuze kufe newekugcina wenu.
Niyawuhlupheka kuze kuphele iminyaka lengema-40 ngenca yetono tenu, umnyaka umele lilanga linye lalawo langema-40, lenawacitsa nihlolisisa lelive, kuze nati kahle kutsi kuyini kumelana kwenu nami.’
Mine, Simakadze, sengikhulumile, futsi ngitakwenta loko kuso sonkhe lesive lesonakele lesihlanganele kumelana nami. Batawuhlangana nesiphetfo sabo lapha kulelihlane, baphelele khona.”
Ngako lamadvodza labetfunywe nguMosi kuyawuhlola lelive ase abuya afaka umoya wekusola kuso sonkhe sive ngalombiko wawo lomubi ngalelive,
yebo, lamadvodza lafike asakata lomoya wekusola ngekuletsa umbiko lomubi ngalelive, ashaywa ngesifo afa, embikwaSimakadze.
Emkhatsini walamadvodza laya kuyawuhlola lelive kwasala boJoshuwa, umsa waNuni, naKhalebi, umsa waJefune.
Watsi kube Mosi awabikele onkhe ema-Israyeli loko, akhala kakhulukati.
Mosi wakhuluma watsi: “Pho, nentelani lokungawulaleli umyalo waNkulunkulu? Loku ngeke kuphumelele!
Ningacali nenyuke, ngobe Simakadze akekho emkhatsini wenu. Titsa tenu titawunehlula,
ngobe ema-Amaleki nemaKhenani atawuhlangana nani lapho. Njengobe nisukile kuSimakadze, naye angeke abe nani, ngako nitakuwa ngelusiko lwenkemba.”
Noko bajinge benyukela etulu eveni letintsaba, nome Mosi kanye nelibhokisi lesivumelwane lalingakesuswa enkambu.
Ema-Amaleki nemaKhenani labehlala kulelo live letintsaba ehla atewubahlasela, abehlula abacosha, adzimate ababeka eHoma.
“Khuluma kuma-Israyeli utsi: ‘Nase ningene eveni lenginipha lona kutsi libe likhaya lenu,

nibobe seniletsa iminikelo leyentiwa ngemlilo kuSimakadze, ibe yetinkhomo, nome yetimbuti, nome yetimvu, kube liphunga lelinuka lusi lolumnandzi kuSimakadze. Kungaba ngumnikelo wekushiswa, nome umhlatjelo wekugcwalisa setsembiso lesitsite, nome umnikelo wesihle, nome iminikelo yemikhosi.
Lowo loletsa umnikelo wakhe utawuletsa kuSimakadze umnikelo walokutinhlavu ngemalitha langaba mabili afulaha lobhicwe nemafutsa emncumo langaba yilitha.
Lungisa liwayini lelingaba yilitha ngelizinyane lemvu, libe ngumnikelo wekushiswa nome wemhlatjelo, kutsi liwayini libe ngumnikelo wesinatfo.
Nawunikela ngesihhanca, bhica fulaha wemnikelo walokutinhlavu longemakhilogremu langaba mabili labhicwe nemafutsa emncumo langaba yilitha nencenye,
kunikelwe kanye neliwayini lelingaba yilitha nencenye, kube ngumnikelo wesinatfo. Kunikele kube liphunga lelinuka lusi lolumnandzi kuSimakadze.
Nawulungisa inkunzana kutsi ibe ngumnikelo wekushiswa nome ibe ngumhlatjelo wesetsembiso lesitsite nome semnikelo wekuthula kuSimakadze,
uyawuyiletsa kanye nemnikelo walokutinhlavu kube ngufulaha longemalitha langaba sitfupha nencenye lobhicwe nemafutsa emncumo langemalitha langaba mabili,
kanye neliwayini lelingemalitha langaba mabili, lemnikelo walokunatfwako kube ngumnikelo lowentiwa ngemlilo, liphunga lelinuka lusi lolumnandzi kuSimakadze.
“ ‘Kutabonikelwa kanjalo-ke, nakunikelwa ngenkunzi, nome ngesihhanca, nome ngelizinyane lemvu nome lembuti.
Ngulowo nalowo mnikelo ubowentela loko kuye ngebunyenti bawo.
Wonkhe um-Israyeli wekutalwa kufanele ente njalo nakaletsa umnikelo lowentiwa ngemlilo, kube liphunga lelinuka lusi lolumnandzi kuSimakadze.

Nakwenteka nome ngunini wetive lohlala emkhatsini wenu, nome kukwesikhashana nome sikhatsi lesidze, aletsa umnikelo lowentiwa ngemlilo, kube liphunga lelinuka lusi lolumnandzi kuSimakadze, naye kufanele ente njengobe nani nenta.
Sive siyawuba nemtsetfo lofananako: wenu kanye newebetive labahlala emkhatsini wenu. Leso-ke simiso setitukulwane ngetitukulwane. Nine nebetive niyawufanana embikwaSimakadze.
Imitsetfo nemiyalo yenu iyawusebenta ngalokufananako kini nakubetive labasemkhatsini wenu.’ ”
“Khuluma kuma-Israyeli utsi: ‘Nase ningene eveni lenginipha lona,
kufanele nehlukanisele Simakadze sabelo sakhe, nanidla sinkhwa salelo live.
Kufanele sinkhwa setilinga tenu tekwendvulelisa nisetfule njengemnikelo wesivuno senu sekucala ekubhuleni kwenu.
Tonkhe titukulwane tenu seniyawunikela kuSimakadze umnikelo wetivuno tenu tekwendvulelisa.
“ ‘Nangabe kwenteka nona ngesiphosiso ngekungayigcini lemiyalo Simakadze layinika Mosi,
konkhe loko Simakadze laniyala ngako ngaMosi kusukela mhlazana Mosi acala kuniyala kuye embili titukulwane ngetitukulwane,

nakwenteka-ke nona ngesiphosiso, nangabe sive sonkhe besingati, kufanele sive sinikele ngenkunzana yinye ibe ngumnikelo wekushiswa, liphunga lelinuka lusi lolumnandzi kuSimakadze, kanye nemnikelo walokutinhlavu, nemnikelo walokunatfwako, kanye nesiphongo sinye kube ngumnikelo wesono.

Umphristi uyakwenta inhlawulo yekubuyisana kwesive sonkhe sema-Israyeli siyawube sesiyatsetselelwa, ngobe sone ngesiphosiso, futsi sitsite ngekona kwaso sasesiletsa kuSimakadze umnikelo lowentiwa ngemlilo kanye nemnikelo wesono.
Sonkhe sive sema-Israyeli kanye nebetive labahlala emkhatsini waso bayawutsetselelwa, ngobe sonkhe lesive sone ngesiphosiso.
Umphristi uyawukwentela lowo muntfu lowone ngesiphosiso inhlawulo yekubuyisana naSimakadze. Nase amentele leyo nhlawulo yekubuyisana naSimakadze, lowo muntfu uyawube sewuyatsetselelwa.
Lowo mtsetfo wekona ngesiphosiso uyawusebenta ngalokufananako, nome ngabe kone um-Israyeli wekutalwa nome ngabe wetive.
“ ‘Kodvwa umuntfu lowona ngemabomu, nome angewemdzabu nome angewetive, uyawuba nelicala lekungahloniphi Simakadze, uyawuncunywa esiveni sakubo.
Njengobe lomuntfu wedzelele livi laSimakadze, wephula lomunye wemitsetfo yakhe ngemabomu, kufanele ancunywe; licala lakhe libe setikwakhe.’ ”
Atsi ema-Israyeli asesehlane, kwatfolakala indvodza itfota tinkhuni ngelilanga leliSabatha.
Labo labayikhandza itfota tinkhuni bayitsatsa bayimikisa kuMosi na-Aroni nesive sonkhe,
bayivalela esitokisini, ngobe kwakungakakhanyi kahle kutsi kufanele kwentiweni kuyo.
Simakadze wakhuluma kuMosi, watsi: “Lendvodza kufanele ife. Sive sonkhe kufanele siyigcobe ngematje, siyigcobele ngephandle kwenkambu.”
Ngako-ke sive sayitsatsa sayikhiphela ngephandle kwenkambu, sayigcoba ngematje yaze yafa, njengobe Simakadze abeyale Mosi.
“Khuluma kuma-Israyeli, utsi: ‘Kuto tonkhe titukulwane tenu letiyawulandzela kufanele nente timvakaza emiphetfweni yetingubo tenu ngelucotfo loluluhlata njengesibhakabhaka.
Niyawutsi nanitibuka letimvakaza, bese nikhumbula yonkhe imiyalo yaSimakadze, niyilalele, khona ningetiwuba tingwadla ngekudvonswa tinkhanuko tetinhlitiyo tenu netemehlo enu.
Niyawukhumbula kulalela yonkhe imiyalo yami, nibe ngulabehlukaniselwe Nkulunkulu wenu.
NginguSimakadze, Nkulunkulu wenu lowanikhipha eGibhithe, kutsi ngibe nguNkulunkulu wenu. NginguSimakadze, Nkulunkulu wenu.’ ”
bavukela Mosi. Babutsa bantfu labanyenti labebatiwa esiveni sonkhe, kwaba ngema-Israyeli labengema-250, lababengubona bakhetsiwe batinhloko.

Babutsana ndzawonye bahlasela boMosi na-Aroni, batsi kubo: “Senihambe kakhulu! Sonkhe lesive singcwele, bonkhe ngamunye ngamunye wabo, futsi naNkulunkulu unabo. Nine-ke nitiphakamiselani etikwalesive saSimakadze?”
Kwatsi Mosi nakakuva loko, wawa phansi ngebuso.

Watsi kuKhora nalesicumbi labesihola: “Ekuseni kusasa Simakadze utasikhombisa kutsi ngubani longewakhe nekutsi ngumuphi longcwele, utamsondzeta edvute naye. Lowo muntfu latikhetsele yena uyawumenta abesedvute naye.
Wena Khora, nabo bonkhe balandzeli bakho niyakwenta kanje: Niyawutsatsa titja temphepho,
bese kutsi kusasa ekuseni nifake kuto umlilo nemphepho embikwaSimakadze. Lowo Simakadze latamkhetsa nguye loyawube angcwele. Nine maLevi senitiphakamise kakhulu.”
Mosi wachubeka watsi kuKhora: “Lalelani, nine maLevi.

Akukanenelisi yini lokutsi Nkulunkulu wema-Israyeli watehlukanisela nine kuso sonkhe sive sema-Israyeli, wanenta nabasedvute naye kutsi nente inkonzo ethendeni laSimakadze, nime embikwesive, nisikhonte?
Unisondzetile nine nawo onkhe emaLevi edvutane naye, kodvwa nyalo senifuna buphristi futsi.
Kuphambene naSimakadze kutsi wena nalabalandzeli bakho nihlangane ngekududana kanje. Ngubani yena lo-Aroni kutsi ningemelana naye nine?”
Mosi wabe sewutfumela kutsi kuyewubitwa boDathani na-Abiramu, emadvodzana a-Eliyabe, kodvwa bona batsi: “Singeke site!
Akukakwenelisi lokutsi wasikhipha eveni lelivundzile leligcwele lubisi neluju lwetinyosi, wasiletsela kutesibulala lapha ehlane? Nyalo ufuna kulibala kutibusa la etikwetfu?
Ngetulu kwaloko awukasimikisi eveni leligcwele lubisi neluju lwetinyosi, nelifa lemasimi netivini. Ucabanga kutsi lamadvodza langaka ungawenta timphumphutse?
Mosi watsi kuKhora: “Wena nebalandzeli bakho bonkhe nimele nibonakale embikwaSimakadze kusasa lolokusako, na-Aroni uyawube akhona lapho.
Wonkhe umuntfu kufanele aphatse sitja sakhe semphepho afake kuso imphepho anikele kuSimakadze. Kutakuba titja letingema-250 setitonkhe. Wena na-Aroni kufanele nani ninikele ngetitja tenu.”
Ngako wonkhe umuntfu watsatsa sitja sakhe wafaka umlilo nemphepho kuso, bema kanye naboMosi na-Aroni ekungeneni kwelithende lekuhlangana.
Watsi kube Khora ahlanganise bonkhe labalandzeli bakhe, lababemelene naMosi, embikwelithende lekuhlangana, inkhatimulo yaSimakadze yabonakala kuso sonkhe sive sema-Israyeli.
“Tjela sive sikhweshe emathendeni aboKhora, naDathani, na-Abiramu.”
Mosi wasukuma waya kuboDathani na-Abiramu, nebaholi bema-Israyeli bamlandzela.
Wasiyala sonkhe sive, watsi: “Khweshani emathendeni aletigangi leti! Ningatsintsi lutfo etintfweni tabo, funa nani nikhukhulwe kanye netono tabo.”
Ngako sive sakhwesha emathendeni aboKhora, naDathani, na-Abiramu.
BoDathani na-Abiramu bese baphumile emathendeni abo, beme eminyango yawo nebafati babo nebantfwababo.
Mosi wakhuluma watsi: “Niyawukwati ngaloku-ke kutsi nguSimakadze longitfumile; akusho kutsi ngitentela ingcondvo yami nje:
Nangabe labantfu batifela njengabo bonkhe bantfu nome babulawe sifo nje lesivamise kubulala bantfu, kuyawube kusho kutsi angikatfunywa nguye Simakadze.
Kodvwa nangabe Simakadze aveta intfo lensha lengazange seyenteke, umhlaba uvule umlomo wawo ubamite kanye nako konkhe lokungekwabo, bashobele phansi, baye endzaweni yalabafile
Kwatsi acedza nje kulisho lelo, umhlaba labebeme kuwo boDathani na-Abiramu wachekeka tindvonga,
wakhamisa umlomo wawo, wabamita kanye nemindeni yabo, nawo onkhe emadvodza labebalandzeli baKhora, nako konkhe lokwakukwawo.
Ekukhaleni kwabo onkhe ema-Israyeli labesedvutane abaleka, amemeta atsi: “Umhlaba utasimita natsi futsi.”
Umlilo lowaphuma kuSimakadze wadla onkhe lamadvodza labengema-250 labekashisa imphepho.
“Tjela Eleyazare, umsa wa-Aroni, umphristi, kutsi akatsatse letitja atisuse lapha elangabini, bese usakata lamalahle emlilo khashane, ngobe letitja tingcwele,

tona letitja talabantfu labalahlekelwe kuphila kwabo ngenca yekona kwabo. Gcobani letitja temphepho tibe bongcwengcwe bekumbonya lilati, ngobe tanikelwa kuSimakadze tase tiba ngcwele. Setiyawuba secwayiso esiveni sema-Israyeli.”
Ngako Eleyazare, umphristi, watsatsa letitja telitfusi letatinikelwe ngulabo labebashisiwe, tagcotjwa tentiwa simbonyo selilati,

njengobe Simakadze amlayela ngaMosi. Loko kwaba sikhumbuto esiveni sema-Israyeli kutsi wonkhe umuntfu longesiye umphristi, longesiyo intalelwane ya-Aroni, akayiwusondzela ashise imphepho embikwaSimakadze. Loyakwenta njalo uyawubona saKhora nesebalandzeli bakhe.
Kwatsi ngakusasa sive sonkhe sema-Israyeli sabasola boMosi na-Aroni sitsi: “Senibulele bantfu baSimakadze.”
Kwatsi lesicumbi sisahlanganele kumelana naMosi na-Aroni, satsi sijikela ngasethendeni lekuhlangana, masinyane sabona lifu lilisibekela kwase kubonakala inkhatimulo yaSimakadze.
BoMosi na-Aroni base baya embikwelithende lekuhlangana,
Bobabili bakhotsama babhekisa tinhloko tabo phansi.

Mosi wakhuluma ku-Aroni, watsi: “Tsatsa sitja sakho semphepho ufake kuso emalahle lavutsako aselatini, bese ufaka imphepho, uphutfume kulesive masinyane usentele inhlawulo yekubuyisana naSimakadze, ngobe lulaka lwakhe seluphumile, sifo sesiphindze sicalele phansi.”

Ngako Aroni naye watsatsela etulu njengekusho kwaMosi, waphutfuma emkhatsini walesicumbi, sabe sesingenile sesibacalile sifo, watsela imphepho kulesitja sakhe wabentela inhlawulo yekubuyisana naSimakadze.
Wema emkhatsini walabafile nalabaphilako, sifo sancamuka.
Sibalo salabo lababulawa nguleso sifo besiti-14 700, ngaphandle kwalabo labafa ngenca yaKhora.
Satsi kube sincamuke lesifo, Aroni wancandzeka wabuyela kuMosi embikwelithende lekuhlangana.
“Khuluma kuma-Israyeli akunike tindvuku letili-12, yinye kuleso nakuleso sive lephuma kumholi waso. Bhala libito laleyo naleyo ndvodza endvukwini yayo.
Endvukwini yakaLevi ubobhala libito la-Aroni, ngobe kufanele kube nendvuku yalowo nalowo mholi waleso sive.
Letindvuku ubotibeka embikwelibhokisi lesivumelwane ethendeni lekuhlangana, lapho ngihlangana nani khona.
Indvuku yalowo lengimkhetsile itawuhluma, ngitakucedza kanjalo kusola kwalama-Israyeli lakhononako.”
Ngako Mosi wakhuluma kuma-Israyeli, nebaholi bawo bamnika letindvuku letili-12, leyo naleyo ndvuku imele umholi wesive, nendvuku ya-Aroni yayisemkhatsini wato.
Letindvuku Mosi watitsatsa watibeka embikwaSimakadze embikwelibhokisi lesivumelwane lelalisethendeni lebufakazi.
Ngako Mosi watsatsa tonkhe letindvuku embikwaSimakadze watiletsa kuma-Israyeli. Atibuka, kwaba ngulowo watsatsa yakakhe.

Simakadze wakhuluma kuMosi, watsi: “Buyisela indvuku ya-Aroni uyibeke embikwelibhokisi lesivumelwane, igcinelwe kutsi ibe secwayiso kulabahlubukako. Loko kutawucedza kungisola nekumelana kwabo nami, khona bangetikufa.”
Sive sema-Israyeli sakhuluma kuMosi, satsi: “Sitakufa! Silahlekile! Silahleke sonkhe!
Nangabe lowo losondzela eceleni kwelithende laSimakadze atakufa, ngabe kusho kutsi sitakufa sonkhe yini?”

Simakadze wakhuluma ku-Aroni, watsi: “Wena, nemadvodzana akho, nemndeni weyihlo kufanele netfwale bubi lobuphambene nendzawo lengcwele; wena-ke nemadvodzana akho niyakwetfwala tono leticondzene nebuphristi benu.
Letsa bomnakenu labangemaLevi esiveni seyihlo batewuhlangana nawe bakusite ngesikhatsi wena nemadvodzana akho nikhonta ethendeni lebufakazi.
Kufanele babe ngaphansi kwakho bente umsebenti wonkhe welithende, kodvwa bangasondzeli etimphahleni tendzawo lengcwele nome elatini. Nakwenteka basondzela, bona nani nitakufa.
Kufanele batihlanganise nani banakekele lithende lekuhlangana, nayo yonkhe imisebenti yalo; kufanele kubete losondzela kini lapho nikhona khona nine.
“Nine kufanele ninakekele indzawo lengcwele kanye nelilati, khona intfukutselo yaSimakadze ingetiwuphindza yehlele sive sema-Israyeli.
Mine matfupha ngikhetse labazalwane bakho labangemaLevi emkhatsini wema-Israyeli kutsi babe sipho kini, banikelwe kuSimakadze kutsi bente umsebenti welithende lekuhlangana.

Kodvwa wena nemadvodzana akho niyawukhonta njengebaphristi kuko konkhe lokukwaselatini nangekhatsi kwendvwangu. Ngininika inkonzo yebuphristi njengesipho. Lowo longakafaneli loyawusondzela eceleni kwalelilati, uyawubulawa.”

Simakadze wakhuluma ku-Aroni, watsi: “Mine ngikubeka kutsi uphatse iminikelo leletfwe kimi, yonkhe iminikelo lengcwele lenginikwa yona ngema-Israyeli, mine ngiyinika wena nemadvodzana akho kutsi ibe sabelo sakho titukulwane ngetitukulwane.

Itawuba ngeyenu incenye yaleminikelo lengcwelengcwele lengayiswa emlilweni. Kuto tonkhe tipho labatiletsa kimi njengeminikelo lengcwelengcwele, nome ingeyalokutinhlavu nome yesono nome yelicala, leyo ncenye lengcwele kakhulu yakho nemadvodzana akho.
Uyakuwudla njengentfo lengcwelengcwele; wonkhe lomdvuna uyakuwudla. Kufanele uwutsatse ube ngcwele.
“Ngikupha sonkhe sivuno lesihle setilinga lesinikelwa kuSimakadze kulowo nalowo mnyaka: semafutsa emncumo, neseliwayini kanye nesakolo.
Tonkhe titselo tekucala letivutsiwe tako konkhe lokusensimini yabo, labakunikela kuSimakadze, tiyawuba takho. Bonkhe bantfu labahlantekile ngekwemtsetfo ekhaya lakho bangakudla.
Kufanele kutsi angaba nenyanga budzala, bese niyawahlenga ngaleyo ntsengo yesihlengo setinhlavu tesiliva letisihlanu ngekwesilinganiso lesisemtsetfweni.
Inyama yawo kufanele ibe yakho, njengemganga wemnikelo wekujikitiswa, nemlente wesekudla ube wakho.

“Konkhe lokwehlukaniselwe eceleni eminikelweni lengcwele lenikelwe ngema-Israyeli kuSimakadze ngikupha wena nemadvodzana akho nemadvodzakati akho, kutsi kube ngusona sabelo sakho titukulwane ngetitukulwane. Kusivumelwane saphakadze seluswayi
Simakadze wakhuluma ku-Aroni, watsi: “Wena uyawubate lifa eveni labo, kantsi uyawubate nesabelo njengabo. Ngimi lengisabelo sakho nelifa lakho esiveni sonkhe sema-Israyeli.”
