Kusukela manje ema-Israyeli kufanele angasondzeli edvutane nelithende lekuhlangana, ngaphandle kwaloko atawutetfwalela wona umvuzo wekona kwawo, afe.

NgemaLevi layawukwenta umsebenti welithende lekuhlangana etfwale bubi lobuphambene nalo. Lesi kutawuba simiso lesingeyiwuphindze siguculwe titukulwane ngetitukulwane letitako. Bangeke balinikwa lifa kuma-Israyeli.
Esikhundleni saloko, emaLevi ngiwapha kutsi lifa lawo kube kwelishumi kwaloko lokunikelwe ngema-Israyeli kuSimakadze. Ngiko nje ngitsite kuwo: ‘Bona bangeke babe nelifa kuma-Israyeli.’ ”
“Khuluma kumaLevi utsi: ‘Nanemukela kuma-Israyeli kwelishumi lokulifa lenu lenginipha lona, nani kufanele ninikele kwelishumi kwaloko kwelishumi kube ngumnikelo waSimakadze.
Lomnikelo wenu uyawutsatfwa njengalokutinhlavu lokusandza kuhhudlwa nome inkhovu yeliwayini lephuma etjeni lekuhluta emagelebisi.

Ngaleyo ndlela nani nitawunikela umnikelo wekwelishumi kuSimakadze, niwutsatse kuko konkhe kwelishumi lenikwemukela kuma-Israyeli. Kuko kona loko kwelishumi kufanele ninikele sabelo saSimakadze ngekusinika Aroni, umphristi.
Kufanele ninikele sabelo saSimakadze kube nguloko lokuhle kakhulu, nalokungcwelengcwele kuko konkhe leninikwe kona.’
“Khuluma kumaLevi utsi: ‘Naninikela loko lokuhle kakhulu, loko kuyawutsatfwa njengemphumela wekudla lokuhhudliwe nome inkhovu yeliwayini lephume etjeni lekuhluta emagelebisi.
Nine nemindeni yenu ningakudla-ke konkhe loko lokusalako, ningakudlela nome ngabe nikuyiphi indzawo, ngobe loko kungumholo wenu ngemsebenti leniwentako ethendeni lekuhlangana.
Njengobe nitawunikela ngalokuhle kakhulu kwako, ningeke nibe nelicala ngaloko; ngako-ke ningeke niyingcolise iminikelo lengcwele yema-Israyeli, futsi ningeke nife ngalelo cala.’ ”
“Lesi-ke sekuyawuba simiso semtsetfo lomiswe nguSimakadze: Tjela sive sema-Israyeli kutsi siletse litfokati lelibovu lelingenasiyela nasici, lekungazange sekubekwe lijoko entsanyeni yalo.
Niyawulinika Eleyazare, umphristi, liyawukhishelwa ngephandle kwenkambu lihlatjelwe embikwakhe.
Eleyazare-ke, umphristi, uyawube sewutsatsa ingati yalo ngemuno wakhe, afafate kasikhombisa ngalengati yalo abhekise ngasembikwelithende lekuhlangana.
Lelitfokati liyawube seliyashiswa-ke embikwakhe, kushiswe sikhumba salo, nenyama yalo, nengati yalo, nemswane walo.
Umphristi-ke uyawutsatsa umsedari, nehisophu, nendvwangu lebovu ngalokutopele, akujike emlilweni etikwalelitfokati lelishiswako.
Lomphristi-ke uyawube sewugeza tingubo takhe, nemtimba wakhe ngemanti, emvakwaloko-ke sekangangena enkambu, abe ngulongcolile ngekwemtsetfo kuze kuhlwe.
Lomuntfu longuyena ashise lelitfokati kufanele naye ageze tingubo takhe kanye nemtimba wakhe ngemanti, abe ngulongcolile kuze kuhlwe.

Lomuntfu longuyena abutse lomlotsa walelitfokati kufanele naye ageze timphahla takhe abe ngulongcolile kuze kuhlwe. Lesimiso siyakwentiwa ngabo bonkhe baka-Israyeli kanye nebetive labasemkhatsini wenu, titukulwane ngetitukulwane.”
“Umuntfu loyawutsintsa sidvumbu nome ngabe sabani uyawuba ngulongcolile ngekwemtsetfo emalanga lasikhombisa.
Uyawutigeza yena ngemanti ngelilanga lesitsatfu nangelesikhombisa, bese-ke uba ngulohlantekile. Kodvwa nakangatigezi yena ngelilanga lesitsatfu nangelesikhombisa, angeke ahlanteke.

Nome ngubani lotsintsa sidvumbu, nome sabani, angakaze atihlambulule, uyawube wedzelela lithende laSimakadze. Lowo muntfu kufanele ancunywe esiveni sakubo, ngobe emanti ekuhlambulula angakaze afafatwe etikwakhe, ngako ungcolile; kungcola kwakhe kusesekuye.
“Lona-ke ngumtsetfo lomacondzana nemuntfu lofele ethendeni lakhe. Nome ngubani loyawungena kulo nalobekasuke akulo lelithende, uyawuba ngulongcolile ngekwemtsetfo emalanga lasikhombisa.
Tonkhe titja lebetingakambonyisiseki taciniswa ngesidekiselo tiyawuba nguletingcolile.

“Nangabe umuntfu utsite asebaleni watsintsa sidvumbu semuntfu lofe ngekugwazwa, nome lofe ngesifo lesetayelekile, nome lotsintsa litsambo laso, nome lithuna, uyawuba ngulongcolile ngekwemtsetfo emalanga lasikhombisa.
“Macondzana nalabangcolile ngekwemtsetfo uyawutsatsa umlotsa wemnikelo wesono utsele kuwo emanti lahlobile esitjeni.

Kuyawutsi umuntfu lohlantekile ngekwemtsetfo atsatse ihisophu ayenye kulamanti, bese ufafata lelithende nako konkhe lokusekhatsi kanye nalabantfu bebakhona lapho. Kufanele afafate bonkhe labake batsintsa litsambo lemufi, nome sidvumbu semuntfu lobulewe nome lotifele, nome-ke lithuna.

Lona lohlantekile kufanele afafate lowo longcolile ngelilanga lesitsatfu nangelesikhombisa; ngaleli lesikhombisa uyawube asamhlambulula. Lona lotewuhlanjululwa kufanele ageze timphahla takhe tekwembatsa kanye nemtimba wakhe ngemanti, uyawuba ngulohlambulukile ngabona lobo busuku.
“Kodvwa nangabe lomuntfu longcolile angatihlambululi yena, kufanele ancunywe esiveni sakubo, ngobe uhlambalate indzawo lengcwele yaSimakadze. Emanti ekuhlambulula akaze afafatwe etikwakhe, ungcolile.
Lesi-ke simiso sabo lesiyawuhlala sentiwa titukulwane ngetitukulwane.
“Lomuntfu lobafafata ngemanti ekuhlambulula kufanele naye ageze timphahla takhe tekwembatsa, nalowo lotsintsa lamanti ekuhlambulula uyawuba ngulongcolile kuze kuhlwe.
Yonkhe intfo letsintfwe ngumuntfu longcolile nayo iyawuba ngulengcolile, nalowo loyawutsintsa leyontfo uyawuba ngulongcolile kuze kuhlwe.”
Ngenyanga yekucala sonkhe sive sema-Israyeli sefika eHlane laseSini, sefike semisa eKhadeshi. Miriyamu wafela khona lapho, wangcwatjwa.
Kwakute emanti kuleyo ndzawo, ngako bantfu babutsana ndzawonye basola boMosi na-Aroni.
Balwa naMosi batsi: “Kube mane savele safa kanye nebanaketfu ngesikhatsi bafela embikwaSimakadze.
Nisiletseleni lesive saSimakadze kulelihlane lelinje? Nentele kutsi tsine kanye naletifuyo tetfu sitewufela lapha!
Nasikhiphelani lena eveni laseGibhithe nasiletsa lapha kulelive lelibi kangaka? Lelive alinakudla, namakhiwa, namagelebisi; lite nemahananandza. Kute ngisho nemanti nje ekunatsa!”
BoMosi na-Aroni besuka emkhatsini walesive bacondza ekungeneni kwelithende lekuhlangana. Bafike bawa phansi ngebuso, bakhotsama. Inkhatimulo yebukhona baSimakadze yabonakala kubo.

“Tsatsa lendvuku, bese-ke wena na-Aroni, umnakenu, nibutsela sonkhe sive ndzawonye. Khuluma kulelidvwala, embikwaso sibuka, litawube selikhipha emanti. Uyawukhipha emanti kulelidvwala, kuze sonkhe sive kanye netifuyo taso sinatse kulo.”
Ngako Mosi watsatsa indvuku ebukhoneni baSimakadze, njengobe abetjeliwe.
Yena na-Aroni bahlanganisa sonkhe sive embikwalelidvwala, Mosi watsi kubo: “Lalelani-ke, nine mahlubuka, sinikhokhele yini emanti kulelidvwala?”
Ngako Mosi waphakamisa sandla sakhe washaya lelidvwala kabili ngalendvuku, emanti ampompota kulelidvwala, banatsa bona bonkhe kanye netifuyo tabo.
Bobabemkhulu behlela eveni laseGibhithe, sahlala lapho sikhatsi lesidze. Bantfu baseGibhithe basigcilata kanye nabobabe betfu,
kodvwa satsi kube sikhale kuSimakadze, wakuva kukhala kwetfu wase utfumela ingilosi, wasikhipha eveni laseGibhithe.
“Nyalo-ke sesilapha eKhadeshi, edolobhaneni lelisemnyeleni welive lakho.

Sicela kwendlula sidzabule ekhatsi nelive lakho. Singeke sihambe emasimini nome etivinini takho, singeke sinatse ngisho nemanti emitfonjeni yakho. Sitawuhamba ngemgwaco lomkhulu sicondze, singaphambukeli ngesekudla nome ngesancele, size siphumele ngale kwalelive lakho.”
Kodvwa Edomu waphendvula, watsi: “Ningeke nengce lapha; naningake nilokotse, siyawuphuma sinihlasele ngetikhali.”
Ema-Israyeli aphendvula, atsi: “Sitawuhamba ngemgwaco lomkhulu, nangabe tifuyo tetfu natsi sinatse emitfonjeni yenu, sitanikhokhela. Tsine sifuna kumane sendlule nje ngetinyawo, hhayi lokunye.”
Baphindza baka-Edomu baphendvula, batsi: “Asifuni kutsi nendlule.” Base bayaphuma baka-Edomu babesukela ngalenkhulu imphi nalenemandla.
Njengobe baka-Edomu bawalela ema-Israyeli kutsi endlule eveni labo, ema-Israyeli abe asayancandzeka, esuka kubo.
SebaseNtsabeni iHori, eceleni kwemnyele waka-Edomu, Simakadze wakhuluma kuboMosi na-Aroni, watsi:
“Aroni sewutakuya kulabafile bakubo, ngako akasoze angene eveni lengilinike ema-Israyeli, ngobe nine nobabili aningihloniphanga ngasemantini aseMeribha.
Bita bo-Aroni nendvodzana yakhe, Eleyazare, ukhuphukele nabo eNtsabeni yaseHori.
Khumula Aroni tembatfo takhe utembatsise indvodzana yakhe, Eleyazare, ngobe Aroni sewutawunishiya abuyele kubakubo, utawufike afele kuyo.”
Mosi wenta njengobe Simakadze abemtjelile: Wakhuphukela nabo eNtsabeni yaseHori embikwesive sonkhe sibuka.
Mosi wakhumula Aroni tembatfo takhe watembatsisa indvodzana yakhe Eleyazare. Aroni wafela khona lapho etulu entsabeni. Bo-Mosi na-Eleyazare behla entsabeni.
Sonkhe sive saka-Israyeli satsi kube sive kutsi Aroni sewufile, samlilela emalanga langema-30.
Israyeli wenta sifungo kuSimakadze, watsi: “Nawungahle usinikele lesive etandleni tetfu, sitasincoba sibhubhise
Simakadze wakulalela waba neluvela ngema-Israyeli, wawanika emaKhenani. Ema-Israyeli abhubhisa onkhe emaKhenani kanye nemadolobha awo; ngako-ke leyo ndzawo yetsiwa libito kwatsiwa yiHoma.
basola Nkulunkulu naMosi batsi: “Nasikhiphelani eGibhithe kuze sitewufela lapha ehlane? Kute kudla! Kute nemanti! Siyakwenyanya lokudla lokungenamsoco!”
Simakadze wase ubatfumelela tinyoka letatinesihlungu; taluma labantfu, labanyenti babo bafa.
Bantfu beta kuMosi, bafike batsi: “Sonile ngekukhuluma kabi ngaSimakadze nangawe. Thandaza kuSimakadze kutsi esuse letinyoka lapha kitsi.” Ngako-ke Mosi wabathandazela labantfu.
Simakadze wakhuluma kuMosi, watsi: “Yenta inyoka lenesitfoze yelitfusi uyiphanyeke etulu elugodvweni; wonkhe labesalunywe yinyoka, utawutsi angayibuka aphile.”
Ngako Mosi wakha inyoka ngelitfusi, wase uyiphanyeka etulu elugodvweni. Kwatsi wonkhe labesalunywe yinyoka watsi nabuka lenyoka yelitfusi, waphila.
Ema-Israyeli atfutsa lapho ahamba ayawumisa e-Obothi.
Esuka e-Obothi afike emisa e-Iye Abharimu, ehlane lelibhekene neMowabi, ngasemphumalanga.
Esuka lapho emisa ngase-Anoni ehlane leliseveni lema-Amori. I-Anoni isemnyeleni weMowabi, emkhatsini welakaMowabi nelaka-Amori,
ngiko nje incwadzi yetimphi taSimakadze itsi:
Kusuka lapho bachubekela eBheyeri, emtfonjeni lapho Simakadze akhuluma kuMosi, watsi: “Butsa lesive sibuye ndzawonye, mine ngitasinika emanti.”
Ngaso sona leso sikhatsi ema-Israyeli ahlabela ingoma atsi:
Esuka lapho kulelo hlane aya eMathana,
esuka eMathana aya eNahaliyeli, esuka eNahaliyeli aya eBamothi,
esuka eBamothi aya esigodzini sakaMowabi, ngaphansi kwentsaba iPhisga leyengamele lihlane.

“Sicela kwendlula sidzabule lelive lakho. Singeke siphambukele emasimini nome esivinini nome sinatse emanti kunome ngumuphi umtfombo. Sitawuhamba ngemgwaco wenkhosi size siphumele ngale kwelive lakho.”

Kodvwa Sihoni wala kutsi bendlule badzabule live lakhe. Wahlanganisa emabutfo akhe onkhe, wawahlomisa wawavivisa awacondzise ehlane kuyawulwa nema-Israyeli. Watsi nakefika eJahasi, walwa nema-Israyeli.
Ema-Israyeli alwa naye amehlula, adla live lakhe kusukela e-Anoni kuya eJabhoki, kuze kugcine ngaseveni lema-Amoni, ngobe iminyele yawo yayakhiwe, itinqaba.
Ema-Israyeli awatfumba onkhe emadolobha ema-Amori, awadla aba ngewawo kanye neHeshboni netabelo tayo tonkhe.
IHeshboni bekulidolobha laSihoni, inkhosi yema-Amori, leyayike yalwa nalenkhosi leyayingeyemaMowabi, yatsatsa lonkhe live layo kuze kuyewugcina e-Anoni.
Watsi kube Mosi atfumele tinhloli eJazeri, ema-Israyeli atfumba lonkhe lelo dolobha kanye netabelo talo, acosha lawo ma-Amori labelapho.
Ema-Israyeli ajika enyuka ngemgwaco locondza eBhashani; kwase kutsi Ogi, inkhosi yaseBhashani, waphuma kanye nemabutfo akhe onkhe, wayawuhlasela ema-Israyeli emphini yase-Edreyi.

Simakadze wakhuluma kuMosi, watsi: “Ungamesabi, ngobe yena kanye nemabutfo akhe onkhe, nelive lakhe, sengimnikele etandleni takho. Yenta kuye kona loko lowakwenta kuSihoni, inkhosi yema-Amori, labebusa eHeshboni.”
Ngako ema-Israyeli abulala Ogi kanye nemadvodzana akhe, naso sonkhe sive sakhe, kwabate ngisho namunye lowasindza. Ase ayalidla lelo live lakhe.
Sive sema-Israyeli sesuka lapho sacondza ematsafeni akaMowabi, sefike semisa emathende ngesheya kwemfula iJordane malungana neJerikho.
Watsi kube Bhalaki, umsa waSiphori, abone konkhe lekwase kwentiwe sive sema-Israyeli esiveni sema-Amori,
Mowabi watfutfumela ngenca yebunyenti bawo. Yebo, Mowabi watfutfumela ngenca yema-Israyeli.
BakaMowabi bakhuluma nebaholi bakaMidiyani, batsi: “Lesicumbi sebantfu sitawudla konkhe lesinako, njengenkhomo idla luhlata lwesiganga.”
Ngako Bhalaki, umsa waSiphori, labeyinkhosi yakaMowabi ngaleso sikhatsi,
watfumela tigijimi kutsi tiyewumbitela Bhalamu, umsa waBheyori, labesePhethori ngasemfuleni iYufrathe, eveni laka-Amawu;

Manje kota utengicalekisela lesive, ngobe sinemandla kakhulu kunami; kumbe ngingakhona kusehlula ngisikhiphe lapha eveni lami. Ngiyati kutsi lababusiswa nguwe bayabusiseka, nalabo labacalekiswa nguwe bayacalekiseka.”
Bhalamu wabaphendvula watsi: “Lalani lapha kulobusuku, kusasa ngitanibuyela nemphendvulo levela kuSimakadze.” Ngako labaholi bakaMowabi balala kaBhalamu.
Nkulunkulu wefika wabuta Bhalamu, watsi: “Ngakabani lamadvodza lalele lapha kakho?”
Bhalamu waphendvula Nkulunkulu, watsi: “Bhalaki, umsa waSiphori, inkhosi yakaMowabi, utfumele kimi umbiko lotsi:
‘Kunesive lesaphuma kulela laseGibhithe lesigcwele umhlaba wonkhe. Ngako wota utengicalekisela sona, kumbe ngingakhona kusehlula ngisicoshe kulelive lami.’ ”
Kodvwa Nkulunkulu wakhuluma kuBhalamu, watsi: “Ungacali uhambe nawo. Ungasibeki sicalekiso kuleso sive leso, ngobe sabusiswa.”
Ngakusasa ekuseni Bhalamu wavuka watjela labaholi lababetfunywe nguBhalaki, watsi: “Hambani nibuyele eveni lakini, Simakadze walile kutsi ngihambe nani.”
Ngako labaholi bakaMowabi babuyela kuBhalaki, bafike bamtjela batsi: “Bhalamu walile kuta natsi.”
Waphindza Bhalaki watfumela labanye baholi lababemcoka, baba banyenti kakhulu kunalaba bekucala.
Befika kuBhalamu batsi: “Bhalaki, umsa waSiphori, utsi: ‘Akubete lutfo lolukuvimbelako kutsi ute kimi,
ngobe ngiyakukukhokhela kahle kakhulu nome ungangibitani; kota ungicalekisele lesive.’ ”
Hlalani nani kulobusuku njengalaba bakucala, ngize ngati kutsi yini lenye Simakadze latangitjela yona.”
Ngalobo busuku Nkulunkulu wefika kuBhalamu, watsi: “Njengobe lamadvodza akulandzile, hamba nawo, kuphela wente loko lengikutjela kona.”
Bhalamu wavuka ekuseni wabophela imbongolo yakhe, wahamba nalabaholi bakaMowabi.
Simakadze wamtfukutselela kakhulu nasahamba, ingilosi yaSimakadze yammela endleleni imvimbela. Bhalamu abegibele imbongolo yakhe, ahamba netinceku takhe letimbili.
Imbongolo yatsi kube ibone lengilosi ime endleleni, yelule inkemba yayo iyiphetse ngesandla, yaphambuka endleleni yacondza esigangeni. Bhalamu wayishaya, ayibuyisela endleleni.
Ingilosi yaSimakadze yachubeka yayakuma emngcingweni wendlela leyayijuba emkhatsini wetivini letimbili, kume tibondza emaceleni ngala nangala.
Imbongolo yatsi kube ibone ingilosi yaSimakadze, yagudla lubondza yahhudla umbala waBhalamu kulolubondza. Bhalamu waphindza wayishaya futsi.
Ingilosi yaSimakadze yaphindza yachubekela ngembidlana, yefika yema emngcengcemaneni wendlela, lapho bekute khona ngisho nendzawana nje yekujikela ngesekudla nome ngesancele.
Imbongolo yatsi kube ibone lengilosi yaSimakadze, yalala phansi, Bhalamu asetulu kuyo; watfukutsela wabila, wayishaya ngalendvuku yakhe.
Simakadze wase uvula umlomo walembongolo, yakhuluma kuBhalamu yatsi: “Kodvwa ngenteni kuwe kutsi ungaze ungishaye kuze kube katsatfu?”
Bhalamu wayiphendvula watsi: “Ungente silima! Kube bengiphetse inkemba esandleni sami, ngabe ngiyakubulala khona nyalo.”
Imbongolo yaphendvula Bhalamu, yatsi: “Angisiyo yini imbongolo yakho lohlala ngekuyigibela njalo nje, kuze kube ngulamuhla? Ngake ngakwenta yini loku kuwe?” Bhalamu watsi: “Cha.”
Simakadze wase uvula emehlo eBhalamu, wayibona lengilosi yaSimakadze ime endleleni yelule inkemba yayo. Ngako watitfoba, wawa phansi ngebuso.
Ingilosi yaSimakadze yambuta yatsi: “Uyishayeleni lembongolo yakho kuze kube katsatfu? Ngite lapha kutewuncandza wena, ngobe lendlela yakho inengoti embikwami.
Lembongolo beyibona mine ingibalekele kulamahlandla lamatsatfu. Kube beyingangibalekeli, ngabe wena sengikubulele nyalo, kodvwa yona bengitayishiya iphila.”
Bhalamu wakhuluma kulengilosi yaSimakadze, watsi: “Ngonile, bengingaboni kutsi ume endleleni kutewuncandza mine. Nangabe-ke akukujabulisi lokuhamba kwami, ngitawuncandzeka.”
Ingilosi yaSimakadze yakhuluma kuBhalamu, yatsi: “Hamba nalamadvodza, kodvwa ukhulume kuphela loko lengitakutjela kona.” Ngako Bhalamu wahamba nalabaholi bakaBhalaki.
Watsi kube eve Bhalaki kutsi Bhalamu sewuyeta, waphuma wayawumhlangabeta edolobheni lakaMowabi lelise-Anoni, lekungumnyele lokhashane kakhulu welive lakhe.
Bhalaki wakhuluma naBhalamu, watsi: “Angikatfumeli yini tigijimi kuwe kutsi tikulandze masinyane? Awuketi ngani kimi? Bewucabanga kutsi anginalutfo yini lwekukukhokhela?”
Bhalamu waphendvula watsi: “Sengikhona, kepha nginawo yini mine emandla ekukhuluma lutfo ngaphandle kwaloko lengikutjelwa nguNkulunkulu?”
Ngako Bhalamu wahamba naBhalaki, baya eKhiriyathi Husothi.
Bhalaki wenta umhlatjelo ngetinkhomo netimvu, lenye inyama wayinika Bhalamu nalabaholi lababehamba naye.
Ngakusasa ekuseni Bhalaki watsatsa Bhalamu, benyukela etulu eBhamothi Bhali, lapho afike wabona kahle incenye yalesive.
Bhalamu wakhuluma kuBhalaki, watsi: “Ngakhele emalati lasikhombisa, ungilungiselele tinkunzi letisikhombisa netihhanca letisikhombisa.”
Bhalaki wakwenta konkhe loko lekwakufunwe nguBhalamu, bobabili base banikela ngenkunzi nesihhanca kulelo nakulelo lilati.

Bhalamu wakhuluma kuBhalaki, watsi: “Mani lapha eceleni kwemnikelo wakho, mine ngisaphambuka; ngisafuna kuhlola kutsi Simakadze utawuhlangabetana yini nami. Loko langembulela kona nawe ngitakwatisa.” Asakushito loko, wase ukhuphukela egcumeni lelingenatihlahla.
Nkulunkulu wahlangabetana naye, naBhalamu watsi kuye: “Sengilungise emalati lasikhombisa, etikwalelo nalelo lati nginikele ngenkunzi nesihhanca.”
Simakadze wabeka emavi emlonyeni waBhalamu, watsi: “Ncandzeka uye kuBhalaki, ufike umtjele lelivi.”
Ngako-ke wancandzeka wamkhandza aseme eceleni kwemnikelo wakhe kanye nebaholi bakaMowabi.
Bhalaki wakhuluma kuBhalamu, watsi: “Yini lena lese uyente kimi? Ngikuletse lapha kutsi utewucalekisa letitsa tami, kodvwa kute lokwentile; esikhundleni saloko utibusisile.”
Bhalamu waphendvula watsi: “Kantsi akukafaneli yini ngikhulume loko lokubekwe nguSimakadze emlonyeni wami?”
Bhalaki wakhuluma kuye, watsi: “Kota la sihambe nawe siye kulenye indzawo, khona utawubabona; noko utawubona incenye yabo, hhayi bonkhe. Utawube sewungicalekisela bona.”
Ngako wamtsatsa wahamba naye baya etsafeni laseSofimu, etulu esicongweni sentsaba iPhisga, wefika lapho wakha emalati lasikhombisa, wanikela ngenkunzi nangesihhanca etikwalelo nalelo lati.
Bhalamu wakhuluma kuBhalaki, watsi: “Mani lapha eceleni kwemnikelo wakho, mine ngisetawuhlangana naSimakadze lapha.”
Simakadze wahlangana naBhalamu, wamtjela emavi lekufanele awakhulume, watsi: “Ncandzeka, uye kuBhalaki uyewumtjela lelivi.”
Ngako-ke wancandzeka waya kuye, wamkhandza eceleni kwemnikelo wakhe, eme nebaholi bakaMowabi. Bhalaki wambuta watsi: “Utsiteni Simakadze?”
Bhalaki wakhuluma kuBhalamu, watsi: “Njengobe awukabacalekisi, lokungenani ungababusisi.”
Bhalamu waphendvula, watsi: “Angikakutjeli yini kutsi kufanele ngikhulume loko lengikutjelwa nguSimakadze?”
Bhalaki wakhuluma kuBhalamu, watsi: “Kota, sihambe nawe, siye kulenye indzawo, mhlawumbe kungahle kumjabulise Nkulunkulu, akuvumele kutsi ungicalekisele lesive ukuleyo ndzawo.”
Bhalaki watsatsa Bhalamu, bobabili benyukela esicongweni sentsaba iPheyori leyengamele lihlane.
Bhalamu wakhuluma watsi: “Ngakhele emalati lasikhombisa lapha, ungilungisele tinkunzi letisikhombisa netihhanca letisikhombisa.”
Bhalaki wenta njengekusho kwaBhalamu, wanikela inkunzi nesihhanca kulelo nakulelo lilati.
Bhalamu watsi uyabuka wabona ema-Israyeli emisile, sive ngesive, Moya waNkulunkulu wehlela etikwakhe,
Maye mahle emathende akho, sive sakaJakobe,
Lulaka lwaBhalaki lwamvutsela kamatima Bhalamu, washaya tandla takhe, watsi kuye: “Ngikulandzele kutsi utewucalekisa titsa tami, kodvwa wena sewutibusise kwaze kwaba katsatfu.
Nyamalala nyalo ubuyele ekhaya lakho; bengitsi ngitakubonga ngesibongo lesihle, kodvwa Simakadze ukwalele kutsi utfole lesibongo.”
Bhalamu watsi kuBhalaki: “Angititjelanga yini letigijimi lewawutitfumele kimi, ngatsi kuto:

‘Ngisho nome ngabe Bhalaki anganginika sigodlo sakhe sigcwele isiliva negolide, bengingeke ngitentele lutfo lolusuka kimi, lokuhle nome lokubi, lokuphambene nemyalo waSimakadze. Ngitakusho kuphela loko lokushiwo nguSimakadze.’ ”
“Sengiyancandzeka ngibuyela eveni lakitsi, kodvwa kota lapha ngikutjele kutsi yini letakwentiwa ngulesive kulesive sakho kulamalanga letako.”
Waphindza wabona emaKheni, wase ubeka umlayeto wakhe utsi:
Bhalamu wesuka wancandzeka wabuyela eveni lakubo, naBhalaki watsatsa yakhe indlela.
Ngesikhatsi sive sema-Israyeli siseseShithimu, emadvodza acala kungenela kulalana nalabasikati besive semaMowabi.
Laba labasikati bawamema lamadvodza kutsi ete atekwenta umhlatjelo kubonkulunkulu babo. Lamadvodza adla, akhotsama, akhonta labonkulunkulu bemaMowabi.
Ngako sive sema-Israyeli sahlanganyela ekukhonteni Bhali wasePheyori. Lulaka lwaSimakadze lwabavutsela.

Simakadze wakhuluma kuMosi, watsi: “Tsatsa bonkhe baholi balesive, ubabulale, bese ubeneka emini kubona wonkhe umuntfu embikwaSimakadze, khona kutewutsi lulaka lolwesabekako lwaSimakadze lungetiwusivutsela lesive saka-Israyeli.”
Lenye indvodza yem-Israyeli yeta nalomsikati umMidiyani yamngenisa ethendeni layo, Mosi abuka, nesive sonkhe sema-Israyeli sisalila ekungeneni kwelithende lekuhlangana.
Watsi kube akubone loko Finehasi, umsa wa-Eleyazare, umsa wa-Aroni, umphristi, washiya sonkhe lesive, watsatsa sikhali ngesandla sakhe,

walandzela lendvodza yem-Israyeli waze wayawungena ethendeni layo. Wafike wabagwaza bobabili, sikhali sangena kulom-Israyeli saze sayawuphumela ngale kulona lomsikati. Lesishayo lesasihlasele ema-Israyeli sakhawula,

“Finehasi, umsa wa-Eleyazare, lotalwa ngu-Aroni, umphristi, sewukuncandzile kutfukutsela kwami ngitfukutselela sive sema-Israyeli, ngobe nguye yedvwa emkhatsini wabo lobe nenshisekelo yekugcina ludvumo lwami; ngiko nje ngingakasicedzi ngelulaka sive sema-Israyeli.
Ngako-ke mtjele kutsi sengenta sivumelwane sekuthula naye.
Yena netitukulwane takhe batawuba nesivumelwane sebuphristi baphakadze naphakadze, ngobe waba nenshisekelo yekugcina ludvumo lwami, wenta inhlawulo yekubuyisana kwesive sonkhe sema-Israyeli nami.”
Libito lalom-Israyeli lowabulawa kanye nemMidiyani lomsikati bekunguZimri, umsa waSalu, umholi wemndeni wakaSimeyoni.
Libito lalona lomsikati bekunguKhozibi, indvodzakati yaSuri, sikhulu semndeni lotsite wesive semaMidiyani.

ngobe naso saniphatsa njengetitsa, ngesikhatsi siniyenga ngalendzaba yasePheyori, nangenca yadzadzewabo, Khozibi, labeyindvodzakati yemholi wesive semaMidiyani. Khozibi nguye lona lowafa ngekubulawa, nakufika lesishayo sasePheyori.”
“Yentani lubalo lwaso sonkhe sive sema-Israyeli ngemindeni yaso, kusukela kulabaneminyaka lengema-20 budzala kuya etulu, bonkhe lasebangalungela kungenela imphi esiveni saka-Israyeli.”
Ngako-ke, ematsafeni akaMowabi, ngesheya kweJordane, malungana neJerikho,
“Yentani lubalo lwawo onkhe emadvodza kusukela kulabaneminyaka lengema-20 budzala kuya etulu, njengobe Simakadze ayale Mosi.”
Titukulwane takaRubeni, litubulo la-Israyeli, lusendvo ngelusendvo kwaba ngemaHanoki labetalwa nguHanoki, nemaPhalu labetalwa nguPhalu,
nemaHesroni labetalwa nguHesroni, nemaKhami, labetalwa nguKhami.
Emadvodzana a-Eliyabe bekuboNemuweli, naDathani, na-Abiramu. BoDathani na-Abiramu bebangulabaholi labavukela Mosi na-Aroni; bebangulabanye bebalandzeli baKhora nabavukela Simakadze.
Umhlaba wakhamisa wabagwinya bonkhe naKhora, balandzeli bakhe labafa ngesikhatsi umlilo ubhubhisa emadvodza langema-250, baba luphawu lwesecwayiso.
Noko intalelwane yaKhora ayizange ife iphele.
Titukulwane takaSimeyoni lusendvo ngelusendvo kwaba ngemaNemuweli labetalwa nguNemuweli, nemaJamini labetalwa nguJamini, nemaJakhini labetalwa nguJakhini,
nemaZera labetalwa nguZera, nemaShawula labetalwa nguShawula.
Titukulwane takaGadi lusendvo ngelusendvo kwaba ngemaSefoni labetalwa nguSefoni, nemaHagi labetalwa nguHagi, nemaShuni labetalwa nguShuni,
nema-Ozni labetalwa ngu-Ozni, nema-Era labetalwa ngu-Era,
nema-Arodi labetalwa ngu-Arodi, nema-Areli labetalwa ngu-Areli.
Titukulwane takaJuda lusendvo ngelusendvo kwaba ngemaShela, labetalwa nguShela, nemaPheresi, labetalwa nguPheresi, nemaZera, labetalwa nguZera.
Titukulwane takaPheresi lusendvo ngelusendvo kwaba ngemaHesroni labetalwa nguHesroni, nemaHamuli labetalwa nguHamuli.
Titukulwane taka-Isakhari lusendvo ngelusendvo kwaba ngemaThola labetalwa nguThola, nemaPhuwa labetalwa nguPhuwa,
nemaJashubi labetalwa nguJashubi, nemaShimroni labetalwa nguShimroni.
Titukulwane takaZebuloni lusendvo ngelusendvo kwaba ngemaSeredi labetalwa nguSeredi, nema-Eloni labetalwa ngu-Eloni, nemaJaleli labetalwa nguJaleli.
Titukulwane takaJosefa lusendvo ngelusendvo kusukela kuboManase na-Efrayimu tatime kanje:
Titukulwane takaManase lusendvo ngelusendvo kwaba ngemaMakhire labetalwa nguMakhire, Makhire kwakunguyise waGileyadi, emaGileyadi abetalwa nguGileyadi.
Leti-ke bekutinsendvo takaGileyadi: ema-Iyezeri labetalwa ngu-Iyezeri, nemaHelekhi labetalwa nguHelekhi,
nema-Asriyeli labetalwa ngu-Asriyeli, nemaShekhemu labetalwa nguShekhemu,
nemaShemida labetalwa nguShemida, nemaHeferi labetalwa nguHeferi.
Selofehadi, umsa waHeferi, abete emadvodzana, abenemantfombatana odvwana lekwakuboMahala, naNowa, naHogila, naMilkha, naThisa.
Titukulwane taka-Efrayimu lusendvo ngelusendvo kwaba ngemaShuthela labetalwa nguShuthela, nemaBekheri labetalwa nguBekheri, nemaThahani labetalwa nguThahani.
Leti-ke bekutinsendvo takaShuthela: ema-Erani labetalwa ngu-Erani.
Leti-ke ngito titukulwane takaJosefa lusendvo ngelusendvo.
Titukulwane takaBhenjamini lusendvo ngelusendvo kwaba ngemaBela labetalwa nguBela, nema-Ashbeli labetalwa ngu-Ashbeli, nema-Ahiramu labetalwa ngu-Ahiramu
nemaShufamu labetalwa nguShufamu, nemaHufamu labetalwa nguHufamu.
Titukulwane takaBela tekutalwa ngu-Adi naNamani kwaba nguleti: ema-Adi labetalwa ngu-Adi, nemaNamani labetalwa nguNamani.
Titukulwane takaDani lusendvo ngelusendvo kwaba ngemaShuhamu labetalwa nguShuhamu. Leti-ke bekutinsendvo takaDani.
Titukulwane taka-Asheri lusendvo ngelusendvo kwaba ngemaJimna labetalwa nguJimna, nemaJishvi labetalwa nguJishvi, nemaBheriya labetalwa nguBheriya.
Titukulwane takaBheriya lusendvo ngelusendvo kwaba ngemaHebere labetalwa nguHebere, nemaMalkhiyeli labetalwa nguMalkhiyeli.
Titukulwane takaNaftali lusendvo ngelusendvo kwaba ngemaJasiyeli labetalwa nguJasiyeli, nemaGuni labetalwa nguGuni,
nemaJeseri labetalwa nguJeseri, nemaShilemi labetalwa nguShilemi.
“Lelive litakwabiwa libe lifa labo, kuye ngebunyenti balawo mabito labhalisiwe.
Sive lesinebantfu labanyenti usabele lifa lelikhulu, sive lesinebantfu labambalwa usabele lifa lelincane. Nguleso naleso sive siyawukwabelwa lifa laso kuye ngebunyenti balawo mabito labhalwe phansi.
Ucaphelisise kutsi lelive labiwa ngenkatho. Nguleso naleso sive siyawukwabelwa ngangekwemabito aboyisemkhulu ngekwebuve baso.
Ngulelo nalelo lifa liyakwabiwa ngenkatho nalahlukaniselwa sive lesinyenti nalesincane.”
Naleti bekutinsendvo temaLevi: emaLibni, nemaHebroni, nemaMahali, nemaMushi, nemaKhora. Khohati abenguyisemkhulu wa-Amramu.
Umka-Amramu bekunguJokhebedi, umtukulu waLevi lowatalelwa emndenini wemaLevi
Aroni abenguyise waboNadabi, na-Abihu, na-Eleyazare, na-Ithamari.
BoNadabi naAbihu ngulaba labafa ngesikhatsi banikela ngemlilo longengcwele.
Onkhe emaLevi lamadvuna kusukela kulabenenyanga budzala kuya etulu abeti-23 000. Wona akazange abalwe kanye nema-Israyeli lamanye, ngobe wona akemukeliswanga sabelo selive.
Tonkhe letinsendvo tabalwa nguMosi na-Eleyazare, umphristi, ngesikhatsi kubalwa ema-Israyeli ematsafeni akaMowabi, ngesheya kweJordane, malunga neJerikho.
Kwabate ngisho yinye indvodza leyabalwa kulawa lababalwe nguMosi na-Aroni umphristi elubalweni lwekucala lolwalwentiwe eHlane laseSinayi.
Kungobe Simakadze abetjele ema-Israyeli kutsi nakanjani atawufela ehlane, ngako kwabate nome munye lowasala ngaphandle kwaboKhalebi, umsa waJefune, naJoshuwa, umsa waNuni.
ekungeneni kwelithende lekuhlangana ema embikwaMosi, na-Eleyazare, umphristi, nebaholi besive sonkhe, atsi:
“Babe wetfu wafela ehlane. Abengesiye lomunye webalandzeli baKhora, labadudana ngekuhlubuka Simakadze; wafela sono sakhe, washiya kute emadvodzana.
Pho, kwentiwa yini libito lababe lingaveli elusendvweni ngobe abete indvodzana? Sinikeni sabelo emkhatsini wetihlobo tababe.”
Ngako Mosi wayitsatsa lendzaba yawo wayimikisa kuSimakadze.
“Kuliciniso loku lokushiwo ngemadvodzakati aSelofehadi. Kufanele uwanike sabelo sawo etihlotjeni teyise, aniketwe lifa leyise.
Tjela ema-Israyeli utsi: ‘Nangabe indvodza ifa, ishiye kute indvodzana, imphahla nelifa layo alendluliselwe endvodzakatini yayo.
Nangabe ite ngisho nendvodzakati, lifa layo linikeni banakabo.
Nangabe ite banakabo, lifa layo linikeni bomnakaboyise.
Nangabe uyise abete banakabo, lifa linikeni sihlobo lesisedvutane elusendvweni lwayo kutsi litewuba laso. Loku kufanele kube ngumtsetfo wema-Israyeli, njengobe Simakadze ayala Mosi.’ ”
Utawutsi ungalibona nawe bese uya kubakini, njengemnakenu Aroni,

ngobe ngesikhatsi bantfu bangihlubuka ngasemantini eHlane laseSini, nani nobabili nangihlubuka lapho nangete nawulalela umyalo wami, ngekunganginiki kwenu ludvumo lwekungingcwelisa embikwabo kulawo manti.” Lawo bekungemanti aseMeribha, eKhadeshi, eHlane laseSini.
“Shangatsi Simakadze, Nkulunkulu wemimoya yebantfu bonkhe, angabeka lenye indvodza ibe ngumholi emkhatsini walesive,
iphume ingene embikwaso, isihole ngekusikhipha nekusingenisa, kuze sive saSimakadze singafani netimvu letingenamelusi.”
Mmise embikwa-Eleyazare, umphristi, nesive sonkhe, umbeke embikwaso.
Mnike lamanye emagunya nemandla akho, kuze sive sonkhe sema-Israyeli sitawumlalela simhloniphe.
Utakuma embikwa-Eleyazare, umphristi, lotamtsatsela tincumo latitfole nge-Urimu kuSimakadze. Ngekukhuluma kwakhe yena nesive sonkhe sema-Israyeli bayawuphuma baphindze bangene njengekuyala kwakhe.”
Mosi wenta njengobe abeyalwe nguSimakadze. Watsatsa Joshuwa, wammisa embikwa-Eleyazare, umphristi, kanye nesive sonkhe.
Wabeka tandla takhe etikwakhe, wamnika sikhundla, njengobe Simakadze abeyale Mosi.
“Yala sive sema-Israyeli utsi: ‘Caphelani kutsi niletse kimi ngesikhatsi lesimisiwe kudla lokungumnikelo wami lowentiwa ngemlilo, kube liphunga lelinuka lusi lolumnandzi kimi.’
Shano kubo utsi: ‘Lona ngumnikelo lowentiwa ngemlilo leniyakuwetfula kuSimakadze: emazinyane lamabili lanemnyaka munye budzala langenasiyela, kube ngumnikelo loshiswa onkhe emalanga.
Niyawunikela linye lizinyane ekuseni, leli lelinye nilinikele nakushona lilanga,
libe nemnikelo walokutinhlavu lokuyikhilogremu yinye yafulaha wakolo lobhicwe nemafutsa emncumo langaba yilitha yinye.
Lona ngumnikelo loshiswa onkhe emalanga, lowamiswa entsabeni yaseSinayi kube liphunga lelinuka lusi lolumnandzi, umnikelo lowentiwa ngemlilo kuSimakadze.
Uyawuhambisana nemnikelo wesinatfo lesingaba yilitha yinye ngelizinyane linye. Kuyawutselwa kuSimakadze umnikelo wesinatfo lesinemandla endzaweni lengcwele.

Niyawunikela leli lelinye lizinyane nakushona lilanga kanye nemnikelo walokutinhlavu nemnikelo wesinatfo lofanana newasekuseni. Lowo-ke ngumnikelo lowentiwa ngemlilo, kube liphunga lelinuka lusi lolumnandzi kuSimakadze.’ ”

“ ‘Ngelilanga leliSabatha yentani umnikelo ngemazinyane lamabili lanemnyaka munye langenasiyela, niwanikele kanye nemnikelo wawo wesinatfo nemnikelo walokutinhlavu longemalitha langaba mane nencenye yafulaha lobhicwe nemafutsa.
Lowo-ke kuyawuba ngumnikelo wekushiswa wemaSabatha onkhe ngetulu kwalona loshiswa onkhe emalanga kanye nemnikelo wawo wesinatfo.’ ”

“ ‘Ngelilanga lekucala enyangeni niyakwetfula kuSimakadze umnikelo wekushiswa wetinkunzana letimbili, nesihhanca sinye, nemazinyane lamadvuna etimvu lasikhombisa, lanemnyaka munye budzala, nalangenasiyela.

Inkunzana iyinye iyawuba nemnikelo walokutinhlavu longemalitha langaba sitfupha nencenye afulaha lobhicwe nemafutsa; nalesihhanca sibe nemnikelo walokutinhlavu longemalitha langaba mane nencenye yafulaha lobhicwe nemafutsa,

lizinyane lemvu lilinye libe nemnikelo walokutinhlavu longaba yikhilogremu yafulaha lobhicwe nemafutsa. Lowo-ke ngumnikelo wekushiswa, kube liphunga lelinuka lusi lolumnandzi, umnikelo lowentiwa ngemlilo kuSimakadze.

Inkunzana iyinye iyawuba nemnikelo wesinatfo lesingemalitha langaba mabili eliwayini, nesihhanca sibe neliwayini lelingaba yilitha nencenye; lizinyane lilinye liyawuhambisana neliwayini lelingaba yilitha. Lona-ke ngumnikelo wekushiswa lekufanele wentiwe njalo ekwetfwaseni kwenyanga.
Ngetulu kwemnikelo wekushiswa lovamile lohambisana nemnikelo wesinatfo, imbuti yinye lendvuna kufanele inikelwe kuSimakadze ibe ngumnikelo wesono.’ ”
Ngelilanga leli-15 kulenyanga kufanele kube nesibhimbi. Niyawudla sinkhwa lesingenambiliso emalanga lasikhombisa.
Ngelilanga lekucala niyawuba nemhlangano longcwele ningatsintsi lutfo lolungumsebenti.

Niyakwetfula kuSimakadze umnikelo lowentiwa ngemlilo, umnikelo wekushiswa wetinkunzana letimbili, nesihhanca sinye, nemazinyane lamadvuna etimvu lasikhombisa lanemnyaka munye budzala, onkhe abe ngulangenasiyela.
Inkunzana niyawuyilungisa kanye nemnikelo walokutinhlavu longemalitha langaba sitfupha nencenye yafulaha lobhicwe nemafutsa; lesihhanca sibe nemalitha langaba mane nencenye;
lilinye lizinyane kulawa lasikhombisa kube ngemalitha langaba mabili.
Niyakwengeta nangembuti yinye lendvuna kube ngumnikelo wesono lotanentela inhlawulo yekubuyisana kuSimakadze.
Loko nikwente ngetulu kwaleminikelo yekushiswa leyentiwa njalo nje ekuseni.

Ngaleyo ndlela niyakwenta umnikelo wekudla lowentiwa ngemlilo onkhe emalanga, kuze kuphelele lamalanga lasikhombisa, kube liphunga lelinuka lusi lolumnandzi kuSimakadze. Uyakwengetelwa ngetulu kwalomnikelo wekushiswa lowentiwa onkhe emalanga kanye nemnikelo wawo wesinatfo.
Ngelilanga lesikhombisa niyawuba nemhlangano longcwele ningatsintsi lutfo lolungumsebenti.’ ”
Niyakwetfula umnikelo wekushiswa wetinkunzana letimbili, nesihhanca sinye, nemazinyane lamadvuna etimvu lasikhombisa lanemnyaka munye budzala, kube liphunga lelinuka lusi lolumnandzi kuSimakadze.
Inkunzana iyinye kufanele ibe nemnikelo walokutinhlavu longemalitha langaba sitfupha nencenye afulaha lobhicwe nemafutsa; lesihhanca sibe nemalitha langaba mane nencenye,
lilinye lizinyane kulawa lasikhombisa kufanele libe nemalitha langaba mabili.
Niyakwengeta nangembuti yinye lendvuna lekunguyona iyawunentela inhlawulo yekubuyisana kuSimakadze.
Leyo-ke niyawuyenta kanye neminikelo yayo yesinatfo, ngetulu kwalena leshiswa onkhe emalanga neminikelo yayo yalokutinhlavu. Nicaphelisise kutsi letifuyo atinasiyela ngempela yini.’ ”

Niyakwenta umnikelo wekushiswa ngenkunzana yinye nesihhanca sinye, nemazinyane etimvu lamadvuna lasikhombisa, lanemnyaka munye budzala, nalangenasiyela. Loko-ke liphunga lelinuka lusi lolumnandzi kuSimakadze.
Lenkunzana niyawuyinikela kanye nemnikelo walokutinhlavu lokungemalitha langaba sitfupha nencenye afulaha lobhicwe nemafutsa; lesihhanca sibe nemalitha langaba mane nencenye;
lizinyane lilinye kulawa lasikhombisa libe nemalitha langaba mabili.
Niyakwengeta nangembuti yinye lendvuna kube ngumnikelo wesono lotanentela inhlawulo yekubuyisana kuSimakadze.

Lena-ke ngulengetulu kwaleminikelo leshiswa ekucaleni kwenyanga, kanye neminikelo leshiswa onkhe emalanga kanye neminikelo yayo yalokutinhlavu neyesinatfo, njengobe kubalelwe. Ngiminikelo leyentiwa kuSimakadze ngemlilo, liphunga lelinuka lusi lolumnandzi.’ ”
Niyakwetfula umnikelo wekushiswa ngenkunzana, nesihhanca, nemazinyane etimvu lamadvuna lasikhombisa lanemnyaka munye budzala, onkhe abete siyela, kube liphunga lelinuka lusi lolumnandzi kuSimakadze.
Lenkunzana niyawuyetfula kanye nemnikelo walokutinhlavu lokungemalitha langaba sitfupha nencenye afulaha lobhicwe nemafutsa, lesihhanca sibe nemalitha langaba mane nencenye;
linye lizinyane kulawa lasikhombisa libe nemalitha langaba mabili.

Nengete nangembuti yinye lendvuna lengumnikelo wesono, ngetulu kwalomnikelo wesono wekwenta inhlawulo yekubuyisana kuSimakadze, nalomnikelo wemalanga onkhe wekushiswa kanye nemnikelo wawo walokutinhlavu, neminikelo yayo yesinatfo.’ ”

Niyakwetfula kuSimakadze umnikelo lowentiwa ngemlilo, kube liphunga lelinuka lusi lolumnandzi kuSimakadze, umnikelo wekushiswa wetinkunzana letili-13, netihhanca letimbili, nemazinyane lamadvuna lali-14 etimvu lanemnyaka munye budzala, onkhe angabi nasiyela.

Iyinye inkunzana kuleti letili-13 niyente kanye nemnikelo walokutinhlavu lokungemalitha langaba sitfupha nencenye afulaha lobhicwe nemafutsa; sisinye sihhanca kuleti letimbili sibe nemalitha langaba mane nencenye;
lilinye lizinyane kulawa lali-14 libe nemalitha langaba mabili.
Niyakwengeta ngembuti yinye lendvuna lengumnikelo wesono, ngetulu kwalomnikelo wekushiswa lowentiwa onkhe emalanga kanye nemnikelo wawo walokutinhlavu newesinatfo.
“ ‘Ngelilanga lesibili niyawulungisa tinkunzana letili-12, netihhanca letimbili, nemazinyane lamadvuna etimvu lali-14 lanemnyaka munye budzala, onkhe abe ngulangenasiyela.
Letinkunzana, naletihhanca, nalamazinyane nibokwentela iminikelo yako yalokutinhlavu neyesinatfo, njengobe kubalelwe.
Nibengeta nangembuti lendvuna ibe ngumnikelo wesono ngetulu kwalomnikelo wekushiswa lowentiwa onkhe emalanga kanye nemnikelo wawo walokutinhlavu kanye neminikelo yesinatfo yayo.
“ ‘Ngelilanga lesitsatfu niyawulungisa tinkunzi letili-11, netihhanca letimbili, nemazinyane lamadvuna etimvu lali-14, lanemnyaka munye budzala, onkhe angabi nasiyela.
Letinkunzi, naletihhanca, nalamazinyane nibotilungisela kanye neminikelo yako yalokutinhlavu neyesinatfo, njengobe kubalelwe.
Nibengeta nangembuti lendvuna lengumnikelo wesono ngetulu kwalomnikelo wekushiswa lowentiwa onkhe emalanga kanye nemnikelo wawo walokutinhlavu newesinatfo.
“ ‘Ngelilanga lesine niyawulungisa tinkunzi letilishumi, netihhanca letimbili, nemazinyane lamadvuna etimvu lali-14 lanemnyaka munye budzala, onkhe angabi nasiyela.
Letinkunzi, naletihhanca, nalamazinyane, niyakukulungisa kanye neminikelo yako yalokutinhlavu neyesinatfo, njengobe kubalelwe.
Nibengeta ngembuti yinye lendvuna ibe ngumnikelo wesono ngetulu kwalomnikelo wekushiswa lowentiwa onkhe emalanga kanye nemnikelo wawo walokutinhlavu newesinatfo.
“ ‘Ngelilanga lesihlanu niyakulungisa tinkunzi letiyimfica, netihhanca letimbili, nemazinyane lamadvuna etimvu lali-14 lanemnyaka munye budzala, onkhe angabi nasiyela.
Letinkunzi, naletihhanca, nalamazinyane, niyakukulungisa kanye neminikelo yako yalokutinhlavu neyesinatfo njengobe kubalelwe.
Nibengeta ngembuti yinye lendvuna ibe ngumnikelo wesono ngetulu kwalomnikelo wekushiswa lowentiwa onkhe emalanga nemnikelo wawo walokutinhlavu newesinatfo.
“ ‘Ngelilanga lesitfupha niyakulungisa tinkunzi letisiphohlongo, netihhanca letimbili, nemazinyane lamadvuna etimvu lali-14 lanemnyaka munye budzala, onkhe angabi nasiyela.
Letinkunzi, naletihhanca, nalamazinyane, niyakukulungisa kanye neminikelo yako yalokutinhlavu neyesinatfo, njengobe kubalelwe.
Nibengeta ngembuti yinye lendvuna ibe ngumnikelo wesono ngetulu kwalomnikelo wekushiswa lowentiwa onkhe emalanga neminikelo wawo walokutinhlavu newesinatfo.
“ ‘Ngelilanga lesikhombisa niyawulungisa tinkunzi letisikhombisa, netihhanca letimbili, nemazinyane lamadvuna etimvu lali-14 lanemnyaka munye budzala, onkhe angabi nasiyela.
Letinkunzi, naletihhanca, nalamazinyane niyakulungisa kanye neminikelo yako yalokutinhlavu neyesinatfo, njengobe kubalelwe.
Nibengeta ngembuti yinye lendvuna kube ngumnikelo wesono, ngetulu kwalomnikelo wekushiswa lowentiwa onkhe emalanga nemnikelo wawo walokutinhlavu newesinatfo.
“ ‘Ngelilanga lesiphohlongo niyawuba nemhlangano longcwele; ningatsintsi lutfo lolungumsebenti.

Niyakwetfula umnikelo lowentiwa ngemlilo, kube liphunga lelinuka lusi lolumnandzi kuSimakadze, umnikelo wekushiswa wenkunzi yinye, nesihhanca sinye, nemazinyane lamadvuna etimvu lasikhombisa lanemnyaka munye budzala, onkhe angabi nasiyela.
Lenkunzi, nalesihhanca, nalamazinyane lasikhombisa niyakulungisela iminikelo yako yalokutinhlavu neyesinatfo, njengobe kubalelwe.
Nibengeta ngembuti yinye lendvuna kube ngumnikelo wesono, ngetulu kwalomnikelo wekushiswa lowentiwa onkhe emalanga nemnikelo wawo walokutinhlavu newesinatfo.

“ ‘Ngetulu kweminikelo yenu yesetsembiso neyesihle, niyakwentela Simakadze ngetikhatsi temikhosi yenu leminikelo lelandzelako: iminikelo yenu yekushiswa, neminikelo yenu yalokutinhlavu, neminikelo yenu yesinatfo kanye neminikelo yenu yekuthula.’ ”
Mosi wawatjela ema-Israyeli konkhe loko Simakadze abemtfume kona.
Mosi wakhuluma nebaholi betive tema-Israyeli, watsi: “Nankhu umyalo waSimakadze:
Nangabe umuntfu enta sincumo kuSimakadze nome ente sifungo sekutibopha ngesetsembiso, kufanele angawephuli emavi akhe, kodvwa ente konkhe lakukhulumile.
uyise ayive nayenta lesincumo nome lesetsembiso, kodvwa angete asho lutfo kuyo, tonkhe tincumo tayo netetsembiso tayo tiyawukuma.
Kodvwa nangabe uyise ayalela ngesikhatsi asasiva lesincumo sayo isisho, leso sincumo sayo nome setsembiso sayo letibophe ngaso ngeke sime; Simakadze uyakuyikhulula, ngobe yalelwe nguyise.
“Nangabe intfombi yenta sincumo isengakashadi, nome isente ngekusheshisa nome ngemabomu, nome yetsembisa kungatenti letinye tintfo, bese iyashada,
indvodza yayo ikuve loko kodvwa ingasho lutfo, tincumo tayo netetsembiso tayo titawukuma.
Kodvwa nangabe indvodza yayo iyalela kutsi ifeze leso sincumo sayo nayitjelwa ngaso, akukabhekeki kutsi lentfombi isifeze. Simakadze uyakuyikhulula.
“Umfelokati nome umfati lowehlukene nendvodza yakhe kufanele afeze tonkhe tincumo takhe latentile, nako konkhe kwetsembisa kwakhe kuyawuba sibopho kuye.
“Nangabe umfati lohlala nendvodza yakhe enta sincumo nome sifungo atibophe ngesetsembiso ngekufunga,
indvodza yakhe imuve nakasenta ingasho lutfo kuye, ingete yamalela, leso sincumo sakhe nesetsembiso sakhe latibophe ngaso siyawukuma sinjalo.

Kodvwa nangabe indvodza yakhe imalela kutsi atifeze leto tetsembiso netincumo takhe ngesikhatsi iva ngato, leto tetsembiso netincumo takhe latishito ngemlomo wakhe atiyikuma. Indvodza yakhe itawube itente lite, Simakadze uyakumkhulula kuto.
Indvodza yemfati iyawutinyembenya nome iticinise tincumo temfati wayo latentile nome-ke ngusiphi sifungo lasentile kutsi angatenti tintfo letitsite.

Kodvwa nangabe indvodza yakhe ingasho lutfo kuye ngaso emalanga ngemalanga, kusho kutsi iyavumelana nesincumo nome setsembiso latibophe ngaso. Iyavuma ngekuthula ingasho lutfo ngato kuye nayitjelwa ngato.
Kodvwa nangabe seyiphikisana nato emvakwesikhatsi seyitjeliwe ngato, ngiyo leyakwetfwala lelo cala lalomfati wayo.”
Lena-ke ngimiyalo Simakadze layiniketa Mosi macondzana nebudlelwane emkhatsini wendvodza nemfati wayo, nasemkhatsini weyise nentfombi yakakhe lesengakendzi.
“Khiphela sive saka-Israyeli sibhongo esiveni sakaMidiyani, bese-ke uyafa.”
Ngako Mosi wakhuluma esiveni saka-Israyeli, watsi: “Hlomisani lamanye emadvodza emkhatsini wenu atilungiselele kulwa nemaMidiyani, alungele kuchuba imphindziselo yaSimakadze kubo.
Tfumelani libutfo leliyinkhulungwane yemadvodza kuleso nakuleso sive saka-Israyeli.”
Ngako kwaphuma emadvodza labeti-12 000, labehlomele kulwa imphi, kuleso nakuleso sive ka-Israyeli kwaphuma inkhulungwane yinye.

Mosi wabatfumela emphini. Kwaphuma inkhulungwane esiveni sisinye, wabakhipha naFinehasi, umsa wa-Eleyazare, umphristi. Yena-ke watsatsa tintfo endzaweni lengcwele, watsatsa nemacilongo lababetawukhombisa ngawo indlela.
EmaMidiyani bawahlasela bawashaya bawacotfula onkhe emadvodza, njengekusho kwaSimakadze kuMosi.
Babulala ngisho nemakhosi lasihlanu akaMidiyani, bo-Evi, naRekhemu, naSuri, naHure, naReba. Babulala ngisho naBhalamu, umsa waBheyori, ngelusiko lwenkemba.
Ema-Israyeli ahlasela emaMidiyani atfumba bafati bawo kanye nebantfwana, nemfuyo yawo yonkhe, nekudla kwawo, nato tonkhe timphahla.
Bashisa onkhe emadolobha, lapho bekuhlala khona emaMidiyani, bashisa netinkambu tawo.
Batfumba tonkhe timphahla tekwembatsa, nekudla, nebantfu, netifuyo.
Baletsa imphango nebatfunjwa kuMosi na-Eleyazare, umphristi, nakulo lonkhe libandla lema-Israyeli enkambu yabo ematsafeni akaMowabi, edvute nemfula iJordane macondzana neJerikho.
BoMosi na-Eleyazare, umphristi, nebaholi besive bahamba bayawubahlangabeta ngephandle kwenkambu.
Mosi wabatfukutselela labaholi bemphi, baholi betinkhulungwane nebemakhulu labancandzeka emphini.
Wababuta watsi: “Nibayekele bonkhe yini labasikati nangete nababulala?
Ngibo laba labalandzela teluleko taBhalamu, bekungubona bashushisi labebacondze kwedukisa ema-Israyeli kutsi ahlubuke kuSimakadze kulentfo leyenteka ePheyori, kuze lulaka lwehlele sive saSimakadze.
Bulalani bonkhe bafana, nibulale bonkhe labasikati labake balala nemuntfu lomdvuna,
kodvwa nitishiyele tonkhe tintfombi letingazange setilale nemuntfu lomdvuna.
Niyawuhlanta tonkhe timphahla tekwembatsa nako konkhe lokwentiwe ngesikhumba, nome ngeboya betimbuti nome yini lokubatiwe.”
Eleyazare, umphristi, wakhuluma kulamabutfo labebuya emphini, watsi: “Loko ngulokufunwa ngumtsetfo Simakadze lawunika Mosi:
Igolide, nesiliva, nelitfusi, nensimbi, nemfimfi, nemtfofu,

nako konkhe lokungamelana nemlilo kufanele kufakwe emlilweni, khona kutewuhlanteka. Kodvwa nako kuyadzinga kutsi kuhlanjululwe ngemanti enhlambuluko. Konkhe lokungasha emlilweni kufanele kufakwe kulawo manti ekuhlambulula.
Ngelilanga lesikhombisa niyawugeza timphahla tenu, bese niba ngulabahlambululekile. Emvakwaloko-ke seningangena enkambu.”
“Wena na-Eleyazare, umphristi, nebaholi bemindeni yesive kufanele nibale bonkhe labantfu nalemfuyo letfunjiwe.
Lemphango niyawuyehlukanisa nabele onkhe emabutfo labehlanganyele emphini naso sonkhe-ke sive.
Kulamabutfo labekayile emphini niyakwehlukanisela Simakadze kube kunye lokusibongo senu emakhulwini lasihlanu: ebantfu, newetinkhomo, newetimbongolo, newetimvu, kanye newetimbuti.
Niyawutsatsa lesibongo encenyeni yabo nisinike Eleyazare, umphristi, sibe sabelo saSimakadze.

Encenyeni yema-Israyeli niyakwehlukanisa kunye emashumini lasihlanu: ebantfu, newetinkhomo, newetimbongolo, newetimvu, newetimbuti, nome-ke aletinye nje tilwane. Niyakukunika emaLevi lekunguwona anakekela tintfo tasendzaweni lengcwelengcwele.”
Ngako boMosi na-Eleyazare, umphristi, benta njengobe Simakadze abeyale Mosi.
Imphango leyasala kuloko lokwakutfunjiwe leyatsatfwa ngemabutfo kwaba timvu letiti-675 000,
netintfombi letiti-32 000 letatingazange setilale nemuntfu lomdvuna.
Incenye yeliphakelo lalamabutfo labekaye emphini kwaba timvu letiti-337 500,
tinkhomo taba ti-36 000, sabelo saSimakadze saba tinkhomo letatingema-72;
timbongolo taba ti-30 500, sabelo saSimakadze saba timbongolo letatingema-61;
bantfu baba ti-16 000, sabelo saSimakadze saba ngema-32 ebantfu.
Mosi waniketa Eleyazare lesibongo lebesisabelo saSimakadze, njengobe Mosi abeyalwe nguSimakadze.
Lencenye leyayingeyema-Israyeli Mosi labeyehlukanise kulena yemabutfo,
Kulencenye yesive Mosi wehlukanisa kunye kuwo onkhe ema-50 ebantfu newetilwane, njengobe Simakadze abemyalile; wakuniketa emaLevi labenguwona anakekela indzawo lengcwelengcwele yaSimakadze.
Baholi lababehola emabutfo emphi, labo labebahola tinkhulungwane nemakhulu, baya kuMosi,
bafike batsi: “Tinceku takho setiwabalile emabutfo letiwaholako, kute nalinye lelilahlekile.
Ngako sesiletse umnikelo kuSimakadze, tintfo tegolide lesititfumbile: emabhengela, nemigaco, netindandatho letitimphawu, nemacici, netingcibe. Sitetentela inhlawulo yetfu yekubuyisana kuSimakadze.”
BoMosi na-Eleyazare, umphristi, batemukela letintfo tegolide nato tonkhe tintfo tebuchwephesha.
Yonkhe igolide leyaletfwa baholi betinkhulungwane nebemakhulu, leyemukelwa boMosi na-Eleyazare bayetfula kuSimakadze yayinesisindvo lesasingemakhilogremu labengaba li-190.
Ngulelo nalelo butfo latitsatsela sabelo salo emphangweni.
BoMosi na-Eleyazare, umphristi, bayemukela legolide kulabaholi betinkhulungwane nebemakhulu, bayimikisa ethendeni lekuhlangana, kwaba sikhumbuto sema-Israyeli embikwaSimakadze.
EmaRubeni nemaGadi labenemihlambi lemikhulu yetinkhomo, netimvu, netimbuti abona ematsafa aseJazeri naseGileyadi kutsi abelungele kuba ngemadlelo.
Ngako baya kuboMosi na-Eleyazare, umphristi, kanye nebaholi besive, bafike batsi:
“I-Atharothe, neDiboni, neJazeri, neNimra, neHeshboni, ne-Eleyale, neSebamu, neNebo, kanye neBheyoni,
live Simakadze lalincoba walinika sive sema-Israyeli, lilungele kuba ngemadlelo, kantsi tinceku takho tinemihlambi yetifuyo.”
Bachubeka batsi: “Nangabe sizuze umusa emehlweni enu, lelive alabelwe tinceku tenu kube sabelo sato. Ningaseweti umfula iJordane.”
Mosi waphendvula lamaGadi nemaRubeni, watsi: “Nisho kutsi nine ningasala lapha, abe emabutfo akini lenishuca nawo ayekulwa imphi?
Niwacedzelani emandla ema-Israyeli kutsi angeweleli ngesheya eveni Simakadze lawaphe lona?
Naboyihlo benta njalo, nangibatfuma eKhadeshi Bhaneya kutsi bayewuhlola live.
Ngemva kwekwewelela eSihosheni sase-Eshikholi kuyewubuka live, bawacedza emandla ema-Israyeli kutsi angangeni eveni Simakadze lawaphe lona.
Ngalelo langa intfukutselo yaSimakadze yavutsa, waze wafunga watsi:

‘Njengobe bangazange bangilandzele ngenhlitiyo yonkhe, kute namunye wemadvodza, kusukela kulaneminyaka lengema-20 kuya etulu, laphuma eGibhithe layawulibona lelive lengaletsembisa ngekufunga ku-Abrahama, na-Isaka, naJakobe;
kute namunye ngaphandle kwaKhalebi, umsa waJefune, umKhenizi, naJoshuwa, umsa waNuni, ngobe bona baphikelela balandzela Simakadze ngayo yonkhe inhlitiyo yabo.’
Intfukutselo yaSimakadze yavutsela sive sema-Israyeli, wasenta sazulazula ehlane iminyaka lengema-40, saze safa saphela sonkhe leso situkulwane lesasente lokubi embikwaSimakadze.
“Nani-ke, ntalelwane yetoni, nime kuleyo ndzawo yaboyihlo, nentela kutsi Simakadze asitfukutselele kakhulu kunakucala sive sema-Israyeli.
Nanijika ningamlandzeli, utawuphindze asishiye sonkhe futsi lesive ehlane, nine-ke nitawuba sisusa sekubhujiswa kwaso.”
Beta kuye, bafike batsi: “Sifuna kwakhela tifuyo tetfu tibaya, sakhe nemadolobha lapha, kuze kutewuhlala khona bafati betfu nebantfwabetfu.

Kodvwa tsine silungele kutsi sihlome sihambe embili kwema-Israyeli, size siwafikise eveni lawo. Ngaleso sikhatsi bafati betfu nebantfwabetfu batawube bahleti emadolobheni lavikelekile, kuze bavikeleke baphephe kulabantfu balelive.
Singeke sibuyele emakhaya etfu, sive sema-Israyeli singakatfoli sabelo saso.
Singeke semukele lifa kanye naso ngesheya kweJordane, ngobe phela tsine lifa letfu sesilemukele ngalapha ngasemphumalanga kweJordane.”
Mosi wakhuluma kubo, watsi: “Nangabe nitawukwenta loko, nihlomele imphi embikwaSimakadze,
nangabe nonkhe nitawuhloma newelele ngesheya kweJordane embikwaSimakadze, aze aticoshe tonkhe titsa takhe embikwakhe,
litawutsi lelive lingatfunjwa embikwaSimakadze, bese niyancandzeka nikhululeke kulesibopho senu naSimakadze nasesiveni sonkhe sema-Israyeli. Lelive-ke seliyawuba sabelo senu embikwaSimakadze.
Kodvwa naningakwenti loko, niyona kuSimakadze, futsi-ke nibociniseka-ke kutsi salakutjelwa sibona ngemopho.
Bafati benu nebantfwabenu bakheleni emadolobha, netifuyo tenu nitakhele tibaya; kodvwa nibokwenta loko lenikwetsembisile.”
EmaGadi nemaRubeni akhuluma kuMosi, atsi: “Tsine, tinceku takho, sitakwenta njengekusho kwenkhosi yetfu.
Bantfwabetfu, nebafati betfu, nemihlambi yetifuyo tetfu kutawusala kulamadolobha aleli lakaGileyadi.
Kodvwa tinceku takho, onkhe emadvodza lahlomele kuyakulwa emphini, atakwewela ayekulwa embikwaSimakadze, njengobe inkhosi yetfu isho.”

Wakhuluma watsi kubo: “Nangabe emaGadi nemaRubeni, onkhe emadvodza lahlomele imphi, ewelela nani ngesheya kweJordane embikwaSimakadze, nitawutsi lelive nase nilitfumbile, bese nibanika live lakaGileyadi kutsi libe labo.
Kodvwa nabangaweli kanye nani bahlomile, kufanele bemukele sabelo sabo kanye nani eKhenani.”
EmaGadi nemaRubeni aphendvula atsi: “Tinceku takho titakwenta njengobe Simakadze ashito.
Sitakwewela sihlomile embikwaSimakadze siye eKhenani, kodvwa live lelilifa letfu lesilidlile litawuba mshiya ngalo kweJordane.”
EmaGadi akha emadolobha iDiboni ne-Atharothe, ne-Aroyeri,
neBhethi Nimra, neBhethi Haramu, aba ngemadolobha lavikelekile, akha netibaya temihlambi yawo.
EmaRubeni akha emadolobha iHeshboni, ne-Eleyale, neKhiriyathayimu,
kanye neNebo, neBhali Meyoni, lawo magama aguculwa, neSibima. Bawetsa emabito lamasha lamadolobha labawakha kabusha.
Ngako-ke live lakaGileyadi Mosi waliniketa emaMakhire, titukulwane takaManase, akha khona lapho.
Jayire, umtukulu waManase, watfumba takhiwo tabo, watetsa libito watsi ngemaHavothi Jayire.
Kwatsi Noba yena watfumba iKhenathi kanye netabelo letatitungelete lelo dolobha, watetsa ngelibito lakhe watsi yiNoba.
Leti-ke tigaba teluhambo lwesive sema-Israyeli, nasiphuma eGibhithe ngetive taso ngaphansi kwesandla saboMosi na-Aroni.
Ngekuyala kwaSimakadze Mosi wabhala onkhe emabito etindzawo lapho babefike bemise khona. Nalu-ke luhambo lwaso ngetigaba talo:
EmaGibhithe abengcwaba ematubulo awo onkhe labeshaywe nguSimakadze emkhatsini wawo; ngobe Simakadze abebehlulele bonkhe bonkulunkulu bawo.
Esuka eSukhothi ayawumisa e-Ethamu, emnyeleni welihlane.
Esuka e-Ethamu ancandzeka aya ePhi Hahirothi, ngasemphumalanga kweBhali Sefoni, emisa embikweMigdoli.
Esuka ePhi Hahirothi, adzabula lwandle ekhatsi ewelela ehlane, atsi kube ahambe emalanga lamatsatfu eHlane lase-Ethamu, emisa eMara.
Esuka eMara aya e-Elimu, lapho bekunemitfombo leli-12 netihlahla temasundvu letatingema-70, emisa khona lapho.
Esuka ngaseLwandle Lolubovu emisa eHlane laseSini.
Esuka e-Alushi emisa eRefidimu, lapho kwakute khona emanti ekunatfwa bantfu.
Esuka eHlane laseSinayi emisa eKhibrothi Hathava.
Esuka eBhene Jakani emisa eHori Hagidigadi.
Esuka e-Esiyoni Geberi emisa eKhadeshi, eHlane laseSini.
Esuka eKhadeshi emisa eNtsabeni iHori, emnyeleni we-Edomu.
Aroni abesaneminyaka leli-123 budzala ngesikhatsi afela eNtsabeni iHori.
Esuka e-Obothi emisa e-Iye Abarimu, emnyeleni wakaMowabi.
Esuka eDiboni Gadi emisa e-Alimoni Diblathayimu.
Esuka e-Alimoni Diblathayimu emisa etintsabeni tase-Abarimu, edvute neNebo.
Esuka etintsabeni tase-Abarimu, emisa ematsafeni akaMowabi, edvute nemfula iJordane malungana neJerikho.
Ematsafeni akaMowabi emisa edvute nemfula iJordane kusuka eBhethi Jeshimothi kuya e-Abela Shithimu.
Ematsafeni akaMowabi edvute nemfula iJordane malungana neJerikho,
niboticosha nitikhiphe tonkhe letive lenitatikhandza khona. Nibotibhubhisa tonkhe letitfombe tato, netithico tato letibatiwe kanye netindzawo tato letiphakeme tekukhontela.
Lelive nibolidla libe lenu nihlale kulo, ngobe nginiphe lona kutsi libe lenu.

Lelive nibolabelana ngenkatho kulolo nakulolo lusendvo. Sive lesinebantfu labanyenti nibabele lifa lelikhulu, kanjalo nakulabo labasive lesincane nibabele lelincane. Nome ngabe yini labayitfole ngenkatho kuyawuba kwabo. Lelive nibolabelana ngekwetive tenu.
Mine ngiyawukwenta kini loko lengitimisele kukwenta kubo.’ ”
“Yala ema-Israyeli utsi kuwo: ‘Naningena eKhenani, live lenitakwabelwa lona kutsi libe lifa lenu, litawuba naleminyele lena:
Ngaseningizimu litawufaka liHlane laseSini kugudla umnyele waka-Edomu. Ngasemphumalanga, umnyele utawucala ngaseningizimu ngasekugcineni kweLwandle Lweluswayi,
wewelele ngesheya eningizimu yemsaho longuFecela, i-Akrabhimu, wendlule uye eHlane laseSini ucondze eningizimu yeKhadeshi Bhaneya. Utawushaya ucondze eHasari Adari uze ufike e-Asmoni,
lapho utawufike ujike khona, ucondze emfudlaneni waseGibhithe uhambelane nawo ugcine eLwandle.
“ ‘Umnyele wenu ngasenshonalanga kutawuba lugu lweLwandle Lolukhulu.
“ ‘Umnyele wenu ngasenyakatho utawuhamba usuke eLwandle Lolukhulu
uchubekele eZifroni ugcine eHasari Enani. Kutawuba ngulowo-ke umnyele wenu ngasenyakatfo.
“ ‘Umnyele wenu ngasemphumalanga utawuhamba usuke eHasari Enani uze ufike eShefamu.
Umnyele utawucondza eningizimu, kusukela eShefamu kuya eRibla ngasemphumalanga ye-Ayini, uchubeke ugudle emacele ngasemphumalanga yeLwandle iKhinerethi.
Lomnyele utakwewuka ugudle iJordane ugcine ngeLwandle Lweluswayi.
“ ‘Ngiyo lena-ke iminyele yelive lenu kuyo yonkhe leyo mihlubulo yalo.’ ”
ngobe imindeni yesive sakaRubeni, nesive sakaGadi, nencenye yesive sakaManase seyilemukele lifa lato.
Letive letimbili nencenye setilemukele lifa lato, ngasemphumalanga yemfula iJordane, malungana neJerikho
“Nankha-ke emabito alamadvodza latawunabela lelive kutsi libe lifa lenu: bo-Eleyazare, umphristi, naJoshuwa, umsa waNuni.
Beka umholi waleso naleso sive kutsi asisite ekwabeni lelive lelilifa lenu.
Bukhi, umsa waJogli, umholi labephuma esiveni sakaDani;
Haniyeli, umsa wa-Efodi, umholi labephuma esiveni sakaManase, umsa waJosefa;
Khemuweli, umsa waShifthani, umholi labephuma esiveni saka-Efrayimu, umsa waJosefa;
Elisafani, umsa waPhanaki, umholi labephuma esiveni sakaZebuloni;
Phaltiyeli, umsa wa-Azani, umholi labephuma esiveni saka-Isakhari;
Ahihudi, umsa waShelomi, umholi labephuma esiveni saka-Asheri;
Phedaheli, umsa wa-Amihudi, umholi labephuma esiveni sakaNaftali.”
Kwaba ngiwo lawa-ke emabito emadvodza Simakadze lawanika umsebenti wekwabela ema-Israyeli lifa lawo lekwakulive laseKhenani.
“Yala ema-Israyeli kutsi abele emaLevi lawo madolobha latawuhlala kuwo kuleso sabelo lesitawuba ngesawo ema-Israyeli. Wabeleni nalawo madlelo latungelete lawo madolobha.
Ngako atawuba nemadolobha latawuhlala kuwo abe nemadlelo, lapho atawukhotsisa khona tifuyo tawo.
“Bubanti balawo madlelo latungelete lawo madolobha lenitakuwanika emaLevi butawuba ngemamitha langaba ngema-450 kusuka elubondzeni lwelidolobha.

Ngephandle kwelidolobha niyawulinganisa indzawo lelibanga lelingemamitha langaba ngema-900 ngasemphumalanga, nalengemamitha langaba ngema-900 ngaseningizimu, nalengemamitha langaba ngema-900 ngasenshonalanga, nalengemamitha langaba ngema-900 ngasenyakatfo, lidolobha libesemkhatsini. Lendzawo iyawuba ngemadlelo alawo madolobha awo.
lokusho kutsi asawonkhe emadolobha lekufanele niwabele wona atawuba ngema-48 kanye nemadlelo awo.

Lamadolobha lenitawanika emaLevi kulelive lelabelwe ema-Israyeli kufanele alingane nalelo live laleso naleso sive ngebukhulu nangebuncane baso: Tsatsani emadolobha lamanyenti kuleso sive lesikhulu, kodvwa nitsatse emadolobha lambalwa kuleso sive lesincane.”
khetsani lamanye emadolobha kutsi atewuba ngemadolobha enu ekukhosela, lapho kungabalakela khona umuntfu, nangabe abulele lomunye umuntfu angakacondzi.
Ayawuba tindzawo tekukhosela ekubalekeleni umphindziseli, khona kutewutsi lona lobulele angetikufa asengakalitfoli litfuba lekutsi licala lakhe litekwe ebandla.
Lamadolobha lasitfupha nitawakhetsela kutsi abe ngewekukhosela.
Lamatsatfu atawuba ngala kweJordane, lamatsatfu abe ngale ngesheya kweJordane eKhenani.

Lamadolobha lasitfupha atawuba yindzawo yekukhoselisa ema-Israyeli, nebetive, nome ngubani umuntfu lohlala emkhatsini wabo, khona kutewutsi lowo lobulele umuntfu ngesiphosiso atewubalekela khona ayewukhosela.
Nome-ke nangabe umuntfu anelitje esandleni sakhe lelingabulala umuntfu, bese kuyenteka ushaya umuntfu ambulale ngalo, lowo lomshayile ungumbulali; lombulali uyawubulawa.
Nome-ke nangabe umuntfu aphetse intfo leyentiwe ngelukhuni lengambulala umuntfu, bese kuyenteka ushaya umuntfu ambulale ngayo, lowo lomshayile ungumbulali; lombulali uyawubulawa naye.
Umphindziseli losihlobo sengati semufi nasihlangana nalombulali, siyawumbulala.
“ ‘Nangabe umuntfu atondza lomunye, adzimate ambulale ngekumchilitela phansi nome ambulale ngekumjikijela ngentfo acondze kumbulala, nembala afe,
nome atfukutsele wamshaya wambulala ngesibhakela, lowo muntfu uyawubulawa; ungumbulali. Umphindziseli losihlobo semufi utawutsi angahlangana nalombulali ambulale.
“ ‘Kodvwa nakwenteka ngaphandle kwekutfukutsela umuntfu wachilita lomunye nome wamjikijela ngentfo angakacondzi,
nome wamshaya angaboni, ngelitje lelingambulala, nembala afe, kantsi abengesiso sitsa sakhe futsi abengakacondzi kumlimata,
libandla kufanele lehlulele emkhatsini wakhe nalomphindziseli losihlobo semufi, lilandzele lemitsetfo.

Libandla kufanele livikele lona lonelicala lekubulala kulomphindziseli losihlobo semufi ngekutsi lincandzekise lombulali, abuyele edolobheni lekukhosela, lapho abebalekele khona. Kufanele ahlale lapho, kuze kufe umphristi lomkhulu, labegcotjwe ngemafutsa langcwele.
“ ‘Kodvwa nangabe lombekwacala kwenteka aphumela ngephandle kwalelidolobha lekukhosela labalekele kulo,
bese lomphindziseli losihlobo semufi ukhandza lombulali ngephandle kwalelidolobha, lomphindziseli angambulala futsi angabi nacala ngaloko kumbulala kwakhe.
Umbulali kufanele ahlale kulelo dolobha lekukhosela, kuze kufe umPhristi Lomkhulu; emvakwekufa kwemPhristi Lomkhulu sangancandzeka abuyele endzaweni lesabelo sakhe.
Lena-ke nguyona mitsetfo yenu lenitawuhamba ngayo titukulwane ngetitukulwane.
Ningayemukeli inhlawulo yekuhlenga kuphila kwembulali, lofanele kufa. Lowo kufanele afe.
Ningayemukeli inhlawulo yemuntfu lobalekele edolobheni lekukhosela ngekutsi nimvumele kutsi abuyele ayewuhlala eveni lakhe, umPhristi Lomkhulu asengakafi.
Ningalingcolisi lelive lenikulo. Kucitsa ingati kuyalingcolisa live, nenhlawulo yekubuyisana naSimakadze ingeke yentelwe live, lapho kucitselwe khona ingati, ngaphandle kwengati yalowo lobulele.
Ningalingcolisi lelive, lapho nine nami sihlala khona, ngobe mine, Simakadze, ngihlala emkhatsini wema-Israyeli.’ ”
Batsi: “Ngesikhatsi Simakadze ayala inkhosi yami kutsi lelive ulabele ngenkatho kuma-Israyeli kutsi kube lifa lawo, wayala kutsi lifa lemnaketfu Selofehadi linikwe emadvodzakati akhe.

Ake sitsi bashada nemadvodza aletinye tive taka-Israyeli, loko kutawusho kutsi lelo lifa labo litawutsatfwa lingabe lisaba ngilo lifa labokhokho betfu, bese liba lalawo madvodza labashade nawo. Ngaloko-ke kusho kutsi incenye yalelo lifa lelabelwe tsine itawube seyiyatsatfwa.
Nakufika umnyaka wekubuyiselwa ka-Israyeli, lifa labo litakwengetelwa kuleso sive lashade kuso, nalelo lifa labo litawutsatfwa lingabe lisaba lifa labokhokho betfu.”
Mosi watsi kube ayalwe nguSimakadze, wabe sewetfula nankhu umlayeto kuma-Israyeli, watsi: “Loko lokushiwo sive setitukulwane taJosefa kungiko ngempela.
Naku-ke lokungumyalo waSimakadze macondzana nemadvodzakati aSelofehadi: Angashada nome ngangubani lamtsandzako yingci nakungewelusendvo lwesive seyise.
Kute lifa lelingumhlaba lekuyawuphiwana ngalo ka-Israyeli lisuke kulesinye sive liye kulesinye sive, ngobe wonkhe um-Israyeli uyawuligcina lelo live lalitfola kubokhokho bakhe.
Indvodzakati lenelifa lelilive kuso sonkhe sive sema-Israyeli kufanele ishade nemuntfu welusendvo lwesive seyise, kuze kutsi wonkhe um-Israyeli atewuba nelifa laboyise.
Kute lifa lelilive leliyakwendluliswa lisuswe kulesinye sive liye kulesinye sive, ngobe nguleso naleso sive siyawutigcinela lifa laso.”
Ngako emadvodzakati aSelofehadi enta loko Simakadze layala Mosi kutsi kwentiwe.
Emadvodzakati aSelofehadi, boMahala, naThisa, naHogila, naMilkha, naNowa, ashada nabomzala bawo lababetihlobo teyise.
Ashada etinsendvweni tetitukulwane taManase, umsa waJosefa, kwase kutsi lifa labo lajinge ladliwa belusendvo lwesive sabo.
Ngiyo lena-ke imiyalo nemitsetfo yaSimakadze layinika ema-Israyeli ngesandla saMosi ngesikhatsi asemise ematsafeni akaMowabi ngaseJordane ngesheya kwemfula iJordane malungana neJerikho.

Lawa-ke ngemavi aMosi lawakhuluma kuso sonkhe sive sema-Israyeli basesehlane ngasemphumalanga nemfula iJordane, e-Arabha, macondzana neSufi, emkhatsini wePharani neThofeli, neLabani, neHaserothi, neDizahabi.
Kutsatsa emalanga lali-11 kuhamba usuka eHorebe uye eKhadeshi Bhaneya, nawuhamba ngemgwaco weNtsaba iSeyiri.
Ngemnyaka wema-40, ngelilanga lekucala enyangeni yeli-11, kusukela baphuma eGibhithe, Mosi wakhuluma kuma-Israyeli konkhe loko Simakadze labemyale ngako kutsi awatjele kona, lokumacondzana nawo.
Loko wakwenta emvakwekuba asehlule Sihoni, inkhosi yema-Amori, leyayibusa eHeshboni. Emphini yase-Edreyi abehlule Ogi, inkhosi yaseBhashani, leyayibusa e-Ashtarothe.
Ngasemphumalanga nemfula iJordane, eveni lakaMowabi, Mosi wacala wawufundzisa lomtsetfo.
“Simakadze Nkulunkulu wetfu ukhulume kitsi siseseHorebe, watsi: ‘Senihleti kakhulu kulentsaba.

Tfutsani, nichubekele etintsabeni tema-Amori, nakuto tonkhe leto tive letisedvutane, tase-Arabha, naletisetintsabeni, naletingaphansi kwetintsaba ngasenshonalanga, naletiseNegevu, lekuyiningizimu yelive, naletigudla lwandle, eveni lemaKhenani kuya kulaseLebanoni, kufike ngisho nasemfuleni lomkhulu iYufrathe.

Libukeni-ke lonkhe lelo live lenginiphe lona. Ngenani kulo nilidle lelive Simakadze lafunga ngalo kutsi utalipha bokhokho benu bo-Abrahama, na-Isaka, naJakobe, kanye netitukulwane tabo letiyawuvela emvakwabo.’ ”
Simakadze Nkulunkulu wenu sewunandzisile manje, senibanyenti kakhulu, senize naba ngangetinkhanyeti tesibhakabhaka.
Shangatsi Simakadze, Nkulunkulu waboyihlomkhulu, anganandzisa ngetinkhulungwane letiphindziwe, anibusise njengobe etsembisa!
Kodvwa ngingatetfwala kanjani tinkinga tenu, nemitfwalo yenu, nemibango yenu, mine ngingedvwa?
Khetsani emadvodza lahlakaniphile, nalanekucondza, nalatiwako kuleso nakuleso sive, ngitawube sengiyawabeka kutsi anengamele.’

Ngako ngatsatsa labaholi betive tenu, emadvodza lahlakaniphile nalahloniphekile, ngawabeka kutsi anengamele, abe tindvuna tetinkhulungwane, netemakhulu, netema-50, netemashumi, nekutsi abe tiphatsimandla taletive tenu.
“Labaholi ngabayala ngaso leso sikhatsi ngatsi: ‘Hlolisisani imibango yalabanakenu, bese nehlulela ngekungakhetsi, nome licala lisemkhatsini wema-Israyeli nome lisemkhatsini wema-Israyeli newetive.
Ningacali nehlulele ngekukhetsa; lalelani lomkhulu nalomncane ngalokufananako. Ningesabi muntfu, ngobe kwehlulela kwaNkulunkulu. Licala lelilukhuni kini niboliletsa lapha kimi, ngitekuliva.’
Ngaleso sikhatsi nganitjela konkhe lebenifanele kukwenta.”
“Satfutsa eHorebe, njengobe Simakadze Nkulunkulu wetfu abesiyalile, sacondza ngasetintsabeni, eveni lema-Amori, sadzabula lonkhe lelo hlane lelesabekako lesenilibonile, saze sefika eKhadeshi Bhaneya.
Ngase ngitsi kini: ‘Senifikile eveni letintsaba, live lema-Amori, lesiliphiwa nguSimakadze Nkulunkulu wetfu.

Libukeni-ke lelive leniliphiwe nguSimakadze Nkulunkulu wenu. Khuphukelani kulo niyekulidla lelo live, njengobe natjelwa nguSimakadze Nkulunkulu waboyihlomkhulu. Ningesabi, ningalahlekelwa nalitsemba.’
“Lomcondvo wabonakala umuhle kimi; ngako ngavele ngakhetsa emadvodza lali-12 emkhatsini wenu, yaba yinye kuleso nakuleso sive.
Esuka akhuphukela eveni letintsaba efika eSihosheni sase-Eshikholi, asihlolisisa.
Lamadvodza akha letinye tetitselo talelo live atiphatsa, eta nato lapha kitsi; afike asibikela atsi: ‘Lelive lasinika lona Simakadze Nkulunkulu wetfu lihle kakhulu.’
Nakhonona emathendeni enu, natsi: ‘Simakadze uyasenyanya; kungako nje asikhipha eveni laseGibhithe, abentela kutasinikela etandleni tema-Amori kutsi atesibhubhisa.

Siyaphi nje? Labanaketfu sebasesabisile, batsi: “Bantfu bakhona bacinile, kantsi futsi badze kunatsi; emadolobha abo makhulu, futsi atinqaba, netibondza tawo tiphakeme taze tatsintsa sibhakabhaka. Sabona ngisho nemadvodzana a-Anaki
Simakadze Nkulunkulu wenu, lohamba embikwenu, utanilwela njengobe enta eGibhithe embikwenu nibuka,
kanjalo nasehlane futsi. Nabona lapho kutsi Simakadze Nkulunkulu wenu wanetfwala kanjani, njengababe etfwele indvodzana yakhe, kuyo yonkhe indlela nahamba naze nefika kuyo lendzawo.’
Kodvwa najinge nangete nametsemba Simakadze Nkulunkulu wenu,
labehamba embikwenu, ngemlilo ebusuku nangelifu emini. Loko abekwentela kunifunela tindzawo lapho ningemisa khona, nekutsi anikhombise indlela lekufanele nihambe ngayo.”
‘Kute nome munye umuntfu walesitukulwane lesibi loyakulibona lelive lelihle lengafunga ngalo kutsi ngiyakulinika bokhokho benu,
ngaphandle kwaKhalebi, umsa waJefune. Yena-ke uyakulibona, nginike yena netitukulwane takhe live lapho lunyawo lwakhe belunyatsele khona, ngobe walandzela Simakadze ngenhlitiyo yakhe yonkhe.’
Simakadze wangitfukutselela ngenca yenu, waze watsi kimi: ‘Nawe ungeke ungene kulo.
Kodvwa umsiti wakho, Joshuwa, umsa waNuni, utawungena kulo. Mkhutsate, ngobe utawuhola lama-Israyeli kutsi alidle.’
Kodvwa nine bantfu, ncandzekani, nicondze ngasehlane ngendlela leya eLwandle Lolubovu.
“Kodvwa Simakadze wakhuluma kimi, watsi: ‘Batjele utsi: “Ningakhuphuki kuyakulwa, ngobe mine ngingeke ngibe nani. Titsa tenu titakunehlula.” ’
Ngabe sengiyanitjela, kodvwa anizange nifune kungilalela. Nahlubuka ngekungawulaleli umyalo waSimakadze, ngekutiphakamisa kwenu nachubeka nashuca, nakhuphukela eveni letintsaba.
Ema-Amori, labehlala kuleto tintsaba, aphuma anihlasela, anicosha anitselekela njengelibulo letinyosi, anishaya anilahla phansi kusukela eSeyiri kuze kuyewufika eHoma.
Nabuya lapho nakhala kuSimakadze, kodvwa akazange akunake loko kukhala kwenu, wasuke watsalalisa nje.”
“Ngako-ke nahlala eKhadeshi emalanga lamanyenti, nacitsa sikhatsi lesidze nilapho.
‘Senihambe sikhatsi lesidze seloku nitungeleta lelive letintsaba, manje-ke sale nijikela ngasenyakatfo.
Nika labantfu nansi imiyalo utsi: “Senitalidzabula ekhatsi lelive lebanakenu, titukulwane ta-Esawu, letihlala eSeyiri. Batawunesaba, kodvwa nibocaphela.

Ningabachukuluti kutsi baze balwe nani, ngobe ngingeke ngininike, ngisho nalokuncane kwalelive labo, ngisho nekwekubeka lunyawo lwenu imbala. Ngilinike Esawu lelive letintsaba iSeyiri, kutsi libe lakhe.
Kufanele nibakhokhele ngesiliva konkhe kudla kwabo lenikudlako, nemanti abo leniwanatsako.” ’

“Simakadze Nkulunkulu wenu unibusisile ngayo yonkhe imisebenti yenu yetandla leniyentako. Uninakekele ngesikhatsi nisahamba nidzabula lelihlane lelikhulukati. Kuyo yonkhe leminyaka lengema-40 Simakadze Nkulunkulu wenu abesolomane anani, anizange seneswele lutfo.
“Ngako sahamba sendlula labanaketfu labatitukulwane taka-Esawu, lababehlala eSeyiri. Sawushiya umgwaco i-Arabha lochamuka e-Elathi nase-Esiyoni Geberi; sahamba ngemgwaco welihlane lakaMowabi.

Simakadze wakhuluma kimi, watsi: ‘Ningawahlaseli emaMowabi, futsi ningawachukuluti kutsi aze alwe, ngobe ngingeke ngininike, ngisho nencenye nje yelive lawo. I-Ari yona ngiyiphe titukulwane taLoti kutsi ibe yato.’ ”
Naso sasatiwa kutsi singemaRefa njengawo ema-Anaki; kodvwa emaMowabi abesibita ngekutsi ngema-Emi.

EmaHori abehlala eSeyiri, kodvwa titukulwane taka-Esawu tawacosha. Tawabhubhisa onkhe emaHori labelapho, kwabe sekuhlala tona kuleyo ndzawo yawo, njengobe ema-Israyeli enta eveni lanikwa lona nguSimakadze kutsi alidle.
Kwendlula iminyaka lengema-38 kusukela esikhatsini sekusuka eKhadeshi Bhaneya. Ngaleso sikhatsi lonkhe lelo butfo lemadvodza aleso situkulwane abesafe aphela, njengobe Simakadze abefungile.
Sandla saSimakadze sachubeka kumelana nabo, baze bafa bonkhe baphela enkambu.
“Kwatsi kube kufe ekugcina kulawo madvodza, emkhatsini walabo bantfu,
‘Lamuhla nitakwewelela ngesheya kwe-Ari lekungumnyele welive lakaMowabi.

Nase nifike esiveni sema-Amoni, ningawachukuluti futsi ningawakhubi, ngobe ngingeke ngininike, ngisho nencenye nje yalelive lawo kutsi libe lifa lenu, ngobe phela ngalipha titukulwane taLoti kutsi libe lifa lato.’ ”
Lelo bekutsiwa live lemaRefa labehlala kulo kucala; kodvwa ema-Amori abewabita ngekutsi ngemaZamzumi.
Bekusive lesasinemandla, kantsi futsi sasisinyenti, futsi sisidze njengema-Anaki, kodvwa Simakadze wawabhubhisa. Kwefika ema-Amoni acosha lamaRefa, kwase kwakha wona kulelo live.
Simakadze bekatentele njalo titukulwane taka-Esawu letatihlala eSeyiri, ngesikhatsi abhubhisa emaHori, lawacosha kulelo live, kwabe sekwakha tona kuze kube ngulamuhla.
Ema-Avi labakhe emadolobheni lagudla lwandle kuze kuyewufika eGaza, wona-ke abhujiswa ngemaKhrethe labechamuka eKhrethe. Lelive lase lidliwa ngulawo maKhrethe.
“Sukumani, nihambe nidzabule Sihosha sase-Anoni. Bukani la, indzawo yaSihoni, um-Amori, inkhosi yaseHeshboni, nelive lakhe, ngikwetfule etandleni tenu. Mhlaseleni nidle lelive lakhe.
Kusukela lamuhla ngitawucala kwenta tonkhe tive temhlaba tinesabe titfutfumele ngani. Nativa kukhulunywa ngani, tiyawukwesaba tikhatsateke kakhulu ngani.”
‘Sicela kwendlula sidzabule lelive lakho. Sitawuhamba ngemgwaco, singeke siphambukele ngesekudla nome ngesancele.
Sitsengisele kudla, khona sitekudla, usitsengisele nemanti sitewunatsa; konkhe usitsengisele ngesiliva. Sicela mane usivumele kutsi sendlule ngetinyawo,
njengobe kwenta titukulwane taka-Esawu letihlala eSeyiri, nanjengobe kwenta emaMowabi lahlala e-Ari, size sewelele ngesheya kweJordane, eveni lasinika lona Simakadze Nkulunkulu wetfu.’
“Simakadze wakhuluma kimi, watsi: ‘Buka la, Sihoni nelive lakhe sengimnikele kuwe. Cala manje kumncoba, khona utekulidla lelive lakhe.’
“Sihoni nemabutfo akhe waphuma atewusihlasela emphini yaseJahasi,
Simakadze Nkulunkulu wetfu wamnikela kitsi, samncoba yena nemadvodzana akhe kanye nesive sakhe sonkhe.
Ngaleso sikhatsi sawatsatsa onkhe emadolobha akhe, sawabhubhisa onkhe, nemadvodza, nebafati, nebantfwana. Akuzange kusale ngisho namunye.
Kodvwa tifuyo nalesasikutfumbe emadolobheni lesasiwancobile sakutfutsa sahamba nako.

Kusukela e-Aroyeri lesemngcengcemeni weSihosha sase-Anoni, kanye nekusuka edolobheni lelisesikhunjini semfula, kuze kuyewufika eGileyadi kwabate ngisho nalinye lidolobha lelaba ngetulu kwemandla etfu. Simakadze Nkulunkulu wetfu wawanikela kitsi onkhe.

Kodvwa asizange sisondzele eveni lema-Amoni: nome eceleni kugudla umfula iJabhoki, nome ngasemadolobheni laseveni letintsaba, nome ngukuphi-ke lapho Simakadze Nkulunkulu wetfu abesiyale kutsi singayi khona.”

Kodvwa Simakadze wakhuluma kimi, watsi: ‘Ungamesabi, ngobe yena kanye nemabutfo akhe onkhe, nelive lakhe, sengimnikele etandleni takho. Yenta kuye kona loko lowakwenta kuSihoni, inkhosi yema-Amori, labebusa eHeshboni.’
“Ngako Simakadze Nkulunkulu wetfu, wanikela Ogi, inkhosi yaseBhashani, kanye nabo bonkhe bantfu bakhe etandleni tetfu. Sabagwaza bonkhe, kwangete kwasala ngisho namunye lowasindza.

Ngaleso sikhatsi sawatfumba onkhe emadolobha akhe; kute ngisho nalinye kulamadolobha labengema-60 lelasala sangete salitfumba kuso sonkhe leso sifundza sase-Agobhu, embusweni wa-Ogi, inkhosi yaseBhashani.
Onkhe lamadolobha abetinqaba ngekwawo, anetibondza letiphakeme nemasango laveletelwa ngemishudvo yensimbi, kanye nalamanye emadolobha lamanyenti kakhulu labete tibondza.
Sawabhubhisa sawacedza onkhe, njengobe senta kuSihoni, inkhosi yaseHeshboni; sabhubhisa onkhe emadolobha, nemadvodza, nebafati nebantfwana.
Kodvwa tonkhe tifuyo nalokunye lokwakuyimphango sakwetfwala, sahamba nako.
“Ngako lelive salitsatsa ngaso leso sikhatsi esandleni semakhosi lamabili ema-Amori, ngesheya emphumalanga nemfula iJordane, kusuka eSihosheni sase-Anoni, kuze kuyewufika eNtsabeni iHemoni.”
INtsaba iHemoni emaSidoni ayibita ngekutsi yiSiriyoni, kantsi ema-Amori wona ayibita ngekutsi yiSeniri.

“Salidla lonkhe live laka-Ogi, inkhosi yaseBhashani: emadolobha lasentsabeni, netifundza takaGileyadi naseBhashani, kuze kuyewufika emadolobheni aseSalekha nase-Edreyi lekungemadolobha embuso wa-Ogi eBhashani.”
Kwase kusele Ogi, inkhosi yaseBhashani, kuphela kuleyo nsali yesive semaRefa. Umbhedze wakhe
Lenye incenye yelive lakaGileyadi neBhashani yonkhe, umbuso wa-Ogi, ngisho sonkhe sifundza sase-Agobhu ngayabela incenye yesive sakaManase.

Jayire, umsa waManase, watsatsa sonkhe sifundza sase-Agobhu, kuze kuyewufika emnyeleni wemaGeshuri nemaMakhathi. Leyo ndzawo wayetsa ngaye; kuze kube ngulamuhla iBhashani yatiwa ngekutsi yiHavothi Jayire.
Sive sakaRubeni nesakaGadi ngatabela live lakaGileyadi, kuze kuyewufika eSihosheni sase-Anoni, ekhatsi nesihosha kwaba ngumnyele, kanye nasemfuleni iJabhoki, umnyele wesive sema-Amoni.
Ngasenshonalanga lelive labo lalihamba lize liyewufika emfuleni iJordane, e-Arabha, lalisuka eKhinerethi lize liyewufika eLwandle lwase-Arabha, Lwandle Lweluswayi, ngaphansi kwemacele asePhisga.
Kodvwa bafati benu, nebantfwabenu, netifuyo tenu – njengobe ngiyati kutsi ninetifuyo letinyenti – kutawusala kulamadolobha lenginiphe wona,

aze Simakadze anike banakenu lendzawo lesasele, njengobe enta nakini, nabo futsi sebalitsetse lelo live Simakadze Nkulunkulu wenu labanika lona lelingesheya kwemfula iJordane. Emvakwaloko-ke nonkhe seningabuyela emuva, nguloyo naloyo aye eveni lakhe lengimabele lona.’

“Ngaso leso sikhatsi ngayala Joshuwa, ngatsi: ‘Nawe utibonele ngewakho emehlo konkhe loko Simakadze Nkulunkulu wakho lakwentile kulamakhosi lamabili; utakwenta njalo-ke kuyo yonkhe lemibuso lenisetakwewelela kuyo.
Ningayesabi, ngobe Simakadze Nkulunkulu wenu nguye lotanilwela.’ ”

‘Hawu! Nkhosi Simakadze, sewucalile kukhombisa inceku yakho bukhulu bakho nesandla sakho lesinemandla. Ngumuphi nje nkulunkulu losezulwini nome losemhlabeni longenta lemisebenti nalemimangaliso yemandla loyentako?
Ngicela kwewela ngiyewubona lelive lelihle lelingesheya kweJordane, live lelihle letintsaba, kanye neLebanoni.’

Yenyuka uye esicongweni sentsaba iPhisga, ubukisise ngasenshonalanga, nangasenyakatfo, nangaseningizimu kanye nangasemphumalanga; lelive ulibukisise ngemehlo akho, ngobe wena ungeke usawewela umfula iJordane.
Kodvwa yala Joshuwa, umcinise umkhutsate, ngobe nguye lotakuhola lesive asewetele ngesheya kwemfula; nguye futsi lotabenta badle lelive lolibonako.’
“Ngako sahlala esihosheni, macondzana nelidolobha laseBhethi Pheyori.”
“Lalelani sive sema-Israyeli imiyalo nemitsetfo lesengitanifundzisa yona. Hambani ngayo, khona nitewuphila ningene eveni nilidle, live Simakadze, Nkulunkulu wabokhokho benu, lanipha lona.
Ningacali nengete lutfo kulamavi lenginiyala ngawo, futsi ningaphunguli lutfo kuwo, kodvwa gcinani lemiyalo yaSimakadze Nkulunkulu wenu lengininika yona.
Natibonela ngemehlo enu loko lokwentiwa nguSimakadze eBhali Pheyori. Simakadze Nkulunkulu wenu wababhubhisa bonkhe labo bantfu bakini lababelandzela Bhali wasePheyori,
kodvwa nonkhe nine lenabambelela kuSimakadze Nkulunkulu wenu nisaphila nalamuhla.
“Nginifundzise yonkhe imiyalo nemitsetfo, njengobe Simakadze Nkulunkulu wami angitfumile kutsi ngente, kuze nihambe ngayo nakulelo live leniyakungena kulo niyekulidla.

Ngako yigcineni niyicaphelisise, ngobe loko kuyawuba kuhlakanipha nekucondza kwenu emehlweni aleto tive letiyakuva ngayo yonkhe lemiyalo, bese titsi: ‘Impela lesive lesikhulu sisive lesihlakaniphile nalesinekucondza.’
Ngusiphi nje lesinye sive lesikhulu kangangekutsi singaba nemiyalo nemitsetfo lelungile njengawo wonkhe lomtsetfo lenginifundzise wona lamuhla?

Caphelani-ke nilindze kahle imiphefumulo yenu, ningaze nikhohlwe nguletintfo lenitibone ngemehlo enu nome nitiyekele tiphunyuke enhlitiyweni yenu yingci nanisaphila. Niyakutifundzisa bantfwabenu nebantfwana bebantfwabenu.

Khumbulani lilanga lenema ngalo embikwaSimakadze Nkulunkulu wenu ngesikhatsi akhuluma kimi eHorebe atsi: ‘Hlanganisa sonkhe sive sibutsane la embikwami. Ngifuna kutsi sive kahle emavi ami, khona sitewufundza kungihlonipha, yingci nasisaphila kulomhlaba sibuye sifundzise nebantfwabaso.’
Simakadze wakhuluma asekhatsi emlilweni, nakuva kudvuma kwemavi, kodvwa anizange nisibone simo sakhe, kwakulivi nje.
Wetfula kini sivumelwane sakhe semiyalo lelishumi laniyala kutsi nihambe ngayo, wase uyibhala phansi etibhelekeceni letimbili tematje.
Simakadze wangikhombisa ngaleso sikhatsi kutsi nginifundzise imiyalo nemitsetfo lekufanele nihambe ngayo kulelive lelingesheya kweJordane, lenewelela kulo kuyakulidla.”
“Ngako-ke ticaphelisiseni nine, ngobe anibonanga simo salutfo mhlazana Simakadze akhuluma nani asemlilweni entsabeni yaseHorebe.
Caphelani ningoni ngekutentela tithico letibatiwe, titfombe nome taluphi luhlobo lwendvodza nome lwemfati,
nome lokufanana nesilwane nome ngangusiphi lapha emhlabeni, nome lokufanana neluhlobo lwanome nganguyiphi inyoni lendiza emoyeni,
nome ngangusiphi silwane lesihuma ngesisu emhlabatsini, nome nganguyiphi inhlanti lesemantini ngaphansi kwemhlaba.

Nicaphele ningatikhonti tinkhanyiso lenitibona esibhakabhakeni njengelilanga, nenyanga, netinkhanyeti. Ningacali niwungeke ngekutikhotsamela nikhonte leto tintfo Simakadze Nkulunkulu wenu latabela tonkhe tive ngephansi kwelizulu.
