Akuzange sekube nenkhosi leyake yafanana naJosaya, ngembili kwakhe nangemuva kwakhe, ngekutsi itilahlele kuSimakadze njengobe yena enta, ngenhlitiyo yakhe yonkhe, nangemphefumulo wakhe wonkhe, nangemandla akhe onkhe ngekulandzela wonkhe umtsetfo waMosi.

Ngako Simakadze wakhuluma, watsi: “Juda ngitamsusa ebukhoneni bami, njengobe ngamsusa na-Israyeli; neJerusalema, lidolobha lengalikhetsa, ngitalisusa, ngisho nalo lithempeli imbala lengase ngakhuluma ngalo ngatsi: Libito lami liyawuhlala lapho.”
Leminye imininingwane ngekubusa kwenkhosi Josaya, nako konkhe lakwenta, kubhaliwe encwadzini yemilandvo yemakhosi akaJuda.

Tindvuna taJosaya tatsatsa sidvumbu sakhe tasekhweta encoleni kusuka eMegido tambuyisela eJerusalema, tafike tamfihla ethuneni lakhe. Sive sakaJuda satsatsa Jehoyahazi, umsa waJosaya, samgcoba, samenta inkhosi esikhundleni seyise.
Jehoyahazi wenta lokubi emehlweni aSimakadze, njengobe boyise babentile.
Faro Nekho wambopha ngetinketane eRibla, eveni laseHamathi,

Faro Nekho wabeka Eliyakimu, umsa waJosaya, kutsi abe yinkhosi esikhundleni seyise. Wagucula libito la-Eliyakimu, wametsa libito watsi nguJehoyakimu. Kodvwa watsatsa Jehoyahazi wammikisa eGibhithe, lapho wafike wafela khona.
Jehoyakimu abeneminyaka lengema-25 budzala, nakabekwa kuba yinkhosi. Wabusela eJerusalema iminyaka leli-11. Libito lenina bekunguZebida, indvodzakati yaPhedaya, waseRuma.
Wenta lokubi emehlweni aSimakadze, njengobe bekwenta boyise.

Simakadze wamtfumelela emaBhabhulona, nemaSiriya, nemaMowabi, nema-Amoni kutsi atemhlasela. Wabatfumela kutsi batewubhubhisa Juda, ngekulandzela livi laSimakadze lalikhuluma ngetinceku takhe baphrofethi.
Ngempela letintfo tenteka kaJuda njengekwemyalo waSimakadze, kuze atekubasusa ebukhoneni bakhe ngenca yetono taManase nako konkhe labekwentile,
kanye nekucitsa kwakhe ingati leyayingenacala, ngobe phela iJerusalema yayigcwele ingati yebantfu lababengenacala. Simakadze abengakatimiseli kutsetselela Manase ngaloko.
Leminye imininingwane ngekubusa kwenkhosi Jehoyakimu, nako konkhe lakwenta, kubhaliwe encwadzini yemilandvo yemakhosi akaJuda.
Jehoyakimu wakhotsama, Jehoyakhini, umsa wakhe, waba yinkhosi esikhundleni sakhe.

Inkhosi yaseGibhithe nemabutfo ayo ayizange iphindze ivive iyewuhlasela ngephandle kwelive layo, ngobe phela inkhosi yaseBhabhulona yase ilitsetse lonkhe live layo, kusukela emfudlaneni waseGibhithe kuze kufike emfuleni iYufrathe.
Jehoyakhini wenta lokubi emehlweni aSimakadze, njengobe bekwente uyise.
Ngaleso sikhatsi tindvuna taNebukhadnezari, inkhosi yaseBhabhulona, tahlasela iJerusalema tayivimbetela,
naNebukhadnezari cobo lwakhe, waya kulo lelidolobha ngesikhatsi tindvuna takhe tisalivimbetele.
Jehoyakhini, inkhosi yakaJuda, nenina, netinceku takhe, netikhulu takhe, kanye netindvuna takhe bavele baphakamisa tandla bashweleta kuye.
Ngemnyaka wesiphohlongo wekubusa kwenkhosi yaseBhabhulona, lenkhosi yatfumba Jehoyakhini, waba siboshwa.

Njengobe Simakadze abeshito, Nebukhadnezari watsatsa yonkhe ingcebo, wayisusa ethempelini laSimakadze nasesigodlweni senkhosi, watitsatsa tonkhe leto timphahla tegolide letatentiwe nguSolomoni, inkhosi yaka-Israyeli, latentela lithempeli laSimakadze.

Wayitfumba yonkhe iJerusalema: tonkhe tindvuna, netingwazi, nato tonkhe tingcweti temisebenti yetandla kanye nebabumbi betinsimbi; babeti-10 000 sebabonkhe. Kwashiywa labo bantfu lababetimphofana kuphela.

Inkhosi yaseBhabhulona yatfumbela eBhabhulona tingwazi letiti-7 000, letaticinile tilungele kulwa imphi; watitfumba kanye nenkhulungwane yetingcweti emisebentini yetandla kanye nasekubumbeni tintfo ngensimbi.
Wenta lokubi emehlweni aSimakadze, njengobe naJehoyakimu abentile.
Kwabangelwa yintfukutselo yaSimakadze lokutsi loku kwenteke eJerusalema nakaJuda, kwaze kwatsi ekugcineni wabesusa ebukhoneni bakhe.
Lelidolobha lahlala livinjetelwe, kwaze kwaba ngumnyaka weli-11 wekubusa kwenkhosi Sedekiya.

Lubondza-ke lwalelidolobha lwase luyafohlwa, imphi yonkhe yabhuza ebusuku seyibaleka, yaphuma ngelisango lelisemkhatsini wetibondza letimbili letatingasengadzeni yenkhosi, lite nome emaBhabhulona abelitungeletile lelidolobha. Yabaleka yabhekisa emabombo ngase-Arabha,
kodvwa emabutfo emaBhabhulona acosha Sedekiya, inkhosi, aze amkhandza etsafeni laseJerikho. Onkhe emasotja akhe esuswa kuye asakatwa,
yena wabe sewuyatfunjwa. Watsatfwa wamikiswa enkhosini yaseBhabhulona eRibla, lapho yefike yakhipha sigwebo sayo kuye.
Emadvodzana aSedekiya abulawa embikwemehlo akhe abukile. Emvakwaloko bakupuluta emehlo aSedekiya, bambopha ngetinketane telitfusi, bammikisa eBhabhulona.

Ngelilanga lesikhombisa enyangeni yesihlanu, emnyakeni weli-19 wekubusa kwaNebukhadnezari, inkhosi yaseBhabhulona, Nebuzaradani, indvuna yabomahlalesangweni benkhosi, siphatsimandla senkhosi yaseBhabhulona, weta eJerusalema.
Wafike wokhela ngemlilo lithempeli laSimakadze, nesigodlo senkhosi kanye nato tonkhe tindlu taseJerusalema. Watokhela ngemlilo tonkhe tindlu letibalulekile.
Yonkhe-ke imphi yaseBhabhulona, leyayingaphansi kwendvuna yabomahlalesangweni, yatidzilita tonkhe tibondza letatitungeleta iJerusalema.
Nebuzaradani, indvuna yabomahlalesangweni, wabatfumba bonkhe labantfu lababesele kulelidolobha neluntfu lonkhe lolwalusele, wabatfumba kanye nalaba lababehlubuke baya enkhosini yaseBhabhulona.
Kodvwa lendvuna yabashiya labanye lababemphofu bakulelo live, kuze batewulima tivini nemasimi.
Batsatsa ngisho nemabhodo, nemafosholo, netijubantsambo, netingwembe, kanye nako konkhe lokwakwentiwe ngelitfusi lokwakusetjentiswa enkonzweni yekukhonta ethempelini.
Lendvuna yabomahlalesangweni yatsatsa titja tekushisela imphepho kanye netitja tekunyenyeta, tonkhe letatentiwe ngegolide lecengekile nome ngesiliva lecengekile.
Litfusi letinsika letimbili, nalelibhavu kanye naletincodlana letatakhiwe nguSolomoni, akwakhela lithempeli laSimakadze, kwakungetulu kwekukalwa.

Nguleyo naleyo nsika yayingemamitha labengaba siphohlongo kuphakama. Nguleyo naleyo ngcongwane leyayakhelwe etikwaleyo naleyo nsika yayingaba limitha nesigamu kuphakama. Kutungeleta leyo naleyo ngcongwane kwakunemhlobiso lowawusamahananadza labentiwe ngelitfusi.
Lendvuna yabomahlalesangweni yatfumba Seraya, umPhristi Lomkhulu, naZefaniya, umphristi longaphansi kwakhe ngesikhundla, kanye nebagcini beminyango labatsatfu.

Kulabo lababesesedolobheni watsatsa indvuna leyayiphetse emadvodza emphi kanye nebeluleki benkhosi labasihlanu. Watsatsa namabhalane wendvuna yekubutsekisa bantfu balelo live, kanye nemadvodza langema-60 labetfolakala edolobheni.
Nebuzaradani, indvuna yabomahlalesangweni, wabatsatsa bonkhe, wayawubetfula enkhosini yaseBhabhulona eRibla.
Lapha eRibla, eveni laseHamathi, inkhosi yafike yababulalela khona.
Ngako-ke sive sakaJuda satfunjelwa khashane nelive laso.

Tatsi kube tonkhe tindvuna temphi nemabutfo ato beve kutsi inkhosi yaseBhabhulona seyibeke Gedaliya kutsi abe ngumbusi, teta kuGedaliya eMispa. Letindvuna bekubo-Ishmayeli, umsa waNethaniya, naJohanani, umsa waKhareya, naSeraya, umsa waThanhumethi waseNethofa, naJazaniya, indvodzana yemMakha, nemadvodza abo.
Gedaliya wafunga kubo nakulamadvodza abo, watsi: “Ningatesabi tindvuna taseBhabhulona. Hlalani phansi lapha eveni, nikhonte lenkhosi yaseBhabhulona, kutawunihambela kahle.”
Kwatsi kube kwenteke loko, sonkhe sive, kusukela kulabancane kuye kulabakhulu, kanye netindvuna temphi babalekela eGibhithe ngenca yekwesaba emaBhabhulona.
Ngemnyaka wema-37 wekudzingiswa kwaJehoyakhini, inkhosi yakaJuda, ngemnyaka lapho Evili Merodaki
Wakhuluma kahle naye, wabe sewumnika sihlalo lesihloniphekile, lesingetulu kwaleto talamanye emakhosi labenaye lapha eBhabhulona.
Ngako Jehoyakhini wabeka eceleni labomfengeni bakhe basejele, kusukela ngalelo langa naye abedla etafuleni lenkhosi njalo nje, imphilo yakhe yonkhe.
Onkhe emalanga inkhosi yayinika Jehoyakhini imbasha nalokunye lekwakusabelo sakhe lesimile semihla ngemihla, yingci nasaphila.
wa-Enoshi kunguKhenani, waKhenani kunguMahalaleli, waMahalaleli kunguJaredi,
waJaredi kungu-Enoki, wa-Enoki kunguMethusela, waMethusela kunguLameki, waLameki kunguNowa.
Emadvodzana aJavani bekubo-Elisha, naThashishi, nemaKhithi, nemaRodani.
Emadvodzana aKushe bekuboSeba, naHavila, naSabta, naRama, naSabtekha. Emadvodzana aRama bekuboSheba naDedani.
nemaPhathrusi, nemaKhasuluhi, nemaKhaftori, lapho kwadzabuka khona emaFilisti.
Emadvodzana aShemi bekubo-Elamu, na-Ashuri, na-Aphakshadi, naLudi, na-Aramu, na-Use, naHuli, naGetheri, naMesheki.
Aphakshadi abenguyise waShela, Shela anguyise wa-Ebheri.
Ebheri watala emadvodzana lamabili. Lomunye bekunguPhelegi,
na-Ofiri, naHavila, naJobabi. Bonkhe laba bekungemadvodzana aJokthane.
Emadvodzana a-Ishmayeli bekunguNebayothi, litubulo lakhe, naKhedari, na-Adbeli, naMibsamu,
naJeturi, naNafishi, naKhedema. Ngiwo lawo-ke emadvodzana a-Ishmayeli.
Emadvodzana aMidiyani bekubo-Efa, na-Eferi, naHanoki, na-Abida, na-Elda. Bonkhe laba bekuyintalelwane yaKhetura.
Emadvodzana a-Esawu bekubo-Elifazi, naRehuweli, naJewushe, naJalamu, naKhora.
Emadvodzana aRehuweli bekuboNahathi, naZera, naShama, naMiza.
Emadvodzana aSeyiri bekuboLotani, naShobali, naSibeyoni, na-Ana, naDishoni, na-Eseri, naDishani.
Emadvodzana aLotani bekuboHori naHemami. Thimna bekungudzadzewaboLotani.
Umsa wa-Ana bekunguDishoni. Emadvodzana aDishoni bekuboHemdani,
Lawa ngemabito emakhosi labebusa eveni laka-Edomu kusengakabusi inkhosi ka-Israyeli:
Kwatsi kube kufe Bela, kwase kubekwa Jobabi, umsa waZera labewekutalwa eBhosra, waba yinkhosi emvakwakhe.
Kwatsi kube kufe Jobabi, kwase kubekwa Hushamu waseveni lemaThemani kutsi abe yinkhosi emvakwakhe.
Kwatsi kube kufe Hushamu, kwase kubekwa Hadadi, umsa waBedadi. Bedadi ngulona lowancoba emaMidiyani eveni lakaMowabi. Inhlokodolobha yakhe bekuyi-Avithi.
Kwatsi kube kufe Hadadi, kwase kubekwa Samla waseMasrekha.
Kwatsi kube kufe Samla, kwase kubekwa Shawula waseRehobothi ngasemfuleni.
Kwatsi kube kufe Shawula, kwase kubekwa Bhali Hanani, umsa wa-Akbori.
Kwatsi kube kufe Bhali Hanani, kwase kubekwa Hadadi. Inhlokodolobha yakhe bekutsiwa yiPhayi,
naDani, naJosefa, naBhenjamini, naNaftali, naGadi, na-Asheri.
Thamari, malukatana waJuda, wamtalela boPheresi naZera. Juda abenemadvodzana lasihlanu asawonkhe.
Emadvodzana aZera bekuboZimri, na-Ethani, naHemani, naKhalkoli, naDara;
Emadvodzana latalelwa Hesroni bekuboJerameli, naRamu, naKhalebi.
Bowazi abenguyise wa-Obedi, Obedi anguyise waJese.
Jese abenguyise wa-Eliyabe, litubulo lakhe, Eliyabe abelanywa ngu-Abinadabi, wesitsatfu bekunguShimeya,
Emadvodzana lamatsatfu aSeruya bekubo-Abishayi, naJowabe, na-Asaheli.
Abigayili watala Amasa. Uyise wa-Amasa bekunguJetheri, um-Ishmayeli.
Khalebi, umsa waHesroni, umkakhe labengu-Azubha wamtalela indvodzakati lekwatsiwa nguJeriyothi.
Kwatsi kube kufe Azubha, Khalebi watsatsa Efratha lamtalela Hure.
Hure abenguyise wa-Uri, Uri anguyise waBesaleli.
Emvakwaloko Hesroni walala nendvodzakati yaMakhire, uyise waGileyadi; Hesroni wayitsatsa asaneminyaka lengema-60 budzala; yamtalela Segubi.
Kodvwa imibuso yaseGeshuri newaseSiriya yehlula emadolobha langema-60 khona lapho, yatfumba iHavothi Jayire,
Watsi kube Hesroni afele eKhalebi Efratha, Abiya, umfati waHesroni,
Emadvodzana aJerameli, litubulo laHesroni, bekuboRamu, litubulo lakhe, naBuna, na-Oreni, na-Osemi kanye na-Ahiya.
Jerameli abenalomunye umfati, libito lakhe kungu-Atara; yena abengunina wa-Onamu.
Emadvodzana aRamu, litubulo laJerameli, bekuboMazi, naJamini, na-Ekeri.
Emadvodzana a-Onamu bekuboShamayi naJada, emadvodzana aShamayi bekuboNadabi na-Abishuri.
Libito lemka-Abishuri bekungu-Abihayili, lamtalela bo-Abani naMolidi.
Emadvodzana aNadabi bekuboSeledi na-Aphayimi. Seledi wafa angenamntfwana.
Umsa wa-Aphayimi bekungu-Ishi, Ishi labenguyise waSheshani. Umsa waSheshani bekungu-Ahilayi.
Emadvodzana aJada, umnakaboShamayi, bekuboJetheri naJonathani. Jetheri wafa angenamntfwana.
Emadvodzana aJonathani bekuboPhelethi naZaza. Tonkhe leti bekutitukulwane takaJerameli.
Sheshani abete emadvodzana, anemadvodzakati kuphela. Abenesisebenti lesasingumGibhithe, libito laso kunguJaha.
Sheshani wanika lesisebenti lesinguJaha indvodzakati yakhe, kutsi siyitsatse ibe ngumkaso. Batala Athayi.
Athayi abenguyise waNathani, Nathani anguyise waZabadi;
Zabadi abenguyise wa-Eflali, Eflali anguyise wa-Obedi.
Obedi abenguyise waJehu, Jehu anguyise wa-Azariya;
Azariya abenguyise waHelesi, Helesi anguyise wa-Eleyasa;
Eleyasa abenguyise waSismayi, Sismayi anguyise waShalumi;
Shalumi abenguyise waJekamiya, Jekamiya anguyise wa-Elishama.
Emadvodzana aKhalebi, umnakaboJerameli, bekunguMesha, litubulo lakhe, labenguyise waZifi, Zifi anguyise waMaresha; Maresha abenguyise waHebroni.
Emadvodzana aHebroni bekuboKhora, naThaphuwa, naRekhemu, naShema.
Shema abenguyise waRahamu, Rahamu anguyise waJokeyamu. Rekhemu abenguyise waShamayi.
Khalebi abenesingani lesasingu-Efa, labengunina waboHarani, naMosa, naGazezi. Harani abenguyise waGazezi.
Emadvodzana aJahadayi bekuboRegemi, naJothamu, naGeshani, naPheleti, na-Efa, naShafi.
Khalebi abenesingani lesasinguMakha, labengunina waboSheberi naThihana.
Leti-ke bekutitukulwane takaKhalebi: Emadvodzana aHure, litubulo la-Efratha, bekuboShobali, uyise
nemindeni yaseKhiriyathi Jeyarimu, lekungemaJetheri, nemaPhuthi, nemaShumathi, nemaMishra. EmaSorathi nema-Eshtayoli adzabuka kulemindeni.
nemaSoferi, lekwakungimindeni yebabhali lababehlala eJabesi: emaThirathi, nemaShimeyathi, nemaSukathi. Laba-ke bekungemaKheni labevela kuHamathi, titukulwane tawo tatitekudzabuka emndenini waRekhabi.
yesitsatfu bekungu-Absalomu labetalwa nguMakha, indvodzakati yaThalmayi, inkhosi yaseGeshuri;
na-Elishama, na-Eliyada kanye na-Elifeleti; abeyimfica asawonkhe.
Onkhe lawa bekungemadvodzana aDavide, ngaphandle kwalawa labetalwa ngemaphovela akhe. Thamari abengudzadzewabo.
Kusukela kuye kwalandzela Rehobowamu, umsa wakhe,
kweta Abiya, umsa wakhe, kweta Asa, umsa wakhe,
kweta Amasiya, umsa wakhe, kweta Azariya, umsa wakhe,
naMalkhiramu, naPhedaya, naShenasari, naJekamiya, naHoshama kanye naNedabiya.
Emadvodzana lamabili aPhedaya bekuboZerubhabheli naShimeyi. Emadvodzana aZerubhabheli bekuboMeshulamu naHananiya. Dzadzewabo bekunguShelomithi.
Lamanye emadvodzana akhe lasihlanu bekuboHashubha, na-Oheli, naBherekhiya, naHasadiya, naJushabi Hesedi.
Hananiya abenemadvodzana lamabili lekwakuboPhelatiya naJeshaya. Jeshaya abenguyise waRefaya, labenguyise wa-Arinani, labenguyise wa-Obadiya, Obadiya anguyise waShekhaniya.
Shekhaniya abenendvodzana lekwakunguShemaya; emadvodzana aShemaya bekuboHathushi, na-Igali, naBhariya, naNeyariya, naShafati; abesitfupha asawonkhe.
Emadvodzana aNeyariya bekubo-Eliyoyenayi, naHizkiya, na-Azrikamu; abematsatfu asawonkhe.
Emadvodzana a-Eliyoyenayi bekuboHodaviya, na-Eliyashibi, naPhelaya, na-Akhubi, naJohanani, naDelaya, na-Anani; abesikhombisa asawonkhe.
Shobali abenguyise waReyaya, Reyaya anguyise waJahathi, Jahathi anguyise wabo-Ahumayi naLahadi. Lena-ke bekungimindeni yemaSorathi.
Emadvodzana a-Etamu bekuboJezreyeli, na-Ishma, na-Idibashi. Dzadzewabo bekunguHaselelponi.
Nara wamtalela bo-Ahuzami, naHeferi, naThemeni, naHahashtari; kwaba nguleto titukulwane taNara.
Jabesi abehlonipheke kakhulu kunabomnakabo emndenini wakabo. Unina abemetse libito watsi nguJabesi,

Jabesi wakhala kuNkulunkulu wema-Israyeli, watsi: “Ngicela ungibusise ungandzisele live lami! Shangatsi sandla sakho singaba nami, ungiphephise engotini, khona ngitewukhululeka ebuhlungwini.” Nkulunkulu wamupha loko labekucelile.
Khelubi, umnakaboShuha, abenguyise waMehiri, Mehiri anguyise wa-Eshtoni.
Eshtoni abenguyise waboBhethi Rafa, naPhaseya, naThehina, uyise
Seraya abenguyise waJowabe, Jowabe abengumsunguli weGe Harashimu,
Emadvodzana aJehaleli bekuboZifi, naZifa, naThiriya, na-Asareli.
Emadvodzana a-Ezra bekuboJetheri, naMeredi, na-Eferi kanye naJaloni. Lomunye webafati baMeredi watala boMiriyamu, naShamayi, kanye na-Ishbha, uyise
Emadvodzana aShimoni bekubo-Amnoni, naRina, naBheni Hanani kanye naThiloni.
naJokimi, nebantfu baseKhozeba, naJowashi, naSarafi, lababebusa eMowabi, naseJashubi Lehemi.
Babebabumbi lababehlala eNethayimu naseGedera, basebentela inkhosi.
Umsa waShawula bekunguShalumi, umsa wakhe kunguMibsamu, umsa wakhe kunguMishma.
Umsa waMishma bekunguHamuweli, umsa wakhe kunguZakhuri, umsa wakhe kunguShimeyi.
Shimeyi abenemadvodzana lali-16 nemadvodzakati lasitfupha, kodvwa bomnakabo babete bantfwana labanyenti; ngako lusendvo lwakabo lonkhe aluzange lwandze lube ngangelusendvo lwakaJuda.
naseBhethi Makhabothi, naseHasari Susimu, naseBhethi Bhiri, naseSharayimu. Lawa kwakungemadolobha abo kwaze kwefika sikhatsi sekubusa kwenkhosi Davide.
Imiti leyayitungelete lamadolobha bekuyi-Etamu, ne-Ayini, neRimona, neThokheni, ne-Ashani; emadolobha lasihlanu asawonkhe,
nayo yonkhe leyo miti kuze kuyewufika eBhalathi.
naJoweli, naJehu, umsa wa-Joshibiya, umsa waSeraya, umsa wa-Asiyeli,
kanye na-Eliyoyenayi, naJakoba, naJeshohaya, na-Asaya, na-Adiyeli, naJesimiyeli, naBhenaya,
naZiza, umsa waShifi, umsa wa-Aloni, umsa waJedaya, umsa waShimri, umsa waShemaya:
Lawa-ke bekungemabito ebaholi baleto tinsendvo. Imindeni yabo yandza kakhulu,
Lapho bakhandza emadlelo labeneluhlata, nelive lalapho lalilikhulu linekuthula futsi lipholile. Bekuke kwahlala emaHhamu kuleyo ndzawo.

Bantfu lekwakubhalwe emabito abo befika ngesikhatsi kusabusa Hezekiya, inkhosi yakaJuda. Bahlasela lamaHhamu lapho abehlala khona kanye nemaMehuni labelapho, bawabhubhisa onkhe, njengobe nalamuhla loku kusabonakala nje. Bahlala kuleyo ndzawo yabo, ngobe bekunemadlelo lakahle etifuyo tabo.
Labanye bakaSimeyoni lababengema-500 bahlasela eNtsabeni iSeyiri, baholwa nguPhelatiya, naNeyariya, naRefaya, na-Uziyeli, emadvodzana a-Ishi.
Babulala leyo misalela yema-Amaleki leyayibalekile, solomane bahlala lapho kuze kube ngulamuhla.
Noko kwase kuba nguJuda lowaba sive lesasinemandla kakhulu, ngiso lesabe sesitala umbusi wato tonkhe tive tema-Israyeli, nome nje emalungelo ebutubulo abenikwe Josefa.
Emadvodzana aRubeni, litubulo la-Israyeli, bekuboHanoki, naPhalu, naHesroni, naKhami.
Leti bekutitukulwane takaJoweli: umsa waJoweli bekunguShemaya, umsa wakhe kunguGogi, umsa wakhe kunguShimeyi,
umsa wakhe kunguMikha, umsa wakhe kunguReyaya, umsa wakhe kunguBhali,
umsa wakhe kunguBhera, lowatfunjwa nguThiglathi Phileseri,
Emilandvweni yemindeni yakaRubeni baholi bayo bekuboJeyiyeli sikhulu, naZakhariya,
naBela, umsa wa-Azazi, umsa waShema, umsa waJoweli. Bebakhe kusukela e-Aroyeri kuya eNebo naseBhali Meyoni.
Ngasemphumalanga bebakhe kusukela emnyeleni welihlane kuze kuyewufika emfuleni iYufrathe, ngobe phela netifuyo tabo tase tandze kakhulu kaGileyadi.
Ngesikhatsi sekubusa kwenkhosi Sawula sive sakaRubeni sahlasela bakaHagari, lesabehlula; sase sidla lelive labo lonkhe lelingasemphumalanga nelakaGileyadi.
Joweli waba ngumholi, wesibili kwaba nguShafamu, kwase kulandzela Janayi, naShafati eBhashani.
Labanye lekwakungimindeni letihlobo tabo bekuboMikhayeli, naMeshulamu, naSheba, naJorayi, naJakani, naZiya, na-Ebheri; babesikhombisa sebabonkhe.
Lawa ngemadvodzana a-Abihayili, umsa waHuri, umsa waJarowa, umsa waGileyadi, umsa waMikhayeli, umsa waJeshishayi, umsa waJado, umsa waBuze.
Ahi, umsa wa-Abdiyeli, umsa waGuni, abengumholi wemndeni wakhe.
BakaGadi babehlala kaGileyadi, naseBhashani nasetabelweni tayo nakulo lonkhe lelo live lemadlelo aseSharoni, kwaze kwaba ngusemikhawulweni yalo.
Yonkhe lemilandvo yeluhlanga lwekutalana kwato yayibhalwe phansi ngesikhatsi sekubusa kwaJothamu, inkhosi yakaJuda, naJerobowamu, inkhosi yaka-Israyeli.

Sive sakaRubeni nesakaGadi kanye nencenye yesive sakaManase tatinemadvodza labeti-44 760, labengangenela umbutfo wemphi, imiswahla leyayihloma ngelihawu nangenkemba, ikwati nekusebentisa butjoki, ngobe yayivele iceceshelwe kulwa imphi.
Lamadvodza alwa nebakaHagari, nebakaJeturi, nebakaNafishi, nebakaNodabi.
Babeka litsemba labo kuNkulunkulu, bathandaza kuye, bacela lusito. Nkulunkulu wayiphendvula imithandazo yabo, wabenta basincoba sive sakaHagari kanye netive letatisitana naso.
Batfumba tifuyo tebakaHagari lekwakungemakamela lati-50 000, netimvu letati-250 000, netimbongolo letati-2 000 kanye nebantfu lababeti-100 000.
Linyenti labulawa, ngobe lemphi beyiyaNkulunkulu. Lelo live balidla, bahlala kulo kwaze kwaba sikhatsi sekudzingiswa kwabo.
Bantfu bencenye yesive sakaManase babebanyenti kakhulu; bona babehlala eveni kusukela eBhashani kuze kuyewufika eBhali Hemoni, lokusho kutsi, eSeniri, naseNtsabeni iHemoni.
Baholi balemindeni bekubo-Eferi, na-Ishi, na-Eliyeli, na-Azriyeli, naJeremiya, naHodaviya, naJadiyeli. Babengemachawe labenesibindzi, ladvumile nalabebaholi bemindeni yawo.
Ngako Nkulunkulu wema-Israyeli wacunula inhlitiyo yaPhuli, inkhosi yase-Asiriya, lekwakunguThiglathi Phileseri,
Emadvodzana aKhohati bekubo-Amramu, naJisihari, naHebroni kanye na-Uziyeli.
Emadvodzana a-Aroni bekuboNadabi, na-Abihu, na-Eleyazare kanye na-Ithamari.
Azariya abekhonta, angumphristi ethempelini lelalakhiwe nguSolomoni eJerusalema.
Emadvodzana aKhohati bekubo-Amramu, naJisihari, naHebroni kanye na-Uziyeli.
umsa wakhe, naJehathi, umsa wakhe, naZima, umsa wakhe,
Titukulwane takaMerari bekunguMahali, naLibni, umsa wakhe, naShimeyi, umsa wakhe, na-Uza, umsa wakhe,
Lawa bekungemadvodza Davide lawabeka kutsi engamele kuhlabelela endlini yaSimakadze, nase kufakwe libhokisi lesivumelwane kuyo.
Abekhonta ngekuhlabelela embikwelithende lekuhlangana, Solomoni waze wakha lithempeli laSimakadze eJerusalema. Lomsebenti babewenta ngekulandzela imitsetfo leyo leyayentelwe bona.
Nankha-ke lamadvodza labekhonta kanye nemadvodzana awo:
Esiveni semaKhohati bekunguHemani, umhlabeli, umsa waJoweli, umsa waSamuweli,
Asafa, labebambisene naHemani, yena abekhonta ngasesandleni sakhe sekudla.
umsa wa-Ethni, umsa waZera, umsa wa-Adaya,
umsa wa-Ethani, umsa waZima, umsa waShimeyi,
umsa waJahathi, umsa waGeshoni, umsa waLevi.
umsa waHashabiya, umsa wa-Amasiya, umsa waHilkiya,
umsa wa-Amsi, umsa waBani, umsa waShemeri,
Laba labanye bomnakabo lababengemaLevi bona bebanikwe leminye imisebenti ethendeni lekuhlangana, lekwakuyindlu yaNkulunkulu.
naFinehasi, umsa wakhe, na-Abishuwa, umsa wakhe,
naBukhi, umsa wakhe, na-Uzi, umsa wakhe,
na-Amariya, umsa wakhe, na-Ahitubi, umsa wakhe,
naSadoki, umsa wakhe, na-Ahimasi, umsa wakhe.
Anikwa iHebroni kaJuda kanye nemadlelo labeyitungeletile.
Kodvwa emasimi kanye nemiti leyayitungelete lelidolobha kwanikwa Khalebi, umsa waJefune.
Emadolobha labelwa tinsendvo temaKhohati aba li-13 asawonkhe.
Letinye titukulwane temaKhohati tabelwa ngenkatho emadolobha lalishumi emkhatsini wetinsendvo tencenye yesive sakaManase.
Titukulwane takaGeshoni, lusendvo ngelusendvo, tabelwa ngenkatho emadolobha lali-13 esiveni saka-Isakhari, nesaka-Asheri kanye nesakaNaftali, nasemkhatsini wesive sakaManase lesasiseBhashani.
Titukulwane takaMerari, lusendvo ngelusendvo, tabelwa ngenkatho emadolobha lali-12 esiveni sakaRubeni, nesakaGadi, nesakaZebuloni.
Ngako ema-Israyeli anika emaLevi lamadolobha kanye nemadlelo awo.
Esiveni sakaJuda, nesakaSimeyoni, nesakaBhenjamini emaLevi abelwa lamadolobha lasashitiwo.
Eveni letintsaba kulaka-Efrayimu tabelwa iShekhemu, lidolobha lekukhosela, neGezeri,
ne-Ayaloni, neGathi Rimoni kanye nemadlelo awo.
Encenyeni yesive sakaManase ema-Israyeli abela tinsendvo nemindeni leminye yemaKhohati i-Aneri neBhileyamu kanye nemadlelo awo.
Esiveni sakaNaftali babelwa iKhedeshi eGalile, neHamoni, neKhiriyathayimu kanye nemadlelo awo.
Esiveni sakaRubeni ngesheya kweJordane emphumalanga neJerikho babelwa iBheseri ehlane, neJahasa,
Esiveni sakaGadi babelwa iRamothi kulakaGileyadi, neMahanayimu,

Emadvodzana aThola bekubo-Uzi, naRefaya, naJeriyeli, naJamayi, na-Ibsamu, naSamuweli, lekwakubaholi bemindeni yabo. Ngesikhatsi sekubusa kwaDavide titukulwane taThola tatingetekulwa timphi, ngekwemlandvo weluhlanga lwekutalana kwato bekungemadvodza lati-22 600.
Umsa wa-Uzi bekunguJizrahiya. Emadvodzana aJizrahiya bekuboMikhayeli, na-Obadiya, naJoweli, naJishiya. Bonkhe laba labasihlanu bebabaholi.
Ngekwemlandvo weluhlanga lwekutalana kwabo bekungemadvodza lati-36 000, labengalungela kuphuma imphi, ngobe bebanebafati labanyenti nebantfwana labanyenti.
Tihlobo tabo bonkhe betinsendvo tesive saka-Isakhari ngekwemlandvo weluhlanga lwekutalana kwabo bekungemadvodza lati-87 000 labengalungela kuphuma imphi.

Emadvodzana lasihlanu aBela bekubo-Esboni, na-Uzi, na-Uziyeli, naJerimothi, na-Iri, lekwakubaholi bemindeni. Ngekwemlandvo weluhlanga lwekutalana kwabo bekungemadvodza lati-22 034, labengalungela kuphuma imphi.
Emadvodzana aBekheri bekuboZemira, naJowashi, na-Eliyezeri, na-Eliyoyenayi, na-Omri, naJeremothi, na-Abiya, na-Anathothi kanye na-Alemethi. Bonkhe laba bekungemadvodzana aBekheri.
Ngekwemlandvo weluhlanga lwekutalana kwabo bekubaholi bemindeni nemadvodza lati-20 200 labengalungela kuphuma imphi.
Indvodzana yaJediyayeli bekunguBilhani, emadvodzana aBilhani bekuboJewushe, naBhenjamini, na-Ehudi, naKhenana, naZethani, naThashishi kanye na-Ahishahari.
Onkhe lamadvodzana aJediyayeli abebaholi bemindeni. Bekungemadvodza lati-17 200 labengalungela kuphuma imphi.
BakaShuphimi nebakaHuphimi bona babetitukulwane taka-Ire, kantsi bakaHushimu bona babetitukulwane taka-Aheri.
Titukulwane takaManase bekungu-Asriyeli, lamtala esinganini sakhe lesasingumSiriya, saphindze samtalela naMakhire, uyise waGileyadi.
Makhire watsatsa umfati esiveni sakaHuphimi, kwatsi lomunye wamtsatsa esiveni sakaShuphimi.
Makha, umkaMakhire, watala emadvodzana lamabili lekwakuboPhereshi naShereshi; emadvodzana aPhereshi bekubo-Ulamu naRakhemi.
Indvodzana ya-Ulamu bekunguBedani. Lawa bekungemadvodzana aGileyadi, umsa waMakhire, umsa waManase.
DzadzewaboGileyadi bekunguHamolekhethi lowatala emadvodzana lamatsatfu: bo-Ishodi, na-Abiyezeri, naMahala.
Emadvodzana aShemida bekubo-Ahiyani, naShekhemu, naLikhi kanye na-Aniyamu.
naZabadi, umsa wakhe, naShuthela, umsa wakhe. Bo-Ezeri na-Eleyadi babulawa ngesikhatsi batsi betama kuba tinkhomo tebantfu baseGathi.
Efrayimu, uyise, wabalilela emalanga lamanyenti, netihlobo takhe taze teta kutamdvudvuta.
Waphindze walala nemkakhe lowatetfwala, wase umtalela indvodzana, layetsa libito watsi nguBheriya,
Indvodzakati yakhe bekunguShera lowakha iBhethi Horoni Lengentansi kanye naLengenhla, waphindze wakha ne-Uzeni Shera.
Efrayimu waphindza watala Refa. Titukulwane takaRefa kwaba nguReshefi, umsa wakhe,
naLadani, umsa wakhe, na-Amihudi, umsa wakhe, na-Elishama, umsa wakhe,
naNuni, umsa wakhe, naJoshuwa, umsa wakhe.

Tindzawo tato tekuhlala bekuyiBetheli nemiti leyayiyitungeletile, kusuka eNarani ngasemphumalanga, neGezeri kanye nemiti yayo ngasenshonalanga, neShekhemu kanye nemiti yayo, kuze kuyewufika e-Aya kanye nemiti yayo.
Titukulwane takaJosefa, umsa wa-Israyeli, tatihlala kulamadolobha.
Hebhere abenguyise waboJafleti, naShomeri, naHothami kanye naShuwa labengudzadzewabo.
Emadvodzana aJafleti bekuboPhasaki, naBimhali kanye na-Ashvathi. Ngawo lawa emadvodzana aJafleti.
Emadvodzana aSofa bekuboShuwa, naHaneferi, naShuwali, naBeri, naJimra,
Emadvodzana aJetheri bekuboJefune, naPhispha kanye na-Ara.
Emadvodzana a-Ula bekubo-Ara, naHaniyeli kanye naRisiya.

Bonkhe laba bekutitukulwane taka-Asheri: kwakutinhloko temindeni, emadvodza elikhetselo, tingwazi letinesibindzi babaholi labahlonishwako. Ngekwemlandvo weluhlanga lwekutalana kwabo bekungemadvodza lati-26 000 labengalungela kuphuma imphi.
Titukulwane taka-Ehudi, lekwakutinhloko temindeni leyayihlala eGeba yase ilahlelwa eManahathi:
bekuboNamani, na-Ahiya kanye naGera. Nguye lowabamikisa khona, kantsi futsi abenguyise wa-Uza na-Ahihudi.
Shaharayimi watala emadvodzana eMowabi emvakwekulahla kwakhe bafati bakhe boHushimu naBhara.
Hodeshi, umkakhe, wamtalela boJobabi, naSibiya, naMesha, naMalkhamu,
naJewuse, naSakhiya kanye naMima. Lawa bekungemadvodzana akhe labetinhloko temindeni.
Emadvodzana a-Elphali bekubo-Ebheri, naMishamu, naShemedi, lowakha emadolobha i-Ono neLodi kanye nemiti leyayiyitungeletile.
Bheriya naShema bekutinhloko temindeni leyayihlala edolobheni i-Ayaloni, ngibo labacosha labantfu lababehlala eGathi.
Titukulwane takaBheriya tatifaka ekhatsi bo-Ahiyo, naShashaki, naJeremothi,
Letinye titukulwane taka-Elphali bekuboZebadiya, naMeshulamu, naHizki, naHebhere,
Bonkhe laba bekutinhloko temindeni netikhulu ngekwemlandvo weluhlanga lwekutalana kwabo; babehlala eJerusalema.
Abdoni kulitubulo lakhe, abelanywa nguSuri, kute Khishi, naBhali, naNeri,
kanye naMikilothi labenguyise waShimeya. Nabo bebahlala edvutane naletihlobo tabo khona eJerusalema.
Mikha abenemadvodzana lamane, lekwakuboPhithoni, naMeleki, naThareya kanye na-Ahazi.
Mosa anguyise waBineya, Bineya anguyise waRafa, Rafa anguyise wa-Eleyasa, Eleyasa anguyise wa-Aseli.
Aseli abenemadvodzana lasitfupha, lekwakubo-Azrikamu, naBokheru, na-Ishmayeli, naSheyariya, na-Obadiya kanye naHanana. Bonkhe laba bekungemadvodzana a-Aseli.
Esheki, umnakabo-Aseli, abenemadvodzana lamatsatfu lekwakubo-Ulamu, naJewushe kanye na-Elifeleti.
Sive sakaJuda sona sase sitfunjelwe eBhabhulona ngenca yekungetsembeki kwaso.
Bekucala ekubuyeni nasekucabeni etindzaweni tabo emadolobheni abo kwakungema-Israyeli labebabantfu nje, nebaphristi, nemaLevi kanye netikhonti tasethempelini.
Besive sakaJuda, nesakaBhenjamini, nesaka-Efrayimu kanye nesakaManase bona bahamba bayawuhlala eJerusalema:
Kwakubo-Uthayi, umsa wa-Amihudi, umsa wa-Omri, umsa wa-Imri, umsa waBani, umtukulu waPheresi, umsa waJuda.
Esiveni sakaShela labengumholi bekungu-Asaya, litubulo lakhe, akanye nalamanye emadvodzana akakhe.
Esiveni sakaZera labengumholi bekunguJehuweli akanye nabomnakabo. Sebabonkhe bantfu besive sakaJuda babengema-690.
Esiveni sakaBhenjamini bekunguSalu, umsa waMeshulamu, umsa waHodaviya, umsa waHasenuwa,
na-Ibhiniya, umsa waJerohamu; na-Ela, umsa wa-Uzi, umsa waMikhri; naMeshulamu, umsa waShefathiya, umsa waRehuweli, umsa wa-Ibhiniya.
Sebabonkhe bantfu besive sakaBhenjamini ngekwemlandvo weluhlanga lwekutalana kwabo bebangema-956. Onkhe lamadvodza abebaholi bemindeni yawo.
na-Azariya, umsa waHilkiya, umsa waMeshulamu, umsa waSadoki, umsa waMerayothi, umsa wa-Ahitubi, labeyindvuna endlini yaNkulunkulu,
na-Adaya, umsa waJerohamu, umsa waPhashuri, umsa waMalkhiya, naMasayi, umsa wa-Adiyeli, umsa waJazera, umsa waMeshulamu, umsa waMeshilemithi, umsa wa-Imeri.
Baphristi lababebaholi bemindeni babeyi-1 760. Babenelikhono ekwenteni wonkhe umsebenti wasendlini yaNkulunkulu.
EmaLevi labehlala eJerusalema bekuboShemaya, umsa waHashubi, umsa wa-Azrikamu, umsa waHashabiya, umMerari;
naBakbakhari, naHereshi, naGalali kanye naMathaniya, umsa waMikha, umsa waZikhri, umsa wa-Asafa;
na-Obadiya, umsa waShemaya, umsa waGalali, umsa waJeduthuni, naBherekhiya, umsa wa-Asa, umsa wa-Elkhana, labehlala emitini yemaNethofa.
Bomahlalesangweni belithempeli lababehlala eJerusalema bekuboShalumi, na-Akhubi, naThalmoni, na-Ahimani kanye nabomnakabo. Shalumi abengumholi wabo.
Shalumi, umsa waKhore, umsa wa-Abiyasafa, umsa waKhora, kanye nabomahlalesangweni bemndeni wakhe, emaKhora, bona umsebenti wabo bekukugadza etimphundvwini telithende,
Finehasi, umsa wa-Eleyazare, ekucaleni bekaphetse labomahlalesangweni, naSimakadze waba naye.
Zakhariya, umsa waMeshelemiya, naye abengumahlalesangweni ekungeneni kwelisango lelithende lekuhlangana.
Bona kanye netitukulwane tabo babebekwe kutsi bagadze emasango endlu yaSimakadze, lekwakutsiwa lithende.
Labomahlalesangweni babebekwe kuyo yonkhe lemihlubulo lemine: ngasemphumalanga, nangasenshonalanga, nangasenyakatfo, nangaseningizimu.
Bomnakabo lababesuka kulemiti yakubo babefika njalo nje kutawubambisana nabo kulemisebenti yekugadza ngemagema emalanga lasikhombisa.
Kodvwa bomahlalesangweni labakhulu labane bemaLevi bona bebanikwe umsebenti wekunakekela emakamelo kanye nengcebo endlini yaNkulunkulu.
Babefanele bahlale busuku bonkhe batungelete indlu yaNkulunkulu, ngobe phela bekufanele bayigadze; babephetse ngisho nesikhiya sekuyivula njalo nje ekuseni.
Umsebenti wemaLevi lamanye bekukuphatsa nekunakekela timphahla letatisetjentiswa ekukhonteni ethempelini. Letimphahla babetibala natingeniswa, baphindze batibale natikhishwa kuyawusetjentiswa.
Lamanye emaLevi umsebenti wawo bekukuphatsa letinye timphahla letingcwele, nafulaha, neliwayini, nemafutsa emncumo, nemphepho kanye netinandzisi.
UmLevi lekwakutsiwa nguMathithiya, indvodzana leyayilitubulo laShalumi, umKhora, yena umsebenti wakhe bekukubhaka sinkhwa semnikelo.
Labanye bomnakabo bemaKhohati umsebenti wabo bekukulungisa sinkhwa semnikelo ngekusibeka etafuleni njalo nje ngeliSabatha.

Labo lababebahlabeli, lababebaholi bemaLevi, babehlala emakamelweni elithempeli. Bayekeliswa nalena leminye imisebenti, ngobe babehlala balindzele kubitelwa emsebentini wabo ngaso sonkhe sikhatsi, emini nasebusuku.
Lamadvodza abebaholi bemindeni yemaLevi, tonkhe tikhulu ngekwemlandvo weluhlanga lwekutalana kwato, bahlala eJerusalema.
Litubulo lakhe kungu-Abdoni, yena elanywa boSuri, naKhishi, naBhali, naNeri, naNadabi,
Mikilothi abenguyise waShimeya. Nabo babehlala edvutane netihlobo tabo eJerusalema.
Emadvodzana aMikha bekuboPhithoni, naMeleki, naThareya kanye na-Ahazi.
Mosa abenguyise waBineya, Bineya anguyise waRefaya, Refaya anguyise wa-Eleyasa, Eleyasa anguyise wa-Aseli.
Aseli abenemadvodzana lasitfupha, emabito awo bekubo-Azrikamu, naBokheru, na-Ishmayeli, naSheyariya, na-Obadiya kanye naHanana. Lawa-ke bekungemadvodzana a-Aseli.
EmaFilisti abahlala emsileni boSawula nemadvodzana akhe. EmaFilisti abulala emadvodzana aSawula: boJonathani, na-Abinadabi, naMalkhi Shuwa.
Imphi yashuba ngakuSawula, lababenemba ngebutjoki bamkhandza, bamhlaba ngemicibisholo.
Sawula wakhuluma neludzibi lwakhe, watsi: “Khipha inkemba yakho ungicedzele, kungaze kufike labantfu labangasoki bangicedzele, ngihlazeke.”
Kodvwa loludzibi lwakhe lwalwesaba, lungeke lukwente loko; ngako Sawula watsatsa yakhe inkemba watiwisela kuyo, atibulala.
Loludzibi lwatsi kube lubone kutsi Sawula sewufile, nalo lwawela enkembeni yalo, lwafa naye.
Sawula nemadvodzana akhe omatsatfu, ngisho nayo yonkhe indlu yakhe, bafela ndzawonye.

Onkhe ema-Israyeli labengasesigodzini atsi kube abone kutsi imphi seyibalekile nekutsi Sawula nemadvodzana akhe sebafile, esuka abaleka, ashiya emadolobha awo. EmaFilisti efika ahlala kuwo lawo madolobha.
Kwatsi ngakusasa emaFilisti nasatewuhlubula letidvumbu talabafile, akhandza Sawula nemadvodzana akhe, bafele eNtsabeni iGilbowa.
Amhlubula ajuba inhloko yakhe ayitsatsa kanye netikhali takhe, atfumela tigijimi kulo lonkhe lemaFilisti kumemetela lendzaba endlini yabonkulunkulu bawo nakubantfu bakubo.
Afaka tikhali takhe ethempelini labonkulunkulu bawo, aphanyeka inhloko yakhe ethempelini laDagoni.
Batsi kube bonkhe bantfu baseJabeshi Gileyadi beve ngako konkhe lokwase kwentiwe ngemaFilisti kuSawula,

tonkhe tihlabani takhona tashuca tayakutsatsa letidvumbu taboSawula kanye nemadvodzana akhe batimikisa eJabeshi. Tase tingcwaba ematsambo abo ngaphansi kwesihlahla lesikhulu saseJabeshi, tazila emalanga lasikhombisa.
wangete wayibuta indlela kuSimakadze. Ngaleso sizatfu Simakadze wamnikela ekufeni, bukhosi wabunika Davide, umsa waJese.

Kadzeni, ngesikhatsi Sawula ayinkhosi, nguwe lowawuhola sive sema-Israyeli nasiyawulwa timphi. Simakadze Nkulunkulu wakho wakhuluma kuwe, watsi: ‘Wena utawuba ngumelusi wesive sami, ema-Israyeli, ube ngumbusi waso.’ ”
akhuluma kuDavide atsi: “Ungeke ungenise lapha.” Noko, Davide wayitfumba inqaba yaseSiyoni, Lidolobha laDavide.
Davide abekhulume watsi: “Lowo lotawuba wekucala kuhlasela emaJebhusi utawuba yindvuna.” Jowabe, umsa waSeruya, wenyuka kucala, ngako wavele waba yindvuna.
Davide wangena wahlala kuleyo nqaba, ngako yabitwa ngekutsi Lidolobha laDavide.
Lelidolobha walakha watungeleta lenqaba, kusukela etibebesini tekwentiwa
Davide wachubeka waba nemandla kakhulu, ngobe Simakadze Somandla abenaye.
AbenaDavide ePhasi Damimu ngesikhatsi emaFilisti ahlanganele khona kulwa imphi. Endzaweni lapho bekunensimi leyayigcwele ibhali, emabutfo ema-Israyeli awabalekela lamaFilisti.
Kodvwa ema endzaweni yawo ekhatsi nekhatsi nensimi. Ayivikela, abulala lamaFilisti, Simakadze wanika ema-Israyeli kuncoba lokukhulu.
Ngaleso sikhatsi Davide abesekhatsi enqabeni, kantsi libutfo lemaFilisti lona laliseBhetlehema.
Davide wativela asomile, wase utsi: “Awu! Kube mane kungaba khona longangikhelela emanti ekunatsa; ngomele emanti asemtfonjeni longasesangweni laseBhetlehema!”

Ngako letingwazi letintsatfu tesuka lapho tabhidla ticheme temabutfo emaFilisti ngenkhani taphumela ngale, taze tefika emtfonjeni longasesangweni laseBhetlehema, takha emanti, tabuya nawo kuDavide. Kodvwa Davide wala kuwanatsa lamanti, esikhundleni saloko wawatfululela embikwaSimakadze.

Davide watsi: “Nkulunkulu akangavumi kutsi ngikwente loku! Kufanele yini kutsi nginatse ingati yalamadvodza latilahle ematsambo ngemphilo yawo?” Njengobe abetilahle ematsambo ngemphilo yawo ngekumkhelela lamanti, Davide akazange awanatse.
yena wadvunyiswa ngalokuphindvwe kwendlula leti letingema-30,

Wabulala sichwaga lesikhulu saseGibhithe lesasingemamitha labengaba mabili nemasentimitha langema-30 budze. Nome lomGibhithe abephetse sikhali lesasingangelipulango lembongolo yemeluki esandleni sakhe, Bhenaya yena wamsukela aphetse simunya. Wahlutfula lesikhali esandleni salomGibhithe, wambulala ngaso lesikhali sakhe.
Lobo kwaba buchawe baBhenaya, umsa waJehoyada. Naye wadvuma njengalaba labatsatfu labebatiwa kakhulu.
Abehlonishwa kakhulu kunato tonkhe letingwazi letatingema-30, kodvwa yena akabalwanga kanye nalaba Labatsatfu. Davide wamenta indvuna yaleti letatisingatsa yena.
Lamadvodza abehlome ngebutjoki, anelikhono lekunemba ngemicibisholo nangetidubulelo ngesekudla nome ngesancele. Bekungemadvodza elusendvo lwaSawula esive sakaBhenjamini:
Bekubo-Ahiyezeri, sikhulu sabo, naJowashi, emadvodzana aShema waseGibeya; naboJeziyeli naPhelethi, emadvodzana a-Azmavethi; naBherakha, naJehu wase-Anathothi,
na-Ishmaya waseGibeyoni, ingwazi emkhatsini walabangema-30, angumholi wabo labangema-30; naJeremiya, naJahaziyeli, naJohanani, naJozabadi waseGedera,
na-Eluzayi, naJerimothi, naBeyaliya, naShemariya, naShefathiya waseHarifi,
na-Elkhana, naJishiya, na-Azareli, naboJowezeri kanye naJashobeyamu besive sakaKhora;

Labanye besive sakaGadi bahlephuka balandzela Davide ngesikhatsi asenqabeni ehlane. Bekutingwazi letatinesibindzi, letatilungele kulwa imphi, tikwati ngisho nekubamba lihawu nesikhali. Buso bato bekubuso bemabhubesi, kantsi futsi tatigijima ngekushesha lokukhulu njengetinyamatane tetintsaba.
Obadiya elama yena ngesikhundla, wesitsatfu kungu-Eliyabe,
Jeremiya awelishumi, kutsi Makbanayi abe welishumi nanye.
LamaGadi bekutindvuna temphi; lamanye abephetse emakhulu, kantsi lamanye abephetse tinkhulungwane.
Ngawo lewela iJordane enyangeni yekucala ngesikhatsi isagcwele igola tintsetse, babaleka bonkhe labebakhe kuleto tigodzi, ngasemphumalanga nangasenshonalanga kwemfula.
Lamanye emadvodza akaBhenjamini newakaJuda eta kuDavide enqabeni yakhe.

Davide waphuma wayawubahlangabeta, wafike wakhuluma kubo, watsi: “Nangabe nite lapha kimi ngekuthula kutengisita, ngitimisele kutihlanganisa nani. Kodvwa nangabe nitele kutangitsengisa etitseni tami ngesikhatsi tandla tami tisakhululekile ekulweni, shangatsi Nkulunkulu wabobabe angakubona loko, bese uyanehlulela.”
“Davide, msa waJese, tsine sibakho! Sihambisana nawe! Imphumelelo! Nalabo labakusitako ababe nemphumelelo! Ngobe Nkulunkulu wakho utakusita.”
Davide wavele wabemukela, wababeka baba baholi bemabutfo akhe ekuhlasela.

Lamanye emadvodza akaManase ahlephuka alandzela Davide ngesikhatsi ahamba nemaFilisti kuyakulwa nenkhosi Sawula. Empeleni yena nemadvodza akakhe akazange awasite emaFilisti, ngobe emvakwekuhlolisana, inkhosi yawo yavele yamcosha. Bakhuluma batsi: “Phela sitawubulawa sonkhe lapha, nakungenteka Davide abuyele enkhosini yakhe Sawula.”

Ngesikhatsi Davide aya eSikilagi, emadvodza akaManase latihlanganisa naDavide nankha: Bekubo-Adna, naJozabadi, naJediyayeli, naMikhayeli, naJozabadi, na-Elihu kanye naSilethayi, lekwakubaholi bemabutfo etinkhulungwane kaManase.
Basita Davide ekulweni nemabutfo labemhlasela, ngobe bonkhe babetingwazi letatinesibindzi, baba tindvuna temphi yakhe.
Imihla nemalanga emadvodza abeta kutawusita Davide, waze waba nemphi lenkhulu lenemandla.
Bekungemadvodza akaJuda, labehlome ngemahawu nangetikhali, abeti-6 800 labelungele kulwa imphi;
emadvodza akaSimeyoni, labetingwazi letatilungele kulwa imphi, abeti-7 100;
akanye naJehoyada, umholi wemndeni waka-Aroni, akakhe ati-3 700,
naSadoki, libhungu lelaliyingwazi linesibindzi, akanye netindvuna takhe letatingema-22, temndeni wakabo;
emadvodza aka-Efrayimu, tingwazi letatinesibindzi letatidvume kakhulu etinsendweni takubo, abeti-20 800;
emadvodza encenye yesive sakaManase, labebitwe ngemabito awo kutsi ete atewubeka Davide kutsi abe yinkhosi, abeti-18 000;
emadvodza aka-Isakhari, labeticondza kahle tikhatsi, ati nekutsi Israyeli kufanele enteni, bekutikhulu letatingema-200, akanye nato tonkhe tinini tawo letatitiphetse;
emadvodza akaZebuloni, emasotja labebokadzebona labelungele kulwa nganome nganguluphi luhlobo lwesikhali, eta kutawusita Davide nekumlalela ngayo yonkhe inhlitiyo yawo, abeti-50 000;
emadvodza akaNaftali, tindvuna letatiyinkhulungwane, tikanye nemadvodza lati-37 000 lahlome ngemahawu nangetikhali;
emadvodza akaDani, labelungele kulwa imphi, abeti-28 600;
emadvodza aka-Asheri, emasotja labebokadzebona labelungele kulwa imphi, abeti-40 000;
kusuka emphumalanga neJordane, emadvodza akaRubeni, newakaDani, kanye newencenye yesive sakaManase, labehlome ngato tonkhe tinhlobo tetikhali, abeti-120 000.

Onkhe lamadvodza abetingwazi letatitinikelele kulwa emabutfweni. Eta eHebroni atimisele ngawo onkhe emandla kubeka Davide kutsi abe yinkhosi etikwa-Israyeli wonkhe. Onkhe lawa lamanye ema-Israyeli nawo abenamcondvo munye wekubeka Davide kutsi abe yinkhosi.
Emadvodza ahlala naDavide emalanga lamatsatfu, adla, anatsa, ngobe imindeni yawo yayiwentele imiphako.

Bomakhelwane babo kusuka ka-Isakhari, nakaZebuloni, nakaNaftali beta nabo baletsa kudla bakwetfwele ngetimbongolo, nangemakamela, nangeminyuzi kanye nangetinkhabi. Lokudla lekwakukunyenti bekungufulaha, nemacebelengwane emakhiwa, newemagelebisi lomisiwe, neliwayini, nemafutsa, netinkhomo kanye netimvu, ngobe kwaba nekujabula ka-Israyeli.

Wakhuluma kulo lonkhe libandla lema-Israyeli, watsi: “Nakubonakala kukuhle kini, kantsi futsi nakuyintsandvo yaSimakadze Nkulunkulu wetfu, asitfumele livi kubo bonkhe besive sakitsi kuyo yonkhe imimango yaka-Israyeli, nakubaphristi kanye nakumaLevi labanawo emadolobheni abo lanemadlelo kutsi bete batekutihlanganisa natsi.
Asilibuyise lapha kitsi libhokisi lesivumelwane saNkulunkulu wetfu, ngobe asizange sibute
Lonkhe lelo bandla lavumelana nalowo mbono, ngobe kwabonakala kulungile kubo bonkhe bantfu.

Davide kanye nawo onkhe ema-Israyeli bahamba baya eBhala yakaJuda, eKhiriyathi Jeyarimu, kulandza libhokisi lesivumelwane saNkulunkulu Simakadze, lobusela esihlalweni sebukhosi asemkhatsini wemakherubhi lasetikwelibhokisi lesivumelwane lelibitwa ngelibito lakhe.
Davide kanye nawo onkhe ema-Israyeli babejabula bagidza ngawo onkhe emandla abo embikwaNkulunkulu ngetingoma, nangemahabhu, nangemalire, nangemafahlawane, nangemasimbali kanye nangemacilongo.
Batsi kube befike ebaleni laKhidoni lekubhulela kolo, Uza welula sandla sakhe, entela kubamba libhokisi lesivumelwane, ngobe letinkhabi takhubatela.
Lulaka lwaSimakadze lwamvutsela Uza, wamshaya, ngobe abesabambe lelibhokisi lesivumelwane. Ngako Uza wafa, wafela embikwaNkulunkulu.
Davide wase uyatfukutsela, ngobe lulaka lwaSimakadze lwalwehlele etikwa-Uza. Kuze kube ngulamuhla loku leyo ndzawo seyabitwa ngekutsi yiPheresi Uza.
Ngalelo langa Davide wesaba Nkulunkulu, wate wabuta watsi: “Pho, ngingaliletsa kanjani libhokisi lesivumelwane saNkulunkulu lapha kami?”
Ngako wangabe asalitsatsa kutsi ahambe nalo aye eJerusalema, Lidolobha laDavide. Esikhundleni saloko, walikhweshisa walibeka endlini ya-Obedi Edomu, waseGathi.
Libhokisi lesivumelwane saNkulunkulu lahlala nebaka-Obedi Edomu endlini yakhe tinyanga letintsatfu; Simakadze wawubusisa umndeni wakhe nako konkhe labenako.
Davide abati kutsi Simakadze sewumbeke kutsi abe yinkhosi yaka-Israyeli, nekutsi sewente umbuso wakhe waphumelela kakhulu ngenca yesive sakhe sema-Israyeli.
EJerusalema Davide waphindze watsatsa labanye bafati, watala emadvodzana nemadvodzakati lamanyenti.
Lawa ngemabito ebantfwana latalelwa bona khona eJerusalema: boShamuwa, naShobabi, naNathani, naSolomoni,
Ngako Davide wabuta kuNkulunkulu, watsi: “Kufanele yini ngihambe kuyawuhlasela lamaFilisti? Utakuwanikela yini esandleni sami?”
Simakadze wamphendvula watsi: “Yebo, hamba, ngobe ngitawanikela esandleni sakho.”
EmaFilisti abesabaleke ashiya bonkulunkulu bawo khona lapho, Davide wakhipha umyalo kutsi babashise ngemlilo.
Ngako Davide waphindze wabuta kuNkulunkulu, Nkulunkulu wamphendvula watsi: “Ungenyukeli lapho, kodvwa watungelete ngemuva, bese uwahlasela ngembili kwetihlahla tebhalisamu.
Utawutsi ungeva tigi tekushuca kwawo lena enhla nato letihlahla tebhalisamu, uphume uyewuhlasela, ngobe loko kutawube kusho kutsi Simakadze sewuhambe embili kuyawubulala emabutfo emaFilisti.”
Ngako Davide wenta loko Nkulunkulu labemyale kutsi akwente, emaFilisti bawabulala yonkhe indlela kusukela eGibeyoni kuze kufike eGezeri.
Ludvumo lwaDavide lwandza nawo onkhe lawo mave, naSimakadze wenta tonkhe tive tamesaba.

Davide wakhuluma watsi: “Kute nome munye ngaphandle kwemaLevi lekufanele etfwale libhokisi lesivumelwane saNkulunkulu, ngobe ngawo lakhetfwa nguSimakadze kutsi amkhonte ngaleyo nkonzo phakadze naphakadze.”
Davide wahlanganisa onkhe ema-Israyeli eJerusalema kutsi aletse lelibhokisi lesivumelwane saSimakadze kulendzawo labesayilungiselele lona.
Wabita wahlanganisa titukulwane taka-Aroni kanye nemaLevi:
Lababetitukulwane takaKhohati, bekungu-Uriyeli, umholi, netihlobo letatili-120.
Lababetitukulwane takaMerari, bekungu-Asaya, umholi, netihlobo letatingema-220.
Lababetitukulwane taka-Elisafani, bekunguShemaya, umholi, netihlobo letatingema-200.
Lababetitukulwane takaHebroni, bekungu-Eliyeli, umholi, netihlobo letatingema-80.
Lababetitukulwane taka-Uziyeli, bekungu-Aminadabi, umholi, netihlobo letatili-112.
Davide wabita Sadoki na-Abiyatha, baphristi, nemaLevi: Bo-Uriyeli, na-Asaya, naJoweli, naShemaya, na-Eliyeli, na-Aminadabi.

Wakhuluma kubo watsi: “Nine nibaholi bemindeni yemaLevi. Ngini nalamanye emaLevi lekufanele nitihlambulule nibe ngcwele, bese niletsa lelibhokisi lesivumelwane saSimakadze, Nkulunkulu wema-Israyeli, nilimikise kulendzawo lesengiyilungiselele lona.
Kungobe nine, maLevi, anilenyusanga kwekucala, ngako-ke Simakadze wasitfukutselela ngaleso sikhatsi. Asizange sike sibute kuSimakadze kutsi singakwenta kanjani njengobe kubhaliwe.”
Baphristi nemaLevi batihlambulula kutsi batekwenyusa libhokisi lesivumelwane saSimakadze, Nkulunkulu wema-Israyeli.
EmaLevi etfwala lelibhokisi lesivumelwane ngetimboko emahlombe awo, njengobe Mosi abekhulumile ngekwemyalo waSimakadze.
Davide watjela baholi bemaLevi kutsi bakhetse bantfu nebahlabeli kutsi batewuhlabela tingoma tekujabula, baphekeletelwa ngimintjingozi: emalire, nemahabhu kanye nemasimbali.
Ngako emaLevi akhetsa boHemani, umsa waJoweli; kubomnakabo akhetsa Asafa, umsa waBherekhiya; kubomnakabo emaMerari akhetsa Ethani, umsa waKhushaya;
Bahlabeli boHemani, na-Asafa kanye na-Ethani bakhetselwa kudlala emasimbali elitfusi.
BoZakhariya na-Aziyeli, naShemiramothi, naJehiyeli, na-Uni, na-Eliyabe, naMaseya kanye naBhenaya bona bakhetfwa kutsi babe bahlabeli bekudlala emalire ngekwe-alamothi,
kantsi boMathithiya, na-Elifelehu, naMikneya, na-Obedi Edomu, naJeyiyeli kanye na-Azaziya bakhetfwa kutsi bona babe bahlabeli bekudlala emahabhu ngekwesishiminithi.
Khenaniya, inhloko yemaLevi, wakhetselwa kutsi engamele lenkonzo yekuhlabela; leyo bekuyinkonzo yakhe, ngobe abenelikhono kulowo msebenti.
BoBherekhiya na-Elkhana bona bakhetselwa kutsi babe bomahlalesangweni belibhokisi lesivumelwane.

BoShebaniya, naJosafati, naNethaneli, na-Amasayi, naZakhariya, naBhenaya kanye na-Eliyezeri bona bekubaphristi lekwakufanele bashaye emacilongo embikwelibhokisi lesivumelwane saNkulunkulu. Bo-Obedi Edomu naJehiya nabo bakhetselwa kutsi babe bomahlalesangweni belibhokisi lesivumelwane.
Njengobe Nkulunkulu abesasite emaLevi labetfwele libhokisi lesivumelwane saSimakadze, kwahlatjwa tinkunzi letisikhombisa netihhanca letisikhombisa, tentiwa umhlatjelo.

Davide abembetse umjiva lowawentiwe ngelineni lecolisakele, njengawo onkhe lamaLevi labetfwele libhokisi lesivumelwane saSimakadze, nanjengalabo bahlabeli, naKhenaniya labengamele lawo makwaya ekuhlabela; Davide abembetse nesidziya selineni.
Ngako onkhe ema-Israyeli enyuka nelibhokisi lesivumelwane saSimakadze amemeta, ashaya timphondvo tetihhanca, nemacilongo, nemasimbali, ashaya ngisho nemalire nemahabhu.

Latsi libhokisi lesivumelwane saSimakadze nalingena eDolobheni laDavide, Mikhali, indvodzakati yaSawula, wabukela avele ngelifasitelo. Watsi nakabona Davide, inkhosi, agidza agubha, wamedzelela enhlitiyweni yakhe.
Watsi kube Davide acedze kwenta iminikelo yekushiswa neminikelo yebudlelwane,
Wesuka lapho wanika wonkhe longum-Israyeli, lomdvuna nalomsikati, sinkhwa nelicebelengwane lemasundvu,
Wakhetsa labanye bemaLevi kutsi bakhonte embikwelibhokisi lesivumelwane saSimakadze, bancuse, babonge babuye badvumise Simakadze Nkulunkulu wema-Israyeli:

Asafa abengumholi wabo lomkhulu, wesibili kunguZakhariya, bese kuba boJeyiyeli, naShemiramothi, naJehiyeli, naMathithiya, na-Eliyabe, naBhenaya, na-Obedi Edomu kanye naJeyiyeli. Bekufanele badlale emalire nemahabhu, bese kutsi Asafa adlale emasimbali.
BoBhenaya naJahaziyeli labebabaphristi bona babefanele bashaye emacilongo njalo nje ngetikhatsi letitsite embikwelibhokisi lesivumelwane saNkulunkulu.
Ngalelo langa Davide wacala kunika Asafa kanye nalawa lamanye emaLevi kutsi ahlabele lengoma yekudvumisa kuSimakadze, letsi:
Davide wesuka washiya Asafa kanye nebangani bakhe embikwelibhokisi lesivumelwane saSimakadze, kutsi atewukhonta njalonjalo njengekwesidzingo salelo nalelo langa.
Waphindze washiya bo-Obedi Edomu kanye nalamadvodza labengema-68 labebambisene nawo ekukhonteni. Bo-Obedi Edomu, umsa waJeduthuni, naHosa babebomahlalesangweni.
kutsi ayekwetfula umnikelo wekushiswa kuSimakadze elatini lemnikelo wekushiswa, njalo nje ekuseni nasentsambama ngekulandzela konkhe lokubhalwe emtsetfweni Simakadze lawunika ema-Israyeli.
Lababenabo bekuboHemani, naJeduthuni kanye nalabanye lababekhetsiwe ngemabito abo bakhetselwe umsebenti wekubonga Simakadze, batsi: “Ngobe umusa wakhe ume kuze kube phakadze.”
BoHemani naJeduthuni bona umsebenti wabo bekukushaya emacilongo, nemasimbali kanye nekudlala letinye tingubhu tekuhlabela ingoma lengcwele yekudvumisa. Emadvodzana aJeduthuni wona abema esangweni.
Nathani waphendvula Davide, watsi: “Loko lonako engcondvweni yakho, kwente, ngobe Simakadze unawe.”
Ngalobo busuku kwefika livi laSimakadze kuNathani, latsi:
“Hamba utjele inceku yami Davide, utsi: ‘Naku lokushiwo nguSimakadze, utsi: Akusiwe lotangakhela indlu lapho ngitawuhlala khona.

Mine angizange sengihlale endlini kusukela ngelilanga lengakhipha ngalo ema-Israyeli eveni laseGibhithe kuze kube ngulamuhla. Bengisolo ngehla ngenyuka nemathende ngisuka kulelo ngiye kulela, ngisuke kulendzawo ngiye kuleya.
Yonkhe indzawo lapho bengihamba khona nema-Israyeli, ngase ngasho yini khona kumunye webaholi
Benginawe kuyo yonkhe indzawo lapho bewuhamba khona, ngibhubhise tonkhe titsa takho embikwakho. Manje ngitakwenta libito lakho libe njengemabito ebantfu labakhulu emhlabeni.
Sive sami, ema-Israyeli, ngitasentela indzawo lenhle, ngisihlanyele khona kuze kube nelikhaya laso, singaphindzi sikhatsateke. Bantfu lababi bangeke baphindze basicitse njengobe bebenta ekucaleni,
njengobe benta seloku ngacala kubeka baholi
“ ‘Ngikhipha livi kuwe lekutsi Simakadze yena matfupha utakwakhela wena indlu.
Emalanga akho nase aphelile, sewulele kuboyihlomkhulu, ngiyawuvusa umliba wakho kutsi uhlale esihlalweni sakho sebukhosi, loyo lomunye wemadvodzana akho mbamba, ngiyakuwumisa umbuso wakhe.
Nguye-ke longuyena ayawungakhela indlu, ngiyawumisa sihlalo sakhe sebukhosi phakadze naphakadze.
Mine ngiyakuba nguyise, yena abe yindvodzana yami. Lutsandvo lwami angisoze ngalususa kuye, njengobe ngalususa kulowo labeyinkhosi embikwakho.
Ngiyakummisa etikwesive sami nasetikwembuso wami phakadze naphakadze. Sihlalo sakhe sebukhosi siyawuhlala sisimile phakadze naphakadze.’ ”
Nathani wawabika kuDavide onkhe lamavi aso sonkhe leso sembulo.
Inkhosi Davide yase iyahamba yayawungena ethendeni lebukhona baSimakadze, yafike yahlala phansi, yathandaza yatsi:
“Bengingubani mine, Simakadze Nkulunkulu? Yona indlu yaketfu beyiyini kutsi ungangihola kuze kube ngulapha?

Kwaba shangatsi konkhe loku bekungakeneli kuwe. Awu, Nkulunkulu! Manje sewukhulume ngisho nangelikusasa lendlu yenceku yakho. Yebo, Simakadze Nkulunkulu, ungibheke kwaba shangatsi ngiphakeme kakhulu kunabo bonkhe bantfu.
“Yini nje lenye lengashiwo nguDavide kuwe ngekuyiphakamisa inceku yakho? Ngobe wena uyayati inceku yakho,

Kona ngubani nje lonjengesive sakho, ema-Israyeli, sive lekukuphela kwaso emhlabeni Nkulunkulu lowaphuma wayakusikhulula kutsi sibe sive sakhe, watakhela wena Libito lelikhulu, wenta timangaliso letinkhulu naletishacisako ngekudvungulula tive ngetive embikwesive sakho lowasikhulula eGibhithe?
Umise sive sakho, ema-Israyeli, saba ngulesingusona sisakho phakadze naphakadze; wena-ke, Simakadze, wase wuba nguNkulunkulu waso.
“Manje-ke, Simakadze, sale usigcina setsembiso sakho losentile macondzana nenceku yakho kanye nendlu yayo sime phakadze naphakadze. Yenta njengobe wetsembisile,

kuze setsembiso sakho sime sitinte, neLibito lakho libe likhulu phakadze naphakadze. Ngaloko-ke bantfu bayawutsi: ‘Simakadze Somandla, Nkulunkulu wema-Israyeli, unguNkulunkulu wa-Israyeli!’ Indlu yenceku yakho Davide iyakuma itinte embikwakho.
“Wena, Nkulunkulu wami, ukwembulile loko encekwini yakho kutsi uyakuyakhela indlu. Ngako inceku yakho ikhutsatekile kutsi ithandaze kuwe.
Awu, Simakadze, wena unguNkulunkulu! Unike inceku yakho lesetsembiso lesihle.
Manje-ke shangatsi kungakujabulisa kubusisa indlu yenceku yakho kuze ichubeke njalo embikwakho; ngobe wena Simakadze uyibusisile, futsi iyawubusiseka phakadze naphakadze.”
Ngetulu kwaloko Davide wahlasela, wehlula Hadadezeri, inkhosi yaseSobha, waze wayakufika eHamathi, ngaleso sikhatsi Hadadezeri abecondze kubusa lonkhe lelo live langasemfuleni iYufrathe.
Davide watfumba inkhulungwane yetincola takhe temphi, nebashayeli betincola temphi labati-7 000,
Atsi ayeta emaSiriya aseDamaseko, atsi etekwelekelela Hadadezeri, inkhosi yaseSobha, Davide wabulala aba ti-22 000 kuwo,
Davide wase umisa tinkambu temabutfo embusweni wemaSiriya eDamaseko. EmaSiriya ase aba bantfu baDavide, atsela kuye. Simakadze wapha Davide kuncoba nome ngukuphi lapho ahlasela khona.
Davide watsatsa lamahawu egolide labengewetindvuna taHadadezeri, wahamba nawo wawayisa eJerusalema.
Davide watitsatsela incumbi yelitfusi edolobheni laseThebha

Inkhosi Davide letintfo yatinikela kuSimakadze, njengobe beyentile nangaleti tesiliva, nangetegolide letatiphuma kuto tonkhe letive beyitincobile yatitfumba: ema-Edomu, nemaMowabi, nema-Amoni, nemaFilisti kanye nema-Amaleki.
Abishayi, umsa waSeruya, wabulala ema-Edomu labeti-18 000 eSigodzini Seluswayi.
Davide walibusa lonkhe lema-Israyeli, enta loko lokulungile kubo bonkhe bantfu bakhe.
Jowabe, umsa waSeruya, abengumphatsi wemphi; Jehoshafati, umsa wa-Ahiludi, abengulobhalisako;
Bhenaya, umsa waJehoyada, abephetse emaKherethi nemaPhelethi;
Davide wacabanga watsi: “Ngitawumentela bubele Hanuni, umsa waNahashi, ngobe uyise wangentela bubele.” Ngako Davide watfumela titfunywa kutsi tiyewulilela Hanuni macondzana nekufa kweyise.
Tatsi letitfunywa taDavide natifika kuHanuni, eveni lema-Amoni, kutsi tiyemlilela,

baholi bema-Amoni bakhuluma kuHanuni, batsi: “Ucabanga kutsi Davide uhlonipha uyihlo ngalokutfumela emadvodza akakhe lapha kuwe kutsi atekulilela? Utsi lamadvodza aketeli kuwe kutawuhlamahlama lelive alihlole, bese ayalibhubhisa?”
Ngako Hanuni wawabamba lamadvodza akaDavide, wawahhula tilevu, wase uhhumbula netembatfo tawo ekhatsi macondzana netibunu, wase uyawayekela, ahamba.

Kwatsi kube kufike lomunye atewutjela Davide ngalamadvodza, Davide wakhipha tigijimi kutsi tiwahlangabete, ngobe abesahlaziseke kakhulu. Inkhosi yatsi: “Hlalani eJerikho, tize tihlume kahle tilevu tenu, bese niyabuya-ke.”

Ema-Amoni atsi kube abone kutsi asatente aba liphunga lelibi kuDavide, Hanuni nema-Amoni bakhokha isiliva leyayingemakhilogremu labengaba ti-34 000 ekucasha tincola temphi nebagibeli bato kubaseMesophothamiya,
Bacasha tincola temphi letiti-32 000 nebagibeli bato, kanye nenkhosi yaseMakha nemasotja ayo leyeta yefike yemisa eceleni kweMedeba. Ema-Amoni wona abeshuca aphuma emadolobheni aviva, aya emphini.
Watsi kube akuve loko Davide, watfumela Jowabe, wamkhipha nalo lonkhe libutfo lemphi yetingwazi.
Ema-Amoni ashuca aphumela ngephandle, atihlela ekungeneni kwelidolobha lawo, kantsi lamakhosi labetawubasita abesatihlela ngephandle esigangeni.
Jowabe wabona kutsi emabutfo etitsa atamhlasela ngemuva nangembili, wase ukhetsa bokadzebona betingwazi cobo lwato temabutfo ema-Israyeli, watimisa watsi atibhekane nemaSiriya.
Kwatsi lawa lasele emabutfo wawashiya esandleni semnakabo, Abishayi, lowawahlela nawo abhekana nema-Amoni.
Jowabe watjela Abishayi watsi: “Nawubona kutsi emaSiriya ayangehlula, ubobe sewuyeta utangelekelela; nami nangibona kutsi ema-Amoni ayakwehlula, ngitakuta ngitekwelekelela.
Cina, ube nesibindzi! Asilwe ngesibindzi, silwele sive sakitsi nemadolobha aNkulunkulu wetfu. Simakadze utakwenta loko lokuhle emehlweni akhe.”
Jowabe nelibutfo lakakhe bashuca bayawudvumelana nemaSiriya. EmaSiriya ehlulwa, abaleka.
Ema-Amoni nawo atsi kube abone kutsi emaSiriya ayabaleka, nawo esuka ngematubane abalekela Abishayi, umnakabo, angena edolobheni. Ngako Jowabe wancandzeka wabuyela eJerusalema.
EmaSiriya atsi kube abone kutsi ehlulwe ngema-Israyeli, atfumela titfunywa kutsi tilandze emaSiriya labesangesheya kwemfula iYufrathe labeholwa nguShobaki,

Davide watsi kube akuve loko, naye wabutsa onkhe emabutfo ema-Israyeli, wewelela ngesheya kwemfula iJordane. Davide wahlela emabutfo akhe, ema-Israyeli aviva acondzana nemaSiriya. Imphi yabambana etulu.
Kodvwa emaSiriya abaleka embikwema-Israyeli, Davide wabulala bagibeli betincola temphi lababeti-7 000 nemasotja labeti-40 000 labeshuca ngetinyawo. Wachubeka wabulala naShobaki,
Lawa lamanye emakhosi labengaphansi kwaHadadezeri, atsi kube abone kutsi asehlulwe ngema-Israyeli, ase enta sivumelwane sekuthula naDavide, ase aba ngaphansi kwakhe.
Ngako emaSiriya akazange afune kuphindze asite ema-Amoni.
Davide watsatsa umchele lowawusenhloko yalenkhosi yema-Amoni.

nalabantfu bebalapho wabakhipha wabafaka emsebentini lababewenta ngemasaha, nangemapiki ensimbi, nangemazembe. Davide konkhe loko wakwenta kuwo onkhe emadolobha ema-Amoni. Davide nawo onkhe emabutfo akhe base bayancandzeka, babuyela eJerusalema.
Watsi nakedzelela ema-Israyeli, Jonathani, umsa waShimeya,

Davide watjela Jowabe netindvuna temabutfo, watsi: “Hambani niyewubala ema-Israyeli kulo lonkhe live, kusukela eBherisheba kuze kuyewufika kaDani. Bese niyabuya-ke nitangibikela, khona ngitewuhlala ngati kutsi ema-Israyeli mangakhi.”

Kodvwa Jowabe waphendvula watsi: “Shangatsi Simakadze angawandzisa ngalokuphindvwe kalikhulu emabutfo akhe. Nkhosi yami, nkhosi, kungabe kambe bonkhe labo bantfu akusibo bantfu benkhosi yami yini? Inkhosi yami ifunelani kukwenta loko? Ifunelani inkhosi yami kwehlisela licala etikwema-Israyeli?”
Noko livi lenkhosi lamehlulekisa Jowabe. Ngako Jowabe wesuka wahamba walidzabula lonkhe laka-Israyeli, wase uyajika ubuyela eJerusalema.
Jowabe wabikela inkhosi Davide linani lemadvodza emphi. Kulo lonkhe laka-Israyeli abesi-1 100 000, emadvodza labengabamba inkemba, bese kutsi kulakaJuda abeti-470 000.
Lesento futsi sasisibi ngisho nasemehlweni aNkulunkulu; ngako Nkulunkulu wawajezisa ema-Israyeli.
Davide wase utsi kuNkulunkulu: “Ngonile kakhulu ngekwenta lentfo lenje. Manje sengiyakuncenga, susa licala lenceku yakho. Vele, ngente intfo lebulima kakhulu.”
“Hamba utjele Davide utsi: ‘Naku lokushiwo nguSimakadze, utsi: Ngikunika tintfo letintsatfu lokumele ukhetse kuto. Khetsa kunye kwato ngitekujezisa ngako.’ ”
Ngako Gadi waya kuDavide, wafike watsi kuye: “Naku lokushiwo nguSimakadze, utsi: ‘Tikhetsele kwakho:

iminyaka lemitsatfu yendlala, nome tinyanga letintsatfu solo ukhekhemukiswa titsa takho tikuphetse ngetikhali tikubhokodzela, nome emalanga lamatsatfu enkemba yaSimakadze lekungemalanga esifo lesingujubajece, ingilosi yaNkulunkulu yonakalisa lonkhe lema-Israyeli.’ Manje-ke cabanga kahle, kutsi ngitawufike ngitsini kulona longitfumile.”
Davide watsi kuGadi: “Ngiselusizini lolukhulu. Angimane ngiwele etandleni taSimakadze, ngobe umusa wakhe mkhulu, kodvwa ungavumi ngiwele etandleni tebantfu.”
Ngako Simakadze watfumela sifo lesingujubajece esiveni sema-Israyeli; kwafa emadvodza lati-70 000 ka-Israyeli.

Nkulunkulu watfumela ingilosi kutsi iyewubhubhisa iJerusalema. Kodvwa ingilosi yatsi isakwenta loko, Simakadze wakubona, wadzabuka ngalobusacasaca lobabehlela bantfu bakhe, wase utsi kulengilosi leyayibhubhisa bantfu: “Sekwenele! Susa sandla sakho.” Ngaleso sikhatsi ingilosi yaSimakadze yase ime ngasebaleni lekubhulela kolo laka-Arawuna,

Davide watsi ubuka etulu, wabona ingilosi yaSimakadze ime emkhatsini welizulu nemhlaba iphakamise inkemba ngesandla sayo iyibhekise ngaseJerusalema. Davide kanye netimphunga base bembatsa emasaka bawa phansi ngebuso, bakhotsama.

Davide watsi kuNkulunkulu: “Akusimi yini lengatsi akubalwe emadvodza emphi? Ngimi lengonile ngenta lokubi. Kodvwa laba batimvu nje. Bona-ke boneni? Awu Simakadze, Nkulunkulu wami! Sandla sakho asimane sehlele etikwami ngedvwa kanye nasetikwendlu yami kuphela, kodvwa ungasiyekeli lesifo sehlele esiveni sakho.”
Ngako ingilosi yaSimakadze yase itjela Gadi kutsi akakhulume naDavide kutsi akakhuphuke ayekwakhela Simakadze lilati, alakhe ebaleni lekubhulela kolo laka-Arawuna, umJebhusi.
Ngako Davide wakhuphuka alalela livi lelalikhulunywe nguGadi egameni laSimakadze.
Watsi Arawuna asabhula kolo, watsi uyagucuka wabona ingilosi, bafana bakhe labane lababekanye naye batifihla.
Davide wasondzela, Arawuna watsi uyabukisisa, wambona Davide, washiya kubhula, wayawukhotsama kuDavide abhekise buso phansi.
Davide watsi kuye: “Ngiphe lendzawo yakho yekubhulela kolo, kuze ngitekwakha kuyo lilati kuSimakadze, khona kutewuncamuka lesifo lesibulala sive. Ngitsengisele yona ngentsengo lephelele.”

Arawuna wakhuluma kuDavide, watsi: “Yitsatse. Inkhosi yami, inkhosi, ayente lekutsandzako kuyo. Buka-ke, ngitawunikela ngetinkhomo kutsi tibe ngumnikelo wekushiswa. Letihliphi tekubhula titawuba tinkhuni, nalokolo abe ngumnikelo walokutinhlavu, ngitakupha konkhe loku.”

Kodvwa inkhosi Davide yaphendvula Arawuna, yatsi: “Cha! Ngifuna kukubhadala ngentsengo lephelele. Ngingeke ngitsatsele Simakadze kulokukwakho, futsi ngeke ngente umhlatjelo ngalengingakakukhokheli lutfo.”
Ngako Davide wanika Arawuna emakhilogremu egolide labengaba sikhombisa atsenga lelibala lekubhulela kolo.
Davide wase wakha lilati kuSimakadze kuleyo ndzawo, wenta iminikelo yekushiswa neyebudlelwane,
Simakadze wase ukhuluma kulengilosi, ingilosi yabuyisela inkemba yayo esikhwameni sayo.
Ngaleso sikhatsi Davide asabonile kutsi Simakadze umphendvulile kulelibala lekubhulela kolo laka-Arawuna, umJebhusi, wase unikela ngemihlatjelo khona lapho.
Kodvwa Davide abenganakuhamba embikwalo kutsi ayewubuta kuNkulunkulu, ngobe abesaba inkemba yengilosi yaSimakadze.
Davide wakhuluma watsi: “Indlu yaSimakadze longuNkulunkulu itakuba lapha, ibe kanye nelilati lemnikelo wekushiswa wema-Israyeli.”
Waletsa insimbi lenyenti yekutsi kwakhiwe ngayo tipikili tetivalo temasango netako konkhe lokudzinga kubetselwa, waletsa nencumbi yelitfusi lelalingeke likaleke ngebunyenti balo.
Waletsa futsi naletinyenti tingodvo temisedari, nato tatingenakubalwa, tona-ke tatiletfwe ngemaSidoni nebaseThire kuDavide.
Davide wase ubita indvodzana yakhe Solomoni wayitjela kutsi ibokwakha indlu, iyakhele Simakadze longuNkulunkulu wema-Israyeli.
Davide watsi kuSolomoni: “Msawami, benginesifiso enhlitiyweni yami sekutsi ngakhe indlu, ngiyakhele Libito laSimakadze Nkulunkulu wami.

Kodvwa kwefika kimi livi laSimakadze, latsi: ‘Wena sewucitse kakhulu ingati, walwa timphi letinyenti. Awukafaneli kutsi wakhe indlu, uyakhele Libito lami, ngobe sewucitse ingati lenyenti emhlabeni embikwami.
Kodvwa noko utawutala indvodzana letawuba ngumuntfu wekuthula newekuphumula, futsi ngitamnika kuthula kuto tonkhe titsa takhe letibomakhelwane bakhe. Libito lakhe kuyawuba nguSolomoni.
Nguye-ke loyakwakha indlu, akhele Libito lami. Uyawuba yindvodzana yami, mine ngibe nguyise. Ngiyawumisa kahle umbuso wakhe, ngiwutintise ka-Israyeli kuze kube phakadze.’
“Manje-ke, ndvodzana yami, Simakadze akabe nawe ube nemphumelelo, uze wakhe indlu yaSimakadze Nkulunkulu wakho, njengobe atsi utakwenta.
Shangatsi Simakadze angakupha kuhlakanipha kwebudvodza nekucondza kahle tintfo, nase akubeke kutsi ube ngumcondzisi wema-Israyeli, khona utekwati kugcina kahle imitsetfo yaSimakadze Nkulunkulu wakho.
Ngaloko-ke uyawuphumelela, nawuticaphela wena unakekele tonkhe timiso nemitsetfo yaSimakadze layinike Mosi ngenca yema-Israyeli. Cina ube nesibindzi. Ungesabi, ungaphelelwa ngemandla.
Manyenti kakhulu emadvodza lotabe usebenta nawo: Kutaba nalabacota kahle ematje, nalababumba ngematje, nalabababati kanye nalamanyenti nje emadvodza lanebuchwephesha kuto tonkhe tinhlobo temisebenti
yegolide, neyesiliva, neyelitfusi, neyensimbi, kube nebabati longeke ubabale. Manje-ke sale uwucala lomsebenti, Simakadze akabe nawe.”
Davide wase ubita bonkhe baholi bema-Israyeli wabayala kutsi abasitane naSolomoni, umsa wakhe.
Watsi kubo: “Simakadze Nkulunkulu wenu akekho ngakini yini? Akaniniki yini kuthula kuyo yonkhe indzawo? Ubanikele kimi bonkhe labakhile kulelive, lelive liphetfwe nguSimakadze kanye nesive sakhe.

Manje-ke nikelani tinhlitiyo tenu nemiphefumulo yenu ekufuneni Simakadze Nkulunkulu wenu. Calani nyalo nakhe indzawo lengcwele yaSimakadze Nkulunkulu, lapho nitawuletsa khona libhokisi lesivumelwane saSimakadze nato tonkhe tintfo letingcwele letitaNkulunkulu, nitifake tonkhe kulelithempeli lenitabe senilakhile nalakhela Libito laSimakadze.”
Davide wachubeka wabita bonkhe baholi besive sema-Israyeli kanye nebaphristi babo, nemaLevi.
EmaLevi labesaneminyaka lengema-30 nalengetulu abalwa, asawonkhe lawo madvodza aba ti-38 000.
Davide watsi: “Emkhatsini walaba: labati-24 000 batakwengamela kwakhiwa kwelithempeli laSimakadze, labati-6 000 bona batawuba tindvuna nebehluleli.
Labati-4 000 bona batawuba bomahlalesangweni, labati-4 000 babe bekudvumisa Simakadze ngetingubhu temculo lengitimisele loko.”
Emadvodzana aLadani: Wekucala bekunguJehiyeli, bese kuba boZethami naJoweli, babatsatfu sebabonkhe.
Wekucala bekunguJahathi, wesibili kunguZiza, kodvwa boJewushe naBheriya bona abazange babe nemadvodzana lamanyenti, ngako-ke babalwa njengemndeni munye, banikwa umsebenti waba munye.

Aroni wehlukaniselwa, yena kanye nentalelwane yakhe phakadze naphakadze kutsi bakhonte ngato tonkhe tintfo letingcwelengcwele tihlale tingcwele, bashise imphepho embikwaSimakadze, bakhonte ebukhoneni bakhe basho netibusiso ngeLibito lakhe phakadze naphakadze.
Emadvodzana aMosi, inceku yaNkulunkulu, nawo abalwa njengalabanye besive semaLevi.
Eliyezeri akazange aphindze amtale umfana, kodvwa emadvodzana aRehabiya wona abemanyenti kakhulu.
Emadvodzana a-Uziyeli: Wekucala bekunguMikha, wesibili kunguJishiya.
Bomnakabo, emadvodzana aKhishi, bawatsatsa bawenta bafati babo.
Emadvodzana aMushi: BekuboMahali, na-Ederi, naJerimothi, babatsatfu sebabonkhe.

Lena-ke bekuyintalelwane yaLevi ngemindeni yawo, tinhloko temindeni, njengobe tatibhaliswe ngemabito tabalwa ngayinye ngayinye, lokusho labo labebangasebenta, kusukela kulababeneminyaka lengema-20 kuya etulu, labo labebakhonta ethempelini laSimakadze.
akusadzingeki kutsi emaLevi abe etfwalana nelithende lekuhlangana nome-ke letinye nje tintfo letisetjentiswa nakukhontwako.”
Ngekwemagama ekugcina aDavide emaLevi abalwa kusukela kulabo lababeneminyaka lengema-20 kuya etulu.

Umsebenti wemaLevi kwakukusita emadvodzana a-Aroni emsebentini wasethempelini laSimakadze: Babefanele kwengamela tibuya netindlu letatichunywe ethempelini, nekuhlambulula tonkhe tintfo letingcwele kanye nekwenta leminye nje imisebenti yasendlini yaNkulunkulu.

Babefanele banakekele sinkhwa sekubekwa etafuleni, nafulaha wemnikelo walokutinhlavu, nemacebelengwane langenambiliso kanye nekuphekwa nekubondvwa kwawo kanye nebungako bawo bebunyenti nesisindvo sawo.
Babesukuma njalo ekuseni beme babonge Simakadze baphindze bamdvumise. Babenta njalo futsi nantsambama,

nangato tonkhe tikhatsi nakwentiwa iminikelo yekushiswa kuSimakadze ngemaSabatha, nangemikhosi yekwetfwasa kwenyanga, nangemikhosi nje leminye lemisiwe. Babefanele kukhonta embikwaSimakadze njalo nje, babe sibalo lesitsite futsi bakhonte ngaleyo ndlela labanikwe yona.
Leti-ke bekuticheme temadvodzana a-Aroni: Emadvodzana a-Aroni bekuboNadabi, na-Abihu, na-Eleyazare, na-Ithamari.
Kodvwa bo-Abihu naNadabi bafa kucala kuneyise, babesete bantfwana. Bo-Eleyazare-ke na-Ithamari bona basale bakhonta babaphristi.
Ngekusitwa boSadoki, umtukulu wa-Eleyazare, na-Ahimeleki, umtukulu wa-Ithamari, Davide wabehlukanisa ticheme ngeticheme entela kutsi basebente ngendlela enkonzweni.

Linani lelikhulu lebaholi latfolakala kubendlu yaka-Eleyazare kunalabo lababetfolakala ka-Ithamari, behlukaniswa njengemfanelo. Lababetfolakala ka-Eleyazare baholi baba li-16, kwatsi baka-Ithamari baba siphohlongo, tinhloko temindeni letatibatukulu.
Loku bakwenta ngekungatikhetseli, ngobe babesebentisa inkatho, bekunetindvuna tendzawo lengcwelengcwele, netindvuna taNkulunkulu kuto njalo titukulwane tabo-Eleyazare na-Ithamari.

Umbhali Shemaya, umsa waNethaneli, umLevi, wababhalisa emabito abo embikwenkhosi netindvuna, naboSadoki, umphristi, na-Ahimeleki, umsa wa-Abiyatha, netinhloko temindeni yebaphristi neyemaLevi, kutsatfwa umndeni munye ka-Eleyazare, kwase kutsatfwa munye ka-Ithamari. Inkatho yahamba kanje:
Yekucala yadla Jehoyaribi, yesibili yadla Jedaya,
yesitsatfu yadla Harimi, yesine yadla Seyorimu,
yesihlanu yadla Malkhiya, yesitfupha yadla Mijamini,
yemfica yadla Jeshuwa, yelishumi yadla Shekhaniya,
yeli-11 yadla Eliyashibi, yeli-12 yadla Jakimu,
yeli-13 yadla Hupha, yeli-14 yadla Jeshebeyabe,
yeli-15 yadla Bilgayi, yeli-16 yadla Imeri,
yeli-17 yadla Heziri, yeli-18 yadla Haphisesi,
yeli-19 yadla Phethahiya, yema-20 yadla Jehezekeli.
Yema-21 yadla Jakhini, yema-22 yadla Gamuli,
yema-23 yadla Delaya, yema-24 yadla Maziya.

Lamadvodza-ke abhaliswa ngekulandzelana kwekukhonta kwawo lokwakumisiwe, kwetikhatsi tekungena kwawo ethempelini laSimakadze, njengekwemininingwane yemiyalo labekelwa yona nguyisemkhulu Aroni, njengobe Simakadze, Nkulunkulu wema-Israyeli, abeshito kuye.

Benta inkatho nabo njengabomnakabo, batukulu ba-Aroni, ngesikhatsi basembikwenkhosi Davide, naSadoki, na-Ahimeleki, netinhloko temindeni yebaphristi netemaLevi. Imindeni yalabangematubulo yayiphatfwa ngendlela lekwakuphatfwa ngayo botfunjana.

Davide kanye netindvuna takhe letatiphetse emaLevi behlukanisela emadvodzana a-Asafa, naHemani, naJeduthuni, bawehlukanisela inkonzo yekuphrofetha, kwanandziswa ngemahabhu, nengemalire, nangemasimbali. Luhla lwalamadvodza lenta lomsebenti bekungulolu:
Kumadvodzana a-Asafa bekuboZakhuri, naJosefa, naNethaniya, na-Asharela. Emadvodzana a-Asafa abephetfwe ngu-Asafa labephrofetha ngekulawulwa yinkhosi.
Mayelana naJeduthuni, kumadvodzana akhe bekuboGedaliya, naSeri, naJeshaya, naShimeyi,

Mayelana naHemani, kumadvodzana akhe bekuboBukhiya, naMathaniya, na-Uziyeli, naShubayeli, naJerimothi, naHananiya, naHanani, na-Eliyatha, naGidalti, naRomamti Ezeri, naJoshbekasha, naMalothi, naHothiri, naMahaziyoti.
Bonkhe labo bekungemadvodzana aHemani, umboniswa wenkhosi. Wabanikwa ngesetsembiso saNkulunkulu kutsi batemphakamisa.

Onkhe-ke lamadvodza abengaphansi kwemitsetfo yaboyise mayelana nemculo wasendlini yaSimakadze, imiculo lenemasimbali, nemalire, nemahabhu enkonzweni yasendlini yaSimakadze. Bo-Asafa, naJeduthuni, naHemani babengaphansi kwemtsetfo wenkhosi.
Bebakanye netihlobo tabo, bonkhe bafundzisiwe baceceshelwa umculo waSimakadze. Sebabonkhe babengema-288.
Labadzala nalabancane, ngisho labafundzisako kanye nalabafundzako, benta inkatho, benta emagema ekusebenta kwabo.
Inkatho yekucala leyayika-Asafa yadla Josefa, nemadvodzana akhe kanye netihlobo takhe,
Yesibili yadla Gedaliya nemadvodzana akhe kanye netihlobo takhe, sebabonkhe babeli-12.
Yesitsatfu yadla Zakhuri nemadvodzana akhe kanye netihlobo takhe, sebabonkhe babeli-12.
Yesihlanu yadla Nethaniya nemadvodzana akhe kanye netihlobo takhe, sebabonkhe babeli-12.
Yesitfupha yadla Bukhiya nemadvodzana akhe kanye netihlobo takhe, sebabonkhe babeli-12.
Yesiphohlongo yadla Jeshaya nemadvodzana akhe kanye netihlobo takhe, sebabonkhe babeli-12.
Yemfica yadla Mathaniya nemadvodzana akhe kanye netihlobo takhe, sebabonkhe babeli-12.
Yelishumi yadla Shimeyi nemadvodzana akhe kanye netihlobo takhe, sebabonkhe babeli-12.
Yeli-12 yadla Hashabiya nemadvodzana akhe kanye netihlobo takhe, sebabonkhe babeli-12.
Yeli-13 yadla Shubayeli nemadvodzana akhe kanye netihlobo takhe, sebabonkhe babeli-12.
Yeli-14 yadla Mathithiya nemadvodzana akhe kanye netihlobo takhe, sebabonkhe babeli-12.
Yeli-15 yadla Jerimothi nemadvodzana akhe kanye netihlobo takhe, sebabonkhe babeli-12.
Yeli-16 yadla Hananiya nemadvodzana akhe kanye netihlobo takhe, sebabonkhe babeli-12.
Yeli-17 yadla Joshbekasha nemadvodzana akhe kanye netihlobo takhe, sebabonkhe babeli-12.
Yeli-18 yadla Hanani nemadvodzana akhe kanye netihlobo takhe, sebabonkhe babeli-12.
Yeli-19 yadla Malothi nemadvodzana akhe kanye netihlobo takhe, sebabonkhe babeli-12.
Yema-20 yadla Eliyatha nemadvodzana akhe kanye netihlobo takhe, sebabonkhe babeli-12.
Yema-21 yadla Hothiri nemadvodzana akhe kanye netihlobo takhe, sebabonkhe babeli-12.
Yema-22 yadla Gidalti nemadvodzana akhe kanye netihlobo takhe, sebabonkhe babeli-12.
Yema-23 yadla Mahaziyoti nemadvodzana akhe kanye netihlobo takhe, sebabonkhe babeli-12.
Yema-24 yadla Romamti Ezeri nemadvodzana akhe kanye netihlobo takhe, sebabonkhe babeli-12.
Leti-ke ticheme temaLevi letatibomahlalesangweni: Belusendvo lwaKhora bekunguMeshelemiya, umsa waKhore, lomunye wemadvodzana a-Asafa.
Meshelemiya abenemadvodzana: Zakhariya abelitubulo, wesibili kunguJediyayeli, wesitsatfu kunguZebadiya, wesine kunguJatniyeli,
wesihlanu kungu-Elamu, wesitfupha kunguJehohanani, wesikhombisa kungu-Eliyoyenayi.
Na-Obedi Edomu abenemadvodzana: Shemaya abelitubulo, wesibili kunguJehozabadi, wesitsatfu kunguJowa, wesine kunguSakhari, wesihlanu kunguNethaneli,
wesitfupha kungu-Amiyeli, wesikhombisa kungu-Isakhari, wesiphohlongo kunguPhewulethayi. Ngobe Nkulunkulu abembusisile Obedi Edomu.
Indvodzana yakhe Shemaya nayo yayinemadvodzana labebaholi emndenini weyise, ngobe bekungemadvodza labenelikhono.
Emadvodzana aShemaya bekubo-Othni, naRefayeli, na-Obedi, na-Elzabadi, tihlobo takhe bo-Elihu naSemakhiya nato tatinelikhono.
Tonkhe leti bekutitukulwane ta-Obedi Edomu; bona nemadvodzana abo kanye netihlobo tabo babengemadvodza labenelikhono nemandla ekwenteni umsebenti, batukulu ba-Obedi Edomu babengema-62 sebabonkhe.
Meshelemiya abenemadvodzana kanye netihlobo letatinelikhono, babeli-18 sebabonkhe.
Hosa labengumMerari abenemadvodzana: Inhloko yabo bekunguShimri, noko abengesilo litubulo, kodvwa uyise wambeka kutsi abe wekucala.
Wesibili bekunguHilkiya, wesitsatfu kunguThabaliya, wesine kunguZakhariya. Emadvodzana kanye netihlobo taHosa babeli-13 sebabonkhe.
Labomahlalesangweni behlukaniswa baba ticheme ngeticheme, ngebaholi bemindeni yabo, base babelwa imisebenti letsite ekukhonteni Simakadze ethempelini, njengobe bekwenta lamanye emaLevi.
Lelo nalelo sango lentelwa inkatho, kuze kutewutfolakala kutsi ngumuphi umndeni lekufanele uligadze, labancane nalabadzala ngalokufanako.
Inkatho yelisango langaseningizimu yadla Obedi Edomu, kwatsi inkatho yengungumakamelo yadla emadvodzana akhe.
Inkatho yelisango langasenshonalanga kanye nelisango laShalekethi lelisemgwacweni longenhla yadla Shuphimi naHosa.
BekunemaLevi lasitfupha ngelilanga ngasemphumalanga, lamane ngelilanga angasenyakatfo, lamane ngelilanga angaseningizimu, bese kutsi lamabili ngasikhatsi sinye agadze ingungumakamelo.
Esibuyeni lesingasenshonalanga bebabane emgwacweni, bese baba babili esibuyeni ngekhatsi.
Leti-ke bekuticheme tabomahlalesangweni lababetitukulwane takaKhora naMerari.
Titukulwane taLadani, letatingetakaGeshoni ngaLadani, futsi titinhloko temindeni yakaLadani, umGeshoni, bekuboJehiyeli
nemadvodzana aJehiyeli, naZethami kanye naJoweli, umnakabo. Bona babeciza ingcebo yelithempeli laSimakadze.
Imisebenti yanikwa netitukulwane ta-Amramu, netaJisihari, netaHebroni, neta-Uziyeli:
Tihlobo takhe nga-Eliyezeri bekunguRehabiya, umsa wakhe, naJeshaya, umsa wakhe, naJoramu, umsa wakhe, naZikhri, umsa wakhe, kanye naShelomithi, umsa wakhe.
Shelomithi netihlobo takhe babeciza yonkhe ingcebo yetintfo letatinikelwe kuNkulunkulu yinkhosi Davide nebaholi bemindeni, netindvuna tetinkhulungwane netemakhulu kanye naletinye tindvuna temabutfo.
Lenye imphango leyayidliwe emphini bayinikelela kutsi kulungiswe ngayo kabusha lithempeli laSimakadze.

Konkhe lokwakunikelwe nguSamuweli, umboniswa, kanye naSawula, umsa waKhishi, na-Abneri, umsa waNeri, naJowabe, umsa waSeruya, kanye nato tonkhe tintfo letatinikelwe tatisesandleni saShelomithi netihlobo takhe.
Etitukulwaneni temaJisihari: Khenaniya nemadvodzana akhe banikwa imisebenti ngephandle kwelithempeli kutsi babhale imilandvo babuye babe behluleli besive sema-Israyeli.

Etitukulwaneni tebakaHebroni: boHashabiya kanye netihlobo takhe letatingemadvodza layi-1 700 lanelikhono, bona babekwa kutsi baphatse ema-Israyeli langasenshonalanga neJordane etinkonzweni taSimakadze nasemsebentini wenkhosi.

KubakaHebroni, Jeriya abengumholi ngekwemlandvo weluhlanga lwekutalana kwemindeni yabo. Ngemnyaka wema-40 wekubusa kwaDavide kwaba neluphenyo emilandvweni, kwaze kwatfolakala bakaHebroni lababengemadvodza lanelikhono eJazeri yaseGileyadi.

Jeriya abenetihlobo letatiti-2 700, lekwakungemadvodza labenelikhono abaholi bemindeni, Davide wababeka kutsi baphatse bakaRubeni nebakaGadi kanye nencenye yesive sakaManase, kuyo yonkhe intfo nome indzaba yaNkulunkulu nome nguloko lokwakucondzene nenkhosi.

Lolu-ke luhla lwemabito ema-Israyeli: Baholi bemindeni, netindvuna tetinkhulungwane, netemakhulu, naletinye tiphatsimandla letatibambisene nenkhosi kuko konkhe lokuphatselene nemabutfo labesemsebentini inyanga ngenyanga, wonkhe umnyaka. Lilinye libutfo lalinemadvodza labeti-24 000.
Yena-ke abesitukulwane saPheresi, asikhulu sato tonkhe tindvuna temabutfo ngenyanga yekucala.
Loyo-ke nguloBhenaya labelichawe kulabangema-30, angumholi wabo. Umsa wakhe Amizabadi abengumholi welibutfo leyise.
Shamhuthi, umJizrahi, abeyindvuna yelibutfo lesihlanu ngenyanga yesihlanu. Babengemadvodza lati-24 000 kulelibutfo lakakhe.
Ira, umsa wa-Ikheshi waseThekhowa, abeyindvuna yelibutfo lesitfupha ngenyanga yesitfupha. Babengemadvodza lati-24 000 kulelibutfo lakakhe.
Helesi, wasePheloni, wesive saka-Efrayimu, abeyindvuna yelibutfo lesikhombisa ngenyanga yesikhombisa. Babengemadvodza lati-24 000 kulelibutfo lakakhe.
Abiyezeri, wase-Anathothi, wesive sakaBhenjamini, abeyindvuna yelibutfo lemfica ngenyanga yemfica. Babengemadvodza lati-24 000 kulelibutfo lakakhe.
Maharayi, waseNethofa, wesive sakaZera, abeyindvuna yelibutfo lelishumi ngenyanga yelishumi. Babengemadvodza lati-24 000 kulelibutfo lakakhe.
Bhenaya, wasePhirathoni, wesive saka-Efrayimu, abeyindvuna yelibutfo leli-11 ngenyanga yeli-11. Babengemadvodza lati-24 000 kulelibutfo lakakhe.
Heldayi, waseNethofa, wesive saka-Othniyeli, abeyindvuna yelibutfo leli-12 ngenyanga yeli-12. Babengemadvodza lati-24 000 kulelibutfo lakakhe.
