Kulo lonkhe live bekute besifazane lababebahle kwendlula emadvodzakati aJobe; uyise wawabela lifa kanye nebafowabo.
Wena ubeke ludvumo lwebukhosi bakho ngetulu kwemazulu.
kuze ngilandze ngalo lonkhe ludvumo lwakho
kuncusa kwami, nekukhala kwami, nekuthandaza kwami
ngobe nguye lokhipha tinyawo tami elugibeni.
sonkhe sikhatsi bakha emacebo ebubi ngami.
Kute nome munye nje lofana nawe!
ngobe umhlaba nako konkhe lokukuwo kwami.
ngaba soni kusukela make atsatsa sisu.
kuze kutsi ematsambo ami lephukile atfokote.
Sive sakho sakha emakhaya aso kulo,
sengize ngefika la kushona khona kakhulu,
ngobe nguwe lidvwala lami nesiphephelo sami.
Ngobe titsa tami tikhuluma kabi ngami,
Noko-ke mine ngihlala nawe onkhe emalanga,
walihlenga kutsi libe sive lesilifa lakho.
lapho bakhonta khona tithico tabo letibatiwe,
kuze kutsi sive sakho sijabule kuwe?
kuze live letfu libe neludvumo lwakhe,
Lesive sijabula njalo nje egameni lakho,
Sandla sami siyawuma naye njalo simcinise,
kutsi ifana nemoya lotsi shwi wendlule.
Ngobe Simakadze angeke asilahle sive sakhe,
lilanga liyasati sikhatsi salo sekuya kunina.
wasenta sandza saba nemandla kunetitsa taso.
kute nome munye lowawa emindenini yabo.
etikwa-Edomu ngulapho ngijika khona sicatfulo sami,
ngobe ulivile livi lami nekuncusa kwami.
ngobe titsa tami tiwakhohliwe emavi akho.
wenta sifungo langeke ajike kuso, watsi:
nemasotja lahlomile lahamba ngetinyawo angeke amjabulise.
kute sive lesake sati timiso takhe.
Letaga tenta umuntfu akwati kuhlakanipha nekwekhuteka, acondzisise inchazelo yemavi lajulile.
Tifundzisana kuphila ngebucotfo bengcondvo, nekwenta kulunga, nekungakhetsi.
Tenta losengakaliboni live abe nekuhlakanipha, tifundzise labasha kuba nelwati nekuzitsa.
Labahlakaniphile batsi bangatilalela kwengeteke lwati lwabo; nalabanengcondvo batsi bangatifundza batente, batfole bungcweti,
khona batekuvisisa kahle letaga, nemifanekiso, nenchazelo yaletimphicabadzala.
ngobe iyakuba ngumhlobiso lonjengemchele wenhloko yakho, nanjengeligcebesha lentsamo yakho.
natitsi kuwe: “Kota, sambe sifune lesingahle simbulale; asihambe silalele labangenacala, sibajabhalate ngaphandle kwesono.
Asibagwinye baphila baye endzaweni yalabafile, njengalabo labangena baye phansi ethuneni.
Sitawutfola tonkhe tintfo letiligugu, sigcwalise tindlu tetfu ngetimphahla lesitichwagile.
Kota, utihlanganise natsi; khona sitewuba nesikhwama sinye nawe.”
Ndvodzana yami, ungahambisani nebantfu labanje; ungalubeki lunyawo lwakho etindleleni tabo,
ngobe tinyawo tabo tigijimela lokubi, basheshe bacitse ingati.
Akusiti lutfo kuvula sochaka, kantsi lenyoni lofuna kuyibamba iyakubuka.
Kodvwa bantfu labanjalo batetsiyela sifu sekutibulala bona; babhacele kutisontsa bona, batibulale.
Kuhlakanipha kumemeta etitaladini; kumemeta kakhulu nasetimakethe.
“Nine leningati lutfo! Niyawuhlala ningati lutfo kuze kube ngunini? Baphukuti bayawuphukuta kuze kube ngunini? Tona tilima titawutondzana nelwati kuze kube ngunini?
Ase nilalele kunitsetsisa kwami; imicabango yami
Njengobe nginimemetile nala kulalela, ngelula sandla sami nala kusibamba,
nangete nasitsatsa seluleko sami, nala nekutsi nginekhute,
nami-ke ngitanihleka nase nehlelwe tinhlupheko. Ngitanicoloshela nase nehlelwe sigemegeme,
nase nifikelwe kutfutfumela lokunjengesiphepho, nesigemegeme lesinjengesihhushuhhushu, nekudzangala kanye nekudzabuka.
Ngobe batondza lwati, abazange bakhetse kwesaba Simakadze.
Abazange basitsatse seluleko sami, nekubacondzisa kwami bakwedzelela.
Ngako-ke batawutfola titselo tetindlela tabo, bacunjiswe ngemacebo abo.
Labate lwati babulawa kweduka kwabo; tilima tibulawa kweneliseka kwato.
Kodvwa lowo lolalela mine utawuhlala aphephile, akhululeke, angesabi lutfo lolubi.”
Ndvodzana yami, yemukela loku lengikufundzisa kona, uyigcine imiyalo yami.
Lalela ubambisise kuhlakanipha; inhlitiyo yakho ibe nekucondza.
Nangabe ukwenta konkhe loko, utawucondzisisa kutsi kuyini kwesaba Simakadze, utfole nekutsi kuyini kwati Nkulunkulu.
NguSimakadze lowephana ngekuhlakanipha; emlonyeni wakhe kuphuma lwati nekucondza.
Labacotfo ubabekele kuhlakanipha; ulihawu kulabo labatiphatsa ngekwetsembeka.
Ugadza tindlela talabo labaphatsa labanye ngekungakhetsi, alindze indlela yalabangcwele bakhe.
Ngako, wena utakucondza kulunga, nebumsulwa, nebucotfo, ukwati nalokufanele.
Kuhlakanipha kutawungena enhlitiyweni yakho, nelwati lube yinjabulo emphefumulweni wakho.
labalahla tindlela tekulunga bahambe etindleleni tebumnyama,
labajabula ngekwenta lokubi, bajatjuliswe kwandza kwemacebo,
labatindlela tabo tigwegwile, nalabahamba ngetindlela tekweduka.
lowala lowo lashade naye ebusheni bakhe, wakhohlwa sivumelwane sakhe kuNkulunkulu wakhe.
Indlu yakhe ibishela ekufeni, netindlela takhe tigcina endzaweni yalabafile.
Kuye akuyi lolubuyako; lowo loke wangena kuye akaphindzi futsi abuyele etindleleni tekuphila.
Ngako kufanele utsatse sibonelo kubantfu labalungile; uhambe etindleleni tekulunga.
Bantfu labacotfo labatawukwakha kulelive; ngulabetsembekile bodvwa labayawuhlala kulo.
Kodvwa lababi bayawususwa eveni, nalabanemacebo bayawusishulwa kulo.
ngobe ngiyo letakunika emalanga neminyaka leminyenti ekuphileni kwakho; ikunike nekuchuma.
Ungehlukani nenhlonipho nekwetsembeka; kukhungele entsanyeni yakho, ukubhale etibhelekeceni tenhlitiyo yakho.
Loko kuyawukwenta ube neludvumo loluhle utsandvwe nguNkulunkulu nebantfu.
Matise kuko konkhe lokwentako, yena uyakucondzisa tindlela takho.
Ungatenti sihlakaniphi, yesaba Simakadze, ukuyekele lokubi.
Ngiko loko lokuyakwelapha umtimba wakho, kuphilise nematsambo akho.
Dvumisa Simakadze ngalokuhle lonako nangetitselo tekucala tako konkhe lokulimile,
netincolobane takho tiyakugcwaliswa ngenala, imiphandza yakho iphuphume liwayini.
Ngobe Simakadze uyamtsetsisa amcondzise lowo lamtsandzako, njengobe neyise enta endvodzaneni yakhe lajabula ngayo.
Ubusisiwe umuntfu lotfola kuhlakanipha nalowo lowemukela kucondza.
Ngobe kuhlakanipha kwendlula isiliva ngekucebisa umuntfu, nenzuzo yako yinkhulu kuneyegolide.
Kuhlakanipha kuligugu kakhulu, kwengca ematje laligugu; kute lokufisako longakulinganisa nako.
Imphilo lendze isesandleni sako sekudla, kantsi esandleni sako sesancele kunengcebo neludvumo.
Tindlela tako kutindlela tekujabula, netindlela tako tonkhe ngetekuthula.
Kusihlahla sekuphila kulabakuphutfumako; labo labakubamba bakunkonkoshele ngulabo labajabulako.
Ndvodzana yami, bambelela ekuhlakanipheni nasekuzitseni; ungakuvumeli kusuke kuwe.
Kuyawuba kuphila emphefumulweni wakho, kube ngumhlobiso entsanyeni yakho.
Endleleni yakho uyakuhamba ngekuphepha, nelunyawo lwakho lungakhubeki.
Nawucambalala phansi, ungeke wesabe; nawulala, uyawutfola butfongo lobumnandzi.
Ungesabi kutunywa yinhlekelele yengoti nekuhlaselwa bantfu lababi;
ngobe Simakadze uyawuba siphephelo sakho; uyawulondvolota lunyawo lwakho lungabanjwa lugibe.
Yenta lokuhle kulabo labakudzingako, nangabe unawo emandla ekukwenta.
Ungasho kumakhelwane wakho utsi: “Hamba, ngitawubuye ngikunike kusasa,” kantsi unako nalamuhla.
Ungatimiseli ngekwenta lokubi kumakhelwane wakho lohlala ngekukwetsemba.
Ungabi namhawu ngemuntfu losidlova; ungacali ukhetse ngisho nome yinye yetindlela takhe.
Ngobe umuntfu losidlova usinengiso kuSimakadze, kodvwa labalungile balitsemba lakhe.
Sicalekiso saSimakadze sisemndenini walomubi, kodvwa indlu yalolungile uyayibusisa.
Uyabahleka labo labeyisako, kodvwa unemusa kulabatfobekile.
Ngininika imiyalo lemihle, ningacali niyilahle nje imfundziso yami.
babe abengifundzisa atsi: “Shangatsi inhlitiyo yakho ingawabambisisa emavi ami, nemiyalo yami, khona utawuphila.
Zuza kuhlakanipha uzuze nekuvisisa. Ungakhohlwa, futsi ungesuki emavini emlomo wami.
Kucala kwekuhlakanipha, naku: Zuza kuhlakanipha, uzuze nekucondza, nome kukubitani.
Kutuse, kona-ke kuyawukuphakamisa, kugone, kona-ke kuyawukwatisa.
Kuyawukwetfwesa ludvumo enhloko, kukwetfwese umchele lomuhle.”
Ndvodzana yami, lalela wemukele emavi ami, khona iminyaka yekuphila kwakho itakwandza.
Ngikufundzise indlela yekuhlakanipha, ngakuholela etindleleni tekulunga.
Nawuhambako, sinyatselo sakho singeke siphatamiseke; nawugijimako, ungeke ukhubeke.
Bambelela emyalweni ungawuyekeli, uwulondvolote, ngobe uyimphilo yakho.
Ungalubeki lunyawo lwakho endleleni yalababi, futsi ungahambi endleleni yebantfu lababi.
Bantfu lababi abalali bangakenti lokubi, bayacwasha bangalali nabangakoni muntfu.
Bubi bukudla kwabo, budlova businatfo sabo.
Kodvwa indlela yalabalungile ifanana nekukhanya kwentsatsakusa, lokuya ngekuya kuze kube ngusemini.
Indlela yalababi ifanana nebumnyama, lababi abati nalapho bakhubeka bawe khona.
Ndvodzana yami, bambisisa emavi ami, ubeke indlebe yakho emavini ami.
Ungawavumeli kutsi alahleke emehlweni akho, walondvolote enhlitiyweni yakho.
Lamavi akuphila kulowo lowatfolako, aphilise wonkhe umtimba wakhe.
Ngetulu kwako konkhe londvolota inhlitiyo yakho ngekunakekela konkhe, ngobe kuyo kugeleta tiyalu tekuphila.
Yisuse kuwe inkhulumo lesigwegwe, inkhulumo lekhohlisako yikhweshisele khashane nawe.
Emehlo akho akacondze ngco embili, ubukisise embikwakho.
Caphelisisa indlela yetinyawo takho, tonkhe-ke tindlela takho tiyawuba nekuciniseka.
Ungajikeli ngesekudla nome ngesancele, lunyawo lwakho ungalubeki ebubini.
Ndvodzana yami, lalelisisa kuhlakanipha kwami, ubeke indlebe ekucondzeni kwami.
Khona-ke uyawukwati kukhetsa lokufanele, netindzebe temlomo wakho tilulondvolote lwati.
Tindzebe temfati loyingwadla tivuta luju, inkhulumo yakhe ishelela kwengca emafutsa;
kodvwa ekugcineni ubaba njengenyongo, akhaliphe njengenkemba lekhalipha nhlangotsi totimbili.
Tinyawo takhe tehlela ekufeni, tinyatselo takhe tihamba ngendlela leya ethuneni.
Akahambi ngendlela yekuphila, tindlela takhe tiyazula, akati nekutsi kwentekani.
Ndvodzana yami, ngilalele, ungesuki emavini emlomo wami.
Mkhweshele ube khashane naye, ungasondzeli ngisho nasemnyango wendlu yakhe,
funa ludvumo lwakho lutsatfwe ngulabanye bantfu, nekuphila kwakho kuphelele etandleni talabangenasihe.
Nebachamuki futsi bangahle batesutsise ngemcebo wakho netitfukutfuku takho tiye endlini yewetive.
Ekupheleni kwemphilo yakho uyawububula ecansini, sekudleka tinyama nemtimba wakho.
Uyawudzimate ukhale utsi: “Empeleni nje, mine ngangikutondzelani kuyalwa nekufundziswa? Ingabe ngangikutondzelani kutsetsiswa?
Angizange ngibalalele bafundzisi bami lababengifundzisa; nome-ke kube mane ngalalela bacondzisi bami.
Ngatsi ngetfuka ngabe sengisekhatsi elubishini lwelihlazo ebandleni nakubantfu.”
Natsa emanti esicobho sakho, emanti lageleta aphuma esiyalwini sakho.
Kufanele yini imitfombo yakho isakateke igcwale yonkhe indzawo, lemifudlana yemanti imoseke ngekusakateka kuto tonkhe tindlela?
Emanti esicobho sakho akabe ngewakho wedvwa, angabi ngemanti etengcamgwaco.
Shangatsi ungabusiseka umtfombo wakho, ube nenjabulo ngemfati webusha bakho.
Muhle, uyabukeka njengenhlangu, utsandzeka njengemphala; shangatsi emabele akhe angakwenelisa ngaso sonkhe sikhatsi, shangatsi nelutsandvo lwakhe lungakuhaca.
Ndvodzana yami, ungavumi kutfunjwa lutsandvo lwemfati loyingwadla. Utsandzelani kugaca libilo lakho kumfati walenye indvodza?
Tindlela temuntfu tisemehlweni aSimakadze, tonkhe tindlela umuntfu lahamba ngato uyatigadzisisa.
Imisebenti yemuntfu lomubi ilugibe, ubanjwa elugibeni lwesono sakhe.
Uyakufa ngenca yekungatibambi kwakhe; bulima bakhe lobukhulu buyamedukisa.
nangabe ungene elugibeni lwesetsembiso sakho, wabanjwa ngemavi akho,
naku-ke, ndvodzana yami, lofanele kukwenta khona utewukhululeka: Hamba uye kulomuntfu lokubambile umncenge aze akuvele.
Tisindzise njengenyamatane ibalekela umtingeli, nanjengenyoni lephunyule esandleni semtingeli.
Lite tintfutfwane tite sikhulu nome indvuna nome umbusi,
kodvwa kudla kwato tikubutsa ehlobo tikulondvolote ngesikhatsi sekuvuna.
Wena vila-ndzini, uyawulala embhedzeni kudzimate kube ngunini?
Ukhuluma utsi: “Kulalalala kancane, kwetelatela kancane, kugocagoca tandla kancane, kuphumula kancane.”
Kodvwa buphuya butawufika kuwe bukunyonyobele njengelisela, nekweswela kukuhlasele njengesihlupheki.
sifica liso lapha nalapha, sisusa luchuku ngekuhlokolota nangekunyatsela lowa nalowa.
Sonkhe sikhatsi sakha emachinga ebubi enhlitiyweni yaso, sisuse nelutfutfuva lwekulwa.
Ngenca yaloku siyakwehlelwa yingoti masinyane sipitjitwe ngaphandle kwesecwayiso, singaphindzi sisindze.
Tisitfupha tintfo letenyanywa nguSimakadze, empeleni letisikhombisa uphambene nato kakhulu:
Kucoboshele enhlitiyweni yakho, ukugace entsanyeni yakho.
Nawuhamba kuyawukucondzisa, nawulala kukugadze, nawuvukako kukweluleke.
Ngobe umyalo usibane, imfundziso ikukhanya, kucondziswa ngekutsetsiswa kuyindlela yekuphila.
Kuyawukuphephisa kumfati lomubi, nasemlonyeni lomnandzi wemfati walenye indvodza.
Ungacali kumkhanukela buhle bakhe enhlitiyweni yakho, nome-ke akutfumbe ngemashiya akhe.
Ngobe ingwadla ungayicasha ngemkhama wesinkhwa, kodvwa umgomo wemfati losiphingi kuhliphita nome kutfumba indvodza.
Ikhona yini indvodza lengetfwala emalahle lavutsako ngetimphahla tayo, tendlule tingashi?
Kungenteka yini ihambe etikwemalahle lavutsako, tinyawo tayo tingashi?
Kanjalo-ke, nendvodza lelala nemfati walenye indvodza, ingeke ikubalekele kujeziswa.
Bantfu abalibukeli phansi lisela lelebela kucosha indlala ngobe lilambile,
kodvwa nangabe libanjwa, kufanele likukhokhe sekuphindvwe kasikhombisa, tonkhe timphahla tendlu yakhe atetfule.
Lophingako weswela ingcondvo, nangabe aphinga nemfati, utibulala yena.
Uyakushaywa ahlaziswe njengobe kufanele; lihlazo lakhe lingeke lesulwe.
Ngobe sikhwele sivusa lulaka lwalendvodza yakhe lephingelwe, nase iphindzisela, ingeke ibe nesihawu.
Kute nenhlawulo leyawukwenta lendvodza lephingelwe ibuyisane naye, futsi kute kwekuncenga lengamnika kona nome ngabe kukhulu kanganani.
Ndvodzana yami, ubokhumbula emavi ami, ugcine imiyalo yami engcondvweni yakho.
Yenta letintfo lengikutjela tona, khona uyawuphila, netimfundziso tami tente tibe ligugu njengemehlo akho,
utembatse njengendandatho eminweni yakho, uticophe engcondvweni yakho.
Khuluma ekuhlakanipheni, utsi: “Wena ungudzadzewetfu,” nasekucondzeni ukhulume utsi: “Sihlobo sami.”
Ngaloko uyawuphepha kumfati losiphingi, umfati walenye indvodza nalonemavi latobotanako.
Ngalelinye lilanga ngime ngasefasitelweni lendlu yami, ngabuka phansi emgwacweni.
Ngabona sicunjana setinsizwa letatingenako kuhlakanipha, emkhatsini wato ngabona lenye leyayingenalwati.
Yayihamba esitaladini eceleni kwelikona, icondzene nendlu yalomfati yaze yayawungena khona.
Kwase kucundzeka emehlo entsambama, sekuhwalala, kusihlwa.
Masinyane lomfati wahlangabeta lensizwa, embatsise kwengwadla, agcwele bucili.
Ungulalunyawana kantsi uyatatisa, futsi akuvumi kutsi ake atihlalele ekhaya;
ngalelinye lilanga usesitaladini, mhlawumbe abesemakethe, ukhanga acotsele kuwo onkhe emakona.
Wayibamba lensizwa wayanga, wase ukhuluma nayo utsi:
“Nginekudla lebekungekwemnikelo wekubonga wekufeza nekugcwalisa tifungo tami.
Ngiko nje ngite lapha kutekuhlangabeta, ngitele kutewufuna wena, manje-ke sengikutfolile.
Umbhedze wami ngiwuhlobise ngendvwangu lenhle lenemibalabala, yekwakhiwa eGibhithe.
Ake sitijabulise bonkhe lobusuku, sitenelise ngekulalana;
ngobe phela indvodza yami ayikho ekhaya, itsetse luhambo loludze yaya khashane.
Ihambe nemali lenyenti, kutawuphela cishe emaviki lamabili ingekho.”
Ngako wavele wayimelela kutsi iphambukele kuye, wayihuha ngemavi akhe.
Wavele wayikha etulu, yamlandzela njengenkhabi itawuhlatjwa nanjengenyamatane ingena esihibeni,
nanjengenyoni icotfota iya esifini. Yayingati kutsi loko itakukhokhela ngemphilo yayo.
Ngako-ke madvodzana ami, ngilaleleni, nilalelisise loku lesengikushito.
Ningacali niphambukele kulomfati, ningayi lapho aya ngakhona,
ngobe sewubulele emadvodza lamanyenti; ungeke uwabale emadvodza lasawacedzile.
Kona kucondza akuliphakamisi yini liphimbo lako?
Lalelani kimi, ngobe ngitawukhuluma tintfo letibalulekile;
Kuhlakanipha kwakhe indlu yako, kwayisimisa ngetinsika letisikhombisa.
Kuhlabile, kwadidiyela liwayini lako, kwadeka litafula lako.
Kutfumele tincekukati tako kutsi tiphume tiye kuyawumemeta eticongweni telidolobha,
titsi: “Nine labate lwati, wotani lapha! Nine labate ingcondvo,
wotani nitewudla kudla kwami, ninatse neliwayini lengilihlanganisile.
Shiyani bulima benu, khona nitewuphila nihambe ngendlela yekucondza.”
Nawuyala umuntfu lohlakaniphile, utawusuka ahlakaniphe kakhulu; nawufundzisa umuntfu lolungile, yena usuka engete kulokufundza kwakhe.
Mine kuhlakanipha, ngitakwandzisa emalanga akho neminyaka yekuphila kwakho.
Nawuhlakaniphile, kusitakala wena; kodvwa nangabe usedzeleli, kutawuhlupheka wena.
Bulima bufanana nemfati lonemsindvo, longalati lihlazo nalongati lutfo,
lohlala emnyango wendlu yakhe embonisweni yelidolobha,
amemete emadvodza lendlulako atihambela ngemisebenti yawo, atsi:
“Wotani lapha, nine tilima.” Ukhuluma kubo bonkhe labate lwati atsi:
“Emanti ekwebiwa amnandzi, nekudla lokudlelwa emasitseleni kwehla esiphundvu.”
Indvodzana lehlakaniphile ijabulisa uyise, kodvwa indvodzana lelibele ikhuba unina.
Simakadze akavumi kutsi lolungile alambe; kodvwa lababi uyabavimba kutsi bakutfole loko labakufunako.
Umuntfu lohlakaniphile uyakwemukela kuyalwa; kodvwa lowo lokhulumela futsi uyawukhubeka, awe.
Umuntfu lowetsembekile uhamba aphephile; kodvwa lokhetsa tindlela letimagiligombo uyawugcina atfolakele.
Umuntfu lofihla inzondo yakhe unemanga, nalowo lowandzisa emanga usilima.
Kukhuluma lokunyenti kubanga kona, ngako umuntfu lohlakaniphile uyawabamba emavi akhe.
Emavi emuntfu lolungile afanana nesiliva lecengiwe, umcondvo webantfu lababi awunamsebenti.
Emavi emuntfu lolungile ondla bantfu labanyenti; kodvwa tilima tifa ngenca yekweswela lwati.
Lokwesatjwa ngumuntfu lomubi kuyamehlela; kodvwa lolungile uphiwa loko lakufunako.
Njengeliwayini lelimunyu nalingena ematinyweni, nanjengentfutfu emehlweni, linjalo livila kulabalitfumako.
Indlela yaSimakadze iyinqaba yalabalungile; kodvwa ikubhubha kulababi.
Umlomo wemuntfu lolungile ukhuluma lokufanele; kodvwa emavi esikhohlakali ayakhubana.
Kwetsembeka kungumcondzisi walabacotfo; kodvwa bucili buyabacitsa labangaketsembeki.
Indlela yebantfu labate kusoleka yentiwa ibe ngulebekile ngekutiphatsa kahle kwabo; kodvwa kuwa kwemuntfu lokhohlakele kusungulwa nguye matfupha.
Umuntfu longesabi Nkulunkulu ubulala makhelwane wakhe ngekukhuluma kwakhe; kodvwa bantfu labalungile bavikelwa lwati lwabo.
Nangabe bantfu labacotfo babusisa lidolobha, liba neludvumo; kodvwa nakukhuluma lomubi, liyafa.
Umuntfu longenangcondvo umbukela phansi makhelwane wakhe; kodvwa umuntfu lohlakaniphile uyalubamba lulwimi lwakhe.
Umuntfu lomsikati lonemusa utfola ludvumo ngako, kantsi bantfu labanelutfutfuva batfola ludvumo ngemcebo wabo.
Umuntfu lonemusa kulabanye utisita yena; kodvwa umuntfu lote sihe utilimata yena.
Lotimisele kwenta lokulungile uyawuphila; kodvwa loneluphike lwekwenta lokubi uyakufa.
Buhle balomsikati lote similo bufanana nendandatho yegolide lesekhaleni lehhontji.
Umuntfu lowephanako, lanako kuyandza; lona lonatsisa lowomile naye uyawunatsiswa.
Bantfu bayamcalekisa umuntfu logodla kudla; kodvwa bamfisele lokuhle lowo lotsengisa ngako.
Umuntfu lofunana nalokuhle ufunana nemvuzo; kodvwa lofunana nebubi uhlangabetana nabo.
Umuntfu loletsa kuhlupheka ekhaya lakhe ulahlekelwa lifa lakhe. Silima siyakuhlala sisisebenti sesihlakaniphi.
Umuntfu lolungile uyemukeleka kuSimakadze; kodvwa lohlosa lokubi uyamlahla.
Umuntfu akasimamiswa kwenta bubi; kodvwa lolungile angeke ashukunyiswe.
Emasu alabalungile mahle; kodvwa teluleko talababi tiyedukisana.
Emavi ebantfu lababi acotsele kucitsa ingati; kodvwa emavi alabalungile ayabakhulula bantfu.
Umuntfu udvunyiswa ngekunakekela kwakhe; kodvwa lonenhlitiyo lembi ubukeleka phansi.

Umuntfu lolungile uyatinakekela tifuyo takhe; kodvwa lomubi utiphatsa dlephu.

Umuntfu lolungile ungumholi kumakhelwane wakhe; kodvwa lababi bayedukisana.
Umuntfu lolivila uyalamba; kodvwa lokhutsele ugcina aphumelele.
Kutiphatsa kahle kwalolungile kuyindlela leya ekuphileni; kodvwa kutiphatsa kabi kuyindlela leya ekufeni.
Umuntfu lolungile uyawatondza emanga; kodvwa lomubi uletsa lihlazo nemahloni.
Umuntfu lomunye utenta shangatsi ucebile, kantsi akanalutfo; lomunye atente shangatsi uphuyile, kantsi unjingile.
Bunjinga bemuntfu bungaba yinhlawulo yekuphila kwakhe; kodvwa luphuya alusongelwa lutfo.
Ligcabho lichamusela incabano; kodvwa kuhlakanipha kutfolakala kulabo labemukela teluleko.
Sifiso lesifezekile siluju emphefumulweni. Lababi abakufuni kwehlukana nebubi.
Lishwa licoshana nesoni; kodvwa imphumelelo ingumvuzo walolungile.
Umhlaba walomphofu ungaba nesivuno lesinyenti; kodvwa bantfu lababi bayamvimbela kutsi awulime.
Umuntfu lohamba ngebucotfo wesaba Simakadze; kodvwa lotindlela takhe tigwegwile wedzelela Simakadze.
Ligcabho lesilima livakala enkhulumeni yaso; kodvwa emavi ebantfu labahlakaniphile ayabaphephisa.
Umuntfu lote tinkhabi uhlala angenalutfo encolobaneni yakhe; kodvwa utawutfola sivuno lesihle nanetinkhabi.
Sedzeleli sifuna kuhlakanipha singakutfoli; kodvwa lwati lutfolakala kalula kumuntfu lonekucondza.
Sikhweshele silima, ngobe kute lwati lotalutfola kuso.
Inhlitiyo yemuntfu buhlungu bayo itetfwalela yona yodvwa, futsi kute longase abe nesabelo ekujabuleni kwayo.
Umuntfu angahleka nome inhlitiyo yakhe ibuhlungu; emvakweluhleko inhlitiyo isala solomane ilusizi.
Umuntfu lojikajikako utfola loko lokufanelwe similo sakhe; nemuntfu lolungile naye wemukela umvuzo wemisebenti yakhe.
Umuntfu lonengcondvo lencane wetsemba yonkhe intfo; kodvwa lohlakaniphile indlela yakhe uyayibukisisa angakacali kuhamba ngayo.
Umuntfu lohlakaniphile unesineke akubalekele lokubi; kodvwa silima siyahlaphata, sitetsembe kakhulu.
Umuntfu lonenhlitiyo lencane wenta tintfo letibulima; kodvwa lonesineke uyabeketela.
Bantfu labanengcondvo lencane bazuza bulima; kodvwa labahlakaniphile banemchele welwati.
Umvuzo wesihlakaniphi kuhlakanipha kwaso; kodvwa bulima ngumchele wetilima.
Fakazi lokhuluma liciniso usindzisa kuphila kwebantfu; kodvwa fakazi locala emanga utsengisa bantfu.
Kwesaba Simakadze umuntfu kumenta abe nenqaba yekuphephela; lenqaba iba siphephelo sebantfwabakhe.
Bukhosi benkhosi busime ebunyentini bebantfu labayilalelako; ngaphandle kwebantfu ayikho ikhona.
Umuntfu lowephuta kutfukutsela unekucondza lokukhulu; kodvwa umuntfu lonenhlitiyo lencane utibonakalisa kutsi usilima.
Umuntfu lomubi ucitfwa kutiphatsa kabi kwakhe; kodvwa lolungile uyasindza ngekuhlonipheka kwakhe.
Inhlitiyo yemuntfu lonekucondza ilikhaya lenhlakanipho; kodvwa ayatiwa enhlitiyweni yetilima.

Emavi ekubuyisana angumutsi wekuphila; kodvwa emavi elulaka ephula umphefumulo.

Umuntfu lowedukako ubuyiswa kamatima; kodvwa lowala kucondziswa uyawukufa.

Umuntfu lohlakaniphile uhamba ngendlela yekuphila lecondze etulu, khona ateyigwema indlela yekufa leya phansi emangcwabeni.

Umuntfu lolungile ucabanga kucala angakaphendvuli; kodvwa bantfu lababi batfulula bubi ngemilomo yabo.

Umuntfu lolalelako nakekhutwako uyawuphila, uyawutivela asekhaya nasasemkhatsini webantfu labahlakaniphile.

Njengancedze londiza angahlali, nenkonjane lendiza ingahlali, sinjalo sicalekiso; asimehleli umuntfu longakasifaneli.
Ungasiphendvuli silima ngebulima baso; nawenta njalo, nawe utawuba silima njengaso.
Phendvula silima njengalokufanele bulima baso, khona sitawubona kutsi asikahlakaniphi njengobe siticabanga.
Emavi lahlakaniphile lakhulunywe silima akanamsebenti, afanana nemilente yesishosha.
Njengekubophela litje esidubulelweni, kunjalo kudvumisa silima.
Njengesidzakwa nasikhipha linyeva esandleni, anjalo emavi lahlakaniphile nasemlonyeni wesilima.
Umuntfu locasha silima nome ngubani nje lowendlulako, ufanana nemuntfu lodubula nome ngukuphi nje ngebutjoki alimate konkhe.
Njengesivalo sijikajika sibanjwe ngemahhuka, kanjalo nelivila lilala lijilajila embhedzeni walo.
Livila liyaye licabange kutsi lihlakaniphe kakhulu kwendlula emadvodza lasikhombisa laphendvula ngekuhlakanipha.
Umuntfu longena ekucabaneni kwalabanye ufanana nemuntfu lobamba inja lengumkhenkhetse ngemadlebe.
uyingoti kanjalo umuntfu loyenga makhelwane abese utsi: “Cha, mine bengidlala.”
Njengeludziwo loluhucwe ngesiliva, anjalo emavi ekuyengana laphuma emlonyeni lonenhlitiyo lembi.
Umuntfu lotentisako ukhuluma kamnandzi, kantsi enhlitiyweni yakhe ufihle kuyengana.
Nome inkhulumo yakhe ingaba mnandzi kanjani, ungakholwa; ngobe ngekhatsi inhlitiyo yakhe igcwele bucili.
Inzondo yakhe angayimbonya ngemavi ekutentisa, kodvwa bubi bakhe buyawubasebaleni ngalelinye lilanga.
Umuntfu localemanga uyabatondza labo labacalela emanga, nelulwimi lolumphacambili luletsa kufa.
Kuncono uvele umuntfu umtsetsise kukhanye kunekumyekela ungamtsetsisi ngesizatfu sekutsi uyamtsandza.
Umngani usuke atimisele lokuhle ngawe, nome akulimatile; kodvwa ubocaphela ingoti, nangabe sitsa sakho sikwanga kanyenti.
Nawesutsi, ngisho nekudla lokumnandzi uyakuchwensa; kodvwa nawulambile, ngisho nekudla lokubi kuba mnandzi.
Umuntfu loshiya likhaya lakhe ufanana nenyoni lese ilahle sidleke sayo.
Emakha nemafutsa lanuka kamnandzi ajabulisa inhlitiyo; kodvwa bungani sibili buyawuphakamisa umphefumulo.
Nangabe umuntfu avusela makhelwane wakhe ngemsindvo ekuseni, kuyawutsatfwa ngekutsi uyacalekiswa.
Kwetama kumthulisa kufanana nekwetama kuvimba umoya nome kwetfwala emafutsa lancibilikile ngesandla.
Njengensimbi lelola lenye insimbi, kanjalo nebantfu bayahlakaniphisana.
Umuntfu lohlakulela umkhiwa uyakudla titselo tawo, nalowo lophetse kahle umcashi wakhe uyakwemukela ludvumo.
Nawutibuka emantini, ubona lingephandle lakho lelibuso bakho; nawutibuka enhlitiyweni, ubona lingekhatsi lakho lelinguwe sibili.
Nome silima ungasigaya etjeni lekusila sibe yimphuphu nome inhlama, kodvwa bulima baso ungeke ubukhiphe kuso.
Nakekela imihlambi yetimvu netinkhomo takho, uyeluse kahle,
ngobe ingcebo ayihlali siphelane, iyaphunyula; ngisho nekubusa kwemakhosi akuhlali kukhona siphelane.
Nakusikwe tjani, kwase kuhluma lobusha, lemihlambi ingadla.
Timvu tiyawukungenisela timphahla tekwembatsa, timbuti tikungenisele imali yekutsenga emasimi.
Uyawuba nelubisi lwetimbuti lolunyenti lwekutsi utondle wena nebantfwabakho kanye netisebenti takho.
Umholi lomubi lophuyile acindzetele labamphofu ufanana nesikhukhula selitulu leligcoba livungule.
Labo labephula umtsetfo ngemabomu badvumisa lababi; kodvwa labo labahlonipha umtsetfo baphambana nebantfu lababi.
Bantfu lababi abacondzi kahle lokulungile kutsi kuyini; kodvwa labo labakhonta Simakadze bakucondzisisa kahle konkhe.
Kuncono kuba mphofu kodvwa ube wetsembekile, kunekutsi ucebe ube ungaketsembeki.
Indvodzana lelalela umtsetfo ihlakaniphile; kodvwa lengumngani wetiyingayinga ihlazisa uyise.
Sicebi singacabanga kutsi sihlakaniphile; kodvwa luphuya loluhlakaniphile lwati kancono kutsi liciniso liyini.
Njengelibhubesi lelibhodlako nelibhele lelihhongako, unjalo umbusi lomubi lobusa bantfu labeswele.
Lifelela litimisela ngekutsi licebe; alati kutsi linyonyobelwa buphuya.
Umuntfu loligovu ususa lutfutfuva; kodvwa lowo lowetsemba Simakadze uyawuchuma.
Umuntfu lolutsa makhelwane wakhe ambonge ngelite, utetsiya yena.
Umuntfu lolungile unakekela emalungelo alabamphofu; kodvwa lomubi akanandzaba naloko.
Babulali bayamtondza umuntfu lowetsembekile; kodvwa labalungile betama kuphephisa kuphila kwakhe.
Nangabe umbusi anaka labakhuluma emanga, tonkhe tindvuna takhe tiba nemanga.
Condzisa indvodzana yakho, khona itakunika kuthula kwemphefumulo. Ingeke ikuhlazise.
Sisebenti ungeke usicondzise nawutawulibala kukhuluma ngemlomo; ngobe nome singeva, singeke sente.
Nangabe wetayeta sisebenti ngekusinika konkhe lesikufunako, nase sikhulile sitakwemuka konkhe lokukwakho.
Bantfu labanyenti bafunana nekutsandvwa ngumbusi; kodvwa imphatfo lengakhetsi muntfu itfolakala kuSimakadze kuphela.
Leti-ke taga ta-Aguri, umsa waJakhe waseMasa: “Nkulunkulu ungilahlile, ungilahle mbamba, sengiphelelwe ngemandla!
Sengifanana nesilwane, angisesiye umuntfu, ngobe tintfo angisaticondzi njengemuntfu.
Ungengeti lutfo etetsembisweni takhe. Uma uke wengeta nje, uyakukutsetsisa utfolakale ungumuntfu wemanga.”
Ticelo tami timbili, Nkulunkulu, lengicela kutsi ungiphe ngisengakafi:
Ngisindzise ekukhulumeni emanga. Buphuya nebunjinga ungangiphi, kodvwa umane ungiphe lengikudzingako.

Nangingaba nako kube kunyenti, ngingahle ngicabange kutsi wena angisakudzingi, ngidzimate ngitsi: “Ngubani yena loSimakadze?” Nome-ke nangingaba luphuya, ngingahle ngebe, ngaloko ngihlazise Nkulunkulu wami.
Ungakhulumi kabi ngesisebenti kumphatsi waso; nawenta loko, sitakucalekisa uhlupheke.
Labanye bantfu bacalekisa boyise, bangabongi ngisho nekubonga kubonina.
Labanye bantfu bacabanga kutsi bona bahlantekile; kantsi bangcole kakhulu, abakahlantwa.
Labanye bayatigcabha, bahlala ngekuchukuluta labanye bantfu.
Labanye bantfu banematinyo latinkemba, nemihlatsi lengimikhwa; yebo, babukhali. Baloshela bamite tonkhe timphuya emhlabeni.
Simunyangati unemadvodzakati lamabili; emabito awo boNgiphe naNgiphe.
Tintsatfu tintfo letingeneliswa, kantsi empeleni tine letingeke tisho titsi: “Sekwenele”:
Kukhona tintfo letintsatfu letiyimfihlakalo, kantsi empeleni tine lengingaticondzi kahle:
Lena-ke yindlela yemfati loyingwadla: Udla esule umlomo, bese utsi: “Angikenti lutfo mine lolubi.”
Tintsatfu tintfo letitfutfumelisa umhlaba, kantsi empeleni tine umhlaba lowehluleka kutibeketelela:
Lapha emhlabeni kukhona tilwanyakatana letincane, kodvwa tihlakaniphe kakhulu:
Timbila: tilwanyakatana letite emandla, noko takha emakhaya ato emadvwaleni.
Sikhonyane: site inkhosi, noko sihamba ngemaviyo.
Tibankhwa: ungatibamba ngesandla, kodvwa ungatikhandza ngisho nasetindlini temakhosi.
Kunetintfo letintsatfu letihamba ngekutigcabha; kodvwa leti letine tihamba ngekutigabatisa:
Libhubesi: linemandla kunato tonkhe tilwane, futsi alesabi lutfo.
Kuphehla lubisi kuveta liphehla. Kushaya likhala kuveta ingati. Kanjalo, nekususa luchuku kuveta kucabana.
Leti-ke taga taLemuweli, inkhosi yaseMasa, latifundziswa ngunina:
“Lalela, ndvodzana yami, ndvodzana yesisu sami! Wena uyimphendvulo yemthandazo wami.
Emandla akho ungawacitsi kulabasikati; yebo, emandla ekuphila kwakho ungawacitseli kulabo lababhubhisa emakhosi.
Lalela-ke, Lemuweli: Emakhosi kufanele angalinatsi liwayini nome ngabe yini lokudzakanako.
Nase banatsa bayayikhohlwa lemitsetfo lebekiwe, bese bakhohlwa emalungelo alabacindzetelwe.
Tjwala bebantfu labafako kanye nalabo labaselusizini.
Bayekele banatse batewudzakwa bakhohlwe tinhlupheko tabo, bangalukhumbuli lusizi lwabo.
Khuluma wehlulele kahle. Vikela emalungelo alabeswele nalabamphofu.”
Uyentela lokuhle ngaso sonkhe sikhatsi sekuphila kwakhe, akayenteli lokubi.
Njengemikhumbi yebahwebi, kudla kwemndeni wakhe ukulandza khashane.
Uvuka kungakasi alungisele umndeni wakhe kudla, bese wabela tidzandzane takhe imisebenti.
Utsi angatfola indzawo, ayitsenge ngemali latentele yona ngetandla takhe, bese uyayilima wenta sivini.
Ukhutsele, uyabhukula afinyete tidvwaba, acinise tandla, asebente.
Uyacaphelisisa kutsi umsebenti wakhe uyayingenisa yini inzuzo, asebente kuze kube ngusebusuku.
Kukhitsika kwelitulu akumetfusi, ngobe bonkhe bemndeni wakhe banetimphahla letifutfumalako.
Wenta tembeso temibhedze, embatse timphahla letentiwe ngakotini locolisakele
Indvodza yakhe iyahlonishwa emasangweni, lapho ingulenye yemalunga emsumphe khona.
Utfunga tingubo ngendvwangu lecolisakele, bese utsengisela bahwebi.
Wembetse emandla nekuhlonipheka, futsi akesabi lutfo ngelikusasa.
Ukhuluma kuhlakanipha, lulwimi lwakhe lugcwele teluleko temusa.
Ucaphelisisa konkhe lokwenteka ekhaya lakhe, akavilaphi.
Bantfwabakhe bayamhlonipha, nendvodza yakhe futsi iyamdvumisa idzimate itsi:
“Banyenti bafati labenta tintfo letinhle, kodvwa wena ubendlula bonkhe.”
Mbonge ngako konkhe lakwenta ngetandla takhe; umdvumisele imisebenti yakhe layentile ngisho nasemkhatsini webantfu.
Kukhona yini intfo umuntfu langasho ngayo atsi:
Ngatimisela kutsi ngekuhlakanipha ngifundze ngiphenyisise ngako konkhe lokwentiwa emhlabeni. Maye, mkhulu umtfwalo Nkulunkulu lawetfwese bantfu!
Ngikubone konkhe lokwentiwako ngaphansi kwemtfunti welilanga; konkhe kulite, kufanana nekucosha umoya.
Loko lokugwegwile kungeke kucondziseke, loko lokungekho kungeke kubalwe.
Ngatimisela engcondvweni yami kukwati kuhlakanipha, nebuhlanya nebulima, kodvwa ngefika lapho ngibona khona kutsi nako loko kufanana nekucosha umoya.
Ngabona, ngatsi: “Cha, kuhleka kubuhlanya. Yini nje lenhle ngekutijabulisa?”

Ngako ngetama kutijabulisa ngeliwayini, ngagona bulima. Kodvwa ingcondvo yami yayidvonswa kuhlakanipha. Ngangifuna kubona kutsi yini lokungukona kufanele kwentiwe bantfu lapha emhlabeni kulamalangana emphilo yabo.
Ngahlanyela tingadze, ngakha netindzawo tekuphumula, ngahlanyela tonkhe tinhlobo tetihlahla tetitselo lapha ngekhatsi kuletingadze,
ngatakhela emadamu ekunisela lamahlatsi etihlahla letikhulako,

ngatsenga tigcili letidvuna naletisikati, kantsi futsi nganginaleti letatalelwa khona ekhaya kami. Ngetulu kwaloko ngangifuyile, nginemihlambi yetinkhomo, neyetimbuti, neyetimvu, ngendlula bonkhe laba labake bahlala kucala kunami eJerusalema.
Ngabutsisa ndzawonye isiliva negolide kanye nengcebo yemakhosi neyemave. Ngatibutsela bahlabeli labadvuna nalabasikati nako konkhe umuntfu langahle atijabulise
loku kwaba ngumvuzo wami ngawo wonkhe umsebenti wami.
Yini nje lengentiwa ngulowo lolandzela inkhosi embusweni

Empeleni ngubani lowatiko kutsi utawuba sihlakaniphi yini nome utawuba silima? Noko kutawuba nguye lotakwengamela tonkhe titselo temsebenti wami netebungcweti bami lapha ngaphansi kwemtfunti welilanga. Nako loko kulite.
Ngako inhlitiyo yami yacala kuphelelwa ngemandla kuko konkhe kukhandleka kwami lengikwentile lapha ngaphansi kwemtfunti welilanga.

Ngobe kunjalo, umuntfu umsebenti wakhe angawenta ngekuhlakanipha, nangelwati kanye nangekucophelela, kodvwa kufanele konkhe loko lokungekwakhe akushiyele umuntfu longakaze wakusebentela. Nako loko kulite nebubi lobukhulu.
Umuntfu utfolani ngako konkhe kukhandleka kwakhe nekushikaneka kwakhe lakwentako lapha ngaphansi kwemtfunti welilanga?
Kuto tonkhe tinsuku tekuphila kwakhe, umsebenti wakhe yiminjunju nekuhlupheka; ngisho nasebusuku ingcondvo yakhe ayinako kuphumula. Nako loko kulite.
ngobe ngubani longadla ajabule ngaphandle kwakhe?

Nkulunkulu uphana ngekuhlakanipha, nangelwati kanye nangenjabulo kumuntfu lotfokotisa yena, kodvwa soni usinika umshikashika wekubutsisa nekucongelela bunjinga, kuze kunikwe lowo lotfokotisa Nkulunkulu. Nako loko kulite, kufanana nekucosha umoya.
Ngiwubonile umshikashika Nkulunkulu lawunike bantfu kutsi bawente.
Konkhe ukwente kwalungela sikhatsi sako. Uphindze wabeka liphakadze etinhlitiyweni tebantfu; noko abakhoni kuyicondza imisebenti yaNkulunkulu kusukela ekucaleni kwayo kuze kube ngusekugcineni.
Ngiyati kutsi kute lokuncono ngaphandle kwekutsi bajabule baphile imphilo lekahle basesemhlabeni.
Ngetulu kwaloko kutsi umuntfu adle anatse atijabulise ngayo yonkhe imishikashika yakhe kusipho saNkulunkulu.
Ngiyati kutsi konkhe lokwentiwa nguNkulunkulu kuyakuma phakadze naphakadze; kute lokungengetwa nalokungacetunwa kuko. Konkhe ukwenta ngendlela yekutsi bantfu batfutfumele ebukhoneni bakhe.
naloko lokuyawuba khona sekwake kwaba khona,
Ngetulu kwaloko kukhona lokunye lengaphindze ngakubona lapha ngaphansi kwemtfunti welilanga:
ngobe kutawuba nesikhatsi sako konkhe lokwentiwako,
Ngaphindze ngacabanga ngatsi: “Macondzana nebantfu Nkulunkulu uyaye abavivinye, khona batewubona kutsi bafanana netilwane.
Ngobe siphetfo semuntfu siyafanana nesiphetfo setilwane; kokubili kumelwe siphetfo lesifananako: Njengobe lokunye kufa, naloku lokunye kuyafa. Konkhe kunemiphefumulo lefananako,
Konkhe kuya endzaweni yinye; konkhe kuphuma elutfulini kuphindze kubuyele elutfulini.
Ngubani lowatiko kutsi umphefumulo wemuntfu wenyukela etulu yini, nekutsi umphefumulo wesilwane wehlela phansi emhlabatsini?”
emandla abengakubacindzeteli babo, kodvwa labo labacindzetelwe
Kodvwa loncono kunabo bonkhe ngulowo losengakatalwa
Ngabona kutsi wonkhe umshikashika nako konkhe kuphumelela kwemuntfu kusukela ekuhawukeleni kwakhe lutfo kumakhelwane wakhe. Nako loko kulite, kufanana nekucosha umoya.
Kuncono kubamba ngesandla sinye ube nekuthula emoyeni, kunekubamba emabhabha ngemshikashika nekucosha umoya.
Ngaphindze futsi ngabona lokunye lokulite lapha ngaphansi kwemtfunti welilanga:
ngobe batfola umvuzo lomuhle ngemsebenti wabo:
lotsi nakawa angabi naye lotamsita amsukumise.
Kantsi futsi bantfu nabalele bababili bayafutfumetana;
kodvwa umuntfu angatifutfumeta kanjani alele yedvwa?
Uncono umuntfu lomusha lophuyile nalohlakaniphile kunenkhosi lendzala lesilima nalengasatitsatsi teluleko.
Umuntfu lomusha angaphuma ejele angene esihlalweni sebukhosi, nome abengulotelwe angulomphofu embusweni walenkhosi.
Ngabona kutsi bonkhe bantfu labake baphila lapha ngaphansi kwemtfunti welilanga balandzela lona lomusha labetsetse sikhundla senkhosi.
Bangaba banyenti kabi bantfu labangabuswa yinkhosi. Kodvwa itawutsi ingakhotsama, bantfu bangakubongi loko lekwentile. Nako loko kulite, kufanana nekucosha umoya.
Nawenta sifungo kuNkulunkulu, ungacali wephute ekusifezeni. Akatijabuleli tilima; sifungo sakho sifeze.
Kuncono kutsi ungasenti setsembiso kunekutsi usente ungabe usasifeza.
Ungawuvumeli umlomo wakho kutsi ukuholele esonweni, bese ukhuluma engilosini yaNkulunkulu
Kwandza kwemaphupho nemavi lamanyenti kulite. Ngako wena yesaba Nkulunkulu.

Nawubona lophuyile acindzetelwe endzaweni letsite, asemukwe emalungelo akhe nekwehlulelwa ngebucotfo, kungakumangalisi loko. Lowo nalowo lophetse unemuntfu longetulu kwakhe, kantsi nalowo longetulu kwakhe unemuntfu longetulu kwabo bonkhe.
Inala yemhlaba itfolwa ngibo bonkhe bantfu; ngisho nenkhosi imbala nayo iyabuyelwa nguloko lokutfolakala emhlabatsini.
lite nome sidle kancane nome sidle sesutsa;
Ngibone intfo lembi lelusizi lapha ngaphansi kwemtfunti welilanga:
ngetulu kwaloko kusipho saNkulunkulu kuye wonkhe umuntfu lamuphe bunjinga, nemcebo, nemandla, kutsi atijabulise ngako, asemukele leso sabelo sakhe, ajabule emsebentini wakhe.
Ngobe akayikutikhumbula kakhulu tinsuku tekuphila kwakhe, ngobe phela Nkulunkulu umenta ahlale amatasatasa ngekujabula enhlitiyweni yakhe.
Ngibone lenye intfo lembi lapha ngaphansi kwemtfunti welilanga, futsi ingumtfwalo lomatima kubantfu:

Nkulunkulu upha umuntfu ingcebo, netimphahla letinyenti, nekuhlonipheka, kuze kutsi kubete lakweswelako lokufiswa yinhlitiyo yakhe, kodvwa Nkulunkulu angamvumeli kutsi atijabulise ngayo, esikhundleni saloko kube ngumfokati nje lotijabulisa ngayo. Nako loko kulite nemvisabuhlungu lembi.

Indvodza ingaba nebantfwana labalikhulu, iphile iminyaka leminyenti; kodvwa nome ingaphila sikhatsi lesidze, ingakwati kutijabulisa ngetintfo letinhle tekuphila, bese kutsi ekugcineni ingabe insangcwatjwa nakahle, ngitsi umntfwana lotelwe asafile uncono kakhulu kunayo.
Kutalwa kwakhe kulite, unyamalala ebumnyameni nelibito lakhe lifihlakale ebumnyameni.
Nome angazange alibone lilanga, angazange ati nalutfo, kuphumula kwakhe kuncono kunekwaleyo ndvodza,
lite nome leyo ndvodza ingaphila iminyaka leyinkhulungwane lephindvwe kabili, kodvwa ibe yehluleka kutijabulisa ngalengcebo yayo. Abayi ndzawonye bonkhe yini?
Kuncono kweneliswa nguloko lokubona ngemehlo akho

Empeleni ngubani longahle ati kutsi yini lenhle lefanele umuntfu kulokuphila, nakulamalangana lambalwa nalalite lendlula kuwo njengesitfunti? Ngubani nje longatjela lomunye umuntfu kutsi kutakwentekani lapha ngaphansi kwemtfunti welilanga nangasekho?
ngobe kufa kusiphetfo sabo bonkhe bantfu;
labo labaphilako kufanele bakufake enhlitiyweni yabo loko.
kantsi futsi kusita labo labasabona lilanga.
Ngubani longacondzisa loko lakwenta kwaba sigwegwe?
nemuntfu lomubi uphila sikhatsi lesidze ebubini bakhe.
Konkhe loku ngakuhlolisisa ngekuhlakanipha, ngase ngitsi:
Ungasheshi usuke embikwenkhosi. Ungacali futsi ukusukumele lokubi, ngobe itakwenta nome ngabe yini leyikutsandzako.
Njengobe livi lenkhosi liyabusa, ngubani longasho kuyo atsi: “Yini lena loyentako?”
ngubani nje longasho kutsi yini letakwenteka?
Konkhe loku ngakubona ngisacabangisisa ngako konkhe lokwenteka lapha ngaphansi kwemtfunti welilanga. Sikhona sikhatsi lapho umuntfu usuke atihlisibete etikwalabanye kantsi utilimata yena.
Ngase ngabona lababi, babengcwatjwa, labo babephuma bangena endzaweni lengcwele babatjatwe badvunyiswe
Nome lomubi enta bubi kalikhulu, achubeke aphile sikhatsi lesidze, ngiyati kutsi kuyakubahambela kahle labo labesaba Nkulunkulu, bahloniphe Nkulunkulu.
Kodvwa kungeke kubahambele kahle lababi, futsi imphilo yabo ingeke yeluleke njengematfunti, ngobe bangamesabi Nkulunkulu.
Ngatsi nangitimisela engcondvweni yami kufunisisa kwati nekuhlakanipha nekutfolisisa kutsi yini umshikashika lowentiwa ngumuntfu emhlabeni, angalali emini nebusuku,

ngayibona yonkhe imisebenti yaNkulunkulu kutsi umuntfu angeke ayicondze yonkhe imisebenti leyentiwako lapha ngaphansi kwemtfunti welilanga. Nome umuntfu angatihlupha kangakanani afunisisa, angeke ayicondze; nome lohlakaniphile angatsi yena uyati, angeke ayicondze.

Ngacabangisisa ngako konkhe loko, ngabona kutsi lolungile nalohlakaniphile nako konkhe labakwentako kusesandleni saNkulunkulu, nome kulutsandvo nome kuyinzondo; kute lowatiko. Konkhe lokusembikwabo kulite.

Naku lokubi kuko lokwentekako lapha ngaphansi kwemtfunti welilanga: Bonkhe behlelwa siphetfo lesifananako. Ngetulu kwaloko tinhlitiyo tebantfu tigcwele bubi, kantsi kunebuhlanya etinhlitiyweni tabo basaphila, emvakwaloko bangena ekufeni.
Kodvwa kulowo losabalelwa kulabaphilako litsemba lisekhona;
bangeke baphindze babe nesabelo kuko konkhe

“Maye kimi, mine ngiphelile! Ngobe ngingumuntfu lotindzebe temlomo wakhe tingcolile, futsi ngihlala emkhatsini webantfu labatindzebe tabo tingcolile. Emehlo ami ayibonile iNkhosi, Simakadze longuSomandla.”
Lafike latsintsa umlomo wami ngalo, latsi: “Buka la, loku sekutsintse umlomo wakho, ngako licala lakho selesuliwe, nesono sakho sesihlawulelwe.”
Ngase ngitsi: “Awu! Simakadze, kutawuze kube ngunini?”
Indlu yakaDavide yatjelwa kwatsiwa: “ISiriya itihlanganise nelaka-Efrayimu.”
Ubosho kuye utsi: ‘Caphela, uthule, ume sibindzi, ungaphelelwa ngemandla ngenca yaletiphintana letibili taletikhuni letishuncako, nangekuvutsa kwelulaka lwaResini nemaSiriya akhe nelwemsa waRemaliya.
Siriya, na-Efrayimu, nemsa waRemaliya bakwakhela luzungu, batsi:
“Asikhuphuke siyewuvimbetela lakaJuda silidzabule ekhatsi, sitehlukanisele lona, bese sibeka umsa waThabheyali kutsi abe yinkhosi etikwalo.”
Kodvwa naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Simakadze, itsi:
“Ticelele sibonakaliso kuSimakadze Nkulunkulu wakho, nome sibe ngulesisekujuleni
Kodvwa Ahazi watsi: “Ngingeke ngisicele. Ngingeke ngivivinye Simakadze.”
Isaya wase utsi: “Lalela lapha, wenandlu yakaDavide! Kuyini kini lokube solomane nihluphana netinhlitiyo tebantfu? Nyalo senifuna nekuhlupha Nkulunkulu wami yini kantsi?
Ngako-ke, Nkulunkulu, yena cobo lwakhe, utawuninika sibonakaliso: Intfombi iyawukhulelwa itale indvodzana, yetsiwe
Iyakudla tikhihli temasi netinyosi idzimate ikwati kwala lokubi ikhetse lokuhle.
Kodvwa kuyawutsi lomfana asengakakwati kwala lokubi akhetse lokuhle, lelo live lalamakhosi lamabili lowesabako, liyawube selingasenalutfo.
Simakadze uyawuletsa kuwe nasetikwesive sakini, nasetikwendlu yeyihlo, sikhatsi lesingazange sesibe khona kusukela baka-Efrayimu bahlephuka kubakaJuda; uyawuletsa inkhosi yase-Asiriya.”
Ngalelo langa Simakadze uyawushaya inkwela abite timphungane letingasemifuleni yaseGibhithe kanye netinyosi taseveni lase-Asiriya.
Tiyawubuya tonkhe titewubutsana etihosheni letehlelako kanye nasemifantfwini yemadvwala, nasetikwato tonkhe tihlahla temanyeva nasetimbotjeni tonkhe temanti.
Ngalelo langa Simakadze uyawusebentisa insingo lecashwe ngesheya kweMfula,
Ngalelo langa indvodza iyawufuya litfokati linye netimbuti letimbili.
Ngenca yekutsi tiyawube tehlisa kakhulu, iyawuba netikhihli temasi letinyenti tekutondla. Bonkhe labayawube basele kulelo live bayawudla tikhihli temasi kanye netinyosi.
Ngalelo langa kuto tonkhe tindzawo lapho kwakunenkhulungwane yemivini leyayingabita tinhlavu letiyinkhulungwane tesiliva,
Emadvodza ayakuya lapho aphetse butjoki bawo nemicibisholo yawo, ngobe lelo live liyawube selene ngetitfwetfwe nangemanyeva.

Mayelana nato tonkhe tintsatjana letake talinywa ngemakhuba etandla, ningeke nisaya kuto, ngenca yekwesaba titfwetfwe nemanyeva; setiyawuba tindzawo lapho kudla khona imihlambi yetinkhomo, kugcobagcobe khona netimvu.
Simakadze wakhuluma kimi, watsi: “Tsatsa incwadzi lenkhulu legocotwako ubhale kuyo ngelutsi lolwetayelekile, utsi: Maheri Shalali Hashi Bazi.
Ngiyawubita Uriya, umphristi, naZakhariya, umsa waJeberekhiya, bangimele njengabofakazi bami labetsembekile.”
Ngabe sengiya kumphrofethikati, wase uyakhulelwa, watala indvodzana. Simakadze wakhuluma kimi, watsi: “Metse libito utsi nguMaheri Shalali Hashi Bazi.
Kwatsi lomfanyana asengakakwati nakahle kutsi ‘Babe’ nome ‘Make’, umcebo waseDamaseko nemphango yaseSamariya kuyawube sekutfunjwa yinkhosi yase-Asiriya.”

Efrayimu angeke aphindze abe nemona ngaJuda,

Live lakaJuda liyawutsela kwesaba kubantfu baseGibhithe; bonkhe labayakuva nje kuphatfwa lelibito laJuda, bayakwetfuka, ngenca yaloko Simakadze longuSomandla losahlose kukwenta kubo.
Ngalelo langa kuyawuba nelilati laSimakadze ekhatsi eveni laseGibhithe, nensika lesikhumbuto saSimakadze eminyeleni yaseGibhithe.
Kuyawuba tibonakaliso letikhumbuta ngaSimakadze longuSomandla eveni laseGibhithe. Nase bakhala kuSimakadze ngenca yebacindzeteli babo, uyawubatfumelela umsindzisi nemvikeli, yena loyawufike abephule.

Ngako Simakadze uyakwenta kutsi emaGibhithe amati; ngalelo langa bayawumhlonipha Simakadze. Bayawumkhonta ngemihlatjelo nangeminikelo yalokutinhlavu, bayakwenta tetsembiso kuSimakadze, futsi bayawutigcina.
Simakadze uyawushaya iGibhithe ngesifo lesibulalanako; uyawubashaya ngaso, aphindze abaphilise. Bayawuphendvukela kuSimakadze, naye uyawukuva kuncusa kwabo, bese uyabaphilisa.
Ngalelo langa kuyawuba nemgwaco losuka eGibhithe uye e-Asiriya. Base-Asiriya bayakuya eGibhithe, nebaseGibhithe bayakuya e-Asiriya. Bantfu baseGibhithe nebase-Asiriya bayakukhonta ndzawonye.
Ngalelo langa Israyeli uyawuba ngewesitsatfu kanye neGibhithe ne-Asiriya, kube sibusiso emhlabeni.
Simakadze longuSomandla uyawubabusisa, atsi: “Ayibusiswe iGibhithe, sive sami, ne-Asiriya lengumsebenti wetandla tami, na-Israyeli lolifa lami.”

Emehlo akho ayakuyibona inkhosi ebuhleni bayo,
kungeke kudzabuke ngisho nayinye yetindophi talo.
kute ngisho nemkhumbi lonemandla lotawuntjweza kuyo.
intfukutselo yakhe isetikwawo onkhe emabutfo ato.
igcwele ingati yemazinyane etimvu, nengati yetimbuti,
kute namunye loyawuphindza adzabule ekhatsi kulo.
Babusi balo kuyawubate labayawukubita batsi bukhosi,
siwachobosele khona lapho, sifukamele emazini aso,
Ase nibuke encwadzini legocotwako yaSimakadze nifundze.
Ngobe ngumlomo wakhe lona lokhiphe lomyalo,

Inkhosi yase-Asiriya yase itfumela indvuna yayo lenkhulu yemphi kanye nalelikhulu libutfo lemphi lelesuka eLakhishi, laya enkhosini Hezekiya eJerusalema. Kwatsi lendvuna lenkhulu yemphi nayima ngasemseleni wesitiba lesisenhla, emgwacweni loya eNsimini yeMgezi Wetingubo,
kwaphuma bo-Eliyakimu, umsa waHilkiya, indvuna yesigodlo, naShebna labengumabhalane, naJowa, umsa wa-Asafa, umbhalisi, baya kuyo.
Indvuna lenkhulu yemphi yafike yakhuluma kubo, yatsi: “Tjelani Hezekiya, nitsi:
“ ‘Naku lokushiwo yinkhosi lenkhulu yase-Asiriya, itsi: Ulibeke kubani litsemba lakho?
Utsi unemasu nemabutfo emphi lanemandla, kodvwa ukhuluma lite nje. Ngubani lona lowetsembele kuye, lokwenta kutsi ngaye ungivukele?

Buka la, nyalo wetsembele eGibhithe, kulolubhatu lwendvuku yemhlanga, lolugwaza sandla semuntfu lumlimate, nakatsi ubambelela kulo! Unjalo-ke Faro, inkhosi yaseGibhithe, kubo bonkhe labetsembela kuye.

Nangabe utsi kimi: “Setsembele kuSimakadze Nkulunkulu wetfu,” akusiye yini lona Hezekiya ladzilita tindzawo takhe letiphakeme tekukhontela nemalati akhe, atsi kubakaJuda nebaseJerusalema: “Kufanele nikhonte embikwanali lilati leliseJerusalema”?
“ ‘Buya-ke nyalo, wente sivumelwane nemphatsi wami, inkhosi yase-Asiriya: Ngitakunika emahhashi lati-2 000, nawungaba nebantfu labangawagibela.
Ungayeyisa yini yona yinye nje kuto tonkhe tindvuna letincane temphatsi wami, nome ngabe wetsembele eGibhithe ngetincola temphi kanye nebagibeli bemahhashi?
Ngetulu kwaloko nje, kantsi lapha ngitele kutawuhlasela nekubhubhisa lelive ngaphandle kwaSimakadze yini? Simakadze nguye cobo lwakhe longitjele kutsi angishuce ngite kulelive ngitelibhubhisa.’ ”

Bo-Eliyakimu, naShebna, naJowa bakhuluma kulendvuna lenkhulu, batsi: “Sicela umane ukhulume ngesiSiriya etincekwini takho, ngobe ngulona lulwimi lesiluvako. Ungakhulumi natsi ngesiHebheru kuva bonkhe labantfu labalapha etulu elubondzeni.”

Kodvwa lendvuna lenkhulu yemphi yaphendvula, yatsi: “Kantsi inkhosi yami beyingitfume kini nalenkhosi yenu nodvwa yini kutsi ngitewukhuluma lamagama? Beyingakangitfumi yini nakubo labantfu labalapha etulu elubondzeni, nabo labanjengani, labatawudla emangcoliso abo, baphindze banatse nemichamo yabo?”
Lendvuna lenkhulu yemphi yase iyasukuma yamemeta ngesiHebheru, yatsi: “Lalelani emavi enkhosi lenkhulu, inkhosi yase-Asiriya!
Naku lokushiwo yinkhosi, itsi: ‘Ningacali niyengwe nguHezekiya. Angeke akhone kunikhulula!
Ningavumi kutsi Hezekiya aniyenge netsembele kuSimakadze, nakatsi: “Simakadze utasephula ngempela, lelidolobha lingeke linikelwe esandleni senkhosi yase-Asiriya.” ’

“Inkhosi yase-Asiriya itsi: ‘Ningamlaleli Hezekiya, yentani sivumelwane nami, niphume nite kimi, nguleyo naleyo ndvodza-ke iyawube seyitidlela kahle esivinini sayo, nasemkhiwaneni wayo, inatse nemanti laphuma emtfonjeni wayo,
ngize ngifike nginitsatse nginimikise eveni lelifanana nelenu, live lelinalokutinhlavu, nalelineliwayini lelisha, live lesinkhwa neletivini.’
Baphi nje bonkulunkulu baseHamathi, nebase-Aphadi? Baphi bonkulunkulu baseSefavayimu? Bayisindzisile yini iSamariya esandleni sami?
Ngumuphi kubo bonkhe labonkulunkulu balamave lowake wakhona kusindzisa live lakhe esandleni sami? Simakadze-ke yena angayisindzisa kanjani iJerusalema esandleni sami?”
Kodvwa labantfu babindza nje bambuka bangete basho lutfo, ngobe inkhosi yayibadvonse ngendlebe yatsi: “Ningacali nimphendvule.”

Bo-Eliyakimu, umsa waHilkiya, labeyindvuna yesigodlo, naShebna, labengumabhalane, kanye naJowa, umsa wa-Asafa, labengulobhalisako, bahamba bayawubikela Hezekiya sebadzabule tingubo tabo, bafike bamtjela konkhe lokwakushiwo yindvuna lenkhulu yemphi yase-Asiriya.
Watfumela bo-Eliyakimu, indvuna yasesigodlweni, naShebna, labengumabhalane, kanye nebaholi bebaphristi, bonkhe bagcoke emasaka baya kumphrofethi Isaya, umsa wa-Amose.
Bamtjela batsi: “Naku lokushiwo nguHezekiya, utsi: ‘Lelilanga lalamuhla lilanga lenjabhiso, nekutsetsiswa, nelihlazo, njenganakufika tikhatsi tekubelekwa kwebantfwana kube kute emandla ekubabeleka.

Kungenteka kube Simakadze Nkulunkulu wakho utaweva emavi endvuna lenkhulu, letfunywe ngumphatsi wayo, inkhosi yase-Asiriya, kutsi itewuhlazisa Nkulunkulu lophilako, nekutsi yena utayitsetsisela emavi Simakadze Nkulunkulu wakho lawevile. Ngako-ke thandazela lensali lesolomane isasele.’ ”

Isaya wakhuluma kuto, watsi: “Tjelani inkhosi yenu nitsi: ‘Naku lokushiwo nguSimakadze utsi: Ningesatjiswa nguloko lenikuvile, lawo mavi ledzelelako etinceku tenkhosi yase-Asiriya letingihlambalate ngawo.
Lalelani! Ngitawufaka kuye umoya lotamenta kutsi atsi nakeva umbiko lotsite, ancandzeke abuyele eveni lakhe, ngulapho-ke ngiyawumenta kutsi afele khona ngenkemba.’ ”
Lendvuna lenkhulu yemphi yatsi kube ive kutsi inkhosi yase-Asiriya ayisekho eLakhishi, yase iyancandzeka nayo, yakhandza inkhosi ibambene etulu neLibna.
Senaheribi watfola umbiko wekutsi Thihakha, inkhosi yaseKushe,
“Tjelani Hezekiya, inkhosi yakaJuda, nitsi: ‘Ungayengwa ngulonkulunkulu wakho lometsembako nakatsi: “IJerusalema ngeke inikelwe etandleni tenkhosi yase-Asiriya.”
Angitsi sewuvile kutsi entani emakhosi ase-Asiriya kuwo onkhe lamanye emave, acotfula imbokodvo nesisekelo kuwo. Wena-ke ungaphepha kanjani?
Labonkulunkulu betive letabhujiswa bobabemkhulu, batikhulula yini letive tabo, bonkulunkulu baseGozani, nebaseHarani, nebaseResefu kanye nebebantfu base-Edeni lababeseThelasari?
Iphi inkhosi yaseHamathi, nenkhosi yase-Aphadi, nenkhosi yelidolobha laseSefavayimu, neyaseHena, neyase-Ava?’ ”
Hezekiya watsatsa lencwadzi kuletigijimi wayifundza, wase ukhuphukela nayo ethempelini laSimakadze, wafike wayendlala embikwaSimakadze.
“Awu, Simakadze Somandla, Nkulunkulu wesive sema-Israyeli, wena lohleli emkhatsini wemakherubhi, wena wedvwa unguNkulunkulu etikwayo yonkhe imibuso yemhlaba. Wena wadala lizulu nemhlaba.
Vula indlebe yakho! Awu, Simakadze, vani; uvule emehlo akho, Simakadze, ubone; lalela onkhe emavi latfunyelwe nguSenaheribi ekwetfuka wena, Nkulunkulu lophilako.
“Kuliciniso kona, Simakadze, kutsi emakhosi ase-Asiriya atibhubhisile tonkhe letive kanye nemave ato.
Bajikijele bonkulunkulu bato emlilweni, bababhubhisa, ngobe bebangesibo bonkulunkulu sibili, bekutingodvo nje nematje labatwe tandla tebantfu.
Manje-ke, Simakadze Nkulunkulu wetfu, sephule esandleni sakhe, kuze yonkhe imibuso yemhlaba yati kutsi wena wedvwa, Simakadze, unguNkulunkulu.”
Isaya, umsa wa-Amose, wase utfumela kuHezekiya, atsi: “Naku lokushiwo nguSimakadze, Nkulunkulu wema-Israyeli, utsi: Njengobe uthandaze kimi mayelana naSenaheribi, inkhosi yase-Asiriya,
nali-ke livi lelikhulunywe nguSimakadze lelimelene naye, litsi:
uyawuhlanyela tivini ubuye udle emagelebisi ato.
“Ngako-ke naku lokushiwo nguSimakadze macondzana nenkhosi yase-Asiriya:
ngenca yami nangenca yenceku yami Davide.”
Ngako ingilosi yaSimakadze yaphuma yabhubhisa emadvodza lati-185 000, labesenkambu yema-Asiriya. Batsi bantfu nabavuka ekuseni ngakusasa, bakhangwa lucaca lwetidvumbu!
Ngako-ke Senaheribi, inkhosi yase-Asiriya, wadzilita inkambu yakhe, wahamba wabuyela eNineve, wayawuhlala khona.

Kwatsi ngalelinye lilanga aselibele kukhonta ethempelini lankulunkulu wakhe Nisroki, kwesuka emadvodzana akhe, bo-Adrameleki naShareseri, bamjuba ngenkemba, besuka lapho babalekela eveni lase-Ararathi. Esahadoni, umsa wakhe, waba yinkhosi yase-Asiriya esikhundleni sakhe.
Hezekiya wagucuka wabheka ngaselubondzeni, wathandaza kuSimakadze, watsi:

“Awu, Simakadze, khumbula kutsi bengihamba ngekwetsembeka lokunjani embikwakho, nekutsi bengitinikele kangakanani embikwakho ngayo yonkhe inhlitiyo yami, ngenta lokuhle emehlweni akho.” Hezekiya wakhala kabuhlungu.

“Hamba uyewutjela Hezekiya, utsi: ‘Naku lokushiwo nguSimakadze, Nkulunkulu weyihlomkhulu, Davide, utsi: Ngiwuvile umthandazo wakho, ngatibona netinyembeti takho. Ngitakwengetela iminyaka leli-15 ebudzeni bemphilo yakho.
Ngitawukhulula wena kanye nalelidolobha esandleni senkhosi yase-Asiriya. Ngitalivikela lelidolobha.
“ ‘Nasi sibonakaliso saSimakadze kuwe, sekutsi Simakadze utakwenta loko lakwetsembisile:

Ngitakwenta sitfunti lesentiwe lilanga siye emuva tinyatselo letilishumi lese sitewuke etitebhisini tekukala sikhatsi ta-Ahazi.’ ” Ngako-ke kukhanya kwelilanga kwafinyela ngetinyatselo letilishumi lebesekutewukile.
Umbhalo waHezekiya, inkhosi yakaJuda, emvakwekugula nekusindza kwakhe:
ngidlelelwe incenye yeminyaka lesasele yemphilo yami?”

Isaya abeshito watsi: “Futfumetani sitfobo semakhiwa, bese nisifaka kulelitfumba, utabe sewuyaphila.”
Hezekiya abebute watsi: “Sitawuba yini sibonakaliso sekutsi ngitawukhuphukela ethempelini laSimakadze?”

Hezekiya watemukela ngekujabula letitfunywa, watikhombisa loko lokwakusetindlini takhe tengcebo, lekwakuyisiliva, negolide, netinongo tekudla, nemafutsa lamahle, nato tonkhe tikhali takhe tekulwa, nako konkhe lokwakungatfolakala endlini yakhe yengcebo. Kwabate ngisho nakunye lokwakusesigodlweni sakhe nalokwakusembusweni wakhe wonkhe lokwasala wangete watikhombisa kona.
Umphrofethi Isaya wase uya ku-Hezekiya, inkhosi, wambuta watsi: “Atsiteni lamadvodza, kona abebuyaphi?”
Hezekiya waphendvula watsi: “Abephuma eveni lelikhashane kakhulu, eBhabhulona, ete kimi.”
Lomphrofethi wabuta watsi: “Baboneni lapha esigodlweni sakho?”
Hezekiya watsi: “Babone konkhe lapha esigodlweni sami. Kute nakunye lokusengcebeni yami lengingakabakhombisi kona.”
Isaya wase utsi kuHezekiya: “Vani livi laSimakadze longuSomandla.

Sikhatsi sitawufika ngempela, lapho konkhe lokusesigodlweni sakho, nako konkhe loko lokwalondvolotwa boyihlomkhulu kusukela kadzenidzeni kuze kube ngulamuhla, kutakwetfwalwa kuyiswe eBhabhulona. Kute nakunye lokutawusala, kusho Simakadze.
Labanye betitukulwane takho, labayinyama nengati yakho, lewuyawutalelwa bona, bayawutfunjwa bayekwentiwa tigcili, baphakulwe esigodlweni senkhosi yaseBhabhulona.”
Hezekiya waphendvula watsi: “Livi laSimakadze lolikhulumile lihle,” ngobe abecabanga atsi: “Kutawuba nekuthula nekuvikeleka ngesikhatsi sekuphila kwami.”

“Ngiyawubeka sibonakaliso emkhatsini wabo, bese ngitfumela labanye balabo labaphephile etiveni: eThashishi, nakumaLibhiya,

Bayawuletsa bonkhe bomnakenu, babakhipha kuto tonkhe tive, babayise entsabeni yami lengcwele eJerusalema, babe ngumnikelo kuSimakadze. Bayawubetfwala ngemahhashi, nangetincola temphi, nangetinkalishi, nangeminyuzi, nangemakamela,” kusho Simakadze. “Bayawuta nabo njengema-Israyeli nakaletsa iminikelo yawo yalokutinhlavu ngetitja letihlantekile ngekwemtsetfo, ateyetfula ethempelini laSimakadze.
Ngiyawukhetsa labanye emkhatsini wabo ngibente babe baphristi nemaLevi,” kusho Simakadze.
Kusukela ekwetfwaseni kwenyanga kuye kulelandzelako, nekusukela kulelinye liSabatha kuye kulelinye, bonkhe bantfu bayakuta bakhotsame embikwami,” kusho Simakadze.
“Bayawuphumela ngephandle babuke tidvumbu talabo labangihlubukile; imphetfu lebadlako ngeke ife, kanjalo nemlilo lobashisako ungeke ucinywe, bayakwenyanyeka kubo bonkhe bantfu.”
Livi laSimakadze lefika kuye emnyakeni weli-13 wekubusa kwaJosaya, umsa wa-Amoni, inkhosi yakaJuda;

labuye lefika futsi ngesikhatsi sekubusa kwaJehoyakimu, umsa waJosaya, inkhosi yakaJuda, kwaze kwaba yinyanga yesihlanu emnyakeni weli-11 wekubusa kwaSedekiya, umsa waJosaya, inkhosi yakaJuda, ngesikhatsi sekutfunjwa kwebantfu baseJerusalema.
Kodvwa Simakadze wakhuluma kimi, watsi: “Ungasho kutsi, ‘ngisengumntfwana.’ Kufanele uhambe uye kubo bonkhe bantfu lengikutfuma kubo, ufike usho loko lengikutfuma kona.
Ungabesabi, ngobe mine nginawe, futsi ngiyawukuphephisa,” kusho Simakadze.
Buka la, lamuhla ngikubeka etikwetive nasetikwemibuso kutsi usiphule ubuye uhhihlite; ubhidlite ubuye uketule, nekutsi wakhe ubuye uhlanyele.”
Livi laSimakadze lefika kimi, latsi: “Jeremiya, ubonani?”
Mine ngaphendvula ngatsi: “Ngibona ligala lesihlahla se-alimondi.”
Simakadze wakhuluma kimi, watsi: “Ubone kahle impela, ngobe ngicaphele
Mine ngaphendvula ngatsi: “Ngibona libhodo lelibilako, litjekile lafulatsela inyakatfo.”
Sekusedvutane kutsi ngibite tonkhe tive temibuso yangasenyakatfo,” kusho Simakadze.

Ngamnika Israyeli longaketsembeki sitifiketi sesehlukaniso, ngamcosha ngenca yako konkhe loko kuphinga kwakhe. Noko ngakubona loko kungetsembeki kwadzadzewabo longuJuda kutsi akesabi; naye waphindze waphuma wayawuphinga.

Ngalawo malanga iJerusalema bayawuyibita ngekutsi Sihlalo Sebukhosi SaSimakadze, tonkhe tive tiyawubutsana eJerusalema, tiyewuhlonipha Libito laSimakadze. Bangeke basayilandzela inkhani yetinhlitiyo tabo letimbi.
Kulawo malanga indlu yakaJuda iyawutihlanganisa nendlu yaka-Israyeli, bete kanyekanye baphuma eveni lelingasenyakatfo, batewungena eveni lengalipha boyisemkhulu kutsi libe lifa labo.”

Leli livi laSimakadze lelefika kuJeremiya, latsi:
“Mani esangweni lendlu yaSimakadze; ushumayele umemetele nankha emavi:
“ ‘Vanini livi laSimakadze, nonkhe nine sive sakaJuda leningena kulamasango kuyawukhonta Simakadze.
Naku lokushiwo nguSimakadze longuSomandla, Nkulunkulu wema-Israyeli, utsi: Guculani tindlela tenu kanye netento tenu tilunge, khona ngiyawunivumela kutsi nihlale kulendzawo.
Ningawetsembi lamagama langemanga nitsi: “Leli lithempeli laSimakadze, lithempeli laSimakadze, lithempeli laSimakadze!”
Nanitigucula ngempela tindlela tenu netento tenu, niphatsane ngekwemtsetfocotfo,
naningabacindzeteli labo bekuhamba, nalabangenaboyise, nebafelokati, ningayicitsi nengati lengenacala kulendzawo, ningabalandzeli labanye bonkulunkulu kutsi nitilimate nine,
mine-ke ngiyawunenta nihlale kulendzawo, eveni lengalipha boyihlomkhulu kutsi libe labo phakadze naphakadze.
Kodvwa bukani la, nine netsembele emavini langemanga nalangenamsebenti.
bese niyeta nitewuma lapha embikwami kulendlu leneLibito lami, nitsi: “Siphephile,” kambe niphephele kutsi nente tonkhe letintfo letisinengiso?
Kungabe lendlu, leneLibito lami, seyigucuke yaba ngumhume wabosidlani yini lapha kini? Kodvwa bengisolomane ngibuka! Kusho Simakadze.
Ngesikhatsi nenta tonkhe letintfo, bengikhuluma kini njalonjalo ngaletintfo, kodvwa anikangilaleli; nginibitile, kodvwa anikasabeli, kusho Simakadze.
Ngako-ke loko lengakwenta eShilo, ngisetakwenta nanyalo kulendlu lebitwa ngeLibito lami, lelithempeli lenetsembele kulo, nendzawo lengayipha nine kanye naboyihlomkhulu.
Ngitanikhipha lapha ebukhoneni bami nginilahle, njengaloku ngenta kubomnakenu, sonkhe sive saka-Efrayimu.’ ”
Awuboni yini kutsi bentani kulamadolobha akaJuda, nasetitaladini taseJerusalema?

Bantfwana batfota tinkhuni, emadvodza alumekela imililo, bafati badovana nenhlama, babhaka emakhekhe eNdlovukazi yeliZulu. Batfulula iminikelo yetinatfo kulabanye bonkulunkulu bentela kuchukuluta lulaka lwami.
Kodvwa ngimi yini lona labamchukulutako? kusho Simakadze. Abatilimati bona yini, batitsele bona ngelihlazo?

“Ngako-ke naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Simakadze, itsi: Intfukutselo yami kanye nelulaka lwami kutawutfululelwa etikwalendzawo, etikwebantfu netinkhomo, etikwetihlahla tesiganga kanye nasetikwetitselo temhlaba, lutawuvutsa lungaphindzi lucimeke.
“Naku lokushiwo nguSimakadze longuSomandla, Nkulunkulu wema-Israyeli, utsi: Chubekani, yengetani leminikelo yenu yekushiswa kulena leminye imihlatjelo yenu, nijinge nitidlele kwanine lenyama!
Ngobe ngesikhatsi ngikhipha boyihlomkhulu eGibhithe, ngikhuluma kubo, angizange ngibanike imiyalo ngeminikelo yekushiswa nangemihlatjelo,
kodvwa ngabanika umyalo lotsi: Ngilaleleni, mine-ke ngiyawuba nguNkulunkulu wenu, nine nibe sive sami. Hambani ngato tonkhe tindlela tami lenginiyale ngato, kuze kunihambele kahle.
Kodvwa abazange balalele, futsi abanakanga nekunaka; esikhundleni saloko balandzela kutsambekela kwenkhani yetinhlitiyo tabo letimbi. Babuyela emuva, bangete baya embili.
Kusukela ngesikhatsi lekwaphuma ngaso boyihlomkhulu eveni laseGibhithe, kuze kube ngunyalo, benginitfumelela tinceku tami baphrofethi lilanga ngelilanga njalo nje.
Kodvwa abazange bangilalele, abanginakanga nekunginaka. Bacinisa tinhloko tabo, benta tono letinyenti kakhulu kunaletentiwa boyisemkhulu.
“Nawubatjela konkhe loku, bangeke bakulalele; nawubabita, bangeke basabele.
Ngako-ke tsani kubo: ‘Lesi sive lesingamlalelanga Simakadze Nkulunkulu waso, futsi asiphendvukanga nasicondziswa. Liciniso seliphelile; linyamalele emilonyeni yabo.
Hhulani tinwele tenu, nine bantfu baseJerusalema, nitilahle, nilile sililo emagcumeni laphakeme, ngobe Simakadze usilahlile, wasishiya lesitukulwane lesingaphansi kwelulaka lwakhe.’ ”
“ ‘Sive sakaJuda sente bubi emehlweni ami, kusho Simakadze. Bagcumeke tithico tabo letitinengiso endlini lebitwa ngeLibito lami, bayingcolisa.
Ngako-ke caphelani, ayeta emalanga, kusho Simakadze, lapho bantfu bangasayikuyibita ngekutsi yiThofethi
Tidvumbu talabo bantfu tiyawuba kudla kwetinyoni tasemoyeni nekwetilwane tesiganga; kuyawubate nalokuyatetfusa, aticoshe.
Ngiyawucedza imisindvo yekujabula neyekutsakasa, ngicedze neliphimbo lemyeni nelamakoti emadolobheni akaJuda nasetitaladini taseJerusalema, ngobe lelive liyawusala likhala libhungane.’ ”
“ ‘Simakadze utsi: Ngaleto tikhatsi, ematsambo emakhosi newetindvuna takaJuda, nematsambo ebaphristi newebaphrofethi, nematsambo ebantfu baseJerusalema ayawususwa emadlizeni abo.

Ayawukwenekwa elangeni, nasenyangeni, nakuto tonkhe tinkhanyeti tasemazulwini lababekutsandzile, bakusebentela, bakulandzela, bakufuna, bakukhotsamela. Akayiwubutfwa futsi akayiwungcwatjwa, kodvwa ayawuba njengemfucuta yetibi lelahlwe emhlabatsini.
Yonkhe indzawo lapho ngiyakuyicoshela khona lensali yalesive lesibi iyawucolela kufa kunekuphila, kusho Simakadze longuSomandla.’ ”

Leli livi lelefika kuJeremiya liphuma kuSimakadze, litsi:
“Lalela timiso talesivumelwane utikhulume esiveni sakaJuda nakulabo labahlala eJerusalema.
Batjele kutsi: Naku lokushiwo nguSimakadze Nkulunkulu waka-Israyeli, utsi: ‘Ucalekisiwe umuntfu longalaleli timiso talesivumelwane,

timiso lengayala ngato bokhokho benu mhlazane ngibakhipha eGibhithe, embawuleni yemlilo loncibilikisa insimbi.’ Ngatsi: ‘Lalelani mine, nente konkhe lenginiyala ngako, khona niyawuba sive sami, nami ngibe nguNkulunkulu wenu.
Mine ngiyawube ngifeza sifungo lengasenta kubokhokho benu, kutsi ngibanike live leligcwele lubisi neluju lwetinyosi,’ lekulive lenu lamuhla.”
Simakadze wakhuluma kimi, watsi: “Wamemetele onkhe lamavi emadolobheni akaJuda nasetitaladini taseJerusalema, utsi: ‘Lalelani timiso talesivumelwane, nitilandzele.
Kusukela ngesikhatsi lengakhipha ngaso bokhokho benu eGibhithe kuze kube ngulamuhla, ngangibayala njalo nje, ngitsi: Ngilaleleni.

Kodvwa abazange bangilalele, abazange sebanginake nekunginaka, esikhundleni saloko bonkhe balandzela inkhani yetinhlitiyo tabo letimbi. Ngako ngehlisela etikwabo tonkhe ticalekiso talesivumelwane lengangibayale ngaso kutsi basilandzele kodvwa labangazange basigcina.’ ”
Ngako Simakadze wakhuluma kimi, watsi: “Kukhona luzungu emkhatsini wesive sakaJuda nakulabo labahlala eJerusalema.

Babuyela etonweni tabokhokho babo, labala kulalela emavi ami. Balandzele labanye bonkulunkulu, bakhonta bona. Indlu yaka-Israyeli nendlu yakaJuda, totimbili tisephulile sivumelwane lengasenta nabokhokho bato.
Ngako-ke naku lokushiwo nguSimakadze, utsi: ‘Ngiyakwehlisela etikwabo inhlekelele labangeke bakhone kuyibalekela. Nome bangakhala bacele lusito kimi, ngingeke ngibalalele.
Emadolobha akaJuda kanye nebantfu baseJerusalema bayawuhamba bayewukhala kubonkulunkulu labatfuncisa kubo imphepho, kodvwa bangeke babasite nakancane nje nase behlelwa ngulenhlekelele.

Ninabonkulunkulu labanyenti labangangalamadolobha enu, nine maJuda; nalamalati leniwamisele kutfuncisa imphepho kuwo, niyitfuncisele sithico lesilihlazo lesinguBhali, manyenti angangetitaladi taseJerusalema.’

Naku-ke lokushiwo nguSimakadze, utsi: “Bonkhe labomakhelwane bami labakhohlakele labatsatsa ngendlovuyangena lifa lami lengalipha sive sami, ema-Israyeli, ngitabazuphuna kulamave abo, ngiphindze ngizuphune nendlu yakaJuda emkhatsini wabo.
Kodvwa ngitawutsi ngingabazuphuna, ngiphindze ngibe nesihawu kubo ngibuyisele ngulowo nalowo eveni lakhe lekulifa lakhe.

Nangabe bafundze kahle tindlela tebantfu bami base bafunga ngeLibito lami, batsi: ‘Ngifunga kuphila kwaSimakadze,’ njengaloku bake bafundzisa bantfu bami kutsi bafunge ngaBhali, bayawube sebayahlaliswa emkhatsini wesive sami.
Kodvwa nangabe nome ngusiphi nje sive singalaleli, ngiyawusizuphuna sonkhe ngisibhubhise,” kusho Simakadze.
Naku lokwashiwo nguSimakadze kimi, watsi: “Hamba uyewutsenga libhande lelineni ulivunule elukhalweni lwakho, kodvwa lingawatsintsi emanti.”
Ngako ngavele ngatsenga libhande, njengobe Simakadze abeshito, ngabe sengilivunula elukhalweni.
Livi laSimakadze lase liyefika kimi kwesibili, latsi:
“Tsatsa lelibhande lolitsengile lolivunule elukhalweni lwakho uhambe nyalo uye eYufrathe, ufike ulifihle khona elufantfwini lwemadvwala.”
Ngako ngahamba ngafike ngalifihla eYufrathe, njengobe Simakadze abengitjelile.
Emvakwemalanga lamanyenti Simakadze wakhuluma kimi, watsi: “Hamba-ke manje uye eYufrathe, ufike utsatse lelibhande lengakutjela kutsi uyekulifihla khona.”
Ngako ngahamba ngaya eYufrathe, ngafike ngemba lelibhande ngalitsatsa kulendzawo lapho bengilifihle khona, kodvwa manje lase libhudluke kakhulu selingenamsebenti.
Livi laSimakadze lase liyefika kimi, latsi:
“Naku lokushiwo nguSimakadze, utsi: ‘Ngalokufananako ngitalibhidlita ligcabho lakaJuda kanye neligcabho lelikhulu laseJerusalema.

Labantfu lababi labalako kulalela emavi ami balandzele inkhani yetinhlitiyo tabo, balandzele labanye bonkulunkulu kutsi batewubasebentela babakhonte, bayawufanana nalelibhande, bangabi namsebenti walutfo ngalokuphelele!

Ngobe njengobe libhande livunulwa elukhalweni lwendvodza, kanjalo indlu yonkhe yaka-Israyeli kanye neyakaJuda ngitibophele kimi,’ kusho Simakadze, ‘kutsi babe sive sami lengitakwatiwa ngaso, ngibatjatwe ngaso ngidvunyiswe ngaso. Kodvwa abakangilaleli.’ ”

“Khuluma kubo utsi: ‘Naku lokushiwo nguSimakadze Nkulunkulu wema-Israyeli, utsi: Leso naleso sikhumbasikhwama kufanele sigcwaliswe ngeliwayini.’ Nabakhuluma kuwe, batsi: ‘Asati yini tsine kutsi leso naleso sikhumbasikhwama kufanele sigcwaliswe ngeliwayini?’

Ngitabashayanisa lomunye kulomunye, boyise nemadvodzana ngalokufananako, kusho Simakadze. Ngingeke ngisivumele sihe nome sihawu nome luvelo kutsi kungivimbele ngingababhubhisi.’ ”

“Awuyikutitsatsela umfati, futsi awuyikuwatala emadvodzana nemadvodzakati kulendzawo.”
Ngobe naku lokushiwo nguSimakadze ngemadvodzana nangemadvodzakati latalelwa kulelive, nangebafati lababonina nangemadvodza laboyise, utsi:

“Bayawukufa babulawe sifo lesibulalanako. Abayiwulilelwa, futsi bangeke bangcwatjwe, kodvwa bayawuba njengemfucuta nje lelahlwe phansi. Bayawubhubha ngenkemba nangendlala, netidvumbu tabo tiyawuba kudla kwetinyoni tasemoyeni kanye nekwetilwane tesiganga.”

Ngobe naku lokushiwo nguSimakadze, utsi: “Ungangeni endlini lapho kunekudla kwemngcwabo, ungayi khona kuyawukhala, nome ukhombise kuvelana nabo, ngobe sengisisusile sibusiso sami, nelutsandvo lwami kanye neluvelo lwami kulabantfu,” kusho Simakadze.
“Labaphakeme nalabaphansi bayawufela kulelive. Bangeke bangcwatjwe, futsi abayiwukhalelwa, futsi kute labayawubazilela nalabayawuhhula ngenca yabo.
Kute naloyawuphekela labo labafukeme kuze batewudvudvuteka, ngisho nalonguyise nome longunina, kute naloyawubanika sinatfo sekubadvudvuta.
“Ungangeni nasendlini lapho kunelidzili khona, uhlale phansi nabo, udle nabo, unatse nabo.

Ngobe naku lokushiwo nguSimakadze longuSomandla, Nkulunkulu wema-Israyeli, utsi: ‘Ngiyakwehlisela siphetfo, embikwemehlo enu nasemihleni yenu, siphetfo semisindvo yekujabula neyentfokoto, liphimbo lamakoti nelemyeni kulendzawo.’
Ubobe sewuyabatjela utsi: ‘Kungobe boyihlo bangilahla balandzela labanye bonkulunkulu, babasebentela, babakhonta. Bangifulatsela mine, bangete bawugcina umtsetfo wami, kusho Simakadze.
Kodvwa nine senitiphetse kabi kakhulu kwendlula boyihlo. Bukani nje kutsi ngulowo nalowo wenu uyilandzela kanjani inkhani yenhlitiyo yakhe lembi, esikhundleni sekutsi ahloniphe mine.
Ngako-ke ngitanikhipha kulelive, nginiyise eveni leningazange senilati, nine kanye naboyihlo; lapho-ke niyawufike nikhonte labanye bonkulunkulu busuku nemini, ngobe angisayikuniphatsa ngesihe.’ ”

kodvwa bayakutsi: ‘Ngifunga kuphila kwaSimakadze, lowakhipha ema-Israyeli eveni lasenyakatfo, nakuwo onkhe emave lapho abebacoshele khona.’ Ngobe ngiyakubabuyisela kulelo live lengalinika boyisemkhulu.”
“Emehlo ami asetikwato tonkhe tindlela tabo, atikafihlakali kimi, nesono sabo asikasitsakali emehlweni ami.

Ngitabaphindzisela ngalokuphindziwe ngenca yetono tabo nangebubi babo, ngobe balingcolisile live lami ngetinhlobonhlobo tetitfombe tabo letingenamphefumulo, bagcwalisa lifa lami ngetithico tabo letinengekako.”
ngenca yetono kulo lonkhe live lenu.
Inhlitiyo iyayengana ngetulu kwato tonkhe tintfo,
unjalo umuntfu lotfola bunjinga ngetindlela letingakalungi.
Kuyawutsi nakasekhatsi nekhatsi nemphilo yakhe bumhlamuke,
uyati kutsi angikalilangateleli lilanga lekuphelelwa litsemba.
Ungabi silwane kimi, ngobe usiphephelo sami
Naku lokwashiwo nguSimakadze kimi, watsi: “Hamba ume esangweni lalabantfu, lapho emakhosi akaJuda aphuma angena khona, ume nakuwo onkhe emasango aseJerusalema.
Batjele, utsi: ‘Vanini livi laSimakadze, nine makhosi akaJuda, nani nonkhe bantfu bakaJuda, nani nonkhe lenihlala eJerusalema, leniphuma ningena kulamasango.
Naku lokushiwo nguSimakadze, utsi: Caphelani ningawetfwali umtfwalo ngeliSabatha, nome niwungenise emasangweni aseJerusalema.
Ningayetfwali imitfwalo niphume nayo etindlini tenu, nome-ke nente leminye nje imisebenti ngeliSabatha, kodvwa gcinani lilanga leliSabatha libe ngcwele, njengaloku ngayala boyihlomkhulu.
Noko abazange bangilalele, abanginakanga nekunginaka; baba nenkhani, bangete bangilalela, futsi abazange baphendvuke nome sebajeziswa.

ngako-ke emakhosi lahlala esihlalweni sebukhosi saDavide, ayawungena ngemasango alelidolobha akanye netindvuna tawo. Wona kanye netindvuna tawo ayawuta agibele tincola temphi kanye nemahhashi, baphekeletelwa bantfu bakaJuda nalabo labahlala eJerusalema; lelidolobha seliyawuhlala linebantfu phakadze naphakadze.

Bantfu bayawuchamuka emadolobheni akaJuda, kanye nasetabelweni letitungelete iJerusalema, naseveni lakaBhenjamini, nasemaceleni angasenshonalanga, naseveni letintsaba, naseNegevu, beta baletsa iminikelo yekushiswa nemihlatjelo, neminikelo yalokutinhlavu, nemphepho kanye neminikelo yekubonga endlini yaSimakadze.

Kodvwa naningangilaleli mine, kutsi nigcine liSabatha lami lingcwele ngekutsi ningetfwali nalomncane umtfwalo ngesikhatsi nisangena emasangweni aseJerusalema ngeliSabatha, ngako ngiyawube sengilumeka umlilo longacimeki emasangweni aseJerusalema, loyawudla netinqaba tayo.’ ”
Leli livi lelefika kuJeremiya liphuma kuSimakadze, litsi:
“Yehlela endlini yembumbi, ngulapho-ke lapho ngitakunikela khona umlayeto wami.”
Ngako-ke ngehlela endlini yembumbi, ngamkhandza enta umsebenti wakhe esondvweni.
Kodvwa imbita labeyibumba ngelibumba yonakala etandleni takhe, ngako lombumbi wase ubumba lenye inhlobo yembita, kwaya ngekubona kwemehlo akhe kutsi ufuna ibe njani.
Livi laSimakadze lase liyefika kimi, latsi:
“Awu, wenandlu yaka-Israyeli, ngingete ngenta yini kini njengaloku kwenta lombumbi?” kusho Simakadze. “Njengelibumba etandleni tembumbi, ninjalo nani esandleni sami, ninendlu yaka-Israyeli.
Nome ngangusiphi sikhatsi nangimemetela kutsi sive nome umbuso utawuzushunwa, ubhidlitwe uze ubhubhe,
nangabe futsi leso sive lengisecwayisile siphendvuka ebubini baso, ngiyawube sengiyasiyekela, ngingabe ngisasehlisela leso sehlakalo lebesengisilungisele sona.
Futsi-ke nangabe ngalesinye sikhatsi sengimemetela kutsi sive nome umbuso utakwakhiwa usime kahle,
nase sibuye senta bubi emehlweni ami, sangete sangilalela mine, ngiyawube sengiyasiyekela ngingabe ngisasentela loko lokuhle lebesengikulungisele sona.
Kodvwa bayawuphendvula batsi: ‘Akunamsebenti. Sitatichubekela ngemasu etfu, ngulowo nalowo wetfu utatichubekela ngenkhani yenhlitiyo yakhe lembi.’ ”
kodvwa wena uyawati onkhe lamasu abo labafuna
futsi-ke ungacali utesule leto tono tabo embikwakho.
Naku lokushiwo nguSimakadze, utsi: “Hamba uyewutsenga ludziwo lapha kumbumbi. Tsatsa labanye balabadzala kanye nebebaphristi,
uphumele eSigodzini sakaBheni Hinomu, lesisekungeneni kweLisango leLudzengelo. Ufike lapho umemetele nangu umlayeto lengikutjela wona,

utsi: ‘Vanini nali livi laSimakadze, nine makhosi akaJuda, nani bantfu baseJerusalema. Naku lokushiwo nguSimakadze longuSomandla, Nkulunkulu wesive sema-Israyeli, utsi: Lalelani! Ngitakwehlisela inhlekelele kulendzawo letakwenta kutsi tonkhe tindlebe letiyakuva ngayo tilume.

Ngobe bangishiyile mine, benta lendzawo yaba yabonkulunkulu betive, bashise imihlatjelo kuyo kubonkulunkulu labangabati, bona kanye naboyisemkhulu, ngisho nemakhosi akaJuda, bagcwalise lendzawo ngengati lengenacala.

Bakhe tindzawo letiphakeme tekukhontela boBhali, bentela kushisa emadvodzana abo emlilweni abe ngiminikelo kuBhali, intfo lengingazange sengibayale ngayo futsi lengingazange sengiyisho, nalengazange seyifike nasengcondvweni yami.
Ngako-ke caphelani, ayeta emalanga lapho bantfu bangasayikuyibita khona lendzawo ngekutsi yiThofethi nome batsi Sigodzi sakaBheni Hinomu, kodvwa sebayawutsi Sigodzi Sekuhlatjwa, kusho Simakadze.
Ngiyawulibhidlita lelidolobha, ngilente libe yintfo yekuhlekisa; bonkhe labendlulako bayawumangala kakhulu, bahleke lusulu ngenca yemanceba alo.
Ngiyawubenta badle inyama yemadvodzana abo neyemadvodzakati abo, badle ngulowo nalowo inyama yemnakabo, ngenca yencindzetelo yekuvinjetelwa lokuyabe kwentiwa titsa letitfungatsana netimphilo tabo.’
“Bese-ke ubhidlita loludziwo embikwalabo lotabe uhamba nabo bakubukile,

utsi kubo: ‘Naku lokushiwo nguSimakadze longuSomandla, utsi: Ngitasibhidlita lesive kanye nalelidolobha njengaloludziwo lwalombumbi lolubhidlitiwe, futsi lolungasayiwuphindze luvusetelwe kabusha. Bayawungcwaba labafile babo eThofethi, bagcwale kuze kubete nendzawo
Nako-ke lengitakwenta kulendzawo nakulabo labahlala kuyo, kusho Simakadze: Lelidolobha ngitalenta lifanane neThofethi.

Emakhaya laseJerusalema nalawo emakhosi akaJuda, ayawungcola njengalendzawo, iThofethi, yebo, tonkhe tindlu lapho batfuncisele khona imphepho eluphahleni, batfuncisela emabutfo etinkhanyeti tasemazulwini, batfulula iminikelo yetinatfo kulabanye bonkulunkulu!’ ”
Jeremiya wase uyancandzeka esuka eThofethi, lapho abetfunywe khona nguSimakadze kutsi ayewuphrofetha, wema esibuyeni selithempeli laSimakadze wakhuluma kubantfu watsi:

“Naku lokushiwo nguSimakadze longuSomandla, Nkulunkulu wema-Israyeli, utsi: ‘Lalelani! Ngitatehlisela kulelidolobha nakuto tonkhe tabelo talo, tonkhe tehlakalo lengitimemetelele ngabo, kumelana nabo, ngobe babe nenkhani, bangete bawalalela emavi ami.’ ”
watsi akushaywe Jeremiya, umphrofethi, abanjwe afakwe esitokisini lesingaseSangweni LakaBhenjamini Lelisetulu lelalisethempelini laSimakadze.
Kwatsi ngakusasa nase Phashuri akhulule Jeremiya esitokisini, Jeremiya watsi kuPhashuri: “Libito lakho kuSimakadze akusesiye Phashuri, kodvwa sewunguMagori Misabibi.

Ngobe nguloko lokushiwo nguSimakadze, utsi: ‘Ngitakwenta ube sesabiso ngisho nakuwe cobo lwakho nakubo bonkhe bangani bakho; uyakubabona ngewakho emehlo bawa ngenkemba babulawa titsa tabo. Ngiyawuniketela wonkhe Juda enkhosini yaseBhabhulona, leyawubetfwala iye nabo eBhabhulona nome ibabulale ngenkemba.

Ngiyawubunikela bonkhe bunjinga balelidolobha etitseni tabo, sonkhe sivuno salo, konkhe kwalo lokuligugu, nayo yonkhe ingcebo yemakhosi akaJuda. Bayakuyitsatsa bahambe nayo ibe yimphango yabo, bayetfwale baye nayo eBhabhulona.
Wena-ke Phashuri, nabo bonkhe basekhaya kakho, niyawutfunjelwa eBhabhulona. Niyawufike nifele khona lapho, ningcwatjwe khona, wena kanye nabo bonkhe labangani bakho lophrofethe kubo emanga.’ ”
ente make wami kube ngulona thuna lami,
Livi laSimakadze lefika kuJeremiya ngesikhatsi inkhosi Sedekiya itfumela kuye boPhashuri, umsa waMalkhiya, nemphristi Zefaniya, umsa waMaseya. Bafike batsi:
“Ase usibutele nyalo kuSimakadze, ngobe naku Nebukhadnezari,
Kodvwa Jeremiya wabaphendvula, watsi: “Tjelani Sedekiya, nitsi:

‘Naku lokushiwo nguSimakadze, Nkulunkulu wema-Israyeli, utsi: Sengitanijikela ngilwe nani ngetikhali temphi letisetandleni tenu, lenitisebentisako ekulweni nenkhosi yaseBhabhulona kanye nemaBhabhulona lanivimbetele langephandle kwelubondza. Ngitatihlanganisa ndzawonye ngekhatsi kwalelidolobha.
Mine matfupha ngiyakulwa nani ngesandla leselulekile, nangengalo lenemandla, nangentfukutselo, nangesikhahlo, nangelulaka lolukhulu.
Ngiyawushaya labo labahlala kulelidolobha, emadvodza netilwane, bayakufa babulawe sifo lesibulalanako.

Simakadze utsi: Emvakwaloko Sedekiya, inkhosi yakaJuda, netindvuna tayo, nebantfu balelidolobha labayawusindza kulesifo lesibulalanako, nenkemba, nendlala, ngiyakubanikela kuNebukhadnezari, inkhosi yaseBhabhulona, nasetitseni tabo letifunana nemphilo yabo. Uyawubabulala ngenkemba, angabi naso nakancane nje sihawu, nesihe kanye neluvela.’ ”

Ngulowo nalowo loyawusala kulelidolobha uyakufa ngenkemba, nangendlala, nangesifo lesibulalanako. Kodvwa ngulowo nalowo lophuma atinikele kulamaBhabhulona lanivimbetele, uyawuphila; uyawusindzisa kuphila kwakhe.
Ngitimisele kwenta lokubi kulelidolobha, hhayi lokuhle, kusho Simakadze. Liyawuniketelwa etandleni tenkhosi yaseBhabhulona, ilibhubhise ngemlilo.’ ”
“Ngetulu kwaloko, khuluma kulendlu yenkhosi yakaJuda, utsi: ‘Vanini livi laSimakadze,
