ngako-ke, naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Simakadze, itsi: Ngiyakwelula sandla sami ngimelane na-Edomu, ngibulale bantfu bakhe netilwane takhe. Ngiyakumenta abe lihlane, kusukela eThemani kuze kuyewufika eDedani bayawubulawa ngenkemba.

Ngiyawukhiphela sibhongo etikwa-Edomu ngesandla sesive sami ema-Israyeli, i-Edomu bayakuyiphatsa ngendlela lefanele intfukutselo yami nelulaka lwami; bayakuyati imphindziselo yami, kusho iNkhosi Simakadze.’ ”
ngako-ke, naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Simakadze, itsi: Sekusedvute kutsi ngelule sandla sami ngimelane nemaFilisti, ngitawacedza emaKherethi, ngiwabhubhise lawo lasesele kugudla lwandle.
Ngiyakwehlisela imphindziselo lenkhulu etikwawo, ngiwajezise ngelulaka lwami. Ngulapho-ke bayawungati khona kutsi mine nginguSimakadze, nase ngehlisela imphindziselo etikwawo.’ ”
Ngemnyaka weli-11, ngelilanga lekucala lenyanga, kwefika livi laSimakadze kimi, latsi:

“Ndvodzana yemuntfu, njengobe iThire seyikhulume ngeJerusalema, yatsi: ‘Hha! Lisango lebetive selephukile, netivalo talo setigedvukele kimi, njengaloku seyibhidlikile iJerusalema, mine Thire sengitawuphumelela.’
Ngako-ke naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Simakadze, itsi: Ngimelana nawe, wena Thire, futsi ngitakuvusela tive letinyenti tikuhlasele, njengelwandle nalugubha emagagasi alo.
Tiyawubhidlita tibondza taseThire, tihhihlite nemibhoshongo yayo, ngiyawukhekhebula yonkhe imfuhlululu yayo, ngiyente ibe lidvwala lelingenalutfo.
Lena ekhatsi nelwandle iyawuba yindzawo yekweneka emanetha ekudweba, ngobe sengikhulumile, kusho iNkhosi Simakadze. Iyawuba yimphango yetive ngetive,
netabelo tayo letingaselwandle eveni layo tiyawuklabelwa ngenkemba. Ngulapho-ke bayawungati khona kutsi mine nginguSimakadze.
Uyawuklabela tabelo tenu eveni lenu ngenkemba; uyawukwakha tinqaba tekuvimbetela nine, akhe lutsango lwekuvimbetela luze lufike elubondzeni lwenu, anihlasele ngekuphakamisa emahawu, alwe nani.
Uyawucondzisa imijijimeto yakhe yemigcalakati yekubhidlita ngasetibondzeni takho, ashaye abhidlite imibhoshongo yakho ngetilimato takhe.

Emahhashi akhe ayawuba manyenti kangangekutsi lutfuli lalususako luyawunimbonya. Tibondza takho tiyawudledletela ngenca yemsindvo wemahhashi emphi, netinkalishi, netincola temphi, ngesikhatsi angena emasangweni akho njengebantfu nabangena edolobheni lelitibondza talo tifohliwe.
Tinselo temahhashi akhe tiyawugcobagcoba tonkhe titaladi takho, uyawubulala bantfu bakho ngenkemba, netinsika takho leticinile tiyawulahleka phansi.

Bayawuphanga bunjinga bakho, batfumbe netimphahla takho letitsengwa titsengiswe, bayawubhidlitela phansi tibondza takho, bahhihlite tindlu takho letinhle, balahle ematje akho, netingodvo leticinile, nayo yonkhe imfuhlululu elwandle.
Ngiyakuticedza tonkhe tingoma takho letinemsindvo; nemculo wemahabhu akho awusayiwuphindza uvakale.
Ngiyawukwenta ube lidvwala lelingenalutfo, uyawuba yindzawo yekweneka emanetha ekudweba. Awusayiwuphindza wakhiwe kabusha, ngobe mine Simakadze sengikhulumile, kusho iNkhosi Simakadze.

“Naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Simakadze kuyo iThire, itsi: Akayiwutfutfumela yini emave langaselwandle ngenca yemsindvo wekuwa kwakho, ngesikhatsi labanemanceba babubula bakhala nase babulawa ngenkemba kuwe, Thire?

Lapho-ke bonkhe labakhulu bemave langaselwandle bayawukwehlela phansi, besuka etihlalweni tabo tebukhosi, babeke eceleni imijiva yabo, bakhumule tembatfo tabo letihlotjisiwe. Bayawuhlala phansi emhlabatsini bembetse kwesaba, batfutfumela ngato tonkhe tikhatsi, bamangaliswe nguwe.
Bayawube sebadzindza sililo macondzana nawe, batsi:

“Naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Simakadze, itsi: Nangikwenta lidolobha lese likhala libhungane njengemadolobha langasahlalwa bantfu, nangesikhatsi ngikhuphula tisekelo telwandle ngitibeke ngetulu kwakho nemanti alo akusibekela,

ngulapho-ke ngiyawukwehlisa nawe kanye nalabo labehlela phansi emgodzini, kubantfu basemandvulo. Ngiyawukuhlalisa endzaweni lengaphansi kwemhlaba, njengasetindzaleni takadzeni kanye nalabo labehlela phansi emgodzini, futsi ngeke ubuye nome utewutsatsa indzawo yakho eveni lalabaphilako.
Ngiyawukufikisa esiphetfweni lesesabekako, futsi ngeke uphindze ube khona. Uyawufunwa, ungete watfolakala, kusho iNkhosi Simakadze.”
Khuluma kuyo iThire, lengasesangweni lelibheke ngaselwandle, ingumhwebi webantfu basemaveni lagudla lwandle, utsi: ‘Naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Simakadze, itsi:
bakhi bakho benta buhle bakho baphelela,
balandza umsedari eLebanoni kutsi batekwakhela insika ngawo.
Ilineni lecolisakele nalehlotjisiwe yaseGibhithe kwakungulona seyili lakho
lelalisebenta njengesiboniso sakho; emathende akho abentiwe
Agaca emahawu awo netimphantitje tawo kuwe,
“ ‘Emadvodza aseBhethi Togama ashintjiselana nawe ngemahhashi emisebenti, newemphi nangeminyuzi ngetimphahla takho.

“ ‘BaseDamaseko nabo babekutsengisela kakhulu ngemikhitsito yakho nangebunjinga bakho lobukhulu betinhlobonhlobo tetimphahla letitsengiswako, bona-ke babekutsengisela tona ngeliwayini laseHelboni nangensontfo yaseSahari.
“ ‘BakaDani nemaGriki ase-Uzali babetsenga timphahla takho ngensimbi lebunjiwe, nangetinandzisi ikhasiya nekhalamusi.
“ ‘BaseDedanki bona babetsengiselana nawe ngetingubo tetihlalo temahhashi.
“ ‘Bahwebi baseSheba nebaseRama babetsengiselana nawe; ngetimphahla takho tekutsengiswa babekunika tinhlobonhlobo tetinongo leticolisakele, netematje laligugu, negolide.
“ ‘BaseHarani, nebaseKhane, nebase-Edeni kanye nebahwebi baseSheba, nebase-Asiriya, nebaseKhilmadi nabo babetsengiselana nawe.
Emakethe yakho babetsengiselana nawe ngekwekwembatsa lokuhle, nangetindvwangu letiluhlata njengesibhakabhaka, nangetintfo letihlotjisiwe, nangematjalo
ngesikhatsi babubula bakhala ngenca yakho, batsi:
“Ndvodzana yemuntfu, shano kumbusi waseThire, utsi: ‘Naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Simakadze, itsi:
“Ndvodzana yemuntfu, dzindza sililo ngenkhosi yaseThire, utsi kuyo: ‘Naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Simakadze, itsi:
kwadzimate kwaba ngumhlazana bubi butfolakala kuwe.
Ngako ngase ngenta kutsi kuphume umlilo kuwe,
“Ndvodzana yemuntfu, bhekisa buso bakho ngaseSidoni; uphrofethe umelane nayoy,
“ ‘Bantfu baka-Israyeli abaseyikuba nabo bomakhelwane labanetinhlitiyo letedzelelako, labangemanyeva lanesitfozi nalacijile. Ngulapho-ke bayawukwati khona kutsi mine ngiyiNkhosi Simakadze.

“ ‘Naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Simakadze, itsi: Nangibutsa sive saka-Israyeli etiveni, lapho besihlakatelwe khona, ngiyawutibonakalisa ngingcwele emkhatsini waso embikwetive. Siyawube sesihlala eveni lelingelaso, lengaliniketa inceku yami Jakobe.

Siyawuhlala lapho siphephile, sakhe tindlu, sihlanyele emasimi emagelebisi; sona siyawuhlala siphephile, nase ngehlisela sijeziso kubo bonkhe bomakhelwane baso labasidlela umona. Ngulapho-ke bayawukwati khona kutsi mine nginguSimakadze Nkulunkulu wabo.’ ”
Ngemnyaka welishumi, enyangeni yelishumi, ngelilanga leli-12, kwefika livi laSimakadze kimi, latsi:
“Ndvodzana yemuntfu, bhekisa buso bakho ngakuFaro, inkhosi yaseGibhithe, uphrofethe umelane nayo kanye nayo yonkhe iGibhithe.
Khuluma kuyo utsi: ‘Naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Simakadze, itsi:
wena kanye nato tonkhe tinhlanti temifula yakho.
Batsi nabakubamba ngetandla tabo, wavavabuka ekhatsi, wadzabula emahlombe abo avuleka; batsi beyama kuwe, wephuka, imihlane yabo yashumphuka.
“ ‘Ngako-ke naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Simakadze, itsi: Ngiyawutfumela inkemba imelane nawe, ngibulale bantfu bakakho netifuyo tabo.
IGibhithe iyawuba lihlane lelingenamsebenti walutfo. Ngulapho-ke bayawukwati khona kutsi mine nginguSimakadze.
ngako-ke ngiyemelana nawe kanye nemifula yakho, live laseGibhithe ngiyawulenta libe yimfuhlululu, lisale likhala libhungane, kusukela eMigdoli kuye e-Aswani,
Kute lunyawo lwemuntfu nome lwesilwane loluyawunyatsela kulo. Kute loyawuhlala kulo kuze kuphele iminyaka lengema-40.

Live laseGibhithe ngiyawulenta libe lihlane kunawo onkhe emave lagagadzekile, nemadolobha alo ayawusala angenabantfu iminyaka lengema-40 emkhatsini wemadolobha labhidlitiwe. Ngiyawubahlakata baseGibhithe ngibayise etiveni, ngibasakatele emaveni ngemave.
“ ‘Noko naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Simakadze, itsi: Ekupheleni kweminyaka lengema-40 ngiyawubabutsa baseGibhithe etiveni ngetive, lapho bebahlakatekele khona.
Kuyawuba ngumbuso lotfobe kunayo yonkhe leminye, futsi ngeke uphindze utiphakamise ngetulu kwaletinye tive. Ngiyakuwenta ube butsakatsaka kakhulu kangangekutsi ungasaphindzi ubuse etikwetive.

IGibhithe ingeke isaba ngumtfombo wemandla esibindzi kubantfu baka-Israyeli, kodvwa iyawuba sikhumbuto sesono sabo, nabajikela kuyo bacela lusito. Ngulapho-ke bayawukwati khona kutsi mine ngiyiNkhosi Simakadze.’ ”
Kwefika livi laSimakadze kimi ngemnyaka wema-27, enyangeni yekucala, ngelilanga lekucala, latsi:

“Ndvodzana yemuntfu, Nebukhadnezari, inkhosi yaseBhabhulona, washucisa emabutfo akhe kamatima wahlasela iThire; tonkhe tinhloko tasingwa taba tincacadvu, nawo onkhe emahlombe abo aba nesikofu. Noko yena kanye nemabutfo akhe abazange babuyelwe lutfo ngalomkhankhaso labawenta ngekuhlasela iThire.

Ngako-ke naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Simakadze, itsi: Ngitawunikela iGibhithe kuNebukhadnezari, inkhosi yaseBhabhulona, uyawutfumba umcebo wayo. Uyawuphanga atfumbe ingcebo yalelive kube yinkhokhelo yemabutfo akhe.
Ngimnike iGibhithe, yaba yinkhokhelo yekukhandleka kwakhe, ngobe yena nemabutfo akhe bakwentela mine, kusho iNkhosi Simakadze.
“Ndvodzana yemuntfu, phrofetha, utsi: ‘Naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Simakadze, itsi:
“ ‘Ngalelo langa kuyawuphuma titfunywa kimi, tiphume ngemikhumbi tiyekwesabisa baseKushe,
futsi ngiyawusakata kwesaba kulo lonkhe live.
lapho-ke emandla ayo letigabatisa ngawo ayawuphela.
Ngemnyaka weli-11, enyangeni yekucala, ngelilanga lesikhombisa, livi laSimakadze lefika kimi, latsi:
“Ndvodzana yemuntfu, ngiwephulile umkhono waFaro, inkhosi yaseGibhithe. Bewungakaboshelwa kutsi uphiliswe, futsi ungakasinyiswa nangetindvuku kuze ucine ngalokwenele kutsi ubambe inkemba.

Ngako-ke naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Simakadze, itsi: Ngimelene naFaro, inkhosi yaseGibhithe. Ngiyakuyephula yomibili imikhono yakhe, wona lona losengakephuki kanye nalona losewephukile, ngidzilite inkemba esandleni sakhe.
BaseGibhithe ngiyawubasakatela etiveni ngetive, ngibasakatele emaveni ngemave.

Ngiyakuyicinisa imikhono yenkhosi yaseBhabhulona, ngifake inkemba yami esandleni sayo, kodvwa yona imikhono yaFaro ngiyakuyigamula. Uyawububula embikwenkhosi yaseBhabhulona njengemuntfu phaca logwaziwe.

Ngiyakuyicinisa imikhono yenkhosi yaseBhabhulona, kodvwa imikhono yaFaro iyawulenga ijikite. Ngulapho-ke bayawukwati khona kutsi mine nginguSimakadze, mzukwana ngibambisa inkhosi yaseBhabhulona inkemba yami ngesandla sayo, iyijikitisele bona baseGibhithe.
BaseGibhithe ngiyakubahlakatela, etiveni ngetive, ngibasakatele emaveni ngemave. Ngulapho-ke bayawukwati khona kutsi mine nginguSimakadze.”
Ngemnyaka weli-11, enyangeni yesitsatfu, ngelilanga lekucala, livi laSimakadze lefika kimi, latsi:
“Ndvodzana yemuntfu, khuluma kuFaro, inkhosi yaseGibhithe, nakuletihlwele takhe temabutfo, utsi:
imifudlana yato yayigeleta ngala nangala kwawo,
takhela tidleke tato emagaleni awo lamakhulu,
“ ‘Ngako-ke naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Simakadze, itsi: Njengobe wawuphakeme, wengamele onkhe emacembe lahlangene, nanjengobe bewutigcabha ngalobudze bawo,
ngawuniketela etandleni tembusi wetive, kuze kutsi yena atewuphatsa ngaleyo ndlela yebubi bawo. Ngawukhweshisela eceleni,

kwase kutsi tive tangaphandle letinelunya kakhulu tawujuba, tase tiyawushiya. Emagala awo lamakhulu awela etintsabeni nasetigodzini tonkhe; emagala awo asala phansi ephukile kuto tonkhe tihosha telive. Tonkhe tive temhlaba taphuma ngaphansi kwemtfunti wawo, tawushiya.
Tonkhe tinyoni tasemoyeni tahlala etikwalesihlahla lesiwile, nato tonkhe tilwane tesiganga tabasemkhatsini walamagala awo.

Ngako-ke kute letinye tihlahla letingasemantini letiyawuphakama tiye etulu ngekutigcabha, tiphakamisele tihloko tato tengamele emacembe lahlangene. Kute letinye tihlahla letiniselwa kahle letiyawuke tikhule tibe tidze ngangaleso sihlahla; tonkhe timiselwe kufa, tiye ngaphansi kwemhlaba, emkhatsini webantfu lababhubhako, kanye nalabo labehlela emgodzini.
“ ‘Naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Simakadze, itsi: Ngalelo langa lomsedari lowehliselwa ngalo ethuneni
Tive ngatitfutfumelisa ngemsindvo wekuwa kwawo ngesikhatsi ngiwehlisela ethuneni
Labo labebahlala emtfuntini wawo, tihlobo tawo
“ ‘Lona nguFaro nato tonkhe tihlwele takhe temabutfo, kusho iNkhosi Simakadze.’ ”
Ngemnyaka weli-12, enyangeni yeli-12, ngelilanga lekucala, livi laSimakadze lefika kimi, latsi:
“Ndvodzana yemuntfu, lila, ulilele Faro, inkhosi yaseGibhithe, utsi:
Ngiyawukwenta tonkhe tinyoni telizulu takhele etikwakho,
nase ngiletsa imbhubhiso yakho emkhatsini wetive,
nemakhosi ato ayawushaciswa kwesaba ngenca yakho,
yebo, emachawe lanelunya kwendlula tonkhe tive.
kutsi tonkhe ticumbi tebantfu bayo tiketulwe.
Ngiyawutsi nase ngenta iGibhithe ibe lihlane,
“Lesi sililo labayakuyihlabelela sona. Emadvodzakati etive ayakusihlabela; ngobe ayawulilela iGibhithe neticumbi tayo, kusho iNkhosi Simakadze.”
Ngemnyaka weli-12, ngelilanga leli-15 lenyanga yekucala,
“Ndvodzana yemuntfu, lilela ticumbi tebantfu baseGibhithe, bese ubehlisela emhlabeni longaphansi, yona kanye nemadvodzakati etive letinemandla kanye nalabo labehlela emgodzini.
Khuluma kubo utsi: ‘Nine nitsandvwe kwendlula labanye yini? Yehlani niyewulaliswa emkhatsini walabangakasoki.’
Bayawukuwa emkhatsini walabo lababulewe ngenkemba. Inkemba seyikhokhiwe; iGibhithe ayihudvulwe kanye nato tonkhe leto ticumbi tayo tebantfu.
Tingwazi letatinemandla kanye nalabebasitana neGibhithe, bemukela emaGibhithe eveni lalabafile.
“I-Asiriya ikhona lapho kanye nayo yonkhe imphi yayo; itungeletwe ngemathuna abo bonkhe lababulewe bayo, bonkhe labo lababulewe ngenkemba.
Emathuna abo asekujuleni kwemgodzi, nemphi yayo ilala itungelete lithuna layo. Bonkhe labo lababange kutfutfumela eveni lalabaphilako bagwaziwe, balahlwa phansi ngenkemba.

“I-Elamu ilapho, kanye nato tonkhe ticumbi tebantfu bayo labatungelete lithuna layo. Bonkhe bagwaziwe, balahlwa phansi ngenkemba. Bonkhe labo lababange kutfutfumela eveni lalabaphilako behla bangakasoki baya ngaphansi kwemhlaba. Betfwele lihlazo labo kanye nalabo labehlela emgodzini.

I-Elamu yendlalelwe umbhedze emkhatsini walabagwaziwe, kanye nato tonkhe ticumbi tebantfu bayo letitungelete lithuna layo. Bonkhe abakasokwa, babulewe ngenkemba. Njengobe kutfutfumelisa kwabo sekwandze nelive lonkhe lalabaphilako, betfwele lihlazo labo kanye nalabo labehlela emgodzini; balaliswe emkhatsini walabagwaziwe.
Abalali yini kanye nalamabutfo langakasokwa lasabulewe, lehlele phansi ethuneni
“Awu Faro, nawe futsi utakwephulwa ulale emkhatsini walabangakasoki, labo lababulewe ngenkemba.
“I-Edomu ilapho, emakhosi ayo nato tonkhe tiphatsimandla tayo; nome babenemandla, noko balaliswe kanye nalababulewe ngenkemba nalabo labangakasokwa, kanye nalabo labehlela emgodzini.

“Tonkhe tiphatsimandla tasenyakatfo nabo bonkhe baseSidoni balapho; behlela phansi kanye nalabagwaziwe bahlazekile, lite nome kwase kunekwesaba lokwase kubangwe ngemandla abo. Balele bangakasokwa kanye nalabo lababulewe ngenkemba, betfwala lihlazo labo kanye nalabo labehlela emgodzini.

Lite nome ngamenta wabanga kutfutfumela eveni lalabaphilako, kodvwa Faro nato tonkhe ticumbi tebantfu bakhe bayawulaliswa emkhatsini walabangakasoki, nalabo lababulewe ngenkemba, kusho iNkhosi Simakadze.”
“Ndvodzana yemuntfu, khuluma kubantfu bakini, utsi: ‘Nase ngiletsa inkemba ngimelana nelive lelitsite nebantfu balo, bese bakhetsa indvodza ibe yinye emkhatsini wabo bayente ibe ngumlindzi wabo,
lotawutsi nakabona inkemba ita itekumelana nelive, bese ushaya impalampala ecwayise bonkhe bantfu,
nangabe lomunye ayiva lempalampala kodvwa angasinaki lesecwayiso, inkemba ize ifike imbulale, ingati yakhe iyawubasenhloko yakhe.
Njengobe abeyivile impalampala nayikhala, kodvwa wangete wasinaka lesecwayiso, ingati yakhe iyawubasetikwakhe. Kube abesinakile lesecwayiso, abetawusindzisa kuphila kwakhe.

Kodvwa nangabe lomlindzi abona inkemba ita, angayishayi impalampala kwecwayisa bantfu, bese kuta inkemba idle munye wabo, lowo muntfu uyawususwa ngenca yesono sakhe, kodvwa ingati yalowo muntfu ngiyawuyibita kulowo mlindzi.’
“Ndvodzana yemuntfu, sengikubeke kutsi ube ngumlindzi wendlu yaka-Israyeli; ngako-ke vani livi lengilikhuluma kuwe, ubanike secwayiso lesiphuma kimi.

Nangikhuluma kumuntfu lomubi, ngitsi: ‘Awu wena muntfu lomubi, ngempela utakufa,’ wena-ke ungabe usakukhuluma loko kuye kutsi atiyekele tindlela takhe letimbi, lowo muntfu lomubi uyakufa ngenca yesono sakhe,
Kodvwa nangabe wena umecwayisa lomuntfu lomubi kutsi atiyekele tindlela takhe letimbi, yena angete atiyekela, lowo muntfu uyakufa ngenca yesono sakhe,

Khuluma kubo utsi: ‘Ngifunga kuphila kwami, kusho iNkhosi Simakadze, angikujabuleli kufa kwalomubi, kodvwa ngitsandza kutsi agucuke etindleleni takhe letimbi aphile. Gucukani! Gucukani etindleleni tenu letimbi! Ningafelani, ninendlu yaka-Israyeli?’

Nangabe ngitjela lolungile kutsi ngempela utawuphila, kodvwa yena bese wetsembela kuloko kulunga kwakhe, ente lokubi, kute nome sinye kuletento takhe letinhle latente kucala lesiyawukhunjulwa; uyakufa ngenca yaloko lokubi lakwentile.
Nangabe ngikhuluma kumuntfu lomubi, ngitsi: ‘Ngempela utakufa,’ kodvwa bese uyaphendvuka esonweni sakhe, ente loko lokucotfo nalokulungile,
nangabe abuyisela loko lakutsatsa njengesibambiso seseboleko, abuyisele naloko lakweba, alandzele timiso tekuphila, angakwenti lokubi, ngempela uyawuphila; angeke afe.
Kute nome sinye sono kuleto latentile lesiyawukhunjulwa simelane naye. Wente lokucotfo nalokulungile; ngempela uyawuphila.
Nangabe umuntfu lolungile agucuka ekulungeni kwakhe ente lokubi, loko uyawukufela.
Kantsi nangabe umuntfu lomubi agucuka ebubini bakhe ente lokucotfo nalokulungile, uyawuphila ngekwenta loko.
Noko, wenandlu yaka-Israyeli, utsi: ‘Indlela yaSimakadze ayikalungi.’ Kodvwa ngulowo nalowo wenu ngiyakumehlulela ngekwetindlela takhe.”
Ngemnyaka weli-12 wekutfunjwa kwetfu, enyangeni yelishumi, ngelilanga lesihlanu, indvodza leyayibaleke eJerusalema yeta kimi, yefika yatsi: “Lidolobha seliwile!”
Ngayitolo kusihlwa lendvodza isengakefiki, sandla saSimakadze sasisetikwami, wavula umlomo wami ekuseni lendvodza isengakefiki. Ngako umlomo wami wavuleka, ngangabe ngisabindza.
Livi laSimakadze lase liyefika kimi, latsi:

“Ndvodzana yemuntfu, bantfu labahlala kulawo madzibikelo eveni laka-Israyeli, batsi: ‘Abrahama bekunguye yedvwa, noko lonkhe lelive belilakhe. Kodvwa tsine sibanyenti; nakanjani lelive linikwe tsine kutsi libe letfu.’
Netsembele enkembeni yenu, nente tintfo letinengekako, ngulowo nalowo wenu ungcolisa umkamakhelwane wakhe. Kufanele yini kutsi lelive libe lenu?’

“Khuluma kubo, utsi: ‘Naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Simakadze, itsi: Ngifunga kuphila kwami, labo labasemadzilikelweni bayawubulawa ngenkemba, labo labasemaphandleni ngiyawubanikela etilwaneni tesiganga kutsi tibashwabudzele, kutsi labo labasetinqabeni nasemigedzeni babulawe sifo lesibulalanako.
Live ngiyawulenta libe lihlane lelingenalutfo, nemandla abo labebatigcabha ngawo ayakuphela atsi nya, tintsaba taka-Israyeli tiyakuba sikhotsa, kangangekutsi kubete nalowengca kuto.
Ngulapho-ke bayawukwati khona kutsi mine nginguSimakadze, nase ngente lelive laba lihlane lelingenalutfo ngenca yato tonkhe letintfo letinengekako labatentile.’ ”
“Wena-ke, ndvodzana yemuntfu, bantfu bakini bakhuluma ngawe ngasetindvongeni nangaseminyango yetindlu, bakafana imilomo ngawe, batsi: ‘Wotani nitekuva livi leliphuma kuSimakadze.’

Bantfu bami beta kuwe, njengobe bavame kwenta, bahlale embikwakho balalele emavi akho, kodvwa abawenti. Ngemilomo yabo bakhuluma kutsi batinikele, kodvwa tinhlitiyo tabo tibukhali, tifuna inzuzo lembi.
Yebo, kubo awusilutfo, ufanana nemuntfu lohlabela tingoma telutsandvo ngeliphimbo lelimnandzi, adlale nemntjingozi kamnandzi, ngobe emavi akho bayaweva, kodvwa bangawenti.
“Kuyawutsi konkhe loku nase kwenteka, ngobe vele kutakwenteka, ngulapho-ke bayawukwati khona kutsi umphrofethi abesemkhatsini wabo.”

“Ndvodzana yemuntfu, phrofetha umelane nebelusi baka-Israyeli; phrofetha ukhulume kubo, utsi: ‘Naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Simakadze, itsi: Nako kubelusi baka-Israyeli labatinakekela bona kuphela! Belusi akukafaneli yini kutsi banakekele umhlambi?
Nidla lihongo, nitembatsise ngetimphahla tensontfo, nitihlabele tifuyo telikhetselo, kodvwa aniwunakekeli umhlambi.
Anikaticinisi letibutsakatsaka naletigulako, anikatelaphi nabopha nemanceba aletilimele. Letedukile anikatifuni natibuyisa, nangete natifuna naletilahlekile. Nitibuse ngelunya, natiphatsa ngesihluku.
Ngako timvu tavele tasakateka, ngobe bekute umelusi, tatsi kube tisakateke, tagucuka taba kudla kwato tonkhe tilwane tesiganga.
Timvu tami tazulazula kuto tonkhe tintsaba nakuwo onkhe emagcuma laphakeme. Tasakateka kuwo wonkhe umhlaba, kwabate lotifunako nalotelusako.
“ ‘Ngako-ke, nine belusi, vanini livi laSimakadze, lelitsi:

Ngifunga kuphila kwami, kusho iNkhosi Simakadze, njengobe umhlambi wami weswele umelusi, waze waphangwa wagucuka waba kudla kwato tonkhe tilwane tesiganga, nanjengobe belusi bami bangazange bawufune umhlambi wami, kodvwa batinakekela bona kakhulu kunekunakekela umhlambi wami,
ngako-ke, awu, belusi, vanini livi laSimakadze, lelitsi:

Naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Simakadze, itsi: Ngimelene nalabelusi, futsi ngiyawubabeka licala ngalomhlambi wami. Ngiyawubesusa ekweluseni lomhlambi, khona labelusi bangetiwuchubeka nekutondla bona. Ngiyawutephula timvu tami emilonyeni yabo, futsi tingeke tiphindze tibe kudla kwabo.’ ”
“ ‘Ngobe naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Simakadze, itsi: Mine ngekwami ngitatifunela letimvu tami, ngitelusele.

Njengemelusi nakeluse umhlambi wetimvu takhe losakatekile, nakanato, kanjalo nami ngiyawutelusela timvu tami. Ngiyawutephula kuto tonkhe tindzawo lapho tisakatelwe khona ngalelo langa lemafu nelebumnyama.
Ngiyawutikhipha emkhatsini wetive, ngitibutse emaveni, bese ngitibuyisela eveni lato. Ngiyakutelusela etintsabeni taka-Israyeli, ngasemifuleni, nasetindzaweni tonkhe letakhiwe eveni.

Ngiyawutelusela edlelweni lelihle, netintsaba letiphakeme taka-Israyeli tiyawuba ngemadlelo ato. Lapho-ke tiyawulala phansi edlelweni lelihle, ngulapho tiyawuklaba khona edlelweni lelineluhlata, etintsabeni taka-Israyeli.
Mine ngekwami ngiyawukwelusa timvu tami ngitilalise phansi, kusho iNkhosi Simakadze.

Ngiyakutifuna letilahlekile, naletedukile ngitibuyise. Letilimele ngiyawutibopha emanceba, ngiticinise emadvolo letibutsakatsaka, kodvwa letesulekile naleticinile ngiyawutibhubhisa. Ngiyakwelusa umhlambi ngemtsetfocotfo.

Akukeneli yini kini kutsi niklabe edlelweni lelihle? Futsi kufanele yini kutsi nigcobagcobe lencenye yelidlelo ngetinyawo tenu? Akukeneli yini kini kunatsa lamanti lahlobile? Kufanele yini kutsi niwadvunge ngetinyawo tenu lamanti?
Lomhlambi wami kufanele yini udle loko lese nikugcobagcobile, uphindze unatse loko lese kudvungwe tinyawo tenu?
“ ‘Ngako-ke naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Simakadze kubo, itsi: Bukani la, mine matfupha ngitakwehlulela emkhatsini wetimvu letikhuluphele netimvu letondzile.
Njengobe nitifuca ngemhlubulo nangelihlombe, nitigcubule ngetimphondvo tenu tonkhe timvu letibutsakatsaka, nize niticoshe tihambe,
mine-ke ngitawusindzisa umhlambi wami, ungeke uphindze uphangwe. Ngiyakwehlulela emkhatsini wemvu nemvu.
Ngiyawubeka etikwato umelusi abe munye, inceku yami Davide, yena uyawutinakekela; uyakuba ngumelusi wato, atinakekele.
Mine Simakadze ngiyawuba nguNkulunkulu wato, nenceku yami Davide abe yinkhosi emkhatsini wato. Mine, Simakadze, sengikhulumile.
Ngiyawubusisa tona kanye netindzawo letitungelete ligcuma lami.

Tihlahla tesiganga tiyawutsela titselo tato, nemhlaba umilise tilimo tawo; bantfu bayawuhlala baphephile eveni labo. Bayawukwati kutsi mine nginguSimakadze, nase ngephula lijoko labo lensimbi, ngibephula etandleni talabo lababagcilatile.
Bangeke baphiindze baphangwe tive, netilwane tesiganga futsi tingeke tiphindze tibashwabudzele. Bayawuhlala baphephile, kute futsi loyawubesabisa.
Ngiyawubalungiselela live lelatiwa ngetilimo talo, bangeke baphindze babe kudla kwendlala kulelo live, nome babe yintfo yekwedzelelwa tive.
Ngulapho-ke bayawukwati khona kutsi mine Simakadze longuNkulunkulu wabo nginabo, nekuktsi bona labayindlu yaka-Israyeli, basive sami, kusho iNkhosi Simakadze.
“ ‘Nine, timvu tami, timvu telidlelo lami, nisive sami, mine nginguNkulunkulu wenu, kusho iNkhosi Simakadze.’ ”
“Ndvodzana yemuntfu, bhekisa buso bakho ngaseveni letintsaba i-Edomu,
utsi: ‘Naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Simakadze, itsi: Ngimelene nawe, Edomu,
Emadolobha akho ngiyakuwagucula abe ngemadzibikelo, live lakho libe lihlane. Ngulapho-ke uyawukwati khona kutsi mine nginguSimakadze.

ngako-ke, ngifunga kuphila kwami, ngiyawukunikela ekucitfweni kwengati yakho, futsi kuyawukucosha ngemuva, kusho iNkhosi Simakadze. Njengobe ungazange sewukutondze kucitsa ingati, kucitsa ingati kuyawukucosha ngemuva.
Tintsaba takho ngiyawutigcwalisa ngalabo labagwaziwe; yebo, labo lababulewe ngenkemba bayakuwa etikwemagcuma akho, nasetihosheni takho, nakuyo yonkhe imifudlana yakho.
Ngiyawukwenta ube lihlane phakadze; emadolobha akho angeke abe nebantfu. Ngulapho-ke uyawukwati khona kutsi mine nginguSimakadze.

ngako-ke, ngifunga kuphila kwami, ngiyawukuphatsa ngentfukutselo nangemona lowakubonakalisa kubaka-Israyeli ngekubatondza kwakho, nami ngiyawutenta ngatiwe emkhatsini wabo, nangikwehlulela, kusho iNkhosi Simakadze.

Ngulapho-ke uyawukwati khona kutsi mine Simakadze ngitivile tonkhe letintfo tekwedzelela letimbi lotikhulume ngetintsaba taka-Israyeli. Watsi: “Tentiwe taba lihlane, taniketwa tsine kutsi sitishwabudzele.”
Wangichoshela, wakhuluma kabi ngami ngaphandle kwekutibamba, ngakuva loko.
Naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Simakadze, itsi: Kuyawutsi umhlaba wonkhe usajabula, wena ngikwente ube lihlane.

Njengobe wajabula ngesikhatsi lifa lendlu yaka-Israyeli liba lihlane, nami-ke ngiyawukuphatsa kanjalo. Uyawuba lihlane, wena live letintsaba taseSeyiri, yebo, wena nalo lonkhe laka-Edomu. Ngulapho-ke bayawukwati khona kutsi mine nginguSimakadze.’ ”
Naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Simakadze, itsi: Sitsa sakhuluma ngani, satsi: “Hha! Ticongo takadzeni setilifa letfu.” ’

Ngako-ke phrofetha, utsi: ‘Naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Simakadze, itsi: Ngenca yekutsi banona kangaka banicosha yonkhe indzawo, naze naba lifa lato tonkhe letinye tive, nentfo yekuhlekisa neyekucashatwa bantfu,

ngako-ke vanini livi leNkhosi Simakadze, nine tintsaba taka-Israyeli: Naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Simakadze, kuto tintsaba nemagcuma, nasemifudlaneni, nasetihosheni, nakuto tindzawo letidzilitiwe, nakumadolobha lasala akhala libhungane, laphangwa laphukutwa ngito tonkhe tive letisele letinitungeletile.

“ ‘Naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Simakadze, itsi: Ngentfukutselo yami levutsako ngikhulume ngemelana nato tonkhe tive letisele, kanye nalo lonkhe laka-Edomu, ngobe batsatsa live lami balenta labo ngekujabula, nangenhlitiyo lembi, bentela kuphanga emadlelo alo.’

“Ngako-ke phrofetha macondzana nelive laka-Israyeli, ukhulume kuto tintsaba nemagcuma, nasemifudlaneni netihosha, utsi: ‘Naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Simakadze, itsi: Ngikhuluma ngelulaka lwami nangesikhwele sami, ngobe senive buhlungu bekwedzelelwa tive.
Ngako-ke naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Simakadze, itsi: Ngifunga ngekuphakamisa sandla sami, ngitsi, tive lenakhelene nato tiyawuva buhlungu bekwedzelelwa.
“ ‘Kodvwa nine, tintsaba taka-Israyeli, niyawuhluma emagala, nitselele sive sami ema-Israyeli titselo tenu, ngobe siyawubuya ekhaya masinyane.
Ngobe ngihluphekile ngani, futsi ngiyawunibuka ngeluvelo, niyawulinywa nihlanyelwe,
ngibuye ngandzise sibalo sebantfu kini, yebo yonkhe indlu yaka-Israyeli. Emadolobha ayawuphindze ahlalwe bantfu, netindzawo letibhidlitiwe takhiwe kabusha.

Ngiyakwandzisa sibalo sebantfu nesetilwane kini, yebo, kuyawutalana kwandze. Ngiyawuhlalisa bantfu kini njengaloku kwakwenteka kucala, ngibuye nginente niphumelele ninjinge kakhulu kunakucala. Ngulapho-ke niyawukwati khona kutsi mine nginguSimakadze.
Ngiyawukwenta bantfu, lekusive sami ema-Israyeli, kutsi bahambe etikwenu. Nine seniyawuba babo, nibe lifa labo; aniseyiwuphindze nibemuke bantfwababo.
“ ‘Naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Simakadze, itsi: Ngenca yekutsi bantfu bakhuluma kuwe, live laka-Israyeli, batsi: “Udla bantfu, udlelele sive sakho bantfwabaso,”
ngako-ke awusayikudla bantfu nome wente sive sakho singabi nabantfwana, kusho iNkhosi Simakadze.
Angisayikwenta uphindze uve kuchukulutwa tive, futsi awusayikubuva buhlungu bekuhlekwa betive nome uwise sive sakho, kusho iNkhosi Simakadze.’ ”
Livi laSimakadze laphindze lefika kimi, latsi:

“Ndvodzana yemuntfu, ngesikhatsi sive sema-Israyeli sisahlala eveni laso, salingcolisa ngekutiphatsa kabi kwaso nangetento taso. Kutiphatsa kwaso emehlweni ami kwakufanana nekungcola kwemfati kwanyangatonkhe.
Ngako ngatfululela lulaka lwami etikwabo, ngobe bese bacitse ingati kulelo live, nangobe bese balingcolise ngaletithico tabo.
Ngabahlakatela emkhatsini wetive, basakateka emaveni ngemave; ngabehlulela ngangekwekutiphatsa kwabo, nangangekwenta kwabo.
Yonkhe indzawo lapho baya khona etiveni balihlambalata Libito lami lelingcwele, ngobe kwakukhulunywa ngabo kutsiwe: ‘Lesi sive saSimakadze, kodvwa noko kwakufanele balishiye live lakhe.’
Ngaphatseka kabi ngeLibito lami lelingcwele, lelahlanjalatwa yindlu yaka-Israyeli emkhatsini wetive, lapho bebaye khona.

Ngitawukhombisa bungcwele beLibito lami lelikhulu, lebeselihlanjalatwe emkhatsini wetive, Libito lenilihlambalate emkhatsini wato. Ngulapho-ke tive tiyawukwati khona kutsi mine nginguSimakadze, nase ngitibonakalisa ngani kutsi mine ngingcwele, embikwemehlo ato, kusho iNkhosi Simakadze.
“ ‘Ngobe ngiyawunikhipha emkhatsini wetive, ngiyawunibutsa kuwo onkhe emave, nginibuyisele eveni lelingelenu.
Ngiyawunifafata ngemanti lahlobile, bese niyahlanteka; ngiyawunihlanta kuko konkhe kungcola kwenu nakuto tonkhe tithico tenu.
Ngiyawuninika inhlitiyo lensha, ngifake umoya lomusha ekhatsi kini; ngiyawuyikhipha inhlitiyo lelitje kini, ngininike inhlitiyo yenyama.
Ngiyawufaka Moya wami kini, nginente nilandzele timiso tami, nicaphele kugcina imitsetfo yami.
Niyawuhlala eveni lengalipha boyihlomkhulu, niyawuba sive sami, mine ngibe nguNkulunkulu wenu.
Ngiyawuniphephisa kuko konkhe kungcola kwenu. Ngiyawubita lokutinhlavu, ngikwandzise kube kunyenti, ngingayehliseli kini indlala.
Nigyakwandzisa titselo tetihlahla, netivuno temasimi, kuze ningetiwutseleka ngelihlazo emkhatsini wetive ngenca yendlala.
Lapho-ke niyawutikhumbula tindlela tenu letimbi netento tenu letinengekako, niyawutenyanya ngenca yetono tenu nangetento tenu letinengekako.
Ngifuna nati kutsi loko angikwenti ngenca yenu. Banini nemahloni nihlazeke ngenca yekutiphatsa kwenu kabi, ninendlu yaka-Israyeli, kusho iNkhosi Simakadze.
“ ‘Naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Simakadze, itsi: Mzukwana nginihlanta kuto tonkhe tono tenu, ngiyakuwatintisa kabusha emadolobha enu, netindzawo tenu lebetibhidlitiwe tiyakwakhiwa kabusha.
Live lelase likhala libhungane liyawulinywa esikhundleni sekutsi lisale liliihlane lelingenalutfo emehlweni abo bonkhe labengca kulo.

Bayawutsi: “Lelive belilihlane lelingenalutfo selihlume laba njengensimi yase-Edeni; emadolobha labesasele atindzala, sekukhala libhungane kuwo, asabhujisiwe, nyalo asabiyelwe futsi asahlalwa bantfu.”

Lapho-ke tive leniyawube nakhelene nato letiyawube tisasele tiyawukwati kutsi mine Simakadze, ngikwakhe kabusha loko lokwase kubhujisiwe, ngabuye ngahlumisa loko lokwase kulihlane. Mine Simakadze sengikhulumile, futsi ngitawukwenta.’

babe banyenti ngangemihlambi yeminikelo eJerusalema, ngetikhatsi temikhosi yakhona lemisiwe. Kanjalo-ke kulamadolobha labebhidlitiwe kuyawunyakatela bantfu. Ngulapho-ke bayawukwati khona kutsi mine nginguSimakadze.”
Wangihola angiyisa enhla nentasi emkhatsini walamatsambo. Ngabona kutsi sonkhe lesigodzi sasigcwele ematsambo lapha phansi, lamatsambo futsi abome nkhwa.
Wangibuta watsi: “Ndvodzana yemuntfu, lamatsambo angaphila yini?”
Ngatsi mine: “Awu, Nkhosi, Simakadze, nguwe wedvwa lowatiko.”
Wase utsi kimi: “Phrofetha kulamatsambo, utsi kuwo: ‘Nine matsambo lomile, vanini livi laSimakadze!
Naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Simakadze kulamatsambo, itsi: Ngitakwenta umphefumulo
Ngitawuhlumisa imisipha kini, ngente inyama imile kini, nginembese ngesikhumba, ngitawufaka umphefumulo kini, nitawube seniyaphila. Ngulapho-ke niyawukwati khona kutsi mine nginguSimakadze.’ ”
Ngako ngaphrofetha njengobe ngangiyaliwe. Ngatsi ngisaphrofetha, kwaba nemsindvo, kwakhala bukhehlekhehle, ematsambo ahlangana, litsambo laya etsanjeni.
Ngatsi ngiyabuka, kwavela kuwo imisipha nenyama, ngabona sikhumba siwembesa, kodvwa kwakute umphefumulo kuwo.
Ngako-ke phrofetha, utsi kubo: ‘Naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Simakadze, itsi: Awu, sive sami, ngitawugwabula emadliza enu, nginikhiphe kuwo; ngiyawunibuyisela eveni lenu laka-Israyeli.
Ngulapho-ke niyawukwati khona, nine bantfu bami, kutsi mine nginguSimakadze, mhlazane ngivula emathuna enu nginikhipha kuwo.
Ngiyawufaka Moya wami kini, bese niyaphila, ngiyawunihlalisa eveni lenu. Lapho-ke niyawube seniyati kutsi mine Simakadze sengikhulumile, futsi sengikwentile, kusho Simakadze.’ ”

“Ndvodzana yemuntfu, tsatsa umzaca ubhale kuwo, utsi: ‘LongewakaJuda nema-Israyeli latihlanganise naye.’ Bese utsatsa lomunye futsi umzaca ubhale kuwo, utsi: ‘Longewaka-Efrayimu, nalongewakaJosefa nabo bonkhe bendlu yaka-Israyeli labatihlanganise naye.’
Yihlanganise ndzawonye, uyente ibe ngumzaca munye, khona itewuba yintfo yinye esandleni sakho.

ubobatjela kutsi mine, iNkhosi Simakadze, ngitawutsatsa lomzaca lomelele baka-Israyeli ngiwubeke kanyekanye nalona lomelele bakaJuda. Ngalemizaca lemibili ngitakwenta umzaca ube munye lengitawuphatsa ngesandla sami.
“Bamba ngesandla sakho lemizaca yomibili lobhale kuyo, wentele kutsi bantfu bayibone,

bese-ke uyabatjela kutsi: ‘Naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Simakadze, itsi: Ngitawubutsa sonkhe sive sami saka-Israyeli kuto tonkhe tive lapho sahlakatekela khona, ngisibutsele ndzawonye ngize ngisibuyisele eveni lelingelaso.

Ngiyawubenta babe sive sinye kulelo live, etintsabeni taka-Israyeli. Kuyawuba nenkhosi yinye leyawubabusa bonkhe, futsi abasayiwuphindze babe tive letimbili letehlukene nome behlukane babe ngimibuso lemibili.
Abasayikutingcolisa bona ngetithico tabo nangetitfombe letinengekako, nanganome ngusiphi setono tabo, ngobe ngiyawubasindzisa kuto tonkhe tono tabo tekuhlubuka,

Bayawuhlala eveni lengalipha inceku yami Jakobe, live lapho kwakuhlala khona boyihlomkhulu. Bona kanye nebantfwababo, kanye nebantfwana bebantfwababo, bayawuhlala lapho phakadze naphakadze; naDavide, inceku yami, uyawuba yinkhosi yabo phakadze naphakadze.
Ngiyawukwenta sivumelwane sekuthula nabo, siyawuba sivumelwane saphakadze. Ngiyawubahlalisa kahle batinte, ngibente bandze, ngibeke indzawo yami lengcwele emkhatsini wabo phakadze naphakadze.
Indzawo yami yekuhlala iyawuba kubo; mine ngiyawuba nguNkulunkulu wabo, bona babe bantfu bami.
Ngulapho-ke tive tiyawukwati khona kutsi mine Simakadze ngenta Israyeli kutsi abe ngcwele, ngesikhatsi indzawo yami lengcwele iyawuba kubo phakadze naphakadze.’ ”
“Ndvodzana yemuntfu, bhekisa buso bakho ngakuGogi waseveni lakaMagogi, indvuna lenkhulu
utsi: ‘Naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Simakadze, itsi: Ngimelene nawe, wena Gogi, ndvuna lenkhulu

Ngitakushayisa situngeletane, ngifake emadweba emihlatsini yakho, ngikukhiphe kanye nayo yonkhe imphi yakho, emahhashi akho, nebagibeli bakho bemahhashi labahlome baphelela, nelucucaba lwebantfu labahlome ngisho nangemahawu lamakhulu nalamancane, bonkhe bamengetelisa tinkemba tabo.
kanye neGomeri inawo onkhe emabutfo ayo, neBhethi Togama lengasekugcineni kwasenyakatfo nawo onkhe emabutfo akhona; tive letinyenti tikanye nawe.
“ ‘Caphela, tilungiselele, wena kanye nalolucucaba lwebantfu lababutsene lapha kuwe, ubahole.

Emvakwemalanga lamanyenti utawubitelwa embutfweni. Kuleminyaka letako utawuhlasela live leselibuyiswe emphini, lelibantfu balo babutfwa etiveni letinyenti, bayiswa etintsabeni taka-Israyeli letase tikhala libhungane kadzenidzeni. Bakhishwe etiveni ngetive, kodvwa nyalo bonkhe sebahlala bavikelekile.
Wena kanye nawo onkhe emabutfo akho netive letinyenti letinawe niyawukhuphuka, nishulungane njengesihhuhhula semoya, niyawuba njengelifu lelimbonya live.
“ ‘Naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Simakadze, itsi: Ngalelo langa kuyawufika imizindlo engcondvweni yakho, uyawukwakha lisu lelibi.
Uyakutsi: “Ngitawungenela live lelitabelo talo tingakabiyelwa, ngiyawuhlasela sive lesinekuthula, sive lesingakacapheli lutfo, bonkhe bahlala ebaleni bangakavikeleki, abanamasango namicabo.

Ngiyawubaphanga, ngibemuke timphahla, bese ngijikisela sandla sami kuletindzawo lebetidzilitiwe lesetakhiwe kabusha, nakulabantfu lababutfwe etiveni ngetive, sive lesesifuye kakhulu, kantsi sinetimphahla letinyenti futsi, bantfu labahlala enkhabeni yelive.”
BaseSheba, nebaseDedani, nebahwebi baseThashishi nebakuyo yonkhe imiti yayo
“Ngako-ke, ndvodzana yemuntfu, phrofetha utsi kuGogi: ‘Naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Simakadze, itsi: Ngalelo langa, mzukwana sive sami, ema-Israyeli, sesihlala sivikelekile, awuyiwukubona yini?
Uyawuchamuka endzaweni yakho lesenyakatfo lekhashane, wena netive letinyenti letikanye nawe, bonkhe bagibele emahhashi, inyakanyaka yemabutfo, imphi lenemandla kakhulu.

Uyawushuca usukele sive sami, ema-Israyeli, njengelifu lelisibekela live. Kulamalanga letako wena, Gogi, ngitakuyisa eveni lami, kuze tive titewungati mine nase ngitibonakalisa bungcwele bami ngawe tibukile.
“ ‘Naku-ke lokuyakwenteka ngalelo langa: Mzukwana Gogi ahlasela live laka-Israyeli, intfukutselo yami leshisako iyawuvuka, kusho iNkhosi Simakadze.
Ngenshisekelo yami nangelulaka lwami loluvutsako, ngiyasho ngitsi: Ngalelo langa kuyawuba nalokukhulu kutamatama kwemhlaba eveni laka-Israyeli.

Tinhlanti taselwandle, netinyoni tasemoyeni, netilwane tesiganga, nato tonkhe tilwanyakatana letinwabutelako emhlabatsini, nabo bonkhe bantfu labasebusweni bemhlaba, kuyawutfutfumela ebukhoneni bami. Tintsaba tiyawugumbuceleka, emawa ahhihlikele phansi, nato tonkhe tindvonga tiyawudzilikela emhlabatsini.
Ngiyawumbitela inkemba Gogi, imelane naye kuto tonkhe tintsaba tami. Inkemba yalowo nalowo muntfu iyawumelana nemnakabo, kusho iNkhosi Simakadze.

Ngiyawukhipha sigwebo sesifo lesibulalanako nesekucitseka kwengati; ngiyakwehlisela sihhuhhula semvula lenesangcotfo nesibabule lesivutsako etikwakhe nasetikwemabutfo akhe, nasetikwetive letinyenti letikanye naye.
Ngiyawubukhombisa kanjalo-ke bukhulu bami nebungcwele bami, ngiyawutenta kutsi ngatiwe emehlweni etive letinyenti. Ngulapho-ke bayawungati khona kutsi mine nginguSimakadze.’ ”
Ngitakushayisa situngeletane ngikuhudvule. Ngiyawukususa enyakatfo lekhashane, ngikuyise kuyawumelana netintsaba taka-Israyeli.
Ngiyawube-ke sengivitsita butjoki bakho esandleni sakho sangesancele, ngiyilahle phansi imicibisholo yakho lesesandleni sakho sangesekudla.

Uyakuwa etintsabeni taka-Israyeli, wena kanye nawo onkhe emabutfo akho netive letikanye nawe. Ngiyawukwenta ube kudla kuto tonkhe tinhlobonhlobo tetinyoni letidla letinye tilwane, nasetilwaneni tesiganga.
Uyawuwela phansi esigangeni kalashameshame, ngobe sengikhulumile, kusho iNkhosi Simakadze.
Ngiyawutfumela umlilo kuMagogi, nakulabo labahlala bavikelekile emaveni lagudla lwandle, bayawukwati kutsi mine nginguSimakadze.
Kuyeta! Nome kanjani kutakwenteka! Kusho iNkhosi Simakadze. Leli ngilo lilanga lengakhuluma ngalo.

Abasayiwudzinga kutsi bayewutfota tinkhuni etigangeni, nome batikabhe emahlatsini, ngobe bayawusebentisa letikhali ekubaseni umlilo. Bayawuphanga labo labebaphangile, babemuke timphahla labo lababebemuke timphahla tabo, kusho iNkhosi Simakadze.’ ”
“ ‘Ngalelo langa ngiyawuniketa Gogi indzawo yekungcwatjwa ka-Israyeli, esigodzini salabo labahamba besuka emphumalanga babheke ngaselwandle.
Bonkhe bantfu belive bayawubangcwaba, futsi lelo langa lengiyawukhatimuliswa ngalo kuyawuba lilanga leliyawuba yincophamlandvo kubo, kusho iNkhosi Simakadze.

“ ‘Kuyawukhetfwa emadvodza latsite kutsi ehle enyuke nalo lonkhe live ahambe angcwaba tonkhe tidvumbu latitfola tidzindzibele eveni, entele kuhlanta live. Kuyawutsi ekupheleni kwaletinyanga letisikhombisa acale kuphenya.
Kuyawutsi ekuhambeni kwabo eveni lonkhe, ngulowo atsi nakakhandza litsambo lemuntfu afinye lifindvo eceleni kwalo, kuze kufike laba labangcwabako, balitsatse bayelingcwaba esigodzini sakaHamona Gogi.
Lidolobha lekutsiwa yiHamona liyawuba khona lapho. Bayawulihlanta kanjalo-ke live.’
Niyawudla inyama yemadvodza lanemandla, ninatse ingati yebabusi bemhlaba, kube shangatsi bekutimvu nemazinyane, timbuti netinkunzi, konkhe kutilwane letikhuluphalisiwe taseBhashani.
Kulo lelidzili lenginilungisela lona, niyakudla emanoni nize ninafune, ninatse ingati nize nidzakwe.
Edzilini lami niyawudla nize nidzabuke tisu yinyama yemahhashi neyebagibeli bawo, neyetingwazi letinemandla neyayo yonkhe inhlobo yetihlabani,’ kusho iNkhosi Simakadze.”
“Ngiyawubonakalisa bukhosi bami emkhatsini wetive, tonkhe tive tiyawusibona sijeziso sami kuto nesandla sami lengisibeka etikwato.
Kusukela ngalelo langa kuye embili indlu yaka-Israyeli iyawungati kutsi mine nginguSimakadze Nkulunkulu wayo.

Netive titakwati kutsi sive saka-Israyeli saya ekutfunjweni ngenca yetono taso, ngobe babengaketsembeki kimi. Ngako ngase ngiyabufihla buso bami kubo, ngabaniketa etandleni tetitsa tabo. Bonkhe bafa ngenkemba.
Ngabaphatsa njengalokungcola kwabo, nanjengekona kwabo, ngabufihla buso bami kubo.
“Ngako-ke naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Simakadze, itsi: Manje sengitambuyisa Jakobe ekutfunjweni,
Bayakulikhohlwa lihlazo labo nako konkhe kungetsembeki kwabo labakwenta kimi, ngesikhatsi basahleti eveni labo bavikelekile, kute namunye labengabesabisa.
Nase ngibabuyisile etiveni sengibabutsile emaveni etitsa tabo, ngiyawubonakalisa bungcwele bami ngabo, emehlweni ato tonkhe tive.

Lapho-ke bayawube sebayati kutsi mine nginguSimakadze longuNkulunkulu wabo, ngobe nome ngabayisa ekutfunjweni emkhatsini wetive, ngiyawuphindze ngibabutsisele eveni lelingelabo, ngingashiyi namunye ngemuva.
Angisayikubufihla buso bami kubo, ngobe ngiyawutfululela Moya wami kuyo indlu yaka-Israyeli, kusho iNkhosi Simakadze.”

Emibonweni yaNkulunkulu wangitsatsa wangiyisa eveni laka-Israyeli, wafike wangimisa entsabeni lephakeme kakhulu, lekwatsi ngaseningizimu kwayo kwakunetindlu letatibukeka shangatsi ngulelikhulu lidolobha.
Wangiyisa khona, ngafike ngabona indvodza leyayibukeka njengelitfusi; yayime esangweni inelucotfo lwelineni nendvuku yekulinganisa esandleni sayo.

Lendvodza yakhuluma kimi, yatsi: “Ndvodzana yemuntfu, buka ngemehlo akho uve ngetindlebe takho, ulalelisise konkhe lengitakukukhombisa kona, ngobe nguloko lokungukona ukuletselwe lapha. Tjela indlu yaka-Israyeli konkhe loku lokubonako.”

Ngabona lubondza lolutungelete yonkhe lendzawo yelithempeli. Budze balendvuku yekulinganisa leyayisesandleni salendvodza babungemamitha labengaba matsatfu, wakala lolubondza. Lwalungemamitha labengaba matsatfu kuphakama, nemamitha labengaba matsatfu bucinsi balo.
Wase uya ngasendlini yelisango lelibheke ngasemphumalanga. Wakhuphuka titebhisi talo, wase ukala lobubanti bemphundvu yelisango, babungemamitha labengaba matsatfu.

Ngale kwemphundvu yelisango kwakunemhubhe lowawunemakamelo abogadzi lamatsatfu ngala nangala kwawo, likamelo lilinye lalisikwele lesimacala angemamitha labengaba matsatfu lilinye, letibondza letisemkhatsini wawo tatingemamitha labengaba mabili nesigamu bucinsi bato. Ngale kwalamakamelo abogadzi, kwakunalenye imphundvu yelisango leyayingemamitha labengaba matsatfu bubanti leyayingena emhubheni lowawubukene nelithempeli.
wawungemamitha labengaba mane bubanti, tibondza tawo tatingaba limitha linye bucinsi. Lomhubhe walendlu yelisango wawubukene nelithempeli.
Ngekhatsi kwalendlu yelisango langasemphumalanga kwakunemakamelo lamatsatfu luhlangotsi lulunye, omatsatfu abelingana ngebukhulu, naletibondza kuwo onkhe emacala awo tatilingana.
Lendvodza yase ilinganisa bubanti basekungeneni kwalelisango; babungemamitha labengaba sihlanu, bese kutsi budze bonkhe balo bube ngemamitha labengaba sitfupha nesigamu.
Embikwalelo nalelo kamelo labogadzi kwakunelubondza lolufishatane lolwalungaba sigamu selimitha kuphakama, nesigamu selimitha bucinsi balo, lamakamelo abesikwele lesingemamitha labengaba matsatfu.

Lendvodza yase ilinganisa bubanti balendlu yelisango, kusuka etulu elubondzeni lolungemuva kwelikamelo linye kuya etulu elubondzeni lolungemuva lwalelinye likamelo lelicondzene nalo lelimshiya ngaloya kwemhubhe wangekhatsi; yatfola kutsi babungemamitha labengaba li-12 nesigamu.

Lendvodza yakala kugudla lingembili letibonza, letiphume taphondla kutungeleta lingekhatsi lendlu yelisango, kwakungemamitha labengaba ngema-30. Lesilinganiso sasifikela kulomhubhe lowawubukene nesibuya.
Sebubonkhe budze balendlu yelisango kusukela elubondzeni lolungephandle ngasekungeneni kwalelisango kuya ekugcineni kwalomhubhe wekugcina, babungemamitha labengaba ngema-25.

Bekunemafasitelo lamancane kulolubondza lolungephandle lwalamakamelo abogadzi nakuleti letatisemkhatsini walamakamelo kanye nakulomhubhe yonkhe indzawo. Bekunetihlahla temasundvu letaticoshwe kuletibondza letingekhatsi letatibheke kulomhubhe wangekhatsi.

Lendvodza yase ingimikisa esibuyeni lesasingephandle. Nalapho ngafike ngabona emakamelo nesiyilo lesasakhiwe kuso sonkhe lesibuya kusitungeleta; kwakunemakamelo langema-30 kulesibuya, embikwawo kwakunelibala lelaliyilwe ngematje.
Lesiyilo sasiseceleni kwaletindlu temasango, bubanti baso babulingene nebudze baletindlu temasango. Lesi kwakusiyilo lesasingentansi.

Kwakunendlu yelisango leyayingenhla iphumela kuso sibuya sangekhatsi. Lendvodza yase ilinganisa budze kusukela ekugcineni kwalendlu yelisango kuya ekungeneni kwalena lenye, kwakungemamitha labengaba ngema-50.
Lendvodza yase ilinganisa budze nebubanti bendlu yelisango langasenyakatfo leyayiphumela esibuyeni lesingephandle.

Emakamelo ayo abogadzi, omatsatfu ngalapha nangalapha kwemhube wangekhatsi, netibondza letatisemkhatsini wawo, kanye nalomhubhe lobukene nesibuya, konkhe bekulingana nekwelisango langasemphumalanga. Sebubonkhe budze balendlu yelisango babungemamitha labengaba ngema-25, nebubanti bayo bungemamitha labengaba li-12 nesigamu.

Umhubhe wayo lobukene nesibuya, nemafasitelo ayo, netihlahla temasundvu letaticoshwe kuyo, konkhe kwakufanana tjika nalokwa kwendlu yelisango langasemphumalanga. Lapha titebhisi letisikhombisa tatikhuphukela emnyango walelisango, lomhubhe wayo wawusekugcineni, ubuke lesibuya.

Mshiya ngaloya kwalesibuya, kusuka kulendlu yelisango langasenyakatfo kwakunalenye indlu yelisango leyayiphumela kulesibuya sangekhatsi, njengasemphumalanga. Lendvodza yase ikala budze emkhatsini waletindlu temasango omabili, yakhandza kutsi bungemamitha labengaba ngema-50.
Lendvodza yase ingiyisa ngaseluhlangotsini lwangaseningizimu, nalapho sabona lenye indlu yelisango. Yakala tibondza tayo nemhubhe wayo lobukene nesibuya, konkhe kwakufanana tjika naloku lokunye.

Lendlu yelisango, nemhubhe wayo, kwakunemafasitelo yonkhe indzawo, njengakuleta letinye. Sebubonkhe budze balendlu yelisango babungemamitha labengaba ngema-25, bubanti bayo bungemamitha labengaba li-12 nesigamu.

Kwakunetitebhisi letisikhombisa letatikhuphukela kuyo, umhubhe wakhona nawo wawusekugcineni ubuke kulesibuya. Nakhona kwakunetihlahla temasundvu letaticoshwe kuletibondza letatibheke kulomhubhe wangekhatsi.

Nakhona lapha kwakunendlu yelisango leyayiphumela kulesibuya sangekhatsi. Lendvodza yase ikala budze kusuka kulelisango kuya kulelisango langaphandle ngaseningizimu, yakhandza kutsi bungemamitha labengaba ngema-50.

Lendvodza yangitsatsa yangidzabulisa indlu yelisango langaseningizimu, yaya nami kulesibuya sangekhatsi. Yayikala lendlu yelisango, yakhandza kutsi iyafanana naleti letinye letatikulolubondza lwangephandle.

Emakamelo ayo abogadzi, netibondza tayo tangekhatsi kanye nalomhubhe wayo kwakulingana nekwaleti letinye. Lendlu yelisango nalomhubhe wayo kwakunemafasitelo yonkhe indzawo. Yayingemamitha labengaba ngema-25 budze, nemamitha labengaba li-12 nesigamu bubanti.
Imihubhe yaletindlu temasango letatitungeleta sibuya sangekhatsi yayingemamitha labengaba li-12 nesigamu budze, nemamitha labengaba mabili nesigamu bubanti.

Umhubhe walendlu yelisango langaseningizimu wawukulesibuya sangephandle; tihlahla temasundvu taticoshwe kuletibondza tayo tangekhatsi. Kwakunetitebhisi letisiphohlongo letatikhuphukela ekungeneni kwelisango.
Lendvodza yangidzabulisa indlu yalelisango langasemphumalanga, yangingenisa esibuyeni sangekhatsi. Yayikala lendlu yelisango, yakhandza kutsi ilingana tjika naleti letinye.

Emakamelo ayo abogadzi netibondza tayo tangekhatsi kanye nalomhubhe wayo kwakulingana ncamashi nekwaleti letinye. Lendlu yelisango nalomhubhe wayo kwakunemafasitelo yonkhe indzawo. Sebubonkhe budze bayo babungemamitha labengaba ngema-25, nebubanti bayo babungemamitha labengaba li-12 nesigamu.

Lomhubhe wayo wawubheke esibuyeni sangephandle. Kwakucoshwe tihlahla temasundvu kuletibondza tayo tangekhatsi emaceleni omabili. Kwakunetitebhisi letisiphohlongo letatikhuphukela ekungeneni kwelisango.
Lendvodza yase ingiyisa endlini yelisango langasenyakatfo. Yayikala, yakhandza kutsi ilingana tjika naleti letinye.

Njengato nayo yayinemakamelo abogadzi, netibondza tangekhatsi, nemhubhe lobukene nesibuya, nemafasitelo yonkhe indzawo. Sebubonkhe budze bayo babungemamitha labengaba ngema-25, nebubanti bayo babungemamitha labengaba li-12 nesigamu.

Lomhubhe wayo lomunye wawubheke kulesibuya sangephandle. Kwakucoshwe tihlahla temasundvu kuletibondza tangekhatsi emaceleni omabili. Kwakunetitebhisi letisiphohlongo letatikhuphukela ekungeneni kwelisango.

Kulesibuya sangephandle kwakunesakhiwo, lesasichunywe kulendlu yelisango lelingekhatsi ngasenyakatfo. Sasiphumela kulomhubhe wayo lowawubheke kulesibuya, lapho-ke ngulapho babegezela khona letilwane letatitekwentiwa umhlatjelo wekushiswa samuku.

Kulomhubhe lobukene nesibuya kwakunematafula lamane, kumunye ngamunye umhlubulo wawo amabili, kutsi kuhlatjelwe etikwawo tilwane temhlatjelo wekushiswa samuku, netemhlatjelo wesono, netemnikelo wenhlawulo.
Ngephandle kwalomhubhe lobukene nesibuya kwakunematafula lamane lafananako, amabili ngala nangale kwemnyango welisango langasenyakatfo.
Asawonkhe lamatafula abesiphohlongo, lapho letilwane letatiba ngumhlatjelo tatibulawelwa khona: Lamane abengekhatsi kulomhubhe, lamane angephandle esibuyeni.

Lamatafula lamane lekwakulungiselelwa kuwo imihlatjelo leyayitawushiswa samuku, abengewematje lacotwe kahle. Abengaba sigamu selimitha kuphakama kwawo, bese kutsi lingetulu lawo lalisikwele lesasingemasentimitha labengaba ngema-75. Tonkhe letimphahla letatisetjentiswa ekuhlabeni letilwane temihlatjelo tatibekwa kulamatafula.
Kwakunemingcengcema leyayingemamilimitha labengaba ngema-75 bubanti, leyayitungeleta lamatafula. Yonkhe inyama yemihlatjelo yayibekwa etikwalamatafula.
Lendvodza yase ingimisa kulesibuya sangekhatsi. Kwakunemakamelo lamabili
Lendvodza yangitjela kutsi lelikamelo lelibheke ngaseningizimu lalilebaphristi lababekhonta ethempelini,

lelikamelo lelalibheke ngasenyakatfo lalilebaphristi lababekhonta elatini. Labaphristi kwakuyintalelwane yaSadoki, kwakungabo kuphela emalunga labewesive semaLevi labenelilungelo lekusondzela ebukhoneni baSimakadze ayewumkhonta.
Lendvodza yakala lesibuya sangekhatsi, yatfola kutsi sasisikwele lesasingemamitha labengaba ngema-50. Lithempeli lalingasenshonalanga, embikwalo kwakunelilati.

Yase iyangitsatsa yangiyisa kulomhubhe wekungena ethempelini. Yakala umnyango wawo, wawungemamitha labengaba mabili nesigamu budze, nemamitha labengaba sikhombisa bubanti, netibondza tawo tatingaba limitha linye nesigamu bucinsi bato, ngala nangale.

Kwakunetitebhisi letatikhuphukela emnyango walomhubhe wekungena ethempelini, lomhubhe wawungemamitha labengaba lishumi bubanti, nemamitha labengaba sitfupha budze. Kwakunetinsika letimbili lapha ekungeneni, iyinye ngala nangale kwemnyango.
Lendvodza yase ingingenisa endzaweni lengcwele, yakala tibhonga temnyango, bubanti bato babungemamitha labengaba matsatfu ngala nangale.

Lomnyango wawungemamitha labengaba sihlanu bubanti, kwatsi lolubondza ngala nangale kwaba ngemamitha labengaba mabili nesigamu. Yaphindze yakala lendzawo lengcwele yangephandle; yayingemamitha labengaba ngema-20 budze nemamitha labengaba lishumi bubanti.

Yase ingena kulendzawo lengcwele leyayingekhatsi, yakala letibhonga temnyango, sisinye sasingaba limitha bubanti. Lomnyango wawungemamitha labengaba matsatfu bubanti, budze betibondza tangasemaceleni emnyango babungemamitha labengaba matsatfu nesigamu.
Yabe seyikala lendzawo lengcwele yangekhatsi, yayingemamitha labengaba lishumi budze, nemamitha labengaba lishumi bubanti. Yakhuluma kimi yatsi: “Lena yindzawo lengcwelengcwele.”

Lamakamelo asemaceleni abetitezi letintsatfu, lesinye singetulu kwalesinye, kuleso nakuleso sitezi kwakunemakamelo langema-30. Lingephandle lwelubondza lwelithempeli kuleso naleso sitezi kwakunemingcengcema leyayitungelete lolubondza lwelithempeli leyayisimisa lamakamelo lasemaceleni, kuze tisimiso tingafakwa elubondzeni lwelithempeli.

Lamakamelo lasemaceleni kutungeleta lithempeli abeya ngekuba banti kakhulu kuleso nakuleso sitezi lesilandzelako. Lesakhiwo lesasitungelete lithempeli sasakhiwe ngekwenyuka kwetigaba, ngaloko lamakamelo abeya ngekuba banti, nawenyukela etulu. Kwakunetitebhisi letenyukako kusukela esitezi lesingaphansi kuye esitezi lesisetulu ekugcineni, kwendlula kulesisekhatsi.

Ngabona kutsi lelithempeli lalinendzawo lephakeme lelitungeletile. Lendzawo lephakeme ngiyo leyayakha sisekelo salamakamelo lasemaceleni. Lesisekelo salamakamelo sasingemamitha labengaba matsatfu kuphakama kwaso.
Lubondza lwangaphandle lwalamakamelo lwalungemamitha labengaba mabili nesigamu bucinsi balo. Lelibala lelisemkhatsini walamakamelo lasemaceleni elithempeli
nemakamelo ebaphristi lalingemamitha labengaba lishumi bubanti; lelibala lalitungeleta lithempeli.
Lamakamelo abeneminyango lebheke ngakulelibala, lomunye ungasenyakatfo lomunye ungaseningizimu; lendzawo lephakeme leyayigudla lelibala yayinemamitha labengaba mabili nesigamu bubanti yonkhe indzawo.

Lendlu leyayibhekene nelibala lelithempeli ngasenshonalanga yayingemamitha labengaba ngema-35 bubanti. Lubondza lwalendlu lwalungemamitha labengaba mabili nesigamu bucinsi, kutungeleta yonkhe indzawo, bese kutsi budze balendlu bube ngemamitha labengaba ngema-45.

Lendvodza yase ilinganisa lelithempeli; lalingemamitha labengaba ngema-50 budze, bese kutsi ngasenshonalanga libala lelithempeli nalendlu yakhona netibondza tayo kwakungemamitha labengaba ngema-50 budze.
Bubanti balelibala lelithempeli ngasemphumalanga, kanye nelingembili lelithempeli kwakungemamitha labengaba ngema-50.
Yase ikala budze balendlu leyayibheke ngasebaleni ngemuva kwelithempeli, kanye nematsala ayo ngala nangale kwaba ngemamitha labengaba ngema-50.
Lendzawo lengcwele, nendzawo lengcwelengcwele, nemhubhe lobhekene nesibuya,

kanye neminyango, nemafasitelo lamancane, nematsala labetungeleta letindzawo letintsatfu, kanye nako konkhe lokunye kanye nelingephandle leminyango kwakwembeswe ngelugodvo. Siyilo nelubondza kuze kuyewufika emafasitelweni, kwakumbonyiwe.
Ngetulu kwemnyango longena endzaweni lengcwele, nasetibondzeni, kuletikhala letifananako, kutungeleta lingekhatsi nelingephandle lendzawo lengcwele,
bekucoshwe umhlobiso wemakherubhi netihlahla temasundvu. Letihlahla tatilandzelana nemakherubhi. Likherubhi lilinye lalinebuso lobubili:
Nganhlanye kwakunebuso bemuntfu lobabubheke ngasesihlahleni selisundvu, bese kutsi ngakulesinye sihlahla selisundvu kubheke buso belibhubesi. Bekucoshwe kuyo yonkhe indzawo ethempelini.
Kusukela phansi kuye ngetulu kwemnyango, emakherubhi netihlahla temasundvu bekucoshwe elubondzeni lwendzawo lengcwele.

Bekunelilati letigodvo lelalingaba limitha nesigamu kuphakama, nelimitha budze nebubanti; emakona alo, nesisekelo salo, nemihlubulo yalo kwakukwetigodvo. Lendvodza yatsi kimi: “Leli litafula lelisembikwaSimakadze.”
Indzawo lengcwele nendzawo lengcwelengcwele kokubili bekunetivalo letingatimbili.
Ngulowo nalowo mnyango wawunetivalo letingumphacambili, tivalo letimbili letijikitako esivalweni sisinye.
Kuletivalo talendzawo lengcwele bekucoshwe emakherubhi netihlahla temasundvu njengaloko lokwakusetibondzeni, bekunesivikelo lesasentiwe ngesigodvo singetulu kwemnyango wemhubhe.
Kuletibondza tasemaceleni temhubhe bekunemafasitelo lamancane netihlahla temasundvu letaticoshwe ngala nangale. Lamakamelo lasemaceleni elithempeli nawo abenato leto tivikelo.
Lendvodza yangihola yangicondzisa ngasenyakatfo esibuyeni sangephandle, yangiyisa emakamelweni lamacondzana nelibala lelithempeli namalungana nelubondza lwangephandle ngasenyakatfo.
Lendlu leyayinemnyango lowawubheke ngasenyakatfo, yayingemamitha labengaba ngema-50 budze, nemamitha labengaba ngema-25 bubanti.

Kuyo yomibili lemihlubulo, umhlubulo lowawungemamitha labengaba lishumi, kanye nalomhlubulo lomalungana nesiyilo sesibuya sangephandle, lendlu yayinelitsala lelibhekene nelitsala etigabeni letintsatfu.
Embikwalamakamelo ayo bekunemhubhe wangekhatsi lowawungemamitha labengaba sihlanu bubanti, nemamitha labengaba ngema-50 budze. Iminyango yalemihubhe yayingasenyakatfo.
Lamakamelo langetulu abengumntjuntju, ngobe lamatsala abetsetse indzawo lenkhulu kuwo kunakulamakamelo langaphansi nakulawo lasemkhatsini waleyondlu.
Lamakamelo lasesitezi sesitsatfu abete tinsika njengaletibuya; abenetiyilo letincane kunetalawa labengaphansi netalawa labesemkhatsini.
Kwakunelubondza lwangephandle lolwalulinganise nalamakamelo nalesibuya sangephandle, lwalujuba embikwalamakamelo emamitha labengaba ngema-25 budze.
Loluhla lwemakamelo langasesibuyeni sangephandle lwalungemamitha labengaba ngema-25 budze, bese kutsi loluhla lolusedvutane nendzawo lengcwele lona lube ngemamitha labengaba ngema-50 budze.
Lamakamelo langaphansi wona abenemnyango ngasemphumalanga, nangabe umuntfu angena esuka esibuyeni sangephandle.
abenemhubhe embikwawo, abefanana nalamakamelo langasenyakatfo; afanana ngebudze, nangebubanti, nangeminyango yekuphuma, nangebukhulu. Leminyango leyayingasenyakatfo
yayifanana ncamashi neyemakamelo langaseningizimu. Kwakunemnyango ekucaleni kwalomhubhe lowawulinganise nalolubondza lolwalushona ngasemphumalanga, lekwakungenwa ngawo emakamelweni.

Batawutsi labaphristi bangangena kulendzawo lengcwele, bangabe basangena esibuyeni lesingephandle, bangakakhumuli tingubo labatembatsako nabakhontako, ngobe leti tingcwele. Kufanele bembatse letinye timphahla basengakasondzeli etindzaweni tebantfu.”
Yatsi kube icedze kukala lokungekhatsi ethempelini, yangikhipha ngelisango lelingasemphumalanga, yakala yonkhe leyo ndzawo ngephandle.
Yakala umhlubulo wangasemphumalanga ngendvuku yekukala; kwaba ngemamitha labengaba ngema-250.
Yakala umhlubulo wangasenyakatfo ngalendvuku yekukala; kwaba ngemamitha labengaba ngema-250.
Yakala umhlubulo wangaseningizimu ngalendvuku yekukala; kwaba ngemamitha labengaba ngema-250.
Yabe seyigucukela emhlubulweni wangasenshonalanga yalukala ngalendvuku yekukala; kwaba ngemamitha labengaba ngema-250.

Ngako yabe seyikala lendzawo kuyo yonkhe imihlubulo yomine. Yayinelubondza lolwaluyitungeleta, kwakungemamitha labengaba ngema-250 budze, nemamitha labengaba ngema-250 bubanti, lwehlukanisa lokungcwele kulokungengcwele.
Lendvodza yangitsatsa yangimikisa esangweni lelibheke ngasemphumalanga,
lapho ngabona khona inkhatimulo yebukhona baNkulunkulu wema-Israyeli ichamuka ngasemphumalanga. Livi lakhe lalifanana nekudvuma kwemabhudlo emanti, live lalicwebetela ngenca yenkhatimulo yakhe.
Lombono lengawubona wawufanana nembono lengangiwubone, nakefika
Inkhatimulo yaSimakadze yangena ethempelini ngelisango lelibheke ngasemphumalanga.
Yatsi lendvodza iseme eceleni kwami, ngeva lomunye akhuluma kimi ngekhatsi ethempelini.

Wakhuluma kimi, watsi: “Ndvodzana yemuntfu, lena yindzawo yesihlalo sami sebukhosi nendzawo yekwenabela tinyawo tami. Ngulapha-ke lapho ngitawuhlala khona emkhatsini wema-Israyeli kuze kube phakadze. Indlu yaka-Israyeli ingeke iphindze ilihlambalate Libito lami lelingcwele, yona kanye nemakhosi ayo, ngebugwadla bayo

Nababeka umnyango wabo eceleni kwemnyango wendlu yami, netinsika tabo temnyango eceleni kwetinsika tami temnyango, kunelubondza kuphela emkhatsini wami nabo, balihlambalata Libito lami lelingcwele ngetintfo tabo letinengekako labatentako. Ngako ngase ngiyababhubhisa ngentfukutselo yami.

Nangabe banemahloni ngako konkhe labakwentile, bachazele ngelipulani lelithempeli, nekuhleleka kwalo, iminyango yalo yekuphuma neyekungena, lonkhe lipulani lalo, nayo yonkhe imiyalo nemitsetfo yalo. Kubhale phansi loku embikwabo, khona batekwetsembeka kulelipulani lalo, balandzele nemitsetfo yalo.
“Lona ngumtsetfo welithempeli: Yonkhe lendzawo lelitungeletile esicongweni sentsaba iyakuba ngcwelengcwele. Unjalo-ke umtsetfo welithempeli.”

Kusuka kulomsedlana phansi kuye etulu bekungaba limitha linye bese kutsi bubanti bube sigamu selimitha. Lencenye lelandzelako yayentiwe yaba ngemasentimitha labengaba ngema-50 bubanti, bese kuba ngemamitha labengaba mabili kuphakama. Lencenye lelandzela leyo nayo yayihleleke kusukela emngcengcemeni wayo kwaba ngemasentimitha labengaba ngema-50 kutungeleta.
Lendzawo lengetulu, lapho kwakushiselwa khona imihlatjelo, bekungemamitha labengaba mabili kuphakama. Timphondvo talo temakona lamane tatiphakeme kunalesibebesi salo.
Lingetulu lelilati lalisikwele lesingemamitha labengaba sitfupha yonkhe indzawo.

Likhatsinendzawo lalo nalo lalisikwele, lingemamitha labengaba sikhombisa, yonkhe indzawo lalinemngcengcema lolitungeleta ngephandle ungemasentimitha labengaba ngema-25 kuphakama. Lomsedlana wawungemasentimitha labengaba ngema-50 bubanti. Titebhisi letatenyukela etulu kulelilati tatingasemhlubulweni wangasemphumalanga.”

Wabe sewukhuluma kimi, utsi: “Ndvodzana yemuntfu, naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Simakadze, itsi: Lena kutawuba ngimitsetfo yeminikelo yemhlatjelo yekushiswa neyekunyenyeta ingati etikwelilati, nase lakhiwe:
Kufanele unikele ngenkunzana kutsi ibe ngumnikelo wesono kubaphristi, labangemaLevi, bendlu yakaSadoki, labasondzelako kutewukhonta embikwami, kusho iNkhosi Simakadze.
Kufanele utsatse lenye yengati yayo uyibeke kuletimphondvo letine telilati, nasemakoneni omane emngcengcema longetulu, nakuwo wonkhe lomngcengcema, khona utewuhlambulula lilati ulentele inhlawulo.
Wena kufanele utsatse lenkunzana ibe ngumnikelo wesono, uyishisele lapho imiselwe kushiselwa khona, lekuyindzawo yelithempeli lengephandle kwendzawo lengcwele.
“Ngelilanga lesibili kufanele unikele ngesiphongo lesingenasiyela kube ngumnikelo wesono, nelilati kufanele lihlanjululwe, njengobe lalihlanjululwe ngenkunzi.
Utawutsi ungacedza kulihlambulula, uyawube sewunikela ngenkunzana kanye nangesihhanca lesiphuma emhlambini, kokubili kungabi nasiyela.
Kufanele konkhe ukunikele embikwaSimakadze, baphristi kufanele banyenyete ngeluswayi etikwako, bakunikele kube ngumhlatjelo wekushiswa kuSimakadze.
Kuwo onkhe lamalanga lasikhombisa kufanele bente inhlawulo yelilati, balihlambulule.
Ekupheleni kwalamalanga, kusukela elangeni lesiphohlongo kuya embili, baphristi kufanele betfule iminikelo yenu yekushiswa kanye neminikelo yenu yekuthula
Lendvodza yase ingibuyisela emuva esangweni lelingephandle lendzawo lengcwele, lelo lelibheke emphumalanga, lalivaliwe.

Simakadze wakhuluma kimi, watsi: “Lelisango kufanele lihlale livaliwe. Kufanele lingavulwa; akubete namunye longena ngalo. Kufanele lihlale livaliwe, ngobe Simakadze, Nkulunkulu wema-Israyeli, ungene ngalo.
Inkhosi lengumbusi ngiyo kuphela lengahlala ngekhatsi kwelisango kutsi itewudla embikwaSimakadze. Kufanele ingene ngendlela yemhubhe welisango, iphindze iphume ngaleyo ndlela.”

Lendvodza yase ingihola ngendlela yelisango langasenyakatfo ingiyisa embikwelithempeli. Ngatsi ngiyabuka, ngabona inkhatimulo yaSimakadze igcwalisa lithempeli laSimakadze, ngawa ngibhekise buso bami phansi.

Simakadze wakhuluma kimi, watsi: “Ndvodzana yemuntfu, bukisisa, sondzela ulalele ukunakisise konkhe loko lengikutjela kona macondzana nayo yonkhe imitsetfo lephatselene nelithempeli laSimakadze. Yinakekele yonkhe imitsetfo yekungena ethempelini nayo yonkhe yekuphuma endzaweni lengcwele.

Ngetulu kwato tonkhe letinye tintfo tenu lenitentako letinengekako niletse betive labangakasokwa enhlitiyweni nasenyameni, nabangenisa endzaweni yami lengcwele, nangcolisa lithempeli lami ngesikhatsi ninikela kimi ngekudla, nangemanoni, nangengati, nephula sivumelwane sami.
Esikhundleni sekwenta umsebenti wenu macondzana netintfo tami letingcwele, nibeke labanye bantfu kutsi baphatse indzawo yami lengcwele.

“ ‘Naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Simakadze, itsi: Kufanele kubete namunye wetive longakasokwa enhlitiyweni nasenyameni longena endzaweni yami lengcwele, kubete ngisho nebetive labahlala emkhatsini wema-Israyeli.’ ”
“ ‘EmaLevi langibalekela ngesikhatsi ema-Israyeli eduka nangesikhatsi azulazula esuka kimi, alandzela tithico tawo, kufanele ayetfwale leyo miphumela yesono sawo.
Angakhonta endzaweni yami lengcwele, engamele emasango alelithempeli, akhonte ngekhatsi kulo; angabahlabela bantfu iminikelo yabo yekushiswa kanye nemihlatjelo, eme embikwebantfu, abakhonte.

Kodvwa njengobe abebakhonta embikwetithico tabo enta indlu yaka-Israyeli yawela esonweni, ngako-ke ngifunge ngesandla lesiphakanyisiwe kutsi kufanele etfwale imiphumela yesono sawo, kusho iNkhosi Simakadze.

Akukafaneli asondzele atengikhonta njengebaphristi nome-ke asondzele nome ngangukutiphi tintfo tami letingcwele nome iminikelo lengcwelengcwele; kufanele aletfwale lihlazo ngaletento tabo letisinengiso.
Noko ngiyawubabeka kutsi bengamele imisebenti letsite yasethempelini nawo wonkhe umsebenti lekufanele wentiwe ekhatsi kulo.’ ”

“ ‘Kodvwa baphristi, labangemaLevi lababatukulu baSadoki, labebayenta ngekwetsembeka imisebenti yendzawo yami lengcwele ngesikhatsi ema-Israyeli aphambuka kimi, kufanele bona basondzele batewukhonta embikwami. Kufanele beme embikwami batewunikela ngemhlatjelo wemanoni newengati, kusho iNkhosi Simakadze.
Ngabo bodvwa lekufanele bangene endzaweni yami lengcwele; ngabo bodvwa lekufanele basondzele elatini lami kutawukhonta embikwami, bente inkonzi yami.
Kufanele bashucule ngemishuculo yelineni etinhloko tabo, netimphahla tabo tangaphansi tibe telineni etinkhalo tabo. Akukafaneli bembatse nome ngabe yini letabenta bajuluke.

Nase baphumela esibuyeni lesingephandle, lapho kunebantfu khona, kufanele batikhumule letimphahla tabo bebatembetse nabakhontako, bese batishiya emakamelweni langcwele, bembatse letinye timphahla, kuze bangetiwulimata bantfu ngetimphahla tabo letingcwele.
Kufanele kubete umphristi lonatsa liwayini, nakatawungena esibuyeni lesingekhatsi.
Abakafaneli batsatse nebafelokati, nome bafati labalahliwe, bangatsatsa tintfombi tema-Israyeli ngekutalwa nome bafelokati bebaphristi.
Kufanele bafundzise bantfu bami umehluko emkhatsini walokungcwele nalokungengcwele, babakhombise kwehlukanisa emkhatsini walokungcolile nalokuhlantekile ngekwemtsetfo.
Nasahlanjululiwe, kufanele eme angakhonti elatini emalanga lasikhombisa.
Mhlazana angena esibuyeni lesingekhatsi sendzawo lengcwele kutewukhonta endzaweni lengcwele, kufanele atentele umnikelo wesono, kusho iNkhosi Simakadze.
Bayawudla iminikelo yalokutinhlavu neminikelo yesono, neminikelo yesono, neminikelo yelicala. Konkhe lokunikelwe kuSimakadze ka-Israyeli kuyawuba kwabo.
Tonkhe tilinga tetitselo telikhetselo nako konkhe kwetipho tenu telikhetselo kuyawuba kwebaphristi. Niyawubanika sabelo sekucala semphuphu legayiwe, kuze sibusiso sehlele etikwetindlu tenu.
Baphristi kufanele bangadli lutfo, inyoni nome silwane, lokutfolakele kutifele nome kudladlabulwe tilwane tesiganga.’ ”

Kulesabelo kufanele kube nendzawo lesikwele, lendzawana yelithempeli ibe ngemamitha langaba ngema-250 luhlangotsi lulunye, kufanele kube nelibala leliyitungeletile, nalo libe ngemamitha langaba ngema-25 bubanti.
Kulendzawo incenye yayo lengemakhilomitha langaba li-12 nesigamu budze, inebubanti lobungemakhilomitha langaba sihlanu, kufanele ikalwe kahle, ngobe itawuba yelithempeli, indzawo lengcwelengcwele.
Kuyawuba yindzawana lengcwele eveni, leyehlukaniselwe baphristi labasondzela kuSimakadze bakhonte ethempelini lakhe. Iyakuba yindzawo yetindlu tabo, ibe nendzawo yelithempeli.

Indzawo lesele lengemakhilomitha langaba li-12 nesigamu budze, nebubanti lobungemakhilomitha langaba sihlanu, kufanele ibe sabelo semaLevi languwona enta inkonzo ethempelini. Kuyawuba nemadolobha lapho batawuhlala khona.
Lendzawo iyawuba sabelo sembusi lobusako eveni laka-Israyeli, kuze angasayiwuphindza acindzetele bantfu bami, kodvwa uyawuvumela lonkhe leli lelinye live libe letive tema-Israyeli.’ ”
“ ‘Kufanele nisebentise tisindvo netikali letetsembekile letisemtsetfweni, kube: yi-efa lengiyo nebhathi lengiyo.
“ ‘I-efa yekukala lokomile kufanele ilingane nebhathi yalokumanti. Lizingasikali yihomeri.
“ ‘Ihomeri ilingane nema-efa lalishumi, kulingane nemabhathi lalishumi.
Tisindvo tenu tifanele tibe kanje: emagera langema-20 alingane nelishekheli,
“ ‘Lena nguyona ndlela leniyawukala ngayo iminikelo yenu yelikhetselo:
“ ‘Kolo: Niyawutsatsa kunye kwema-60 kwesivuno senu, ibhali: kunye kwema-60 kwesivuno senu,
emafutsa emncumo: kunye kwelikhulu kwetitselo tetihlahla tenu; nikukale ngebhathi; ngobe emabhathi lalishumi alingana nehomeri, ihomeri yinye ilingene nekhori yinye.
Timvu: Imvu yinye itsatfwe kuwo umhlambi wema-200 tasemadlelweni lanemanti aka-Israyeli. Kufanele niletse iminikelo yalokutinhlavu, netilwane letitawushiswa samuku, netilwane temnikelo webudlelwane,
“ ‘Bonkhe bantfu bakulelive kufanele bayitsatse leminikelo bayimikise kumbusi lobusako ka-Israyeli.

Kuyawuba ngumsebenti wakhe kutsi aletse tilwane letitawushiswa samuku, neminikelo yalokutinhlavu, neminikelo yesinatfo saso sonkhe sive saka-Israyeli ngemikhosi yekwetfwasa kwenyanga, nangemaSabatha, nangaleminye imikhosi. Kufanele aletse iminikelo yesoni, neminikelo yalokutinhlavu, neminikelo yekushiswa, neminikelo yebudlelwane,

Umphristi uyawutsatsa incenye yengati yemnikelo wesono, ayibhoce etinsikeni temnyango wasethempelini, nasemakoneni omane emngcengcemeni longetulu elatini, nasetinsikeni temasango laphumela esibuyeni lesingekhatsi.
Ngelilanga lesikhombisa lenyanga uyakwenta njalo futsi, entele nome ngubani lowone ngesiphosiso, nome one ngekungati. Ngaleyo ndlela-ke niyawulihlawulela lithempeli.
Ngelilanga lekucala lemkhosi, umbusi lobusako kufanele anikele ngenkunzi, kube ngumhlatjelo wetono takhe netabo bonkhe bantfu.

Onkhe-ke lawo malanga lasikhombisa lombusi kufanele anikele kuSimakadze tinkunzi letisikhombisa, netihanca letisikhombisa, letingenasiyela, akushise samuku. Kufanele futsi ente umhlatjelo wesiphongo onkhe emalanga kube ngumnikelo wesono.
Inkunzi iyinye nesihhanca sinye lesentiwe umhlatjelo, kufanele selekelwe ngemnikelo walokutinhlavu longemalitha langaba li-17 nencenye, nangemafutsa emncumo langemalitha langaba mane.

“ ‘Naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Simakadze, itsi: Lisango langasemphumalanga lelingenela esibuyeni sangekhatsi kufanele lihlale livaliwe kuwo onkhe lamalanga lasitfupha emsebenti, kodvwa kufanele libovulwa ngeliSabatha nangemikhosi yekwetfwasa kwenyanga.

Lombusi lobusako uyawuphuma kulesibuya sangephandle angene emhubheni welisango, eme ngasensikeni yelisango, ngesikhatsi baphristi basashisa umnikelo wakhe wekushiswa, banikele nangeminikelo yakhe yebudlelwane.
Ngawo onkhe emaSabatha nangayo yonkhe imikhosi yekwetfwasa kwenyanga, bonkhe bantfu kufanele batewukhotsama phansi bakhonte Simakadze embikwalelisango.
“ ‘NgeliSabatha umbusi kufanele aletse kuSimakadze umhlatjelo wekushiswa samuku, kube ngemazinyane etimvu lasitfupha nesihhanca, konkhe kungabi nasiyela.

Sisinye sihhanca kufanele aselekele ngemnikelo walokutinhlavu longemalitha langaba li-17 nencenye, nelizinyane lilinye lemvu kufanele alelekele nganome yini lafuna kuyinikela. Umunye umnikelo walokutinhlavu kufanele awuletse nemalitha langaba mane emafutsa emncumo.
Ngemkhosi wekwetfwasa kwenyanga, uyawunikela ngenkunzana, nangemazinyane etimvu lasitfupha, nangesihhanca, konkhe kungabi nasiyela.

Iyinye inkunzana, nesihhanca sisinye lomnikelo kufanele ube nemalitha langaba li-17 nencenye yalokutinhlavu, nemazinyane etimvu kufanele lombusi awelekele nganome yini lafuna kuyinikela. Wonkhe umnikelo walokutinhlavu longangemalitha langaba li-17 nencenye kufanele awengetele ngemalitha langaba mane emafutsa emncumo.
Lombusi kufanele naphuma lapha emhubheni welisango, aphume ngaleyo ndlela langene ngayo.

“ ‘Bantfu nabeta kutawukhonta Simakadze nome ngukumuphi umkhosi, labo labangena ngelisango langasenyakatfo kufanele baphume ngelisango langaseningizimu, nase bacedze kukhonta; nalabo labangene ngelisango langaseningizimu kufanele baphume ngelisango langasenyakatfo. Kute namunye lokufanele aphume ngelisango langene ngalo, kodvwa kufanele aphume ngalelinye lisango lelimalungana nalelo langene ngalo.
Umbusi naye kufanele angene, nakungena labanye bantfu, aphume nase baphuma nabo.

Ngemalanga emadzili nangemikhosi lemisiwe, umnikelo walokutinhlavu uyawuba ngemalitha langaba li-17 nencenye, uhambisane nenkunzi yinye, nemalitha langaba li-17 nencenye lahambisana nesihhanca, nemazinyane etimvu nanome ngabe yini-ke leyo loyo lokhontako lafuna kuyinikela. Umnikelo lonjalo walokutinhlavu kufanele uhambisane nemalitha langaba mane emafutsa emncumo.

“ ‘Nangabe umbusi alungisa umnikelo wakhe wesihle kuSimakadze, nome ngumhlatjelo wekushiswa samuku nome iminikelo yebudlelwane, lisango langasemphumalanga lelingenela esibuyeni sangekhatsi liyawuvulelwa yena. Uyawukwenta umnikelo wakhe njenganakenta ngemalanga emaSabatha, lelisango kufanele liphindze livalwe, nase aphumile.’ ”

Kufanele kwentiwe nemnikelo walokutinhlavu njalo nje ekuseni, kube ngufulaha longemakhilogremu langaba mabili, nemafutsa emncumo langaba lilitha linye nencenye yesitsatfu yelilitha kutewubhucwa ngawo lofulaha. Lemitsetfo yaleminikelo lena kuSimakadze iyawuhlala imile phakadze naphakadze.
Lizinyane lemvu, nafulaha, nemafutsa emncumo kufanele kunikelwe kuSimakadze onkhe emalanga ekuseni.’ ”

“ ‘Naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Simakadze, itsi: Nangabe umbusi lobusako apha indvodzana yakhe incenye yelive lakhe, njengesipho nje, seliyawuba laleyo ndvodzana yakhe neletitukulwane tayo, kuhlale kuyincenye yelifa lakabo.

Kodvwa nangabe umbusi lobusako apha nome ngubani nje lamsebentelako incenye yelive lakhe, lelo live liyawubuye libe lalombusi futsi, nase kufike uMnyaka Wekubuyiselwa; futsi ngawo nemadvodzana awo kuphela lelingaba labo kokuphela lelo live.

Umbusi lobusako akufanele emuke ngenkhani bantfu bakhe live labo. Live layakulipha emadvodzana akhe kufanele kube nguleliyincenye yelive lakhe, lelisabelo sakhe, khona angayiwuze acindzetele bantfu bami ngekubemuka live labo.’ ”

Lendvodza yase ingiyisa ekungeneni kwemakamelo labheke ngasenyakatfo eceleni kwelisango langaseningizimu kwesibuya sangekhatsi. Lawo-ke bekungemakamelo langcwele ebaphristi. Yase ingikhombisa lenye indzawo ngasenshonalanga kwalamakamelo,
yatsi: “Lena-ke yindzawo, lapho baphristi batabobilisela khona inyama yemhlatjelo welicala neyemnikelo wesono, nalapho batawubhakela khona umnikelo wafulaha,
Yase ingiyisa esibuyeni lesingephandle, yangitungeletisa kuwo onkhe emakona aso omane, ngabona kulelo nalelo kona lesinye sibuya.
Kulamakona omane alesibuya lesingephandle, kwakunetibuya letibiyelwe,
Kutungeleta lingekhatsi laleso naleso sibuya saletibuya letine kwakunemngcengcema wematje nematiko lakhiwe ngaphansi kwalomngcengcema.
Lendvodza yangitjela yatsi: “Lawa-ke ngemadladla, lapho tisebenti tasethempelini tibilisela khona lemihlatjelo lenikelwa bantfu.”

Lendvodza yase ingikhiphela ngephandle kwendzawo yelithempeli ngendlela yelisango langasenyakatfo, yangigegisa, saze sefika esangweni langephandle lelibheke emphumalanga. Nalapho kwakunemfudlana wemanti lowawumpompota, usuka ngaseningizimu kwelisango.

Ngalendvuku yayo yekukala lendvodza yase ikala emamitha labengaba ngema-500 kwehla nalomfudlana, abheka ngasemphumalanga, yase ingitjela kutsi angiklabhute kulomfula khona lapho. Emanti akhuphuka efika emacakaleni.
Yaphindza yakala lamanye emamitha labengaba ngema-500 emanti akhuphukela emadvolweni. Yakala lamanye futsi emamitha labengaba ngema-500 kwewuka, emanti efika elukhalo.

Yabuye yakala lamanye futsi emamitha labengaba ngema-500, lapho-ke umfula wase ushona kakhulu, kangangekutsi ngangingasakhoni kuklubhuta ngetinyawo. Kwase kushona kakhulu kumatima kwewela ngaphandle kwekuhlamba.
Yase iyangihola njalo yangibuyisela elusentseni lwemfula.
Ngatsi nangifika lapho, ngabona lihlatsi ngala nangale kwemfula.
Yatsi kimi: “Lamanti lawa ageletela ngaseveni langasemphumalanga, ehle aze ayewufika eSigodzini saseJordane i-Arabha, lapho afike angene khona elwandle,

Emabulo etintfo letiphilako naletinwabutelako kuyawuphila nome ngukuphi lapho ayawugeletela khona. Kuyawuphetfuka incumbi yetinhlanti lapho, ngobe lamanti ageletela khona ente lamanti lamunyu abe mnandzi; ngako lapho lamanti ageletela khona, konkhe kuyawuphila.

Badwebi betinhlanti bayawukuma lugele lapha elusentseni; kusukela e-Eni Gedi kuye e-Eni Eglayimu kuyawuba netindzawo tekwendlala emanetha. Letinhlanti kuyawuba tinhlobonhlobo, letingangetetinhlanti taseLwandle Lolukhulu
Kodvwa emachaphoti nematete akayiwuhluma abe luhlata abe mahle, ayawusala aluswayi.

Kuyawukhula tinhlobonhlobo tetihlahla tetitselo ngala nangale elusentseni lwemfula. Emacembe ato akasoze abune, netitselo tato tingeke tiphele. Tiyawutsela ngato tonkhe tinyanga, ngobe emanti lasuka ethempelini ageletela kuto. Titselo tato tiyawuba tekudla, bese kutsi emacembe ato abe ngewekuphilisa.”
Kufanele nehlukaniselane ngalokulinganako emkhatsini wato. Ngobe mine ngafunga ngekuphakamisa sandla kutsi ngiyawulinika boyihlomkhulu, lelive leli liyawuba lifa lenu.

Kufanele nilabe ngenkatho njengelifa lenu nalabo lababetive labahlala emkhatsini wenu, lasebatele nebantfwana. Niyakubatsatsa njengemisinsi yekutimilela yema-Israyeli. Nabo njengani kufanele babelwe lifa emkhatsini wetive tema-Israyeli.
Nome ngukusiphi sive lapho lona wetive ahleti khona, kufanele nimabele khona lapho naye sabelo selifa,” kusho iNkhosi Simakadze.
“Asheri uyawuba nesabelo sinye; siyawugudla umnyele welive lakaDani kusukela ngasemphumalanga kuye ngasenshonalanga.
“Naftali uyawuba nesabelo sinye; siyawugudla umnyele welive laka-Asheri kusukela ngasemphumalanga kuye ngasenshonalanga.
“Manase uyawuba nesabelo sinye; siyawugudla umnyele welive lakaNaftali kusukela ngasemphumalanga kuye ngasenshonalanga.
“Efrayimu uyawuba nesabelo sinye; siyawugudla umnyele welive lakaManase kusukela ngasemphumalanga kuye ngasenshonalanga.
“Rubeni uyawuba nesabelo sinye; siyawugudla umnyele welive laka-Efrayimu kusukela ngasemphumalanga kuye ngasenshonalanga.
“Juda uyawuba nesabelo sinye; siyawugudla umnyele welive lakaRubeni kusukela ngasemphumalanga kuye ngasenshonalanga.
“Lesabelo senu selikhetselo leniyawusinikela kuSimakadze siyawuba ngemakhilomitha langaba li-12 nesigamu bubanti, nemakhilomitha langaba sihlanu budze.

Lena-ke kuyawuba yindzawo lengcwele leyehlukaniselwe baphristi. Iyawuba ngemakhilomitha langaba li-12 nesigamu budze ngasenyakatfo, nemakhilomitha langaba sihlanu bubanti ngasenshonalanga, nemakhilomitha langaba sihlanu bubanti ngasemphumalanga, nemakhilomitha langaba li-12 nesigamu budze ngaseningizimu. Kuyawutsi enkhabeni yalo kube nelithempeli laSimakadze.
Leyo-ke kuyawuba yebaphristi labehlukaniselwe, bakaSadoki, lababetsembekile ekungikhonteni, bangete beduka njengobe kwenta emaLevi ngesikhatsi kweduka ema-Israyeli.
Kuyawuba sipho selikhetselo kubo, esabelweni lesingcwele selive, indzawo lengcwelengcwele, ngasemnyeleni welive lemaLevi.

“Kugudla live lebaphristi, emaLevi ayawuba nesabelo lesingemakhilomitha lali-12 nesigamu budze, nemakhilomitha langaba sihlanu bubanti. Sebubonkhe budze baso buyawuba ngemakhilomitha langaba li-12 nesigamu, nemakhilomitha langaba sihlanu bubanti.
Abayikusitsengisa, futsi abayiwuntjintjisa nangalokuncane kwaso. Lena nguyona ncenye yelive yelikhetselo, akukafaneli yendluliselwe kuletinye tandla, ngobe ingcwele kuSimakadze.
