liyawuma kanje: Ngasenyakatfo liyawuba ngemamitha langaba ti-2 250 budze, ngaseningizimu libe ngulati-2 250, ngasemphumalanga libe ngemamitha lati-2 250 budze, nangasenshonalanga libe ngulati-2 250 budze.
Emadlelo alelidolobha ayawuba ngemamitha langaba li-125 ngasenyakatfo, nemamitha langaba li-125 ngaseningizimu, nemamitha langaba li-125 ngasemphumalanga, nemamitha langaba li-125 ngasenshonalanga.

Incenye lesele yaleyo ndzawo lesemnyeleni wendzawo lengcwele, igudla budze bayo, iyawuba ngemakhilomitha langaba sihlanu budze ngasemphumalanga, nemakhilomitha langaba sihlanu budze ngasenshonalanga. Sivuno sayo siyawukondla tisebenti takulelidolobha.
Balimi bakulelidolobha labayawulima kulo bayawube bachamuka kuto tonkhe tive tema-Israyeli.

Yonkhe leyo ndzawo iyawuba sikwele, emacala ayo ayawuba ngemakhilomitha langaba li-12 nesigamu lilinye. Njengesipho senu selikhetselo, niyawubeka eceleni lendzawo lengcwele kanye nendzawo yelidolobha.

“Loko lokuyawusala macala omabili alendzawo lengcwele, nalendzawo yelidolobha, kuyawuba kwembusi lobusako. Kuyawubheka ngasemphumalanga kusuka kulamakhilomitha langaba li-12 nesigamu alelithempeli kuya ngasemnyeleni wasemphumalanga, nangasenshonalanga kusuka kulamakhilomitha langaba li-12 nesigamu kuya emnyeleni wangasenshonalanga. Totimbili-ke letindzawo letigudla tabelo tetive, tiyawuba tembusi lobusako, nendzawo lengcwele lenendzawo lengcwelengcwele yasethempelini, iyawubasenkhabeni yato.
Ngako indzawo yemaLevi nendzawo yelidolobha iyawubasenkhabeni yalendzawo lengiyona iyembusi. Lendzawo yembusi iyawubasemkhatsini wemnyele wakaJuda nemnyele wakaBhenjamini.
“Mayelana netive letisele: Bhenjamini uyawuba nesabelo sinye; siyawusukela ngasemphumalanga siye ngasenshonalanga.
“Simeyoni uyawuba nesabelo sinye, siyawugudla umnyele welive lakaBhenjamini kusukela ngasemphumalanga kuye ngasenshonalanga.
“Isakhari uyawuba nesabelo sinye; siyawugudla umnyele welive lakaSimeyoni kusukela ngasemphumalanga kuye ngasenshonalanga.
“Zebuloni uyawuba nesabelo sinye; siyawugudla umnyele welive laka-Isakhari kusukela ngasemphumalanga kuya ngasenshonalanga.
“Gadi uyawuba nesabelo sinye; siyawugudla umyele welive lakaZebuloni kusukela ngasemphumalanga kuye ngasenshonalanga.
“Leli-ke live leniyawulaba ngenkatho njengelifa letive tema-Israyeli, loko-ke kuyawuba tabelo tabo,” kusho iNkhosi Simakadze.
“Lawa-ke kuyawuba ngemasango elidolobha ekuphuma: Kusukela emhlubulweni wangasenyakatfo, longemamitha langaba ti-2 250 budze,
emasango alelidolobha ayakwetsiwa ngemabito etive taka-Israyeli. Emasango lamatsatfu angasenyakatfo kuyawuba: lisango lakaRubeni, nelakaJuda, nelakaLevi.
“Ngasemhlubulweni wangasemphumalanga, longemamitha langaba ti-2 250 budze, kuyawuba nemasango lamatsatfu: lisango lakaJosefa, nelakaBhenjamini, nelakaDani.
“Ngasemhlubulweni wangaseningizimu, longemamitha langaba ti-2 250 budze, kuyawuba nemasango lamatsatfu: lisango lakaSimeyoni, nelaka-Isakhari, nelakaZebuloni.
“Ngasemhlubulweni wangasenshonalanga, longemamitha langaba ti-2 250 budze, kuyawuba nemasango lamatsatfu: lisango lakaGadi, nelaka-Asheri, nelakaNaftali.
“Libito lalelidolobha kusukela ngaleso sikhatsi sekuyawutsiwa: ngu

Simakadze wanikela Jehoyakimu, inkhosi yakaJuda, kanye naletinye timphahla tasethempelini laNkulunkulu esandleni saNebukhadnezari. Letimphahla watetfwala watiyisa ethempelini lankulunkulu wakhe kulaseBhabhulona,

Kwakufanele kube ngemajaha lamahle langenasiyela, labenemandla nenhlitiyo yako konkhe kufundziswa, lanelwati, lanengcondvo lekhaliphile, lalungele kusebenta esigodlweni senkhosi. Kwakufanele awafundzise lulwimi netincwadzi taseBhabhulona.
Inkhosi yawehlukanisela sabelo sekudla kwawo onkhe emalanga neseliwayini lasetafuleni lenkhosi. Bekufanele aceceshwe iminyaka lemitsatfu, emvakwaloko bese angena emsebentini wenkhosi.
Emkhatsini wawo bekunemajaha labephuma kaJuda: boDanyela, naHananiya, naMishayeli, na-Azariya.
Lendvuna yawetsa emabito lamasha: Danyela yatsi nguBhelteshasari, Hananiya yatsi nguShadraki, Mishayeli yatsi nguMeshaki, Azariya yatsi ngu-Abednego.
Kodvwa Danyela watincumela enhlitiyweni yakhe kutsi yena angeke atingcolise ngalokudla kwenkhosi kanye nangaleliwayini lakhona; wacela imvume endvuneni lenkhulu kutsi yena angatingcolisi ngalendlela.
Manje Nkulunkulu abesente lendvuna kutsi ibe nemusa nesihawu kuDanyela,

kodvwa lendvuna yamtjela Danyela, yatsi: “Ngiyayesaba inkhosi yami, inkhosi, lekunguyona inehlukanisele leliphakelo lenu lekudla nesinatfo senu. Kufanele ngani kutsi inibone senibukeka nondzile kunalawa lamanye emajaha labontsanga yenu? Inkhosi itangijuba inhloko yami ngenca yenu.”
Danyela wakhuluma kulomahlalesangweni labebekwe ngulendvuna kutsi engamele boDanyela, naHananiya, naMishayeli kanye na-Azariya, watsi:
“Ngicela kutsi uke ulinge tinceku takho emalanga lalishumi. Sinike kuphela tibhidvo sitekudla nemanti sitewunatsa.
Ubobe-ke sewuyasicatsanisa kubukeka kwetfu nekwalamajaha lamanye ladla kudla kwenkhosi, bese tinceku takho utiphatsa ngaleyo ndlela loyibonako.”
Ngako lomahlalesangweni wakuvuma loko, wabalinga emalanga lalishumi.
Ekupheleni kwemalanga lalishumi babukeka baphile kancono kakhulu, futsi bondleke kakhulu kunawo onkhe lawa lamanye emajaha labedla kudla kwenkhosi.
Ngako lomahlalesangweni wavele wakususa lokudla kwelikhetselo neliwayini labebafanele balinatse lekwakusabelo sabo; esikhundleni sako wabanika tibhidvo.
Lamajaha lamane Nkulunkulu wawanika lwati nekucondza kwato tonkhe tinhlobo temfundvo netetincwadzi letatibhaliwe. Danyela abesayicondza yonkhe imibono nemaphupho ato tonkhe tinhlobo.
Kwatsi ekupheleni kwalesikhatsi lesasimiswe yinkhosi kutsi bangeniswe, lendvuna yavele yabetfula kuNebukhadnezari.
Inkhosi yakhuluma nabo, yakhandza kutsi kute namunye labelingana naboDanyela, naHananiya, naMishayeli kanye na-Azariya; ngako base bangena emsebentini wenkhosi.
Kuyo yonkhe indzaba yekuhlakanipha neyekucondza, inkhosi leyayibabuta ngayo yabakhandza bancono ngalokuphindvwe kalishumi kunato tonkhe tangoma nebatsebuli lababe kuwo wonkhe umbuso wayo.
Ngako inkhosi yabita tangoma, nebatsebuli, nebaphenguli, kanye nabosonkhanyeti
yatsi kubo: “Ngibhudze liphupho lelingihlupha kakhulu, manje ngifuna kwati kutsi lisho kutsini.”
Kodvwa naningitjela leliphupho nilichaze, nitakwemukela kimi tipho, nemivuzo, neludvumo lolukhulu. Ngako-ke ngitjeleni leliphupho, bese ningichazela lona.”
Baphindza baphendvula futsi, batsi: “Sicela inkhosi kutsi itjele tinceku tayo leliphupho, tsine-ke sitabe sesiyalichaza.”
Inkhosi yaphendvula yatsi: “Cha, sengiyabona kutsi nicondze kungicitsela sikhatsi, ngobe nani niyabona kutsi loku ngukona lese ngikuncumile ngema kuko:

Naningangitjeli leliphupho, sinye kuphela sijeziso senu. Nihlanganise emasu ekungitjela tintfo letedukisako naletikhohlakele netsembe kutsi tintfo titawugucuka. Ngako-ke ngitjeleni liphupho, ngitawube sengiyati-ke kutsi ningangichazela lona.”
Loku lokufunwa yinkhosi kulukhuni kakhulu. Kute namunye longakwembula loku enkhosini ngaphandle kwabonkulunkulu, bona-ke abahlali emkhatsini webantfu.”
Loku kwenta inkhosi yatfukutsela yatselwa ngemanti, yatsi: “Tonkhe tati taseBhabhulona atibulawe.”
Ngako inkhosi yakhipha umtsetfosimemetelo kutsi akubulawe tati; kwabe sekukhishwa bantfu kutsi bayewufuna boDanyela nebangani bakhe kutsi nabo batewubulawa.
Kwatsi ngesikhatsi Ariyoki, indvuna yabomahlalesangweni benkhosi, asahambile kuyawubulala tati taseBhabhulona, Danyela wakhuluma kuye ngekuhlakanipha lokukhulu nangekucophelela.
Wabuta lendvuna yenkhosi, watsi: “Inkhosi iwukhipheleni lomtsetfosimemetelo lonesihluku lesibi kangaka?” Ariyoki wabe sewuchazela Danyela kahle yonkhe lendzaba.
Ngaloko Danyela wesuka waya enkhosini wayawucela litfuba lekutsi ayichazele leliphupho layo.
Danyela wancandzeka wabuyela endlini yakhe, wafike wachazela labangani bakhe boHananiya, naMishayeli kanye na-Azariya ngalendzaba.
Wabacela kutsi bancuse umusa kuNkulunkulu welizulu ngalemfihlakalo, kuze kutsi yena kanye nebangani bakhe bangete babulawa kanye nato tonkhe tati taseBhabhulona.
Kwatsi ebusuku lemfihlakalo yembulwa kuDanyela ngembono. Danyela wadvumisa Nkulunkulu welizulu,

Danyela wahamba waya ku-Ariyoki, labebekwe yinkhosi kutsi abulale tonkhe tati taseBhabhulona, wafike wakhuluma kuye, watsi: “Ungatibulali tati taseBhabhulona. Ngitsatse ungimikise enkhosini, ngitayichazela leliphupho layo.”
Ariyoki watsatsa Danyela wamyisa enkhosini ngekushesha, watsi: “Ngitfole indvodza emkhatsini webatfunjwa bakaJuda lengayitjela inkhosi kutsi leliphupho layo lisho kutsini.”
Danyela wayiphendvula inkhosi, watsi: “Kute sati, nome umtsebuli, nome sangoma, nome inyanga lokungayichazela inkhosi ngalemfihlakalo leyicelile,

kodvwa ukhona Nkulunkulu losezulwini lowembula timfihlakalo. Nguye lobonise inkhosi Nebukhadnezari loko lokutakwenteka kulamalanga letako. Liphupho lakho nemibono yakho leyendlule lapha engcondvweni yakho usalele embhedzeni wakho ngunaku:
“Ngesikhatsi usalele lapho, wena waphakathi, ingcondvo yakho igucukele ngasetintfweni letitako, kwase kutsi umembuli wetimfihlakalo wakubonisa loko lokutakwenteka.

Lemfihlo yembuliwe kimi, hhayi ngobe mine nginekuhlakanipha lokukhulu kwendlula labanye bantfu labaphilako, kodvwa kuze kutsi wena, nkhosi, utekwatiswa inchazelo, khona utewucondzisisa loko lokwendlule engcondvweni yakho.
“Wabuka, wena waphakathi, wabona kume embikwakho sitfombe lesikhulu, sasisikhulukati kusitfombe lesicwebetelako, sesabeka nawusibuka.
Inhloko yalesitfombe yayentiwe ngegolide lecengekile, sifuba saso nemikhono yaso iyesiliva, sisu saso nematsanga aso kulitfusi,
imilente yaso kuyinsimbi, tinyawo taso kuyinhlanganisela yensimbi nelibumba lelishisiwe.
Utsite usabukile, kwahleshulwa lidvwala, kodvwa alihleshulwanga tandla temuntfu. Lelidvwala lashaya lesitfombe etinyaweni taso letatitensimbi nelibumba, latiphihlita.

Lensimbi, nalelibumba, nalelitfusi, nalesiliva, nalegolide kwabhidlika kwaba ticucu ngasikhatsi sinye, kwaze kwafanana nemakhoba lasebaleni lekubhula ehlobo. Umoya wakuphephula konkhe, kwangete kwasala lutfo. Kodvwa lelidvwala lelalishaye lesitfombe lakhula laba yintsaba lenkhulu, lagcwala wonkhe umhlaba.
“Ngilo-ke leliphupho, manje inkhosi sitayichazela kutsi lisho kutsini.
Wena waphakathi, nkhosi, wena uyinkhosi yemakhosi. Nkulunkulu welizulu ukunike kubusa, nemandla, neligunya, neludvumo;
etandleni takho ubeke bantfu netilwane tesiganga kanye netinyoni telizulu. Nome ngukuphi lapho tidalwa tihlala khona, wena ukwente waba ngumbusi wato tonkhe. Wena ungulenhloko yegolide.
“Emvakwakho, kuyawuvela lomunye umbuso lomncane kunalowakho. Lolandzelako, ngumbuso wesitsatfu, umbuso welitfusi, uyawubusa umhlaba wonkhe.

Ekugcineni, kuyawuba nembuso wesine loyawucina ube njengensimbi, ngobe phela insimbi iyacheketa iphihlite konkhe, futsi-ke njengobe insimbi iphihlita tintfo tibe ticucu nje, kanjalo lombuso uyawucindzetela uchekete yonkhe lena leminye.

Njengobe ubonile nje kutsi tinyawo netintwane, incenye yako bekulibumba lelishisiwe kantsi lena lenye incenye bekuyinsimbi, ngako lowo kuyawuba ngumbuso lowehlukene ekhatsi; noko uyawuba nemandla ensimbi kuwo, kuye njengobe ubonile, lensimbi beyihlangene nelibumba.
Njengobe tintwane betihlanganiswe kwaba yinsimbi nelibumba, kanjalo nalowo mbuso nganhlanye uyawuba nemandla, kutsi nganhlanye ube yintekenteke.

Kantsi futsi njengobe ubone insimbi ihlanganiswe nelibumba lelishisiwe, kanjalo-ke nebantfu bayawulinga kubumbana ngekuganiselana bangabe basahlangana babe munye, kufanane nensimbi lengakabumbani nelibumba.

Ngiyo leyo-ke inchazelo yalombono welidvwala lelahleshulwa entsabeni, kodvwa hhayi ngetandla temuntfu, ngilo lelidvwala lelabhidlita insimbi, nelitfusi, nelibumba, nesiliva kanye negolide, kwaba ticucu.
“Nkulunkulu lomkhulu wembulele inkhosi loko lokutakwenteka kuletikhatsi letitako. Leliphupho liliciniso, nalokuchazwa kwalo kwetsembekile.”
Inkhosi yakhuluma kuDanyela, yatsi: “Impela, loNkulunkulu wakho unguNkulunkulu wabo bonkhe bonkulunkulu, neNkhosi yemakhosi, neMembuli wetimfihlakalo, ngobe wena ukhonile kwembula lemfihlakalo.”
Ngetulu kwaloko, ngesicelo saDanyela, inkhosi yabeka boShadraki, naMeshaki, na-Abednego kutsi babe tiphatsimandla kulesifundza saseBhabhulona, kwase kutsi Danyela yena wasala esigodlweni.
Inkhosi Nebukhadnezari yenta sithico segolide, lesasingemamitha labengaba ngema-30 kuphakama, nemamitha labengaba matsatfu bubanti, yasibeka etsafeni laseDura esifundzeni saseBhabhulona.

Yabe seyibita baholi, netindvuna, nebabusi, nebeluleki, nebagcinitikhwama, nebehluleli, nabomantji kanye nato tonkhe tiphatsimandla tetifundza, kutsi bete batewunikela lesithico, Nebukhadnezari, inkhosi, labesimisile.

Ngako-ke baholi, netindvuna, nebabusi, nebeluleki, nebagcinitikhwama, nebehluleli, nabomantji kanye nato tonkhe tiphatsimandla tetifundza bahlangana batewunikela lesithico Nebukhadnezari, inkhosi, labesakhile; befika bema embikwaso.
Ummemeteli wevakala amemeta kakhulu, atsi: “Naku lokufanele kutsi nikwente, yebo, nine bantfu, nani tive, nani nonkhe nine bantfu betilwimi tonkhe:

Kutawutsi kungevakala kukhala kwempalampala, nekwemntjingozi, nekwezitha, nekwelire, nekwehabhu, nekwetimveve, nekwato tonkhe tinhlobo tekuhlabela, kufanele niwe phansi nikhotsame kulesithico segolide lesimiswe yinkhosi Nebukhadnezari.
Lowo longawi phansi asikhotsamele, utawujikijelwa masinyane ekhatsi elangabini lemlilo lowesabekako nalohhumako.”

Ngako-ke batsi kube beve umsindvo wempalampala, newemntjingozi, newezitha, newelire, newehabhu, newato tonkhe tinhlobo tekuhlabela, bonkhe bantfu, netive, nebantfu bato tonkhe tilwimi bawa phansi bakhotsama kulesithico segolide lesasimiswe yinkhosi Nebukhadnezari.
Bakhuluma enkhosini Nebukhadnezari, batsi: “Bayethe nkhosi, lunwele loludze! Wena waphakathi!

Ukhiphe simiso, wena waphakathi, kutsi wonkhe umuntfu, nakeva kukhala kwempalampala, nekwemntjingozi, nekwezitha, nekwelire, nekwehabhu, nekwetimveve, nekwato tonkhe tinhlobo tekuhlabela, kufanele awe phansi akhotsame kulesithico segolide,
nekutsi wonkhe longawi akhotsame uyawujikijelwa kulelilangabi lemlilo lowesabekako nalohhumako.

Kodvwa kukhona emaJuda lamanye lowabeke kutsi engamele tonkhe tindzaba talesifundza saseBhabhulona, boShadraki, naMeshaki, na-Abednego, labangenandzaba nawe, nkhosi. Ababakhonti bonkulunkulu bakho, kantsi futsi nalesithico segolide losimisile abasikhotsameli.”
Nebukhadnezari watfukutsela wabila, wabita boShadraki, naMeshaki kanye na-Abednego kutsi bete kuye. Ngako lamadvodza aletfwa embikwenkhosi.
Nebukhadnezari wakhuluma kuwo, watsi: “Kuliciniso yini, wena Shadraki, nawe Meshaki, nawe Abednego, kutsi anibakhonti labonkulunkulu bami nekutsi lesithico segolide lengisakhile anisikhotsameli?

Manje, naniva umsindvo wempalampala, newemntjingozi, newezitha, newelire, newehabhu, newetimveve, newato tonkhe tinhlobo tekuhlabela, nase nilungele kuwa nikhotsame kulesithico segolide lengisimisile, kulungile. Kodvwa naningasikhotsameli, nitawujikijelwa ngekushesha lokukhulu ekhatsi kulamalangabi emlilo lowesabekako nalohhumako. Ngumuphi-ke lowo nkulunkulu lotaba nemandla ekunephula esandleni sami?”
BoShadraki, naMeshaki, na-Abednego baphendvula inkhosi, batsi: “Nkhosi Nebukhadnezari, tsine asidzingi kutivikela kuwe ngalendzaba.
Nasijikijelwa ekhatsi kulamalangabi emlilo lowesabekako nalohhumako, loNkulunkulu wetfu lesimkhontako unemandla ekusisindzisa kuwo, futsi uyakusephula esandleni sakho, nkhosi.
Kodvwa-ke nome angakakwenti loko, sifuna kutsi wena wati, nkhosi, kutsi tsine singeke sibakhonte labonkulunkulu bakho, nome sikhotsame kulesithico sakho segolide losimisile.”

Nebukhadnezari watfukutselela boShadraki, naMeshaki, na-Abednego, nesimo sakhe kubo sagucuka. Watfumela kutsi kubaswe lamalangabi emlilo lowesabekako nalohhumako kutsi ushise ngalokuphindvwe kasikhombisa,
watfuma lamanye emadvodza emphi labenemandla kakhulu kutsi abophe boShadraki, naMeshaki, na-Abednego bese abajikijela ekhatsi kulamalangabi emlilo lohhumako.
Ngako-ke lamadvodza labembetse imijiva yawo, nemabhuluko, nemishuculo, naletinye nje timphahla tawo aboshwa, ajikijelwa ekhatsi kulamalangabi emlilo lohhumako.

Lomlayeto wenkhosi bewuphutfuma kakhulu, nalamalangabi emlilo lowesabekako nalohhumako abesashisa kangangekutsi lamalangabi alomlilo adzimate abulala wona lamadvodza labejikijele boShadraki, naMeshaki, na-Abednego ekhatsi kuwo,
kwatsi wona lamadvodza lamatsatfu, aboshisisiwe, akhalakatsiselwa ekhatsi emalangabini alomlilo lowesabekako nalohhumako.
Inkhosi Nebukhadnezari yagcuma yema ngetinyawo imangele, yabuta labeluleki bayo, yatsi: “Abengematsatfu yini lamadvodza lesiwabophe sawajikijela lapha ekhatsi emlilweni?”
Yatsi: “Ase nibuke! Ngibona emadvodza lamane ahambahamba lapha ekhatsi emlilweni, atfukululiwe, futsi akalimali ndzawo, kantsi lona wesine ufanana nendvodzana yabonkulunkulu.”

Nebukhadnezari wasondzela emnyango walomlilo lowesabekako nalohhumako longemalangabi lavutsako, wamemeta, watsi: “Shadraki, naMeshaki, nawe Abednego, nine tinceku taNkulunkulu Longetulu Kwako Konkhe, phumani! Wotani lapha!”
Ngako boShadraki, naMeshaki, na-Abednego baphuma emlilweni,

kwatsi mpu kubo baholi, netindvuna, nebabusi, netati, basondzela kubo bababunganyela. Babona kutsi lomlilo awuzange ubatsintse emitimbeni yabo, ngisho nalunye nje lunwele lwetinhloko tabo aluzange seluhashuke; imijiva yabo ayizange ishe, babenganuki ngisho neliphungana nje lemlilo imbala.
“Mine, Nebukhadnezari, ngangisekhaya esigodlweni sami, ngenelisekile, futsi ngiphumelela etintfweni tonkhe.
Ngabhudza liphupho lelangenta ngesaba kakhulu. Ngatsi ngisalele embhedzeni wami, imicabango nemibono leyabonakala engcondvweni yami kwangetfusa.
Ngako ngayala kutsi tonkhe tati taseBhabhulona tite lapha embikwami, titengichazela leliphupho lami.
Ekugcineni kwefika Danyela, wema embikwami, ngabe sengimlandzisa ngaleliphupho lami. Ubitwa ngekutsi Bhelteshasari, lekulibito lankulunkulu wami; umoya wabonkulunkulu labangcwele
Lena ngimibono lengayibona ngesikhatsi ngisalele embhedzeni wami: Ngatsi ngiyabuka, ngabona embikwami kume sihlahla, sisekhatsi nelive. Budze baso babesabeka.
Lesihlahla sakhula saba sikhulu, sacina futsi, sihloko saso saze satsintsa sibhakabhaka, sasibonakala emhlabeni wonkhe jikelele.

Emacembe aso abemahle netitselo taso titinyenti, lapha kuso bekunekudla kwabo bonkhe. Ngaphansi kwaso tilwane tesiganga tatfola umtfunti wekuphumula, netinyoni tasemoyeni takhela tidleke tato emagaleni aso; tonkhe tidalwa tondliwa kuso.
“Kulemibono lengayibona ngisalele embhedzeni wami, ngatsi ngiyabuka, ngabona embikwami sitfunywa

Samemeta ngelivi lelikhulu, satsi: ‘Sijube leso sihlahla, ucote emagala aso; phundla emacembe aso, usakate titselo taso. Tilwane letingaphansi kwaso atibaleke, netinyoni letisemagaleni aso tindize tisuke kuso.
Kodvwa siphunti saso netimphandze taso kuboshwe ngensimbi nangelitfusi kusale emhlabatsini, etjanini besiganga.
“ ‘Lomuntfu akanetfwe ngematolo asezulwini, futsi akaphile netilwane, ahlale emkhatsini walokumila emhlabeni.
Ingcondvo yakhe ayigucuke ekubeni yemuntfu, yena anikwe ingcondvo yetilwane kuze tikhatsi letisikhombisa

“Ngilo leli-ke liphupho lengilibhudzile, mine Nebukhadnezari. Manje-ke, Bhelteshasari, ngitjele kutsi lisho kutsini, ngobe kute nome munye wetati letilapha embusweni wami longangichazela lona. Kodvwa wena ungangichazela, ngobe umoya wabonkulunkulu labangcwele

Ngako Danyela, labebitwa ngekutsi nguBhelteshasari, wadideka kakhulu kwesikhashana, imicabango yakhe yametfusa. Ngako inkhosi yakhuluma kuye, yatsi: “Bhelteshasari, ungavumi likwetfuse leliphupho kanye nenchazelo yalo.”
Bhelteshasari waphendvula, watsi: “Nkhosi yami, kube mane leliphupho belicondzene netitsa takho nenchazelo yalo icondzene nalabo labemelene nawe!
Lesihlahla losibonile, lesikhule sabuye sacina, nesihloko saso sitsintsa sibhakabhaka, sibonakala emhlabeni wonkhe,
sinemacembe lamahle netitselo letinyenti, sinekudla kwabo bonkhe, singumtfunti wekuhlala tilwane tesiganga, sinetidleke emagaleni aso kutsi kutekwakhela tinyoni tasemoyeni,
nguwe lesihlahla, nkhosi yeluhlanga! Ube mkhulu, waba nemandla, bukhulu bakho bukhule baze befikela etulu esibhakabhakeni, nembuso wakho wenaba waze wefika etindzaweni letikhashane emhlabeni.

“Wena, nkhosi, ubone sitfunywa, lesingcwele, sehla siphuma ezulwini, sitsi: ‘Sijube leso sihlahla usibhubhise, kodvwa ushiye siphunti saso, siboshwe ngensimbi nangelitfusi etjanini besiganga, timphandze taso tisesele phansi emhlabatsini. Lomuntfu akanetfwe ngematolo asezulwini; akahlale njengetilwane tesiganga, kuze kwendlule tikhatsi letisikhombisa ngakuye.’
“Nansi-ke inchazelo yaleliphupho, wena waphakathi, loku simisomtsetfo lesikhishwe nguLongetulu Kwako Konkhe samelana ngco nenkhosi yami.

Utawucoshwa emkhatsini webantfu, uhlale netilwane tesiganga; utawudla tjani njengetinkhomo, unetfwe ngematolo asezulwini. Kutakwendlula tikhatsi letisikhombisa kuwe, uze uvume kutsi Longetulu Kwako Konkhe wengamele imibuso yonkhe yebantfu, uyinika nome ngubani lowo latsandza kumupha yona.
Lomyalo wekushiya siphunti sesihlahla netimphandze taso kusho kutsi lombuso wakho uyawubuyiselwa kuwe, wena nase uvume kutsi Lizulu ngilo lelibusako.

Ngako-ke, wena waphakathi, asemukeleke kuwe leseluleko sami: Yekela tono takho, wente lokulungile, uyekele nekukhohlakala kwakho, ngekutsi ube nemusa kulabo labacindzetelwe. Kungenteka kutsi kuchubeka kahle kwakho nekuphumelela kwakho kuchubekele embili.”
Emvakwetinyanga letili-12, yatsi inkhosi isahambahamba etulu eluphahleni lwesigodlo sayo saseBhabhulona,
yatsi: “Lena akusiyo yini iBhabhulona lenkhulu lengiyakhile yaba sigodlo sekuhlala inkhosi, ngemandla ami lamakhulu ngayakhela ludvumo lwebukhosi bami?”
Emavi abesesemlonyeni wayo, nayiva livi liphuma ezulwini, litsi: “Naku lese kumiselwe wena, nkhosi Nebukhadnezari: Emandla ebukhosi bakho asatsetfwe kuwe.

Wena sewutawukhishwa emkhatsini webantfu, uyewuhlala emkhatsini wetilwane tesiganga; utawudla tjani njengetinkhomo. Kutakwendlula tikhatsi letisikhombisa kuwe, uze uvume kutsi Longetulu Kwako Konkhe wengamele yonkhe imibuso yebantfu, nekutsi uyinika nome ngubani umuntfu latsandza kumupha yona.”

Ngekushesha nje loko lokwakukhulunyiwe ngaNebukhadnezari kwagcwaliseka. Wakhishwa emkhatsini webantfu, wadla tjani njengetinkhomo. Umtimba wakhe wanetfwa ngematolo asezulwini, tadzimate tinwele takhe takhula taba ngangetinsiba telusweti, netingalo takhe tafanana netingalo tenyoni.
kuwo emandla asezulwini nakuto tive temhlaba.

“Ngasona leso sikhatsi lekwabuyiselwa ngaso kusanguluka kwengcondvo yami, kuhlonishwa kwami neludvumo lwami kwabuyiselwa kimi, kwaba ludvumo lwembuso wami. Beluleki bami netikhulu tami bangifunisisa bangibuyisela esihlalweni sami sebukhosi, ngaba ngulomkhulu kakhulu kwendlula kucala.

Manje, mine Nebukhadnezari, ngibabata ngiphakamise ngekudvumisa iNkhosi yelizulu, ngobe konkhe lekwentako kulungile, nato tonkhe tindlela tayo tiphelele ngekulunga. Labo labahamba ngekutigcabha, uyakwati kubatfobisa.”
Inkhosi Bhelshasari yenta lidzili lelikhulu yentela tindvuna tayo letatiyinkhulungwane, yanatsa nato liwayini.
Kwatsi Bhelshasari asanatsa liwayini lakhe, walayeta kutsi kulandvwe tindzebe tegolide netesiliva letatitsetfwe nguNebukhadnezari, uyise,
Ngako-ke baletsa letindzebe tegolide letatitsetfwe ethempelini laNkulunkulu eJerusalema, kwase kutsi inkhosi, netindvuna tayo, nebafati bayo, nemaphovela ayo banatsa ngato.
Batsi basanatsa liwayini, babe badvumisa bonkulunkulu begolide, nebesiliva, nebelitfusi, nebensimbi, nebetigodvo, nebematje.
Ngekushesha kwabonakala iminwe yesandla semuntfu ibhala elubondzeni, macondzana nelutsi lwesibane esigodlweni senkhosi. Inkhosi yasibuka lesandla lesibhalako.
Buso bayo bagucuka baphaphatseka, yatfutfumela kangangekutsi kwaze kwagedletela emadvolo ayo, kwatsamba nemilente yayo.
Tonkhe tati tenkhosi tangena; kodvwa atizange tikwati kuwufundza lombhalo nome titjele inkhosi kutsi wawusho kutsini.
Ngako inkhosi Bhelshasari yatfutfumela kakhulu, nebuso bayo bachubeka baphaphatseka. Tindvuna tayo nato tacakeka.

Kukhona indvodza lapha embusweni wakho lenemoya wabonkulunkulu labangcwele. Ngesikhatsi seyihlo yatfolakala inako kubonisisa, nekucondzisisa, nekuhlakanipha lokufanana nekwabonkulunkulu. Inkhosi Nebukhadnezari, uyihlo, yambeka kutsi abe ngumphatsi wetinyanga, nebatsebuli, nabosonkhanyeti kanye netangoma.

Lendvodza lenguDanyela, inkhosi leyayetsa yatsi nguBhelteshasari, yatfolakala inengcondvo lekhaliphile, inelwati nekucondza, kantsi futsi yatfolakala ikwati kuchaza emaphupho, nekucaca timfumbe, icatulule netinkinga letilukhuni. Bita Danyela, yena utakutjela kutsi lombhalo usho kutsini.”
Ngivile kutsi umoya wabonkulunkulu ukuwe nekutsi uyakubona lokusitsekile, unengcondvo kantsi unekuhlakanipha lokugcamile.
Letati nebatsebuli bangeniswe lapha embikwami kutsi batewufundza lombhalo bangitjele kutsi usho kutsini, kodvwa behlulekile kuwuchaza.

Ngivile-ke wena kutsi ungakwati kuveta tinchazelo nekucatulula tinkinga letilukhuni. Nawungafundza lombhalo, ungitjele kutsi usho kutsini, utakwembatsiswa letibukhwebeletane, kugacwe umgaco wegolide entsanyeni yakho, bese wentiwa uba ngumbusi wesitsatfu embusweni.”
Danyela waphendvula inkhosi, watsi: “Letipho takho ungatigcinela tona, uyinike lomunye leyo mivuzo yakho. Noko lombhalo inkhosi ngitakuyifundzela wona ngiyichazele kutsi usho kutsini.

Ngenca yesikhundla lesiphakeme lamupha sona, bonkhe bantfu, netive, nebantfu bato tonkhe tilwimi babetfutfumela bamesaba. Labo inkhosi leyayifuna kutsi babulawe, yayibabulala; nalabo leyayifuna kubaphephisa, yayibaphephisa; nalabo leyayifuna kubaphakamisela etikhundleni, yayibaphakamisa; nalabo leyayifuna kubatfobisa, yayibatfobisa.
Kodvwa watsi kube inhlitiyo yakhe ibe nekutigcabha yaba lukhuni ngenca yekutigcabha, wehliswa esihlalweni sakhe sebukhosi, wemukwa ludvumo lwakhe.

Wakhishwa emkhatsini webantfu, wanikwa ingcondvo yesilwane; wahlala emkhatsini wetimbongolo tesiganga, wadla tjani njengetinkhomo; nemtimba wakhe wanetfwa ngematolo asezulwini, waze wavuma kutsi Nkulunkulu Longetulu Kwako Konkhe wengamele yonkhe imibuso yebantfu nekutsi ubeka etikwayo nome ngumuphi lowo latsandza kumbeka.

Esikhundleni saloko, sewutiphakamisile wamelana naNkulunkulu welizulu. Baletsa letindzebe tasethempelini lakhe kuwe, kwatsi wena netindvuna takho, nemakhosikati akho, nemaphovela akho nanatsa ngato liwayini. Nikhuleke nadvumisa bonkulunkulu besiliva nebegolide, nebelitfusi, nebensimbi, nebetigodvo kanye nebematje labangakwati kubona, nome kuva, nome kucondza. Kodvwa awukamdvumisi Nkulunkulu lophetse kuphila kwakho nato tonkhe tindlela takho esandleni sakhe.
Ngabo bona lobo busuku Bhelshasari, inkhosi yemaBhabhulona, wagwazwa wafa.
Dariyusi, umMede, watsatsa umbuso, asaneminyaka lengema-62.
Kwaba kuhle kuDariyusi kutsi abeke tikhulu letili-120 kutsi tengamele wonkhe umbuso wakhe;
ngetulu kwato tonkhe letikhulu kwakunebengameli labatsatfu, lomunye wabo kwakunguDanyela. Letikhulu tatingaphansi kwabo labengameli, kuze inkhosi ingetiwulahlekelwa lutfo.
Danyela wakhombisa likhono lebuholi lelaliphakeme emkhatsini wabo bonkhe labengameli naletikhulu, kangangekutsi inkhosi yadzimate yafuna kumbeka kutsi engamele wonkhe lombuso wayo.

Ngenca yaloko labengameli kanye naletikhulu, betama kutfola tizatfu tekutsi Danyela atfolakale anemacala macondzana nekuphatsa kwakhe tindzaba tembuso, kodvwa behluleka kukwenta loko. Abazange bayitfole inkhohlakalo kuye, ngobe abetsembekile, abengakakhohlakali, futsi anakekela kahle konkhe.
Ekugcineni lamadvodza atsi: “Singeke sisitfole sizatfu lesingambeka ngaso emacala Danyela ngaphandle kwentfo letsintsana nemtsetfo waNkulunkulu wakhe.”

Bengameli bembuso, netindvuna, netikhulu, nebeluleki kanye nebabusi bonkhe bavumelene ngekutsi inkhosi kufanele ikhiphe umtsetfosimemetelo bese icinisa lesimemetelo ngekutsi nome ngubani lothandaza kulomunye nkulunkulu nome umuntfu ngaphandle kwakho, nkhosi, kulamalanga langema-30 letako uyawujikijelwa emgodzini wemabhubesi.
Manje-ke, nkhosi, khipha lesimemetelo usibhale phansi, kuze singetiwuguculwa ngumuntfu, njengekwemitsetfo yemaMede nemaPheresiya lengeke iguculwe ngumuntfu.”
Ngako inkhosi Dariyusi, yase iwubhala phansi lomtsetfosimemetelo.
Lamadvodza ase ayahamba asicumbi aya kuDanyela, afike amkhandza athandaza kuNkulunkulu acela lusito.

Ngako ahamba aya enkhosini, afike akhuluma kuyo ngalesimemetelo sayo sebukhosi, atsi: “Awuzange yini ukhiphe umtsetfosimemetelo kutsi kulamalanga langema-30 letako umuntfu lothandaza kunome ngumuphi nkulunkulu nome umuntfu ngaphandle kwakho, nkhosi, utawujikijelwa emgodzini wemabhubesi?”
Inkhosi yaphendvula, yatsi: “Lesimemetelo simile njengekwemitsetfo yemaMede nemaPheresiya, lengeke iguculwe ngumuntfu.”
Base bakhuluma enkhosini, batsi: “Danyela, longulomunye webatfunjwa bakaJuda, akakunaki wena, nkhosi, nalesimemetelo sakho lowasibhala phansi akasishayi mkhuba. Usathandaza katsatfu ngelilanga.”
Inkhosi yatsi kube ikuve loko, yakhatsateka kakhulu, yetama konkhe lokwakusemandleni ayo kutsi imsindzise Danyela kwadzimate kwashona lilanga.

Lamadvodza abutsana aba sicumbi aya enkhosini, afike atsi: “Khumbula, Silosikhulu, kutsi ngekwemtsetfo wemaMede nemaPheresiya kute simemetelo nome umtsetfo lokhishwa yinkhosi longabuye uguculwe ngumuntfu.”
Ngako inkhosi yatfumela livi, kwalandvwa Danyela, wajikijelwa emgodzini wemabhubesi. Inkhosi yakhuluma kuDanyela, yatsi: “Shangatsi Nkulunkulu wakho, lomkhonta njalonjalo, angakulamlela!”
Inkhosi yase iyancandzeka ibuyela esigodlweni sayo, busuku bonkhe yayihleti ingadli lutfo, akuzange kuletfwe ngisho nentfo yekuyijabulisa embikwayo. Ayizange ilale.
Kwatsi nakudzabuka kusa, inkhosi yavuka yaphutfuma emgodzini wemabhubesi.

Yatsi kube ifike edvute nemgodzi wemabhubesi, yamemeta Danyela ngeliphimbo lelidzabukile, yatsi: “Danyela, nceku yaNkulukulu lophilako, loNkulunkulu wakho, lomkhonta njalonjalo, ukhonile yini kukulamlela emabhubesini?”
Nkulunkulu wami utfumele ingilosi yakhe, lefike yavala imilomo yemabhubesi. Akangilimati, ngobe ngitfolakele ngite licala emehlweni akhe, kantsi nakuwe, nkhosi, kute lengikonile.”

Inkhosi yajabula kakhulu, yatfumela kutsi kuyewukhishwa Danyela emgodzini wemabhubesi. Danyela watsi nasakhishwe emgodzini wemabhubesi, kwangete kwatfolakala ngisho nemyocu emtimbeni wakhe, ngobe abemetsembile Nkulunkulu wakhe.

Inkhosi yakhipha umyalo, kwaletfwa kuyo onkhe lamadvodza labebeke Danyela licala ngekumcalela emanga, ajikijelwa emgodzini wemabhubesi, wona, nabomkawo, kanye nebantfwabawo. Emabhubesi atseleka etikwabo, abadzabudzabula abacedza bangakefiki ngisho nasesiyilweni salomgodzi wemabhubesi, ababhasha ngisho nematsambo abo.

Kwatsi ngemnyaka wekucala waBhelshasari, inkhosi yaseBhabhulona, Danyela wabhudza liphupho, kwendlula imibono engcondvweni yakhe aselele embhedzeni wakhe ngalobo busuku. Walibhala phansi leliphupho alandzisa lobekucuketfwe ngilo leliphupho.
Danyela watsi: “Embonweni wami ebusuku, ngabona embikwami kwakunemimoya yomine yasezulwini, ivumbuka elwandle lolukhulu.
Kwakhuphuka letikhulu tilo letine, nguleso sehlukile kulesinye, taphuma elwandle.

“Ngatsi ngisabukile, naku embikwami sekume lesinye silo sesibili, sona-ke sasinjengelibhele. Saphakanyiswa ngalomunye wemihlubulo yaso, sasinetimbambo letintsatfu emlonyeni waso emkhatsini wematinyo aso, satjelwa kwatsiwa: ‘Vuka, udle, wesutse inyama.’

“Emvakwaloko, ngatsi ngiyabuka, ngabona embikwami lesinye futsi silo, sona-ke sasifanana nengwe. Lapha emhlane waso sasinetimphiko letine letinjengetenyoni. Lesilo sasinetinhloko letine, sanikwa emandla ekubusa.

“Emvakwaloko, embonweni wami ebusuku ngabuka, ngabona embikwami lesinye futsi silo sesine, sasesabeka, setfusana kakhulu futsi sinemandla lamakhulu. Sasinetimbabela tematinyo ensimbi, sasikufihlita sikushwabudzele loko lesikubambile sigcobagcobe loku lokwakusele kwako ngetinselo taso. Sasehlukile kuto tonkhe leta takucala tilo, futsi sasinetimphondvo letilishumi.
tinwele tenhloko yakhe tatimhlophe njengeboya betimvu.
“Ngachubeka ngabukisisa ngenca yekuhlokoma kwemavi ekutigabatisa lakhulunywa luphondvo. Ngangibukisisile saze sahlatjwa lesilo, umtimba waso wabhujiswa, wajikwa emlilweni lovutsa emalangabi.
Nato leti letinye tilo temukwa emandla ato ekubusa, kodvwa tavunyelwa kuphila sikhashana.

Wanikwa emandla ekubusa, nenkhatimulo, nebukhosi. Bonkhe bantfu, netive, nebantfu bato tonkhe tilwimi bakhotsama kuye bamkhonta. Kubusa kwakhe kukubusa kwaphakadze naphakadze lokungasoze kwaphela, nembuso wakhe ngulowo longasoze wacitfwa.”
“Mine Danyela ngakhatsateka emoyeni wami, nalemibono leyendlula engcondvweni yami yangiphatamisa emphefumulweni.
Ngasondzela ngakulomunye walabo lababeme lapho, ngambuta liciniso lako konkhe loku.
“Ngako wase uyangitjela, wangichazela kahle nekutsi kusho kutsini konkhe loku:
‘Letilo letine tingimibuso lemine leyawuba khona emhlabeni.
Kodvwa labangcwele balowo Longetulu Kwako Konkhe bayawunikwa umbuso loyawuba ngewabo phakadze naphakadze, yebo, waphakadze naphakadze.’

“Ngase ngifuna kutfolisisa kahle ngalesilokati sesine kutsi sasisho kutsini, ngobe sona sasehlukile kuto tonkhe leti letinye, sesabeka kakhulu ngalamatinyo aso etinsimbi, netidladla telitfusi, silo lesasikufihlita sikushwabudzele loko lesikubambile, sigcobagcobe loko lokwakusele kwako ngetinselo taso.

Ngabuta futsi nangaletimphondvo letatilishumi letatisenhloko yaso, nangalolu lolunye luphonjwana lolwase luyamila, lapho kwatsi letintsatfu takucala tase tiyahhohloka embikwalo, loluphondvo lwalunemehlo nemlomo lowawukhuluma ngekutigabatisa kantsi lwalubukeka lwengama leti letinye.
Kwatsi ngisabuka, loluphondvo lwaphekehla imphi yekutsi kuliwe nalabangcwele, futsi lwabehlula,
“Wase utsi: ‘Lesilo sesine ngumbuso wesine loyawuvela emhlabeni. Uyawukwehluka kuyo yonkhe leminye imibuso, futsi uyawushwabudzela wonkhe umhlaba, uwugcobagcobe phansi uwufihlite.
Letimphondvo letilishumi ngemakhosi lalishumi layawuvela kulombuso. Emvakwawo kuyawuvela lenye inkhosi leyakwehluka kulawa lamanye akucala; iyawutfobisa emakhosi lamatsatfu.

Iyawukhuluma ihlambalate Longetulu Kwako Konkhe, icindzetele labangcwele bakhe, yetame kugucula tikhatsi temikhosi lemisiwe nemitsetfo. Labangcwele bayawunikelwa kuyo kube sikhashana, netikhatsi, nencenye yesikhatsi.
“ ‘Kodvwa behluleli bayawuhlala, lenkhosi iyakwemukwa emandla ayo ekubusa, icitfwe kokuphela.

Lapho-ke kubusa, nemandla, nebukhulu bemibuso yonkhe lengaphansi kwelizulu, kuyawunikelwa etandleni talabangcwele, sive saLongetulu Kwako Konkhe. Umbuso wakhe kuyawuba ngumbuso waphakadze naphakadze, bonkhe babusi bayawukhotsama kuye bamkhonte, bamlalele.’
Embonweni wami ngatibona mine ngisenqabeni yaseSusa esifundzeni sase-Elamu; kulombono ngangiseceleni kwemfula, i-Ulayi.

Ngatsi ngiphakamisa emehlo, ngabona embikwami kunesihhanca sinetimphondvo letimbili, sime eceleni kwalomfula, letimphondvo tatitindze. Lolunye lwaletimphondvo lwaluludze kunalolu lolunye, kodvwa lwamila kamuva.

Ngasibuka lesihhanca sisahlasela sibheke ngasenshonalanga, nangasenyakatfo, nangaseningizimu. Kute ngisho nasinye silwane lesasingemelana naso, kute nalokwakungalanyulelwa emandleni aso, sasijangaza nje senta lesikutsandzako, saze saba sikhulu kakhulu.
Ngatsi ngisacabanga ngaloku, kwachamuka siphongo sineluphondvo lolugcamile emkhatsini wemehlo aso, sachamuka ngasenshonalanga sadzabula wonkhe umhlaba, sagijima singakaze sawutsintsa umhlabatsi.
Sasondzela ngakulesihhanca lesinetimphondvo letimbili lengangisibone sime eceleni kwemfula, sasukela lesihhanca sasishishimeta ngelulaka lolumatima kabi.

Ngasibona sihlasela lesihhanca kabuhlungu kabi, sagadla lesihhanca safohlota letimphondvo taso letimbili. Lesihhanca sona sasingenamandla ekutivikela kulesiphongo, lesiphongo sasihlaba sasijika phansi, sasigcobagcoba ngemasondvo aso, kwabate ngisho namunye labengasilamlela lesihhanca emandleni alesiphongo.

Lesiphongo satikhukhumukisa saba sikhulu kakhulu, kodvwa kwatsi lapho sesinemandla, lwephuka loluphondvo lwaso lolukhulu, kwatsi esikhundleni salo kwamila timphondvo letine letigcamile, takhula taya etulu emimoyeni yomine yelizulu.
Lwakhula lwadzimate lwefikela nasemabutfweni lasemazulwini, lwajikijela phansi emhlabeni letinye tetinkhanyeti, lwatigcobagcoba.
Lwatikhulisa lona kutsi lube lukhulu lube ngangembusi walamabutfo, lwasusa imihlatjelo yemalanga onkhe kuye, nendzawo yakhe lengcwele yehliselwa phansi.

Ngase ngiva longcwele akhuluma, nalomunye longcwele wakhuluma kuye, watsi: “Kutawutsatsa sikhatsi lesidze kangakanani kuze kugcwaliseke lombono, umbono lomacondzana nemihlatjelo yemalanga onkhe nalobuphekula lobubanga incitsakalo, namacondzana nekunikelwa kwendzawo lengcwele nekwelibutfo lasezulwini lelitawugcotjwagcotjwa ngetinyawo?”
Ngatsi mine Danyela ngisabukisisa umbono, ngetama kuwuvisisa kahle, ngabona sekume embikwami lokwakunjengemuntfu ngesimo.
Ngeva livi lemuntfu lichamuka ngase-Ulayi limemeta litsi: “Gabriyeli, tjela lomuntfu inchazelo yalombono.”
Watsi asasondzela kulendzawo lapho ngangime khona, ngesaba kakhulu ngawa phansi ngebuso. Watsi kimi: “Ndvodzana yemuntfu, visisa kahle kutsi lombono umacondzana nesikhatsi sekugcina.”
Watsi: “Ngitakutjela kutsi kutakwentekani kamuva, ngesikhatsi selulaka, ngobe lombono umacondzana nesikhatsi sekugcina lesimisiwe.
Lesihhanca losibonile lesinetimphondvo letimbili, simele emakhosi aseMediya newasePheresiya.
Lesiyephuyephu sesiphongo siyinkhosi yaseGrisi, naloluphondvo lolukhulukati lolusemkhatsini wemehlo aso, yinkhosi yekucala.
Letimphondvo letine letamila esikhundleni salolwa lolwephulwa, timele imibuso lemine leyawuvela kuleso sive, kodvwa ingeke ibe nemandla lafananako.
“Kuyawutsi ngasekupheleni kwekubusa kwayo, lapho buphekula sebubunyenti ngalokuphelele, kuyawuvela inkhosi lenebuso lobulukhuni, inkhosi yemanga yekwakha emacebo.
Iyawuba nemandla kakhulu, kodvwa hhayi ngekwemandla ayo. Iyawukwenta umonakalo lowesabekako, iphumelele kuko konkhe leyikwentako. Iyawubhubhisa emadvodza lanemandla lamakhulu nesive lesingcwele.

Iyawuphumelelisa lokungemanga, ititsatse ngekutsi yona ingulongetulu. Bayawutsi nasebativela kutsi bavikelekile, ibabhubhise linyenti labo, imelane nembusi webaphatsi. Noko yona iyawubhujiswa, kodvwa hhayi ngemandla ebantfu.
“Lombono wemihlatjelo yasebusuku neyasekuseni lowukhonjisiwe uliciniso, kodvwa uwugcine usifuba sakho, ngobe wona umacondzana netikhatsi tekugcina.”
Mine Danyela ngaphela emandla, ngalala ngigula emalanga lamanyenti. Ngase ngiyavuka ngachubeka nemsebenti wenkhosi. Ngangimangaliswe ngulombono, futsi wawungetulu kwengcondvo yemuntfu.

ngemnyaka wakhe wekucala abekiwe, mine Danyela ngafundza ngeva kahle emiBhalweni njengekwelivi laSimakadze kuJeremiya, umphrofethi, kutsi kubhidlitwa kweJerusalema kuyawutsatsa iminyaka lengema-70, lapho iyawusala khona ikhala libhungane.
Ngako ngagucukela kuSimakadze longuNkulunkulu ngamncenga ngemthandazo nangekuncusa ngizila kudla, ngembatse emasaka, ngatitsela ngemlotsa.
sonile kuwe senta lokubi. Besibabi kakhulu, futsi sakuvukela; siphambukile sashiya imiyalo yakho nemitsetfo yakho.
Asikatilaleli tinceku takho baphrofethi, lababekhuluma egameni lakho, kuwo emakhosi etfu, nakubabusi betfu, nakubobabemkhulu, nakubo bonkhe bantfu belive.
Awu Simakadze, tsine nemakhosi etfu, nebabusi betfu, nabobabemkhulu, sitseleke ngelihlazo nendlisamahloni, ngobe sonile kuwe.
Simakadze Nkulunkulu wetfu unemusa nekutsetselela, nome nje sihlubukile kuye;
asikalilaleli livi laSimakadze Nkulunkulu wetfu, futsi asikayigcini imitsetfo lasinika yona ngetinceku takhe baphrofethi.
Wonkhe Israyeli uwephulile umtsetfo wakho, weduka wala kulalela livi lakho.
“Ngako-ke ticalekiso letibhalwe emtsetfweni waMosi, inceku yaNkulunkulu, setitfululelwe etikwetfu ngenca yekona kwetfu kuwe.

Uwagcwalisile emavi akho lowawakhuluma ngatsi nangebabusi betfu, uwagcwalise ngekwehlisela inhlekelele lenkhulu etikwetfu. Kute nakunye lokwake kwenteka ngaphansi kwelizulu lokunjengaloku lokwenteke kuyo iJerusalema.

Njengobe kubhaliwe emtsetfweni waMosi, yonkhe lenhlekelele yehlele etikwetfu, kodvwa tsine sisengakabufunisisi buso baSimakadze Nkulunkulu wetfu, ngekutsi siphendvuke etonweni tetfu, sinakekele ngekucophelela liciniso lakho.
Simakadze akazange angabate kwehlisela lenhlekelele etikwetfu, ngobe Simakadze Nkulunkulu wetfu ulungile kuko konkhe lakwentako; noko tsine asikalilaleli livi lakhe.

Awu Simakadze, ngako konkhe kulunga kwakho mane ugucule intfukutselo yakho nelulaka lwakho kuyo iJerusalema, lidolobha lakho, leliyintsaba yakho lengcwele. Tono tetfu nekona kwabobabe sekwente iJerusalema nesive sakho kwaba lihlazo kubo bonkhe labakhelene natsi.
“Manje-ke Nkulunkulu wetfu, vani umthandazo nekuncusa kwenceku yakho. Ngenca yakho nje, Simakadze, mane ubuke ngesihawu lithempeli lakho lese libhidlitiwe.

Awu Nkulunkulu wami, mane ubeke indlebe, uve, vula emehlo akho ubone kubhidlitwa kwetfu nekwelidolobha lelibitwa ngeLibito lakho. Asiletsi kuncusa kwetfu kuwe, ngobe tsine silungile, kodvwa kungenca yemusa wakho lomkhulu.
Awu Simakadze, lalela! Awu Simakadze, tsetselela! Awu Simakadze, vani, wente! Awu, Nkulunkulu wami, ngenca yakho mane ungete wabina, ngobe lidolobha lakho nesive sakho kubitwa ngeLibito lakho.”
Ngatsi ngisakhuluma ngithandaza, ngivuma tono tami netono tesive sema-Israyeli akitsi, ngiletsa kuncusa kwami kuSimakadze Nkulunkulu wami ngentsaba yakhe lengcwele,
ngatsi ngisesemthandazweni, kwefika Gabriyeli, leyo ndvodza lengangiyibone embonweni wakucala, wefika kimi njengembane, ngesikhatsi semnikelo wakusihlwa.
Wangitjela watsi: “Danyela, nyalo sengitele kutekukhutsata kutsi ubone futsi ucondzisise.
Watsi nje ucala kuthandaza, wanikwa imphendvulo, lengitekutjela yona, ngobe utsandzekile. Ngako visisa lelivi, uwucondzisise lombono:
“Yati loku ukucondzisise: Kusukela ekumisweni kwesimiso sekutsi
Ngaleso sikhatsi, mine Danyela, ngalila emaviki aze aba matsatfu.
Ngangingadli kudla kwelikhetselo, nome inyama; kute nelitfonsi leliwayini lelake latsintsa umlomo wami; angigcobisanga ngisho nakancane, kwadzimate kwaphela lawo maviki lamatsatfu.
ngatsi ngiyabuka, ngabona embikwami kume umuntfu embetse telineni, atibophe ngelibhande legolide lecengekile elukhalo.

Umtimba wakhe wawufanana nelitje lekhrisolithe, buso bakhe bunjengembane, emehlo akhe anjengetidlwane letivutsa emalangabi, imikhono yakhe nemilente yakhe imengetela njengelitfusi lelilongiwe, livi lakhe lalinjengemsindvo wesicumbi.
Ngako ngatikhandza sengisele ngedvwa ngigolotele lombono lomkhulu kangaka ngingenamandla, buso bami bagwala baba bovu tju, ngaba yingici.
Ngase ngimuva uyakhuluma, ngatsi ngisemlalele, ngatikhandza ngikulobukhulu butfongo, ngase ngilele, buso bami buse mbo phansi.
Kwaba khona sandla lesingitsintsako, ngatfutfumela, kwachachatela emadvolo netandla.
Watsi: “Danyela, wena lotsandzekile, caphelisisa lamavi lesengitakutjela wona, sukuma ume, ngobe nyalo ngitfunyelwe kuwe.” Watsi kube asho njalo kimi, ngasukuma ngichachatela.
Manje-ke sengitele kutakuchazela kutsi kutakwentekani kubantfu bakini ngemalanga letako, ngobe lombono umayelana netikhatsi letiseta.”
Watsi asasho njalo kimi, ngakhotsama, buso bami bubheke phansi ngingasakhoni ngisho nekukhuluma.
Kungenteka kanjani kutsi mine, nceku yakho, ngikhulume nawe, nkhosi. Emandla ami asangishiyile, sengehluleka ngisho nekuphefumula.”
Waphindza futsi lona labenjengemuntfu wangitsintsa, wanginika emandla.
Watsi: “Ungesabi, wena ndvodza letsandzeke kakhulu. Kuthula! Cina manje, ube nesibindzi.”
Watsi kube akhuluma nami, ngacina lidvolo, ngatsi: “Khuluma, nkhosi yami, ngobe naku sewungicinise emandla.”
Ngako watsi: “Uyati yini kutsi ngiteleni lapha kuwe? Masinyane ngitawuncandzeka kuze ngitekulwa nengilosi yasePheresiya,
kodvwa ngitawucala ngikutjele kutsi kubhalweni encwadzini yeliciniso. Kute namunye longelekelelako kutsi emelane nato, ngaphandle kwaMikhayeli, inkhosi yenu.
“Ngemnyaka wekucala wekubusa kwaDariyusi umMede, mine-ke ngasukuma, ngema ngakuye ngamvikela.”

“Manje-ke, sengikutjela liciniso: Kusetawuvela lamanye emakhosi lamatsatfu ePheresiya, bese kuba yesine leyawunjinga kakhulu kunawo onkhe lalamanye. Kuyawutsi nase iwatfolile emandla ngebunjinga bayo, bese ivusa wonkhe umhlaba kutsi akuvukelwe iGrisi.
Lapho-ke kuyawuvela inkhosi lenemandla, leyawubusa ngemandla ayo lamakhulu, ihlamahlame njengekutsandza kwayo.

Iyawutsi nase ivele, umbuso wayo bese uyehlukaniswa ubhekiswe emimoyeni yomine yasezulwini. Ngeke wendlulele etitukulwaneni tayo, futsi ngeke ube nalamandla leyayiwasebentisa, ngobe lombuso wayo uyawusishulwa unikwe labanye.
Kuyawutsi emvakweminyaka bese bayahlangana basitane. Kuyawusuka indvodzakati yenkhosi yaseningizimu
“Kuyawuvela lomunye entalelwaneni yakabo loyawutsatsa sikhundla sayo. Uyawuhlasela emabutfo enkhosi yasenyakatfo,
Uyawutfumba bonkulunkulu babo, netitfombe tabo tetinsimbi, netimphahla tabo letingemagugu tesiliva netegolide, atetfwale aye nato eGibhithe. Kuyawuba sikhatsi lesidze ayiyekele inkhosi yasenyakatfo

Emadvodzana ayo ayawutilungiselela imphi, abutse emabutfo lamanyenti, lomunye wawo nemphi yakhe bayawukhukhula kungatsi sihhuhhula semvula, ayidvudvule imphi, badzimate bahlasele nenqaba yenkhosi yaseningizimu.
Kuyawutsi imphi nase itfunjiwe, inkhosi yaseningizimu
Umhlaseli uyawujangaza alihlamahlame ngekutsandza kwakhe, kute loyawukhona kumelana naye. Uyawukwakha atinte eveni lelihle, abe nemandla ekulibhubhisa.
Uyawutimisela kuta ngemandla embuso wakhe wonkhe atihlanganise nenkhosi yaseningizimu,

Uyawujikisa ingcondvo yakhe ayibhekise emaveni lagudla tilwandle atsatse lamanyenti awo, kodvwa umkhuteli wemphi uyawucedza kutigabatisa kwakhe, akugucule lokutigabatisa kwakhe abuyisele lihlazo kuye.
Emvakwaloko uyawujikela ngasetinqabeni taseveni lakhe, kodvwa uyawukhubatela awe, angasayiwuphindza abonwe.
“Uyawulandzelwa ngumfokatana nje longazange asanikwe ludvumo lwebukhosi. Uyawufika ngesikhatsi bantfu bawo bativela bavikelekile, atsatse umbuso ngemacebo.
Sikhukhula semphi lenkhulu siyawukhukhuleka sisuswe embikwakhe; kokubili, imphi kanye nesikhulu sesivumelwane, kuyawubhujiswa.
Kuyawutsi nase bente sivumelwane naye, bese uyakhohlisa, uyawukhula abe nemandla, kantsi nje unesive lesinebantfu labambalwa.

Kuyawutsi emave lanjingile nase ativela kutsi avikelekile, awahlasele, futsi uyakwenta loko ngisho naboyise labangazange sebakwente bona kanye naboyisemkhulu. Uyawukwaba imphango, netimphahla kanye nemcebo emkhatsini webalandzeli bakhe. Uyawukwakha luzungu lwekuketula tinqaba, noko kube kwesikhashana nje.
“Uyawuvusa emandla akhe ngemphi yakhe lenkhulu, atikhutsate kubhekana nenkhosi yaseningizimu.
Labo labadla kanye nenkhosi bayakwetama kuyibhubhisa, imphi yayo iyawukhukhuleka, labanyenti bayawufela emphini.

Lawo makhosi lamabili layawube tinhlitiyo tawo ticondze bubi, ayawuhlala etafuleni linye ayengane odvwa, kodvwa loko kungasiti lutfo, ngobe siphetfo sona siyawuhlale sifike ngesikhatsi saso lesibekiwe.
“Kuyawutsi ngesikhatsi lesimisiwe, iphindze ihlasele laseningizimu futsi, kodvwa ngaleso sikhatsi umphumela uyawukwehluka kulowo wakucala.
Ngekuyenga nangemavi ekuwunga inkhosi iyakonakalisa labo labephule sivumelwane, kodvwa noko bantfu labamati kahle Nkulunkulu wabo bayawumelana nayo bacinile.
Bayawutsi nabawa, batfole lusito loluncane, labanyenti labatentisako bayawutihlanganisa nabo.
Labanye balabahlakaniphile bayawukhubatela, kuze bahlanjululwe ngekucengwa, bangcweliswe, bentiwe bangabi nasici kuze kube sikhatsi sesiphetfo, ngobe sona siyawufika ngesikhatsi lesimisiwe.”
Ayiyiwubanaka bonkulunkulu baboyise nome lowo lotsandvwa ngulabasikati, futsi ingeke inake nome ngumuphi nkulunkulu, kodvwa iyawutigabatisa yona itibeke ngetulu kwabo bonkhe.
Esikhundleni sabo iyawuhlonipha nkulunkulu wetinqaba, nkulunkulu labangazange bamati boyise, iyawumhlonipha ngegolide nangesiliva, nangematje laligugu, nangetipho letidulile.
Iyawuhlasela tinqaba leticine kakhulu, isitwa ngulonkulunkulu, iyawubadvumisa kakhulu labo labamvumako. Iyawubabeka babe babusi etikwetive letinyenti, yabe live libe ngumvuzo wabo.
“Ngesikhatsi sekugcina, inkhosi yaseningizimu iyawuhlaselana nayo emphini, kodvwa inkhosi yasenyakatfo
Iyawubuye ingenele nelive lelihle. Emave lamanyenti ayakuwa, kodvwa bo-Edomu neMowabi, kanye nebaholi baka-Amoni bayawukhululwa esandleni sayo.
Iyakwandzisa kubusa kwayo etikwemave lamanyenti; neGibhithe ngeke idzabule.
Iyawuba nemandla ekulawula umcebo wegolide newesiliva, netimphahla tonkhe taseGibhithe letidule kakhulu, itfobise baseLibiya nebaseKushe.
Kodvwa imibiko levela emphumalanga nasenyakatfo iyakuyetfusa, bese itihlelela kuphuma nemphi lenkhulu, iyewubhubhisa labanyenti bangaphindzi babe khona.
Iyawumisa emathende ayo ebukhosi emkhatsini wetilwandle entsabeni lenhle nalengcwele. Noko iyawufika esiphetfweni sayo, futsi kute namunye loyawuyilamulela.”
Ticumbi ngeticumbi lesetalala elutfulini lwemhlaba tiyawuvuka, labanye bavukele ekuphileni kwaphakadze, labanye ehlazweni nasekwedzelelekeni kwaphakadze.
Kodvwa wena Danyela, wavalele uze uwashicilele lamavi alencwadzi legocotwako, kuze kube nguleso sikhatsi sekugcina. Labanyenti bayawukwehla benyuka bafuna kwati kutsi kwentekani.”
Mine Danyela, ngase ngiyabuka, ngabona embikwami sekume labanye lababili, lomunye eme ngala elusentseni lwemfula, lomunye eme ngesheya kwemfula malungana naye.
Lomunye wabo wakhuluma kulona labembetse telineni, labesetikwalamanti alomfula, watsi: “Kuyawuze kube ngunini, solomane tingakagcwaliseki tonkhe letintfo letimangalisa kangaka?”
Ngakuva loko labekukhuluma, kodvwa angizange ngikucondze kutsi kusho kutsini. Ngako ngabuta ngatsi: “Awu nkhosi yami, uyawuba yini umphumela wako konkhe loko?”
Wangiphendvula watsi: “Hamba ngendlela yakho, Danyela, ngobe lamavi asavalelwe ashicilelwa, kuyawudzimate kube sikhatsi sekugcina.

Labanyenti bayawuhlanjululwa babe msulwa, bacengisiswe kahle bangabi nasici, kodvwa lababi bayawuchubeka babe babi kakhulu. Kute namunye walababi loyawukuvisisa, kodvwa laba labahlakaniphile bayawukuvisisa kahle.
Ubusisiwe lowo loyawulindza aze efike ekugcineni kwalamalanga layi-1 335.
“Kodvwa wena Danyela, hamba endleleni yakho kuze kube ngusekugcineni. Uyawuphumula, kuyawutsi ekupheleni kwemalanga, uvuke utekwemukeliswa sabelo sakho lekulifa lakho.”

Livi laSimakadze lelefika kuHoseya, umsa waBheri, ngesikhatsi sekubusa kwemakhosi bo-Uziya, naJothamu, na-Ahazi, naHezekiya, emakhosi akaJuda, nakubusa inkhosi Jerobowamu, umsa waJehoyashi, inkhosi yaka-Israyeli:
Ngako-ke Hoseya watsatsa Gomeri, indvodzakati yaDiblayimu; watetfwala, wamtalela indvodzana.
Ngalelo langa ngitabephula butjoki baka-Israyeli, ngicedze emabutfo alo eSigodzini saseJezreyeli.”
Gomeri waphindze futsi watetfwala, watala indvodzakati, Simakadze wabe sewukhuluma kuHoseya, watsi: “Metse libito utsi nguLo Ruhama,

Noko ngiyakuyihawukela indlu yakaJuda; ngiyakubasindzisa, kodvwa hhayi ngebutjoki, nangenkemba, nangemphi, nangemahhashi, nangebagibeli bemahhashi, kodvwa ngiyakubasindzisa mine, Simakadze longuNkulunkulu wabo.”
Watsi kube alumule Lo Ruhama, Gomeri watala lenye indvodzana.
Simakadze wase utsi: “Lendvodzana yetse libito utsi nguLo Ami,
Bantfu bakaJuda nebantfu baka-Israyeli bayawuphindze bahlanganiswe, bese babeka umholi wabo abe munye, bahlume eveni labo, ngobe liyawuba likhulu lelo langa lakaJezreyeli.
“Khulumani kubomnakenu nitsi: ‘Bantfu bakitsi,’ kubodzadzewenu nitsi: ‘Labatsandzekako bami.’ ”
Ase akususe lokubukeka kwebugwadla ebusweni bakhe,
labo labangipha kudla kwami nemanti ami,
Uyawucoshana nemashende akhe, kodvwa ngeke awakhandze;
kanye naleliwayini lami lelisha nase lilungile.
kuze kutsi bonkhe batewulala phansi baphephile.

Simakadze wakhuluma kimi watsi: “Hamba, uphindze umtsandze umkakho, lite nome asatsandvwe ngulomunye futsi, ayingwadla. Mtsandze wena njengobe Simakadze atsandza ema-Israyeli, kwala nome sebagucukele kulabanye bonkulunkulu, batsandza emacebelengwane emagelebisi lomisiwe.”
Ngako ngamtsenga ngesiliva lengemagremu lali-170 nangemakhilogremu langaba likhulu ebhali.
Ngase ngiyamtjela lomkami, ngatsi: “Wena kufanele uhlale nami
Ngako ema-Israyeli asetawuhlala emalanga lamanyenti angenambusi, angenankhosi, angenamhlatjelo nome ematje langcwele, angenasidziya sebaphristi nome sithico.
Emvakwaloko ema-Israyeli ayawuphendvuka afune Simakadze, Nkulunkulu wawo, naDavide, inkhosi yawo. Bayawubuyela batitfobe kuSimakadze nakuto tibusiso taSimakadze ngemalanga ekugcina.
nebaphrofethi bakhubateka kanye nani, nine baphristi.
nami-ke sengiyanilahla kutsi ningete naba baphristi bami;
nabomalukatane benu ngingeke ngibajezise nase baphinga,
baholi babo batitsandza kakhulu tindlela tabo telihlazo.
Ngiyawulutfululela kubo lulaka lwami njengetikhukhula temanti.
Impela, njengobe kucinisekile kutsi lilanga liphuma ekuseni,
kutsi ngitikhumbula tonkhe tento tabo letimbi.
bese kutsi ekuseni ivutse njengemalangabi emlilo.
kute namunye emkhatsini wabo locela lusito kimi.”
Imbhubhiso kubo! Ngobe bangihlubukile bemelana nami!
lamalati asagucuke aba ngemalati ekwenta tono.
kodvwa loko bakutsatsa njengentfo lengesiyo yabo.
Israyeli sewumkhohliwe uMenti wakhe, wakha tigodlo;
nifuna kukhokhelwa kuwo onkhe emabala ekubhulela kolo.
nematje ekuhluta liwayini ngeke abondle bantfu;
noko tingibe timele umphrofethi kuto tonkhe tindlela takhe,
bekungatsi ngibona titselo tekucala esihlahleni semakhiwa.
Ngako kwehlulela emacala kuyahluma njengencatsavane lenebutsi
bayawulililela ngobe itsatfwe kubo yayiswa ekutfunjweni.
Israyeli uyawuba nemahloni ngetithico takhe tetigodvo.
Emanyeva nemitfuma kuyawukhula kumbonye emalati abo.
Imphi ingeke ibakhandze yini lababi eGibeya?
ngako ngiyawubeka lijoko entsanyeni yakhe lenhle.
adzimate efike ehlisele imvula yekulunga etikwenu.’
kudvuma kwemphi kuyawusuka kumelane nebantfu benu,
khona kutewutsi tonkhe tinqaba tenu tibhidlitwe,
njengobe Shalmani abhidlita iBhethi Abeli ngelilanga lemphi,
Awu, Betheli, kuyakwenteka kona loko-ke nakuwe,
kodvwa akazange akunake kutsi ngimi lowamphilisa.
yona i-Asiriya ingeke yini ibuse etikwabo,
Ngisho nome sebangambita Longetulu Kwako Konkhe,
Kodvwa wena kufanele ubuyele kuNkulunkulu wakho,
ulindzele Nkulunkulu wakho ngaso sonkhe sikhatsi.
bangeke bakutfole lokubi nome sono kimi.”
ngako-ke emalati abo ayawufanana netincumbi tematje
Simakadze wakhe uyawumetfwesa licala lakhe lekucitsa ingati,
Kodvwa waba nelicala lekukhonta Bhali, wafa.
Tiphi tikhulu takho kuwo onkhe lamadolobha akho
Ye Kufa, tiphi tifo takho letibulalanako?
Livi laSimakadze lefika kuJoweli, umsa waPhethuweli, latsi:
kutsi loko lokwasala nyakana welifu lesikhonyane
kanye nato tonkhe tihlahla tensimi setomile.
futsi ingeke iphindze ibe khona nome ngunini.
Asikho nesidzingo sekutsi letive tingaze titsi:
umkhiwa nemvini nako kutsela titselo tako.
nekutsi futsi kute lomunye ngaphandle kwami.
Ngobe nitsetse isiliva yami negolide yami nakwetfwala konkhe lokungemagugu nemcebo wami lomkhulu nayawukufaka emathempelini enu.
Natsengisa bantfu bakaJuda nebaseJerusalema kumaGriki, nentela kutsi batewuba khashane nemikhawulo yelive labo.
“Bukani la, ngitabavusa kuleto tindzawo lenibatsengise kuto, ngitawubuyisela etikwetinhloko tenu loko lenikwentile.
Ngiyawutsengisa emadvodzana nemadvodzakati enu esiveni sakaJuda, bese sibatsengisa esiveni sakaSheba, sive lesikhashane kakhulu.” Simakadze sewukhulumile.
Ngako ngitakwehlisela umlilo endlini yakaHazayeli, lotawushisa ucotfule leto tigodlo takaBheni Hadadi.
Ngitawubhidlita emasango aseDamaseko, ngibhubhise inkhosi leseSigodzini
Ngako-ke ngitakwehlisela umlilo etikwetibondza taseGaza, lotawucotfula tonkhe tigodlo tayo.
Ngako-ke ngitakwehlisela umlilo etikwetindvonga taseThire lotawucotfula tigodlo tayo.”
Ngako-ke ngitakwehlisela umlilo etikwaThemani lotawucotfula tigodlo taseBhosra.”

Ngako-ke ngitawulumeka umlilo etikwetibondza taseRabha lotawucotfula tonkhe tigodlo tayo emkhatsini webumayemaye bekukhala ngelilanga lekulwa imphi, nasemkhatsini wemimoya lenemandla, ngelilanga lesivunguvungu.
Inkhosi yabo iyawudzingiswa kanye nato tonkhe tikhulu tayo,” kusho Simakadze.
Ngako-ke ngitakwehlisela umlilo etikwaMowabi, lotawucotfula tigodlo taseKheriyothi.
Ngitawubhubhisa umbusi wakaMowabi kanye nato tonkhe tikhulu takhe,” kusho Simakadze.
Ngako-ke ngitakwehlisela umlilo etikwaJuda lotawushisa ucotfule tigodlo taseJerusalema.”

Bagcobagcoba tinhloko talabamphofu kube shangatsi bagcobagcoba lutfuli lwemhlaba, bese kutsi labacindzetelwe bangababoneleli. Indvodza nemsa wayo balala nentfombatana yinye, ngaloko bahlazise Libito lami lelingcwele.
Bacambalala phansi eceleni kwalelo nalelo lati ngetingubo tesibambiso. Endlini yaNkulunkulu wabo banatsa liwayini lalabahlawulisiwe.
Ngaphindza nganivusela baphrofethi emkhatsini wemadvodzana enu kanye nebaNaziri emkhatsini wemajaha enu. Akusilo liciniso yini lelo, sive sema-Israyeli?” kusho Simakadze.
“Manje-ke, ngitanipitjita njengekupitjita kwencola nayetfwele umtfwalo lomkhulu walokutinhlavu.
Nalabagijima ngematubane bangeke baphunyule, nalabanemandla bangeke bakhone kuwagcogca emandla abo, kanjalo nelichawe lingeke liyisindzise imphilo yalo.
Loyingcweti ekudubuleni ngebutjoki angeke akhone kucina, lisotja lelihamba phansi ngetinyawo lingeke libaleke, kanjalo nemgibeli welihhashi angeke akhone kusindzisa imphilo yakhe.
Ngisho nemachawe lanesibindzi kakhulu ayawubaleka angcunu ngalelo langa,” kusho Simakadze.
Lalelani nankha emavi lashiwo nguSimakadze ngani, anisola nine, sive sema-Israyeli, umelana nawo wonkhe umndeni lawukhipha eGibhithe, utsi:
“Ngini kuphela lenginikhetsile emkhatsini wato tonkhe tive temhlaba; ngako-ke ngitanijezisa ngenca yato tonkhe tono tenu.”
Bantfu lababili bangahambisana yini kanyekanye bangakavumelani?
Libhubesi liyabhodla yini ehlatsini, lingakabambi inyamatane?
Libhubesi lelincane lona lingahhonga yini endzaweni yalo, lingakabambi lutfo?
Inyoni iyawela yini elugibeni loluphansi emhlabatsini, kungekho leyetsiywe ngako?
Sochaka umane atisukele yini phansi, azube kungekho lutfo lolumtsintsile?
Inhlekelele iyalehlela yini lidolobha, ingakatfunyelwa nguSimakadze?
Nakubhodla libhubesi, ngubani longahlala angesabi? INkhosi Simakadze seyikhulumile, ngubani longahlala angaphrofethi?
Memetelani etigodlweni tase-Ashdodi nasetigodlweni taseGibhithe, nitsi: “Butsanani ndzawonye etintsabeni taseSamariya; bonani umsindvo lomkhulu losemkhatsini wayo kanye nekucindzetelwa lokukuyo.”
Simakadze utsi: “Abati kutsi bangakwenta njani lokulungile, labo lababutsise budlova nemphango etigodlweni tabo.”
Ngaleso sizatfu naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Simakadze, itsi: “Sitsa siyakulitungeleta live, sibhidlite tonkhe tinqaba tenu, siphange netigodlo tenu.”

Naku-ke lokushiwo nguSimakadze, utsi: “Njengemelusi asindzisa emlonyeni welibhubesi imilente lemibili yekugcina nome sicu sendlebe yelizinyane, ayakuhlwitfwa kanjalo nema-Israyeli lambalwa, lawo lasahlala eSamariya, emaphetselweni emibhedze yawo, lasahlala acuphele etihlalweni tawo tekuphumula.”
INkhosi Simakadze, Nkulunkulu longuSomandla, utsi: “Vanini naku, niyidvonse ngendlebe indlu yakaJakobe.
Ngiyawubhidlita indlu yasebusika kanye nendlu yasehlobo, tindlu letihlotjiswe ngematinyo etindlovu tiyawubhidlitwa, kanjalo netindlu letibukekako tiyawuhhihlitwa,” kusho Simakadze.

Lalelani nali livi, nine bafati basentsabeni yaseSamariya, leniphila kahle, nitamase njengetinkhomati taseBhashani, nine lenicindzetela labamphofu, nifihlite labeswele, niphocelele emadvodza enu kutsi aninike tjwala!
INkhosi Simakadze ifungile ngebungcwele bayo, yatsi: “Lalelani la: Siyeta sikhatsi lapho niyawutsatfwa khona ngemadweba, ngisho nebekugcina benu bayawutsatfwa ngemahhuka ekudweba tinhlanti.
Nitawuhudvulwa lapho ngamunye nikhishwe ngetikhala letiselubondzeni, nilahlelwe ngephandle eHemoni,”
Shisani sinkhwa senu lesinemvubelo kube ngumnikelo wekubonga, tigabatiseni ngeminikelo yenu yesihle. Gungubalani ngayo, nine ma-Israyeli, ngobe nguko loko lenitsandza kukwenta.

“Ngaphindze ngabamba imvula, sekusele tinyanga letintsatfu nje kutsi kuvunwe; ngatfumela imvula kulelinye lidolobha, kodvwa ngayibamba kulelinye. Lenye insimi yatfola imvula, lenye yangete yayitfola imvula yaze yoma.
Bantfu badzayitela besuka kulelinye lidolobha baya kulelinye, bafunana nemanti, kodvwa abazange bawatfole lenele kutsi banganatsa baze bakholwe; noko anikabuyeli kimi,” kusho Simakadze.
“Ngako-ke, ma-Israyeli, ngitanijezisa; futsi njengobe ngitakwenta njalo nje, tilungiseleleni kubhekana naNkulunkulu wenu, nine ma-Israyeli!”
Lalelani nali livi, ninendlu yaka-Israyeli. Lesililo ngisenta ngenca yenu:
“Iwile iNtfombi yaka-Israyeli, ingeke iphindze ivuke futsi, ayinakwa ngumuntfu eveni layo, kantsi futsi kute longayivusa ime.”

Ngobe naku lokushiwo yiNkhosi Simakadze, itsi: “Lidolobha laka-Israyeli lebelinemasotja layinkhulungwane laphuma ayawuhlasela litawugcina linemasotja lalikhulu, kutsi lidolobha lebelinemasotja lalikhulu ligcine selinemasotja lalishumi.”
Ningangifuni eBetheli, ningayi naseGilgali, ningayi ngisho naseBherisheba. Ngobe iGilgali ngempela itawudzingiswa, kutsi iBetheli incishiswe ize ibe lite.”
Funanai Simakadze, nitewuphila, ngobe nakungenjalo, utawuhlasela lendlu yakaJosefa njengemlilo. Lomlilo utawukhotsisisa, iBetheli imeswele lotawucisha lowo mlilo.
Nine lenigucule imphatfocotfo nayenta yababa, kulunga nakudzaceka phansi emhlabatsini!
Nine bantfu niyamtondza umuntfu lomelana nebubi benu, nimedzelele umuntfu lokhuluma liciniso lodvwa enkhundleni.
Nigcobagcoba labamphofu nibacindzetele kutsi baninike kudla. Ngako-ke, nome nakhe tindlu letinkhulu tematje, ningeke nihlale kuto; nome nihlanyele tivini letikhulu, ningeke nilinatse liwayini lato.
Ngobe ngiyati kutsi mangaki emacala enu nekutsi tono tenu tikhulu kangakanani. Niyabacindzetela labalungile, nitsatse imidizo, nemuke labamphofu emalungelo abo etinkhundleni.
Ngako-ke umuntfu locaphelako uyabindza etikhatsini letinje, ngobe tikhatsi timbi.
Funani lokuhle, hhayi lokubi, khona nitewuphila. Khona-ke Simakadze Nkulunkulu longuSomandla uyawuba nani, njengobe nani nisho kutsi unani.
Kuyawuba khona kudzindza sililo kuto tonkhe tivini, ngobe ngiyakwendlula emkhatsini wenu nginijezise.”
Kuyawuba shangatsi ngumuntfu lobalekele libhubesi, wase utitsela etikwelibhele; kube shangatsi ngumuntfu longene endlini yakhe wabeka tandla takhe elubondzeni, kusuke inyoka imlume.
Lilanga laSimakadze lingeke yini libe bumnyama lingabi kukhanya, kube bumnyama lobukhulu kubete ngisho nemushi nje wekukhanya?
Ngisho nome ningangiletsela imihlatjelo yekushiswa kanye neminikelo yalokutinhlavu, ngingeke ngiyemukele. Ngisho nome ningaletsa iminikelo yebudlelwane
Sukani lapha nalemisindvo yenu yekuhlabela! Ngingeke ngikulalele loko kuhlabela kwenu ngemahabhu.
Kodvwa kwenta tintfo ngekungakhetsi akube yintfo legeleta njengemfula, kulunga kube yintfo legeleta njengemfula longashi.
Niphakamise tithico tenu: Sakhuthi, inkhosi yenu, naKhewani, nkulunkulu wenu loyinkhanyeti,
ngitanenta nitfunjelwe ngesheya kweDamaseko,” usho njalo-ke Simakadze, lolibito lakhe linguNkulunkulu longuSomandla.
Maye kini, nine labanetsetekile eSiyoni, nakini
Maye nakini, nine madvodza lagcamile esiveni lesikhulu
Nangabe kusele emadvodza lalishumi endlini yinye, nawo futsi atakufa.
Nangabe sihlobo lesifanele kushisa leto tidvumbu
Naku-ke iNkhosi Simakadze lengibonise kona: Ngiyibone yenta lifu lesikhonyane ngesikhatsi nakuphela kuvunwa kwemabele enkhosi,
Satsi kube sikudle konkhe lokuluhlata eveni, ngakhala kakhulu ngatsi: “Nkhosi Simakadze, cola! Jakobe angasindza kanjani? Mncane kakhulu!”
Simakadze wase uyayekela, watsi: “Loko kungeke kusenteka.”
Naku-ke iNkhosi Simakadze lengibonise kona: INkhosi Simakadze beyisabita kwehlulela kwemlilo,
Ngase ngiyakhala ngitsi: “Nkhosi Simakadze, ngiyakuncenga, mane ume; Jakobe angasindza kanjani? Mncane kakhulu!”
Ngako Simakadze wase uyayekela, watsi: “Naloku kungeke kusenteka nako.”
Simakadze watsi: “Buka la! Ngibeka silinganiso kubantfu bami ema-Israyeli;
Amasiya, umphristi waseBetheli, watfumela sigijimi kuJerobowamu, inkhosi yaka-Israyeli, watsi: “Amose wakha luzungu ngawe embusweni waka-Israyeli. Live lingeke liwamele onkhe lamavi akhe.
Ungaphindzi uphrofethe lapha eBetheli, ngobe lena yindzawo lekutsiwa ingcwele yenkhosi, nelithempeli lembuso.”
Kodvwa Simakadze wangitsatsa ekweluseni kwami timvu, watsi kimi: ‘Hamba uyewuphrofetha esiveni sami, ema-Israyeli.’
Manje-ke vani livi laSimakadze. Wena watsi:
Naku-ke iNkhosi Simakadze lengibonise kona: Ngabona libhasikidi letitselo letivutsiwe.
Simakadze wase uyangibuta utsi: “Ubonani, ye Amose?” Ngamphendvula ngatsi: “Ngibona libhasikidi lelinetitselo letivutsiwe.”
Simakadze wase ukhuluma kimi utsi: “Sikhatsi sesive sami saka-Israyeli sesiphelile, ngingeke ngisasicolela.”

nikhuluma nitsi: “Ingabe umkhosi longcwele wekwetfwasa kwenyanga uyakwendlula nini, khona sitewutsengisa ngesivuno salokutinhlavu, neliSabatha litawuphela nini, khona sitewutsengisa ngakolo?” Ngaloko nentela kunciphisa tikali nenyuse intsengo, nitewuganga ngekusebentisa tikali letingekho emtsetfweni,
nitsenge labamphofu ngesiliva, nalabeswele ngetincabule letimbili, ngisho naloku lokushanyelwe phansi esibuyeni sekubhula nikubite imali.
Simakadze loludvumo lwaka-Israyeli utifunge yena, watsi: “Ngingeke ngikukhohlwe nakunye kwalabakwentile.
Live lingeke yini litfutfumele ngaloku, nabo bonkhe labahlala kulo bangeke yini balile? Lonkhe live liyawukhukhumuka njengeNayili, liyawutanyatanyiswa, bese liyabotja njengalomfula waseGibhithe.”

Emadzili enu enkholo ngiyakuwagucula abe sililo, nako konkhe kuhlabela kwenu kube kukhala. Ngiyawunenta nonkhe nembatse emasaka, nihhule tinhloko tenu. Leso sikhatsi ngiyawusenta sifanane nesekulilela indvodzana letelwe yodvwa kabo. Lelo langa liyawugcina kabuhlungu kakhulu.”

INkhosi Simakadze itsi: “Lalelani la, ayeta emalanga lapho ngiyawutfumela khona indlala kulo lonkhe live, kungabi yindlala yekufuna kudla neyekomela emanti, kodvwa kube yindlala yekufuna livi laSimakadze.
Bantfu bayawuyendza kusukela elwandle kuye kulolunye, bazulazule kusukela enyakatfo kuye emphumalanga, bafunana nelivi laSimakadze; kodvwa bangeke balitfole.
“Ngalelo langa tintfombi letinhle nemajaha lanemandla bayawucaleka ngenca yekoma.
Nome bangemba bashone phansi ekujuleni kwelithuna,
Nome bangatifihla esicongweni sentsaba iKhameli, nakhona lapho ngiyawubatingela ngize ngibabambe. Nome bangangibhacela ekujuleni kwelwandle, nakhona lapho ngiyawutfumela inyoka ibalume.
Nome bangatfunjwa titsa tabo, nakhona lapho ngiyawuyala inkemba kutsi ibabulale. Emehlo ami ngiyakuwanamatselisa kubo, kube kubi kubo, kungabi kuhle.”
ngiphindze ngilakhe libe nguloku lelake laba nguko,
kanye nelato tonkhe tive letibitwa ngeLibito lami,”
usho njalo Simakadze, lotawutenta tonkhe letintfo.
bebangete bawachulula kusale abe mbalwa yini?
Umndeni wakaJakobe uyawulidla lelive lekulifa lawo.
“Hamba uye eNineve, lidolobha lelikhulukati, ufike umemetele kubantfu balo utsi bubi babo sebenyukele kimi.”
Kepha Jona wesuka wacondza eThashishi. Wehlela eJopha, lapho afike wakhokha imali yekwekhwela, wagibela umkhumbi, waya eThashishi, abalekela Simakadze.
Kodvwa Simakadze watfumela umoya lomkhulu elwandle, kwaba nesivunguvungu lesikhulu kangangekutsi umkhumbi wabasengotini yekwephuka.

Onkhe ematilosi efikelwa kwesaba lokukhulu, kwaba ngulelo nalelo lakhala kunkulunkulu walo. Batijika elwandle timphahla letatisemkhunjini, batsi betama kuwuphungula umkhumbi. Kepha Jona abewukele ngaphansi ekhatsi nemkhumbi, akulobukhulu butfongo.
Indvuna yemkhumbi yakhandzanisa Jona alele, yafike yatsi: “Wentani la? Uleleleni? Vuka uthandaze kuNkulunkulu wakho! Mhlawumbe yena utasivela asisindzise singabhubhi!”
Base bayambuta batsi: “Ngubani yena lona losibangele yonkhe lenhlupheko? Utekwentani la? Ungewekukleza kuphi wena? Usive sini?”
Wabaphendvula watsi: “NgingumHebheru; ngikhonta Simakadze, Nkulunkulu welizulu, lowadala umhlaba nelwandle.”
Lamadvodza esaba kakhulukati, adzimate atsi kuye: “Yini-ke lena lose uyentile?” Phela lamadvodza abesati kutsi ubalekela Nkulunkulu, ngobe Jona abesawatjelile.
Sivunguvungu sachubeka sahhusha ngemandla, aze lamatilosi atsi: “Sitakwenta njani-ke ngawe, kuze lesivunguvungu sibindze?”
Jona wabaphendvula watsi: “Ngitsatseni ningijikijele elwandle, sitawube sesiyabindza lesivunguvungu; ngobe vele ngiyati kutsi ngimi lona lonidvonsele lomkhokha wesivunguvungu.”
Esikhundleni saloko, lamatilosi etama kuwugwedla ngemandla awo onkhe lomkhumbi kutsi ubuyele elugwini, kodvwa ehluleka, ngobe lwandle lwachubeka lwahhusha kakhulu kunakucala.

Ngako base bakhala kuSimakadze, batsi: “Awu, Simakadze waJona, siyakuncenga, ungasibhubhisi ngenca yalomuntfu! Ungalibeki etikwetfu licala lengati lengenacala! Nguwe, Simakadze waJona, lowente konkhe loku!”
Ngako-ke base batsatsa Jona, bamjikijela elwandle, lwase luyathula lutsi nya.
Loko kwenta lamatilosi esabe Simakadze kakhulu kangangekutsi adzimate amentela umhlatjelo; etsembisa nekumkhonta.
Simakadze wahlinzeka Jona ngenhlanti lenkhulu, leyafike yammita. Jona wahlala esiswini sayo emalanga lamatsatfu nebusuku lobutsatfu.
ngicela lusito, wena waliva livi lami.
noko, ngiyawuphindze ngibuke lithempeli lakho lelingcwele.’
Umthandazo wami wafinyelela kuwe, ethempelini lakho lelingcwele.
Livi laSimakadze laphindze lefika kuJona kwesibili, latsi:
“Hamba, uye eNineve, kulelidolobha lelikhulu, ufike umemetele lesimemetelo lengikunike sona.”
Ngako-ke wahamba Jona waya eNineve, njengekusho kwelivi laSimakadze. INineve lena kwakulidolobha lelikhulukati; bekungatsatsa emalanga lamatsatfu kutsi umuntfu alihambe lonkhe.
Jona walingenela lelidolobha, wahamba lilanga lonkhe. Wase uyacala uyamemetela utsi: “Sekusele emalanga langemashumi lamane kutsi iNineve ibhujiswe!”
Letindzaba tatsi natifika enkhosini yaseNineve, yasukuma esihlalweni sayo sebukhosi, yakhumula ingubo yayo yebukhosi, yatembonya ngendvwangu yemasaka, yahlala phansi emlotseni.

Yakhipha simemetelo kuyo yonkhe iNineve, yatsi: “Inkhosi netiphatsimandla tayo itsi: ‘Akubete lodlako nalonambitsa lutfo nome lonatsa emanti: Umuntfu nome silwane, umhlambi wetinkhomo nome timvu ungadli unganatsi.
Kodvwa bantfu netilwane akumbonywe ngetindvwangu temasaka kukhalwe kuNkulunkulu. Wonkhe umuntfu akaphendvuke endleleni yakhe lembi nasebudloveni lobusetandleni takhe.
Ngobe ngubani nje lowatiko, mhlawumbe Nkulunkulu angatisola ayiyekele lentfukutselo yakhe leyesabekako, kuze singabhubhi?’ ”
Kwamkhuba kakhulu loko Jona, ngako watfukutsela kakhulu.

Wathandaza kuSimakadze watsi: “Awu, Simakadze! Akusiko yini loku lengakusho ngiseseveni lakitsi kutsi kutakwenteka? Ngiko ngabaleka ngaya eThashishi; ngobe ngangati kutsi wena unguNkulunkulu lonemusa nesihawu, uyephuta kutfukutsela, unelutsandvo loluphuphumako, uyatisola ngekutfumela lokubi.
Ngako-ke Simakadze, ngiyakuncenga kutsi ukususe kuphila kwami kimi; ngobe kuncono kimi kutsi ngife kunekutsi ngiphile.”
Jona waphuma kulelidolobha wayawuhlala ngasemphumalanga yalo, watentela lidlangala lapho. Wahlala emtfuntini ngaphansi kwalo, kute atewubona lokwase kutakwenteka kulelidolobha laseNineve.
Simakadze Nkulunkulu wamilisa umhlafutfo, wawukhulisa etikwaJona kutsi umentele umtfunti, kuze kuphele kutfukutsela kwakhe; Jona wamjabulisa lomhlafutfo.
Ngakusasa nakudzabuka kusa, Nkulunkulu walungisa imphehla, yawuphehla lomhlafutfo, wabuna.
Nakuphuma lilanga, Nkulunkulu walungisa umoya loshisako wasemphumalanga; lilanga lashaya enhloko yaJona, wadzimate waba nesiyeti, wafisa kufa; wase utsi: “Kuncono ngimane ngife kunekutsi ngiphile.”
Kodvwa Nkulunkulu watsi kuJona: “Unalungelo lini lekutfukutselela lomhlafutfo?”
Yena-ke watsi: “Ngenta kahle kutsi ngitfukutsele; ngitfukutsele kutsi angife ngitsi saka!”
Simakadze watsi: “Wena uyawuhawukela umhlafutfo longakawujulukeli nome longakawukhulisi, lomile ebusuku bunye, waphindze wafa ebusuku lobulandzelako.

Pho, mine bengingeke ngiyihawukele yini iNineve, lelidolobha lelikhulu kangaka, lapho kukhona bantfu labangakwati kwehlukanisa sandla sabo sekudla nesancele, labati-120 000, kanye netinkhomo letinyenti kangaka?”

nengcebo isuke kuyo yonkhe imigodzi yayo.

Emavi etitfunywa takho angeke aphindze evakale.”

entele kutsi atewubukela imitimba yabo nase bangcunu.
Livi laSimakadze lelefika kuZefaniya, umsa waKushi, umsa waGedaliya, umsa wa-Amariya, umsa waHezekiya, ngesikhatsi sekubusa kwaJosaya, umsa wa-Amoni, inkhosi yakaJuda, latsi:
Lababi ngiyakubacedza kanye nato tonkhe tikhubekiso,
nase ngisusa bonkhe bantfu ebusweni bemhlaba,”

Tive letikulo lonkhe lusentse lwelwandle tiyakumkhonta,
“Ngimi ngimi, kute futsi lelinye ngaphandle kwami.”
Kusa ngekusa bantfu bakhe ubaphatsa ngekungakhetsi,
Jabula utfokote ngayo yonkhe inhlitiyo yakho,
ungeke uphindze wesabe nome nguyiphi ingoti.
Ngalelo langa bayawusho kuyo iJerusalema, batsi:
“Naku lokushiwo nguSimakadze longuSomandla, utsi: Labantfu batsi: ‘Sikhatsi asikefiki sekutsi kwakhiwe kabusha indlu yaSimakadze.’ ”
Livi laSimakadze lase liyefika ngemphrofethi Hagayi, latsi:
“Ngabe kambe ngiso yini lesi sikhatsi sekutsi nihlale etindlini letihlotjiswe kahle kakhulu, kube kantsi indlu yaSimakadze yona ibukeka itindzala nje?”
Manje-ke, naku lokushiwo nguSimakadze longuSomandla, utsi: “Cabangisisani ngetindlela tenu.
Nihlanyele kakhulu, navuna kuncane. Niyadla, anesutsi; niyanatsa, kodvwa anikholwa. Niyembatsa, kodvwa anifutfumali. Niyahola imali yenu, niyifake esipatjini lesinetimbobo.”
Naku lokushiwo nguSimakadze longuSomandla, utsi: “Cabangisisani ngetindlela tenu.
Khuphukelani etintsabeni niyewugawula khona tingodvo nitekwakha lendlu, kuze nami ngitewutijabulisa kuyo, ngidvunyiswe,” kusho Simakadze.

“Benilindzele sivuno lesikhulu, kodvwa navuna kuncane. Loko lenikubuyise ekhaya ngikuphuphutsile, kwahamba. Leni?” kusho Simakadze longuSomandla. “Ngenca yendlu yami lesolomane ihleti itindzala, ngalesikhatsi lapho kungulowo nalowo wenu aphishaneke ngeyakhe indlu.
Ngako-ke ngenca yenu emazulu ayigodlile imvula, nemhlaba wagodla sivuno sawo.

Ngehlisela somiso emasimini, nasetintsabeni, nasetikwalokutinhlavu, nakulo liwayini lelisha, nakuwo emafutsa, nakuko konkhe lokuvetwa ngumhlaba, etikwebantfu nemihlambi, nasetikwemisebenti yonkhe yetandla tenu.”
Ngako Simakadze wavuselela umoya waZerubhabheli, umsa waSheyaltiyeli, umbusi wakaJuda, nemoya waJeshuwa,
ngelilanga lema-24 lenyanga yesitfupha ngemnyaka wesibili wekubusa kwenkhosi Dariyusi.
Ngelilanga lema-21 lenyanga yesikhombisa ngalowo mnyaka, livi laSimakadze lefika ngemphrofethi Hagayi, latsi:
“Khuluma kuZerubhabheli, umsa waSheyaltiyeli, umbusi wakaJuda, nakuJeshuwa,
‘Ngubani losesele kini lowake wayibona lendlu isenenkhatimulo yayo yakucala? Seyibukeka njani kini nyalo? Kini ayisafanani nje nelite?
Kodvwa-ke nyalo cinani, wena Zerubhabheli, nawe Jeshuwa,
‘Nguko loku lengenta ngako sivumelwane nani, mhlazane niphuma eGibhithe. Moya wami usahlala emkhatsini wenu. Ningesabi.’
Ngitawunyakatisa tonkhe tive, nako konkhe lokulangatelelwa tive tonkhe kutawufika, ngitawugcwalisa lendlu ngenkhatimulo,’ kusho Simakadze longuSomandla.
‘Isiliva yami, negolide ngeyami,’ kusho Simakadze longuSomandla.
‘Inkhatimulo yalendlu lena itawuba yinkhulu kakhulu kunenkhatimulo yendlu yakucala,’ kusho Simakadze longuSomandla. ‘Futsi kulendzawo ngiyawuletsa kuthula,’ kusho Simakadze longuSomandla.”
“Naku lokushiwo nguSimakadze longuSomandla, utsi: ‘Buta kubaphristi kutsi umtsetfo utsini:

Nangabe umuntfu aphetse inyama leyehlukaniselwe Nkulunkulu ishumphetelwe engutjeni yakhe, bese kutsi lomphetfo wakhe utsintse sinkhwa, nome sitjulo, nome liwayini, nome emafutsa, nome lokunye nje kudla, kuyaye bese kuba ngulokwehlukaniselwe Nkulunkulu yini?’ ”
Hagayi wabe sewutsi: “Nangabe umuntfu etfuke wangcoliswa kutsintsana nesidvumbu, bese utsintsa lokunye kwaletintfo, kuyaye bese kuba ngulokungcolile yini ngekwemtsetfo?”
Baphristi baphendvula, batsi: “Yebo, kuyaye bese kuba ngulokungcolile.”
“ ‘Manje-ke, cabangisisani kahle ngaloku kusukela lamuhla kuye embili,

Nakufika nome ngubani endvundvumeni yalokutinhlavu lokutilinganiso letingema-20, tatilishumi kuphela. Nangabe ngunome ngubani aye emphongolweni weliwayini atsi uyewukha tilinganiso letingema-50, betingema-20 kuphela.
Ngashaya yonkhe imisebenti yetandla tenu ngesikhutsa, nangekuhanguka, nangesangcotfo, noko nine anizange nigucukele kimi,’ kusho Simakadze.
‘Kusukela lamuhla, ngisho kusukela ngelilanga lema-24 lenyanga yemfica, cabangisisani kahle. Kusukela ngelilanga lesabekwa ngalo sisekelo sendlu yaSimakadze, cabangisisani kahle:
Isekhona yini inhlanyelo lesasele emiphandzeni? Kudzimate kube ngunyalo umvini, nesihlahla semkhiwa, nesemahananandza, nesemncumo akukaze kwatsela titselo.
Livi laSimakadze lefika kuHagayi, umphrofethi, kwesibili ngelilanga lema-24 laleyo nyanga, latsi:
“Tjela Zerubhabheli, umbusi wakaJuda, kutsi ngitawunyakatisa emazulu nemhlaba.

Ngitawuketula tihlalo tebukhosi ngibhidlite emandla emibuso yebetive. Ngitawuketula tincola temphi kanye nebashayeli bato, emahhashi kanye nebagibeli bawo bayawuwela phansi, ngulowo ngenkemba yemnakabo.
Ngako-ke tjela bantfu, utsi: Naku lokushiwo nguSimakadze longuSomandla, utsi: ‘Buyelani kimi,’ kusho Simakadze longuSomandla, ‘nami ngitawubuyela kini,’ kusho Simakadze longuSomandla.

Ningafanani nabokhokho benu, lekwatsi baphrofethi bakucala nabakhuluma kubo, batsi: Naku lokushiwo nguSimakadze longuSomandla, utsi: ‘Phendvukani etindleleni tenu letimbi nakulokubi lenikwentako.’ Kodvwa abazange bangilalele, futsi abanginakanga nekunginaka, kusho Simakadze.
Baphi labokhokho benu nyalo? Labaphrofethi benu bona baphila kuze kube nguphakadze yini?

Kodvwa lamavi ami netimiso tami, lengabayala ngako ngemlomo webaphrofethi, tinceku tami, akuzange kufike yini etindlebeni taboyihlomkhulu? Base bayaphendvuka batsi: ‘Simakadze longuSomandla wente kitsi loko lobekusifanele ngekwetindlela tetfu nangalesikwentako, njengobe abesatimisele kukwenta.’ ”
Ngelilanga lema-24 enyangeni yeli-11, lenguShebathi, emnyakeni wesibili wekubusa kwaDariyusi, livi laSimakadze lefika kumphrofethi Zakhariya, umsa waBherekhiya, umsa wa-Ido.

Kwatsi ebusuku ngaba nembono, kwatsi embikwami ngabona indvodza leyayigibele lihhashi lelibovu! Yayime emkhatsini wetihlahla temibomvana, emfudlaneni. Emvakwayo bekunemahhashi labovu, nalabubendze, nalamhlophe.
Ngabuta ngatsi: “Nkhosi yami, bayini laba?” Bekunengilosi lebeyikhuluma nami, yaphendvula, yatsi: “Ngitakubonisa kutsi bayini.”
Babika engilosini yaSimakadze leyayime emkhatsini wemibomvana, batsi: “Sesihambe emhlabeni wonkhe, sakhandza kutsi umhlaba wonkhe uphumulile, futsi unekuthula.”
Ngako Simakadze wakhuluma emavi lamnandzi ekudvudvuta kulengilosi leyayikhuluma nami.
Bengingakatfukutseli kangaka, kodvwa tive letitibona kutsi tiphephile setengete kulenhlekelele, tangitfukutselisa kakhulu.’
Ngase ngiphakamisa emehlo ami ngabuka, ngabona embikwami kunetimphondvo letine.
Ngabe sengibuta lengilosi leyayikhuluma nami, ngatsi: “Kuyini loku?”
Yangiphendvula, yatsi: “Leti timphondvo letasakata Juda, na-Israyeli kanye neJerusalema.”
Simakadze wabe sewungibonisa tincondzi letine kutekubata.

Yangiphendvula, yatsi: “Leti timphondvo letasakata Juda kuze kubete namunye lophakamisa inhloko yakhe, kodvwa letincondzi titele kutekwetfusa babusi betive nekutijika phansi letimphondvo tetive letatiphakamise timphondvo tato temelana nelive lakaJuda kutewusakata bantfu bakaJuda.”
Ngase ngiphakamisa emehlo ami ngabuka, ngabona embikwami kume indvodza leyayiphetse intsambo yekukala esandleni sayo.
Yangiphendvula, yatsi: “Ngiyawukala iJerusalema, ngitewutfola kutsi ibanti kangakanani nekutsi yindze kangakanani.”
Lengilosi leyayikhuluma kimi yesuka yahamba, kwefika lenye ingilosi iteyihlangabeta,
yafike kuyo yatsi: “Gijima uyewutjela lelijaha, utsi: ‘IJerusalema itawuba lidolobha lelite tibondza ngenca yebunyenti bebantfu labahlala kuyo nangenca yemfuyo lenyenti lengekhatsi kwayo.
Mine matfupha ngiyawuba lubondza lwemlilo loluyitungeleta luyivikele, ngibe yinkhatimulo yayo ngekhatsi kwayo,’ kusho Simakadze.”
“Balekani! Balekani! Sukani eveni lasenyakatfo,” kusho Simakadze, “ngobe nginisakatele emimoyeni yomine yelizulu,” kusho Simakadze.
Ngobe naku lokushiwo nguSimakadze longuSomandla, longitfumile wangipha emandla
Utsi: “Impela ngiyawuphakamisa sandla sami ngimelane nato, khona titewuba yimphango yetigcili tato. Ngulapho-ke niyawukwati khona kutsi nguSimakadze longuSomandla longitfumile.
