“Tive letinyenti tiyawutihlanganisa naSimakadze ngalelo langa, tibe sive sami. Ngiyawuhlala emkhatsini wenu, nani niyawukwati-ke kutsi Simakadze longuSomandla ungitfume kini.
Simakadze uyakudla lifa lelinguJuda libe sabelo sakhe eveni lelingcwele, aphindze akhetse iJerusalema.
Simakadze wakhuluma kuSathane, watsi: “Simakadze uyakwekhuta wena Sathane! Simakadze, lokhetse iJerusalema, uyakukwekhuta! Lendvodza ayisiso sikhuni lesivutsako yini lesephulwe emlilweni?”
Lengilosi yakhuluma kulabasiti lababeme embikwayo, yatsi: “Mkhumuleni letimphahla takhe letingcolile.”

“Naku lokushiwo nguSimakadze longuSomandla, utsi: ‘Nawutawuhamba etindleleni tami ugcine nemiyalo yami, indlu yami-ke uyakuyibusa uphatse netibuya telithempeli lami; mine ngiyawukunika indzawo emkhatsini waletingilosi letime lapha.
Lengilosi leyayikhulume nami yabuya, yangivusa, njengemuntfu nakavuswa ebutfongweni.
Ngaphendvula, ngatsi: “Ngibona lutsi lwetibane luyigolide lonkhe, lunesitja lesinemafutsa ngetulu, netibane letisikhombisa kulo, netimbobo letisikhombisa tetintsambo tetibane talo.
Futsi ngibona netihlahla letimbili temncumo eceleni kwalo, lesinye ngesekudla kwaso lesitja, lesinye ngesancele saso lesitsha.”
Ngayibuta lengilosi leyakhuluma nami, ngatsi: “Kuyini loku, nkhosi yami?”
Yangiphendvula yatsi: “Awati yini kantsi kutsi loku kuyini?”
Livi laSimakadze lase liyefika kimi, latsi:
“Tandla taZerubhabheli tibeke sisekelo salelithempeli; netandla takhe futsi titalicedza. Nine-ke niyawube seniyati kutsi Simakadze longuSomandla ungitfume kini.
“Lamehlo lasikhombisa ngewaSimakadze, azulazula emhlabeni wonkhe, jikelele.”
Ngabe sengibuta lengilosi, ngatsi: “Iyini lemincumo lemibili lengasekudla nangesancele kwalolutsi lwetibane?”
Ngaphindze ngayibuta futsi, ngatsi: “Ayini lamagala lamabili emncumo emaceleni aletimbobo letimbili tegolide letitfulula emafutsa egolide?”
Yangiphendvula, yatsi: “Awati yini kantsi kutsi loku kuyini?”
Ngaphindza ngaphakamisa emehlo ami ngabuka, ngabona embikwami kundiza incwadzi legocotwako!
Ngaphendvula, ngatsi: “Ngibona kundiza incwadzi legocotwako, ingemamitha langaba yimfica budze, nemamitha langaba mane nesigamu bubanti.”

Simakadze longuSomandla utsi: ‘Ngiyawutfumela lesicalekiso, siyewungena endlini yelisela nasendlini yalowo lofungela emanga ngeLibito lami. Siyawuhlala lapha endlini yakhe siyibhubhise kanye netigodvo nematje ayo.’ ”
Lengilosi leyayikhuluma nami yasondzela kimi, yafike yatsi: “Phakamisa emehlo akho ubone kutsi kuyini loku lokuvelako.”
Kwase kutsi simbonyo salo lesasentiwe ngemtfofu saphakanyiswa: ekhatsi kwalelo bhasikidi bekuhleti umfati!
Yakhuluma yatsi: “Lobu bubi,” yabe seyimfucela ekhatsi ebhasikidini, yacindzetela lesimbonyo salo semtfofu emlonyeni walelibhasikidi, walimbonya ngaso.

Ngase ngiphakamisa emehlo ami ngabuka, ngabona embikwami kunebafati lababili bandiza emoyeni ngetimphiko tabo. Letimphiko tabo tatifanana netadvoye, base baphakamisa lelibhasikidi, laze labasemkhatsini welizulu nemhlaba.
Ngabuta lengilosi leyayikhuluma nami, ngatsi: “Baliyisaphi lelibhasikidi?”
Ngatsi ngiphakamisa emehlo njalo ngiyabuka, ngabona kuchamuka tincola letine, tiphuma emkhatsini wetintsaba letimbili, tintsaba telitfusi!
Incola yekucala yayinemahhashi labovu, yesibili inemahhashi lamnyama,
yesitsatfu inemahhashi lamhlophe, yesine yayinemahhashi lamabalabala, onkhe anemandla, kutinjomane sibili.
Ngabuta lengilosi leyayikhuluma nami, ngatsi: “Nkhosi, lamahhashi naletincola kusho kutsini?”
Lencola ledvonswa ngemahhashi lamnyama iya eveni langasenyakatfo, lena ledvonswa ngemahhashi lamhlophe icondze ngasenshonalanga,
Ingilosi yabe seyiyangimemeta, yatsi kimi: “Ase ubuke, lawa lacondze ngaseveni langasenyakatfo asatawubeka Moya
“Tsatsa isiliva negolide kulabatfunjiwe boHeldayi, naThobiya, naJedaya, lababefike baphuma eBhabhulona. Hamba ngalona lelo langa uye endlini yakaJosaya, umsa waZefaniya.
Ubotsatsa lesiliva negolide, wakhe ngayo umchele, bese uwubeka enhloko yemPhristi Lomkhulu, Jeshuwa, umsa waJosadaki.
Ufike umtjele kutsi naku lokushiwo nguSimakadze longuSomandla, utsi: ‘Nangu umuntfu lolibito lakhe nguLigala, futsi uyawuhluma akhule endzaweni yakhe, akhe lithempeli laSimakadze.

Nguye-ke longuyena loyawukwakha lithempeli laSimakadze. Uyawukwembatsiswa bukhosi, futsi uyawuhlala esihlalweni sakhe sebukhosi abuse. Uyawuba ngumphristi esihlalweni sakhe sebukhosi. Futsi-ke kuyawuba nekuvana emkhatsini walababili.’
Lomchele uyawubasethempelini laSimakadze ube sikhumbuto ngabo boHeldayi,
Ngemnyaka wesine wekubusa kwenkhosi Dariyusi, kwefika livi laSimakadze kuZakhariya ngelilanga lesine enyangeni yemfica, inyanga yaKhislevu.
Bantfu baseBetheli bebatfumele boShareseri, naRegemi Meleki kanye nemancusa abo kutsi bayewuncenga Simakadze

ngekutsi babute baphristi basendlini yaSimakadze longuSomandla kanye nebaphrofethi, batsi: “Ngilile yini ngizile nekudla ngenyanga yesihlanu, njengaloku bengivele ngenta kuleminyaka leminyenti leyendlulile?”
Livi laSimakadze longuSomandla lase liyefika kimi, latsi:
“Buta kubo bonkhe bantfu bakulelive nakubaphristi babo, utsi: ‘Ngalesikhatsi nizila kudla nilila ngenyanga yesihlanu neyesikhombisa kuleminyaka lengema-70 leyendlulile, benivele nizilela mine yini?
Kona ngesikhatsi nidla ninatsa, anitenteli nine yini lawo madzili?
Akusiwo yini emavi aSimakadze lawo lamenyetelwa ngebaphrofethi bakucala, ngesikhatsi iJerusalema kanye nemadolobha layitungeletile asephumulile, aphumelela lapho khona kwaze kwatinta iNegevu
Livi laSimakadze laphindze lefika futsi kuZakhariya, latsi:
“Naku lokushiwo nguSimakadze longuSomandla, utsi: ‘Yehlulelani ngekwemtsetfocotfo, niphatsane ngemusa nangeluvelo kulowo nakulowo.
Ningabacindzeteli bafelokati, netintsandzane, nemihambima kanye nalabamphofu. Etinhlitiyweni tenu ningafiselani lokubi lomunye nalomunye.’

Benta tinhlitiyo tabo taba lukhuni njengelitje, bangete bawulalela umtsetfo, bangawalaleli nemavi lakhulunywa nguSimakadze longuSomandla, lawatfumela ngaMoya wakhe ngebaphrofethi bakadzeni. Ngako-ke Simakadze longuSomandla watfukutsela kakhulu.

Ngabasakata ngesiwunguwungwana, ngabasa kuto tonkhe tive, lapho bafike baba tihambi khona. Live lasala likhala libhungane emvakwabo, kangangekutsi kute muntfu labengaphuma angene kulo. Balenta kanjalo-ke lelive lelalijabulile kutsi libe ngusehlane kahlongasibi.’ ”
Livi laSimakadze longuSomandla laphindze futsi lefika kimi, latsi:
“Naku lokushiwo nguSimakadze longuSomandla, utsi: ‘Nginenshisekelo kakhulu ngeSiyoni. Ngiyasha ngenca yesikhwele ngayo.’ ”
Naku lokushiwo nguSimakadze longuSomandla, utsi: “Emachegu kanye netalukati, bayawuphindze bahlale etitaladini taseJerusalema, nguloyo aneludvondvolo esandleni sakhe ngobe asakhulile.
Titaladi telidolobha tiyawuphitsitela bafana nemantfombatana labayawube badlala khona.”

Naku lokushiwo nguSimakadze longuSomandla, utsi: “Nangabe kubonakale kusimangaliso kulensali yalabantfu ngaleso sikhatsi, kodvwa ingabe nakimi kuyawuba simangaliso yini?” kusho Simakadze longuSomandla.
Ngiyawubabuyisa batewuhlala eJerusalema; bayawuba bantfu bami, nami ngibe nguNkulunkulu wabo ngekwetsembeka nangekulunga.”

Naku lokushiwo nguSimakadze longuSomandla, utsi: “Nine leniwevako nyalo lamavi labekhulunywa baphrofethi lababekhona ngesikhatsi kubekwa tisekelo tendlu yaSimakadze longuSomandla, cinisani tandla tenu kuze litekwakhiwa lelithempeli.
Ngaphambili kwalawo malanga kwakute inkhokhelo yebantfu nome yetilwane. Kute namunye labengaphuma angene ngenca yesitsa sakhe, ngobe ngagucula wonkhe umuntfu kutsi emelane namakhelwane wakhe.
Kodvwa nyalo ngingeke ngisayiphatsa lensali yalabantfu njengaloku ngake ngakwenta ngemalanga akucala,” kusho Simakadze longuSomandla.
“Inhlanyelo seyiyawukhula kahle, sivini siyawutsela titselo taso, umhlaba uyawuveta sivuno sawo, nemazulu ayakwehlisa ematolo awo. Tonkhe letintfo ngiyawutipha insali yalesive tibe lifa laso.
Njengobe beniyintfo yesicalekiso emkhatsini wetive, awu nine bakaJuda nani ma-Israyeli, ngiyakunisindzisa kanjalo-ke, niyawuba sibusiso. Ningesabi, kodvwa cinani emadvolo.”
Naku lokushiwo nguSimakadze longuSomandla, utsi: “Njengaloku ngatimisela kwehlisela inhlekelele etikwenu ngingasagucuki ngesikhatsi bangitfukutselisa boyihlo,” kusho Simakadze longuSomandla,
“kanjalo-ke nyalo sengitimisele kwenta lokuhle futsi kuyo iJerusalema naJuda. Ningesabi.
Nati tintfo lokufanele nitente nine: Khulumani liciniso lomunye kulomunye, emasangweni enu nikhiphe sigwebo lesiliciniso nalesiveta kuthula.
Ningambopheli luzungu makhelwane, futsi ningabokutsandza kufungela emanga. Ngiyakwenyanya konkhe loko,” kusho Simakadze.
Livi laSimakadze longuSomandla laphindze lefika kimi, latsi:

“Naku lokushiwo nguSimakadze longuSomandla, utsi: ‘Lokuzila kudla kwenyanga yesine, neyesihlanu, neyesikhombisa, neyelishumi sekuyawuba ngemalanga enjabulo, nekutsakasa, nemadzili ekutijabulisa akaJuda. Ngako-ke litsandzeni liciniso nekuthula.’ ”
labahlala kulelinye lidolobha bayakuya kulelinye batsi: ‘Asambeni ngekushesha siyewuncenga kuSimakadze, sifunisise Simakadze longuSomandla. Mine ngekwami ngiyahamba.’
Tive letinyenti netive letinemandla tiyawuta eJerusalema titewufunisisa Simakadze longuSomandla, timncenge.”

Naku lokushiwo nguSimakadze longuSomandla, utsi: “Ngalawo malanga emadvodza lalishumi lasuka kuto tonkhe tilwimi netive ayawunkonkoshela umJuda munye ngemphetfo wesembatfo sakhe, atsi: ‘Asihambisane nani, ngobe sivile kutsi Nkulunkulu unani.’ ”
nayo iDamaseko iyawuba yindzawo yekuhlala kwalelivi,
ngobe emehlo aSimakadze asetikwabo bonkhe bantfu
Kodvwa Simakadze uyawutsatsa lowo mcebo wayo,
Juda ngiyawumgoba njengobe ngigoba butjoki bami,
aphe netitselo tesiganga kubo bonkhe bantfu.
kodvwa kuwo lawo mave lakhashane bayakungikhumbula.
Naku lokukhulunywa nguSimakadze Nkulunkulu wami, utsi: “Yelusa timvu letimiselwe kuhlatjwa.
Labo lababetsengiselana ngetimvu base bayangicasha; ngayelusa lemihlambi leyase imiselwe kuhlatjwa.
ngatsi kuwo: “Ngingeke ngisanelusa. Leto letifako atife, naleto letibhubhako atibhujiswe. Leto letisele atidlane todvwana, nguleyo inyama yalenye.”
Ngase ngitsatsa indvuku yami lenguMusa, ngayephula, ngephula sivumelwane lengase ngisente kanye nato tonkhe tive.
Sacitfwa ngalelo langa, ngako labantfu labatsenga letimvu nalabo labatsengisa ngato babengibukile sebati
Ngase ngephula lendvuku yami yesibili leyayinguNhlanganiso, ngephula buhlobo emkhatsini waJuda na-Israyeli.
Simakadze wase ukhuluma kimi, watsi: “Phindza futsi utsatse tikhali temelusi, kodvwa nyalo utsatse talosilima.

Ngobe ngiyawuvusa umelusi etikwalelive longeke atinakekele timvu letilahlekile, longeke atifune letincane, longeke atiphilise letilimele, nalongeke atibonelele ondle leticinile naletikhuluphele, kodvwa uyawudla inyama yetimvu telikhetselo abhoncule tinselo tato.
Leli livi laSimakadze nga-Israyeli. Simakadze, lowendlale emazulu, lobeke tisekelo temhlaba, nalowabumba umoya wemuntfu ekhatsi kuye, utsi:
“IJerusalema ngitayenta ibe yindzebe leyenta tonkhe tive letiyitungeletile tidzayitele. Emadolobha akaJuda atawuvinjetelwa kanye neJerusalema.

Ngalelo langa, mhlazane tonkhe tive temhlaba tibutsene ndzawonye kutawumelana nayo, iJerusalema ngiyakuyenta ibe lidvwala lelisindzako kuto tonkhe tive. Bonkhe labetama kulisundvuta bayakutilimata bona.

Ngalelo langa onkhe emahhashi ngiyakuwashaya ngeluvalo, bagibeli bawo bona ngibashaye ngekuhlanya,” kusho Simakadze. “Liso lami liyawubasetikwendlu yakaJuda liyeluse, kodvwa onkhe emahhashi ebetive ngiyakuwaphumphutsekisa.
Baholi bakaJuda bayakutsi etinhlitiyweni tabo: ‘Bantfu baseJerusalema bacinile, ngobe Simakadze longuSomandla unguNkulunkulu wabo.’
“Simakadze uyawusindzisa emakhaya akaJuda kucala, kuze kutsi ludvumo lwendlu yaDavide kanye nelwetakhamiti taseJerusalema lungabi lukhulu kunelwakaJuda.

Ngalelo langa Simakadze uyawubavikela labo labahlala eJerusalema, kuze kutsi lababutsakatsaka kakhulu emkhatsini wabo babe njengaDavide, bese kutsi indlu yaDavide yona ifanane naNkulunkulu, ibe njengengilosi yaSimakadze lehamba embikwabo.
Ngalelo langa ngiyawuphuma ngiyewubhubhisa tonkhe tive letihlasela iJerusalema.”
Ngalelo langa kulila kwaseJerusalema kuyakuba kukhulu, kube njengekulila kwaHadadi Rimoni etsafeni laseMegido.
Live liyawulila, lolo nalolo lusendvo ngekwalo, nebafati balo balile ngekwabo; lusendvo lwendlu yakaDavide nebafati balo, lusendvo lwendlu yakaNathani nebafati balo,
nabo bonkhe balolo nalolo lusendvo ngekwalo nebafati balo ngekwabo.”
“Nangabe kukhona losachubeka nekuphrofetha, uyise nenina, labamtalako, bayakutsi kuye: ‘Wena kufanele ufe, ngobe ukhulume emanga egameni laSimakadze;’ nasaphrofetha, batali bakhe bayawumgwaza.
Uyakutsi: ‘Angisiye umphrofethi, ngingumlimi; kusukela ebusheni bami seloku ngisebentana nemhlaba.’
Nangabe abutwa ngumuntfu, atsi: ‘Pho, lamanceba lasemtimbeni wakho
Lilanga laSimakadze liyeta, lapho iyakwehlukaniswa khona embikwemehlo enu imphango letsatfwe kini.

Ngalelo langa tinyawo takhe tiyakuma etikweNtsaba Yemincumo, ngasemphumalanga kweJerusalema, bese kutsi leNtsaba Yemincumo ichekeke ekhatsi kusukela ngasemphumalanga kuye ngasenshonalanga, kwakheke sigodzi lesikhulu, incenye yalentsaba iyawukhweshela ngasenyakatfo, kutsi incenye lenye ikhweshele ngaseningizimu.
Niyawubalekela ngasesigodzini sentsaba yami, ngobe lesigodzi siyawufikela e-Aseli. Yebo, niyawubaleka njengamhlazane nibalekela kutamatama kwemhlaba
Ngalelo langa kuyawubate kukhanya, nekucandza, nesitfwatfwa.
Kuyakuba lilanga leliyincophamlandvo, leliyawubate imini nebusuku, lilanga lelatiwa nguSimakadze. Kuyawutsi nakutakuhlwa, kuvele kukhanya.
Iyakuhlalwa bantfu; ingeke iphindze ibhujiswe. IJerusalema iyawulamuleleka.

Lesi-ke sishayo Simakadze layawushaya ngaso tonkhe tive letalwa neJerusalema: Umtimba wabo uyawubola baseme ngetinyawo tabo, emehlo abo ayawubola etingojeni tawo, netilwimi tabo tiyawubola emilonyeni yabo.
Ngalelo langa bantfu bayawushaywa nguSimakadze ngekutfutfumela lokukhulu. Ngulowo nalowo uyawubamba sandla salomunye bahlaselane bodvwana.
NaJuda uyakulwa amelane neJerusalema. Ingcebo yato tonkhe tive letakhelene nayo iyawubutsiselwa ndzawonye, kube tincumbi letinkhulu tegolide, netesiliva kanye netetimphahla tekwembatsa.
Sishayo lesifanana naso siyawushaya emahhashi neminyuzi, nemakamela, netimbongolo, kanye nato tonkhe tilwane kuleto tinkambu.
Nangabe letinye tive temhlaba tingayi eJerusalema kuyawukhonta iNkhosi, Simakadze longuSomandla, tiyawubate imvula.
Nangabe emaGibhithe akenyuki kuyawuhlanganyela, nawo ayawubate imvula.
Lesi kuyakuba sijeziso seGibhithe nesijeziso setive tonkhe letingenyuki kuyewugubha uMkhosi Wemadlangala.

Onkhe emabhodo aseJerusalema newakaJuda ayakwehlukaniselwa Simakadze longuSomandla, kutsi bonkhe labetako kutakwenta umhlatjelo batsatse lamanye alamabhodo bapheke ngawo. Ngalelo langa sewuyawubate umtsengisi
Sembulo: Livi laSimakadze lelefika kuma-Israyeli ngemphrofethi Malakhi.
Simakadze utsi: “Esawu bekungesiye yini umnakaboJakobe? Noko ngase ngimtsandzile Jakobe,
kodvwa Esawu ngamtondza. Ngagucula tintsaba takhe taba lugwadvule, lifa lakhe ngalishiyela timphungutja tasehlane.”
Edomu angasho atsi: “Nome sipitjitiwe, kodvwa sitawutakha kabusha letindzala.”
Kodvwa naku lokushiwo nguSimakadze longuSomandla, utsi: “Bangakha, kodvwa ngitawuphindze ngibhidlite. Bayawubitwa ngekutsi Live Lenkhohlakalo, sive lesihlala njalo singaphansi kwelulaka lwaSimakadze.
Niyawukubona nine ngemehlo enu, bese nitsi: ‘Mukhulu Simakadze, kuze kwendlulele nangesheya kweminyele yaka-Israyeli!’ ”

Naniletsa tifuyo letitindlobho kutsi titewuba ngumhlatjelo, kulungile yini loko? Nanenta umhlatjelo ngesifuyo lesichutako nome lesigulako, kulungile yini loko? Yetamani kunikela ngato kumbusi wenu! Anganijabulela yini? Anganemukela yini?” kusho Simakadze longuSomandla.
Nitsi: “Ncusani kuNkulunkulu kutsi atewuba nemusa kitsi.” “Ngaleminikelo lenjena lephuma etandleni tenu utanemukela yini?” kusho Simakadze longuSomandla.

“Libito lami liyawuba likhulu etiveni kusukela ekuphumeni kwelilanga kuze kube ngusekushoneni kwalo. Kuyo yonkhe indzawo imphepho neminikelo lehlantekile iyawuletfwa kulo Libito lami, ngobe Libito lami liyawuba likhulu etiveni,” kusho Simakadze longuSomandla.
“Kodvwa nine niyalihlambalata ngekukhuluma ngelitafula laSimakadze nitsi: ‘Lingcolile,’ nangekudla kwalo, nitsi: ‘Kuyenyanyeka!’
Niphindze nitsi: ‘Maye, ngumtfwalo!’ bese nikumfumfutsa ngaphandle kwenhlonipho,” kusho Simakadze longuSomandla.
“Naniletsa tifuyo letitsetfwe ngebudlova nome letichutako, nome letigulako nitinikele tibe ngumhlatjelo, kufanele ngitemukele yini kuleto tandla tenu?” kusho Simakadze.

“Ucalekisiwe umuntfu lotsi anesifuyo lesemukelekako lesidvuna emhlambini wakhe, afunge kutsi utawunikela ngaso, kodvwa bese uyesuka lapho unikela kuSimakadze ngalesinye lesinesici. Ngobe mine ngiyinkhosi lenkhulu, neLibito lami liyesatjwa etiveni tonkhe,” kusho Simakadze longuSomandla.
Naningalaleli, futsi naningatimiseli ngenhlitiyo yenu kutsi nihloniphe Libito lami, ngitanitfumelela sicalekiso, netibusiso tenu ngiticalekise.
Nitawukwati-ke kutsi nginitfumelele lesecwayiso, khona kutawutsi sivumelwane sami naLevi sichubeke,” kusho Simakadze longuSomandla.
“Sivumelwane sami naye bekusivumelwane sekuphila nekuthula, nguloko lengamnika kona, kutsi angihloniphe, futsi wavele wangihlonipha wema ekulesabeni Libito lami.
Sifundziso lesiliciniso sasisemlonyeni wakhe, kute inkhohliso leyatfolakala etindzebeni temlomo wakhe. Wahamba nami ngekuthula nangebucotfo, wakhipha labanyenti esonweni.
Kodvwa nine senisukile kuleyo ndlela, kwatsi ngalemfundziso yenu nakhubatelisa bantfu labanyenti, bawa; nisephulile sivumelwane sami naLevi,” kusho Simakadze longuSomandla.
“Ngako-ke mine senginente nedzeleleka natfotjiswa embikwabo bonkhe bantfu, ngobe anikatilandzeli tindlela tami, kodvwa nine niyaye nikhetse bantfu nanisebentisa umtsetfo.”
Umuntfu lowenta loko, nome ngabe ngubani, shangatsi Simakadze angamsusa emathendeni akaJakobe,
Lokunye lenikwentako naku: Nilitsela ngetinyembeti lilati laSimakadze. Niyalila nikhale ngobe angasayinaki iminikelo yenu, nome angasayemukeli ngekujabula etandleni tenu.
Niyabuta nitsi: “Leni?” Kungobe Simakadze abengufakazi emkhatsini wakho nemfati webusha bakho, ngobe awuketsembeki kuye, nome yena usengumkakho, umfati wesivumelwane semshado.
Simakadze akabenti baba munye yini? Enyameni nasemoyeni bakhe. Bamunye leni? Ngobe abefuna bantfwana labesaba Nkulunkulu.
Nimkhatsate ngekukhuluma nitsi: “Bonkhe labenta lokubi bahle emehlweni aSimakadze, futsi uyajabula ngabo,” nome: “Uphi loNkulunkulu wema-Israyeli lowehlulela ngebucotfo?”
Kodvwa ngubani nje longamelana nelilanga lekufika kwakhe? Ngubani longema ekubonakaleni kwakhe? Ngobe uyawufanana nemlilo wemcengi nome nensipho yemgezi.
Uyawuhlala njengemcengi nanjengemhlanti wesiliva; uyawuhlanta emaLevi awacenge njengegolide nesiliva. Simakadze uyawuba nemadvodza layawuletsa iminikelo ngekulunga,
neminikelo yakaJuda neyaseJerusalema iyawuphindze yemukeleke kuSimakadze, njengasemalangeni akadzeni, eminyakeni yasemandvulo.
Kusukela esikhatsini sabokhokho benu nisukile etimisweni tami, nangete natigcina. Buyelani kimi, nami ngiyawubuyela kini,” kusho Simakadze longuSomandla.
Ningaphansi kwesicalekiso, nonkhe nine sive, ngobe nichubeka nekungebela.

Letsani konkhe kwelishumi endlini yengcebo, kuze kutewuba nekudla endlini yami.” Simakadze utsi: “Ase ningilinge ngaloko, nitewubona kutsi ngingeke yini nginivulele emafasitelo asezulwini ekutfulula, nginitfululele tibusiso letinyenti, nize nehluleke kutfola indzawo leyenele yekutigcina.
Ngiyawuvimba tilwanyakatana kutsi tingatidli tilimo tenu, nemivini emasimini enu ingasali ite titselo,” kusho Simakadze longuSomandla.
“Lapho-ke tonkhe tive tiyawutsi nine ningulababusisiwe, ngobe live lenu liyakuba live lelihle,” kusho Simakadze longuSomandla.
Simakadze utsi: “Nikhulume kimi emavi lanelulaka nalabuhlungu.
Kodvwa nyalo sibita labatigabatisako sitsi bangulababusisiwe. Impela benti balokubi bayaphumelela, ngisho nalabo labamelene naNkulunkulu nabo bayaphunyula.’ ”
Niyawuphindze niwubone kahle umehluko emkhatsini walabalungile nalababi, ngisho emkhatsini walabo labakhonta Nkulunkulu nalabo labangamkhonti.”
Kodvwa kini lenilesabako Libito lami, lilanga lekulunga liyawuphuma linekuphilisa etimphikweni talo. Niyawuphuma nitjakadvule njengemankhonyane lakhululwe etisingeni tawo.
Lapho-ke niyawubagcobagcoba phansi lababi; bayawuba lutfuli ngaphansi kwetinyawo tenu ngalelo langa lengiyawulungisa ngalo konkhe,” kusho Simakadze longuSomandla.
Uyawuguculela tinhlitiyo taboyise kubantfwababo, netinhlitiyo tebantfwana kuboyise; ngaphandle kwaloko ngiyawuta ngitewushaya lelive ngesicalekiso.”
Lona ngumlandvo wekutalwa kwaJesu Khristu, labesitukulwane saDavide, naye abesitukulwane sa-Abrahama.
Juda watala boPheresi naZara, unina wabo bekunguThamari; Pheresi watala Hesroni; Hesroni watala Ramu;
Ramu watala Aminadaba; Aminadaba watala Nasoni; Nasoni watala Salmoni;
Salmoni watala Bowazi kuRahabi; Bowazi watala Obedi kuRuthe; Obedi watala Jese;
Davide watala Solomoni, unina abengumfati wa-Uriya;
Solomoni watala Rehobhowamu; Rehobhowamu watala Abiya; Abiya watala Asafa;
Asafa watala Josafati; Josafati watala Joramu; Joramu watala Oziya;
Oziya watala Jothamu; Jothamu watala Ahazi; Ahazi watala Hezekiya;
Hezekiya watala Manase; Manase watala Amoni; Amoni watala Josaya;
Josaya watala Jekhoniya nabomnakabo, ngesikhatsi bantfu baka-Israyeli batfunjwa bayiswa eBhabhulona.
Zerubhabheli watala Abiyudi; Abiyudi watala Eliyakimu; Eliyakimu watala Azori;
Azori watala Sadoki; Sadoki watala Akhimu; Akhimu watala Eliyudi;
Eliyudi watala Eliyezeri; Eliyezeri watala Mathani; Mathani watala Jakobe;
Jakobe watala Josefa, indvodza yaMariya, unaboJesu lobitwa ngekutsi nguKhristu.

Tili-14 titukulwane kusukela ku-Abrahama kuya kuDavide. Kusukela kuDavide kuya esikhatsini sekutfunjwa kwabo kuya eBhabhulona nakhona tili-14. Kusukela esikhatsini sekutfunjelwa eBhabhulona kuya esikhatsini saKhristu nakhona tili-14.
Kepha Josefa, indvodza yakhe, abengumuntfu lolungile, akatsandzanga kumtsela ngelihlazo. Wacabanga, asafuna kumlahla ngasese.
Kodvwa asakucabanga loko, kwefika ingilosi yeNkhosi kuye ngeliphupho yatsi: “Josefa, ndvodzana yaDavide, ungesabi kumtsatsa Mariya umkakho, ngobe loko lakukhulelwe kwaMoya Longcwele.
Mariya utakutala indvodzana uyetse libito utsi nguJesu, ngobe nguye loyakusindzisa bantfu bakhe etonweni tabo.”
Konkhe loku kwentekela kugcwalisa loko lokwashiwo yiNkhosi ngemphrofethi lowatsi:
“Bheka, intfombi iyawukhulelwa itale indvodzana, libito layo kuyawutsiwa ngu-Imanuweli,” lokusho kutsi: “Nkulunkulu unatsi.”
Josefa nakavuka ebutfongweni, wenta njengaloku ingilosi yeNkhosi imtjelile; watsatsa Mariya waba ngumkakhe.
Kodvwa akazange ahlangane naye waze watubula ngendvodzana; wayetsa libito, watsi nguJESU.
Kwatsi kube kutalwe Jesu eBhetlehema esigodzini saseJudiya ngesikhatsi Herodi ayinkhosi, kwefika tati eJerusalema tiphuma emphumalanga,
tabuta tatsi: “Uphi lomntfwana lotelwe loyinkhosi yemaJuda? Ngobe sabona inkhanyeti yakhe iphuma emphumalanga. Site kutemkhotsamela.”
Inkhosi Herodi isakuva loko, yakhatsateka kakhulu kanye neJerusalema yonkhe.
Yatsi kube ibite bonkhe baphristi labakhulu netati temtsetfo tesive, yababuta kutsi Khristu utawutalelwa kuphi.
Bamtjela batsi: “EBhetlehema yaseJudiya, njengobe umphrofethi wabhala watsi:
Ngako-ke Herodi wase ubita tati emhlanganweni wangasese, watibutisisa sikhatsi inkhanyeti leyayibonakale ngaso,
wase utitfumela eBhetlehema utsi: “Hambani nimfunisise kahle lomntfwana; nasenimtfolile, nibobuya nitewungatisa, khona nami ngitekuya, ngiyewumkhotsamela.”
Tati setiyivile inkhosi, tesuka tahamba; setisendleleni taphindza tayibona inkhanyeti letatiyibone emphumalanga, yase ihamba embikwato, yaze yema lapho bekukhona khona umntfwana.
Tangena endlini, tabona umntfwana naMariya, unina. Taguca phansi, tadvumisa iNkhosi; tase tivula tikhwama tato, tamupha tipho: igolide, nemphepho, nemakha.
Tadvonswa nguNkulunkulu ngendlebe ephusheni kutsi tingahambi tibuyele kuHerodi. Ngako-ke tabuyela emuva eveni lato ngalenye indlela.

Kwatsi kube tati tisuke lapho, ingilosi yeNkhosi yatibonakalisa kuJosefa ephusheni itsi: “Vuka, utsatse umntfwana nenina, nibalekele eGibhithe, nifike nihlale khona niyawuze nitjelwe ngimi; ngobe Herodi utawufuna lomntfwana kuze ambulale.”
Ngako-ke Josefa wavuka watsatsa umntfwana nenina, bahamba ebusuku balibhekisa eGibhithe.
Wahlala khona, waze Herodi wafa, kuze kugcwaliseke lokwakhulunywa yiNkhosi ngemphrofethi nakatsi: “Ngayibita iNdvodzana yami kutsi iphume eGibhite.”

Kwatsi Herodi asabonile kutsi tati timyengile, watfukutsela wagcwala kokana, watfumela kutsi akubulawe bonkhe bantfwana labadvuna baseBhetlehema nakuto tonkhe tindzawo tangakhona lababeneminyaka lemibili nome ngephansi, kwaya ngesikhatsi labesibutisise etatini.
Ngako-ke kwagcwaliseka lokwakhulunywa ngumphrofethi Jeremiya nakatsi:
Kwatsi kube kufe Herodi, ingilosi yeNkhosi yabonakala kuJosefa ngeliphupho eGibhithe
itsi: “Vuka! Tsatsa umntfwana nenina, ubuyele eveni laka-Israyeli, ngobe labo bebafuna kubulala umntfwana sebafile.”
Josefa wavuka, watsatsa umntfwana nenina, wabuyela eveni laka-Israyeli.
Kodvwa watsi nakeva kutsi sekubusa Akhelawusi eJudiya esikhundleni seyise Herodi, wesaba kuya khona; asayalwe ngeliphupho, wajika waya esifundzeni saseGalile.
Wayawuhlala edolobheni lekutsiwa yiNazaretha, kuze kugcwaliseke lokwashiwo baphrofethi kutsi: “Uyawubitwa ngekutsi ngumNazaretha.”
Ngalawo malanga kwavela Johane uMbhabhatisi ashumayela ehlane laseJudiya
Kweta kuye bonkhe baseJerusalema nebaseJudiya, nebaseveni lonkhe lelingaseJordane.
Wababhabhatisa emfuleni iJordane, bavuma tono tabo.
Ningatiyengi nje nitsi: ‘Sinaye Abrahama longubabe wetfu,’ ngobe ngiyanitjela ngitsi: Nkulunkulu angamvusela Abrahama bantfwana kulamatje.
Nanyalo lizembe libekiwe etimphandzeni tetihlahla, ngako-ke sihlahla lesingatseli titselo letihle siyajutjwa sifakwe emlilweni.
Sitja sakhe sekwela sisesandleni sakhe; uyawushanelisisa sibuya sakhe abutsele emabele esilulwini sakhe, kepha emakhoba uyawuwashisa ngemlilo longacimeki.”
Kwatsi kusenjalo, wachamuka Jesu avela eGalile naye ete eJordane kutewubhajatiswa nguJohane.
Kepha Johane wetama kumalela atsi: “Ngimi lengidzinga kubhajatiswa nguwe, wena sewute kimi?”
Kodvwa Jesu wamphendvula watsi: “Vuma nyalo, ngobe kufanele sigcwalise kanjalo intsandvo yaNkulunkulu.” Ngako wase uyamvumela.
Kusenjalo kwevakala livi livela ezulwini litsi: “Lena yiNdvodzana yami, letsandzekako, lengijabula ngayo.”
Asazilile kudla emalanga langema-40 nebusuku bakhona, wase uyalamba.
Umlingi wase uyefika kuye utsi: “NawuyiNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu, tjela nankha ematje agucuke abe tinkhwa!”
Wesuka lapho Sathane wamyisa edolobheni lelingcwele, wammisa esicongweni selithempeli,
watsi kuye: “NawuyiNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu, tijike phansi, ngobe kubhaliwe kutsi:
Waphindza futsi Sathane wamtsatsa, wamenyusela esicongweni sentsaba, wamkhombisa yonkhe imibuso nebucwebecwebe bayo,
watsi kuye: “Konkhe loku ngitakunika kona, nawungamane uwe phansi nje, ungikhotsame.”
Jesu watsi kuye: “Suka, Sathane, ngobe kubhaliwe kutsi:
Wesuka Sathane wamshiya, kwase kufika tingilosi titewusita Jesu.
Wesuka eNazaretha wayawuhlala eKhaphanawume eceleni kwelwandle, eveni lakaZebuloni nelakaNaftali,
kuze kugcwaliseke lokwashiwo ngumphrofethi Isaya kutsi:
Jesu watsi kubo: “Ngilandzeleni, ngitawunenta badwebi bebantfu.”
Asachubeka lapho, wabona letinye telamani letimbili, boJakobe naJohane, emadvodzana aZebedi, lababesesikebheni naZebedi, uyise, bachibela emanetha abo, wababita.
Masinyane bamshiya uyise kanye nesikebhe, balandzela Jesu.

Ludvumo ngaye lwandza nalo lonkhe laseSiriya, kangangekutsi kwaletfwa kuye bonkhe bantfu lababegula, baphetfwe tinhlobonhlobo tekufa, nalababekhatsatwe tinhlobonhlobo tetinhlupheko: lababenemadimoni, nalababenesitfutfwane, nalababefe tinhlangotsi; Jesu wabaphilisa bonkhe.
Ticumbi letikhulu tebantfu tamlandzela tisuka eGalile, naseDekhapholisi, naseJerusalema, naseJudiya, naseveni lelingesheya kwemfula iJordane.
Jesu watsi kube abone ticumbi tebantfu, wase wenyukela entsabeni, wefika wahlala phansi. Bafundzi bakhe base beta kuye,
Jabulani nitfokote, ngobe umvuzo wenu mkhulu ezulwini; ngobe nebaphrofethi labanendvulela babatingela babahlupha kanjalo.”
Kute umuntfu lokhanyisa sibane bese usibeka ngephansi kwesitja; kodvwa usibeka endzaweni yaso, kuze sikhanyisele wonkhe umuntfu losendlini.
Kanjalo-ke akukhanye kukhanya kwenu embikwebantfu, kuze babone lokulungile lenikwentako, bese badvumisa uYihlo losezulwini.”
“Ningacabangi kutsi ngitele kutewucitsa umtsetfo netimfundziso tebaphrofethi. Angiketeli kutewucitsa, kodvwa ngitele kutewugcwalisa.

Ngako-ke lowo lowephula munye kulemiyalo lemincanyana, aphindze afundzise labanye kanjalo, uyakuba ngulomncane embusweni welizulu; kepha loyigcinako ayifundzise, lowo kuyawutsiwa mkhulu embusweni welizulu.
Ngobe ngiyanitjela impela ngitsi: Ngaphandle kwekutsi kulunga kwenu kwendlule kwetati temtsetfo nekwebaFarisi, ningeke ningene embusweni welizulu.”
Kepha mine ngitsi kini: Lowo lotfukutselela umnakabo, uyawulahlwa licala; nalowo lowetfuka umnakabo, uyakuba nelicala emtsetfweni; nalowo lotsi kumnakabo: ‘Silima,’ uyawufanelwa ngumlilo wesihogo.
Ngako nangabe utawunikela ngesipho sakho elatini kuNkulunkulu, bese ukhumbula kutsi umnakenu unemavundvo nawe,
sishiye khona lapho embikwelilati sipho sakho, uhambe uyekubuyisana nemnakenu, bese uyabuya-ke utewunikela ngesipho sakho.
Ngicinisile, ngitsi: Ungeke usaphuma lapho ungakakhiphi isenti yekugcina.”
Kepha mine ngitsi kini: Ngulowo nalowo lobuka lomsikati, bese uyamkhanuka, sewuphinge naye enhlitiyweni yakhe.
Nangabe liso lakho langesekudla likonisa, likhokhe ulilahle; ngobe kuncono kuwe kulahlekelwa sitfo sinye semtimba kunekutsi umtimba wakho wonkhe ulahlwe uphelele esihogweni.
Nangabe sandla sakho sangesekudla sikonisa, sijube usilahle; ngobe kuncono kuwe kulahlekelwa sitfo sinye semtimba kunekutsi umtimba wakho wonkhe ulahlwe uphelele esihogweni.”
Kepha mine ngitsi: Lowo lolahla umkakhe ngaphandle kwebugwadla, uyamphingisa; nalotsatsa umfati lolahliwe, uyaphinga.”
Kodvwa mine ngitsi kini: Ningafungi sanhlobo: nome ngelizulu, ngobe lingumchele waNkulunkulu;
nome ngemhlaba, ngobe usenabelo setinyawo takhe; ngisho nangeJerusalema, ngobe kulidolobha leNkhosi yemakhosi.
Ungafungi ngisho nangenhloko yakho, ngobe ungeke ugucule ngisho nalunye lunwele kutsi lube mhlophe, nome lube ntima.
Nanivuma nibotsi: ‘Yebo’ nome-ke nitsi: ‘Cha’ nangabe niyala; ngobe lokwendlula lapho kuvela kuLomubi.”
Kodvwa mine ngitsi kini: Ningamelani nalokubi; umuntfu nakakumukula esihlatsini sangesekudla, mnike nalesi lesinye.
Nangabe umuntfu akwemuka lihembe, mnike nelijazi futsi.
Nangabe umuntfu akucindzetela kutsi uhambe naye likhilometha libe linye umetfwalele umtfwalo wakhe, hamba naye abe mabili.
Muphe locela lutfo kuwe, ungamtsalaliseli lofuna kuboleka kuwe.”
Kodvwa mine ngitsi kini: Tsandzani titsa tenu,
kuze nitewuba ngemadvodzana eYihlo losezulwini. Ngobe yena uphumisa lilanga lakhe kulababi nalabahle, anise imvula yakhe kulabalungile nalabangakalungi.
Kambe nanitsandza labanitsandzako, ninamvuzo muni? Abenti njalo yini nebatselisi?
Futsi nanibingelela bazalwane benu bodvwa, nenta buncono buni-ke? Abenti njalo yini nebetive?
Ngako-ke nani banini ngulabaphelele, njengobe neYihlo losezulwini aphelele.”
“Ngako-ke nawupha lutfo kumuntfu loswele, ungamemeteli, njengobe kwenta batentisi emasinagogeni nasetitaladini, khona batewudvunyiswa bantfu. Ngicinisile, ngitsi kini: Sebawemukele umvuzo wabo.
Kepha wena nawupha sipho, sandla sakho sangesancele asingakwati lesikwentako sangesekudla,
kuze sipho sakho sibesekusitsekeni, khona uYihlo lobona ekusitsekeni utakuvuza.”
Kepha wena nawuthandaza, ngena endlini yakho uvale umnyango, uthandaze kuYihlo losekusitsekeni, khona uYihlo lobona ekusitsekeni utawukunika umvuzo.
“Kodvwa nanithandazako, ningalibali kukhuluma emagama lamanyenti langasho lutfo, njengebetive labacabanga kutsi batawuvakala ngekukhuluma kwabo lokunyenti.
Ningabalingisi-ke, ngobe Nkulunkulu uYihlo ukwati kucala lenikudzingako nine ningakakuceli.
Kodvwa naningabatsetseleli bantfu tono tabo, neYihlo angeke anitsetselele tono tenu.”

“Futsi-ke nanizila kudla, ningabunyukumalisi buso benu njengebatentisi, ngobe bona banyukumalisa buso babo, kuze batekubonakalisa kubantfu kuzila kwabo. Ngicinisile, ngitsi kini: Sebawemukele umvuzo wabo.
Kepha wena nawuzila, gcobisa inhloko yakho ugeze nebuso bakho,
kuze bantfu bangakuboni kutsi uzilile, kodvwa ubonwe nguYihlo losekusitsekeni; neYihlo lobona ekusitsekeni utakukunika umvuzo.”
Lokungenani tibekeleni umcebo wenu ezulwini, lapho kungekho khona umvunya, nekutfomba lokuwudlako, nemasela angeke agcekeze awube.
Phela lapho kukhona umcebo wakho khona, nenhlitiyo yakho itakuba khona.”
Kodvwa nangabe liso lakho lingaphili, nemtimba wakho wonkhe uyakubasebumnyameni. Ngako-ke nangabe kukhanya lokukuwe kubumnyama, bukhulu-ke bumnyama lobukuwe.”
“Kute umuntfu longakhonta emakhosi lamabili; ngobe uyakutondza lenye, atsandze lenye; uyakwetsembeka kulenye ayedzelele lenye. Ungeke ukhonte Nkulunkulu nemcebo.
Bukani tinyoni temoya kutsi atihlanyeli, ativuni, atibeki lutfo etilulwini, kodvwa uYihlo losezulwini uyatondla. Anincono kakhulu yini nine kunato?
Kukhona yini emkhatsini wenu longatengetela umzuzwana ebudzeni bemphilo yakhe ngekutihlupha kwakhe?
“Nitihluphelani ngetimphahla? Bukani timbali temhlaba kutsi tikhula njani, atikhandleki, futsi atitfungi.
Kepha ngitsi kini: NaSolomoni ebukhatikhatini bakhe bonkhe abengeke afanane ngisho nayinye yato ngekwembatsa.
Kodvwa nangabe Nkulunkulu abembatsisa kangaka tjani besiganga, lobuphilako lamuhla, kusasa bushe, akayiwunembatsisa kakhulu yini nine leninekukholwa lokuncane?
Ngobe nebetive bafuna tona leto tintfo, kantsi uYihlo losezulwini uyati kutsi niyatidzinga tonkhe letintfo.
Kodvwa funani kucala umbuso waNkulunkulu kanye nekulunga kwakhe, khona tonkhe letintfo titakwengetelwa kini.
Ngako-ke ningakhatsateki ngelikusasa lenu, ngobe likusasa liyakutikhatsalela lona. Inhlupheko yelilanga yenele lona.”
Ngobe ngaloko kwehlulela lenehlulela ngako labanye, nani niyakwehlulelwa ngako; nangaleso silinganiso lenilinganisa ngaso, nani niyakulinganiswa ngaso.
Pho, ulunakeni lutsi lolusesweni lwemzalwane wakho, kodvwa ube ungalunaki lolugodvo lolusesweni lakho?
Nome-ke ungasho kanjani kumzalwane wakho utsi: ‘Ase ngikukhiphe nalu lutsi lolusesweni lakho,’ ibe kantsi kuvundle lugodvo esweni lakho?
Mtentisi, cala kucala ukhiphe lugodvo lolusesweni lakho, emvakwaloko-ke utakubonisisa kahle kutsi ukhiphe lutsi lolusesweni lwemzalwane wakho.
“Ningatiniki tinja lokungcwele, ningawalahli etihhontjini ematje enu laligugu, funa tiwagcobagcobe ngetinselo tato, bese tigucukela kini tiyanidzabudzabula.”
Ngobe wonkhe locelako uyakuphiwa, nalofunako uyatfola, nalonconcotsako uyavulelwa.
Ngubani emkhatsini wenu lekungatsi umsa wakhe nakacela sinkhwa, yena amnike litje?
Nome acela inhlanti, yena amnike inyoka?
Nangabe-ke nine lenibabi kangaka nikwati kubapha bantfwabenu tipho letinhle, kakhulu kangakanani-ke uYihlo losezulwini utakubapha lokuhle labacela kuye.
Kepha lisango lincane nendlela yincane leyisa ekuphileni, nebantfu labayitfolako bambalwa.”
Niyawubati ngemisebenti yabo, njengetihlahla tatiwa ngetitselo tato. Emagelebisi angakhiwa yini etihlahleni temanyeva, nome emakhiwa elugaganeni?
Sihlahla lesimnandzi sitsela titselo letimnandzi, kantsi sihlahla lesibi sitsela titselo letimbi.
Sihlahla lesimnandzi singeke sitsele titselo letimbi, kanjalo futsi nesihlahla lesibi singeke sitsele titselo letimnandzi.
Sonkhe sihlahla lesingatseli titselo letimnandzi, siyajutjwa, silahlwe emlilweni.

Ngalelo langa labanyenti bayakutsi kimi: ‘Nkhosi, Nkhosi, asizange siphrofethe yini ngelibito lakho? Asiwakhiphanga yini emadimoni ngelibito lakho? Asiyentanga yini imisebenti leminyenti nalemikhulu ngelibito lakho?’
Kepha ngiyawubaphendvula ngitsi: ‘Angizange nginati. Sukani kimi, nine benti balokubi!’ ”
“Ngako-ke wonkhe umuntfu lova lamavi ami awente, ufanana nendvodza lehlakaniphile, leyakha indlu yayo etikwelidvwala.
Kwase kuna imvula, imifula yagcwala, nemimoya yahhusha, yetama kuyiphephula lendlu, kodvwa ayizange iwe, ngobe yayakhelwe esisekelweni lesasilidvwala.
“Lowo lova lamavi ami angawenti, ufanana nendvodza lesilima, leyakha indlu yayo esihlabatsini.
Kwase kuna imvula, imifula yagcwala, nemimoya yahhusha yayiphephula lendlu, yaze yawa. Maye! Kwaba kukhulu loko kuwa kwayo!”
ngobe abebafundzisa njengemuntfu lonemandla, hhayi njengetati tabo temtsetfo.
Kwatsi Jesu nehla entsabeni, walandzelwa ticumbi letinyenti tebantfu.
Kwase kufika umuntfu labenebulephelo, wakhuleka kuye watsi: “Nkhosi, nawutsandza, ungangihlambulula.”
Jesu welula sandla, wamtsintsa watsi: “Ngiyatsandza, hlambuluka!” Nembala wahlambuluka masinyane ebulephelweni bakhe.
Jesu wase utsi kuye: “Lalela la! Ungatjeli muntfu, kodvwa hamba uye kumphristi akubone, bese wenta umnikelo wekubonga lowamiswa nguMosi, ukhombise nebantfu kutsi sewuhlantekile.”
Kwatsi Jesu asangena eKhaphanawume, wahlangabetwa yindvuna yelikhulu lemasotja, yamncenga
yatsi: “Nkhosi, sisebenti sami silele phansi endlini, sife luhlangotsi, sisebuhlungwini lobukhulu.”
Lendvuna yaphendvula yatsi: “Nkhosi, angikafanelwa nekutsi ungene ngaphansi kweluphahla lwendlu yami, kepha shano livi nje, khona sisebenti sami sitawuphila.
Nami nginetiphatsimandla letingetulu kwami, nginemasotja langaphansi kwami; ngitsi kulelinye: ‘Hamba,’ lihambe; ngitsi kulelinye: ‘Wota la,’ lite; nencekwini yami ngitsi: ‘Yenta loku,’ ikwente.”
Jesu nakuva loko, wamangala, watsi kulaba babemlandzela: “Ngicinisile, ngitsi kini: Ngisho naka-Israyeli angizange sengikutfole kukholwa lokunje.
Kepha ngiyanitjela ngitsi: Labanyenti bayawuchamuka emphumalanga nasenshonalanga, bahlale etafuleni kanye na-Abrahama, na-Isaka, naJakobe embusweni welizulu.
Kodvwa bantfwana bembuso bayawukhishelwa ebumnyameni bangaphandle, lapho kuyawuba khona kukhala nekugedletela kwematinyo.”
Jesu wase utsi endvuneni: “Hamba, akwenteke kuwe njengekukholwa kwakho!”
Jesu wase ungenisa ekhaya laPhetro, lapho efika wakhandza uninatala waPhetro alele embhedzeni, aphetfwe ngumkhuhlane.
Jesu watsintsa sandla sakhe, umkhuhlane wase uyamyekela; wasukuma wamlungisela kudla.
Kwatsi nase kuhlwa, baletsa kuye labanyenti lababenemadimoni; wabakhipha bonkhe bomoya lababi ngelivi nje, waphilisa bonkhe lababegula,
kuze kugcwaliseke loko lokwakhulunywa ngumphrofethi Isaya nakatsi: “Wasetfwalela butsakatsaka betfu, watisusa kitsi tifo tetfu.”
Jesu watsi kube abone sicumbi simkakile, wase utsi akwewelelwe ngesheya kwelwandle.
Kwase kufika sati semtsetfo satsi: “Mfundzisi, ngitakulandzela, ngisho nome uyaphi.”
Jesu wamphendvula watsi: “Timphungutja tinemigodzi, netinyoni tinetidleke, kodvwa iNdvodzana yeMuntfu ite indzawo yekulala iphumule.”
Lomunye webafundzi bakhe watsi kuye: “Nkhosi, asewungivumele kucala sengiyewungcwaba babe!”
Kepha Jesu watsi kuye: “Ngilandzele, uyekele labafile, bangcwabe labafile babo!”
Kwatsi Jesu nasangena esikebheni, bafundzi bakhe bamlandzela.
Kwase kuvuka sivunguvungu selwandle lesikhulu, sikebhe sadzimate sagujetelwa ngemagagasi; kepha Jesu abelele.
Bafundzi baya kuye bayakumvusa batsi: “Nkhosi, sisindzise! Sesiyafa!”
Jesu wabaphendvula watsi: “Nesabani, nine bekukholwa lokuncane?” Wasukuma wasekhuta lesivunguvungu kanye nelwandle, kwase kuba khona kuthula lokukhulu.
Bantfu bamangala, badzimate batsi: “Kantsi muntfu muni lona, ngobe imimoya nelwandle kuyamlalela?”
Kwatsi Jesu nasafikile ngesheya, eveni lemaGadara, wahlangabetwa bantfu lababili lababenemadimoni, baphuma emathuneni. Babeyingoti lenkhulu kangangekutsi kwakungasahambi muntfu ngaleyo ndlela.
Bamemeta batsi: “Sinamsebenti muni nawe, Ndvodzana yaNkulunkulu, sewutele kutesivisa buhlungu yini sikhatsi sisengakefiki?”
Madvutane nalapho kwakudla umhlambi lomkhulu wetingulube.
Emadimoni ancenga Jesu atsi: “Nawusikhipha la, sitfumele singene kunankhu umhlambi wetingulube!”
Jesu watsi kuwo: “Hambani!” Ngako aphuma angena etihhontjini, wonkhe lowo mhlambi wagijima wewusa sihosha, wangena elwandle, wacwila, wafa.
Lamadvodza abelusile abaleka aya edolobheni, afike abalandzisa yonkhe indzaba, nekutsi kwentekani kulamadvodza lamabili labenemadimoni.
Ngako-ke wonkhe umuntfu kulelo dolobha waphuma wayawuhlangabeta Jesu; batsi kube bambone, bamncenga batsi akesuke kulelo live labo.
Jesu wangena esikebheni, wewelela ngesheya, wangena edolobheni lakubo.
Baletsa kuye umuntfu lobekafe luhlangotsi alaliswe eluhlakeni. Nakabona kukholwa kwabo, Jesu watsi kulobekafe luhlangotsi: “Mani sibindzi, ndvodzana yami! Tono takho titsetselelwe.”
Letinye tati temtsetfo takhuluma todvwana tatsi: “Lomuntfu uyahlambalata.”
Kodvwa Jesu ayati imicabango yabo, watsi: “Yini nicabange lokubi etinhlitiyweni tenu?
Ngukuphi lokulula ekutseni: ‘Tono takho titsetselelwe,’ nasekutseni: ‘Sukuma uhambe’?
Ngitanikhombisa-ke kutsi iNdvodzana yeMuntfu inemandla ekutsetselela tono emhlabeni.” Wase utsi kulobekafe luhlangotsi: “Sukuma, tsatsa luhlaka lwakho, uhambe ubuyele ekhaya!”
Bantfu batsi kube bakubone loko, betfuka badvumisa Nkulunkulu lonika bantfu emandla lanjalo.
Jesu asengca lapho, wabona umuntfu, libito lakhe kunguMatewu, ahleti endzaweni yekutselisa, watsi kuye: “Ngilandzele!”
BaFarisi nababona loku, base batsi kubafundzi bakhe: “Kwentiwa yini kutsi lomfundzisi wenu adle kanye nebatselisi netoni?”
Jesu nakuva loko, wabaphendvula watsi: “Bantfu labaphilako abayidzingi inyanga, kodvwa ngulabagulako kuphela labayidzingako.
Kepha hambani nifundze kutsi kusho kutsini kutsi: ‘Ngifuna sihawu, hhayi umhlatjelo;’ ngobe angiketeli kubita labalungile kepha toni.”
Kusenjalo kwefika bafundzi baJohane uMbhabhatisi kuJesu batsi: “Kwentiwa yini kutsi tsine nebaFarisi sizile, kepha bafundzi bakho bangazili?”
Jesu watsi kubo: “Likhetfo lingakhala yini umkhwenyane asenalo? Kodvwa kutawufika sikhatsi lapho umkhwenyane atawususwa kulo, kube ngukhona-ke litawuzila.
“Kute umuntfu lochibela ingubo lendzala ngesichibi lesisha; ngobe lesichibi sitayidzabula lengubo, sente imbobo lenkhulu.

Kute nalongatsela liwayini lelisha kuso sikhumbasikhwama lesidzala, ngobe nakenta njalo, lesikhumbasikhwama singapumuka, kucitseke leliwayini. Esikhundleni saloko, liwayini lelisha litselwa kuso sikhumbasikhwama lesisha, kuze kutsi kokubili kuphatsane kahle.”
Watsi Jesu asakhuluma loko, kwefika umphatsi welisinagoge, waguca embikwakhe watsi: “Indvodzakati yami isandza kufa nyalo, kodvwa kota ubeke sandla sakho etikwayo, itawuphila!”
Jesu wasukuma wamlandzela, kanye nebafundzi bakhe.
ngobe abecabanga atsi: “Nangingamane nje ngitsintse umphetfo wengubo yakhe, ngitawusindza.”
Jesu wagucuka wambuka watsi: “Mani sibindzi, ndvodzakati, kukholwa kwakho kukuphilisile.” Kusukela kuleso sikhatsi lomfati waphila.
Kwatsi Jesu asefikile endlini yalomphatsi, abona bashayi bemintjingozi nesicuku lesijokotelako,
watsi: “Phumani nonkhe; lesidzandzane asikafi, silele.” Bamane bamhleka bulima nje.
Nase bakhishiwe bonkhe bantfu, Jesu wangena wasibamba ngesandla, sidzandzane savuka.
Lendzaba yandza nalo lonkhe lelo live.
Jesu asendlula lapho, timphumphutse letimbili tamlandzela, timemeta titsi: “Ndvodzana yaDavide! Sihawukele!”
Watsi kube Jesu angene endlini, letimphumphutse teta kuye, watsi kuto: “Niyakholwa yini kutsi ngingakwenta loku?”
Jesu watsintsa emehlo ato watsi: “Akwenteke kini njengekukholwa kwenu!”
Ase ayavuleka emehlo ato. Jesu watiyalisisa watsi: “Ningatjeli muntfu ngaloku!”
Kepha taphuma lapho, takhuluma ngaye kulo lonkhe lelo live.
Latsi kube likhishwe lelidimoni, lendvodza yase iyakhuluma. Bantfu bonkhe bamangala, baze batsi: “Akuzange sekubonwe lokunje ka-Israyeli!”
Nabona ticumbi tebantfu, inhlitiyo yakhe yagcwala sihawu, ngobe bebakhatsatekile bahlakatekile, banjengetimvu letite umelusi.
Ngako wase utsi kubafundzi bakhe: “Kuvuna kukhulu, kodvwa tisebenti timbalwa.
Ngako-ke ncusani eNkhosini yekuvuna kutsi itfumele tisebenti ekuvuneni kwayo!”
Nankha emabito ebaphostoli lababeli-12: Wekucala nguSimoni, lotsiwa nguPhetro, nemnakabo Andreya; Jakobe nemnakabo longuJohane, emadvodzana aZebedi;
Filiphu naBhatalomewu; Tomase naMatewu, umtselisi; Jakobe, umsa wa-Alfiyose, naThadiyosi;
Simoni, wephathi yemaKhenani, naJudasi Skariyothi lowatsengisa Jesu.
Jesu wawatfuma lamadvodza labeli-12 wawayala watsi: “Ningangeni eveni lebetive nasemitini yemaSamariya.
Esikhundleni saloko hambani niyewufuna timvu letilahlekile letisive sema-Israyeli.
Philisani labagulako, nivuse labafile, niphilise emalephelo, nikhiphe emadimoni. Nemukeliswe ngesihle, ngako-ke nani phanini ngesihle.
Ningayiphatsi imali, negolide, nesiliva, nemasenti emakhikhini enu.
Ningaphatsi ngisho nemgodla wendlela wekucela, nemabhantji lamabili, neticatfulo, nentfonga, ngobe sisebenti sifanelwe kudla kwaso.
“Naningena edolobheni nome emtini, nibofuna umuntfu lotimisele kunemukela, bese nihlala naye, nize nihambe kuleyo ndzawo.
Nangabe bantfu balowo muti banemukela, shiyani sibusiso senu sekuthula sihlale khona; kodvwa nangabe abanemukeli, sitsatseni lesibusiso senu sibuyele kini.
Kantsi futsi nangabe anemukelwa, nelivi lenu lingalalelwa, nibotsi naniphuma kulelo dolobha nome umuti, nitsintsitse lutfuli lwetinyawo tenu.
Ngicinisile, ngitsi kini: Kuyawuba ncono eveni laseSodoma nelaseGomora ngelilanga lekwehlulela kunakulowo muti.”
Kepha nicaphele bantfu, ngobe bayawunibopha banifake etinkantolo, banibhambabule emasinagogeni abo.
Niyawumiswa embikwebabusi nemakhosi ngelibito lami, kuze kube bufakazi kubo nakubetive.
Kepha-ke nabanimangalele, ningahlupheki ngekutsi niyawutsini nekutsi nikusho kanjani; ngobe nakufika leso sikhatsi, niyawunikwa lenifanele nikusho.
Ngobe akusini leniyakukhuluma, kepha nguMoya weYihlo wasezulwini loyawukhuluma ngani.
Niyawutondvwa bantfu bonkhe ngenca yelibito lami; kodvwa lokhutsatelako kuze kubesekupheleni, uyawusindziswa.
Nabanitingela kulelinye lidolobha, nibobalekela kulelinye; ngobe ngicinisile, ngitsi kini: Ningeke niwacedze onkhe emadolobha aka-Israyeli, iNdvodzana yemuntfu ingakabuyi.

Ngako-ke umfundzi kufanele eneliswe kutsi ufanana nemfundzisi wakhe, nenceku kufanele yeneliswe kutsi ifanana nenkhosi yayo. Nangabe inhloko yemuti kwatsiwa nguBhelzebule, emalunga alowo muti ayawubitwa ngemagama lamabi kakhulu!”
Loku lenginitjela kona lapha ekusitsekeni kukhulumeni ebaleni, naloku lenikuva etindlebeni kumemeteleni yonkhe indzawo.
Ningabesabi lababulala umtimba kodvwa babe bangeke bawubulale umphefumulo; lokungenani, mesabeni Yena, lokwati kubulala umtimba nemphefumulo kokubili esihogweni.
Abatsengwa yini boncedze lababili ngesenti? Noko kute nome munye longawa phansi afe ngaphandle kwemvume yeYihlo.
Kodvwa kini kubalwe ngisho netinwele tonkhe tenhloko yenu.
Ngako-ke ningesabi; ngobe nine nibaluleke kakhulu kunaboncedze labanyenti.”
Kodvwa lowo longiphika embikwebantfu, nami ngiyawumphika embikwaBabe losezulwini.”
Ngitele kuphambanisa indvodzana neyise, indvodzakati nenina, malukatane neninatala.
“Lotsandza uyise nome unina kwengca mine, akangifaneli; nalotsandza indvodzana yakhe nome indvodzakati yakhe kwengca mine, akangifaneli.
Lofuna kutfola imphilo yakhe, uyawulahlekelwa ngiyo; nalolahlekelwa yimphilo yakhe ngenca yami, uyakuyitfola.”
Lowemukela umphrofethi ngobe angumphrofethi, uyakutfola umvuzo wemphrofethi; nalowemukela lolungile ngobe angulolungile, uyakwemukela umvuzo walolungile.
Ngulowo nalowo loyawunatsisa abe munye kulaba labancane nome yinye nje inkomishi yemanti, ngobe angumfundzi wami, ngicinisile, ngitsi kini: Ngeke alahlekelwe ngumvuzo wakhe.”
Kwatsi kube Jesu acedze kuyala bafundzi bakhe labebali-12, wesuka lapho wayawufundzisa ashumayela emadolobheni akuleyo ndzawo.
Kwatsi-ke Johane uMbhabhatisi asesejele weva ngemisebenti yaKhristu, wase utfumela labanye bafundzi bakhe kuye.
Befike batsi kuye: “Wena unguye yini lona lotako, nome kusafanele silindzele lomunye?”
Jesu waphendvula watsi kubo: “Ncandzekani niyemtjela Johane ngako konkhe lenikuvako nalenikubonako:
Timphumphutse setiyabona, tinchute netishosha setiyahamba, emalephelo ayahlanteka, tihhulu setiyeva, labafile bayavuswa, neliVangeli seliyashunyayelwa kulabamphofu.
Kwatsi nasebancandzeka, Jesu wacala wakhuluma eticunjini ngaJohane watsi: “Nanisuka niya ehlane naniyewubonani kani? Naniyewubona umhlanga uveveteliswa ngumoya yini?
Kantsi nanisukele kuyawubonani, vele? Naniyewubona umuntfu lowembetse tingubo letinhle yini? Anati yini kutsi labanjalo basetindlini temakhosi?
Kodvwa vele nje, nanisukele kuyawubonani, umphrofethi? Yebo, empeleni nabona lomkhulu kakhulu kunemphrofethi.
“Ngicinisile, ngitsi kini: Kubo bonkhe labake baba khona emhlabeni kute lowake waba mkhulu kunaJohane uMbhabhatisi; kepha lomncane embusweni welizulu mkhulu kunaye.
Kusukela etikhatsini taJohane uMbhabhatisi kuze kube ngulamuhla umbuso welizulu uyaphangwa, nalabo labawuphangako bayawuhlwitsa.
Ngobe bonkhe baphrofethi nemtsetfo kwaphrofetha, kwaze kwefika Johane.
Nanivuma kukwemukela loko, ngu-Elija lona labetawufika.
“Konje ngingasifanisa nani nje lesitukulwane salamuhla? Sinjengebantfwana labasemakethe nabamemetana
batsi: ‘Sanishayela tigubhu, anigidzanga; sahlabela tingoma tesililo, kodvwa anikhalanga.’
Ngobe Johane wefika angadli, anganatsi, base batsi: ‘Unelidimoni.’

INdvodzana yeMuntfu yona yefika, yadla yanatsa, base batsi: ‘Ase nibheke, nansi indvodza! Simiti nemnatsi weliwayini, kantsi futsi ungumngani webatselisi netoni!’ Noko, kuhlakanipha kwaNkulunkulu kubonakala kuliciniso ngemiphumela yako.”
Jesu wase ucala kusola emadolobha, lekwakwenteke kuwo imisebenti yakhe yemandla leminyenti, ngobe abengaphendvuki.

Watsi: “Maye kuwe, Khorazini! Maye nakuwe, Bhethsayida! Ngobe kube lemisebenti yemandla lebeyenteke kini beyenteke eThire naseSidoni, ngabe kadze batitsela ngemlotsa bembatsa emasaka bakhombisa kuphendvuka.
Kepha ngitsi kini: Kuyawuba ncono kuyo iThire neSidoni kunakini ngelilanga lekwehlulela.
Kepha ngitsi kini: Kuyawuba ncono kulo live laseSodoma kunakuwe ngelilanga lekwehlulela.”
Yebo, Babe, ngobe kwaba kuhle ebusweni bakho kutsi kube njalo.
Bekani lijoko lami etikwenu, nifundze kimi, ngobe mine ngimnene, ngitfobekile ngenhlitiyo, khona niyawutfola kuphumula kwemiphefumulo yenu;
ngobe lijoko lami lilula, nemtfwalo wami awusindzi.”
Kepha baFarisi batsi nabakubona loko, batsi kuJesu: “Asubuke, labafundzi bakho benta lokungakavunyelwa kutsi kwentiwe ngeliSabatha.”
kutsi wangena endlini yaNkulunkulu wadla tinkhwa tekubekwa embikwaNkulunkulu, lebekungakafaneli kutsi tidliwe nguye, kanye nalabo labenabo, ngaphandle kwebaphristi kuphela?
Khona kantsi anikafundzi yini emtsetfweni kutsi ngeliSabatha baphristi bephula umtsetfo weliSabatha ngekusebenta ethempelini, babuye bangabi nacala?
Ngiyanitjela ngitsi: Lapha kukhona lokukhulu kunelithempeli.
Kepha kube benati kutsi kusho kutsini kutsi: ‘Ngifuna sihawu, hhayi umhlatjelo,’ ngabe anibalahlanga labo labangenalo licala.
Jesu wesuka lapho wangena esinagogeni labo.
Kwakukhona indvodza leyayinesandla lesasishwaphene, bambuta batsi: “Kuvunyelwe yini kutsi kuphiliswe ngeliSabatha?” Phela babentela kutsi batemmangalela.
Pho-ke, umuntfu ubaluleke kakhulu kanganani-ke kunemvu? Ngako-ke kuvunyelwe kwenta lokuhle ngeliSabatha.”
Ngako wase utsi kulendvodza: “Yelula sandla sakho.”
BaFarisi besuka lapho baphuma bayakwakha lisu lekumbulala.
Kepha Jesu asakwati loko, wesuka kuleyo ndzawo; labanyenti bamlandzela, wabaphilisa bonkhe.
Wabadvonsa ngendlebe kutsi bangatjeli muntfu ngaye,
kuze kugcwaliseke loko lokwashiwo ngemphrofethi Isaya nakatsi:
Tonkhe ticumbi tebantfu tamangala, tatsi: “Akusiyo yini indvodzana yaDavide lena?”
Kepha Jesu ayati imicabango yabo, watsi kubo: “Wonkhe umbuso lowehlukene ekhatsi, uyacitseka. Kute lidolobha nome likhaya lelingema nalehlukene ekhatsi.
Ngako-ke nangabe Sathane akhipha Sathane, kusho kutsi yena yedvwa wehlukene ekhatsi. Pho, umbuso wakhe ungema njani?
Nanitsi mine ngikhipha emadimoni ngaBhelzebule, pho, emadvodzana enu awakhipha ngabani? Ngako-ke ngiwo layakuba bagwebi benu.
Kepha nangabe ngikhipha emadimoni ngaMoya waNkulunkulu, kusho kutsi umbuso waNkulunkulu sewufikile-ke kini.
“Futsi umuntfu angangena kanjani endlini yesichwaga, atsatse timphahla taso, ngaphandle kwekubopha lesichwaga kucala; bese-ke uchwaga lendlu?
Ngaloko-ke ngitsi kini: Bantfu bayawutsetselelwa tonkhe tono kanye nekuhlambalata, kepha kuhlambalata Moya Longcwele kungeke kutsetselelwe.
Wonkhe lokhuluma kabi ngeNdvodzana yeMuntfu uyawutsetselelwa; kodvwa lokhuluma kabi ngaMoya Longcwele, angeke atsetselelwe, kuleli nakulelitako.”
Nine, ntalo yetinyoka, ningakukhuluma kanjani lokuhle nine nibabi kangaka nje? Ngobe umlomo ukhuluma loko lokugcwele enhlitiyweni.
Umuntfu lolungile ukhipha lokulungile engungwini yakhe lelungile; nemuntfu lomubi ukhipha lokubi engungwini yakhe lembi.
“Kepha ngiyanitjela ngitsi: Ngelilanga lekwehlulela, bantfu bayawutilandza ngawo onkhe emagama lalite labawakhulumako.
Ngobe ngemavi akho uyawutfolakala umsulwa, nangemavi akho uyawulahlwa.”
Njengobe naJona ahlala emalanga lamatsatfu nebusuku lobutsatfu esiswini semkhoma, kanjalo futsi neNdvodzana yeMuntfu iyawuhlala emalanga lamatsatfu nebusuku lobutsatfu ematfunjini emhlaba.
Bantfu baseNineve bayakusukuma kanye nalesitukulwane ekwehlulelweni basilahle, ngobe bona baphendvuka ngekushunyayelwa nguJona; ase nibuke-ke, ngobe lapha kukhona lomkhulu kunaJona.

Indlovukazi yaseningizimu iyawusukuma kanye nalesitukulwane ekwehlulelweni, isilahle, ngobe yesuka emikhawulweni yemhlaba yatawulalela kuhlakanipha kwaSolomoni; ase nibuke-ke, ngobe lapha kukhona lomkhulu kunaSolomoni!”
“Umoya lomubi nawuphumile kumuntfu, uhamba udzabule tindzawo letomile ufuna kuphumula, ungakutfoli,
ubese utsi: ‘Ngitawubuyela endlini yami, lapho ngiphume khona.’ Nawufika khona, ukhandze kungenalutfo, kutsanyelisisiwe, konkhe kubekwe ngabolonina,

ubese uyahamba ulandze leminye imimoya lesikhombisa lemibi kakhulu kunawo, ite ingene ihlale khona. Ngako siphetfo salowo muntfu siyawuba sibi kakhulu kunesimo sakhe sekucala. Kuyawuba njalo nakulesitukulwane lesibi.”
Watsi asakhuluma eticukwini, kwabonakala unina waJesu nabomnakabo beme ngephandle bafuna kukhuluma naye.
Lomunye walabantfu watsi kuye: “Nangu unyoko nabomnakenu beme ngephandle, bafuna kukhuluma nawe.”]
Kepha yena waphendvula watsi: “Ngubani make? Bobani bomnaketfu?”
Wase ukhomba bafundzi bakhe utsi: “Bukani la; nangu make nabomnaketfu!
Ngobe lowo lowenta intsandvo yaBabe losezulwini, nguye longumnaketfu, nadzadzewetfu, namake.”
Ngalo lelo langa Jesu waphuma endlini wayawuhlala ngaselwandle.
Sicumbi sebantfu sasondzela kuye samtungeleta, bantfu baba banyenti kangangekutsi wangena esikebheni wahlala ekhatsi, bantfu bema elusentseni.
Wabatjela tintfo letinyenti ngemifanekiso, watsi: “Bekukhona umuntfu lowahamba wayawuhlanyela.
Ekuhlanyeleni kwakhe lenye inhlanyelo yawela endleleni, kwefika tinyoni tayidla tayicedza.
Kepha lenye yawela emhlabatsini losemadvwaleni, yasheshe yamila, ngobe yayite umhlabatsi lowenele.
Latsi ngekuphuma lilanga lahashula titfombo tabuna, ngenca yekutsi tatite timphandze letijulile.
Lenye inhlanyelo yawela emanyeveni, yamila; emanyeva akhula aminyetela titfombo.
Kodvwa lenye yawela emhlabatsini lovundzile, yatsela titselo: lenye ngelikhulu, lenye ngema-60, lenye ngema-30.
Kwase kufika bafundzi bakhe kuye batsi: “Ukhulumelani kubo ngemifanekiso?”
Wabaphendvula watsi: “Nine ninikiwe lwati lwetimfihlakalo tembuso welizulu, kodvwa bona abakanikwa.
Ngobe lowo lonako uyawunikwa kube kunyenti, kodvwa lowo lote uyakwemukwa naloko lokuncane lanako.
Kungako nje ngikhuluma kubo ngemifanekiso, ngobe nome babuka ababoni, nome beva abevisisi, abacondzi.
Ngobe ngicinisile, ngitsi kini: Banyenti baprofethi nebantfu labalungile lababefisa kubona loku lenikubonako, kodvwa abazange bakubone; futsi babefisa kuva loku lenikuvako, kodvwa abazange bakuve.”
Bantfu labatsi nabeva livi lembuso kepha bangete balicondza, bayaye befikelwe nguLomubi, abemuke loko bekuhlanyelwe etinhlitiyweni tabo: loko-ke kusho inhlanyelo leyayihlanyelwe endleleni.
Kuhlanyelwa kwenhlanyelo emhlabatsini losemadvwaleni kusho labo labalivako livi lembuso balemukele masinyane ngekujabula.
Kepha ngekubate timphandze letijulile etinhlitiyweni tabo, bahlala sikhashana nje. Kutsi kungavela tinhlupheko nome kutingelwa ngenca yelivi, bese bahlubuka masinyane.
Kuhlanyelwa kwenhlanyelo emanyeveni kusho labalivako livi lembuso, kodvwa tinhlupheko macondzana nalemphilo nelutsandvo lwebunjinga kuyaye kuliminyetele livi bangabe basatsela titselo.
Lena leyayihlanyelwe emhlabatsini lovundzile ifanekisa lowo lolivako livi, alicondze, bese utsela titselo: lomunye ngelikhulu, lomunye ngema-60, nalomunye ngema-30.”
Lomunye umfanekiso lawubeka utsi: “Umbuso welizulu ufanana nendvodza leyahamba yayawuhlanyela inhlanyelo lenhle ensimini yayo.
Kepha ebusuku, bantfu sebalele bonkhe, kwefika sitsa sayo sahlanyela lukhula emkhatsini walamabele, sesuka sahamba.
Latsi kube likhule likhaba litsele titselo, kwase kubonakala lukhula.
Tisebenti talendvodza teta kuyo tatsi: ‘Mnumzane, njengobe wawuhlanyele inhlanyelo lenhle ensimini yakho, pho, lolukhula luphumaphi?’
Lendvodza yaphendvula yatsi: ‘Loko kwentiwa sitsa.’ Tase tiyabuta titsi: ‘Uyafuna yini siyeluzuphuna lolukhula?’
Kodvwa yena watsi: ‘Cha, ngobe nitawutsi nizuphuna lukhula, kantsi senizuphuna nalamabele.

Yekelani nje kukhule kokubili ndzawonye, kuze kube sikhatsi sekuvuna, kuvunwe; nasekuvunwa ngitawutjela labavunako kutsi babutse lukhula kucala, balubophe tincumbi, kuze lutewushiswa; bese-ke nibutsela emabele ndzawonye esiteni sami.’ ”
Yona yincane kakhulu, kepha naseyikhulile iba yinkhulu kunato tonkhe tihlahla, kudzimate kufike netinyoni temoya, takhele tidleke tato emagaleni aso.”
Konkhe loku Jesu wakukhuluma esicukwini ngemifanekiso. Ngaphandle kwemifanekiso kute lakukhuluma kuso,
kuze kugcwaliseke loko lokwakhulunywa ngemprofethi kutsi:
Jesu wesuka lapho watishiya ticumbi, wangena endlini. Bafundzi bakhe beta kuye, befika batsi: “Ase usichasisele lomfanekiso ngelukhula ensimini kutsi usho kutsini.”
Yena wabaphendvula watsi: “Lona lowahlanyela inhlanyelo lenhle yiNdvodzana yeMuntfu.
Insimi ngulomhlaba, inhlanyelo lenhle bantfwana bembuso, kepha lukhula bantfwana baLomubi.
Sitsa lesahlanyela lukhula nguSathane. Kuvuna kusho siphetfo saletikhatsi, bavuni-ke tingilosi.
“Ngako-ke njengobe lukhula lwabutfwa lwashiswa, kuyawuba njalo nasekupheleni kwelive.
INdvodzana yeMuntfu iyawutfumela tingilosi tayo tiyewubutsa tikhiphe konkhe lokubanga kona nabo bonkhe benti balokubi embusweni wayo,
tibalahle emlilweni lowesabekako, lapho bayawukhala kudzimate kugedletele ematinyo.
Lapho bantfu baNkulunkulu bayawukhanya njengelilanga embusweni weYise.
“Futsi umbuso welizulu ufanana nemtsengi labefuna ematje laligugu lelikhulu.
Watsi kube alitfole lelinye lawo lelalidule kakhulu, wase uyahamba wayawutsengisa ngako konkhe lanako, wabuyela wayawulitsenga.”
Latsi nase ligcwele, badwebi balidvonsela elusentseni lwelwandle bahlala phansi, behlukanisa letinhlanti. Letinhle batifaka etitjeni, kwatsi letimbi batilahla.
Kuyawuba njalo ekupheleni kwelive, kuyawuphuma tingilosi tikhiphe lababi emkhatsini walabalungile,
tibajike emlilweni lowesabekako, lapho bantfu bayawukhala kakhulu bagedletelise nematinyo.”
Jesu wababuta watsi: “Nikuve kahle yini konkhe loku?”
Wase utsi kubo: “Ngako-ke wonkhe umfundzisi wemtsetfo loba ngumfundzi embusweni welizulu, unjengemnikati wemuti lokhipha engcebeni yakhe lokusha nalokudzala.”
Watsi Jesu nasacedzile ngalemifanekiso, wase uyesuka kuleyo ndzawo.
Wabuyela edolobheni lakubo. Wabafundzisa esinagogeni labo, bamangala badzimate batsi: “Lomuntfu wakutfolaphi lokuhlakanipha lokungaka, nalemisebenti yemandla?
Akusiyo yini indvodzana yembati le? Unina akusiye yini lona lekutsiwa nguMariya, bomnakabo akusibo yini boJakobe, naJosefa, naSimoni, naJudasi?
Bodzadzewabo bona akusibo yini laba labahlala natsi?
Kepha Jesu watsi: “Umprofethi uhlonishwa nome kukuphi, ngaphandle kwasendzaweni yakubo, nakubantfu bakubo.”
Akazange ayente imisebenti yemandla leminyenti lapho ngenca yekungakholwa kwabo.
Kwaba nguleso sikhatsi lapho Herodi, inkhosi yaseGalile, eva umbiko ngaJesu.
Watsi etisebentini takhe: “Lona nguJohane uMbhabhatisi. Sewuvukile ekufeni. Ngiko nje lamandla asebenta kuye.”
Ngobe Johane abetsi kuye: “Akukalungi kutsi wena umtsatse!”
Herodi abefuna kumbulala, kodvwa wesaba bantfu, ngobe bebamtsatsa ngekutsi ngumphrofethi.
Kwatsi ngelilanga lekutalwa kwaHerodi indvodzakati yaHerodiyasi yeta yagidza embikwetivakashi tonkhe. Herodi wajabula kangangekutsi
wayetsembisa watsi: “Ngiyafunga kutsi ngitakunika nome ngabe yini loyicelako!”
Yona seyitjelwe ngunina yatsi: “Ngiphe inhloko yaJohane uMbhabhatisi ibekwe emgcwembeni.”
Inkhosi yadzabuka kakhulu, kepha ngenca yesifungo sayo lebeseyisentile embikwabo bonkhe lebeyihleti nabo ekudleni, yayaleta kutsi inikwe njengekufisa kwayo.
Ngako-ke kwatfunyelwa, Johane wajutjwa inhloko ejele.
Inhloko yakhe yaletfwa ngemgcwembe, yanikwa intfombatana, yona yabe seyiyimikisa kunina.
Bafundzi baJohane beta, basitsatsa sidvumbu sakhe, basingcwaba; base bayahamba bayawubikela Jesu.

Watsi kube Jesu ayive lendzaba, wesuka kuleyo ndzawo wakhwela sikebhe, wewela waya endzaweni lete bantfu afuna kuba yedvwana. Bantfu batsi kube bakuve loko, baphuma emitini yabo bamlandzela ngetinyawo.
Jesu watsi uyehla esikebheni, wabona sicumbi lesikhulu sebantfu, waba nesihawu nabo. Wabaphilisa bonkhe lababegula.
Kepha Jesu watsi kubo: “Akudzingeki kutsi bahambe, bapheni nine kudla, badle.”
Batsi kuye: “Asinalutfo lapha ngaphandle kwetinkhwa letisihlanu netinhlanti letimbili.”

Jesu wase utjela bantfu kutsi bahlale phansi etjanini, watsatsa letinkhwa letisihlanu naletinhlanti letimbili, wabuka etulu, wabusisa. Wahlephula tinkhwa wanika bafundzi bakhe, bona base bemukelisa leticumbi.
Bonkhe bantfu badla, besutsa. Bafundzi babutsa timvutfuluka, tacwaba emabhasikidi lali-12.
Bantfu lababedla kwakungemadvodza labengacishe abe ti-5 000 ngaphandle kwebafati nebantfwana.
Jesu wase utjela bafundzi bakhe kutsi bangene esikebheni bahambe embili bewelele ngesheya, yena wasale akhulula ticumbi tebantfu.
Watsi asatihambisile ticumbi, wenyukela entsabeni yedvwa wayawuthandaza, kwadzimate kwahlwa solo ayedvwa kuleyo ndzawo.
Sikebhe satsi sesihambe emakhilometha lamanyenti kusuka elusentseni, sashukunyiswa ngemagagasi, ngobe umoya bewuphambene nabo.
Kwatsi ekuseni kuseluvivi Jesu weta kubo ahamba etikwemanti.
Batsi kube bambone ahamba etikwemanti, bafundzi besaba kakhulu, betfuka bamemeta ngekwesaba batsi: “Sipoko!”
Jesu washesha wakhuluma kubo watsi: “Ningesabi, manini sibindzi, ngimi!”
Phetro wamphendvula watsi: “Nkhosi, nakunguwe, ngibite ngite lapho kuwe, ngihamba etikwemanti!”
Jesu watsi: “Kota!” Ngako Phetro wehla esikebheni waya kuJesu ahamba etikwemanti.
Kodvwa watsi kube abone umoya kutsi unemandla, wesaba; asacwila wakhala watsi: “Nkhosi! Ngisindzise!”
Labo labebasesikebheni bamkhotsamela batsi: “Ngempela wena uyiNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu!”
Batsi nase bewelele ngesheya, befika eveni laseGenesaretha.
Atsi kube emadvodza aleyo ndzawo ambone atfumela tigijimi kulo lonkhe lelo live. Bantfu baletsa kuye bonkhe labebagula.
Bamncenga kutsi sale batsintsa nje umphetfo wengubo yakhe. Bonkhe labawutsintsa baphiliswa.
Kwatsi baFarisi netati temtsetfo beta kuJesu besuka eJerusalema, bambuta batsi:
“Kwentiwa yini kutsi bafundzi bakho bangalihloniphi lisiko lalabadzala? Ngobe abatigezi tandla tabo ngendlela lefanele nase batakudla.”
Kepha yena waphendvula watsi: “Nine nentiwa yini kutsi ningawuhloniphi umtsetfo waNkulunkulu ngenca yemasiko enu?
Ngobe Nkulunkulu watsi: ‘Hlonipha uyihlo nenyoko,’ nekutsi: ‘Wonkhe lokhuluma kabi ngeyise nome ngenina, ufanele afe nekufa.’
Kepha nine nifundzisa nitsi: ‘Nangabe umuntfu atjela uyise nome unina atsi: “Loko lengabe ukutfole kimi, sekunikelwe kuNkulunkulu,”
akusadzingeki kumhlonipha uyise nome unina.’ Kanjalo nilente laba lite livi laNkulunkulu, nase nilandzela emasiko enu.
Batentisi, waphrofetha kahle ngani Isaya nakatsi:
Jesu wase uyababita bantfu watsi: “Lalelani, nive kahle!
Akusiko lokungena emloyeni lokumngcolisako umuntfu, kodvwa ngulokuphuma emlonyeni loku lokumngcolisako.”
Bafundzi bakhe beta kuye batsi: “Uyati yini kutsi loku lokushito kubaphatse kabi emoyeni baFarisi?”
Jesu waphendvula watsi: “Sonkhe sitfombo lesingazange sihlanyelwe nguBabe losezulwini siyawuzishunwa.
Bayekeleni, ngobe ngibo baholi labatimphumphutse; kepha nangabe imphumphutse ihola lenye imphumphutse, totimbili tiyawuwela emgodzini.”
Phetro waphendvula watsi: “Sitjele kutsi usho kutsini lomfanekiso!”
Watsi yena: “Hhawu, kantsi nani nisengakabi nakuva?
Anikaboni nanyalo kutsi konkhe lokungena ngemlomo kuya esiswini, nakhona kufike kwendlule kuphindze kuphume?
Kodvwa loko lokuphuma ngemlomo kusuke kusuka enhlitiyweni, futsi nguko lokumngcolisako umuntfu.
Ngobe enhlitiyweni kuvela imicabango lemibi, nekubulala, nekuphinga, nebugwadla, nekuba, nekucalemanga, nekuhlambalata.
Nguleto-ke tintfo letimngcolisako umuntfu, kodvwa kudla ngetandla letingakagezwa akumngcolisi umuntfu.”
Jesu wesuka lapho, waya etindzaweni tangaseThire naseSidoni.
Umfati labengumKhenani wakuyo leyo ndzawo weta kuJesu akhala atsi: “Ngihawukele, Nkhosi! Ndvodzana yaDavide! Indvodzakati yami iphetfwe lidimoni kabi.”
Kodvwa Jesu akazange amphendvule. Bafundzi bakhe base basondzela kuye batsi: “Mcoshe lomfati! Ngobe nangu solomane uyasilandzela uyakhala.”
Kepha lomfati wasondzela, waguca embikwakhe, watsi: “Nkhosi, ngisite!”
Jesu wamphendvula watsi: “Akukalungi kutsi kudla kwebantfwana kulahlwe etinjeni.”
Umfati waphendvula watsi: “Yebo, Nkhosi, ucinisile, kodvwa netinja tiyawatfola emavutfuluka lasele kubanikati bato.”
Jesu wesuka lapho, waya ngaseLwandle lwaseGalile. Wenyukela entsabeni, wefika wahlala phansi.
Ticumbi letikhulu teta kuye, tiletse tinchute netingini, netimphumphutse, netimungulu, netigulane letinyenti. Tabekwa embikwakhe; watiphilisa tonkhe.
Ngako ticumbi tamangala natibona timungulu tikhuluma, tingini tiphelele, tinchute tihamba, netimphumphutse tibona; tase tidvumisa Nkulunkulu wema-Israyeli.

Jesu wabita bafundzi bakhe watsi: “Ngiyabadzabukela labantfu, ngobe sengemalanga lamatsatfu banatsi lapha, bangenalutfo labangahle baludle. Angitsandzi kubahambisa balambile, funa bacaleke endleleni.”
Bafundzi bakhe batsi kuye: “Konje lapha ehlane singakutfolaphi nje kudla lokungenela lesicumbi sebantfu lesingaka?”
Jesu wase utjela lesicumbi sebantfu kutsi asihlale phansi.
Watsatsa letinkhwa letisikhombisa netinhlanti, wabonga, watihlephula watinika bafundzi, bona banika bantfu.
Badla bonkhe, besutsa. Bafundzi babutsa timvutfuluka letatisele nabadlako, bagcwalisa emabhasikidi lasikhombisa.
Bantfu labadla lapho kwakungemadvodza lati-4 000 ngaphandle kwebafati nebantfwana.
Kwatsi Jesu nasatihambisile leticumbi tebantfu, wangena esikebheni, wewelela ngesheya eveni laseMagadani.
Kepha yena wabaphendvula watsi: “Nalishonako lilanga, niyaye nitsi: ‘Litawubalela, ngobe sibhakabhaka sibhejile.’
Nasekuseni niye nitsi: ‘Lamuhla litakuna, ngobe sibhakabhaka sibhejile sinemafu.’ Niyakwati kuchaza simo sesibhakabhaka, kepha anikwati kuchaza tibonakaliso tesikhatsi?
Situkulwane lesibi nalesiphingako ngekungetsembeki kuNkulunkulu sifuna sibonakaliso, kepha ngeke sisitfole ngisho nasinye ngaphandle kwesibonakaliso saJona.”
Batsi nabewelela ngesheya kwelwandle, bafundzi bakhohlwa kuphatsa sinkhwa.
Jesu watsi kubo: “Nibocaphela, ningangenwa yimbiliso yebaFarisi nebaSadusi!”
Base bakhuluma bodvwana batsi: “Usho ngobe asikatiphatsi tinkhwa.”
Kepha Jesu akwati loko watsi kubo: “Nine bantfu bekukholwa lokuncane, nentiwa yini kutsi nikhulumisane nodvwana ngekutsi kwentiwa ngobe nite tinkhwa?
Anikeva namanje? Anikhumbuli yini mhlazana ngihlephula tinkhwa letisihlanu, letesutsisa emadvodza lati-5 000, nekutsi ngacwalisa emabhasikidi lamangaki?
Tona letinkhwa letisikhombisa letesutsisa emadvodza lati-4 000, niyatikhumbula yini? Nagcwalisa emabhasikidi lamangaki?
Aniboni ngani kutsi bengingakhulumi kini ngesinkhwa? Kepha caphelani imbiliso yebaFarisi nebaSadusi!”
Base bayabona bafundzi kutsi abengasho yona imbiliso yesinkhwa, kepha abesho timfundziso tebaFarisi nebaSadusi.
Jesu wesuka lapho, waya eveni lelisedvute nelidolobha laseKhesariya Filiphi, lapho afike wabuta bafundzi bakhe watsi: “Bantfu batsi iNdvodzana yeMuntfu ingubani?”
Ngiyawukunika tikhiya tembuso wasezulwini; lotakubopha lapha emhlabeni kuyawube kuboshiwe nasezulwini; nako konkhe lotakukhulula lapha emhlabeni kuyawube kukhululiwe nasezulwini.”
Ngako wabayalisisa bafundzi bakhe kutsi bangatjeli muntfu kutsi unguKhristu.
Phetro wase umdvonsela eceleni wamekhuta watsi: “Nkhosi, Nkulunkulu akakusite, loku kungete kwenteka kuwe!”
Lofuna kusindzisa imphilo yakhe, uyawulahlekelwa ngiyo; kepha lolahlekelwa yimphilo yakhe ngelibito lami, uyawuyitfola.
Ngobe kuyawumsita ngani umuntfu kutfola live lonkhe, kepha alahlekelwe ngumphefumulo wakhe? Ingabe angakhiphani umuntfu kuhlenga umphefumulo wakhe?
Ngobe iNdvodzana yeMuntfu iyawufika ngenkhatimulo yeYise, ikanye netingilosi tayo, ngulapho-ke iyawukhokhela wonkhe umuntfu njengekwenta kwakhe.
Ngicinisile, ngitsi kini: Kukhona labanye la emkhatsini wenu labangeyikuva kufa, badzimate bayibone iNdvodzana yeMuntfu ita embusweni wayo.”
Jesu wagucuka lesinye simo embikwabo, buso bakhe bakhatimula njengelilanga, tingubo takhe taba mhlophe njengekukhanya.
BoMosi na-Elija babonakala kubo, bakhuluma naye.
Ngako Phetro watsi kuJesu: “Nkhosi, kuhle lokuba lapha kwetfu; nawutsandza ngitakwakha emathende lamatsatfu lapha: lelinye libe lakho, lelinye libe laMosi, lelinye libe la-Elija.”
Batsi nabeva loko, bafundzi bawa phansi ngebuso besaba kakhulu.
Kepha Jesu weta kubo, wafike wabatsintsa watsi: “Sukumani, ningesabi!”
Kepha batsi nabaphakamisa emehlo abo, bangete babona muntfu ngaphandle kwaJesu yedvwa.
Basehla kulentsaba Jesu wabadvonsa ngendlebe, watsi: “Ningatjeli muntfu ngalombono leniwubonile, kuze kuvuswe iNdvodzana yeMuntfu kulabafile.”
Jesu wabaphendvula watsi: “Empeleni Elija uyeta, uyawubuyisela konkhe esimeni sako.
Kepha ngitsi kini: Elija sewefika, kuphela nje kutsi bantfu abazange bamati, kodvwa benta kuye konkhe labakutsandzako. Kanjalo-ke neNdvodzana yeMuntfu iyawuhlushwa ngabo.”
Ngako bafundzi base bayabona kutsi abekhuluma kubo ngaJohane uMbhabhatisi.
Kwatsi nabefika esicunjini sebantfu, kwefika indvodza yaguca embikwaJesu,
yatsi: “Nkhosi, hawukela indvodzana yami, ngobe inesitfutfwane, ihlupheka kabi, iwela futsi emlilweni nasemantini.
Ngiyiletse kubafundzi bakho, kodvwa behluleka kuyiphilisa.”
Jesu waphendvula watsi: “Yehheni, situkulwane lesingakholwa nalesiphambene, kuyawudzimate kube ngunini nginani? Kuyawudzimate kube ngunini nginibeketelela? Yiletseni la kimi!”
Jesu walekhuta lelidimoni, lomfana waphila ngaleso sikhatsi.
Bafundzi base beta kuJesu ngasense, bafike bambuta batsi: “Kwentiwe yini kutsi tsine sehluleke kulikhipha lelidimoni?”
Kepha loluhlobo aluphumi ngaphandle kwekukhuleka nekuzila.]”
batayibulala, kodvwa ngelilanga lesitsatfu iyawuvuswa ekufeni.” Badzabuka kakhulu.
Ngesikhatsi Phetro angena endlini, Jesu wambuta kucala watsi: “Simoni, ngembono wakho wena utsini? Emakhosi emhlaba ayitsatsa kubobani imitselo? Ayitsatsa emadvodzaneni awo yini, nome ebafokatini?”
Jesu wase utsi: “Ngako-ke kusho kutsi emadvodzana akhululekile ekutseleni.

Kodvwa-ke kuze singabakhubi, hamba uye elwandle ufike ujike lidweba lakho udwebe. Leyo nhlanti lotayibamba kucala emlonyeni wayo uyawukhandza luhlavu lwemali; ulutsatse, ubanike, utselele mine nawe, sobabili.”
Wase ubita umntfwana, wammisa emkhatsini wabo
watsi: “Ngicinisile, ngitsi kini: Naningaphendvuki nibe njengebantfwana, ningeke ningene embusweni welizulu.
Ngako-ke wonkhe muntfu loyawutitfoba njengalomntfwana, nguye lomkhulu embusweni welizulu.
Nalowo lowemukela umntfwana lonje egameni lami, wemukela mine.”
Maye kulomhlaba ngekutsi kukhona tikhubekiso, ngobe tikhubekiso kufanele kutsi tibe khona, kodvwa maye kulowo muntfu letita ngaye!
Futsi nangabe liso lakho likonisa, likupulute ulilahle khashane, kuncono kuwe kungena ekuphileni uneliso linye, kunekutsi ube nemehlo omabili, kantsi utawulahlwa esihogweni semlilo.”
“Caphelani ningedzeleli ngisho namunye kulaba labancane; ngobe ngitsi kini: Tingilosi tabo ezulwini tibubona njalo buso baBabe losezulwini.
“Nitsini-ke? Nangabe umuntfu anetimvu letilikhulu, bese kulahleka yinye yato, angeke yini atishiye leti letingema-99 tidla eceleni, ahambe yena ayewufuna lena lelahlekile?
Nginitjela ngitsi: Nakayitfola, utfokota kakhulu ngayo kunaleti letingema-99 lebetingakalahleki.
Kanjalo-ke akusiyo intsandvo yeYihlo losezulwini kutsi kubhubhe nome ngabe munye kulaba labancane.”
Kodvwa nangakulaleli, tsatsa lomunye nome babili bantfu uye kuye, kuze kutsi ‘yonkhe inkhulumo yenu ibe nabofakazi lababili nome labatsatfu,’ njengobe kusho umBhalo.
Kodvwa nangabalaleli nabo, yonkhe lendzaba yetfule ebandleni. Kantsi, nangabe akalilaleli nelibandla, sale sewumtsatsa njengemfokati nome njengemtselisi.”
“Ngobe lapho kuhlangene khona lababili nome labatsatfu egameni lami, nami ngikhona emkhatsini wabo.”
Jesu watsi kuye: “Angisho kuwe kutsi kube kasikhombisa, kodvwa kuze kube ngemahlandla langema-70 laphindvwe kasikhombisa.
Ngako-ke umbuso welizulu ufanana nenkhosi, leyayifuna kutsi tonkhe tisebenti letatiyikweleda tisale setiyikhipha yonkhe imali yayo.
Kwekucala kwaletfwa embikwayo lesasiyikweleda emaRandi latigidzi letinyenti.
Kepha ngobe sasite lutfo lwekukhokha lesikwelede, lenkhosi yatsi akutsengiswe ngaso, nangemkaso, nangebantfwabaso, kanye nangako konkhe lesasinako, kuze kutewukhokhwa lesikwelede.
Lesisebenti sase siwa phansi sikhotsamela lenkhosi sadzimate satsi: ‘Ase umane ungibeketelele, ngitawusikhokha sonkhe lesikwelede sami.’
Inkhosi yaleso sisebenti yaba nesihawu, yasesula sonkhe leso sikwelede, yasikhulula.
“Kepha satsi siphuma nje leso sisebenti, sahlangana nalesinye sisebenti lesasikanye naso, lesasisikweleda emaRandi lalishumi. Sasibamba sasekhama, satsi: ‘Khipha imali yami!’
Lesisebenti sawa phansi satincengela satsi: ‘Ase umane ungibeketelele, ngitakubhadala.’
Kepha sona sala, sahamba sayawusifaka ejele, size siyikhokhe.
“Letinye tisebenti letatikanye naso natikubona loko, tadzabuka kakhulu, taya tayawubikela inkhosi yato konkhe lokwase kwentekile.
“Inkhosi yaso yasibita yatsi kuso: ‘Sisebenti lesibi, lonkhe lelicala lesikwelede ngikutsetselele ngalesula ngobe ungincengile.
Pho, wena awukasihawukeli ngani lesisebenti lesikanye nawe, njengobe nami ngikuhawukele?’
“Inkhosi yaso yatfukutsela yabila yasinikela kubaphatsi belijele, size sikhokhe sonkhe sikwelede.
Kwatsi Jesu asacedze kukhuluma, wesuka eGalile waya eveni laseJudiya, ngesheya kwemfula iJordane.
Ticumbi letikhulu tebantfu tamlandzela, watiphilisa khona lapho.
Labanye baFarisi beta kuye bamlinga batsi: “Kuvunyelwe yini kutsi indvodza idivose umkayo nome ngasiphi sizatfu?”
Watsi: ‘Ngenca yaloko-ke indvodza iyawushiya uyise nenina inamatsele kumkayo, labo-ke bobabili sebayawuba nyamanye.’
Ngako-ke abasebabili, kodvwa sebamunye. Ngako-ke loko lakuhlanganisile Nkulunkulu, akungabe kusehlukaniswa ngumuntfu.”
Jesu watsi kubo: “Mosi waninika imvume yekudivosa nebafati benu ngenca yebulukhuni betinhlitiyo tenu. Kodvwa kwakungenjalo kusukela ekucaleni.
Kodvwa ngitsi kini: Wonkhe umuntfu lodivosa umkakhe ngaphandle kwanakaphingile, bese ushada lomunye umfati, uyaphinga; naloshada umfati lodivosiwe uyaphinga.”
Bafundzi bakhe batsi kuye: “Nangabe injalo kantsi indzaba yendvodza nemfati, kuncono kungashadi.”
Kepha watsi kubo: “Akusibo bonkhe labangalemukela lelivi, ngaphandle kwalabo labakuphiwe.

Ngobe kukhona batsenwa labatalwa banjalo kwasetiswini tabonina; kukhona nebatsenwa labatsenwa bantfu; kukhona futsi nebatsenwa labatitsena bona ngenca yembuso welizulu. Lowo longakhona kukwemukela loko, akakwemukele!”
Kwase kuletfwa bantfwana kuJesu, kuze atewubeka tandla etikwabo, abathandazele; kepha bafundzi bakhe babekhuta labo bantfu.
Jesu watsi: “Vumelani bantfwana bete kimi, ningabaleli, ngobe umbuso welizulu ungewalabanjalo.”
Kwase kufika lijaha lelitsite kuJesu latsi: “Mfundzisi, ngingahle ngenteni lokulungile kuze ngitewuba nekuphila lokuphakadze?”
Jesu watsi kulo: “Ungibutelani ngalokulungile? Munye kuphela lolungile. Kepha nawutsandza kungena ekuphileni, gcina imiyalo!”
Labuta latsi: “Miphi?” Jesu waliphendvula watsi: “Ungabulali; ungaphingi; ungebi; ungafakazi emanga;
hlonipha uyihlo nenyoko; utsandze makhelwane wakho njengobe utitsandza wena.”
Lelijaha laphendvula latsi: “Konkhe loku ngikugcinile, manje yini lesasele?”
Lelijaha nalikuva loko, lahamba lidzabukile, ngobe belicebe kakhulu.
Kepha Jesu watsi kubafundzi bakhe: “Ngicinisile, ngitsi kini: Kulukhuni kumuntfu lonjinge kakhulu kungena embusweni welizulu.
Futsi ngitsi kini: Kulula kutsi likamela lingene embotjeni yenyalitsi, kunekutsi umuntfu lonjingile angene embusweni waNkulunkulu.”
Batsi nabakuva loko bafundzi, bamangala batsi: “Pho, ngubani-ke longasindziswa?”
Wonkhe lodzele tindlu, nome bomnakabo, nome bodzadzewabo, nome uyise, nome unina, nome bantfwana, nome emasimi ngenca yami, uyakwemukela ngalokuphindvwe kanyenti, adle nelifa lekuphila lokuphakadze.
Kodvwa labanyenti lababekucala bayawuba bekugcina, nalababekugcina bayawuba bekucala.”
“Umbuso welizulu ufanana nemnikati wesivini, lowaphuma ekuseni ayawucasha emadvodza ekusebenta esivinini sakhe.
Watsi asavumelene naletisebenti kutsi utatiholela denariyo munye ngelilanga, wase ubatfumela esivinini sakhe,
watsi uyaphuma futsi ngeli-awa lemfica, wabona lamanye emadvodza emile nje emakethe ayingilekile,
nakuwo watsi: ‘Hambani nani niyewusebenta esivinini sami, ngitaniholela loko lokunifanele.’ Bahamba-ke.
Waphindze waphuma futsi emini ngeli-awa leli-12, kwaba njalo, nangeli-awa lesitsatfu entsambama wenta njalo.
Kwakungacishe kube li-awa lesihlanu entsambama lapho atsi uyaphuma futsi, wakhandza labanye bemile. Wafike wababuta watsi: ‘Nimeleni lapha lonkhe lelilanga seloku ningenti lutfo?’
Batsi kuye: ‘Kute losicashile.’ Wase utsi nakubo: ‘Kulungile, hambani nani niye esivinini sami!’
Kutsite natifika leti teli-awa lesihlanu entsambama, watiholela denariyo munye sisinye.
Nabefika laba bekucala, bebacabanga kutsi utabaholela kakhudlwana, kodvwa nabo wabaholela denariyo munye, umuntfu amunye.
Batsi nabamemukela, bacala bakhonona kulomnikati wesivini,
batsi: ‘Laba bekugcina basebente li-awa linye nje, ubalinganiseleni natsi lesitfwele bumatima lobungaka, sashiswa nalilanga lasensimini?’
“Waphendvula watsi kulomunye wabo: ‘Mnganami, phela angikoni; kantsi kakadze besingakavumelani ngadenariyo munye yini nawe?
Tsatsa lokukwakho sehlukane; kepha mine ngiyatitsandzela kunika nalona wekugcina liholo lelingangelakho.
Kantsi angikavumeleki yini kwenta lengikutsandzako ngalokukwami? Nome unemona ngekutsi ngiyephana?’
“Lalelani la, sesiya eJerusalema, lapho iNdvodzana yeMuntfu itawunikelwa kubaphristi labakhulu netati temtsetfo, bese bayilahla ngelicala kutsi ibulawe.
Batayinikela etandleni tebetive, kuze iphukutwe, bayishaye, bese bayibetsela esiphambanweni; kodvwa ngelilanga lesitsatfu itawuvuswa ekufeni.”
Watsi yena: “Yetsembisa kutsi lamadvodzana ami lamabili ayawuhlala, lenye ngesekudla sakho, lenye ngesancele sakho embusweni wakho.”
Jesu watsi: “Yebo-ke, nitayinatsa leyo ndzebe, kantsi kuhlala ngesekudla sami nangesancele akusiko kwami kutsi ngephane ngako, kodvwa kwalabo labakulungiselelwe nguBabe.”
Kepha Jesu wababita watsi: “Niyati kutsi babusi betive babusa etikwato, netikhulu tato titiphetse ngetandla letimatima.
Akunjalo-ke lapha kini, kodvwa wonkhe umuntfu lofuna kuba mkhulu emkhatsini wenu, akabe sikhonti senu,
nalofuna kuba wekucala emkhatsini wenu, akabe sisebenti senu.
Njengobe neNdvodzana yeMuntfu ayitelanga kukhontwa, kepha yetela kutawukhonta nekunikela ngemphilo yayo, kutsi ibe yinhlawulo yalabanyenti.”
Timphumphutse letimbili, letatihleti elusentseni lwemgwaco, teva kutsi nguJesu lona lowengcako, tase tiyamemeta titsi: “Nkhosi, Ndvodzana yaDavide! Sihawukele!”
Kepha sicumbi sebantfu satitsetsisa sitsi atibindze. Kodvwa kwaba ngukhona timemeta kakhulu titsi: “Nkhosi, Ndvodzana yaDavide! Sihawukele!”
Kepha Jesu wema watibita, watibuta watsi: “Nifuna nginenteleni?”
