Tatsi kuye: “Nkhosi, sifuna kutsi emehlo etfu avuleke.”
Jesu watihawukela, watsintsa emehlo ato, tabona masinyane, tase tiyamlandzela.
watsi kubo: “Hambani niye edolobhaneni lelibhekene nani, nitawukhandza imbongolo iboshiwe inelitfole layo; titfukululeni, nitiletse kimi!
Nakukhona lokhuluma lutfo ngato kini, nibotsi: ‘INkhosi iyatidzinga, itatibuyisa masinyane.’ ”
Loku kwenteka kuze kugcwaliseke lokwashiwo ngumphrofethi nakatsi:
Bayiletsa imbongolo kanye nelitfole layo, bagaca tingubo etikwato, wase uyagibela.
Sicumbi lesikhulu sebantfu sendlala tingubo taso phansi emgwacweni, labanye bageca emagala etihlahla, bawendlala phansi.
Leticumbi letatihamba embikwakhe naletatimlandzela tatimemeta titsi:
Kwatsi nakangenako Jesu eJerusalema, kwanyakatela lidolobha lonkhe, bantfu babutana batsi: “Ngubani-ke yena lo?”
Watsi kubo: “Kubhaliwe kutsi: ‘Indlu yami iyawubitwa ngekutsi yindlu yekuthandaza,’ kepha nine seniyente umgedze wetigelekece.”
Asesethempelini kwase kufika kuye timphumphutse netinchute, watiphilisa tonkhe.
Baphristi labakhulu netati temtsetfo tatfukutsela tacansuka natibona letimangaliso labetenta Jesu, nebantfwana bamemeta ethempelini batsi: “Hosana kuyo iNdvodzana yaDavide!”
Ngako batsi kuJesu: “Uyeva yini kutsi batsini?”
Wabaphendvula watsi: “Yebo, ngiyeva. Anizange nifundze yini kutsi: ‘Emlonyeni webantfwana nakulabamunyako utilungiselele ludvumo’?”
Jesu waphuma kulelo dolobha wabashiya, waya eBhetani, lapho wefika walala khona.
Wabona umkhiwa lowawuwodvwa eceleni kwendlela, wenyukela kuwo, kodvwa akatfolanga lutfo kuwo ngaphandle kwemacembe. Ngako wase utsi kuwo: “Akungabe kusavela sitselo kuwe!” Ngekushesha umkhiwa wabuna.
Batsi nabakubona loko bafundzi bamangala, batsi: “Kwentiwe yini kutsi lomkhiwa ubune masinyane kangaka?”
Jesu wabaphendvula watsi: “Nami ngitanibuta livi libe linye; naninginika imphendvulo, ngitanitjela kutsi lamandla lengenta ngawo letintfo ayini.
Kubhabhatisa kwaJohane kwavelaphi? KuNkulunkulu nome kubantfu?”
Base bakhulumisana bodvwana batsi: “Sitawutsini? Nasitsi: ‘KuNkulunkulu,’ utawutsi: ‘Pho, animkholwanga ngani?’
Kodvwa nasitsi: ‘Kubantfu,’ sicuku siyasesaba, ngobe bonkhe bavumelana ngekutsi Johane abengumphrofethi.”
Base bayamphendvula Jesu batsi: “Asati.” Naye-ke wase utsi kubo: “Nami-ke ngingeke nginitjele kutsi loku ngikwenta ngamaphi emandla.”
“Kepha nitsini-ke? Umuntfu lotsite abenemadvodzana lamabili. Waya kuleyekucala, wefike watsi: ‘Msawami, hamba uyewusebenta esivinini lamuhla!’
Yaphendvula yatsi: ‘Yebo, Babe, ngitakuya,’ kepha yangete yaya.
Wase uya kulelenye, washo njalo nakuyo. Yaphendvula yatsi: ‘Angifuni;’ kodvwa emvakwaloko yacabanga, yase iyaphendvuka iyaya.
Ngumuphi-ke emkhatsini wabo bobabili lowenta intsandvo yeyise?”
Wase utsi: “Ngicinisile, ngitsi kini: Batselisi, netingwadla, netiphingi bayanengcelela embusweni waNkulunkulu.
Ngobe Johane weta kini ngendlela yekulunga, anizange nimkholwe; kodvwa batselisi, netingwadla, netiphingi tamkholwa. Kodvwa nine, nome senibone loko, anizange niphendvuke kuze nimkholwe.”
Kwatsi nasekufika sikhatsi sekuvuna emagelebisi, watfumela tisebenti takhe kuleto ticashi kutsi timlandzele incenye yesivuno lekuyakhe.
Leticashi tatibamba letisebenti, lesinye tasishaya, lesinye tasibulala, lesinye tasigcoba ngematje.
Waphindze watfumela tisebenti letinyenti kunetekucala; tenta njalo futsi nakuleto tisebenti.
Ekugcineni lomnikati watfumela umsa wakhe, atsi: ‘Batayihlonipha indvodzana yami.’
Kodvwa tatsi ticashi natiyibona lendvodzana, takhuluma todvwana, tatsi: ‘Lena yindlalifa yakhe; wotani siteyibulala, khona sitewudla lifa layo.’
Tase tiyayibamba, tiyikhiphela ngephandle kwesivini, tayibulala.
“Manje-ke nakufika lomnikati wesivini, uyawutenta njani leticashi?”
Bamphendvula batsi: “Uyawutibhubhisa kabi leticashi letimbi, atsatse lesivini sakhe acashise ngaso kuletinye ticashi letiyakumnika titselo ngetikhatsi tato.”
“Ngako-ke, nginitjela kutsi: Umbuso waNkulunkulu uyawutsatfwa kini, unikwe bantfu labayawutsela titselo letifanele. [
Wonkhe lowela etikwalelitje uyawuhlifika, abe ticucu; kantsi leliyakuwela etikwakhe, lelitje liyawumsila, abe ngumcaba.]”
Baphristi labakhulu nebaFarisi bayiva lemifanekiso yaJesu bati kutsi ukhuluma ngabo.
Ngako bafuna kumbopha. Kodvwa besaba ticumbi tebantfu, ngobe tatitsi ungumprofethi.
Jesu waphindze futsi wakhuluma kubo ngemifanekiso watsi:
“Umbuso welizulu ungafaniswa nenkhosi leyalungisela indvodzana yayo lidzili lemshado.
Yatfumela tisebenti tayo kutsi tiyewubita lababemenyiwe kuta emshadweni, kodvwa abavumanga kuta.

Yaphindze yatfumela letinye tisebenti yatsi: ‘Tjelani labo labamenyiwe kutsi lidzili lami selilungile, tinkhabi tami netinkhomo tami letikhuluphalisiwe setihlatjiwe, konkhe sekulungile; wotani edzilini!’
Kodvwa letimenywa atinakanga, tesuka tahamba: Lesinye satiyela ensimini, lesinye satiyela ebhizinisini yaso.
Letinye timenywa tabamba letisebenti, tatiphatsa dlephu, tatishaya, tatibulala.
Inkhosi yatfukutsela kakhulu, yaze yakhipha imphi yemasotja leyafike yabulala bonkhe labo babulali, yashisa nelidolobha labo.
Ngako yatsi etisebentini tayo: ‘Lidzili selilungile, kodvwa labo labebamenyiwe abakalifaneli.
Ngako-ke hambani niye etinhlanganweni tetindlela nemigwaco; nimeme bonkhe lenibabonako kutsi bete edzilini.’
Ngako-ke tisebenti taphuma, taya etindleleni, tabutsa bonkhe letatihlangana nabo, lababi nalabahle ngalokufananako; indlu yemshado yagcwala letimenywa.
yatsi kuye: ‘Mnganami, ungene njani lapha ungenayo ingubo yemshado?’ Kepha yena wathula.
Inkhosi yatjela tisebenti tayo yatsi: ‘Mbopheni tandla netinyawo, nimlahle ngephandle ebumnyameni. Lapho kuyawuba khona kukhala nekugedletelisa ematinyo.’

Base batfumela kuye labanye bafundzi babo kanye nemalunga ephathi yemaHerodi. Befike batsi: “Mfundzisi, siyati kutsi wena uneliciniso, ufundzisa indlela yaNkulunkulu ngeliciniso, awunaki muntfu, ngobe awubuki buso bemuntfu.
Sitjele-ke kutsi wena utsini. Kuvunyelwe yini kutsela kuKhesari nome cha?”
Kepha Jesu abati bubi babo watsi: “Batentisi, ningilingelani?
Ngako watsi kubo: “Yebo-ke, nikani Khesari lokukwaKhesari; ninike Nkulunkulu lokukwaNkulunkulu!”
Batsi sebakuvile loko, bamangala kakhulu, bamshiya bahamba.
batsi: “Mfundzisi, Mosi watsi: ‘Nakufa indvodza ingenabantfwana, umnakabo uyamngena lomfelokati wakhe, kuze atalele umufi bantfwana.’
Manje le ngakitsi kwakunetelamani letatisikhombisa. Lona lomdzala watsatsa umfati, kodvwa wafa ate bantfwana, ngako umnakabo wamngena lomfati.
Kwenteka kona loko nakuwesibili nakuwesitsatfu, kwaze kwefika kuwesikhombisa.
Pho, nasekuvukwa ekufeni, lomfati uyawuba wabani kulaba labasikhombisa, ngobe bonkhe abengumfati wabo?”
Jesu watsi kubo: “Maye! Nedukile, ngobe aniyati imiBhalo kanye nemandla aNkulunkulu!
Ngobe ekuvukeni kulabafile abateki, abatekwa, banjengetingilosi tasezulwini.
Kepha macondzana nekuvuswa kwalabafile: Anifundzanga yini lokwakhulunywa nguNkulunkulu kini nakatsi:
‘Mine nginguNkulunkulu wa-Abrahama, naNkulunkulu wa-Isaka, naNkulunkulu waJakobe’? Akasiye Nkulunkulu walabafile, kodvwa walabaphilako.”
Natikuva loko ticumbi tebantfu, tamangala ngalokufundzisa kwakhe.
Batsi nasebevile baFarisi kutsi Jesu ubathulisile baSadusi, base babutsana ndzawonye.
Lomunye wabo labesati semtsetfo wamlinga ngekumbuta, watsi:
Wesibili ufanana nawo utsi: ‘Ubotsandza makhelwane wakho, njengobe utitsandza wena.’
Kuleyo miyalo yomibili kubambelele wonkhe umtsetfo kanye nemfundziso yebaphrofethi.”
watsi: “Nitsini ngaKhristu? Nitsi uyiNdvodzana yabani?” Bamphendvula batsi: “YaDavide.”
Jesu watsi kubo: “Pho, Davide wambita njani akuMoya ngekutsi: ‘YiNkhosi,’
“Ngako-ke nangabe Davide wambita ngekutsi: ‘YiNkhosi,’ uyiNdvodzana yakhe njani?”
Kwabate ngisho namunye lowaba nelivi labengamphendvula ngalo; kusukela ngalelo langa kute lowaphindze waba nesibindzi sekumbuta.
Jesu wakhuluma eticunjini tebantfu nakubafundzi bakhe,
watsi: “Tati temtsetfo nebaFarisi bahleti esihlalweni saMosi bafundzisa umtsetfo.
Ngako-ke kwenteni konkhe labanitjela kona nikugcine, kodvwa ningenti njengemisebenti yabo, ngobe bayakhuluma bangabe basenta.
Babopha imitfwalo lesindzako, bayibeke emahlombe alabanye bantfu, kepha bona abafuni kuyifukula, ngisho nangemuno wabo.
Konkhe labakwentako kwekutiveta kubantfu. Ngobe la etinhloko tabo sebandzise emabhande lanetikhehle temabhokisana letinemavesi emiBhalo, bese belula timvakaza temijiva yabo.
Batsandza tindzawo letingenhla emadzilini, netitulo letisembili emasinagogeni,
batsandza nekubingelelwa ngenhlonipho etimakethe, bantfu bababite ngekutsi: ‘Mfundisi!’
Kepha nine ningabobitwa ngumuntfu ngekutsi: ‘Mfundisi,’ ngobe nonkhe nibazalwane, munye uMfundzisi wenu.
Ningabiti muntfu emhlabeni ngekutsi: ‘Babe,’ ngobe munye uYihlo losezulwini.
Futsi ningabitwa ngumuntfu ngekutsi nibaholi, ngobe munye umholi wenu, longuKhristu.
Ngobe wonkhe umuntfu lotiphakamisako uyawutfotjiswa, nalotitfobako uyawuphakanyiswa.”
“Maye kini, bafundzisi bemtsetfo nebaFarisi! Batentisi! Ngobe nidla tindlu tebafelokati, nangekutentisa nenta imithandazo lemidze. Ngako niyakwemukeliswa kulahlwa lokukhulu.]

“Maye kini, bafundzisi bemtsetfo nebaFarisi! Batentisi! Ngobe niwela tilwandle, nidzabule nemave, kuze nidwebele enkholweni yenu abe munye wetive; nasenimtfolile, nimenta abe yindvodzana yesihogo ngalokuphindziwe kunani.
Tiphukuphuku letitimphumphutse! Kantsi ngukuphi lokubaluleke kakhulu, yigolide nome lithempeli lelingcwelisa igolide yalo?
Futsi nitsi: ‘Lowo lofunga lilati, akanandzaba; kodvwa lofunga umnikelo losetikwalo, utibopha yena ngesifungo sakhe.’
Timphumphutse, ngukuphi lokubaluleke kakhulu, sipho nome lilati, lelenta sipho sibe ngcwele?
Ngako-ke umuntfu nakafunga lilati, ufunga lona kanye nako konkhe lokukulo;
lofunga lithempeli, ufunga lona kanye nalowo lohlala kulo.
Umuntfu lofunga lizulu, ufunga sihlalo saNkulunkulu kanye nalowo lohlala kuso.
Baholi labatimphumphutse, nikhetsa imphungane ekudleni, kodvwa nimite likamela.
MFarisi loyimphumphutse! Geza kucala lingekhatsi lendzebe, kuze kutsi nelingephandle ligezeke.
Kanjalo nani nibonakala nilungile emehlweni ebantfu, kodvwa ngekhatsi nigcwele kutentisa nekuphambana nemtsetfo.”
bese nitsi: ‘Kube sasiphila ngesikhatsi sabokhokho, sasingayikwenta loko labakwenta ngekubulala baphrofethi.’
Kanjalo nitifakazela nine kutsi ningemadvodzana alabo lababulala baphrofethi.
Chubekani-ke nicedzele loko lokwacalwa bokhokho benu!
Tinyoka, ntalo yemabululu! Nitakubalekela njani kulahlwa esihogweni?

Ngako nginitjela kutsi: Ngiyawunitfumelela baphrofethi, netati, nebafundzisi. Labanye babo niyawubabulala, nibabetsele etiphambanweni, labanye nibabhambabule emasinagogeni enu. Niyawubatingela emadolobha ngemadolobha;

kuze kwehlele etikwenu yonkhe ingati lelungile leyacitfwa emhlabeni, kusukela engatini ya-Abela labelungile, kuze kube ngusengatini yaZakhariya, umsa waBarakhiya, lenambulala emkhatsini welithempeli nelilati.
Ngicinisile, ngitsi kini: Konkhe loku kuyakwehlela etikwalesitukulwane.”
Bukani-ke lelidolobha lenu selisele lodvwana, lite bantfu.
Ngiyanitjela ngitsi: Ningeke niphindze ningibone nize nitsi: ‘Ubusisiwe lotako egameni leNkhosi.’ ”
Kepha waphendvula watsi: “Angitsi, niyakubona konkhe loku? Nginitjela ngitsi: Kute ngisho nalinye litje leliyawusala lihleti etikwalelinye lingakadzilitelwa phansi.”
Ngobe bantfu labanyenti bayawuta ngelibito lami, befike batsi: ‘NginguKhristu!’ bedukise labanyenti.
Niyawuva ngetimphi nangemahemuhemu etimphi; caphelani ningetfuki, ngobe loko kufanele kwenteke, kodvwa umhla wekuphela uyawube ungakefiki.
Ngobe sive siyawuvukela lesinye sive, nembuso uyawuvukela lomunye umbuso. Kuyawuba khona tindlala nekutamatama kwemhlaba tindzawo ngetindzawo.
Kuyakuvela baprofethi bemanga labanyenti, bedukise bantfu labanyenti.
Kodvwa lowo loyawubambelela kuze kube ngusekupheleni, uyawusindziswa.
LeliVangeli ngembuso liyawushunyayelwa emhlabeni wonkhe, kuze kube bufakazi etiveni tonkhe, bese-ke kuyefika kuphela.”
Umuntfu losetikwendlu angabe asehla kuyawutsatsa lutfo lolusendlini yakhe,
nalowo losensimini angabuyeli endlini kuyawutsatsa kwekwembatsa.
Kepha maye kulabayawube batetfwele nakulabayawube bamunyisa ngaleto tikhatsi!
Thandazelani kutsi kubaleka kwenu kungabi kusebusika nome ngeliSabatha!
Ngobe lapho kuyawuba khona kuhlupheka lokukhulu lokungazange sekube khona kusukela seloku kwasekelwa umhlaba, kuze kube ngulamuhla, futsi akuseyiwuba khona.
Kube lawo malanga akafinyetwanga bekuyakubate longasindziswa; kepha ngenca yalabakhetsiwe lawo malanga ayawufinyetwa.
Ngobe kuyawuvela bokhristumbumbulu, nebaphrofethi bemanga, bente tibonakaliso letinkhulu netimangaliso, kuze kudukiswe nalabakhetsiwe nakunekwenteka.
Ngobe iNdvodzana yeMuntfu iyawufika njengembane umanyata esibhakabhakeni kusukela emphumalanga kuye enshonalanga.
Iyawutfumela tingilosi tayo ngekukhala lokukhulu kwelicilongo, tibutse bonkhe labakhetsiwe bayo emagumbini omane emhlaba, kusukela emkhawulweni lomunye welizulu kuze kube kulomunye.”
Kanjalo-ke nani, nanibona konkhe loku kwenteka, nibokwati kutsi sekusedvute ngasemnyango.
Ngicinisile, ngitsi kini: Lesitukulwane ngeke sendlule kungakenteki konkhe loku.
Lizulu nemhlaba kuyakwendlula, kodvwa emavi ami wona angeke endlule.”
Njengasemalangeni aNowa kuyawuba njalo nekufika kweNdvodzana yeMuntfu.
Njengemalanga labengembili kwazamcolo, bantfu babedla banatsa, labadvuna nalabasikati batsatsana, kwaze kwaba lilanga langena ngalo Nowa emkhunjini;
abazange bati, kwaze kwefika zamcolo wabacedza, kuyawuba njalo nekufika kweNdvodzana yeMuntfu.
Ngaleso sikhatsi emadvodza lamabili ayawube asebenta ensimini; lenye iyawutsatfwa, lenye isale.
Bafati lababili bayawube basila; lomunye uyawutsatfwa, lomunye asale.
Ngako-ke caphelani, ngobe anilati lilanga iNkhosi yenu leyawubuya ngalo.
Nibokwati kutsi kube umniyo wendlu abesati sikhatsi sekufika kwelisela, abengeke alale, entele kuvimbela lelisela lingayigcekezi lendlu yakhe.
“Ngako-ke nani hlalani nilindzele, ngobe iNdvodzana yeMuntfu iyawufika ngesikhatsi leningakasibheki.”
Sibusisiwe leso sisebenti lesiyawukhandvwa yinkhosi yaso senta njalo.
Ngicinisile, ngitsi kini: Iyawusimisa ngetulu kwako konkhe lenako lenkhosi.
Kodvwa nangabe leso sisebenti lesibi sicabanga enhlitiyweni yaso sitsi: ‘Inkhosi yami isalibele,’
bese sicala kushaya letisebenti letikanye naso, sidle sinatse naletinye tidzakwa,
inkhosi yaleso sisebenti iyawufika ngalelo langa, leso sisebenti singakayibheki, nangesikhatsi lesingasati.
Iyawusijezisa kakhulu kanye nebatentisi. Lapho kuyawuba khona kukhala nekugedletelisa ematinyo.”
Leti letatitilima tatsatsa tibane tato, kodvwa tangete tawaphatsa emafutsa ekukhanyisa;
kantsi leti letatihlakaniphile tatsatsa tibane tato, tatiphatsela nemafutsa.
Ngenca yekwephuta kwemyeni kufika, tetela tonkhe talala.
Tavuka-ke tonkhe leto tintfombi letatilishumi talungisa tibane tato.
Leti letatitilima tatsi kuleti letatihlakaniphile: ‘Sipheni emafutsa kulawa enu, ngobe tibane tetfu tiyacisha.’
Kepha letatihlakaniphile taphendvula tatsi: ‘Cha, ngeke asenele tsine nani. Lokuncono hambani niye kulabawatsengisako, niyetitsengela kubo!’
Tatsi tisehambile tiyewutsenga, wefika umyeni; leti letatilungele tangena kanye naye edzilini lemshado, umnyango wavalwa.
Kodvwa umyeni waphendvula watsi: ‘Ngicinisile, ngitsi kini: Anginati.’
Lesinye yasinika emathalenta lasihlanu, lesinye yasinika aba mabili, lesinye laba linye: nguleso njengemandla aso; yesuka ekhaya yahamba.
“Masinyane lesi lesemukela lasihlanu sawatalisa, saze satfola lamanye lasihlanu.
Kanjalo futsi nalesi lesemukela emathalenta lamabili sawatalisa, atala lamanye lamabili.
Kepha lesi lesemukela linye sahamba sayawulimbela emhlabatsini, salifihla lithalenta lenkhosi yaso.
Seta lesisebenti lesasinikwe emathalenta lasihlanu, saletsa lamanye emathalenta lasihlanu, satsi: ‘Nkhosi, wanginika emathalenta lasihlanu; nankha lamanye lasihlanu lengiwatalisile.’
Inkhosi yaso yatsi kuso: ‘Wente kahle, sisebenti lesihle nalesetsembekile; wetsembekile etintfweni letincane, ngako ngitakubeka wengamele lokunyenti. Ngena ekujabuleni kwenkhosi yakho!’
“Seta nalesi lesinye sisebenti lebesemukele emathalenta lamabili, satsi: ‘Nkhosi, wanginika emathalenta lamabili; nankha lamanye lamabili lengiwatalisile.’
Inkhosi yaso yatsi kuso: ‘Wente kahle, sisebenti lesihle nalesetsembekile; wetsembekile etintfweni letincane, ngako ngitakubeka wengamele lokunyenti. Ngena ekujabuleni kwenkhosi yakho!’
“Kwase kungena lesisebenti lesasinikwe lithalenta linye, safike satsi: ‘Nkhosi, ngatile kutsi ungumuntfu lonelulaka. Uvuna lapho ungazange sewuhlanyele khona, ubutse lapho ungazange sewusakate khona.
Ngekwesaba ngahamba ngayawulimbela lithalenta lakho. Ngako-ke naku lokukwakho.’
“Inkhosi yaso yatsi kuso: ‘Wena sisebenti lesibi nalesivilaphako! Bewati kutsi ngivuna lapho ngingakahlanyeli khona, ngiphindze ngibutse lapho ngingakasakati khona.
Ngako-ke, ngabe utsatse lemali yami wayifaka ebhange, bengitayikhandza seyinentalo.
Ngobe ngulowo nalowo lonako uyakwengetelwa abe nako kakhulu, kodvwa lowo longenako uyakwemukwa naloko lanako.
tonkhe tive temhlaba tiyawubutselwa embikwayo. Iyawubehlukanisa labanye kulabanye, njengemelusi ehlukanisa timvu netimbuti.
Iyawumisa timvu ngesekudla sayo, netimbuti ngesancele.
“Lapho-ke iNkhosi iyawutsi kulabo labangesekudla sayo: ‘Wotani, nine lenibusiswe nguBabe! Wotani nitewudla lifa lembuso, lenawulungiselelwa seloku kwasekelwa umhlaba.
Ngobe ngangilambile, nangipha kudla; ngangomile, nanginatsisa; ngangisihambi, nangemukela emitini yenu;
ngangingcunu, nangigcokisa; ngangigula, nangivakashela; ngangisejele, neta kimi.’
“Laba labalungile bayakumbuta batsi: ‘Nkhosi, kunini lapho sakubona khona ulambile sakupha kudla, nome womile sakunatsisa?
Sakubona nini usihambi sakwemukela emitini yetfu, nome ungcunu sakwembatsisa?
Sakubona nini ugula, nome usejele sakuvakashela?’
INkhosi iyawubaphendvula itsi: ‘Ngicinisile, ngitsi kini: Konkhe loko lenanikwenta kulomunye walabanaketfu labancane, nanikwenta kimi!’
Ngobe ngangilambile, kodvwa aningiphanga kudla; ngangomile, aninginatsisanga.
Ngangisihambi, kodvwa aningingenisanga emitini yenu; ngangingcunu, kodvwa aningigcokisanga; ngangigula, ngangisejele, kodvwa aningivakashelanga.’
“Bayakumbuta batsi: ‘Nkhosi, sakubona nini ulambile, nome womile, nome usihambi, nome ungcunu, nome ugula, nome usejele, sangete sakusita?’
INkhosi iyawubaphendvula itsi: ‘Ngicinisile, ngitsi kini: Loko leningakwentanga kulomunye walaba labancane, anikwentanga kimi.’
Labo-ke bayawuhamba baye ekujezisweni kwaphakadze; kodvwa labalungile bayakuya ekuphileni kwaphakadze.”
Jesu watsi kube acedze kufundzisa, watsi kubafundzi bakhe:
“Njengobe nati kutsi sekusele emalanga lamabili kutsi kube nguMkhosi weliPhasika, iNdvodzana yeMuntfu itawunikelwa kuze ibetselwe esiphambanweni.”
Baphristi labakhulu netibondza temaJuda babutsana esigodlweni sakaKhayafase, umPhristi Lomkhulu,
bakha lisu lekubamba Jesu ngebucili, bambulale.
Kepha batsi: “Kufanele singakwenti ngesikhatsi semkhosi, ngobe bantfu bangahle bente siphitsiphitsi.”
kwefika umfati kuye aphetse sigujana lesasakhiwe ngelitje lembiza, sigcwele emafutsa langemakha ladule kakhulu, wawatsela enhloko yaJesu, asadla.
Kepha bafundzi, nabakubona loku, batfukutsela batsi: “Kumoselwani?
Ngobe lamakha ngabe atsengiswe ngemali lenkhulu, kwanikwa labamphofu!”
Kepha Jesu akwati loko, watsi kubo: “Nimhluphelani lomfati? Ngobe wente umsebenti lomuhle kimi.
Ngobe labamphofu nihlala nabo onkhe emalanga; kepha mine, anihlali nami onkhe emalanga.
Ngicinisile, ngitsi kini: Nome ngukuphi lapho liyawushunyayelwa khona leliVangeli emhlabeni wonkhe, kuyawukhulunywa ngalesento sakhe, kube sikhumbuto ngaye.”
Wafike watsi: “Nitanginikani nanginganiniketa loJesu?” Base bamnika tinhlavu tesiliva letingema-30.
Kusukela ngalelo langa Judasi wacala kufuna litfuba lekunikela Jesu kubo.
Watsi kubo: “Hambani niye kumuntfu lotsite edolobheni, nifike nimtjele nitsi: ‘UMfundzisi utsi: “Sikhatsi sami sesifikile; mine nebafundzi bami siyeta sitawudlela liPhasika endlini yakho.” ’ ”
Bafundzi-ke benta njengobe Jesu abebatjelile, befike balungisa Sidlo seliPhasika.
Batsi basadla, Jesu watsi kubo: “Ngicinisile, ngitsi kini: Lomunye wenu utangitsengisa.”
Bafundzi badzabuka kakhulu, bacala babuta, kwaba ngulowo watsi: “Kungahle kube ngimi yini, Nkhosi?”
INdodzana yeMuntfu itawufa kambe, njengobe kubhaliwe ngayo, kepha maye kulowo muntfu, iNdvodzana yemuntfu letawutsengiswa nguye! Bekuyawuba ncono kulowo muntfu kube fane akatalwanga!”
Wase uyabuta naJudasi labetamtsengisa watsi: “Kungabe ngimi yini, Mfundzisi?” Jesu wamphendvula watsi: “Usho kona.”
Wase utsatsa indzebe uyabonga, wabanika watsi: “Natsani kuyo nonkhe,
ngobe loku kuyingati yami yesivumelwane, lecitselwe labanyenti kube kutsetselelwa kwetono.
Kepha ngitsi kini: Kusukela lamuhla angisayiwunatsa kulesitselo semvini, kuyawudzimate kufike lelo langa lengiyakusinatsa ngalo nani sesisisha embusweni waBabe.”
Jesu watsi kuye: “Ngicinisile, ngitsi kuwe: Kulobusuku balamuhla, lichudze litawutsi likhala, utabe sewungiphike katsatfu.”
Phetro waphendvula watsi: “Nome ngingaze ngife nawe, ngingeke ngikuphike!”
Watsatsa Phetro nemadvodzana lamabili aZebedi. Wacala kufikelwa ngumunyu nelusizi,
watsi kubo: “Umphefumulo wami ulusizi, kuze kubesekufeni. Salani la, nilindze kanye nami.”
Wabuyela kubafundzi bakhe wabakhandza balele, watsi kuPhetro: “Beningeke yini nilindze kanye nami li-awa libe linye nje?
Lindzani, nithandaze, kuze ningetikungena ekulingweni! Umoya uyavuma, kodvwa inyama ibutsakatsaka.”
Waphindze wahamba futsi kwesibili wathandaza atsi: “Babe, nangabe lendzebe ingeke yendlule kimi ngingakayinatsi, akwenteke intsandvo yakho!”
Waphindze futsi wabuya, wabakhandza balele, ngobe emehlo abo abesindvwa butfongo.
Waphindze wabashiya futsi, wahamba wayawuthandaza kwesitsatfu, asho wona lawo mavi.
Jesu wefika kubafundzi bakhe watsi: “Nisalele namanje, niyaphumula? Bukani-ke, sikhatsi sesisondzele, iNdvodzana yeMuntfu seyiniketwe etandleni tetoni.
Sukumani sambe! Bukani, lona longitsengisako sewusondzele!”
Lona labemtsengisa abevumelene nabo watsi: “Lendvodza lengitawuyanga, ngiyo-ke lena leniyifunako. Nibobamba yona!”
Wefika kuJesu masinyane watsi: “E, Mfundzisi!” Wamanga.
Lomunye walaba babehamba naJesu wakhipha inkemba yakhe, wahhumbula indlebe yesigcili semPhristi Lomkhulu, yalahleka phansi.
Jesu watsi kuye: “Buyisela inkemba yakho emgodleni wayo, ngobe bonkhe labaphatsa inkemba bayawufa ngenkemba.
Ucabanga kutsi bengingete ngacela yini mine kuBabe angehlisele tinkhulungwane letingetulu kweli-12 tetingilosi?
Pho, ingagcwaliseka kanjani imiBhalo letsi kumele kube njalo?”
Kodvwa konkhe loku kwentekele kutsi kugcwaliseke loko lokwabhalwa baphrofethi emiBhalweni.”
Bafundzi bakhe bonkhe bamshiya khona lapho, babaleka.
Kepha Phetro bekamlandzela khashane, waze wangena esibuyeni sendlu yemPhristi Lomkhulu. Wafike wahlala nebalindzi, afuna kubona kutsi sigcino kutawuba yini.
Baphristi labakhulu neLiqoqo lonkhe baphenyisisa Jesu bafuna bufakazi lobungemanga, khona batewumlahla ngelicala lekufa.
Kodvwa abazange babutfole ngisho nabunye, kwala nome bofakazi labanyenti bemacebo sebetama kubuveta. Ekugcineni kweta ngembili emadvodza lamabili,
afike atsi: “Lendvodza yatsi: ‘Mine ngingalibhidlita lelithempeli laNkulunkulu, ngibuye ngilakhe ngemalanga lamatsatfu.’ ”
UmPhristi Lomkhulu wasukuma watsi kuJesu: “Akukho yini longatiphendvulela ngako kuloku labakubeke licala ngako?”
Kodvwa Jesu wabindza. Waphindze wakhuluma umPhristi Lomkhulu watsi kuye: “Egameni laNkulunkulu lophilako, sengiyakufungisa-ke manje kutsi sitjele nawunguKhristu, iNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu.”
batsi: “Phrofetha, Khristu, usitjele kutsi ngubani lokushayile!”
Kodvwa wakuphika embikwabo bonkhe watsi: “Angikwati loku lokhuluma ngako.”

Watsi asesukile asatimele eceleni kwemphundvu yesibuya, kwaphindze kwefika lenye intfombatana lesisebenti yambuka yase ikhuluma kulamadvodza labelapho, imkhomba, yatsi: “Nalona abenaye loJesu waseNazaretha.”
Emvakwesikhashana lamadvodza labeme lapho asondzela kuPhetro afike atsi: “Ngempela nawe ungulomunye wabo, ngisho nekukhuluma kwakho kuyatisho nje.”
Phetro wacala kuticalekisa nekufunga watsi: “Angimati lomuntfu!”
Phetro wase uyawakhumbula emavi aJesu ngesikhatsi atsi: “Lichudze litakutsi likhala, utakube sewungiphike katsatfu.”
Bona batsi kuye: “Pho, singenaphi lapho tsine? Tibonele wena!”
Baphristi labakhulu bayicobonga lemali batsi: “Lemali ngeyengati, kantsi kuphambene nemtsetfo wakitsi kutsi imali lenje ifakwe esikhwameni selithempeli.”
Emvakwekuvumelana ngaloko, lemali batsenga ngayo iNsimi yeMbumbi, kuze ibe yindzawo yekungcwabela tihambi.
Ngiko nje lensimi kuze kube ngulamuhla ibitwa ngekutsi: “YiNsimi yeNgati.”
Batsenga ngayo insimi yembumbi, njengobe iNkhosi ingiyalile.”
Kepha ngesikhatsi baphristi labakhulu netibondza bametfwesa emacala abengaphendvuli.
Ngako Philatu watsi kuye: “Awuweva yini lamacala langaka labakubeka wona?”
Ngaso leso sikhatsi-ke kwakunesiboshwa lesasidvume ngebubi baso lebesinguBharaba.
Ngako-ke satsi kube lesicumbi sibutsane, Philatu wasibuta watsi: “Nifuna nginikhululele bani emkhatsini waBharaba naJesu lowatiwa ngekutsi nguKhristu?”
Abati kahle kamhlophe kutsi Jesu babemletse ngobe babenemona naye.

Watsi Philatu asahleti esihlalweni sekwehlulela, umfati wakhe watfumela kuye livi atsi: “Ungatifaki endzabeni yalowo muntfu longenacala, ngobe angikalali ngihlushwa ngaye ngeliphupho ebusuku balamuhla.”
Kepha baphristi labakhulu netibondza bativumisa leticumbi kutsi ticele Bharaba, kubulawe Jesu.
Kodvwa Lusibalukhulu wababuta watsi: “Nifuna nginikhululele muphi emkhatsini walaba lababili?”
Philatu wababuta watsi: “Ngenteni-ke ngaloJesu lekutsiwa nguKhristu?” Bonkhe baphendvula batsi: “Mbetsele esiphambanweni!”
Kodvwa Philatu wababuta futsi watsi: “Ngobe ente cala lini?” Kepha kwaba ngukhona bamemeta bonkhe batsi: “Mbetsele esiphambanweni!”
Sonkhe sive saphendvula satsi: “Ingati yakhe ayibesetikwetfu nasetikwebantfwana betfu!”
Philatu wase ubakhululela Bharaba; kepha Jesu asashayiwe wase umnikela kubo kutsi abetselwe esiphambanweni.
Lamhlubula tingubo takhe, lamembatsisa ingubo lebovu.
Lase leluka umchele ngemanyeva, lawufaka enhloko yakhe, lambambisa umhlanga ngesekudla, laguca embikwakhe, lamphukuta latsi: “Bayethe! Nkhosi yemaJuda!”
Lamkhafulela ngematse, latsatsa lomhlanga, lamshaya enhloko.
Naselicedzile kumphukuta, lamkhumula lengubo lebovu, laphindze futsi lamembatsisa letakhe tingubo, lase liphuma naye layakumbetsela esiphambanweni.
Nasebafikile endzaweni lekutsiwa yiGolkotha, lokusho kutsi: “YiNdzawo yeSikobho,”
lamnatsisa liwayini lelalibhicwe nenyongo; watsi kube alive walala, wangete walinatsa.
Ngetulu kwenhloko yakhe labeka satiso selicala lagwetjwe ngalo sitsi:
Kwase kubetselwa kanye naye tigebengu letimbili, lesinye ngesekudla, lesinye ngesancele.
batsi: “Wena lobhidlita lithempeli uphindze ulakhe ngemalanga lamatsatfu! Tisindzise phela, nangabe uyiNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu! Yehla lapho esiphambanweni!”
Kanjalo futsi nebaphristi labakhulu, netati temtsetfo, netibondza bamphukuta, batsi:
“Wabasindzisa labanye, kodvwa yena angeke atisindzise! Kantsi akasiyo iNkhosi yema-Israyeli yini? Akehle phela! Nangabe angehla esiphambanweni, sitawukholwa nguye!
Wetsembele kuNkulunkulu. Akamehlise phela loNkulunkulu wakhe namtsandza! Ngobe watsi: ‘NgiyiNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu.’ ”
Kwatsi ngensimbi yesitsatfu entsambama Jesu wakhala kakhulu watsi: “Eli, Eli, lama sabakthani?” lokusho kutsi: “Nkulunkulu wami, Nkulunkulu wami, ungishiyeleni?”
Labanye bantfu lababelapho labamuva batsi: “Ase nimuve! Ubita Elija!”
Lomunye wabo wagijima masinyane waya kuye nesiponji, wasenya ewayinini lelimunyu, wasihloma elutsini lwemhlanga wetama kumnatsisa.
Kodvwa labanye batsi: “Ase nimyekele, sibone kutsi lo-Elija utawufika yini atemsindzisa!”
Jesu waphindze wakhala ngelivi lelikhulu kakhulu, wase uyafa.
emathuna avuleka, bantfu labanyenti baNkulunkulu labebafile bavuswa ekufeni.
Bawashiya emathuna; emvakwekuvuka kwaJesu ekufeni baya bangena edolobheni lelingcwele, lapho babonwa bantfu labanyenti.
Indvuna yemphi nemasotja labenawo labelindze Jesu, nabakubona lokutamatama kwemhlaba, nako konkhe lokwenteka, befikelwa kwesaba lokukhulu baze batsi: “Ngempela lomuntfu abeyiNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu!”
Emkhatsini wabo bekukhona Mariya waseMagdala, naMariya, unina waJakobe naJosefa, nenina wemadvodzana aZebedi.
Waya kuPhilatu kuyawucela sidvumbu saJesu. Philatu wakhipha livi watsi akanikwe.
Ngako Josefa wasitsatsa lesidvumbu, wasigocota ngendvwangu lenhle, yelineni lecolisakele,
wasibeka ethuneni lelisha labesandza kuligubha edvwaleni. Wase ugicitela litje lelikhulu emnyango walelithuna wavala ngalo, wesuka wahamba.
Kepha Mariya waseMagdala nalomunye Mariya babehleti khona lapho, macondzana nelithuna.
Ngakusasa, lokusho kutsi, ngelilanga lelilandzela lelemalungiselelo, baphristi labakhulu nebaFarisi bahlangana naPhilatu,
batsi kuye: “Nkhosi, siyakhumbula kutsi lomkhohlisi asaphila watsi: ‘Ngiyawuvuka emvakwemalanga lamatsatfu.’

Ngako khipha umyalo kutsi lelithuna lakhe ligadzisiswe kahle kuze kube lilanga lesitsatfu, kuze bafundzi bakhe bangayi kuyawumeba, bese batjela bantfu batsi: ‘Uvusiwe kulabafile,’ bese kutsi lamanga akhe ekugcina abe makhulu kakhulu kunalawa ekucala.”
Philatu watsi kubo: “Tsatsani naba balindzi nihambe niyekulelusa njengekubona kwenu.”
Besuka bahamba, bayawuligadzisisa lelithuna: balivalisisa, baze bashiya neluphawu etjeni, babeka nebalindzi.
Kwaba khona kutamatama kwemhlaba lokukhulu, ingilosi yeNkhosi yehla ezulwini, yaligicita lelitje, yase ihlala etikwalo.
Lengilosi yayinjengembane, timphahla tayo tatimhlophe njengesitfwatfwa.
Kepha balinidzi befikelwa kwesaba, bachachatela, baze baba njengalabafile.
Akekho lapha; uvukile, njengobe abeshito. Wotani nitewubona indzawo lapho abelele khona.
Hambani masinyane niyewutjela bafundzi bakhe nitsi: ‘Sewuvukile kulabafile, nyalo nje sewusembili kunani uya eGalile; nitawumbona khona.’ Nibokukhumbula loku lenginitjela kona.”
Base basheshe bayesuka ethuneni, ngobe babesaba, kantsi futsi babejabule kakhulu, bagijima bayawutjela bafundzi bakhe.
Jesu watsi kubo: “Ningesabi! Hambani nibikele bomnaketfu kutsi, abahambe baye eGalile, bayawungibona khona.”
Batsi labafati basahamba, bancandzeka, labanye balindzi baya edolobheni, babikela baphristi labakhulu ngako konkhe lokwase kwentekile.
Kwatsi baphristi labakhulu netibondza nasebahlangene bakha lisu, banika balindzi imali lenkhulu,
batsi: “Nibotsi: ‘Bafundzi bakhe befike ebusuku, baseba sidvumbu sakhe, tsine sisatunywe butfongo.’
Lusibalukhulu nakuva loko, tsine siyawumchazela, eve kahle, ningahlupheki nine.”
Balindzi bayitsatsa lemali, benta njengobe babetjeliwe. Kuze kube ngulamuhla emaJuda abambelele kulawo mavi.
Batsi nabambona bakhuleka kuye, noko labanye babo babesangabata.
Jesu wasondzela kubo watsi: “Ngiphiwe emandla onkhe ezulwini nasemhlabeni.
Ngako-ke hambani, nente tive tonkhe tibe bafundzi bami, nibabhabhatise egameni leYise, neleNdvodzana, nelaMoya Longcwele,
nibafundzise kugcina konkhe lenginiyale ngako. Nibokwati kutsi mine nginani onkhe emalanga, kuze kube ngusekupheleni kwetikhatsi.”
LiVangeli ngaJesu Khristu, iNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu, licala kanje:
Nangempela kwavela Johane uMbhabhatisi ehlane ashumayela bantfu atsi: “Phendvukani nibhajatiswe, Nkulunkulu utanitsetselela tono tenu.”
Bonkhe bantfu besifundza saseJudiya nebaseJerusalema babephuma bayewulalela Johane. Babetsi bangefika ababhabhatise emfuleni iJordane, bavume tono tabo.
Abeshumayela atsi: “Kukhona lota emvakwami, lonemandla kakhulu kunami. Mine angikafaneli nekutsi ngigobondzele ngitfukulule imichilo yeticatfulo takhe.
Mine benginibhabhatisa ngemanti, kepha yena utanibhabhatisa ngaMoya Longcwele.”
Kulawo malanga Jesu wefika aphuma eNazaretha yaseGalile, naye wabhajatiswa nguJohane eJordane.
Watsi uyaphuma nje Jesu emantini, wabona lizulu livuleka naMoya Longcwele ehlela etikwakhe anjengelituba.
Kwevakala livi livela ezulwini litsi: “Wena uyiNdvodzana yami lengiyitsandzako. Ngiyatfokota ngawe.”
Masinyane Moya Longcwele wachubela Jesu ehlane.
Kwaphela emalanga langema-40 asehlane, alingwa nguSathane. Jesu bekahlala emkhatsini wetilwane tesiganga. Tingilosi tatimsita kuloko labekudzinga.
Emvakwekuboshwa kwaJohane Jesu waya eGalile, ahamba ashumayela liVangeli laNkulunkulu.
Abetsi: “Sikhatsi sesifikile, umbuso waNkulunkulu sewusondzele. Phendvukani nikholwe liVangeli.”
Kwatsi Jesu asahamba agudla Lwandle lwaseGalile, wabona boSimoni bana-Andreya, umnakabo, badweba tinhlanti ngelinetha; phela bebabadwebi.
Jesu watsi kubo: “Ngilandzeleni, ngitawunenta nibe badwebi bebantfu.”
Jesu watsi nasachubachubekile, wakhandza boJakobe naJohane, emadvodzana aZebedi. Bebasesikebheni balungisa emanetha abo.
Watsi kube ababone Jesu, wababita nabo, base bayamlandzela, bashiya uyise, Zebedi, asesikebheni kanye netisebenti labeticashile.
Kwabamangalisa kufundzisa kwakhe, ngobe wabafundzisa njengalonemandla, hhayi njengetati tabo temtsetfo.
Masinyane kwevakala umuntfu labenelidimoni esinagogeni labo, akhala amemeta,
atsi: “Ufunani kitsi, Jesu waseNazaretha? Sewutesibhubhisa yini? Ngiyakwati kutsi ungubani. UnguLongcwele waNkulunkulu.”
Lelidimoni lamklinklitisa lomuntfu, lakhala limemeta laphuma kuye.
Bonkhe bantfu bamangala betfuka, kangangoba badzimate babutana bodvwana batsi: “Seyini-ke le? Yimfundziso lensha lenemandla. Kantsi nemadimoni uyawekhuta amlalele!”
Masinyane tidvumo taJesu tandza nalo lonkhe laseGalile.
Umkhwekati waSimoni abelele embhedzeni aphetfwe ngumkhuhlane. Watsi kube efike Jesu, bambikela ngaye.
Waya kuye, wamphakamisa ambambe ngesandla. Umkhuhlane wesuka kuye, waphila, wase ubalungisela kudla.
Kwatsi kusihlwa selishonile baletsa kuJesu bonkhe lababegula nalababephetfwe ngemadimoni.
Bonkhe bantfu bakulelo dolobha babutsana ngasemnyango.
Jesu waphilisa bantfu labanyenti lababephetfwe tinhlobonhlobo tetifo, wakhipha nemadimoni lamanyenti. Akawavumelanga emadimoni kutsi akhulume, ngobe abemati.
Ekuseni kusemnyama kakhulu Jesu wavuka wahamba, waphumela ngephandle kwelidolobha waya ehlane, lapho afike wathandaza khona.
Batsi kube bamtfole, bamtjela batsi: “Bonkhe bantfu bayakufuna.”
Kepha Jesu watsi kubo: “Asichubekele kulamanye emadolobha lasedvutane kuze ngishumayele nakhona, ngobe ngulowo umsebenti wami lengiwutele.”
Jesu wamhawukela, welula sandla sakhe, wamphatsa watsi: “Ngiyatsandza, hlambuluka.”

watsi kuye: “Caphelisisa-ke, ungacali ukhulume kumuntfu ngaloku; hamba uye kumphristi akuhlole, bese ukhipha umnikelo wekubonga lokuhlanjululwa kwakho, njengaloku Mosi ayala, khona bonkhe bantfu batawuciniseka kutsi uhlambulukile.”

Kepha lomuntfu wahamba ayifafata lendzaba, yandza kakhulu, kangangekutsi Jesu abengasakhoni kungena nakulinye nje lidolobha abonwa bantfu. Abesatihlalela emaphandleni nje, kepha bantfu labanyenti babeta kuye bachamuka magangana onkhe.
Emvakwemalangana Jesu wabuyela eKhaphanawume; kwevakala kutsi ubuyile ekhaya.
Kwakungasibantfu nje lababeta kuye, kwadzimate kwasweleka nendzawo yekufaka lunyawo endlini, ngisho nangephandle emnyango. Abebashumayela livi laNkulunkulu.
Kwaletfwa kuye umuntfu labefe luhlangotsi, etfwelwe ngemadvodza lamane.
Behluleka kumsondzeta edvute naJesu ngenca yemminyaminya wesicuku, ngako base bavula sikhala eluphahleni lwendlu macondzana naJesu, bamehlisa ngeluhlaka lwakhe, bambeka embikwaJesu.
Jesu abona kukholwa kwabo, watsi kuye: “Mntfwanami, tono takho titsetselelwe.”
Letinye tati temtsetfo, letatihleti lapho, tatitibuta etinhlitiyweni tato titsi:
“Lomuntfu wentiwa yini lokutsi akhulume kanjena? Wetfuka Nkulunkulu. Ngubani longatsetselela tono ngaphandle kwaNkulunkulu?”
Kona loko Jesu wati emoyeni wakhe kutsi bacabangani, ngako watsi kubo: “Nizindlelani kanjalo?
Ngukuphi lokulula kukusho kulona lofe luhlangotsi kutsi: ‘Utsetselelwe tono takho’, nome kutsi: ‘Sukuma utsatse luhlaka lwakho uhambe’?
Ngitanikhombisa-ke kutsi mine, Ndvodzana yeMuntfu, nginemandla ekutsetselela tono emhlabeni.” Wase utsi kulesigulane:
“Ngitsi kuwe: Sukuma utsatse luhlaka lwakho, uhambe uye ekhaya.”
Ngekushesha lomuntfu wasukuma watsatsa luhlaka lwakhe, wahamba bonkhe bambukile. Bamangala bonkhe, badvumisa Nkulunkulu, batsi: “Asizange sesikubone lokunje.”
Jesu waphindze waphuma waya ngaseLwandle lwaseGalile. Bantfu labanyenti beta babutsana kuye, wabafundzisa.
Watsi uyendlula ngasendzaweni yekutsela, wabona Levi, umsa wa-Alfiyose, ahleti, asebenta, wase utsi kuye: “Kota ungilandzele.” Levi wasukuma wahamba naye.
Jesu wase uyakudla ekhaya kaLevi. Batselisi labanyenti naletinye toni bebalandzela Jesu. Ngako-ke labanyenti babo bangena naye endlini kaLevi, badla naye kanye nebafundzi bakhe.
Tati temtsetfo telicembu lebaFarisi tambona adla netoni nebatselisi, tabuta bafundzi bakhe tatsi: “Kwentiwa yini kutsi adle netoni kanye nebatselisi?”

Ngesikhatsi bafundzi baJohane uMbhabhatisi kanye nebaFarisi bazile kudla, labanye bantfu beta kuJesu bambuta batsi: “Bafundzi baJohane kanye nebebaFarisi bayakuzila kudla. Kwentiwa yini kutsi laba bakho bangazili?”
Wabaphendvula Jesu watsi: “Likhetfo lingakuzila yini kudla emshadweni umkhwenyane lisamsingatsile? Cha, lingeke likuzile nasoloku umkhwenyane analo.
Kodvwa kuyawufika sikhatsi lapho liyakwemukwa khona umkhwenyane, kulapho-ke liyawuzila khona.
“Ingubo lendzala ayichitjelwa ngesichibi lesisha. Nakungentiwa njalo, lesichibi lesisha singadzabula lengubo lendzala, kwenteke imbobo lenkhulu kuneyakucala.

Liwayini lelisha alitselwa kuso sikhumbasikhwama lesidzala, ngobe nakungentiwa njalo, lesikhumbasikhwama singapumuka, kucitseke leliwayini. Esikhundleni saloko liwayini lelisha kufanele litselwe kuso sikhumbasikhwama lesisha, kuze kutsi kokubili kuphatsane kahle.”
BaFarisi base batsi kuye: “Asubuke-ke labafundzi bakho! Bakwentelani ngeliSabatha loku lokungakavunyelwa ngumtsetfo?”

Wangena endlini yaNkulunkulu ngesikhatsi kuphetse Abiyatha, umPhristi Lomkhulu, wadla tinkhwa lekwakunikelwe ngato kuNkulunkulu, nome kwakungakavunyelwa ngekwemtsetfo kutsi tidliwe ngulomunye umuntfu ngaphandle kwebaphristi kuphela. Kepha Davide watidla, wapha nalamadvodza labehamba nawo.”
Jesu wachubeka watsi kubo: “LiSabatha lamiselwa kuphumuta bantfu; bantfu abamiselwanga kugcilatwa liSabatha.
Ngako-ke iNdvodzana yeMuntfu iyiNkhosi ngisho neyalo liSabatha.”
Waphindza Jesu wangena esinagogeni, bekunemuntfu labenesandla lesishwaphene.
Bekukhona lababefuna kubeka Jesu licala, ngako-ke bamcaphelisisa kutsi utawumphilisa yini lomuntfu, njengobe kwakuliSabatha nje.
Jesu watsi kulomuntfu labenesandla lesishwaphene: “Sukuma ute la ngembili.”
Wabuta kubo watsi: “Kulungile yini kwenta lokuhle ngeliSabatha, nome kwenta lokubi, kusita umuntfu nome kumyekelela aze afe?”
Wabatsi cala cala, acansukile, wadzabuka ngobe tinhlitiyo tabo tatilukhuni, tinenkhani, wase utsi kulomuntfu: “Yelula sandla sakho!” Waselula, saphila.
Jesu wahamba nebafundzi bakhe baya ngaseLwandle LwaseGalile. Ticumbi tebantfu letatiphuma eGalile naseJudiya tamlandzela.
Letinye ticumbi tatiphuma eJerusalema, nase-Idumiya, nangesheya kweJordane, nangasemadolobheni aseThire naseSidoni. Tonkhe leticumbi tatite kuye, ngobe tative ngaloko abekwenta.
Loko wakwenta emvakwekuphilisa labanyenti. Bonkhe lababenetifo babephangelana kuye batewumtsintsa.
Lababenemadimoni babetsi bangambona, baguce embikwakhe bamemete batsi: “Wena uyiNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu!”
Jesu wase ukhuphukela entsabeni. Wababita labo labefuna kubatfuma; beta kuye.
Wabamisa baba li-12, lababetawuba naye, [wabetsa watsi baphostoli,]
boJakobe naJohane, emadvodzana aZebedi, labetsa watsi boBhowanegese, lokusho kutsi “Emadvodzana Ekudvuma Kwelitulu”;
na-Andreya, naFiliphu, naBhatalomewu, naMatewu, naTomasi, naJakobe, umsa wa-Alfiyose, naThadiyosi, naSimoni, wephathi yemaKhenani,
Jesu wase uyesuka ubuyela ekhaya. Ticumbi taphindze tabutsana ngalokwengcile, kangangekutsi Jesu kanye nebafundzi bakhe badzimate baswela ngisho sikhatsi sekudla.
Bakubo batsi kube bakuve loko, baphutfuma bamlandza, ngobe kwase kutsiwa: “Usangene ingcondvo!”
Jesu wababita, wakhuluma nabo ngemifanekiso atsi: “Kodvwa Sathane angamcosha njani Sathane?
Nangabe umbuso wehlukene ekhatsi, lowo mbuso ngeke ume.
Nangabe umbuso waSathane wehlukene ekhatsi, sewuvukelana kwawona, ungeke ume, kodvwa uyakuwa uphele.
“Kute umuntfu longagcekeza indlu yesichwaga aphange timphahla taso, ngaphandle kwekutsi acale ngekubamba sona asibophe; emvakwaloko-ke angangena aphange timphahla endlini yaso.
kodvwa umuntfu lohlambalata Moya Longcwele, ngeke atsetselelwe nanini, kepha unelicala laphakadze.”
Jesu wakusho loko, ngobe labanye bebatsi unelidimoni.
Kwase kufika unina waJesu nabomnakabo bema ngephandle, base batfumela livi kutsi abambite.
Bantfu babegcwele batungelete Jesu bahleti phansi, base bayambikela batsi: “Nangu unyoko la ngephandle nabomnakenu, [nabodzadzewenu]
Jesu wabaphendvula watsi: “Ngubani make? Bobani bomnaketfu?”
Wacalata ababuka bonkhe labebasedvute naye watsi: “Nangu make nabomnaketfu.
Ngobe wonkhe lowenta intsandvo yaNkulunkulu ngumnaketfu, nadzadzewetfu, namake.”
“Lalelani la: Umuntfu lotsite wake wahamba wayawuhlanyela.
Kwatsi ngesikhatsi ahlanyela, lenye inhlanyelo yawela endleleni, kwefika tinyoni tayidla.
Lenye yawela edvwaleni lelalimbonywe ngumhlabashana, yashesha yamila, ngobe lomhlabashana bewungemnyenti.
Kwefika lilanga labalela, latishisa letitfombo, tabuna ngobe timphandze tato tatingakashoni ngalokwenele.
Lenye yawela elukhuleni lwemanyeva, lwakhula lwaminyetela titfombo ngemanyeva alo tangabe tisatsela.
Lenye yawela emhlabatsini lovundzile, yamila kahle, yakhula, yatsela titselo: lenye ngema-30, lenye ngema-60, lenye ngelikhulu.”
Kwatsi Jesu asasele nebafundzi bakhe lababeli-12 nalabanye lababemlandzela, bambuta ngalemifanekiso.
Waphendvula watsi: “Nine niphiwe imfihlakalo yembuso waNkulunkulu, kodvwa laba labangephandle konkhe bakutfola ngemifanekiso,
Jesu watsi kubo: “Nisho kutsi nani lomfanekiso aniwuva? Pho, nitayiva kanjani leminye imifanekiso?
Kuhlanyelwa kwaleyo leyawela endleleni kufanekisa labo labatsi bangaliva livi, masinyane kufike Sathane alitsatse lelivi lelihlanyelwe kubo.
Kuhlanyelwa kwaleyo leyawela emadvwaleni kufanekisa labo labatsi bangaliva livi basheshe balemukele ngekujabula,
kepha babe bate timphandze letishona ngalokwenele, balibamba kwesikhashana nje, batsi ngekuhlaselwa tilingo netinhlupheko ngenca yalo basheshe bahlubuke.
Kuhlanyelwa kwaleyo leyawela emanyeveni kufanekisa labo labalivako livi,
kepha kunaka tintfo tasemhlabeni nekujabulela umcebo, nekukhangwa nguletinye tintfo letinyenti kubangene, kuliminyetele livi, bangabe basatsela titselo.
Kuhlanyelwa emhlabatsini lovundzile kufanekisa labo labalivako livi balemukele batsele titselo: ngema-30 nome ngema-60 nome ngelikhulu.”
Konkhe lokufihlakele kuyawuvetwa ebaleni, naloko lokumbonyiwe kuyawugwatjulwa.
Lowo lonako uyakwengetelwa; lowo lote uyakwemukwa naloko lokuncane lanako.”
Jesu wachubeka watsi: “Umbuso waNkulunkulu ufanana nanaku: Umuntfu usakata inhlanyelo ensimini yakhe,
ebusuku uyalala, emini avuke, nenhlanyelo iyamila ikhule, kodvwa yena abe angati kutsi ikhula njani.
Umhlaba ngekwawo uveta kudla: Kucala kube likhaba, bese kuyabhaceka, kube netibhuluja leticinile,
kuyaye kutsi kungoma, kutsatfwe lisikela kuyewuvunwa, ngobe sikhatsi sekuvuna sesifikile.”
Jesu wabuta watsi: “Kodvwa umbuso waNkulunkulu singawufananisa nani nje? Singawubekisa ngani kodvwa?
Kepha umuntfu nakayihlanyela emhlabatsini, itsi ingamila, ikhule ibe sihlahla lesikhulu lesiveta emagala lamakhulu lanemtfunti, ngisho netinyoni tesiganga tifike takhe tidleke tato kuso.”
Jesu abekhuluma kubantfu ngemifanekiso leminyenti lenjalo, abashumayela livi ngalokubalingene kutsi bakuve.
Abengakhulumi lutfo angasebentisi imifanekiso, kantsi nase babodvwana nebafundzi bakhe, bona abebachazela konkhe.
Kusihlwa ngalelo langa Jesu watjela bafundzi bakhe watsi: “Aseweleleni ngesheya kwelwandle.”
Besuka basishiya sicumbi sebantfu, bahamba ngalesikebhe labekuso. Bekunaletinye tikebhe letatihambisana nalesabo.
Kwesuka lesikhulu sivunguvungu, emagagasi angena esikebheni adzimate acishe asigcwalisa.
Jesu abengemuva esikebheni, acamele emcamelweni, alele. Bamvusa batsi: “Mfundzisi, walala nje sifa?”
Wavuka wekhuta lomoya watsi kulolwandle: “Thula, utsi nya!” Umoya wakhawula khona lapho, kwathula kwatsi nya.
Watsi kubafundzi: “Nesabani kodvwa? Nentiwa yini lokutsi nibete kukholwa?”
Bafikelwa kwesaba lokukhulu; kwaba ngulowo wabuta lomunye atsi: “Kantsi ngubani lona? Wekhuta umoya ngisho nelwandle kumlalele!”
Base bewelela ngesheya kweLwandle LwaseGalile eveni laseGerasa.
Watsi Jesu uyaphuma nje esikebheni, wahlangabetwa yindvodza lebeyinelidimoni iphuma emathuneni,
lapho yase ihlala khona. Kwase kute namunye umuntfu labengakhona kuyibopha ngisho nangetinketane.
Beyike yetanywa ngaphambili kutsi iboshwe ngetindilimo nangetinketane, kodvwa beyitidzabula incamule naletinketane tibe ticucu. Kute labenemandla ekuyehlula.
Busuku nemini beyikhala impongoloze etintsabeni nasemathuneni, itihhwebhe ngematje.
Yatsi nayibona Jesu abucalu, yesuka ngematubane yaya kuye yafika yamkhotsama ikhuleka.
Yamemeta ngelivi lelikhulu yatsi: “Ufunani kimi wena, Jesu, Ndvodzana yaNkulunkulu Losetikwako Konkhe? Mane ungangihluphi!”
Yakusho loku, ngobe Jesu abesatsite kuyo: “Phuma dimoni kulomuntfu!”
Jesu wase uyabuta utsi: “Ungubani libito lakho?”
Yamphendvula yatsi: “Libito lami nguSibanyenti, ngobe silibutfo.”
Emadimoni ase ancenga Jesu kutsi angawacoshi kulelo live.
Bekukhona umhlambi lomkhulu wetihhontji kuleyo ndzawo utse bhidli, udla eceleni lentsaba.
Yase iyatincengela lemimoya lemibi itsi: “Mane usitfumele lapha etihhontjini singene kuto.”

Wayivumela. Yaphuma-ke imimoya lemibi kulowo muntfu yangena etihhontjini. Wonkhe lowo mhlambi lowawungahle ube tihhontji letiti-2 000 wagijima, wahholokoshela eweni, wagcumkela elwandle, wacwila, wafa.
Bantfu lababeluse letingulube babaleka bayawubika kubantfu edolobheni nasemaphandleni. Bantfu beta batawutibonela loko lokwase kwentekile.
Befika kuJesu bayibona lendvodza lebeyikadze inemadimoni, lebeyibitwa ngekutsi nguSibanyenti. Beyihleti phansi, yembetse kahle, isangulukile nasemcondvweni. Betfuka, besaba.
Labo lababebonile babachazela konkhe lokwakwentekile kulomuntfu labenemadimoni, nalokwakwentekile etihhontjini.
Base bancenga Jesu kutsi akesuke eveni labo.
Kwatsi Jesu nakakhwela esikebheni, lendvodza lebeyinemadimoni yacela kuJesu kutsi ihambe naye.
Kepha Jesu wala, watsi kuyo: “Buyela ekhaya kubantfu bakini, ubatjele kutsi iNkhosi ikwentele tintfo letinkhulu kangakanani, nekutsi ikuhawukele kanjani.”
Yahamba-ke lendvodza yacala kumemetela eDekhapholisi kutsi Jesu uyentele tintfo letinkhulu kangakanani. Bonkhe bamangala nabakuva loko.
Jesu wewela ngesikebhe wabuyela ngesheya kwelwandle. Sicuku lesikhulu sebantfu seta kuye ngaselwandle.
Kwefika kuye indvodza, libito layo kunguJayiru, umphatsi welisinagoge, yanelela kubona Jesu yatilahla phansi embikwakhe.
Yamncenga yatsi: “Indvodzakati yami lencane igulela kufa, sekubonwa ngekusa. Mane ute uteyibeka tandla itekusindza iphile.”
Jesu wavuma wahamba nayo. Sicumbi lesikhulu sebantfu samlandzela simkakile.
Bekukhona umfati labegula, aphetfwe sifo sekopha, lesase sicedze iminyaka leli-12 simphetse.
Abesagule kakhulu, asaphelelwe timali kulabelaphako, angasenalutfo esandleni, kodvwa kujinge kubete buncono, kugula kuya embili.
Abesake weva tidvumo ngaJesu, ngako watfumbeleta ngemuva kwaJesu watsintsa ingubo yakhe,
ngobe wacabanga watsi: “Nangingamane nje ngitsintse ingubo yakhe, ngitawuphila.”
Kopha kwancamuka khona lapho, wativa asaphilile esifeni lebesimphetse.
Masinyane Jesu wativela kutsi kukhona emandla lasaphumile kuye, wagucuka, wacalata, watsi: “Ngubani lotsintse ingubo yami?”
Bafundzi bakhe batsi kuye: “Hhawu, ungatsi usibona nje lesiminyaminya lesikukakile ube utsi: ‘Ngubani lotsintse ingubo yami?’ ”
Wacalata afuna kubona kutsi ngubani lona lomtsintsile.
Kodvwa lomfati ati kahle kutsi kwentekeni kuye, wasondzela ngembili achachatela, ngenca yekwesaba, waguca phansi embikwakhe, wamtjela lonkhe liciniso.
Jesu watsi kuye: “Ndvodzakati yami, kukholwa kwakho kukuphilisile. Hamba ngekuthula, uphile esifeni sakho.”
Asakhuluma nje Jesu, kwefika tigijimi tiphuma kaJayiru tambikela tatsi: “Indvodzakati yakho seyifile. Sale umyekela loMfundzisi, ungasamhluphi.”
Kodvwa Jesu, angakunaki loku letatikusho, watsi kuJayiro: “Ungesabi, kholwa kuphela.”
Jesu wesuka lapho wahamba; wabalela bonkhe kutsi bamlandzele, ngaphandle kwaboPhetro, naJakobe, naJohane, umnakaboJakobe.
Batsi nabefika endlini yalomphatsi welisinagoge, beva sililo kutse mpu, bantfu bakhala.
Watsi kube angene, watsi kubo: “Nikhalelani, nidzindza sililo nje? Lomntfwana akafi, ulele.”
Bamane bamhleka bulima nje. Wabakhiphela ngephandle bonkhe, watsatsa uyise nenina walomntfwana, nalabo labebanaye, wangena nabo lapho bekunemntfwana khona.
Wafike wabamba lomntfwana ngesandla, watsi kuye: “Thalitha, khumi,” lokusho kutsi: “Ntfombatana, ngitsi kuwe: Vuka!”
Intfombatana yasukuma masinyane, yahamba. Bese ineminyaka leli-12 budzala. Masinyane bantfu behlelwa kwesaba nekumangala lokukhulu.
Jesu wabayalisisa kutsi bangatjeli muntfu ngaloku. Watsi abayiphe kudla lentfombatana.
Jesu wesuka lapho wabuyela endzaweni yakubo, bafundzi bakhe bamlandzela.

Kwatsi ngeliSabatha wacala wafundzisa esinagogeni. Labanyenti labamuva bamangala, batsi: “Lomuntfu wakutsatsaphi konkhe loku? Nhlakanipho lenjani lena layiphiwe? Letimangaliso letingaka utenta kanjani?
Akusiye yini umbati, indvodzana yaMariya, umnakaboJakobe, naJose, naJudasi, naSimoni? Angitsi bodzadzewabo balapha emkhatsini wetfu?” Base bayamcansukela.
Akakhonanga kwenta imisebenti yemandla kuleyo ndzawo ngaphandle kwekutsi nje wabeka tandla kulabambalwa lababegula, wabaphilisa.
Jesu abehamba angenela imiti ngemiti yangakubo afundzisa bantfu.
Wabita bafundzi labali-12 watsi abete kuye. Wabatfuma ngababili, wabanika emandla ekukhipha imimoya lemibi kubantfu.
Kodvwa watsi bafake tincabule, bangatihlindzekeli ngeliyembe lesibili.
Watsi kubo: “Nabaningenisa endlini, nibohlala kuleyondlu, nize nihambe kuleyo ndzawo.
Nakukhona lapho banganemukeli khona bangavumi nekunilalela, nibobashiya nihambe, nitsintsitse lutfuli etinyaweni tenu, kuze kube bufakazi bekunala kwabo.”
Bahamba-ke baphostoli bashumayela bantfu kutsi baphendvuke.
Bakhipha emadimoni lamanyenti kubantfu, nalabanyenti lababegula babagcobisa ngemafutsa babaphilisa.
Kodvwa labanye babetsi: “Ngu-Elija.” Labanye batsi: “Ngumphrofethi njengalabanye baphrofethi bakadzeni.”
Kodvwa Herodi, nakeva ngesimo setintfo, watsi: “Johane, lengamjuba inhloko, sewuvusiwe, uyaphila.”
Phela Johane abekhute Herodi watsi: “Umtsetfo awukuvumeli kutsi utsatse umfati wemnakenu, umente wakho.”
Nguko-ke Herodiyasi waba nemagcubu naJohane, afisa kutsi abulawe, kodvwa abete indlela.
Herodi bekamesaba Johane amati kahle kutsi ungumuntfu lolungile nalongcwele, ngako-ke abemvikela. Abetsi, nakamuva akhuluma, adzidzeke, noko ajabulele kumlalela.
Kodvwa litfuba lavuleka ngesikhatsi Herodi agubha lusuku lwakhe lwekutalwa. Wenta sibhimbi, wabita bonkhe bantfu besigodlo sakhe, netindvuna takhe temphi, kanye netiphakanyiswa taseGalile.
Indvodzakati yaHerodiyasi yeta yabagidzela kahle kakhulu. Herodi wajabula kanye netivakashi takhe, wadzimate watsi kulentfombatana: “Cela kimi nome ngabe yini lokufunako, ngitakupha kona.”
Wafunga watsi kuyo: “Nome yini lotayicela kimi, ngitakupha yona, nome ngabe yihhafu yembuso wami.”
Yaphumela ngephandle intfombatana yaya kuyawubuta kunina yatsi: “Ngingacelani?” Unina watsi: “Cela inhloko yaJohane uMbhabhatisi.”
Masinyane intfombatana yabuya igijima, yafika enkhosini yacela yatsi: “Ngifuna ungiphe nyalo nje inhloko yaJohane uMbhabhatisi, ibekwe emgcwembeni.”
Inkhosi yadzabuka kakhulu; kodvwa ngenca yesifungo, lebeseyisentile embikwetivakashi tayo, ayitsandzanga kusephula.
Masinyane inkhosi yatfumela lisotja kutsi aliletse inhloko yaJohane. Lahamba layawujuba inhloko yaJohane ejele.
Yaletfwa-ke inhloko yaJohane isemgcwembeni, yaniketwa intfombatana, intfombatana yayinika unina.
Batsi kube bakuve loko bafundzi baJohane, bahamba bayawutsatsa sidvumbu sakhe bayawusingcwaba.
Baphostoli babuya kuJesu bafike bambikela ngako konkhe lababekwentile nalababekufundzisile.
Watsi kubo: “Ase sibonane sodvwa, siphumule kancane.” Ngobe bekuphitsitela bantfu behla benyuka, loko kwenta kutsi Jesu nebafundzi bakhe babete nalesincane nje sikhatsi ngisho nesekudla imbala.
Ngako bahamba ngemkhumbi baya endzaweni lete bantfu, baba bodvwana.
Noko bantfu labanyenti bababona nase bahamba, babalandzela ngematubane, batsi phitsilili bavela kuwo onkhe emadolobha, baze befika kucala nakuleyo ndzawo abeya kuyo Jesu nebafundzi bakhe.
Watsi uyehla nje Jesu esikebheni wabona lesikhulu sicumbi sebantfu, wabahawukela ngobe bebanjengetimvu letite umelusi. Wabafundzisa ngetintfo letinyenti.
Kwatsi nase liyawushona, bafundzi bakhe beta kuye batsi: “Lendzawo ilihlane, kantsi futsi nelilanga seliya kunina.
Bahambise labantfu baye emitini nasemadolobhaneni lasedvute bayetitsengela kudla.”
Kepha Jesu wabaphendvula watsi: “Banikeni nine labangahle bakudle.”
Batsi bona: “Singaya yini kuyawutsenga tinkhwa ngabodenariyo labangema-200 sibanikete badle?”
Watsi kubo: “Ase niyewuhlola kutsi ninetinkhwa letingaki.”
Batsi nase bahlolile, babuya batsi: “Sinetinkhwa letisihlanu netinhlanti letimbili.”
Wabayala bafundzi bakhe watsi abahlalise labantfu ngetigaba tabo etjanini lobuluhlata.
Ngako bahlala phansi ngeticheme tabo: ngemakhulu nangema-50.

Watsatsa letinkhwa letisihlanu naletinhlanti letimbili wabuka etulu ezulwini, watibusisa. Wahlephula letinkhwa watiniketa bafundzi bakhe kutsi batabele labantfu; wacetuna naletinhlanti letimbili wabanika bonkhe.
Bafundzi babutsa timvutfuluka tetinkhwa netetinhlanti, bagcwalisa emabhasikidi lali-12.
Emadvodza ladla kuleto tinkhwa abe ti-5 000.
Masinyane Jesu wangenisa bafundzi bakhe esikebheni, wabahambisa ngembili kwakhe, wabewetela ngesheya eBhethsayida, yena wasala ahambisa lesicuku sebantfu.
Kwatsi nakuhwalalako, sikebhe sabe sisekhatsi nelwandle, yena waba yedvwa elusentseni.

Wababona kutsi basigwedla kamatima sikebhe, ngobe umoya bewuphambene nabo. Kwatsi ekuseni kungakasi, emkhatsini weli-awa lesitsatfu nelesitfupha, Jesu weta kubo ahamba etikwemanti. Wacondza embili, washaya kungatsi uyendlula.
Bona-ke bambona ahamba etikwemanti bakhala bamemeta batsi: “Sipoko!”
Ngobe bambona bonkhe betfuka, besaba kakhulu.
Masinyane wakhuluma nabo, watsi: “Manini sibindzi, ningesabi, ngimi.”
Wangena esikebheni sabo, umoya wathula, ngako bamangala kakhulu.
Bebangacondzisisi kahle kutsi tinkhwa betichazani, imicondvo yabo yayivalekile.
Batsi nase bewelile, bakhunga sikebhe elusentseni lwelwandle, behlela eGenesaretha.
Batsi nabehla esikebheni, bantfu bambona masinyane Jesu.
Bagijima bonkhe bachamuka kuto tonkhe tigodzi letatimadvutane, baletsa labagulako ngetinhlaka, babaletsa lapho beve kutsi ungakhona Jesu.

Yonkhe indzawo lapho abeya khona Jesu emitini, nasemadolobheni, nasemaphandleni, babeletsa kuye tigulane etimakethe. Tamncenga kutsi sale avuma kutsi titsintse umphetfo wengubo yakhe. Nembala tonkhe letawutsintsa taphila.
BaFarisi kanye naletinye tati temtsetfo babutsana kuJesu, baphuma eJerusalema.
Babona kutsi bafundzi bakhe badla ngetandla letatingakagezwa, letatingcolile ngekwelisiko lebuJuda.
Phela baFarisi, njengemaJuda onkhe, bebasabambelele kakhulu emasikweni abokhokho babo, babengadli bangakagezi tandla.
Ngisho nekudla lokuphuma etimakethe bebangakudli bangakakuhlambululi.
Ngako-ke baFarisi netati temtsetfo babuta Jesu batsi: “Kwentiwa yini lokutsi bafundzi bakho bangawenti emasiko abokhokho, kodvwa besuke badle nje ngetandla letingcolile?”
Jesu wachubeka watsi: “Niyekela imitsetfo yaNkulunkulu nibambelele emitsetfweni yebantfu.”
Wabuye watsi kubo: “Ninemacebo lahlakaniphile ekulahla imiyalo yaNkulunkulu, khona nitewubambelela emasikweni enu.
Mosi watsi: ‘Hlonipha uyihlo nenyoko,’ nekutsi: ‘Umuntfu lowetfuka uyise nome unina, akabulawe afe.’
Kodvwa nine nitsi: ‘Umuntfu nakanelutfo langahle asite ngalo uyise nome unina, kepha bese utsi: “Sekuyikorbani”,’ (lokusho kutsi sekwehlukaniselwe Nkulunkulu),
‘lowo muntfu akasavumeleki kutsi asite unina nome uyise ngaleyontfo.’
Ngaleyo ndlela nilenta lite livi laNkulunkulu, nilicitsa ngetimfundziso tenu temasiko leninikana wona. Kunyenti lenikwentako lokufanana naloku.”
Jesu wabuye wabita sicuku lesikhulu sebantfu watsi kuso: “Lalelani nonkhe nitekuva kutsi ngitsini.
Kute kudla lokungena ngemlomo lokungahle kumngcolise umuntfu, kepha lokumngcolisako umuntfu nguloko lokuphuma kuye.
Kwatsi nase angene endlini asehlukene nebantfu, bafundzi bakhe bambuta batsi: “Usho kutsini lomfanekiso?”
Wabaphendvula watsi: “Kantsi nani nisengakangiva? Nani aniboni kutsi kute lokungena ngemlomo lokungamngcolisa umuntfu?
Phela kudla akuyi enhlitiyweni, kodvwa kucondza esiswini, nakhona kufike kwengce.” Ngaloko Jesu abechaza kutsi konkhe kudla kuhlantekile.
Wachubeka watsi: “Nguloko lokuphuma ngekhatsi lokumngcolisako umuntfu.
Ngobe enhlitiyweni yemuntfu kuphuma imicabango lemibi, nebugwadla, nekuba, nekubulala,
nekuphinga, nekukhanuka, nekukhohlakala, nekuyengana, nemanyala, nemona, nekunyundza, nekutigcabha, nebulima.
Bonkhe bubi lobunjalo buchamuka ngekhatsi kumuntfu bumngcolise.”
Jesu wesuka lapho wahamba waya esigodzini saseThire [naseSidoni].
Lomunye umfati labegulelwa yindvodzakati yakhe inelidimoni weva ngaye, weta watilahla phansi etinyaweni takhe.
Lomfati abengewetive, angumSirofenikhe ngekutalwa. Wancusa Jesu kutsi akhiphe lelidimoni kulendvodzakati yakhe.
Kepha Jesu watsi kuye: “Asekwenele kucala bantfwana bendlini, ngobe akukalungi kutsi sitsatse kudla kwebantfwana bendlini sikunikete tinja.”
Kodvwa lomfati watsi kuye: “Yebo, kona Nkhosi, ucinisile; kodvwa noko netinja letingaphansi kwelitafula tiyawatfola emavutfuluka lawa kubantfwana.”
Jesu wase utsi kuye: “Mahle emavi lowakhulumile. Ungahamba, lidimoni seliphumile endvodzakatini yakho.”
Lomfati wahamba wabuyela ekhaya, wakhandza lendvodzakati yakhe icambalele embhedzeni, lidimoni seliphumile kuyo.
Jesu wesuka esifundzeni saseThire wayakujika eSidoni, wadzabula sifundza saseDekhapholisi acondze eLwandle lwaseGalile.
Kwaletfwa kuye indvodza lebeyisihhulu, futsi ingakhulumi nakahle. Bacela kutsi Jesu ayibeke tandla.
Jesu wayehlukanisa nebantfu yaba yodvwa, wase ufaka iminwe yakhe etindlebeni tayo, wakhafula, wase utsintsa lulwimi lwayo.
Wabheka ezulwini wabubula watsi kuyo: “Efatha,” lokusho kutsi: “Vuleka.”
Tindlebe tayo tavuleka, ngekushesha lulwimi lwayo lwacatuluka, yase ikhuluma ngalokuvakala kahle.
Jesu wabayala bantfu kutsi bangatjeli muntfu ngaloku. Kwaba shangatsi ubabangile, batsi besuka babe bayisakata nelive lonkhe.
Bamangala kakhulu batsi: “Lomuntfu utenta kahle tonkhe tintfo. Wenta labangeva beve, nalabangakhulumi bakhulume!”
Kwatsi nje kuwo lawo malanga ticumbi tebantfu tabutsanela kuJesu, tase teswele kudla letatingakudla. Ngako-ke Jesu wabita bafundzi bakhe watsi kubo:
“Ngiyabadzabukela labantfu, ngobe bebakanye nami lapha kwaze kwaba ngemalanga lamatsatfu. Manje sebate lutfo loludliwako.
Futsi nangibahambisa ngendlala kutsi baye emakhaya, batawucaleka ngendlela, ngobe labanye babo besuka khashane kakhulu.”
Bafundzi bakhe bamphendvula batsi: “Kepha vele, umuntfu angabaphani la ehlane, kute netinkhwa nje?”
Jesu wababuta watsi: “Ninetinkhwa letingakhi?” Bamphendvula batsi: “Tisikhombisa.”
Wase utsi kulabantfu abahlale phansi, watsatsa letinkhwa letisikhombisa watsi kube atibusise wase uyatihlephula watinika bafundzi bakhe kuze babele labantfu. Nangempela-ke bababela.
Babenetinhlantana nje letimbalwa, nato watibusisa, watsi nato atabelwe labantfu.
Bantfu badla besutsa; babutsa timvutfuluka letatisele, tagcwala emabhasikidi lasikhombisa.
Bantfu lababelapho babengacishe babe ti-4 000. Jesu-ke wase utsi sale babuyela emakhaya abo.
Waphutfuma yena wangena esikebheni kanye nebafundzi bakhe, balibangisa eDalmanutha.
Wesuka wabashiya, wangena esikebheni walibangisa ngesheya kwelwandle.
Bafundzi baJesu bakhohlwa kutiphatsela tinkhwa; bese basele nesinkhwa sinye kuphela esikebheni.
Bakhulumisana bodvwana batsi: “Kumbe usho ngobe kute sinkhwa.”
Jesu ababona kutsi batsini, watsi kubo: “Nikhulumelani ngendzaba yekubate kwenu sinkhwa? Nanyalo anikacondzi, futsi anikaboni? Kantsi tinhlitiyo tenu senitente taba lukhuni yini?
Naloku ninemehlo kaniboni? Nangetindlebe kaniva? Anisakhumbuli?
Namzukwana ngihlephula tinkhwa letisihlanu, ngihlephulela ti-5 000, nagcwalisa emabhasikidi lamangaki?”
Jesu watsi efika nje eBhethsayida, baletsa kuye imphumphutse, bamcela kutsi ayitsintse ngesandla.
Wayibamba ngesandla lemphumphutse wayikhiphela ngephandle kwemuti. Watsi kube ayikhafulele emehlweni wayibeka tandla wayibuta watsi: “Kukhona yini lokubonako?”
Lemphumphutse yaphakamisa inhloko yatsi: “Ngibona bantfu, kodvwa banjengetihlahla letihambako.”
Waphindza futsi Jesu wabeka tandla emehlweni ayo. Yabukisisa, yaphiliswa, yabona kahle konkhe.
Wase uyayiyala kutsi ayiye ekhaya layo, watsi: “Ungasaphambukeli edolobheni.”
Emvakwaloko Jesu wesuka wahamba nebafundzi bakhe baya emadolobhaneni langaseKhesariya Filiphi; basesendleleni wababuta bafundzi bakhe watsi: “Bantfu batsi mine ngingubani?”
Jesu wabayala abafica kutsi bangatjeli muntfu ngaye.

Jesu watjela bafundzi bakhe kutsi iNdvodzana yemuntfu ifanele kuhlushwa ngalokunyenti, ilahlwe natibondza telibandla, nebaphatsi bebaphristi, netati temtsetfo, ibulawe, ivuke emvakwemalanga lamatsatfu.
Loko wakusho ngalokucacile. Phetro wamdvonsela eceleni wamekhuta.
Kodvwa Jesu waphendvuka wabuka bafundzi, wakhahla Phetro, watsi: “Suka kimi, Sathane! Awukunakekeli lokukwaNkulunkulu, kodvwa unakekela kwebantfu!”
Ngobe wonkhe lofuna kusindzisa kuphila kwakhe, uyawulahlekelwa nguko, nalowo lolahlekelwa kuphila kwakhe ngenca yami nangenca yeliVangeli, uyawukusindzisa.
Ngabe kambe kuyawumsita ngani umuntfu kuzuza live lonkhe, kepha alahlekelwe ngumphefumulo wakhe?
Ingabe angakhiphani umuntfu kuhlenga umphefumulo wakhe?
Lowo lonemahloni ngami, nangemavi ami, kulesitukulwane lesonakele nalesiphingako, neNdvodzana yeMuntfu iyawuba nemahloni ngaye, nayifika ebukhosini beYise kanye netingilosi letingcwele.”
Jesu waphindza watsi: “Ngicinisile, ngitsi kini: Bakhona labeme lapha emkhatsini wenu labangayikubona kufa bangakaboni Nkulunkulu abusa ngemandla.”
Tingubo takhe tacwebetela taba mhlophe nke, kwakungekho muntfu emhlabeni jikelele labengatenta tibe mhlophe njengato.
Kwabonakala kubo bo-Elija banaMosi, bakhuluma naJesu.
Phetro watsi kuJesu: “Mfundzisi, kuhle lokutsi sibe lapha. Asakhe emathende lamatsatfu, linye litawuba lakho, lelinye libe laMosi, lelinye libe la-Elija.”
Phela loko wakusho angasati kutsi utsini, ngobe base bafile luvalo.
Batsi batsi cala cala, bangete babona muntfu ngaphandle kwaJesu yedvwa.
Basehla entsabeni Jesu wabayala kutsi bangacali batjele muntfu ngaloku labakubonile, iNdvodzana yeMuntfu ingakavuswa kulabafile.
Nangempela basigcina leseluleko, kodvwa babutana bodvwa batsi: “Kusho kutsini ‘kuvuka kulabafile’?”
Bambuta batsi: “Tisho ngani tati temtsetfo lokutsi: ‘Kufanele kufike Elija kucala’?”
Kodvwa ngiyanitjela ngitsi: Elija sewefika, noko bantfu benta kuye konkhe labakutsandzako, njengaloku kubhaliwe ngaye.”
Batsi nabefika kubafundzi labanye, bakhandza sicumbi lesikhulu sibakakile netati temtsetfo tiphikisana nabo.
Masinyane nje sicuku satsi kube simbone Jesu, samangala kakhulu, sagijima saya kuye sayawumbingelela.
Lomunye kulesicuku watsi kuye: “Mfundzisi, ngiletse nansi indvodzana yami kuwe, ngobe inelidimoni lelisimungulu.
Litsi lingambamba limlahle phansi, limkliklitise, akhihlite emagwebu, abhashe ematinyo, ome atsi nkhwa. Ngicele labafundzi bakho kutsi balikhiphe, kodvwa behlulekile.”
Wabaphendvula watsi: “Awu, situkulwane lesingakholwa, kuyawudzimate kube ngunini nginani? Kuyawudzimate kube ngunini nginibeketelela? Mletseni la kimi!”
Lanelela kumbona nje lelidimoni, lamlahla phansi umfana, lamekhama, washumpha aphukuhla emagwebu emlonyeni.
Jesu wabuta uyise walomfana watsi: “Selinesikhatsi lesingakanani limphetse?”
Belihle limjika nasemlilweni, nasemantini, lifuna kumbulala. Kodvwa nakukhona longakwenta, mane usihawukele usisite.”
Masinyane uyise walomfana wakhala amemeta atsi: “Ngiyakholwa, sita kungakholwa kwami.”
Jesu watsi kube abone sicumbi sibutsana, wawekhuta lomoya lomubi watsi: “Moya webumungulu nebuhhulu! Ngiyakutjela ngitsi: Phuma kuye! Ungaphindzi futsi ubuye kuye!”
Lidimoni latswilila, lamhlukumeta kamatima lomfana, laphuma kuye. Lomfana walala watsi dzalakaca, wafanana nesidvumbu. Labanyenti babo badzimate batsi: “Ufile.”
Kodvwa Jesu wambamba ngesandla; wamsukumisa, nembala wasukuma.
Jesu nasangene endlini nebafundzi bakhe babodvwa, bambuta batsi: “Kwentiwe yini kutsi tsine sehluleke kulikhipha lelidimoni?”
Wabaphendvula Jesu watsi: “Loluhlobo lolu aluphumi ngalutfo lolunye ngaphandle kwemkhuleko [nekuzila kudla]
Jesu nebafundzi bakhe besuka lapho bachubekela embili, badzabula eGalile. Abengatsandzi kutsi bantfu bati kutsi ukuphi.
Jesu wabafundzisa bafundzi bakhe atsi: “INdvodzana yeMuntfu itawuniketwa etandleni tebantfu. Bona batayibulala. Nase bayibulele itawuvuka ngelilanga lesitsatfu.”
Kodvwa abazange bayive leyo nkhulumo, besaba nekumbuta.
Befika eKhaphanawume; batsi nase bangekhatsi endlini, Jesu wababuta watsi: “Beniphikisana ngani endleleni?”
Jesu wahlala phansi, wabita bafundzi bakhe labebali-12, watsi kubo: “Lofuna kuba mkhulu kunabo bonkhe, kufanele atitfobe ngaphansi kwabo bonkhe, abe sisebenti sabo bonkhe.”
Wasondzeta umntfwana wammisa emkhatsini wabo, wamgona ngemikhono yakhe, watsi kubo:
“Lowo lowemukela lomunye walabantfwana egameni lami, wemukela mine; nalowo lowemukela mine, akemukeli mine kuphela, kodvwa wemukela nalowo longitfumile.”
Kodvwa Jesu watsi: “Ningamaleli, ngobe kute longenta imisebenti yemandla egameni lami, longajika masinyane akhulume kabi ngami.
Ngobe lowo longakemelani natsi, ukanye natsi.
Ngicinisile, ngitsi kini: Lowo loyakuninatsisa nome yinkomishi yinye nje yemanti, ngobe ningebaKhristu, nakanjani uyakwemukela umvuzo wakhe.”

“Lowo lowenta munye nje walaba labancane labakholwa ngimi aphambuke endleleni yaNkulunkulu, bekuyakuba ncono kuye kutsi kunkinkelwe inguzanguza yelitje entsanyeni yakhe, agcumkiselwe elwandle, amite afe.
‘Kuleyo ndzawo timphetfu takhona atifi, nemlilo wakhona awucimi.’]
Nangabe lunyawo lwakho lukonisa, lujube! Kuncono umane ungene ekuphileni uyinchute, kunekutsi ube netinyawo totimbili kodvwa uyewulahlwa esihogweni. [
‘Kuleyo ndzawo timphetfu takhona atifi, nemlilo wakhona awucimi.’]
Nangabe liso lakho likonisa, likupulute ulilahle khashane! Kuncono umane ungene embusweni waNkulunkulu uneliso linye, kunekutsi ube nemehlo omabili kodvwa uyewulahlwa esihogweni.
‘Kuleyo ndzawo timphetfu takhona atifi, nemlilo wakhona awucimi.’
“Ngobe phela wonkhe umuntfu uyawuvangwa ngemlilo, njengobe kudla kuvangwa ngeluswayi.
“Banini neluswayi ngekhatsi kwenu, nibe nekuthula lomunye kulomunye, nivane.”
Jesu wesuka lapho waya eveni laseJudiya adzabula live lelingesheya kweJordane. Ticumbi letikhulu tebantfu taphindza tabutsanela kuye, watifundzisa njengenhlalayenta.
Kwase kuta baFarisi kuye batakumlinga, bambuta batsi: “Kuvumelekile yini emtsetfweni kutsi indvodza idivose umkayo?”
Kodvwa Jesu watsi kubo: “Mosi wanibhalela loko ngenca yebulukhuni betinhlitiyo tenu.
Kodvwa ekucaleni kwendalo ‘uMdali wenta umuntfu lomdvuna nalomsikati.
Ngaloko-ke indvodza iyawushiya uyise nenina [inamatsele kumkayo]
labo bobabili sebayawuba nyamanye.’ Ngako-ke abasebabili, sebamunye.
Loko losekuhlanganiswe nguNkulunkulu, akungabe kusehlukaniswa ngumuntfu.”
Sebasendlini, bafundzi bakhe bambuta futsi ngalendzaba.
Watsi kubo: “Lowo lodivosa umkakhe bese utsatsa lomunye umfati, unelicala kumkakhe lekuphinga.
Nalowo lodivosa indvodza yakhe bese wendza kulenye indvodza, unelicala endvodzeni yakhe lekuphinga.”
Labanye bantfu baletsa bantfwana kuye, khona atewubeka tandla etikwabo ababusise; bafundzi babakhalimela.
Kodvwa watsi kube akubone loko Jesu, watfukutsela watsi kubo: “Vumelani bantfwana bete kimi, ningabavimbeli, ngobe umbuso waNkulunkulu walabanjalo.
Ngicinisile, ngitsi kini: Lowo longawemukeli umbuso waNkulunkulu njengemntfwana, angeke angene kuwo.”
Wabatsatsa labantfwana, wabagona, wabeka tandla etikwabo, wababusisa.
Kwatsi Jesu nasatawuhamba, kwachamuka indvodza ita igijima, yefika yaguca embikwakhe yambuta yatsi: “Mfundzisi lolungile, ngingentani kuze ngitfole kuphila lokuphakadze?”
Jesu watsi kuye: “Ungibitelani ngekutsi ngilungile? Kute lolungile, nguNkulunkulu kuphela.
Uyayati imiyalo letsi: ‘Ungabulali, ungaphingi, ungebi, ungafakazi emanga, ungatsatsi lutfo ngebucili, hlonipha uyihlo nenyoko.’ ”
Yamphendvula yatsi: “Mfundzisi, konkhe loko ngakugcina kusukela ebuntfwaneni bami.”
Jesu asambuka wamtsandza watsi kuye: “Kunye lokusasele kutsi ukwente: Hamba uyewutsengisa ngako konkhe lonako, wabele labamphofu lemali, khona uyawuba
nemcebo ezulwini, bese-ke uyeta uyangilandzela.” Yajabha kakhulu nayikuva loko, ngobe beyinjinge kakhulu, yahamba umoya wayo sewushone phansi.
Jesu wabuka bafundzi bakhe watsi kubo: “Maye, kuyawuba lukhuni kulabo labanjingile kungena embusweni waNkulunkulu!”
Bafundzi bakhe bamangala ngalawo mavi akhe. Kodvwa Jesu waphindze watsi kubo: “Bantfwabami, kumatima kungena embusweni waNkulunkulu.
Kulula kungena kwelikamela embotjeni yenyalitsi kunekungena kwemuntfu lonjingile embusweni waNkulunkulu.”
Bafundzi bamangala kakhulu babutana bodvwana batsi: “Kepha nakunjalo, ngubani longasindziswa?”
Phetro watsi kuye: “Buka la, tsine sishiye konkhe, salandzela wena.”
Jesu watsi: “Ngicinisile, ngitsi kini: Lowo loshiye umuti, nome bomnakabo, nome bodzadzewabo, nome unina, nome uyise, nome bantfwana, nome emasimi, ngenca yami nangenca yeliVangeli,

uyakwemukeliswa lokunyenti aselapha kulomhlaba. Uyawuphiwa ngalokuphindvwe kalikhulu: imiti, nabomnakabo, nabodzadzewabo, nabonina, nebantfwana, nemasimi, yebo, ngisho netinhlupheko, bese kutsi kulelitako atfole kuphila lokuphakadze.
Labanyenti lababekucala bayawuba bekugcina, nalabo lababekugcina bayawuba bekucala.”

Batsi basendleleni benyukela eJerusalema, Jesu abahola embili, bafundzi bakhe bebasamangele, nalabo labebamlandzela befikelwa kwesaba. Waphindza watsatsa bafundzi bakhe labali-12, wakhweshela nabo eceleni, wabafundzisa, abatjela ngaloko lebekutamehlela,
watsi: “Ase nilalele la, sesenyukela eJerusalema, iNdvodzana yeMuntfu itawunikelwa kubaphristi labakhulu nasetatini temtsetfo, batayilahla ngelicala kutsi ibulawe. Batayinikela kubetive.
Batawuhlekisa ngayo, bayikhafulele ngematse, bayibhambabule, bayibulale, kodvwa kuyawutsi ngelilanga lesitsatfu ivuke kulabafile.”
BoJakobe, naJohane, emadvodzana aZebedi, basondzela kuJesu batsi: “Mfundzisi, kukhona lesicela kutsi usentele kona.”
Batsi kuye: “Sicela kutsi lomunye wetfu ahlale ngesekudla sakho, lomunye ahlale ngesancele sakho ebukhosini bakho.”
Batsi kuye: “Singakumela.” Jesu watsi kubo: “Yebo kona, lendzebe lengitayinatsa nani nitayinatsa; nangalombhabhatiso lengitawubhajatiswa ngawo nani nitawubhajatiswa ngawo.
Kodvwa tikhundla tekuhlala ngesekudla nome ngesancele sami akusiko kwami kutsi ngephane ngato; kodvwa talabo labalungiselelwe tona nguNkulunkulu.”
Batsi nabakuva loko lababelishumi, babacansukela boJakobe naJohane.
Jesu wababita wabatjela watsi: “Niyati kutsi babusi betive babusa etikwato, netikhulu tato titiphetse ngesandla lesimatima.
Kodvwa akukafaneli kutsi kube njalo kini, lowo lofuna kuba ngulomkhulu kini nonkhe, akabe sisebenti senu nonkhe.
Nalowo lofuna kuba wekucala kini, akabe sigcili senu nonkhe.
Ngobe neNdvodzana yeMuntfu ayitelanga kutawukhontwa, kodvwa yetela kutawukhonta, nekunikela ngekuphila kwayo kutsi ibe yinhlawulo yalabanyenti.”
Befika eJerikho. Jesu nase aphuma khona kanye nebafundzi bakhe, nesicuku lesikhulu sebantfu, Bhathimeyosi, imphumphutse, umsa waThimeyosi, abehleti ngasemgwacweni acela kuphiwa.
Watsi kube eve kutsi nguJesu waseNazaretha, wamemeta kakhulu atsi: “Jesu, Ndvodzana yaDavide! Ngihawukele!”
Labanyenti bamkhahlameta, batsi akathule; kodvwa kwaba shangatsi bambangile, washo kakhulu watsi: “Ndvodzana yaDavide, ngihawukele!”
Bayibita lemphumphutse, batsi: “Ungesabi, sukuma, uyakubita Jesu.”
Yalahla phansi lijazi layo, yasukuma yabanga kuJesu.
Lemphumphutse yatsi: “Mfundzisi wami, mane ngibone nje.”
Masinyane avuleka emehlo ayo abona, yase ilandzela Jesu eluhambeni lwakhe.
Batsi kube basondzele eJerusalema sebasedvute naseBhethifage neBhetani, ngaseNtsabeni Yemincumo, Jesu watfumela bafundzi bakhe lababili,
watsi kubo: “Hambani nize ningene edolobhaneni lelimacondzana nani; nitawukhandza kukhungwe litfole lembongolo, lelingazange seligitjelwe. Nifike nilikhumule, nililetse la.
Nakukhona lonibutako atsi: ‘Nikwentelani loko?’ nibotsi: ‘INkhosi iyalidzinga, italibuyisa masinyane.’ ”
Bahamba-ke labo lababili balikhandza lelitfole likhungwe ngasesangweni, ngephandle kwemuti, ngasemgwacweni, balitfukulula.
Labo lababeme lapho bababuta batsi: “Nentani? Nilikhumulelani lelitfole?”
Babatjela loko labebakutjelwe nguJesu; nembala bantfu babayekela bahamba.
Baliletsa kuJesu lelitfole. Bagaca tingubo tabo etikwalo, Jesu waligibela.
Labanyenti bendlala tingubo tabo emgwacweni, labanye bendlala emagala etihlahla labebawagawule esigangeni.
Labo labebahamba embili nalabebahamba ngemuva babememeta batsi:
Jesu wangena-ke eJerusalema, wacondza ngekhatsi ethempelini. Watsi kube acedze kubuka konkhe, wase uyengca uya eBhetani ngobe kwase kuhlwile, abehamba kanye nebafundzi bakhe lababeli-12.
Ngakusasa nase babuya eBhetani, Jesu wativa asalambile.
Wabona bucalu sihlahla semkhiwa sinemacembe, waya kuso ayewufuna emakhiwa. Watsi uyefika wakhandza kute, kungemacembe odvwa, ngobe bekungesiso sikhatsi semakhiwa.
Watsi kulesihlahla: “Sale kubate muntfu loyakudla emakhiwa la kuwe nanini.”
Befika eJerusalema. Jesu wangena ethempelini wakhipha bonkhe lababetsenga nalababetsengisa. Wagumbucela ematafula alababentjintja timali kanye netihlalo talabebatsengisa ngematuba.
Abengavumeli muntfu kutsi ahambe adzabule emabaleni elithempeli atfwele.
Wabafundzisa watsi: “Akashongo yini Nkulunkulu emBhalweni wakhe watsi: ‘Indlu yami iyawubitwa ngekutsi yindlu lapho kuthandaza khona tonkhe tive’? Kodvwa nine seniyigucule yaba ngumhume wabosidlani!”

Baphristi labakhulu kanye netati temtsetfo batsi kube bakuve loko, bafuna indlela lababengabulala ngayo Jesu, ngobe phela babemesaba, kwatise kutsi tonkhe ticuku tatitsatsekile ngalemfundziso yakhe, timangele.
Kwatsi nakuhwalala Jesu nebafundzi bakhe baphuma edolobheni laseJerusalema.
Ekuseni nase babuyela emuva, basibona lesihlahla semkhiwa sesome ngisho netimphandze taso.
Phetro wayikhumbula indzaba yangayitolo, wase utsi: “Mfundzisi, buka lesa sihlahla losicalekise itolo, sesomile.”

Ngicinisile, ngitsi kini: Nome ngubani loyawutsi kulentsaba: ‘Cukuleka uyewuphonseka le elwandle,’ angangabati enhlitiyweni yakhe, kodvwa akholwa kutsi loko lasakushito kutakwenteka, uyakwentelwa kona.
Ngako-ke ngitsi kini: Konkhe leniyawukucela ngemkhuleko, kholwani kutsi seninako, niyawube seniyaphiwa-ke.
Ngaso sonkhe sikhatsi nanithandazako, nibobacolela leniphambene nabo, kuze kutsi neYihlo losezulwini anitsetselele tono tenu. [
Kodvwa naningatsetselelani, neYihlo losezulwini angeke anitsetselele emacala enu.]”
Babuyela-ke eJerusalema; watsi asaya ethempelini, baphristi labakhulu netati temtsetfo netibondza beta kuye,
bambuta batsi: “Ulitsatsaphi ligunya lekwenta letintfo, kona ngubani lokunike leligunya lekutenta?”
Jesu watsi: “Nami ngitanibuta livi libe linye; naninginika imphendvulo, ngitanitjela kutsi leligunya lengenta ngalo letintfo, ngilitsatsaphi.
Ase ningitjele kutsi umbhabhatiso waJohane bewuphuma kuNkulunkulu yini nome bewuphuma kubantfu?”
Bacale bakhulumisana bodvwana batsi: “Nasitsi: ‘KuNkulunkulu,’ utawutsi: ‘Animkholwanga ngani kepha?’
Kodvwa nasingatsi: ‘Kubantfu,’ ngeke silunge.” Phela babesaba bantfu, ngobe bonkhe bebabambelele ekutseni Johane abengumphrofethi cobo.
Ngako base baphendvula Jesu batsi: “Awu, asati.”
Jesu-ke yena watsi: “Nami-ke ngeke nginitjele kutsi letintfo ngitenta ngaliphi ligunya.”
Kwatsi nakufika sikhatsi sekuvuna, yatfumela sisebenti kulabacashi kutsi siyewuyilandzela sabelo sayo sesivuno.
Yaphindza futsi yatfumela lesinye sisebenti, naso basibhobota tindvuma, basihlazisa.
Yaphindza yatfumela lesinye sisebenti sayo, sona-ke sefika basibulala. Tinyenti letinye letatitfunywa: letinye tatishaywa, letinye tibulawe.
Ekugcineni kwase kusele umuntfu munye lebeyingamtfumela, umsa wayo lebeyimtsandza kakhulu. Beyicabanga kutsi batamhlonipha ngobe kuyindvodzana yayo.
Kodvwa labacashi batsi kube bayibone lendvodzana, bakhulumisana bodvwana batsi: ‘Nanso indlalifa yakhe, wotani siteyibulala, khona lelifa kutakuba letfu.’
“Uyakwenta njani-ke lomnikati walesivini? Uyawuta atetibhubhisa leticashi atsatse lesivini acashise ngaso kulabanye.
Betama kubamba Jesu, kodvwa besaba ticuku tebantfu, ngobe babona kahle kutsi ngalomfanekiso ukhuluma ngabo, base bayamshiya, bahamba.
Base batfumela labanye bebaFarisi, kanye nemaHerodi, kutsi atewugiba Jesu ngenkhulumo yakhe.

Bafike batsi kuye: “Mfundzisi, siyati kutsi wena uneliciniso, awuwatsengi emehlo emuntfu ngobe awesatjiswa bunjalo bemuntfu. Ufundzisa indlela yaNkulunkulu ngeliciniso. Kulungile yini kukhipha umtselo kuKhesari, uMbusi wemaRoma, nome cha? Sifanele siwukhiphe yini nome singawukhiphi?”
Kodvwa Jesu abati kahle bumbulu babo, watsi kubo: “Ningilingelani? Ase ningikhombise loluhlavu lwemali.”
Baluletsa. Wababuta watsi: “Lesitfombe naloku lokubhalwe la kulo kwabani?” Bamphendvula batsi: “KwaKhesari.”
Jesu watsi kubo: “Yebo-ke, nikani Khesari kwaKhesari, naNkulunkulu kwaNkulunkulu.”
“Mfundzisi, Mosi wasibhalela kutsi indvodza nayifa, ishiya umfati wayo angakabi namntfwana, umnakabomufi kufanele angene lomfati, khona atewuvusela umufi umuti.
Manje-ke bekunetelamani letatisikhombisa; wekucala watsatsa umfati, wase uyafa asete bantfwana.
Ngako-ke lona wesibili wase ungena lomfelokati, naye wafa ate bantfwana, wesitsatfu futsi kwaba ngiso sona leso.
Bobasikhombisa abazange batale ngisho namunye umntfwana. Ekugcineni-ke wase uyafa nalomfati.
Ekuvukeni kwalabafile lomfati uyawuba wabani, ngobe bobasikhombisa abengumfati wabo?”
Jesu watsi kubo: “Maye, nedukile, kwatisa kutsi nemiBhalo aniyati, futsi nemandla aNkulunkulu aniwati!
Phela nase bavuka kulabafile, abasatekani, ngobe sebanjengetingilosi tasezulwini.

Kona-ke macondzana nekuvuka kulabafile anifundzanga yini encwadzini yaMosi endzabeni yesihlahla lesasivutsa emalangabi, kutsi Nkulunkulu watsini kuye? Watsi: ‘NginguNkulunkulu wa-Abrahama, naNkulunkulu wa-Isaka, naNkulunkulu waJakobe.’
Nkulunkulu akasiye walabafile, kodvwa walabaphilako. Nine nje neduke kabi.”
Uboyitsandza iNkhosi Nkulunkulu wakho, ngayo yonkhe inhlitiyo yakho, nangawo wonkhe umphefumulo wakho, nangayo yonkhe ingcondvo yakho, nangawo onkhe emandla akho.’
Wesibili utsi: ‘Ubotsandza makhelwane wakho, njengobe utitsandza wena.’ Kute-ke lomunye umyalo lomkhulu kunaleyo.”

Kutsandza Nkulunkulu ngenhlitiyo yami yonkhe, nangekucondza kwami konkhe, nangemandla ami onkhe, kanye nekutsandza makhelwane wami njengobe ngititsandza mine, kuncono kakhulu kuneminikelo leshiswako nakunemihlatjelo.”
Jesu wabona kutsi siphendvule kahle, watsi: “Cha, awukho khashane kakhulu nembuso waNkulunkulu.”
Emvakwaloko kute lowaba nesibindzi sekumbuta umbuzo.
Jesu asafundzisa ethempelini wababuta bantfu watsi: “Tati temtsetfo tisho ngani kutsi Khristu wesitukulwane saDavide?
Davide, agcwele Moya Longcwele, washo watsi:
“Nangabe Davide cobo ambita ngeNkhosi yakhe, pho, uwesitukulwane sakhe njani?” Ticumbi letikhulu tebantfu tamlalela ngekujabula.
Ekufundziseni kwakhe Jesu watsi: “Caphelani tati temtsetfo, letitsandza kuhamba tembetse imijiva lemidze, tihambe tibingelelwa bantfu etimakethe.
Titsandza titulo letincono emasinagogeni, netindzawo letihloniphekile emadzilini.
Tidla tindlu tebafelokati, titentise ngekuthandaza imithandazo lemidze. Tiyakwemukela sijeziso lesikhulu.”
Jesu wahlala phansi macondzana nelibhokisi leminikelo, wabukela ticuku tinikela tifaka timali ebhokisini. Labanyenti lababenjingile bafaka timali letinkhulu.
Umfelokati lotsite labephuyile weta wafaka tinhlavu letimbili telitfusi letenta isenti.
