Jesu wabita bafundzi bakhe watsi kubo: “Ngicinisile, ngitsi kini: Lomfelokati lophuyile unikele kakhulu kunabo bonkhe.
Ngobe bona bebacupha kulokunyenti, kodvwa yena ukhiphe konkhe labenako, nalabengahle aphile ngako.”
Watsi Jesu nakaphuma ethempelini, lomunye webafundzi bakhe watsi kuye: “Mfundzisi, asewubuke lamatje naletakhiwo kutsi takheke kahle kangakanani.”
Jesu abehleti eNtsabeni Yemincumo abhekene nelithempeli. BoPhetro, naJakobe, naJohane, na-Andreya bambuta babodvwana naye batsi:
“Ase usitjele kutsi kuyakwenteka nini loko? Kuyakwentekani lokuyawuba sibonakaliso saleso sikhatsi sekuphela?”
Jesu wabatjela watsi: “Caphelani kutsi kubete lonedukisako.
Kuyawuta labanyenti egameni lami batsi: ‘Nginguye!’ Ngaloko bayakwedukisa labanyenti.
Naniva emahemuhemu etimphi, netindzaba tetimphi, ningetfuki, ngobe letintfo tifanele kutsi tenteke, kodvwa noko umhla wekuphela uyawube ungakefiki.

Sive siyawuvukela lesinye sive, umbuso uvukele lomunye umbuso, kuyawuba nekutamatama kwemhlaba tindzawo ngetindzawo, kuyawuba netindlala. Loko kuyawube kukucala kwetinsizi, kube njengemhelo walomsikati nasatawuteta.
LiVangeli kufanele lishunyayelwe etiveni tonkhe kucala.

Nabanimikisa etinkantolo baninikele, ningahlupheki ngekucabanga kutsi niyawutsini, kodvwa shanoni loko leniyakuphiwa ngalowo mzuzu, ngobe kuyawube kungasesini leniyakube nikhuluma, kodvwa Moya Longcwele uyakukhuluma ngemilomo yenu.
Umuntfu uyawunikela umnakabo ekufeni, neyise umntfwanakhe, bantfwana bayawuvukela batali babo bababulalise.
Niyawutondvwa ngabo bonkhe ngenca yeligama lami. Kepha lowo loyawucinisela kuze kube ngusekugcineni, uyakusindziswa.”
Naloyabe asetikwendlu angabe asehla, angasangeni nasendlini yakhe kuyawutsatsa timphahla takhe.
Losensimini angasabuyeli emuva kuyawutsatsa kwekwembatsa kwakhe.
Maye kulabo labayawube batetfwele, nalabo labayawube bamunyisa ngalawo malanga!
Thandazelani kutsi loko kungete kwenteka ebusika.
Ngobe kulawo malanga kuyawuba netinhlupheko letinkhulu, letingazange setibekhona kusukela ekucaleni kwendalo yaNkulunkulu kudzimate kube ngulamuhla, futsi tingeke tiphindze tibe khona.
Kube futsi Nkulunkulu abengakawafinyeti lawo malanga, kute namunye labeyawusindziswa; kodvwa ngenca yalabakhetfwe nguye wawafinyeta lawo malanga.
“Ngaleso sikhatsi nakufika lomunye atsi kini: ‘Ase nibuke, nangu Khristu,’ nome atsi: ‘Nanguya,’ ningamkholwa.
Bokhristu bemanga nebaphrofethimbumbulu batawuvela bakhombise tibonakaliso netimangaliso kuze kwedukiswe nalabakhetsiwe, nakunekwenteka.
“Kodvwa caphelani, ngobe senginitjele konkhe loku kungakenteki.”
Iyawutfumela tingilosi tayo kutsi tiyewubutsa labo labakhetsiwe bayo emimoyeni yomine, nasemikhawulweni yonkhe yemhlaba.”
“Ase nifundze sifundvo esihlahleni semkhiwa. Ngesikhatsi emagala aso advumba, bese sihluma emacembe, niyabe seniyati kutsi seletfwese lihlobo.
Kanjalo-ke nani, nanibona letintfo tenteka, nibokwati kwekutsi iNdvodzana yeMuntfu seyisedvute, seyingasemnyango.
“Ngicinisile, ngitsi kini: Lesitukulwane singeke sendlule kungakenteki konkhe loku.
Kuyakwendlula lizulu nemhlaba, kodvwa emavi ami wona angeke endlule.”
Caphelani nilindze, ngobe anati kutsi leso sikhatsi siyawufika nini.
Kufanana nendvodza leyayitawuya khashane; yatsi nase itawusuka ekhaya, yabeka tisebenti tayo etikhundleni tato, nguleso nemsebenti waso lotsite. Yayala umgcini welisango kutsi alindze kahle.
Ngako-ke lindzani, ngobe animati umnikati wendlu kutsi uyawubuya nini. Angahle abuye ebusuku nome ekhatsi nebusuku, angabuya ekukhaleni kwekucala kwelichudze, nome ekuseni.
Loku lengikusho kini, ngikusho kubo bonkhe ngitsi: Lindzani.”
Kepha babetsi: “Akufuneki simbambe ngesikhatsi semkhosi, ngobe bantfu bangahle besuse siphitsiphitsi.”
Kodvwa bekukhona labatfukutsela, bakhuluma bodvwana batsi: “Kudlalelwani ngalamafutsa?
Ngobe ngabe atsengiswe ngabodenariyo labangema-300, kwabelwa labamphofu lemali.” Bamsola kakhulu lomfati.
Kodvwa Jesu watsi: “Myekeleni; nimhluphelani? Ngobe wente umsebenti lomuhle kakhulu kimi.
Labamphofu nihlala nabo onkhe emalanga, nome ngunini nanitsandzako ningabentela lokuhle; kodvwa mine aninawuhlala nami sonkhe sikhatsi.
Naye-ke wente loko langahle akwente, ugcobise umtimba wami awulungiselela kungcwatjwa usengakangcwatjwa.
Ngicinisile, ngitsi kini: Nome kukuphi lapho liVangeli liyawushunyayelwa khona emhlabeni wonkhe, loku lakwentile kuyawuba sikhumbuto ngaye.”
Judasi Skariyothe, labengulomunye walababeli-12, waya kubaphristi labakhulu wayawutsengisa ngaJesu.
Batsi nabakuva loko, bajabula bafa, bametsembisa kumnika imali.
Wacala-ke Judasi wafuna litfuba lelikahle lekunikela Jesu kubo.
Jesu watfumela bafundzi bakhe lababili watsi kubo: “Hambani niye edolobheni, niyawuhlangabetana nemuntfu etfwele imbita yemanti; nibomlandzela.
Nitawufike nikhulume nalomnikati wendlu, latawungena kuyo lomuntfu, nitsi: ‘UMfundzisi utsi: “Liphi likamelo lapho ngingadlela khona liPhasika ngikanye nebafundzi bami?” ’
Lomnikati wendlu utanikhombisa likamelo lelikhulu lelingetulu, lelilungiswe kahle; bese nisilungiselela khona.”
Bafundzi bahamba-ke baya edolobheni, bakhandza kunjengobe Jesu abebatjelile; bavele basilungiselela Sidlo seMkhosi weliPhasika.
Kwatsi sekuhlwile, Jesu wefika akanye nebafundzi bakhe labali-12.
Batsi basadla, Jesu watsi kubo: “Ngicinisile, ngitsi kini: Lomunye emkhatsini wenu, nine lenidla kanye nami, utangitsengisa.”
Bacala kudzabuka, kwaba ngulowo watibutela yena atsi: “Kungabe ngimi yini?”
Jesu watsi kubo: “Ngulomunye wenu nine labali-12, lowo lowenya lucetu lwesinkhwa ndishi yinye nami.
Vele kambe iNdvodzana yeMuntfu itawufa, njengobe kubhaliwe ngayo; kodvwa maye kulowo muntfu iNdvodzana yeMuntfu letawutsengiswa ngaye! Bekuyawuba ncono kulowo muntfu kube mane akatalwanga.”
Watsatsa nendzebe, watsi nasabongile, wabanika, bonkhe banatsa kuyo.
Watsi kubo: “Loku kuyingati yami yesivumelwane, lecitselwa labanyenti.
Ngicinisile, ngitsi kini: Angeke ngiphindze nginatse kulesitselo semvini, kuyawudzimate kube ngulelo langa nase ngisinatsa sisisha embusweni waNkulunkulu.”
Batsi kube bacedze kuhlabela ingoma yekubonga, baphuma baya eNtsabeni Yemincumo.
Kepha Phetro watsi kuye: “Nome bangakuhlamuka bonkhe, mine ngingeke.”
Jesu watsi kuye: “Ngicinisile, ngitsi kuwe: Kubo lobusuku balamuhla, lichudze litawutsi lingakakhali kwesibili, wena utabe sewungiphike katsatfu.”
Kepha Phetro wagcizelela watsi: “Nome bangangibulala kanye nawe, mine ngeke ngikuphike.”
Besuka lapho baya endzaweni lekwakutsiwa yiGetsemane, Jesu watsi kubafundzi bakhe: “Hlalani lapha, mine ngisaya kukhuleka.”
Watsatsa boPhetro, naJakobe, naJohane, wachubachubeka nabo. Wafikelwa ngumunyu nekudzabuka nekwesaba,
watsi kubo: “Umphefumulo wami ucindzetelwe lusizi, ngidzabuke lokwekufa. Salani lapha nilindze.”
Yena wachubachubeka libangana, watilahla phansi, wakhuleka kutsi sendlule kuye lesikhatsi selusizi, nakungenteka.
Watsi: “Aba, Babe, konkhe kungenteka kuwe. Yendlulise kimi lendzebe yelusizi, noko kungayi ngentsandvo yami kodvwa kuye ngentsandvo yakho.”
Weta kubafundzi labatsatfu wabakhandza sebalele, watsi kuPhetro: “Simoni, ulele? Ungabe usalindza neli-awa linye nje?
Lindzani nikhuleke kuze ningangeni ekulingweni. Umoya uyavuma, kodvwa inyama ibutsakatsaka.”
Wabuyela futsi wayawuthandaza, asho wona lawo mavi.
Waphindza wabuyela kulabafundzi labatsatfu, wabakhandza balele. Phela emehlo abo abesindvwa butfongo, behluleka kutsi bangamphendvula batsini.
Wabuya kwesitsatfu watsi kubo: “Kantsi nisalele nanyalo? Nisaphumulile? Sekwenele; sikhatsi sesifikile. Ase nibuke-ke, iNdvodzana yeMuntfu seyiniketwa etandleni tetoni.
Sukumani sambe! Bukani nangu longitsengisako asakhona.”

Masinyane nje asakhuluma, kwatseleka Judasi, lomunye walabebali-12. Abehamba nesicuku lesikhulu sebantfu sihlome ngetinkemba nangetindvuku, sitfunywe baphristi labakhulu, netati temtsetfo kanye netibondza.
Lona labemtsengisa-ke abebanike siboniso watsi: “Lowo lengitamanga, nguye-ke lowo. Nimbambe, niphume naye, nimbone angaphunyuli.”
Watsi kube efike nje Judasi wacondza ngco kuJesu, watsi: “Mfundzisi!” Wamanga.
Kodvwa lomunye walabo lababeme eceleni kwaJesu wahoshula inkemba yakhe wagalela esigcilini semPhristi Lomkhulu, wasihhumbula indlebe.
Jesu watsi kubo: “Nidzimate nihlome kangaka, shangatsi nihlomele sigebengu, niphetse tinkemba netagila nje, kantsi nitewubamba mine.
Imihla nemalanga bengihlala nani ethempelini ngifundzisa, anizange seningibophe. Kodvwa kufanele kugcwaliseke umBhalo.”
Lelinye libhungu lalilandzela Jesu, lembetse indvwangu yelineni kuphela. Batsi bayalibamba,
laphunyula labashiya babambe lendvwangu, lacela empunzini, lingcunu.
Bachuba Jesu bammikisa kumPhristi Lomkhulu; bonkhe baphristi labakhulu, netibondza, netati temtsetfo tabutsana khona.
Phetro wamlandzela ahambela emuva le, waze wangena ebaleni lakamPhristi Lomkhulu. Wefika wahlala kanye nabogadzi, wotsa umlilo.
Baphristi labakhulu kanye neLiqoqo lonkhe bafuna bufakazi labangahle bambeke licala ngabo Jesu, khona batemlahla ngelicala lekufa, kodvwa abazange babutfole ngisho nabunye.
Labanyenti baletsa bufakazi bemanga ngaye, kodvwa nalobo bufakazi babo abuzange buhlangane.
Labanye basukuma bafakaza emanga ngaJesu, batsi:
“Simvile tsine atsi: ‘Ngitalibhidlita lelithempeli lelakhiwe ngetandla, ngibuye ngakhe lelinye lelingakakhiwa ngetandla tebantfu, ngilakhe ngemalanga lamatsatfu.’ ”
Nakhona lapho bufakazi babo abuzange buhlangane.
UmPhristi Lomkhulu wasukuma wema emkhatsini wabo bonkhe, wabuta Jesu watsi: “Awutiphendvuleli ngani kuloku labakushoko ngawe labantfu?”
UmPhristi Lomkhulu wadzabula imijiva yakhe, atsi: “Sisabufunelani lobunye bufakazi?
Bonkhe bamlahla ngelicala, batsi kufanele abulawe.
Labanye bamkhafulela ngematse, bammbonya buso bakhe, bamshaya batsi: “Phrofetha!” Nabogadzi imbala bammukula.
Phetro asehleti entansi nelibala, kweta kuye intfombatana leyayingulesinye setisebenti temPhristi Lomkhulu;
yatsi kube ibone Phetro otsa umlilo, yambuka yase itsi kuye: “Nawe futsi bewuhamba naye lomNazaretha longuJesu.”
Kodvwa waphika Phetro watsi: “Angati, futsi angikuva nekutsi ukhuluma ngani.” Waphumela ngephandle esibuyeni. [Lichudze lase liyakhala.]
Yaphindza yambona lentfombatana, yase ikhuluma nalababeme naye yatsi: “Lo, ungulomunye wabo.”
Emvakwesikhashana lababeme naye batsi kuPhetro: “Kuliciniso kutsi ungulomunye wabo, ngobe naku ungumGalile.”
Kodvwa Phetro wafunga aticalekisa, watsi: “Angimati lomuntfu lenikhuluma ngaye!”

Masinyane lichudze lakhala kwesibili. Nembala Phetro wawakhumbula emagama aJesu ngesikhatsi atsi kuye: “Lichudze lingakakhali kwesibili wena utawube sewungiphike katsatfu.” Wadzabuka kakhulu enhlitiyweni yakhe, wakhala.
Kwanelela kwasa nje kwabutsana lonkhe Liqoqo, baphristi labakhulu, netibondza, netati, kanye nalamanye emalunga alo, bahlanganisa inkhulumo. Babopha Jesu bamchuba bayawumetfula kuPhilatu.
Philatu wambuta watsi: “Ungiyo yini inkhosi yemaJuda?”
Waphindza Philatu wambuta watsi: “Ute yini imphendvulo longayisho? Buka kutsi bakubeka emacala lamanyenti kangakanani!”
Kodvwa Jesu akabange asamphendvula ngalutfo. Loko kwammangalisa kakhulu Philatu.
Kulomkhosi-ke Philatu abevamise njalo nje kubakhululela siboshwa sibe sinye lesicelwe ngulesicuku.
Ngaleso sikhatsi bekunesiboshwa ejele lesasinguBharaba, sasiboshwe kanye nalabanye lababevukele umbuso: ngekususa tiphitsiphitsi nangekubulala.
Sicuku sebantfu sasondzela kuPhilatu samncenga kutsi asentele leso sisa njengasemihleni.
Philatu wase uyababuta utsi: “Niyafuna yini kutsi nginikhululele inkhosi yemaJuda?”
Philatu abesabonile kutsi baphristi labakhulu babephetfwe ngumona nje lokutsi baze baletse Jesu la kuye.
Kodvwa baphristi labakhulu basifaka umoya lesicuku kutsi sicele Philatu asikhululele Bharaba, hhayi Jesu.
Philatu waphindza watsi kubo: “Ngitakwentani ngalomuntfu lenitsi yinkhosi yemaJuda?”
Kodvwa bamemeta kakhulu kunakucala batsi: “Mbetsele esiphambanweni!”
Ngako-ke Philatu atsandza kujabulisa ticumbi, wabakhululela Bharaba. Jesu asabhanjabuliwe, Philatu wabe sewumnikela esicukwini kutsi siyewumbetsela esiphambanweni.
Emasotja achuba Jesu amngenisa ngekhatsi kwesigodlo saPhilatu, ase abita yonkhe imphi yemasotja.
Amembatsisa umjiva lobovu webukhosi, eluka umchele lonemanyeva, awuhlisibetela enhloko yakhe.
Ase amshayela sihlutfu atsi: “Bayethe! Nkhosi yemaJuda!”
Abehle amshaya enhloko ngendvuku yenhlangamlambo, amkhafulele ngematse, aguce embikwakhe amkhotsamele.
Asamphukutile aze enela, ase ayamkhumula lomjiva lobovu webukhosi, amembatsisa tingubo takhe. Amkhiphela ngephandle aya kumbetsela esiphambanweni.
Achuba Jesu amyisa endzaweni lekwakutsiwa yiGolkotha, lokusho kutsi: “YiNdzawo yeSikobho”.
Wanikwa liwayini lelalibhicwe nemure, kodvwa wala kulinatsa.
Emasotja ambetsela esiphambanweni, abelana ngetingubo takhe, entelana inkatho kuze kubonakale kutsi lilinye belitawutfolani.
Bekuli-awa lemfica ekuseni nababetsela Jesu esiphambanweni.
Satiso selicala lakhe lesasibhalwe esiphambanweni besitsi: “INKHOSI YEMAJUDA.”
Kwabetselwa kanye naye tigelekece letimbili, lesinye ngesekudla, lesinye ngesancele sakhe.
Ngako kwagcwaliseka umBhalo lotsi: “Wabalwa kanye netoni.”]
Nebaphristi labakhulu kanye netati temtsetfo bebahlekisa ngaye, batsi: “Wabasindzisa labanye, kodvwa akasakwati kutisindzisa yena.
Nango-ke, Khristu, iNkhosi yaka-Israyeli! Sale wehla lapho esiphambanweni, kuze sitewubona sikholwe.”
Nalaba lababebetselwe kanye naye nabo babemetfuka.
Kwatsi ngeli-awa leli-12 emini kwaba mnyama emhlabeni wonkhe, kwaze kwaba li-awa lesitsatfu.
Ngalelo awa Jesu wakhala ngelivi lelikhulu, watsi: “Eloyi! Eloyi! Lama sabakthani?” lokusho kutsi: “Nkulunkulu wami! Nkulunkulu wami! Ungishiyeleni?”
Labanye labebeme khona lapho nabamuva batsi: “Ase nimuve, ubita Elija.”

Lomunye wagijima watsatsa siponji wasicwilisa ewayinini lelimunyu, wasihloma endvukwini yenhlangamlambo, wamnatsisa, atsi: “Ase nime sesibone kutsi lo-Elija utawuta yini atemsita, ametfule lapha etulu.”
Jesu waphindze wamemeta ngelivi lelikhulu, wase uyafa.
Kwatsi indvuna yelikhulu lebeyime lapho imbuka nakafa ngalendlela, yavuma yatsi: “Ngempela lomuntfu abengiyo iNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu.”
Labo-ke ngulababenaye aseseGalile, babemsita, bamkhonta. Bekukhona nalabanye nje-ke bafati labanyenti, lababete kanye naye eJerusalema.
Kwase kucalile kuhwalala. Phela kwakulilanga lekwenta emalungiselelo, lokusho kutsi kwakunguLesihlanu, kutakusa kuliSabatha.
Josefa wase-Arimathiya, umhlonishwa walelo Liqoqo, labe ngulomunye walababelindzele umbuso waNkulunkulu, wacunga sibindzi waya kuPhilatu ayewucela sidvumbu saJesu.
Philatu wamangala kwekutsi Jesu sewufile; wabita indvuna yemasotja wabuta kutsi ngabe sesikhatsi lesingakanani Jesu afile.
Watsi kube atfole imphendvulo endvuneni, wase uyavuma kutsi Josefa asitsatse lesidvumbu.
Josefa watsenga indvwangu yelineni, wasetfula sidvumbu saJesu, wasigocota ngalendvwangu, wayawusibeka ethuneni lelalimbiwe edvwaleni, wagicitela litje wavala ngalo umnyango walelithuna.
BoMariya waseMagdala naMariya, unaboJosese, babona lapho angcwatjwa khona Jesu.
Emvakwelilanga leliSabatha boMariya waseMagdala, naMariya, unaboJakobe, naSalome batsenga emakha bentela kuya bayewugcobisa ngawo sidvumbu saJesu.
Ekuseni ngeluvivi, ngeliSontfo, lilanga lekucala evikini, baya ethuneni; befika lilanga seliphuma.
Basesendleleni babehamba babutana bodvwana batsi: “Ngubani lotasigicitela lelitje lekuvalwe ngalo ethuneni?”
Batsi batsi ganganana, babona lelitje selisusiwe, phela kwakuyinguzanguza yelitje.
Batsi bayangena ethuneni, bakhandza libhungu lihleti ngesekudla, lembetse umjiva lomhlophe; bashaywa luvalo.
Latsi kubo: “Ningesabi! Nifuna Jesu waseNazaretha lona bekabetselwe esiphambanweni. Uvusiwe ekufeni, akasekho lapha. Nasi sikhundla lapho bebambeke khona.
Hambani nitjele bafundzi bakhe kanye naPhetro kutsi sewusembili, uya eGalile. Nitambona khona, njengobe anitjela.”
Baphuma babaleka ethuneni, ngobe bese bachachatela besaba kakhulu. Abazange sebayitsi vu ngisho nakumunye, ngobe bebesaba kakhulu.
Mariya wesuka lapho wahamba wayawutjela labo labekadze anabo; wabakhandza bakhala balila.
Kodvwa batsi nome beva kutsi uyaphila nekutsi yena sewumbonile, bangete bamkholwa kahle.
Babuyela emuva bafike batjela laba labanye bafundzi, kodvwa nabo abazange babakholwe.
Watsi kubo: “Hambani niye emhlabeni wonkhe, nishumayele liVangeli kubo bonkhe bantfu.
“Lowo lokholwako abhajatiswe, uyawusindziswa; kodvwa lowo longakholwa, uyawulahlwa.
Labakholwako bayawuba nanati tibonakaliso: Bayawukhipha emadimoni ngelibito lami, bakhulume ngetilimi letinsha,
ngeke behlelwe lutfo nababamba tinyoka nome nabanatsa lokubulalanako. Bayakubeka tandla kulabagulako baphile.”
Bafundzi base bayahamba-ke bashumayela kuyo yonkhe indzawo. INkhosi yaba nabo yalifakazela livi layo, ngekwenta tibonakaliso ngalo. Amen.

Labafati baya kuboPhetro nalabo labenabo bayawubabikela kafisha ngako konkhe lababekutjeliwe. Emvakwaloko Jesu matfupha watfumela ngebafundzi bakhe liVangeli lelingcwele lelingeke libhubhe. Wabatfumela kutsi leliVangeli lensindziso yaphakadze balishumayele emhlabeni wonke, jikelele.
Labanyenti bente kahle ngekubhala umbiko ngetintfo letentekile emkhatsini wetfu.
Bakubhala loko lesakutjelwa baphatsi belivi lababetibona letintfo kusukela ekucaleni kwato.
Ngako-ke, Mhlonishwa, ngobe ngitifundzisise kahle kusukela ekucaleni letindzaba, ngikubone kufanele kutsi ngikubhalele ngikulandzise kahle ngato.
Loko ngikwentela kutsi wati ngalokugcwele liciniso lato tonkhe letindzaba lotifundzisiwe.
Bobabili babephila imphilo lengcwele kuNkulunkulu, babeyigcina yonkhe imiyalo nemitsetfo yeNkhosi.
Babete bantfwana, ngobe Elizabethe abengatali, futsi bobabili besebakhulile.
Ngalelinye lilanga kwakuligema laZakhariya lekwenta umsebenti wakhe webuphristi kuNkulunkulu njengalokwakwetayelekile.
Ngelisiko lebuphristi, abedliwe yinkatho yekutsi ashise imphepho elatini. Ngako-ke wangena ethempelini leNkhosi.
Sicumbi sonkhe sebantfu sasithandaza ngephandle ngesikhatsi ashisa imphepho.
Ingilosi yeNkhosi yabonakala kuye, ime ngesandleni sekudla selilati lapho kwakushiselwa khona imphepho.
Kodvwa ingilosi yatsi kuye: “Ungesabi, Zakhariya! Umthandazo wakho sewuvakele, umkakho Elizabethe utakutalela indvodzana. Utayetsa libito layo utsi nguJohane.
Maye! Utawujabula utfokote kakhulu, nebantfu labanyenti batakujabula kanye nawe ngekutalwa kwakhe,
ngobe uyakuba ngumuntfu lomkhulu ebusweni baNkulunkulu, akayiwulinatsa liwayini nome-ke yini ledzakisako, uyawugcwaliswa ngaMoya Longcwele kusukela angakatalwa.
Uyawubuyisela bantfu labanyenti baka-Israyeli kuNkulunkulu, iNkhosi yabo.

Uyawuhamba embikwakhe ngemoya nangemandla njengemphrofethi Elija. Uyawuhlanganisa boyise nebantfwana babo babuye babe nebudlelwane, agucule bantfu labangalaleli babe ngulabalungile; uyakwenta bantfu balungele kuta kweNkhosi yabo.”
Zakhariya watsi engilosini: “Ngiyawukwati ngani kutsi loku kungiko? Mine nemkami sesibadzala kakhulu.”
Kodvwa awukalikholwa livi lami, lelitawugcwaliseka ngesikhatsi lesifanele. Ngako-ke utawuba simungulu; uhlale ungakwati kukhuluma, kuze kufike lelo langa lekuyawugcwaliseka ngalo setsembiso sami.”
Konkhe loku kwenteka nje bantfu babeloku balindzele Zakhariya, sebamangele kutsi sewephuteleni kangaka ethempelini.
Waphuma angasakwati kukhuluma, ngako bavele bati kutsi wembulelwe umbono ethempelini. Njengobe abesasimungulu, wavele wakhuluma nabo ngetandla.
Nasacedze emalanga emsebenti wakhe webuphristi ethempelini, wabuyela ekhaya lakhe.
Emvakwesikhatsi umkakhe Elizabethe wakhulelwa, watifihla endlini tinyanga letisihlanu.
Wase utsi: “Manje ekugcineni iNkhosi seyingisitile. Seyilisusile lihlazo lami ebantfwini.”
Ngenyanga yesitfupha Elizabethe atetfwele, Nkulunkulu watfumela ingilosi Gabhriyeli edolobheni laseGalile, lelitsiwa yiNazaretha.
Ingilosi yeta kuye, yefika yatsi: “E! Sikhulekile! Wena lobusisekile, iNkhosi inawe.”
Mariya yamkhatsata kakhulu lenkhulumo yengilosi, wamangala kutsi lenkhulumo isho kutsini.
Ingilosi yase itsi kuye: “Ungesabi, Mariya, ngobe utfole umusa kuNkulunkulu.
Utawukhulelwa utale indvodzana, uyetse libito utsi nguJesu.
Uyawuba mkhulu, abitwe ngekutsi yiNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu Losetikwako Konkhe. Nkulunkulu iNkhosi iyawumnika sihlalo sebukhosi sakhokho wakhe Davide,
uyawuba yiNkhosi yetitukulwane taJakobe nini nanini; umbuso wakhe ungeke ube nesiphetfo.”
Mariya wase utsi engilosini: “Kepha loko kungenteka kanjani ngingakahlangani nendvodza?”

Ingilosi yamphendvula yatsi: “Moya Longcwele uyakwehlela kuwe, emandla aNkulunkulu Losetikwako Konkhe akusibekele. Ngako-ke lomntfwana Longcwele lotawutalwa nguwe uyawubitwa ngekutsi yiNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu.
Khumbula sihlobo sakho Elizabethe, lebekutsiwa angeke abe nemntfwana, kepha nyalo sewunetinyanga letisitfupha atetfwele, lite asamdzala kangaka.
Mariya wase utsi: “Ngiyincekukati yeNkhosi; akwenteke kimi loko, njengobe sewushito.” Yase iyamshiya ingilosi.
Kulawo malanga Mariya watilungiselela ngekushesha waya emtini loseJudiya, eveni letintsaba,
Kwatsi lapho Elizabethe nakeva kubingelela kwaMariya, umntfwana wagcuma esiswini sakhe. Elizabethe wagcwaliswa ngaMoya Longcwele,
Mariya wahlala na-Elizabethe tinyanga letatingacishe tibe tintsatfu, wase ubuyela ekhaya.
Sefika sikhatsi sa-Elizabethe sekubeleka, wabeleka umfana.
Bomakhelwane netihlobo takhe beva kutsi iNkhosi imbusise kanganani, bajabula kanye naye.
kodvwa unina watsi: “Cha! Libito lakhe kutakuba nguJohane.”
Batsi kuye: “Ingani kute ngisho nasinye sihlobo senu lesinalelibito.”
Base bakhuluma neyise ngetandla, babuta kutsi yena ufuna lomfana etsiwe ngaliphi libito.
Zakhariya wacela kwekubhala, wabhala watsi: “Libito lakhe nguJohane.” Bonkhe bantfu bamangala.
Ngasona leso sikhatsi lulwimi lwaZakhariya lwatfukululeka, wakhuluma, wadvumisa Nkulunkulu.
Bonkhe bomakhelwane befikelwa kwesaba lokukhulu, yandza indzaba ngaloko lokwakwentekile kulo lonkhe live letintsaba laseJudiya.
Bonkhe labayiva bacabanga ngayo batibuta batsi: “Ingabe lomntfwana utawuba yini?” Ngobe kwavele kwakhanya kutsi emandla eNkhosi abekuye.
Uyise Zakhariya wagcwaliswa ngaMoya Longcwele, wase uyaphrofetha utsi:
kutsi, nase sikhululiwe esandleni setitsa tetfu,
Umntfwana wakhula waba nemandla emoyeni; wahlala ehlane, kwaze kwaba lilanga lavela ngalo ebaleni kubantfu baka-Israyeli.
Kulawo malanga Khesari, Agustusi, wamemetela kubo bonkhe bantfu bembuso kutsi kubhaliselwe lubalo.
Lolubalo lwekucala lwentiwa ngesikhatsi Kwiriniyusi anguLusibalukhulu waseSiriya.
Wonkhe umuntfu wahamba wayawubhalisa edolobheni lakubo.
waya kuyawubhalisa yena naMariya labetsembise kumshada. Mariya abetetfwele.
Kwatsi baseBhetlehema, sase siyefika sikhatsi saMariya sekubeleka.
Watubula ngendvodzana, wayigocota ngetindvwangu, wayilalisa emkhombeni wekudlela tinkhomo, ngobe phela kwakungenandzawo yekuhlala endlini yetihambi.
Bekunebelusi kulelo live lababeluse imihlambi yetimvu ebusuku etsafeni.
Ingilosi yeNkhosi yabonakala kubo, nebukhatikhati beNkhosi babakhanyisela, baze besaba kakhulu.
Kodvwa ingilosi yatsi kubo: “Ningesabi; ngobe nginiletsele indzaba lemnandzi, yekutfokota lokutawuba kwebantfu bonkhe;
ngobe lamuhla nitalelwe emtini waDavide uMsindzisi longuKhristu iNkhosi.
Loku kutaba sibonakaliso kini: Niyawukhandza umntfwana agocotwe ngetindvwangu alele emkhombeni wekudlela tinkhomo.”
Masinyane kwabonakala lengilosi inesicumbi lesikhulu setingilosi tasezulwini sihlabelela sidvumisa Nkulunkulu sitsi:
Kwatsi lapho tingilosi setibuyele ezulwini, belusi bakhulumisana batsi: “Asambeni siye eBhetlehema siyewubona loko lokwentekile, lesitjelwe kona yiNkhosi.”
Ngako-ke bashesha bahamba, bakhandza Mariya naJosefa nemntfwana alele emkhombeni wekudlela tinkhomo.
Kwatsi nabambona belusi, babatjela loko lababekuve ngengilosi ngalomntfwana;
bonkhe labakuva loko bamangala ngalababekutjelwe belusi.
Yena-ke Mariya watikhumbula tonkhe leto tintfo, wazindla ngato enhlitiyweni yakhe.
Belusi babuyela emuva badvumisa babonga Nkulunkulu ngako konkhe lababekuvile nalababekubonile; kwakunjengobe ingilosi yayibatjelile.
njengobe kubhaliwe emtsetfweni weNkhosi, lotsi: “Onkhe ematubulo lamadvuna ayawuba ngcwele eNkhosini,”
banikele nangemnikelo njengekusho kwemtsetfo weNkhosi lotsi: “Ematuba lamabili nome emavukutfu lamabili lasemancane.”

Ngaleso sikhatsi bekukhona indvodza leyayilungile yesaba Nkulunkulu, ihlala eJerusalema, libito layo kunguSimeyoni. Abelindzele indvudvuto ngensindziso yesive sema-Israyeli, Moya Longcwele abesetikwakhe.
Abesambulelwe nguMoya Longcwele kutsi abengetikufa angakamboni Khristu weNkhosi.
Achutjwa nguMoya waya ethempelini; batali base baletsa lomntfwana longuJesu kutsi bente loko lokwakulisiko lemtsetfo.
Simeyoni wamtsatsa wamgona lomntfwana, wase ubonga Nkulunkulu utsi:
ngobe emehlo ami asayibonile insindziso yakho
Uyise nenina wemntfwana bamangala ngaloko lokwakushiwo nguSimeyoni ngaye.
kuze imicabango lefihlekile yebantfu labanyenti yembulwe. Ngisho nenhlitiyo yakho imbala iyawudzabuka kube sengatsi igwazwa sikhali.”
Bekunemphrofethikati labesamdzala kakhulu, libito lakhe kungu-Ana, ayindvodzakati yaFanuweli wesive saka-Asheri. Waba ngumfelokati emvakweminyaka lesikhombisa endzile,
nyalo-ke abengumfelokati waze waba neminyaka lengema-84 budzala. Abehlale ethemphelini, akhonta, azila kudla, athandaza imini nebusuku.
Ngaso leso sikhatsi weta wefika wabonga Nkulunkulu, wase ukhuluma ngalomntfwana kubo bonkhe lababelindzele inkhululeko yeJerusalema.
Umntfwana wakhula waba nemandla; wagcwala inhlakanipho; umusa netibusiso taNkulunkulu tabasetikwakhe.
Kwatsi lapho Jesu asaneminyaka leli-12 budzala, wahamba nabo njengekwelisiko lemkhosi.
Kutsite sekuphele emalanga emkhosi, bantfu bacala bahamba babuyela emakhaya abo, kodvwa umntfwana longuJesu wasala emuva eJerusalema. Batali bakhe babengati ngaloko.
Babecabanga kutsi uhambisana nabontsanga yakhe, ngako-ke badzimate bahamba libanga lelilanga, emvakwaloko bacala bamfuna kubontsanga yakhe nasetihlotjeni tabo;
kwatsi kube bangamtfoli, base bayancandzeka bayawumfuna eJerusalema.
Ngelilanga lesitsatfu bamkhandza ethempelini, ahleti netati temtsetfo, atilalela futsi atibuta nemibuzo;
bonkhe labamuva bamangaliswa kucondzisisa kwakhe kanye netimphendvulo takhe.
Batali bakhe bamangala kakhulu nabambona lapho; waze watsi unina: “Mntfwanami, ukwenteleni loku kitsi? Uyihlo kanye nami sesiphatseke kabi ngekukufuna singakutfoli.”
Jesu wabaphendvula watsi: “Beningifunelani? Beningati yini kutsi kufanele ngibesemsebentini waBabe?”
Noko Jesu wahamba nabo waya eNazaretha; lapho wafike watitfoba, waba ngephansi kwabo; kodvwa unina watigcina enhlitiyweni yakhe tonkhe leto tintfo.

Kwakungumnyaka weli-15 wekubusa kwaThibheriyusi, uMbusi; Phontiyuse Philatu bekanguLusibalukhulu waseJudiya, Herodi ayinkhosi yaseGalile, umnakabo Filiphu bekayinkhosi yesigodzi sase-Ithureya naseTrakhonithisi; Lisaniyasi abeyinkhosi yase-Abilene.
Livi laNkulunkulu lefika kuJohane, indvodzana yaZakhariya, ngaso leso sikhatsi, asehlane.
Ngako-ke Johane wasihamba sonkhe sigodzi lesingasemfuleni iJordane ashumayela atsi: “Phendvukani nibhajatiswe, Nkulunkulu utanitsetselela tono tenu.”
Njengobe umphrofethi Isaya wabhala encwadzini yakhe watsi:
Vetani titselo letikhombisa kuphendvuka. Ningacali nicabange kutsi: ‘Abrahama ngukhokho wetfu.’ Ngiyanitjela ngitsi: Nkulunkulu angawatsatsa nalamatje awente titukulwane ta-Abrahama!
Lizembe selibekwe emphandzeni yetihlahla. Sonkhe sihlahla lesingatseli titselo letimnandzi, sitakugecwa siwe, bese silahlwa emlilweni.”
Bantfu bambuta batsi: “Kepha kufanele sente njani?”
Labanye batselisi beta nabo kutakubhajatiswa, bafike bambuta batsi: “Mfundzisi, kufanele sente njani?”
Emabutfo nawo ambuta atsi: “Tsine-ke? Sifanele sente njani?” Watsi-ke yena kubo: “Ningemuki muntfu imali yakhe ngemacebo, yeneliswani ngumholo wenu.”
Bantfu bacala kwetsemba bacabangisisa ngaJohane, bacabanga kutsi mhlawumbe kungahle kube nguye loKhristu.

Ngako Johane wabatjela bonkhe watsi: “Nginibhabhatisa ngemanti, kodvwa kukhona lomkhulu kunami lotako, lengingakafaneli ngisho nekutfukulula imichilo yeticatfulo etinyaweni takhe. Utakunibhabhatisa ngaMoya Longcwele nangemlilo.
Esandleni sakhe unesitja sekwela emabele lasabhuliwe, awatsele esilulwini, bese kutsi emakhoba awashise ngemlilo longeke ucishe.”
Johane washumayela ngetindlela letinyenti ancusa bantfu ngesineke abatjela ngeliVangeli.
Herodi wase wenta lokubi kakhulu-ke manje ngekubopha Johane amfake ejele.
Kwatsi nase babhajatiswe bonkhe, kwase kubhajatiswa naJesu. Watsi asathandaza kwavuleka lizulu,
Moya Longcwele wehlela kuye afana nelituba. Kwevakala livi liphuma ezulwini litsi: “Wena uyiNdvodzana yami letsandzekako. Ngitfokotile ngawe.”
Nakacala lomsebenti wakhe Jesu abeneminyaka lecishe ibe ngema-30 budzala; bantfu babecabanga kutsi uyindvodzana yaJosefa labengumsa wa-Eli,
umsa waMathati, umsa waLevi, umsa waMelkhi, umsa waJanayi, umsa waJosefa,
umsa waMathathiyase, umsa wa-Amosi, umsa waNahume, umsa waHesli, umsa waNagayi,
umsa waMahathi, umsa waMathathiyase, umsa waSemeyini, umsa waJoseki, umsa waJoda,
umsa waJowanani, umsa waResa, umsa waZerubhabheli, umsa waSheyaltiyeli, umsa waNeri,
umsa waMelkhi, umsa wa-Adi, umsa waKhosamu, umsa wa-Elmadamu, umsa wa-Eri,
umsa waJoshuwa, umsa wa-Eliyezeri, umsa waJorimu, umsa waMathati, umsa waLevi,
umsa waSimeyoni, umsa waJuda, umsa waJosefa, umsa waJonamu, umsa wa-Eliyakhimu,
umsa waMeliya, umsa waMena, umsa waMathatha, umsa waNatani, umsa waDavide,
umsa waJese, umsa wa-Obedi, umsa waBhowazi, umsa waSala, umsa waNasoni,
umsa wa-Aminadabi, umsa wa-Admini, umsa wa-Arini, umsa wa-Hezroni, umsa waPheresi, umsa waJuda,
umsa waJakobe, umsa wa-Isaka, umsa wa-Abrahama, umsa waThara, umsa waNahori,
umsa waSerugi, umsa waRehu, umsa waPhelegi, umsa wa-Ebheri, umsa waShela,
umsa waKhenani, umsa wa-Aphakisadi, umsa waShemi, umsa waNowa, umsa waLameki,
umsa waMethusala, umsa wa-Enoki, umsa waJarede, umsa waMahalaleli, umsa waKhenani,
umsa wa-Enoshi, umsa waSethi, umsa wa-Adamu, umsa waNkulunkulu.
Jesu wabuya eJordane, asagcwele Moya Longcwele. Moya Longcwele wamholela ehlane,
lapho alingwa nguSathane emalanga langema-40. Abengadli lutfo kulawo malanga, kodvwa indlala wayiva ekupheleni kwawo.
Sathane watsi kuye: “Nangabe uyiNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu, tjela nali litje ligucuke libe sinkhwa.”
Sathane wamphakamisa, wamkhombisa ngekushesha lokukhulu yonkhe imibuso yemhlaba,
watsi: “Ngitakunika onkhe lamandla, nabo bonkhe lobunjinga, ngobe bonkhe banikwa mine, futsi ngingabunika nome ngubani lengimtsandzako.
Konkhe loku kungaba kwakho nawungamane ungikhotsamele kanye nje.”
Sathane wamtsatsa wamyisa eJerusalema wafike wambeka esicongweni selithempeli watsi: “NawuyiNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu, tijike lapha phansi.
Sathane asacedze kumlinga ngako konkhe, wesuka wamshiya kwesikhashana.
Jesu wabuyela eGalile agcwele emandla aMoya Longcwele. Indzaba yakhe yandza yasakateka naso sonkhe leso sigodzi.
Wafundzisa emasinagogeni abo, bonkhe bantfu bamdvumisa.
Jesu waya eNazaretha lapho abekhulele khona, kwatsi ngeliSabatha waya esinagogeni njengaloku abevamisile. Wasukuma asatawufundza imiBhalo.
Bamnika incwadzi ya-Isaya, umphrofethi. Wayisombulula watfola indzawana, wayifundza itsi:
Wase uyayigocota lencwadzi uyinika sikhonti ubuyela phansi uyahlala. Bonkhe bantfu esinagogeni bambukisisa.
Wacala wakhuluma kubantfu watsi: “Lamuhla lomBhalo ugcwalisekile, njengobe nitivele nje kutsi utsini.”
Bonkhe bantfu batsatseka ngaye bamangala ngalamagama lamahle lawakhuluma batsi: “Akusiye umsa waJosefa yini lona?”
Watsi kubo: “Ngiyati kutsi nitangivulela lamavi alesiga lesitsi: ‘Nyanga tiphilise,’ niphindze futsi nitsi kimi: ‘Yenta nakuwo lomuti wakini letintfo leseva kutsi utentile eKhaphanawume!’ ”
Jesu wachubeka watsi: “Ase nginitjele naku, kutsi umphrofethi akemukeleki endzaweni yangakubo.
Noko Elija akatfunyelwanga ngisho nakumunye wabo, kepha watfunyelwa kulomfelokati abewaseSarepta, esigodzini saseSidoni.
Kwakunemalephelo lamanyenti ka-Israyeli ngesikhatsi semphrofethi Elisha, noko kute nalinye lelaphiliswa emkhatsini wawo ngaphandle kwaNahamani, umSiriya.”
Bonkhe bantfu esinagogeni bagcwala kutfukutsela nabeva loko,
basukuma ngekutfukutsela, bamcosha kulelidolobha bamcondzisa esiweni salentsaba, lapho belakhiwe khona, bentela kumhholokoshisela kuso,
kodvwa waphicaphicela emkhatsini wesicumbi sebantfu, wahamba.
Jesu wehlela eKhaphanawume, lidolobha laseGalile, lapho afundzisa khona ngemaSabatha.
Bamangala bonkhe bantfu ngendlela labekafundzisa ngayo, ngobe emavi akhe bekanemandla.
Bekunendvodza lapho esinagogeni lebeyinelidimoni; yamemeta kakhulu yatsi:
“Awu! Jesu waseNazaretha ufunani kitsi? Sewutele kutesibhubhisa yini? Ngiyakwati kutsi ungubani; unguLongcwele waNkulunkulu.”
Jesu wawekhuta lomoya watsi: “Thula! Phuma futsi kulomuntfu!” Lidimoni lamjika phansi embikwabo bonkhe, noko laphuma kuye lingakamlimati.
Bantfu betfuka bonkhe, bakhuluma bodvwana batsi: “Livi lini leli? Ngeligunya nangemandla lamakhulu lomuntfu ukhalimela imimoya lemibi iphume.”
Lendzaba ngaJesu yandza naso sonkhe leso sigodzi.
Jesu wesuka esinagogeni waya ekhaya kaSimoni. Uninatala waSimoni abephatseke kakhulu ngumkhuhlane; base babikela Jesu ngalowo mkhuhlane wakhe.
Jesu waya kuye, wafike wema eceleni kwembhedze wakhe wawekhuta lomkhuhlane; umkhuhlane waphela masinyane kuye, wasukuma khona lapho wayawubalungisela labakudzingako.
Kwatsi ekushoneni kwelilanga bonkhe labebagulelwa tihlobo tabo tiphetfwe tifo letehlukene batiletsa kuJesu; tonkhe watibeka tandla, watiphilisa.
Kwaphuma nemadimoni ebantfwini labanyenti. Amemeta atsi: “Wena uyiNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu!”
Jesu abewekhuta angawavumeli kutsi akhulume, ngobe abemati lamadimoni kutsi unguKhristu.
Jesu waphuma kuseluvivi kulelo dolobha waya lapho kungenabantfu khona. Bantfu base bacala kumfuna, batsi kube bamtfole, betama kumvimbela kutsi angabashiyi.
Kodvwa watsi kubo: “Kufanele ngishumayele liVangeli ngembuso waNkulunkulu nakulamanye emadolobha, ngobe Nkulunkulu ungitfume kwenta kona loko.”
Ngako washumayela emasinagogeni kulo lonke laseJudiya.
Wabona tikebhe letimbili time elusentseni, kodvwa badwebi bebaphumile kuto bageza emanetha abo.
Watsi asangena kulesinye sato lebesisaSimoni, wamcela kutsi ase akhweshe kancane elusentseni lwemanti. Wase uhlala phansi kulesikebhe, wacala wafundzisa bantfu.
badzimate bakhweba labanye bangani babo lababekulesinye sikebhe kutsi batebabambisa; beta batigcwalisa totimbili, tikebhe taphose tacwila.
Kodvwa Simoni Phetro abona loku, waguca ngemadvolo etinyaweni taJesu watsi: “Ncono usuke kimi, Nkhosi, ngobe mine ngingumuntfu losoni!”
Yena nebangani bakhe bamangaliswa bunyenti betinhlanti labebatibambile.
Kwaba ngiso sona leso nakuboJakobe naJohane, emadvodzana aZebedi. Jesu watsi kuSimoni: “Ungesabi, kusukela nyalo sewutawudweba bantfu.”
Abesakulelinye lidolobha nakufika indvodza leyayinebulephelo, nayibona Jesu, yatilahla embikwakhe yamncenga yatsi: “Nkhosi, nawutsandza, ungangihlambulula.”
Jesu welula sandla sakhe wayitsintsa watsi: “Ngiyatsandza; hlambuluka.” Ngekushesha bulephelo besuka kuyo.
Jesu wayiyalisisa kutsi ingatjeli muntfu, kodvwa yente umyalo waMosi ngekutsi iyewutibonakalisa kumphristi, yente nemnikelo wekuhlambuluka kwayo, kuze kube bufakazi kubantfu.
Kodvwa noko indzaba ngaye yandza nayo yonkhe indzawo; ticumbi letikhulu teta kutemlalela nekutsi titewuphiliswa etifeni tato.
Ngalelinye lilanga Jesu abefundzisa, baFarisi netati temtsetfo tihleti, tiphuma kuwo onkhe emadolobha aseGalile, naseJudiya, naseJerusalema. Emandla eNkhosi abenaye kutsi aphilise labagulako.
Lamanye emadvodza eta atfwele lenye indvodza ngeluhlaka leyayife luhlangotsi, etama kuyingenisa endlini ayibeke embikwaJesu.

Ehluleka kuyingenisa, ngobe bantfu bebabanyenti baminyetelene kakhulu. Ngako base bayayetfwala bakhwela nayo etulu eluphahleni, bavula sikhala, bayehlisela phansi ngeluhlaka lwayo, bayibeka embikwaJesu.
Jesu nakabona kukholwa kwabo lokungaka, watsi: “Ndvodza, tono takho titsetselelwe.”
Bafundzisi bemtsetfo nebaFarisi bacala bavungatela bakhuluma bodvwa batsi: “Ngubani lona lohlambalata Nkulunkulu? Ngubani longatsetselela tono ngaphandle kwaNkulunkulu?”
Jesu wakubona lokubutana kwabo, wabaphendvula watsi: “Yini lena leniyibuta etinhlitiyweni tenu?
Ngukuphi lokulula ekutseni: ‘Utsetselelwe tono takho,’ nome kutsi: ‘Sukuma uhambe’?
Ngitanikhombisa-ke kutsi iNdvodzana yeMuntfu inemandla ekutsetselela tono emhlabeni,” wase utsi kulobekafe luhlangotsi: “Ngitsi kuwe, sukuma, utsatse luhlaka lwakho uhambe uye ekhaya.”
Ngekuphatima kweliso lendvodza yasukuma embikwabo bonkhe, yatsatsa luhlaka lwayo, yahamba yaya ekhaya, idvumisa Nkulunkulu.
Bonkhe bantfu bamangala ngekwesaba lokukhulu badvumisa Nkulunkulu batsi: “Maye, tsine sibone tintfo letimangalisako lamuhla lapha!”
Emvakwaloko Jesu waphuma wahamba, wabona Levi labengumtselisi ahleti endzaweni yekutsela, watsi kuye: “Ngilandzele!”
Levi wasukuma, washiya konkhe labekwenta wamlandzela.
Levi wase wentela Jesu lidzili lelikhulu endlini yakhe, kwaba nebatselisi nebantfu labanyenti lababehleti nabo lapho.
Labanye baFarisi netati temtsetfo telicembu labo tasola bafundzi baJesu. Tabuta tatsi: “Nidlelani nebatselisi kanye netoni nibuye ninatse nato?”
Jesu wabaphendvula watsi: “Bantfu labaphilako abayidzingi inyanga, kodvwa ngulabo labagulako.
Angiketeli kubita labalungile, kodvwa ngitele kubita toni kutsi tiphendvuke.”
Labanye batsi kuJesu: “Bafundzi baJohane bavame kuzila bathandaze, nebafundzi bebaFarisi nabo benta njalo; kodvwa bafundzi bakho bona bayadla banatse.”
Jesu wabaphendvula watsi: “Nicabanga kutsi ningema likhetfo kudla emshadweni, umkhwenyane asenalo? Cha! Ngeke!
Kodvwa sikhatsi siyeta lapho liyakwemukwa khona umkhwenyane walo; liyawuzila-ke lingadli kulawo malanga.”

Jesu wabatjela nankhu umfanekiso: “Kute umuntfu longadzabula sicephu sengubo lensha achibele ngaso ingubo lendzala. Nakenta njalo, utabe udzabule ingubo lensha, lesicephu lesisha singeke sivane nalengubo lendzala.

“Futsi kute umuntfu longatsela liwayini lelisha kuso sikhumbasikhwama lesidzala sigcwale. Nakente njalo, leliwayini lelisha lingapumuta lesikhumbasikhwama nalo licitseke, kufe nalesikhumbasikhwama sipumuke siphele.
Cha! Liwayini lelisha lifanele litselwe kuso sikhumbasikhwama lesisha.
“Futsi losanatse liwayini lelidzala angabe asalifuna lelisha, angatsi: ‘Lelidzala lincono!’ ”
Labanye baFarisi batsi: “Nikwenteleni loku, njengobe umtsetfo utsi anikafaneli kwenta loko ngeliSabatha?”

Wangena endlini yaNkulunkulu, watsatsa sinkhwa lesasinikelwe kuNkulunkulu, wasidla wapha nalamadvodza abehamba nawo, kantsi kuphambene nemtsetfo kutsi singadliwa ngulomunye umuntfu ngaphandle kwebaphristi.”
Jesu watsi kubo: “INdvodzana yeMuntfu iyiNkhosi yeliSabatha.”
Ngalelinye liSabatha Jesu wangena esinagogeni wafundzisa. Bekunendvodza leyayinesandla sangasekudla lesasishwaphene.
Labanye bafundzisi bemtsetfo nebaFarisi bafuna lichinga lekubeka Jesu licala lekutsi wonile, bebamciphile bafuna kubona kutsi, njengobe kuliSabatha nje, utawuphilisa yini.
Kodvwa Jesu ayati imicabango yabo watsi kulendvodza lenesandla lesasishwaphene: “Sukuma ute la ngembili.” Nembala indvodza yasukuma yeta ngembili yafike yema.
Jesu wase utsi kubo: “Ase ngibute. Umtsetfo wetfu usivumela kutsi asenteni ngeliSabatha? Sisite nome silimate? Sisindzise imphilo yemuntfu nome siyibulale?”
Wabacalacalata bonkhana, wase utsi kulendvodza: “Yelula sandla sakho.”
Kodvwa baFarisi batfukutsela babila, bafakana imilomo bodvwana ngekutsi bafanele bente njani ngaloJesu.
Ngaleso sikhatsi Jesu wenyukela egcumeni ayewuthandaza, wacitsa busuku bonkhe khona lapho athandaza kuNkulunkulu.
Ekuseni wabita bafundzi bakhe, wakhetsa baba li-12 kubo. Labo wababita ngekutsi baphostoli:
Simoni, lambita ngekutsi nguPhetro, nemnakabo labe ngu-Andreya, Jakobe naJohane, Filiphu naBhatalomewu,
Matewu naTomase, Jakobe umsa wa-Alfiyose, naSimoni labekatiwa ngekutsi ngumZelothi,
naJudasi umsa waJakobe, kanye naJudasi Skariyothi lowaba ngumtsengisi waJesu.

Wehla nabo, wefika wema endzaweni leyayibekile kanye nabo bonkhe bafundzi bakhe labanyenti. Sicumbi sebantfu sase sikhona lapho siphuma eJudiya lonkhe, naseJerusalema, naselusentseni lwelwandle lwaseThire naseSidoni.
Babetele kutamlalela nekutawuphiliswa; labo bebahlushwa ngimimoya lemibi babephiliswa.
Bonkhe bantfu betama kumtsintsa, ngobe emandla abephuphuma kuye, wabaphilisa bonkhe.
Nakwenteka loko, nibojabula nize nigcumagcume, ngobe mkhulu umvuzo wenu lenigcinelwe wona ezulwini; ngobe bokhokho babo benta njalo kubaphrofethi.
“Kodvwa maye, kubuhlungu kini nine leninjingile manje, ngobe phela seninako konkhe lokunijabulisako.
Babusiseni labanicalekisako, bathandazeleni labo labaniphatsa kabi!
Nangabe umuntfu akumukula esihlatsini, mnike nalesi lesinye, naso asimukule; nakatsatsa libhantji lakho, mnike nelihembe futsi!
Wonkhe locela lutfo kuwe, mnike; nangabe umuntfu atsatsa intfo yakho, ungamhambeli!
Yentani kulabanye bantfu loko lenifuna kutsi bakwente kini!
“Nanitsandza labanitsandzako, pho, ningasibheka kanjani sibusiso? Ngisho netoni titsandza labatitsandzako!
Naniphatsa kahle labaniphatsa kahle, pho, ningasibheka kanjani sibusiso? Ngisho netoni nato tenta njalo.
Nanetjeleka labo lenetsemba kutsi batawuphindze banibuyisele, pho, ningasibheka kanjani sibusiso? Ngisho netoni tiyetjelekana tibuyiselane.
Cha! Tsandzani titsa tenu nitentele lokuhle, nitjeleke ningabheki lutfo! Niyawuba nemvuzo lomkhulu ezulwini, nibe ngemadvodzana aLosetikwako Konkhe. Ngobe unemusa kulabangabongi nakulababi.
“Ningabehluleli labanye bantfu, khona ningetikwehlulelwa nguNkulunkulu; ningabalahli labanye, khona ningetiwulahlwa; tsetselelani, nani niyawutsetselelwa.
Umfundzi akamkhulu kunemfundzisi wakhe, kodvwa wonkhe umfundzi nasafundziswe ngalokuphelele, uyawuba njengemfundzisi wakhe.
“Ubukelani lutsi lolusesweni lemzalwane, kodvwa ube utsalalisela lugodvo lolusesweni lakho?

Ungasho kanjani kumzalwane wakho kutsi: ‘Awu, mzalwane, ase ngikukhiphe nalu lutsi esweni lakho’? Mtentisi! Cala kucala ukhiphe lugodvo lolusesweni lakho, khona utabe sewuyakwati kukhipha lutsi lolusesweni lemzalwane wakho.”
“Sihlahla lesimnandzi asititseli titselo letimbi, kantsi nesihlahla lesibi asititseli titselo letimnandzi.
Tonkhe tihlahla tatiwa ngetitselo tato. Ungeke ukhandze emakhiwa atsele emanyeveni. Futsi ungeke uwakhe emagelebisi elugaganeni.

Umuntfu lolungile uveta lokulungile lokuphuma engungwini yenhlitiyo yakhe lenhle. Nemuntfu lomubi uveta tintfo letimbi letivela enhlitiyweni yakhe lembi, ngako umlomo wemuntfu ukhuluma loko lokugcwele enhlitiyweni yakhe.”
Wonkhe lota kimi eve emavi ami, awente, ngitanitjela kutsi ufanana nani.

Ufanana nemuntfu lowakha indlu; wemba kwashona, wase wakha sisekelo edvwaleni. Emanti netikhukhula kwagcwala kwaphuphuma emfuleni, kwetama kuyikhukhula lendlu, kodvwa ayizange inyakate, ngobe yayakheke kahle la edvwaleni.

Kodvwa lona lova emavi ami angawenti, ufanana nemuntfu lowakha indlu yakhe esihlabatsini ngaphandle kwekubeka sisekelo. Yatsi nase ishaywa ngemanti netikhukhula, yasheshe yawa. Yeka kubhidlika kwayo kwaba kukhulu!”
Watsi nase akhulume konkhe loku kubantfu, wesuka waya eKhaphanawume.
Indvuna yelibutfo lemaRoma yayinesisebenti leyayisitsandza kakhulu, sasigulela kufa.
Yatsi nayiva ngaJesu lendvuna, yatfumela kuye lamanye emaJuda lamadzala kutsi ayewucela Jesu kutsi ete ateyiphilisela lesisebenti sayo.
Befika kuJesu bamncengisisa batsi: “Impela lomuntfu ulufanele lusito lwakho.
Uyasitsandza sive sakitsi, futsi nguye lowasakhela lelisinagoge.”

Ngako Jesu wahamba nabo. Watsi nase asedvute nalapho ihlala khona lendvuna, yatfumela bangani bayo kuJesu kutsi bafike batsi: “Nkhosi, ungatihluphi ngekuta lapha. Angikafaneli nekutsi ngingakungenisa nasemtini wami,
ngako-ke, ngitikhandza ngingakafaneli nekutsi ngite kuwe. Mane usho livi nje, sisebenti sami sitawuphila.
Nami ngiyindvuna lephetfwe ngulabakhulu, nginemabutfo lengiwaphetse, ngitsi kulelinye: ‘Hamba!’ lihambe; ngitsi kulelinye: ‘Wota!’ lite; ngitsi esigcilini sami: ‘Yenta naku!’ sikwente.”
Jesu wamangala nakeva loku, wagucuka wabuka lesicumbi sebantfu lesasimlandzela watsi: “Angizange sengikubone kukholwa lokungaka ngisho naka-Israyeli imbala.”
Titfunywa tatsi tibuyela emuva endlini yalendvuna, takhandza lesisebenti sesiphilile.
Emvakwaloko Jesu waya edolobheni lelalitsiwa yiNayini. Bafundzi bakhe nesicumbi sebantfu lesikhulu sasihamba naye.
Nakefika esangweni lelidolobha, wahlangana nebantfu baya emngcwabeni. Lendvodzana lebeyifile beyiyemfelokati, futsi bekukuphela kwayo. Sicumbi sebantfu sasimsingatsile lomfelokati.
INkhosi yamdzabukela nayimbona lomfelokati yatsi kuye: “Ungakhali!”
Wahamba Jesu watsintsa loluhlaka lwalunalesidvumbu, bantfu lababelutfwele base bayema. Jesu watsi: “Ngitsi kuwe: Vuka, jaha!”
Lelijaha lelalifile lavuka lahlala ngetibunu, lacala lakhuluma. Jesu wase ulinika unina.
Bonkhe bantfu bafikelwa kwesaba, badvumisa Nkulunkulu batsi: “Sifikelwe ngumphrofethi lomkhulu!” Baphindze batsi: “Nkulunkulu sewubahambele bantfu bakhe!”
Lendzaba ngaJesu yandza neliJudiya lonkhe kanye netigodzi letatakhelene nalo.
Bafundzi baJohane bamtjela ngato tonkhe tintfo tatentiwa nguJesu. Johane wase ubita babili babo.
Wabatfumela eNkhosini kuyawubuta kutsi: “Unguye yini lona lofanele kufika, nome kusafanele silindzele lomunye?”
Nase befikile kuJesu, befika batsi: “Johane uMbhabhatisi usitfumile kutsi sitewubuta kutsi: ‘Unguye yini lona lotawufika, nome kusafanele silindzele lomunye?’ ”
Ngaso leso sikhatsi Jesu waphilisa labanyenti labebaphetfwe ngimikhuhlane, netifo, nemadimoni, wavula emehlo etimphumphutse letinyenti.
Tatsi kube tihambe titfunywa taJohane, Jesu wacala wakhuluma eticunjini tebantfu watsi: “Ngesikhatsi niya kuJohane ehlane nanilindzele kubonani? Nanilindzele kubona tjani bulaliswa ngumoya yini?
Naniyewubonani? Naniyele kuyawubona indvodza legcoke tingubo letinhle nje kuphela? Empeleni anati yini kutsi bantfu labahlobe ngemvunulo lenhle batfolakala etigodlweni?
Ase ningitjele kahle nine, nanibheke kubonani? Umphrofethi? Yebo, ngiyanivumela, empeleni nabona lomkhulu kunalomphrofethi nanimbhekile.
Wachubeka watsi: “Ngiyanitjela ngitsi, akekho namunye, lotelwe ngumfati, lomkhulu kunaJohane, kepha loyo lomncane embusweni waNkulunkulu, mkhulu kunaye.”
Kodvwa baFarisi netati temtsetfo atiyemukelanga injongo yaNkulunkulu ngato, bala kubhajatiswa nguJohane.
Jesu wachubeka watsi: “Konje bantfu balesitukulwane ngingabafanisa nani nje?

Banjengebantfwana labahleti emakethe, lesinye sicumbi sabo simemeta lesinye sitsi: ‘Sanishayela tigubhu engomeni yesibhaca, kodvwa anizange nigidze; sahlabela tingoma temngcwabo, kodvwa anizange senikhale.’
“Johane uMbhabhatisi wazila kudla wangete wanatsa neliwayini, nase nitsi: ‘Unelidimoni!’
INdvodzana yeMuntfu yase iyefika, yona-ke yadla yanatsa, nase nitsi: ‘Ase nibheke! Lomuntfu usimiti nemnatsi, futsi ungumngani webatselisi netoni.’
Noko inhlakanipho yaNkulunkulu ibonakaliswa iliciniso kulabo labayemukelako.”
Jesu wamenywa ngumFarisi kutsi ete atewudla ekhaya kakhe. Nangempela Jesu waya wafike wadla.
wafike wema emvakwaJesu, ngasetinyaweni takhe akhala, taze tinyawo taJesu taba manti tinyembeti. Watesula ngetinwele takhe lomfati, watanga, watitsela ngemakha.

Nakabona loko lomFarisi lobekameme Jesu, watsi enhlitiyweni yakhe: “Kube lomuntfu ungumphrofethi ngempela, ngabe uyati kutsi ungubani lomfati lomtsintsako. Ngabe uyati kutsi uphila imphilo leyonakele kangakanani.”
Jesu wakhuluma waphumisela watsi: “Simoni, kukhona lengifuna kukutjela kona.” Waphendvula watsi: “Yebo, Mfundzisi, ngitjele.”
Jesu watsi: “Kwake kwaba khona emadvodza lamabili labekweleda umtjelekisi wetimali. Lenye yayimkweleda tinhlavu tesiliva letingema-500, lenye yayimkweleda tinhlavu tesiliva letingema-50.
Atsi kube ehluleke omabili kuyibuyisa lemali yakhe, wawacolela. Nguyiphi emkhatsini wawo leyamtsandza kakhulu?”
Simoni waphendvula watsi: “Ngiyabona kutsi kufanele kube ngulena lebeyimkweleda kakhulu.”

Wase ugucukela kulomfati, utsi kuSimoni: “Uyambona lomfati? Seloku ngingenile lapha endlini yakho awukanginiki emanti ekugeza tinyawo tami, kodvwa yena sewugeze tinyawo tami ngetinyembeti takhe, waze watesula ngetinwele takhe.
Wena awukangemukeli ngekunganga, kodvwa yena seloku efikile wanga tinyawo tami.
Wena awukayigcobisi ngemafutsa inhloko yami, kodvwa yena sewugcobise tinyawo tami ngemakha.
“Ngako-ke ngikutjela ngitsi: Tono takhe lebetitinyenti setitsetselelwe, ngobe unelutsandvo lolukhulu, kodvwa lowo lotsetselelwe lokuncane, utsandza kancane.”
Labanye labebahleti naye badla, bavungatela bodvwana batsi: “Ngubani lona lotsetselela netono?”
Kodvwa Jesu wase utsi kulomfati: “Kukholwa kwakho kukusindzisile, hamba ngekuthula.”
Emvakwesikhatsi Jesu wahamba wadzabula emadolobha nemadolobhana ashumayela liVangeli ngembuso waNkulunkulu. Bafundzi bakhe labali-12 babehamba naye,
kanye nalabanye bafati lababephiliswe emadimonini nasetifeni: Mariya waseMagdala lebekukhishwe kuye emadimoni labesikhombisa,
Jwana umkaKhuza, indvuna yesigodlo saHerodi, naSusana, nalabanye labanyenti bafati lababekhonta Jesu nebafundzi bakhe ngaloko lababenako.
Kwatsi lapho bantfu labanyenti sebabutsene bachamuka emadolobheni lehlukene, Jesu wase ubatjela nankhu umfanekiso lotsi:
“Umhlanyeli waphuma wayawuhlanyela inhlanyelo yakhe. Ekuhlanyeleni kwakhe lenye inhlanyelo yakhe yawela endleleni, lapho yanyatselwa khona bantfu, kwafika netinyoni tayidla.
Lenye yawela emhlabatsini losemadvwaleni, yashesha yamila, kodvwa yashesha yaphelelwa ngemandla yabuna, ngobe yayingenawo umhlabatsi lonemswakama.
Lenye yawela emanyeveni, yakhula kanye nawo, ase ayayiminyetela.
Lenye yawela emhlabatsini lovundzile, yamila, yatsela ngemakhulu.”
Bafundzi baJesu bambuta kutsi usho kutsini lomfanekiso.

Wabatjela watsi: “Nine niphiwe lwati lwetimfihlakalo tembuso waNkulunkulu, kodvwa kulabanye kushunyayelwa ngemifanekiso, kuze batsi bayabona kodvwa bangabonisisi, batsi bayeva kantsi abevisisi kahle.”
Kuhlanyelwa kwaleyo leyawela endleleni kufanekisa labo labalivako livi laNkulunkulu bese kufika Sathane uyalisusa etinhlitiyweni tabo, kuze bangakholwa funa basindziswe.

Kuhlanyelwa kwaleyo leyawela emhlabatsini losemadvwaleni kufanekisa labo labatsi nabalivako livi laNkulunkulu balemukele ngekutfokota, kodvwa ngenca yekungalijulisi kwabo etinhlitiyweni tabo, bakholwa sikhashana. Kutsi kungefika kulingwa, bese balilahla phansi.

Kuhlanyelwa kwaleyo leyawela emhlabatsini losemanyeveni kusho labo labatsi sebalivile livi laNkulunkulu, kodvwa tinhlupheko nebunjinga, netinjabulo talomhlaba kubaminyetele batsele titselo letingavutfwa.
Kuhlanyelwa kwaleyo leyawela emhlabatsini lovundzile kufanekisa labo labalivako livi laNkulunkulu baligcine ngekutitfoba lokukhulu babeketele, baze batsele titselo letihle.”
Unina nabomnakaboJesu beta kuye, kodvwa behluleka kusondzela madvutane naye, ngobe bantfu bebaminyetelene kakhulu.
Bamtjela Jesu batsi: “Unyoko nabomnakenu beme la ngephandle, bacela kukubona.”
Kodvwa yena watsi: “Make nabomnaketfu ngulabo labeva livi laNkulunkulu balente.”
Ngalelinye lilanga Jesu nebafundzi bakhe bakhwela esikebheni, wase utsi kubo: “Asambeni sewelele ngesheya kwalolwandle.” Nembala bentjweza,
yena wase uyalala. Kwase kufika sivunguvungu sihhusha la elwandle, kwaze kwangena nemanti esikebheni, ngako babasengotini.
Baya kuye bafike bamvusa batsi: “Mfundzisi, Mfundzisi, sesiyafa!”
Waphaphama wase uyasikhalimela lesivunguvungu nemagagasi; kwabindza, kwaba khona kuthula.
Besaba bamangala, badzimate bakhulumisana bodvwana batsi: “Ngubani kantsi lona, ngobe ukhalimela umoya nemanti kumlalele?”
Nakehlela elusentseni lwemanti, Jesu wahlangana nendvodza leyayiphume edolobheni. Yayinemadimoni. Kwase kusikhatsi lesidze ihamba ngcunu lendvodza ingasahlali nekhaya, seyihlala emadlizeni.
Yatsi nayibona Jesu, yakhala kakhulu, yaze yatilahla embikwakhe, yatsi: “Jesu, Ndvodzana yaNkulunkulu Losetikwako Konkhe! Ufunani kimi? Ngiyakuncenga ngitsi ungangihluphi.”

Yayisho loko nje, ngobe Jesu abesawekhutile lomoya lomubi kutsi awuphume kuyo. Lomoya wase uyibambe kanyenti kwale nome seyibanjwe njengesiboshwa, yaboshwa tandla netinyawo ngetinketane. Yayitidzabula itilahle le, lelidimoni liyihambise iyewuhlala etsafeni.
Lendvodza yamphendvula yatsi: “Sibanyenti,” ngobe yayingenwe ngemadimoni lamanyenti.
Emadimoni abese ancenga Jesu kutsi amane angawatfumeli emgodzini longenamkhawulo.
Kwakunetingulube letinyenti edvute, tidla eceleni lentsaba. Emadimoni amncenga Jesu kutsi amane awavumele angene etingulubeni; wawavumela.
Aphuma-ke emadimoni kulendvodza angena etingulubeni; tonkhe tingulube tesuka ngematubane tewusa sihosha taye tatitsela ekhatsi eLwandle lwaseGalile, tacwila tonkhe tafa.
Lamadvodza labeluse letingulube akubona loko lokwakwentekile, ase ayagijima ahamba atifafata edolobheni nasemitini letindzaba.
Bantfu baphuma sebayawubona lokwasekwentekile. Batsi beta kuJesu, bakhandza lomuntfu labenemadimoni ahleti ngasetinyaweni taJesu, embetse kahle, nemcondvo wakhe sewusangulukile; bonkhe bantfu besaba.
Base bayabachazela labo bebabonile kutsi kwenteke njani nekutsi lomuntfu uphile kanjani.
Sonkhe lesicumbi sebantfu baseGegesa samcela Jesu kutsi sale esuka kuleyo ndzawo, ngobe bonkhe befikelwa kwesaba lokukhulu. Ngako-ke Jesu wase ukhwela esikebheni, wahamba.
Lendvodza lekwakukhishwe kuyo emadimoni yancusa Jesu yatsi: “Ngicela ngisale sengihamba nawe.”
“Buyela ekhaya ubatjele ngaloko Nkulunkulu lakwentele kona.”
Lendvodza yahamba kuso sonkhe leso sigodzi, ihamba ilandzisa bantfu ngaloko Nkulunkulu labesayentele kona.
Sicuku sebantfu samhlangabeta Jesu nasabuya, ngobe bonkhe babelindzele yena.
Kwase kufika indvodza, libito layo kunguJayiru, siphatsimandla selisinagoge. Yatijika etinyaweni taJesu yamncenga kutsi aye ekhaya layo,
ngobe lesidzandzane sayo lekwakukuphela kwaso, sineminyaka leli-12, sasigulela kufa.
Watsi Jesu asahamba, bantfu bamkaka ngala nangala.
Umfati labesagule iminyaka leli-12 opha asacedze imali yakhe yonkhe aya etinyangeni, setehluleke tonkhe,
wasondzela emvakwaJesu; wafike watsintsa umphetfo wengubo yaJesu, kopha kwaphela khona lapho konkhe swe!
Bonkhe batilandvula, kodvwa Phetro watsi: “Mfundzisi, kufanele, ngobe bantfu banyenti labakukakile nalabakuminyetele!”
Kodvwa Jesu watsi: “Kukhona longiphatsile! Ngiyeva kutsi kukhona emandla laphumile kimi.”

Lomfati asabonile kutsi abengeke asatifihla, wase uyativeta kuJesu watilahla phansi embikwakhe asachachatela luvalo, watilandza kuye embikwebantfu bonkhe, kutsi umphatseleni nekutsi sewuphile masinyane kangakanani.
Jesu watsi kuye: “Ndvodzakati, kukholwa kwakho kukusindzisile; hamba ngekuthula.”
Watsi asakhuluma Jesu, kwachamuka sigijimi site kulesiphatsimandla lesasinguJayiru, safike satsi: “Indvodzakati yakho seyifile, sale ungabe usamhlupha uMfundzisi.”
Kepha Jesu nakuva loko, watsi kuJayiru: “Ungesabi wena, kholwa nje kuphela; itawuphila.”
Lapho Jesu efika ekhaya wabalela kutsi bangene bonkhe ngaphandle kwaPhetro, naJohane, naJakobe, neyise wemntfwana kanye nenina.
Bonkhe bantfu bebakhala badzindza sililo, kodvwa Jesu watsi: “Ningakhali, ngobe akafi, ulele nje.”
Bamane bamhleka bulima nje, ngobe besebati kutsi sewufile.
Kodvwa Jesu wambamba ngesandla watsi kuye: “Ntfombatane! Vuka!”
Umphefumulo wabuya, umntfwana wavuka masinyane. Jesu watsi abamuphe lokudliwako adle.
Batali bakhe bamangala kakhulu. Kepha Jesu wabadvonsa ngendlebe kutsi bangatjeli muntfu ngaloko lokwakwentekile.
Jesu wabita bafundzi bakhe labali-12 watsi abasondzele kuye; wase ubanika emandla, neligunya lekukhipha emadimoni nekuphilisa labanetifo.
Wase uyabatfuma kutsi bayewushumayela umbuso waNkulunkulu baphilise nalabagulako.
Lapho banemukela khona, hlalani kulelo khaya nize nihambe kulelo dolobha.
Lapho banganemukeli khona lishiyeni lelo dolobha, nitsintsitse lutfuli etinyaweni tenu, kuze kube bufakazi bekunala kwabo.”
Bahamba-ke, bangenela imiti ngemiti bashumayela liVangeli, baphilisa kuto tonkhe tindzawo.
labanye bebatsi ngu-Elija lotibonakalisile; kantsi labanye bebatsi ngulomunye webaphrofethi basendvulo lovuke ekufeni.
Nase babuyile baphostoli, bafike batjela Jesu konkhe lababekwentile. Wase uhamba nabo uya edolobheni eBhethsayida.
Tatsi kube tikuve loko leticumbi tebantfu, tamlandzela. Watemukela, wakhuluma ngembuso waNkulunkulu, waphilisa nalabo bebadzinga kuphiliswa.
Nalishonako lilanga, baphostoli labali-12 beta kuye batsi: “Bacitse labantfu bahambe baye emitini nasemakhaya bayewutifunela kudla kanye nendzawo yekulala, ngobe ilihlane kakhulu lendzawo lesikuyo.”
Kodvwa Jesu watsi kubo: “Banikeni nine matfupha labangahle bakudle.”
Baphendvula batsi: “Lesinako tinkhwa letisihlanu netinhlanti letimbili, ngaphandle kwekutsi siyewutsenga lokunye sitekwengeta, kuze kutekwenela bonkhe labantfu.”
Bekungaba ti-5 000 temadvodza labelapho. Jesu watsi kubafundzi bakhe: “Hlalisani labantfu ngema-50 sicumbi sisinye.”
Bafundzi bakhe benta njengobe abeshito, babahlalisa phansi bonkhe.
Jesu wase utsatsa letinkhwa letisihlanu netinhlanti letimbili wabuka ezulwini, watibusisa, watihlephula wase utinika bafundzi bakhe kutsi babele bantfu.
Bonkhe badla besutsa; bafundzi base babutsa timvutfuluka letatisele, kwagcwala emabhasikidi lali-12.
Kwatsi Jesu asathandaza yedvwana bafundzi bakhe banaye, wababuta watsi: “Bantfu batsi ngingubani?”
Jesu wabadvonsa ngendlebe watsi loko bangakutjeli muntfu,
wachubeka watsi: “INdvodzana yeMuntfu ifanele kuhlupheka kakhulu, ilahlwe tibondza tenkholo, nebaphristi labakhulu nebafundzisi bemtsetfo. Iyawubulawa, ivuswe ekufeni ngelilanga lesitsatfu.”
Ngobe lofuna kusindzisa imphilo yakhe, uyawulahlekelwa ngiyo, kodvwa lolahlekelwa yimphilo yakhe ngenca yami, uyakuyisindzisa.
“Kodvwa kuyawumbuyiselani umuntfu kuzuza live lonkhe, bese ulahlekelwa nguye lucobo lwakhe nome abhujiswe?
Nangabe umuntfu unemahloni ngami nangemavi ami, neNdvodzana yeMuntfu iyawuba nemahloni ngaye nayita ngenkhatimulo yayo nangebukhosi beYise kanye neyetingilosi letingcwele.
Ase nginitjele naliciniso kutsi, bakhona lapha emkhatsini wenu labangeyikufa bangakawuboni umbuso waNkulunkulu.”
Asathandaza buso bakhe bagucuka, netimphahla takhe taba mhlophe tamengetela.
Kusenjalo kwabonakala emadvodza lamabili asakhuluma naye, kwakuboMosi na-Elija;
babonakala ngebukhatikhati banenkhatimulo yasezulwini bakhuluma naJesu ngeluhambo lwakhe belutawugcwaliseka eJerusalema lokwakuyinjongo yaNkulunkulu.
Phetro nebangani bakhe babephetfwe butfongo lobukhulu, kodvwa babebhekile bayibona inkhatimulo yaJesu kanye nalamadvodza.

Atsi nasehlukana lamadvodza, Phetro watsi kuye: “Mfundzisi, kuhle lokutsi sibe lapha. Asakhe emathende lamatsatfu: lelinye libe lakho, lelinye libe laMosi, lelinye libe la-Elija.” Empeleni abengati kutsi utsini.
Asakhuluma loko, kwachamuka lifu labasitsa ngesitfunti salo, bafundzi besaba nababona kusondzela lelifu.
Kwase kuvakala livi liphuma kulelifu litsi: “Lena yiNdvodzana yami, lengiyikhetsile, yilaleleni!”
Latsi libindza lelivi, kwabesekusele Jesu yedvwana. Bafundzi bakufihla loko, abazange batjele muntfu ngalababekubonile ngalawo malanga.
Ngakusasa sebehlile entsabeni, sicumbi lesikhulu seta sihlangabeta Jesu.
Kwase kumemeta indvodza emkhatsini waso itsi: “Mfundzisi, ase ungibonele nangu umsa wami, indvodzana yekuphela.
Kunemoya lomhlaselako ummemetise kakhulu, bese uba nesitfutfwane, aze akhihlite emagwebu emlonyeni; kumshumphisa kangangekutsi uze ehluleke ngisho nekuhamba, kulukhuni kuphuma kwawo.
Ngancenga bafundzi bakho kutsi bawukhiphe lomoya, kodvwa behluleka.”
Jesu waphendvula watsi: “Yehheni, nine situkulwane lesonakele nalesingakholwa, ngiyawuhlala nani kuze kube ngunini nginibeketelela? Mletse lapha lomsa wakho.”
Watsi naketa lomfana, lidimoni lamjika phansi, waba nesitfutfwane. Jesu wawekhuta lomoya lomubi, wamphilisa lomfana, wase umbuyisela kuyise.
Bonkhe bantfu bamangala ngalamandla aNkulunkulu lamakhulu kangaka.
Bantfu bebasamangele ngako konkhe lokwakwentiwa nguJesu, nakatsi kubafundzi bakhe:
“Ningabokukhohlwa naku lengitanitjela kona! INdvodzana yeMuntfu itawunikelwa etandleni tebantfu.”
Kodvwa abazange bayive lenkhulumo kutsi isho kutsini, ngobe beyifihlakele kubo futsi ingevakali, kantsi babesaba nekumbuta ngalendzaba.
Bafundzi baJesu babese bayaphikisana ngekutsi ngubani lomkhulu kunabo bonkhe.
Kodvwa Jesu asabonile kutsi bacabangani, wase uletsa umntfwana, wammisa eceleni kwakhe.

Wase utsi kubo: “Umuntfu lowemukela lomntfwana ngelibito lami, wemukela mine; nalowo lowemukela mine, wemukela lowo longitfumile. Ngobe lowo lomncane kakhulu kunani nonkhe, nguye lomkhulu kunani nonkhe.”
Johane wakhuluma watsi: “Mfundzisi, sibone umuntfu akhipha emadimoni ngelibito lakho, samtjela satsi akakhawule, ngobe akahambisani natsi.”
Sekusele emalangana ekutsi Jesu atsatfwe ayiswe ezulwini, watimisela kutsi aye eJerusalema.
Watfumela titfunywa ngembili kwakhe, letesuka tangena edolobheni lemaSamariya kuyawumlungisela khona.
Kodvwa bantfu balapho abazange bamemukele, ngobe kwakukhanya kutsi ucondze kuya eJerusalema.
Jesu watsi kuyo: “Timphungutja tinemigodzi, netinyoni tinetidleke, kodvwa iNdvodzana yeMuntfu ayinandzawo yekulala iphumule.”
Kodvwa yona yatsi: “Nkhosi, asewungivumele ngiyewungcwaba babe.”
Jesu waphendvula watsi: “Yekela labafile bangcwabane bodvwana. Wena hamba uyewushumayela umbuso waNkulunkulu!”
Ngemuva kwaloko iNkhosi yakhetsa labanye labangema-72,
Yase itsi kubo: “Kuvuna kukhulu, kodvwa tisebenti tincane. Thandazani kumnikati wekuvuna kutsi atfumele letinye tisebenti tekuvuna.
Nome ngukuyiphi indlu leningena kuyo nibotsi: ‘Kuthula akube kulendlu!’
Nangabe lapho kuhlala umuntfu wekuthula, kumbingelela kwenu kutawuhlala kuye; nangabe akunjalo, loko kuthula kwenu kutawubuyela kini.
Hlalani kulendlu, nidle ninatse loko labataninika kona; ngobe sisebenti kufanele sitfole liholo laso. Ningahambi ningena tindlu ngetindlu.
Njalo nje naningena edolobheni banemukela, nibodla labaniphakela kona,
nibaphilise labagulako kulelo dolobha, bese nibatjela nitsi: ‘Umbuso waNkulunkulu sewusondzele kini.’
Kodvwa nabanganemukeli kulelo dolobha, phumelani ngephandle etindleleni, bese nitsi:
‘Nelutfuli lwelidolobha lenu lolunamatsele etinyaweni tetfu silutsintsitsela kini, kodvwa khumbulani kutsi umbuso waNkulunkulu sewusondzele kini!’
Nginitjela kutsi: Ngelilanga lekwehlulela labakulelo dolobha Nkulunkulu uyawubajezisa kamatima kunebaseSodoma.”
Wena-ke Khaphanawume, ucabanga kutsi uyawuphakanyiselwa ezulwini yini? Cha! Uyakwehliselwa esihogweni.”
Jesu wabaphendvula watsi: “Ngabona Sathane awa ezulwini ehla njengembane.
Bukani la! Ngininike emandla ekunyatsela tinyoka, nabofecela, nemandla ekuncoba sitsa; kute lokuyawunilimata.
Ningajabuli ngobe imimoya lemibi initfobela; kodvwa jabulani kutsi emabito enu abhaliwe ezulwini.”

Ngaso leso sikhatsi Jesu wajabula kuMoya Longcwele, watsi: “Yebo, Babe, Nkhosi yelizulu nemhlaba, konkhe loku utifihlele tati netihlakaniphi, kodvwa wakwembula kubantfwana. Yebo, Babe, loko kwaba yintsandvo yakho.
Jesu wase ugucukela kubafundzi bakhe emasitseleni utsi: “Maye, abusisiwe emehlo labona lenikubonako!
Ngiyanitjela ngitsi: Baphrofethi nemakhosi lamanyenti abefisa kukubona loku lenikubonako, kodvwa abakubonanga, bebafuna nekuva loku lenikuvako, kodvwa abazange bakuve.”
Jesu wasiphendvula watsi: “Umtsetfo utsini? Uwufundza njani?”
Kepha sati semtsetfo sifuna kutitsetselela, sabuta satsi: “Ngubani makhelwane wami?”
Jesu waphendvula ngekutsi: “Umuntfu lotsite abephuma eJerusalema aya eJerikho. Wahlaselwa tigebengu, tadzabula tingubo takhe, tamshaya, tamshiya asatawufa.
Kwenteka kwendlula umphristi ehla ngaleyo ndlela; watsi kube ambone lomuntfu, wamgega.
Kanjalo nemLevi wefika lapho, waya wambuka lomuntfu, naye washaya ngale kwakhe.
Kepha umSamariya lotsite labehamba ngaleyo ndlela wamkhandza; watsi kube ambone lomuntfu, wamhawukela.
Waya kuye, wamtsela ngeliwayini amgcobisa nangemafutsa emancebeni, wawabopha ngendvwangu, wase umgibelisa embongolweni yakhe, wamyisa endlini yetihambi lapho amongela khona.
Ngakusasa lomSamariya wakhipha imali lengemasiliva lamabili, wayinika umnikati walendlu yetihambi. Watsi kuye: ‘Ngongele nangu umuntfu wami, nase ngibuya ngitakukhokhela tonkhe tindleko takhe.’ ”
Jesu wephetsa ngekutsi: “Ngumuphi-ke walabantfu labatsatfu longatsi waba ngumakhelwane kulomuntfu lowahlaselwa tigebengu?”
Sati semtsetfo saphendvula satsi: “Ngulona lowaba nesihawu kuye.”
Jesu waphendvula ngekutsi: “Hamba, nawe wente njalo!”
Abenadzadzewabo labenguMariya lowafike wahlala phansi ngasetinyaweni teNkhosi alalela kufundzisa kwayo.
Mata waze wacansulwa kudlangelwa ngumsebenti labewenta; ngako wefika watsi: “Nkhosi, awusangiboneleli dzadzewetfu angibukelela ngemsebenti longaka? Mtjele kutsi atengisita.”
INkhosi yamphendvula yatsi: “Mata, ye Mata! Utikhatsata ngetintfo letinyenti,
kodvwa yinye kuphela ledzingekile. Mariya ukhetse intfo lengiyo sibili, kunjalo nje angeke ayemukwe ngumuntfu leyo ntfo.”
Ngalelinye lilanga Jesu abethandaza endzaweni letsite. Nasacedzile, lomunye webafundzi bakhe watsi kuye: “Nkhosi, sifundzise kuthandaza njengaJohane lowafundzisa bafundzi bakhe.”
Jesu wase utsi kubafundzi bakhe: “Ase ngitsi lomunye wenu nangabe aye endlini yemngani wakhe ekhatsi nebusuku afike atsi: ‘Mngami, ngicela ungenanisele tinkhwa letintsatfu.
Ngifikelwe ngumngani wami lophuma khashane, kantsi anginako nalokuncane nje lokuya ngasetfunjini lengingamnika kona!’
Ase ngitsi-ke lomnganakhe uyawuphendvula atsi: ‘Ungangiyabuli, umnyango sewukhiyiwe, bantfwabami nami sesilele, ngingeke ngivukele kukunika loko!’ Manje-ke bese kwentekani?
Ase nginitjele naku kutsi: Nome abengeke avuke amnike letinkhwa ngobe angumngani wakhe, kodvwa utamnika konkhe lakudzingako, ngobe abengenamahloni ekumbekela siye ngekumcela.
ngobe wonkhe locelako uyaphiwa, lofunako uyatfola, nalonconcotsako uyavulelwa.
Nine bobabe, ningakwenta yini kutsi nangabe umsa wakho acela inhlanti bese umnika inyoka?
Nome kukhona yini longanika umsa wakhe fecela, kantsi ucela licandza?
Nome ningakalungi kodvwa niyakwati kupha bantfwabenu tintfo letinhle, kakhulu kangakanani-ke, Babe losezulwini uyawubanika Moya Longcwele labo labamcelako.”
Jesu abekhipha lidimoni lelingakhulumi; nasalikhiphile lelidimoni, lendvodza yacala yakhuluma; tamangala ticumbi tebantfu,
kodvwa labanye batsi: “NguBhelzebule, inkhosi yemadimoni, lomnika emandla ekukhipha lamadimoni.”
Kodvwa Jesu ayibona imicabango yabo, wase utsi kubo: “Lonkhe live lelehlukana emacembu bese alwa odvwana, alimi, lisheshe liwe; umndeni lowehlukene ekhatsi awumi, uyacitseka.
Ngako-ke nangabe umbuso waSathane wehlukene emacembu lalwa odvwana, ungema njani? Nitsi ngikhipha emadimoni, ngobe nginikwe nguBhelzebule emandla ekwenta loko.
Nangabe emadimoni ngiwakhipha kanjalo, pho, lenihambisana nabo bawakhipha kanjani?
Kodvwa nangabe ngiwakhipha ngemandla aNkulunkulu, loko-ke kufakazela kutsi umbuso waNkulunkulu sewufikile kini.
“Nangabe umuntfu lonemandla, ahlome aphelele, bese ugadza indlu yakhe, tonkhe timphahla takhe tiphephile.
Kodvwa nangabe umuntfu lonemandla kunaye alwa naye amehlule, uchwaga tonkhe letikhali abegungubele ngato, atenetise bangani bakhe.
“Umoya lomubi nasewuphumile kumuntfu, uhamba yonkhe indzawo leyomile ehlane ufuna indzawo yekuphumula; nangabe ungayitfoli bese utsi: ‘Angibuyele kulendlu yami lengayishiya!’
Ngako-ke uyancandzeka ukhandze lendlu ishanyelwe, ikhanya, ihlobile, konkhe kubekwe ngabolonina.
Bese uyahamba ulandza leminye imimoya lesikhombisa, lemibi kakhulu kunawo, bese iyangena seyihlala lapho. Ngako emvakwaloko lomuntfu sewubasesimeni lesibi kakhulu kunesakucala.”
Njengobe Jona waba sibonakaliso kubantfu baseNineve, kanjalo neNdvodzana yeMuntfu iyawuba sibonakaliso kulesitukulwane.

Mhlazana welilanga lekwehlulelwa indlovukazi yaseningizimu iyawusukuma isilahle ngelicala lesitukulwane salamuhla, ngobe yahamba yadzabula umhlaba yayawulalela kuhlakanipha kwemfundziso yaSolomoni; ngiyanitjela ngitsi: Kukhona lomkhulu kunaSolomoni la.
Ngelilanga lekwehlulelwa bantfu baseNineve bayawusukuma basilahle ngelicala lesitukulwane; ngobe baphendvuka nabashunyayelwa nguJona, ngiyanitjela ngitsi: Kukhona lomkhulu kunaJona la.”
Liso lakho lisibane semtimba wakho. Nangabe liso lakho likhanya, nemtimba wakho wonkhe unekukhanya; kodvwa nangabe liso lakho lingaboni kahle, nemtimba wakho wonkhe ubasebumnyameni.
Caphelani-ke kutsi lokukhanya lokukini kungabi bumnyama.
Nangabe umtimba wakho wonkhe unekukhanya, kungabikho nalencane indzawana lesemnyameni, utawukhanya wonkhe, njengesibane nasikhanya kakhulu.”
Jesu nasacedze kukhuluma, lomunye umFarisi wammema kutsi ayewudla kakhe; waya, wafike wadla.
LomFarisi wamangala kakhulu nakabona kutsi Jesu udle angakagezi.
“Nine baFarisi, nigeza lingephandle lenkomishi nelipulede, kodvwa ngekhatsi nigcwele bumiti nebubi.
Nine tilima! Lona lowenta lingephandle akusiye yini lowenta lingekhatsi?
Kodvwa banikeni labaphuyile lokusetinkomishini nemapuledini enu, konkhe kutabe kuhlambulukile kini.
“Maye kini, baFarisi! Nitsandza titulo letincono emasinagogeni nibingelelwe ngekuhlonishwa nasetimakethe.
Maye kini! Ninjengemadliza langasabonakali, nebantfu sebahamba etikwawo ngobe bangasawaboni.”
Lomunye wetati temtsetfo wase utsi kuye: “Mfundzisi, nawusho loko wetfuka natsi phela.”
Jesu waphendvula watsi: “Maye kini nani futsi, tati temtsetfo! Netfwesa bantfu imitfwalo lekulukhuni kuyetfwala, kodvwa nani matfupha aniyitsintsi ngisho nangemuno wenu leyo mitfwalo.
“Maye kini! Nenta emadliza ebaphrofethi lababulawa bokhokho benu abe mahle.
Nani matfupha niyakuvuma kutsi loko lokwentiwa bokhokho benu kulungile; ngobe babulala baphrofethi, nine senakha emadliza abo.
Ngako-ke kuHlakanipha kwaNkulunkulu kwatsi: ‘Ngiyawubatfumela baphrofethi nebaphostoli; labanye babo bayawubabulala babahluphe!’
Ngako yonkhe ingati yebaphrofethi leyacitfwa seloku kwasekelwa umhlaba iyawubitwa etikwalesitukulwane,
kusukela ekucitfweni kwengati ya-Abela kuze kufike ekucitfweni kwengati yaZakhariya, lowabulawa emkhatsini welilati nendzawo lengcwele. Yebo, ngiyanitjela, iyawubitwa kulesitukulwane.
“Maye kini, tati temtsetfo! Nitsatse sikhiya sekuvula umnyango welwati, nine matfupha anikangeni ngekhatsi, konje nibavimbele labo labafuna kungena ngekhatsi.”
Nasesuka kuleyo ndzawo, tati temtsetfo nebaFarisi bacala kumchukuluta bacondze kumcansula ngekumbuta imibuzo leminyenti ngetintfo letinyenti.
Betama kumetsiya bentela kumgiba ngalokubi labengahle akukhulume.
Konkhe lokumbonyiwe kuyawugwatjulwa, yonkhe imfihlo iyakwatiwa.
Ngako-ke, konkhe lenakusho ebumnyameni kuyawuvakala ekukhanyeni, lenake nakuhleba emasitseleni kuyawuba yindzaba lesematseni.”
“Ngiyanitjela, tihlobo tami, ngitsi: Ningabesabi labo lababulala umtimba kodvwa bangenamandla ekwenta lokubi lokungetulu kwaloko.
Kodvwa ngitaneluleka ngalenifanele kumesaba. Mesabeni lowo longuYena anemandla ekubulala umtimba aphindze ashisane esihogweni; yebo, nginitjela ngitsi: Yesabani lowo!
“Boncedze labasihlanu ababiti emasenti lamabili yini? Noko Nkulunkulu akakhohlwa ngisho nome munye wabo.
Hhawu, ingani netinwele tenhloko yenu tibaliwe. Ngako ningesabi; nine nibaluleke kakhulu kunaboncedze labanyenti.”
“Nginitjela kutsi: Longivuma embikwebantfu kutsi wami, iNdvodzana yeMuntfu nayo iyawumvuma embikwetingilosi taNkulunkulu.
Kodvwa lowo longiphika embikwebantfu kutsi akasiye wami, iNdvodzana yeMuntfu nayo iyawumphika embikwetingilosi taNkulunkulu.
Ngobe Moya Longcwele uyawunifundzisa ngaso leso sikhatsi lenifanele kukusho.”
Lomunye abesesicunjini wase utsi kuJesu: “Mfundzisi, tjela umnaketfu kutsi angabele incenye yelifa.”
Kodvwa wamphendvula watsi: “Ndvodza, ngubani losangente umehluleli nemenetisi kini?”
Watsi kubo: “Caphelani, nikubalekele konkhe kufisa lokubi; ngobe imphilo yemuntfu ayinconotiswa bunjinga bakhe.”
Wase ubatjela umfanekiso watsi: “Emasimi esicebi enta sivuno lesikhulu;
sase sicabanga enhlitiyweni yaso satsi: ‘Manje sengitakwente njani, ngobe ayisekho indzawo yekugcina lesivuno sami?’
Sachubeka satsi: ‘Ngitakwenta naku: Ngitawubhidlita tonkhe tinyango tami, bese ngakha letinkhulu, lapho ngitawugcina khona sonkhe sivuno netimphahla tami,
bese ngikhuluma ngedvwana ngitsi: Cha, senginetimphahla lengitibekele tona teminyaka leminyenti; angikhululeke, ngidle, nginatse, ngijabule!’
Kodvwa Nkulunkulu watsi kuso: ‘Silima! Kulobusuku balamuhla umphefumulo wakho uyabitwa kuwe; pho, letintfo lesewutilungisile titawuba tabani?’
“Kunjalo-ke kulowo lotibekela umcebo, kantsi akacebi kuNkulunkulu.”
Ngobe imphilo ibaluleke kakhulu kunekudla, nemtimba ubaluleke kakhulu kunetimphahla.
Ase nibuke emangangane! Akahlanyeli akavuni; ate tincolobane netilulu, kodvwa noko Nkulunkulu uyawondla. Nibaluleke kakhulu kangakanani-ke nine kunetinyoni!
Ngubani nje lapha emkhatsini wenu longatsi ngekunanta kwakhe kwengeteke iminyaka lembalwa ngetulu kwemphilo yakhe?
Nangabe ningeke nibe nemandla ekwenta loku lokuncane kangaka, nitihluphelani ngaloku lokunye?
Nangabe Nkulunkulu embatsisa tjani besiganga lobukhona lamuhla, kusasa abusekho sebushile, angeke yini etsembeke kutsi anganembatsisa nani? Maye, bantfu bekukholwa lokuncane!
Ngako ningakhatsateki ngekufuna leningahle nikudle nikunatse; netingcondvo tenu tingakhatsateki.
Ngobe tonkhe tive temhlaba tifuna letintfo; neYihlo uyati kutsi niyatidzinga letintfo.
Esikhundleni saloko, funani umbuso wakhe, khona-ke tonkhe letintfo titawuba tenu.”
“Ningesabi, mhlambi lomncane, ngobe uYihlo utfokotela kona kutsi aninike umbuso.

Tsengisani ngako konkhe leninako, bese nabela labeswele. Tiphatseleni tipatji letingagugi, nigcine umcebo wenu ezulwini, lapho ungeke unciphe khona, kute nelisela lelingefika kuwo, kute ngisho nemvunya longawudla.
Ngobe lapho umcebo wenu ukhona, ngulapho nenhlitiyo yenu itawuba khona.”
Njengetisebenti letilindzele kufika kwemnumzane wato aphuma edzilini, khona atewutsi nakefika anconcotsa, tisheshe timvulele umnyango.
Maye, tibusisekile leto tisebenti letiyakukhandvwa ngumnumzane wato tilindzele tingakalali! Ngicinisile, ngitsi kini, uyawubopha acinise libhande lakhe elukhalweni, atihlalise phansi, atiphe kudla.
Maye, tibusisiwe nakatikhandza tilindzele, nome ngabe ufike ekhatsi nebusuku nome kusengakasi!
Kodvwa yatini loku, kutsi kube lomniyo wendlu bekati sikhatsi sekufika kwelisela, abeyawulindza indlu yakhe kuze ingetikugcekezwa.
Nani futsi, lindzani, ngobe iNdvodzana yeMuntfu iyawufika ngesikhatsi leningakasilindzeli.”
Phetro watsi: “Nkhosi, utjela tsine sodvwa yini lomfanekiso, nome uwucondzise kubo bonkhe bantfu?”

INkhosi yaphendvula yatsi: “Ngubani-ke losisebenti lesetsembekile nalesihlakaniphile lesiyawutfunywa kutsi sicize indlu yenkhosi kanye nekunika letinye tisebenti kudla lokutifanele nangesikhatsi lesifanele?
Sibusisiwe leso sisebenti lesiyawukhandvwa yinkhosi yaso senta tonkhe timfanelo talelo khaya nayibuyako.
Ecinisweni leso sisebenti siyawunikwa umsebenti wekutsi siphatse tonkhe timphahla talenkhosi,
kodvwa nangabe lesisebenti sicabange satsi: ‘Inkhosi yami isalibele,’ bese sishaya tonkhe letinye tisebenti, letidvuna naletisikati, sihlaphate kudla, sinatse sidzakwe,
lenkhosi yaso iyawufika ngelilanga nangesikhatsi lesingakasilindzeli isijezise, isihlanganise nalabangetsembeki.
“Sisebenti lesatiko kutsi inkhosi yaso ifuna senteni, kodvwa singatilungiseleli kutsi sente loko lokufunwa yinkhosi yaso, siyawujeziswa ngekushaywa kakhulu;

kodvwa sisebenti lesingati kutsi inkhosi yaso ifunani, bese senta lokubi lesifanele sishayelwe kona, siyawujeziswa ngekushaywa kancane. Umuntfu lonikwe lokukhulu, kuyawudzingeka lokukhulu kuye; umuntfu lonikwe lokukhulu kakhulu, kuyawudzingeka lokukhulu kakhulu kuye.”
“Ngitele kutakokhela umlilo emhlabeni, maye, ngifisa shangatsi ngabe sewokhelekile!
Nicabanga kutsi ngiletse kuthula yini emhlabeni? Cha, hhayi kuthula, kodvwa ngiletse kwehlukana.
Kusukela manje indlu lenebantfu labasihlanu itakwehlukana, labatsatfu bacabane nalababili, lababili nalabatsatfu.
Bayawucabana, uyise nendvodzana, indvodzana neyise, unina nendvodzakati, indvodzakati nenina, uninatala nemalukatane, malukatane neninatala.”
Naniva umoya lochamuka eningizimu uhhusha, niyaye nitsi: ‘Kutawushisa,’ livele lishise.
Batentisi! Ngekubuka umhlaba nesibhakabhaka niyakwati kufundza lesikushoko; pho, nehlulwa yini kufundza inchazelo yaletikhatsi talamuhla?”

Nangabe umuntfu akumangalele enkantolo, yetama ngawo onkhe emandla akho kulungisana naye endleleni nisaya kuyawuliteka lelicala, kuze angetikufikisa embikwemehluleli, ngobe umehluleli utakunikela emaphoyiseni, wona akufake ejele.
Lapho-ke ngikutjela kutsi, ungeke uphume ungakayikhiphi yonkhe inhlawulo.”
Ngaso leso sikhatsi labanye bantfu batjela Jesu ngebantfu baseGalile labatsi banikela umnikelo wekushiswa kuNkulunkulu, Philatu wababulala.
Jesu wabaphendvula watsi: “Njengobe babulawa-ke laba baseGalile, nicabanga kutsi loko kusho kutsi bona babetoni kakhulu yini kunalabanye bantfu baseGalile?
Cha! Nginitjela kutsi, nangabe nani ningatishiyi tono tenu, niyawubhubha njengabo.
Nome-ke nicabanga kutsi laba labebali-18 baseSilowama lokwawela kubo umbhoshongo wababulala, bona babebabi kakhulu yini kunabo bonkhe bantfu lababehlala eJerusalema?
Cha! Nginitjela kutsi, nangabe nani ningashiyi tono tenu, niyawubhubha njengabo.”
Jesu wase ubatjela nankhu umfanekiso lotsi: “Lenye indvodza beyinesihlahla semkhiwa engadzeni yayo. Yaya kuyawufuna emakhiwa kulesihlahla, yakhandza kutsi kute.

Ngako yase itsi esisebentini sayo sengadze: ‘Ase ubuke lesihlahla, sengite lapha iminyaka lemitsatfu ngitewukha emakhiwa kodvwa angiwakhandzi, sigece siwe! Yini siloku sichubeka sisebentisa lomhlabatsi mahhala?’
Kodvwa sisebenti sengadze samphendvula satsi: ‘Mnumzane, ase umane usiyekele kulomnyaka kuphela; ngitase ngisimbele umsele usitungelete, bese ngisifakela umcuba.
Nangabe-ke sitsela nyakenye, kuyawuba ncono; kodvwa nasingatseli, utabe sewuyasijuba-ke.’ ”
Khona lapho bekunemfati labenemoya lomubi lowase umgulise iminyaka leli-18; abesagobene angasakwati nekuhamba eme acondze atsi tfwi!
Jesu watsi nakambona, wambita watsi: “Mfati, sewukhululekile ekuguleni kwakho.”
Wambeka tandla, masinyane umfati weluleka waphila, wadvumisa Nkulunkulu.
INkhosi yasiphendvula yatsi: “Nine batentisi! Lomunye wenu angete ayikhipha yini inkhabi nome imbongolo esibayeni ayeyinatsisa ngeliSabatha?
Manje-ke nansi lendvodzakati lesitukulwane sa-Abrahama lebeseyiboshwe nguSathane iminyaka leli-18, akukafaneli yini kutsi ikhululwe ekuboshweni kwayo ngeliSabatha?”
Lemphendvulo yakhe yenta tonkhe titsa takhe taba nemahloni, kantsi bantfu bonkhe bebajabulela tonkhe timangaliso labetenta.
Ngako-ke Jesu watsi: “Umbuso waNkulunkulu ufanana nani? Ngingawufanisa nani nje?
Ufanana nenhlanyelo yendlulamitsi leyatsatfwa ngumuntfu wayihlanyela ensimini yakhe. Lenhlanyelo yakhula yaba sihlahla, netinyoni letindiza emoyeni takha tidleke tato emagaleni aso.”
Jesu waphindze wabuta watsi: “Umbuso waNkulunkulu ngingawufanisa nani nje?
Ngingawufanisa nembiliso leyatsatfwa ngumfati wayihlanganisa nemabinta lamatsatfu afulaha, yakhukhumuka lenhlama.”
Jesu wadzabula emkhatsini wemadolobha nemadolobhana acondze eJerusalema, ahamba afundzisa.
Lomunye wambuta watsi: “Nkhosi, kutawusindziswa bantfu labambalwa yini kantsi?”
“Phikelelani kungena ngemnyango lomncane; ngobe banyenti bantfu labatakwetama kungena ngawo, kodvwa bayakwehluleka.
Niyawube seniphendvula nitsi: ‘Sadla, sanatsa nawe; wafundzisa futsi, etitaladini telidolobha lakitsi.’
Kodvwa yena uyawutsi: ‘Ngiyanitjela ngitsi: Anginati lapho niphuma khona. Nyamalalani lapha embikwami, benti balokubi!’
Lapho-ke laba lababekugcina bayawuba bekucala, laba lababekucala babe bekugcina.”
Khona lapho nje kwase kufika labanye baFarisi bete kuJesu batsi kuye: “Suka lapha uhambe uye kulenye indzawo, ngobe Herodi ufuna kukubulala.”
Jesu wabaphendvula watsi: “Hambani nitjele leyo mphungutja nitsi: ‘Ngikhipha emadimoni ngiphilise lamuhla nakusasa, lomsebenti wami ngiyawucedzela ngemhlomunye.’
Noko kufanele kutsi ngibesendleleni lamuhla nakusasa nangemhlomunye, ngobe kungeke kwenteke kutsi umphrofethi abulawelwe nome kukuphi ngaphandle kwaseJerusalema.
Buka-ke manje likhaya lakho selilahliwe, ngiyakutjela kutsi, ungeke usangibona, kuze kufike sikhatsi lapho uyawutsi: ‘Ubusisiwe lotako egameni leNkhosi.’ ”
Ngalelinye liSabatha Jesu abeyewudla emtini walesinye siphatsimandla selicembu lebaFarisi, bantfu bebacaphelisisile kutsi Jesu utakwentani.
Jesu wakhuluma, wabuta tati temtsetfo nebaFarisi watsi: “Umtsetfo wetfu uyasivumela yini kutsi siphilise ngeliSabatha, nome cha?”
