Kodvwa abazange batsi vu. Jesu wayitsatsa lendvodza wayiphilisa, wase utsi ayihambe.
Wase utsi kubo: “Ngubani emkhatsini wenu lokungatsi imbongolo yakhe nome inkhabi yakhe ibhajwe eludzakeni angete ayikhipha ngobe kuliSabatha?”
Jesu wabona kutsi laba bebamenyiwe babekhetsa tindzawo letinhle, ngako wase ubatjela bonkhe umfanekiso lotsi:
“Nangabe umenyiwe emshadweni ungabohlala etindzaweni letiphakeme, ngobe kusenekwenteka kutsi kukhona lomunye lomenyiwe loncono kunawe.
Bese lona lonimemile uta kuwe utsi:
“ ‘Ase ukhweshele nangu, ahlale lapha.’ Ngako uyawuba nemahloni ngekwehliselwa endzaweni lephansi.

Lokungenani nawumenyiwe, kuncono uhlale endzaweni lephansi, kuze kutsi lokumemile afike atsi: ‘Yenyuka, mngami, utewuhlala kunansi indzawo lencono,’ loko kutakuletsela kuhlonishwa emkhatsini walabo bebamenyiwe.
Ngobe wonkhe umuntfu lotiphakamisako uyawutfotjiswa, nalotitfobako uyawuphakanyiswa.”

Jesu wase utsi kulona lammemile: “Nawente lidzili, ungabomema tihlobo takho, nome banakenu, nome tinini, nome bomakhelwane bakho labacebile, ngobe nawe bayawukumema, ngalendlela-ke uyawube sewuwutfolile umvuzo waloko kwenta kwakho.
Nawente lidzili, ubomema timphuya, netishosha, netinchute, netimphumphutse.
Uyawubusiswa, ngobe bangeke babe nemandla ekukwenana loko. Uyawubuyiselwa nguNkulunkulu ekuvukeni kwalabalungile.”
Lomunye walamadvodza bekahleti adla naye nakeva loko, watsi kuJesu: “Maye, ubusisiwe loyawuhlanganyela ekudleni embusweni waNkulunkulu!”
Jesu watsi: “Kwake kwaba khona umuntfu lowenta lidzili lelikhulu, wamema bantfu labanyenti.
Sesifikile sikhatsi sekudla, watfumela sisebenti kutsi siyewubita labamenyiwe, watsi sifike sitsi: ‘Wotani, konkhe sekulungile!’
Kodvwa bonkhe ngalokufananako bacala babeka taba tekungaphumeleli. Wekucala watsi: ‘Ngitsenge lipulazi, kufanele ngiyewulibona; ngicela ufike ungicolisele!’
Lomunye watsi: ‘Ngitsenge tinkhabi letilishumi, manje ngisayawutilinga kutsi tinjani; ngicela ungicolisele!’
Lomunye watsi: ‘Ngisandza kuteka umfati, ngaleso sizatfu ngingeke ngiphumelele.’

“Sisebenti sancandzeka, safike satjela lomnumzane waso. Lomnumzane watfukutsela, watselwa ngemanti, waze watsi kuso: ‘Sheshisa uye etindleleni nasetitaladini edolobheni ubite timphuya, netishosha, netimphumphutse netinchute.’
Sisebenti satsi: ‘Mnumzane, sengikwentile lokushito, kodvwa kusasele indzawo.’
Lomnumzane wase utsi esisebentini: ‘Hamba uye etindleleni nasemigwacweni lesetikhotseni uncenge bonkhe bantfu kutsi bete, khona itewugcwala lendlu yami.
Nginitjela ngitsi: Kute nome munye loyawudla kulelidzili lami kulabo bebamenyiwe!’ ”
Ticumbi letinkhulu tebantfu betihamba naJesu. Wagucukela kuto watsi:
“Lota kimi angeke abe ngumfundzi wami ngaphandle kwekutsi adzele uyise nenina, umfati wakhe nebantfwabakhe, bomnakabo nabodzadzewabo, yebo, kanye nemphilo yakhe lucobo lwayo.
Longetjatsi siphambano sakhe angilandzele, angeke abe ngumfundzi wami.
“Ngubani emkhatsini wenu longatsi afuna kwakha sitezi lesikhulu, angahlali phansi kucala, abale tindleko, abukisise kutsi unayo yini imali leyenele kutsi angasicedza lesitezi?
Nangabe akanayo kantsi sewubeke nesisekelo saso, angasasicedzi, bonkhe lababonako bangahlekisa ngaye batsi:
‘Lendvodza yacala yakha, kodvwa seyiyehluleka kuwucedza lomsebenti!’
“Nangabe inkhosi inemabutfo lati-10 000 iyawulwa nalenye inkhosi lenemabutfo lati-20 000, leyo nkhosi ifanele kutsi ihlale phansi ibukisise kutsi ingaba nawo yini emandla ekubhekana nalenkhosi.
Nangabe ayinawo, itawuvele itfumele tigijimi kulelenye inkhosi isesekhashane, tiyewutsi: ‘Mayoyo, ayiphele!’ ”
Jesu wagcina ngekutsi: “Kunjalo-ke nakini, kute longaba ngumfundzi wami ngaphandle kwekutsi adzele konkhe lanako.”
Alusekalungeli ngisho nemhlabatsi nome sengumcuba, nebantfu bayalulahla.
Kodvwa baFarisi netati temtsetfo tahhingatela tatsi: “Lomuntfu wemukela tilahlwa abuye futsi adle nato!”
Ngako-ke Jesu wase ubatjela umfanekiso lotsi:
“Nangabe lomunye wenu anetimvu letilikhulu bese kulahleka lenye, angente njani? Angete atishiya etsafeni yini leti letingema-99, ahambe ayewufuna lena lenye lelahlekile, adzimate ayitfole?
Angatsi nase ayitfolile, atfokote ayetjatse ehlombe abuyele nayo ekhaya.
Atsi nase afike ekhaya, ameme tihlobo takhe nabomakhelwane atsi kubo: ‘Tfokotani kanye nami, ngobe sengiyitfolile imvu yami lebeyilahlekile.’ ”
Jesu wachubeka watsi: “Ngalokufananako, ngitsi kini: Kuyawuba khona kutfokota lokukhulu ezulwini ngesoni sinye lesiphendvukako kunebantfu labalungile labangema-99 labangakudzingi kuphendvuka.”
“Nome-ke ake sitsi: Umfati lonetinhlavu tesiliva letilishumi alahlekelwe ngulolunye, wente njani? Akasikhanyisi yini sibane atsanyele indlu yakhe alufunisise adzimate alutfole?
Atsi angalutfola, ameme tihlobo takhe, nabomakhelwane bakhe atsi kubo: ‘Tfokotani kanye nami, ngobe sengilutfolile luhlavu lebelulahlekile.’ ”
Jesu wachubeka watsi: “Ngalokufananako-ke, ngitsi kini: Tingilosi taNkulunkulu tiyawutfokota ngesoni sinye lesiphendvukako.”
Wachubeka Jesu watsi: “Bekukhona umuntfu labenemadvodzana lamabili.
Indvodzana lencane yatsi kuyise: ‘Babe, nginike sabelo lesilifa lami.’ Ngako-ke uyise wawehlukanisela lifa emadvodzana akhe.
Yayidla yonkhe imali. Kwefika indlala lenkhulu kulelo live, ingasenalutfo yahlupheka kakhulu.
Ngako-ke yahamba yayawufuna umsebenti kumuntfu walelo live, wayitfumela enhlonhleni yakhe kuyakwelusa tingulube.
Yayilamba idzimate ifise kudla imidvumba ledliwa tingulube, ngobe yayinganikwa ngumuntfu kudla.
“Sigcino yasanguluka engcondvweni yacabanga yatsi: ‘Tonkhe tisebenti tababe tidla tidzimate titibekele, kepha mine lapha ngilamba kangaka.
Ngitawuhamba ngiye kubabe ngitsi kuye: “Babe, ngonile kuNkulunkulu nakuwe.
Angisafanele nekutsi ngibitwe ngekutsi ngiyindvodzana yakho; sale umane ungenta lomunye wetisebenti takho.” ’
“Yayisekudzeni kabi nelikhaya ngesikhatsi uyise ayibona. Inhlitiyo yeyise yagcwala sihawu, wayihawukela wagijima wayihlangabeta. Wayigaca ngemkhono wakhe, wayanga.
Lendvodzana yatsi kuyise: ‘Babe, ngonile kuNkulunkulu nakuwe, angisafanele nekutsi ngibitwe ngekutsi ngiyindvodzana yakho.’
Kepha uyise wabita tisebenti watsi: ‘Phangisani niletse ingubo lenhle niyembatsise, niyifake nendandatho emnweni wayo, neticatfulo etinyaweni.
Nifune litfole lelihle lelikhuluphele nilihlabe sitewudla sijabule.
Ngobe lendvodzana yami beyifile, kodvwa nyalo seyiyaphila; beyilahlekile, kodvwa nyalo seyitfolakele.’ Ngako kwase kuyadliwa, kuyajatjulwa.
“Ngaleso sikhatsi indvodzana lenkhulu beyingekho isensimini, yatsi seyibuya yeva umsindvo wekuhlabela nekugidza ingakangeni ekhaya,
yase ibita lesinye setisebenti iyabuta kutsi kwente njani lapha ekhaya kunemsindvo nje.
Sisebenti satsi kuye: ‘Umnakenu sewubuyile, ngako-ke uyihlo umhlabise litfole lelikhuluphele, ngobe umnakenu ubuye asaphila.’
“Indvodzana lenkhulu yatfukutsela yabila, yase iyala nekungena lapha ekhaya. Kwadzimate kwaphuma uyise wayakuyincenga;

yamphendvula yatsi: ‘Kodvwa, babe, mine yonkhe leminyaka bengihleti nawe ngikusebentela. Angizange sengephule namunye umyalo wakho, kodvwa awuzange sewunginike nangalinye lilanga ngisho nelizinyane nje, kutsi nami ngitijabulise kanye nebangani bami.
Kodvwa lendvodzana yakho nayibuya kuyawuhlaphata lifa lakho netingwadla, yona uyihlabisa litfole lelikhuluphele!’
“Uyise watsi kuye: ‘Ndvodzana yami, wena unami njalo, nako konkhe lokukwami ubokwati kutsi kwakho.
Kepha kusifanele kutsi sijabule sidle ngekutfokota, ngobe umnakenu abefile, kepha manje sewuyaphila; abelahlekile, kepha manje sewutfolakele.’ ”
Jesu wase utsi kubafundzi bakhe: “Kwake kwaba khona indvodza leyayisicebi lesasinendvuna. Sase sitjelwe kutsi lendvuna ihlaphata imali yaso.
Sayibita lendvuna satsi: ‘Yini loku lengikuvako ngawe? Ngikhombise kutsi imphahla yami uyiphatsa kanjani, ngobe ungeke uchubeke ube yindvuna yami, nawuhamba ngalolunyawo!’
Lendvuna yacabanga yatsi: ‘Inkhosi yami itangicosha emsebentini. Ngitakwente njani? Ngingeke ngikumele kuba simbamgodzi, kantsi nekucela futsi ngiyakwesaba.
Sengibonile lengitawukwenta, kuze nase ngiphelelwe ngumsebenti, bangani bami bangemukele, bangihlalise emakhaya abo.’
“Ngako wabita bonkhe lababekweleda lesicebi ngamunye ngamunye. Kulona wekucala watsi: ‘Uyikweleda malini inkhosi yami?’
Wamphendvula watsi: ‘Nasi sikwelede, ngikweleda emabhodlela emafutsa eliphehla lati-4 000.’ Lendvuna yamtjela yatsi: ‘Nali libhuku lakho lesikwelede. Hlala phansi ubhale ti-2 000.’
Kulomunye watsi: ‘Wena-ke ukweleda malini?’ Waphendvula watsi: ‘Nasi sikwelede, ngikweleda emasaka emmbila lalikhulu.’ Lendvuna yatsi: ‘Nali libhuku lesikwelede sakho. Hlala phansi ubhale ema-80.’
“Inkhosi yayidvumisa lendvuna lengaketsembeki ngekwenta lentfo lenebucili kangaka, ngobe bantfu balomhlaba bahlakaniphile esitukulwaneni sabo kunebantfu bekukhanya.”
Ngako naningaketsembeki ekuphatseni umcebo walomhlaba, ningetsembeka kanjani emcebeni lokunguwo sibili?
Nani naningaketsembeki entfweni yalomunye umuntfu, ngubani loyawuninika lokukwenu?
BaFarisi nabakuva loku, bamphukuta Jesu, ngobe phela babeyitsandza imali.
Kodvwa Jesu watsi kubo: “Nitenta labalungile emehlweni ebantfu, kodvwa Nkulunkulu uyatati tinhlitiyo. Loko bantfu labacabanga kutsi kuyintfo lenkhulu lebalulekile, kusinengiso ebusweni baNkulunkulu.
kodvwa kulula kutsi lizulu nemhlaba kwendlule kunekutsi lichashatana lemtsetfo lendlule liphele.
“Bekukhona indvodza leyayicebile igcoka timphahla letatidule kakhulu. Yayinekudla lokunyenti idla kahle onkhe emalanga.
Esangweni lemuti wayo bekuhlala umuntfu labechakile, libito lakhe kunguLazaro, abenetilondza wonkhe umtimba,
abedzinga kondliwa ngetimvutfuluka tekudla letatiwa etafuleni lalesicebi. Netinja tatita timkhotse tilondza.
“Lendvodza leluphuya yafa yemukelwa tingilosi, tayiyisa edzilini lasezulwini, lapho tefike tayibeka edvute na-Abrahama; nesicebi safa sangcwatjwa.
Sabasebuhlungwini lobukhulu endzaweni yalabafile; satsi sibuka ngetulu sabona Abrahama akhashane, anaLazaro.
Sase siyamemeta sitsi: ‘Babe Abrahama, ngihawukele ungitfumelele nango Lazaro enye sihloko semuno wakhe emantini atengiphotisa elulwimini, ngobe ngisebuhlungwini lobukhulu, ngiyasha!’
“Kodvwa Abrahama watsi: ‘Khumbula, ndvodzana yami, kutsi usaphila emhlabeni wanikwa konkhe lokuhle, kepha Lazaro abenikwe lokubi kodvwa. Sewuyajatjuliswa-ke lapha, kantsi wena sewusekuhluphekeni.

Nangaphandle kwaloko nje kuneludvonga lolukhulu lapha emkhatsini wetfu, lolusivimbelako kutsi labamshiya ngalo bangakwati kwewelela ngalapho, nalabo labangesheya bangete bakwati kwewelela mshiya ngalo.’
Lesicebi sase sitsi: ‘Sengiyakuncenga, babe, umane sale nje umtfumela ekhaya lababe.
Lapho nginebanaketfu labasihlanu, efike abatjele kutsi bangete beta lapha kulendzawo lengikuyo.’
“Abrahama watsi: ‘Bomnakenu banemtsetfo waMosi netincwadzi tebaphrofethi letingabatjela, abalalele tona.’
Lesicebi samphendvula satsi: ‘Cha-ke, babe Abrahama, nakungavuka lomunye ekufeni aye kubo, bayawuphendvuka etonweni tabo.’
Kodvwa Abrahama watsi: ‘Nabangalaleli boMosi nebaphrofethi nababeluleka, nome bekungavuka lomunye kulabafile, bangeke baneliswe!’ ”
Bekuyawuba ncono kutsi kuboshelwe litje entsanyeni yakhe, bese ujikijelwa elwandle, kunekutsi ente nome munye walaba labancane kutsi one.
Caphelani! Nangabe umnakenu ona, mekhute, nangabe uyaphendvuka, mtsetselele.
“Nangabe akona emahlandla lasikhombisa ngelilanga linye solomane atsi kuwe: ‘Ngiyacolisa,’ kufanele umtsetselele.”
Baphostoli base batsi eNkhosini: “Yandzisa kukholwa kwetfu.”
“Ase ngitsi lomunye wenu unesisebenti lesilimako nome leselusa tinkhomo nome timvu. Nase sibuya ensimini angasho yini kuso kutsi: ‘Hlala phansi kucala udle naku kudla’?
Cha! Esikhundleni saloko angatsi kuso: ‘Faka sidziya sakho, ungilungisele kudla kwami, unginike ngidle nginatse; emvakwaloko-ke nawe utawuhlala phansi udle unatse.’
Uyasibonga yini sisebenti lesisuke sente loko lebesifanele sikwente?
Kanjalo-ke nani nanente konkhe lenitjelwe kutsi nikwente, nibotsi: ‘Sitisebenti letingakafaneli kubongwa, ngobe sente lebesifanele kutsi sikwente.’ ”
Asangena emtini wahlangabetwa ngemadvodza labelishumi labephetfwe bulephelo ema bucadlwana naye,
Lenye yatsi kube ibone kutsi seyiphilile, yancandzeka idvumisa Nkulunkulu ngelivi lelikhulu.
Yefika yatilahla phansi etinyaweni taJesu imbonga. Yona-ke beyingumSamariya.
Jesu watsi: “Beningesilo yini lishumi ekuphilisweni kwenu? Baphi labayimfica?
Akatfolakalanga namunye yini, lowabuyela emuva weta kutawubonga Nkulunkulu ngaphandle kwalomchamuki?”
Wase utsi kuye: “Sukuma uhambe; kukholwa kwakho kukusindzisile.”
Kute loyawutsi: ‘Ase nibuke nankhu!’ nome: ‘Nankhuya!’ Ngobe umbuso waNkulunkulu ukini.”
Wase utsi kubafundzi bakhe: “Siyeta sikhatsi lapho niyawufisa shangatsi ningabona linye nje lemalanga eNdvodzana yeMuntfu, kodvwa ningeke nilibone.
Bayawuba khona labayawutsi kini: ‘Ase nibuke lapha!’ nome batsi: ‘Ase nibuke naku!’ Kodvwa ningayi, ningabalandzeli.
Njengembane ubaneka uvundla kabili esibhakabhakeni, iyawuba njalo neNdvodzana yeMuntfu ngelilanga layo.
Kodvwa kwekucala ifanele ihlupheke kakhulu ilahlwe bantfu balesitukulwane.
Bonkhe bantfu bebadla, banatsa, bateka bafati, bendziswa, kwaze kwaba lilanga Nowa langena ngalo emkhunjini lana zamcolo wababulala bonkhe.
Kuyawuba njengesikhatsi saLoti; bebadla, banatsa, batsenga, batsengisa, balima, bakha tindlu.
Mhlazana Loti esuka eSodoma, umlilo nesibabule kwana kuphuma ezulwini, kwababulala bonkhe.
Kuyawuba njalo nangelilanga leyiyakwembulwa ngalo iNdvodzana yeMuntfu.
Umuntfu lowetama kusindzisa imphilo yakhe, uyawulahlekelwa ngiyo. Kodvwa umuntfu lolahlekelwa yimphilo yakhe, uyawuyisindzisa.
Nginitjela kutsi: Kulobo busuku bantfu bayawube balele bababili embhedzeni munye; lomunye uyawutsatfwa, lomunye asale ngemuva.
Bafati lababili bayawube bagaya ndzawonye; lomunye uyawutsatfwa, lomunye asale ngemuva. [
Emadvodza lamabili ayawube asensimini; lenye iyakutsatfwa, lenye isale ngemuva.]”
Jesu wabaphendvula watsi: “Lapho kunesidvumbu khona, nemangce ahlangana khona.”
Jesu wase ubatjela lomfanekiso abafundzisa kutsi kufanele bathandaze sonkhe sikhatsi bangadzinwa.
“Kwake kwaba khona umehluleli kulelinye lidolobha lelikhulu labengamesabi Nkulunkulu angahloniphi nebantfu.
Kwakukhona umfelokati kulelo dolobha labevame kuta kulomehluleli atewucela emalungelo akhe afike atsi: ‘Ngisite kulona lolwa nami!’
Kwaba sikhatsi lesidze umehluleli angavumi, kodvwa ekugcineni watsi: ‘Nome ngingamesabi Nkulunkulu ngingahloniphi muntfu,
kodvwa ngaloluhlupho lengilutfola kulomfelokati, kuncono kutsi ngimnike emalungelo akhe, funa achubeke nalokunginakashela, adzimate angiphuphise!’ ”
INkhosi yachubeka yatsi: “Lalelani kutsi watsini lomehluleli lomubi!
Pho, Nkulunkulu utakwehlulwa yini kubevela labakhetsiwe bakhe, labakhala kuye imini nebusuku bacela lusito? Uyawubina yini ekubasiteni?
Nginitjela kutsi uyawubevela ngekushesha. Kodvwa ingabe iNdvodzana yeMuntfu nayibuyako iyawukukhandza kukhona yini kukholwa emhlabeni?”
Jesu wabatjela futsi nankhu umfanekiso acondzise kubantfu labetsemba kulunga kwabo bese bababukela phansi labanye bantfu:
“Emadvodza lamabili enyukela ethempelini kuyawuthandaza, lomunye abengumFarisi, lomunye angumtselisi.
“UmFarisi wakhwesha wema yedvwa wathandaza watsi: ‘Ngiyakubonga, Nkulunkulu, kutsi mine angifanani nalabanye bantfu labatigebengu, nalabangakalungi, netiphingi, nanjengalomtselisi.
Ngizila kudla emalanga lamabili ngeliviki ngikunika kwelishumi kwako konkhe lengikwemukelako.’

Jesu watsi: “Nginitjela kutsi lendvodza lengumtselisi yabuyela ekhaya seyemukelwe nguNkulunkulu kutsi ilungile kunalona lomunye, ngobe phela wonkhe umuntfu lotiphakamisako, uyawutfotjiswa, wonkhe lotitfobako, uyawuphakanyiswa.”
Ngaleso sikhatsi baletsa ngisho netinswane kutsi Jesu atetibeka tandla. Kodvwa bafundzi batsi nabakubona loko, babatsetsisa.
Kodvwa Jesu wababita labantfwana atsi: “Vumelani bantfwana bete kimi! Ningabavimbeli, ngobe umbuso waNkulunkulu walabanjalo.
Ngicinisile, ngitsi kini: Longawemukeli umbuso waNkulunkulu njengemntfwana, angeke angene kuwo.”
Lesinye sikhulu sambuta satsi: “Mfundzisi lolungile, kufanele ngenteni kuze ngidle lifa lekuphila lokuphakadze?”
Jesu watsi kuso: “Ungibitelani ngekutsi ngilungile? Kute lolungile ngaphandle kwaNkulunkulu.
Uyayati imiyalo letsi: ‘Ungaphingi, ungabulali, ungebi, ungacali emanga, hlonipha uyihlo nenyoko’?”
Lendvodza yaphendvula yatsi: “Yonkhe lemiyalo ngayenta kusukela ebuncaneni bami.”
Nakakuva loko Jesu, watsi kuyo: “Kusadzingeka wente intfo yinye, tsengisa ngako konkhe lonako, bese wabela timphuya lemali, uyawuba nemcebo ezulwini, bese uyeta uyangilandzela.”
Kodvwa yatsi kube ikuve loko lendvodza, yadzabuka kakhulu, ngobe beyinjinge kakhulu.
Jesu abona lokutsi idzabukile, wase utsi: “Maye, kulukhuni etinjingeni kutsi tingene embusweni waNkulunkulu!
Kulula kutsi likamela lingene embotjeni yenyalitsi kunekutsi injinga ingene embusweni waNkulunkulu.”
Nabeva loku bantfu, bambuta batsi: “Kepha nakunjalo, ngubani longasindziswa?”
Phetro watsi: “Buka tsine, sishiye konkhe kwetfu salandzela wena.”
Jesu watsi kubo: “Empeleni wonkhe loshiya likhaya lakhe, nome umfati wakhe, nome bomnakabo, nome batali bakhe, nome bantfwabakhe ngesimanga sembuso waNkulunkulu,
uyakwemukela lokuphindzaphindziwe kulamalanga, nekuphila lokuphakadze etikhatsini letitako.”
Jesu wabadvonsela eceleni bafundzi bakhe labali-12 watsi kubo: “Lalelani, sesiya eJerusalema, lapho konkhe lokwabhalwa baphrofethi ngeNdvodzana yeMuntfu kutakugcwaliseka khona.
Itawunikelwa etandleni tetive letitawuhlekisa ngayo tiyetfuke, tiyikhafulele.
Titawuyibhambabula tiyibulale, kodvwa ngelilanga lesitsatfu iyawuvuka iphile.”
Bafundzi bakhe abazange beve kutsi ucondze kutsini, ngobe inchazelo yalamavi akhe yayifihlekile kubo, bebangati kutsi Jesu ukhuluma ngani.
Jesu asasondzela ngaseJerikho wakhandza indvodza leyayiyimphumphutse ihleti elusentseni lwemgwaco icela.
Yatsi nayiva sicumbi sebantfu sendlula, yabuta yatsi: “Yini leyo?”
Yase iyamemeta itsi: “Jesu, Ndvodzana yaDavide! Ngihawukele!”
Bantfu labebangembili bayekhuta lendvodza batsi ayibindze. Kodvwa yamemeta kakhulu kunakucala yatsi: “Ndvodzana yaDavide, ngihawukele!”
Ngako Jesu wase uyema utsi abayiletse kuye; nase isondzele wayibuta watsi:
Jesu watsi kuyo: “Bona; kukholwa kwakho kukuphilisile.”
Ngekushesha yabona, yase ilandzela Jesu, idvumisa Nkulunkulu; nabakubona loko, bonkhe bantfu badvumisa Nkulunkulu.
Lapho-ke kwakukhona umtselisi lomkhulu kunguZakewu, futsi anjingile.
Wetama kubona Jesu, kodvwa wehluleka ngenca yesicumbi ngobe phela abemfisha.
Ngako wase ugijimela ngembili wakhwela esihlahleni semkhiwa isikhamore kuze atewubona Jesu, labetakwendlula ngaleyo ndlela.
Watsi kube efike lapho Jesu, wase ubuka etulu watsi kuye: “Zakewu, shesha wehle, ngobe kufanele ngiyewungenisa endlini yakho lamuhla.”
Ngako-ke Zakewu washesha wehla, wamemukela ngekujabula lokukhulu.
Bantfu labakubona loko bacala bavungama basola batsi: “Hhawu-u, lomuntfu bekasivakashi emtini walesoni!”
Jesu wase utsi kuye: “Lamuhla seyifikile insindziso kulomuti; ngobe phela lendvodza nayo isitukulwane sa-Abrahama.
Phela, iNdvodzana yeMuntfu itewufuna nekusindzisa lokulahlekile.”
Ngako wase utsi: “Kwakukhona umnumzane labehloniphekile, lowahamba waya eveni lelikhashane kakhulu ayawubekwa inkhosi, bese uyabuya-ke.
Asengakahambi, wabita tisebenti takhe letatilishumi, nguleso wasinika luhlavu lwegolide, wase utitjela kutsi: ‘Ase nibone kutsi ningatitalisa kangakanani letinhlavu ngesikhatsi ngingekho.’
Kantsi takhamiti tatimtondza, ngako tase titfumela tigijimi kutsi tiyewubika tifike titsi: ‘Asimfuni lowo muntfu abe yinkhosi yetfu.’
“Watsi kube abuye lomnumzane abesabekwe inkhosi kuleyo ndzawo, wase ubita tonkhe tisebenti takhe, labetinike imali, watsi atite titemlandzisa kutsi tase tiyitalise kangakanani.
Wekucala watsi: ‘Mnumzane, ngitalise letinye tinhlavu letilishumi ngalolo lowanginika lona.’
Wase utsi kuye: ‘Wente kahle, sisebenti lesihle. Njengobe wetsembeke kulokuncane, ngitawukubeka wengamele emadolobha lalishumi.’
“Sisebenti sesibili seta satsi: ‘Mnumzane, ngitalise letinye tinhlavu letisihlanu ngalolo lowanginika lona.’
“Lesinye sisebenti seta sefika satsi: ‘Mnumzane, nalu loluhlavu lwakho; ngalugocotela ngeliduku, ngase ngiyalufihla.
Ngakwesaba ngobe ungumuntfu lonelulaka. Utsatsa lokungesiko kwakho, uvune lapho ungazange uhlanyele khona.’
Yase itsi lenkhosi kuso: ‘Wena sisebenti lesibi, ngitakulahla ngelicala ngemavi akho! Uyati kutsi ngingumuntfu lonelulaka, ngitsatsa lokungesiko kwami, ngivune lapho ngingazange ngihlanyele khona!
Pho, manje, loluhlavu lwami awulufakanga ngani ebhange? Bengitawutsi ngibuya ngilutfole selunentalo.’
Wase utsi kulabo lababeme madvutane: ‘Memukeni, ninike lona lonetinhlavu letilishumi.’
“Base batsi kuye: ‘Mnumzane, ingani lona unetinhlavu letilishumi.’
Wabaphendvula watsi: ‘Nginitjela kutsi: Ngulowo lonako, uyakwengetelwa; kodvwa lowo longenalutfo, uyakwemukwa naloko lokuncane lanako.
Njengamanje nje, tonkhe letitsa tami betingafuni kutsi ngibe yinkhosi yato, tiletseni la nitibulale embikwami.’ ”
Jesu watsi kube acedze kukusho loko, wase uchubekela embili alibangise eJerusalema.
Kwatsi lapho Jesu asasondzela eBhethifage naseBhetani, eNtsabeni yetihlahla temiNcumo, watfumela bafundzi lababili,
wabayala watsi: “Hambani niye edolobhaneni lelisembikwenu, nisangena kulo nitawubona sidonkana lesingazange sesigitjelwe, sikhungiwe. Nifike nisitfukulule nisiletse lapha kimi.
Basasitfukulula sidonkana, baniyo baso batsi kubo: “Nisitfukululelani?”
Base basimikisa kuJesu. Bagaca tingubo tabo etikwaso, bamkhweta kuso.
Asasigibele, bendlala tingubo tabo endleleni embikwakhe.

Nase asatawufika, edvute neJerusalema, lapho indlela yehlela khona eNtsabeni Yemincumo, sicuku lesikhulu sebafundzi bakhe sacala sabonga Nkulunkulu samemeta kakhulu, njengobe base babone timangaliso letikhulu,
Khona lapho labanye baFarisi bakhuluma kuJesu esicukwini batsi:
Watsi: “Kube mane lamuhla bewati lokudzingwa kuthula! Kodvwa manje kufihlakele emehlweni akho.
Ngobe ayeta emalanga lapho titsa takho tiyawukuhlasela, tikuvimbetele tikuvalele ndzawo tonkhe.
Tiyawukubhidlita uphele nya kanye nebantfu labangekhatsi kwakho; alikho nome linye litje leliyawusala ngetulu kwalelinye, ngobe awusicaphelisisanga sikhatsi Nkulunkulu lakuhambela ngaso.”
Jesu wangena ethempelini wacala wacosha labo bebatsengisa,
watsi kubo: “Kubhaliwe emiBhalweni kutsi: ‘Indlu yami iyawuba yindlu yemthandazo.’ Kodvwa nine seniyigucule, nayenta yaba ngumgedze wetigebengu.”
kodvwa behluleka kukwenta loko, ngobe bonkhe bantfu babenamatsele kuye, bangafuni kulahlekelwa nome ngulinye livi lakhe.
Ngalelinye lilanga Jesu asafundzisa ashumayela bantfu ethempelini ngeliVangeli, baphristi labakhulu netati temtsetfo kanye netibondza beta
kuye batsi: “Sitjele, unagunya lini lekwenta letintfo? Wanikwa ngubani leligunya lekutenta?”
Jesu wabaphendvula watsi: “Nami ase nginibute; ngitjeleni:
Ligunya laJohane lekubhabhatisa laphuma kuNkulunkulu yini nome kubantfu?”
Base baphikisana bodvwana batsi: “Sitawutsini? Nasitsi: ‘Laphuma kuNkulunkulu,’ utawutsi: ‘Pho, anikholwanga ngani kuJohane?’
Kodvwa nasitsi: ‘Laliphuma kubantfu,’ sonkhe lesicumbi sebantfu sitasigcoba ngematje, ngobe bayakholwa kutsi Johane abengumphrofethi.”
Ngako baphendvula batsi: “Awu, asati kutsi laliphuma kubani lelo gunya.”
NaJesu wase utsi kubo: “Nami-ke ngeke nginitjele kutsi ligunya lini lengenta ngalo letintfo.”
Satsi kube sifike sikhatsi sekuvuna emagelebisi, yatfumela sisebenti kuleticashi kuyawutsatsa sabelo sakayo sesivuno. Kodvwa leticashi tasishaya lesisebenti, tasincandza mahhala.
Yaphindze yatfumela lesinye sisebenti, naso tasishaya futsi, tasiphatsa kabuhlungu, tasincandza mahhala.
Yase itfumela sisebenti sesitsatfu; ticashwa tasilimata naso, futsi tasikhiphela ngephandle.
“Lomnikati wensimi wase utsi: ‘Ngitakwente njani? Sengitawutfumela umsa wami lengimtsandzako; mhlawumbe yena bayawumhlonipha!’
Kodvwa tatsi kube ticashi timbone, tase tikhuluma todvwana titsi: ‘Lona yinkhosana yemnikati wensimi. Asimbulale, khona lensimi itawuba yetfu!’
Jesu wase uyabuta utsi: “Manje lomnikati walesivini uyakwente njani kuleticashi?”
Wachubeka watsi: “Uyawubuya atibulale leticashi ayinike labanye lensimi.”
Nabakuva loko bantfu, base batsi: “Cha, empeleni akungabi njalo!”
Tati temtsetfo nebaphristi labakhulu betama kumbopha Jesu khona lapho, ngobe bebati kutsi lomfanekiso wawucondze kulahla bona; kodvwa besaba bantfu.

Ngako betama kutfola sikhatsi lesikahle. Batsenga labanye bantfu kutsi babe timpimpi, batente shangatsi batimisele kantsi bentela kugiba Jesu ngemibuzo, kuze bamnikete kulabakhulu nasemandleni embusi.
Letimpimpi tase titsi kuJesu: “Mfundzisi, siyati kutsi awunaki simo semuntfu, kodvwa ufundzisa liciniso ngentsandvo yaNkulunkulu ngemuntfu.
Asusitjele, kuphambene yini nemtsetfo wetfu kukhipha umtselo kuKhesari, uMbusi wemaRoma, nome cha?”
Kodvwa Jesu wabona ngale ngemuva kwalobucili babo, wase utsi kubo:
“Ase ningikhombise luhlavu lwemali loluyisiliva. Lomfanekiso nelibito lokubhalwe kulo kwabani?”
Wabaphendvula watsi: “Yebo-ke, khiphani kuKhesari lokukwakhe, nikhiphe kuNkulunkulu lokukwaNkulunkulu.”
Behluleka kumgiba ngalakushito embikwebantfu, ngako babindza, bamangaliswa yimphendvulo yakhe.
bambuta batsi: “Mfundzisi, Mosi wasibhalela umtsetfo lotsi: ‘Indvodza nayifa ishiya umfati ate bantfwana, umnakabo lendvodza uyamngena lomfelokati avusele lomufi indlu ngekumtalela bantfwana.’
Manje-ke kwake kwaba khona emadvodza layinkhotsa labelamana. Lona lomdzala wase uteka umfati, kodvwa wase uyafa angakabatfoli bantfwana.
newesitsatfu; kwenteka loko kuwo onkhe lamadvodza layinkhotsa, afa angenabantfwana.
Asewusho kutsi bonkhe labantfu nase bavuka ngelilanga lekuvuka, lomfati uyawuba wabani, njengobe onkhe lamadvodza lasikhombisa abengumfati wawo?”
kodvwa bantfu labayawuvuswa ekufeni baphile kulesikhatsi lesitako abatsatsani.
Banjengetingilosi, abafi. Bangemadvodzana aNkulunkulu, ngobe sebavusiwe ekufeni.

Kodvwa ngekuvuka kwalabafile naMosi uyakucinisa loko nasencwadzini lekhuluma ngesihlahla lesasivutsa emalangabi lapho abita iNkhosi ngekutsi Nkulunkulu wa-Abrahama, naNkulunkulu wa-Isaka, naNkulunkulu waJakobe.
Loku kusho kutsi unguNkulunkulu walabaphilako, hhayi walabafile; ngobe bonkhe bayaphila kuye.”
Letinye tati temtsetfo takhuluma tatsi: “Uphendvule kahle, Mfundzisi,”
ngobe base besaba kumbuta leminye imibuzo.
Jesu wase utsi kubo: “Bangasho kanjani kutsi Khristu uyiNdvodzana yaDavide?
Ngobe encwadzini yeTihlabelelo Davide matfupha utsi:
“NaDavide wambita ngekutsi ‘INkhosi!’ Ngako-ke, kungenteka kanjani kutsi abe yindvodzana yakhe?”
Bantfu labanyenti kakhulu bebasalalele, Jesu nakatsi kubafundzi bakhe:
“Caphelani tati temtsetfo, letihamba tigcoke imijiva yato, titsandza kubingelelwa ngenhlonipho etindzaweni temibutsano, titsandza tihlalo letisembili emasinagogeni, netindzawo letiphakeme emadzilini;
tidla tindlu tebafelokati, bese titentisa ngekuthandaza imithandazo lemidze. Tiyakwemukela sijeziso lesikhulu.”
wase ubona umfelokati labephuye kakhulu lowanikela ngetinhlavu temali letimbili letenta lisenti.
Wase utsi: “Nginitjela kutsi lomfelokati lophuyile unikele kakhulu kunabo bonkhe labanikele,
ngobe laba labanye banikele ngalokusele ebunjingeni babo; kodvwa yena, njengobe aphuyile nje, unikele ngako konkhe labengahle aphile ngako.”
Labanye bebakhuluma ngelithempeli, nebuhle balo nangekuhlotjiswa kwalo ngematje lamahle, nangaletinye tintfo letatinikelwa kuNkulunkulu; Jesu watsi:
“Niyakubona konkhe loku, sikhatsi siyeta lapho kuyawubate litje leliyawusala lihleti etikwalelinye; onkhe ayawudzilitelwa phansi.”
Babuta batsi: “Mfundzisi, kuyakwenteka nini loko? Siyini sibonakaliso lesiyawubona ngaso kutsi sengiso sikhatsi sekwenteka kwaletintfo?”
Jesu watsi: “Caphelani, ningedukiswa. Kuyawufika bantfu labanyenti egameni lami, batsi: ‘Nginguye!’ batsi: ‘Sikhatsi sesifikile!’ Kodvwa ningabalandzeli!
Ningesabi naniva ngetimphi nengucuko, ngobe letintfo kufanele tenteke kucala, kodvwa atisho kutsi siphetfo sesifikile.”
Wachubeka watsi: “Sive siyawuvukela lesinye, umbuso uvukele lomunye.

Kuyawuba nekutamatama kwemhlaba lokwesabekako lokunyenti, kuvame indlala netifo letingelapheki naletitsatselwanako etindzaweni letinyenti, kube netesabekiso netibonakaliso letikhulu letivela esibhakabhakeni.
Lelo kuyawuba litfuba lenu lekufakaza ngaleliVangeli.
Timiseleni etinhlitiyweni nasetingcondvweni tenu, ngekutsi ningatihluphi ngekucabanga kutsi niyawutivikela kanjani;
ngobe phela ngiyawuninika emavi nekuhlakanipha lekuyawubate nome sinye setitsa tenu lesiyawuba nemandla ekumelana nekuphikisana nani.
Niyawunikelwa ngisho nabatali benu, nabomnakenu, netihlobo tenu, nebangani benu; labanye benu bayawubulawa nekubulawa.
Wonkhe umuntfu uyawunitondza ngenca yelibito lami.
Kodvwa kute nome lunye nje lunwele loluyawulahleka etinhloko tenu.
“Nanibona iJerusalema itungeletwe timphi, nibovele nati kutsi seyitawubhidlitwa.
Labo labaseJudiya babalekele etintsabeni, kutsi labo labakulelo dolobha babaleke, bese kutsi labo labasetigangeni bangabe basangena kulelo dolobha.
Phela lamalanga ngesijeziso, newekugcwaliseka kwako konkhe lokushiwo ngimiBhalo.
“Maye kulabo labayawube bakhulelwe, nakulabo labayakube bamunyisa tinswane kulawo malanga! Kuyakufika lusizi lolukhulu kulelive, nentfukutselo yaNkulunkulu iyakulwa nalesive;
bayawubulawa ngenkemba, batsatfwe bentiwe babe titfunjwa etiveni tonkhe; nebetive bayakuyigcobagcoba iJerusalema, kuze kugcwaliseke sikhatsi sabo.”
bantfu bayawucaleka babe nesiyeti ngenca yekwesaba loko labayawube babheke kutsi kwenteke emhlabeni wonkhe; ngobe emandla emkhatsi ayawutanyatanyiswa.
Kusenjalo iNdvodzana yeMuntfu iyawubonakala, ita ngelifu ngemandla lamakhulu neludvumo.
Nakucala kwenteka letintfo, sukumani niphakamise tinhloko tenu, ngobe insindziso yenu iyawube seyisedvutane.”
Jesu wabatjela lomfanekiso watsi: “Khumbulani sihlahla semkhiwa naletinye tihlahla;
nasenibona kuhluma emagala aba luhlata nivele nati kutsi lihlobo seliyetfwasa.
Ngalokufanako-ke, nanibona letintfo tenteka, nibokwati kutsi umbuso waNkulunkulu sewutawufika.
Impela ngiyanitjela ngitsi: Tonkhe letintfo tiyakwenteka singakapheli lesitukulwane salamuhla.
Lizulu nemhlaba kuyawushabalala, kodvwa emavi ami ngeke endlule.”
“Ticaphelisiseni! Ningatifaki kakhulu emadzilini nasekunatseni lokudzakanako, nasekunakeni tintfo talomhlaba, funa lelo langa linitume;
ngobe liyawufika njengasochaka kubantfu bonkhe emhlabeni wonkhe.
Lindzani nithandaze onkhe emalanga, khona nitawuba nemandla ekuphunyula kuletintfo letitakwenteka nitekwati kuma embikweNdvodzana yeMuntfu.”
Bonkhe bantfu babevukela ethempelini bayewumlalela nakakhuluma.
Baphristi labakhulu netati temtsetfo betama kwenta lisu lekubulala Jesu; noko babesaba bantfu.
Ngako wahamba wayawukhuluma nebaphristi labakhulu netindvuna tebalindzi belithempeli kutsi angabatsengisela kanjani loJesu.
Judasi wakuvuma loko, wase wetama kutfola litfuba lelikahle lekutsengisa Jesu kubo, sicumbi singekho.
Lefika lilanga leMkhosi Wesinkhwa Lesingenambiliso lekusikhatsi sekuhlatjwa kwemazinyane eSidlo seliPhasika.
Jesu watfuma boPhetro naJohane watsi: “Hambani niyewulungisela liPhasika sitewudla.”
Wase utsi kubo: “Lalelani-ke, naningena edolobheni nitawuhlangana nemuntfu etfwele imbita yemanti. Mlandzeleni aze angene endlini,
bese nitsi kulomnikati wendlu: ‘Umfundzisi utsi kuwe: Iphi indlu lapho ngitawudlela khona liPhasika nebafundzi bami?’
Utanikhombisa indlu lenkhulu lesetulu lenako konkhe kwekuhlala, lapho nitawulungisa khona.”
Bahamba bakhandza konkhe kunjengobe abebatjelile, bafike basilungisa Sidlo seliPhasika.
Satsi nasishaya sikhatsi, Jesu wahlala endzaweni yakhe ekudleni kanye nebaphostoli.
Wase utsi kubo: “Bengifisa kakhulu kudla nani leliPhasika kucala ngingakahlupheki;
ngobe nginitjela kutsi: Ngingeke ngiphindze ngilidle futsi, lize ligcwaliseke embusweni waNkulunkulu.”
Jesu wemukela indzebe, wabonga kuNkulunkulu wase utsi: “Tsatsani loku nenetisane;
ngobe nginitjela kutsi ngingeke ngiphindze ngilinatse leliwayini kusukela manje, kuze kufike umbuso waNkulunkulu.”
vele, iNdvodzana yeMuntfu itawufa, njengobe kwamiswa, kodvwa maye kulowo muntfu loyitsengisako!”
Bacala babutana bodvwana kutsi ngubani emkhatsini wabo labetakwenta loko.
Jesu watsi kubo: “Emakhosi alomhlaba anemandla etikwebantfu bawo, nebabusi babitwa ngekutsi: ‘Benti balokuhle’.
Kodvwa kini akunjalo; lokungenani lomkhulu kakhulu emkhatsini wenu kufanele afanane nalomncane kakhulu, nemholi kufanele afane nesisebenti.
Ngubani lomkhulu, ngulohlalako angene ngekudla yini, nome ngulona lolungisela lomunye kudla? Vele, ngulona lohlalako angene ngekudla. Kodvwa mine ngisemkhatsini wenu njengemuntfu lonilungiselako.
“Nine senibeketele kanye nami kuko konkhe kulingwa kwami;
njengobe Babe anginikile ligunya lekubusa, nami-ke ngitaninika lona.
Niyawudla ninatse etafuleni embusweni wami, niyawuhlala etihlalweni nehlulele tive tema-Israyeli letili-12.”
Noko sengikukhulekele, Simoni, kuze kungehluleki kukholwa kwakho. Nase uphendvukile wabuya kimi, kufanele ucinise nalabanakenu.”
Waphendvula watsi: “Nkhosi, ngitimisele kukulandzela ngisho nasekuboshweni nasekufeni.”
Jesu waphendvula watsi: “Phetro, ngikutjela kutsi: Lamuhla lichudze litawukhala sewungiphike katsatfu utsi awungati.”
Jesu watsi: “Kodvwa lowo lonesipatji nalonesikhwama, akasitsatse; nalowo longenankemba, akatsengise lijazi lakhe atsenge inkemba.
Ase nginitjele naku: UmBhalo lotsi: ‘Wabalwa kanye netigelekece,’ kufanele ugcwaliseke ngami. Phela lokwabhalwa ngami sekuyagcwaliseka.”
Bafundzi batsi: “Buka! Nati tinkemba letimbili, Nkhosi!”
Jesu wesuka wahamba, waya eNtsabeni Yemincumo njengobe abevamile; nebafundzi bakhe bahamba naye.
Watsi kube efike kuleyo ndzawo, watsi kubo: “Thandazani, kuze ningangeni ekulingweni.”
Kodvwa yena wesuka kubo, wachubeka libanga lelingaba ngangemjikijelo, waguca phansi wathandaza.
Watsi: “Babe, nawutsandza, susa kimi lendzebe yelusizi. Noko kungabi ngentsandvo yami, kodvwa akwenteke intsandvo yakho.”
Ingilosi leyayiphuma ezulwini yefika kuye yamcinisa.
Inhlitiyo yakhe yayilusizi; wathandaza ngekuciniseka lokukhulu, titfukutfuku takhe taze taba njengematfonsi engati, atfontsela phansi.
Wesuka ekuthandazeni, wabuyela kubafundzi bakhe wabakhandza sebalele, ngobe bebakhatsateke kakhulu etinhlitiyweni tabo.
Watsi kubo: “Nilaleleni? Vukani nithandaze kuze ningangeni ekulingweni.”
Watsi asakhuluma, kwase kufika sicumbi sebantfu; Judasi, labengulomunye webafundzi labali-12 labesihola embili, weta kuJesu wafike wamanga.
Kodvwa Jesu watsi: “Judasi, nembala iNdvodzana yeMuntfu uyitsengisa ngekuyanga?”
Bafundzi lababenaJesu babona lokwakutakwenteka, base batsi: “Nkhosi! Sigadle yini ngaletinkemba tetfu?”
Lomunye wabo wagadla sigcili semPhristi Lomkhulu wasihhumbula indlebe yangasekudla.
Jesu watsi kubaphristi labakhulu kanye netiphatsimandla tebalindzi belithempeli netibondza letatite kutembamba: “Niteleni la netinkemba netagila, kube sengatsi ngisigebengu?
Nganginani onkhe emalanga ethempelini, anizange netame kungibopha. Kodvwa lesikhatsi senu nesemandla ebumnyama.”
Base bayambopha Jesu bamtsatsa bamfaka endlini yemPhristi Lomkhulu; Phetro abelandzela khashane ngemuva.
Kwakubaswe umlilo ekhatsi nendzawo yelibala lenkantolo, naPhetro weta wahlala wotsa nabo umlilo.
Kwatsi kube intfombatana, leyayisisebenti, imbona otsa umlilo, yambukisisa yatsi: “Nalendvodza beyihamba naye!”
Kodvwa Phetro waphika watsi: “Ntfombatana! Angimati nekumati!”
Emvakwesikhashana, indvodza lenye yamfanisa yatsi: “Ungulomunye wabo nawe.”
Ngemvakwesikhatsi lesidzanyana lesingaba li-awa lenye indvodza yambelesela ngemandla yatsi: “Akukho nalokuncane nje kungabata kutsi lendvodza yayinaye, ngobe ingumGalile!”
Kodvwa Phetro waphendvula watsi: “Ndvodza, angiyati lentfo lokhuluma ngayo!”
INkhosi yagucuka yabuka Phetro, naPhetro wase uyawakhumbula emavi eNkhosi nayitsi: “Lamuhla lichudze lingakakhali, utabe sewushito katsatfu kutsi awungati.”
Phetro waphumela ngephandle wafike wakhala kabuhlungu kakhulu.
Lamadvodza abegadze Jesu amenta inhlekisa amshaya;
abemvala emehlo bese ayambuta atsi: “Combelela kutsi ngubani lokushayile?”
Ekuseni Liqoqo letibondza temaJuda, nebaphristi labakhulu, netati temtsetfo tahlangana ndzawonye, naJesu waletfwa kuleLiqoqo labo.
kani futsi nanginganibuta umbuzo, ningeke ningiphendvule.
Kodvwa kusukela manje iNdvodzana yeMuntfu itawuhlaliswa ngasesandleni sekudla saNkulunkulu, Somandla.”
Bonkhe batsi: “Pho, ungiyo yini iNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu?”
Base batsi kuye: “Asisadzingi labanye bofakazi! Tsine matfupha sesitivele inkhulumo yakhe!”
Lonkhe lelo Liqoqo lasukuma latsatsa Jesu lamyisa kuPhilatu.
Base batsi: “Lomuntfu simbambe edukisa sive sakitsi, asitjela kutsi singatseli kuKhesari, atigabatisa ngekutsi yena unguKhristu, iNkhosi.”
Philatu wambuta watsi: “Ungiyo yini inkhosi yemaJuda?”
Philatu watsi kubaphristi labakhulu naseticunjini tonkhe: “Angitfoli cala kulomuntfu.”
Kodvwa baphikelela ngemandla batsi: “Lomuntfu ususa lutfutfuva emkhatsini webantfu ngalemfundziso yakhe! Wacala eGalile, wadzabula iJudiya yonkhe, manje sewuze wefika nalapha.”
Nakeva loko Philatu, wabuta watsi: “UngumGalile yini lomuntfu?”
Watsi kube achazelwe kutsi lomuntfu abephuma esifundzeni lesasibuswa nguHerodi, wase umtfumela kuHerodi, naye lobekaseJerusalema ngaleso sikhatsi.
Ngako-ke Herodi wabuta Jesu imibuzo leminyenti, kodvwa Jesu akazange atsi vu.
Baphristi labakhulu netati temtsetfo tasondzela ngembili titfukutsele, tacindzetela Jesu ngemacala lamanyenti.
Herodi nemabutfo akhe bahlekisa ngaJesu bamhhalatisa ngekwedzelela bamembesa umjiva wengubo, bambuyisela kuPhilatu.
Bacala ngalelo langa boHerodi naPhilatu baba bangani; kantsi ngembili kwaloko bebatitsa.
Philatu wabita umhlangano webaphristi labakhulu, nebaholi, nebantfu.
Wase utsi kubo: “Lomuntfu nimletse lapha kimi natsi wedukisa bantfu. Manje, kumangalelwa kwakhe sengikuhlolisisile khona la embikwenu, ngimtfole ate licala ngaletintfo lenimmangalele ngato.
NaHerodi umtfole angenacala, ngobe naku umbuyise la kitsi. Kute lokubi lokwentiwe ngulomuntfu lokungenta kutsi aze ajeziswe ngekubulawa.
[Njalo nje ngesikhatsi semkhosi Philatu kwakufanele abakhululele sinye siboshwa.]
Sonkhe sicumbi samemeta satsi: “Msuse loJesu! Sikhululele Bharaba!”
Bharaba abeboshelwe kubulala kanye nekususa lutfutfuva kulelo dolobha.
Njengobe Philatu abefuna kukhulula Jesu, waphindze wamemeta kulesicumbi sebantfu;
kodvwa saphendvula ngekumemeta satsi: “Mbetsele! Mbetsele esiphambanweni!”
“Kodvwa cala lini lalentile? Kute lengikhandze kutsi ukwentile lokungaze kwente kutsi adzimate abulawe. Ngako-ke ngitamshaya ngimbhambabule, bese ngiyamkhulula.”
Kodvwa bajinge bachubeka bamemeta kakhulu batsi Jesu kufanele abetselwe esiphambanweni. Ekugcineni kumemeta kwabo kwaphumelela.
Ngako Philatu wakhipha sigwebo lababeloku basicela ngaJesu.
Wakhulula lendvodza lababeyifuna, lena leyayisejele ngekuboshelwa lutfutfuva nekubulala, wabanika Jesu kutsi bente labakutsandzako ngaye.
Batsi basahamba naye Jesu, bahlangana nendvodza yaseSirene, libito layo lalinguSimoni, abephuma emaphandleni ete edolobheni. Bambamba, bametfwesa siphambano batsi akalandzele Jesu.
Sicumbi lesikhulu sebantfu sasimlandzela; emkhatsini waso kwakunebafati labebadzatimula bamkhalela.
Jesu wagucukela kubo watsi: “Bomake baseJerusalema, ningangikhaleli mine, kodvwa tikhaleleni nine nebantfwana benu.
Ngobe ayeta emalanga lapho bayawutsi: ‘Maye, baba nenhlanhla labo bafati labangazange batale bantfwana, nalawo mabele langazange amunyise.’
“Ngobe tintfo letinje natentiwa esihlahleni lesiseluhlata, kuyaba njani-ke kulesomile?”
Bebatsatse tigelekece letimbili letatiyawubulawa kanye naJesu.
Batsi kube befike endzaweni leyayibitwa ngekutsi “Sikobho” bambetsela loJesu, kanye naletigelekece letimbili, lesinye ngesekudla nalesinye ngesancele.
Emagama labebhalwe ngetulu kwakhe abetsi: “LONA YINKHOSI YEMAJUDA.”
Lesinye saletigelekece letatilengisiwe setfuka Jesu satsi kuye: “Awusiye yini Khristu? Tisindzise wena kanye natsi!”
Lesi lesinye sasekhuta, satsi: “Awumesabi yini Nkulunkulu? Naku silapha sonkhe ngesigwebo lesifanako.
Noko, setfu silungile, ngobe sitfola loko lokusifanele ngalesikwentile; kodvwa yena kute lakonile.”
Wase utsi kuJesu: “Ungikhumbule, Jesu, nase ufikile ebukhosini bakho.”
Jesu watsi kuso: “Ngikutjela kutsi: Lamuhla utakuba nami ePharadisi.”
Kwatsi kungusemini lenkhulu, ngensimbi yeli-12, lilanga lafiphala, bumnyama bembesa live lonkhe, kwaze kwaba ngesikhatsi santsambama, ngensimbi yesitsatfu,
nendvwangu leyayilenga ethempelini yaklebhuka emkhatsini taba timbili.
Jesu wakhala ngelivi lelikhulu watsi: “Babe! Ngibeka umoya wami etandleni takho!”
Indvuna yelibutfo nayibona loko kwenteka, yabonga Nkulunkulu, yatsi: “Impela abelungile lomuntfu!”
Bonkhe labantfu babetewubukela nabakubona loko kwenteka, babuyela emakhaya kuceka emadvolo.
Bonkhe lababemati Jesu, kanye nebafati lababemlandzela kusukela eGalile, bema khashane batibona tonkhe letintfo natenteka.
Kwakukhona indvodza leyayinguJosefa ngekutalwa awase-Arimathiya, lidolobha lemaJuda. Abelilunga leLiqoqo, alungile, atsembekile, alindzele kufika kwembuso waNkulunkulu.
Nome abelilunga lalelo Liqoqo kodvwa akazange avumelane nesincumo nekwenta kwabo,
waya kuPhilatu, wafike wacela sidvumbu saJesu.
Wasetfula lesidvumbu wasigocota ngendvwangu lenhle, wasifaka ethuneni labelimbe kahle edvwaleni, lalingazange selisetjentiswe ngembili.
KwakunguLesihlanu, lilanga Lemalungiselelo; liSabatha lase litawucala.
Bafati lababelandzela Jesu kusukela eGalile, bahamba naJosefa, balibona lelithuna nekutsi sidvumbu saJesu sasingcwatjwe kanjani.
Base babuyela ekhaya bayawulungisa emakha nemafutsa ekugcobisa sidvumbu.
Ekuseni kuseluvivi ngeliSontfo, lilanga lekucala evikini, bafati baya ethuneni baphetse emakha lababewalungisile.
Bakhandza litje ligicitelwe eceleni kwemnyango welithuna,
kodvwa batsi nabangena ekhatsi abazange basikhandze sidvumbu seNkhosi Jesu.
Bema bangacondzisisi kahle ngaloku, batsi betfuka, kwase kume eceleni kwabo emadvodza lamabili embetse tingubo letikhatimulako.
Ngekwesaba lokukhulu labafati bakhotsama, lamadvodza ase atsi kubo: “Nimfunelani lophilako kulabafile?
Akekho lapha; sewuvukile. Khumbulani kutsi watsini kini ngesikhatsi aseseGalile nakatsi:
‘INdvodzana yeMuntfu kufanele inikelwe etandleni tetoni, ibetselwe esiphambanweni, bese iyavuswa ngelilanga lesitsatfu.’ ”
Besuka ethuneni, bayawutjela bafundzi bakhe labali-11, nalabanye.
Labafati kwakunguMariya waseMagdala, naJwana, naMariya, unina waJakobe; bona nalabanye bafati lababenabo befika babikela baphostoli ngaloko.
Kodvwa baphostoli bayitsatsa lenkhulumo yalabafati ngekutsi bayabhedza, bangete bakukholwa loko.
Kodvwa Phetro wasukuma wagijima waya ethuneni. Wagobondzela, wahlola, wabona timphahla letatigocote sidvumbu kuphela. Wase uyancandzeka ubuyela ekhaya, amangele ngaloko kwakwentekile.
Ngalo lona lelo langa bafundzi lababili babehamba baya edolobhaneni i-Emawusi, lelingaba ngemakhilometha lali-11 kusuka eJerusalema.
Babehamba bakhulumisana ngato tonkhe leto tintfo letatentekile.
Batsi basacoca, Jesu wasondzela kubo, wahambisana nabo.
Jesu watsi kubo: “Yini lena lenihambe nikhulumisana ngayo?”
Lomunye wabo, kunguKleyophase, wambuta watsi: “Usho kutsi nguwe wedvwa yini sihambi lapha eJerusalema lesingati lokwentekile kulamalangana lendlulile?”
Baphendvula batsi: “Loko lokwenteke ngaJesu waseNazaretha, labeyindvodza lengumphrofethi lonemandla ngetento nangemavi, embikwaNkulunkulu nebantfu bonkhe,
nekutsi baphristi betfu labakhulu nebabusi banikela kutsi abulawe, base bambetsela esiphambanweni.
Kantsi besetsemba kutsi nguye labetawukhulula ema-Israyeli. Lamuhla selilanga lesitsatfu loku kwentekile.
Futsi ngetulu kwaloko labanye bafati balelicembu lakitsi basetfusile; ngobe bahambe kuseluvivi baya ethuneni,
kodvwa bakhandze sidvumbu sesingekho. Babuye bafike batsi kubonakaliswe tingilosi kubo letibatjele kutsi uvukile, uyaphila.
Labanye betfu babese baya ethuneni bakhandza kunjengobe kusho labafati, kodvwa abazange bambone.”
Jesu wase utsi kubo: “Maye, nilibele, nekukholwa kwenu kubutsakatsaka ekwemukeleni loko lokwashiwo baphrofethi!
Kwakungadzingeki yini kutsi loKhristu ahlupheke ngalendlela bese ungena ebukhosini bakhe?”
Base basondzele kulomuti labebaya kuwo, Jesu washaya sengatsi uyendlula,
kodvwa bamcela batsi: “Hlala natsi sekuhlwile, futsi sekumnyama.”
Nasekudliwa, watsatsa sinkhwa, wasibusisa, wase uyasihlephula, sewuyabanika.
Kwase kuyabakhanyela, bacondzisisa kutsi ngubani; kodvwa wase uyanyamalala, bangabe basambona.
Babutana bodvwana batsi: “Angitsi sivele satsintseka etinhlitiyweni tetfu ngesikhatsi akhuluma asichazela imiBhalo endleleni?”
Basukuma ngaso leso sikhatsi bancandzeka baya eJerusalema, lapho bakhandza khona bafundzi labali-11 nalabanye bandzawonye,
bafike batjelwa kutsi: “INkhosi ivuke ngempela! Simoni uyibonile!”
Nalaba lababili base bayachaza ngaloko lokwakwenteke emgwacweni, nekutsi baze babona kutsi ngiyo iNkhosi ngekuhlephula kwayo sinkhwa.
Batsi basakhuluma loko, iNkhosi Jesu yema emkhatsini wabo yatsi: “Kuthula akube kini!”
Kodvwa bona besaba kakhulu batfutfumela, bacabanga kutsi sipoko.
Yena watsi kubo: “Netfuswa yini kangaka? Ningabatelani etinhlitiyweni tenu?
Ase nibheke tandla netinyawo tami nibone lokutsi ngimi cobo. Ngitsintseni, nitewubona, ngobe phela sipoko asinawo ematsambo nenyama, njengobe ningibona mine nginako.” [
Watsi kube asho njalo, wase ubakhombisa tandla takhe netinyawo takhe.]
Bajinge bangete bakholwa, ngobe babejabulile, bamangele kakhulu; ngako wase uyababuta utsi: “Kukhona yini lokudliwako lapha?”
Wase utsi kubo: “Ngito-ke letintfo lenganginitjela tona ngisenani, kutsi konkhe lokubhaliwe ngami emtsetfweni waMosi, nasemiBhalweni yebaphrofethi, naseTihlabelelweni bekufanele kugcwaliseke.”
Wase uvula tingcondvo tabo, kuze bacondzisise imiBhalo.
Watsi kubo: “Naku lokubhaliwe kutsi Khristu ufanele kuhlupheka abulawe abuye avuswe ekufeni ngelilanga lesitsatfu,
nekutsi egameni lakhe kumelwe kushunyayelwe etiveni tonkhe kuphendvuka kube kutsetselelwa kwetono, kucalwe eJerusalema.
Mine-ke ngiyawunitfumelela sipho lesetsenjiswa nguBabe; kodvwa hlalani eJerusalema, nize nemukeliswe emandla lavela ngetulu.”
Wase uphuma nabo, wabahola, waze wefika eBhetani, waphakamisa tandla takhe, wababusisa.
Bamdvumisa, base babuyela eJerusalema banekujabula lokukhulu;
sonkhe sikhatsi basicitsa ethempelini babonga Nkulunkulu.
Konkhe kwadalwa ngaye, ngaphandle kwakhe kute lokwadalwa kuko konkhe lokudaliwe.
Nguye labengumtfombo wekuphila, naloko kuphila bekukukhanya kwebantfu bonkhe.
Lowo abetele bufakazi, atewufakaza ngaloko kukhanya, kutsi ngaye bonkhe bantfu bakholwe.
Yena abengesiko loko kukhanya, kepha abetewufakaza ngaloko kukhanya.
Kukhanya kweliciniso, lokukhanyisa wonkhe umuntfu, bekuseta emhlabeni.
Livi abesendalweni. Indalo yavela ngaye, kepha umhlaba awuzange umati.
Weta kubakubo, kodvwa bantfu bakubo abazange bamemukele.
Kepha bonkhe labamemukela, ngekukholwa egameni lakhe, wabapha emandla ekutsi babe bantfwana baNkulunkulu.
Abazange batalwe ngengati, nangenyama, nangentsandvo yendvodza, kodvwa batalwa nguNkulunkulu.
Johane wafakaza ngaye, amemeta atsi: “Nguye lona lebengikhuluma ngaye ngitsi: ‘Lowo lota emvakwami mkhulu kunami, ngobe yena abekhonanchanti kunami.’ ”
Umtsetfo waniketwa ngaMosi; umusa neliciniso kwavela ngaJesu Khristu.
Kute lowase wabona Nkulunkulu, ngaphandle kweNdvodzana letelwe yodvwa lenguNkulunkulu, lesesifubeni seYise, ngiyo lembonakalisile.
Lobu bufakazi baJohane mhlazana emaJuda atfumela baphristi nebaLevi, baphuma eJerusalema kutembuta batsi: “Wena ungubani?”
Base batsi kuye: “Kepha ungubani? Tisho wena kutsi ungubani, khona sitebaphendvula laba labasitfumile.”
Bambuta-ke batsi: “Pho, ubhabhatiselani nangabe awusiye Khristu, nome Elija, nome umphrofethi?”
Johane wabaphendvula watsi: “Mine ngibhabhatisa ngemanti; kepha la emkhatsini wenu kume leningamati.
Yena lowo lotako emvakwami, mine angikafaneli ngisho nekutfukulula imichilo yeticatfulo takhe.”
Loko-ke kwenteka ngesheya kweJordane, eBhetani, lapho bekubhabhatisela Johane khona.
Nguye lona lebengikhuluma ngaye ngitsi: Ukhona lota emvakwami lomkhulu kunami, ngobe yena abekhonanchanti, ngingakabikho.
Nami bengingamati, kodvwa kuze abonakaliswe ku-Israyeli, kwafanela ngite ngitewubhabhatisa ngemanti.”
Johane wafakaza watsi: “Ngimbonile Moya ehla ezulwini anjengelituba, wahlala etikwakhe.
Nami bengingamati, kodvwa lona lowangitfuma kutawubhabhatisa ngemanti watsi kimi: ‘Lowo loyawubona Moya ehla ahlala etikwakhe, nguye loyawubhabhatisa ngaMoya Longcwele.’
Mine ngimbonile, ngingufakazi wekutsi: ‘Lona yiNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu.’ ”
Ngakusasa futsi Johane abeme kanye nebafundzi bakhe lababili.
Wabona Jesu atihambela nje watsi: “Bukani! Nalo liWundlu laNkulunkulu!”
Bafundzi lababili labamuva nakakhulumako, besuka balandzela Jesu.
Jesu watsi uyagucuka wababona bamlandzela, wababuta watsi: “Nifunani?”
Wabaphendvula watsi: “Wotani nitewubona.” Ngako-ke base bayeta, bafike babona lapho abehlala khona. Bahlala naye ngalelo langa, kwakungaba li-awa lesine ntsambama.
Yena watfola kucala umnakabo, Simoni, watsi kuye: “Sesimtfolile Mesiya.” (Lelibito lisho kutsi: “Khristu.”)
Wamyisa kuJesu, Jesu wambuka, watsi: “Wena unguSimoni, umsa waJohane. Libito lakho sekutaba nguKhefase.” (Lelibito lisho kutsi: “Phetro, lidvwala.”)
Ngakusasa Jesu watimisela kuya eGalile. Watfola Filiphu watsi kuye: “Ngilandzele.”
Filiphu abewaseBhethsayida, lapho bekuhlala bo-Andreya naPhetro khona.
Filiphu watfola Nathanayeli, watsi kuye: “Simtfolile lowo labhala ngaye emtsetfweni Mosi kanye nebaphrofethi, Jesu waseNazaretha, umsa waJosefa.”
Jesu wabona Nathanayeli eta kuye, wakhuluma ngaye watsi: “Bheka, nango-ke um-Israyeli wangempela, lekute bucili kuye.”
Jesu watsi kuye: “Ngikubone ngesikhatsi uhleti ngaphansi kwesihlahla semkhiwa, Filiphu asengakefiki kutakubita.”
Nathanayeli waphendvula watsi: “Mfundzisi, wena uyiNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu, uyiNkhosi yaka-Israyeli!”
Jesu wamphendvula watsi: “Ukholwa ngobe ngitsite kuwe ngakubona ungaphansi kwemkhiwa yini? Utawubona lokukhulu kunaloko.”
Wase utsi kuye: “Ngicinisile, ngicinisile, ngitsi kini: Nitawubona lizulu livulekile netingilosi taNkulunkulu tehla tenyuka etikweNdvodzana yeMuntfu.”
Kwatsi ngelilanga lesitsatfu kwaba nemshado eKhana laseGalile. Unina waJesu abekhona naye.
Kulowo mshado Jesu abemenywe kanye nebafundzi bakhe.
Kwatsi kube linatfwe liphele liwayini, unina waJesu weta kuye watsi: “Sebate liwayini.”
Jesu watsi kuye: “Make, ungena ngani emsebentini wami? Sikhatsi sami sisengakefiki.”
Unina watsi etincekwini: “Nibokwenta konkhe latanitjela kona.”
Bekunetimbita tematje letatisitfupha khona lapho, tihlelenjiswe kahle, ngelisiko lekugeza kwemaJuda. Leyo naleyo mbita beyingagcwatjiswa ngemalitha labengacishe abe likhulu.
Jesu watsi kuletinceku: “Gcwalisani letimbita ngemanti.” Batigcwalisa tatsi nswi.
Wase utsi kuto: “Khanini niyewuvisa lona lophetse lomshado.” Bammikisela-ke.
Wawanambitsisisa lamanti labesagucuke aba liwayini; abengati noko kutsi lelo wayini-ndzini laliphumephi, kodvwa letisebenti tona betati, ngako-ke wase ubita umkhwenyane.

Wefike watsi kuye: “Wonkhe umuntfu ucala ngekukhipha liwayini lelimnandzi kucala, bese-ke kutsi nase banatse kakhulu, benela, kube ngukhona akhipha lelingemnandzi kunelakucala; kodvwa wena usuka ubeka leli lelimnandzi kuze kube ngunyalo!”
Wakhandza bantfu ethempelini batsengiselana tinkhomo, netimvu, nematuba; labanye bebantjintja timali bahleti ematafuleni.
Wesuka weluka siswebhu ngetintsambo, wabacosha bonkhe ethempelini, kanye netimvu netinkhomo; wacitsa timali tebantjintji, wagenula ematafula.
Watsi kulabo labebatsengisa ngematuba: “Susani loku lapha! Ningayenti lendlu yaBabe ibe yindlu yekutsengiselana.”
Bafundzi bakhe base bayakhumbula kutsi umBhalo utsi: “Yebo, Nkulunkulu, kushisekela indlu yakho kuvutsa njengemlilo ngekhatsi kwami.”
Ngako bambuta batsi: “Utsi utalakha ngemalanga lamatsatfu? Utsi uyati nje kutsi latsatsa iminyaka lengema-46 lakhiwa lelithempeli?”
Kodvwa lelithempeli labekhuluma ngalo Jesu bekulithempeli lelingumtimba wakhe.
Watsi nase avukile ekufeni, bafundzi bakhe base bayakhumbula kutsi watsini. Bakholwa ngumBhalo nangemavi akhe labewakhulumile.
Kwatsi ngesikhatsi aseJerusalema ngeMkhosi weliPhasika, bantfu labanyenti bakholwa nguye ngekubona tibonakaliso takhe latenta.
Kepha Jesu akazange atsembane nabo, ngobe abebati kahle bonkhe.
Futsi-ke sasingekho nesidzingo sekutsi angachazelwa ngulomunye ngebantfu, ngobe yena bekati lingekhatsi lemuntfu.
Weta kuJesu ngalobunye busuku, wefike watsi: “Mfundzisi, siyati kutsi wena ungumfundzisi lophuma kuNkulunkulu. Ngobe kute umuntfu longenta timangaliso letingaka, nakate Nkulunkulu.”
Nikhodemu wabuta watsi: “Kodvwa umuntfu losamdzala angatalwa njani kabusha? Angangena yini ngekwesibili esiswini senina aphindze atalwe?”
Loko lokutelwe yinyama kuyinyama, naloko lokutelwe nguMoya kungumoya.
Ungamangali, ngobe naku ngitsi kuwe: ‘Nifanele kutsi nitalwe kabusha.’
Umoya uhhusha lapho utsandza khona, uyakuva kuhhusha kwawo, kodvwa awati lapho uphuma khona nalapho uya khona. Loko-ke kufanana naye wonkhe umuntfu lotelwe nguMoya.”
Jesu waphendvula watsi: “Wena, ungumfundzisi waka-Israyeli. Pho, awukucondzi ngani loku?
Ngicinisile, ngicinisile, ngitsi kuwe: Sikhuluma lesikwatiko sifakaze ngalesikubonile, kepha anibemukeli bufakazi betfu.
Nanginitjela ngetintfo talelive, aningikholwa; pho, ningangikholwa kanjani, nasenginitjela ngetintfo tasezulwini?
Kute lowase wenyukela ezulwini ngaphandle kweNdvodzana yeMuntfu, leyehla ezulwini.
kuze kutsi wonkhe umuntfu lokholwa ngiyo abe nekuphila lokuphakadze.
Nkulunkulu walitsandza live kakhulu kangangekutsi wadzimate wanikela ngeNdvodzana yakhe lekukuphela kwayo, kuze kutsi nome ngubani lokholwa ngiyo angabhubhi, kodvwa abe nekuphila lokuphakadze.
Ngobe Nkulunkulu akazange atfumele iNdvodzana yakhe emhlabeni kutsi itewulahla live ngelicala, kodvwa kwekutsi live litewusindziswa ngayo.
Kwehlulelwa ngiko loko kutsi: Kukhanya kutsi sekufikile emhlabeni, kepha bantfu babe batsandza bumnyama kunekukhanya, ngenca yemisebenti yabo lemibi.
Umuntfu lowenta lokubi uyakutondza kukhanya; aketi ekukhanyeni, funa imisebenti yakhe ibonakale ebaleni.
Kepha lowenta liciniso uyeta ekukhanyeni, kuze kubonakale imisebenti yakhe, kutsi yentiwe kuNkulunkulu.”
Emvakwaloko Jesu wahamba nebafundzi bakhe baya eveni laseJudiya, befika bahlala khona, kwabhajatiswa bantfu.
NaJohane-ke abebhabhatisa, yena-ke ase-Enoni madvutane nje neSalimi, ngobe emanti abemanyenti kuleyo ndzawo, bantfu beta lapho befike babhajatiswa.
Phela ngaleso sikhatsi Johane abesengakafakwa ejele.
Kwabe sekuvela kuphikisana kubafundzi baJohane neliJuda lelitsite mayelana nekuhlambuluka ngekugeza tandla.
Ngako-ke base beta kuJohane, befika batsi: “Mfundzisi, uyayikhumbula yini lendvodza bewunayo uyifakazela ngesheya kweJordane? Seyiyabhabhatisa nyalo, bonkhe bantfu sebaya kuyo!”
Nani ngekwenu ningangifakazela kutsi ngake ngasho ngatsi: ‘Angisiye mine Khristu, kodvwa ngitfunyelwe kumvulela indlela.’
Lowo lonamakoti ungumyeni; kepha umngani wemyeni nakaliva livi lemyeni, ujabula kakhulu. Ngako-ke lenjabulo yami seyiphelele.
Ufakaza ngaloko lakubonile nalakuvile, kodvwa kute umuntfu lowemukela bufakazi bakhe.
Lowemukela bufakazi bakhe ulubekile luphawu lwekutsi: Nkulunkulu ucinisile.
Ngobe lowo lotfunywe nguNkulunkulu ukhuluma emavi aNkulunkulu; ngobe Moya akaniki ngekwesilinganiso.
UYise uyayitsandza iNdvodzana, waniketa konkhe etandleni tayo.
Lokholwa yiNdvodzana, unekuphila lokuphakadze; kodvwa longakholwa yiNdvodzana, ute kuphila lokuphakadze; kodvwa lulaka lwaNkulunkulu lulengela etikwakhe.”
BaFarisi beva kutsi Jesu abetfola, futsi abhabhatisa bafundzi labanyenti kunaJohane.
Empeleni, Jesu ngekwakhe abengazange asabhabhatise namunye umuntfu, kodvwa bekubafundzi bakhe kuphela labebabhabhatisa bantfu.
Ngako-ke kwatsi Jesu nakakuva lokwase kukhulunywa, wesuka eJudiya wancandzeka wabuyela eGalile.
Bekudzingekile kutsi ahambe ngendlela ledzabula eSamariya.
Umtfombo waJakobe bewukhona lapho. Jesu asadziniwe ngenca yeluhambo, wahlala phansi eceleni kwawo waphumula. Bekungacishe kube li-awa lelishumi nambili emini.
Kwase kuchamuka umfati waseSamariya atekukha emanti. Jesu watsi kuye: “Ase unginatsise tsine.”
Bafundzi bakhe babesengekho bayewutsenga kudla edolobheni.
Lomfati watsi: “Nkhosi, awunalutfo lwekukha, kantsi nalomtfombo uyashona; pho, utawatsatsaphi lawo manti laphilako?
Kantsi wena umkhulu yini kunababe wetfu Jakobe lowasinika lomtfombo? Yena wanatsa kuwo kanye nemadvodzana akhe nemihlambi yakhe.”
Kepha lowo loyawunatsa emanti lengiyawumnika wona, angeke aphindze ome naphakadze; ngobe emanti lengiyawumnika wona, ekhatsi kuye ayawuba ngumtfombo wemanti laphuphumako, kube kuphila lokuphakadze.”
Umfati waphendvula watsi: “Nkhosi, ngiphe lawo manti, khona ngingaseyiwuphindze ngome; ngingetiwuphindza ngite lapha kutewukha emanti.”
Jesu watsi kuye: “Hamba ubite indvodza yakho, nite lapha.”
Jesu waphendvula watsi: “Usho sibili nawutsi: ‘Ngite indvodza.’
Ngobe sewuke waba nemadvodza lasihlanu, nalena lonayo nyalo akusiyo yakho. Ukhulume liciniso.”
Bokhokho betfu bemaSamariya bebakhonta Nkulunkulu kuyo lentsaba, nine maJuda-ke nitsi iseJerusalema indzawo lapho kufanele kukhontelwe Nkulunkulu khona.”
Jesu watsi kuye: “Mfati, kholwa nguloku lengikushoko. Sikhatsi siyeta lapho ningetimkhonta Babe etikwalentsaba nome eJerusalema.
Nine maSamariya nikhonta leningakwati, tsine maJuda sikhonta lesikwatiko, ngobe insindziso ivela kumaJuda.
Kodvwa sikhatsi siyeta, nanyalo sesifikile, lapho labo labakhonta ngeliciniso bayawukhonta Babe ngaMoya nangeliciniso. Ngobe Babe ufuna labamkhonta kanjalo.
Nkulunkulu unguMoya, nalabo labamkhontako bafanele kumkhonta ngaMoya nangeliciniso.”
Umfati watsi kuye: “Ngiyati kutsi Mesiya, lokutsiwa nguKhristu, utawufika. Nasefikile yena utakusitjela konkhe.”
Kwatsi kusenjalo kwefika bafundzi bakhe. Bamangala kakhulu nabamkhandza akhuluma nalomfati. Kodvwa kute namunye lowase watsi kuye: “Ufunani?” nome ambute atsi: “Ukhulumelani nalomfati?”
Lomfati washiya imbita yakhe yemanti, wabuyela edolobheni, wafike watsi kubantfu:
“Wotani nitewungibonisa umuntfu longitjele konkhe lengake ngakwenta. Kungete kwaba nguye yini Khristu?”
Bafundzi bakhe base bayamncenga batsi: “Mfundzisi, asewudle phela.”
Kodvwa Jesu wabaphendvula watsi: “Nginekudla lengikudlako, leningakwati nine.”
Ngako bafundzi bacala babutana bodvwa, batsi: “Ngabe kukhona yini loke wamletsela kudla?”
Nine niyaye ningete nasho yini kutsi: ‘Sekusele tinyanga letine sivune’? Lalelani la, phakamisani emehlo enu nibone kutsi emasimi asamhlophe, asalungele kuvunwa.
Lovunako uyaholelwa, abutse sivuno kube kuphila lokuphakadze, kuze lohlanyelako ajabule kanye nalowo lovunako.
Ngobe kuloko licinisile lelivi lelitsi: ‘Lomunye uyahlanyela, lomunye avune.’
Mine nganitfumela kutsi niyekuvuna loko leningakusebentanga. Labanye basebentile, nine-ke ningene emsebentini wabo.”
EmaSamariya lamanyenti akulelo dolobha akholwa kuJesu ngelivi lalowo mfati, lowafakaza ngekutsi: “Ungitjele konkhe lengake ngakwenta.”
Atsi kube ete kuye emaSamariya, ase ayamncenga kutsi ase ahlalahlale nawo. Ngako-ke, wahlala khona emalanga lamabili.
Labanyenti futsi bakholwa ngenca yelivi lakhe.
Base batsi kulomfati: “Manje asisakholwa ngobe kushito wena, kodvwa ngobe natsi nje, matfupha, sesitivele futsi sesitibonele kutsi nguye ngempela uMsindzisi welive.”
Ngemvakwemalanga lamabili Jesu wesuka lapho waya eGalile.
Ngobe Jesu matfupha wafakaza ngekutsi: “Umphrofethi akahlonishwa eveni lakubo.”
Bantfu baseGalile bamemukela ngemoya lomuhle, ngobe bebake baya eMkhosini weliPhasika eJerusalema, bafike bakubona konkhe loko labekwenta ngalawo malanga.
Satsi kube sive kutsi Jesu sewusukile eJudiya sewuseGalile, saya kuye. Samcela kutsi ehle aye eKhaphanawume, ayewusiphilisela lendvodzana yaso leyase igulela kufa.
Ngako-ke Jesu watsi kuso: “Naningaboni tibonakaliso netimangaliso, ngeke nikholwe.”
Siphatsimandla satsi: “Nkhosi, yehla ingakafi indvodzana yami!”
Jesu watsi kuye: “Hamba, indvodzana yakho seyiphilile.”
Lendvodza yakholwa ngemavi aJesu, yavele yahamba.
Watsi asehla nje, tisebenti takhe tamhlangabeta ngembiko wekutsi: “Indvodzana yakho seyiyaphila.”
Wababuta watsi: “Bekusikhatsi sini nayicala kuba ncono indvodzana yami?” Baphendvula batsi: “Bekungusemini, ngensimbi yekucala, itolo, nakusuka lomkhuhlane kuye.”
Uyise wakhumbula kutsi bekunguleso sikhatsi Jesu lasho ngaso kutsi indvodzana yakhe seyiphilile. Ngako-ke yena kanye nemuti wakhe wonkhe bakholwa.
Emvakwaloko kwaba khona umkhosi wemaJuda, naJesu wakhuphukela eJerusalema.
Lapha eJerusalema, eceleni kweliSango Letimvu, bekunelichibi lebekutsiwa ngesiHebheru yiBhethesda, belinemihubhe lesihlanu.
Bekulele kuyo ticumbi tetigulane, timphumphutse, netinyonga, nalababefe tinhlangotsi, [bonkhe bebalindzele kutanyatanyiswa kwemanti.
Bekuvame njalo kutsi kwehle ingilosi yeNkhosi, ifike iwatamatamise lamanti. Bekutsi lowo longene kucala emuva kwekutanyatanyiswa kwemanti, aphile esifeni sakhe, nome ngabe saluphi luhlobo.]
Bekunendvodza lapho leyase igule iminyaka lengema-38.
Jesu watsi kube ayibone ilele lapho, ati nekutsi sekuphele sikhatsi lesingakanani igula, watsi kuyo: “Uyatsandza yini kuphiliswa?”
Lendvodza yaphendvula yatsi: “Nkhosi, ngite umuntfu longangifaka echibini, nakutanyatanyiswa emanti. Ngiyaye ngitsi ngetama kungena, kusuke lomunye umuntfu angengcelele.”
Jesu watsi kuye: “Sukuma, utsatse licansi lakho uhambe.”
Ngekucwabita kweliso lendvodza yaphila. Yasukuma yatsatsa licansi layo yahamba.
Ngako emaJuda atjela lendvodza lebeyiphilisiwe atsi: “Phela lamuhla liSabatha, awukavumeleki kwetfwala lelicansi.”
Yona yaphendvula yatsi: “Lona longiphilisile, nguye lotsite kimi: ‘Tsatsa licansi lakho uhambe.’ ”
Ambuta atsi: “Ngubani yena lowo muntfu lotsite kuwe: ‘Tsatsa licansi lakho uhambe’?”
Kodvwa lendvodza lebeyiphilisiwe beyingamati kutsi ngubani, ngobe bekunesicumbi sebantfu kuleyo ndzawo, futsi naJesu abesahambile.
Lendvodza yesuka lapho, yahamba yayawutjela emaJuda kutsi nguJesu lona labeyiphilisile.
Ngaloko-ke emaJuda amtingela Jesu, ngobe loko abekwente ngeliSabatha.
Kodvwa Jesu wabaphendvula watsi: “Babe wami seloku usasebenta kuze kube manje; nami-ke ngenta njalo.”
Ngobe uYise uyayitsandza iNdvodzana, uyikhombisa konkhe lakwentako yena. Utayikhombisa imisebenti lemikhulu kunalena, nize nimangale.
Njengobe uYise avusa labafile baphile, nayo-ke iNdvodzana iyabaphilisa labo letsandza kutsi baphile.
UYise akehluleli muntfu, konkhe kwehlulela ukunike iNdvodzana,
kuze bonkhe bahloniphe iNdvodzana njengobe bahlonipha uYise. Lowo longayihloniphi iNdvodzana, akahloniphi neYise loyitfumile.
“Ngicinisile, ngicinisile, ngitsi kini: Lowo lova livi lami akholwe ngulongitfumile, unekuphila lokuphakadze. Akayi ekwehlulelweni, kodvwa sewuphumile ekufeni, wangena ekuphileni.
Ngicinisile, ngicinisile, ngitsi kini: Sikhatsi siyeta, nanyalo sesifikile lapho labafile bayawuliva livi leNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu, nalabo labalivako bayawuphila.
Njengobe uYise anekuphila ngekwakhe, kanjalo uyiphile neNdvodzana kutsi ibe nekuphila ngekwayo.
Uyiphile emandla ekwehlulela, ngobe iyiNdvodzana yemuntfu.
Kunganimangalisi loko, ngobe sikhatsi siyeta lapho bonkhe bantfu labasemathuneni bayawuliva livi layo.
Labo labente kulunga bayawuvukela ekuphileni, labente lokubi bayawuvukela ekulahlweni.”
“Mine ngingeke ngitentele lutfo ngekwami; ngehlulela njengaloko lengikuvako, kwehlulela kwami kulungile, ngobe angifuni yona intsandvo yami, kepha intsandvo yalowo longitfumile.
Kodvwa kukhona longifakazelako, futsi ngiyati nekutsi bufakazi labufakazako ngami buliciniso.
Nine nitfumele titfunywa tenu kuJohane, wafike walifakazela liciniso.
Kepha mine angikasimi ebufakazini bemuntfu, kodvwa loko nginitjelela kutsi nitewusindziswa.
Yena-ke abesibane lesivutsako nalesikhanyako, nine-ke benitimisele kujabula kwesikhashana ekukhanyeni kwakhe.
Kepha nginebufakazi lobukhulu kunebaJohane, ngobe imisebenti Babe langinike yona kutsi ngiyente, yona lemisebenti lengiyentako iyangifakazela kutsi ngitfunywe nguBabe.
NaBabe longitfumile ufakazile ngami. Anizange nilive livi lakhe, anizange nisibone nesimo sakhe;
kunjalo nje aniligcini nelivi lakhe etinhlitiyweni tenu, ngobe yena lowo lamtfumile anikholwa kuye.
Niphenya imiBhalo, ngobe nicabanga kutsi nitawutfola kuphila lokuphakadze kuyo, kantsi ngiyo lucobo lefakaza ngami.
Kepha anivumi kuta kimi kuze phela nitewuba nekuphila.
Kepha ngiyanati kutsi nine nite lutsandvo lwaNkulunkulu etinhlitiyweni tenu.
Mine ngite egameni laBabe, kodvwa aningemukeli; kepha nakuta lomunye atitela egameni lakhe, yena nitamemukela.
Ningakholwa kanjani nine nidvumisana nodvwana nje, ningalufuni ludvumo loluvela kuNkulunkulu, lokunguye yedvwa?
“Ningacabangi-ke kutsi ngitanimangalela kuBabe. Ukhona lonimangalelako, yena loMosi lenetsembele kuye.
Kube benikholwa nguMosi, ngabe niyakholwa nangimi, ngobe yena wabhala ngami.
Kodvwa naningakholwa ngulokubhalwe nguye, pho, emavi ami nitawakholwa njani?”
Emvakwaloko Jesu wahamba waya ngesheya kweLwandle lwaseGalile lolulwaseThibheriyase.
Sicumbi lesikhulu sebantfu samlandzela, ngobe sasibone tibonakaliso labetente kulabagulako.
Jesu wenyukela entsabeni, wefike wahlala phansi akanye nebafundzi bakhe.
Jesu watsi uphakamisa emehlo, wabona kutsi sicuku lesikhulu sita kuye, watsi kuFiliphu: “Labantfu sitabatsengela kuphi tinkhwa batewudla?”
Abembuta loko amhlola nje, ngobe yena abekwati labetakwenta.
Filiphu wamphendvula watsi: “Tinkhwa temaLangeni langema-200 tingeke tibenele, kube ngulowo nalowo atfole lucetwana nje.”
Lomunye webafundzi bakhe, Andreya, umnakaboSimoni Phetro, watsi kuye:
“Kukhona umfana lapha lonetinkhwa tebhali letisihlanu netinhlanti letimbili. Kepha kungentani loko, bantfu babanyenti kangaka nje?”
Jesu watsi: “Hlalisani labantfu.” Bekunetjani lobunyenti kuleyo ndzawo. Emadvodza lahlaliswa phansi abengacishe abe ti-5 000.
Jesu watitsatsa letinkhwa, wabonga, wase utiphakululela laba bebahleti phansi, wabuye, wenta njalo futsi nangetinhlanti, kwaya ngekutsi basakufuna yini kudla.
Kwatsi nase besutsi, watsi kubafundzi bakhe: “Butsani timvutfuluka letisele, kubete lokulahlekako.”
Batibutsa, bagcwalisa emabhasikidi la-12 ngetimvutfuluka tetinkhwa tebhali letatisihlanu letatisele kulababedla.
Ngako-ke Jesu ati kutsi batawuta bambambe bambeke inkhosi, wamonyuka waya entsabeni yena yedvwa.
Bangena esikebheni, bewela lwandle baya eKhaphanawume, kwase kuhlwile, Jesu abesolo angakefiki kubo.
Kwavunguta umoya lomkhulu, lwandle lwavuka indlwabane.
Bafundzi bese bagwedle emakhilometha lasihlanu nome lasitfupha ngesikhatsi babona Jesu ahamba etikwemanti, asondzela esikebheni, betfuka besaba kakhulu.
Bese bajabulele kutsi bamekhwete esikebheni sabo. Batsi bangakabheki babona sebefikile eveni labebaya kulo.

Ngakusasa lesicumbi sebantfu lebesisasele ngesheya kwelwandle, sabona kutsi bese kute lesinye sikebhe, sakhumbula nekutsi bese sisinye kuphela, nekutsi Jesu abengakahambi ngesikebhe sebafundzi bakhe, kodvwa babehambe bodvwa.
Kodvwa letinye tikebhe lebetiphuma eThibheriyase, tefika edvutane naleyo ndzawo, lapho lesicumbi sasidlele khona tinkhwa emvakwekubonga kweNkhosi.
Satsi kube sibone lesicumbi sebantfu kutsi Jesu nebafundzi bakhe abasekho lapho, sakhwela etikebheni saya eKhaphanawume, sifuna Jesu.
Batsi kube bamtfole asangesheya kwelwandle, batsi kuye: “Mfundzisi, ufike nini lapha?”
Jesu wabaphendvula watsi: “Ngicinisile, ngicinisile, ngitsi kini: Aningifuni ngobe nibone tibonakaliso, kepha ningifuna ngobe nidle tinkhwa, nesutsa.
Ningabosebentela kudla lokuphelako, kepha nibosebentela kudla lokutawukhonsa kuze kubesekuphileni lokuphakadze leyawunipha kona iNdvodzana yeMuntfu. Ngobe Nkulunkulu uYise ulubekile luphawu kuyo.”
Base bayambuta-ke batsi: “Singentani lokungukona kuyimisebenti yaNkulunkulu?”
Bokhokho betfu badla imana ehlane, njengobe kubhaliwe kutsi: ‘Wabapha sinkhwa lesehla ezulwini, kutsi badle.’ ”
Jesu watsi kubo: “Ngicinisile, ngicinisile, ngitsi kini: Bekungesiye Mosi lona lowanipha sinkhwa lesavela ezulwini, kepha Babe unipha sinkhwa sibili sivela ezulwini.
Ngobe sinkhwa laphana ngaso Nkulunkulu nguleso lesehla siphuma ezulwini, lesiletsa kuphila emhlabeni.”
Base batsi kuye: “Nkhosi, siphe leso sinkhwa onkhe emalanga.”
Kepha nginitjelile kutsi ningibonile, kodvwa anikakholwa.
Ngobe kwehla kwami ezulwini akusiko kutsi ngetela kutakwenta intsandvo yami, kepha kutakwenta intsandvo yalowo longitfumile.
Intsandvo yalona longitfumile kutsi ngingalahlekelwa lutfo kuko konkhe loko langiphe kona, kepha ngikuvuse ngemhla wekuphela.
Ngobe loko kuyintsandvo yaBabe kutsi, bonkhe lababone iNdvodzana, base bakholwa kuyo, babe nekuphila lokuphakadze; mine-ke ngiyawubavusa ngemhla wekuphela.”
EmaJuda ase acala kukhonona ngaye, ngobe phela abetsite: “Mine ngisinkhwa lesehla ezulwini.”
Ngako batsi: “Lona akusiye yini Jesu, umsa waJosefa, uyise nenina lesibatiko? Pho, usho kanjani kutsi: ‘Ngehle ezulwini’?”
Kute umuntfu longeta kimi nangabe Babe, lokunguyena angitfumile, angamdvonsi. Ngemhla wekuphela mine-ke ngiyawumvusa aphile.
Kubhaliwe kubaphrofethi kutsi: ‘Bonkhe bayawuba ngulabafundziswe nguNkulunkulu.’ Bonkhe labevile kuBabe, bafundza kuye, bayeta kimi.
Kute umuntfu loke wambona Babe, ngaphandle kwalowo lovela kuNkulunkulu; nguyena-ke lambonile Babe.
Ngicinisile, ngicinisile, ngitsi kini: Lowo lokholwako, unekuphila lokuphakadze.
Bokhokho benu badla imana ehlane, kodvwa bafa.
Lesi sinkhwa lesehla ezulwini, kuze wonkhe umuntfu asidle angabe asafa.
Mine ngisinkhwa lesinekuphila lesehla ezulwini, umuntfu nakadla lesinkhwa uyawuphila ingunaphakadze. Futsi-ke lesinkhwa, lengitasinikelela kuphila kwelive, siyinyama yami.”
EmaJuda aphikisana odvwana atsi: “Kodvwa lomuntfu angasinika kanjani inyama yakhe, kutsi siyidle?”
Jesu watsi kubo: “Ngicinisile, ngicinisile, ngitsi kini: Naningayidli inyama yeNdvodzana yeMuntfu, ninatse nengati yayo, nite kuphila.
Lodla inyama anatse nengati yami, unekuphila lokuphakadze; mine-ke ngemhla wekuphela ngiyawumvusa aphile.
Ngobe inyama yami ikudla sibili, nengati yami isinatfo sibili.
Njengobe Babe lophilako angitfumile, nami ngiphila ngaBabe, kanjalo-ke lodla mine, uyawuphila ngami.
Lesi-ke sinkhwa lesehla ezulwini, asifanani nesinkhwa lesadliwa bokhokho benu, babuye bafa. Lodla lesinkhwa uyawuphila kuze kube phakadze.”
Konkhe loko Jesu wakukhuluma asesinagogeni eKhaphanawume, afundzisa.
Kepha Jesu ati enhlitiyweni yakhe kutsi bafundzi bakhe bayakhonona ngalenkhulumo yakhe, watsi: “Kuyanenyanyisa yini loko?
Kepha niyawutsini nase nibona iNdvodzana yeMuntfu yenyuka iya lapho beyivele ikhona kucala?
Lokunika imphilo nguMoya; inyama ayinamsebenti; emavi lengiwakhuluma kini anguMoya, futsi akuphila.
Noko bakhona labanye lapha emkhatsini wenu labangakholwa.” Ngobe Jesu bekati kwasekucaleni kutsi bobani labangakholwa, nekutsi ngubani labetamtsengisa.
Wachubeka watsi: “Ngiko nje ngitsite kini: Kute longeta kimi, nangakakuphiwa nguBabe.”
Emvakwaloko labanyenti bebafundzi bakhe bamhlubuka, abazange baphindze bahambe naye.
Ngako Jesu watsi kulabo labebali-12: “Nani nifuna kuncandzeka yini?”
Nyalo sesiyati, futsi siyakholwa, kutsi wena unguLongcwele waNkulunkulu.”
Abekhuluma ngaJudasi, umsa waSimoni Skariyothi, ngobe nguye labetamtsengisa, naye futsi abengulomunye walabo labebali-12.
Emvakwaloko Jesu walihambahamba laseGalile; akatsandzanga kuya eJudiya, ngobe emaJuda abefuna kumbulala.
Bomnakabo batsi kuye: “Suka kulendzawo uye eJudiya, kuze bafundzi bakho batewubona lemisebenti yakho loyentako.
Kute lofihla lakwentako nakafuna kutsi atiwe. Njengobe wenta letintfo nje, tibonakalise wena kulo lonkhe live.”
Waphendvula Jesu watsi: “Sikhatsi sami asikefiki, kodvwa kini sonkhe sikhatsi silungile.
Live lingeke linitondze nine, kodvwa mine liyangitondza, ngobe ngifakaza ngalo kutsi imisebenti yalo mibi.
Nine yenyukani niye emkhosini, kepha mine ngingeke ngenyuke kwanyalo ngiye kulomkhosi, ngobe sikhatsi sami sisengakefiki.”
Watsi kube asho njalo, wachubeka wahlala eGalile.
Batsi kube benyuke baye emkhosini labomnakabo, yena-ke wanyenya, wenyuka abalandzela.
EmaJuda wona abetingelana naJesu lapha kulomkhosi, abutana odvwa atsi: “Uphi-ke yena?”
Kwaba nekuvungatela lokukhulu ngaye emkhatsini weticumbi. Labanye batsi: “Ulungile mosi lomuntfu,” labanye batsi: “Lomuntfu uyaganga, ngobe wedukisa bantfu.”
Noko bekute labekhulumela etulu, ngobe babesaba emaJuda.
Kwatsi sekungusekhatsi nemkhosi, Jesu wenyukela ethempelini, wacala wafundzisa.
EmaJuda amangala kakhulu, adzimate atsi: “Kodvwa lomuntfu lolwati lolungaka ulutsatsaphi, angazange asalufundzele nje?”
Umuntfu nakatsandza kwenta intsandvo yaNkulunkulu utakwati ngalemfundziso yami, nome iphuma kuNkulunkulu, nome ngitikhulumela kwami nje.
Lotikhulumela kwakhe ufuna ludvumo lwakhe, kepha lofuna ludvumo lwalowo lamtfumile, lowo ucinisile, futsi kute kungalungi kuye.
Mosi akaninikanga yini umtsetfo? Kodvwa kute namunye emkhatsini wenu lowulalelako lowo mtsetfo. Nentiwa yini lokutsi nifune kungibulala?”
Mosi waninika lisiko lekusoka, (noko kungasho kutsi liphuma kuye kodvwa kubokhokho benu), umuntfu niyamsoka nome kuliSabatha.
Nangabe-ke umuntfu niyamsoka ngeliSabatha, kuze phela ningawephuli umtsetfo waMosi, pho, ningitfukutselelelani-ke mine nangiphilisa umuntfu ngeliSabatha?
Ningabokwehlulela ngekubuka kwemehlo enu, kodvwa yehlulelani ngekwehlulela lokulungile!”
Ase nimbuke, ukhuluma nje ebaleni, akafihli, kute labamphikisa kuko. Kungahle kube kwentiwa kutsi baphatsi nabo sebayati yini kutsi lomuntfu vele unguKhristu?
Kodvwa Khristu nakefika, kute loyawumati kutsi uphuma kuphi, kepha lona siyamati mosi kutsi uphuma kuphi.”
Kodvwa mine ngiyamati yena, ngobe ngiphuma kuye, nguye longitfumile.”
Kodvwa labanyenti kulesicumbi bakholwa nguye batsi: “Nasefikile Khristu, uyakwenta tibonakaliso letinyenti letendlula leti letentiwe ngulona yini?”
BaFarisi beva sicuku sivungatela ngaye ngaletintfo.
Ngako baphristi labakhulu nebaFarisi base batfumela tinceku kutsi timbambe.
Jesu wase utsi: “Ngisetawuba nani kwesikhashana, bese ngiyahamba ngibuyela kulowo longitfumile.
Nitangifuna, kodvwa ngeke ningitfole, ngobe lapho ngiya khona, ningeke nine nikhone kuta.”
Ngako emaJuda ase akhuluma odvwana atsi: “Utakuya kuphi lapho singetimtfola khona? Kungabe utakuya kulabasakatekile bemaGriki ayewufundzisa bona yini?
Nkhulumo yini yona lena? Usho kutsini nakatsi: ‘Niyawungifuna ningete nangitfola;’ nalokutsi: ‘Lapho ngikhona, nine ningeke nikhone kuta’?”
Lokholwa ngimi, njengekusho kwemiBhalo, etibilinini takhe kuyawuhlala kugobhota imifula yemanti ekuphila.”
Jesu abekhuluma ngaMoya labebatawumemukela laba lababekholwa kuye, ngobe Moya abengakefiki, kwatise kutsi Jesu abesengakakhatimuliswa.
UmBhalo kawushongo yini kutsi: ‘Khristu uvela entalweni yaDavide, eBhetlehema lapho abehlala khona Davide’?”
Labanye babo babefuna kumbamba, kepha kwabate lowabeka sandla etikwakhe.
Tinceku tancandzeka tabuyela kubaphristi nebaFarisi, bona bafike batsi: “Yini ningakamletsi la kitsi?”
Nise nambona yini nobe munye nje webaholi nobe webaFarisi, akholwa kulomuntfu?
Lesicumbi asiwati umtsetfo, ngako-ke singaphansi kwesicalekiso saNkulunkulu!”
“Kodvwa ngekwemtsetfo wetfu umuntfu uyanikwa yini sigwebo angakaze abutwe kuvakale kahle kutsi cala lini lalentile?”
Bamphendvula batsi: “Wo, kantsi nawe uphuma eGalile yini? Asewuphenye kahle imiBhalo, utawukhandza kutsi akukho mphrofethi loyawuvela eGalile.”
Base bayahamba-ke, ngulowo nalowo watibuyelela ekhaya lakhe.
Ekuseni ngeluvivi wabuya weta ethempelini. Bantfu bonkhe beta kuye; wase uhlala phansi uyabafundzisa.
Kepha tati temtsetfo nebaFarisi baletsa kuye umfati labebambambe aphinga, beta bamfake ekhatsi.
Emtsetfweni Mosi wasiyala ngebantfu labanje kutsi bafanele bagcotjwe ngematje baze bafe. Wena-ke utsini?”
Phela bakusho loko bamlinga kuze babe nesizatfu sekummangalela, kepha Jesu wesuka wagobondzela wabhala ngemuno emhlabatsini.
Batsi nabakuva loko baphuma ngamunye ngamunye, kwacala labadzala kwaze kwaba wekugcina. Jesu wasala yedvwa, nalomfati abeseloku eme khona lapho.
Jesu waphakamisa inhloko watsi kulomfati: “Hhawu! Mfati, sebaphi kantsi laba bebatekumangalela? Sekute yini lokulahla ngelicala?”
Jesu watsi: “Nami-ke angikulahli. Hamba ungabe usona.”]
Nine nehlulela ngekwebuntfu, mine angehluleli muntfu.
Nome ngehlulela, kwehlulela kwami kungulokucinisile, ngobe angingedvwa kuloku, kodvwa ngikanye naBabe lowangitfuma.
Kubhaliwe emtsetfweni wenu kutsi bufakazi bebantfu lababili bucinisile.
Mine ngiyatifakazela, naBabe longitfumile futsi ufakaza ngami.”
Jesu wabaphendvula watsi: “Aningati mine, naBabe animati. Kube beningati mine, ngabe naBabe niyamati.”
Ngako emaJuda ase atsi: “Kungabe utatibulala yini, ngobe naku utsi: ‘Lapho ngiya khona mine, nine ningeke nikhone kuya’?”
Ngiko nje ngatsi kini: ‘Nitawufela etonweni tenu, naningakholwa kutsi: “Mine Nginguye leNginguye.” ’ ”
Base batsi kuye: “Ungubani?” Jesu wabaphendvula watsi: “Nguloko lenganitjela kona kwasekucaleni.
Nginalokunyenti lengingakusho ngani, nalenginganehlulela ngako. Noko, lona longitfumile ucinisile, nami live ngilitjela loko lengikuve kuye.”
Babengacondzisisi kahle kutsi ukhuluma kubo ngeYise.

Ngako Jesu wase utsi kubo: “Nase niyiphakamisile iNdvodzana yeMuntfu, nitakwati kutsi: ‘Mine Nginguye leNginguye;’ nekutsi futsi angenti lutfo ngekwami; kepha ngikhuluma loko, njengobe ngifundziswe nguBabe.
Lowo longitfumile unami; akangishiyi ngedvwa, ngobe sonkhe sikhatsi ngenta lokutsandzekako kuye.”
Labanyenti labamuva Jesu akhuluma letintfo bakholwa kuye.
Angitsi kambe sigcili asihlali endlini siphelane, kepha indvodzana ihlala siphelane ngobe yakhona.
Ngako-ke nangabe iNdvodzana inikhulula, nitawuba ngulabakhululekile sibili.
Ngiyati kutsi niyintalelwane ya-Abrahama. Kepha nifuna kungibulala, ngobe livi lami aliyitfoli indzawo etinhlitiyweni tenu.
Mine ngikhuluma ngaloko lengikubone kuBabe, nani-ke nenta loko lenikutjelwe nguyihlo.”
Jesu wabaphendvula watsi: “Kube benibantfwana ba-Abrahama ngempela, ngabe nenta imisebenti ya-Abrahama.
Kodvwa manje nifuna kungibulala mine lenginitjela liciniso lengilive kuNkulunkulu: Abrahama akazange asakwente loko.
Batsi kuye: “Tsine asisibo bekuphingwa, sinaBabe munye, nguNkulunkulu lucobo.”
Nentiwa yini kutsi ningete nayivisisa lenkhulumo yami? Kungobe niyehluleka kuliva livi lami.

Nine nibeyihlo Sathane. Nitsandza kwenta tinkhanuko teyihlo. Yena abevele angumbulali webantfu kusukela ekucaleni, akemi ecinisweni, ngobe liciniso kute kuye. Nakakhuluma emanga, ukhuluma intfo yakhe, ngobe ungumcambimanga neyise wawo onkhe emanga.
Ngubani nje emkhatsini wenu longangilahla ngesono? Pho, aningikholwa ngani, nanginitjela liciniso?
Jesu wabaphendvula watsi: “Anginadimoni mine, ngidvumisa Babe, nine-ke seniyangetfuka.
Mine-ke angifuni lwami ludvumo. Ukhona lolufunako nalowehlulelako.
Ngicinisile, ngicinisile, ngitsi kini: Nangabe umuntfu agcina livi lami, angeke akubone kufa nini nanini.”
EmaJuda atsi kuye: “Cha, sesibonile ngempela kutsi unelidimoni. Abrahama wafa, nebaphrofethi futsi bafa. Kepha wena utsi: ‘Lowo lowenta livi lami, angeke afe.’
Wena umkhulu yini kunababe wetfu Abrahama losewafa kanye nebaphrofethi lasebafa? Wena-ke ucabanga kutsi ungubani?”
Jesu wabaphendvula watsi: “Nangitidvumisa mine, ludvumo lwami lulite. NguBabe longidvumisako, lona lenitsi nani unguNkulunkulu wenu.
Uyihlo Abrahama wajabulela kubona lilanga lami. Walubona, wajabula.”
EmaJuda ase atsi kuye: “Usete neminyaka lengema-50 budzala, kepha sewusitjela kutsi sewubonane na-Abrahama?”
Jesu watsi endlula nje, wabona umuntfu labeyimphumphutse seloku atalwa.
Bafundzi bakhe bambuta batsi: “Mfundzisi, kwabangelwa sono sabani lokutsi lomuntfu atalwe ayimphumphutse? Sono sakhe yini nome sebatali bakhe?”
Kufanele sisebente imisebenti yalowo longitfumile, kusesemini; buyeta busuku, lapho kuyawubate loyawuba nemandla ekusebenta.
Watsi kuyo: “Hamba uyewugeza echibini laseSilowama!” (Lelibito lisho kutsi: “Utfunyiwe”.) Lendvodza yavele yahamba yayawugeza, yabuya seyibona.
Ngako bomakhelwane bayo kanye nebantfu nje lababeyibona ihleti icela kuphiwa, babutana batsi: “Lendvodza akusiyo yini lena beyihlalela kucela kuphiwa?”
Labanye batsi: “Ngiyo.” Labanye batsi: “Cha, akusiyo, kodvwa ufanana nayo.” Yena watsi: “Nginguye.”
Bambuta batsi: “Pho, emehlo akho avuleke kanjani?”
