Wabaphendvula watsi: “Lomuntfu lokutsiwa nguJesu, wente ludzaka walunindza emehlweni ami, wase utsi kimi: ‘Hamba uyewugeza eSilowama!’ Ngako-ke ngaya, ngageza, ngase ngiyabona.”
BekuliSabatha mhlazana Jesu enta loludzaka, avula emehlo alemphumphutse.
BaFarisi-ke bayibuta futsi lendvodza kutsi emehlo ayo avuleke kanjani. Yabatjela yatsi: “Unindze ngeludzaka emehlweni ami, ngageza, ngase ngiyabona.”
Noko emaJuda akazange ayikholwe kutsi beyiyimphumphutse, nekutsi seyitfole kubona. Badzimate babita batali bayo.
Bababuta batsi: “Lena yindvodzana yenu yini? Nisho kutsi seloku yatalwa beyingaboni? Pho, seyibona kanjani nyalo?”
Batali bayo baphendvula batsi: “Siyati kutsi lona uyindvodzana yetfu, nekutsi watalwa ayimphumphutse.
Kepha kutsi sewubona njani nyalo, nekutsi ngubani lovule emehlo akhe, asati. Butani yena, sewukhulile utatiphendvulela.”
Batali bakhe bakusho loko ngobe bebesaba emaJuda. Phela abesavumelene ngekutsi lotawufakaza kutsi Jesu unguKhristu, abeyawuncunywa esinagogeni.
Ngiko nje batali bakhe batsi: “Sewukhulile. Butani yena.”
Yona yatsi: “Kwekutsi usoni nome akasiso, angikwati; kepha kunye lengikwatiko, kutsi mine bengiyimphumphutse, kodvwa nyalo sengiyabona.”
Batsi kuye: “Wente njani kuwe? Uwavule njani emehlo akho?”
Yaphendvula yatsi: “Kadze nginitjela solomane ningeva. Nifunelani kuphindze nive? Niyafuna yini nani kuba bafundzi bakhe?”
Bametfuka batsi: “Nguwe umfundzi wakhe. Tsine sibafundzi baMosi.
Siyati kutsi Nkulunkulu wakhuluma kuMosi, kepha lona asimati nekutsi uphumaphi.”
Lendvodza yaphendvula yatsi: “Simangaliso-ke lesi, nine anati kutsi uphumaphi! Ingani emehlo ami uwavulile!
Siyati kutsi Nkulunkulu akativa toni; kodvwa nangabe umuntfu amesaba Nkulunkulu, ente intsandvo yakhe, lowo uyamuva.
Seloku kwadalwa umhlaba, akuzange sekuvakale kutsi ukhona lowake wavula emehlo emuntfu lowatalwa ayimphumphutse.
Kube lomuntfu abengaveli kuNkulunkulu, abengeke ente lutfo.”
Bayiphendvula batsi: “Wena watalelwa esonweni; wena futsi sewufundzisa tsine?” Base bayincuma esinagogeni labo.
Jesu weva kutsi bayincumile. Wahlangana nayo watsi kuyo: “Uyakholwa yini eNdvodzaneni yeMuntfu?”
Yaphendvula yatsi: “Nkhosi, ngitjele kutsi ingubani, kuze ngitewukholwa kuyo.”
Labo baFarisi lababelapho bamuva nakasho njalo, batsi kuye: “Pho, tsine sitimphumphutse yini?”
Umgadzi welisango uyamvulela lowo, netimvu tiyaliva livi lakhe. Takhe timvu utibita ngemabito ato atiholele ngephandle.
Nasaphume nato tonkhe utihola embili, tona timlandzele ngemuva, ngobe tiyalati livi lakhe.
Ngeke timlandzele lomunye umuntfu, kodvwa tiyawumbalekela; ngobe atiwati emavi ebafokati.”
Jesu wabatjela lomfanekiso, kodvwa bona abazange beve kahle kutsi kuyini loku labekukhuluma kubo.
Ngako Jesu waphindza watsi kubo: “Ngicinisile, ngicinisile, ngitsi kini: Mine ngilisango letimvu.
Bonkhe labefika kucala kunami bangemasela nebaphangi; kodvwa timvu atizange setibalalele.
Mine ngilisango, umuntfu nakangena ngami uyawusindziswa; uyawungena, aphume, akhandze lidlelo.
Lisela litela kweba, nekubulala, nekubhubhisa. Mine ngitele kwekutsi bantfu babe nekuphila; babe nako kuphuphume.
Umuntfu locashiwe, longesiye umelusi wetimvu, naletimvu kungesito takhe, nakabona imphisi ita, ushiya letimvu, abaleke, imphisi itisukele itihlakate.
Ngobe phela lomuntfu ucashiwe, ngako akatinakekeli letimvu.
Mine ngingumelusi lolungile, ngiyatati timvu tami, nato futsi tiyangati.
Njengobe naBabe uyangati, nami ngiyamati, ngidzela kuphila kwami ngenca yetimvu.
Nginaletinye timvu letingesito noko takulesibaya, nato futsi kufanele ngitiletse, titakuliva livi lami. Titawuba mhlambi munye tonkhe nemelusi munye.
“Ngaloko-ke Babe uyangitsandza, ngobe ngidzela kuphila kwami khona ngitawubuya ngikutsatse futsi.
Kute longangemuka kuphila kwami. Ngikubeka phansi mine ngekwami. Nginawo emandla ekukubeka phansi, newekuphindze ngikutsatse futsi. Nguloko lengikutfunywe nguBabe kutsi ngikwente.”
Lamanyenti awo atsi: “Unelidimoni! Uyahlanya! Nine nimlalelelani?”
Kodvwa labanye babo batsi: “Lamavi akusiwo emavi emuntfu lonelidimoni. Lidimoni lingawavula yini emehlo emphumphutse?”
Kwase kufika sikhatsi sekugubha uMkhosi Wekuhlanjululwa kweliThempeli eJerusalema, bekungusebusika.
Ase ayamkaka emaJuda atsi: “Kutawudzimate kube ngunini solomane usibambelela wena, ulibatisa tinhlitiyo tetfu? Nangabe unguKhristu sitjele ngalokuvakalako.”
Kodvwa nine anikholwa, ngobe vele anisibo betimvu tami.
Timvu tami tiyaliva livi lami, nami ngiyatati; tiyangilandzela.
Ngitinika kuphila lokuphakadze, futsi tingeke tisabhubha naphakadze, kute nalongatihlwitsa esandleni sami.
Babe longinike tona mkhulu kunabo bonkhe; kute longatitsatsa esandleni saBabe.
Jesu wawaphendvula watsi: “Minyenti imisebenti lengiyente embikwenu lengiyinikwe nguBabe. Ngumuphi-ke lona lenifuna kungigcobela wona ngalamatje?”
Wababita ngekutsi bonkulunkulu labo babenelivi laNkulunkulu, umBhalo ungeke uguculwe.
Mine ngingulowehlukaniselwe Babe, ngitfunywe nguye emhlabeni. Ningigwebelani ngekuhlambalata ngobe ngitsite: ‘NgiyiNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu’?
Nangabe angenti yona imisebenti yaBabe ningabongikholwa.
Kodvwa nangabe ngenta yona, nome ngabe anikholwa kimi, kholwani ngulemisebenti lengiyentako, kuze nitekwati, nihlale nati kutsi Babe uhlala kimi, nami ngihlala kuye.”
Bantfu labanyenti beta kuye batsi: “Ngempela Johane akazange asente nasinye sibonakaliso, kepha konkhe Johane lakusho ngalomuntfu kuliciniso.”
LoMariya bekungulona lowagcobisa tinyawo teNkhosi ngemakha watesula ngetinwele takhe. LoLazaro labegula-ke bekungumnakabo.
Bodzadzewabo base batfumela umlayeto kuJesu batsi: “Nkhosi, umngani wakho lomtsandzako uyagula.”
Jesu abebatsandza boMata nadzadzewabo kanye naLazaro.
Ngako-ke watsi kube eve kutsi uyagula, wachubeka wahlala emalanga lamabili lapho abekhona.
Kepha nakahamba ebusuku, uyakhutjwa, ngobe kute kukhanya kuye.”
Emvakwekusho njalo Jesu wachubeka watsi kubo: “Lazaro, sihlobo setfu, sewulele, kodvwa ngitakuya ngiyemvusa.”
Bafundzi bamphendvula batsi: “Nkhosi, nangabe ulele, utawusindza.”
Kepha Jesu abesho kutsi Lazaro sewufile; bona-ke bacabanga kutsi ulele butfongo.
Ngako Jesu wabatjela kahle kamhlophe watsi: “Lazaro sewufile.
Ngiyanitfokotela kwati kutsi bengingekho kuye, kuze nikholwe; kepha asambeni siye kuye.”
Nakefika Jesu, wakhandza kutsi sekuphele emalanga lamane Lazaro angcwatjiwe.
IBhetani beyisedvutane neJerusalema; kungaba ngemakhilometha lamatsatfu kusuka eJerusalema uye eBhetani.
EmaJuda lamanyenti abesetile kutawulilela boMata naMariya ngalokufa kwemnakabo.
Ngako Mata asevile kutsi Jesu uyeta, wahamba wayawumhlangabeta, kepha Mariya wasala afukeme.
Mata wakhuluma kuJesu watsi: “Nkhosi, kube mane bewukhona, ngabe umnaketfu akafi.
Kepha ngiyati kutsi nanyalo Nkulunkulu angakunika nobe yini longayicela kuye.”
Lowo lophila akholwe ngimi, angeke afe naphakadze. Uyakukholwa loku?”
Watsi kube asho njalo Mata, wahamba wayawubita Mariya ngasense watsi: “Sheshisa, uMfundzisi sewukhona, uyakubita.”
Nakakuva loko Mariya, wasukumela etulu waya kuye.
Jesu abesengakefiki kulowo muti, kodvwa abesakuleyo ndzawo lapho abehlangabetwe nguMata khona.
LamaJuda abefukeme kanye naMariya amlilela, amlandzela, nakambona asukuma aphuma ngekushesha; abecabanga kutsi uyawukhala ethuneni.
Mariya nakefika lapho bekunaJesu khona, wambona, watilahla phansi etinyaweni takhe watsi: “Nkhosi, kube mane bewukhona, ngabe umnaketfu akafi.”
Ngako Jesu nakambona akhala, nalamaJuda labefike naye akhala, wabibitseka, wadzabuka kakhulu.
Ngako emaJuda atsi: “Ase nibheke kutsi abemtsandza kangakanani!”
Ngako Jesu waphindze wabibitseka, wahamba waze wefika ethuneni. Belingumhume nje limbonywe ngelitje emnyango.
Mata, dzadzewabomufi, watsi: “Nkhosi, kutawunuka, ngobe sekwendlule emalanga lamane angcwatjiwe!”
Jesu watsi kuye: “Angikakutjeli yini kutsi nawukholwa utawubona inkhatimulo yaNkulunkulu?”
Base bayalisusa-ke lelitje. Jesu wabuka etulu watsi: “Ngiyabonga, Babe, ngobe ungivile.
Bengati mine kutsi uyangiva ngawo onkhe emalanga, kepha loko ngikukhulume ngenca yalabantfu labalapha, khona batekwati kutsi ngitfunywe nguwe.”
Asakushito loko, wamemeta ngelivi lelikhulu watsi: “Lazaro! Phuma!”
Umufi waphuma aboshwe tandla netinyawo ngetindvwangu, buso bakhe bumbonywe ngeliduku.
Kodvwa labanye babo besuka baya kubaFarisi, bafike babatjela ngako konkhe lakwentile Jesu.
Ngako baFarisi nebaphristi labakhulu bahlangana neLiqoqo batsi: “Senta njani? Lomuntfu wenta tibonakaliso letinyenti.
Nasimyekela achubeka ngalendlela, bonkhe bantfu batawukholwa kuye. EmaRoma atawufika abhidlite lendzawo atfumbe nesive sakitsi.”
Lomunye wabo labenguKhayafase angumPhristi Lomkhulu ngalowo mnyaka watsi kubo: “Anati lutfo nine!
Aniboni kutsi kunilungele kutsi kufe munye umuntfu, afele bantfu, kuze kutsi kungabhubhi sive sonkhe.”
Empeleni loko wakusho angatikhulumeli yena. Kepha njengemPhristi Lomkhulu ngalowo mnyaka waphrofetha kutsi Jesu abetawufela sive;
kungesiso sive kuphela, kepha kuze atekubutsela ndzawonye bantfwana baNkulunkulu, labasakateke nemhlaba wonkhe, babe munye.

Ngako-ke Jesu akabange asahamba ebaleni emkhatsini wemaJuda, kodvwa wesuka lapho, wahamba waya endzaweni lesedvute nelihlane, emtini lobitwa ngekutsi yi-Efrayimu, wayawutihlalela khona nebafundzi bakhe.
Babefuna Jesu, nasebahlangene ethempelini, babutana bodvwana batsi: “Nisho kutsi kambe aketi kulomkhosi?”
Baphristi labakhulu nebaFarisi base bakhipha simemetelo sekutsi nakukhona lowatiko lapho akhona Jesu, abobabikela, kuze batembamba.
Base bamentela kudla khona lapho. Mata abephakela kudla, Lazaro angulomunye walababedla naJesu.

Mariya watsatsa emakha labedule kakhulu, entiwe ngenadi; abengaba nesisindvo semagremu langema-340, wagcobisa tinyawo taJesu, wabuye watesula ngetinwele takhe. Liphunga lelimnandzi lalamakha latsaphuka nayo yonkhe lendlu.
Kepha Judasi Skariyothi, lomunye webafundzi bakhe, lona labetamtsengisa, watsi:
“Yini lamakha angakatsengiswa ngemaLangeni langema-300, kwaphiwa labamphofu lemali?”
Abesho loku, hhayi ngobe abevelana netimphuya kodvwa ngobe abelisela, angumgcinisikhwama, eba loko bekufakwa esikhwameni.
Kodvwa Jesu watsi: “Myekele, kuze atekuwalondvolotela lilanga lami lekungcwatjwa.
Labamphofu nihlala nabo ngaso sonkhe sikhatsi, kepha mine anihlali nami sonkhe sikhatsi.”
Kepha baphristi labakhulu benta emacebo ekubulala naLazaro;
ngobe ngenca yekuvuswa kwakhe emaJuda lamanyenti abesabahlubukile akholwa kuJesu.
Batsatsa emagala etihlahla telisundvu, baya bamhlangabeta, bamemeta batsi: “Hosana! Ubusisiwe lotako egameni leNkhosi! Yebo, uyiNkhosi yaka-Israyeli!”
Jesu wakhandza litfole lembongolo, waligibela, njengekusho kwemBhalo lotsi:
Besifakazile leso sicuku lesasinaye ngesikhatsi abita Lazaro, kutsi akaphume ethuneni, amvusa kulabafile.
Ngiko nje sicuku seta samhlangabeta, ngobe sase sivile kutsi Jesu wente lesibonakaliso.
Ngako baFarisi bakhuluma bodvwana batsi: “Niyabona yini kutsi shangatsi asenti lutfo; live lonkhe liyamlandzela lomuntfu!”
Bekukhona nemaGriki latsite emkhatsini walabo lababetewudvumisa kulowo mkhosi.
Wona-ke aya kuFiliphu waseBhethsayida laseGalile, afike atsi kuye: “Nkhosi, sicela kubona Jesu.”
Filiphu wahamba wayawutjela Andreya, base baya bobabili kuyawutjela Jesu.
Jesu wabaphendvula watsi: “Sesifikile sikhatsi sekutsi iNdvodzana yeMuntfu ikhatimuliswe.
Ngicinisile, ngicinisile, ngitsi kini: Inhlanyelo yakolo nayiwela emhlabatsini ingete yafa, ihlala iyodvwa; kepha nayifa, itsela titselo letinyenti.
Lowo lotsandza kuphila kwakhe, uyawulahlekelwa ngiko; nalowo lotondza kuphila kwakhe kulelive, uyawukulondvolotela kuphila lokuphakadze.
Lowo losikhonti sami akangilandzele, lapho ngikhona khona mine nesisebenti sami siyawuba khona. Losikhonti sami uyawutuswa nguBabe.”
Kusenjalo kwefika livi livela ezulwini litsi: “Sengilidvumisile, ngisetalidvumisa futsi.”
Bantfu lababeme lapho baliva lelivi bacabanga batsi: “Belidvuma.” Labanye batsi: “Ingilosi ikhulume kuye.”
Manje sesikhatsi sekwehlulelwa kwalelive, nembusi walelive sewutawucitfwa.
Mine nase ngiphakanyisiwe emhlabeni, bonkhe bantfu ngitabadvonsa bete kimi.”
Loko-ke wakusho akhombisa indlela labetawufa ngayo.
Kholwani kukhanya nisenako, kuze nitewuba bantfwana bekukhanya.”
Jesu watsi kube acedze lenkhulumo, wesuka kubo watifihla.
Kepha nome abetentile tibonakaliso letinyenti kangako embikwabo, abazange bakholwe kuye,
kuze kugcwaliseke livi la-Isaya umphrofethi lelitsi:
Ngako-ke abazange bakholwe, ngobe Isaya waphindze watsi:
Babetsandza kakhulu kudvunyiswa bantfu kunekudvunyiswa nguNkulunkulu.
Lowo lobona mine, ubona lowo longitfumile.
Ngite ngikukhanya emhlabeni, kuze kutsi wonkhe lokholwa ngimi angahlali ebumnyameni.
Umuntfu nakaweva emavi ami kepha angete awenta, angimehluleli; ngobe angiketeli kutakwehlulela live, kodvwa ngitele kutewulisindzisa.
Longalako, angawemukeli emavi ami, unemehluleli; livi lengilikhulumile liyawuba ngumehluleli wakhe ngemhla wekuphela.
Ngobe mine angikatikhulumeli ngekwami, kodvwa Babe, lokunguyena angitfumile, nguye longinike imiyalo yekutsi ngifanele ngitsini, ngikhulumeni.
Ngiyati kutsi imiyalo yakhe ikuphila lokuphakadze. Ngako-ke loko lengikushoko, ngikusho njengobe Babe angitjelile.”
Jesu ati kutsi uYise abesanikele konkhe etandleni takhe, nekutsi abephuma kuNkulunkulu, futsi aya kuNkulunkulu,
wasukuma etafuleni wakhumula ingubo yakhe, wabopha lithawula elukhalweni lwakhe.
Watsela emanti emgezelweni, wacala kugeza tinyawo tebafundzi bakhe, watesula ngelithawula labelivunule elukhalweni.
Wefika kuSimoni Phetro, yena watsi kuJesu: “Nkhosi, wena utawugeza tinyawo tami?”
Jesu wamphendvula watsi: “Kwanyalo awukakwati loku lengikwentako, kodvwa emvakwaloko utakwati.”
Phetro watsi kuye: “Nkhosi, ungeke ugeze tinyawo tami nekadzeni.”
Jesu wamphendvula watsi: “Nangingatigezi tinyawo takho, ute budlelwane nami.”
Simoni Phetro watsi kuye: “Nkhosi, akungabi tinyawo todvwa; ngigeze netandla nenhloko.”
Ngobe abati kutsi ngubani labetamtsengisa. Ngiko nje atsi: “Anikagezeki nonkhe.”
Ningibita ngeMfundzisi neNkhosi, nenta kahle, ngobe vele nginguko.
Nangabe-ke mine lengiyiNkhosi yenu neMfundzisi wenu, nginigeza tinyawo, nani-ke kufanele nigezane tinyawo.
Ngobe nginentele sibonelo, kuze nani nente njengobe nami ngentile kini.
Ngicinisile, ngicinisile, ngitsi kini: Sisebenti asisikhulu kunemcashi waso, nalowo lotfunyiwe akamkhulu kunalowo lamtfumile.
Nginitjela loku nyalo kusengakenteki, kuze kutsi nase kwenteka nikholwe kutsi ‘Nginguye leNginguye.’
Ngicinisile, ngicinisile, ngitsi kini: Lowo lowemukela nome ngubani lengimtfumile, wemukela mine; nalowo lowemukela mine, wemukela lowo longitfumile.”
Bafundzi babukana bodvwana badzidzekile kutsi ingabe ukhuluma ngabani.
Lomunye webafundzi labetsandvwa nguJesu abehleti edvute naye.
Ngako Simoni Phetro wamkhweba watsi: “Sitjele kutsi ngubani lona lakhuluma ngaye.”
Ngako-ke lomfundzi labehleti edvute naJesu watsi: “Nkhosi, ngubani lowo?”
Jesu wamphendvula watsi: “Ngulowo lengitamenyela lucetu lwesinkhwa ngimnike.”
Ngako-ke watsatsa lucetu lwesinkhwa, walwenya, walunika Judasi, umsa waSimoni Skariyothi.
Emvakwalolo lucetu, Sathane wase ungena kuJudasi. Jesu watsi kuye: “Loko lohlose kukwenta kwente masinyane.”
Kute kulaba lababesetafuleni lowati kutsi usho kutsini Jesu, nakasho njalo kuye.
Labanye bacabanga kutsi njengobe Judasi abengumphatsisikhwama, Jesu abetsi kuye akayewutsenga loko lababetakudzinga emkhosini, nome aphe timphuya lokutsite.
Judasi watsi kube alwemukele lolucetu lwesinkhwa, waphuma ngekushesha. Bekungusebusuku.
Nkulunkulu nakakhatimulisiwe kuyo, naye iNdvodzana yeMuntfu uyawuyikhatimulisa kuye; loko akwente masinyane.
Bantfwabami, ngisetawuba nani sikhashana. Nitangifuna, kodvwa njengaloku ngasho nakumaJuda nakini ngiyasho ngitsi: Lapho ngiya khona ningeke nine nikhone kuta.
Ngininika umyalo lomusha wekutsi: Njengobe nami nginitsandzile, nani tsandzanani.
Nanitsandzanako, bonkhe bantfu bayawunati kutsi nibafundzi bami.”
Jesu wamphendvula watsi: “Kwamanje ungeke ungilandzele lapho ngiya khona, kodvwa uyawungilandzela kamuva.”
Jesu wamphendvula watsi: “Usho kutsi wena ukulungele nekufa ngenca yami? Ngicinisile, ngicinisile, ngitsi kuwe: Lichudze litawutsi likhala, wena utawube sewungiphike katsatfu.”
Ekhaya laBabe kunetindlu letinyenti; ngisaya kunilungisela indzawo. Ngabe anginitjeli loko kube akunjalo.
Nase ngiyile nganilungisela indzawo, ngiyawubuya nginilandze, nite kimi, kuze kutsi lapho ngikhona nibe khona nani.
Niyayati indlela leya lapho ngiya khona.”
Tomase watsi kuye: “Nkhosi, asati lapho uya khona. Indlela singayati njani?”
“Kube beningati mine ngabe niyamati naBabe. Kepha kusukela manje niyamati, nimbonile.”
Filiphu watsi kuye: “Nkhosi, sibonise uYihlo, sitakweneliseka.”
Filiphu, awukholwa yini kutsi ngikuBabe, naBabe ukimi? Lamavi lengiwakhulume kini, angitikhulumeli mine, kodvwa Babe lohlala kimi nguye lowenta umsebenti wakhe ngami.
Ngikholweni kutsi ngikuBabe, naBabe ukimi. Nakungenjalo ngikholweni ngenca yalemisebenti.
Ngiyakwenta nome ngabe yini leniyicelako egameni lami, kuze inkhatimulo yaBabe ibonakaliswe eNdvodzaneni.
Nanicela nome yini kimi egameni lami, ngiyawunentela yona.”
Ngiyawucela kuBabe kutsi aniphe lomunye uMdvudvuti kutsi abe kanye nani kuze kube phakadze,
yena unguMoya weliciniso, live lelingeke limemukele, ngobe lingamboni futsi lingamati. Kodvwa nine niyamati, ngobe uhlala nani, futsi uyawuhlala kini.
Kodvwa sekusele sikhashana live lingabe lisangibona, noko nine niyawungibona, ngobe mine ngiphila, nani futsi niyawuphila.
Ngalelo langa nine niyakwati kutsi ngikuBabe nekutsi nine nikimi, njengobe nami ngikini.
“Lowo lonemiyalo yami futsi ayigcine, nguye-ke longitsandzako. Lowo lotsandza mine uyawutsandvwa nguBabe, nami ngiyawumtsandza ngitibonakalise kuye.”
Judasi, kungesiye Judasi Skariyothi, watsi kuye: “Nkhosi, utatibonakaliselani kitsi? Yini ungatibonakalisi eveni?”
Umuntfu longangitsandzi mine, akawagcini emavi ami. Lamavi leniwevile akasiwo emavi ami, kodvwa ngaBabe longitfumile.
Kepha uMeluleki, Moya Longcwele, Babe latamtfumela egameni lami, utanifundzisa konkhe, anikhumbute konkhe lenginitjele kona.
Ningivile ngitsi kini: ‘Ngiyahamba, kodvwa ngitawubuya ngite kini.’ Kube beningitsandza, ngabe niyajabula kutsi ngiya kuBabe, ngobe Babe mkhulu kunami.
Manje senginitjele loku ngaphambili kwekutsi kwenteke, kuze kutsi nakwenteka, nikholwe.
Angisenakukhuluma kabanti nani, ngobe nangu umbusi walelive aseta, akanamandla etikwami.
Kodvwa konkhe loku kwentekela kutsi live lati kutsi Babe ngiyamtsandza, nekutsi ngenta njengobe yena angiyalile.
Onkhe emagala lakimi langatseli titselo uyawajuba. Onkhe emagala latsela titselo uyawatsena, kuze atewutsela kakhulu.
Hlalani kimi nami kini. Njengobe ligala lingeke likwati kutsela titselo ngekwalo, kuphela nalihleti esicwini, kanjalo-ke nani kuphela nanihlala kimi.
Umuntfu longahlali kimi, uyawulahlwa ngephandle njengeligala, abune, ome, kufike bantfu batfote lamagala bayekuwabasa emlilweni, lapho afike ashe khona.
Nanihlala kimi nemavi ami ahlala kini, niyawucela lenikutsandzako, nikuphiwe.
Ludvumo lwaBabe lubonakaliswa ngaloko kutsi nitsele titselo letinyenti, nibe bafundzi bami.
Njengaloku Babe angitsandzile, nami nginitsandzile. Hlalani elutsandvweni lwami.
Nanigcina imiyalo yami, niyawuhlala elutsandvweni lwami, njengobe nami ngigcina imiyalo yaBabe, ngihlala elutsandvweni lwakhe.
Nankhu umyalo wami: ‘Tsandzanani, ngengobe nami nginitsandzile.’
Kute umuntfu lonelutsandvo lolukhulu kunalolu kwekutsi adzele kuphila kwakhe ngenca yetihlobo takhe.
Nine nitihlobo tami, nanenta loku lenginiyale ngako.

Kusukela manje angisete nganibita ngekutsi nitisebenti, ngobe phela sisebenti asati kutsi umphatsi waso wentani. Esikhundleni saloko nginibita ngekutsi nitihlobo tami, ngobe senginitjele konkhe lengikuve kuBabe.
Akusini lenangikhetsa, kodvwa ngimi lenganikhetsa nganitfuma kutsi nihambe nitsele titselo letinyenti, leto titselo time futsi, kuze kutsi nobe yini leniyakuyicela kuBabe egameni lami aniphe yona.
Kube benibelive, live belitanitsandza. Kodvwa anisibo belive, ngobe nganikhetsa eveni. Ngako-ke live liyanitondza.
Khumbulani livi lenganitjela lona kutsi: ‘Kute sisebenti lesikhulu kunemcashi waso.’ Nangabe mine bangihlupha, nani futsi bayawunihlupha; nangabe bawagcina emavi ami, newenu bayakuwagcina.
Kodvwa konkhe loku bayawukwenta ngobe nilivuma ligama lami, ngobe futsi bangamati nalona longitfumile.
Ngobe bebangeke babe nelicala lekona, kube angikefiki ngakhuluma kubo. Kodvwa nyalo sebate taba ngetono tabo.
Kube bengingakenti imisebenti lemikhulu lengazange seyentiwe ngumuntfu emkhatsini wabo, ngabe bate licala lesono, kodvwa manje sebangibonile base batondza naBabe.
Kodvwa noko, loko bekufanele kwenteke, kuze kutewugcwaliseka loko lokwabhalwa emtsetfweni wabo kwekutsi: ‘Bangitondza ngaphandle kwesizatfu.’
nani futsi nibofakazi bami, ngobe benisolo ninami kusukela ekucaleni.
Bayakunincuma emasinagogeni. Yebo, sikhatsi siyeta, lapho bayawunibulala, bacabange kutsi basebentela Nkulunkulu.
Bayawukwenta konkhe loku, ngobe bangamati Babe, nami bangangati.
Kodvwa nginitjela loku kuze kutsi, nase kufika sikhatsi sekutsi bakwente, nikhumbule kutsi nganitjela ngako.”
Manje sengibuyela kulowo lowangitfuma; kodvwa kute lapha emkhatsini wenu longibutako kutsi: ‘Uyaphi?’
Kodvwa njengobe senginitjelile nje, tinhlitiyo tenu setilusizi.
Kodvwa noko nginitjela liciniso: Kuncono kini kutsi ngihambe, ngobe nangingahambi, angeke ete kini uMeluleki. Kodvwa nangihamba, ngitamtfumela kini.
Nakefika yena, uyawukhanyisela bantfu balelive kutsi yini sono, nekulunga, nekwehlulela:
Kodvwa Moya weliciniso nakefika, uyawuniholela kulo lonkhe liciniso. Angeke atikhulumele kwakhe, kodvwa uyawukhuluma lakuvako, anitjele nangetintfo letisetakwenteka.
Uyawubonakalisa bukhosi bami, njengobe ayawutsatsa loko lengiyawumtjela kona kutsi anitjele.
Konkhe lanako Babe kwami, ngiko nje ngitsi: Moya uyakutsatsa loko lengiyakumnika kona anitjele.”
Babutana batsi: “Usho kutsini nakatsi: ‘Sikhashana’? Asati nje tsine kutsi ukhuluma ngani!”

Jesu bekati kutsi bafuna kumbuta, ngako-ke watsi kubo: “Senibutana ngaloku lengikushoko yini kwekutsi: ‘Kusetawuba sikhashana nje ningabe nisangibona; kantsi emvakwesikhashana nitawuphindze ningibone futsi’?
Ngicinisile, ngicinisile, ngitsi kini: Nitawukhala, nilile, kodvwa live litawujabula. Niyawuba nelusizi, noko lusizi lwenu luyawugucuka lube yinjabulo.
Nangabe umfati asatawubeleka, ubaselusizini, ngobe sikhatsi sebuhlungu sesifikile. Kodvwa nasambelekile umntfwana, ubukhohlwa bonkhe lobo buhlungu, ngobe ujatjuliswa kutalwa kwemntfwana.
Kunjalo-ke nakini, kwamanje niselusizini, kodvwa ngitawuphindze nginibone futsi, tinhlitiyo tenu tiyawujabula kakhulu. Kute futsi umuntfu loyakunemuka loko kujabula kwenu.
Sekuze ngunyalo anikaceli lutfo egameni lami. Celani nitawuphiwa, kuze kutfokota kwenu kuphelele.”
Ngalelo langa niyawucela ngelibito lami; angisho nekutsi ngiyawunicelela mine kuBabe.
Ngobe phela Babe ngekwakhe uyanitsandza, unitsandza ngobe niyangitsandza; futsi senikholiwe nekutsi ngiphuma kuNkulunkulu.
Ngaphuma kuBabe ngeta emhlabeni; manje sengiyawushiya futsi lomhlaba, sengibuyela kuBabe.”
Bafundzi bakhe batsi kuye: “Buka-ke manje, ngukhona ukhuluma kahle, sekuyacaca nje ngaphandle kwekukhuluma ngemifanekiso!
Manje sesiyati-ke kutsi wati konkhe; awudzingi kutsi umuntfu akubute imibuzo. Ngako-ke siyakholwa kutsi uphuma kuNkulunkulu.”
Siyeta sikhatsi, nanyalo sesifikile, lapho nonkhe nitawusakateka, ngulowo nalowo abuyele ekhaya lakhe. Nitangishiya ngedvwa; kodvwa noko angingedvwa, ngobe Babe unami.
Senginitjele loku, kuze nitewuba nekuthula kimi. Eveni niyawuhlupheka nibe nelusizi. Kodvwa manini sibindzi, ngobe mine ngilincobile live.”
Ngobe uyiphe emandla ngetulu kwabo bonkhe bantfu, kuze itebapha kuphila lokuphakadze bonkhe labo loyiphe bona.
Kuphila lokuphakadze nguloku: kutsi bakwati wena, Nkulunkulu longuye yedvwa weliciniso, bamati naJesu Khristu lomtfumile.
Babe, ngikudvumisile eveni ngekucedzela umsebenti lowanginika wona kutsi ngiwente.
Manje-ke, Babe, ngikhatimulise kuwe ngaleyo nkhatimulo lenganginayo ngisenawe, umhlaba ungakasekelwa.
“Ligama lakho ngilatisile kulabo longiphe bona. Babevele babakho, wangipha bona. Baligcinile livi lakho.
Manje-ke sebayati kutsi konkhe longinike kona kuphuma kuwe,
ngobe ngibanikile lamavi lowanginika wona, nabo bawemukela. Bayati kutsi kuliciniso kutsi ngaphuma kuwe. Bayakholwa futsi kutsi ngitfunywe nguwe.
“Ngiyabathandazela, Babe; angithandazeli lona live, kodvwa labo longiphe bona, ngobe babakho.
Bonkhe lababami bakho, nabo bonkhe lababakho bami; mine ngidvunyisiwe kubo.
Manje mine sengita kuwe; angisekho eveni, kodvwa bona baseseveni. Babe Longcwele, bagcine egameni lakho longiphe lona,
Ngisesenabo, ngabalondvolota egameni lakho lowangipha lona.
Ngibanikile livi lakho; live labatondza ngobe bangesibo belive, njengobe nami ngingesiye walelive.
Angiceli kutsi ubasuse eveni, kodvwa ngicela kutsi ubalondvolote bangatfunjwa nguLomubi.
Njengobe nami ngingesiye walelive, nabo abasibo balelive.
Tehlukanisele bona ngeliciniso babe bakho, livi lakho liliciniso.
Njengobe nawe wangitfumela eveni, nami ngibatfumela eveni.
Ngitinikela kuwe ngenca yabo, kuze nabo futsi babe bakho ngeliciniso.
“Angithandazeli laba bodvwa, kodvwa ngithandazela nalabo labayawukholwa kimi ngelivi labo.
Ngithandazela kutsi babe munye bonkhe, njengaloku wena, Babe, ukimi, nami ngikuwe, kuze kutsi nabo babe kitsi, khona live litawukholwa kutsi ngitfunywe nguwe.
Ngibanike kona loko kukhatimula lowanginika kona, kuze babe munye, njengobe tsine nawe simunye;
mine ngikubo, nawe ukimi, bapheleliswe ebunyeni, kuze live lati kutsi wangitfuma nekutsi nabo uyabatsandza, njengobe nami wangitsandza.
Babe lolungile, live alikwati wena, kodvwa mine ngiyakwati; nalaba bayati kutsi ngitfunywe nguwe.
Ngibatisile libito lakho, futsi ngisetawuchubeka ngente njalo, kuze kutsi lutsandvo longitsandze ngalo lube khona nakubo, nami ngibe kubo.”
Judasi, lowamtsengisa, naye bekayati leyo ndzawo. Phela Jesu abevamise kuhlanganela khona nebafundzi bakhe.

Ngako-ke Judasi wavele wacondza khona kuleyo ndzawo, ahamba nesicuku lesikhulu semasotja, nalabanye bogadzi belithempeli lababetfunywe baphristi labakhulu bakanye nebaFarisi. Babehlome tikhali, baphetse emalambu netidlwane.
Ngako Jesu, akwati konkhe lokwakutamehlela, wasondzela embikwabo watsi: “Nifuna bani?”
Kwatsi Jesu nakabaphendvula atsi: “Ngimi,” bakhwesha nyova, baze bawela phansi.
Jesu waphindza wababuta watsi: “Kantsi nifuna bani?”
Jesu watsi kubo: “Ingani nginitjelile ngatsi ngimi. Ngako-ke nangabe nifuna mine, bayekeleni bahambe laba!”
Jesu watsi kuPhetro: “Buyisela inkemba yakho esikhwameni sayo! Kantsi angisete ngayinatsa yini lendzebe yelusizi lengiyinikwe nguBabe?”
Kwekucala bammikisa ku-Anasi, ngobe abenguyisetala waKhayafase, labengumPhristi Lomkhulu kulowo mnyaka.
Bekunguye, yena loKhayafase, lowayala emaJuda kutsi bekufanele kufe umuntfu munye, afele bonkhe bantfu.
Simoni Phetro nalomunye umfundzi babeloku balandzela Jesu. UmPhristi Lomkhulu abemati kahle lona lomunye umfundzi. Ngako-ke wangena naJesu ngekhatsi esibuyeni sendlu yemPhristi Lomkhulu.

Phetro yena bekeme ngephandle nje eyeme umnyango. Ngako lomfundzi lomunye labatiwa ngumPhristi Lomkhulu, wancandzeka waphuma wakhuluma nentfombatana leyayingasemnyango ingugonsa, yase iyamngenisa-ke naPhetro.
Lentfombatana yabuta Phetro yatsi: “Awusiye yini lomunye webafundzi balomuntfu?”
Kwakumakhata, ngako-ke tisebenti kanye nabogadzi bese babase umlilo wemalahle bawutungeletile botsa, naPhetro wema kanye nabo, wotsa umlilo.
UmPhristi Lomkhulu wabuta Jesu ngebafundzi bakhe nangetimfundziso takhe.

Jesu wamphendvula watsi: “Ngikhulume ebaleni ngikhuluma nemhlaba wonkhe. Ngato tonkhe tikhatsi bengifundzisa emasinagogeni nasethempelini, lapho kubutsana khona onkhe emaJuda. Angizange sengikhulume lutfo emasitseleni.
Manje, ungibutelani-ke? Buta kulabantfu bebangiva. Ubabute kutsi bengibatjela kutsini, ngobe bayakwati konkhe loku bengibafundzisa kona.”
Asakhuluma loko Jesu, lomunye wabogadzi labesedvutane naye wammukula ngemphama watsi: “Uphendvula umPhristi Lomkhulu nawusho nje?”
Jesu wamphendvula watsi: “Nangikhulume kabi, shano phela kutsi ngitsiteni; kodvwa nangikhulume liciniso, ungishayelani?”
Ngako Anasi watfumela Jesu asaboshiwe kuKhayafase, umPhristi Lomkhulu.
Kodvwa Phetro wakuphika loko watsi: “Cha, angisiye.”
Lomunye wetigcili temPhristi Lomkhulu, labesinini salona lowahhunjulwa nguPhetro indlebe, wambuta watsi: “Angikubonanga yini unaye engadzeni?”
Waphindza waphika Phetro. Masinyane nje lichudze lakhala.
Ngako-ke Philatu waphuma, waya kubo, wababuta watsi: “Cala lini lalentile lomuntfu?”
Bamphendvula batsi: “Kube lomuntfu abete licala, ngabe asikamletsi lapha kuwe.”
Loku kwenteka kuze kutewugcwaliseka livi laJesu lalisho, nakachaza indlela labetawufa ngayo.
Jesu wamphendvula watsi: “Ngekwakho lombuzo usuka kuwe yini, nome kukhona labakutjele kona ngami?”
Philatu waphendvula watsi: “NgingumJuda yini mine? Sive sakini nebaphristi bakini labakhulu labakuletse la kimi. Wenteni wena?”
Jesu waphendvula watsi: “Uyasho wena kutsi ngiyiNkhosi. Mine ngatalelwa kona loko, futsi ngetela kona loko kulomhlaba kuze ngifakazele liciniso. Lowo loweliciniso uyaliva livi lami.”
Emvakwekusho njalo Philatu waphindze waphuma, waya kumaJuda, watsi kuwo: “Angilitfoli licala kulomuntfu.
Kodvwa ngelisiko lenu kufanele nginikhululele siboshwa sinye njalo ngeliPhasika. Nginganikhululela yini inkhosi yemaJuda?”
Bamphendvula bamemeta batsi: “Hhayi lowo! Sifuna Bharaba!”
Emasotja eluka umchele lonemanyeva, awugigela enhloko yaJesu, amembatsisa umjiva lobovu webukhosi,
amphukuta, eta kuye afike atsi: “Bayethe! Nkhosi yemaJuda!” Ammukula ngetimphama.
Ngako-ke Jesu waphuma asatfwele umchele wemanyeva, embetse umjiva lobovu webukhosi. Philatu watsi kubo: “Bukani! Nangu lomuntfu!”
Batsi kube bambone baphristi labakhulu nabogadzi, bamemeta batsi: “Mbetsele esiphambanweni! Mbetsele esiphambanweni!”
Philatu watsi kubo: “Mtsatseni nine nimbetsele esiphambanweni, mine angilitfoli licala kulomuntfu!”
Philatu nakabeva basho njalo, wesaba kakhulu.
Wancandzeka futsi wangena endlini, watsi kuJesu: “Wena uphumaphi?”
Philatu watsi kuye: “Awutikhulumeli kimi? Utsi uyati nje kwekutsi ngimi lenginemandla ekukukhulula newekukubetsela esiphambanweni?”
Jesu wamphendvula watsi: “Ngabe kawunamandla etikwami kube bewungakawabelwa ngetulu. Kepha lona longinikele kuwe nguye lonelicala lelikhulu.”
Nakeva loko Philatu, wamkhiphela ngephandle loJesu, wahlala esihlalweni sekwehlulela, endzaweni lekwakutsiwa: Yindzawo Leyilwe Ngematje. (NgesiHebheru yiGabhatha).
Lelo langa bekulemalungiselelo eliPhasika. Ngeli-awa leli-12 emini Philatu wakhuluma kumaJuda watsi: “Nanso inkhosi yenu!”
Bamemeta kakhulu batsi: “Msuse! Msuse! Mbetsele esiphambanweni!”
Philatu wababuta watsi: “Ngibetsele inkhosi yenu esiphambanweni?”
Baphristi labakhulu bamphendvula batsi: “Site tsine lenye inkhosi ngaphandle kwaKhesari!”
Waphuma etfwele siphambano sakhe, waze wefika endzaweni lekutsiwa yiNdzawo yeSikobho, ngesiHebheru kutsiwa yiGolkotha.
Bafike bambetsela esiphambanweni, khona kuleyo ndzawo. Base babetsela lamanye emadvodza lamabili etiphambanweni, lenye ngesekudla nalenye ngesancele, Jesu asemkhatsini wawo.
Philathu wabhala satiso lesashayelwa esiphambanweni sitsi: “JESU, WASENAZARETHA, INKHOSI YEMAJUDA.”
EmaJuda lamanyenti akufundza loko, ngobe lendzawo labebetselwe kuyo Jesu beyisedvutane kakhulu nelidolobha. Lesatiso sasibhalwe ngelulwimi lwesiHebheru nesiLatini kanye nesiGriki.
Baphristi labakhulu bemaJuda batsi kuPhilatu: “Awusikubhala utsi: ‘Inkhosi yemaJuda’; kodvwa tsani: ‘Lendvodza yatsi: “Ngiyinkhosi yemaJuda.” ’ ”
Emasotja akhuluma odvwana atsi: “Asingayisiki, kodvwa asente inkatho sitewubona kutsi itawuba yabani.” Loko kwenteka kuze kutewugcwaliseka umBhalo lotsi:
Jesu wabona unina nemfundzi labekamtsandza beme khona lapho, ngako wase utsi kunina: “Make, nanso indvodzana yakho!”
Watsi kulomfundzi: “Buka la, nango unyoko!” Kusukela ngaleso sikhatsi lomfundzi watsatsa lonina waJesu wayawuhlala naye ekhaya kakhe.
Watsi kube alemukele leliwayini Jesu, wase utsi: “Kuphelele.”
Wagebisa inhloko yakhe, wakhulula umoya wakhe, wafa.
Ngako-ke emasotja afike ephula imilente yendvodza yekucala, neyalena lenye futsi leyayibetselwe kanye naJesu.
Kodvwa batsi nabefika kuJesu, babona kutsi sewuvele ufile, ngako-ke bangabe basayephula imilente yakhe.
Lomunye wemasotja wagwaza Jesu emhlubulweni, masinyane nje kwageleta emanti nengati.
Lona lowakubona loko wafakaza ngako. Siyati futsi kutsi loko labekusho kuliciniso, futsi naye uyati kutsi ukhuluma liciniso, kuze nani nitewukholwa.
Ngobe loko kwenteka kuze kugcwaliseke umBhalo lotsi:
Nikhodemu, lona loweta kutawubonana naJesu ebusuku, wahamba kanye naJosefa. Nikhodemu abephetse emakha, labeyinhlanganisela yemure nenhlaba, labenesisindvo lesasingaba ngemakhilogremu langema-32.
Basitsatsa-ke sidvumbu saJesu, basigocotela ngetindvwangu telineni, basifaka nemakha njengelisiko lemaJuda lekungcwaba.
Kuleyo ndzawo lapho abebetselwe ngakhona Jesu bekunengadze. Kulengadze bekunelithuna lelisha, lebekungazange sekungcwatjwe umuntfu kulo.
Ngako-ke Jesu bamngcwaba kulelithuna lelalisedvute, ngobe kwakulilanga lekulungiselela liSabatha.
Masinyane waya kuSimoni Phetro, wamkhandza analomfundzi labetsandvwa nguJesu, wafike wabatjela watsi: “Sebayitsatsile iNkhosi ethuneni; asati kutsi bayibeke kuphi!”
Phetro nalomfundzi lomunye besuka, baya ethuneni.
Bobabili bagijima, kodvwa lona lomunye umfundzi wagijima kakhulu kunaPhetro, wafika kucala ethuneni.
Wagobondzela, wahlola, ekhatsi wabona tindvwangu telineni, noko akangenanga ekhatsi.
Emvakwakhe wefika naSimoni Phetro, yena wangena ekhatsi ethuneni. Watibona tindvwangu telineni tifutjatwe phansi,
kanye nalena leyayigigelwe enhloko yaJesu. Yona beyingekho kanye naleti letinye; yayigocotwe yodvwana.
Lona lomunye umfundzi labefike kucala, wase uyangena naye ethuneni, wabona, wakholwa.
Noko babenguloku bangawucondzisisi kahle umBhalo lowawutsi kufanele avuswe ekufeni.
Kepha Mariya wema edvute nelithuna akhala; asachubeka akhala wahlola ngekhatsi ethuneni.
Wabona tingilosi letimbili tembetse lokumhlophe tihleti lapho bekunesidvumbu saJesu khona, lenye ingasenhloko, lenye ingasetinyaweni.
Watiphendvula watsi: “Sebatsetse iNkhosi yami, angati nekutsi bayibeke kuphi!”
Jesu wambuta watsi: “Make, ukhalelani? Ufuna bani?”
Masinyane acabanga kutsi ngumlindzi wengadze, watsi kuye: “Nkhosi, nangabe utsetfwe nguwe, ngilayele lapho umbeke khona, ngitakuya ngimlandze.”
Wagucuka wasabela ngesiHebheru watsi: “Rabhuni,” lokusho kutsi: “Mfundzisi.”
Ngako Mariya waseMagdala wahamba wayawutjela bafundzi baJesu watsi: “Ngiyibonile iNkhosi;” washo nekutsi imtjele loko.
Asababingelele wabakhombisa tandla takhe nemhlubulo wakhe. Bafundzi bakhe bajabula kakhulu, nabayibona iNkhosi.
Jesu waphindza futsi watsi kubo: “Kuthula akube kini! Njengaloku Babe angitfumile mine, nami ngiyanitfuma.”
Watsi kube asho njalo, wabaphefumulela watsi: “Yemukelani Moya Longcwele.
Nome ngubani lenimtsetselela tono, utsetselelwe; kantsi futsi nome ngubani leningamtsetseleli tono, akatsetselelwa.”
Ngako-ke laba labanye bafundzi base bayamtjela batsi: “Siyibonile iNkhosi.”
Kodvwa yena watsi kubo: “Ngaphandle kwekutsi ngibone emanceba etipikili etandleni takhe, ngifake umuno wami lapho bekunetipikili khona, ngifake nesandla sami emhlubulweni wakhe, ngeke ngikholwe.”
Kwatsi sekwendlule liviki bafundzi bakhe bandzawonye futsi kuyona leyondlu, naTomase akhona, iminyango ikhiyiwe, Jesu wefika wema emkhatsini wabo, watsi: “Kuthula akube kini!”
Jesu watsi kuTomase: “Faka umuno wakho la, ubone tandla tami; welule nesandla sakho, usifake emhlubulweni wami. Khawula kungakholwa, kodvwa bani ngulokholwako!”
Tomase waphendvula watsi: “Nkhosi yami, Nkulunkulu wami!”
Leti tibhalelwe kutsi nitewukholwa kutsi Jesu unguKhristu, iNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu, nekutsi ngekukholwa kwenu nibe nekuphila ngelibito lakhe.
Emvakwaloko Jesu waphindza watibonakalisa futsi kubafundzi bakhe ngaseLwandle lwaseThibheriyase. Loko wakwenta kanje:
Simoni Phetro, naTomase, lotsiwa liPhahla, naNathanayeli waseKhana laseGalile, nemadvodzana aZebedi, nalabanye bafundzi baJesu lababili, bonkhe laba babendzawonye.
Ngako bahamba bekhwela esikebheni; kodvwa ngabo bonkhe lobo busuku abazange sebabambe lutfo.
Latsi naliphuma lilanga, Jesu wema elusentseni lwemanti; kodvwa bafundzi abatanga kutsi nguJesu.
Jesu watsi kubo: “Bantfwana, kute yini tinhlanti lenitibambile?”
Labanye bafundzi beta ngesikebhe, babesedvutane nesihlabatsi, kwakungacishe kube tinyatselo letilikhulu. Badvonsa linetha ligcwele tinhlanti letinyenti.
Batsi nabefika esihlabatsini, babona umlilo wemalahle ubasiwe etikwawo kunenhlanti kanye nesinkhwa.
Jesu watsi kubo: “Letsani letinye tinhlanti kuleto lenitibambile!”
Simoni Phetro waya esikebheni, wadvonsa linetha lekudweba, lelaligcwele tinhlanti letinkhulu, tatili-153. Nome-ke tatitinyenti kangako, kodvwa linetha alizange lidzabuke.
Jesu watsi kubo: “Wotani nitewudla.” Emkhatsini wabo bafundzi kwabate ngisho namunye lowaba nesibindzi sekumbuta kutsi: “Wena kambe ungubani?” Bavele batatela nje kutsi yiNkhosi.
Jesu waya kubo, wafika watsatsa sinkhwa, wabanika, wachubeka wenta njalo futsi nasetinhlantini.
Waphendvula watsi: “Yebo, Nkhosi, uyati kutsi ngiyakutsandza.”
Waphindza Jesu watsi kuye: “Simoni, msa waJohane, uyangitsandza yini?”
Watsi kuye: “Yebo, Nkhosi, uyati kutsi ngiyakutsandza.”
Waphindza futsi kwesitsatfu wambuta watsi: “Simoni, msa waJohane, uyangitsandza yini?”
Phetro wadzabuka enhlitiyweni yakhe, ngobe Jesu abesambute katsatfu atsi: “Uyangitsandza yini?” Phetro wamphendvula watsi: “Nkhosi, wati konkhe nje wena, uyati kutsi ngiyakutsandza.”

Ngicinisile, ngicinisile, ngitsi kuwe: Ngesikhatsi usemusha, wawuvele ubophe libhande lakho uye lapho utsandza khona, kodvwa nase umdzala uyakwelula tandla, lomunye akubophe, akutsatse, akuyise lapho ungatsandzi khona.”
Phetro nakabona lomfundzi, watsi kuJesu: “Nkhosi, lomuntfu lona-ke?”
Jesu wamphendvula watsi: “Nangifuna kutsi aphile, ngidzimate ngibuye, kukuhlupha ngani wena loko? Wena landzela mine!”

Ngako kwabe sekwandza inkhulumo emkhatsini webafundzi baJesu kutsi lomfundzi angeke afe. Kodvwa Jesu abengazange asasho kutsi lomfundzi angeke afe; watsi: “Nangifuna kutsi aphile, ngidzimate ngibuye, kukuhlupha ngani wena loko?”
Encwadzini yami yekucala ngabhala ngako konkhe Jesu lacala kukwenta nekukufundzisa,
kwaze kwaba lilanga latsatfwa ngalo mhlazana aya ezulwini. Angakenyukeli ezulwini wanika imiyalo ngemandla aMoya Longcwele kubaphostoli labebakhetsile.

Emvakwekuhlupheka kwakhe kwaphela emalanga langema-40 avukile ekufeni. Wativeta kubo ngetindlela letinyenti letaticinisa ngalokungangabateki kutsi uyaphila; wabonwa ngabo akhuluma kubo ngembuso waNkulunkulu.
Kwatsi nase bahlangene ndzawonye, wabanika umyalo lotsi: “Ningesuki eJerusalema, kodvwa hlalani nimele sipho lenetsenjiswa sona nguBabe, lenganitjela ngaso.
Johane wabhabhatisa ngemanti, kodvwa emvakwemalangana nine nitawubhajatiswa ngaMoya Longcwele.”
Kodvwa nine nitawugcwaliswa ngemandla, nasefikile kini Moya Longcwele, niyawuba bofakazi bami eJerusalema, naseJudiya lonkhe, naseSamariya, kuze kube ngusekugcineni kwemhlaba.”
Babeloku babukisisile etulu nakahamba, kwase kubonakala emadvodza lamabili embetse letimhlophe eme eceleni kwabo.
Atsi kubo: “Madvodza aseGalile, nimeleni nibuke etulu? LoJesu, lotsetfwe lapha kini wayiswa ezulwini, uyawubuya futsi ngayo yona leyo ndlela njengobe nimbonile nje aya ezulwini.”
Baphostoli besuka eNtsabeni Yemincumo babuyela eJerusalema, kulibangana nje lelingaphansana kancane kwelikhilometha.

Sebefikile eJerusalema baya bangena endlini leyayisetulu lapho babengenise khona. BekuboPhetro, naJohane, naJakobe, na-Andreya, naFiliphu, naTomase, naBhatalomewu, naMatewu, naJakobe, umsa wa-Alfiyose, naSimoni labekatiwa ngekutsi ngumZelothi kanye naJudasi, umsa waJakobe.
Bonkhe laba bacinisela njalo nganhlitiyo yinye ekukhulekeni nasekuncuseni kunye, kanye nebafati naMariya, unina waJesu, nabomnakaboJesu.
Kulawo malanga kusahlangene emakholwa labengaba li-120 asawonkhe, Phetro wasukuma watsi:
“Madvodza, bazalwane, umBhalo bewufanele ugcwaliseke njengekusho kwaMoya Longcwele, lowakhuluma kadzeni ngaDavide macondzana naJudasi, lowahola labo lababopha Jesu.
Judasi abengulomunye wetfu, ngobe naye abekhetsiwe kutsi abe nalakwentako kulomsebenti.
Bonkhe lababehlala eJerusalema bakuva loko, ngako-ke ngelulwimi lwabo lendzawo base bayibita ngekutsi: ‘Yi-Akheldama’, lokusho kutsi: ‘Yindzawo Yengati’.
“Ngako-ke kufanele kukhetfwe lomunye walamadvodza besishuca nawo sehla senyuka sisenaJesu iNkhosi,
kusukela embhabhatisweni waJohane kuze kube lilanga lekutsatfwa kwakhe emkhatsini wetfu, abe ngufakazi kanye natsi ngekuvuka kweNkhosi Jesu.”
Ngako-ke bazalwane base bancoma emagama emadvodza lamabili: Josefa, labebitwa ngekutsi nguBhasabasi (nome nguJustusi) kanye naMathiyasi.
Base bayathandaza batsi: “Nkhosi, wena lowati tonkhe tinhlitiyo tebantfu, sikhombise kutsi ngubani lomkhetsile kulaba lababili
kutsi atsatse sikhundla sekuba ngumphostoli ente lomsebenti loshiywe nguJudasi waya lapho abewakhona.”
Base benta inkatho emkhatsini walabo bobabili. Inkatho yadla Mathiyasi, wase uyengetwa kulabaphostoli labesebali-11.
Batsi betfuka kwabe kuchamuka umsindvo lomkhulu esibhakabhakeni lowevakala sengatsi kuhhusha kwemoya lomkhulu, wagcwalisa yonkhe lendlu babehleti kuyo.
Kwabonakala kubo inkhehlenkhehle yemlilo kusengatsi yetilimi letehlukana ekhatsi, tahlala emuntfwini ngamunye ngamunye.
Bonkhe bagcwaliswa ngaMoya Longcwele; base bakhuluma ngaletinye tilimi, njengobe Moya wabapha kuphumisela.
Kwakukhona emaJuda labehlala eJerusalema, bantfu lababesaba Nkulunkulu bavela etiveni tonkhe temhlaba.
Kwatsi kube kuvakale lomsindvo, ticumbi tebantfu tabutsana ndzawonye. Bamangala badzidzeka bonkhe, ngobe ngulowo nalowo wabeva bakhuluma ngelulwimi lwakubo;
babutana ngekwetfuka nangekumangala batsi: “Kantsi akusibo baseGalile bonkhe yini labantfu labakhuluma kanje?
Pho, kwentiwa yini kutsi sonkhe sibeve bakhuluma ngetilimi takitsi?
Siphuma ePhathiya, eMediya nase-Elamu, eMesophothamiya, eJudiya naseKhaphadosiya, ePhontusi nase-Asiya,
eFrigiya nasePhamfiliya, eGibhithe kanye nasetifundzeni taseLibhiya ngaseSirene, kantsi labanye betfu baphuma eRoma,
emaJuda nebetive lababephendvukele enkholweni yemaJuda, nalabanye betfu baphuma eKhrethe nase-Arabiya, kodvwa sonkhe lapha sibeva ngetilimi takitsi bakhuluma ngemisebenti lemikhulu yaNkulunkulu.”
Basamangele badzidzekile babutana bodvwana batsi: “Kusho kutsini loku?”
Kodvwa labanye bahlekisa ngawo lamakholwa batsi: “Labantfu badzakiwe.”
Kodvwa Phetro wasukuma akanye nebaphostoli labali-11, wakhuluma ngelivi lelikhulu watsi: “Sive semaJuda, nani nonkhe lenakhile eJerusalema, yatini loku; bekani indlebe ningilalele kahle.
Laba abakadzakwa njengaloku nicabanga nine; empeleni kusesekuseni ngeli-awa lemfica.
Kodvwa loku nguloko lokwakhulunywa ngumphrofethi Joweli lowatsi:
Nkulunkulu ngekwatinchanti kwakhe nangentsandvo yakhe abesakumisile kutsi Jesu uyawuniketwa kini; nine-ke nambulala ngekumbetsela esiphambanweni ngetandla tetoni.
Kodvwa Nkulunkulu wamvusa kulabafile; wamkhulula etinhlungwini tekufa, ngobe kwakungeke kwenteke kutsi kufa kumbambe.
Njengemphrofethi-ke ati futsi kutsi Nkulunkulu abetsembisile ngesifungo kuye kutsi uyawukhetsa lomunye wesitukulwane sakhe amente abe yiNkhosi njengaye.
Davide abekubone kucala kuvuka kwaKhristu ekufeni nakatsi:
Asaphakanyiselwe ngasesandleni sekudla saNkulunkulu wemukeliswa nguYise setsembiso lesinguMoya Longcwele lebesetsenjiswe Yena, wabuye wamtfululela kitsi. Ngiko loku lenikubonako nalenikuvako.
NaDavide lucobo lwakhe akenyukelanga ezulwini, noko watsi:
Ngobe setsembiso saNkulunkulu senu nesebantfwabenu kanye nabo bonkhe labakhashane, lowo nalowo loyawubitwa nguNkulunkulu, iNkhosi yetfu, kutsi ete kuye.”
Labo labalemukela livi lakhe babhajatiswa; babengacishe babe ti-3 000 tebantfu letengetelwa kubo ngalelo langa.
Bacinisela njalo bahlanganyela etimfundzisweni tebaphostoli, nasebudlelwaneni, nasekuhlephuleni sinkhwa, nasemithandazweni.
Bonkhe bantfu befikelwa kwesaba: timangaliso netibonakaliso letinyenti tentiwa baphostoli.
Bonkhe labakholwako bachubeka ngebudlelwane ndzawonye, benetisana ngetimphahla tabo.
Batsengisa ngetitandi, nangemapulazi nangetimphahla tabo bentela kwenetisana ngaleyo mali, kuye ngekutsi lowo nalowo udzingani.
Onkhe emalanga babecinisela njalo ekuhlanganeni ethempelini, banhlitiyonye, babevakashelana emakhaya, badle ndzawonye ngetinhlitiyo letijabulako naletitfobekile,
badvumisa Nkulunkulu, babetsandzeka kubo bonkhe bantfu. Onkhe emalanga iNkhosi yayibengetela ngalabo babesindziswa.
Ngalelinye lilanga boPhetro naJohane baya ethempelini ntsambama ngeli-awa lesitsatfu, ngesikhatsi semkhuleko.

Kwakukhona indvodza letsite leyayisishosha seloku yatalwa. Yayihleti endzaweni lekutsiwa “Intfunja Lenhle”. Yayetfwalwa onkhe emalanga ibekwe ngasentfunjeni yentele kucela kubantfu lababengena ethempelini.
Yatsi nayibona boPhetro naJohane bangena, yacela kutsi bayiphe noma ngayini lababengahle bayiphe kona.
Bayibukisisa, Phetro watsi kuyo: “Ase ubuke ngala ngakitsi.”
Phetro watsi kuyo: “Anginamali, kodvwa ngitakunika loko lenginako: Ngelibito laJesu Khristu waseNazaretha ngitsi kuwe: Sukuma uhambe!”
Wase uyibamba ngesandla sangasekudla ayisita kutsi isukume. Masinyane tinyawo tayo nemacakala ayo acina.
Yesuka emankayi yaya etulu, yema ngetinyawo tayo, yahamba, yangena ethempelini kanye nabo, ihamba isuka emankayi idvumisa Nkulunkulu.
Bonkhe bantfu bayibona seyihamba idvumisa Nkulunkulu;
batsi nase babone kahle kutsi ngiyo lendvodza lebeyihlala ngase “Ntfunjeni Lenhle” yelithempeli, bamangala kakhulu ngaloko lokwase kwentekile.
“Madvodza aka-Israyeli, kunimangaliselani loku, nisigolotelelani kangaka? Nicabanga kutsi kungebungcwele betfu yini nome ngemandla etfu yini kutsi sente lomuntfu wahamba?

Nkulunkulu wa-Abrahama na-Isaka naJakobe, Nkulunkulu wabokhokho, usikhatimulisile Sisebenti sakhe lesinguJesu, lenamniketa etiphatsimandleni, namlahla embikwaPhilatu, namala nome Philatu asatimisele kumkhulula.
Abengcwele alungile, kodvwa namala, namlahla, esikhundleni sakhe nacela Philatu kutsi anikhululele sigelekece.
Ngako nabulala uMtfombo Wemphilo. Kodvwa Nkulunkulu wamvusa kulabafile, tsine-ke sibofakazi baloko.
Ligama laJesu nekukholwa egameni lakhe lokucinise lendvodza leniyibonako naleniyatiko; nekukholwa lokungaJesu kunike imphilo lephelele kulomuntfu, njengobe nani nibona nje.
Nkulunkulu wakumemetela kucala ngabo bonkhe baphrofethi kutsi Khristu abefanele kuhlupheka; nembala loko sekugcwalisekile ngalendlela.
Ngako, phendvukani, nibuyele kuNkulunkulu, kuze esule licala letono tenu,
kuze kufike tikhatsi Nkulunkulu ahlumelelise imiphefumulo yenu ngekutfumela Jesu longuKhristu, lanikhetsela yena kucala.
Kufanele ahlale ezulwini kuze kufike sikhatsi lapho konkhe kuyakwentiwa kube kusha, njengobe Nkulunkulu amemetela emandvulo ngebaphrofethi bakhe labangcwele.
NaMosi watsi: ‘INkhosi, Nkulunkulu wenu, iyawunitfumelela umphrofethi, njengobe nami angitfuma, loyawuba wesive sakini. Nibolalela konkhe latanitjela kona.
Lowo longalaleli loko lokushiwo ngulowo mphrofethi uyakwehlukaniswa nesive saNkulunkulu abhujiswe.’
Nebaphrofethi bonkhe lababenelivi njengaSamuweli nalabeta emvakwakhe, bamemetela ngawo lamalanga.

Tetsembiso taNkulunkulu ngebaphrofethi bakhe ngetenu, ninesabelo nani kulesivumelwane lesentiwa nguNkulunkulu kubokhokho benu. Washo naku-Abrahama watsi: ‘Ngesitukulwane sakho ngiyawubusisa bonkhe bantfu emhlabeni.’
Ngako Nkulunkulu wasikhetsa wasitfuma Sisebenti sakhe kini kucala kutenibusisa ngekunenta nonkhe niphendvuke nitishiye tindlela tenu tekonakala.”
Babecansulwe ngulabaphostoli, ngobe bebafundzisa bantfu kutsi Jesu wavuswa ekufeni, lokufakaza kutsi nalabafile bayawuvukela ekuphileni.
Ngako bababopha babafaka ejele kwaze kwaba ngakusasa, ngobe lase lishonile lilanga.
Kodvwa labanyenti labaliva livi bakholwa; emadvodza andza acishe aba ti-5 000.
Ngakusasa baholi bemaJuda, netibondza tenkholo yemaJuda, netati temtsetfo bahlangana eJerusalema.
Bahlangana na-Anasi labengumPhristi Lomkhulu, naKhayafase, naJohane, na-Alekzanda, nelusendvo lwemPhristi Lomkhulu.
Baphostoli babemisa embikwabo bababuta batsi: “Loku nikwente ngamaphi emandla nome ngaliphi ligama?”
lamuhla nasibutwa ngaloku lokuhle lesikwente kulesishosha nekutsi siphile kanjani,

kufanele nonkhe nati, nabo bonkhe bantfu baka-Israyeli bafanele bati, kutsi lomuntfu ume lapha embikwenu aphile saka ngemandla elibito laJesu Khristu waseNazaretha, lenambetsela, kodvwa Nkulunkulu wamvusa ekufeni.
Emalunga aleLiqoqo letiphatsimandla amangala kubona sibindzi saboPhetro naJohane, nekubona kutsi babebantfukatana nje labebangakafundzi. Bavele babona kutsi babehamba naJesu.
Kodvwa kwakute lababengahle bakusho, ngobe babeyibona nalendvodza leyayiphilisiwe ime eceleni kwebaphostoli.
Base bacela kutsi bake baphumele ngephandle, basale bakhuluma bodvwana.
Kodvwa kuze siyicitse lendzaba, ingandzi la kubantfu, asibafice, sibatjele kutsi bangaphindzi bakhulume nome kukubani ngelibito laJesu.”
Kodvwa boPhetro naJohane babaphendvula batsi: “Nine ngekwenu ake senisho kutsi ngukuphi lokulungile ebusweni baNkulunkulu, kulalela nine yini nome kulalela Nkulunkulu?
Ngako singeke tsine siyekele kukhuluma ngaloko lesikubonile nalesikuvile.”
Liqoqo lelo labaficisisa kakhulu, lase liyabakhulula, ngobe alisitfolanga sizatfu sekubajezisa, ngobe bonkhe bantfu bebadvumisa Nkulunkulu ngaloko lebekwentekile.
Lendvodza lebekwentiwe kuyo lesibonakaliso sekuphiliswa yayineminyaka lengetulu kwema-40 budzala.
Batsi kube bakhululwe, boPhetro naJohane babuyela kubazalwane, bafike babatjela lokwakushiwo baphristi labakhulu netibondza takhona.
Kwatsi kube bakuve loko, bahlangana ndzawonye bathandaza kuNkulunkulu batsi: “Somandla, Mdali welizulu, nemhlaba, nelwandle, nako konkhe lokukuwo!
NgaMoya Longcwele wakhuluma ngakhokho wetfu Davide, inceku yakho, mhlazana utsi:
Bahlangana benta konkhe loko, wena ngemandla nentsandvo yakho, wawuvele ukumisenchanti kutsi kwenteke.
Yelula sandla sakho uphilise, uvume kutsi tibonakaliso netimangaliso tentiwe ngelibito leSisebenti sakho lesiNgcwele lesinguJesu.”
Ngemandla lamakhulu baphostoli banika bufakazi ngekuvuka kweNkhosi Jesu, naNkulunkulu wehlisela imvula yetibusiso etikwabo bonkhe.
Akekho namunye emkhatsini wabo labeswele. Lababenemapulazi nome tindlu bakutsengisa, base baletsa lemali lebabeyitfolile,
bayinika baphostoli kutsi babehlukanisele bonkhe, kuye ngekweswela kwabo.
watsengisa ngensimi yakhe waletsa imali, wayetfula kubaphostoli.
Kwakukhona indvodza libito layo kungu-Ananiyase, umkayo kunguSafira, leyatsengisa ngendzawo,
kodvwa yatigodlela lenye imali, nemkayo abekwati loko, yase iletsa lena lenye kubaphostoli.
Phetro watsi kuyo: “Ananiyase, umvumeleleni Sathane kutsi abuse inhlitiyo yakho akwente ucale emanga kuMoya Longcwele ngekugodla incenye yalemali leyintsengo yalendzawo?

Ngaphambi kwekutsi uyitsengise lendzawo bekungesiyo yakho yini? Nasewuyitsengisile beyingekho yini emandleni akho? Pho, utimiseleleni enhlitiyweni yakho kwenta intfo lenje? Awukacali emanga kubantfu kodvwa kuNkulunkulu.”
Watsi nakeva lamavi Ananiyase washayeka phansi wafa; bonkhe labeva ngalesehlo besaba kakhulu.
Emajaha aphutfuma, asisonga sidvumbu sakhe, asikhiphela ngephandle, asingcwaba.
Emvakwema-awa lamatsatfu umkakhe wangena, kodvwa abengati ngalokwentekile.
Phetro watsi kuye: “Ngitjele, ngulena kuphela yini imali leniyitfolile nendvodza yakho ngekutsengisa lendzawo yenu?” Waphendvula watsi: “Yebo, ngulena kuphela.”

Phetro watsi kuye: “Hhawu, nitimiseleleni nalendvodza yakho ngekulinga Moya weNkhosi? Lamajaha labengcwaba indvodza yakho asalapha emnyango, lo ngikhuluma nje nawe, atakutfwala akukhiphele ngephandle.”
Masinyane Safira washayeka phansi ngasetinyaweni taPhetro, wafa. Angena futsi emajaha abona kutsi sewufile, asayamtfwala amkhiphela ngephandle amngcwaba eceleni kwendvodza yakhe.
Libandla lonkhe nalabanye bonkhe nabeva loku bafikelwa kwesaba lokukhulu.
Kwabate namunye lowaba nesibindzi sekuhlanganyela nabo, lite nome bantfu babebadvumisa kangaka.
Kodvwa lesicuku sabo sengeteka kakhulu ngebantfu labakholwa eNkhosini, labadvuna nalabasikati.
Ngemiphumela yaloku, lokwakwentiwa baphostoli, labagulako babetfwalwa ngemibhedze nangemacansi babekwe emigwacweni kuze kutsi loPhetro nakendlula, mane nje sitfunti sakhe sihambe etikwabo.
Ticumbi ngeticumbi tebantfu teta eJerusalema tiphuma emadolobheni labesedvutane, tiletse labagulako nalababehlushwa bomoya lababi; bonkhe baphiliswa.
kodvwa kwatsi ebusuku ingilosi yeNkhosi yavula iminyango yelijele, yabahola yabakhiphela ngephandle, yatsi kubo:
“Hambani niye ethempelini, nitjele bantfu bonkhe ngalemphilo lensha.”

Baphostoli balalela, ekuseni ngeluvivi bangena ethempelini bafundzisa. UmPhristi Lomkhulu nabo bonkhe labenabo babita tonkhe tibondza temaJuda kutsi kube nemhlangano weLiqoqo; batfumela kutsi kulandvwe baphostoli baletfwe embikwabo.
Kodvwa tatsi natifika tinceku, takhandza baphostoli bangekho ejele; ngako tabuyela emuva tayawubika loko kuleLiqoqo tatsi:
“Nasifika lapha ejele sikhandze likhiyiwe nabogadzi bagadze eminyango; kodvwa nasivula asikakhandzi muntfu ngekhatsi!”
Nasikuva loko siphatsimandla lesiphetse bogadzi belithempeli, nebaphristi labakhulu nabakuva loko, bamangala kutsi ngabe kwentekeni kubaphostoli.
Basemangele kwefika indvodza yatsi kubo: “Lalelani la! Lamadvodza beniwafake ejele sikhuluma nje aphishekile afundzisa bantfu ethempelini.”
Ngako lesiphatsimandla sahamba netinceku taso, sefike satsatsa baphostoli sababuyisa. Kodvwa ababaphocanga ngenkhani, ngobe babesaba kutsi bantfu babengahle babagcobe ngematje.
Baletsa baphostoli babemisa embikweLiqoqo, umPhristi Lomkhulu wabagweba ngemibuzo.

Watsi: “Saniyalisisa kutsi ningafundzisi ngelibito lalomuntfu, kodvwa ase nibuke lesenikwentile! Senisakate lemfundziso yenu yaze yagcwala lonkhe lelidolobha laseJerusalema, senifuna kutsi sibe nelicala ngekufa kwakhe!”
Nkulunkulu wabokhokho betfu wamvusa loJesu ekufeni, emvakwekuba senimbulele ngekumbetsela esiphambanweni.
Nkulunkulu wamenyusela ngasesandleni sakhe sekudla njengeMholi neMsindzisi, kuze anike bantfu baka-Israyeli litfuba lekuphendvuka, kutsetselelwe tono tabo.
Sibofakazi baletintfo tsine naMoya Longcwele, losipho saNkulunkulu kulabo labamlalelako.”

Kepha lomunye wabo, umFarisi labenguGamaliyeli, abengumfundzisi wemtsetfo kantsi futsi abehlonishwa kakhulu bantfu bonkhe, wasukuma wema embikwaleLiqoqo, wacela kutsi baphostoli sebakhishelwe ngephandle kwesikhashana.
Wase ukhuluma kuleLiqoqo utsi: “Madvodza aka-Israyeli, caphelisisani ngaloko lenifuna kukwenta kulamadvodza.

Kuleta tikhatsi letendlula kwake kwachamuka Thoyidasi, watibeka embili ngekutsi ungumuntfu lomkhulu; bantfu labangema-400 bamlandzela. Kodvwa wabulawa, kwase kutsi bonkhe balandzeli bakhe basakateka, kwaba kuphela kwakhe njalo.
Emvakwaloko, kwavela Judasi abengumGalile ngesikhatsi selubalo; naye wadvonsa sicumbi lesikhulu sebantfu samlandzela, kodvwa wabulawa naye, kwase kutsi balandzeli bakhe bayasakateka.
Manje-ke kulendzaba, ase nginitjele naku: Ningacali nitsatse sinyatselo sekumelana nalabantfu. Bayekeleni bahambe, ngobe nangabe loluhlelo nalomsebenti wabo kuyintfo leyentiwa ngumuntfu, kutawuphela;
kodvwa nangabe kuphuma kuNkulunkulu, ningeke nibehlule. Nitatikhandza kutsi senilwa naNkulunkulu.”
Base bangenisa baphostoli, babashaya babayala futsi kutsi bangaphindzi bakhulume ngelibito laJesu, base bayabakhulula.
Bachubeka bafundzisa onkhe emalanga ethempelini nasemitini yebantfu bashumayela liVangeli lekutsi Jesu nguKhristu.
EmaJuda lakhuluma siGriki asola kutsi bafelokati bawo babenganakwa ekwenetisweni kwemihla ngemihla.
Ngako-ke baphostoli labali-12 babita umhlangano, bahlanganisa sonkhe sicumbi sebafundzi batsi: “Akukafaneli kutsi tsine siyekele kushumayela livi laNkulunkulu bese siyawuphatsa timali.
Ngako-ke, bazalwane, khetsani emkhatsini wenu emadvodza lasikhombisa leniwatiko kutsi aneludvumo loluhle nalagcwele Moya Longcwele nekuhlakanipha, ngawo-ke lesitakuwanika aphatse lomsebenti.
Tsine-ke, sitakutinika sikhatsi lesenele emthandazweni nasemsebentini wekushumayela livi.”
Lesicumbi sabaletsa kubaphostoli, babathandazela bababeka tandla.

Kodvwa labanye bantfu lababemphikisa babengemalunga elisinagoge leBantfu Labakhululiwe, lalilemaJuda labephuma eSirene nase-Alekzandriya. Bona nalamanye emaJuda aseSilisiya nase-Asiya bacala baphikisana naStefano.
Kodvwa Moya wanika Stefano kuhlakanipha kangangobe abetsi nakakhuluma behluleke nekumphikisa.
Ngako-ke base batsenga lamanye emadvodza kutsi afike atsi: “Simvile lomuntfu ahlambalata Mosi naNkulunkulu!”
Ngalelicebo labo benta kutsi bonkhe bantfu, netibondza, netati temtsetfo timvukele kamatima. Bamdvumela Stefano, bambamba, bammikisa embikweLiqoqo letiphatsimandla.
Base baletsa bantfu bekutsi bamcalele emanga, batsi: “Onkhe emalanga lomuntfu ukhuluma kabi ngelithempeli lelingcwele nangemtsetfo.
Ngobe samuva atsi, loJesu waseNazaretha utawubhidlita lithempeli, agucule onkhe emasiko lesawatfola kuMosi.”
Bonkhe lababehleti phansi kuleLiqoqo letiphatsimandla bambukisisa Stefano, babona kutsi buso bakhe base bufana nebengilosi.
UmPhristi Lomkhulu wabuta Stefano watsi: “Ngabe kunjalo yini?”
Stefano waphendvula watsi: “Bazalwane, nani bobabe, lalelani kimi! Nkulunkulu weludvumo wabonakala kukhokho wetfu Abrahama asahlala eMesophothamiya, asengakatfutsi kuyakwakha eHarani,
watsi kuye: ‘Suka ushiye lusendvo lwakini nelive lakini uye eveni lengiyawukukhombisa lona!’
Wesuka-ke kulelive lemaKhaledi waya eHarani. Asafile uyise, Nkulunkulu wamsusa Abrahama wamletsa kulelive, lona leli lenakhe kulo.

Nkulunkulu akamnikanga Abrahama lendzawo kutsi ibe yakhe, ngisho neligajana nje lemhlaba imbala; kepha Nkulunkulu wetsembisa kutsi uyawumnika lelive libe lakhe netitukulwane takhe emvakwakhe. Ngalesikhatsi Nkulunkulu enta lesetsembiso Abrahama abengenamntfwana.
Nkulunkulu watsi kuye: ‘Titukulwane takho tiyawuhlala eveni letive, lapho tiyawuba tigcili khona tiphatseke kabuhlungu, kuze kuphele iminyaka lengema-400.
Kodvwa ngiyakusehlulela leso sive lesiyawube sibagcilata, emvakwaloko bayawusuka baphume kulelo live bete batengikhonta kulendzawo.’
Nkulunkulu wanika Abrahama lisiko lekusoka, kwaba sibonakaliso sesivumelwane. Ngako Abrahama watala Isaka, wamsoka ngemvakweliviki atelwe; na-Isaka wasoka Jakobe, naJakobe wasoka bokhokho labali-12.

wamsindzisa kuto tonkhe tinhlupheko takhe. Josefa watsi nakema embikwaFaro, inkhosi yaseGibhithe, Nkulunkulu wamnika umoya lomuhle nekuhlakanipha. Faro wamenta umbusi etikwalo lonkhe laseGibhithe nasetikwendlu yakhe yonkhe.
Kwase kuba khona indlala kulo lonkhe laseGibhithe naseKhenani, leyaletsa kuhlupheka lokukhulu. Nabokhokho kwabaphelela kudla.
Ngako-ke watsi Jakobe nakeva kutsi kukhona kudla eGibhithe, watfumela emadvodzana akhe, labokhokho betfu, kutsi aye khona kwekucala.
Nase babuyela eGibhithe kwesibili, Josefa wase uyativeta kubomnakabo, kulapho-ke naFaro acala khona kulwati lusendvo lwakuboJosefa.
Ngako-ke Josefa watfumela umlayeto kuyise Jakobe, ambita kutsi akete nendlu yakhe yonkhe eGibhithe; sebabonkhe labo bantfu babengema-75.
Wehla-ke Jakobe waya eGibhithe, lapho yena nabokhokho betfu, bahlala khona baze bafa.
Tidvumbu tabo tamikiswa eShekhemu, lapho tangcwatjwa khona edlizeni lelalitsengwe ngu-Abrahama ngemali esiveni saHamori eShekhemu.
Ekugcineni lenye inkhosi leyayingamati Josefa yacala kubusa eGibhithe.
Yacala yasihlupha sive sakitsi, yaba nelulaka kubokhokho betfu, ibaphoca ngekutsi ibalahlise tinswane tabo, khona phela titewufa.
Ngiso-ke lesikhatsi latalwa ngaso Mosi, labengumntfwana lotsandzekako kuNkulunkulu. Wakhulela ekhaya tinyanga letintsatfu.
Kwatsi nasasusiwe ekhaya lakubo iNkhosatana yaFaro yamtsatsa, yamfaka esiswini sayo yamkhulisa imphatsa njengendvodzana yayo.
Mosi wafundziswa yonkhe inhlakanipho yemaGibhithe, waba lijaha leliyindvodza leyayinemandla ekukhulumeni nasetentweni.
Wabona lomunye wabo ashaywa ngumGibhithe; wase uvikela lowakubo, wamkhiphela sibhongo ngekubulala lomGibhithe.
Abecabanga kutsi emaJuda, bantfu bakubo, abetakubona kutsi Nkulunkulu utawusebentisa yena ekuwakhululeni kulobugcili; kodvwa wona akakubonanga loko.
Ngakusasa wabona ema-Israyeli lamabili alwa, wetama kuwalamula. Watsi kubo: ‘Madvodza, lalelani la, nine nibandzawonye, nibangani?’
Kodvwa lona abeshaya lomunye wakhweshisa Mosi watsi: ‘Ngubani losakwente waba ngumbusi nemehluleli etikwetfu wena?
Sewufuna kungibulala nami, njengalomGibhithe lombulele itolo?’
Watsi nakuva loko Mosi wabaleka eGibhithe waye wahlala njengesihambi eveni lakaMidiyani. Watalela khona emadvodzana lamabili.
Mosi wamangala ngaloko lakubona, asasondzele madvutane kuyawubukisisa lesihlahla lesasivutsa weva livi leNkhosi litsi:
‘NginguNkulunkulu wabokhokho bakho, Nkulunkulu wabo-Abrahama, na-Isaka, naJakobe.’ Mosi wavevetela entiwa kwesaba, wehluleka nekusibukisisa kahle.
INkhosi yase itsi kuye: ‘Khumula tincabule etinyaweni takho, ngobe lendzawo lome kuyo ingcwele.
Ngibukile ngabona kuhlupheka kwesive sami eGibhithe. Sengikuvile kukhala nekububula kwaso, sengehlile kutasisindzisa. Wota-ke manje, ngitekutfumela eGibhithe.’
Wabahola wabakhipha bantfu eGibhithe, enta timangaliso netibonakaliso eGibhithe naseLwandle Lolubovu, elugwadvule nasehlane iminyaka lengema-40.
Nguye loMosi lowatsi kubantfu baka-Israyeli: ‘Nkulunkulu uyawunitfumelela umphrofethi, njengobe angitfuma nami, uyawuba ngumuntfu wesive sakini.’
Ngako base batsi ku-Aroni: ‘Sentele titfombe letitawuhamba embikwetfu. Asati kutsi sewudliwe yini loMosi lowasikhipha eGibhithe.’
Ngulapho-ke benta khona sitfombe lesaba nesimo lesinjengeselitfole, base banikela imihlatjelo kuso, benta lidzili badvumisa lobekungumsebenti wetandla tabo.
Kodvwa Nkulunkulu wabashiya basale bakhonta tinkhanyeti tasezulwini, njengobe kubhaliwe encwadzini yebaphrofethi kutsi:
Emvakwaloko, bokhokho betfu labemukela lelithende kuboyise babo baletfwala bahamba nalo naJoshuwa, balitsatsa lelive Nkulunkulu lacosha letinye tive kulo. Baligcina kwaze kwaba sikhatsi saDavide.
Davide watsandzeka kuNkulunkulu, wase ucela kuNkulunkulu kutsi amvumele kube amakhele indlu leyawusetjentiswa titukulwane taJakobe,
Kodvwa loNkulunkulu Losetikwako Konkhe akahlali etindlini letakhiwe ngetandla, njengekusho kwemphrofethi lotsi:

Ukhona nje yena munye umphrofethi longazange ahlushwe bokhokho benu? Babulala titfunywa taNkulunkulu, letatimemetela ngembili ngekufika kweSisebenti sakhe lesilungile. Manje senimtsengisile nambulala.
Ningibo labemukela umtsetfo waNkulunkulu, lowendluliselwa tingilosi kini, nawo anizange seniwulalele!”
Kodvwa Stefano agcwele Moya Longcwele, wabuka ezulwini wabona bukhatikhati baNkulunkulu, naJesu eme ngasesandleni sekudla saNkulunkulu.
Bamemeta kakhulukati bavala tindlebe tabo, bamtselekela bonkhe kanyekanye,
bamhudvulela ngephandle kwelidolobha, bamgcoba ngematje. Bofakazi babeka timphahla tabo phansi kutsi tigadvwe lijaha lelalibitwa ngekutsi nguSawula.
Basachubeka bamgcoba ngematje Stefano, wakhala ngelivi lelikhulu watsi: “Nkhosi Jesu, yemukela umoya wami.”
Lamanye emadvodza lakholwako asingcwaba sidvumbu saStefano; akhala kakhulu amlilela.
Filiphu waya edolobheni laseSamariya ayawushumayela ngaloKhristu kubantfu bakhona.
Sicumbi sebantfu salalela nganhlitiyo yinye loko kwakukhulunywa nguFiliphu, sabona netimangaliso labetenta.
Bomoya lababi babephuma kubantfu bakhala kakhulu; bonkhe lababefe tinhlangotsi nalababechuta nabo baphiliswa.
Bonkhe bantfu, betinhlobo tonkhe, babembukisisa bese batsi: “Ungemandla ankulunkulu latiwa ngekutsi: ‘Ngemandla Lamakhulu.’ ”
Abesabamangalise ngemilingo yakhe sikhatsi lesidze kangangekutsi base bambukisisa.
Kodvwa kwatsi nase bakholwa yinshumayelo yaFiliphu ngeliVangeli lembuso waNkulunkulu nangelibito laJesu Khristu, babhajatiswa, labadvuna nalabasikati.
NaSimoni matfupha wakholwa; emvakwekubhajatiswa kwakhe wahlala njalo asedvute kwaFiliphu, wamangala nakabona letimanga letinkhulu kanye netibonakaliso labetenta.
Baphostoli eJerusalema beva kutsi bantfu baseSamariya balemukele livi laNkulunkulu; ngako batfumela boPhetro naJohane kubo.
Nase befikile, bawathandazela emakholwa kutsi emukele Moya Longcwele.
Phela Moya Longcwele abesengakehleli nome kumunye nje wabo; bebabhajatiselwe egameni leNkhosi Jesu kuphela.
Ngako boPhetro naJohane babeka tandla etikwabo, base bemukela Moya Longcwele.
Watsi Simoni nakabona kutsi Moya bamemukele ngekubekwa tandla baphostoli, wakhipha imali afuna kuyinika boPhetro naJohane,
watsi: “Nami nginikeni lamandla, kuze kutsi nami lowo lengibeka tandla etikwakhe emukele Moya Longcwele.”
Awunasabelo nalifa kulomsebenti, ngobe inhlitiyo yakho ayikalungi emehlweni aNkulunkulu.
Ngako, phendvuka kulelichinga lakho lelibi, uthandaze eNkhosini kutsi ikutsetselele ngekucabanga intfo lembi kangaka.
Ingani ngiyabona kutsi ugcwele umona, kantsi usiboshwa sesono.”
Simoni watsi kuPhetro naJohane: “Ngiyacela kutsi ningithandazele eNkhosini, khona tingetikwenteka kimi letintfo lenitishoko.”
Emvakwekufakaza nekushumayela livi leNkhosi boPhetro naJohane babuyela eJerusalema, bahamba bashumayela liVangeli emitini leminyenti yaseSamariya.
Ingilosi yeNkhosi yakhuluma kuFiliphu yatsi: “Tilungiselele kuya endleleni leseNingizimu lesuka eJerusalema yehlele eGaza.” (Lendlela ilihlane).
asabuyela ekhaya agibele inkalishi abefundza encwadzini yemphrofethi Isaya.
Moya Longcwele watsi kuFiliphu: “Sondzela kulenkalishi uhambe eceleni kwayo!”
Nangempela Filiphu wagijima wasondzela, weva umTopiya afundza incwadzi yemphrofethi Isaya, wase uyabuta Filiphu utsi: “Uyakuva yini loku lokufundzako?”
Waphendvula watsi: “Ngingeva kanjani kute longichazelako nje?”
Wase ucela yena Filiphu kutsi agibele ahlale eceleni kwakhe.
Siphatsimandla satsi kuFiliphu: “Ngiyakubuta ngitsi: Abekhuluma ngabani lomphrofethi la, abetisho yena yini, nome abekhuluma ngalomunye umuntfu?”
Filiphu wakhuluma nalesiphatsimandla, wacala ngalendzawana emBhalweni asitjela liVangeli ngaJesu.
Basachubeka nendlela yabo befika lapho kunemanti khona siphatsimandla satsi: “Ingani nankha emanti, kwalani kutsi ngibhajatiswe?” [
Filiphu watsi kuso: “Nawukholwa ngenhlitiyo yakho yonkhe, kungentiwa.” Saphendvula satsi: “Ngiyakholwa kutsi Jesu Khristu yiNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu.”]
Wase utsi akumiswe inkalishi yakhe, behla bobabili, baya emantini, siphatsimandla naFiliphu, wase uyasibhabhatisa.
Batsi kube baphume emantini, Moya weNkhosi watsatsa Filiphu, siphatsimandla asizange siphindze simbone, noko sachubeka neluhambo lwaso sesihamba sijabula.

Wafike wacela tincwadzi tekumetfula emasinagogeni emaJuda aseDamaseko, kuze atsi nakakhandza lapho nobe bobani lababalandzeli baleNdlela yeNkhosi, abe nemandla ekubabopha, labadvuna nalabasikati, abatsatse abamikise eJerusalema.
Washayeka phansi, weva livi litsi kuye: “Sawula! Ye Sawula! Ungihluphelani?”
Sukuma-ke uye kulelo dolobha, lapho utawutjelwa khona lokufanele ukwente.”
Nalamadvodza labehamba naSawula abesamile, abindze ase dvu; abeliva lelivi, kepha akazange ambone lona labekhuluma.
Sawula wasukuma phansi, wavula emehlo, kodvwa emehlo ehluleka kubona. Ngako base bambamba ngesandla bamhola baze bayawungena naye eDamaseko.
Kwaphela emalanga lamatsatfu angakwati kubona, ngaleso sikhatsi abengadli anganatsi lutfo.
Kwakukhona umfundzi lapha eDamaseko libito lakhe kungu-Ananiyase. Wabona umbono lapho iNkhosi yatsi kuye: “Ananiyase!”
INkhosi yatsi kuye: “Tilungiselele kuhamba uye eSitaladini Lesicondzile, endlini yaJudasi ucele indvodza yaseThasusi libito layo nguSawula. Uyathandaza.
Ekwembulelweni kwakhe ubone indvodza lengu-Ananiyase ingena ibeka tandla etikwakhe kuze aphindze abone.”
Kepha Ananiyase waphendvula watsi: “Nkhosi, bantfu labanyenti sebangitjelile ngalendvodza, nangabo bonkhe budlova lebentile kubantfu bakho eJerusalema.
Futsi seyite lapha eDamaseko ngemandla nangemvume yebaphristi labakhulu kutewubopha bonkhe bantfu lababita libito lakho.”
Mine ngekwami ngitamkhombisa konkhe lafanele ahlupheke ngako ngelibito lami.”
Ngako-ke Ananiyase wahamba, wangena endlini wabeka tandla etikwaSawula. Watsi: “Mzalwane, Sawula, iNkhosi Jesu lebonakele kuwe endleleni ingitfumile kutsi ubone futsi, ugcwaliswe ngaMoya Longcwele.”
Masinyane kwawa tincwencwe letatifanana nenkhwetfu tisuka emehlweni aSawula, waphindze wabona futsi. Wasukuma wabhajatiswa.
Sawula wahlala nebafundzi emalangana lambalwa eDamaseko.
Masinyane wacala kushumayela emasinagogeni ngaJesu atsi: “UyiNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu.”

Bonkhe labamuva bamangala babutana bodvwana batsi: “Akusiyo yini lendvodza lebeyibulala bonkhe lababita lelibito eJerusalema? Khona kantsi nje ayiketi lapha ngalenjongo yekubabopha ibamikise kubaphristi labakhulu yini?”
Kodvwa Sawula weva ngalelisu labo kutsi bamlindza imini nebusuku emagedeni elidolobha kuze bambulale.
Kodvwa balandzeli bakhe Sawula bamtsatsa ebusuku bamehlisa ngelibhasikidi elubondzeni lwelidolobha.

Noko Bhanabasi wamsita ngekutsi amtsatse amyise kubaphostoli. Wafike wabachazela kutsi Sawula wayibona kanjani iNkhosi endleleni, nekutsi iNkhosi yakhuluma naye. Wabatjela futsi nekutsi Sawula washumayela kanjani ngesibindzi ngelibito laJesu eDamaseko.
Ngako-ke Sawula wahlanganyela kanye nabo behla benyuka nelidolobha lonkhe laseJerusalema, bashumayela ngesibindzi ngelibito leNkhosi.
Wakhuluma waphikisana nemaJuda labekhuluma siGriki; kodvwa abefuna kumbulala.
Kwatsi bazalwane nabakhandza tintfo time kanje, bamtsatsa Sawula bamyisa eKhesariya bamtfumela eThasusi.
Ngako-ke libandla kulo lonkhe laseJudiya naseGalile naseSamariya laba nesikhatsi sekuthula. Lakhiwa, lakhula ngebunyenti ngekusitwa nguMoya Longcwele liphila imphilo yekwesaba iNkhosi.
Phetro asahambahamba emkhatsini wabo bonkhe, waze wehlela kulabangcwele lababehlala eLida.
Kulapho akhandza khona indvodza leyayingu-Ayeneyasi, leyayife luhlangotsi ingakwati nekuvuka embhedzeni iminyaka lesiphohlongo.
Phetro watsi kuye: “Ayeneyasi, Jesu Khristu uyakuphilisa. Sukuma ugcebe umbhedze wakho!”
Bonkhe bantfu lababehlala eLida nasesigodzini saseSharoni bambona, baphendvukela eNkhosini.
EJopha kwakunemfati labelikholwa anguThabitha. Libito lakhe ngesiGriki kwakunguDokhasi, (lokusho kutsi “inyamatane”), abecitsa sonkhe sikhatsi sakhe ngekwenta lokuhle ngekusita timphuya.
Ngaso leso sikhatsi wagula, wafa. Sidvumbu sakhe basigeza basilalisa endlini esitezi.
IJopha yayisedvute naseLida, kwatsi bafundzi nabeva kutsi Phetro abeseLida, batfumela emadvodza lamabili nemlayeto lotsi: “Sicela unonophe ute lapha kitsi.”
Ngako Phetro watilungisela wahamba nabo. Nasafikile bamtsatsa bamyisa kulendlu leyayisesitezi. Bonkhe bafelokati bamsingatsa, bakhala bamkhombisa emahembe nemajazi labentiwe nguDokhasi asengakafi.
Phetro wabakhiphela ngephandle bonkhe labantfu, waguca phansi wathandaza; wase ugucukela kulesidvumbu watsi: “Thabitha, sukuma!”
Thabitha wavula emehlo, watsi kube abone Phetro wahlala ngetibunu.
Phetro wambamba ngesandla wamsukumisa. Wase ubita emakholwa nebafelokati, wabanika yena asaphilile.
Lendzaba yasakateka neJopha yonkhe, bantfu labanyenti bakholwa eNkhosini.
Phetro wahlala eJopha emalanga lamanyenti nemshuki wetikhumba labenguSimoni.
Kwakukhona indvodza leyayinguKhoneliyuse eKhesariya, beyiyindvuna yelibutfo lemaRoma lelalibitwa ngekutsi: “Libutfo laseTaliyane.”
Abekholwa, amesaba Nkulunkulu yena nendlu yakhe abesita labanyenti labamphofu bemaJuda, ahlala emkhulekweni ngaso sonkhe sikhatsi.
Kwakungeli-awa lesitsatfu entsambama, lapho abona ngalokusebaleni embonweni ingilosi yaNkulunkulu ingena kuye itsi: “Khoneliyuse!”
Ingilosi yaphendvula yatsi: “Nkulunkulu uyemukele imithandazo yakho nemisebenti yakho yesihawu, ngako-ke sewukukhumbulile.
Ngako tfumela emadvodza eJopha ayewubita indvodza lebitwa ngekutsi nguSimoni Phetro,
isivakashi emtini wemshuki wetikhumba lotsiwa nguSimoni, lohlala ngaselwandle.”
Lengilosi leyayikhuluma naye yase iyahamba, Khoneliyuse wase ubita tisebenti tasekhaya kakhe letimbili kanye nelisotja, indvodza leyayikholwa, ingulenye yabogadzi bakhe.
Wabatjela konkhe lokwase kwentekile, wase ubatfumela eJopha.
Ngakusasa, nase basondzele eJopha, Phetro waya egumeni lelalisetulu eluphahleni lwendlu emini ayewuthandaza.
Walamba, wakhanuka kudla; kusalungiswa kudla watsatseka wabona umbono.
Wabona lizulu livulekile kwehla intfo leyayifana nendvwangu lenkhulu kusengatsi ilengiswe ngemakona ayo omane yehliselwa emhlabeni,
ekhatsi kwayo kwakunetinhlobo tonkhe tetilwane temhlaba, letihamba ngetinyawo letine, naletihamba ngesisu, netinyoni temoya.
Kwevakala livi litsi kuye: “Sukuma, Phetro; hlaba udle!”
Loku kwenteka katsatfu; kwase kuyatsatfwa kubuyela ezulwini.
Phetro kwammangalisa kutsi usho kutsini lombono lawubonile. Ngaso leso sikhatsi lamadvodza labetfunywe nguKhoneliyuse abesawutfolile lomuti waSimoni aseme emnyango.
Sebakhulekile babuta batsi: “Asikho yini sivakashi lapha lesibitwa ngekutsi nguSimoni Phetro?”
Phetro asacabangisisa inchazelo yalombono, Moya Longcwele watsi kuye: “Lalela! Emadvodza lamatsatfu ayakufuna.
Ngako sukuma wehle uhambe nawo ungangabati, ngobe atfunywe ngimi.”
Ngako Phetro wehla waya kulamadvodza wafike watsi: “Ngimi lona lenimfunako. Ningifunelani?”

Baphendvula batsi: “Khoneliyuse, indvuna yelibutfo, usitfumile. Uyindvodza lelungile naleyesaba Nkulunkulu, futsi uhlonishwa ngiso sonkhe sive semaJuda. Watjelwa yingilosi lengcwele kutsi akumeme ute emtini wakhe, kuze atewuva emavi akho.”
Phetro wabacela labantfu kutsi sale balala, ngobe lase lishonile. Ngakusasa watilungiselela kuhamba nabo; labanye bazalwane baseJopha bamphekeletela.
Ngakusasa befika eKhesariya, lapho abelindzelwe nguKhoneliyuse khona, kanye netihlobo nebangani bakhe labakhulu labebamemile.
Nasatawungena nje ekhaya Phetro, Khoneliyuse waphuma wamhlangabeta, waguca ngemadvolo wakhotsama embikwakhe.
Kodvwa Phetro wamsukumisa. Watsi kuye: “Sukuma, nami ngingumuntfu nje.”
Phetro wachubeka wakhulumisa Khoneliyuse basangena endlini, lapho akhandza bantfu labanyenti bahlangene.

Watsi kubo: “Nani matfupha niyati kutsi umJuda akavunyelwa yinkholo yakhe kutsi avakashele nome atihlanganise nebetive. Kodvwa Nkulunkulu ungikhombisile kutsi angifanele kusho kutsi umuntfu ungcolile nome akahlanteki.
Ngako-ke njengobe utfumele kimi, ngivele ngeta ngaphandle kwekungatsita. Sengiyabuta-ke, manje, ungibiteleni?”

Khoneliyuse waphendvula watsi: “Kwakucishe kube ngito letikhatsi kutsanti kwayitolo ngesikhatsi ngithandaza endlini yami ngeli-awa lesitsatfu ntsambama ngabona indvodza yembetse tingubo letikhatimulako ime embikwami
itsi: ‘Khoneliyuse, Nkulunkulu uwuvile umthandazo wakho, uyikhumbulile imisebenti yakho yesihawu.
Tfumela umuntfu eJopha ayewubita indvodza lebitwa ngekutsi nguSimoni Phetro, usivakashi emtini waSimoni, umshuki wetikhumba, lohlala ngaselwandle.’
Nganonopha ngatfumela kuwe, wavele wavuma ngenhlitiyo lemhlophe kuta njengobe sewulapha nje. Nanyalo sesihlangene sonkhe embikwaNkulunkulu, simele kuva loko iNkhosi lekutfume kona.”
kodvwa lowo lomesabako ente lokulungile uyemukeleka kuye, nome angewasiphi sive.
Niyalati livi lalitfumela kubantfu baka-Israyeli, ashumayela liVangeli lekuthula ngaJesu Khristu, loyiNkhosi yabo bonkhe bantfu.
Niyayati nalendzaba lenkhulu leyenteka eJudiya lonkhe, kusukela eGalile, ngemuva kwembhabhatiso lowawuyinshumayelo yaJohane.

Niyati futsi ngaJesu waseNazaretha, kutsi Nkulunkulu wamgcoba kanjani ngaMoya Longcwele nangemandla nekutsi waya kuyo yonkhe indzawo enta lokuhle aphilisa bonkhe lababecindzetelwe ngemandla aSathane, ngobe Nkulunkulu abenaye.
Kodvwa Nkulunkulu wamvusa ekufeni ngelilanga lesitsatfu, wambonakalisa;
noko akabonwanga ngabo bonkhe bantfu, kodvwa ngitsi kuphela lesibofakazi, tsine lesasivele sikhetfwe nguNkulunkulu. Sadla sanatsa naye ngemuva kwekuvuswa kwakhe nguNkulunkulu ekufeni.
Wasitfuma kutsi sishumayele kubantfu, sifakaze nekutsi nguye lokhetfwe nguNkulunkulu kutsi abe nguMehluleli walabaphilako nalabafile.
Bonkhe baphrofethi bafakaza ngaye, batsi wonkhe umuntfu lokholwa nguye uyawutsetselelwa tono ngelibito lakhe.”
Asakhuluma Phetro, Moya Longcwele wehlela kubo bonkhe labaliva lelivi.
Emakholwa emaJuda labephuma eJopha kanye naPhetro amangala kutsi Nkulunkulu utfululele sipho sakhe lesinguMoya Longcwele, ngisho nakubetive imbala;
ngobe babeva sebakhuluma ngetilimi badvumisa bukhulu baNkulunkulu. Khona Phetro wakhuluma watsi:
“Labantfu sebemukele Moya Longcwele, njengobe natsi samemukela. Kepha ukhona yini longahle abavimbele kutsi babhajatiswe ngemanti?”
Baphostoli nebazalwane kulo lonkhe laseJudiya beva kutsi betive nabo balemukele livi laNkulunkulu.
Kwatsi lapho Phetro akhuphukela eJerusalema, labo labatsandza kusoka kwebetive bamsola,
batsi: “Uvumeleni kuya emtini webetive labangakasoki futsi udle nabo?”
Ngako-ke Phetro wabalandzisa ngalokwenteka, kusukela ekucaleni, watsi:
“Bengithandaza emtini eJopha, ngatsatseka, ngabona umbono. Ngabona kwehla intfo leyayibukeka njengendvwangu lenkhulu yehla ezulwini kusengatsi ibanjwe ngemakona ayo omane yehliselwa kimi.
Ngasondzela ngabuka ekhatsi ngabona tilwane letihamba ngetinyawo letine, netesiganga, naletihamba ngesisu kanye netinyoni temoya.
Ngeva livi litsi kimi: ‘Sukuma, Phetro; hlaba udle!’
Kodvwa ngatsi: ‘Ngeke, Nkhosi, ngobe akuzange sekungene nakunye lokungcolile emlonyeni wami.’
Livi lakhuluma futsi ezulwini latsi: ‘Ungasho kutsi lokuhlantwe nguNkulunkulu kungcolile.’
Loku kwenteka emahlandla lamatsatfu, ekugcineni yonkhe intfo yakhushulelwa emuva yenyuselwa ezulwini.
“Ngasona leso sikhatsi emadvodza lamatsatfu labetfunyelwe kimi achamuka eKhesariya efika endlini lapho ngangihlala khona.
Moya Longcwele wangitjela kutsi angihambe nabo ngingangatsiti. Labazalwane labasitfupha labangiphekeletela sahamba nabo saya eKhesariya, sonkhe sangena endlini yaKhoneliyuse.
Wasitjela ngekubona kwakhe ingilosi ime endlini yakhe itsi kuye: ‘Tfumela emadvodza eJopha ayekubitela Simoni lokutsiwa nguPhetro.
Uyawukhuluma emavi lokuyawutsi ngawo usindziswe wena nendlu yakho yonkhe.’
“Ngisacala nje kukhuluma, Moya Longcwele wehlela kubo njengobe ehlela kitsi ekucaleni.
Ngase ngikhumbula lokwashiwo yiNkhosi nayitsi: ‘Johane wabhabhatisa ngemanti, kodvwa nine niyawubhajatiswa ngaMoya Longcwele.’
Nangabe-ke Nkulunkulu wabapha laba betive lesipho lesifana naleso lasipha sona tsine nasikholwa eNkhosini Jesu Khristu, mine-ke bengingubani kutsi ngingemelana naNkulunkulu?”
Labanye babo babengemadvodza aseSiphrosi naseSirene labatsi nabefika e-Antiyokhi batjela nebetive livi leNkhosi, babashumayela liVangeli lekutsi Jesu yiNkhosi.
Sandla seNkhosi sasinabo, bantfu labanyenti bakholwa baphendvukela eNkhosini.
Lapho efika wabona kutsi Nkulunkulu abebabusisile bantfu, watfokota wabancusa bonkhe kutsi betsembeke baciniseke eNkhosini ngetinhlitiyo tonkhe tabo.
Bhanabasi abengumuntfu lolungile agcwele Moya Longcwele nekukholwa. Bantfu labanyenti bengetekela eNkhosini.

Kwatsi lapho amkhandza, wamletsa e-Antiyokhi. Umnyaka wonkhe bobabili babehlanganyela nebantfu belibandla, babefundzisa sicuku lesikhulu. Kwakuse-Antiyokhi lapho bafundzi babitwa kwekucala ngekutsi ngemaKhristu.
Lomunye wabo longu-Agabusi wasukuma ngemandla aMoya wabatjela ngendlala leyayitawufika emhlabeni wonkhe. Yaze yaba khona ngesikhatsi sekubusa uMbusi Klawudiyusi.
Bafundzi bavumelana kutsi ngulowo nalowo atfumele loko langakutfumela kusita bazalwane baseJudiya.
Bakwenta loko batfumela imali kubabonisi belibandla ngaboBhanabasi naSawula.
Ngalesikhatsi Herodi, inkhosi, wacala kutingela nekuhlupha emalunga elibandla.
Watsi kube ambambe wamfaka ejele lapho aniketwa etigabeni letine temasotja lamane sigaba sisinye, letatimlindza ngekuntjintjana. Herode abehlose kutsi amletse embikwemaJuda emvakweliPhasika.
Ngako-ke Phetro walondvolotwa ejele, kodvwa libandla belithandaza limncusela kuNkulunkulu.
Ngebusuku bekugcina Herodi atamkhipha amletse ebantfwini, Phetro abelele emkhatsini webalindzi lababili. Abeboshwe ngetinketane letimbili, kwakunebalindzi lapho emnyango welijele balindzile.
Khona lapho tinketane tadzilika etandleni takhe.
Ingilosi yase itsi kuye: “Tibophe ngelibhande, ufake tincabule takho.” Wakwenta loko Phetro, ingilosi yatsi: “Yembatsa ingubo yakho ungilandzele!”
