Phetro waphuma ejele wayilandzela. Noko akatanga kutsi loku lokwentiwa yingilosi kwenteka ngempela yini; wacabanga kutsi ubona umbono.

Bendlula balindzi bekucala, nebesibili, befika kubekugcina esangweni lensimbi lelivulekela edolobheni, lativulekela. Baphumela ngephandle. Bahamba bengca sitaladi saba sinye, khona lapho ingilosi yamshiya Phetro.

Kwangukhona kumkhanyela Phetro kutsi bekwentekani kuye, wase utsi: “Manje sengiyati kutsi kuliciniso kutsi iNkhosi itfumele ingilosi, yangikhulula emandleni aHerodi nakuko konkhe emaJuda abebheke kutsi kutangehlela.”
Phetro wanconcotsa emnyango; Roda, intfombatana leyayisisebenti, weta kutamvulela.
Waliva livi laPhetro wajabula kakhulu, wagijima wabuyela emuva angakawuvuli umnyango. Wefika wabatjela kutsi nguPhetro lome ngephandle.
Kepha wacinisa watsi kuliciniso. Base baphendvula batsi: “Yingilosi yakhe.”
Phetro abeseloku anconcotsa. Batsi bavula umnyango bambona Phetro, bamangala.
Waphakamisa sandla sakhe wababindzisa, wabachazela kutsi iNkhosi imkhulule njani ejele.
Watsi kubo: “Nibotjela Jakobe nebazalwane.” Wase uyabashiya uya encenye.
Ekuseni kwesuka lesikhulu sidvumo kubalindzi kutsi ushonephi Phetro.
Herodi watfumela kutsi afunwe, kepha abazange bamtfole. Ngako-ke wabita balindzi wababutisisa, wase utsi ababulawe.
Emvakwaloko Herodi wehlela eKhesariya aphuma eJudiya, wahlala sikhatsi khona.

Wabatfukutselela kakhulu Herodi bantfu baseThire naseSidoni; ngako-ke baya kanyekanye bayawubonana naye. Kwekucala bavumelana naBlastusi, labengumgcini wesigodlo. Baya kuHerodi bayawucela kuthula, ngobe live labo lalitfola kudla eveni lakhe.
Ngelilanga lelalikhetsekile Herodi wembatsa tingubo takhe tebukhosi, wahlala esihlalweni sebukhosi, wabeka inkhulumo kubantfu.
Bamemeta batsi: “Akusiye umuntfu lona lokhulumako, kepha ngunkulunkulu.”
Bhanabasi naSawula bacedza umsebenti wabo babuyela eJerusalema, bahamba kanye naJohane Makho.
Basakhonta iNkhosi, bazila, Moya Longcwele watsi kubo: “Ngehlukaniseleni boBhanabasi naSawula, nibehlukanisele umsebenti lengibabitele wona.”
BoBhanabasi naSawula, sebatfunyelwe nguMoya Longcwele, behlela eSeloyisiya bahamba ngemkhumbi besuka khona balibangisa esichingini saseSiphrosi.
Lapho befika eSalamisi, bashumayela livi leNkhosi emasinagogeni emaJuda. BabenaJohane labebalekelela emsebentini.
Bahamba yonkhe indlela lejuba esichingini baya ePhafosi, lapho bahlangana naBhajesu labesangoma, umJuda labengumphrofethi wemanga.
Abenembusi waleso sichingi, Segiyusi Pawulusi, labeyindvodza lehlakaniphile. Umbusi wabita boBhanabasi naSawula kutsi abete kuye ngobe afuna kuva livi laNkulunkulu.
Kepha baphikiswa ngu-Elimasi labesangoma, leyo yinchazelo yelibito lakhe lesiGriki; wetama kuvimbela umbusi ekukholweni.
Kodvwa Sawula lokunguPawula, agcwele Moya Longcwele, wasibukisisa lesangoma.
Watsi: “Wena ndvodzana yaSathane! Usitsa sako konkhe lokuhle; ugcwele onkhe emachinga ebubi, uyawuyekela nini kuvimbela liciniso leNkhosi ngemanga?
Sandla seNkhosi sitakwehlela etikwakho nyalo; utawuba yimphumphutse, awunakubona kukhanya kwelilanga sikhatsi lesitsite.”
Khona lapho Elimasi wehlelwa yinkhungu yebumnyama yavala emehlo akhe, wahambahamba ajikeleta afuna longamhola amdvonse ngesandla.
Umbusi wakholwa nakabona loko lokwase kwentekile, ikakhulu wamangaliswa yimfundziso yeNkhosi.
Bahamba besuka ePhega befika e-Antiyokhi yasePhisidiya.
Ngelilanga leliSabatha bangena esinagogeni bahlala phansi.
Sekufundvwe umtsetfo nemiBhalo yebaphrofethi, baphatsi belisinagoge batfumela livi batsi: “Bazalwane, sicela nikhulume kubantfu nangabe ninawo emavi ekubakhutsata.”
Pawula wasukuma waphakamisa sandla kuze batemlalela watsi: “Nine baka-Israyeli, nani lenimesabako Nkulunkulu, lalelani!
Nkulunkulu wesive saka-Israyeli wakhetsa bokhokho betfu, wabandzisa ngesikhatsi basahlala njengetihambi eveni laseGibhithe. Nkulunkulu wabakhipha eGibhithe ngemandla akhe lamangalisako.
Wabulala tive letisikhombisa eveni laseKhenani, walinika bona kutsi libe labo.
Lapho bacela inkhosi, Nkulunkulu wabanika Sawula, indvodzana yaKishi, wesive sakaBhenjamini, waba yinkhosi yabo iminyaka lengema-40.

Nkulunkulu asamkhiphile wabeka Davide, waba yinkhosi yabo. Nkulunkulu wafakaza kahle ngaye nakatsi: ‘Ngitfole kutsi Davide, indvodzana yaJese, ungumuntfu wenhlitiyo yami, umuntfu lotakwenta konkhe lengifuna kutsi akwente.’
Entalweni yakhe Nkulunkulu waletsela ema-Israyeli uMsindzisi longuJesu njengobe abebatsembisile.
Asengakefiki Jesu, Johane washumayela esiveni sonkhe saka-Israyeli kutsi siphendvuke etonweni sibhajatiswe.

Johane nasatawucedza umsebenti wakhe, watsi kubantfu: ‘Nicabanga kutsi ngingubani mine? Angisiye lona lenimlindzele. Kepha bukani la! Yena uta emvakwami, mine angikafaneli ngisho kumkhumula ticatfulo takhe etinyaweni.’
Bantfu labahlala eJerusalema nebaholi babo abazange bati kutsi Jesu unguMsindzisi, abevanga nemavi ebaphrofethi labawafundza njalo ngemaSabatha, kepha bawagcwalisa ngekubulala Jesu.
Naloku bangasitfolanga sizatfu sekumlahla ngelicala lekufa, kepha bacela kuPhilatu kutsi akabulawe.
Ngemuva sebakwentile konkhe njengobe kubhaliwe ngaye, bametfula esiphambanweni bamfaka engcwabeni.
Ngemalanga lamanyenti wabonwa ngulabo labehamba nabo kusuka eGalile kuya eJerusalema. Manje sebabofakazi bakhe esiveni saka-Israyeli.
sewukugcwalisile kitsi tsine lesisitukulwane sabo ngekuvusa Jesu aphile; njengobe kubhaliwe eSihlabelelweni sesibili kutsi:
kepha lona Nkulunkulu lamvusa ekufeni akabolanga.
Ngako-ke caphelani, kuze kutsi lokwashiwo baphrofethi kungenteki kini:
Batsi boPawula naBhanabasi nabaphuma esinagogeni, bantfu babacela kutsi babuye ngeliSabatha lelilandzelako batewubatjela ngalokunyenti kwaleto tintfo.

Bantfu sebahambile emhlanganweni, boPawula naBhanabasi balandzelwa ngemaJuda lamanyenti nalabanye labanyenti lababephendvukele enkholweni yemaJuda. Baphostoli bakhuluma kubo babakhutsata kutsi bachubeke baphile emseni waNkulunkulu.
NgeliSabatha lelilandzelako cishe bonkhe bantfu edolobheni beta batewulalela livi leNkhosi.
Lapho emaJuda abona ticuku, aba nemona; aphikisa Pawula kuloko abekusho, ametfuka.

Kepha boPawula naBhanabasi bakhuluma ngesibindzi batsi: “Bekufanele kutsi livi leNkhosi likhulunywe kini kucala. Kepha njengobe ningalifuni, ningaticabangeli nine kutsi nifanelwe kuphila kwaphakadze, bhekani-ke sesiyanishiya siya kubetive.
Livi leNkhosi landza kuyo yonkhe leyo ndzawo.

Kodvwa emaJuda afaka umoya wetikhova ebafatini lababehloniphekile lababephendvukele enkholweni yebuJuda nasemadvodzeni labesembili kulelo dolobha. Bacala bahlupha boPawula naBhanabasi, babacosha kuleyo ndzawo yakubo.
Baphostoli batsintsitsa lutfuli lwetinyawo tabo bachubekela e-Ikhoniyumi.
Bafundzi base-Antiyokhi bagcwala kujabula naMoya Longcwele.
Kepha emaJuda labengakholwa afaka lulwimi lolubi kubetive kuze bavukele bazalwane.

Baphostoli bahlala lapho sikhatsi lesidze. Bakhuluma ngesibindzi ngeNkhosi, leyafakaza kutsi inshumayelo yabo ngemusa wayo iliciniso, ibanika emandla ekwenta tibonakaliso netimangaliso ngetandla tabo.
Bantfu belidolobha behlukana ekhatsi, labanye baba ngakumaJuda, labanye baba ngakubaphostoli.
Kwatsi nakusuka siphitsiphitsi emkhatsini webetive, nemaJuda, nebaholi bawo, bafuna kuhlupha nekugcoba baphostoli ngematje,
baphostoli nabakuva loko, babalekela eListra naseDebe, emadolobha lamakhulu aseLikhawoniya, naseveni lelakhelene nawo.
Yalalela emavi aboPawula. Pawula wabona kutsi iyakholwa kutsi ingaphiliswa, ngako-ke wayibukisisa,
Lendvodza yazuba yema ngetinyawo, yacala kuhamba.
Lapho sicumbi sibona lokwentiwe nguPawula, sacala samemeta ngelulwimi lwesiLikhawoniya sitsi: “Bonkulunkulu batsatse simo sebantfu behlela kitsi.”
Betsa Bhanabasi batsi unguZeyusi, naPawula bametsa batsi nguHemesi, ngobe nguye labekhuluma.
Umphristi waZeyusi labenelithempeli lelalakhiwe ngephandle kwelidolobha, waletsa tinkunzi nemhlobiso wetimbali emasangweni. Yena nesicumbi abefuna kunikela umnikelo kubaphostoli.
Lapho boBhanabasi naPawula beva loko bese batakwenta, badzabula tingubo tabo bagijima bacondza emkhatsini wesicumbi, bamemeta batsi:

“Madvodza, nikwentelani loku? Natsi sibantfu nje, labafanana nani! Site lapha kuniletsela liVangeli, kuze nigucuke nisuke kuletintfo letingenamsebenti niye kuNkulunkulu lophilako, lowenta lizulu, nemhlaba, nelwandle, nako konkhe lokukuko.
Ngesikhatsi lesendlulile watiyekela tonkhe tive tatihambela ngetindlela tato.
Kodvwa akayekelanga kutifakazela ngekwenta imisebenti lemihle: Unehlisela imvula nekudla ngesikhatsi lesifanele; uninika kudla agcwalise tinhlitiyo tenu ngenjabulo.”
Nangawo lawo mavi baphostoli babemisa kalukhuni bantfu kutsi babanikelele iminikelo.
Kodvwa ngesikhatsi emakholwa abutsana kuye, wasukuma wabuyela edolobheni. Ngelilanga lelilandzelako yena naBhanabasi bahamba baya eDebe.
BoPawula naBhanabasi bashumayela liVangeli eDebe, batfola balandzeli labanyenti.
Base babuyela emuva eListra, nase-Ikhoniyumi, nase-Antiyokhi lesePhisidiya.
Bacinisa emakholwa bawakhutsata ekubambeleleni ekukholweni. Babafundzisa kutsi: “Sifanele sendlule ekuhluphekeni lokunyenti kuze singene embusweni waNkulunkulu.”
bashumayela livi ePhega, base behlela e-Athaliya.
Nabesuka lapho bantjweza ngemkhumbi babuyela emuva e-Antiyokhi, indzawo lababenikelwe khona umsebenti waNkulunkulu labase bawentile.
Lapho sebefike e-Antiyokhi babutsela bantfu belibandla ndzawonye babatjela konkhe Nkulunkulu labekusebentile ngabo, nekutsi nebetive ubavulele indlela yekukholwa.
Endleleni yabo batfunywe libandla, basadzabula eFenisiya naseSamariya babika kutsi betive baphendvukela kanjani kuNkulunkulu; letindzaba taletsa kujabula lokukhulu kubazalwane bonkhe.
Kepha lamanye emakholwa elicembu lebaFarisi asukuma atsi: “Kufanele basoke, batjelwe kutsi bagcine umtsetfo waMosi.”
Baphostoli nebabonisi bahlangana ndzawonye kumungunya lendzaba.

Emvakwemphikiswano lendze Phetro wasukuma watsi: “Bazalwane bami, niyati kutsi sekusikhatsi lesidze lesendlulile Nkulunkulu angikhetsa emkhatsini wenu kube ngishumayele liVangeli kubetive, khona batewuva bakholwe.
Nkulunkulu, lowati tinhlitiyo tebantfu, wakhombisa kuvumela betive ngekubanika Moya Longcwele, njengobe enta nakitsi.
Akentanga umehluko emkhatsini wetfu nabo; ngekukholwa wabahlanta tinhlitiyo.
Pho, nifunelani kulinga Nkulunkulu ngekubeka lijoko emahlombe emakholwa lokungazange bokhokho nome tsine sibe nemandla ekuletfwala?
Cha! Sikholwa kutsi tsine nabo sisindziswa ngalokufananako ngemusa weNkhosi yetfu Jesu.”
Sebacedzile kukhuluma, Jakobe wakhuluma watsi: “Bazalwane, ngilaleleni!
Simoni usandza kuchaza kutsi Nkulunkulu wacala kunakekela betive ngekutitsatsela sive emkhatsini wabo kutsi sibe sakhe.
Loku kuvumelana ncamashi nemavi ebaphrofethi, njengobe imiBhalo itsi:
Jakobe wachubeka watsi: “Kungumcondvo wami kutsi akukafaneli sibatsikamete laba betive labaphendvukela kuNkulunkulu,
kuphela nje asibabhalele incwadzi sibatjele kutsi bangakudli kudla lokungcoliswe ngekunikelwa etithicweni, babalekele bugwadla, bangadli lokucumbelene, bangayidli nengati.
Ngobe nemtsetfo waMosi sewushunyayelwe kuwo onkhe emadolobha wafundziswa sikhatsi lesidze emasinagogeni ngemalanga onkhe emaSabatha.”

Baphostoli nebabonisi, kanye nelibandla lonkhe, bancuma kukhetsa lamanye emadvodza emkhatsini wabo kutsi bawatfumele e-Antiyokhi naboPawula naBhanabasi. Bakhetsa Judasi lokutsiwa nguBhasabasi, naSilasi, lekwakungemadvodza lahloniphekile emkhatsini webazalwane.
“Yemukelani nanso incwadzi levela kubaphostoli nebazalwane labababonisi lababingelela bazalwane betive ngekutalwa, labahlala edolobheni lase-Antiyokhi nasetifundzeni taseSiriya naseSilisiya.
Ngako-ke sibese siyahlangana savumelana sonkhe ngalivi linye lekutsi sitawutfumela kini lamadvodza lesiwakhetsile kanye nebahlobo betfu labatsandzekako boBhanabasi naPawula,
labanikele ngetimphilo tabo emsebentini weNkhosi yetfu Jesu Khristu.
Ngako-ke sinitfumelele boJudasi naSilasi, labatanitjela bona ngemlomo kona loko lesikubhalile.
Ningakudli kudla lokungcoliswe ngekunikelwa etithicweni, ningayidli ingati, ningadli lokucumbelene; nibalekele bugwadla. Niyawube nente kahle naniyigcinile lemiyalo. Salani kahle.”
Titfunywa tahamba taya e-Antiyokhi, lapho tahlangana nabo bonkhe lababengemakholwa, tabanika lencwadzi.
Lapho bantfu sebayifundzile incwadzi bajatjuliswa ngemavi ekubakhutsata.
BoJudasi naSilasi, lababebaphrofethi ngekwabo, bacoca sikhatsi lesidze nebazalwane babacinisa emadvolo ngekubakhutsata.
Bahlala sikhatsi lapho. Bazalwane base bayabakhulula kutsi bancandzeke ngekuthula, babaphatsisa nemikhontiso yabo leyayiya kulabo bazalwane labebabatfumile. [
BoPawula naBhanabasi bahlala sikhatsi e-Antiyokhi babehlanganyela nalabanyenti, babefundzisa bashumayele livi leNkhosi.
Emvakwesikhatsi Pawula watsi kuBhanabasi: “Asibuyele emuva sivakashele bazalwane kuwo onkhe emadolobha lapho sashumayela khona livi leNkhosi, sibone kutsi bachubeka njani.”
kepha Pawula akakubonanga kulungile kumtsatsa, ngobe akachubekanga nabo emsebentini wabo wonkhe, kepha abebuyele emuva wabashiya ePhamfiliya.
Bacabana kabi ngalendzaba, baze behlukana. Bhanabasi wahamba naMakho ngemkhumbi walibangisa eSiphrosi.
Kodvwa Pawula wakhetsa Silasi, wahamba naye asanikelwe bazalwane emseni weNkhosi.
Wahamba wadzabula eSiriya naseSilisiya, acinisa emabandla.
Pawula abetsandza kutsi ahambe naThimothi, ngako-ke wamtsatsa wamsoka ngenca yemaJuda labekhona kuleto tindzawo, ngobe onkhe abemati kutsi uyise abengumGriki.
Basahamba badzabula emadolobheni batjela emakholwa tincumo letemiswa baphostoli nebabonisi lababeseJerusalema kutsi batigcine.
Ngako-ke emabandla acinisela ekukholweni, bengeteka ngebunyenti emalanga ngemalanga.
Sebefikile emnyeleni waseMisiya, balinga kuya eveni laseBhithiniya, kodvwa Moya waJesu akabavumelanga.
Ebusuku Pawula wabona umbono, wabona indvodza yaseMasedoniya imile imncenga itsi: “Yewelela eMasedoniya utesisita!”
Kwatsi Pawula asawubonile lombono satilungiselela masinyane kuwelela eMasedoniya, ngobe sase sibonile kutsi Nkulunkulu usibitele kutsi siyewushumayela liVangeli kubo.
Ngako-ke santjweza ngemkhumbi sisuka eThrowasi sacondza eSamothrakhe, ngakusasa sabe singena eNeyapholisi lapho safike sehla khona.
Sesuka lapho saya eFiliphi, lidolobha lelisesifundzeni sekucala saseMasedoniya, lelingephansi kwembuso wemaRoma. Sahlala emalanga lambalwa kulelo dolobha.
Kwatsi ngeliSabatha saphumela ngephandle kwelidolobha saya ngasemfuleni, lapho sabona khona kutsi kungahle kube yindzawo yekuthandaza. Sahlala phansi sakhuluma nalabasikati lababebutsene lapho.

Lomunye walabo lowasilalela nguLidiya, waseThiyathira, umtsengisi wetingubo letibukhwebeletane; abengumfati losikhonti saNkulunkulu. INkhosi yavula inhlitiyo yakhe kuze eve emukele loko lokwakukhulunywa nguPawula.
Watsi kube abhajatiswe yena nendlu yakhe, wasincenga watsi: “Nangabe niyangibona kutsi ngetsembekile ngempela eNkhosini yami, wotani nitewuhlala endlini kami.” Wasicindzetela saze savuma.
Satsi sisahamba siya endzaweni yekuthandaza, sahlangana nesigcili sentfombatana lesasinemoya wekuphengula. Ngaleyo ndlela sasitfolela baniyo baso imali lenyenti.
Sasivamise kulandzela tsine naPawula, simemete sitsi: “Labantfu laba tinceku taNkulunkulu Losetikwako Konkhe, bamemetela kini indlela yensindziso.”
Loku wakwenta emalanga lamanyenti, kodvwa Pawula wacansuka waze wagucuka watsi kulomoya: “Ngiyakuyala ngelibito laJesu Khristu ngitsi: Phuma kuye!” Umoya lomubi waphuma kuye ngaleso sikhatsi.
Kodvwa baniyo bakhe sebabonile kutsi litsemba labo lekutfola imali seliphelile, bababamba boPawula naSilasi babahudvulela enkantolo embikweticumbi tebantfu nebabusi.
Babayisa etimantjini temaRoma befike batsi: “Labantfu bangemaJuda, futsi bayahlupha lapha edolobheni letfu.
Bafundzisa emasiko laphambene nemitsetfo yetfu, tsine maRoma lesingakafaneli kuwavuma nekuwenta.”
Sicuku sabavukela naso salwa nabo; netimantji tadzabula tingubo taboPawula naSilasi, tatsi ababhanjabulwe ngemizaca.
Batsi sebashaywe imivimba leminyenti tase titsi abafakwe ejele, tayala umgcinijele kutsi abagcine kahle, abagadzisise.
Nembala wabavalela ejele lelingekhatsi wabophela tinyawo tabo etizemuzemini tetigodvo.
Kwatsi ekhatsi nebusuku boPawula naSilasi bathandaza bahlabela tingoma tekudvumisa Nkulunkulu, tiboshwa letinye tatibalalele.
Masinyane kwaba khona kutamatama kwemhlaba lokukhulu, lokwatamatamisa tisekelo telijele. Khonapho yonkhe iminyango yavuleka, tinketane tato tonkhe tiboshwa tadzilika.
Umgcinijele waphaphama, lapho abona iminyango yelijele ivulekile wacabanga kutsi tonkhe tiboshwa tibalekile; wanyomula inkemba yakhe asafuna kutibulala.
Kodvwa Pawula wamemeta ngelivi lelikhulu watsi: “Ungatilimati! Sikhona sonkhe.”
Umgcinijele watsi akukhanyiswe, wagijima wangena ngekhatsi, agedletela, watilahla phansi etinyaweni taboPawula naSilasi.
Wase ubakhiphela ngephandle wababuta watsi: “Makhosi, kufanele ngente njani kuze ngisindziswe?”
Base bashumayela livi leNkhosi kuye nakubo bonkhe bendlu yakhe.
Ngasona leso sikhatsi ebusuku wabatsatsa wayawubageza emanceba abo, wase uyabhajatiswa khonapho yena nebendlu yakhe bonkhe.
Wenyusela boPawula naSilasi endlini yakhe wabapha kudla, badla. Yena nebendlu yakhe bajabula kakhulu, ngobe bese bakholwe kuNkulunkulu.
Sekusile ngakusasa timantji tatfumela emaphoyisa kumgcinijele tatsi: “Khulula labo bantfu!”
Umgcinijele watjela Pawula watsi: “Timantji titfumele livi lekutsi Silasi nawe anikhululwe. Ngako-ke seningaphuma, nihambe ngekuthula.”
Emaphoyisa akubikela timantji loko, kodvwa tatsi nativa kutsi boPawula naSilasi bangemaRoma, tesaba.
Ngako tase tiyeta titawucolisa kubo, tabakhipha; tabacela kutsi abesuke kulelo dolobha.
Ngako-ke baphuma ejele baya kaLidiya. Bafike babona bazalwane, babakhutsata base bayahamba.
Njengemvamisa Pawula wangena esinagogeni, waphikisana nabo ngetemiBhalo emaSabatha lamatsatfu,
abachazela abakhombisa ngekwemiBhalo kutsi Khristu bekufanele afe aphindze avuke kulabafile, asho nekusho kutsi: “LoJesu lengimshumayelako kini nguye loKhristu.”
Labanye babo bakholwa base batihlanganisa naboPawula naSilasi, njengobe kwenta sicuku lesikhulu semaGriki labesaba Nkulunkulu, kanye nalabasikati labanyenti lababehloniphekile.
Kodvwa emaJuda aba nemona ase abutsa tihlophoyi letatitizulela etitaladini atihlanganisa, atsi atisuse umsindvo tihlasele umuti waJasoni, afuna kukhipha boPawula naSilasi abaletse embikwemkhambatsi.

Kwatsi kube bangabakhandzi lapho, base bahudvula Jasoni nalabanye bazalwane babayisa etimantjini telidolobha, batsi: “Labantfu labadvungutelise umhlaba bawubhekisa phansi, sebadzimate befika nakulelidolobha lakitsi.
NaJasoni ubemukele emtini wakhe. Labantfu labephula umtsetfo waKhesari, uMbusi, batsi kukhona lenye inkhosi lenguJesu.”
Bantfu kanye netiphatsimandla talelo dolobha tadvungutela natikuva loko,
timantji tatsatsa sibambiso kuboJasoni nalabanye tase tiyabakhulula.
Bantfu balapho babencono kakhulu kunebaseThesalonika, ngobe livi balemukela ngalenkhulu inshisekelo. Onkhe emalanga babephenyisisa imiBhalo bahlolisise kutsi kunjalo ngempela yini.
Labanyenti babo nalabasikati labasembili bemaGriki kanye nalabadvuna labanyenti bemaGriki bakholwa.
Masinyane bazalwane babalekisa Pawula bamyisa elusentseni lwelwandle, kodvwa boSilasi naThimothi basala eBheriya.
Labo labaphekeletela Pawula bahamba naye baze bambeka e-Athene. Nase babuyela emuva eBheriya, babuya nemlayeto waboSilasi naThimothi uvela kuPawula kutsi babononopha befike kuye.
Ngesikhatsi Pawula asehleti e-Athene alindzele boSilasi naThimothi, umoya wakhe wakhatsateka kakhulu, nakabona titfombe tabonkulunkulu letatigcwele kulelidolobha.
Ngako waphikisana nemaJuda nebetive labakholwako esinagogeni, kantsi futsi abephindze akhulume onkhe emalanga etinkhundleni, aphikisana nalabo lekwakwenteka babelapho.

Letinye tati letitsite tema-Ephikhuri nemaStoyiki taphikisana naye. Letinye tatsi: “Lesibhungayeti setama kutsini?” Letinye tatsi: “Shangatsi ushumayela ngabonkulunkulu labangatiwa.” Takusho loku ngobe Pawula abeshumayela ngaJesu nangekuvuka kwalabafile.
Base bayamtsatsa Pawula bamyisa enhlanganweni yase-Ariyophagusi, batsi: “Singatsandza kutsi sati ngalemfundziso yakho lensha loyishumayelako,
ngobe usiletsele tindzaba letingazange setingene etindlebeni tetfu. Ngako-ke singatsandza kutsi usichazele kutsi tisho kutsini.”
Phela tonkhe takhamiti netihambi tase-Athene taticitsa sonkhe sikhatsi sato ekukhulumeni nasekulaleleni nome ngabe yini lensha.
Pawula wema enhlanganweni yase-Ariyophagusi watsi: “Bantfu base-Athene, ngiyanibona kutsi niyakholwa impela.
Ngobe ngitsite ngisahambahamba kulelidolobha lenu ngibuka letindzawo lenikhontela kuto, ngakhandza nelilati lelibhalwe kutsi: ‘KUNKULUNKULU LONGATIWA.’
“Ngako-ke loko lenikukhonta ningakwati, ngiko-ke loku lengikushumayela kini.
LoNkulunkulu lowenta yonkhe indalo yemkhatsi, nguNkulunkulu welizulu nemhlaba, akahlali emathempelini lakhiwe ngetandla tebantfu.
Futsi akadzingi nalutfo lolungumsebenti webantfu labangamnika lona, ngobe yena nguye loniketa imphilo nekuphefumula nako konkhe kubantfu bonkhe.
Wenta tonkhe tive ngamuntfu munye kutsi tihlale ebusweni bonkhe bemhlaba, wemisa tikhatsi tekuphakama netekwehla kwato kanye nemikhawulo lapho kufanele tigcine khona.
Wakwenta loko kuze timfune kumbe tingamtfola ngesikhatsi tisamfuna, ibe kantsi Nkulunkulu akekho khashane ngisho nakumunye wetfu.
Ngobe siphila sihambe sikuye, njengobe sinje, netimbongi takini tishito tatsi:
ngobe umisile lilanga lapho ayakwehlulela khona umhlaba wonkhe ngeliciniso lelimsulwa ngemuntfu munye lamkhetsile; ngaye sewuvete siciniseko kubantfu bonkhe ngekutsi amvuse kulabafile.”
Kepha lamanye emadvodza atihlanganisa naye akholwa. Emkhatsini wawo bekukhona naDiyonisiyusi labelilunga le-Ariyophagusi nemfati labenguDamarisi kanye nalabanye.
Emvakwaloko Pawula wesuka e-Athene waya eKhorinte.

Lapho akhandzana neliJuda, libito lalo kungu-Akhwila lekutalwa ePhontusi belisandza kubuya eTaliyane nemkalo Phrisila, ngobe Klawudiyuse bekacoshe onkhe emaJuda kutsi akesuke eRoma. Pawula wase uyawubabona,
njengobe naye abenta umsebenti lofanana newabo, wekutfunga emathende, wahlala wasebentisana nabo.
Bekavamise kutsi njalo ngemaSabatha aye esinagogeni aphendvulane nemaJuda nemaGriki etama kuwazuza.
Batsi nabamphikisa bangavumelani naye bametfuka, watsintsitsa lutfuli etingutjeni takhe wase utsi kubo: “Ingati yenu ayibesemahlombe enu, mine sengite licala. Kusukela nyalo sengitakuya kubetive.”
Wesuka lapho wayawuhlala endlini yalomunye umuntfu bekutsiwa nguThithiyusi Justusi, sikhonti saNkulunkulu, indlu yakhe yayisedvute nelisinagoge.
Kepha Khrispusi, umphatsi welisinagoge, wakholwa eNkhosini kanye nendlu yakhe, nebantfu labanyenti baseKhorinte lababeve livi kuPawula, bakholwa, base bayabhajatiswa.
ngobe nginawe, futsi kute umuntfu lotakuhlasela akulimate, ngobe nginebantfu bami labanyenti kulelidolobha.”
Ngako-ke wabe sewuhlala umnyaka netinyanga letisitfupha afundzisa bantfu livi laNkulunkulu.
Kwatsi ngesikhatsi kuphetse Galiyo e-Akhaya, onkhe emaJuda ase ahlanganyela Pawula ambamba amyisa enkantolo,
atsi: “Lomuntfu lona ucindzetela bantfu kutsi bakhonte Nkulunkulu ngendlela lephambene nemtsetfo.”
kodvwa njengobe kusitfungo semibuzo nje ngemavi, nangemagama, nangemitsetfo yenu, tiboneleni nine ngekwenu; angingeni mine ekwehluleleni tintfo letinje.”
Besuka bonkhe babamba Sostenesi, umphatsi welisinagoge, bamshaya embikwenkantolo, kodvwa Galiyo akakunakanga loko.
Batsi nabefika e-Efesu, wabashiya lapho boPhrisila na-Akhwila, yena waya wangena esinagogeni waphendvulana nemaJuda.
Batsi bayamcela kutsi asahlale nabo sikhashana lesidze wala,
kodvwa nasabavalelisa watsi: “Ngitawubuye ngite kini, Nkulunkulu nakavuma.”
Watsi nakefika eKhesariya, wakhuphukela eJerusalema kuyawubingelela libandla, wase wehlela e-Antiyokhi.
Emvakwekuhlala sikhashana lapho wase uyesuka udzabula tigodzi tetifundza taseGalathiya naseFrigiya ahambe akhutsata bonkhe bazalwane.
Kwefika liJuda e-Efesu, libito lalo kungu-Apolosi, kungelekudzabuka e-Alekzandriya. Belikwati kukhuluma futsi liyati kakhulu imiBhalo.
Belifundzisiwe ngeNdlela yeNkhosi, ligcwele inshisekelo emoyeni walo; lafundzisa lichaza kahle emaciniso macondzana naJesu, kepha-ke lona belati ngembhabhatiso waJohane kuphela.
Lo-Apolosi wacala kushumayela ngesibindzi esinagogeni kwatsi kube Phrisila na-Akhwila bamuve, bamtsatsa bamyisa ekhaya bafike bamchazela kahle ngeNdlela yaNkulunkulu.
Kwatsi nasafuna kwewelela eGrisi, bazalwane bamkhutsata, base babhalela bazalwane kutsi babomemukela. Watsi kube efike, waba lusito lolukhulu kulabo bese bakholiwe ngemusa waNkulunkulu;
ngobe emaJuda wawehlula eshashalatini ngekuhlakanipha lokukhulu, awakhombisa ngekwemiBhalo kutsi Jesu unguKhristu.
wababuta watsi: “Namemukela yini Moya Longcwele ngesikhatsi nikholwa?”
Baphendvula batsi: “Asizange sesive ngisho nekuva kutsi kukhona Moya Longcwele.”
Pawula wababuta watsi: “Kepha nabhajatiswa ngamuphi umbhabhatiso?”
Batsi kube bakuve loko, base bayabhajatiswa egameni leNkhosi Jesu.
Kwatsi Pawula asabeka tandla etikwabo, behlelwa nguMoya Longcwele. Bakhuluma ngetilwimi letehlukene baphrofetha.
Babe ngemadvodza labengacishe abe li-12 sebabonkhe.
Kwaphela tinyanga letintsatfu seloku Pawula ahle aya esinagogeni abashumayela ngesibindzi ngembuso waNkulunkulu aphikisana nabo etama kubavumisa.

Kodvwa labanye kubo baba lukhuni bangete bavuma kukholwa, bakhuluma kabi ngaleNdlela yeNkhosi embikwabo bonkhe bantfu. Wase uyabashiya Pawula wahamba nebafundzi. Onkhe emalanga waba netinkhulumo aphikisana nabo eHholeni yaThiranusi.
Loku kwachubeka iminyaka lemibili, kwaze kwatsi onkhe emaJuda nemaGriki labehlala e-Asiya aliva livi leNkhosi.
kwakuze kutsi emaduku netidziya letike tamtsintsa timikiswe kulabagulako tifo tibayekele, nemimoya lemibi iphume kubo.
Bekungemadvodzana lasikhombisa labetalwa ngumPhristi Lomkhulu wemaJuda, lekwakutsiwa nguSkheva lawo labenta loko.
Lomuntfu labekhwelwe ngumoya lomubi wabesukela wabadladlabula ngelulaka nangemandla wabehlula. Babaleka bonkhe baphuma kuleyondlu bangcunu balimele kakhulu.
Onkhe emaJuda nebaletinye tive lababehlala e-Efesu nabeva loko, besaba kakhulu, kwatsi libito leNkhosi Jesu ladvunyiswa kakhulu.
Labanyenti labese bakholiwe beta bavuma konkhe labebakwentile.
Labanyenti balabo lababenemilingo baletsa tincwadzi tabo temilingo ndzawonye batokhela ngemlilo, bonkhe bantfu babuka. Bahlanganisa imali yaletincwadzi, kwatfolakala tinhlavu tesiliva letiti-50 000.
Indvodza lebeyisebentisa isiliva, libito layo kunguDemetriyusi, yayenta titfombe letincane telithempeli laDiyana, labengunkulunkulu lomsikati. Lomsebenti bewungenisa imali lenyenti kubakhandzi.
Wababitela ndzawonye kanye nalabanye lababesebenta umsebenti lofanana nalona, watsi kubo: “Madvodza, nani niyati kutsi lomsebenti siphila ngawo.

Niyatibonela, futsi niyativela konkhe lokwentiwa ngulendvodza lenguPawula. Utsi bonkulunkulu labakhiwe ngetandla abasibo bonkulunkulu sibili, sewugucule bantfu labanyenti, hhayi kuleli lase-Efesu kuphela kodvwa cishe kulo lonkhe lase-Asiya.

Kukhona ingoti yekutsi lomsebenti wetfu utfole ligama lelibi. Akusiko loko kodvwa kepha nengoti yekutsi lithempeli lankulunkulu lomkhulu, Diyana, lingeke lisanakwa ngumuntfu, kutawuphela bonkhe bukhulu bakhe, lonkulunkulu lokhontwa kulo lonkhe lase-Asiya nasemhlabeni wonkhe jikelele.”
Kwatsi kube bantfu bakuve loko, batfukutsela babila, bacala bamemeta batsi: “Lomkhulu nguDiyana webase-Efesu!”
Kwesuka lesikhulu siphitsiphitsi kulo lonkhe lidolobha. Sicuku sadvumela boGayusi na-Aristakhusi sabadvungulula sabayisa enkhundleni yemidlalo. Bona-ke babebaseMasedoniya, bahambisana naPawula.
Pawula bekafuna kuya yena matfupha abhekane nalesicuku, kepha bafundzi bamalela.
Labanye kulababephetse esifundzeni sase-Asiya lababevana naye batfumela ligama lekumncenga kutsi angaveli enkhundleni.
Kwesuka lesikhulu siphitsiphitsi, labanye bantfu bamemeta basho loku, labanye basho lokwa, labanyenti bebangati nekwati kutsi konje babetekwentani kulomhlangano.
Ngesikhatsi emaJuda asafucela Alekzanda ngembili, labanye betama kumtjela kutsi kwentekani. Alekzanda-ke waphakamisa sandla afuna kukhuluma ashwelete kulesicumbi.
Batsi kube babone kutsi ungumJuda, base bayamemeta kanyekanye sikhatsi lesingaba ngema-awa lamabili batsi: “Lomkhulu nguDiyana webase-Efesu!”

Ekugcineni mabhalane welidolobha waze wabathulisa, watsi: “Madvodza ase-Efesu, nonkhe niyati kutsi lelidolobha lase-Efesu ngulapho kuhlala khona lithempeli laDiyana lomkhulu kanye nelitje lelingcwele lelehla ezulwini.
Kute longakuphika loku. Ngako-ke musani kubanga umsindvo, ningatitsatseli etulu tintfo.
Niletse lamadvodza lapha, kani akazange agcekeze emathempelini enu, futsi akazange asho lutfo lolubi ngalonkulunkulu wetfu lomsikati.
Nakukhona lokungamenelisi kahle Demetriyusi kanye nalabanye bakhandzi, umtsetfo nemantji kukhona; ngako-ke bangamangalelana khona.
Nakusekhona lokunye lenikufunako kufanele kuyewulungiswa emhlanganweni wetakhamiti losemtsetfweni.
Ngobe sesisengotini yekubekwa licala ngalomsindvo lowenteke lapha lamuhla. Kute nesizatfu lesingasibeka mayelana nalomsindvo lowentekile.”
Emvakwalesiphitsiphitsi Pawula wabita labakholwako wabakhutsata, wabavalelisa, wabashiya, waya eMasedoniya.
Wadzabula tindzawo takhona ahamba akhutsata avuselela labakholwako ngemavi lamanyenti, waze wefika eGrisi,
lapho ahlala khona tinyanga letintsatfu. Besalungisela kuya eSiriya ngemkhumbi, nakeva kutsi emaJuda afuna kumbulala, wase ubona kutsi kuncono abuyele emuva ahambe ngaseMasedoniya.
Kepha tsine sahamba ngemkhumbi sisuka eFiliphi emvakweMkhosi Wesinkhwa Lesingenambiliso; kwatsi emvakwemalanga lasihlanu sahlangana nabo eThrowasi, lapho sacedza khona liviki.
Kwakukhanyiswe tibane letinyenti endlini lesetulu lapho besihlanganele khona.

Libhungu lebekutsiwa ngu-Oyithikhusi lalihleti efasitelweni. Kwatsi ngekuchubeka kwetinkhulumo taPawula Oyithikhusi wefikelwa butfongo walala, waze wawela phansi esuka esitezi sesitsatfu. Nase bamtsatsa, bakhandza kutsi sewufile.
Kodvwa Pawula wehla watijika etikwakhe wamgaca ngemikhono, wase utsi kulabo bebalapho: “Ningakhatsateki, akafi.”
Emvakwekube Pawula asabuyele etulu esitezi, wefika wahlephula sinkhwa wadla, wakhuluma nabo sikhatsi lesidze kwaze kwadzabuka kusa, wase uyahamba.
Balitsatsa lelibhungu balibuyisela ekhaya liphila, bajabula kakhulu.
Sachubeka saya emkhunjini sakhwela saya e-Asosi, lapho sasitawufike sitsatse khona Pawula njengekusho kwakhe, ngobe abehambe ngetinyawo.
Watsi kube ahlangane natsi e-Asosi, sase siyamekhweta saya naye eMithilene.
Sachubeka ngemkhumbi kusukela lapho, saze sefika malungana neKhiyosi ngakusasa. Ngelilanga lelilandzelako sabe sendlula eSamosi, kwatsi kulelilandzelako sefika eMilethusi.
Pawula bekemise kutsi ufuna kuya e-Efesu, kuze angacitsi sikhatsi eveni lase-Asiya. Bekajake kutsi efike eJerusalema ngelilanga lePhentekhoste nakwenteka.
AseseMilethusi Pawula watfumela umlayeto e-Efesu wacela babonisi belibandla kutsi bamhlangabete.
Batsi nabefika, watsi kubo: “Nani niyati kutsi bengiphila njani ngisesemkhatsini wenu ngaso sonkhe sikhatsi kusukela ngelilanga lengefika ngalo e-Asiya,
ngikhonta iNkhosi ngekutfobeka konkhe, nangetinyembeti, nangekulingwa lengahlangana nako ngemacebo emaJuda.
Niyati nekutsi kute lenganigodlela kona kunitjela nekunifundzisa embikwebantfu nasemakhaya enu, lokwakungahle kube lusito kini.
Kuwo emaJuda nemaGriki, ngalokufananako ngayala kakhulu ngiwatjela kutsi akaphendvukele kuNkulunkulu, nekutsi akholwe yiNkhosi yetfu Jesu.
Kepha-ke Moya Longcwele ungatisile kulelo nakulelo dolobha kutsi ngilindzelwe kuboshwa netinhlupheko.
Kepha ngikhandza kutsi imphilo yami ayisho lutfo kimi, nangabe nje ngingaphumisela indzima yami ngicedze nemsebenti lengawunikwa yiNkhosi Jesu, wekutsi ngifakaze ngeliVangeli lemusa waNkulunkulu.
“Bengihamba emkhatsini wenu nonkhe ngishumayela ngembuso waNkulunkulu. Manje-ke sengiyati kutsi kute namunye wenu loyawuphindze abone buso bami.
Ngako-ke ngiyafakaza kulelilanga lalamuhla ngitsi anginacala lengati yenu nonkhe.
Ngobe angizange nginifihlele lutfo lwentsandvo yaNkulunkulu.
Ticapheleni nine kanye nemhlambi wonkhe lobekwe etandleni tenu nguMoya Longcwele, neluse libandla laNkulunkulu latitsengela lona ngengati yeNdvodzana yakhe.
Ngiyati kutsi emvakwekuhamba kwami timphisi letesabekako tiyawufika emkhatsini wenu tihlasele tilimate umhlambi wetimvu.
Emkhatsini wenu kuyawuvela bantfu labayawufundzisa lokuphambene neliciniso badvonse emakholwa lamanyenti alandzele bona.
Ngako-ke caphelani nikhumbule kutsi ngetinyembeti letinyenti imini nebusuku benginifundzisa ngamunye ngamunye, kwaze kwaphela iminyaka lemitsatfu.
Manje-ke senginibeka esandleni seNkhosi kanye nasevini lemusa wayo, yona lenemandla ekunakha inikhulise ininike lifa labo bonkhe labahlantiwe.
Nani lucobo niyati kutsi ngangisebenta ngaletandla tami, ngentela kutfola konkhe lengangikudzinga kanye nalabo ngangisebenta nabo.
Nginikhombisile kanyenti kutsi ngekusebenta kakhulu kanje kufanele sibasite labeswele, nikhumbule nemavi eNkhosi Jesu lawasho nakatsi: ‘Kubusisiwe kupha kunekwemukela.’ ”
Bakhala bonkhe, Pawula bamgaca ngemikhono, bamanga.
Babedzabukiswe kakhulu ngemavi akhe labekawashito ekutsi ngeke baphindze babubone buso bakhe. Base bayamphekeletela baya naye emkhunjini.
Satsi kube sehlukane nabo, santjweza ngemkhumbi saze sefika eKhosi. Ngakusasa sefika eRodosi, satsi nasisuka lapho, sacondza ePhatara.
Sakhandza umkhumbi loya eFenisiya, sekhwela sahamba ngawo.
Sefika endzaweni lapho sabona khona sichingi saseSiphrosi, sasigudla ngaseningizimu saya eSiriya. Sehlela eThire, ngobe lapho bekutakwehla khona timphahla betisemkhunjini.
Sakhandza emakholwa, sahlala nawo liviki. Ngemandla aMoya Longcwele batjela Pawula kutsi angayi eJerusalema.

Kepha kwatsi kube kuphele sikhatsi sekuhlala kwetfu nabo, sabashiya sachubeka neluhambo lwetfu. Basiphekeletela bonkhe kanye nalabasikati nebantfwana, baze basibeka ngephandle kwalelidolobha. Sefika elugwini saguca sathandaza.
Sase siyavalelisana sakhwela emkhunjini, bona-ke babuyela emuva emakhaya.
Sachubeka neluhambo lwetfu sesuka eThire ngemkhumbi saya ePhitolemayisi, lapho sefika sabingelela bazalwane. Sahlala nabo lilanga linye.
Ngakusasa sahamba saze sefika eKhesariya. Sefike sangenisa sahlala emtini wemvangeli Filiphu lobekangulomunye webasiti lababesikhombisa.

Wefika kitsi watsatsa libhande laPawula walibopha etinyaweni nasetandleni takhe watsi: “Naku lokushiwo nguMoya Longcwele: ‘Umnikati walelibhande utawuboshwa ngemaJuda kanje eJerusalema amnikele etandleni tebetive.’ ”
Kodvwa waphendvula watsi: “Nikhalelani kanjena nize ningidzabukise enhlitiyweni? Angikalindzeli kuphela kutsi ngiboshwe eJerusalema kepha ngilungele nekutsi ngife ngenca yeNkhosi Jesu.”
Emvakwalawo malanga salungisa timphahla tetfu sakhuphukela eJerusalema.
Labanye bafundzi baseKhesariya bahamba natsi basiyisa emtini wendvodza lebesitawuhlala kayo, Mnasoni wekuchamuka eSiphrosi, lobekasalikholwa sikhatsi lesidze.
Pawula wababingelela wase ubanika umbiko lophelele mayelana nemsebenti lowentiwe nguNkulunkulu kubantfu betive ngaye.
Futsi sebatjeliwe ngawe kutsi bewufundzisa onkhe emaJuda lahlala emaveni aletinye tive kutsi akayekele umtsetfo waMosi, uwatjela nekutsi akayekele kusoka bantfwabawo nekwenta emasiko.
“Nakanjani batawuva kutsi sewufikile. Kufanele kwentiwe njani-ke ngaleyo ndzaba?
Yenta naku-ke lesikutjela kona. Kukhona emadvodza lamane lapha lente sifungo.

Hamba nalamadvodza utihlanganise nawo nitihlambulule ngekwelisiko, bese uwakhokhela tindleko tawo; atawube asahhula tinwele tetinhloko tawo. Ngekwenta njalo-ke bonkhe bantfu batakwati kutsi kute liciniso kuto tonkhe letintfo labatjelwe tona ngawe, kepha batakwati kutsi nawe uhamba ngawo umtsetfo waMosi.
Kepha-ke mayelana nebetive labakholwako sibatfumelele incwadzi, sabatjela kutsi bangakudli kudla lokwentelwe tithico, nengati, nesilwane lesitifele, nekutsi babalekele bugwadla.”
Kwatsi lapho sekusele kancane kutsi kuphele emalanga lasikhombisa, emaJuda ase-Asiya abona Pawula asethempelini, ase afaka kubantfu umoya wetikhova wekutsi basuse siphitsiphitsi, ambamba,

amemeta atsi: “Madvodza aka-Israyeli, sitani! Nangu lomuntfu lohamba tonkhe tindzawo afundzisa bantfu lokuphambene nesive sakitsi, nemtsetfo waMosi kanye nalendzawo. Manje-ke sewudzimate wafaka bantfu betive ethempelini kutsi batewungcolisa lendzawo lengcwele.”
Kwaba nesiphitsiphitsi kulo lonkhe lelidolobha, bantfu bagijimela ndzawonye babamba Pawula bamhudvulela ngephandle kwelithempeli, masinyane iminyango yavalwa.
Babesetama kumbulala Pawula ngesikhatsi kutfunyelwa ligama kukhenela wemabutfo aseRoma kutsi kukhona umsindvo losukile eJerusalema.
Masinyane khenela wahamba naletinye tindvuna temabutfo nemasotja baphutfuma kulesicuku. Satsi kube simbone lesicuku eta ahamba nemasotja, sayekela kushaya Pawula.
Khenela wacondza kuPawula wambamba, watsi akaboshwe ngetinketane letimbili. Wase uyababuta kutsi ngubani yena lomuntfu, nekutsi wenteni.

Labanye kulesicumbi bamemeta basho loku, nalabanye basho lokwa. Kwaba khona kungavumelani lokunyenti lokwaze kwabanga kutsi khenela angatfoli kahle kutsi kubangwani. Wase utsi kulamadvodza labehamba nawo akatsatse loPawula amyise emalawini emabutfo.
Atsi emasotja nakefika etitebhisini, ametjatsa, ngobe abona kutsi sicumbi sesimfuna ngetandla.
Sicumbi sebantfu sasimlandzela ngemuva simemeta sitsi: “Akabulawe!”
Kwatsi nase bafuna kumfaka esitokisini, Pawula wakhuluma nakhenela watsi: “Ngivumelekile yini kukhuluma nawe?”
Khenela wambuta watsi: “Uyakwati yini kukhuluma siGriki?
Nakunjalo, pho, akusiwe yini lomGibhithe losandza kususa lutfutfuva ngekubutsa ti-4 000 temadvodza latidlova, lavukela umbuso, wawaholela ehlane?”
Pawula waphendvula watsi: “Mine ngiliJuda lekutalwa eThasusi esigodzini saseSilisiya, ngisakhamuti selidolobha lelibaluleke kakhulu. Ase ungivumele ngikhulume nalabantfu!”
Khenela wamvumela. Pawula wema etitebhisini, waphakamisa tandla wababindzisa, batsi kube babindze wacala wakhuluma kubo ngesiHebheru watsi:
Batsi kube bamuve akhuluma ngesiHebheru, babindza batsi dvu, wachubeka watsi:
Ngangibahlupha kakhulu kuze kubesekufeni bonkhe lababelandzela leNdlela, ngibabophe ngibafake nasemajele bonkhe labadvuna nalabasikati;

ngisho umPhristi Lomkhulu neLiqoqo lonkhana lingangifakazela kutsi loku lengikushoko kuliciniso. Nganikwa ngabo tincwadzi letatiyimvume ticondziswe kubazalwane labangemaJuda eDamaseko, ngako-ke ngangicondze khona kuyawubopha labo bantfu ngibaletse la eJerusalema, baboshwe ngetinketane, batewujeziswa.”
Ngawela phansi ngeva livi litsi: ‘Sawula! Ye Sawula! Ungihluphelani?’
Ngabuta ngatsi: ‘Ungubani wena, Nkhosi?’ Wangiphendvula watsi: ‘NginguJesu waseNazaretha, lona lomhluphako.’
“Lamadvodza bengihamba nawo akubona lokukhanya, kodvwa akazange alive livi lalona abekhuluma nami.
Ngabuta ngatsi: ‘Kufanele ngenteni, Nkhosi?’ INkhosi yatsi kimi: ‘Sukuma uye eDamaseko, lapho utawutjelwa khona konkhe lokhetselwe kutsi ukwente.’
“Njengobe ngase ngiyimphumphutse ngiphandlwe ngulokukhanya, lamadvodza bengihamba nawo angidvonsa ngesandla saze sayawungena eDamaseko.
Kwakukhona indvodza, leyayingu-Ananiyase libito layo; yayikholwa, iwuhlonipha umtsetfo yatiswa ngiwo onkhe emaJuda labehlala eDamaseko,
yeta kimi, yafike yema eceleni kwami yatsi: ‘Mzalwane Sawula, ngibuke!’ Ngekuphatima kweliso ngabona, ngayibuka.
Yase itsi kimi: ‘Nkulunkulu wabokhokho betfu ukukhetsile kutsi wati intsandvo yakhe, ubone Lolungile wakhe, umuve akhuluma nawe ngeliphimbo lakhe,
ngobe utawuba ngufakazi wakhe wekutjela bonkhe bantfu loko lokubonile nalokuvile.
Pho, usebanjwe yini? Sukuma ubhajatiswe, utsetselelwe tono takho, ukhuleke egameni lakhe.’ ”
ngabona iNkhosi itsi kimi: ‘Nonopha uhambe lapha eJerusalema, ngobe bangeke babemukele bufakazi bakho ngami!’
Ngaphendvula ngatsi: ‘Nkhosi, ingani bati kahle-hle kutsi bengingena emasinagogeni ngibabophe ngibashaya bonkhe labakholwa nguwe.
Nangesikhatsi kubulawa Stefano, fakazi wakho, nami matfupha ngangikhona lapho, ngibambisene nalabo babulali bakhe ngekutsi ngibaphatsele timphahla tabo.’
INkhosi yatsi kimi: ‘Hamba, ngobe ngitakutfumela khashane kubetive.’ ”
Bamemeta badzabula timphahla tabo, basakata inhlabatsi emoyeni.
Lokhenela watsi Pawula akafakwe emalawini emasotja, nekutsi bamhlolisise ngekumbhambabula, kuze batewutfola kahle kutsi kwentiwa yini lokutsi bantfu baphambane naye kangaka.
Kodvwa kwatsi nase bambophile sebatawumbhambabula Pawula wakhuluma nalendvuna yelibutfo leyayime eceleni kwakhe watsi: “Kungumtsetfo yini kutsi wena ubhambabule umRoma asengakalahlwa licala?”
Indvuna yelibutfo yatsi kube ikuve loko, yahamba yaya kukhenela yabuta yatsi: “Utawutsini-ke nyalo, ngobe lendvodza ingumRoma?”
Ngako-ke khenela waya kuPawula, wefike wambuta watsi: “Ase ungitjele, ungumRoma yini?”
Lokhenela wase utsi: “Mine ngabukhiphela imali lenhle lobuRoma.”
Pawula wamphendvula watsi: “Kodvwa mine ngabutfola ngekutalwa.”
Ngako-ke labo babetawuphenya Pawula ngemibuzo bakhwesha kuye ngekushesha, nakhenela wesaba, nakabona kutsi Pawula ngumRoma ngekutalwa nekutsi abesambophe ngetinketane.

Khenela watsandza kwati kahle-hle kutsi emaJuda abembeka licala lani loPawula. Ngako-ke ngakusasa watsi akatfukululwe tinketane. Wase ubita umhlangano wetikhulu tebaphristi kanye nalo lonkhe Liqoqo. Waletsa Pawula embikwabo.

Pawula watsi kuye: “Nakanjani Nkulunkulu utakumukula nawe, wena ludvonga-ndzini lolupendwe lwaba mhlophe! Kantsi uhlalele kwehlulela mine ngekwemtsetfo, kodvwa wena ube uwephula ngekubatjela kutsi abangimukule?”
Lamadvodza abeme eceleni kwaPawula atsi: “Umetfukelani lomPhristi Lomkhulu waNkulunkulu?”
Watsi kube asho njalo, baFarisi nebaSadusi bacala baphikisana bodvwana, umhlangano wehlukana ekhatsi.
Phela baSadusi bebatsi kute kuvuka kulabafile, kute tingilosi, nekutsi kute nemimoya; kodvwa baFarisi babekholwa kutsi kokutsatfu kukhona.

Lomsindvo wekuphikisana waya ngekwandza, letinye tati temtsetfo telicembu lebaFarisi tasukuma tabeka inkhulumo lecosheme tatsi: “Asiliboni licala kulomuntfu. Kutawutsiwani-ke, nangabe umoya nome ingilosi yakhuluma ngempela kuye?”

Kuphikisana kwandza, kwadzimate kwashuba ngemandla kangangekutsi khenela waze wesaba kutsi Pawula bangahle bamdzabule ticucwana. Ngako-ke watfuma emasotja kutsi ewuke aye kulomhlangano efike amtsatse ngendluzula ayemfaka emalawini emasotja.
Ngakusasa ekuseni lamanye emaJuda ahlangana enta lisu, ase atibopha ngesifungo kutsi ngeke akudle kudla, nekunatsa angeke anatse angakambulali Pawula.
Base baya kubaphristi labakhulu netibondza tenkholo yemaJuda, bafike batsi: “Sesente sibopho lesimatima lapha, satsi ngeke sikufake kudla emlonyeni singakambulali Pawula.

Ngako-ke, nine neLiqoqo, tfumelani livi kukhenela wemaRoma nicele ehlise Pawula ete la kini, nente shangatsi kukhona lenifuna kukutfolisisa kahle ngalendzaba yakhe. Tsine-ke sitatilungiselela kutsi simbulale angakefiki lapha kini.”
Kodvwa umshana waPawula weva nakwakhiwa lelisu; ngako-ke waya emalawini emasotja wefike watjela Pawula.
Pawula wase ubita lenye yetindvuna wefike watsi kuyo: “Mikisa nali lijaha kukhenela; kukhona lelitambikela kona.”
Lendvuna yalitsatsa lelijaha, yaliyisa kukhenela yefike yatsi: “Siboshwa lesinguPawula singibitile sefike sangicela kutsi angiletse nali lijaha la kuwe, ngobe kukhona lelifuna kukutjela kona.”
Khenela walibamba ngesandla waya nalo emasitseleni, wefike walibuta watsi: “Yini lena lofuna kungitjela yona?”
Lamtjela latsi: “EmaJuda asavumelene ngekutsi akucele kutsi kusasa nje wehlise Pawula aye kulelibandla leLiqoqo, bente shangatsi leLiqoqo lifuna kutfolisisa kahle ngaye.

Kodvwa ungavumi, ngobe kukhona emadvodza langetulu kwema-40 latawube amlalele endleleni atembulala. Asente nesifungo kutsi angeke akudle kudla, nekunatsa angeke anatse angakabulali Pawula. Njengamanje nje, asalungele kukwenta loko, aseme ngawe nje kutsi eve kutsi wena utsini.”
Khenela, angakalikhululi lelijaha, walifica watsi: “Ungatjeli muntfu kutsi lendzaba sewuyibikile kimi.”

Khenela wase ubita tindvuna takhe letimbili utsi kuto: “Khetsani emasotja langema-200 niwatjele kutsi akatilungiselele kuya eKhesariya, nebagibeli bemahhashi labangema-70, nalabahlome ngetikhali babe ngema-200, nitilungiselele kusuka ngeli-awa lemfica kusihlwa.
Lamanye emahhashi niwalungiselele kugibelisa Pawula, nimphekeletele nize nifike naye kuLusibalukhulu Feliksi, nimetfule aphephile engotini.”
“Mine, Klawudiyusi Lisiyasi, ngibhalela wena, Lusibalukhulu Mhlonishwa Feliksi. Ngiyakubingelela.
“Njengobe ngangifuna kwati kutsi woneni, ngamewusela kuleLiqoqo lawo.
Ngakhandza kutsi kute nome kunye lakwentile lokungaze kumente afanelwe kubulawa nome afakwe advonse ejele; kuphela nje uboshelwe imibuzo nemitsetfo yabo.

Ngitsite kube ngive kutsi lamanye emaJuda atamlalela endleleni afuna kumbulala, ngase ngincoma kutsi ngimtfumele lapho kuwe masinyane, ngaphindze ngatjela nalabo labambeka licala kutsi bete batewuchaza kahle kuwe, kutsi bambeka licala lani lomuntfu.”
Emasotja enta njengobe abetjeliwe, atsatsa Pawula ahamba naye ebusuku, aze efika e-Antiphatrisi.
Ngakusasa emasotja labehamba ngetinyawo ancandzeka abuyela amalawini awo ashiya lawo abegibele emahhashi kutsi achubeke naye.
Efika eKhesariya, anika Lusibalukhulu lencwadzi, etfula naPawula etandleni takhe.
Lusibalukhulu watsi kube ayifundze lencwadzi, wase ubuta Pawula kutsi abephuma kusiphi sifundza. Watsi kube eve kutsi abephuma eSilisiya,
watsi: “Licala lakho ngitawulilalela kahle, nase kufike bamangaleli bakho.” Wase uyalisisa kutsi loPawula agcinwe ngekugadvwa esigodlweni saHerodi.

Kwabitwa Thethulusi wefike wabeka Pawula licala watsi: “Mhlonishwa! Sifanele kukubonga ngenhlakanipho yebuholi bakho lesiletsele kuthula sikhatsi lesidze kangaka, nekutsi tingucuko letinyenti letifanele kuba khona tiyenteka ekusiteni sive.
Kodvwa kuze ngingakubambeleli, bengisakucela ngemusa wakho kutsi sewumane usiboleke indlebe kancane.
Sikhandze kutsi lomuntfu uyingoti, ngobe ususa tiphitsiphitsi emkhatsini wemaJuda wonkhe umhlaba, kantsi futsi ungumholi walelicembu lekutsiwa ngemaNazaretha.
Wadzimate wetama nekuhlambalata lithempeli, sabe sesiyambopha, [sasifuna kumgweba ngekwemtsetfo wetfu,
kodvwa Khenela Lisiyasi, weta wafike wasemuka yena wamtsatsa ngenkhani.
Wakhipha umyaleto kutsi bonkhe labambeka licala abete kuwe.]
“Nawe matfupha nawungahle umbute nje, utativela ngekwakho uwatfole onkhe lamacala lesimbeka wona la embikwakho.”
NemaJuda asukuma nawo amvumela, atsi vele kunjalo.
Lusibalukhulu nasamkhombile Pawula kutsi akhulume, Pawula watsi: “Ngiyati kutsi bewungumgwebi walesive iminyaka leminyenti, ngako-ke ngiyatfokota kubeka inkhulumo yami yekutivikela la embikwakho.
abazange sebangikhandze mine ngiphikisana nemuntfu nome ngetama kususa siphitsiphitsi emkhatsini webantfu ethempelini, emasinagogeni nome-ke edolobheni.
Nabo bate nebufakazi baloko labangahle bangibeke licala ngako nje la embikwakho nyalo.
Kodvwa naku lengikuvuma kuwe kutsi: Mayelana naleNdlela, lebatsi bona kweduka, ngikhonta Nkulunkulu wabokhokho ngekukholwa konkhe lokusemtsetfweni nalokubhalwe kubaphrofethi,
ngekubeka litsemba kuNkulunkulu lababambelele kulo nabo lekutsi bonkhe bantfu, labalungile nalabangakalungi, bayawuvuka ekufeni.
Ngako-ke nami ngetama ngemandla ami onkhe ngetikhatsi tonkhe, kuze kutsi ngihlale nginanembeza longenacala kuNkulunkulu nakubantfu.
Bangikhandza ethempelini sengihlanjululiwe. Kwakungekho sicumbi sebantfu, kungekho nasiphitsiphitsi.
Kodvwa kwakunemaJuda lambalwa labephuma esifundzeni sase-Asiya lebekufanele nawo abe la embikwakho angibeke emacala,
nome-ke basho bona ngekwabo laba labalapha kutsi cala lini lengatfolakala nginalo ngesikhatsi ngisembikweLiqoqo labo,
ngaphandle kwentfo yinye nje lengayikhuluma ngisesemkhatsini wabo, ngamemeta ngatsi: ‘Lamuhla ngimangalelwe ngelitsemba lekutsi labafile bayawuvuka baphile.’ ”
Kodvwa Feliksi labesayatisisa kahle lendzaba yaleNdlela, kutsetfwa kwalelicala wakugucisa ngekutsi: “Lelicala ngiyawulijuba nasekufike Khenela Lisiyasi.”
Emvakwemalangana Feliksi weta nemkakhe Drusila labengumJuda; watfumela kwalandvwa Pawula lafike wamlalela asakhuluma ngekukholwa kuKhristu Jesu.

Kodvwa asachubeka achaza ngekutiphatsa kahle, kutibamba nangekugwetjwa lokuseta, Feliksi wetfuka watfutfumela wadzimate watsi: “Kwamanje ase uhambe. Ngitawuphindze ngikubite, nase ngitfole lesinye sikhatsi.”
Abenelitsemba lekutsi Pawula abetamdizela ngemali; ngako-ke abevame kuhle ambita akhulume naye.
Ekupheleni kweminyaka lemibili sikhundla saFeliksi satsatfwa nguPhokhiyusi Festusi. Njengobe Feliksi abefuna kutsandvwa ngemaJuda, wavele washiya Pawula asesejele.
Emvakwemalanga lamatsatfu Festusi afikile kuleso sifundza, wesuka eKhesariya waya eJerusalema.
Baphristi labakhulu nebaholi bemaJuda bachazisisa kungevani kwabo naPawula; base bancenga Festusi
kutsi amane ababonelele ngekuletsa Pawula eJerusalema, ngobe phela base bente lisu lekumenta silo sengubo endleleni.
Festusi wabaphendvula watsi: “Pawula siboshwa lesiseKhesariya, nami ngitawuncandzeka masinyane ngiye khona.
Ngako-ke nangabe kukhona emacala lenimbeka wona, khululani tiphatsimandla tenu ngihambe nato.”
Festusi wahlala nabo emalanga lasiphohlongo nome lalishumi, wase wehlela eKhesariya. Ngakusasa wahlala esihlalweni sakhe sekwehlulela, wase utfumela kutsi akuletfwe Pawula.
Watsi kube Pawula angene, lamaJuda bekete naye esuka eJerusalema amkaka ngala nangala, ambeka emacala lamanyenti nalamabi, labehluleka nekubeka bufakazi bawo.
Kodvwa Pawula wativikela ngekutsi: “Kute lengikonile lokuphambene nemtsetfo wemaJuda, nome nelithempeli, nome naKhesari.”
Festusi afuna kujabulisa emaJuda wabuta Pawula watsi: “Ungatsandza yini kuya eJerusalema kuyewutekwa lamacala labakubeke wona la embikwami?”
Kodvwa Pawula watsi: “Ngime embikwesihlalo sekwehlulela saKhesari, uMbusi, ngulapho-ke lakufanele licala lami litsetfwe khona. Kute lengiwone ngako emaJuda, njengobe nawe ukwati nje loko.

Nangabe kukhona lapho ngephule khona umtsetfo, ngenta lokufanele kutsi ngijeziswe ngekufa, angiceli kuphepha ekufeni; kodvwa nalingekho liciniso kulamacala labangibeka wona, kute umuntfu lofanele kunginikela etandleni tabo. Ngicela kuyakwembula ingubo kuKhesari, uMbusi.”
Festusi wase ufakana imilomo nebeluleki bakhe uphendvula Pawula utsi: “Sewucele kutsi lelicala lendluliselwe kuKhesari, ngako-ke utawuvele uhambe uye kuKhesari.”
Emvakwemalanga inkhosi Agripha naBhenise bavakashela eKhesariya ngenjongo yekwemukela Festusi.
Kulawo malanga basahleti lapho, Festusi wase utekela inkhosi ngalendzaba yaPawula utsi: “Kukhona indvodza lesiboshwa lesashiywa nguFeliksi;
nangiya eJerusalema, baphristi labakhulu bemaJuda netibondza tenkholo yabo bambeka emacala lamanyenti, bangicele nekutsi ngimehlulele ngekumlahla ngelicala.

Ngabaphendvula ngekutsi akusiwo umtsetfo wetfu tsine maRoma kutsi silahle umuntfu ngelicala, angakalitfoli litfuba lekubhekana nebamangaleli bakhe buso nebuso atiphendvulele ngaloko labambeka ngako licala.
Batsi kube befike bahlangane lapha, angizange ngicitse sikhatsi, kodvwa kwatsi kusa ngakusasa ngavele ngahlala esihlalweni sekwehlulela, ngatfumela kutsi ayiletfwe lendvodza.
Bamangaleli bakhe abambekanga emacala langako ebugelekece, njengobe ngangibhekile.
Ngadzidzeka nje kutsi ngingayihlolisisa kanjani lendzaba yakhe, ngako-ke ngase ngibuta yena kutsi angatsandza yini kuya eJerusalema kuyewutekwa lamacala akhe khona.
Kodvwa Pawula wacela kutsi lokutekwa kwelicala lakhe akwendluliselwe ku-Agustusi, uMbusi, lofanele alijube; ngase ngitjela emasotja kutsi amgadze, kuze kufike sikhatsi sekumetfula kuKhesari.”
Agripha watsi kuFestusi: “Ngifuna kutivela nayikhuluma lendvodza.”
Kodvwa mine ngekwami kute lokubi lengitfole kutsi ikwentile lokungayenta ize ijeziswe ngentsambo. Kodvwa njengobe yona icele kutsi ilendlulisele ku-Agustusi, nami-ke sengincume kuyitfumela kuye.

Kodvwa kute lokumcoka lenginako lengingahle ngikubhalele uMbusi ngayo. Ngiko nje ngiyiletse la embikwenu, ikakhulu kuwe, Nkhosi Agripha, khona litawutsi lingahlolwa lelicala layo nami ngibe nako lengingakubhala.
Ngobe ngibona shangatsi kungaba bulima kimi kutsi ngingatfumela siboshwa kuye ngingachazi kutsi cala lini lesibekwe lona.”
Agripha watsi kuPawula: “Ukhululekile, kutsi ungatikhulumela nawe, utivikele.” Pawula wase uphakamisa sandla sakhe uyatikhulumela ativikela watsi:
“Nkhosi Agripha! Ngitivela nginenhlanhla kutsi lamuhla embikwakho ngitatikhulumela ngitivikele kuwo onkhe lamacala lengibekwe wona ngemaJuda,
kakhulu ngobe naku wena utetayele timphikiswano nemasiko emaJuda, ngako-ke ngiyakuncenga kutsi ungilalele ngekubeketela.
“Onkhe emaJuda ayayati imphilo yami kusukela ebuncaneni bami, ngisahlala eveni lakitsi kanye naseJerusalema.

Ngihleti sikhatsi lesidze nabo bayangati; futsi bangakufakaza loko, nabatsandzako, kutsi ngekwenkholo ngangiphila ngililunga lebaFarisi, licembu lelikhonta Nkulunkulu ngekulandzela tibopho temiyalo nemitsetfo.
Manje lo ngime lapha ngibekwe licala lekwetsemba setsembiso saNkulunkulu lasetsembisa kubokhokho betfu.
Ngiso lesetsembiso lesasibhekwe tive takitsi letili-12 kutsi sigcwaliseke, njengobe tikhonta Nkulunkulu ngesineke imini nebusuku. Nguleso setsembiso-ke, Nkhosi, langibeke licala ngaso emaJuda.
Kwentiwa yini lokutsi nine ningakholwa kutsi Nkulunkulu uyabavusa bantfu labafile?
Ngavele ngakwenta loko eJerusalema. Nganikwa baphristi labakhulu emandla neligunya lekubabopha ngibafake ejele bonkhe labangcwele, sasitsi sijubo selicala singaba yintsambo nami ngisisekele ngevoti.

Ngadlanga ngekubajezisa emasinagogeni ngibacindzetela kutsi bakugceke kukholwa kwabo. Ngangibacansukela kakhulu kangangekutsi ngadzimate ngabalandzela nome sebabalekele kulamanye emadolobha langephandle.”
“Kwabangelwa nguloko-ke kuya kwami eDamaseko sengitfole emandla neligunya kubaphristi labakhulu.
Kwakusemini lenkhulu emgwacweni, Nkhosi, nangibona kukhanya lokwakwendlula kwelilanga kuphuma ezulwini kwangibaneka kwangitungeleta kanye nalabo ngangihamba nabo.
Sonkhe sawela phansi, ngeva livi likhuluma kimi ngesiHebheru litsi: ‘Sawula! Ye Sawula! Ungihluphelani? Kulukhuni kuwe kukhahlela etinchijini.’
“Mine ngase ngitsi: ‘Ungubani wena, Nkhosi?’ INkhosi yaphendvula yatsi: ‘NginguJesu, lona lomhluphako.
Kodvwa sukuma ume ngetinyawo takho, ngobe ngitibonakalisele loko kuwe kutsi ngikwente ube sisebenti sami nafakazi wami ngaloku lokubonile ngami lamuhla, kanye naloko lengitawutibonakalisa ngako kuwe.
Ngitawukusindzisa esiveni saka-Israyeli nebetive lengikutfuma kubo.

Utawuvula emehlo abo, kuze besuke ebumnyameni bagucukele ekukhanyeni besuke nasemandleni aSathane baye kuNkulunkulu, kuze batsetselelwe tono tabo babelwe nendzawo emkhatsini walabahlantwe ngekukholwa kimi.’ ”
kodvwa ngashumayela kusukela khona eDamaseko, naseJerusalema, nakulo lonkhe laseJudiya nakubetive ngimemetela kutsi abaphendvuke babuyele kuNkulunkulu bente imisebenti lekhombisa kuphendvuka.
Ngiko loko-ke lokwenta emaJuda angibambe ethempelini afune kungibulala.

Kodvwa kuze kube ngulamuhla Nkulunkulu usangisitile. Ngako-ke namanje lo ngime la ngifakaza kubo bonkhe bantfu, labancane nalabakhulu, hhayi lokunye, kodvwa kona loko lokwashiwo baphrofethi naMosi kutsi kuyakwenteka,
kutsi Khristu kufanele ahlupheke afe nekutsi abe wekucala kuvuka ekufeni, bese umemetela kukhanya kumaJuda nakubetive.”
Kodvwa Pawula waphendvula watsi: “Angihlanyi, Mhlonishwa Festusi! Kodvwa ngikhuluma liciniso leliphilile nalelimsulwa.
Nkhosi Agripha! Ngikhuluma kuwe ngaso sonkhe sibindzi, ngobe uyakwati konkhe loku. Ngineliciniso kutsi tonkhe letintfo utibonile ngobe atentekanga emasitseleni.
Nkhosi Agripha, uyabakholwa yini baphrofethi? Noko ngiyati kutsi uyabakholwa!”
Agripha wase utsi kuPawula: “Cishe wangenta umKhristu ngesikhashana!”
Inkhosi yase iyasukuma, naLusibalukhulu, naBhenise, nabo bonkhe lababelapho basukuma.
Nase baphumile, sebakhulumisana bodvwana batsi: “Lendvodza ayikenti lutfo lolufanele kutsi ife nome iboshwe.”
Agripha wase ukhuluma kuFestusi utsi: “Lendvodza bekufanele ikhululwe, kube beyingakaceli kutsi lelicala layo lendluliselwe kuKhesari.”

Sakhwela emkhunjini lowawusuka e-Adramithiyamu lowase utawusuka uye etikhumulweni temikhumbi elugwini lwase-Asiya, nembala salucala luhambo lwetfu siphekeletelwa ngu-Aristakhusi labewaseMasedoniya esuka eThesalonika.
Ngakusasa sangenisa eSidoni, naJuliyusi wamphatsa kahle Pawula, wamvumela nekutsi ayewubonana nebangani bakhe asho nekusho kutsi abonakekelwa kahle.
Sesuka lapho sachubeka ngemkhumbi; kodvwa njengobe umoya bewuphambene natsi, sahamba sagudla sichingi saseSiphrosi.
Sancamula lwandle ngaseSilisiya nePhamfiliya, saze sangena eMira yaseLisiya,
lapho indvuna yatfola umkhumbi lowawuchamuka e-Alekzandriya nawo lowawucondze eTaliyane, ngako yase isigibelisa kuwo.

Sahamba sesihamba kancane emalanga lamanyenti, nangebulukhuni lobukhulu, kodvwa ekugcineni saze sefika ngasedolobheni laseKhinidusi. Umoya wasivimbela kutsi sichubeke ngaleyo ndlela, ngako sase siyajika sigudla sichingi saseKhrethe sehla saze sendlula eKapa laseSalmone.
Sehla singafuni kukhweshela lusentse lwesihlenge, noko sihamba kalukhuni kabi saze sefika endzaweni leyayibitwa ngekutsi Sikhumulo Sekuphepha, sesisedvutane nelidolobha laseLaseya.

“Madvodza, ngiyabona kutsi kusukela lapha luhambo lwetfu lutawugcwala tingoti; kutaba khona umonakalo lomkhulu kabi, hhayi etimphahleni letisemkhunjini nasemkhunjini kuphela, kodvwa nasemphilweni yetfu.”
Kodvwa indvuna yabo yayinakekele kakhulu loko beyikutjelwa litilosi lemkhumbi kanye nemphatsi wemkhumbi yangete yakunaka loko lokwakushiwo nguPawula.

Ngobe-ke kwakuyingoti nekuhlala kuleso sikhumulo ebusika labanyenti bebancokombele kona kutsi akuchutjekwe kwetanywe kuyawufika eFeniksi, nakwenteka. Leso bekusikhumulo saseKhrethe lesasibheke eNshonalanga yeNingizimu neNshonalanga yeNyakatfo, lapho bebangahle bacitse khona lobo busika.
Umoyana waseningizimu wacala kuhhusha, nabo bacabanga kutsi sebatawuphumelela, ngako base bakhuphula sisimiso semkhumbi bantjweza bagudla lusentse lwaseKhrethe.
Kodvwa masinyane nje kwachamuka umoya lomkhulu lobewubitwa ngekutsi yiNyakatfo-Mphumalanga, lowahhusha uchamuka esichingini.
Umkhumbi wawubhekene nawo, ngako wehluleka kuchubeka sase siyawuvumela kutsi usiphephule.
Saze satfola kukhosela nasigudla sichingana lesitsiwa iKhawuda. Lapho-ke nome kwakulukhuni, kodvwa sakhona kusibamba sikebhe semkhumbi.

Basikhweta base bankinkela umkhumbi ngetindophi esiswini sawo, ngobe bebesaba kutsi bangahle baphahlateke esihlabatsini lesingaselugwini lweLibhiya; ngako kwehliswa liseyili, kwayekelwa umkhumbi kutsi wemuke nemoya.
Sachubeka sihhushuhhushu semoya sawuphephula umkhumbi, kwatsi ngelilanga lelilandzelako bacala kuphungula umtfwalo ngekulahla letinye tintfo letatisindza.
Kwatsi ngelilanga lesitsatfu bachubeka banyomula letinye tigcobo temkhumbi letatisindza batilahla bona ngetandla tabo.
Kwaba ngemalanga lamanyenti singaliboni lilanga netinkhanyeti, nesiphepho sachubeka nekucinisa kuhhusha, saze saphelelwa nalitsemba lekutsi singaphindze siphile.
Emvakwemalanga singasafaki lutfo etfunjini, Pawula wasukuma wema emkhatsini wabo watsi: “Madvodza, kube nangilalela nangete nesuka eKhrethe, ngabe asikangeni kulenhlupheko lengaka.
Namanje ngiyanincenga, manini sibindzi. Kute namunye lotawufa, kodvwa umkhumbi wona utakufa uphele nya.
Ngobe kulobusuku balamuhla ingilosi yaNkulunkulu, lengiwakhe nalengimkhontako, ime eceleni kwami
yatsi: ‘Ungesabi, Pawula, ufanele ume embikwaKhesari; Nkulunkulu ukunikile bonkhe laba lohamba nabo.’
Ngako-ke, madvodza, manini sibindzi, ngobe ngiyametsemba Nkulunkulu kutsi kutawuba njengaloku angitjelile.
Kwase kulilanga leli-14 sintanta elwandle lwase-Adriya, sekungusekhatsi nebusuku bashayeli bemkhumbi basola shangatsi besebasondzele eveni lelitsite.

Ngako base behlisa insimbi yekukala kutsi sekushona kangakanani, batfola kutsi lamanti angemamitha langema-40 kushona kwawo; bachubeka sikhashana baphindza bakala futsi, base batfola kutsi asangemamitha langema-30 kushona kwawo.
Babesaba kutsi umkhumbi wetfu ungahle uphahlateke ematjeni, ngako base behlisa tisimiso temkhumbi letine ngemuva kwemkhumbi, bafisa kutsi kuse,
ngako bashayeli bemkhumbi betama kubaleka ngekwehlisela umkhumbi emantini bashaya sengatsi behlisela letinye vtisimiso ngembili kwemkhumbi.
Kodvwa Pawula watjela lendvuna yembutfo watsi: “Nangabe labashayeli balomkhumbi babaleka, kute lotawuphila lapha emkhunjini.”
Ngako emasotja atijuba letintsambo letatisimise sikebhe, asiyekela sahamba.
Lilanga lase litawuphuma, ngako Pawula wabancenga bonkhe kutsi badle kudla watsi: “Senicedze emalanga lali-14 solomane ningadli lutfo!
Ngako-ke ngiyanicela kutsi nidle, nidzinga kudla khona nitewuba nemandla. Ngeke kulahleke ngisho nalunye lunwele lwetinhloko tenu.”
Watsi kube asho loko Pawula watsatsa sinkhwa wabonga kuNkulunkulu embikwabo bambuka bonkhe, wasihlephula wacala wadla.
Ngako-ke nabo bema sibindzi bacala badla.
Kwatsi nase sidle sonkhe sesutsa, kwase kuphungulwa umkhumbi ngekulahla kolo emantini.
Kwatsi sekusa, bashayeli bemkhumbi solo bangaluboni lusentse, babona sikhumbi sinesihlabatsi, base bancoma kutsi bayewufika kuso nakwenteka, ngobe bebafuna kuwumisa khona lapho umkhumbi.

Ngako base bajuba tintsambo letatibambe tisimiso, batiyekela tacwila elwandle, ngaso leso sikhatsi bakhumula imiphini yekucondzisa umkhumbi, baphakamisa liseyili lelingembili, kuze kutsi umoya ufucele umkhumbi esihlabatsini lesasingembili.

Kodvwa umkhumbi washayisa ngenhloko esibundvumeni wabhajwa. Inhloko yemkhumbi yembeleka yangabe isakwati kufuceka, kwabe kungulapho lingemuva lemkhumbi lifohloteka, laze laba tincetu lephulwa sihhushuhhushu semagagasi.
Emasotja enta lisu lekubulala tonkhe tiboshwa, kubete nasinye lesitawuhlamba sidzimate siphunyule.
Kodvwa indvuna yelibutfo ifuna kusindzisa Pawula, yawalela kuloko, esikhundleni salokho yatsi: “Bonkhe labakwatiko kuhlamba abadvumele emantini kucala bahlambe baye elusentseni.
Laba labanye batawulandzela ngemuva bahlambe ngekugibela emapulangweni nome etincentwini temkhumbi, baze befike elusentseni.” Sasindza kanjalo-ke sonkhe, sahlamba saze sefika elusentseni, sewela.
Bantfu bakulesichingi baba nemusa lomkhulu kitsi. Lase licale kuna, ngako kwase kumakhata, base basibasela umlilo, sotsa.
Pawula wasabutela tinkhunyana; watsi asatibasa, kwachamuka inyoka, icoshwa kushisa, yaluma Pawula, yaze yanamatsela yalenga esandleni sakhe.
Lesive saseMaltha satsi nasibona lenyoka inamatsele esandleni saPawula, samsola satsi: “Lomuntfu ngumtsakatsi, nome asaphunyulile elwandle nkulunkulu wekujezisa, longuDikhe, akamvumeli kutsi aphile.”
Pawula wamane wayitsintsitsela emlilweni nje lenyoka angakalimali ndzawo.

Babeloku babheke kutsi bambone avuvuka nome bambone ashayeka phansi afe. Kodvwa emvakwekuba sebabheke kwaze kwaba sikhatsi lesidze, babona kungenteki lutfo kuPawula, bajikisa tingcondvo tabo batsi: “Lomuntfu ungunkulunkulu.”
Bucamamana nje kwaleyo ndzawo bekunemasimi aPhupliyuse, umbusi walesichingi, wasemukela kahle nangemusa emalanga lamatsatfu asiphatsa njengetivakashi takhe.
Uyise waPhupliyuse abesembhedzeni agula, aphetfwe yimbo nesisu sengati. Pawula wangena endlini yakhe, wakhuleka, wambeka tandla, wamphilisa.
Kwatsi kube kwenteke loko, tonkhe tigulane takulesichingi taletfwa tafike taphiliswa tonkhe.
Ngako base basipha tipho letinyenti. Kwatsi nome sesihamba, basipha lesasingahle sikudzinge endleleni.
Ngemvakwetinyanga letintsatfu sesuka ngemkhumbi wase-Alekzandriya, lowawubitwa ngekutsi: “Emaphahla Asezulwini.” Wawucitse busika esichingini.
Sefika edolobheni laseSirakhusi, sahlala emalanga lamatsatfu.
Sesuka lapho sajikeleta, saze sefika edolobheni laseRegiyumu. Ngakusasa umoya wacala kubhenguta uchamuka eningizimu, kwatsi ngemalanga lamabili sefika edolobheni lasePhutheyoli.
Sakhandza bazalwane, basicela kutsi sihlale nabo liviki, sahlala; sabe sesendlulela eRoma.
Bazalwane baseRoma bese bevile ngatsi, ngako base bayasihlangabeta eMakethe yaka-Aphiyusi neMahhotela Lamatsatfu. Pawula watsi kube ababone labazalwane, wabonga Nkulunkulu wase uma nesibindzi.
Angiphenya asafuna kungikhulula ngobe angalitfolanga licala lelalifanele kutsi ngilifele.
Kodvwa kwatsi ngobe emaJuda akuphikisa loko, ngacindzeteleka kutsi ngitetikhalela kuKhesari, hhayi ngobe ngangihlose kubeka sive sakitsi licala.
Kungako ngicele kunibona nje ngikhulume nani; ngobe ngiboshwe ngaletinketane ngenca yakhe lolitsemba lebantfu baka-Israyeli.”
EmaJuda atsi kuye: “Kute tincwadzi lesititfolile tsine letikhuluma ngawe tiphuma eJudiya, kute namunye kubazalwane lowabuya netindzaba khona, ngisho kukhuluma lutfo nje lolubi ngawe.
Kodvwa noko sifuna kuva ngawe umcondvo wakho, ngobe siyati kutsi live lonkhe likhuluma kabi ngalenkholo lohambisana nayo.”
Labanye beneliswa ngulamavi akhe, noko labanye abazange bakholwe.
Ngako base bahamba baphikisana bodvwana, lapho Pawula asabeke inkhulumo letsi: “Maye, washo kahle Moya Longcwele nakakhuluma ngemphrofethi Isaya kubokhokho benu,
Watsi kube acedze kusho njalo Pawula, ase ayahamba emaJuda ahamba aphikisana odvwana adzatisana inkhani.]
Wacedza iminyaka lemibili Pawula ahleti lapho, ahlala endlini labeyicashile. Abemukela ngetandla totibili bonkhe labebeta batemvakashela.
Abeshumayela ngembuso waNkulunkulu, afundzisa ngeNkhosi Jesu Khristu akhuluma ngesibindzi nangekukhululeka lokukhulu.
LingeNdvodzana yakhe, iNkhosi yetfu Jesu Khristu, ebuntfwini bakhe watalwa awesitukulwane saDavide;
ngebungcwele bakhe basezulwini kwakhonjiswa ngemandla lamakhulu kutsi uyiNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu ngekutsi avuswe ekufeni.
Ngaye loJesu semukele umusa nebuphostoli, kuze kutsi egameni lakhe bantfu etiveni tonkhe sibaholele ekukholweni nasekutfobeleni Nkulunkulu.
Nani nikuleto tive, nibitelwe kutsi nibe baJesu Khristu.
Akube kini umusa nekuthula lokuvela kuBabe wetfu Nkulunkulu naseNkhosini Jesu Khristu.
Nkulunkulu lengimkhonta ngemoya wami wonkhe ngekushumayela liVangeli leNdvodzana yakhe ungufakazi wami wekutsi nginikhumbula kangakanani emithandazweni yami onkhe emalanga.
Sonkhe sikhatsi emikhulekweni yami ngincusa kutsi Nkulunkulu, ngentsandvo yakhe, awente ematfuba ekutsi nginivakashele nome nini.
Maye, ngiyafisa kunibona khona ngitewucetunelana nani sipho saMoya kuze nitewucina.
Ngisho kutsi nine nami sitewusitakala kanyekanye, nine ngekukholwa kwami, nami ngekukholwa kwenu.
ngobe nginemtfwalo kubo bonkhe, emaGriki nalabangakaphucuki, labafundzile nalabangakafundzi.
Ngiko nje ngilambele kushumayela liVangeli nakini lenihlala eRoma.
Ngobe liVangeli lembula kutsi Nkulunkulu wenta kanjani kutsi bantfu balungelane naye: Kungekukholwa, kusuka ekucaleni kuye ekugcineni, njengobe umBhalo utsi: “Lolungile ngekukholwa utawuphila.”
Nkulunkulu uyabajezisa, ngobe loko labangahle bakwati bantfu ngaNkulunkulu kusebaleni, njengobe yena cobo lwakhe akubonakalisile kubo.

Kusukela ekudalweni kwemhlaba nemkhatsi emandla akhe laphakadze nebuNkulunkulu bakhe bebufihlekile emehlweni ebantfu; noko bebukhona etingcondvweni kutsi bubonakale etintfweni latentile. Ngako-ke bate taba;
ngobe batsi kantsi Nkulunkulu bayamati bangete bambonga bamnike neludvumo lolumfanele njengaNkulunkulu. Esikhundleni saloko imicabango yabo yaba lite, netinhlitiyo tabo taba mnyama.
bashiya bukhosi baNkulunkulu longabhubhi, bakhonta umfanekiso wemuntfu lobhubhako, newetinyoni, newetilwane letihamba ngetinyawo letine, newaletihamba ngesisu.
Baguculele liciniso laNkulunkulu balenta emanga; bakhonta, badvumisa indalo kunekukhonta nekudvumisa uMdali lokunguyena abongeka kuze kube phakadze. Amen.
Kanjalo nemadvodza ayekele kulalana nalabasikati, kodvwa adliwa yinkhanuko ase alalana odvwana; ngako atfola sijeziso lesifanele kona kwawo.
Njengobe abafunanga kumati Nkulunkulu, ngako wababukelela, tingcondvo tabo taba butsakatsaka, netimilo tabo tonakala.
Bagcwele tonkhe tinhlobo tebubi: kona, nekuhawukela, nekuzindlekela; bagcwele umona, nekubulala, nekulwa, nemacebo, nebucili, nenhlebo.
Bakhuluma kabi ngalabanye, batondze Nkulunkulu, bangahloniphi, batigcabhe, batikhukhumete, bacambe lokubi, bangahloniphi batali babo;
abehlukanisi lokuhle kulokubi, abatigcini tetsembiso tabo, abanalutsandvo, abanasihawu.
Bayawati umtsetfo waNkulunkulu lotsi bantfu labenta tintfo letinje bafanele kufa, kepha bona abagcini ngekutenta kuphela kodvwa besuka bavumelana nalabo labatentako.
Siyati kutsi Nkulunkulu akasenti siphosiso nakehlulela bantfu labenta lokubi.
Kodvwa wena muntfu-ndzini, wenta loko nawe lowehlulela ngako labanye bantfu! Ucabanga kutsi uyawuphepha yini ekwahlulelweni kwaNkulunkulu?
Kumbe uyayedzelela yini ingcebo yemusa wakhe, nekubeketela kwakhe, nekumela bulukhuni kwakhe? Awati yini kutsi umusa waNkulunkulu nguwo lokuholela ekuphendvukeni?
Kodvwa ngebulukhuni nangenkhani yekungaphendvuki kwenhlitiyo yakho, utibekela lulaka lube lukhulu ngelilanga lelulaka. Ngalelo langa iyawukhanya indlela Nkulunkulu lehlulela ngayo kutsi imsulwa.
Phela Nkulunkulu uyawuvuza wonkhe umuntfu njengekwemisebenti yakhe.
Labanye bantfu bachubeka benta lokuhle, bafuna tibusiso, neludvumo nekuphila lokungabhubhi; labo-ke Nkulunkulu uyawubanika kuphila lokuphakadze.
Labanye bantfu baticabanga bona, bangakwemukeli loko lokuliciniso, bese balandzela loko lokungesiko; kulabo Nkulunkulu uyawutfululela lulaka nentfukutselo yakhe.
Kuyawuba khona kuhlupheka nebuhlungu lobumatima kubo bonkhe bantfu labenta lokubi, kucale kumaJuda bese kulandzela betive.
Kepha kuyawuba khona inkhatimulo, neludvumo, nekuthula kubo bonkhe labenta lokuhle, kucale emaJuda bese-ke kulandzela betive.
Bonkhe labone bate umtsetfo bayawubhujiswa ngaphandle kwemtsetfo, nalabo labone banemtsetfo bayakwehlulelwa ngemtsetfo.
Ngobe akusibo labawuvako umtsetfo labalungile kuNkulunkulu, kepha ngulabo labawentako umtsetfo labayakwemukelwa nguNkulunkulu ngekutsi balungile.
Ngekwemvelo betive bate umtsetfo, kodvwa nabatentela loko lokufunwa ngumtsetfo, kungumtsetfo kubo, nome bate umtsetfo.

Batiphatsa ngendlela lekhombisa kutsi loko lokufunwa ngumtsetfo kubhalwe etinhlitiyweni tabo. Nanembeza wabo uyabafakazela kutsi loko kuliciniso, njengobe nemicabango yabo ngaletinye tikhatsi iyabalahla, nangaletinye tikhatsi iyabavumela.
NgekweliVangeli lami ngaKhristu Jesu kuyawuba njalo nangalelo langa Nkulunkulu layakwehlulela ngalo lokufihlekile kwebantfu.
Uyayati intsandvo yaNkulunkulu ngekuyifundza emtsetfweni, uyakwati nekukhetsa lokuncono.
Uneliciniso kutsi wena ungumkhombi wendlela kulaba labatimphumphutse, nekukhanya kulabasebumnyameni.
Nguwe umceceshi walabangati nemfundzisi walabangakafundzi, wati kahle kutsi emtsetfweni kunelwati loluphelele ngeliciniso.
Pho, njengobe ufundzisa labanye, wena awutifundzisi ngani? Wena ushumayela kutsi kungebiwa, pho, wena ubelani?
Utsi akungaphingwa, pho, wena uphingelani? Utondza tithico, kodvwa uwagcekezelani emathempeli?
Utigabatisa ngekuba nemtsetfo waNkulunkulu, kepha umhlaziselani Nkulunkulu ngekwephula umtsetfo wakhe?
Kubhaliwe kutsi: “Ngenca yenu, betive bahlambalata ligama laNkulunkulu.”
Kusoka kwakho kunalo lusito nawugcina umtsetfo, kepha nawephula umtsetfo kusoka kwakho kuyafanana nekungasoki.
Nangabe wetive, longakasoki, agcina imiyalo yemtsetfo, angeke yini Nkulunkulu amtsatse njengemuntfu losokile?
Ngako-ke wena mJuda, uyawulahlwa ngumuntfu wetive, ngekutsi yena ugcina umtsetfo nome angazange asasoke enyameni, ngobe wena wephula umtsetfo nome unawo ubhalwe phansi, kantsi futsi usokile.
UmJuda akusiye umJuda ngalokubonakalako, nekusoka akusiko loko lokubonakala emehlweni kuphela.
Kodvwa umJuda weliciniso ngumuntfu longumJuda ngekhatsi, lokusho kutsi, usoke enhlitiyweni ngaMoya, hhayi ngalokubhaliwe. Umuntfu lonjalo-ke ubongeka kuNkulunkulu, hhayi kubantfu.
Pho, emaJuda ancono ngani kunalabanye bantfu? Kusita ngani kusoka?
Vele kusita ngalokuphelele. Kwekucala Nkulunkulu emavi akhe wawaphatsisa emaJuda.
Pho, nangabe lamanye emaJuda angazange etsembeke-ke, ngabe loko kusho kutsi kungetsembeki kwawo kungacedza kwetsembeka kwaNkulunkulu yini?
Cha, akusho loko. Nkulunkulu wetsembekile, nome bonkhe bantfu bangaba nemanga, njengobe kubhaliwe kutsi:
Cha, akunjalo. Pho, nangakalungi Nkulunkulu, angawehlulela kanjani umhlaba?
Kodvwa nangabe bucili bami busita ludvumo lwaNkulunkulu ngekwenta liciniso lakhe libonakale kakhulu, ngingalahlelwani njengesoni?
Pho, akushiwo ngani-ke kutsi: “Asente lokubi, khona kutawuvama lokuhle”? Labanye bantfu, badzimate bangetfuka ngekungibeka licala ngekutsi ngikhuluma kanjalo! Bayawulahlwa njengobe kufanele.
Ngobe kute umuntfu loyakwemukeleka kuNkulunkulu kutsi ulungile ngekugcina umtsetfo. Umtsetfo wenta bantfu basati sono.
Nkulunkulu wenta kutsi bonkhe labakholwako balungelane naye ngekukholwa kwabo nguJesu Khristu, bonkhe ngalokufananako.
Bonkhe bantfu bonile, bakhashane kakhulu nenkhatimulo yaNkulunkulu.
Kodvwa ngesipho samahhala semusa waNkulunkulu bonkhe bentiwe bemukeleka kuye kutsi balungile ngekuhlengwa lokukuKhristu Jesu.

Nkulunkulu wamnikelela kutsi abe yinhlawulo ngengati yakhe; lenhlawulo-ke yemukeleka ngekukholwa. Ngalendlela Nkulunkulu sewubonakalise kulunga kwakhe ngekutsi ngaJesu ahlawule tono letatentiwa kadzeni Nkulunkulu angakatehluleli,
ngenca yekubeketela kwakhe. Kodvwa kwanyalo Nkulunkulu sewubonakalisa kulunga kwakhe, kuze kukhanye kutsi yena ulungile nekutsi wonkhe umuntfu lokholwa nguJesu uyamemukela kutsi ulungile.
Ngako sibona kutsi umuntfu wemukelwa nguNkulunkulu kutsi ulungile ngekukholwa kuphela, hhayi ngekwenta lokufunwa ngumtsetfo.
Empeleni Nkulunkulu ngabe unguNkulunkulu wemaJuda kuphela yini? Akasiye yini futsi Nkulunkulu webetive? Vele, unguNkulunkulu newebetive,
ngobe phela Nkulunkulu munye. Bekusoka bayakwemukelwa nguNkulunkulu kutsi balungile ngekukholwa; kanjalo nebekungasoki balungisiswa ngekukholwa.
Pho, siyawulahla yini umtsetfo ngalokukholwa? Cha, asiwulahli, esikhundleni saloko siyawusekela umtsetfo.
Pho, singatsini-ke ngakhokho wetfu Abrahama lesiyintalelwane yakhe? Watfolani?
Nangabe Abrahama emukelwa nguNkulunkulu kutsi ulungile ngenca yemisebenti yakhe, angaba nako kutigabatisa. Kodvwa ngeke atigabatise embikwaNkulunkulu.
UmBhalo utsini-ke? Utsi: “Abrahama wakholwa nguNkulunkulu, ngenca yekukholwa kwakhe Nkulunkulu wamemukela kutsi ulungile.”

Kodvwa nangabe umuntfu angaketsembeli emisebentini yakhe lemihle kodvwa ngekukholwa etsembele kulowo lolungisisa longamesabi Nkulunkulu, kukholwa kwakhe nguko lokumenta emukeleke kuNkulunkulu kutsi ulungile.
Abesho loku Davide, nakakhuluma ngekubusiseka kwemuntfu lobitwa nguNkulunkulu ngekutsi ulungile ngaphandle kwemisebenti, nakatsi:
Loku kwenteka nini? Kwenteka asasokile yini Abrahama nome angakasoki? Kwenteka angakasoki, hhayi asasokile.

Wasoka muva, lokusoka kwaba luphawu lwekucinisa kutsi ngenca yekukholwa kwa-Abrahama Nkulunkulu abesamemukele ngekutsi ulungile, ngaphambi kwekutsi asoke. Ngako-ke Abrahama waba nguyise wabo bonkhe labakholwa nguNkulunkulu bese bemukelwa nguye kutsi balungile, nome bangakasoki.
Uphindze abe nguyise walabo labasokile, hayi ngobe basokile, kodvwa ngobe baphila imphilo yekukholwa lefanana nalena leyaphilwa ngubane wetfu Abrahama asengakasoki.
Ngobe nangabe tindlalifa kungulabo labalalela umtsetfo, kukholwa kucitsekile, nesetsembiso sibhidlikile.
Umtsetfo uletsa intfukutselo; kodvwa lapho kute umtsetfo khona, kute nekuwephula.

“Ngikukhetsele kutsi ube nguyise wetive letinyenti.” Lesetsembiso wasemukela kuNkulunkulu labemetsemba; lowo-ke nguNkulunkulu lovusa labagfile baphile. Nguye lokhuluma bese kuba khona lokungazange sekube khona.
Abrahama wakholwa, wetsemba, kungekho tsemba, ngako wase uba “nguyise wetive letinyenti”, njengobe umBhalo utsi: “Titukulwane takho tiyawuba ngaka.”
Kukholwa kwakhe akuzange kube butsakatsaka nome abesaneminyaka lengacishe ibe likhulu asatibonela nje kutsi umtimba wakhe bese kufanana nekutsi ufile, nekutsi sitalo saSara sase sifile.
Noko akazange asingabate setsembiso saNkulunkulu ngekungasikholwa. Kodvwa wacina ekukholweni anika Nkulunkulu ludvumo.
Waba neliciniso leliphelele kutsi Nkulunkulu unawo emandla ekukwenta loko labekwetsembisile.
Ngiko nje ngekukholwa kwakhe: “Nkulunkulu wamemukela ngekutsi ulungile.”
kodvwa abhalwa nangatsi lesemukelwe ngekutsi silungile, tsine lesikholwa nguye lowavusa Jesu iNkhosi yetfu kulabafile.
Wanikelelwa kutsi afe ngenca yetiphambuko tetfu, wavuswa khona atewusenta semukeleke kuNkulunkulu kutsi silungile.
Ngaye loJesu Khristu sinekungena ngekukholwa kulomusa lesesime kuwo; siyabonga sijabulela litsemba lebukhosi baNkulunkulu lobutawuba betfu.
Ngetulu kwaloko siyabonga nasetinhluphekweni tetfu, ngobe siyati kutsi tinhlupheko tiveta kubeketela.
Kubeketela kuveta kuciniseka, kuciniseka kudala litsemba.
Litsemba alijabhisi, ngobe lutsandvo lwaNkulunkulu selutselwe etinhlitiyweni tetfu ngaMoya Longcwele, lesinikwe yena.
Ngobe kwatsi sisebutsakatsaka, Khristu wafela labangamesabi Nkulunkulu; wafa ngesikhatsi lesifanele.
Kulukhuni kabi kutsi umuntfu afele lomunye umuntfu nome ngabe umsulwa. Mhlawumbe kukhona longaba nesibindzi sekufela umuntfu lolungile.
Kodvwa-ke Nkulunkulu sewulukhombisile lutsandvo lwakhe kitsi ngekutsi sisetoni Khristu wafa esikhundleni setfu.
Sesentiwe ngengati yaJesu semukeleka kuNkulunkulu kutsi silungile, ngetulu kwaloko siyawusindziswa ngaye elulakeni lwaNkulunkulu.
Ngobe nangabe kwatsi sisetitsa satfola kubuyisana naNkulunkulu ngekufa kweNdvodzana yakhe, kakhulu kanganani-ke nase sibuyisene naye siyawusindziswa ngekuphila kwayo.
Noko akusiko loko kuphela, kodvwa siphindze sijabula kuNkulunkulu ngaJesu Khristu iNkhosi yetfu lokungaye semukeliswe kubuyisana naNkulunkulu.
Sono sasikhona emhlabeni usengakabekwa umtsetfo; kodvwa lapho kute khona umtsetfo, sono asibalelwa kumuntfu.
Kodvwa kusukela esikhatsini sa-Adamu kuye esikhatsini saMosi bonkhe bantfu babuswa kufa, ngisho nalabo labangazange bone njenga-Adamu. Adamu abesitfunti salowo abetawufika.

Kodvwa sono sa-Adamu singeke silinganiswe nesipho saNkulunkulu semusa; ngobe nangabe ngesiphambuko semuntfu munye kwafa labanyenti, kakhulu kangakanani-ke ngesipho lesingumuntfu longuJesu Khristu, umusa waNkulunkulu wenela bantfu labanyenti.

Kukhona umehluko emkhatsini wesipho saNkulunkulu nemphumela wesono salowo muntfu munye: Nganhlanye kunesehlulelo ngenca yesono sinye kube kubhujiswa; nganhlanye kunesipho saNkulunkulu semusa lesisusa tono letinyenti kube kulunga lokwemukeleka kuNkulunkulu.
Nangabe ngesono semuntfu munye kufa kwacala kubusa ngaye, kakhulu kanganani-ke labo labemukela umusa lochichimako nesipho sekulunga bayawubusa ekuphileni ngemuntfu munye longuJesu Khristu.
Njengobe ngekungalaleli kwemuntfu munye labanyenti baba toni, ngalokufananako ngekulalela kwemuntfu munye longuKhristu labanyenti bentiwa balungelana naNkulunkulu.
Ngako-ke, njengobe sono sabusa kwaba kufa, ngalokufananako kubusa kwemusa kwaba kulunga lokusiholela ekuphileni kwaphakadze ngaJesu Khristu iNkhosi yetfu.
Pho, siyawutsini-ke? Kufanele yini sichubeke siphile esonweni kuze kwandze umusa?
Cha, akungabi njalo. Tsine lesesafa sehlukana nesono, pho, singachubeka kanjani siphile kuso?
Kantsi anati yini kutsi tsine sonkhe lesabhajatiselwa kuKhristu Jesu, sabhajatiselwa ekufeni kwakhe?
Ngako-ke ngekubhajatiswa kwetfu sangcwatjwa kanye naye, kuze kutsi njengobe Khristu avuswa kulabafile ngemandla ebukhosi baBabe, kanjalo-ke natsi singayiphila imphilo lensha.
siyati kutsi umuntfu wetfu lomdzala wabetselwa esiphambanweni kanye naye, khona kutewutsi umtimba wetfu wesono utewufa, singabe sisagcilatwa sono.
Siyakholwa kutsi nasife naKhristu siyawuphila kanye naye.
Siyati nekutsi Khristu wavuswa kulabafile, angeke aphindze afe; nekufa sekute emandla etikwakhe.
Ngobe kufa lakufa kwaba kanye ngenca yesono, kuphila lakuphilako ukuphilela Nkulunkulu.
Kanjalo nani kufanele nitsatse ngekutsi nifile nehlukana nesono, kodvwa niphilela Nkulunkulu nikuKhristu Jesu.
Ngako-ke ningasivumeli sono kutsi siphindze siyibuse lemitimba yenu lebhubhako. Ningabobe nisatilandzela ngisho netinkhanuko temitimba yenu.

Futsi akusafanele kutsi ninikele titfo tenu esonweni tibe tikhali tekungalungi; kodvwa tinikeleni nine matfupha kuNkulunkulu njengobe ningulabavuswe ekufeni base bayaphila. Ngako-ke titfo tenu tinikeleni tibe tikhali tekulunga kuNkulunkulu.
Sono akusafanele sibuse etikwenu, ngobe anisaphili ngaphansi kwemtsetfo, kodvwa niphila ngaphansi kwemusa.
Pho-ke, sitakona yini, ngobe singekho ngaphansi kwemtsetfo, singaphansi kwemusa? Cha, ngeke.
