Asitigabatisi ngephandle kwemaphetselo ngalokwentiwe ngulabanye, kodvwa siyetsemba kutsi nisakhula ekukholweni, nemsebenti wetfu utakwandza emkhatsini wenu,
kuze sitewushumayela liVangeli nasemaveni langesheya kwenu, ngaphandle kwekutigabatisa ngemsebenti lese wentiwe ngulomunye umuntfu.
Ngobe lowemukelela eNkhosini, akusiye lotincomako, kodvwa ngulowo lonconywa yiNkhosi.
Ngicela senimane ningibeketelele ngalobulinyana lengitabukhuluma. Vele, ngiyati seningibeketelele!
Nginesikhwele ngani, sikhwele saNkulunkulu; ngobe nganendzisa njengentfombi lengenasici, nganetfula kuKhristu, lekunguyona ndvodza yenu leyodvwana.
Kodvwa ngineluvalo ngani, kutsi njengobe inyoka yakhohlisa Eva ngebucili bayo, nani tingcondvo tenu tingahle tedukiswe niyekele kutinikela kuKhristu ngeliciniso nangebumsulwa.

Nangabe kufika lomunye umuntfu ashumayele lomunye Jesu kunalowo lesamshumayela, nome-ke nangabe nemukela lomunye umoya lowehlukile kunalowo lenamemukela, nome-ke nangabe nemukela lelinye livangeli lelehlukile kunalelo lenalemukela, konkhe loko shangatsi nikubeketelele ngalokumangalisako.
Nome ngingesilo libeka ekukhulumeni, kodvwa nginalo lwati. Loko-ke sinikhombise ngato tonkhe tindlela etintfweni tonkhe.
Ngawaphamba lamanye emabandla ngekutsi ngitsatse liholo lami kuwo, kuze kutsi ngikhonte nine.

Ngisenani, angizange ngibe ngumtfwalo kunome ngubani, nangeswele. Tonkhe tidzingo tami tacedvwa bazalwane labebaphuma eMasedoniya. Ngako-ke angizange ngibe ngumtfwalo, futsi sonkhe sikhatsi ngiyawuchubeka ngingesiwo.
Njengobe liciniso laKhristu likimi, kute loyawungibindzisa kulokutigabatisa kwami etifundzeni tase-Akhaya.
Leni? Ngobe nginganitsandzi yini? Nkulunkulu uyati kutsi ngiyanitsandza.
Kodvwa ngitawuchubeka ngente loku lengikwentako, kuze kutsi bangalitfoli litfuba lekutiveta labo labalifunako, labenta shangatsi benta umsebenti lofanana newetfu njengobe bona basho.
Ngobe labantfu babaphostolimbumbulu, tisebenti temanga; batenta shangatsi baphostoli baKhristu.
Loko-ke akumangalisi, ngobe naSathane utigucula abe yingilosi yekukhanya.
Ngako-ke akumangalisi nangabe tisebenti takhe titigucula tibe tisebenti tekulunga. Siphetfo sato siyawuya ngemisebenti yato.
Loko lengikushoko-ke nyalo, angikukhulumi ngemandla nangeligunya leNkhosi, kodvwa njengesilima lesitigabatisa ngesibindzi.
Ingani bantfu labanye bayatigabatisa ngetintfo tabo temhlaba; pho, mine ngitakuyekelelani kutigabatisa?
Maye, niyajabula ngekubeketelela tilima nibe nine nihlakaniphile!
Niyambeketelela nome ngubani lonigcilatako, nalonichwagako, nalonicaphatako, nalotichayisako, nalonimukula ebusweni.
Nginemahloni nangikuvuma kutsi mine bengehluleka kakhulu kuloko.
Kodvwa nakukhona umuntfu lofuna kutigabatisa ngentfo letsite, loko-ke ngikusho njengesilima, nami futsi ngingatigabatisa.
BangemaHebheru yini? Nami nginguye. Bangema-Israyeli yini? Nami nginguye. Batitukulwane ta-Abrahama yini? Mine-ke ngingiso.
Batisebenti taKhristu yini? Mine ngingulesincono. Loku sengikukhuluma njengeluhlanya. Ngasebenta kakhulu kunabo, ngidvonsa matima, ngaboshwa kanyenti, ngashaywa kanyenti, ngabasengotini yekufa.
Kwaze kwaba ngemahlandla lasihlanu emaJuda angibhambabula imivimba lengema-39 leyayimiswe ngumtsetfo wawo.
Ngabhanjabulwa ngemzaca emahlandla lamatsatfu; ngagcotjwa ngematje kanye. Ngephukelwa yimikhumbi emahlandla lamatsatfu; ngabasesitsabatsabeni selwandle busuku bonkhe nemini yonkhe.

Eluhambeni lwami ngabasetingotini temifula, nasetingotini tetigelekece, nasetingotini kubantfu bakitsi, nasetingotini kubetive, nasetingotini tasemadolobheni, nasetingotini temaphandleni, nasetingotini telwandle, nasetingotini kubazalwanembumbulu.
Ngasebenta kakhulu ngidvonsa matima. Bengike ngicwashe ngingalali, ngilambe, ngome, ngeswele kudla, ngiphatfwe lichwa, ngeswele nekwekwembatsa.
Ngetulu kwako konkhe, nginemtfwalo losetikwami, nginekushisekela onkhe emabandla.
Nakukhona lobutsakatsaka, angitfwalisani naye yini kulobutsakatsaka bakhe? Nakukhona lowako ekukholweni, angimveli buhlungu yini?
Nkulunkulu neYise weNkhosi Jesu, yena lofanele kudvunyiswa phakadze naphakadze, uyati kutsi angicali wona emanga.
EDamaseko Lusibalukhulu labengaphansi kwenkhosi Arethasi wagadza lidolobha lonkhe afuna kungibamba angibophe,
kodvwa ngakhishwa ngelibhasikidi esikhaleni lesasentiwe elubondzeni, ngaphunyula esandleni sakhe.
Kukhona umuntfu lengimati akuKhristu, lekwatsi eminyakeni leli-14 leyendlulile, wenyuselwa ezulwini lesitsatfu; nome abesemtimbeni nome abekuMoya, angati; nguNkulunkulu lowatiko.
Ngiyaphindza ngitsi: Nome lomuntfu abesemtimbeni nome abekuMoya, angati; nguNkulunkulu lowatiko. Kodvwa ngiyamati lomuntfu
kutsi wenyuselwa ePharadisi lapho efike weva tintfo letiyimfihlo, kangangekutsi kute umuntfu lekufanele atikhulume.
Ngingamgabatisa-ke umuntfu lonjalo, kodvwa mine ngingeke ngitigabatise ngalutfo, ngaphandle kwebutsakatsaka bami.
Kube bengifuna kutigabatisa, bengingeke ngibente bulima, ngobe ngitabe ngikhuluma liciniso. Kodvwa ngiyativimba kuloko, kuze phela kubete longibeka ngetulu kwaloko langibona nome langiva nginguko.
Kwadzimate kwaba ngemahlandla lamatsatfu ngincusa iNkhosi kutsi ilisuse kimi.

Kodvwa iNkhosi yatsi kimi: “Umusa wami ukwanele wena, ngobe emandla ami abonakaliswa aphelele ebutsakatsakeni.” Ngako-ke ngitawutigabatisa kakhulu ngebutsakatsaka bami, kuze phela emandla aKhristu atewuhlala kimi.
Ngenca yaKhristu-ke, ngiyeneliswa butsakatsaka, netinhlamba, nebulukhuni, nekutingelelwa kuhlushwa kanye netingoti; ngobe nangibutsakatsaka, kulapho ngiba nemandla khona.
Timphawu temphostoli wangempela tabonakaliswa kini, njengobe nitibonele ngemehlo enu, nati kubeketela, netibonakaliso, netimanga, nemisebenti yemandla.
Empeleni nine nentiwa yini kutsi nibe nenhlanhla lembi kunalamanye emabandla ngaphandle kwekutsi nine angizange nginetfwese umtfwalo? Ngitsetseleleni kulesiphosiso!
Ngiyawujabula kutsi nginikele ngako konkhe ngize nginikelwe nami lucobo, kuze kusitakale imiphefumulo yenu. Nanginitsandza kakhulu, pho, mine kufanele yini kutsi ngitsandvwe kancane?
Hho! Kodvwa nitsi ngaba nebucili ngekutsi nginganetfwesi umtfwalo, kuze phela ngitenibamba kahle ngebucili.
Ngakhutsata Thithusi kutsi ahambe, ngatfuma umzalwane kutsi ahambe naye. Ngobe loThithusi wanihlakaniphela yini? Sasingatenti ngamoya munye yini tintfo? Asititsatsanga yini tinyatselo letifanako?

Ngobe ngesaba kutsi mhlawumbe ngiyawutsi ngiyefika lapho kini nginikhandze ningesiko loko lengibheke kutsi nibe ngiko, nami ningikhandze ngingesiko loko lenibheke kutsi ngibe ngiko. Ngesaba kutsi mhlawumbe kunekulwa, nemona, nekutfukutsela, nebugovu, nenkhani, nenhlebo, nekutatisa, nesiphitsiphitsi.

Ngesaba kutsi nangiphindze ngita lapho futsi, shangatsi Nkulunkulu wami angangitfobisa embikwenu, kutsi ngililele labo labonile labangakaphendvuki ekungcoleni, nasebugwadleni, nasebuphingini, nasenkhanukweni labayentile.
Ngabecwayisa labo labona kucala, namanje futsi ngiyabecwayisa naloku ngingekho, njengobe ngabatjela nangilapho ekuvakasheni kwami kwesibili kutsi nangingefika lapho ngiyakubashiya emehlo ekubuka,
njengobe nifuna siciniseko kutsi Khristu ukhuluma kimi. Yena angeke aniphatse ngebutsakatsaka, kodvwa unemandla kini.
Ngobe wabetselwa ebutsakatsakeni, kodvwa sewuphila ngemandla aNkulunkulu. Sibutsakatsaka kuye, kodvwa sitawuphila kanye naye ngemandla aNkulunkulu, kuze sikwati kunisita.
Kodvwa sithandaza kuNkulunkulu kutsi ningoni, hhayi kutsi sibonakale singulabancono, kodvwa kuze nente loko lokufanele, nome kungabonakala shangatsi sehlulekile.
Ngobe site emandla ekwenta lutfo, nasimelene neliciniso, kodvwa sinawo kuphela nasimele liciniso.
Ngobe tsine siyajabula nangabe nine nicinile nome tsine sibutsakatsaka. Sithandazela kutsi nine nipheleliswe kuKhristu.
Loku ngikubhala ngisengakefiki kini, kuze kutsi nangifika lapho kungadzingeki kutsi nginiphatse ngesandla lesimatima lenginikwe sona yiNkhosi, kutsi ngakhe, ngingahliphiti.
Umusa weNkhosi Jesu, nelutsandvo lwaNkulunkulu, nebudlelwane baMoya Longcwele akube nani nonkhe.
Iphuma kimi nakubo bonkhe bazalwane lenginabo. Iya emabandleni aseGalathiya.
Nguye lowatinikela ngenca yetono tetfu, kuze kutsi ngentsandvo yaNkulunkulu longuBabe asephule kulesikhatsi lesibi.
Akube kuye ludvumo kuze kube phakadze naphakadze. Amen.
Empeleni akusho kutsi likhona lelinye livangeli, kodvwa nje kutsi kukhona labanihluphako labafuna kuguculela liVangeli laKhristu.
Kodvwa-ke nakukhona umuntfu, nome ngabe ngitsi nome yingilosi lechamuka ezulwini, lofika nalelinye livangeli lelehlukile kunaleli lesanishumayela lona, lowo akabe ngulocalekisiwe.
Njengobe sasho, namanje ngiyaphindza ngiyasho ngitsi: Nakukhona lonishumayela lelinye livangeli kunalelo lenalemukela, lowo akabe ngulocalekisiwe.
Ngobe angilinikwanga ngumuntfu, kantsi futsi angilifundziswanga ngumuntfu, kodvwa ngalembulelwa nguJesu Khristu.
Ngachubeka ngekwenkholo yebuJuda, ngabendlula labanyenti lababebontsanga yetfu esiveni sakitsi ngishisekela kakhulu kugcina timfundziso tabokhokho.
kungembulela iNdvodzana yakhe kutsi ngiyishumayele kubetive, angibutanga muntfu.
Angizange ngenyukele ngisho naseJerusalema kulabo babebaphostoli kucala kunami; kodvwa ngesuka ngekushesha ngaya e-Arabiya, ngase ngiyancandzeka ngiya eDamaseko.
Kodvwa angizange sengibone namunye webaphostoli ngaphandle kwaJakobe, umnakabo weNkhosi.
Noko ngangisengakatiwa ngemehlo emabandleni aKhristu aseJudiya.
Kodvwa babeva ngendzaba nje kutsi: “Lowo lowake wasihlupha kamatima sewushumayela kona loko kukholwa lake wetama kukucedza,”

Ngenyukela kubo njengobe Nkulunkulu abengembulele kutsi ngiye khona, ngafike ngabalandzisa liVangeli lengilishumayela kubetive, labo labatiwa ngekutsi babaholi ngabalandzisa emasitseleni, funa mhlawumbe kwenteke kutsi ngigijimele lite, nome ngagijimela lite.
Ngisho naThithusi, umGriki labekanye nami, abamcindzetelanga kutsi asoke.
Kodvwa bazalwanembumbulu labaletfwa ngasese, bangena ngekunyelela emkhatsini wetfu, batinhloli tenkhululeko yetfu lesinayo kuKhristu Jesu, khona batesenta tigcili.
Noko asibanikanga ngisho nalelincane nje litfutjana lekubatfobela, kuze kutsi liciniso leliVangeli libe kini njalo.
Kodvwa esikhundleni saloko babona kutsi ngiphatsiswe liVangeli kutsi ngilishumayele kubetive, njengobe naPhetro aphatsiswa liVangeli kutsi alishumayele kumaJuda.
Ngobe yena lowo lowasebenta ngaPhetro kutsi abe ngumphostoli wemaJuda, wasebenta nangami futsi kubetive.
Batsi kube boJakobe, naPhetro, naJohane, labebatiwa ngekutsi batinsika, babone umusa lengiwuphiwe banika tsine naBhanabasi sandla sekudla sebudlelwane kutsi siye kubetive, bona baye kumaJuda.
Batsi nje kumelwe sikhumbule labamphofu, lebekungiyonantfo nami lebengiyikhutsalele.
Ngesikhatsi kungakefiki batnfu labatsite, abedla nebetive; kodvwa kwatsi kube kufike emadvodza labephuma kuJakobe, wase uyatehlukisa kulabo betive, ngobe phela bekesaba lamaJuda.
Nalamanye emaJuda ase angena kulobo buhatsa bakhe bekutentisa, kwadzimate kwatsatseka naBhanabasi ngaloko kutentisa kwabo.

Kodvwa ngatsi kube ngibone kutsi abasahambi khona ecinisweni leliVangeli, ngavele ngamtjela Phetro embikwabo bonkhe ngatsi: “Nangabe wena longumJuda, uphila njengebetive, hhayi njengemJuda, pho, yini ubacindzetele betive kutsi abaphile njengemaJuda?”
Tsine singemaJuda ekutalwa, asisito toni tebetive.

Siyati kutsi imisebenti yemtsetfo layentako umuntfu ingeke imente emukeleke kuNkulunkulu kutsi ulungile, kepha umuntfu wemukeleka kuNkulunkulu kutsi ulungile ngekukholwa kwakhe nguKhristu Jesu. Natsi-ke sakholwa nguKhristu Jesu, sentiwa semukeleka kuNkulunkulu kutsi silungile ngaloko kukholwa kwetfu nguKhristu, hhayi ngekwenta loko lokufunwa ngumtsetfo. Empeleni kute umuntfu lowemukeleka kuNkulunkulu kutsi ulungile ngobe ente imisebenti yemtsetfo.
Nangabe tsine sifuna kwemukeleka kuNkulunkulu kutsi silungile ngaKhristu tsine ngekwetfu sibe sitfolakala sitoni, ngabe kambe naKhristu usikhonti sesono yini? Cha, akasiso.
Nangabe ngiphindza ngivusa loko lengikubhidlitile, ngabe ngitenta sephulamtsetfo.
Ngobe mine ngekwami ngafa ngemtsetfo emtsetfweni, kuze ngiphilele Nkulunkulu. Ngibetselwe kanye naKhristu;

ngako-ke mine angisaphili, kodvwa nguKhristu lophila kimi. Nalemphilo lengiyiphilako kulomtimba, ngiyiphila ngekukholwa yiNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu leyangitsandza yatinikela yona matfupha esikhundleni sami.
Angiwenti lite umusa waNkulunkulu; ngobe nangabe kulunga kutfolakala ngekwenta lokufunwa ngumtsetfo, kusho kutsi Khristu wafela lite.
Hhawu, maGalathiya lalibele! Seniyengwe ngubani? Akusini yini lenakhonjiswa emehlweni enu kutsi Jesu Khristu wabetselwa?
Ase ningitjele naku: Moya waNkulunkulu namemukela ngekwenta lokufunwa ngumtsetfo yini, nome namemukela ngekukholwa liVangeli lenaliva nalishunyayelwa?
Kungabe nitilima kangako yini? Nicale ngaMoya waNkulunkulu, pho, niyawupheleliswa ngemandla enu yini?
Ngabe kambe letintfo letinyenti kangaka lesenitibonile tilite yini? Phela loko kungasho kutsi tilite.
Nkulunkulu uyaninika yini Moya wakhe ente imisebenti lemangalisako emkhatsini wenu ngobe nigcina umtsetfo, nome uninika ngobe nikholwe liVangeli lenaliva nalishunyayelwa?
UmBhalo wakubona kucala kutsi Nkulunkulu nebetive uyawubalungisisa ngekukholwa; ngiwo lowashumayela liVangeli kucala ku-Abrahama watsi: “Tive tonkhe tiyawubusiswa ngawe.”
Ngako-ke labakholwako babusiswe kanye na-Abrahama lowakholwa.

Ngako-ke kuyakhanya kutsi kute umuntfu lowemukeleka kuNkulunkulu kutsi ulungile ngekwenta lokufunwa ngumsetfo, ngobe umBhalo utsi: “Umuntfu lowemukeleka kuNkulunkulu kutsi ulungile ngekukholwa kwakhe uyawuphila.”
Umtsetfo awukasimi ekukholweni, kodvwa “lowo lowentako uyawuphila ngawo.”
Loko Khristu wakwenta, kuze kutsi sibusiso lesetsenjiswa Abrahama sifike sinikwe betive ngaJesu Khristu, nekutsi semukele ngekukholwa sipho saMoya lesetsenjiswa sona.
Mayelana netetsembiso letanikwa Abrahama nentalo yakhe: “Intalo” yinye, hhayi lenyenti. Akukhulunywa ngalenyenti, kodvwa kushiwo yinye; leyo-ke nguKhristu.
Ngisho kutsi-ke: Lomtsetfo lowase uyefika emvakweminyaka lengema-430, awusephuli lesivumelwane lesasentiwe nguNkulunkulu, futsi ungeke usicitse lesetsembiso.
Ngobe nangabe lifa litfolakala ngekwenta lokufunwa ngumtsetfo, alisesilo-ke lesetsembiso; kodvwa Nkulunkulu walinika Abrahama ngesetsembiso.
Umlamuli akadzingeki ngalutfo umuntfu nakayedvwana, vele-ke Nkulunkulu munye.

Pho, ngabe kusho kutsi umtsetfo uphambene yini netetsembiso taNkulunkulu? Cha, akunjalo. Ngobe nangabe ubekiwe umtsetfo longaphilisa, nakanjani kulunga bekungatfolakala ngekwenta lokufunwa ngumtsetfo.
Ngako-ke umtsetfo wasebenta njengemcondzisi wetfu wekusiyisa kuKhristu, kuze sibe ngulabemukeleka kuNkulunkulu kutsi silungile ngekukholwa kwetfu.
Kodvwa nyalo ngobe kukholwa sekufikile, asisekho ngephansi kwemcondzisi.
Nine nonkhe nabhajatiselwa kuKhristu, ngako-ke senembetse Khristu.
Kute umJuda nemGriki, kute sigcili nalokhululekile, kute lomdvuna nalomsikati, nonkhe nimunye kuKhristu Jesu.
Nangabe-ke nibaKhristu, niyintalelwana ya-Abrahama, nitindlalifa ngekwesetsembiso.
Ngisho kutsi-ke: Ngesikhatsi indlalifa iseyincane ayikehlukani nesisebenti, nome ingumnikati wako konkhe.
Iba ngephansi kwebalindzi nebaphatsi bayo kuze kufike sikhatsi lesabekwa nguyise.
Kunjalo-ke nakitsi, ngesikhatsi sisebantfwana sasigcilatwe ngimimoya yemvelo.
Kodvwa kwatsi sikhatsi sesifike ngalokuphelele Nkulunkulu watfumela iNdvodzana yakhe leyatalwa ngumfati, yakhula ingephansi kwemtsetfo,
khona itebahlawulela labo labangephansi kwemtsetfo, kuze natsi semukeleke njengemadvodzana.
Ngako-ke awusesiso sigcili, kodvwa sewuyindvodzana; nawuyindvodzana uyindlalifa yaNkulunkulu ngaKhristu.

kodvwa nyalo seniyamati Nkulunkulu, ngetulu kwaloko senatiwa nguNkulunkulu, kwentiwa yini kutsi nifune kuncandzeka, niye kulemimoya yemvelo lebutsakatsaka nalengasiti lutfo? Niyatsandza yini kutsi iphindze inigcilate?
Ngineluvalo ngani, shangatsi konkhe lokukhandleka kwami lapho kini kwaba lite.
kepha niyati kutsi kwaba kungaphili kahle kwami lokwangenta ngatfola litfuba lekushumayela liVangeli kini kwekucala.

Kodvwa nome loba butsakatsaka bami baba silingo lesikhulu kini, anizange ningedzelele nome ningangemukeli. Esikhundleni saloko, nangemukela njengesitfunywa saNkulunkulu, kwaba shangatsi nemukela Khristu Jesu.
Pho, sekushonephi loko kujabula kwenu kwakucala? Ngobe nanyalo ngiyacinisa ngitsi kube beninemandla, ngabe nakhipha emehlo enu nawanika mine.
Kungabe sengigucuke ngaba sitsa senu ngekunitjela liciniso yini?
Kona kuhle kushisekela lokuhle njalonjalo, hhayi nangikhona emkhatsini wenu kuphela.
Bantfwabami, nginemhelo ngani, kuyawudzimate kwakheke Khristu kini.
Bengifisa shangatsi ngingake ngibe nani nyalo, kumbe ngingake ngikhulume ngalenye indlela, ngobe sengidzidzekile ngani.
Ase ningitjele, nine lenifuna kuba ngephansi kwemtsetfo, aniva yini kutsi umtsetfo utsini?
Kubhaliwe kutsi Abrahama abenemadvodzana lamabili, lenye kwakuyesigcilikati sakhe, lenye kuyemfati wakhe sibili.
Kodvwa lendvodzana yesigcilikati yatalwa ngendlela latalwa ngayo wonkhe umuntfu; lena yemfati wakhe sibili yatalwa ngekwesetsembiso.
Loku kungumfanekiso: Labafati lababili bamele tivumelwane letibili, lona lonebantfwana labatalelwe ebugcilini nguHagari; leso sivumelwane siphuma entsabeni yaseSinayi.
Hagari umele iNtsaba yaseSinayi lese-Arabiya. Ufanekisa iJerusalema yanyalo legcilateke kanye nebantfwabayo.
Kodvwa lomfati wakhe sibili ukhululekile, umele iJerusalema yasezulwini lengumake wetfu.
Kodvwa njengobe lona lowatalwa ngalokwetayelekile watingela lona labetelwe ngekwaMoya, namanje kusenjalo.
Kodvwa umBhalo utsini? Utsi: “Cosha lesigcilikati kanye nendvodzana yaso; ngobe lendvodzana yesigcilikati ingeke ibe yindlalifa kanye nendvodzana yemfati sibili.”
Ngako-ke, bazalwane, asisibo bantfwana besigcilikati, kodvwa sibantfwana bemfati sibili, lokhululekile.
Ngiyafakaza futsi kunobe ngubani wekusoka kutsi ubophelekile ekwenteni konkhe lokufunwa ngumtsetfo.
Nine lenifuna kwemukeleka kuNkulunkulu kutsi nilungile ngekwenta lokufunwa ngumtsetfo nitehlukanisile naKhristu, ningephandle kwemusa waNkulunkulu.
Tsine-ke sinelitsemba kutsi sitakwemukeleka kuNkulunkulu kutsi silungile, loko sikulindzele ngemandla aMoya Longcwele losebenta ngekukholwa.
Ngobe kuKhristu Jesu kusoka nekungasoki akunamsebenti, kodvwa kuphela kukholwa lokusebenta ngelutsandvo.
Benigijima kahle! Pho, ngubani lona losanivimbele kutfobela liciniso?
Khumbulani naku: “Sibiliso lesincane nje lesibilisa yonkhe inhlama.”
Ngisenelitsemba ngani eNkhosini kutsi ningeke niwutsatse lomunye umcondvo; kodvwa lowo lonihluphako uyakwetfwala sijeziso sakhe, nome ngangubani.
Ngifisa shangatsi labo labaniphatamisako bangatiphakula bona!
Ngobe wonkhe umtsetfo upheleliswe evini linye lelitsi: “Ubotsandza makhelwane wakho njengobe utitsandza wena.”
Kodvwa nanilumana nidlane nodvwana, nibocaphela kutsi ningacedzani.
Ngobe inyama ikhanuka lokuphambene naMoya, naMoya, uphambene nenyama, ngobe kokubili kuyaphikisana, kuze ningetikwenta lenikutsandzako.
Kodvwa naniholwa nguMoya, anikho ngaphansi kwemtsetfo.
nekukhonta tithico, nekutsakatsa, nebutsa, nenkhani, nemona, nelulaka, nekubanga, nekwehlukana, nekuhlubuka,
nekuhawukela, nekudzakwa, nebudli, naletinye tintfo letifanana naleti lenganitjela ngato kucala, kutsi labo labenta letintfo bangeke balidle lifa lembuso waNkulunkulu.
nekutfobeka, nekutibamba; kute umtsetfo lophambene naletintfo.
BaKhristu Jesu bayibetsele esiphambanweni inyama nekushangashanga kwayo kanye netinkhanuko tayo.
Njengobe siphila kuMoya, ngako asihambe ngaMoya.
Asingafuni ludvumo lolulite, singacansulani, futsi singabi nemona lomunye kulomunye.
Tfwalisanani imitfwalo yenu, kuze nigcwalise umtsetfo waKhristu.
Nangabe umuntfu aticabanga kutsi ulutfo, kantsi akasilo lutfo, uyatiyenga.
Kodvwa akube ngulowo atihlolele wakhe umsebenti, khona uyawuba nekutibonga ngekwakhe yedvwana, hhayi ngekwalomunye umuntfu.
Ngobe ngulowo nalowo uyawutetfwalela umtfwalo wakhe.
Ngobe lowo lohlanyela enyameni yakhe, uyawuvuna kubola kuyo; kodvwa lohlanyela kuMoya waNkulunkulu, uyawuvuna kuphila lokuphakadze kulowo Moya.
Asingadzinwa kwenta lokuhle; ngobe nasingadzinwa, siyawuvuna ngesikhatsi lesifanele.
Ngako-ke njengobe sinematfuba nje, asente lokuhle kubo bonkhe bantfu, ikakhulu kubendlu yaketfu yekukholwa.
Niyabona-ke nani, nati tinhlavu letinkhulu lesengitibhala ngesandla sami kulencwadzi.
Ngobe nemaJuda akakwenti lokufunwa ngumtsetfo, kodvwa bafisa kutsi nine nisoke, kuze phela batetigabatisa ngani kuloko.
Ngobe kusoka nekungasoki akusilutfo kodvwa kuphela kudalwa kabusha.
Kuthula nemusa akube kubo bonkhe labahamba ngalomyalo, ema-Israyeli aNkulunkulu.
Iya kulabangcwele labase-Efesu labakholwa nguKhristu Jesu ngekwetsembeka.
Akube kini umusa nekuthula lokuvela kuNkulunkulu longuBabe wetfu, nakuJesu Khristu iNkhosi.
Kwatsi nemhlaba ungakasekelwa, Nkulunkulu wasikhetsa ngaKhristu, kuze sibe ngcwele, singabi nasici emehlweni akhe.
Nkulunkulu wavele wasikhetsanchanti ngekwenjongo yentsandvo yakhe, wasenta emadvodzana akhe ngaJesu Khristu.
Ngako-ke akudvunyiswe umusa wakhe webukhosi, lasipha wona ngeNdvodzana yakhe letsandzekako.
Ngengati yaJesu sinekuhlengwa nekutsetselelwa kwetono, ngekwengcebo yemusa,
Nkulunkulu wakubona kufanele kutsi asatise imfihlakalo yentsandvo yakhe, labeyimisile ngaKhristu kwasekucaleni.
Wakubona kufanele kutsi lelisu alifeze ngesikhatsi lesingiso ngekutsi indalo yonkhe yalokusemhlabeni nalokusezulwini ayihlanganisele ndzawonye ngaJesu Khristu loyinhloko yako konkhe.
Tsine lesetsemba kuKhristu kucala sakhetselwa kutsi siphilele kudvumisa bukhosi baNkulunkulu.
Yena usibambiso selifa leliyawuba letfu ngesikhatsi Nkulunkulu ahlenga lokukwakhe, kube ludvumo lwebukhosi bakhe.
ngibonga ngingakhawuli ngani, nginikhumbula njalo nje emikhulekweni yami.
Nkulunkulu weNkhosi yetfu Jesu Khristu, uYise lonebukhosi, aniphe umoya wekuhlakanipha nekwembulelwa ekumatini Yena.
Akakhanyise emehlo etinhlitiyo tenu, kuze nati lokulitsemba lanibitela kulo, nekutsi buhle kanganani bukhosi belifa lakhe kubo labangcwele,
nati nalokubukhulu lobumangalisako bemandla akhe kitsi, tsine lesikholwako.
Lamandla lamakhulu wawasebentisa nakavusa Khristu kulabafile, amhlalisa ngesekudla sakhe ezulwini,
ngetulu kwako konkhe kubusa, neligunya, nemandla, nebukhosi, nemagama onkhe laphatfwako, hhayi kuleli kuphela, kodvwa nakulelitako.
Nkulunkulu wabeka konkhe ngaphansi kwemandla akhe, wambeka kutsi abe yinhloko etikwako konkhe ebandleni.
Libandla lingumtimba waKhristu, lokuphelela kwakhe kuphelelisa konkhe kuko konkhe.
lebenikadze nihamba kuto ngekwendlela yalomhlaba, ngekwembusi wemandla emkhatsi, umoya losasebenta kubantfu labangalaleli Nkulunkulu.
Empeleni sonkhe sasinjengabo, sasiphila ngetinkhanuko tenyama yetfu, senta intsandvo yenyama neyengcondvo yetfu. Ngekwemvelo yetfu sasifanelwe lulaka lwaNkulunkulu njengabo bonkhe bantfu.
nome sase sifile ngetiphambuko tetfu, wasiphilisa kanye naKhristu. Nisindziswe ngemusa waNkulunkulu.
Wasivusa kanye naKhristu Jesu, wabuye wasihlalisa kanye naye sikuye, embusweni welizulu,
kuze kutsi etikhatsini letitako abonakalise kitsi ingcebo lenkhulu yemusa wakhe ngekusiphatsa ngebubele ngaKhristu Jesu.
Empeleni kusindziswa kwenu ngekukholwa kuya ngemusa, futsi loko akuveli kini, sipho nje saNkulunkulu.
Loko akuveli ngemisebenti, funa kube khona lotibongako.
Ngobe tsine singumsebenti waNkulunkulu. Sidalwe ngaJesu Khristu kutsi sente imisebenti lemihle, Nkulunkulu layilungisa kucala.
Nikhumbule nekutsi ngaleto tikhatsi benehlukanisiwe naKhristu, ningephandle kwembuso waka-Israyeli, nitihambi letite sabelo etivumelwaneni tesetsembiso, nite litsemba, nite naNkulunkulu emhlabeni.
Kodvwa nyalo nine lebenikadze nikhashane naNkulunkulu senimunye kuKhristu Jesu. Senisondzetwe ngengati yaJesu.
Ngobe yena ukuthula kwetfu, lowenta lokubili kwaba kunye, ngekufa kwakhe wabhidlita lubondza lwebutsa lolwalwehlukanisa.
Umtsetfo, nemiyalo, nemisimeto wakucitsa khona atewudala kabusha labo lababili: umJuda newetive, babe ngumuntfu munye kuye, kube kuthula.
Bobabili wabenta kutsi babuyisane naNkulunkulu emtimbeni munye ngesiphambano, ngaloko wacedza bonkhe butsa.
Weta washumayela liVangeli lekuthula kini lebenikadze nikhashane, yebo, kuthula nakubo labo lababesedvute.
Ngobe ngaye sobabili sinekungena ngaMoya munye kuYise.
Lendlu yakhelwa etikwesisekelo sebaphostoli nebaphrofethi; Jesu Khristu lucobo ulitje lelisimise lendlu.
Sakhiwo sonkhe sihlanganiselwe kuye, siyakhula, siyawudzimate sibe lithempeli lelingcwele leNkhosi.
Nani futsi nakhiwa kulo, kuze nibe yindlu yekuhlala Nkulunkulu ngaMoya.
Empeleni senivile kutsi Nkulunkulu, ngemusa wakhe, unginike lomsebenti kutsi ngiwetfwale kuze nisitakale.
Nkulunkulu wangatisa imfihlakalo ngekungembulela, njengobe sengike ngatsintsa nje ekubhaleni kwami.
Nanifundza loku, nitawubona kwati kwami ngemfihlakalo yaKhristu.
Bonkhe bantfu abazange bayatiswe etitukulwaneni letinye, njengaloku nyalo seyembulwe ngaMoya kubaphostoli bakhe labangcwele nakubaphrofethi.
Imfihlakalo ngulokutsi betive nabo sebatindlalifa kanye natsi, nekutsi sebangumtimba munye kanye natsi, futsi sebabahlanganyeli besetsembiso kanye natsi kuJesu Khristu ngeliVangeli.
Mine, nome ngingulomncane kunabo bonkhe labangcwele, ngaphiwa lowo musa wekushumayela kubetive liVangeli lemcebo waKhristu longenawuphenyeka.
Ngaphiwa nekutsi ngibakhanyisele bonkhe bantfu kutsi lisebenta njani lisu lemfihlakalo, lebeyifihlakele kwaphakadze kuNkulunkulu lowadala tintfo tonkhe,
kuze babusi nalabanemandla emazulwini batiswe nyalo ngelibandla kuhlakanipha lokukhulu kwaNkulunkulu.
Loku wakwenta ngekwenjongo yaphakadze layifeza ngaKhristu Jesu iNkhosi yetfu.
Ngaye sinekuciniseka nesibindzi sekusondzela kuNkulunkulu ngekukholwa kwetfu.
Ngako-ke ngiyanincenga kutsi ningadzinwa kuhlupheka kwami ngenca yenu, lokungukona kuludvumo lwenu.
leyetsiwa ngaye yonkhe imindeni yasezulwini neyasemhlabeni,
kuze ngekwengcebo yebukhosi bakhe aniphe kuciniseka emandleni kumuntfu wangekhatsi ngaMoya wakhe.
Khristu akahlale etinhlitiyweni tenu ngekukholwa, kuze nisime, nisekeleke elutsandvweni,
nibe nemandla ekucondzisisa kanye nalabangcwele bonkhe lokububanti, nebudze, nekuphakama, nekujula kwelutsandvo lwaKhristu,
yebo, nekulwati lutsandvo lwakhe lolwendlula konkhe kwati, kuze ngigcwaliswe kube kuphelela konkhe kwaNkulunkulu.
Kuye lonemandla ekwenta lokukhulu kakhulu kunako konkhe lesikucelako nome lesikucabangako, ngekwemandla lasebenta kitsi,
akube ludvumo ebandleni nakuKhristu Jesu etitukulwaneni tonkhe, phakadze naphakadze. Amen.
Nikhombise lutsandvo lwenu ngekubeketelelana ngekutfobeka konkhe, nangebumnene, nangekucinisela.
Nibokukhutsalela kugcina bunye baMoya ngesibopho sekuthula.
Munye umtimba, munye naMoya, njengobe lilinye nelitsemba lenabitelwa kulo.
Yinye iNkhosi, kunye kukholwa, munye umbhabhatiso;
munye Nkulunkulu, longuBabe wetfu sonkhe, longetulu kwabo bonkhe, nalongekhatsi kwabo bonkhe, nakubo bonkhe.
Ngako-ke lowo lowehla, nguye futsi lowenyuka, waba ngetulu kwemazulu onkhe, kuze agcwalise konkhe.
Nguye futsi lowapha labanye kutsi babe baphostoli, labanye babe baphrofethi, labanye babe bavangeli, labanye babe belusi, labanye babe bafundzisi.
Loko wakwentela kutsi labangcwele bahlonyiselwe umsebenti wabo wekukhonta, kuze kwakheke umtimba waKhristu,
size sifinyelele sonkhe ebunyeni bekukholwa, nasekuyatini iNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu, ebudvodzeni lobuphelele kuKhristu.
Ngako-ke ngeke sisaba bantfwana, sigujuteliswe ngemagagasi, sipheshulwe ngimimoya yonkhe yetimfundziso tekukhohlisa kwebantfu labanebucili bekudukisa.
Kodvwa asikhulume liciniso ngelutsandvo, kuze sikhule ngako konkhe kuye, longuyena ayinhloko, Khristu.
Umtimba wonkhe uhlanganiswe ngaye, ubambene ngekwelekelelana kwemalunga onkhe awo, njengekusebenta lokulinganiselwe lelo nalelo lunga kukhuliswe umtimba, wakhelwe elutsandvweni.
Bahlwelwe engcondvweni yabo, bakhashane nekuphila kwaNkulunkulu, ngobe abati lutfo, ngenca yebulukhuni benhlitiyo.
Batsi kantsi babutfuntfu, batinikela emanyaleni, basebenta kungcola konkhe ngekuhungeka.
Kepha nine anizange nimfundze Khristu kanjalo,
nangabe-ke nimvile nafundziswa futsi kuye, njengobe liciniso likuJesu.
Khumulani umuntfu lomdzala wesimilo sakucala, lose onakala ngetinkhanuko tenkhohliso,
nentiwe nibe basha emoyeni nasengcondvweni yenu.
Yembatsani umuntfu lomusha, lowadalwa wafuta Nkulunkulu ngekulunga nangebungcwele beliciniso.
Tfukutselani, kodvwa ningoni; lilanga lingashoni solomane nitfukutsele.
Lisela alingabe liseba, kepha kunaloko alikhutsale, lisebente lokuhle ngetandla talo, khona litewuba nako lelingahle likwabele labadzingako.
Akungabe kusaphuma nalinye livi lelibolile emlonyeni wenu, kodvwa kube ngulelilungele kwakha njengalokuswelekile, kuze libavetele umusa labevako.
Ningamdzabukisi Moya Longcwele waNkulunkulu lenabekwa luphawu ngaye kudzimate kube lilanga lekuhlengwa.
Konkhe lokubabako, nelulaka, nekutfukutsela, nemsindvo, nekuhlambalata akususwe kini, kanye nako konkhe lokubi.
Kodvwa phatsanani ngebumnene, nihawukelane, nitsetselelane, njengobe naNkulunkulu wanitsetselela ngaKhristu.
Niphile imphilo yelutsandvo, njengobe naKhristu asitsandza watinikela ngenca yetfu, waba ngumnikelo nemhlatjelo loliphunga lelimnandzi kuNkulunkulu.
Akubete kungcola, nekwedzelela, nekuhhalatisa, lokutintfo letingakafaneli. Esikhundleni saloko banini nekubonga.
Nifanele nati, futsi nicondze kahle, kutsi kute umuntfu loyingwadla nome losiphingi nome longcolile, nalobukhali, lokusho kutsi ukhonta tithico, longabuye abe nelifa embusweni waKhristu naNkulunkulu.
Ngobe kucala nanibumnyama, kepha nyalo senikukhanya eNkhosini. Hambani njengebantfwana bekukhanya.
Ningahlanganyeli emisebentini yebumnyama, lete titselo, kunaloko niboyeneka ebaleni.
Kulihlazo lelikhulu ngisho nekukhuluma ngaleto tintfo labatenta emasitseleni.
ngobe konkhe lokuvetwa kukhanya kuyabonakala. Ngako-ke kutsiwa:
Ngako-ke ningabi tilima, kodvwa yatini loko lokuyintsandvo yeNkhosi.
Niphendvulane ngemahubo, nangemaculo, nangetingoma takaMoya; nihlabele nidvumise iNkhosi ngenhlitiyo yenu yonkhe.
Nimbonge njalo Nkulunkulu uYise ngako konkhe egameni leNkhosi yetfu Jesu Khristu.
Bafati, tfobelani emadvodza enu kungatsi kuseNkhosini.
Ngobe indvodza iyinhloko yemfati, njengobe naKhristu ayinhloko yelibandla, yena unguMsindzisi welibandla lelingumtimba wakhe.
Ngako-ke njengobe libandla litfobela Khristu, kanjalo nebafati abatfobele emadvodza abo kuko konkhe.
kuze atelingcwelisa alihlambulule ngesigezo semanti, ngelivi,
khona atetimisela libandla lelinebukhosi, lingabi nabala nome sici nome yini lokunjalo; kodvwa libe ngcwele lingabi nacala.
Emadvodza kufanele atsandze bafati bawo, njengobe atsandza imitimba yawo. Indvodza letsandza umfati wayo ititsandza yona.
Phela kute umuntfu lowake watondza umtimba wakhe, kepha uyawondla, awunakekele, njengobe naKhristu enta ebandleni,
UmBhalo utsi: “Ngenca yaloko indvodza iyawushiya uyise nenina inamatsele kumkayo; labo bobabili bayawuba nyamanye.”
Lemfihlakalo yinkhulu, mine ngiyitsatsa ngekutsi isho Khristu nelibandla.
Noko-ke, akube ngulowo nalowo atsandze umkakhe, njengobe atitsandza yena, nemfati ahloniphe indvodza yakhe.
“Hlonipha uyihlo nenyoko;” lowo ngumyalo lobalulekile nalonesetsembiso lesitsi:
“Kuze kube kuhle kuwe, ube nemphilo lendze emhlabeni.”
Loko ningakwenti ngekutsenga emehlo njengalabajabulisa bantfu, kodvwa njengetisebenti taKhristu, nente intsandvo yaNkulunkulu ngenhlitiyo.
Ngako-ke yentani umsebenti wenu ngekujabula, kube sengatsi nisebentela iNkhosi, hhayi bantfu nje.
Nati kutsi, konkhe lokuhle lakwentako umuntfu uyakwemukela lokunjalo eNkhosini, nome usigcili nome ukhululekile.
Hlomani tonkhe tikhali taNkulunkulu, khona nitewuba nemandla ekumelana nebucili baSathane.
Ngobe asilwi nebantfu, kodvwa silwa netikhulu temimoya, nemandla, nebabusi bendalo yalobumnyama, nemabutfo abomoya lababi labasemkhatsini.
Ngako-ke hlomani tikhali tonkhe taNkulunkulu, khona nitewuba nemandla ekulwa ngelilanga lelibi, nitsi nome senicedzile kulwa, nigcine nincobile.
tinyawo tenu tigcokiswe kulungela kushumayela liVangeli lekuthula.
Kunako konkhe, nitsatse lihawu lelikukholwa, lenitawuba nemandla ekucima ngalo tonkhe tikhali letivutsako taLomubi.
Nitsatse impantitje leyinsindziso, nenkemba yaMoya lelivi laNkulunkulu.
Ningithandazele nami, khona ngitewuphiwa livi, ngitsi nangivula umlomo wami ngiyishumayele ngaso sonkhe sibindzi imfihlakalo yeliVangeli.
Ngikhulekeleni-ke, kutsi mine lengilincusa lelisetinketaneni ngenca yeliVangeli, ngilikhulume ngesibindzi njengobe kungifanele.
Ngiko nje ngimtfumele kini atenitjela kutsi sichubeka njani, khona atenikhutsata etinhlitiyweni.
Kuthula akube kubazalwane, nelutsandvo, kanye nekukholwa lokuvela kuNkulunkulu, longuBabe, naseNkhosini yetfu Jesu Khristu.
Umusa awube nabo bonkhe labatsandza iNkhosi yetfu Jesu Khristu ngelutsandvo lolungapheli.
Iya kubo bonkhe labangcwele baseFiliphi, labakuJesu Khristu, nakubabonisi nebadikhoni:
Ngetikhatsi tonkhe, ekuncuseni kwami, nginithandazela nonkhe ngekutfokota.
Ngibonga kuhlanganyela kwenu nami eVangelini kusukela ngelilanga lekucala kuze kube ngulamuhla.
Nginelitsemba leliphelele kutsi lowo lowacala umsebenti lomuhle kini, uyakuwufeza kuze kube lilanga laKhristu Jesu.

Kufanele kutsi ngibe nemcondvo lonjalo ngani nonkhe, njengobe nami nginetfwele enhlitiyweni yami. Ngemusa weNkhosi nonkhe nihlanganyele nami ekuboshweni kwami ngenca yeliVangeli, nasekulivikeleni, nasekulisimiseni.
Nkulunkulu ungufakazi wami kutsi nginilangatelela kanganani nonkhe ngesihe saKhristu Jesu.
Ngikhulekela loku kutsi lutsandvo lwenu lukhule njalo ekwatini nasekucondzeni konkhe,
nize nikwati kwehlukanisa lokuncono, nibe msulwa nibete sici, kuze kube lilanga laKhristu.
Nitsele inala yetitselo tekulunga letingaye Jesu Khristu, kube yinkhatimulo neludvumo kuNkulunkulu.
Kubonakele kubalindzi bami, nakubo bonkhe labanye kutsi kuboshwa kwami kungenca yaKhristu.
Ngekuboshwa kwami linyenti lebazalwane litfole sibindzi lesikhulu eNkhosini sekukhuluma livi laNkulunkulu ngekungesabi.
Kantsi labanye bashumayela Khristu ngemona nangembango, kepha labanye ngenhlitiyo lenhle.
Laba-ke bashumayela bachutjwa lutsandvo, bayati kutsi ngimiselwe kuvikela liVangeli;
kepha labo labashumayela Khristu ngembango, kungesiko ngenhlitiyo lemhlophe, bacabanga kutsi batangivusela kukhatsateka ekuboshweni kwami.

Kepha kunani? Nome labanye bashumayela Khristu ngekutentisa, nome labanye bamshumayela ngeliciniso, lokumcoka kimi kutsi Khristu uyashunyayelwa nome nganguyiphi indlela. Loko-ke kuyangitfokotisa, futsi ngiyawuhlala ngitfokota.
Ngiyati kutsi ngemithandazo yenu nangekusitwa nguMoya waJesu Khristu, ngiyawukhululwa.

Ngukulangatelela nekwetsemba kwami kutsi ngibete emahloni, kepha ngibe nesibindzi, njengobe bengivele nginaso ngaso sonkhe sikhatsi, kutsi Khristu entiwe abe mkhulu emphilweni yami, nome kwenteka ngemphilo yami nome kwenteka ngekufa kwami.
Kepha nangisetawuphila enyameni, ngisenemsebenti lengisengawenta. Angisakwati lengitawukukhetsa.
Kepha ngisemkhatsini walokubili: Nginesifiso sekuhamba ngiyewuba naKhristu, ngobe ngiko lokuhle kakhulu.
Kantsi-ke kuphila kulomtimba kweswelekile kakhulu ngenca yenu.
Kuloko ngineliciniso, futsi nginelitsemba lekutsi ngisetawuphila. Ngisetawuhlala nani nonkhe nginisite kutsi nikhule ekukholweni kwengeteke injabulo yenu,
kuze kutsi, nasengiphindza ngifika lapho kini, nitibonge kakhulu ngami kuKhristu Jesu.
Ningetfuswa lutfo ngalabo labamelene nani, lokusiciniseko sekubhubha kubo, kepha sekusindziswa kwenu. Loku-ke kuvela kuNkulunkulu.
Ngobe ngenca yaKhristu nine nabelwa ngemusa angisho kukholwa kuye kuphela, kepha nekuhlupheka ngenca yakhe.
Nikuko kona loko kulwa lenakubona kimi, njengobe nanyalo niva kutsi ngisekuko.
Ngako-ke, naninendvudvuto kuKhristu, naninekudvudvuteka kwelutsandvo, naninebudlelwane baMoya, naninesisa nesihawu,
gcwalisani kutfokota kwami ngekutsi nibe mcondvo munye, nelutsandvo lunye, nenhlitiyo yinye, nemgomo munye.
Ningenti lutfo ngembango nangeludvumo lwelive, kepha ngekutfobeka nishaye kungatsi labanye bakhulu kunani.
Ngulowo nalowo anganakekeli kwakhe yedvwa, kepha anakekele nekwalabanye:
ngobe nguNkulunkulu losebenta kini kutsandza nekwenta ngekwentsandvo yakhe lenhle.

kuze nibe ngulabangasoleki, nalabangenacala, bantfwana baNkulunkulu labangenasici emkhatsini wesitukulwane lesigwegwile nalesiphambene. Kufanele nikhanye kuso lesitukulwane njengetinkhanyeti letikhanyisa esibhakabhakeni,
nisabapha livi lekuphila. Nanenta njalo-ke, ngiyawuba nekutibonga ngelilanga laKhristu ngekutsi angigijimelanga lite nome-ke angisebentelanga lite.
Ngako-ke ngitsi: Nani tfokotani kanye nami.
Kepha ngiyetsemba eNkhosini Jesu kutsi ngitawutfumela Thimothi kini masinyane, kuze nami ngitewujabula nasengive tindzaba tenu letimnandzi.
Ngite muntfu lonenhlitiyo lenjengeyakhe, lotawunakekela tindzaba tenu ngebucotfo.
Ngobe bonkhe labanye batifunela kwabo, abafuni kona kwaJesu.
Kepha vele niyakwati kwetsembeka kwakhe, kutsi ukhonte kanye nami eVangelini njengendvodzana ibambisene neyise.
Yena-ke ngiyetsemba ngitamtfumela masinyane, nasengibonile kutsi lokucondzene nami kuphela kuphi.
Kepha ngiyetsemba eNkhosini kutsi nami ngitawuta masinyane.
Loku phela abenilangatelela nonkhe, asakhatsatekile emoyeni wakhe, njengobe neva kutsi abegula.
Ngempela abegula, asemkhatsini wekufa nekuphila, kepha Nkulunkulu wamhawukela, kungesiye yena yedvwa, kepha wangihawukela nami kutsi ngingabi nelusizi etikwelusizi.
Ngaloko-ke ngakhutsalela kakhulu kumtfuma, kuze kutsi nase nimbonile futsi nitfokote, nakimi kunciphe lusizi.
Ngako-ke memukeleni eNkhosini ngekutfokota konkhe; labanjalo-ke nibobatisa.
Ngobe ngenca yemsebenti waKhristu wacishe wafa, watidzela, kuze agcwalise lokusilele ekungikhonteni kwenu.
Caphelani tinja, nicaphele tisebenti tebubi, nicaphele bekusika umtimba.
Ngitsi labasoke sibili, tsine lesikhonta ngaMoya waNkulunkulu, sitibonga kuKhristu Jesu, asetsembeli enyameni,
nome nami bengingaba nekwetsembela enyameni. Empeleni kube bekungaba khona umuntfu lofanele kwetsembela enyameni, ngabe ngimi kakhulu.
Ngobe ngasokwa ngelilanga lesiphohlongo, futsi ngiweluhlanga lwaka-Israyeli, wesive sakaBhenjamini, umHebheru wemaHebheru; ngekwemtsetfo ngingumFarisi.
Ngatingela libandla ngekushisekela lokukhulu; ngekulunga lokusemtsetfweni bengingasoleki ndzawo.
Yebo, konkhe ngikushaya lite ngebukhulu bekumati Khristu Jesu iNkhosi yami, lengilahlekelwe ngiko konkhe ngenca yakhe. Ngikushaya tibi, kuze ngizuze Khristu,

ngitfolakale kuye ngite ngisho nalokuncane kulunga lokukwami, lokutfolakala ngekwenta lokufunwa ngumtsetfo. Kepha ngifuna kutfolakala nginekulunga lokuya ngekukholwa nguKhristu, ngisho kulunga lokutfolakala kuNkulunkulu ngekukholwa.
Lengikufunako kutsi ngimati yena, nemandla ekuvuka kwakhe, nekuhlanganyela etinhluphekweni takhe, ngimfute ngekufa kwakhe,
kuze kutsi nakungenteka kumbe nami ngifinyelele ekuvukeni kulabafile.
Bazalwane, angisho kutsi mine lucobo sengikubambile, kepha kunye lengikwentako: Ngikhohlwa lokungemuva, ngitelulele kulokusembili,
ngibabele emgomeni, kuyakwemukela umklomelo wekuphila kwasezulwini, Nkulunkulu langibitele kuko ngaKhristu Jesu.
Kuphela nje kutsi lesesifikile kuko, asihambe ngemkhondvo wako.
Phela labanyenti lenganitjela kanyenti ngabo, nanyalo nginitjela ngetinyembeti ngabo ngitsi, sebahamba batitsa tesiphambano saKhristu.
Kuphela kwabo kubhujiswa, nkulunkulu wabo sisu, ludvumo lwabo lusehlazweni labo, bangulabanaka tintfo temhlaba.
Kepha tsine likitsi lisezulwini, lapho silindzele khona kutsi kuvele uMsindzisi wetfu, iNkhosi Jesu Khristu.
Nguye loyawugucula simo sebuphansi bemtimba wetfu, ufane nemtimba wakhe wenkhatimulo, ngemandla akhe langahlela ngawo konkhe ngephansi kwakhe.
Ngiyabayala bo-Evodiya naSintike kutsi ababe nekucondza kunye eNkhosini.

Yebo, ngiyakuncusa nawe, mhlobo wami locotfo, lengiboshelwe kanye naye, yelekelela labo bafati, ngobe babambisene nami eVangelini, kanye naKlemente naletinye tisebenti lengibambisene nato, emabito ato labhaliwe encwadzini yekuphila.
Ningakhatsateki ngalutfo. Kepha kuko konkhe ticelo tenu atatiwe nguNkulunkulu, ngekukhuleka nekuncusa kanye nekubonga.
Kuthula kwaNkulunkulu lokwendlula konkhe kwati kutawulondvolota tinhlitiyo tenu nemicabango yenu kuKhristu Jesu.
Loko lenakufundza, nakwemukela, nakuva, nakubona kimi, kwenteni, Nkulunkulu wekuthula utawuba nani.
Ngijabule kakhulu eNkhosini, ngobe manje senite navuselela kunginakekela kwenu; noko beninginakekela, kepha benisengakabi nelitfuba lekukwenta loko.
Loko angikusho ngenca yekweswela kwami, ngobe mine sengifundze kutsi ngeneliseke nome ngikusiphi simo.
Ngiyakwati kuba phansi, kantsi futsi ngiyakwati nekubusa. Kuko konkhe nasetintfweni tonkhe ngifundziswe imfihlakalo yekumelana nekwesutsa nekulamba, kweneliswa nekweswela.
Nginemandla ekwenta konkhe ngaye Khristu longicinisako.

Niyati nani, nine baseFiliphi, kutsi ekucaleni kwekushumayela kwami liVangeli nangiphuma eMasedoniya, bekute ngisho nalinye libandla lelahlanganyela nami endzabeni yekupha nekwemukela ngaphandle kwenu.
Ngobe, nome ngiseThesalonika, nake nangitfumelela lusito, hhayi kanye kuphela nje.
Akusho kutsi ngifuna sipho, kodvwa ngifuna sitselo saso lesingusona sitakwandzisa inzuzo kini.
Ngemukele konkhe ngalokungetulu, ngenelisekile ngetipho lengitinikwe ngu-Ephafrodithu tichamuka kini, letingumnikelo longemakha lamnandzi, umhlatjelo lowemukelekako nalojabulisako kuNkulunkulu.
Nkulunkulu wami utawuhlangabetana nako konkhe kweswela kwenu, kuye ngemcebo webukhosi bakhe lobukuKhristu Jesu.
Akube ludvumo kuNkulunkulu, longuBabe wetfu, kuze kube nguphakadze naphakadze. Amen.
Hambisani bonkhe labangcwele labakuKhristu Jesu. Bazalwane labakanye nami bayanihambisa.
Bonkhe labangcwele bayanihambisa, kakhulu bendlu yaKhesari.
Umusa weNkhosi Jesu Khristu awube nemoya wenu.
Akube kini umusa nekuthula lokuvela kuNkulunkulu, longuBabe wetfu.
ngobe sivile ngekukholwa kwenu nguKhristu Jesu kanye nangelutsandvo leninalo kubo bonkhe labangcwele.
Sibonga litsemba lenibekelwe lona ekhaya ezulwini, leneva ngalo kucala ngesikhatsi kushunyayelwa kini livi leliciniso, liVangeli.

Lona lifike kini, njengaloku likhona nasemhlabeni wonkhe jikelele; futsi litsela titselo landze, njengobe nakini kunjalo, seloku kwesukela mhlazana niva kahle ngebunjalo beliciniso lemusa waNkulunkulu.
Nafundziswa ngu-Ephafrasi lotsandzekako, losisebenti kanye natsi. Nguye losimelele ngekutsi abesikhonti lesetsembekile saKhristu.
Seva ngaye ngelutsandvo lwenu leninalo ngaMoya Longcwele.
Sinicelela nekutsi niphile imphilo lefanele naletsandzekako eNkhosini, nitsele titselo emsebentini wonkhe lolungile, futsi nikhule nasekumatini Nkulunkulu.
Sinincusela kutsi Nkulunkulu anicinise ngemandla ebukhosi bakhe, kuze kutsi nome sekuvelani kodvwa nine nisime, nime, nibeketele ngekujabula,
nibonge uYise lowanenta nafanelwa sabelo selifa lalabangcwele ekukhanyeni.
Wasikhulula emandleni ebumnyama, wasibeka embusweni weNdvodzana yakhe letsandzekako.
futsi ngiyo yematubulo ayo yonkhe indalo.
kuze kutsi kuko konkhe ibe yekucala.
Kodvwa nyalo Nkulunkulu sewubuyisene nani ngekucitsa ingati yaJesu esiphambanweni, kuze kutsi animise ningcwele, ningenasici, ningenacala embikwakhe.

Loko kungenteka kuphela nangabe nine nihlala ekukholweni, futsi nisekelekile, nisimile, ninganyikanyiswa lutfo ekwetsembeni kwenu liVangeli lenalitfola, naliva lishunyayelwa emhlabeni wonkhe jikelele. Mine Pawula ngentiwa ngaba sikhonti salo lelo Vangeli.
Ngekuhlela kwaNkulunkulu, ngentiwa sikhonti salo. Ngetfweswa umtfwalo macondzana nani, kuze kutsi ngimemetele livi laNkulunkulu ngalokuphelele,
imfihlakalo yalo leseloku yafihlakala kusukela ekucaleni kwetikhatsi netitukulwane, kepha manje seyembulelwe labangcwele bakhe.
Nkulunkulu watsandza kutsi kwateke kubo kutsi iyini ingcebo nebukhosi balemfihlakalo kubetive. Lemfihlakalo inguKhristu kini, lolitsemba lebukhosi.
Ngisebentela loko ngishikashikeka ngekusebenta kwakhe, lokusebenta ngemandla kimi.

Loko ngikwentela kutsi tinhlitiyo tabo tikhutsateke tidvudvuteke, bahlanganiswe babe munye elutsandweni, babe nekuciniseka konkhe kwekwati lokuphelele, bayati kahle imfihlakalo yaNkulunkulu lenguKhristu.
Kuye kutfukuswe emagugu onkhe ekuhlakanipha newekwati.
Nome ngingekho emkhatsini wenu ngemtimba, kodvwa ngikhona ngemoya, ngijabulela kubona kuhlela kwenu lokuhle, nekusima kwekukholwa kwenu nguKhristu.
nisime ngekugcila, futsi nakhelwe kuye, niciniswe ekukholweni, njengaloku nifundzisiwe, nivame kubonga.
Nani-ke seniphelelisiwe kuye, yena loyinhloko yemibuso neyemandla onkhe.
Nembelwa kanye naye embhabhatisweni, lokungawo futsi navuswa kanye naye ngekukholwa ngemandla aNkulunkulu, lowamvusa ekufeni.
Nani-ke lebenifile ngekona kwenu nangekungasoki emtimbeni wenu, Nkulunkulu sewanenta labaphilako kanye naye ngekunitsetselela tonkhe tono tenu.
Wesula incwadzi yemacala etfu leyayimelene natsi ngemitsetfo yayo, wayisusa ngekuyibetsela esiphambanweni.
Babusi, nalabanemandla wabemuka tikhali, wabatsela ngelihlazo ebaleni abehlula ngaso siphambano.
Loko bekusitfunti nje saloko bekuta, lokungiko sibili ngulokukuKhristu.
Akubete umuntfu lonilahla ngelicala, atsandza kutenta lotfobile, akhonte tingilosi, alibele ngimibono yakhe, atikhukhumeta ngelite engcondvweni yakhe.
Lowo sewuyekele kusima kuKhristu loyinhloko, lokusitwa ngaye umtimba wonkhe, uhlanganiswe ngemalunga nemisipha, ukhule ngekukhula kwaNkulunkulu.
Konkhe loku kusho tintfo letiphelako natisetjentiswa, yimiyalo netimfundziso tebantfu nje.
Tibonakala shangatsi tinekuhlakanipha, tineminako yetinkholo tabo, nekutitfobambumbulu, nekuhlupha umtimba, kepha tite lusito macondzana nekutitsiba etinkhanukweni tenyama.
Nakekelani tintfo tasezulwini, ninganaki tintfo talapha emhlabeni.
Ngobe phela nafa, imphilo yenu ifihliwe kanye naKhristu kuNkulunkulu.
Mhlazana Khristu, lokuphila kwetfu, abonakaliswa, nani niyawubonakaliswa kanye naye ebukhosini bakhe.
Ngaloko-ke bulalani tonkhe tinkhanuko tenu talapha emhlabeni: bugwadla, nebuphingi, nekungcola, nekuhungeka, nekukhanuka lokubi, nebukhali lobukukhonta tithico.
Konkhe loku kwenta Nkulunkulu ehlisele lulaka lwakhe kubantfu labangamlaleli.
Ningakhulumelani emanga, ngobe senikhumule umuntfu lomdzala kanye nemikhuba yakhe.
Manje senembetse umuntfu lomusha, kuze nihlale nakhiwa kabusha, nifute Nkulunkulu, nimati ngalokuphelele.
Kulabanjalo kute umehluko emkhatsini wemGriki nemJuda, walosokile nalongakasoki, wetive nemSikithi, sigcili nalokhululekile, kodvwa Khristu ungiko konkhe, futsi ukubo bonkhe.
Nibeketelelane, nitsetselelane, nangabe umuntfu akhube lomunye; ngobe phela neNkhosi yanitsetselela, nani-ke yentani njalo.
Kodvwa-ke ngetulu kwako konkhe loko yembatsani lutsandvo, lolusibopho sekuphelela.
Kuthula kwaKhristu, lenabitelwa kuko emtimbeni munye, akubuse etinhlitiyweni tenu; futsi netayele kubonga.

Livi laKhristu alihlale ngekhatsi kwenu liphuphume. Fundzisanani niyalane ngekuhlakanipha konkhe, nifundzisane ngemahubo nangetingoma, nangemaculo akaMoya. Nihlabelele Nkulunkulu ngekumbonga etinhlitiyweni tenu.
Konkhe lenikwentako kwenteni ngelibito leNkhosi Jesu, nome ngelivi, nome ngemisebenti, nibonge Nkulunkulu uYise ngaye.
Konkhe lenikwentako, kwenteni ngenhlitiyo, kube shangatsi nentela iNkhosi, hhayi bantfu.
Khumbulani kutsi nikhonta iNkhosi. Nati kutsi niyakwemukeliswa umvuzo welifa kuKhristu.
Ngobe lowo lowenta lokungakalungi, uyakwemukela lokungakalungi lakwentile, ngobe kuyawube kungakhetfwa bala lamuntfu.
Nisikhulekele natsi kuNkulunkulu, kutsi asinike ematfuba ekushumayela livi lakhe, sitekwati kukhuluma imfihlakalo yaKhristu, mine lengisiboshwa ngenca yayo.
Ningincusele kuze ngiyibonakalise ngalokuphelele, njengobe ngifanele kukhuluma.
Tiphatseni ngekuhlakanipha nanisemkhatsini webantfu labangakholwa, bambisisani sikhatsi, niwasebentise kahle ematfuba leninawo.
Kukhuluma kwenu akube nemusa ngaso sonkhe sikhatsi, nikunandzise njengeluswayi ekudleni, khona nitekwati lenifanele kubaphendvula ngako bantfu.
Ngimtfumele kini kutsi anatise kutsi tsine siphila njani, advudvute netinhlitiyo tenu.
Utawube ahamba na-Onesimuse, umzalwane lomunye lowetsembekako nalotsandzekako, yena-ke ungulomunye wenu. Batanilandzisa-ke ngako konkhe lokwenteka ngalapha.
Uyanihambisa naJesu lowatiwa ngekutsi nguJustusi, labo-ke ngibo bodvwa lababekusoka labasebentela umbuso waNkulunkulu kanye nami, sebayindvudvuto lenkhulu kimi.
Nami ngingufakazi wakhe wekutsi uyanisebentela, nine kakhulu, kanye nebaseLawodisiya, nebaseHiyerapholisi.
NaLukha longudokodela lotsandzekako, kanye naDemasi bayanihambisa kakhulu.
Ngikhonteleni nami kubazalwane baseLawodisiya nakuNimfasi, nasebandleni lelihlanganela endlini yakhe.
Nangabe lencwadzi seniyifundzile, nibobafundzisa nebaseLawodisiya, nani niyifundze lena lephuma eLawodisiya.
Nitjele Akhipho nitsi: “Caphela kufeza lowo msebenti lowawemukela eNkhosini.”
kuNkulunkulu wetfu, longuBabe, sikhumbula imisebenti yenu yekukholwa, nemisiphalato yelutsandvo, nekubambelela kwenu etsembeni leliseNkhosini yetfu Jesu Khristu.
Siyati, bazalwane labatsandzekako kuNkulunkulu, kutsi nguye lonikhetsile.

Ngobe liVangeli lesanishumayela lona alifikanga kini ngemavi kuphela, kodvwa lefika ngemandla, nangaMoya Longcwele, seneliseka kutsi inshumayelo yetfu iliciniso. Niyati kutsi sasitiphatsa kanjani ngesikhatsi sisemkhatsini wenu. Konkhe loko sasikwenta ngenca yenu.
Nani naba balingisi betfu nebeNkhosi; ngobe, nome nanisenhluphekweni lenkhulu, nemukela livi ngenjabulo lenaniyinikwe nguMoya Longcwele,
nadzimate naba sibonelo kubo bonkhe labakholwako eMasedoniya nase-Akhaya.

Ngobe kuvakala kwelivi leNkhosi lokwachamuka lapho kini akuvakalanga eMasedoniya nase-Akhaya kuphela, kodvwa kukholwa kwenu nguNkulunkulu sekuvakele kuto tonkhe tindzawo, ngako-ke asinasidzingo sekulandzisa ngako.
Ngobe bona ngekwabo babika ngatsi kutsi nasemukela kahle kangakanani, nekutsi naphendvukela kanjani kuNkulunkulu, nashiya tithico tenu, kuze nikhonte Nkulunkulu lophilako nalonguye sibili.
Nonkhe nilindzele kuchamuka kweNdvodzana yakhe ezulwini, layivusa kulabafile. LeNdvodzana nguJesu losikhulula elulakeni lolutako.
Kodvwa nome sase sihlushiwe satselwa ngelihlazo eFiliphi, njengobe nani nati, saba nesibindzi kuNkulunkulu wetfu kutsi sishumayele kini liVangeli laNkulunkulu sibhekene nebulukhuni lobukhulu.
Ngobe kushumayela kwetfu akusiko kwekuduka, nekwekungcola, nekwebucili.
Kodvwa njengaloku sivunyiwe nguNkulunkulu kutsi siphatsiswe liVangeli, asikhulumeli kujabulisa bantfu, kodvwa sikhulumela kujabulisa Nkulunkulu lohlola tinhlitiyo tetfu.
Tsine asizange sikhulume emagama ekuyenga, njengobe nani nati, asizange futsi sibe nebucili bekufisa bunjinga, Nkulunkulu ungufakazi.
Asizange sesilufune ludvumo kubantfu, ngisho nakini imbala.
Noko, njengebaphostoli baKhristu, sasinalo lilungelo lekusebentisa bukhulu betfu, kodvwa saba mnene kini njengemfati anakekela bantfwabakhe.
Ngenca yelutsandvo lwetfu kini satimisela kutsi sihlephunelane nani, hhayi liVangeli kuphela kodvwa nemphilo yetfu lucobo, ngobe natsandzeka kakhulu kitsi.
Nine naNkulunkulu nibofakazi betfu bekutsi indlela lesasitiphetse ngayo emkhatsini wenu nine labakholwako yayingcwele, ilungile ingenasici.
Niyati nekutsi saniphatsa njani; saniphatsa njengendvodza iphetse bantfwabayo,
sanidvudvuta ngamunye ngamunye sinikhutsata, siniyala ngekutsi nihambe ngalokufanelekile kuNkulunkulu, lonibitela embusweni wakhe nasebukhosini bakhe.

Bazalwane, nani naba balingisi bemabandla aNkulunkulu aseJudiya lakuKhristu Jesu; ngobe nani nehlelwa kuhlupheka kunye ngekuhlushwa bantfu bakini, njengobe nebantfu balawo mabandla bahlushwa ngemaJuda.
LamaJuda ngiwo kanye lawo labulala iNkhosi Jesu kanye nebaphrofethi, natsi asicitsa, ayekela kwenta intsandvo yaNkulunkulu, aphambana nebantfu bonkhe.
Adzimate asivimbela nekutsi sishumayele insindziso kubetive. Ngaloko-ke imihla nemalanga atengetela tono. Kodvwa ekugcineni lulaka lwaNkulunkulu seluze lwabehlela.
Besifisa kuta kini, mine Pawula kukanyenti, kodvwa Sathane wasivimbela.
Empeleni liyini litsemba letfu, nome injabulo, nome umchele wemsebenti wetfu lesingatibonga ngawo embikweNkhosi yetfu Jesu ekubuyeni kwayo? Akusini yini?
Vele, ngini ludvumo lwetfu nenjabulo yetfu.
sase sinitfumelela Thimothi, umzalwane wetfu, lesibambisene naye emsebentini waNkulunkulu wekushumayela liVangeli laKhristu. Samtfumela kutsi atenicinisa anikhutsate ekukholweni kwenu,
kuze kutsi kubete namunye wenu lohlubukako ngenca yekutanyatanyiswa nguletinhlupheko. Nine ngekwenu niyati kutsi simiselwe loko,
ngobe ngesikhatsi sisenani, sanitjela kucala kutsi sitakuhlushwa; njengobe sekwentekile nje, nani senati.

Ngako-ke ngitsite kube ngehluleke kubeketelela situnge ngani, ngase ngitfumela Thimothi, khona ngitekwati ngekukholwa kwenu. Bengesaba kutsi kungahle kube umlingi unilingile, kuze kutsi kusiphalata kwetfu kube lite.
Ngako-ke, bazalwane, nome sasiselusizini nasenhluphekweni, kodvwa sefika sadvudvuteka ngani ngekukholwa kwenu.
Ngobe nyalo siyaphila, nanime nicinile eNkhosini.
Kepha Nkulunkulu singambonga kanjani ngani, simbonge ngako konkhe kujabula lesinako ngani?
Sincusa busuku nemini ngayo yonkhe inhlitiyo yetfu kutsi simane sibonane nani buso nebuso, khona sitenengetela kuloko lokusilele ekukholweni kwenu.
Shangatsi Nkulunkulu, longuBabe wetfu, yena matfupha neNkhosi yetfu Jesu angacondzisa indlela yetfu kini.
Shangatsi iNkhosi inganandzisa inikhulise naselutsandvweni lomunye kulomunye nakubo bonkhe bantfu, njengobe nelwetfu lunjalo kini,
kuze kutsi icinise tinhlitiyo tenu tingabi nacala, kodvwa tibe ngcwele ebukhoneni baNkulunkulu, longuBabe, nakufika iNkhosi yetfu Jesu nabo bonkhe labangcwele bakhe.
ngobe niyayati imiyalo lesaninika yona ngeNkhosi Jesu.
Kuyintsandvo yaNkulunkulu kungcweliswa kwenu, bubalekeleni bugwadla nebuphingi.
Ngamunye ngamunye wenu kufanele akwati kutiphatsela yena umtimba
hhayi ngekushisekela kwenkhanuko njengemahedeni langamati Nkulunkulu.
Akubete lowonako aphambe umzalwane wakhe nome ngani, ngobe Nkulunkulu ungumphindziseli kuto tonkhe letintfo, njengobe saniyalisisa nje.
Nkulunkulu akasibitelanga ebugwadleni nasebuphingini, kepha wasibitela ebungcweleni.
Ngako-ke lomelana naloku, akamelani namuntfu, kodvwa umelene naNkulunkulu lonipha Moya wakhe Longcwele.
Empeleni loko senikubonakalisile kubo bonkhe bazalwane labaseMasedoniya. Kodvwa siyanikhutsata, bazalwane, kutsi chubekani nikwente loko.
Timiseleni kuphila ngekuthula, nicaphele lokucondzene nani, nitisebentele nine ngetandla tenu, njengobe sanitjela.
Ngaleyo ndlela niyawuhlonipheka emkhatsini walabangakholwa nguJesu, ningabi timbungulu.
Njengobe sikholwa kutsi Jesu wafa waphindze wavuka, kanjalo nalabo labafe bakuJesu: Nkulunkulu uyawubavusa ekufeni abaletse kanye naJesu.
Ngobe iNkhosi lucobo lwayo iyakwehla ezulwini ngelivi lenhlokomo, nangeliphimbo lengilosi lenkhulu, nangelicilongo laNkulunkulu. Labo labafe bakholwa nguKhristu bayawuvuka kucala.
Lapho-ke tsine lesiyawube siphila ngaleso sikhatsi sisasele siyawuhlwitfwa senyuke sihlangane kanye nabo emafini sihlangabete iNkhosi emoyeni, kuze sihlale neNkhosi njalonjalo.
Mayelana netikhatsi nangematfuba, bazalwane, anidzingi kubhalelwa ngako.
Ngobe nine ngekwenu nati kahle kamhlophe kutsi lilanga leNkhosi liyawufika, njengelisela lifika ebusuku.
Ngesikhatsi bantfu batsi: “Kunekuthula nenhlalakahle,” ngekushesha lokukhulu kubhujiswa kuyawubatuma njengemhelo ufikela umfati nasatawubeleka; futsi kute loyawusindza.
Kodvwa nine, bazalwane, anikho ebumnyameni, anikafaneli kutunywa ngulelo langa njengekutunywa lisela.
Nine nonkhe ningemadvodzana ekukhanya nemadvodzana emini; asisibo bebusuku nebebumnyama.
Ngako-ke, asingalali njengalabanye; kufanele silindze sizitse.
Phela labo labalalako balala ebusuku, netidzakwa tidzakwa ebusuku.
Kodvwa tsine lesibemini asizitse, sembatse sivikelo sesifuba lesikukholwa nelutsandvo, sifake nempantitje lelitsemba letfu lensindziso.
Ngobe Nkulunkulu akasimiselanga kwehlelwa lulaka lwakhe, kodvwa wasimisela kutsi sitfole insindziso ngeNkhosi yetfu Jesu Khristu,
lowasifela kuze kutsi, nome silindza nome silala, nakabuya, siphile kanye naye.
Ngako-ke dvudvutanani nakhane, njengobe nenta nje manje.
Bahlonipheni ngelutsandvo lolukhulu ngenca yemsebenti wabo. Hlalisanani ngekuthula.
Bonani kutsi kubete lophindzisela kulomunye lokubi ngalokubi, kodvwa ngato tonkhe tikhatsi yetamani kwenta lokuhle kubo bonkhe bantfu.
Yena lowo lonibitako uyawukwenta loko, ngobe wetsembekile.
Akube kini umusa nekuthula lokuvela kuNkulunkulu, longuBabe, naseNkhosini Jesu Khristu.
Nguko nje tsine ngekwetfu sitigabatisa ngani emabandleni aNkulunkulu; sibonga indlela lenibambelele ngayo ekukholweni kwenu nome nitingelwa kangaka, noko nikwatile kutimela tinhlupheko.
Loku kusibonelo lesikhanyako ngekwehlulela kwaNkulunkulu lokunekulunga, nize nitfolakale ningulabafanele umbuso waNkulunkulu wona lowo leniwuhluphekelako.
Ngempela Nkulunkulu wehlulela kahle ngekubuyisela kuhlupheka kulabo labanihluphako,
bese uletsa kuphumula kini nine lenihluphekako, kanye nakitsi ngesikhatsi iNkhosi Jesu yembulwa ivela ezulwini, ikanye netingilosi tayo letinemandla.
INkhosi iyawuvela emalangabini emlilo, ijezise labo labangamati Nkulunkulu, nalabo labangalilaleli liVangeli leNkhosi yetfu Jesu.
Bayawujeziswa ngekubhujiswa kwaphakadze balunyulwe ebukhoneni beNkhosi nasenkhatimulweni yemandla ayo.
Loko kuyakwenteka ngelilanga nayifika kutawudvunyiswa kulabangcwele bayo, bayibabate bonkhe labakholwako; nani niyawube nisemkhatsini wabo, ngobe nani nabemukela bufakazi betfu ngayo.
Sikhulekela kutsi libito leNkhosi yetfu Jesu lidvunyiswe kini, nani kuye, ngekwemusa waNkulunkulu wetfu neweNkhosi Jesu Khristu.
kutsi ningasheshi nidvungeke engcondvweni yenu, ningetfuswa ngumoya nome ngemavi, nome yincwadzi lekungatsi iphuma kitsi. Konkhe loku kunganetfusi kutsi lilanga leNkhosi selifikile.
Ningayengwa ngumuntfu nome ngani, ngobe lelo langa lingeke lifike kungakefiki kuhlubuka lokukhulu kucala, kwembulwe umuntfu longenamtsetfo, indvodzana yekubhujiswa.
Lowo uyakuhlala aphika atiphakamise ngetulu kwako konkhe lokubitwa ngaNkulunkulu nome lokukhontwako, kuze atewuhlala endzaweni lengcwele yaNkulunkulu, atigabatise yena ngekutsi unguNkulunkulu.
Anisakhumbuli yini kutsi ngesikhatsi ngisenani nganitjela ngaletintfo?
Nani niyati kutsi usabanjwe yini kwanyalo, kuze kufike leso sikhatsi lesamiswa kutsi embulwe.
Ngobe emandla ekubate umtsetfo asacalile kusebenta ngendlela lefihlakele, intfo nje lona losavimbile kwamanje utawuchubeka ente njalo, adzimate asuswe,
bese-ke lowo longenamtsetfo uyembulwa; Jesu iNkhosi uyawumbhubhisa ngemoya wemlomo wakhe, amcedze ngekubonakala kwenkhatimulo yekufika kwakhe.
Kufika kwalongenamtsetfo ngumsebenti waSathane. Uyawufika anawo onkhe emandla, netibonakaliso, netimangaliso letingemanga,
nayo yonkhe inkhohliso yekwedukisa lababhubhako, ngobe abazange balitsandze liciniso laKhristu labebangasindziswa ngalo.
Ngako-ke Nkulunkulu ubatfumelela emandla enkhohlakalo, kuze bakholwe loko lokungemanga.
Ngako-ke bonkhe labo labangazange balikholwe liciniso, kodvwa baba nenjabulo kuloko lokungakalungi, bayakwehlulelwa ngekulahlwa.
Yena wanibitela kuko ngeliVangeli letfu, kuze nibe nesabelo ebukhosini beNkhosi yetfu Jesu Khristu.
Ngako-ke, bazalwane, manini nicine, nibambelele kulawo maciniso lesanifundzisa wona ngemavi emlomo nangencwadzi yetfu.
angadvudvuta tinhlitiyo tenu, anakhele kuyo yonkhe imisebenti lemihle nakuwo onkhe emavi lamahle.
Nisithandazele nekutsi sikhululeke kubantfu labonakele nalababi, ngobe akusibo bonkhe labakholwako.
Kodvwa iNkhosi yetsembekile, iyawunicinisa, ineluse, iniphephise kuLomubi.
Sinesibindzi eNkhosini ngani ngekutsi tonkhe letintfo lesiniyala ngato niyatenta, futsi niyawuhlala nitenta.
Shangatsi iNkhosi ingacondzisa tinhlitiyo tenu elutsandvweni lwaNkulunkulu nasekubeketeleni kwaKhristu.
Ngobe nani matfupha niyati kutsi kufanele nisilingise njani, tsine asizange sesivilaphe ngesikhatsi sisesemkhatsini wenu,
sasingadli sinkhwa semuntfu singakasikhokheli; kodvwa sasidla ngekukhandleka sishikashikeka imini nebusuku, kuze kutsi singasindzi ngisho namunye wenu.
Loko asikwentanga ngobe site lilungelo lekufuna emaholo etfu, kodvwa kuze sibe sibonelo sekutsi nisilingise.
Ngesikhatsi sisenani saneluleka satsi: “Nakukhona longasebenti, akasikudla.”
Siyeva kutsi labanye emkhatsini wenu abasebenti, abenti lutfo ngaphandle kwekutigaca etindzabeni talabanye bantfu.
Bantfu labanjalo siyabayala sibakhutsata eNkhosini Jesu Khristu kutsi abatiphatse kahle bente imisebenti yabo, kuze badle titfukutfuku tabo.
Nangabe kukhona longafuni kulalela loku lesikushoko kulencwadzi, mbukisiseni, ningahlanganyeli naye, khona atewudliwa ngemahloni.
Noko ningamtsatsi njengesitsa, kodvwa nimeluleke njengemzalwane.
Umusa weNkhosi yetfu Jesu Khristu awube nani nonkhe.
Umusa, nebubele, nekuthula lokuvela kuNkulunkulu, longuBabe, nakuKhristu Jesu iNkhosi yetfu, akube nawe.
Ubayale nekutsi bangatinaki tinganekwane nemilandvo lengapheli yetitukulwane. Konkhe loku kubanga kuphikisana lokungasiti lutfo esikhundleni sekutsi kuphumelelise kusebentela Nkulunkulu ngekukholwa.
Empeleni injongo yemyalo wetfu kuvusetela lutsandvo loluphuma enhlitiyweni lemhlophe, nakunembeza lomsulwa, nasekukholweni lokute kutentisa.
Labanye ngekuyigeja lenjongo baphambukele etinkhulumeni letingenamsebenti,
bafisa kuba bafundzisi bemtsetfo ngaphandle kwekukucondzisisa kahle loko labakushoko, naloko labakugcizelelako.

Asikhumbule kutsi umtsetfo awubekelwa bantfu labalungile, kepha ubekelwa labangawugcini umtsetfo, nalabangalaleli, nalabangamesabi Nkulunkulu, netoni, nalabangenabungcwele, nalabate Nkulunkulu, nalababulala boyise nome bonina; ubekelwe lababulala labanye bantfu,
wabekelwa netingwadla, netiphingi, nalabadvuna labalalanako, nebatfumbi bebantfu, nalabacala emanga, nabofakazi bemanga, nalabenta nome ngabe yini lephambene nemfundziso lengiyo.
Lemfundziso ivumelana neliVangeli lebukhosi. Ngilo leliVangeli laNkulunkulu lobusisekile, lengaphatsiswa lona mine.
Nome ngaphambilini ngangimlulata ngenhlamba, ngimtingela, ngimetfuka, kodvwa ngemukela bubele, ngobe ngangikwentiswa kungati ngesikhatsi ngingakakholwa.
INkhosi yamane yangibabala ngemusa wayo yangipha kukholwa nelutsandvo lolukuKhristu Jesu.
Letsembekile, futsi lifanele kwemukelwa ngibo bonkhe lelivi lelitsi: Khristu Jesu weta emhlabeni kutawusindzisa toni, mine lengingulesikhulu kunato tonkhe.
Kodvwa ngahawukelwa ngaso lesizatfu sekutsi kimi lengisembili, Jesu Khristu abonakalise konkhe kubeketela kwakhe, kube sibonelo kulabo labayawukholwa kuye, badzimate babe nekuphila lokuphakadze.
Kuyo iNkhosi yetikhatsi, lengabhubhi, nalengabonwa ngemehlo enyama, nalekungiyo yodvwa lenguNkulunkulu, akube ludvumo nebukhosi phakadze naphakadze. Amen.
ngekubambelela ekukholweni uhlale unanembeza lomsulwa. Labanye batsi ngekungalaleli lonembeza wabo bephukelwa ngumkhumbi wabo wekukholwa.
Labanye babo nje boHumenayosi na-Alekzanda lesengibanikele kuSathane kutsi batewufundza kungamhlambalati Nkulunkulu.
Khulekelani emakhosi nabo bonkhe labasetikhundleni letiphakeme, khona sitewuphila imphilo yekuthula, ngekwesaba Nkulunkulu nangako konkhe kuhlonipheka.
Loku kuhle, kuyemukeleka kuNkulunkulu uMsindzisi wetfu,
lofisa kutsi bonkhe bantfu basindziswe bafinyelele ekulatini liciniso.
Ngobe munye Nkulunkulu, munye neMlamuli losemkhatsini waNkulunkulu nebantfu, lomuntfu nguKhristu Jesu,
lowatinikela kutsi abe yinhlawulo yabo bonkhe, loko kwaba bufakazi ngesikhatsi lesifanele.
Ngiko lengakhetselwa kuba ngummemeteli nemphostoli wako, ngifundzise betive kukholwa neliciniso; ngikhuluma liciniso, hhayi emanga.
Kanjalo futsi nalabasikati bafanele kuhloba kahle, bagcoke kahle, nangekuhlonipheka, hhayi ngemichino, nome ngemihlobiso yegolide, nome yematje laligugu, nome ngetingubo letidule kakhulu,
kodvwa bahlobe ngetento letinhle letifanele labasikati labatsi besaba Nkulunkulu.
Lomsikati kufanele afundze ngekuthula nangekutfobeka konkhe.
Kodvwa angimvumeli kutsi afundzise nome-ke engamele indvodza, kepha akathule.
Ngobe phela Adamu wentiwa kucala, kwase kulandzela Eva;
futsi Adamu akakhohliswanga, kepha ngumfati lowakhohliswa, wephula umtsetfo.
Kodvwa umfati uyawusindziswa ngekutala bantfwana, nabahlala ngekuzitsa konkhe ekukholweni, naselutsandvweni, nasekungcwelisweni.
Umbonisi kufanele kube yindvodza lengasoleki, lenemfati munye, letibambako, lezitsile, lehloniphekile, lephatsa kahle tihambi, lenemasu ekufundzisa,
lengesiso sidzakwa, lengatitsatseli etulu tintfo, kodvwa lemnene, lengenalo luchweba, lengayitsandzi imali.
Umbonisi kufanele abe ngulophetse kahle umuti wakhe, afundzise ngekuhlonipheka konkhe kutsi bantfwabakhe batfobeke.
Kodvwa nangabe indvodza yehluleka kuphatsa umuti wayo, pho, ingaliphatsa kanjani libandla laNkulunkulu?
Umbonisi akukafaneli kube ngumuntfu losandza kuphendvuka funa atigcabhe, bese-ke Sathane uyamwisa.
Ngetulu kwaloko kufanele abe nebufakazi lobuhle kubangephandle, funa awele ehlazweni naselugibeni lwaSathane.
Emaciniso lembulekile ekukholwa kufanele bawaphatse nganembeza lomhlophe.
Laba kufanele bavivinywe kucala, bese-ke bangena emsebentini webudikhoni, nabangasoleki.
Kanjalo futsi nalabasikati bafanele kuzitsa, bangahlebi, batitsibe, betsembeke kuko konkhe.
Umdikhoni kufanele abe yindvodza lenemfati munye, lephetse kahle bantfwabayo nemuti wayo.
Ngobe labo labake bawenta kahle lomsebenti webudikhoni batizuzela ludvumo loluhle nesibindzi lesikhulu ekukholweni kuKhristu Jesu.
Nome ngikubhalela ngaletintfo nje, ngiyetsemba kutsi ngitawufika lapho kuwe masinyane.
Kodvwa nakwenteka ngephuta, umelwe kwati kutsi umuntfu kufanele atiphatse kanjani endlini yaNkulunkulu, lekulibandla laNkulunkulu lophilako, leliyinsika nesisekelo seliciniso.
Siyavuma kutsi yinkhulu kakhulu imfihlakalo yenkholo yetfu yekutsi:
Bantfu labatentisako bayawufundzisa emanga, ngobe bonembeza babo bashiswe luphawu.

Bayawuvimbela kushada nekuteka, batsi akuzilwe kudla lokutsite. Phela konkhe kudla kwadalwa nguNkulunkulu lekufanele kutsi labakholwako bakwemukele ngekubonga, njengobe babantfu labalatiko liciniso lonkhe.
Ngobe konkhe lokudalwe nguNkulunkulu kulungile. Kuko konkhe lokwemukelwa ngekubonga kute lokufanele kwaliwe,
ngobe konkhe kungcweliswe ngelivi laNkulunkulu nangemthandazo.
Ungahambisani netinganekwane tebulukati letingakalungi. Tetayete wena kumesaba Nkulunkulu.

Ngobe kwetayeta umtimba ngekwelula imisipha kunenzuzo kwesikhashana nje, kodvwa kumesaba Nkulunkulu kunenzuzo etintfweni letinyenti, ngobe kucuketse setsembiso semphilo yamanje kanye nesemphilo letako.
Lelivi letsembekile, lifanele kwemukelwa ngibo bonkhe.
Kuze kube manje siyasebenta sishikaneke, ngobe sibeke litsemba letfu kuNkulunkulu lophilako, longuMsindzisi wabo bonkhe bantfu, ikakhulu walabo labakholwako.
Tinikele kufundzela bantfu umBhalo, ubayale, ubafundzise, ngize ngifike.
Ungasivilapheli sipho sakho lowasinikwa ngelivi lesiphrofetho ngesikhatsi baholi belibandla babeka tandla etikwakho.
Khutsala kakhulu kuloko, khona batewubona kuchubekela kwakho embili.
Uticaphele wena nekufundzisa kwakho, ungesuki kuko; ngobe ngekwenta njalo utawube utisindzisa wena kanye nalabakuvako.
Labasikati labadzala ubaphatse shangatsi uphetse bonyoko, nalabasikati labasebancane ubaphatse shangatsi uphetse bodzadzewenu, ube msulwa kubo bonkhe.

Nangabe umfelokati anebantfwana nome batukulu, abacale bakhombise inhlonipho yekukholwa kwabo emakhaya kubo, babuyisele kubonga kwabo kulabo lababakhulisile, ngobe nguloko lokuhle emehlweni aNkulunkulu.
Kodvwa lowo longumfelokati sibili, longasenabani, litsemba lakhe lonkhe sewulibeke kuNkulunkulu. Uthandaza busuku nemini acela lusito kuNkulunkulu.
Kodvwa umfelokati lotinikele etinkhanukweni ufe asaphila.
Kepha nangabe umuntfu anganakekeli tihlobo takhe, ikakhulu umndeni wakhe, sewukulahlile kukholwa; futsi loko kwenta kwakhe kubi kakhulu kunekwemuntfu longakholwa.

Kufanele atiwe ngetento takhe letinhle, njengemuntfu lowake wondla wakhulisa bantfwana, waphatsa kahle tihambi, wageza tinyawo talabangcwele, wasita labahluphekile, futsi kufanele abe ngulabetinikele kwenta lokuhle nome ngayiphi indlela.
Kodvwa bafelokati labasebancane ungababhalisi, ngobe nangabe tinkhanuko tabo tenyama setibenta besuke kuKhristu, babe sebafisa kwendza.
Ngaleyo ndlela batifaka ekwehlulelweni ngekuphambuka esetsembisweni sabo sekucala.
Ngetulu kwaloko bafundza buvila ngekutfunga imiti, bangagcini ngebuvila kuphela, kodvwa babuye bahlebe, bangene kulokungesiko kwabo, bakhulume nalokungakafaneli.
Ngifisa kutsi bafelokati labasebancane bendze, batale bantfwana, baphatse imindeni yabo, kuze sitsa singetilitfola litfuba lekunyembenya labakholwako.
Nangabe kukhona umfati lokholwako lonebafelokati labatihlobo, akabasite; lingetfweswa umtfwalo libandla, khona litekusita labo lababafelokati labeswele ngempela.
Empeleni umBhalo utsi: “Ungayifaki sifonyo inkhabi nayibhulako;” uphindze utsi: “Sisebenti sifanelwe liholo laso.”
Labo labonako ubasole ubekhute embikwabo bonkhe, khona nalabo labanye batewuhlala ngekwesaba.
Ungasheshi kubeka tandla kunome ngukubani, futsi ungabambisani nemuntfu etonweni takhe; tigcine umsulwa.
Yekela kunatsa emanti odvwa, ubosale unatsa nelitsantana leliwayini ngenca yesisu sakho nangebutsakatsaka lobuvama kukuhlupha.

Tisebenti letinebaphatsi labakholwako kufanele tingabedzeleli ngeligunya lekutsi babazalwane; kodvwa timelwe tisebente kancono, ngobe labo labasitakala ngekusebenta kwato ngulabatsandzekako labakholwako.
Nangabe kukhona lofundzisa lokunye lokungavumelani nemavi laphilile eNkhosi yetfu Jesu Khristu, nemfundziso lenekumesaba Nkulunkulu,
uyatikhukhumeta, akati lutfo, uguliswa ngimibuzo nekuphikisana lokuveta umona, nembango, nekuhlambalata, nekuzindlekela lokubi,
nemsindvo wembango longapheli webantfu labanengcondvo leyonakele, futsi labemukwe neliciniso, bacabange kutsi kwesaba Nkulunkulu yindlela yenzuzo.
Ngobe kute leseta nako la emhlabeni, futsi kute nalesiyawuhamba nako;
Kodvwa labo labafisa bunjinga bawela ekulingweni, naselugibeni, nasetinkhanukweni letinyenti tebulima, naletiyingoti letigcumukisela bantfu ekufeni nasekubhujisweni.
Phela kutsandza imali kuyimphandze yako konkhe lokubi; labanye-ke ngekuyifisa kwabo bedukile, bakhwesha ekukholweni, batigwaza ngeminjunju yebuhlungu leminyenti.
Lwani kulwa lokuhle kwekukholwa, kuze uzuze kuphila lokuphakadze lowabitelwa kuko, wavuma kuvuma lokuhle embikwabofakazi labanyenti.
Ngikuyala embikwaNkulunkulu lophilisa konkhe, nasembikwaKhristu Jesu lowavuma sivumo lesihle embikwaPhontiyuse Philatu,
kutsi ugcine lomyalo, ungenabala, ungasoleki, kuze kube sikhatsi sekubonakala kweNkhosi yetfu Jesu Khristu.
Ngesikhatsi sakhe Jesu utawubonakaliswa nguSomandla lokunguye yedvwa, lobusisekile, iNkhosi yemakhosi neMbusi webabusi.
Nguye yedvwa longabhubhi lohlala ekukhanyeni lekungasondzeleki kuko, longazange asabonwe ngumuntfu, nalongeke abonwe ngumuntfu. Kuye akube ludvumo nemandla aphakadze. Amen.
Ubatjele kutsi bente lokuhle, bacebe emisebentini lemihle, babelane, bephane.
Ngaloko batibekela sisekelo lesihle sesikhatsi lesitako, khona batewunamatsela ekuphileni lokunguko sibili.
ngobe labanye batsi ngekulwemukela balahlekelwa ngumgomo wekukholwa.
Lencwadzi iphuma kuPawula, umphostoli waKhristu Jesu ngekwentsandvo yaNkulunkulu lowetsembisa kuphila lokukuKhristu Jesu.
Akube kuwe umusa, nebubele, nekuthula lokuvela kuNkulunkulu, longuBabe, nakuKhristu Jesu iNkhosi yetfu.
Ngikhumbula tinyembeti takho, bese ngifisa kukubona, khona kujabula kwami kutewuphelela.
Ngikhunjutwa kukholwa kwakho lokute kutentisa. Ngiko kona loko kukholwa lokwacala kutfolakala kugogo wakho Lowisi nakunyoko Yunisi, ngineliciniso kutsi nakuwe kukhona.
Kungako ngikukhumbuta kutsi usibasele kabusha sipho saNkulunkulu lesikuwe, lowasitfola ngekubekwa ngimi tandla.
Ngobe Nkulunkulu akasiphanga umoya webugwala, kodvwa wasipha Moya wemandla, newelutsandvo, newekutekhuta.
Nguye lowasisindzisa wasibita ngelubito lwakhe lolungcwele, hhayi ngemisebenti yetfu, kodvwa ngelisu lakhe nangemusa wakhe, lasipha wona kuKhristu Jesu, umhlaba ungakasekelwa,
kepha nyalo sewembulwe ngekubonakaliswa kweMsindzisi wetfu Khristu Jesu lowakucitsa kufa; kuphila nekungabhubhi wakuletsa ekukhanyeni ngeliVangeli.
kungako nje ngihlupheka nanyalo. Kodvwa ngite emahloni, ngobe ngiyamati lengetsembele kuye, futsi ngineliciniso kutsi yena unawo emandla ekukulondvolota loko lakubeke kimi,
Hamba ngekukholwa nangelutsandvo lolukuKhristu Jesu. Ulandzele etinyatselweni temavi lacinile lengakufundzisa wona.
Loko lokuhle lokuligugu lophatsiswe kona ukulondvolote ngaMoya Longcwele lohlala kitsi.
Shangatsi iNkhosi ingaba nebubele kubaka-Onesiforusi, labevame kungihlumelelisa njalo, ngobe abengenamahloni ngekuboshwa kwami.
futsi uyayati kahle yonkhe imisebenti yakhe lemihle labetinikele kuyo e-Efesu. Shangatsi iNkhosi ingamhawukela ngalelo langa!
Loko lokuve kimi embikwabofakazi labanyenti, nawe kuphatsise bantfu labetsembekile labatawuba nemandla ekukufundzisa kulabanye.
Kute lisotja lelisemphini lelibuye litikhatsate ngetintfo letingesito tebusotja; phela injongo yalo kwenelisa lowo lolibutsile.
Futsi nemdlali, nakangawugcini umtsetfo wemdlalo, akawiniswa.
Ngumlimi losebenta kamatima lekufanele atfole kucala sabelo esivunweni.
Cabangisisa loku lengikushoko, ngobe iNkhosi itakupha kucondzisisa konkhe.
Ngilo leliVangeli lengilihluphekelako, ngidzimate ngaboshwa nangetinketane, kwaba shangatsi ngisigebengu. Kepha noko livi laNkulunkulu alikaboshwa.
Ngako-ke ngicinisela kuko konkhe ngenca yalabakhetsiwe, kuze kutsi nabo batekwemukela insindziso lekuKhristu Jesu baphiwe nebukhosi baphakadze.
Khutsalela kutiveta wemukelekile kuNkulunkulu, ube sisebenti lesetsembekile kuye lesite emahloni nalesiliphakela kahle livi leliciniso.
Kodvwa utigege tinkhulumo telive letilite, ngobe tibanga kungamesabi Nkulunkulu.
Inkhulumo yabo iyawubhidlika njengesilondza semgubho lesincincako. Emkhatsini wabo kukhona boHumenayosi naFiletusi,
lese baphambukile ecinisweni batsi kuvuka kulabafile sekwendlula. Bacitsisa labanye kukholwa kwabo.
Kodvwa sisekelo lesimiswe nguNkulunkulu solomane simile, sineluphawu lolutsi: “INkhosi iyabati lababayo,” nekutsi: “Wonkhe umuntfu lotibita ngelibito leNkhosi akakhweshe kulokubi.”

Nangabe umuntfu atihlanta yena angabi sitja sekusetjentiswa nje nome kunini, uyabe sewuba sitja lesihloniphekile lesingcweliswe sadzimate safanela umniyo wendlu, size silungele nome ngumuphi umsebenti lomuhle.
Ngako-ke balekela tinkhanuko tebusha, kodvwa hambisana nalabo labakhuleka eNkhosini ngenhlitiyo lehlambululekile, ujonge kulunga, nekukholwa, nelutsandvo, nekuthula.
Kodvwa ungakunaki kuphikisana kwebulima lokungenasisekelo, ngobe uyati nawe kutsi kubanga kucabana.
Sisebenti seNkhosi asikafaneli kutsi silwe, kodvwa sifanele kutsi sibe mnene kubo bonkhe bantfu, sibe nelisu lekufundzisa, sibeketele,
sibayale ngemoya lomnene labo labamelene naso, mhlawumbe Nkulunkulu angabanika kuphendvuka, badzimate balati liciniso,
baze basanguluke etingcondvweni tabo, baphunyule elugibeni lwaSathane, lowabagcilata kuze bente intsandvo yakhe.
Bantfu bayawutitsandza, batsandze imali, batigcabhe, batigabatise, balulate Nkulunkulu ngenhlamba. Bayawuba ngulabangalaleli batali babo, bangabongi, babete bungcwele,
babete lutsandvo, bangatsetselelani. Bayawuba tinyoka, bangatitsibi, babe nebulwane, batondze lokuhle,
batsengise ngalabanye bantfu, babe nemawala, bakhukhumukiswe kutatisa, batsandze kutijabulisa kunekutsi babe ngulabatsandza Nkulunkulu.
Bayawuba nesimo sekumesaba Nkulunkulu, kodvwa babe bawaphika emandla ako; labo-ke ubakhweshele.
Ngobe emkhatsini wabo laba kukhona labakhokhobela kungena etindlini talabasikati lababutsakatsaka ngekusindvwa tono tabo, baholwa tinkhanuko letimihibahiba.
Laba labasikati bafundza njalonjalo, kodvwa bangeke befike ekulatini liciniso.
Njengobe boJanesi naJambresi bamelana naMosi, nabo-ke labantfu bamelene neliciniso, babantfu labanengcondvo leyonakele netehluleki ekukholweni.
Kodvwa bangeke bafike ndzawo; ngobe bulima babo butakwembuleka kubo bonkhe bantfu, njengebulima balabo bobabili.
nasekutingelweni, nasekuhluphekeni lokwangehlela e-Antiyokhi, nase-Ikhoniyumi, naseListra; ngacinisela kuko konkhe lokutingelwa, futsi iNkhosi yangikhulula kuko konkhe.
Yebo, bonkhe labafisa kuphila ngekukholwa nguKhristu Jesu bayawutingelwa bahlushwe,
kepha lababi nebakhohlisi bayawudlanga ngebubi, bedukise, nabo bedukiswe.
Kodvwa wena chubeka kuloko lokufundzile wakukholwa, wati kutsi ukufundze kubobani,
nekutsi kusukela ebuntfwaneni bakho wayati imiBhalo lengcwele lenemandla ekuhlakaniphisa kube kusindziswa ngekukholwa nguKhristu Jesu.
Yonkhe imiBhalo iphefumulelwe nguNkulunkulu; ilungele kufundzisa, nekusola, nekucondzisa, nekuyala ngekulunga,
kuze umuntfu waNkulunkulu atewuhlonyiswa alungele kwenta wonkhe umsebenti lomuhle lamiselwe wona.
Shumayela livi, ulimele nome tikhatsi tivuma nome tingavumi; sola, ucwayise, uyale ngako konkhe kubeketela nekufundzisa.
Ngobe siyeta sikhatsi lapho bangeyiwuyemukela imfundziso lephilile; kodvwa ngekwenkhanuko yabo bayawutibutsela bafundzisi babo, bafundziswe loko labatsandza kufundziswa kona.
Bayawufulatselisa tindlebe tabo ecinisweni baphambukele etinganekwaneni.
Kodvwa wena, zitsa etintfweni tonkhe, ubeketele ekuhluphekeni, wente umsebenti webuvangeli, utifeze tonkhe timfanelo telubito lwakho.
Ngikulwile kulwa lokuhle, sengiyicedzile indzima yami, ngibambelele ekukholweni.

Manje sengihlalelwe kutfola umchele wekulunga, lengibekelwe wona yiNkhosi, uMehluleli lolungile. INkhosi iyawunginika lowo mchele ngalelo langa, hhayi mine kuphela kodvwa bonkhe labetsabele kubuya kwayo.
Demasi sewungibalekele waya eThesalonika, ngenca yekutsandza lelive. Khresensi waya eGalathiya, Thithusi waya eDalmathiya;
nguLukha kuphela lenginaye la. Ubota naMakho, ngobe ulusito kimi emsebentini.
Ubota nalelo jazi lami lengalishiya kuKhaphusi eThrowasi, kanye naleto tincwadzi, ikakhulu leti tesikhumba.
Mkhweshele nawe, ngobe wamelana kakhulu nemfundziso yetfu.
Kodvwa iNkhosi yema nami yangicinisa kuze inshumayelo yami ipheleliselwe ngami, nebetive beve. Ngako-ke ngakhululwa emlonyeni welibhubesi.
INkhosi iyawungikhulula kuyo yonkhe imisebenti lemibi, ingisindzise, ngize ngifike embusweni wayo wasezulwini. Akube kuyo bukhosi phakadze naphakadze. Amen.
Erastusi wasala eKhorinte; Trofimusi ngamshiya agula eMilethusi.
Bayakuhambisa bo-Ebulusi, naPhudensi, naLinusi, naKlawudiya kanye nabo bonkhe bazalwane.
Lencwadzi iphuma kuPawula, sisebenti saNkulunkulu, nemphostoli waJesu Khristu. Ngitfunyelwe kwakha kukholwa kwalabakhetsiwe baNkulunkulu ngibafundzise lwati lweliciniso ngekwesaba Nkulunkulu.
Futsi ngitfunyelwe nekubaholela etsembeni lekuphila lokuphakadze, lekwatsi umhlaba ungakasekelwa kwetsenjiswa nguNkulunkulu longawacali emanga.
Kodvwa ngesikhatsi lesifanele sekubonakaliswe evini lakhe ngekushumayela lengiphatsiswe kona mine ngekwemyalo waNkulunkulu, uMsindzisi wetfu.
Akube kuwe umusa nekuthula lokuvela kuNkulunkulu, longuBabe, nakuKhristu Jesu, uMsindzisi wetfu.
Umbonisi kufanele angasoleki, abe yindvodza lenemfati munye, lenebantfwana labakholwako nalabalalelako, labangakadvumi ngebubi.
Umholi, njengobe asisebenti saNkulunkulu, kufanele angasoleki, angatigcabhi, abete lulaka, angabi sidzakwa, abete luchweba, futsi angahaleli inzuzo ngebubi.
Kodvwa kufanele aphatse kahle tihambi, atsandze lokulungile, aticaphele abe cotfo, abe ngcwele, atibambe.
Ngobe banyenti labangalaleli, nalabakhuluma lite, nalabacala emanga, ikakhulu labaphuma enkholweni yebuJuda.
Labo bafanele kubindziswa, ngobe bacitsa emakhaya ngekufundzisa timfundziso letingakafaneli, bentele kutfola ingcebo ngebubi.
bangatinaki tinganekwane temaJuda nome imiyalo yebantfu labafulatsela liciniso.
Kulabahlantekile konkhe kuhlantekile, kodvwa kulababi nalabangakholwa kute lokuhlantekile; kepha kungcole ingcondvo yabo nanembeza wabo.
Bavuma ngemlomo kutsi bayamati Nkulunkulu, kepha ngetento tabo bayamphika; bayenyanyeka, abalaleli, bayehluleka kwenta nome ngabe yini lenhle.
Uyale emadvodza lamadzala kutsi atitsibe, azitse, acondze, acine ekukholweni, naselutsandvweni, nasekuciniseleni.
Kanjalo nabomake labadzala ubayale kutsi bahlonipheke ngesimilo, bangabi tinhlebi nome tigcili tekudzakwa, kufanele babe bafundzisi balokulungile.
Abafundzise bomakoti kutsi batsandze emadvodza abo nebantfwababo,
