babe ngulabacondzile nalabacotfo; baphatse kahle emakhaya abo, balunge, batfobele emadvodza abo, kuze lingahlanjalatwa livi laNkulunkulu.
Wena-ke ube sibonelo lesihle ngato tonkhe tindlela. Ufundzise ngebucotfo nangekutimisela,
nangekukhuluma lokuphilile lokungasoleki, kuze kutsi labo labamelene natsi, bahlazeke ngekutsi bate lokubi labangahle bakusho ngatsi.
Tingebi, kodvwa tikhombise kwetsembeka kuko konkhe, kuze etintfweni tonkhe tihlobise imfundziso yaNkulunkulu uMsindzisi wetfu.
Lomusa usifundzisa kutsi sikudzele kungakholwa, nekutsi sitilumule etinkhanukweni telive, bese siphila ngekuzitsa, nangekulunga, nangekumesaba Nkulunkulu kulomhlaba,
ngesikhatsi sisabheke kugcwaliseka kwelitsemba lelibusisekile, kubonakala kwenkhatimulo yebukhosi baNkulunkulu lomkhulu, uMsindzisi
Yena watinikela ngenca yetfu, kuze atesihlenga ebubini bonkhe atingcwelisele sive lesisakhe, lesinenshisekelo kutsi sente imisebenti lemihle.
Kubete lokhuluma kabi ngalomunye, bangabi tilwi, babeketele, bakhombise bumnene kubo bonkhe bantfu.
Ngobe natsi matfupha sake saba tilima, singalaleli, sidukiswa, sitigcili tato tonkhe tinkhanuko nekutamasa. Besiphila ebubini nasemoneni, sitondzekile, sitondzana.
Kodvwa kwatsi Nkulunkulu uMsindzisi wetfu nakabonakalisa lutsandvo lwakhe kubantfu,
wasisindzisa, hhayi ngobe besente imisebenti yekulunga, kodvwa ngesihawu sakhe. Wasisindzisa, wasigeza ngekusitala kabusha nangekusenta busha ngaMoya Longcwele,
lowatfululelwa etikwetfu ngalokuchichimako ngaJesu Khristu uMsindzisi wetfu.
Ngako-ke ngemusa wakhe usente semukeleka kuye kutsi silungile, sibe tindlalifa tekuphila lokuphakadze lesetsembele kuko.
Ngifisa kutsi ukugcizelele loku, kuze labo labakholwe kuNkulunkulu bakhutsalele kwenta imisebenti lemihle.
Kodvwa uboyikhweshela imibuzo yebulima, nemilandvo yekutalana, nemibango, nekuphikisana ngemitsetfo, ngobe konkhe loko akusiti lutfo, futsi kulite.
Umuntfu lonemfundziso yekwedukisa ubomkhweshela, nasayalwe kanye nakabili,
wati kutsi lowo lonjalo sewuphambukile, wonile, utehlulele yena.
Sheshisa utfumele Zenasi, ummeli, na-Apolosi, ucaphele nekutsi bangesweli lutfo.
Bantfu bakitsi bakhutsalele kwenta imisebenti lemihle, kuze batewusita lapho kwesweleke lusito khona, bangabi ngulabangatseli titselo.
Bonkhe lenginabo lapha bayakuhambisa. Hambisa labo labasitsandzako ekukholweni.
Iya kuFilemoni lotsandzekako nalosisebenti kanye natsi,
naku-Aphiya, dzadzewetfu, naku-Akhiphusi, lolisotja laJesu kanye natsi, nakulo lonkhe libandla lelihlanganela endlini yaFilemoni.
ngobe sengivile ngelutsandvo lwakho kubantfu baNkulunkulu, ngeva nangekukholwa kwakho lonako eNkhosini Jesu.
Ngithandazela kutsi budlelwane betfu ekukholweni bukwente uwati kancono emagugu lesinawo kuKhristu.
Lutsandvo lwakho luyangijabulisa, futsi luyangikhutsata, mzalwane wami. Tinhlitiyo talabanyenti labangcwele tihlunyelelisiwe ngalo.
Ngako-ke bengingaba nesibindzi ngaKhristu kutsi ngikutfume wente lokufanele kwentiwe,
kodvwa ngenca yelutsandvo ngiyakuncenga. Mine Pawula, njengemuntfu losamdzala nyalo, nalosasiboshwa ngenca yaKhristu Jesu,
Kucala abete lusito kuwe, kodvwa nyalo sewunelusito lolukhulu
Bengingatsandza kutsi ngimgcine ngalapha ngakimi, njengobe ngisiboshwa nje, khona atewutsatsa indzawo yakho ekungisiteni ngesikhatsi ngisaboshiwe ngenca yeliVangeli.
Noko angikatsandzi kwenta lutfo wena ungakavumi, kuze umusa ungayi ngekucindzetelwa, kodvwa usebente ngesihle.
Ngobe encenye Onesimuse wehlukaniswa nawe kwesikhashana nje, khona atawuphindze abuyiselwe kuwe, ningasenawuphindza nehlukane.

Manje akasabuyi njengesigcili, kodvwa sengumzalwane lotsandzekako. Njengobe angulotsandzeka kangaka kimi, kangakanani-ke kuwe! Phela sewuligugu kuwe, hhayi njengobe asigcili sakho kuphela, kodvwa njengemzalwane wakho eNkhosini.
Ngako-ke nawutsi mine ngingumhlanganyeli kanye nawe, naye-ke, memukele ngaleyo ndlela lebewungangemukela ngayo mine.
Nangabe kukhona lakona ngako, nome kukhona lakukweleda kona, sibuyise kimi leso sikwelede.
Nalu-ke luphawu lwekutsi mine Pawula ngiyakumkhokhela; akudzingeki nekutsi ngibe ngikukhumbuta kutsi kwawena nje ngekwakho ungewami, nginesabelo kuwe.
Yebo, mzalwane wami, ngicela kutsi ngitfokotiswe nguwe eNkhosini, ngekuhlumelelisa inhlitiyo yami kuKhristu.
Ngibhalele wena, ngobe ngiyetsemba kutsi utakwenta lengikucelako; ngiyati kutsi utakwenta nalokungetulu kwaloku lengikucelile.
Lokunye-ke kutsi ungilungiselele indzawo yekuhlala, ngobe ngiyetsemba kutsi imithandazo yenu itawuphendvuleka, Nkulunkulu angisite ngite lapho kini.
naMakho, na-Aristakhusi naDemasi, kanye naLukha, tisebenti kanye nami.
Kodvwa kulamalanga ekugcina sewukhulume kitsi ngeNdvodzana yakhe ladala ngayo umhlaba nako konkhe lokukhona; wayimisa kutsi ibe yindlalifa yako konkhe.

LeNdvodzana ibonakalisa bukhosi nebunjalo bonkhe baNkulunkulu. Isimise indalo yonkhe ngelivi layo lelinemandla. Yatsi kube yente intsetselelo yetono tebantfu, yahlala ezulwini ngesekudla saNkulunkulu Somandla.
Livi lelamenyetelwa tingilosi laciniseka; nako konkhe lokubi nekungalaleli kwakujeziswa ngalokufanele.
Pho, tsine siyawuphunyula njani, nasingakunaki lokusindziswa lokungaka? Kwakhulunywa yiNkhosi kucala, kwaciniswa kitsi ngulabo labayiva.
Nkulunkulu wafakaza kanye nabo ngetibonakaliso, nangetimangaliso, nangemisebenti yemandla leyehlukahlukene, nangetipho taMoya Longcwele lataba ngekwentsandvo yakhe.
Sikhuluma ngemhlaba lotako; Nkulunkulu akawubekanga ngaphansi kwetingilosi.
Kepha bukhona bufakazi lesibutfola emiBhalweni lobutsi:
Kubeka tintfo tonkhe ngaphansi kwakhe kusho kutsi kute lakushiya kungakabekwa ngaphansi kwemandla akhe. Kwanyalo nje, sisengakaboni kutsi tintfo tonkhe tibekwe ngaphansi kwakhe.

Kodvwa lesimbonako nguJesu, lowentiwa waba mncane kunetingilosi kwesikhashana. Wetfweswa umchele webukhosi neludvumo ngenca yekuhlupheka kwekufa. Kwaya ngebubele baNkulunkulu kutsi Jesu eve kufa ngenca yebantfu bonkhe.

Konkhe lokukhona kukhona kuye nangaye Nkulunkulu. Ngako-ke kwakuvele kumfanele kutsi yena ente Jesu apheleliswe ngekuhlupheka; wamenta waba ngumvuli wendlela yekusindziswa kwemadvodzana lamanyenti ngekuwaletsa ebukhosini.
Ngobe lowo longcwelisako nalabo labangcwelisiwe baphuma kuBabe munye. Ngiko nje angenamahloni kubabita ngekutsi bomnakabo,
kuze akhulule bonkhe labo labatsi ngesikhatsi sonkhe sekuphila kwabo baboshelwa ebugcilini ngenca yekwesaba kufa.
Ngobe akusito tingilosi labecondze kutisita, kodvwa titukulwane ta-Abrahama.
Ngako-ke kwakudzingekile kutsi afanane nabomnakabo ngako konkhe, kuze atewuba ngumPhristi Lomkhulu lonesihawu nalowetsembekile emsebentini waNkulunkulu, kube yinhlawulo yetono tebantfu.
Njengobe naye matfupha wahlupheka alingwa, unawo emandla ekubasita labo labalingwako.
Wetsembeka kuNkulunkulu lammisa, njengobe naMosi etsembeka endlini yaNkulunkulu.
Noko Jesu wafanelwa ludvumo lolukhulu kakhulu kunaMosi, njengobe vele umakhi wendlu udvunyiswa kakhulu kunalendlu layakhile.
Tonkhe tindlu tinebakhi bato, kodvwa Nkulunkulu ungumakhi wako konkhe.
Mosi kambe abetsembekile kuko konkhe endlini yaNkulunkulu njengenceku, kuze kube bufakazi baleto tintfo lebekutawukhulunywa ngato kamuva.
Kodvwa Khristu wetsembeka njengeNdvodzana endlini yaNkulunkulu. Tsine-ke siyindlu yaNkulunkulu, nasibambelele ngesibindzi etsembeni letfu [kuze kube ngusekupheleni].
Kodvwa khutsatanani onkhe emalanga yingci nakusatsiwa: “Lamuhla”, kutsi kubete lowentiwa inhlitiyo yakhe ibe lukhuni ngekuyengwa sono.
Ngobe sihlanganyela naKhristu kuphela, nasibambelele etsembeni letfu lakucala kuze kube ngusekupheleni.
Bobani laba labamcansula iminyaka lengema-40? Bekungesibo yini labo labona bafela ehlane?
Bobani labo labafungela Nkulunkulu kutsi bangeke basangena ekuphumuleni kwakhe? Empeleni ngulabo lababengamlaleli.
Siyabona-ke kutsi abazange bangene kuko ngenca yekungakholwa kwabo.
Ngako-ke asesabe, funa kube khona emkhatsini wenu lobonakala shangatsi sewusigejile lesitfuba, ngobe sisemile lesetsembiso saNkulunkulu sekungena ekuphumuleni kwakhe.
LiVangeli lishunyayelwe kitsi, njengobe lashunyayelwa nakulabo bakadzeni. Kodvwa lelivi labaliva alizange libasite; ngobe naloku baliva ngetindlebe nje abazange balikholwe ngetinhlitiyo.
Tsine lesikholwako siyangena ekuphumuleni kwakhe, njengobe washo watsi:
Noko imisebenti yakhe yase iphelelisiwe kusukela ekudalweni kwemhlaba.
Ngobe ngiko lokushiwo ngumBhalo ngelilanga lesikhombisa kutsi: “Ngelilanga lesikhombisa Nkulunkulu waphumula kuyo yonkhe imisebenti yakhe.”
Kodvwa uphindze atsi kulendzawo: “Bangeke basangena ekuphumuleni kwami.”
Kuyakhanya-ke kutsi nanyalo umnyango usavuliwe kutsi labo labatsandzako basengangena ekuphumuleni kwakhe, ngobe phela labo labaliva kucala liVangeli abangenanga ngenca yekungalaleli kwabo.
Loku-ke Nkulunkulu ukukhombise ngekutsi akhetse lelinye lilanga lekutsiwa ngu “lamuhla”. Wakhuluma ngaDavide emvakweminyaka leminyenti, njengobe kubhaliwe, watsi:
Ngako-ke kuphumula kweliSabatha kusabasalele bantfu baNkulunkulu.
Ngobe lowo longene ekuphumuleni kwaNkulunkulu, naye uphumula emisebentini yakhe, njengobe naNkulunkulu aphumula kuyakhe.
Ngako-ke asikhutsalele kungena kuloko kuphumula, kubete lowehluleka ngenca yekungalaleli njengabo.
Kute sidalwa lesifihlakele kuNkulunkulu, kodvwa konkhe kusebaleni kwembuliwe emehlweni alowo lekufanele sitilandze kuye.
LomPhristi wetfu Lomkhulu akasiye lowehluleka kuvelana natsi ebutsakatsakeni betfu, kodvwa walingwa ngayo yonkhe indlela njengatsi, noko akazange one.
Ngako-ke asisondzele ngesibindzi esihlalweni semusa, khona sitekwemukela sihawu, sitfole umusa lotasisita ngesikhatsi lesifanele.
Lowo-ke angababeketelela labo labangati lutfo nalaba labedukako, ngobe kwayena unebutsakatsaka.
Ngenca yalobo butsakatsaka bakhe, naye kudzingekile kutsi ente iminikelo yetono takhe, njengobe abentela labanye bantfu.
Kute umuntfu lotitsatsela lesikhundla ngaphandle kwekutsi abitwe nguNkulunkulu, njengobe na-Aroni abitwa.
Nome abeyiNdvodzana, wafundza kulalela ngekuhlupheka kwakhe,
kwase kutsi ngekupheleliswa kwakhe waba ngumtfombo wensindziso yaphakadze yabo bonkhe labo labamlalelako,
Nkulunkulu asammise kutsi abe ngumPhristi Lomkhulu ngekuma kwaMelkhisedeki.
Mayelana naloku kunyenti lesingakusho, kodvwa kulukhuni kunichazela, ngobe naku senaba butfuntfu ekuveni.
Ngobe lowo losaphila ngelubisi usengakakhuli evini lekulunga; useluswane.

Ngako-ke asitishiye timfundziso tekucatfuta evini laKhristu, sendlulele kuletingembili talasebavutsiwe eNkhosini. Asikuyekele kuphindza sibeke sisekelo ngekushumayela kuphendvuka emisebentini lefile, kanye nesekukholwa kuNkulunkulu.
Asikuyekele futsi kuphindza sinifundzise ngemibhabhatiso letinhlobonhlobo, nangekubekwa tandla, nangekuvuswa kwalabafile, nangekwehlulelwa kwaphakadze.
Labo-ke labanambitse kulunga kwelivi laNkulunkulu baweva nemandla ekuphila lokutako,
nase bahlubuka, kusho kutsi bona matfupha sebaphindze batibetselela iNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu esiphambanweni, bayitsela ngelihlazo ebaleni; labo kungeke kwenteke kutsi baphindze baphendvuke.
Umhlabatsi lonatsa emanti emvula nayina njalo nje, bese umilisa tilimo letiba lusito kulabo labawulimako, ubusiswa nguNkulunkulu.
Kodvwa nangabe umhlaba umilisa emanyeva netinchachabutane, awunamsebenti walutfo, futsi usengotini yekucalekiswa nguNkulunkulu; nesiphetfo sawo kushiswa ngemlilo.
Kodvwa, bazalwane bami, nome sikhuluma kanjena nje, asesabi lutfo ngani, ngobe siyanati kutsi ninako lokuncono lokumacondzana nensindziso yenu.
Ngobe phela Nkulunkulu akakhetsi, futsi angeke ayikhohlwe imisebenti yenu nelutsandvo lenilukhombise ekusiteni labangcwele, njengobe nenta namanje.
Sifisa shangatsi ngulowo nalowo kini angakhombisa loko kushisekela, nekuciniseka etsembeni lenu, kuze kube ngusekugcineni.
Sifisa kutsi ningavilaphi, kodvwa nibe njengabo labo labadla lifa letetsembiso ngekukholwa nangekubeketela.
Nangabe umuntfu afunga, usebentisa libito lalomunye lomkhulu kunaye. Sifungo siyacinisa, sicedze kuphikisana kwebantfu.
Kulabo labebafanele kwemukela loko kwakutsenjisiwe, Nkulunkulu watimisela kukukhanyisa kahle kutsi yena ngeke ayigucule injongo yakhe, ngiko nje acinisa tetsembiso takhe ngekufunga.

Ngako-ke Nkulunkulu wasebentisa tintfo letimbili langeke agucuke kuto: setsembiso nesifungo. Tsine-ke lesesitfole kuphepha kuye kufanele sibe nekukhutsatela lokukhulu, siphutfume lelitsemba leselibekwe embikwetfu.
Ngulelo litsemba letfu lemiphefumulo yetfu. Linjengesisimiso semkhumbi, lisiphephelo lesicinile, lingenisana ngekhatsi kwesihenco, endzaweni lengcwelengcwele,
lapho Jesu angena khona njengemvuli wendlela lomele tsine, waba ngumPhristi Lomkhulu loyawuhlala akhona phakadze naphakadze, ngekuma kwaMelkhisedeki.
Abrahama wamnika kwelishumi kwako konkhe labekutfumbile. Lelibito lakhe lelitsi Melkhisedeki lisho kutsi: “INkhosi Yekulunga”; kantsi leli lelitsi iNkhosi yaseSalema lisho kutsi: “INkhosi Yekuthula”.

LoMelkhisedeki kute umlandvo lowatiwako ngeyise nome ngenina nome ngabokhokho bakhe, kute lokwatiwako ngekutalwa nangekufa kwakhe; kodvwa ufanana neNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu ngekutsi ungumphristi loyawuhlala akhona phakadze naphakadze.
Ase nibuke nje kutsi abemkhulu kanganani! Abrahama, khokho wetfu, wamnika kwelishumi kwako konkhe labekutfumbile.
Titukulwane taLevi letemukela buphristi tinemiyalo emtsetfweni kutsi titsatse kwelishumi kubo bonkhe bantfu. Phela bakutsatsa kubantfu besive sakubo lesaphuma ku-Abrahama.
Kodvwa lomuntfu abengesiye wesitukulwane saLevi, watsatsa kwelishumi ku-Abrahama, wase ubusisa lowo abenetetsembiso.
Kwelishumi kwemukelwa baphristi lababuye bafe; kodvwa ngaMelkhisedeki kwelishumi kwemukelwa ngulophilako, njengobe umBhalo usho.
Kungashiwo nekutsi naLevi matfupha, lowemukela kwelishumi, abekukhipha nga-Abrahama,
ngobe phela Levi abeselukhalweni lwakhokho wakhe Abrahama ngesikhatsi ahlangana naMelkhisedeki.
Ngobe nakunengucuko ebuphristini, nakanjani kufanele kube nengucuko nasemtsetfweni.
Ngobe lona lekukhulunywa ngaye letintfo abewalesinye sive, lekungazange sekube khona namunye kuso lowake waba ngumphristi, wakhonta elatini.
Ngobe kuyakhanya kutsi iNkhosi yetfu yatalwa esiveni sakaJuda, kunjalo nje naMosi akazange akhulume ngebaphristi bakuleso sive.
Loku kubuye kukhanye kakhulu, nasekuvela lomunye umphristi ngendlela yaMelkhisedeki.
Waba ngumphristi, hhayi ngemtsetfo lababebekwa ngawo bantfu, kodvwa ngemandla emphilo lengabhubhi.
ngobe umtsetfo awuphelelisi lutfo. Kodvwa sesinikwe litsemba lelisha nalelincono, lesingasondzela ngalo kuNkulunkulu.
Ngetulu kwaloko linesifungo saNkulunkulu. Kadzeni besingentiwa sifungo nakubekwa baphristi.
Kodvwa Jesu waba ngumphristi ngesifungo ngesikhatsi Nkulunkulu atsi:
Baphristi bekucala babebanyenti, ngobe kufa kwakumvimba lowo nalowo kutsi achubeke nalowo msebenti.
Kodvwa buphristi baJesu abupheli, ngobe yena uhlala akhona kuze kube phakadze.
Ngako-ke unawo emandla ekubasindzisa ngalokuphelele labo labasondzela ngaye kuNkulunkulu, njengobe yena aphilela kubancusela ngaso sonkhe sikhatsi.

Yena akadzingi kunikela imihlatjelo yekushiswa njengalaba labanye baphristi labakhulu lababeyinikela onkhe emalanga, ngekutinikelela bona tono tabo kucala, bese banikelela tono talabanye. Kodvwa yena loko wakwenta kwaba kanye, kwenela, ngesikhatsi anikela ngaye lucobo lwakhe.

Empeleni, umtsetfo ubeka bantfu labanebutsakatsaka, ubente babe baphristi labakhulu; kodvwa livi laNkulunkulu lelaciniswa ngesifungo, nalelefika muva kunemtsetfo, ngilo lelabeka iNdvodzana leyentiwa yaphelela kuze kube phakadze.
Nguye losikhonti endzaweni lengcwele, ethendeni lekuhlangana, lelingilo sibili lelakhiwa yiNkhosi, hhayi ngumuntfu.
Kube abesemhlabeni abengeke abe ngumphristi nakancane nje, ngobe phela lapha emhlabeni bakhona baphristi labanikela ngetipho ngekwemtsetfo.

Bona bakhontela kuloko lokungumfanekiso nesitfunti saloko lokunguko sibili kwasezulwini, ngobe ngesikhatsi Mosi asatakwakha lithende lekuhlangana, Nkulunkulu wamyala watsi: “Ucaphele kutsi konkhe ukwente ngaleyo ndlela lowakhonjiswa yona entsabeni.”
Kodvwa Khristu sewunikwe inkonzo lephakeme nalenkhulu kuneyabo, njengobe nalesivumelwane, languMlamuli waso emkhatsini waNkulunkulu nebantfu, singulesincono, ngobe sisekelwe tetsembiso letincono.
Kube sivumelwane sekucala besite sici, besingeke sidzingeke sivumelwane sesibili.
Kodvwa Nkulunkulu sive sakhe usikhandza sinesici nakatsi:
Bekwakhiwe lithende lekuhlangana lelalinetindzawo letimbili: Lengephandle bekutsiwa yindzawo lengcwele lapho bekunelutsi lwetibane, nelitafula lelinetinkhwa tekunikelwa kuNkulunkulu.
Ngemuva kwendvwangu yesibili bekunendzawo lebeyibitwa ngekutsi yindzawo lengcwelengcwele.

Kulendzawo bekunelilati legolide lekushisela imphepho; lelilati belikanye nelibhokisi lesivumelwane. Lingephandle lalelo bhokisi lonkhe beliyigolide, ekhatsi kwalo bekuneludziwo lwegolide luphetse imana. Kulelo bhokisi bekunendvuku ya-Aroni leyahluma, netibhelekeca tematje tesivumelwane semitsetfo.
Ngetulu kwalelo bhokisi bekunemakherubhi ebukhosi baNkulunkulu labengamele sihlalo semusa. Kodvwa kwanyalo ngingeke ngichazisise ngalokuphelele ngaletintfo.
Kodvwa kulendzawo lengcwelengcwele kungena umPhristi Lomkhulu kuphela, nako angene kanye ngemnyaka, aphetse ingati yekunikelela tono takhe netalabanye bantfu labatente bangati kutsi bayona.
Ngaloko Moya Longcwele ukhombisa kahle kutsi indlela yekuya endzaweni lengcwelengcwele ayikavuleki, nakusekhona indzawo lengcwele ethendeni lekuhlangana.
Loku ngumfanekiso waletikhatsi. Tipho nemihlatjelo lenikelwa ngaleyo ndlela lendzala kungeke kuyente ihlanteke ngalokuphelele inhlitiyo yesikhonti.
Ngobe phela loko kucondzene nalokudliwako nalokunatfwako nemisimeto yekuhlantwa. Lena yimitsetfo nje lephatselene nelingephandle letfu lebekelwe kutsi isebente, kudzimate kufike ingucuko yalokusha.
Wangena kanye kwenela endzaweni lengcwelengcwele, angakaphatsi ingati yetimbuti neyematfole, kodvwa aphetse ingati yakhe lucobo, kungako nje asizuzela kuhlengwa kwaphakadze.
Ngobe nangabe bantfu labangcolile ngekwelisiko bafafatwa ngengati yetimbuti, neyetinkunzi, nangemlotsa wesitfokati bekubageza ngekwelisiko kube kuhlanteka,
inganihlambulula kakhulu kangakanani-ke ingati yaKhristu! Watinikela yena kuNkulunkulu ngaMoya waphakadze, watinikela ate sici. Ingati yakhe iyawuhlambulula nembeza wenu
Ngobe nome kanjani umbhalolifa ungeke usebente kungakabikwa kufa kwembhali wawo.
Phela umbhalolifa awunamsebenti nangabe umbhali wawo asaphila, kodvwa unemandla lamakhulu nasafile umbhali wawo.
Kungako nje nesivumelwane sekucala sasungulwa ngengati.

Ngako Mosi watsi nasamemetele kuso sonkhe sive imiyalo njengobe ibhaliwe emtsetfweni, watsatsa ingati yematfole, neyetimbuti, nemanti kanye neboya lobubovu, nehisophu; wafafata lencwadzi kanye nesive sonkhe,
atsi: “Lena yingati leluphawu lwesivumelwane Nkulunkulu lanimisele sona.”
Mosi abechubeka kanjalo afafate lengati ethendeni lekuhlangana nakuto tonkhe titja letatisetjentiswa emsebentini wekukhonta kulo.
Empeleni, ngekwemtsetfo cishe konkhe kuhlanjululwa ngengati; ngaphandle kwekucitfwa kwengati kute kutsetselelwa kwetono.
Kuyakhanya-ke kutsi nguleto tintfo kuphela letatingumfutiselo wetasezulwini letatingahlanjululwa ngaleyo ndlela. Kodvwa tintfo tasezulwini tidzinga imihlatjelo lencono kunalena.
Ngobe Khristu akangenanga endzaweni lengcwelengcwele leyentiwe ngetandla nalengumfutiselo waleyo lengiyo sibili; kodvwa wangena ezulwini sibili, lapho abonakala khona asimele kuNkulunkulu.
Khristu akangenanga kanyenti kuyawutinikela, iminyaka ngeminyaka, njengaloku bekwenta baphristi labakhulu labangena baphetse ingati lengesiyo yabo.

Kube Khristu akangenanga kanye, bekuyawudzingeka kutsi ahlupheke kanyenti kusukela ekusekelweni kwendalo yonkhe. Kodvwa esikhundleni saloko, ubonakaliswe kwaba kanye, kwenela, ekugcineni kwetikhatsi, kuze asuse sono ngenhlawulo lenguye cobo lwakhe.
Bantfu bamiselwe kutsi bafe kanye, bese kutsi emvakwaloko bayekwehlulelwa.
Kanjalo-ke naKhristu, asatinikele kanye kwetfwala tono talabanyenti, uyawubonakala ngekwesibili, asangaseteli sono, kodvwa asetele kuyawusindzisa labo labahlala bamlindzele.
Kube labo labakhonta Nkulunkulu bebahlanjululwa ngemtsetfo etonweni kube kanye, ngabe imihlatjelo seyayekelwa kwentiwa, futsi bebangeke baphindze bative banelicala lekona.
Kodvwa ngalemihlatjelo bantfu bakhunjutwa ngetono tabo iminyaka ngeminyaka;
ngobe kungeke kwenteke kutsi ingati yetinkunzi neyetimbuti itisuse tono.
Kwekucala utsi: “Awuyifunanga imihlatjelo neminikelo, njengeminikelo yekushiswa neminikelo yetono, futsi awujatjuliswanga ngiyo.” Noko yonkhe leminikelo inikelwa ngekwemtsetfo.
Wase uphindze utsi: “Naku, ngilapha! Ngitekwenta intsandvo yakho.” Ucitsa kwekucala, khona atewumisa kwesibili.
Njengobe Jesu Khristu wenta intsandvo yaNkulunkulu, wanikela ngemtimba wakhe, sesihlanjululwe kwaba kanye kwenela.
Kodvwa kwatsi Khristu nasanikele kwaba kanye kwenela ngemhlatjelo munye wetono, wase uhlala ngesekudla saNkulunkulu,
lapho asahleti khona amele kutsi titsa takhe tize tifakwe ngaphansi kwetinyawo takhe.
Ngobe ngamnikelo munye ubahlante bonkhe, wabenta baphelela kuze kube phakadze.
NaMoya Longcwele usinika bufakazi bakhe. Kwekucala utsi:
Ngako-ke lapho kunekutsetselelwa kwetono khona, sekute nesidzingo sekunikela ngenca yesono.
Lendlela lese sivulelwe yona yinsha, futsi iyaphila, idzabula sihenco iphumele ngale kwaso, sona-ke singumtimba waJesu.
Ngetulu kwaloko-ke tsine sesinemPhristi Lomkhulu lowengamele indlu yaNkulunkulu.

Ngako-ke asisondzele kuNkulunkulu ngenhlitiyo lecinisile, nangekwetsemba lokuphelele kwekukholwa, tinhlitiyo tetfu tinyenyetiwe tahlanjululwa kunembeza lomubi, nemitimba yetfu igeziwe ngemanti lahlobile.
Asibambelele kuso sivumo selitsemba letfu, singangabati, ngobe yena lowenta lesetsembiso wetsembekile ekutigcineni tetsembiso takhe.
Ngako-ke asinakane, sisitane ngekukhutsatana elutsandvweni nasemisebentini lemihle.
Singakuyekeli kuhlangana ndzawonye, njengobe labanye sebanemkhuba wekungahlangani; kodvwa asikhutsatane kakhulu, njengobe nani niyabona kutsi lilanga selisondzele.
kodvwa sekusele kutsi ngekwesaba lokukhulu silindzele kwehlulelwa nemlilo loshisa ngelulaka loyawucedza emaphikankhani.
Umuntfu lowephula umtsetfo waMosi ufa ngaphandle kwekuhawukelwa, ngebufakazi bebantfu lababili nome labatsatfu.
Nicabanga kutsi siyawuba sikhulu kangakanani-ke sijeziso salowo logcobagcoba iNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu, edzelele ingati yesivumelwane lahlanjululwe ngayo, etfuke Moya wesihawu?
Siyamati lowo lowatsi: “Kubuyisela ngekwami, ngimi lotawunenanela.” Uphindze atsi: “Simakadze uyawusehlulela sive sakhe.”
Ngaletinye tikhatsi nanetfukwa nihlukumetwe emkhatsini webantfu, nangaletinye tikhatsi nanitfwalisana nalabo bebaphetfwe ngaleyo ndlela.
Naba nesihawu kulabo bebaboshiwe, nacinisela ngekujabula nanemukwa timphahla tenu, ngobe nanati kutsi nine ninalokuncono lokukhonsako.
Ngako-ke ningasilahli lesibindzi senu sekwetsemba Nkulunkulu, ngobe sinemvuzo lomkhulu.
Nidzinga kucinisela kuze kutsi nase nente intsandvo yaNkulunkulu, nitekwemukela loko lokwatsenjiswa nguye.
Kepha tsine asikho kulabo labahlehla nyova badzimate babhubhe; kodvwa sikulabo labanekukholwa, aze Nkulunkulu asindzise imiphefumulo yabo.
Bokhokho betfu bemukeleka ngaloko kukholwa kwabo kuNkulunkulu.
Umuntfu lote kukholwa angeke akhone kujabulisa Nkulunkulu; ngobe lota kuNkulunkulu kufanele akholwe kutsi Nkulunkulu uyaphila nekutsi uyabavuza labo labamfunako.
Ngekukholwa waba sihambi eveni labetsenjiswe lona. Wahlala emathendeni; benta njalo nabo-Isaka naJakobe. Nabo baba tindlalifa kanye naye kuso leso setsembiso,
ngobe Abrahama abebheke lelo khaya lelinetisekelo, lelimsunguli nemakhi walo kunguNkulunkulu.

Nome Abrahama bese kufanana nekutsi ufile ngebudzala, noko kuye yedvwa nje kwatalwa titukulwane letinyenti letingangetinkhanyeti tesibhakabhaka, nangangesihlabatsi saselugwini lwelwandle lesingenawubalwa.
Labo labakhuluma kanje, bakubeka ebaleni kutsi bafuna live labo lemdzabo.
Kube babelikhumbula live lababephuma kulo, ngabe bafuna litfuba lekubuyela kulo.
Esikhundleni saloko, babelangatelela live lelincono, lokusho kutsi: lizulu. Ngako-ke Nkulunkulu akanamahloni kutibita ngekutsi nguNkulunkulu wabo, ngobe ubalungiselele lelo khaya.
Nkulunkulu abekhulume kuye watsi: “Titukulwane takho tiyawubitwa nga-Isaka.”
Abrahama wabona kutsi Nkulunkulu unemandla ekuvusa umuntfu ngisho kulabafile; ngiko nje, ngekufanekisa, Abrahama emukela Isaka asaphila.
Wakhetsa kuhlupheka nesive saNkulunkulu kunekutijabulisa esonweni kwesikhashana.
Wabona kutsi kwetfukwa ngenca yaKhristu kwakungumcebo loncono kunemcebo waseGibhithe, ngobe phela abebheke umvuzo.
Ngekukholwa wasungula liPhasika ngekunyenyeta ingati, kuze kutsi ematubulo ema-Israyeli angabulawa ngumbulali.
Ngekukholwa balwa bancoba imibuso, benta kulunga, bazuza tetsembiso, bavimba imilomo yemabhubesi,
bacima emandla emlilo, baphepha enkembeni, baphiwa emandla ebutsakatsakeni, baba ngemachawe ekulweni timphi, badzimate baticosha timphi tebetive.
Labanya babetfoswa ngetinhlupho letitinhlobonhlobo bangete bavuma kukhululwa, kuze bemukeliswe lokuncono lokukuvuswa kulabafile.
Labanye baphukutwa, bashaywa, baboshwa ngetinketane ejele.
Live lalingakabafaneli; bazulazula emahlane, nasetintsabeni, nasemihumeni, nasemigedzeni yemhlaba.
Bonkhe laba, bemukeleka ngekukholwa kwabo, kodvwa abazange bakwemukele lababetsenjiswe kona,
ngobe Nkulunkulu abesakubonenchanti lokuncono lokusifanele kutsi abaphelelise sebakanye natsi.

emehlo etfu angesuki kuJesu longumsunguli nemphelelisi wekukholwa kwetfu. Ngenca yekujabula labekubekelwe Jesu wacinisela ngekwetfwala siphambano, wangete walinaka lihlazo laso; wahlala ngesekudla sesihlalo sebukhosi saNkulunkulu.
Nisengakemelani nesono, kudzimate kucitseke ingati yenu.
Seniwukhohliwe yini lomyalo lokhuluma kini njengakumadvodzana lotsi:
Ciniselani ekuyalweni. Nkulunkulu uniphatsa njengemadvodzana akhe; ngobe vele ikhona yini indvodzana lengayalwa nguyise?
Naningayalwa njengawo onkhe emadvodzana, kusho kutsi anisiwo emadvodzana, ningemavezandlebe.
Tsine sinabobabe betfu bengati labasiyalako sibahloniphe; pho, Babe wetfu ngekwaMoya akukafaneli yini simhloniphe ngentfobeko lenkhulu, kuze sitewutfola kuphila?
Phela bobabe babesiyala kwesikhashana ngekubona kwabo, kodvwa yena usiyalela kutsi kutewusitakala tsine, kuze sibe nesabelo ebungcweleni bakhe.
Ngobe ngesikhatsi sisayalwa kuvakala kubuhlungu kunekutsi kujabulise, noko kamuva sivuno saloko kuyalwa sibonakala sinesitselo sekuthula nesekulunga, kulabo labaceceshwe ngako.
tinyawo tenu nitentele tindlela leticondzile, kuze kutsi lunyawo loluchutako lungachubiseleki, kodvwa luphiliswe.
Nicaphelisise kutsi kubete lophunyulako emseni waNkulunkulu; kubete “imphandze lenashevu” lemila ibange luhlupho, ibulale labanyenti.
Akubete logwadlako, nome lophingako, nome lonaka live njenga-Esawu, lowatsenga kudla ngemalungelo akhe onkhe ebutubulo.
Emvakwaloko wafisa kudla lifa lesibusiso, kodvwa waliwa, njengobe nati. Phela, lase lingekho litfuba lekuphendvuka, nome abesakufuna ngetinyembeti.
nekukhala kwelicilongo, nekuvakala kwelivi, lekwatsi nalivakala kuma-Israyeli, ancenga kutsi lingaphindzi likhulume.
Kungobe babengeke bawumele lomtsetfo lababenikwe wona, lotsi: “Nome silwane siyitsintsa lentsaba, siyawugcotjwa ngematje.”
Lombono wawesabeka kakhulu kangangekutsi Mosi wadzimate watsi: “Ngiyesaba kakhulu, ngiyatfutfumela.”
kanye nelibandla lematubulo lamabito awo abhaliwe ezulwini. NisembikweMehluleli longuNkulunkulu wabo bonkhe, nakuyo imimoya yalabalungile labaphelelisiwe,
nakuJesu, uMlamuli wesivumelwane lesisha. Ingati yakhe isiphatsele lokukhulu kunengati ya-Abela.
Livi lakhe lanyakatisa umhlaba; kodvwa nyalo sewetsembisile watsi: “Ngitawuphindze nginyakatise, hhayi umhlaba kuphela, kodvwa nelizulu.”
Lamavi latsi: “Ngitawuphindze” akhombisa ngalokukhanyako kutsi konkhe lokudaliwe kutawunyakatiswa kususwe, kuze kutsi lokungeke kunyakatiswe kusale kunjalo.
Ningakhohlwa kungenisa tihambi emakhaya enu, ngobe labanye ngekwenta njalo bangenisa tingilosi bangaketeleli.
Bakhumbuleni labasemajele, kube shangatsi nani niboshwe kanye nabo. Nibakhumbule nalabo labaphetfwe kabi, kube shangatsi nihlupheka kanye nabo.
Jesu Khristu akagucuki; nguye itolo, nalamuhla, naphakadze.
Ningedukiswa timfundziso letingatiwa letitinhlobonhlobo. Kuhle kutsi tinhlitiyo tetfu ticiniswe ngemusa, hhayi ngekugcina imitsetfo yekudla, ngobe labo labayigcinako ayibasiti ngalutfo.
UmPhristi Lomkhulu ungena nengati yetinkhomo neyetimbuti endzaweni lengcwele, itewuba ngumnikelo, kodvwa tidvumbu taletilwane tishiswa ngephandle kwenkambu.
Ngiko nje naJesu wafela ngephandle kwelisango, kuze atewungcwelisa bantfu ngengati yakhe.
Ngako-ke asiphumele kuye ngephandle kwenkambu setfwalisane naye lihlazo lakhe;
ngobe lapha site likhaya lelitawuma kuze kube phakadze, kodvwa sifuna likhaya lelitako.
Asimbonge njalo Nkulunkulu, simdvumise ngaJesu. Lokumdvumisa akube ngumnikelo wayo yonkhe imilomo levuma libito lakhe.
Ningakuyekeli kwenta lokuhle nekuhlephunelana loko leninako, ngobe iminikelo lenjalo iyamtfokotisa Nkulunkulu.
Ngiyanincenga kutsi nisithandazele kakhulu, kuze kutsi Nkulunkulu angibuyisele kini masinyane.
anganiphelelisa kuko konkhe lokuhle, kuze nente intsandvo yakhe, asebente kini
Ngiyanincenga-ke, bazalwane, kutsi nilalele kuyala kwami ngekubeketela, ngobe nginibhalele incwadzi lemfisha.
Kufanele nati kutsi Thimothi, umzalwane, sewukhululiwe ejele. Nasheshe wefika, ngitawufika naye lapho kini.
Hambisani bonkhe baholi benu, kanye nabo bonkhe labangcwele. Bazalwane baseTaliyane bayanihambisa.
nati kutsi kuvivinywa kwekukholwa kwenu kuveta kucinisela.
Kucinisela kumele kucedzela umsebenti wako, kuze nivutfwe niphelele ningenasici, ningehlulwa lutfo.
Nangabe emkhatsini wenu kukhona loswele kuhlakanipha, akacele kuNkulunkulu lonika bonkhe bantfu ngekwephana lokungenakufehla, utawuphiwa.
Kepha locelako akacele ngekukholwa, angangabati; ngobe longabatako ufanana neligagasi lelwandle lelichutjwa litanyatanyiswe ngumoya.
Ngako-ke umuntfu lonjalo angabocabanga kutsi iNkhosi iyawumemukelisa lutfo;
ungumuntfu lonetinhlitiyo letimbili, uyagucugucuka etindleleni takhe tonkhe.
Kepha locebile akatincome ngekwehliswa kwakhe, ngobe uyakwendlula njengembali yesiganga.
Umuntfu lolingwako angabosho kutsi: “Ngilingwa nguNkulunkulu;” ngobe Nkulunkulu angeke alingwe ngalokubi, futsi akalingi muntfu.
Kepha ngulowo nalowo ulingwa ahuhwe tinkhanuko takhe, adudeke.
Nangabe inkhanuko seyitsatsile, itala sono; sono nase siphelele, sitala kufa.
Tonkhe tipho letinhle naletiphelele tivela ngetulu, tiphuma kuBabe uMdali wetibane tasesibhakabhakeni, lote kugucugucuka, njengobe tona tigucuka, tibohle tisishiya ebumnyameni.
Ngekwentsandvo yakhe wasitala ngelivi leliciniso, khona sitekuba ngematubulo ato tonkhe tidalwa takhe.
ngobe lulaka lwemuntfu alukwenti kulunga lokungukona kwemukeleka kuNkulunkulu.
Ngako-ke lahlani yonkhe insila nalokubi lose kukunyenti, nemukele ngekutitfoba livi lelihlanyelwe kini, ngobe linemandla ekusindzisa imiphefumulo yenu.
Ngobe nangabe umuntfu angumlaleli nje angesiye umenti welivi, lowo muntfu ufanana nemuntfu lobuka buso bakhe esibukweni:
Umuntfu lonjalo uyatibuka, esuke ahambe akhohlwe kutsi abenjani.
Kukholwa lokumsulwa lokungenasici embikwaNkulunkulu longuBabe ngunaku: kuhambela tintsandzane nebafelokati elusizini lwabo, nekutigcina ungangcoliswa live.
Nangabe emhlanganweni wenu kungena umuntfu lofake indandatho yegolide, agcoke kahle, kuphindze kungene nalomunye lophuyile, agcoke kabi,
bese-ke nine ninaka lona logcoke tingubo leticwebetelako ngekutsi: “Hlala lapha, kunasi situlo,” kulona lophuyile nitsi: “Mani lapho,” nome: “Hlala lapha, entinyaweni tami,”
ngekwenta njalo anikhetsi yini ngekutsi nibe behluleli ngemicabango lemibi?
Kepha nine nimdvumatile lona lophuyile. Akusibo labacebile yini labanicindzetelako? Akusibo yini labo labanimangalela etinkantolo?
Akusibo yini labo labahlambalata lelibito laKhristu lelihloniphekile lenibitwa ngalo?
Kodvwa nanikhetsa bantfu, nenta sono, nemtsetfo uyanilahla ngekutsi nitephulamtsetfo.
Ngobe lowo logcina yonkhe imitsetfo, kodvwa ephule munye, unelicala layo yonkhe.
Ngobe lona lowatsi: “Ungaphingi,” waphindze watsi: “Ungabulali.” Nangabe ungaphingi kodvwa ubulale, usephulamtsetfo.
Ngako khulumani, nente njengalabo labayakwehlulelwa ngemtsetfo wenkhululeko.
Ngobe kwehlulela akunabo bubele kulowo longenabo bubele; kodvwa bubele buyawucoloshela kwehlulela.
Nangabe umzalwane nome umzalwanekati bahlubulile beswele nekudla kwemalanga onkhe,
bese-ke lomunye emkhatsini wenu utsi kubo: “Hambani ngekuthula, nifutfumale, nesutse,” ngaphandle kwekubapha loko labakudzingako emtimbeni, kusitani loko?
Ngako-ke nangabe kukholwa, kona ngekwako, kungenayo imisebenti, kufile.
Kepha lomunye angatsi: “Wena unekukholwa, mine nginemisebenti. Ngikhombise kukholwa kwakho ngaphandle kwemisebenti, nami ngitakukhombisa kukholwa kwami ngemisebenti yami.”
Uyakholwa kutsi Nkulunkulu munye? Wenta kahle; nemadimoni ayakukholwa loko, atfutfumele.
Wena silima-ndzini, uyafuna yini kukhonjiswa kutsi kukholwa lokungenamisebenti kulite?
Khokho wetfu Abrahama ngesikhatsi anikela nga-Isaka, umsa wakhe, elatini, akazange yini emukelwe nguNkulunkulu ngekutsi ulungile ngemisebenti?
Uyabona-ke kutsi kukholwa kwasebenta kanye nemisebenti yakhe, nekutsi kukholwa kwakhe kwapheleliswa ngimisebenti yakhe.
Ngako kwagcwaliseka umBhalo lotsi: “Abrahama wakholwa Nkulunkulu; ngenca yekukholwa kwakhe Nkulunkulu wamemukela njengemuntfu lolungile,” wase ubitwa ngekutsi: “Ungumngani waNkulunkulu.”
Niyabona-ke kutsi umuntfu wemukeleka kuNkulunkulu ngekutsi ulungile ngisho nangemisebenti, hhayi ngekukholwa kuphela.
Njengobe umtimba ufile nawute umoya, ngalokufananako nekukholwa nakute imisebenti kufile.
Ngobe sonkhe siphosisa ngetindlela letinyenti; nakukhona longaphosisi ngekukhuluma, lowo uphelele ngempela, ngobe uyakwati kubamba ngisho nemtimba wakhe wonkhe shangatsi ngematomu.
Nasifaka ematomu emilonyeni yemahhashi kutsi atewusilalela, sisuke siwacondzisa umtimba wonkhe.
Ase nibuke nemikhumbi, nome imikhulu kangaka, ichutjwa ngimimoya lenemandla, noko icondziswa ngeliphini lelincane nje, iye lapho bashayeli bayo bafuna iye khona.
Kanjalo nelulwimi lusitfo lesincane, kantsi lutigabatisa ngetintfo letinkhulu.
Ase nibuke nje umlilo lomncane wokhela lihlatsi lelikhulu!
Lulwimi lungumlilo, lulive lebubi, lulwimi lusitfo lesingcolisa wonkhe umtimba, lokhela yonkhe imphilo ngemlilo lulunyekwa sihogo.
Yonkhe indalo yetilwane ingatsanjiswa: ngisho tinyoni, netilwane letihamba ngetisu, netilwane taselwandle; vele, bantfu batitsambisile letilwane.
Kodvwa kute longatsambisa lulwimi; lububi lobuyalukako, lugcwele shevu lobulalako.
Ngalo sibonga iNkhosi lenguBabe, nangalo sicalekisa bantfu labentiwe baba ngumfanekiso waNkulunkulu.
Emlonyeni munye kuphuma kubusisa nekucalekisa. Bazalwane bami, akufanele kube njalo.
Kuyenteka yini kutsi esicojeni sinye kuphume emanti lamnandzi nalababako?
Bazalwane bami, sihlahla semkhiwa singatitsela yini titselo temncumo, nome umvini temkhiwa? Sicobho lesikhipha emanti lababako singeke siwavete lamnandzi.
Kepha naninemona lobabako, nembango etinhlitiyweni tenu, ningatigabatisi; ngobe ngaloko liciniso nilenta emanga.
Lokuhlakanipha akuchamuki ngetulu, kodvwa ngekwemhlaba, nekwemvelo, nekwebusathane;
ngobe lapho kunemona nembango khona, kunesiphitsiphitsi nayo yonkhe imisebenti lemibi.
Kodvwa kuhlakanipha lokuchamuka ngetulu kwekucala kumsulwa, bese kuba nekuthula, nekutfobeka, nekulalela, kugcwele bubele netitselo letihle; akunalo lubandlululo nekutentisa.
Niyafisa, noko anitfoli lutfo; niyabulala, nibe nemona, kodvwa niyehluleka kutfola lenikufunako. Niyalwa, nente timphi. Aninalutfo, ngobe aniceli.
Aniketsembeki, ninjengetiphingi. Anati yini kutsi kutsandzana nelive kubutsa kuNkulunkulu? Lofisa kuba ngumngani welive, utenta sitsa kuNkulunkulu.
Nome-ke nicabanga kutsi kulite yini loku lokushiwo ngumBhalo, kutsi: “LoMoya, lambeka kitsi Nkulunkulu uyafutselana, kantsi futsi unesikhwele ngatsi”?
Kodvwa Nkulunkulu wephana ngemusa lomkhulu, ngako umBhalo utsi: “Nkulunkulu umelana nalabatigcabhako, kepha labatfobekile ubapha umusa.”
Sondzelani kuNkulunkulu, naye utawusondzela kini. Gezani tandla tenu, nine toni, nihlambulule tinhlitiyo tenu, nine bantfu labanetinhlitiyo letimbili.
Khatsatekani, nidzabuke, nilile; kuhleka kwenu akugucuke kube kulila, nekujabula kwenu akube kujabha.
Munye loshaya umtsetfo, nguye futsi longumehluleli nalonemandla ekusindzisa nekubhubhisa. Kodvwa wena ungubani kutsi ungehlulela makhelwane wakho?
Ningakusho kanjani loko, njengobe ningalati likusasa lekuphila kwenu kutsi litawuba yini? Ngobe kuphila kwenu kunjengenkhungu, lechamuka ibonakale sikhashana, iphindze inyamalale.
Esikhundleni saloko ngabe nitsi: “INkhosi nayivuma, sitawuphila sente loku nalokwa.”
Kepha manje niyatibonga ngekutigabatisa kwenu. Konkhe kutigabatisa lokunjalo kubi.
Lengcebo yenu seyiyabola, netingubo tenu setidliwa ngumvunya.
Igolide nesiliva yenu sekuyatfomba, nalokutfomba kwako kutawunilahla ngelicala kudle imitimba yenu njengemlilo. Nisacongelela ingcebo nakulamalanga ekugcina.
La emhlabeni niphile ngekutamasa nangekutijabulisa, nakhuluphalisa tinhlitiyo tenu ngelilanga lekuhlatjwa.
Nimlahlile nambulala umuntfu lolungile; kantsi akamelani nani.
Nani-ke beketelani. Cinisani tinhlitiyo tenu, ngobe kubuya kweNkhosi sekusondzele.
Bazalwane, tsatsani sibonelo sekuhlupheka nekubeketela kwebaphrofethi labebakhuluma egameni leNkhosi.
Khumbulani phela kutsi ngulabo labaciniselako lesitsi babusisiwe. Nake neva ngekukhutsatela kwaJobe, niyati-ke nekutsi iNkhosi yaletsa siphetfo sini kuye; ngobe iNkhosi inebubele nesihawu lesikhulu.
Ukhona yini logulako emkhatsini wenu? Akabite babonisi belibandla, bamthandazele ngekumgcobisa ngemafutsa egameni leNkhosi.
Umthandazo wekukholwa uyawumphilisa logulako, iNkhosi imvuse, nome entile tono uyawutsetselelwa tona.
Ngako-ke vumani tono tenu lomunye kulomunye, nithandazelane, kuze nitewuphiliswa. Kuncusa kwemuntfu lolungile kunemandla kakhulu.
Elija labengumuntfu afana natsi, wakhuleka ngekuncusa kutsi lingani, langete lana emhlabeni iminyaka lemitsatfu netinyanga letisitfupha.
Waphindze wathandaza, lase liyana futsi litulu, nemhlaba waphindze watsela titselo tawo.
yatini kutsi lowo lobuyise soni ekwedukeni kwaso, uyawusindzisa umphefumulo waso ekufeni, asibekele tono letinyenti.
Ngekwatinchanti kwakhe Nkulunkulu uYise wanikhetsa ngekuningcwelisa ngaMoya Longcwele, kuze nilalele Jesu Khristu nihlantwe ngengati yakhe. Shangatsi umusa nekuthula kungandziswa kakhulu kini!
Ngalo lelitsemba sinelifa lelingapheli, lelingenasici, nalelingaphuphi, lenilondvolotelwe lona ezulwini.
Nkulunkulu uyawunigcina ngemandla akhe, njengobe nimetsemba, kube kusindziswa lokutakwembulwa ngesikhatsi sekugcina.

Injongo yaletilingo kutsi kukholwa kwenu kuvivinywe, kuze kubonakale bungiko bako. Ngisho negolide lebhubhako ihlolisiswa ngemlilo bungiyo bayo, kanjalo-ke nekukholwa kwenu lokuligugu kunegolide kufanele kutsi kuvivinywe bungiko bako. Khona-ke niyawutfola kubongwa, nebukhosi, neludvumo ekwembulweni kwaJesu Khristu.
Niyamtsandza, nome ningazange senimbone; niyakholwa kuye nome ningakamboni, futsi nitfokota ngenjabulo lengenawuchazeka ngemavi emlomo,
ngobe nemukela kusindziswa kwemiphefumulo yenu lokungumphumela wekukholwa kwenu.

Moya waKhristu abesavele asebenta kubo abakhombisa tinhlupheko lebetitakwehlela Khristu; waphindze wabakhombisa nebukhosi lobebutawulandzela leto tinhlupheko. Babehlolisisa kutsi kuyakwenteka nini loko, nekutsi kuyakwenteka kanjani.

Bona bembulelwa kutsi tiphrofetho tabo tatingakacondzani nabo, taticondzene nani, njengobe babekhuluma ngaloko nani lese nikuve ngalabo labanishumayela liVangeli ngaMoya Longcwele lophuma ezulwini. Ngisho netingilosi tiyafisa kutibona letintfo.
Lalelani Nkulunkulu njengebantfwana bakhe, ningabuswa tinkhanuko tenu letatinibusa nisengakati lutfo ngekukholwa nguJesu Khristu.
Ngako-ke, njengobe lowo lonibitile angcwele, nani-ke banini ngcwele kuko konkhe kuhamba kwenu.
UmBhalo utsi: “Banini ngcwele, ngobe nami ngingcwele.”
Nati kutsi nahlengwa ngani ekuhambeni kwenu lokwakulite, lenakunikwa bokhokho. Anihlengwanga ngetintfo letigugako njengesiliva negolide;
kodvwa nahlengwa ngengati leligugu yeliWundlu lelinguKhristu, lelingenacala nalelingenasici.
Yena watinchanti, live lisengakasekelwa, kodvwa wabonakaliswa kuletikhatsi tekugcina ngenca yenu.
Ngaye loKhristu nakholwa kuNkulunkulu, lowamvusa kulabafile, wamnika bukhosi, kuze kutsi nibheke kuNkulunkulu ngelitsemba nangekukholwa.
Phela senitelwe kabusha ngelivi laNkulunkulu lelingabhubhi, kodvwa leliphila phakadze naphakadze.
Njengebantfwana labasandza kutalwa, langatelelani lubisi lwaMoya loluhlantekile nalolungakabhicwa nalutfo, lolulivi laNkulunkulu, lenitawutsi ngekulunatsa nikhule, nize nisindziswe.
Nani senitibonele ngekwenu kutsi iNkhosi inemusa, njengobe kusho umBhalo.
Nani-ke wotani kuyo, nibe ngematje laphilile, nakhiwe nibe yindlu yaMoya, khona-ke niyawuba baphristi labangcwele bekunikela imihlatjelo yaMoya, leyemukelekako kuNkulunkulu ngaJesu Khristu.
Nembala bayakhutjwa labo labangalilaleli livi; vele bamiselwe kona loko.
Nine naningesiso sive, kodvwa nyalo senisive saNkulunkulu. Nake naba ngaphandle kwemusa, kepha nyalo seniwemukele.
Philani imphilo yekulunga emkhatsini wemahedeni, khona kutawutsi nome banihleba ngekutsi nenta lokubi, kodvwa batsi bangabona imisebenti yenu lemihle, badvumise Nkulunkulu ngelilanga lekubuya kwakhe.
nome tindvuna, ngobe nato titfunywe nguye kutsi titewujezisa labo labenta lokubi, tibonge labo labenta lokuhle.
Ngobe Nkulunkulu ufuna kona loko kutsi nibavale imilomo labo labatilima, ngekutsi nente lokuhle.
Nitiphatse njengebantfu labakhululekile, kodvwa ningakusebentisi kukhululeka kwenu kube simbonyo salokubi; kodvwa tiphatseni njengetinceku taNkulunkulu.
Hloniphani bonkhe bantfu, nitsandze bazalwane, nesabe Nkulunkulu, nihloniphe uMbusi.
Ngobe Nkulunkulu uyambusisa umuntfu lotsi ngekwesaba Nkulunkulu abeketele, nome ahlushwa ngaphandle kwesono.
Sikhona yini sibusiso lenifanele kusitfola, nanibeketelela kushaywa, ngobe nente lokubi? Kepha nanibeketelela kuhlushwa, ngobe nente lokuhle, Nkulunkulu utawunibusisa ngako.
Ngobe vele, nabitelwa kona loko; ngobe Khristu naye wanihluphekela, wanishiyela sibonelo sekutsi nimlandzele etinyatselweni takhe.
Khristu cobo lwakhe wetfwala tono tetfu emtimbeni wakhe, emtsini, kuze kutsi tsine singabe sisabuswa tono kodvwa siphile ekulungeni. “Niphiliswe ngemivimbo yakhe.”
Ngobe beninjengetimvu letedukile; kodvwa manje seniphendvukele kuMelusi neMlondvoloti wemiphefumulo yenu.
nakabona similo senu lesimsulwa lesinekwesaba Nkulunkulu.
Kuhloba kwenu kungabi kwekubukisa ngemichino, nangekugaba, nangekufaka imihlobohlobo yegolide, nome-ke ngekugcoka.
Kodvwa akube kuhloba kwemuntfu longekhatsi, lohloba ngalokungabhubhi kwemoya lomnene nalonekuthula, lokuligugu lelimcoka emehlweni aNkulunkulu.
Babetihlobisa kanjalo-ke bafati bakadzeni labangcwele lababetsembela kuNkulunkulu, babewatfobela emadvodza abo.
Abenta njalo-ke naSara, ahlonipha Abrahama, ambita ngekutsi “yinkhosi” yakhe, lese naba bakhe nanenta lokulungile, ningesatjiswa lutfo.
Ningaphindziseli lokubi ngalokubi, nome inhlamba ngenhlamba; kodvwa esikhundleni saloko busisani, ngobe nabitelwa loko kutsi nidle lifa lekubusiswa.
Pho, ngubani longahle anilimate nangabe ninenshisekelo yekwenta lokulungile?
Kepha nangabe nihlushwa ngenca yekwenta lokulungile, nibusisiwe. Ningesabi muntfu, ningakhatsateki.
Kepha mngcweliseni Khristu abe yiNkhosi etinhlitiyweni tenu, nimhloniphe, nihlale nilungele kubaphendvula bonkhe labanibuta ngelitsemba lelikini.
Loku nikwente ngebumnene nangekuhlonipha, nibe nanembeza lomsulwa, kuze kutsi kuloko labanihleba ngako bajabhiswe labo labetfuka kuhamba kwenu lokuhle kuKhristu.
Ngobe kuncono kuhlupheka ngekwenta lokuhle, nakuyintsandvo yaNkulunkulu, kunekuhlupheka ngekwenta lokubi.
Wahamba ngaye loMoya wayawushumayela imiphefumulo yalabasekuboshweni.

Labo-ke ngulabo lekwatsi endvulo bala kulalela Nkulunkulu ngesikhatsi Nkulunkulu abalindzele ngekubeketela ngemalanga ekwakhiwa kwemkhumbi waNowa. Bantfu labambalwa, lababesiphohlongo, bangena kulomkhumbi basindza emantini.
Emanti wona emele umbhabhatiso. Umbhabhatiso awusiwo wekususa insila yemtimba, kodvwa wekucela nembeza lomsulwa kuNkulunkulu. Lombhabhatiso uyanisindzisa ngekuvuka kwaJesu Khristu ekufeni.
Yena sewahamba waya ezulwini, lapho asahleti khona ngesekudla saNkulunkulu; emagunya, nemandla, netingilosi sekwabekwa ngaphansi kwakhe loJesu.
Ngako ngesikhatsi nisesemhlabeni, ningabe nisaphila ngetinkhanuko talelive, kodvwa ngentsandvo yaNkulunkulu.
Ngobe lesikhatsi lesendlulile besenele kutsi nente lokutsandvwa ngemahedeni ngekuphila ngemanyala, nangetinkhanuko, nangekudzakwa, nangekumita, nangemsindvo, nangekukhonta tithico lokungakavumeleki.
Ayamangala kutsi anisahambisani ngani nawo kulomsindvo wekutiphatsa kabi, ayanetfuka.
Kepha ayawutiphendvulela kulowo losalungele kwehlulela labaphilako nalabafile.
Nguloko lokwabangela kutsi liVangeli lishunyayelwe ngisho nakulabafile, khona batekwehlulelwa njengabo bonkhe bantfu bemhlaba, kuze baphile kuNkulunkulu ngaMoya.
Ngetulu kwako konkhe hlalani nitsandzana, ngobe lutsandvo lusibekela tono letinyenti.
Lowo nalowo lowemukele sipho semusa, akasisebentise ekukhonteni labanye njengenceku lenhle yemusa lomnyenti waNkulunkulu.

Nangabe umuntfu akhuluma, akakhulume ngekwemavi aNkulunkulu; nangabe umuntfu akhonta, akakhonte ngemandla lawanikwa nguNkulunkulu, kuze kutsi kuko konkhe kudvunyiswe Nkulunkulu ngaJesu Khristu, lekukuye bukhosi nemandla phakadze naphakadze. Amen.
Kodvwa tfokotani, ngobe ninesabelo etinhluphekweni taKhristu, kuze kutsi nitfokote kakhulu nakwembulwa bukhosi bakhe.
Nibusisiwe nanetfukwa ngenca yelibito laKhristu, ngobe loko kukhombisa kutsi Moya webukhosi, lowaNkulunkulu, unifukamele.
Kodvwa akubete kini lohlupheka ngobe angumbulali, nome lisela, nome lowenta lokubi, nome lotigaca etindzabeni talabanye bantfu.
Kepha nakukhona lohlupheka ngobe angumKhristu, abobate emahloni, kodvwa akadvumise Nkulunkulu ngenca yalelo bito.

Yelusani umhlambi waNkulunkulu leniwuphetse, hhayi ngekucindzetelwa, kodvwa ngenhlitiyo levumako njengobe Nkulunkulu atsandza kutsi nente, hhayi ngekunaka inkhokhelo nje, kodvwa ngenshisekelo yekukhonta.
Ningatenti emakhosi etikwalabo lenibaphetse, kodvwa nibe tibonelo letinhle emhlambini leniwelusile.
Mhlazana kubonakala uMelusi Lomkhulu, niyakwemukela umchele webukhosi longagugi.
Lahlelani kuye konkhe kukhatsateka kwenu, ngobe yena uyanikhatsalela.
Melanani naso nicinile ekukholweni, nati kutsi tona leto tinhlupheko tiyabehlela nebazalwane benu labasemhlabeni wonkhe.
Emvakwekuhlupheka kwalesikhashana Nkulunkulu wemusa wonkhe, lowanibitela kutsi nihlanganyele naKhristu ebukhosini baphakadze, yena matfupha uyawuniphelelisa, anakhe anicinise, anitintise.
Kuye akube ngemandla phakadze naphakadze. Amen.
Iya kini lenemukele kukholwa lokuligugu njengekwetfu. Nikwemukele ngekulunga kwaNkulunkulu neMsindzisi wetfu Jesu Khristu.
Shangatsi umusa nekuthula kungandziswa kini ngekwati Nkulunkulu naJesu iNkhosi yetfu.
Ngemandla akhe Nkulunkulu usiphe konkhe lesikudzingako kuze siphile, simesabe njengobe simati yena lowasibitela ekuhlanganyeleni naye emandleni nasebukhosini bakhe.
Ngaleyo ndlela siphiwe tetsembiso letiligugu naletikhulukati, kuze kutsi ngato nibe nenhlanganyelo nesimo sebuNkulunkulu, niphunyule ekubhujisweni kwelive lese lokheleke etinkhanukweni.
nasekwatini nengete kutitsiba, nasekutitsibeni nengete kukhutsatela, nasekukhutsateleni nengete kumesaba Nkulunkulu,
nasekumesabeni Nkulunkulu nengete kutsandza bazalwane, nasekutsandzeni bazalwane nengete lutsandvo.
Nangabe letintfo tikini, tivama, titawunenta nikhutsale, nitsele titselo ekuyatini ngalokugcwele iNkhosi yetfu Jesu Khristu.
Ngobe lowo lote letintfo, uyimphumphutse, uyafifiyela, sewukhohliwe kutsi wahlantwa etonweni takhe takucala.
kodvwa niyawunikwa lilungelo leliphelele lekungena embusweni waphakadze weNkhosi neMsindzisi wetfu Jesu Khristu.
Ngikubona kufanele, yingci ngisekhona kulomtimba, kwekutsi nginivusetele ngekunikhumbuta;
ngobe ngiyati kutsi masinyane nje ngitawushiya lomhlaba, njengaloku iNkhosi yetfu Jesu Khristu yangitjela.
Kepha ngitakwetama kwenta lisu lekutsi nisale nitikhumbula letintfo ngaso sonkhe sikhatsi, nome ngingasekho.
Mhlazana emukela ludvumo nenkhatimulo kuNkulunkulu uYise, sasikhona tsine. Kwaphuma livi enkhatimulweni yebukhosi, latsi: “Lo, uyiNdvodzana yami letsandzekako, lengitfokota ngayo.”
Tsine sasinaye entsabeni lengcwele, nakuvakala lelivi liphuma ezulwini, saliva ngetetfu tindlebe.
Ngetulu kwako konkhe, nifanele nicondzisise kahle kutsi kute siphrofetho semBhalo lesingachasiswa ngumuntfu ngekwakhe kucondza.
Kute siphrofetho lesake seta ngentsandvo yemuntfu; kodvwa bantfu bakhuluma lokukwaNkulunkulu, bachutjwa nguMoya Longcwele.
Labanyenti bayawulandzela lawo manyala abo; ngenca yabo indlela yeliciniso iyawuhlanjalatwa.
Ngenca yebudli babo bayawutsengiselana ngani ngemavi ebucili. Kusukela emandvulweni kulahlwa kwabo akulibali, nekubhujiswa kwabo akweteli.
Nkulunkulu akazange awuyekele umhlaba wakadzeni, kodvwa wamlondvolota Nowa, umshumayeli wekulunga, kanye nalabanye lababesikhombisa, ngesikhatsi aletsa zamcolo emhlabeni walababengamesabi Nkulunkulu.
Emadolobha aseSodoma naseGomora Nkulunkulu wawalahla ngelicala, wase uwabhubhisa ngemlilo, aphela nya, aba ngumlotsa; wawenta aba sibonelo kulabo labangayiwumesaba Nkulunkulu.
Nkulunkulu wamsindzisa Loti labelungile; Loti abesavele asakhatsateke kakhulu, ngenca yekuhamba ngemanyala kwabo labangenamtsetfo.
Lendvodza lelungile lebeyihlala emkhatsini wabo, onkhe emalanga beyidzatjukiswa kuva nekubona tento tabo letimbi tekungamesabi Nkulunkulu, umphefumulo wayo lolungile weva buhlungu.
INkhosi iyakwati kubakhulula ekulingweni labo labesaba Nkulunkulu; kodvwa labangakalungi ibagcinela kujeziswa ngelilanga lekwehlulelwa,
ikakhulu labo labahamba etinkhanukweni temvelo tekutingcolisa, bedzelela baphatsi.
kantsi ngisho netingilosi, letinkhulu kakhulu kunabo ngebuchawe nangemandla, atibahlambalati labo bantfu ngekubamangalela embikweNkhosi.

Kodvwa labantfu labahlambalatako banjengetilwane tesiganga letingenangcondvo, ngekwemvelo titalelwe kubanjwa nekubulawa. Bahlambalata ngetintfo labangatati; kodvwa batawubhujiswa kanye naleto tilwane.

Bayakwemukeliswa buhlungu, ngobe nabo bevisa buhlungu. Kujabula kwabo kumita nekutamasa, ngisho nasemini imbala. Yebo, balihlazo nendlisamahloni nase bahlanganyela nani edzilini ngaso sonkhe sikhatsi, batijabulisa ngetinkhanuko tabo.
Emehlo abo agcwele buphingi, anamatsele esonweni; baholela labo lababutsakatsaka elugibeni; tinhlitiyo tabo tetayele bukhali. Bangaphansi kwesicalekiso.
Bashiye indlela lecondzile bedukela endleleni yaBhalamu, umsa waBheyori, lowatsandza umvuzo lomubi.
Kodvwa wekhutwa ngaloko kona kwakhe: Imbongolo lesimungulu yakhuluma ngelivi lemuntfu, yakuvimbela loko kuhlanya kwalowo mphrofethi.
Bakhuluma emagama lalite, bayenge ngetinkhanuko nangemanyala labo labasandza kuphunyula kulabedukako.
Babetsembisa inkhululeko, kantsi bona ngekwabo batigcili tekubhubha; ngobe loko lokumehlulako umuntfu, usigcili sako.
Ngobe nangabe kungcoliswa ngulomhlaba bakubalekele ngekwati iNkhosi lenguMsindzisi wetfu Jesu Khristu, baphindze behlulwa ngiko, sigcino sabo sibi kakhulu kunesicalo sabo.
Lokungenani bekuyawuba ncono kubo kube mane abazange sebayati indlela yekulunga, kunekutsi batsi sebayatile baphindze bawufulatsele umyalo longcwele lababenikwe wona.
nikhumbule emavi lakhulunywa kwakucala baphrofethi labangcwele, nikhumbule nemyalo weNkhosi neMsindzisi lenafundziswa wona baphostoli benu.
Kwekucala nje yatini kutsi ngemalanga ekugcina kuyawufika baphukuti labahamba ngetinkhanuko tabo, banihleke bulima,
batsi: “Uphi-ke loJesu lowanetsembisa kutsi uyabuya? Ngobe seloku kwalala bobabemkhulu, tonkhe tintfo tihamba njengobe tatinjalo kusukela ekucaleni kwendalo.”
Ngobe batsandza kukhohlwa kutsi emazulu abevele asakhona kadzenidzeni, nekutsi Nkulunkulu wakhuluma ngelivi lakhe, kwavela umhlaba emantini, wabasemkhatsini wemanti.
Kwabuye kwaba ngiwo lawo manti, umhlaba lowabuye wabhujiswa ngawo.
Kepha ngalo lelivi emazulu nemhlaba lokukhona nyalo kugcinelwe umlilo ngelilanga lekwehlulelwa, lapho kuyawubhujiswa khona labangamesabi Nkulunkulu.

INkhosi ayibini kugcina setsembiso sayo, njengobe labanye bacabanga kutsi iyabina; kepha iyanibeketelela, ngobe ingatsandzi kutsi kubhubhe ngisho namunye umuntfu, kodvwa itsandza kutsi bonkhe bantfu baphendvuke etonweni tabo.
Njengobe-ke tonkhe letintfo titawubhidlitwa kanjalo, nine-ke kufanele nibe bantfu labanjani? Kufanele nitinikele ngalokuphelele kuNkulunkulu, niphile ngekumesaba yena,
nilindzele kufika kwelilanga laNkulunkulu, nisebentele kutsi lisheshe lifike.
Kepha ngesetsembiso sakhe silindzele emazulu lamasha, nemhlaba lomusha, lapho kubusela khona kulunga.
Kubeketela kweNkhosi nibokutsatsa ngekutsi kunentela ematfuba ekusindziswa, njengobe nemzalwane wetfu lotsandzekako longuPawula anibhalele ngekuhlakanipha laphiwe kona.

Ngiko loko lakushoko kuto tonkhe tincwadzi takhe, nakabhala ngaletintfo. Kukhona tintfo letilukhuni kutivisisa kahle kuto leto tincwadzi. Labo labangati nalabangakacini bayatihlanekela, njengobe benta nakuletinye tincwadzi temiBhalo. Ngekwenta loko batiletsela kubhujiswa.
Kodvwa khulani emseni nasekuyatini iNkhosi neMsindzisi wetfu Jesu Khristu. Ludvumo alube kuye manje kuze kube phakadze. Amen.
Yena lowo Sokuphila wabonakaliswa kitsi, sambona, sifakaza ngaye, simemetela kini Sokuphila waphakadze. Nguye labeneYise; wabe sewubonakaliswa kitsi.
Lowo lesambona samuva simemetela yena nakini, kuze nani nibe nebudlelwane kanye natsi. Tsine-ke sinebudlelwane neYise kanye neNdvodzana yakhe lenguJesu Khristu.
Ngako-ke sibhala loku kuze kutsi kujabula kwetfu
Nasitsi sinebudlelwane naye, kodvwa sibe sihamba ebumnyameni, sinemanga, futsi asiphili ngekweliciniso.
Kodvwa nasihamba ekukhanyeni, njengobe yena asekukhanyeni, sinebudlelwane lomunye nalomunye, nengati yaJesu, iNdvodzana yakhe, iyasihlanta kuko konkhe kona.
Kodvwa nasitivuma tono tetfu, Nkulunkulu wetsembekile, futsi ulungile, utasitsetselela tono tetfu abuye asihlambulule kuko konkhe kungalungi.
Nasitsi asikoni, simenta localemanga, nelivi lakhe alikho kitsi.
nguye loyinhlawulo yetono tetfu, hhayi tetfu sodvwa, kodvwa netemhlaba wonkhe.
Nasigcina imiyalo yakhe, sineleciniso lekutsi siyamati yena.
Umuntfu lotsi: “Ngiyamati,” kodvwa abe angayenti imiyalo yakhe, ngulocalemanga, neliciniso kute kuye.
Kodvwa lowo logcina livi lakhe, lutsandvo lwaNkulunkulu luphelelisiwe kuye; ngaloko singaba neliciniso lekutsi sikuye.
Wonkhe umuntfu lotsi uhlala kuye, kufanele ahambe ngaleyo ndlela Khristu lahamba ngayo.
Noko nginibhalela umyalo lomusha, buciniso bawo lobubonakala kuJesu nakini, ngobe bumnyama buyendlula nekukhanya lokunguko sibili sekuvele kuyakhanya.
Lowo lotsandza umzalwane wakhe, uhlala ekukhanyeni, nesikhubekiso kute kuye.
Kodvwa lowo lotondza umzalwane wakhe usebumnyameni, uhamba ebumnyameni, futsi akati nekutsi uyaphi, ngobe bumnyama buphumphutsekise emehlo akhe.
Ngobe konkhe lokuseveni, kuyinkhanuko yenyama, nenkhanuko yemehlo, nekutigabatisa lokulite ngetintfo takulomhlaba. Konkhe loku akuveli kuBabe, kodvwa kwelive.
Live liyendlula netinkhanuko talo, kodvwa lowo lowenta intsandvo yaNkulunkulu, uyawuphila kuze kube phakadze.
Baphuma emkhatsini wetfu, kodvwa babevele bangesibo bakitsi, ngobe kube bebabakitsi, ngabe bachubeka kanye natsi. Noko kwakufanele kutsi kubonakale kutsi kute namunye wabo labewakitsi.
Angikanibhaleli ngobe ningalati liciniso kodvwa ngobe nilati. Niyati futsi kutsi kute emanga laphuma ecinisweni.
Pho, ngubani localemanga nakungesiye lophika Jesu kutsi nguKhristu? Lowo ngumphikakhristu: lophika uYise neNdvodzana.
Lowo lophika iNdvodzana, ute Nkulunkulu uYise; kantsi lowo lovuma iNdvodzana unaye, Nkulunkulu uYise.
Loko lenakuva kusukela ekucaleni akuhlale etinhlitiyweni tenu. Nangabe-ke loko kuhlala kini, nani-ke niyawuhlala eNdvodzaneni kanye nakuYise.
Nguleso-ke setsembiso Khristu lasinika sona: kuphila lokuphakadze.

Kodvwa nine ninekugcotjwa kwaMoya lokukini lenakwemukela kuKhristu; ngako-ke asikho sidzingo sekutsi ningabuye nifundziswe ngulomunye umuntfu. Lokunigcoba kwakhe kunifundzisa tonkhe tintfo, futsi kuliciniso, akusiwo emanga; njengobe kunifundzisile-ke, hlalani nikuye.
Nanati kutsi ulungile, ningahlala nineliciniso lekutsi wonkhe lowenta kulunga, utelwe nguye.
Batsandzekako, nyalo sibantfwana baNkulunkulu, noko akukabonakali kutsi siyawuba yini. Lesikwatiko kutsi ngesikhatsi achamuka Khristu, siyawuba njengaye, ngobe siyawumbona njengobe anjalo.
Wonkhe umuntfu lonalo lelo tsemba kuKhristu uyatihlambulula, njengobe naKhristu ahlambulukile.
Futsi niyati kutsi Jesu wabonakaliselwa kususa tono, nekutsi kute sono kuye.
Wonkhe umuntfu lohlala kuye akoni, lowonako akazange asambone, futsi akamati.
Bantfwana baNkulunkulu nebantfwana baSathane babonakala ngaloku: Umuntfu longenti kulunga nalongatsandzi umzalwane wakhe, akasiye waNkulunkulu.
Singabi njengaKhayini labe waLomubi, wabulala umnakabo. Wambulalelani-ke? Wambulala, ngobe imisebenti yakhe yayimibi, kantsi lena ya-Abela, umnakabo, yayilungile.
Siyati kutsi sesiphumile ekufeni, sangena ekuphileni, ngobe sitsandza bazalwane; lote lutsandvo usesekufeni.
Umuntfu lotondza umzalwane ungumbulali, nani-ke niyati kutsi kute umuntfu longumbulali lonekuphila lokuphakadze.
Lutsandvo silwati ngaloku kutsi yena wanikela ngekuphila kwakhe ngenca yetfu; natsi-ke kufanele sinikele ngekuphila kwetfu ngenca yebazalwane.
Nangabe umuntfu anako kwelive bese ubona umzalwane wakhe loswele, angamhawukeli, angasho kanjani kutsi lutsandvo lwaNkulunkulu luhlala enhlitiyweni yakhe?
Bantfwabami, asingatsandzi ngemavi nje emlomo kuphela, kodvwa asitsandze ngetento nangeliciniso.
Ngaloko-ke siyawukwati kutsi sibeliciniso nasembikwaNkulunkulu siyawuba nesibindzi kunembeza wetfu,
ngekutsi nangabe nembeza wetfu asilahla, Nkulunkulu mkhulu kunanembeza wetfu, futsi wati konkhe.
Batsandzekako, nangabe nembeza wetfu angasilahli, sinesibindzi kuNkulunkulu.
Konkhe lesikucelako uyasipha, ngobe siyigcina imiyalo yakhe, futsi senta lokutsandzeka emehlweni akhe.
Naku lasiyala ngako: kutsi sikholwe egameni leNdvodzana yakhe lenguJesu Khristu bese siyatsandzana, njengobe asiyala.
Umuntfu logcina imiyalo yaNkulunkulu uhlala kuNkulunkulu, naNkulunkulu uhlala kuye. Nkulunkulu wasinika Moya wakhe, nguko lesibona ngako kutsi Nkulunkulu uhlala kitsi.
Moya waNkulunkulu niyawumati ngaloku: Wonkhe umoya lovumako kutsi Jesu Khristu wefika waba ngumuntfu, yena unguMoya waNkulunkulu.
Wonkhe umoya longamvumi Jesu, akusiwo waNkulunkulu; lowo ngumoya wamphikakhristu leneva ngaye kutsi uyeta, nangempela sewukhona la kulomhlaba.
Bona belive, ngako-ke nalabakukhulumako kwaseveni, futsi nelive liyabeva.
Tsine sibaNkulunkulu, lomatiko Nkulunkulu uyasiva, lowo longesiye waNkulunkulu akasiva. Siwehlukanisa ngaloko-ke umoya weliciniso nemoya wekweduka.
Kodvwa lote lutsandvo akamati Nkulunkulu, ngobe Nkulunkulu ulutsandvo.
Lutsandvo lwaNkulunkulu lwabonakaliswa kitsi ngekutsi Nkulunkulu watfumela iNdvodzana yakhe leyodvwa emhlabeni, khona sitewuphila ngayo.
Ngulolo-ke lutsandvo, hhayi kutsi ngitsi lesatsandza Nkulunkulu, kepha kutsi nguye lowasitsandza, wadzimate watfumela iNdvodzana yakhe kutsi ibe yinhlawulo yetono tetfu.
Kute umuntfu lowase wabona Nkulunkulu; nasitsandzana-ke, Nkulunkulu uhlala kitsi, nelutsandvo lwakhe luphelelisiwe kitsi.
Tsine sitibonele, sifakaza kutsi uYise utfumele iNdvodzana yakhe kutsi itewuba nguMsindzisi welive.
Lowo lovuma kutsi Jesu uyiNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu, Nkulunkulu uhlala kuye, naye uhlala kuNkulunkulu.
Tsine siyalwati lutsandvo Nkulunkulu lasitsandza ngalo, futsi siyakholwa ngilo.
Nkulunkulu ulutsandvo. Umuntfu lohlala elutsandvweni uhlala kuNkulunkulu, naNkulunkulu uhlala kuye.
Lutsandvo luphelelisiwe kitsi kuze sibe nesibindzi ngelilanga lekwehlulela, ngobe njengaloku abenjalo Khristu natsi sinjalo kulomhlaba.
Lutsandvo lute kwesaba, kodvwa lutsandvo loluphelele luyakucosha kwesaba. Kwesaba kuhambisana nesijeziso; lowo lowesabako akapheleli elutsandvweni.
Tsine sitsandza, ngobe kwacala yena wasitsandza.

Umuntfu nakatsi: “Ngiyamtsandza Nkulunkulu,” kepha abe atondza umzalwane wakhe, ungulocalemanga; ngobe umuntfu longamtsandzi umzalwane wakhe lambonako, angeke amtsandze Nkulunkulu langazange asambone.
Sinemyalo lasinika wona Khristu kutsi umuntfu lotsandza Nkulunkulu ufanele kutsandza nemzalwane wakhe futsi.
Nasitsandza Nkulunkulu sigcina nemiyalo yakhe, siyati kutsi siyabatsandza bantfwana bakhe.
Ngobe kutsandza Nkulunkulu kugcina imiyalo yakhe. Imiyalo yaNkulunkulu ayimatima kitsi.
Wonkhe umuntfu lotelwe nguNkulunkulu uyalincoba live. Kuncoba lesincoba ngako live: kukholwa kwetfu.
Ngubani umuntfu longancoba live ngaphandle kwalowo lokholwa kutsi Jesu uyiNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu?
nguMoya, nemanti, nengati: bufakazi babo bobatsatfu buyavumelana.
Siyabemukela bufakazi bebantfu; kodvwa bufakazi baNkulunkulu bukhulu kakhulu, ngobe Nkulunkulu ufakaze ngeNdvodzana yakhe.
Nome ngubani lokholwa yiNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu, unebufakazi kuye; kodvwa umuntfu longakholwa kuNkulunkulu, umente localemanga, ngobe angakholwa ebufakazini lobubekwe nguNkulunkulu ngeNdvodzana yakhe.
Bufakazi ngulobu kutsi Nkulunkulu wasinika kuphila lokuphakadze, nalokuphila kuseNdvodzaneni yakhe.
Wonkhe umuntfu loneNdvodzana, unekuphila; kantsi lowo lote iNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu, ute kuphila.
Sinesibindzi kutsi nasicela lutfo kuNkulunkulu ngekwentsandvo yakhe, uyasiva.
Njengobe sati kutsi uyasiva kunobe yini lesiyicelako, siyati nekutsi sesikunikiwe loko lesikucela kuye.
Konkhe lokungakalungi kusono, noko kukhona sono lesingaholeli ekufeni.
Iya kuMake lokhetsiwe nakubantfwabakhe, lengibatsandza ngeliciniso, kungesimi ngedvwana, kodvwa nabo bonkhe labalatiko liciniso,
ngenca yeliciniso lelihlala kitsi naleliyawuba natsi phakadze naphakadze.
Namanje ngiyakuncusa-ke, Make, kungesiko kutsi ngikushayela umyalo lomusha, kodvwa wona lowo lesawuva ekucaleni wekutsi sifanele sitsandzane.
Ngulolo-ke lutsandvo, kutsi sihambe ngekwemiyalo yakhe; ngiwo lomyalo lekumelwe kutsi nihambe ngawo, njengobe neva kwasekucaleni.
Ticapheleni nine, kuze ningalahlekelwa nguloko lesikusebentele,
Nakufika umuntfu longeti nalemfundziso, ningabomemukela emakhaya enu, futsi ningambingeleli nekumbingelela,
ngobe umuntfu lombingelelako ubambisana naye emisebentini yakhe lemibi.
Wena lotsandzekako, ngiyakhuleka kutsi konkhe kukuhambele kahle, nekutsi uphile kahle, njengobe ngati kutsi uyaphila emphefumulweni wakho.
Ngajabula kakhulu nakufika labanye bazalwane bafakaza ngekutimisela kwakho ecinisweni, njengobe uhamba ecinisweni.
Kute kujabula lengingaba nako lokwengca loko: kuva kutsi bantfwabami bahamba ecinisweni.
Wena lotsandzekako, ukwenta ngekwetsembeka konkhe lokwentela bazalwane, ikakhulu etihambini,
labafakaze ngelutsandvo lwakho ebandleni. Utabe wente kahle ngekubahlinzeka ngako konkhe labangahle bakudzinge, ngiko loko lokufanelekile emsebentini waNkulunkulu.
Ngobe baphuma egameni laKhristu bangatsatsi lutfo kulabangakholwa kuye.
Ngako-ke sifanele kubasita bantfu labanjalo, kuze sibambisane nabo emsebentini weliciniso.

Ngako-ke nangifika lapho, ngiyawuvumbulula konkhe lokubi lakwente kitsi ngemavi lamabi, asihleba. Kodvwa loko akumenelisi, ngobe ujinge angabemukeli bazalwane; nalabo labafuna kubemukela, uyabavimbela abancume nasebandleni.
Demetriyusi unconywa ngibo bonkhe bantfu, ngisho neliciniso imbala liyamncoma; natsi siyamfakazela, futsi nawe uyati kutsi bufakazi betfu buliciniso.
ngobe ngetsemba kutsi ngitakubona masinyane, sikhulume nawe umlomo nemlomo.
Kuthula akube nawe. Bonkhe bangani bayakuhambisa. Hambisa bangani, ngamunye ngamunye.
Iya kulabo lababitwe nalabatsandvwe nguNkulunkulu longuBabe, labalondvolotelwe Jesu Khristu.

Ngobe kukhona labangene ngekunyelela ebandleni. ImiBhalo kadze yasho ngalabo bantfu kutsi bamiselwe kubhujiswa kwaphakadze. Abamesabi Nkulunkulu; sebaguculele umusa wakhe bawenta siyalu sebugwadla nebuphingi, baphika Jesu Khristu, iNkhosi yetfu, lekunguye yedvwa uMbusi.

Nikhumbule phela kutsi netingilosi letingabugcinanga bukhosi bato ngekushiya likhaya lato, watigcina ebumnyameni tiboshwe ngetinketane letingasoze tikhunyulwe. Letingilosi timele lilanga lelikhulu lekwehlulelwa.

Khumbulani futsi iGomora neSodoma nemadolobha labekakhelene nawo. Bantfu balawo madolobha nabo balingisa letingilosi. Emadvodza abelalana odvwana ngendlela lengazange seyibonwe nalephambene nemvelo ehlelwa sijeziso lesimatima, umlilo longacimeki; aba secwayiso.
Ngisho naMikhayeli, ingilosi lenkhulu, mhlazane abangisana naSathane ngesidvumbu saMosi, akazange asayikhiphe inhlamba, kuze amehlule. Lakusho nje kwaba kutsi: “INkhosi ayikukhalimele.”
Maye kubo, ngobe bahamba ngendlela yaKhayini; bagijimela ekwedukeni kwaBhalamu ngenca yemvuzo; bahlubukile njengaKhora, nabo babhubha.

Bayanonela ekudleni kwenu kwebudlelwane bate emahloni ngekumita kwabo. Babogubhela kwesabo. Banjengemafu lapheshulwa ngumoya, abe wona ate imvula. Batihlahla letingatseli titselo, ngisho nangetikhatsi tato, tihlahla letisishulwe netimphandze tato, yebo, batihlahla lese tafa.
Bantfu labanjena banjengemagagasi elwandle, bakhephuta emahlazo abo; batinkhanyeti leteduka lese tagcinelwa bumnyama bebumnyama baphakadze.

Iyakwehlulela bonkhe bantfu, ibajezise labo labangamesabi Nkulunkulu. Iyawubajezisa ngenca yemisebenti yabo yonkhe yekwedzelela nekungamhloniphi Nkulunkulu, nangawo onkhe emavi lamabi lakhulunywe ngaye toni letingamesabi.”
Noko, bazalwane bami, khumbulani loko lokwashiwo yiNkhosi Jesu ngebaphostoli bakhe.
Batsi kini: “Ngetikhatsi tekugcina kuyawufika labahleka bulima, bantfu labangenandzaba nekukholwa, labahamba ngetinkhanuko tabo.”
Badala kwehlukana, ngobe babuswa tinkhanuko tabo temvelo, abanaye Moya Longcwele.
Kodvwa nine, bazalwane bami, yakhanani ekukholweni lokungcwele, nikhuleke ngaMoya Longcwele.
Tigcineni elutsandvweni lwaNkulunkulu ngesikhatsi nisalindzele iNkhosi yetfu Jesu Khristu, kutsi ngemusa wayo ininike kuphila lokuphakadze.
Labanye basindziseni nibahlwitse emlilweni. Kodvwa labanye nibevele ngekwesaba, ningatitsintsi tingubo letingcoliswe tinkhanuko tabo letimbi.
yebo, kuNkulunkulu lokunguye yedvwa, uMsindzisi wetfu ngaJesu Khristu iNkhosi yetfu, akube ludvumo, nebukhosi, nemandla, neligunya, ngaphambi kwetikhatsi, manje, naphakadze. Amen.
Nguye futsi lowabhala lelivi laNkulunkulu, afakazela Jesu Khristu ngako konkhe labekubona.
Ubusisiwe lofundza lamavi alesiphrofetho, babusisiwe nalabo labawevako bese benta loko lokubhalwe kuso, ngobe sikhatsi sesisondzele.
Akube kini umusa nekuthula lokuvela kuye labekhona, nalokhona, nalotako, nakuyo imimoya lesikhombisa lesembikwesihlalo sakhe sebukhosi,
nakuJesu Khristu, fakazi lowetsembekile, litubulo lalabafile nembusi wemakhosi onkhe emhlaba.
Kuye, lositsandzako nalowasikhulula etonweni tetfu ngengati yakhe,
wasenta emakhosi nebaphristi kuNkulunkulu uYise, akube ludvumo nebukhosi phakadze naphakadze! Amen.
Ngelilanga leNkhosi ngangikuMoya, ngase ngiva emvakwami livi lelikhulu, shangatsi lelicilongo,
litsi: “Bhala encwadzini loko lokubonako, bese uyitfumela emabandleni lasikhombisa: lase-Efesu, nelaseSmuna, nelasePhegamu, nelaseThiyathira, nelaseSadesi, nelaseFiladelfiya, nelaseLawodisiya.”
Emkhatsini wato kwakukhona labefanana neNdvodzana yemuntfu, embetse umjiva lomudze, abophe ngembhenso wegolide esifubeni sakhe.
Inhloko netinwele takhe kwakumhlophe njengeboya betimvu, kumhlophe njengangcocwane; emehlo akhe afanana nelilangabi lemlilo.
Tinyawo takhe tatifanana nelitfusi lelilolongwe lacoliswa ngemlilo, livi lakhe lalifanana nekudvuma kwemanti lamanyenti.
Esandleni sakhe sangesekudla abephetse tinkhanyeti letisikhombisa, emlonyeni wakhe kuphuma inkemba leyayikhalipha tinhlangotsi totimbili, buso bakhe bumengetela njengelilanga emini.
Ngatsi kube ngimbone, ngawa ngasetinyaweni takhe, ngadzimate ngaba njengemuntfu lofile. Wangibamba ngesandla sakhe sangesekudla watsi: “Ungesabi, mine ngiwekucala newekugcina,
nalophilako. Ngafa, kodvwa ase ubheke nyalo, sengiyaphila, kuze kube phakadze, futsi nginetikhiya tekufa neteHayidesi.
Manje-ke, bhala konkhe lokubonako: lokukhona nalokutakwenteka ngemvakwaloko.

Imfihlakalo yaletinkhanyeti letisikhombisa lotibone esandleni sami sangesekudla, naletibane letisikhombisa ngule: Letinkhanyeti letisikhombisa tingilosi temabandla lasikhombisa; naletibane letisikhombisa ngemabandla lasikhombisa.”
“ ‘Nali livi leliphuma kuye lophetse tinkhanyeti letisikhombisa esandleni sakhe sangesekudla, lohamba emkhatsini wetibane letisikhombisa tegolide, utsi:

Ngiyayati imisebenti yakho, nekuphishaneka kwakho, nekubeketela kwakho, nekutsi ungeke ubamele bantfu lababi, kangangekutsi nalabo labatibita ngekutsi baphostoli, kantsi abasibo, ubahlolile, wavele wabakhandza bacala emanga.
Ngiyati kutsi uyabubeketelela bulukhuni, uhlupheke kakhulu ngenca yelibito lami; kodvwa awuzange sewudzinwe.
Kodvwa tsine nawe sehlukana la ekutseni wena awusangitsandzi njengobe bewungitsandza kucala.
Khumbula-ke lapho uwe khona. Phendvuka wente loko lowawukwenta ekucaleni. Nakungenjalo, ungaphendvuki, ngitawuta kuwe, ngisuse sibane sakho endzaweni yaso.
Noko, naku lokuhle ngawe: Uyayitondza imisebenti yemaNikholawu, njengobe nami ngiyitondza.
“ ‘Loncobako ngiyawumnika kutsi adle esihlahleni sekuphila, lesisePharadisi yaNkulunkulu.’ ”
“ ‘Nali livi leliphuma kuye lokucala nekugcina, lowafa wabuye waphila, utsi:
Ngiyakwati kuhlupheka kwakho; ngiyabati buphuya bakho, kodvwa ube unjingile. Ngiyakwati lokubi lokushiwo ngulabo labatsi bangemaJuda kantsi abasiwo, kodvwa babe balisinagoge laSathane.

Ungakwesabi loko lotakuhluphekela. Buka la, Sathane utawufaka labanye benu ejele, kuze nitewuvivinywa; nitawuhlushwa emalanga lalishumi. Yetsembeka kuze kube ngusekufeni, ngiyawukupha umchele wekuphila.
“ ‘Lowo loncobako ngeke kumente lutfo kufa kwesibili.’ ”
“ ‘Nali livi leliphuma kuye lonenkemba lekhalipha tinhlangotsi totimbili, utsi:

Ngiyati lapho uhlala khona; uhlala lapho Sathane anesihlalo sakhe sebukhosi khona. Libito lami ulibambisisile, awuzange ungihlubuke ngisho namhlazane Antipasi, fakazi wami lowetsembekile, abulawa emkhatsini wenu, lapho kuhlala khona Sathane.

Kodvwa tsine nawe sehlukana la ekutseni kusenebantfu labanemfundziso yaBhalamu emkhatsini wenu. Phela Bhalamu wafundzisa Bhalaki kutsi abekele baka-Israyeli lugibe, ngekubadlisa kudla lokunikelwe etithicweni, wabafundzisa kuphinga nebugwadla.
Nawe futsi unebantfu lababambelele kulemfundziso yemaNikholawu.
Phendvuka-ke. Nakungenjalo, ngitawuta kuwe masinyane, ngilwe nabo ngenkemba yemlomo wami.
“ ‘Loncobako ngiyawumnika lokukwemana lefihliwe, ngiphindze ngimnike litje lelimhlophe, nelibito lelisha, lelibhalwe etjeni, lelingatiwa ngumuntfu ngaphandle kwalowo lolemukelako.’ ”
“ ‘Nali livi leliphuma kuye loyiNdvodzana yaNkulunkulu, lonemehlo lavutsako kube shangatsi ngemalangabi emlilo, nalonetinyawo letifanana nelitfusi lelilolongiwe, utsi:
Ngiyayati imisebenti yakho, nelutsandvo, nekukholwa, nekukhonta, nekucinisela kwakho, nekutsi imisebenti yakho yamuva iyayendlula leya yakucala.

Kodvwa tsine nawe sehlukana la ekutseni wena uyamvumela lomfati longuJezebeli, lotibita ngekutsi ungumphrofethikati, edukise tinceku tami ngekutifundzisa buphingi, nebugwadla, nekudla kudla lokuhlatjelwe tithico.
Ngimnikile litfuba lekuphendvuka, kodvwa wala kuphendvuka ebugwadleni bakhe.
Manje-ke, ngitamlalisa ngesifo ecansini; labo labaphinga naye ngitawubafaka ekuhluphekeni lokukhulu, ngaphandle kwekutsi baphendvuke kulemihambo yakhe lemibi.
Bantfwabakhe ngiyawubashaya bafe. Onkhe emabandla ayawukwati kutsi nginguye lophenyisisa ingcondvo nenhlitiyo. Ngulowo nalowo emkhatsini wenu ngiyawumnika njengekwemisebenti yakhe.

“ ‘Kodvwa nonkhe nine lenisasele lapho eThiyathira, lenisengakangeni kulemfundziso, nani lenisengakatifundzi letintfo, labanye labatibita ngekutsi tintfo letijulile taSathane, kini-ke ngitsi: Anginetfwesi lomunye umtfwalo.
Kuphela nje bambelelani kuloko leninako, ngize ngifike.
“atibuse ngendvuku yensimbi, atiphihlite tidzimate tibe ticucu njengetincetu tembita leyakhiwe ngelibumba,”
“ ‘Lowo lonendlebe akeve loko lokushiwo nguMoya emabandleni!’ ”
“ ‘Nali livi leliphuma kuye lonemimoya yaNkulunkulu lesikhombisa, netinkhanyeti letisikhombisa utsi: Ngiyayati imisebenti yakho; unelibito lekutsi uyaphila, kantsi ufile.
Vuka, ucaphele, ucinise loko lokusasele lobese kutakufa, ngobe imisebenti yakho ngiyibonile kutsi ayikapheleli ebusweni baNkulunkulu wami.
Khumbula-ke loko lokwemukele wakuva, ukugcine, uphendvuke. Nangabe awuvuki ucaphele, ngitawuta kuwe ngikutume njengelisela, ngeke usati sikhatsi lengiyawukufikela ngaso.
Noko usenabo bantfu labambalwa lapho eSadesi labangakatingcolisi tingubo tabo, bayawuhamba nami bagcoke letimhlophe, ngobe vele bakufanele.
“ ‘Nali livi leliphuma kuye longcwele, loliciniso, lonesikhiya saDavide, lovula kungavali muntfu, avale kungavuli muntfu, utsi:
Ngiyayati imisebenti yakho. Lalela la, ngikuvulele umnyango, kute namunye longawuvala; ngiyati kutsi unemandla lamancane, kantsi livi lami uligcinile, nelibito lami awuzange uliphike.
Lalela la, labo labalisinagoge laSathane, labatsi bangemaJuda babe bangesiwo, bacala emanga, ngitawubenta bete bakhotsame etinyaweni takho, baze babone kutsi wena ngikutsandzile.
Njengobe uligcinile livi lami lekucinisela ngekubeketela, ngitakugcina ngesikhatsi sekulingwa lesitawufika emhlabeni wonkhe, sitewulinga bonkhe labo labahlala emhlabeni.
Ngiyeta masinyane, bambisisa loko lonako, kuze kubete umuntfu lokwemuka umchele wakho.
“ ‘Lowo lonendlebe akeve loko lokushiwo nguMoya emabandleni!’ ”
“ ‘Nali livi leliphuma kuye longu-Amen; nguye longufakazi lowetsembekile nalocinisile, ungumtfombo wendalo yaNkulunkulu utsi:
Ngiyayati imisebenti yakho, awucandzi, awushisi. Maye, bengingatsandza kutsi umane ushise nome ucandze!
Njengobe usivuvu, ungacandzi ungashisi, ngitakukhafula emlonyeni wami.
Wena utsi: “Nginjingile, nginako konkhe, angidzingi lutfo.” Kodvwa awati kutsi ungumuntfu wenhlupheko, newekuhawukelwa, uphuyile, uyimphumphutse, ungcunu.

Ngako-ke ngiyakuyala kutsi utsenge kimi igolide lelolongwe ngemlilo, khona utewuceba, utsenge tingubo letimhlophe tekwembatsa, khona utewufihla bungcunu bakho kutsi bungabonakali, utsenge nemutsi wekugcobisa emehlo akho kutsi ubone.
Labo lengibatsandzako ngiyabakhalimela ngibajezise; ngako-ke shisekela lokuhle, uphendvuke.
Lalela la, ngime emnyango ngiyanconcotsa; nangabe umuntfu eva livi lami, avule umnyango, mine ngiyawungena kuye, ngidle naye, naye adle nami.
“ ‘Lowo lonendlebe akeve loko lokushiwo nguMoya emabandleni!’ ”
Masinyane ngaba kuMoya, kwabonakala ezulwini kume sihlalo sebukhosi, kukhona bekahleti kuso.
Nalowo labehleti kuso abenebuso lobukhatimulisa kwelitje lejasiphe nesadiyu; lesihlalo sebukhosi sasitungeletwe ngumushi wenkosazana lowawufanana nelitje leliluhlata leliligugu.
Sihlalo sebukhosi sasitungeletwe nguletinye tihlalo tebukhosi letatingema-24, lekwakuhleti kuto emalunga langema-24. Lamalunga abembetse tingubo letimhlophe, afake nemichele yegolide etinhloko tawo.
Kulesihlalo sebukhosi bekuphuma imibane, nemavi, nekudvuma. Embikwaso bekuvutsa tidlwane letisikhombisa letingimimoya lesikhombisa yaNkulunkulu.
Kwakutungelete sihlalo sebukhosi kulolo nakulolo luhlendlo, tidalwa letine, leso naleso sinemehlo lamanyenti ngembili nangemuva.
Sidalwa sekucala sasifanana nelibhubesi, sesibili sifanana nelitfole, sesitsatfu sifanana nebuso bemuntfu, sesine sifanana nelusweti lolundizako.
Tonkhe letidalwa letine tatinemaphiko lasitfupha sisinye, tinemehlo yonkhe indzawo, ngephandle nangekhatsi. Tatihlabelela imini nebusuku tingakhawuli titsi:
Njalo nje nangabe letidalwa letine tatibabata bukhosi bakhe, timdvumise, tibonga lowo lohleti esihlalweni sebukhosi, nalophila kuze kube phakadze,
lamalunga langema-24 awa phansi embikwakhe lohleti esihlalweni sebukhosi, amkhonte lowo lophila kuze kube phakadze. Etfula imichele yawo ayibeke embikwesihlalo sebukhosi, ahlabelele atsi:
Ngabona ingilosi lenemandla imemeta ngelivi lelikhulu itsi: “Ngubani lofanele kuvula lencwadzi acatulule letimphawu tayo?”
Kwabate ngisho namunye ezulwini, nasemhlabeni, nangaphansi kwemhlaba, lowaba nemandla ekuyivula lencwadzi ayifundze.
Ngakhala kakhulu, ngobe kwabate ngisho namunye lowafaneleka kuyivula lencwadzi ayifundze.
Lelinye lalamalunga latsi kimi: “Ungakhali! Asubuke! INgwenyama yesive sakaJuda, lengumliba waDavide incobile. Yona-ke ingaticatulula letimphawu letisikhombisa ivule lencwadzi.”
Lasondzela lafike layitsatsa lencwadzi leyayisesandleni sangesekudla salowo labehleti esihlalweni sebukhosi.
Latsi kube liyitsatse lencwadzi, letidalwa letine kanye nemalunga langema-24 awa phansi embikweliWundlu, lelo nalelo liphetse ihabhu, netitja tegolide tigcwele imphepho lengimithandazo yalabangcwele.
Kwatsi chamu lihhashi lelimhlophe, nalona labeligibele aphetse butjoki, wanikwa umchele, wahamba ancoba, ayawuncoba.
Latsi liWundlu nalicatulula luphawu lwesibili, ngeva sidalwa sesibili sitsi: “Wota!”
Kwaphindze kwatsi chamu lihhashi lelibovu. Lowo labeligibele wavunyelwa kutsi ayewususa kuthula emhlabeni, kuze bantfu babulalane bodvwana; wanikwa inkemba lenkhulu.

Ngase ngiva livi shangatsi liphuma emkhatsini wetidalwa letine litsi: “Libinta lakolo wekudliwa ngelilanga lelingatsengwa ngeliholo lelilanga, nemabinta lamatsatfu emabele langatsengwa ngeliholo lelilanga; kepha ungawoni emafutsa neliwayini!”
Latsi liWundlu nalicatulula luphawu lwesine, ngeva livi lesidalwa sesine litsi: “Wota!”

Kwatsi chamu lihhashi lelimphofu, libito lemgibeli walo bekunguKufa, iHayidesi yamlandzela. Banikwa emandla etikwencenye yesine kukwemhlaba, kutsi bayibulale ngenkemba, nangendlala, nangesifo lesingelapheki, nangetilwane tesiganga.
Bamemeta kakhulu, ngelivi lelikhulu, batsi: “Nkhosi Somandla, longcwele naloliciniso, kuyawudzimate kube ngunini ungehluleli uphindzisele ingati yetfu kulabo labahleti emhlabeni?”
Ngamunye ngamunye wabo wase unikwa ingubo lemhlophe; batjelwa kutsi ase baphumule kancane, kuze kuphelele linani lalababetinceku kanye nabo nebazalwane babo, lababesetawubulawa njengabo.
Tinkhanyeti tesibhakabhaka tavutfuteleka emhlabeni njengekuhhohloka kwemakhiwa lasengakavutfwa emkhiweni, nakuhhusha umoya lomkhulu.
Sibhakabhaka sanyamalala njengekugocotwa kwelicansi; tonkhe tintsaba netichingi tesuswa etindzaweni tato.
Onkhe emakhosi emhlaba, netikhulu, netindvuna, nalabacebile, nalabanemandla, nabo bonkhe labatigcili, nalabakhululekile, babhaca emigedzeni nasemihumeni emkhatsini wemadvwala etintsaba.
Bamemeta tintsaba nemadvwala batsi: “Welani etikwetfu, nisifihle ebusweni balowo lohleti esihlalweni sebukhosi, naselulakeni lweliWundlu,
ngobe lilanga lelikhulu lelulaka labo selifikile. Ngubani longaba nemandla ekuma?”

Ngase ngibona lenye ingilosi yenyuka iphuma emphumalanga, iphetse luphawu lwaNkulunkulu lophilako; yamemeta ngelivi lelikhulu, imemeta letingilosi letine letatinikwe emandla ekulimata umhlaba nelwandle,
yatsi: “Ningawulimati umhlaba, nome lwandle, nome tihlahla, singakatibeki luphawu emabuntini tisebenti taNkulunkulu wetfu.”
Ngase ngitjelwa sibalo salababekwe luphawu kutsi bati-144 000. Babephuma kuto tonkhe tive taka-Israyeli:
Sakhala ngelivi lelikhulu satsi: “Insindziso yaNkulunkulu wetfu, lohleti esihlalweni sebukhosi, neyeliWundlu.”
Tonkhe tingilosi tema tatungeleta sihlalo sebukhosi, nemalunga, netidalwa letine, tawa phansi ngebuso embikwesihlalo sebukhosi, takhonta Nkulunkulu,
tatsi: “Amen! Sibusiso, nebukhosi, nekuhlakanipha, nekubongwa, neludvumo, nemandla, nekuncoba akube kuNkulunkulu phakadze naphakadze! Amen!”
Lelinye lemalunga lakhuluma kimi latsi: “Bobani laba labembetse tingubo letimhlophe, empeleni baphumaphi?”
Kungako nje basembikwesihlalo sebukhosi saNkulunkulu, bamkhonta imini nebusuku ethempelini lakhe; lowo lohlala esihlalweni sebukhosi uyawubasingatsa ngebukhona bakhe.
Bangeke baphindze balambe, bangeke baphindze bome, lilanga lingeke liphindze libahlabe ngekubashisa, kute nome ngayini leyawubashisa.
