Ngobe liWundlu laNkulunkulu lelisenkhabeni yesihlalo sebukhosi, liyawubelusa, libaholele emitfonjeni yemanti ekuphila. Nkulunkulu uyakwesula tonkhe tinyembeti tabo emehlweni abo.”
Ngase ngibona tingilosi letisikhombisa time embikwaNkulunkulu, tanikwa emacilongo lasikhombisa.
Intfutfu yemphepho yenyukela kuNkulunkulu kanye nemithandazo yalabangcwele, isuka esandleni sengilosi.
Lengilosi yasitsatsa lesitja yasigcwalisa ngemlilo lowawuselatini, yawujikijela emhlabeni; kwase kuba khona kudvuma, nemavi, nemibane nekutamatama kwemhlaba.
Tingilosi letatisikhombisa letatiphetse emacilongo lasikhombisa tatilungiselela kuwashaya.
Kwafa incenye yesitsatfu yako konkhe lokuphilako elwandle, kwabhujiswa nencenye yesitsatfu yemikhumbi.
Libito lalenkhanyeti bekunguMhlonyane. Incenye yesitsatfu yemanti yababa, kwafa bantfu labanyenti babulawa ngulamanti, ngobe abebaba.
Lenkhanyeti yawuvula lomgodzi longenamkhawulo, kwase kuphuma intfutfu leyayifanana nentfutfu yemlilo lomkhulu; lilanga nemoya kwaba mnyama ngenca yalentfutfu leyayiphuma kulomgodzi.
Kulentfutfu kwaphuma sikhonyane sehlela emhlabeni, sanikwa emandla lafanana nemandla abofecela bemhlaba.
Satjelwa kutsi singaboni tjani bemhlaba, nome yini leluhlata lekhulako, nome sihlahla, intfo nje sicondzane ngco nebantfu labangenalo luphawu lwaNkulunkulu emabuntini abo.
Savunyelwa kutsi sibatfose ngetinhlupho tinyanga letisihlanu, kodvwa singababulali. Lokuhlushwa kwabo kuyawuba njengebuhlungu bafecela, nakasutela umuntfu.
Kulawo malanga bantfu bayawukufuna kufa, kodvwa bangete bakutfola; bayawufisa kutsi bafe, kodvwa kufa kuyakubabalekela.
Tinwele taso tatifanana netalabasikati, ematinyo aso afanana nematinyo emabhubesi.
Esifubeni sasinetivikelo tesifuba tensimbi, imisindvo yetimphiko taso yayifanana nemdvumo wetincola temphi letinyenti tidvonswa ngemahhashi, lagijimela ekulweni.
Sasinemisila lefanana neyabofecela, inetindvonsi. Kulemisila yaso bekungulapho kunemandla aso ekuhlupha nekulimata bantfu tinyanga letisihlanu.
Inkhosi yaso lesibusako bekuyingilosi yemgodzi longenamkhawulo. Libito layo ngesiHebheru ngu-Abadoni, ngesiGriki ngu-Apoliyoni.
likhuluma kulengilosi yesitfupha leyayinelicilongo litsi: “Tfukulula letingilosi letine letiboshwe emfuleni lomkhulu iYufrathe.”
Ngako-ke letingilosi letine tatfukululwa. Tativele tilungiselwe li-awa, nelilanga, nenyanga, nemnyaka kutsi tibulale incenye yesitsatfu yabo bonkhe bantfu emhlabeni.
Ngeva kutsi lamabutfo labegibele emahhashi abengahle abe tigidzi letingema-200.

Embonweni wami lamahhashi ngawabona anje: Labagibeli babefake tivikelo tetifuba letatibovu njengemlilo, netesafire, netesibabule; tinhloko temahhashi tatinjengetinhloko temabhubesi, emilonyeni yawo kuphuma umlilo, nentfutfu, nesibabule.
Incenye yesitsatfu yebantfu yafa ibulawa nguletinhlupheko letintsatfu: umlilo, nentfutfu, nesibabule, lokwakuphuma emilonyeni yawo.
Ngobe emandla alamahhashi abesemilonyeni yawo nasemisileni yawo. Imisila yawo yayinetinhloko, ifanana netinyoka. Abelimata ngayo lemisila.
Abazange baphendvuke ekubulaleni kwabo, nasekutsakatseni kwabo, nasebugwadleni babo, nasebuphingini babo, nasekwebeni kwabo.
Yayiphetse incwajana levulekile esandleni sayo. Ngelunyawo lwayo lwangesekudla yema etikwelwandle, ngelwangesancele yema etikwemhlabatsi.
Yamemeta ngelivi lelikhulu lelalinjengelekubhodla kwelibhubesi. Yatsi kube imemete, kwevakala kudvuma lokusikhombisa.
Kwatsi kube kuvakale lokudvuma lokusikhombisa, ngase ngilungiselela kubhala, kodvwa ngeva livi liphuma ezulwini litsi: “Loko lokushiwo kudvuma lokusikhombisa ungakubhali phansi; kugcine kuyimfihlo.”
yamfunga yena lophila kuze kube phakadze, lowadala lizulu nako konkhe lokukulo, nemhlaba nako konkhe lokukuwo, nelwandle nako konkhe lokukulo, yatsi: “Kutawubate lokutawubambelela!
Kodvwa kutawutsi ngesikhatsi selivi lengilosi yesikhombisa, nase itawushaya licilongo layo, kufezeke imfihlakalo yaNkulunkulu, njengobe abetsembisile etisebentini takhe, baphrofethi.”
Ngako ngaya kulengilosi, ngayitjela kutsi ayinginike lencwajana. Yatsi kimi: “Yitsatse, uyidle. Itawuluma esiswini, kodvwa ibe mnandzi njengeluju emlonyeni.”
Ngayitsatsa-ke lencwajana esandleni salengilosi, ngayidla. Yaba mnandzi njengeluju emlonyeni wami, kodvwa ngatsi nase ngiyidlile yaluma esiswini sami.
Ngatjelwa kwatsiwa: “Kufanele uphrofethe ngebantfu labanyenti, nangetive, nangetilimi, nangemakhosi.”
Kodvwa ungasilinganisi sibuya lesingephandle kwalelithempeli, ngobe siniketwe betive labayakuwugcobagcoba lomuti longcwele tinyanga letingema-42.
Bofakazi bami lababili labembetse emasaka ngiyawubanika emandla ekuphrofetha emalanga layi-1 260.”
Nakukhona lotama kubalimata, kutawuphuma umlilo emlonyeni wabo utishise uticedze tonkhe leto titsa tabo; nangabe-ke kukhona lotama kubalimata, nakanjani uyawubulawa.

Laba banemandla ekuvala litulu kutsi lingani ngesikhatsi sekuphrofetha kwabo. Banemandla etikwemanti kutsi bawagucule abe yingati. Banemandla futsi ekushaya umhlaba ngako konkhe kuhlupheka nome kukangaki, kuye njengekutsandza kwabo.
Tidvumbu tabo tiyawulala esitaladini selidolobha lelikhulu lelibitwa ngekufanekisa kutsi yiSodoma neGibhithe, lapho iNkhosi yabo yabetselwa khona.
Kuyawuphela emalanga lamatsatfu nesigamu seloku bantfu bemindeni, netive, netilimi batibuka letidvumbu bangavumi kutsi tingcwatjwe.
Bantfu labahlala emhlabeni bayawukutsakasela kufa kwabo labo bofakazi. Bayawugubha imikhosi, bephane netipho, ngobe phela labaphrofethi lababili bese babahluphile emhlabeni.
Kodvwa emvakwemalanga lamatsatfu nesigamu umoya wekuphila lophuma kuNkulunkulu wangena kubo, basukuma, bema ngetinyawo; bonkhe labakubona loku befikelwa kwesaba lokukhulu.
Base beva livi lelikhulu liphuma ezulwini litsi kubo: “Yenyukani nite la!” Tatiloku tibabuka titsa tabo, nabenyuka ngelifu baya ezulwini.

Ngaso leso sikhatsi kwaba khona kutamatama lokukhulu kwemhlaba, incenye yelishumi yelidolobha yabhidlika. Kwafa bantfu lababeti-7 000 kuloko kutamatama, laba labanye batfutfumela badvumisa Nkulunkulu welizulu.
Emalunga langema-24 labehleti etihlalweni tawo tebukhosi embikwaNkulunkulu, awa phansi ngebuso, akhuleka kuNkulunkulu,
ngekutsi utsatse emandla akho lamakhulu, wabusa.
Kwase kuba khona sibonakaliso lesikhulu ezulwini, umfati embetse lilanga, inyanga ingaphansi kwetinyawo takhe, enhloko kunemchele wetinkhanyeti letili-12.
Abetetfwele, wakhala ngenca yemihelo, nekusikwa buhlungu bekubeleka.
Umsila wakhe wahudvula incenye yesitsatfu yetinkhanyeti tesibhakabhaka, watilahla emhlabeni. Nyokangwenya wema embikwalomfati labesatawubeleka, entela kutsi alumite lusabelekwa nje loluswane.
Wabeleka indvodzana, letawubusa tonkhe tive ngesandla lesimatima. Loluswane lwakhe lwahlwitselwa kuNkulunkulu, esihlalweni sakhe sebukhosi.
Lomfati wabaleka waya ehlane, lapho Nkulunkulu amlungiselela indzawo yekutsi anakekelwe emalanga layi-1 260.
kodvwa behlulwa bonyokangwenya; kwabate indzawo yabo ezulwini.
Nyokangwenya lomkhulu walahlelwa phansi, leya nyoka yasemandvulo, lebitwa ngekutsi nguMhlebi nome nguSathane, uMkhohlisi wemhlaba wonkhe. Wajikijelwa phansi emhlabeni kanye netingilosi takhe.
Bamehlule ngengati yeliWundlu nangelivi lebufakazi babo, ngobe abakutsandzanga kuphila kwabo kwaze kwabasekufeni.
Tfokotani-ke, nine mazulu, nani lenihlala kuwo! Kodvwa maye kuwe, mhlaba nelwandle, ngobe Mhlebi sewehlele kini ngentfukutselo lenkhulu, ngobe uyati kutsi sikhatsi sakhe sesifishane!”
Watsi kube nyokangwenya abone kutsi sewulahlelwe phansi emhlabeni, watingela lomfati labetele indvodzana.
Kodvwa lomfati wanikwa timphiko letimbili telusweti lolukhulu, kuze atewundiza abalekele lenyoka aye ehlane endzaweni lapho kufanele ondliwe khona, kuze kube sikhatsi netikhatsi nencenye yesikhatsi.
Lenyoka yona yacitsa emanti ngemlomo wayo, kwaba sengatsi ngewemfula, alandzela lomfati, kuze atewumkhukhula lamanti.
Kodvwa umhlaba wasita lomfati ngekutsi uvule umlomo wawo umite lomfula lowawucitfwe ngunyokangwenya ngemlomo wakhe.
Nyokangwenya wamtfukutselela kakhulu lomfati, wahamba wayawulwa nensali yentalo yakhe, labo labagcina imiyalo yaNkulunkulu nalabanebufakazi baJesu.
Lesilo sasifanana nengwe, tinyawo taso tatifanana netelibhele, umlomo waso wawufanana newelibhubesi. Nyokangwenya wasinika emandla akhe, nesihlalo sakhe sebukhosi, nemagunya akhe lamakhulu.
Lenye yetinhloko taso yayilinyatwe yakhehletwa sakufa, kodvwa lelinceba laso lekufa lelashwa laphola, wonkhe umhlaba wamangala wasilandzela lesilo.
Bantfu bakhonta lonyokangwenya, ngobe emandla akhe abewanike lesilo; lesilo basikhonta batsi: “Ngubani longalwa naso?”
Sahlambalata Nkulunkulu, sihlambalata libito lakhe, nalapho ahlala khona, nabo bonkhe labahlala khona ezulwini.
Savunyelwa nekutsi silwe nalabangcwele sibehlule, sanikwa nemandla etikwayo yonkhe imindeni, nebantfu, netilimi, netive.
Bonkhe labahlala emhlabeni bayawusikhonta, bokhe labo lekwatsi umhlaba ungakasekelwa emabito abo angete abhalwa encwadzini yekuphila yeliWundlu lelahlatjwa.
Ngase ngibona lesinye silo lesaphuma emhlabatsini, sasinetimphondvo letimbili letatifanana netelizinyane lemvu, sakhuluma njenganyokangwenya.
Sasebentisa onkhe emandla esilo sekucala ngeligunya laso; saphocelela umhlaba nabo bonkhe labahlala kuwo kutsi bakhonte lesilo sekucala leselashwa saphiliswa encebeni laso lekufa.
Senta tibonakaliso letinkhulu, ngisho nekwehlisa umlilo ezulwini wehlele emhlabeni embikwebantfu bonkhe babuka.

Silo sesibili savunyelwa kutsi sikhohlise bonkhe bantfu labahlala emhlabeni ngaletibonakaliso lesasitenta ngeligunya lesilo sekucala. Lesilo sesibili sabatjela kutsi bakhe umfanekiso, bakhele lesilo sekucala lesasinelinceba lenkemba lelelashwa laphiliswa.
Silo sesibili sanikwa emandla ekuphefumulela lomfanekiso wesilo, kuze kutsi ukhulume, sente nekutsi labo labangawukhonti lomfanekiso babulawe.
Lesilo saphocelela bonkhe labancane nalabakhulu, ticebi netimphuya, labakhululekile netigcili, kutsi babekwe luphawu ngulowo nalowo esandleni sakhe sangesekudla nome ebuntini.
Loko kwentelwa kutsi kubete lotsengako nome lotsengisako ngaphandle kwekutsi abe neluphawu lekulibito lesilo nome inombolo yelibito laso.
Ngeva livi liphuma ezulwini lelevakala lifanana nemabhudlo emanti, lifanana nekudvuma lokukhulu. Lelivi lalifanana nekuhlabela kwetingitali tishaywa bashayi bato.

Labantfu lababenelibito leliWundlu neleYise emabuntini abo, basukuma bahlabela ingoma lensha embikwesihlalo sebukhosi, nasembikwetidalwa letine, nasembikwemalunga. Kute lomunye labengahle abe nemandla ekufundza lengoma, ngaphandle kwabo kuphela lababehlengiwe emhlabeni lababeti-144 000.

Laba bangemadvodza langazange asatingcolise ngalabasikati, bamsulwa. Ngibo laba labalandzela liWundlu nome kukuphi lapho liya khona. Kubo bonkhe bantfu ngibo labahlengiwe, balulibo lwaNkulunkulu nelweliWundlu.
Akuzange sekutfolakale emanga emilonyeni yabo, abanasici.

Ngase ngibona lenye ingilosi indiza emkhatsini esibhakabhakeni, iphetse liVangeli lelingunaphakadze lekushunyayelwa kulabo labahlala emhlabeni, etiveni tonkhe, nasemindenini yonkhe, nasetilimini tonkhe, nakubantfu bonkhe.
Yakhuluma ngelivi lelikhulu yatsi: “Yesabani Nkulunkulu, nimnike ludvumo, ngobe sikhatsi sekwehlulela kwakhe sesifikile; mkhonteni yena lowo lowenta lizulu nemhlaba, nelwandle, nemitfombo yemanti!”
Kwalandzela ingilosi yesitsatfu; yakhuluma ngelivi lelikhulu yatsi: “Nakukhona lokhonta silo nemfanekiso waso, emukele neluphawu lwaso ebuntini lakhe nasesandleni sakhe,

uyawunatsa liwayini lentfukutselo yaNkulunkulu lelinekuphelela kwemandla alo latselwa endzebeni yelulaka lwakhe. Uyawuhlushwa aviswe buhlungu ngemlilo nangesibabule, embikwetingilosi letingcwele nasembikweliWundlu.
Intfutfu yekuhlupheka kwabo yenyuka, kuze kube nini nanini. Abanako kuphumula, imini nebusuku, labo labakhonta silo nemfanekiso waso, nome ngangubani lowemukela luphawu lwelibito laso.”
Moya waphendvula watsi: “Babusisiwe ngempela! Bayawuphumula ekusebenteni kwabo kamatima, ngobe tento tabo tiyabalandzela.”

Lenye ingilosi yaphuma ethempelini, imemeta lona bekahleti etikwelifu ngelivi lelikhulu itsi: “Tfumela lelo sikela lakho, kuvunwe, ngobe sikhatsi sekuvuna sesifikile, tonkhe tilimo sekufanele tivunwe.”
Ngako lowo bekahleti etikwelifu walijikijela emhlabeni lelisikela lakhe, umhlaba wase uyavunwa-ke.
Kwaphuma lenye ingilosi ethempelini lelisezulwini; nayo futsi yayinelisikela lelikhaliphako.

Kwase kuphuma lenye ingilosi elatini, lengilosi inemandla etikwemlilo, nayo yamemeta ngelivi lelikhulu imemeta lona bekaphetse lisikela lelikhaliphako yatsi: “Tfumela lelo sikela lakho, kujutjwe emagelebisi esivinini semhlaba, ngobe lamagelebisi asavutsiwe.”
Ngako lengilosi yalijikijela emhlabeni lisikela layo, yajuba emagelebisi emvinini, yawafaka etjeni lekuhluta lentfukutselo yaNkulunkulu.

Lamagelebisi ahluteka kulelitje lekuhluta lelingephandle kwelidolobha lelikhulu. Kulelitje kwaphuma ingati leyageleta; libanga lebudze lalingemastadiyu layi-1 600, kujula kwakungangekusuka phansi kuye ematomini elihhashi.
Babehlabela ingoma yaMosi, sisebenti saNkulunkulu, nengoma yeliWundlu, batsi:
Kwaphuma kulo tingilosi letisikhombisa tiphetse tinhlupho letisikhombisa tatembetse tingubo telineni lehlantekile, tikhanya timhlophe. Etifubeni tatitibophe ngemibhenso yegolide.
Lesinye saletidalwa letine sanika letingilosi letisikhombisa titja tegolide letisikhombisa tigcwele lulaka lwaNkulunkulu lophila kuze kube phakadze.
Lithempeli lagcwaliswa ngentfutfu yenkhatimulo nemandla aNkulunkulu, bekute muntfu labengahle abe nemandla ekungena ethempelini tingakapheli tinhlupho letisikhombisa tetingilosi letisikhombisa.
Ingilosi yesitsatfu yatfululela sitja sayo emifuleni nasetiyalwini temanti. Emanti agucuka, aba yingati.
Ngase ngiva ingilosi lephetse emanti itsi: “Wena, Longcwele, lokhona, nalabekhona, ulungile; tehlulelo takho timsulwa:
Bantfu bacitse ingati yalabangcwele, neyebaphrofethi, ngako sewubanike ingati kutsi bayinatse. Kubafanele loko!”
Ngase ngiva livi liphuma elatini litsi: “Nkhosi, Nkulunkulu, Somandla! Tiliciniso, futsi timsulwa tehlulelo takho!”
Ingilosi yesine yatfululela sitja sayo elangeni; lavunyelwa kutsi lishise bantfu ngekushisa lokukhulu.
Bantfu bashiswa kakhulu, badzimate bacalekisa libito laNkulunkulu lonemandla etikwaletinhlupho; kodvwa abazange baphendvuke badvumise nebukhosi bakhe.
Bacalekisa Nkulunkulu wasezulwini ngenca yebuhlungu babo netilondza tabo, kodvwa bangete baphendvuka emisebentini yabo lemibi.
Ngase ngibona imimoya lemibi lemitsatfu: Lomunye wawuphuma emlonyeni wanyokangwenya, lomunye uphuma emlonyeni wesilo, lomunye uphuma emlonyeni wemphrofethi wemanga. Lemimoya beyinjengetigogodvolo.
Bekungimimoya yemadimoni, lanemandla ekwenta tibonakaliso. Beyiphumele kuyawuhlanganisa emakhosi emhlaba wonkhe, iwalungiselela imphi yelilanga lelikhulu laNkulunkulu, Somandla.
Kwaba nebumanyamanya bemibane, nemisindvo lemikhulu, nekudvuma, nekutamatama kwemhlaba lokungazange sekube khona seloku kwadalwa umuntfu; ngempela kwaba kutamatama kwemhlaba lokukhulu kakhulu.
Lidolobha lelikhulu lajubeka laba tincamu letintsatfu, nemadolobha etive abhidlika. Nkulunkulu wayikhumbula iBhabhulona lenkhulu, wayinatsisa endzebeni yentfukutselo yakhe.

Kwehla lesikhulu sangcotfo, lesingematje lamakhulu, sisindvo sawo lilinye litje bekungaba ngemakhilogremu langema-50. Lesangcotfo sehlela kubantfu labacalekisa Nkulunkulu ngenca yeluswati lababeshaywa ngalo, ngobe lwalwesabeka kakhulu.
Emakhosi emhlaba aphingana nayo. Bonkhe bantfu bemhlaba badzakwa kunatsa liwayini lebugwadla bayo.”

Lomfati bekagcoke ingubo lebukhwebeletane nalebovu, abembeswe ngemihlobiso yegolide, nangematje laligugu, nangemapharele. Esandleni sakhe abephetse indzebe yegolide igcwele emanyala nekungcola kwebugwadla bakhe.
Ebuntini lakhe kwakubhalwe libito leliyimfihlakalo litsi: “IBhabhulona lenkhulu, unina wetingwadla nemanyala emhlaba.”
Ngabona kutsi lomfati abesadzakwe yingati yalabangcwele, nengati yalabo labafela kufakaza ngaJesu.
Kodvwa ingilosi yangibuta yatsi: “Umangaliswa yini? Ngitakutjela imfihlakalo yalomfati, neyalesilo lesimetfwele lesinetinhloko letisikhombisa netimphondvo letilishumi.

Lesilo losibonile sake saphila, kodvwa nyalo asisaphili; sesitawuphuma kulomgodzi longenamkhawulo siye ekubhujisweni. Bantfu labakhe emhlabeni labamabito abo langabhalwanga encwadzini yekuphila, seloku kwasekelwa umhlaba, bayawumangala, nababona lesilo, ngobe sasiphila, kodvwa nyalo asisaphili, noko siyawuphindze sivele.
Lasihlanu awo awile, yinye lekhona, lena lenye-ke isengakefiki. Nayifika, iyawubusa sikhashana.
Lesilo lesasiphila, nyalo asisaphili, siyinkhosi yesiphohlongo kulawo lasikhombisa. Lesilo siya ekubhujisweni.
Onkhe lawa lalishumi acondze intfo yinye: Kutsi anike silo emandla awo neligunya.
Ayawulwa neliWundlu; kodvwa liyakuwehlula, ngobe liyiNkhosi yemakhosi neMbusi webabusi. Liyawuwancoba likanye nalababitiwe balo, labakhetsiwe nalabetsembekile.”
Letimphondvo letilishumi lotibonile nesilo tiyawuyitondza lengwadla; tiyawukutsatsa konkhe lenako tiyishiye ingcunu, tidle inyama yayo, tiyishise ngemlilo.
Ngobe Nkulunkulu ukufake etinhlitiyweni tato kutsi tifeze injongo yakhe, ngekutsi tibe mcondvo munye, tinikete bukhosi bato kulesilo, kuze kugcwaliseke emavi aNkulunkulu.
“Lomfati lombonile lidolobha lelikhulu lelibusa emakhosi emhlaba.”
Emvakwaloko ngabona lenye ingilosi lenkhulu yehla iphuma ezulwini, ineligunya lelikhulu. Inkhatimulo yayo yakhanyisa umhlaba wonkhe.
Ayawuma bucalu ngobe ayawube esaba kutfoswa kwayo ngetinhlupho, ayawutsi: ‘Maye! Maye! Hhawu, Bhabhulona! Dolobha lelikhulu lelinemandla! Kwehlulelwa kwakho sekwenteke ngesikhashana nje!’ ”

imphahla yegolide, neyesiliva, neyematje ladulile, neyemapharele, neyelineni lecolisakele, nalebubendze, neyesilika, nalebovu, neyato tonkhe tihlahla temakha, naletentiwe ngematinyo etindlovu, nato tonkhe letilitfusi, netensimbi, netemabuli,
nesinamoni, netinandzisi, nemphepho, nemakha, nenhlaka, neliwayini, nemafutsa, nafulaha locolisakele, nakolo, netinkhomo, netimvu, nemahhashi, netincola, netigcili kanye nemiphefumulo yebantfu.
Bahwebi bayawutsi kuyo: ‘Tonkhe titselo lebewutifisa atisekho kuwe, konkhe kutamasa nebucwebecwebe bakho abusekho, futsi ngeke uphindze ubutfole!’
Bahwebi baletimphahla labadzimate baceba ngalengwadla, bayawuma bucalu, ngobe bayawube besaba kutfoswa kwayo ngetinhlupho. Bayawukhala, balile
batsi: ‘Maye! Waze wabhubha dolobha lelikhulu! Yeka kwembatsiswa kwakho ngelineni lecolisakele, nalebukhwebeletane, nalebovu, nekuhlotjiswa ngegolide, nangematje laligugu, nangemapharele!
“Bonkhe bashayeli bemikhumbi, kanye nalabahamba ngayo, nematilosi ayo, nabo bonkhe labasebenta elwandle bema bucalu.
Bakhala nababona iphakama lentfutfu yekusha kwalelidolobha batsi: ‘Kute lidolobha lelikhulu lelase laba ngangalo!’

Batitsela ngetintfuli etinhloko, balila, bakhala, bamemeta batsi: ‘Maye! Maye! Hhawu, yehheni, lelidolobha lelikhulu kangaka lelicebise bonkhe labanemikhumbi elwandle! Ngesikhashana nje lilahlekelwe ngiko konkhe.’ ”
Lelineni lecolisakele itento nemisebenti lelungile yalabangcwele.
Emehlo akhe abenjengemalangabi emlilo, enhloko yakhe bekunemichele leminyenti; abenelibito lebelibhaliwe lelingatiwa ngumuntfu ngaphandle kwakhe.
Abembetse ingubo leyayenyiwe engatini. Libito lakhe nguLivi laNkulunkulu.
Emabutfo asezulwini amlandzela agibele emahhashi lamhlophe, embetse tingubo letimhlophe letihlantekile telineni.

Emlonyeni wakhe kuphuma inkemba lekhaliphako latawushaya tive ngayo, uyawutibusa ngesandla lesimatima. Uyawunyatsela litje lesikhamo seliwayini. Leliwayini liyintfukutselo yelulaka lwaNkulunkulu Somandla.
Engutjeni yakhe nasetsangeni lakhe kubhalwe libito lelitsi: “INkhosi yemakhosi, uMbusi webabusi.”
Wotani nitewudla inyama letidvumbu temakhosi, netetindvuna, netemadvodza lanemandla, netemahhashi kanye netebagibeli bawo, netabo bonkhe bantfu, labakhululekile netigcili, labancane nalabakhulu.”

Kodvwa lesilo satfunjwa, kanye nemphrofethi wemanga labenta tibonakaliso tekudukisa labo labaneluphawu lwesilo nalabasikhonta ngekukhotsamela lomfanekiso waso. Bobabili bajikijelwa baphila echibini lemlilo lelivutsa sibabule.
Laba labanye babulawa ngenkemba lephuma emlonyeni walowo logibele lihhashi. Tonkhe tinyoni tesutsa inyama yetidvumbu tabo.
Yabamba nyokangwenya, inyoka lendzala, lekutsiwa nguMhlebi nome nguSathane; yambopha ngeluketane iminyaka leyinkhulungwane.
Yamjika emgodzini longenamkhawulo, yamvalela yase ibeka luphawu etikwakhe, kutsi angasaphindzi edukise tive, kuze kuphele leminyaka leyinkhulungwane. Emvakwaloko kufanele akhululwe sikhashane.
Laba labanye lababefile abazange bavuke ekufeni, kwadzimate kwaphela iminyaka leyinkhulungwane. Loku kuvuka ekufeni kwekucala.
Babusisiwe futsi bangcwele labo labahlanganyela ekuvukeni kwekucala. Kufa kwesibili kute emandla etikwabo, kodvwa bayawuba baphristi baNkulunkulu naKhristu, bayawubusa naye iminyaka leyinkhulungwane.
Kuyawutsi kube kuphele iminyaka leyinkhulungwane, Sathane uyawukhululwa ekuboshweni kwakhe.
Uyawutsi nasaphumile ahambe ayewudukisa boGogi naMagogi, tive letisemagunjini omane emhlaba, kutsi atihlanganisele imphi. Letinye tingangesihlabatsi saselwandle.
Tenyuka tahlakateka nemhlaba wonkhe, tafike tatungeleta inkambu yebantfu baNkulunkulu nemuti lotsandzekako. Kwehla umlilo uphuma ezulwini, watidla tonkhe.
Sathane labedukise leto tive wabanjwa, wajikwa echibini lemlilo lonesibabule, lapho bekukhona khona silo kanye nemphrofethi wemanga. Bayawuhlushwa batfoseke imini nebusuku phakadze naphakadze.

Ngabona labafile, labakhulu nalabancane, beme embikwaso lesihlalo sebukhosi. Tincwadzi tavulwa. Nalenye incwadzi yavulwa, incwadzi yekuphila. Labafile behlulelwa ngekwemisebenti yabo, ngaloko lokwakubhalwe etincwadzini.
Lwandle lwakhipha labafile lababekulo, kufa nendzawo yalabafile kwaniketa labafile lababekuko; bonkhe bantfu behlulelwa ngekwemisebenti yabo.
Kufa nendzawo yalabafile kwajikwa echibini lemlilo. Loku kufa kwesibili, lichibi lelivutsa umlilo.
Lowo libito lakhe lelalingakabhalwa encwadzini yekuphila, wajikwa echibini lelivutsa umlilo.
Ngabona likhaya lelingcwele, iJerusalema Lensha, lehla liphuma ezulwini kuNkulunkulu, lilungiswe kahle lahlotjiswa njengamakoti ahlobele kuyawuhlangabeta umyeni wakhe emshadweni.

Ngeva livi liphuma esihlalweni sebukhosi limemeta kakhulu litsi: “Nalo likhaya laNkulunkulu likubantfu. Nkulunkulu utawuhlala emkhatsini wabo, bona babe bantfu bakhe. Nkulunkulu cobo lwakhe uyawuhlala nabo, abe nguNkulunkulu wabo.
Uyakwesula tonkhe tinyembeti emehlweni abo, sekuyawubate kufa, nekulila, nekukhala, nebuhlungu, ngobe kwakucala sekwendlulile.”
Wase utsi kimi: “Sekwentekile. Mine ngingu-Alfa na-Omega, sicalo nesiphetfo. Lowo lowomile ngiyawumnika lilungelo lekunatsa mahhala emtfonjeni wemanti ekuphila.
Lowo loncobako uyawudla lifa lato tonkhe letintfo: Mine ngiyawuba nguNkulunkulu wakhe, yena abe yindvodzana yami.

Kodvwa sabelo semagwala, nalabangakholwa, nalabanengekako, nebabulali, netingwadla, netiphingi, nebatsakatsi, nalabakhonta tithico, nalabacala emanga, kuyawuba lichibi lelivutsa umlilo nesibabule; loku kufa kwesibili.”
Yangitsatsa ngikuMoya, yangibeka esicongweni sentsaba lephakeme kakhulu. Yangikhombisa likhaya lelingcwele, iJerusalema Lensha, lehla, liphuma kuNkulunkulu ezulwini.
Lalinenkhatimulo yaNkulunkulu. Kukhanya kwalo kwakumengetela njengelitje leliligugu nalelidule kakhulu; lalinjengejasiphi lecwebetelako.
Belinelubondza loludze loluphakeme kakhulu, lunemasango lali-12. Kulamasango bekunetingilosi letili-12. Bekubhalwe kuwo emabito etive letili-12, emadvodzana a-Israyeli.
Bekunemasango lamatsatfu ngasemphumalanga, nangasenyakatfo amatsatfu, nangaseningizimu amatsatfu, nangasenshonalanga amatsatfu.
Lolubondza lwalelikhaya lwalunetisekelo tematje lali-12; etikwawo bekubhalwe emabito lali-12 ebaphostoli beliWundlu.
Lengilosi lebeyikhuluma nami beyiphetse indvuku yegolide yekukala lelikhaya, nemasango alo kanye nelubondza lwalo.

Lelikhaya belinetinhlendlo letine letilinganako; budze balo bebulingana nebubanti balo. Yase ilikala ngalendvuku-ke lelikhaya: Laba ngemastadiyu lati-12 000. Budze nebubanti nekuphakama kwalo bekulingana.
Yase ikala lubondza lwalo, lona-ke lwaba tinyatselo letili-144 kuphakama kwalo, isebentisa leso silinganiso lesivamile.
Lolubondza lwalwakhiwe ngejasiphi, likhaya lalakhiwe ngegolide, kucweba kwalo bekunjengekwengilazi.
Tisekelo talolubondza lwalelikhaya betihlotjiswe ngematje laligugu nalatinhlobonhlobo: Litje lesisekelo sekucala bekuyijasiphi, lesibili kuyisafire, lesitsatfu kuyikhalkedoni, lesine kuyisimaragidu,

lesihlanu kuyisadoniksi, lesitfupha kuyisadiyusi, lesikhombisa kuyikhrisolithe, lesiphohlongo kuyibherili, lemfica kuyithophazi, lelishumi kuyikhrisophrasi, leli-11 kuyihiyakinte, leli-12 kuyi-amethiste.
Lamasango lali-12 bekungemapharele lali-12; lelo nalelo sango lalakhiwe ngelipharele linye. Umgwaco walelo khaya bewuyigolide lecwebile lenjengengilazi lekubonakala ngale kwayo.
Angizange ngilibone lithempeli kulelo khaya, ngobe iNkhosi Nkulunkulu, Somandla, neliWundlu bekungulona lithempeli lalo.
Lelo khaya alilidzingi lilanga nenyanga, kutsi kulikhanyisele, ngobe inkhatimulo yaNkulunkulu iyalikhanyisela, nesibane salo liWundlu.
Tive tiyawuhamba ekukhanyeni kwalo, nemakhosi emhlaba ayakwetfula kulo emagugu ebukhosi bawo.
Emasango alo ayawuhlala avuliwe sonkhe sikhatsi, ngobe sekuyawubate busuku.
Tive tiyawuletsa kulo emagugu ato nebukhosi bato.
Kute lokungcolile lokuyawungena kulo, ngisho nalowenta lokubi nalonemacebo angeke angene kulo; kodvwa kuyawungena kuphela labo emabito abo labhaliwe encwadzini yekuphila yeliWundlu.
Ageleta ehla nemgwaco welikhaya. Ngale nangale kwalomfula bekunesihlahla sekuphila. Besitsela titselo emahlandla lali-12 ngemnyaka, lokusho kutsi kanye ngenyanga. Emacembe aso abephilisa tive.
Sihlalo sebukhosi saNkulunkulu neseliWundlu siyawuba kulo. Tinceku takhe tiyawumkhonta.
Tiyawubonana naye buso nebuso; libito lakhe liyawubasemabuntini ato.
Kuyawubate busuku, tingeke tikudzinge nekukhanya kwesibane nome kwelilanga, ngobe iNkhosi Nkulunkulu iyakutikhanyisela, tiyawubusa phakadze naphakadze.
Ngimi, Johane, loweva waphindze wakubona konkhe loku. Ngatsi kube ngikuve ngikubone konkhe loku, ngawa phansi ngasetinyaweni talengilosi lebeyingikhombisa letintfo, ngentela kuteyikhotsama.
Yatsi kimi: “Ungakwenti loko. Nami ngisisebenti nje njengawe, nebazalwane bakho lababaphrofethi, kanye nabo bonkhe labawentako lamavi alencwadzi. Khotsama Nkulunkulu.”
Yachubeka yatsi kimi: “Ungawafihli lamavi alesiphrofetho salencwadzi, ngobe sikhatsi sesisedvute.
Lomubi akachubeke nebubi bakhe, lowonako achubeke one, lolungile achubeke nekulunga kwakhe, longcwele achubeke nebungcwele.”
Ngingu-Alfa na-Omega, wekucala newekugcina, sicalo nesiphetfo.
Kepha ngephandle kunetinja, nebatsakatsi, netingwadla, netiphingi, nebabulali, nalabakhonta tithico, nabo bonkhe labatsandza kucala emanga ngekukhuluma nangetento.
Lowo lowomile akete; nalowo lofuna emanti ekuphila, akawanatse mahhala.
Nakukhona lowaphungulako lamavi alesiphrofetho lesikulencwadzi, naNkulunkulu uyawuphungula sabelo sakhe esihlahleni sekuphila nasekhaya lelingcwele, njengobe sekuchaziwe kulencwadzi.
Umusa weNkhosi awube nabo bonkhe labangcwele.
